# 42004038	Simoni zokʾanchʾĕ gĕ towaytēr sastig tentov , ow tʾakhantsetsʾin iren , anor hamar .
#43006051	Etʾē mēgĕ owtē ays hatsʾēn , biti abri yawitean : ew ayn hatsʾĕ or es biti tam , im marmins ē , or biti tam ashkharhi geankʾin hamar » .
#44028031	ow g!ĕntownēr polor iren egoghnerĕ ,
#50004021	Parewetsʾēkʾ polor sowrperĕ Yisows Kʾristosov .
40001001	Yisows Kʾristosi , Tawitʾi ortiin , Aprahami ortiin dznownti kirkʾĕ .
40001002	Apraham dznaw Isahagĕ : Isahag dznaw Yagopĕ : Yagop dznaw Yowtan ow anor eghpayrnerĕ :
40001003	Yowta dznaw Pʾarēsn ow Zaran , Tʾamarēn : Pʾarēs dznaw Esronĕ : Esron dznaw Aramĕ :
40001004	Aram dznaw Aminatapĕ : Aminatap dznaw Naasonĕ : Naason dznaw Saghmonĕ :
40001005	Saghmon dznaw Poosĕ , Ṛakhapēn : Poos dznaw Ovpētĕ , Hṛowtʾēn : Ovpēt dznaw Yessēn :
40001006	Yessē dznaw Tawitʾ tʾakaworĕ : Tawitʾ tʾakaworĕ dznaw Soghomonĕ , Owriayi gnochmēn :
40001007	Soghomon dznaw Ṛopovamĕ :
40001008	Ṛopovam dznaw Apian : Apia dznaw Asan : Asa dznaw Yovsapʾatĕ : Yovsapʾat dznaw Yovramĕ : Yovram dznaw Ozian :
40001009	Ozia dznaw Yovatʾamĕ : Yovatʾam dznaw Akʾazĕ , Akʾaz dznaw Ezegian :
40001010	Ezegia dznaw Manasēn : Manasē dznaw Amonĕ :
40001011	Amon dznaw Yovsian : Yovsia dznaw Yekʾonian ow anor eghpayrnerĕ , Papeloni tarakrowtʾean atennerĕ :
40001012	Papeloni tarakrowtʾenēn etkʾ , Yekʾonia dznaw Saghatʾiēlĕ :
40001013	Saghatʾiēl dznaw Zōrapapēlĕ : Zōrapapēl dznaw Apiowtĕ : Apiowt dznaw Eghiagimĕ :
40001014	Eghiagim dznaw Azovrĕ : Azovr dznaw Satovgĕ : Satovg dznaw Akʾinĕ : Akʾin dznaw Eghiowtĕ :
40001015	Eghiowt dznaw Eghiazarĕ : Eghiazar dznaw Mattʾanĕ :
40001016	Mattʾan dznaw Yagopĕ : Yagop dznaw Yovsēpʾĕ , amowsinĕ Mariami , ormē dznaw Yisows , or gochʾowetsʾaw Kʾristos .
40001017	Owremn polor serowntnerĕ Aprahamēn minchʾew Tawitʾ , tasnchʾors serownt en , ew Tawitʾēn minchʾew Papeloni tarakrowtʾiwnĕ , tasnchʾors serownt , ow Papeloni tarakrowtʾenēn minchʾew Kʾristos , tasnchʾors serownt .
40001018	Yisows Kʾristosi dznowntĕ eghaw sa gerbov . Anor mayrĕ , Mariam , Yovsēpʾi nshanowadz , Sowrp Hokiēn yghatsʾadz ktnowetsʾaw , teṛ irarow kʾov chʾegadz .
40001019	Yovsēpʾ , anor amowsinĕ , artar mart ĕllalov , ow chʾowzelov or khaytaṛagē zayn , gĕ dzrakrēr dzadzgapar artsagel zayn .
40001020	Minchʾ an aytbēs gĕ mtadzēr , aha Tēroch hreshtagĕ erewtsʾaw anor , erazi mēch , ew ĕsaw : « Yovsēpʾ , Tawitʾi orti , mi vakhnar kʾovt aṛnel gint , Mariamĕ , orovhetew anor mēch yghatsʾowadzĕ Sowrp Hokiēn ē .
40001021	An biti dznani orti mĕ , ew anor anownĕ Yisows biti gochʾes , kʾani or an biti pʾrgē ir zhoghovowrtĕ irentsʾ meghkʾerēn » .
40001022	Ays amēnĕ gatarowetsʾaw , orbēszi irakordzowi markarēin michotsʾov ĕsowadz Tēroch khōskʾĕ :
40001023	« Aha goysĕ biti yghanay ow orti biti dznani , ew anor anownĕ Ēmmanowēl biti gochʾen » , or gĕ tʾarkmanowi , Astowadz mezi het .
40001024	Yovsēpʾ kʾownēn artʾnnalov , ĕraw inchʾ or Tēroch hreshtagĕ hramayetsʾ iren , ew kʾovĕ aṛaw ir ginĕ .
40001025	Ow chʾkittsʾaw zayn , minchʾew or an dznaw ir antranig ortin : ew anor anownĕ Yisows gochʾetsʾ .
40002001	Erp Yisows dznaw Hrēastani Petʾlehēmin mēch , Herovtēs tʾakaworin ōrerĕ , aha arewelkʾēn moker egan Erowsaghēm ,
40002002	ew ĕsin : « Owr ē an , or dznaw ipr Hreanerown tʾakaworĕ : orovhetew menkʾ tesankʾ anor astghĕ , arewelkʾi mēch , ow egankʾ ergrbakelow anor » .
40002003	Erp Herovtēs tʾakaworĕ lsetsʾ , vrtovetsʾaw , ew iren het , ampoghch Erowsaghēmĕ .
40002004	Aba , hawakʾelov polor kʾahanayabetnern ow zhoghovowrtin tbirnerĕ , hartsʾapʾortsetsʾ zanonkʾ tʾē owr biti dznēr Kʾristosĕ .
40002005	Anonkʾ al ĕsin iren : « Hrēastani Petʾlehēmin mēch . Orovhetew sa krowadz ē markarēin michotsʾov :
40002006	“ Town , Petʾlehēm , Yowtayi ergir , Yowtayi gaṛavarichʾnerown mēch pnaw amenapʾokʾrĕ chʾes : orovhetew Gaṛavarichʾ mĕ biti ellē kʾezmē , or biti hovowē im zhoghovowrts , Israyēlĕ ” » .
40002007	Ayn aten Herovtēs dzadzgapar ganchʾetsʾ mokerĕ , stowketsʾ anontsʾmē astghin erewtsʾadz zhamanagĕ ,
40002008	ew ghrgetsʾ zanonkʾ Petʾlehēm , ĕselov : « Katsʾēkʾ , jshkrtowtʾeamp teghegatsʾēkʾ manowgin masin , ow erp ktnēkʾ zayn , lowr perēkʾ indzi , orbēszi es al ertʾam , ergrbakem anor » .
40002009	Erp anonkʾ tʾakaworēn lsetsʾin ays khōskʾĕ , megnetsʾan : ew aha ayn astghĕ , or teser ēin arewelkʾi mēch , g!ertʾar anontsʾ aṛchewēn , minchʾew or egaw ow getsʾaw manowgin eghadz teghin vray .
40002010	Erp tesan astghĕ , chʾapʾazantsʾ owrakhatsʾan .
40002011	Ew town mtnelov , tesan manowgĕ , ir mōr , Mariami het : iynalov ergrbaketsʾin anor , ow panalov irentsʾ kantserĕ , matowtsʾanetsʾin anor ĕndzaner : - osgi , gntrowg ew zmowṛs .
40002012	Ow erazi mēch batkam stanalov , or chʾverataṛnan Herovtēsi , owrish jampayov megnetsʾan irentsʾ ergirĕ .
40002013	Erp anonkʾ megnetsʾan , aha Tēroch hreshtagĕ erazi mēch erewtsʾaw Yovsēpʾi ew ĕsaw : « Otkʾi elir , aṛ manowgn ow anor mayrĕ , ew pʾakhir Ekibtos : hon getsʾir , minchʾew or kʾezi ĕsem , kʾani or Herovtēs biti pʾntṛē manowgĕ , gorsntsʾnelow hamar zayn » .
40002014	An al otkʾi elaw , kisherowan mēch aṛaw manowgn ow anor mayrĕ , megnetsʾaw Ekibtos , ew hon ēr minchʾew Herovtēsi vakhjanilĕ ,
40002015	orbēszi irakordzowi markarēin michotsʾov ĕsowadz Tēroch khōskʾĕ : « Ekibtosēn ganchʾetsʾi im ortis » .
40002016	Ayn aten Herovtēs , tesnelov tʾē khapowetsʾaw mokerēn , sastig zayratsʾaw , ow ghrgetsʾ , chartetsʾ Petʾlehēmi ew anor ampoghch hoghamasin mēch eghogh polor manowgnerĕ , ergow taregan ow angē var , ayn zhamanagin hamemat , or stowkadz ēr mokerēn .
40002017	Ayn aten irakordzowetsʾaw Eremia markarēin michotsʾov ĕsowadz khōskʾĕ : « Ṛamayi mēch lsowetsʾaw tsayn mĕ , oghp , latsʾ ow medz sowk :
40002018	Ṛakʾēl gow lar ir zawagnerown vray ow chʾēr owzer mkhitʾarowil , orovhetew chʾgayin » .
40002019	Erp Herovtēs vakhjanetsʾaw , Tēroch hreshtagĕ Ekibtosi mēch erewtsʾaw Yovsēpʾi , erazi mēch , ew ĕsaw :
40002020	« Otkʾi elir , aṛ manowgn ow anor mayrĕ , ew kna Israyēli ergirĕ , orovhetew meṛan anonkʾ , or gĕ pʾntṛēin manowgin antsĕ » .
40002021	An al otkʾi elaw , aṛaw manowgn ow anor mayrĕ , ew egaw Israyēli ergirĕ .
40002022	Isg erp lsetsʾ tʾē Arkʾeghayos gĕ tʾakaworēr Hrēastani vray , ir hōr , Herovtēsi tegh , vakhtsʾaw hon ertʾalow : ew erazi mēch batkam stanalov , megnetsʾaw Kalileayi goghmerĕ ,
40002023	ow egaw pnagetsʾaw Nazarētʾ gochʾowadz kʾaghakʾĕ , orbēszi irakordzowi markarēnerown khōskʾĕ : « Nazovretsʾi biti gochʾowi » .
40003001	Ayt ōrerĕ Yovhannēs Mgrtichʾĕ egaw , Hrēastani anabatin mēch kʾarozelov
40003002	ew ĕselov : « Abashkharetsʾēkʾ , orovhetew erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ mōtetsʾadz ē » .
40003003	Ays ē an , orown masin Esayi markarēn khōsetsʾaw , ĕselov : « Anabatin mēch kochʾoghin tsaynĕ : “ Batrastetsʾēkʾ Tēroch jampan , shtgetsʾēkʾ anor shawighnerĕ ” » .
40003004	Yovhannēsi hakowstĕ owghti mazē ēr , ir mēchkʾin showrch , gashiē kōti ownēr , ew ir geragowrĕ , marakh ow vayri meghr ēr .
40003005	Ayn aten Erowsaghēmēn , ampoghch Hrēastanēn ew Yortanani ampoghch shrchagaykʾēn g!ertʾayin iren ,
40003006	gĕ mgrtowēin irmē , Yortanani mēch , ow gĕ khostovanēin irentsʾ meghkʾerĕ .
40003007	Erp tesaw Pʾarisetsʾinerēn ew Satowgetsʾinerēn shater , or egadz ēin ir mgrtowtʾean , ĕsaw : « I zherow dznowntner , ov imatsʾowtsʾ tsezi , khowsapʾil kalikʾ pargowtʾenēn .
40003008	Owremn abashkharowtʾean ar zhanavayel btowgh perēkʾ :
40003009	ow mi mtadzēkʾ tser mēch ĕsel : “ Menkʾ Aprahamĕ owninkʾ ipr hayr ” : orovhetew gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē Astowadz garogh ē ays kʾarerēn hanel Aprahami zawagner .
40003010	Gatsʾinĕ artēn isg trowadz ē dzaṛerow armatin kʾov : owremn amēn dzaṛ or law btowgh chʾi perer , gĕ gtrowi ow gragĕ gĕ netowi .
40003011	Artarew es gĕ mgrtem tsez chowrov , abashkharowtʾean hamar , paytsʾ an or gow kay im etewēs , intsmē hzōr ē , ow es ar zhani chʾem anor gōshignerĕ grelow : aniga biti mgrtē tsez Sowrp Hokiov ow gragov .
40003012	Anor hedzanotsʾĕ ir tseṛkʾn ē : ir galĕ biti makʾrē ew ir tsʾorenĕ biti zhoghvē amparĕ , isg yartĕ biti ayrē anshēch gragov » .
40003013	Ayn aten Yisows egaw Kalileayēn Yortanan , Yovhannēsi , orbēszi mgrtowi angē .
40003014	Yovhannēs g!arkilēr zayn ow g!ĕsēr : « Es bētkʾ ē or mgrtowim kʾezmē , ow town gow kas indzi » .
40003015	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor « Tʾoyl towr hima , orovhetew aysbēs gĕ batshaji mezi , or kordzatrenkʾ artarowtʾiwnĕ ir ampoghchowtʾeamp » . Ayn aten tʾoyl towaw anor .
40003016	Erp Yisows mgrtowetsʾaw , isgoyn towrs elaw chowrēn , ew aha erginkʾĕ patsʾowetsʾaw ow tesaw Astowdzoy Hokin , or aghawnii bēs g!ichnēr ow gow kar ir vray .
40003017	Ew aha tsayn mĕ egaw erginkʾēn , or g!ĕsēr : « Ays ē im sireli Ortis , orown hajetsʾay » .
40004001	Ayn aten Yisows anabatĕ tarowetsʾaw Sowrp Hokiēn , CHʾarakhōsēn pʾortsowelow hamar .
40004002	Kʾaṛasown tsʾereg ow kʾaṛasown kisher dzom bahelē etkʾ , anōtʾetsʾaw .
40004003	Ew Pʾortsichʾĕ mōtenalov anor , ĕsaw : « Etʾē town Astowdzoy Ortin es , ĕsē or ays kʾarerĕ hatsʾ ĕllan » .
40004004	An al bataskhanetsʾ : « Krowadz ē : “ Miayn hatsʾov chʾē or martĕ biti abri , haba amēn khōskʾov , or g!ellē Astowdzoy peranēn ” » .
40004005	Ayn aten CHʾarakhōsĕ aṛaw ta֊raw zayn sowrp kʾaghakʾĕ , gaynetsʾowtsʾ zayn tajarin ashtaragin vray ,
40004006	ew ĕsaw anor : « Etʾē town Astowdzoy Ortin es , var netē kʾez asgē : orovhetew krowadz ē : “ Ir hreshtagnerown biti hrahankē kʾezi hamar , or irentsʾ tseṛkʾerown vray gren kʾez , orbēszi kʾari mĕ chʾzarnes otkʾt ” » .
40004007	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Tartseal krowadz ē : “ Mi pʾortser Tērĕ , kʾow Astowadzt ” » .
40004008	CHʾarakhōsĕ tartseal aṛaw hanetsʾ zayn chʾapʾazantsʾ partsr leṛ mĕ , tsʾoytsʾ towaw anor ashkharhi polor tʾakaworowtʾiwnnern ow anontsʾ pʾaṛkʾĕ ,
40004009	ew ĕsaw anor : « Asonkʾ polorĕ biti tam kʾezi , etʾē iynas , ergrbakes indzi » .
40004010	Ayn aten Yisows ĕsaw anor : « ( Etews ) kna , Satanay , orovhetew krowadz ē : “ Tēroch , kʾow Astowdzoyt ergrbakē , ow miayn zinkʾ bashtē ” » .
40004011	Ayn aten CHʾarakhōsĕ tʾoghowtsʾ zayn , ew hreshtagnerĕ mōtetsʾan ow sbasargetsʾin anor .
40004012	Erp Yisows lsetsʾ tʾē Yovhannēs matnowetsʾaw , megnetsʾaw Kalilea .
40004013	Ow tskelov Nazarētʾĕ , egaw pnagetsʾaw Gapʾaṛnayowm , dzovezereay kʾaghakʾĕ , Zapowghoni ow Nepʾtʾaghimi hoghamaserown mēch ,
40004014	orbēszi irakordzowi Esayi markarēin michotsʾov ĕsowadz khōskʾĕ :
40004015	« Zapowghoni ergirn ow Nepʾtʾaghimi ergirĕ , dzovow jampayov Yortanani miws goghmĕ , hetʾanosnerow Kalilean :
40004016	khawari mēch pnagogh zhoghovowrtĕ medz loys tesaw , ew loys dzaketsʾaw anontsʾ , or gĕ pnagēin mahowan ergrin ow showkʾin mēch » .
40004017	Ayt atenēn etkʾ Yisows sgsaw kʾarozel ew ĕsel : « Abashkharetsʾēkʾ , orovhetew erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ mōtetsʾadz ē » .
40004018	Erp Yisows gĕ kʾalēr Kalileayi dzovown ezerkʾĕ , tesaw ergow eghpayrner , Betros gochʾowadz Simonĕ , ew anor eghpayrĕ , Antrēasĕ , oronkʾ owṛgan gĕ netēin dzovĕ , orovhetew tsgnors ēin .
40004019	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Egēkʾ im etewēs , ow martotsʾ orsort ĕnem tsez » .
40004020	Anonkʾ al isgoyn tʾoghowtsʾin owṛgannerĕ ew hetewetsʾan anor .
40004021	Angē yaṛach ertʾalov , tesaw owrish ergow eghpayrner , Zepetean Yagoposn ow anor eghpayrĕ , Yovhannēsĕ , oronkʾ nawown mēch gĕ gargtnēin irentsʾ owṛgannerĕ , irentsʾ hōr , Zepetēosi het . Ganchʾetsʾ zanonkʾ :
40004022	anonkʾ al isgoyn tʾoghowtsʾin nawn ow irentsʾ hayrĕ , ew hetewetsʾan anor .
40004023	Yisows ampoghch Kalilean shrchelov , gĕ sorvetsʾnēr anontsʾ zhoghovarannerown mēch , gĕ kʾarozēr arkʾayowtʾean awetaranĕ , ew zhoghovowrtin mēch gĕ pow zhēr amēn tesag akht ow amēn tesag vataṛoghchowtʾiwn .
40004024	Anor hampawĕ taradzowetsʾaw ampoghch Sowriayi mēch , ew perin anor polor hiwantnerĕ , or zanazan akhterov ow tanchankʾnerov gĕ towaytēin , naew tiwaharner , lowsnotner , ew antamaloydzner , ow pow zhetsʾ zanonkʾ .
40004025	Medz pazmowtʾiwnner gĕ hetewēin anor , Kalileayēn , Tegabolisēn , Erowsaghēmēn , Hrēastanēn ew Yortanani miws goghmēn .
40005001	Tesnelov pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ , leṛĕ elaw . Erp nstaw , ir ashagertnerĕ kʾovĕ katsʾin ,
40005002	ew ir peranĕ panalov , gĕ sorvetsʾnēr anontsʾ ow g!ĕsēr :
40005003	« Erani hokiov aghkʾatnerown , orovhetew erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ anontsʾn ē .
40005004	Erani skawornerown , orovhetew anonkʾ biti mkhitʾarowin .
40005005	Erani hezerown , orovhetew anonkʾ biti zhaṛanken ergirĕ .
40005006	Erani anontsʾ , or anōtʾowtʾiwn ow dzaraw ownin artarowtʾean , orovhetew anonkʾ biti gshtanan .
40005007	Erani oghormadznerown , orovhetew anonkʾ oghormowtʾiwn biti ktnen .
40005008	Erani anontsʾ , or sirtov makʾowr en , orovhetew anonkʾ biti tesnen Astowadz .
40005009	Erani khaghaghararnerown , orovhetew anonkʾ Astowdzoy ortiner biti gochʾowin .
40005010	Erani anontsʾ , or haladzowadz en artarowtʾean hamar , orovhetew erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ anontsʾn ē .
40005011	Erani tsezi , erp gĕ nakhaten tsez ow gĕ haladzen , ew stowtʾeamp tsezi tēm amēn tesag chʾar khōskʾer g!ĕsen , im batjaṛovs .
40005012	Owrakhatsʾēkʾ ew tsʾndzatsʾēkʾ , orovhetew tser vartsatrowtʾiwnĕ shat ē erginkʾĕ : kʾani or ays gerbov haladzetsʾin tsezmē aṛach eghadz markarēnerĕ » .
40005013	« Towkʾ ēkʾ ergri aghĕ : etʾē aghĕ gorsntsʾnē ir hamĕ , inkʾ inchʾov biti aghowi . Angē etkʾ ochʾ mēg aztetsʾowtʾiwn g!ownenay , haba towrs gĕ netowi ew gĕ gokhgṛtowi martotsʾ otkʾin tag .
40005014	Towkʾ ēkʾ ashkharhi loysĕ : kʾaghakʾ mĕ , or leran vray gĕ ktnowi , , , chʾi grnar bahowil .
40005015	Ow jrakĕ chʾen vaṛer ew tner krowani tag , haba , ashtanagi vray , or lowsaworē polor tan mēch eghoghnerĕ .
40005016	TSer loysĕ aynbēs tʾogh pʾayli martotsʾ aṛchew , or tesnen tser pari kordzerĕ ew pʾaṛapanen tser Hayrĕ , or erginkʾn ē » .
40005017	« Mi gardzēkʾ tʾē egay , awrelow ōrēnkʾĕ gam Markarēnerĕ . Egay ochʾ tʾē awrelow , haba , kordzatrelow .
40005018	Orovhetew jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Minchʾew or erginkʾn ow ergirĕ antsʾnin , ōrēnkʾēn yovt mĕ gam nshanakir mĕ biti chʾantsʾni , minchʾew or polorn al gatarowin ” .
40005019	Owremn ov or ays amenapʾokʾr batowirannerēn mēgĕ lowdzē ew martotsʾ aynbēs sorvetsʾnē , aniga amenapʾokʾr biti gochʾowi erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾean mēch : paytsʾ ov or kordzatrē ow sorvetsʾnē , aniga medz biti gochʾowi erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾean mēch .
40005020	Orovhetew gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Etʾē tser artarowtʾiwnĕ chʾkerazantsʾē tbirnerow ew Pʾarisetsʾinerow artarowtʾiwnĕ , pnaw biti chʾmtnēkʾ erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ ” » .
40005021	« Lser ēkʾ tʾē ĕsowetsʾaw nakhnikʾnerown : “ Mi sbanner ” . Ov or sbannē , ar zhani biti ĕllay tatastani .
40005022	Paytsʾ es gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ov or zowr teghĕ parganay ir eghpōr tēm , ar zhani biti ĕllay tatastani . Ov or " abowsh " ĕsē ir eghpōr , ar zhani biti ĕllay ateani tatabartowtʾean . Ov or " yimar " ĕsē ir eghpōr , ar zhani biti ĕllay keheni gragin ” .
40005023	Owremn etʾē kʾow ĕndzat zohaseghanin vray peres , ow hon yishes tʾē eghpayrt pan mĕ owni kʾezi tēm ,
40005024	hon tskē ĕndzat , zohaseghanin aṛchew : nakh kna , hashtowē eghpōrt het , ew ayn aten egowr , or matowtsʾanes ĕndzat .
40005025	SHowtov hamatsaynē kʾow osokhit het , minchʾ jampan es anor het , orbēszi hagaṛagortt chʾyantsnē kʾez tataworin , ow tataworĕ , ostiganin , ew pantĕ chʾnetowis .
40005026	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem kʾezi : “ Pnaw towrs biti chʾelles angē , minchʾew or vjares verchin nakʾaragitĕ ” » .
40005027	« Lser ēkʾ tʾē ĕsowetsʾaw : “ SHnowtʾiwn mi ĕner ” .
40005028	Paytsʾ es gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ov or gĕ nayi gnoch mĕ , anor tsʾangalow hamar , artēn aniga ir sirtin mēch shnowtʾiwn ĕradz ē anor het ” .
40005029	Owsti etʾē ach achʾkʾt gĕ kaytʾagghetsʾnē kʾez , hanē zayn ow netē kʾezmē : orovhetew aweli ōktagar ē kʾezi , or antamnerēt mēgĕ gorsowi , paytsʾ ampoghch marmint chʾnetowi kehenĕ .
40005030	Etʾē ach tseṛkʾt gĕ kaytʾagghetsʾnē kʾez , gtrē zayn ow netē kʾezmē : orovhetew aweli ōktagar ē kʾezi , or antamnerēt mēgĕ gorsowi , ow ampoghch marmint chʾnetowi kehenĕ » .
40005031	« Naew ĕsowetsʾaw : “ Ov or artsagē ir ginĕ , tʾogh tay anor amowsnalowdzowmi vgayakir mĕ ” .
40005032	Paytsʾ es gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ov or g!artsagē ir ginĕ , aṛantsʾ boṛngowtʾean batjaṛi , inkʾ shnowtʾiwn ĕnel gow tay anor , ew ov or g!amowsnanay artsagowadzin het , shnowtʾiwn g!ĕnē ” » .
40005033	« Lser ēkʾ tartseal tʾē ĕsowetsʾaw nakhnikʾnerown : “ Sowt ertowm mi ĕner , haba hatowtsʾanē Tēroch ĕradz ertowmnert ” .
40005034	Paytsʾ es gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Erpekʾ ertowm mi ĕnēkʾ , ochʾ erginkʾi vray , or Astowdzoy kahn ē ,
40005035	ochʾ ergri vray , or anor otkʾerown batowantann ē , ochʾ Erowsaghēmi vray , or Medz Tʾakaworin kʾaghakʾn ē ,
40005036	ochʾ al klowkhit vray ertowm ĕrē , orovhetew chʾes grnar mēg maz jermgtsʾnel gam sewtsʾnel .
40005037	Haba tser khōskʾĕ ĕllay , ayon , ayo , ew ochʾĕ , ochʾ : asgē awelin yaṛach gow kay CHʾarēn ” » .
40005038	« Lser ēkʾ tʾē ĕsowetsʾaw : “ Achʾkʾi tegh , achʾkʾ , ew agṛayi tegh , agṛay ” .
40005039	Paytsʾ es gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ CHʾarin mi timatrer : haba ov or abtagē ach aytit , tartsowr anor miwsn al .
40005040	Etʾē mēgĕ owzē tat varel kʾezi het ow pajgont aṛnel , tʾogh towr anor hantertst al .
40005041	Ew ov or stibē kʾez mghon mĕ ertʾal , kna anor het ergow mghon .
40005042	Towr kʾezmē owzoghin , ow eres mi tartsner angē , or g!owzē pʾokh aṛnel kʾezmē ” » .
40005043	« Lser ēkʾ tʾē ĕsowetsʾaw : “ Sirē ĕngert ew atē tʾshnamit ” .
40005044	Paytsʾ es gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Siretsʾēkʾ tser tʾshnaminerĕ , ōrhnetsʾēkʾ tsez anidzoghnerĕ , parikʾ ĕrēkʾ anontsʾ , or g!aten tsez , ew aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ anontsʾ hamar , or gĕ bakharagen ow gĕ haladzen tsez ,
40005045	orbēszi ĕllakʾ tser ergnawor Hōr ortinerĕ : orovhetew ir arewĕ gĕ dzaketsʾnē tʾē chʾarerown ew tʾē parinerown vray , ew antsrew gĕ ghrgē tʾē artarnerown ew tʾē anartarnerown vray .
40005046	Orovhetew etʾē towkʾ sirēkʾ tsez siroghnerĕ , inchʾ vartsatrowtʾiwn g!ownenakʾ : makʾsawornern al noynĕ chʾen ĕner .
40005047	Ow etʾē parewēkʾ miayn tser eghpayrnerĕ , inchʾ aweli g!ĕnēkʾ owrishnerēn : makʾsawornern al noynĕ chʾen ĕner .
40005048	Owremn towkʾ gatareal eghēkʾ , inchʾbēs tser ergnawor Hayrĕ gatareal ē ” » .
40006001	« Zkowshatsʾēkʾ or tser oghormowtʾiwnĕ chʾĕnēkʾ martotsʾ aṛchew , tesnowelow hamar anontsʾmē : aylabēs , vartsatrowtʾiwn chʾēkʾ ownenar tser Hōrmēn , or erginkʾn ē .
40006002	Owremn erp oghormowtʾiwn ĕnes , pʾogh mi hnchʾetsʾner aṛchewt , inchʾbēs geghdzawornerĕ g!ĕnen zhoghovarannerown ow pʾoghotsʾnerown mēch , orbēszi pʾaṛaworowin martotsʾmē . Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Anonkʾ ownetsʾadz g!ĕllan irentsʾ vartsatrowtʾiwnĕ ” .
40006003	Isg town , erp oghormowtʾiwn ĕnes , tsakh tseṛkʾt tʾogh chʾkitnay ach tseṛkʾit inchʾ talĕ ,
40006004	orbēszi kʾow oghormowtʾiwnt kaghtni ĕllay : ew kʾow Hayrt , or gĕ tesnē kaghtnikʾĕ , patsʾayaytōrēn biti hatowtsʾanē kʾezi » .
40006005	« Erp aghōtʾes , nman mi ĕllar geghdzawornerown , oronkʾ gĕ siren aghōtʾel , gaynelov zhoghovarannerown mēch ow hrabaragnerown angiwnnerĕ , orbēszi erewnan martotsʾ . Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Anonkʾ ownetsʾadz g!ĕllan irentsʾ vartsatrowtʾiwnĕ ” .
40006006	Isg town , erp aghōtʾes , mtir nerkʾin seneagt , kotsʾē towṛt , ew aghōtʾē Hōrt , or kaghtni tegh gĕ ktnowi : ow Hayrt , or gĕ tesnē kaghtnikʾĕ , patsʾayaytōrēn biti hatowtsʾanē kʾezi .
40006007	Erp aghōtʾēkʾ , shatakhōs mi ĕllakʾ hetʾanosnerown bēs , orovhetew gĕ gardzen tʾē biti ĕntownowin , irentsʾ shat khōselown hamar .
40006008	Owremn mi nmanikʾ anontsʾ , orovhetew tser Hayrĕ kitē tser bētkʾerĕ , teṛ towkʾ chʾkhntradz irmē .
40006009	Owsti towkʾ sabēs aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ : “ Hayr mer , or erginkʾn es , kʾow anownt sowrp ĕllay :
40006010	kʾow tʾakaworowtʾiwnt kay : kʾow gamkʾt ĕllay , inchʾbēs erginkʾĕ , noynbēs ergri vray .
40006011	Mer amēnōreay hatsʾĕ , mezi towr aysōr :
40006012	mezi nerē mer bartkʾerĕ , inchʾbēs menkʾ al gĕ nerenkʾ mer bartabannerown :
40006013	ow mez mi tanir pʾortsowtʾean , haba mez azatē CHʾarēn : orovhetew kʾowgt en tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ , zōrowtʾiwnĕ ew pʾaṛkʾĕ yawitean : amēn ” .
40006014	Artarew etʾē towkʾ nerēkʾ martotsʾ irentsʾ yantsʾankʾnerĕ , tser ergnawor Hayrn al biti nerē tsezi :
40006015	isg etʾē towkʾ chʾnerēkʾ martotsʾ irentsʾ yantsʾankʾnerĕ , tser Hayrn al tsezi biti chʾnerē tser yantsʾankʾnerĕ » .
40006016	« Erp dzom bahēkʾ , trtowmeres mi ĕllakʾ , geghdzawornerown bēs : orovhetew irentsʾ eresnerĕ gĕ khatʾaren , orbēszi erewnan martotsʾ , tʾē dzom gĕ bahen . Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Anonkʾ ownetsʾadz g!ĕllan irentsʾ vartsatrowtʾiwnĕ ” .
40006017	Paytsʾ town , erp dzom bahes , ōdzē klowkht ow lowa erest ,
40006018	orbēszi chʾerewnas martotsʾ , dzom bahoghi bēs , haba kʾow Hōrt , or kaghtni tegh gĕ ktnowi . Ew kʾow Hayrt , or gĕ tesnē kaghtnikʾĕ , biti hatowtsʾanē kʾezi » .
40006019	« Ergri vray kantser mi tizēkʾ tsezi , owr tsʾetsʾĕ ew zhankĕ g!abaganen , owr kogherĕ bat gĕ dzagen ow gĕ koghnan .
40006020	Haba erginkʾĕ kantser tizetsʾēkʾ tsezi , owr ochʾ tsʾetsʾĕ ew ochʾ zhankĕ g!abaganen , ow ochʾ kogherĕ bat gĕ dzagen ew gĕ koghnan .
40006021	Orovhetew tser kantsĕ owr or ē , tser sirtn al hon biti ĕllay » .
40006022	« Marminin jrakĕ achʾkʾn ē : owremn etʾē achʾkʾt barz ē , ampoghch marmint lowsawor g!ĕllay .
40006023	Paytsʾ etʾē achʾkʾt chʾar ē , ampoghch marmint khawaramadz g!ĕllay : owremn etʾē kʾow mēcht eghadz loysĕ khawar ē , al orkʾan ē ayt khawarĕ » .
40006024	« Ochʾ mēgĕ grnay dzaṛayel ergow tiroch : orovhetew gam biti atē mēgĕ ew sirē miwsĕ , gam biti yari mēgown , , ow arhamarhē miwsĕ . CHʾēkʾ grnar dzaṛayel Astowdzoy ew mamonayin .
40006025	Owsti gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Mi mtahokowikʾ tser antsin masin , tʾē inchʾ biti owtēkʾ gam inchʾ biti khmēkʾ , ochʾ al tser marminnerown masin , tʾē inchʾ biti haknikʾ : mitʾē antsĕ aweli chʾē geragowrēn , ow marminĕ , hakowstēn .
40006026	Nayetsʾēkʾ erginkʾi tʾṛchʾownnerown , oronkʾ ochʾ gĕ sermanen ew ochʾ gĕ hntsen , ochʾ al gĕ zhoghven ampari mēch : paytsʾ tser ergnawor Hayrĕ gĕ geragrē zanonkʾ . Towkʾ aweli chʾēkʾ ar zher anontsʾmē .
40006027	Hima tsezmē ov grnay mtahokowelov , gankown mĕ aweltsʾnel ir hasagin vray .
40006028	Ew inchʾow gĕ mtahokowikʾ hakowsti masin : ngatetsʾēkʾ tashti showshannerĕ , tʾē inchʾbēs g!ajin : ochʾ g!ashkhatin ow ochʾ gĕ manen .
40006029	Paytsʾ gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē Soghomon al , ir ampoghch pʾaṛaworowtʾean mēch , chʾhakowetsʾaw anontsʾmē mēgown bēs .
40006030	Owsti etʾē tashti khotĕ , or aysōr gay ew vaghĕ pʾowṛĕ gĕ netowi , Astowadz aynbēs gĕ hakowetsʾnē , haba orchʾapʾ aweli tsez , tʾerahawatner .
40006031	Owremn mi mtahokowikʾ , ĕselov : " Inchʾ biti owtenkʾ " , gam , " inchʾ biti khmenkʾ " , gam , " inchʾ biti hakninkʾ "
40006032	( kʾani or hetʾanosnerĕ gĕ pʾntṛen ayt polor panerĕ ) : orovhetew tser ergnawor Hayrĕ kitē tʾē ayt polor panerĕ bētkʾ en tsezi .
40006033	Paytsʾ nakh khntretsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnn ow anor artarowtʾiwnĕ , ew ayt polor panern al biti trowin tsezi .
40006034	Owsti mi mtahokowikʾ vaghowan hamar , orovhetew vaghowan ōrĕ biti hokay iren hamar : pawagan ē ōrowan ir antsgowtʾiwnĕ ” » .
40007001	« Mi tatēkʾ , orbēszi chʾtatowikʾ .
40007002	Orovhetew inchʾ tatastanov or tatēkʾ , anov biti tatowikʾ , ew inchʾ chʾapʾov or chʾapʾēkʾ , anov biti chʾapʾowi tsezi .
40007003	Ew inchʾow gĕ tesnes eghpōrt achʾkʾin mēchi shiwghĕ , ow chʾes nshmarer kʾow achʾkʾit mēchi keranĕ .
40007004	Gam inchʾbēs grnas ĕsel eghpōrt : “ Tʾoyl towr or hanem achʾkʾēt shiwghĕ ” , erp aha keran gay kʾow achʾkʾit mēch .
40007005	Geghdzawor , nakh hanē kʾow achʾkʾēt keranĕ , ew ayn aten ystag biti tesnes , hanelow hamar shiwghĕ eghpōrt achʾkʾēn .
40007006	Sowrp panĕ mi takʾ shownerown , ow tser markaritnerĕ mi netēkʾ khozerown aṛchew , orbēszi chʾgokhgṛten zanonkʾ irentsʾ otkʾerown tag , ew taṛnalov chʾpzkʾten tsez » .
40007007	« KHntretsʾēkʾ , ow biti trowi tsezi : pʾntṛetsʾēkʾ , ow biti ktnēkʾ : towṛĕ pakhetsʾēkʾ , ow biti patsʾowi tsezi .
40007008	Orovhetew ov or khntrē , gĕ stanay , ov or pʾntṛē , gĕ ktnē , ew ov or towṛĕ pakhē , biti patsʾowi anor .
40007009	TSezmē ov ē ayn martĕ , ormē etʾē ir ortin hatsʾ owzē , kʾar gow tay anor :
40007010	gam etʾē tsowg owzē , mitʾē ōts gow tay anor .
40007011	Owremn etʾē towkʾ , or chʾar ēkʾ , kitēkʾ pari nowērner tal tser zawagnerown , orchʾapʾ aweli tser Hayrĕ , or erginkʾn ē , pari paner biti tay anontsʾ , or gĕ khntren irmē .
40007012	Owremn amēn inchʾ or g!owzēkʾ , or martig ĕnen tsezi , towkʾ al aynbēs ĕrēkʾ anontsʾ , orovhetew asiga ē ōrēnkʾn ow Markarēnerĕ » .
40007013	« Negh tṛnēn ners mtēkʾ : orovhetew layn ē ayn towṛĕ , ew ĕntartsag , ayn jampan , or tēbi gorowst gĕ tani , ow shat en anonkʾ , or gĕ mtnen angē :
40007014	orovhetew negh ē ayn towṛĕ , ew antsowg , ayn jampan , or tēbi geankʾ gĕ tani , ow kʾichʾ en anonkʾ , or gĕ ktnen zayn » .
40007015	« Zkowshatsʾēkʾ sowt markarēnerēn , oronkʾ gow kan tsezi ochʾkhari hantertsnerov , paytsʾ nersēn , yapʾshtagogh kayler en .
40007016	Irentsʾ btowghēn biti janchʾnakʾ zanonkʾ . Mitʾē pʾowsherēn gĕ kʾaghen khaghogh , gam tatasgēn , tʾowz .
40007017	Aysbēs amēn pari dzaṛ , law btowgh gĕ perē , ew vat dzaṛ , chʾar btowgh gĕ perē .
40007018	Pari dzaṛĕ chʾi grnar chʾar btowgh perel , ochʾ al vat dzaṛĕ , law btowgh perel .
40007019	Amēn dzaṛ or law btowgh chʾi perer , gĕ gtrowi ow gĕ netowi gragĕ .
40007020	Owremn , irentsʾ btowghēn biti janchʾnakʾ zanonkʾ » .
40007021	« Ochʾ tʾē ov or indzi , “ Tēr , Tēr ” g!ĕsē , biti mtnē erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ , haba an , or gĕ kordzatrē im ergnawor Hōrs gamkʾĕ .
40007022	SHater ayn ōrĕ biti ĕsen indzi : “ Tēr , Tēr , mitʾē chʾmarkarēatsʾankʾ kʾow anownovt , tewer chʾhanetsʾinkʾ kʾow anownovt , ew shat hrashkʾner chʾkordzetsʾinkʾ kʾow anownovt ” .
40007023	Ayn aten biti yaytararem anontsʾ : “ Es pnaw chʾēi janchʾnar tsez : heṛatsʾēkʾ kʾovēs towkʾ , or anōrēnowtʾiwn gĕ kordzēikʾ ” » .
40007024	« Owremn ov or gĕ lsē ays khōskʾers ew gĕ kordzatrē zanonkʾ , biti nmantsʾnem zayn owshim martow mĕ , or ir townĕ gaṛowtsʾanetsʾ vēmi vray .
40007025	Teghatarapʾ antsrew ichaw , hegheghnerĕ egan , hoverĕ pʾchʾetsʾin ow zargin ayt tan , paytsʾ chʾpʾlaw , orovhetew himnowadz ēr vēmi vray .
40007026	Isg ov or gĕ lsē ays khōskʾers ow chʾi kordzatrer , gĕ nmani yimar martow mĕ , or ir townĕ gaṛowtsʾanetsʾ awazi vray .
40007027	Teghatarapʾ antsrew ichaw , hegheghnerĕ egan , hoverĕ pʾchʾetsʾin ew zargin ayt tan , ow pʾlaw : ew anor angowmĕ medz eghaw » .
40007028	Erp Yisows lmntsʾowtsʾ ays khōskʾerĕ , pazmowtʾiwnĕ abshadz mnatsʾ anor owsowtsʾowmin vray :
40007029	orovhetew ishkhanowtʾiwn ownetsʾoghi mĕ bēs gĕ sorvetsʾnēr anontsʾ , ochʾ tʾē tbirnerown bēs .
40008001	Erp ayt leṛnēn var ichaw , medz pazmowtʾiwnner hetewetsʾan anor .
40008002	Ew aha porot mĕ egaw ow ergrbaketsʾ anor , ĕselov : « Tēr , etʾē owzes , grnas makʾrel zis » .
40008003	Yisows , ergarelov ir tseṛkʾĕ , tbaw anor ew ĕsaw : « G!owzem , makʾrowē » . Isgoyn anor porotowtʾiwnĕ makʾrowetsʾaw .
40008004	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Zkowshatsʾir , ochʾ mēgown ĕsē : haba kna , tsʾoytsʾ towr kʾez kʾahanayin , ow matowtsʾanē Movsēsi batowiradz ĕndzan , vgayowtʾiwn ĕllalow hamar anontsʾ » .
40008005	Erp mtaw Gapʾaṛnayowm , hariwrabet mĕ kʾovĕ egaw , g!aghachʾēr anor
40008006	ow g!ĕsēr : « Tēr , dzaṛas , townĕ antamaloydz baṛgadz , chʾarachʾar gĕ tanchowi » .
40008007	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Es gow kam ew gĕ pow zhem zinkʾ » .
40008008	Hariwrabetĕ bataskhanetsʾ : « Tēr , es ar zhani chʾem , or town mtnes im yargis tag : miayn ĕsē khōskʾ mĕ , ow dzaṛas biti p zhshgowi .
40008009	Orovhetew es al ishkhanowtʾean tag mart em , ew zinoworner ownim im hramanis tag . Asor g!ĕsem : “ Kna ” , ow g!ertʾay : ew miwsin : “ Egowr ” , ow gow kay : ew dzaṛayis : “ Ĕrē ays panĕ ” , ow g!ĕnē » .
40008010	Erp Yisows lsetsʾ , zarmatsʾaw , ew ĕsaw ir hetewortnerown : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi , Israyēli mēch ankam es chʾktay ayschʾapʾ medz hawatkʾ .
40008011	TSezi gĕ yaytararem tʾē arewelkʾēn ew arewmowtkʾēn shater biti kan ow biti pazmin erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾean mēch , Aprahami , Isahagi ew Yagopi het ,
40008012	isg tʾakaworowtʾean ortinerĕ biti hanowin towrsi khawarĕ : hon biti ĕllay latsʾ ow agṛanerow grjtowm » .
40008013	Yisows ĕsaw hariwrabetin : « Kna , ew inchʾbēs town hawatatsʾir , aynbēs tʾogh ĕllay kʾezi » . Noyn zhamown anor dzaṛan p zhshgowetsʾaw .
40008014	Erp Yisows egaw Betrosi townĕ , tesaw tʾē anor zokʾanchʾĕ baṛgadz ēr , tentov hiwantatsʾadz .
40008015	Pṛnetsʾ anor tseṛkʾēn , ow tentĕ tʾoghowtsʾ zayn . An al otkʾi elaw ew gĕ sbasargēr anontsʾ .
40008016	Erp irigown eghaw , shat tiwaharner perin anor : khōskʾov towrs hanetsʾ chʾar okinerĕ , ow pow zhetsʾ polor akhtawornerĕ ,
40008017	orbēszi irakordzowi Esayi markarēin michotsʾov ĕsowadz khōskʾĕ : « An stantsnetsʾ mer hiwantowtʾiwnnerĕ ew gretsʾ mer akhterĕ » .
40008018	Yisows , tesnelov ir showrchĕ medz pazmowtʾiwnner , hramayetsʾ or ertʾan miws ezerkʾĕ .
40008019	Tbir mĕ mōtenalov , ĕsaw anor : « Vartabet , biti hetewim kʾezi , owr or ertʾas » .
40008020	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Aghowēsnerĕ orcher ownin , ow erginkʾi tʾṛchʾownnerĕ , poyner , paytsʾ martow Ortin tegh mĕ chʾowni , owr hankchʾetsʾnē ir klowkhĕ » .
40008021	Owrish mĕ , or anor ashagertnerēn ēr , ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , artōnē indzi , or nakh ertʾam , tʾaghem hayrs » .
40008022	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Hetewē indzi , ew tʾogh meṛelnerown , tʾaghel irentsʾ meṛelnerĕ » .
40008023	Erp naw mtaw , ir ashagertnerĕ hetewetsʾan iren .
40008024	Ew aha medz alegodzowtʾiwn mĕ eghaw dzovown mēch , aynkʾan , or nawĕ gĕ dzadzgowēr alikʾnerēn : isg inkʾ gĕ kʾnanar .
40008025	Ashagertnerĕ katsʾin ir mōt , artʾntsʾowtsʾin zinkʾ ew ĕsin : « Tēr , pʾrgē mez , aha gĕ gorsowinkʾ » .
40008026	Inkʾ al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Tʾerahawatner , inchʾow aytbēs ergchʾot ēkʾ » . Ayn aten otkʾi elaw , sastetsʾ hovern ow dzovĕ , ew medz khaghaghowtʾiwn eghaw .
40008027	Martig zarmatsʾan , ow g!ĕsēin irarow : « Inchʾbisi mart ē asiga , or noynisg hoverĕ ew dzovĕ gĕ hnazantin iren » .
40008028	Erp antsʾaw miws ezerkʾĕ , Kerkesatsʾinerown ergirĕ , ergow tiwaharner hantibetsʾan iren , kerezmannerēn eladz , chʾapʾazantsʾ ta zhan , aynbēs or ochʾ mēgĕ garogh ēr antsʾnil ayt jampayēn .
40008029	Ew aha aghaghagetsʾin : « Town inchʾ kordz ownis mezi het , Yisows , Astowdzoy Orti : atenēn aṛach mez tanchelow hamar egar hos » .
40008030	Anontsʾmē heṛow , khozerow medz eramag mĕ gar , or g!aradzēr .
40008031	Tewerĕ g!aghachʾēin iren ow g!ĕsēin : « Etʾē hanes mez , artōnē mezi , or ertʾankʾ mtnenkʾ khozerow eramagin mēch » .
40008032	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Katsʾēkʾ » . Erp anonkʾ towrs elan , katsʾin khozerow eramagin mēch , ew aha ampoghch eramagĕ kahavē zh teghēn dzovĕ vazetsʾ ow chowrerown mēch meṛaw .
40008033	KHozaradznern al pʾakhan , ew kʾaghakʾĕ ertʾalov , batmetsʾin amēn inchʾ , naew tiwaharnerown batahadz panerĕ .
40008034	Owsti ampoghch kʾaghakʾĕ towrs elaw , timaworelow Yisowsĕ , ow erp tesan zinkʾ , aghachʾetsʾin or megni irentsʾ hoghamasēn .
40009001	Owsti naw mtnelov , antsʾaw miws goghmĕ ow knatsʾ ir kʾaghakʾĕ .
40009002	Ew perin iren antamaloydz mĕ , or baṛgadz ēr mahiji mēch . Yisows , tesnelov anontsʾ hawatkʾĕ , ĕsaw antamaloydzin : « Kʾachalerowē , orteag , meghkʾert nerowadz en kʾezi » .
40009003	Tbirnerēn omankʾ ĕsin , irenkʾ irentsʾ mēch : « Asiga gĕ hayhoyē » .
40009004	Yisows , kitnalov anontsʾ mtadzowmnerĕ , ĕsaw : « Inchʾow chʾar pan gĕ mtadzēkʾ tser sirterown mēch .
40009005	Orĕ aweli tiwrin ē , “ meghkʾert nerowadz en ” ĕselĕ , tʾē , “ otkʾi elir ow kʾalē ” ĕselĕ .
40009006	Paytsʾ orbēszi kitnakʾ tʾē martow Ortin ishkhanowtʾiwn owni meghkʾerĕ nerelow ergri vray , ( ayn aten ĕsaw antamaloydzin : ) “ Otkʾi elir , aṛ mahijt ow kna townt ” » .
40009007	An al otkʾi elaw ew knatsʾ ir townĕ .
40009008	Erp pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ tesan , zarmatsʾan , ow pʾaṛapanetsʾin Astowadz , or aytbisi ishkhanowtʾiwn towadz ēr martotsʾ .
40009009	Yisows angē yaṛach ertʾalov , tesaw mart mĕ , Mattʾēos gochʾowadz , or nstadz ēr makʾs ĕntownelow teghĕ , ew ĕsaw anor : « Hetewē indzi » . An al ganknetsʾaw ow hetewetsʾaw anor .
40009010	Townĕ seghan nstadz , , atenĕ , aha owrish shat makʾsaworner ew meghaworner egadz ow seghan nstadz ēin Yisowsi ew anor ashagertnerown het .
40009011	Erp Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ tesan , ĕsin anor ashagertnerown : « Inchʾow tser vartabetĕ g!owtē makʾsawornerow ew meghawornerow het » .
40009012	Paytsʾ erp Yisows lsetsʾ , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ochʾ tʾē aṛoghchnerown p zhishg bētkʾ ē , haba , hiwantnerown .
40009013	Katsʾēkʾ , sorvetsʾēkʾ tʾē inchʾ ĕsel ē : “ Garegtsʾowtʾiwn g!owzem , ow ochʾ tʾē zoh ” : orovhetew es egay ganchʾelow ochʾ tʾē artarnerĕ , haba meghawornerĕ , abashkharowtʾean » .
40009014	Ayn aten Yovhannēsi ashagertnerĕ egan anor ew ĕsin : « Inchʾow menkʾ ow Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ yajakh dzom gĕ bahenkʾ , isg kʾow ashagertnert chʾen baher » .
40009015	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Mitʾē gareli ē , or harsnewornerĕ skan , kʾani pʾesan irentsʾ het ē . Paytsʾ ōrerĕ biti kan , erp pʾesan biti vertsʾowi irentsʾmē : ayn aten dzom biti bahen .
40009016	Ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ tskē nor latʾi gtor mĕ hin hantertsi mĕ vray , orovhetew aniga or anor lrowmin hamar trowadz ē , gĕ kʾashē hantertsĕ , ow batṛowadzkʾĕ aweli kēsh g!ĕllay .
40009017	Ochʾ al nor kinin gĕ tnen hin tigerow mēch : aylabēs , tigerĕ gĕ batṛin , ew kinin gĕ tʾapʾi , ew tigerĕ gĕ gorsowin . Haba nor kinin gĕ tnen nor tigerow mēch , ow ergowkʾn al gĕ bahowin » .
40009018	Erp an ays panerĕ gĕ khōsēr anontsʾ het , aha bet mĕ egaw ow ergrbaketsʾ anor , ĕselov : « Aghchigs tʾerews vakhjanadz ē minchʾew hima : paytsʾ egowr , tir tseṛkʾt anor vray , ew biti abri » .
40009019	Yisows al otkʾi elaw ow hetewetsʾaw anor , ir ashagertnerown het .
40009020	Ew aha gin mĕ , or ariwnahosowtʾenē gĕ taṛabēr tasnergow tariē i ver , mōtetsʾaw etewēn ow tbaw anor hantertsin kʾghantsʾkʾin :
40009021	kʾani or g!ĕsēr inkʾniren : « Etʾē miayn tbchʾim anor hantertsin , biti p zhshgowim » .
40009022	Yisows , erp etew tartsaw ow tesaw zayn , ĕsaw : « Kʾachalerowē , aghchig , hawatkʾt p zhshgetsʾ kʾez » . Ew ginĕ p zhshgowetsʾaw noyn zhamown .
40009023	Erp Yisows hasaw betin townĕ , ow tesaw srnkaharnerĕ ew aghmgarar pazmowtʾiwnĕ ,
40009024	ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Megnetsʾēkʾ , orovhetew aghchigĕ meṛadz chʾē , haba gĕ kʾnanay » .
40009025	Anonkʾ al dzaghretsʾin zinkʾ . Paytsʾ erp pazmowtʾiwnĕ towrs hanowetsʾaw , inkʾ ners mtaw , pṛnetsʾ anor tseṛkʾēn , ew aghchigĕ otkʾi elaw .
40009026	Ays lowrĕ taradzowetsʾaw ampoghch ergirĕ .
40009027	Erp Yisows yaṛach antsʾaw angē , ergow goyrer hetewetsʾan anor , aghaghagelov : « Oghormē mezi , Tawitʾi Orti » :
40009028	Erp town hasaw , goyrerĕ egan iren . Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Gĕ hawatakʾ tʾē grnam ĕnel ays panĕ » . Ĕsin anor : « Ayo , Tēr » .
40009029	Ayn aten tbaw anontsʾ achʾkʾerown ew ĕsaw : « Tʾogh ĕllay tsezi , tser hawatkʾin hamemat » .
40009030	Anontsʾ achʾkʾerĕ patsʾowetsʾan , ow Yisows aztararetsʾ anontsʾ , ĕselov : « Zkowshatsʾēkʾ or ochʾ mēgĕ kitnay » .
40009031	Paytsʾ anonkʾ megnelov taradzetsʾin anor hampawĕ ayt ampoghch ergrin mēch .
40009032	Erp anonkʾ towrs elan , aha hamr tiwahar mart mĕ perin iren .
40009033	Erp tewĕ elaw , hamrĕ khōsetsʾaw . Owsti pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ zarmatsʾan , ow g!ĕsēin tʾē pnaw aysbisi pan erewtsʾadz chʾēr Israyēli mēch .
40009034	Paytsʾ Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ g!ĕsēin : « An tewerown ishkhanov towrs gĕ hanē tewerĕ » .
40009035	Yisows gĕ shrchēr polor kʾaghakʾnern ow kiwgherĕ , gĕ sorvetsʾnēr anontsʾ zhoghovarannerown mēch , gĕ kʾarozēr arkʾayowtʾean awetaranĕ , ew gĕ pow zhēr polor akhtern ow polor vataṛoghchowtʾiwnnerĕ zhoghovowrtin mēch .
40009036	Ew tesnelov pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ , ktʾatsʾ anontsʾ vray , orovhetew bartasadz ow tsʾrowadz ēin , hoviw chʾownetsʾogh ochʾkharnerow bēs .
40009037	Ayn aten ĕsaw ir ashagertnerown : « Howntskʾĕ irabēs shat ē , paytsʾ kordzawornerĕ , kʾichʾ :
40009038	owremn aghersetsʾēkʾ howntskʾin Tēroch , or kordzaworner owghargē ir howntskʾin » .
40010001	Yetoy , kʾovĕ ganchʾelov ir tasnergow ashagertnerĕ , ishkhanowtʾiwn towaw anontsʾ , anmakʾowr okinerown vray , orbēszi towrs hanen zanonkʾ , ow pow zhen amēn tesag akht ew amēn tesag vataṛoghchowtʾiwn .
40010002	Ahawasig tasnergow aṛakʾealnerown anownnerĕ : - aṛachinĕ , Simon , or Betros gĕ gochʾowi , ew anor eghpayrĕ , Antrēas ,
40010003	Yagopos Zepetean ew anor eghpayrĕ , Yovhannēs , Pʾilibbos ow Partʾoghomēos , Tʾovmas ew Mattʾēos , makʾsaworĕ , Yagopos Alpʾean ow GHepēos , or Tʾatēos maganowanowetsʾaw ,
40010004	Simon Gananatsʾi ew Yowta Isgariovtatsʾi , or matnetsʾ zayn .
40010005	Yisows ghrgetsʾ ays tasnergowkʾĕ ew batowiretsʾ anontsʾ : « Mi ertʾakʾ hetʾanosnerow jampayēn , ow mi mtnēkʾ Samaratsʾinerow orewē kʾaghakʾ ,
40010006	ayl manawant katsʾēkʾ Israyēli tan gorsowadz ochʾkharnerown .
40010007	Erp ertʾakʾ , kʾarozetsʾēkʾ ew ĕsēkʾ : “ Erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ mōtetsʾadz ē ” .
40010008	Pow zhetsʾēkʾ hiwantnerĕ , makʾretsʾēkʾ porotnerĕ , , , hanetsʾēkʾ tewerĕ : tsri statsʾadz ēkʾ , tsri towēkʾ .
40010009	Mi ownenakʾ ochʾ osgi , ochʾ ardzatʾ ow ochʾ bghints , tser kōtinerown mēch :
40010010	ochʾ jamportowtʾean hamar barg , ochʾ grgin pajgon , ochʾ gōshig , ochʾ kawazan : orovhetew kordzaworĕ ar zhani ē ir geragowrin .
40010011	Erp kʾaghakʾ mĕ gam kiwgh mĕ mtnēkʾ , teghegatsʾēkʾ tʾē ov ē ar zhanaworĕ anor mēch , ew mnatsʾēkʾ anor kʾov , minchʾew or megnikʾ angē .
40010012	Erp town mtnēkʾ , parew towēkʾ anor .
40010013	Etʾē ayt townĕ ar zhani ē , tser parewĕ tʾogh kay anor vray : isg etʾē ar zhani chʾē , tser parewĕ tʾogh verataṛnay tsezi .
40010014	Etʾē mēgĕ chʾĕntowni tsez ow mtig chʾĕnē tser khōskʾerĕ , erp megnikʾ ayt townēn gam kʾaghakʾēn , tʾōtʾowetsʾēkʾ tser otkʾerown pʾoshin .
40010015	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Sotomatsʾinerow ew Komoratsʾinerow ergrin aweli tiwrin biti ĕllay tatastanin ōrĕ , kʾan ayt kʾaghakʾin ” » .
40010016	« Aha gĕ ghrgem tsez ipr ochʾkharner , kaylerow mēch : owremn khorakēt eghēkʾ ōtserow bēs , ew annenk , aghawninerow bēs .
40010017	Isg zkowshatsʾēkʾ martotsʾmē : orovhetew ateannerow biti matnen tsez , ow biti kharazanen tsez irentsʾ zhoghovarannerown mēch .
40010018	Gaṛavarichʾnerow ew tʾakawornerow aṛchew biti tarowikʾ , im batjaṛovs , ipr vgayowtʾiwn anontsʾ ow hetʾanosnerown .
40010019	Paytsʾ erp matnen tsez , mi mtahokowikʾ tʾē inchʾbēs gam inchʾ biti khōsikʾ , orovhetew inchʾ or biti khōsikʾ , biti trowi tsezi ayt zhamown .
40010020	Orovhetew ochʾ tʾē towkʾ ēkʾ or biti khōsikʾ , haba tser Hōr Hokin , or biti khōsi tser mēch .
40010021	Eghpayrĕ mahowan biti matnē ir eghpayrĕ , ew hayrĕ , zawagĕ : ow zawagner biti ellen irentsʾ dznoghnerown tēm ew meṛtsʾnen zanonkʾ .
40010022	Polorin ateli biti ĕllakʾ im anownis hamar : paytsʾ ov or togay minchʾew vakhjanĕ , aniga biti pʾrgowi .
40010023	Erp ays kʾaghakʾin mēch haladzen tsez , pʾakhēkʾ owrish kʾaghakʾ mĕ : orovhetew jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Biti chʾawartēkʾ Israyēli kʾaghakʾnerĕ , minchʾew or martow Ortin kay ” .
40010024	Ashagertĕ keriver chʾē ir vartabetēn , ochʾ al dzaṛan , ir tirochmēn .
40010025	Pawagan ē ashagertin , or ir vartabetin bēs ĕllay , ow dzaṛayin , ir tiroch bēs . Etʾē tanowtērĕ gochʾetsʾin Pēeghzepowgh , orchʾapʾ aweli , anor tnetsʾinerĕ » .
40010026	« Owremn mi vakhnakʾ anontsʾmē , orovhetew ochʾinchʾ gay dzadzgowadz , or biti chʾyaytnowi , ow kaghtni , or biti chʾkittsʾowi .
40010027	Inchʾ or g!ĕsem tsezi khawari mēch , khōsetsʾēkʾ zayn loysi mēch , ew inchʾ or gĕ lsēkʾ aganchi mēch , kʾarozetsʾēkʾ tanikʾnerown vray .
40010028	Mi vakhnakʾ anontsʾmē , or marminĕ gĕ sbannen ow chʾen grnar antsĕ sbannel : ayl manawant vakhtsʾēkʾ angē , or grnay antsĕ ew marminĕ gorsntsʾnel kehenin mēch .
40010029	Ergow jnjghowg chʾen dzakhowir mēg tanki : sagayn anontsʾmē ochʾ mēgĕ ketin g!iynay aṛantsʾ tser Hōr gamkʾin .
40010030	Paytsʾ tser klowkhin polor mazern al hamrowadz en .
40010031	Owremn mi vakhnakʾ , orovhetew towkʾ shat jnjghowgnerē aweli g!ar zhēkʾ » .
40010032	« Owsti ov or tawani zis martotsʾ aṛchew , es al biti tawanim zinkʾ Hōrs aṛchew , or erginkʾn ē .
40010033	Isg ov or owranay zis martotsʾ aṛchew , es al biti owranam zinkʾ Hōrs aṛchew , or erginkʾn ē » .
40010034	« Mi gardzēkʾ tʾē es egay khaghaghowtʾiwn tskelow ergri vray . Es egay ochʾ tʾē khaghaghowtʾiwn tskelow , haba , sowr .
40010035	Orovhetew egay zatelow martĕ ir hōrmēn , ew aghchigĕ , ir mōrmēn , ow harsĕ , ir gesowrēn .
40010036	Martown tʾshnaminerĕ , ir tnetsʾinerĕ biti ĕllan .
40010037	An or intsmē aweli gĕ sirē ir hayrĕ gam mayrĕ , indzi ar zhani chʾē , ew an or intsmē aweli gĕ sirē ir ortin gam aghchigĕ , indzi ar zhani chʾē .
40010038	An or ir khachʾĕ chʾ!aṛner ow im etewēs chʾi kar , indzi ar zhani chʾē .
40010039	An or gĕ ktnē ir antsĕ , biti gorsntsʾnē zayn , ew an or gĕ gorsntsʾnē ir antsĕ indzi hamar , biti ktnē zayn » .
40010040	« An or tsez g!ĕntowni , zis g!ĕntowni : ew an or zis g!ĕntowni , zis ghrgoghĕ g!ĕntowni .
40010041	An or markarē mĕ g!ĕntowni , markarēi anownov , markarēi vartsatrowtʾiwn biti stanay : ow an or artar mĕ g!ĕntowni , artari anownov , artari vartsatrowtʾiwn biti stanay .
40010042	Ew ov or ays bztignerēn mēgown miayn kawatʾ mĕ bagh chowr khmtsʾnē , ashagerti anownov , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi , pnaw ir vartsatrowtʾiwnĕ biti chʾgorsntsʾnē » .
40011001	Erp Yisows awartetsʾ batowēr talĕ ir tasnergow ashagertnerown , megnetsʾaw angē , sorvetsʾnelow ew kʾarozelow anontsʾ kʾaghakʾnerown mēch .
40011002	Erp Yovhannēs pantin mēch lsetsʾ Kʾristosi kordzerown masin , ir ashagertnerēn ergowkʾĕ ghrgelov , ĕsaw anor :
40011003	« Town es an , or biti kar , tʾē owrishi mĕ sbasenkʾ » .
40011004	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Katsʾēkʾ ew batmetsʾēkʾ Yovhannēsi , inchʾ or gĕ lsēkʾ ow gĕ tesnēkʾ :
40011005	goyrerĕ gĕ tesnen , gagherĕ gĕ kʾalen , porotnerĕ gĕ makʾrowin , khowlerĕ gĕ lsen , meṛelnerĕ yarowtʾiwn g!aṛnen , ew aghkʾatnerown g!awetaranowi .
40011006	Erani anor , or chʾi kaytʾagghir im batjaṛovs » .
40011007	Erp anonkʾ megnetsʾan , Yisows sgsaw pazmowtʾiwnnerown ĕsel Yovhannēsi masin : « Inchʾ tesnelow katsʾikʾ anabatĕ : hovēn tatanogh eghēk mĕ .
40011008	Haba inchʾ tesnelow katsʾikʾ : pʾapʾowg hantertsner hakadz mart mĕ : aha pʾapʾowg hantertsner groghnerĕ , tʾakawornerown townern en .
40011009	Haba inchʾ tesnelow katsʾikʾ : markarē mĕ . Ayo , gĕ yaytararem tsezi , markarēē mĕn al aweli .
40011010	Orovhetew asiga ē an , orown masin krowadz ē : “ Aha es gĕ ghrgem im batkamawors kʾow aṛchewēt : an biti batrastē jampat , kʾow aṛchewt ” .
40011011	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ginerē dznadznerown mēch , Yovhannēs Mgrtichʾēn aweli medzĕ eladz chʾē ” : sagayn erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾean mēch , amenēn bztigĕ angē aweli medz ē .
40011012	Ow Yovhannēs Mgrtichʾin ōrerēn minchʾew hima , erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ oy zhov g!aṛnowi , ew ow zheghnerĕ gĕ yapʾshtagen zayn :
40011013	orovhetew polor Markarēnern ow ōrēnkʾĕ markarēatsʾan minchʾew Yovhannēs .
40011014	Etʾē g!owzēkʾ ĕntownil , aniga ē Eghian , or biti kar .
40011015	An or aganch owni lselow , tʾogh lsē .
40011016	Paytsʾ orow nmantsʾnem ays serowntĕ . Gĕ nmani manowgnerow , oronkʾ hrabaragnerĕ nstelov , gĕ kochʾen irentsʾ ĕngernerown
40011017	ew g!ĕsen : “ Srink nowaketsʾinkʾ tsezi , ow chʾbaretsʾikʾ , oghpatsʾinkʾ tsezi , ow chʾhedzedzetsʾikʾ ” .
40011018	Orovhetew Yovhannēs egaw , ochʾ g!owtēr ew ochʾ gĕ khmēr , ow g!ĕsēin : “ Tew gay anor mēch ” .
40011019	Martow Ortin egaw , g!owtē ew gĕ khmē , ow g!ĕsen : “ Aha shatager ow kinesēr mart mĕ , makʾsawornerow ew meghawornerow paregam ” . Paytsʾ imastowtʾiwnĕ artaratsʾaw ir zawagnerov » .
40011020	Ayn aten sgsaw gshtampel ayn kʾaghakʾnerĕ , orontsʾ mēch gatarower ēin ir hrashkʾnerēn shaterĕ , kʾani or chʾabashkharetsʾin :
40011021	« Vay kʾezi , Kʾorazin , vay kʾezi , Petʾsayita , orovhetew etʾē Tiwrosi ew Sitoni mēch gatarowadz ĕllayin ayn hrashkʾnerĕ , oronkʾ tser mēch gatarowetsʾan , shatontsʾ abashkharadz biti ĕllayin kʾowrtsov ow mokhirov .
40011022	Paytsʾ tsezi gĕ yaytararem , Tiwrosi ew Sitoni aweli tiwrin biti ĕllay tatastanin ōrĕ , kʾan tsezi .
40011023	Isg town , Gapʾaṛnayowm , or partsratsʾadz es minchʾew erginkʾ , biti ichnes minchʾew t zhokhkʾ , orovhetew etʾē Sotomi mēch gatarowadz ĕllayin ayn hrashkʾnerĕ , oronkʾ kʾow mēcht gatarowetsʾan , tagawin mnatsʾadz biti ĕllar minchʾew aysōr .
40011024	Paytsʾ gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē Sotomatsʾinerow ergrin aweli tiwrin biti ĕllay tatastanin ōrĕ , kʾan kʾezi » .
40011025	Ayt aten Yisows ĕsaw : « Gĕ nerpoghem kʾez , ov Hayr , Tēr erginkʾi ow ergri , or ays panerĕ dzadzgetsʾir imastownnerēn ew khelatsʾinerēn , ow yaytnetsʾir erakhanerown .
40011026	Ayo , Hayr , orovhetew aysbēs hajeli eghaw kʾow aṛchewt .
40011027	Amēn pan yantsnowetsʾaw indzi im Hōrmēs , ew ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ janchʾnay Ortin , paytsʾ miayn Hayrĕ , ow ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ janchʾnay Hayrĕ , paytsʾ miayn Ortin , ew an , orown Ortin pʾapʾakʾi yaytnel .
40011028	Egēkʾ indzi , towkʾ polort or gĕ yoknikʾ ow peṛnaworowadz ēkʾ , ew es biti hankstatsʾnem tsez .
40011029	Aṛēkʾ im lowdzs tser vray ow sorvetsʾēkʾ intsmē , or hez em ew sirtov khonarh , ow hankstowtʾiwn biti ktnēkʾ tser antserown :
40011030	orovhetew im lowdzs hesht ē , ew im peṛs , tʾetʾew » .
40012001	Ayt aten Yisows , SHapatʾ ōr mĕ , knatsʾ arterow mēchēn : ir ashagertnerĕ , anōtʾenalov , sgsan tsʾoreni hasger pʾrtsʾnel ew owtel .
40012002	Erp Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ tesan , ĕsin anor : « Aha kʾow ashagertnert gĕ kordzen , minchʾteṛ artōnowadz chʾē kordzel SHapatʾ ōrĕ » .
40012003	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « CHʾēkʾ gartatsʾer Tawitʾi ĕradzĕ , erp inkʾ ew iren het eghoghnerĕ anōtʾetsʾan :
40012004	mtaw Astowdzoy townĕ , ow geraw aṛachatrowtʾean hatsʾerĕ , or ochʾ iren artōnowadz ēr owtel , ochʾ al iren het eghoghnerown , paytsʾ miayn kʾahananerown .
40012005	Gam tʾē ōrēnkʾin mēch chʾēkʾ gartatsʾer tʾē kʾahananerĕ gĕ srpabghdzen SHapatʾĕ tajarin mēch , SHapatʾ ōrerĕ , ew anbart en .
40012006	Paytsʾ gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē aystegh tajarēn aweli medz mēgĕ gay .
40012007	Etʾē kitnayikʾ tʾē inchʾ ĕsel ē : “ Garegtsʾowtʾiwn g!owzem , ow ochʾ tʾē zoh ” , ayn aten chʾēikʾ tatabarter anbartnerĕ :
40012008	orovhetew martow Ortin tērn ē SHapatʾin » .
40012009	Megnelov angē , egaw anontsʾ zhoghovaranĕ .
40012010	Hon mart mĕ gar , orown tseṛkʾĕ chʾortsʾadz ēr . Ampastanelow hamar zinkʾ , hartsʾowtsʾin anor : « Artōnowadz ē pow zhel SHapatʾ ōrĕ » .
40012011	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « TSezmē ov ē ayn martĕ , or etʾē ochʾkhar mĕ ownenay ew an pʾosi mēch iynay SHapatʾ ōrĕ , chʾi pṛner ow ver chʾi haner zayn .
40012012	Hetewapar martĕ orchʾapʾ aweli g!ar zhē ochʾkharēn . Owremn artōnowadz ē parikʾ kordzel SHapatʾ ōrĕ » .
40012013	Ayn aten ĕsaw ayt martown : « Ergarē tseṛkʾt » . An al ergaretsʾ , ew aṛoghchatsʾaw miwsin bēs .
40012014	Isg Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ towrs ellelov , khorhrtagtsʾetsʾan anor tēm tʾē inchʾbēs gorsntsʾnen zayn .
40012015	Erp Yisows kittsʾaw , megnetsʾaw angē . Medz pazmowtʾiwnner hetewetsʾan anor , ew pow zhetsʾ polorĕ :
40012016	paytsʾ sastig hrahanketsʾ anontsʾ , or ochʾ mēgown yaytnen zinkʾ ,
40012017	orbēszi irakordzowi Esayi markarēin michotsʾov ĕsowadz khōskʾĕ :
40012018	« Aha im dzaṛas , or ĕntretsʾi , ew im sirelis , orown hajetsʾaw im antss : im Hokis biti tnem anor vray , ow irawownkʾĕ biti hṛchʾagē hetʾanosnerown .
40012019	Ochʾ biti hagaṛagi , ochʾ biti boṛay , ew ochʾ mēgĕ biti lsē anor tsaynĕ hrabaragnerown mēch .
40012020	Biti chʾpʾshrē chakhchakhowadz eghēkĕ ow biti chʾmarē blblatsʾogh batroykĕ , minchʾew or irawownkʾĕ hastsʾnē yaghtʾowtʾean .
40012021	Ew hetʾanosnerĕ biti yowsan anor anownin » .
40012022	Ayn aten perin iren goyr ow hamr tiwahar mĕ , ew pow zhetsʾ zayn , aynbēs or hamrn ow goyrĕ khōsetsʾaw ew tesaw .
40012023	Ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ zmayletsʾaw , ow g!ĕsēr : « Arteōkʾ asiga ē Tawitʾi ortin » .
40012024	Paytsʾ erp Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ lsetsʾin , ĕsin : « Asiga owrish panov towrs chʾi haner tewerĕ , paytsʾ miayn tewerown Pēeghzepowgh ishkhanov » .
40012025	Yisows kitnalov anontsʾ mtadzowmnerĕ , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inkʾnir tēm pa zhnowadz orewē tʾakaworowtʾiwn , g!aweri , ew inkʾnir tēm pa zhnowadz orewē kʾaghakʾ gam town , chʾi grnar genal .
40012026	Etʾē Satanan towrs hanē Satanan , pa zhnowadz ē inkʾnir tēm : owremn anor tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ inchʾbēs biti genay .
40012027	Ow etʾē es Pēeghzepowghov gĕ hanem tewerĕ , tser ortinerĕ inchʾov gĕ hanen : owsti anonkʾ biti ĕllan tser tatawornerĕ .
40012028	Paytsʾ etʾē es Astowdzoy Hokiov gĕ hanem tewerĕ , owremn Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ hasadz ē tser vray .
40012029	Gam mēgĕ inchʾbēs grnay mtnel ow zhegh martow mĕ townĕ ew yapʾshtagel anor garasinerĕ , etʾē nakh chʾgabē ayt ow zhegh martĕ , ew ayn aten goghobtē anor townĕ .
40012030	An or indzi het chʾē , indzi hagaṛag ē , ew an or indzi het chʾi zhoghver , gĕ tsʾrowē .
40012031	Owsti gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Amēn tesag meghkʾ ow hayhoyowtʾiwn biti nerowi martotsʾ , paytsʾ Sowrp Hokiin tēm eghadz hayhoyowtʾiwnĕ biti chʾnerowi martotsʾ ” .
40012032	Ov or khōskʾ mĕ ĕsē martow Ortiin tēm , biti nerowi anor , paytsʾ ov or khōsi Sowrp Hokiin tēm , biti chʾnerowi anor , ochʾ ays ashkharhin mēch ew ochʾ kalikʾin mēch » .
40012033	« Gam law sebetsʾēkʾ dzaṛĕ , ow anor btowghĕ law g!ĕllay , gam vat sebetsʾēkʾ dzaṛĕ , ew anor btowghĕ vat g!ĕllay : orovhetew dzaṛĕ gĕ janchʾtsʾowi ir btowghēn .
40012034	I zherow dznowntner , inchʾbēs grnakʾ , chʾar ĕllalov , pari paner khōsil : orovhetew peranĕ gĕ khōsi sirtin liowtʾenēn .
40012035	Pari martĕ ir sirtin pari kantsēn gĕ hanē pari paner , isg chʾar martĕ ir sirtin chʾar kantsēn gĕ hanē chʾar paner .
40012036	Paytsʾ gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Amēn tatarg khōskʾi hamar , or martig gĕ khōsin , hashiw biti tan tatastanin ōrĕ ” .
40012037	Orovhetew kʾow khōskʾerēt biti artaranas , ew kʾow khōskʾerēt biti tatabartowis » .
40012038	Ayn aten tbirnerēn ow Pʾarisetsʾinerēn omankʾ ĕsin iren : « Vartabet , nshan mĕ g!owzenkʾ tesnel kʾezmē » .
40012039	Isg inkʾ bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « CHʾar ew shnatsʾogh serowntĕ nshan gĕ khntrē . Owrish nshan biti chʾtrowi anor , paytsʾ miayn Yovnan markarēin nshanĕ .
40012040	Orovhetew inchʾbēs Yovnan mnatsʾ gēt tsowgin pʾorin mēch , erekʾ ōr ow erekʾ kisher , aynbēs martow Ortin biti mnay ergri sirtin mēch , erekʾ ōr ew erekʾ kisher .
40012041	Ninowēi martigĕ tatastanin ōrĕ biti ganknin ays serowntin tēm ow biti tatabarten zayn , orovhetew zghchatsʾin Yovnani kʾarozowtʾeamp : ew aha Yovnanē medz mēgĕ gay hos .
40012042	Harawi tʾakowhin tatastanin ōrĕ otkʾi biti ellē ays serowntin tēm ow zayn biti tatabartē , orovhetew inkʾ egaw ergri dzayrerēn , Soghomoni imastowtʾiwnĕ lselow : ew aha Soghomonē medz mēgĕ gay hos » .
40012043	« Erp anmakʾowr okin towrs g!ellē martē mĕ , gĕ shrchi anchowr tegher , hankstowtʾiwn gĕ pʾntṛē , ow chʾi ktner .
40012044	Ayn aten g!ĕsē : “ Verataṛnam im towns , owrgē elay ” . Gow kay ew gĕ ktnē zayn , barab , awlowadz ow zartarowadz .
40012045	Ayn aten g!ertʾay , ew g!aṛnē iren het eōtʾĕ owrish okiner , irmē aweli chʾar , ow mtnelov hon gĕ pnagin : ew ayt martown verchin vijagĕ g!ĕllay aṛachinēn aweli kēsh . Aysbēs biti ĕllay ays chʾar serowntin al » .
40012046	Minchʾ inkʾ gĕ khōsēr pazmowtʾean , ir mayrn ow eghpayrnerĕ gaynadz ēin towrsĕ , ew gĕ chanayin khōsil iren het .
40012047	Mēgĕ ĕsaw iren : « Aha kʾow mayrt ow eghpayrnert gaynadz en towrsĕ , ew gĕ chanan khōsil kʾezi het » .
40012048	Inkʾ al bataskhanetsʾ iren ĕsoghin : « Ov ē im mayrs , ow oronkʾ en im eghpayrners » .
40012049	Ew ergarelov ir tseṛkʾĕ tēbi ir ashagertnerĕ , ĕsaw : « Aha mayrs ow eghpayrners :
40012050	orovhetew ov or gĕ kordzatrē im ergnawor Hōrs gamkʾĕ , aniga ē im eghpayrs , kʾoyrs ew mayrs » .
40013001	Noyn ōrĕ Yisows , townēn ellelov , nstaw dzovown ezerkʾĕ .
40013002	Medz pazmowtʾiwnner kʾovĕ hawakʾowetsʾan : owsti inkʾ naw mtaw ow nstaw , isg ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ gaynadz ēr dzovezerkʾĕ .
40013003	SHat paner khōsetsʾaw anontsʾ , aṛagnerov , ew ĕsaw :
40013004	« Aha sermnatsʾan mĕ knatsʾ , or serm tsʾanē . Erp gĕ tsʾanēr , kʾani mĕ sermer ingan jampayin ezerkʾĕ , ew tʾṛchʾownnerĕ egan ow lapʾetsʾin zanonkʾ .
40013005	Owrishner ingan zhayṛot tegherow vray , owr shat hogh chʾgar , ew isgoyn powsan , hoghin khorowngowtʾiwn chʾownenalown hamar :
40013006	sagayn tōtʾagēz eghan erp arewĕ elaw , ow chʾortsʾan , kʾani or armat chʾownēin .
40013007	Owrishner al ingan pʾowsherow mēch : ew pʾowsherĕ partsratsʾan ow kheghtetsʾin zanonkʾ .
40013008	Isg owrishner ingan law hoghi mēch , ew btowgh towin , mēgĕ hariwr , miwsĕ , vatʾsown , miwsĕ , eresown .
40013009	An or aganch owni lselow , tʾogh lsē » .
40013010	Ashagertnerĕ mōtenalov , ĕsin iren : « Inchʾow aṛagnerov gĕ khōsis anontsʾ » .
40013011	Inkʾ al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Kʾani or tsezi trowadz ē kitnal erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾean khorhowrtnerĕ , paytsʾ anontsʾ trowadz chʾē .
40013012	Orovhetew ov or owni , anor biti trowi ow aṛatowtʾean mēch biti ĕllay : isg ov or chʾowni , ownetsʾadzn al angē biti aṛnowi .
40013013	Owsti aṛagnerov gĕ khōsim anontsʾ , kʾani or tesnelov , chʾen tesner , ow lselov , chʾen lser , ochʾ al gĕ hasgnan .
40013014	Anontsʾ vray biti irakordzowi Esayii markarēowtʾiwnĕ , or g!ĕsē : “ SHat biti lsēkʾ , paytsʾ biti chʾhasgnakʾ : shat biti tesnēkʾ , paytsʾ biti chʾĕmpṛnēkʾ .
40013015	Orovhetew ays zhoghovowrtin sirtĕ tʾantsratsʾaw , ew irentsʾ aganchnerov dzanr lsetsʾin ow kotsʾetsʾin irentsʾ achʾkʾerĕ , orbēszi achʾkʾerov chʾtesnen , aganchnerov chʾlsen , sirtov chʾhasgnan , ew tartsi chʾkan , ow es chʾp zhshgem zanonkʾ ” .
40013016	Paytsʾ erani tser achʾkʾerown , or gĕ tesnen , ew tser aganchnerown , or gĕ lsen .
40013017	Orovhetew jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē shat markarēner ew artarner tsʾangatsʾin tesnel tser tesadznerĕ , ow chʾtesan , ew lsel tser lsadznerĕ , ow chʾlsetsʾin » .
40013018	« Lsetsʾēkʾ owremn sermnatsʾanin aṛagĕ .
40013019	Ov or gĕ lsē tʾakaworowtʾean khōskʾĕ ew chʾi hasgnar , chʾarĕ gow kay ow gĕ yapʾshtagē anor sirtin mēch tsʾanowadzĕ . Asiga an ē , or serm statsʾaw jampayin ezerkʾĕ .
40013020	ZHayṛot tegherow vray serm statsʾoghĕ an ē , or gĕ lsē khōskʾĕ ew isgoyn g!ĕntowni zayn owrakhowtʾeamp .
40013021	Paytsʾ ir mēch armat chʾownenalov , kʾichʾ zhamanag gĕ tewē , ow erp taṛabankʾ gam haladzankʾ ĕllay khōskʾin batjaṛov , isgoyn gĕ kaytʾagghi .
40013022	Pʾowsherow mēch serm statsʾoghĕ an ē , or gĕ lsē khōskʾĕ , sagayn ays ashkharhi hokern ow harstowtʾean khapēowtʾiwnĕ gĕ kheghten khōskʾĕ , ew anbtowgh g!ĕllay .
40013023	Isg law hoghi mēch serm statsʾoghĕ an ē , or khōskʾĕ gĕ lsē ow gĕ hasgnay : naew btowgh gow tay , ew gĕ perē , mēgĕ hariwr , miwsĕ , vatʾsown , miwsĕ , eresown » .
40013024	Owrish aṛag mĕn al aṛachargetsʾ anontsʾ ow ĕsaw : « Erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ nmanetsʾaw martow mĕ , or ir artin mēch law serm tsʾanetsʾ .
40013025	Minchʾ martig gĕ kʾnanayin , ir tʾshnamin egaw , orom tsʾanetsʾ tsʾorenin mēch ew knatsʾ .
40013026	Erp khotĕ dzaghgetsʾaw ow btowgh peraw , ayn aten oromn al erewtsʾaw .
40013027	Owsti hoghatiroch dzaṛanerĕ mōtetsʾan ew ĕsin anor : “ Tēr , town law serm chʾtsʾanetsʾir artit mēch : owremn oromĕ owrgē ē ” .
40013028	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : “ Tʾshnami mĕ ĕradz ē asiga ” . DZaṛanerĕ ĕsin iren : “ Owsti g!owzes or ertʾankʾ ow kʾaghenkʾ zanonkʾ ” .
40013029	Isg an ĕsaw : “ Ochʾ , orbēszi erp oromĕ kʾaghēkʾ , tsʾorenn al chʾpʾrtsʾnēkʾ anor het .
40013030	Tʾoyl towēkʾ or ergowkʾn al miasin ajin , minchʾew howntskʾi atenĕ ” . Ew howntskʾi atenĕ biti ĕsem hntsoghnerown : “ Nakh oromĕ kʾaghetsʾēkʾ ow khowrts-khowrts gabetsʾēkʾ , ayrelow hamar , isg tsʾorenĕ zhoghvetsʾēkʾ im ampars ” » .
40013031	Owrish aṛag mĕn al aṛachargetsʾ anontsʾ ew ĕsaw : « Erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ nman ē mananekhi hatigi mĕ , or mart mĕ aṛaw ow tsʾanetsʾ ir artin mēch .
40013032	Artarew an polor sermerown amenēn bztign ē , paytsʾ erp aji , towngerown medzakoynĕ g!ĕllay ow dzaṛ gĕ taṛnay , aynbēs or erginkʾi tʾṛchʾownnerĕ gow kan ew gĕ pnagin anor jiwgherown vray » .
40013033	Owrish aṛag mĕn al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ nman ē khmorin , or gin mĕ aṛaw ow bahetsʾ erekʾ kriw aliwri mēch , minchʾew or ampoghchĕ khmorowetsʾaw » .
40013034	Yisows aṛagnerov khōsetsʾaw pazmowtʾean ays polor panerĕ . Aṛantsʾ aṛagi chʾēr khōser anontsʾ ,
40013035	orbēszi irakordzowi markarēin michotsʾov ĕsowadz khōskʾĕ : « Aṛagnerov biti panam perans , ew biti artayaytem ashkharhi himnatrowtʾenēn i ver dzadzgowadz panerĕ » .
40013036	Ayn aten Yisows artsagetsʾ pazmowtʾiwnĕ , ow town knatsʾ . Ir ashagertnerĕ mōtetsʾan iren ew ĕsin : « Patsʾatrē mezi artin oromnerown aṛagĕ » .
40013037	Inkʾ al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Law sermĕ tsʾanoghĕ , martow Ortin ē ,
40013038	artĕ , ashkharhn ē . Law sermĕ tʾakaworowtʾean ortinern en , paytsʾ oromĕ chʾarin ortinern en .
40013039	Tʾshnamin or tsʾanetsʾ zayn , CHʾarakhōsn ē , howntskʾĕ , ashkharhi vakhjann ē , ew hntsoghnerĕ , hreshtagnern en .
40013040	Owremn inchʾbēs or oromĕ gĕ kʾaghowi ow g!ayrowi gragi mēch , aynbēs biti ĕllay ays ashkharhi vakhjanin .
40013041	Martow Ortin biti ghrgē ir hreshtagnerĕ , ew biti hawakʾen ir tʾakaworowtʾenēn polor kaytʾagghowtʾiwnnern ow anōrēnowtʾiwn kordzoghnerĕ ,
40013042	ew biti neten zanonkʾ gragi hnotsʾin mēch : hon biti ĕllay latsʾ ow agṛanerow grjtowm .
40013043	Ayn aten artarnerĕ biti pʾaylin arewi bēs , irentsʾ Hōr tʾakaworowtʾean mēch . An or aganch owni lselow , tʾogh lsē » .
40013044	« Tartseal , erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ nman ē arti mēch bahowadz kantsin , or mart mĕ , ktnelē etkʾ , gĕ dzadzgē , ew owrakhowtʾenēn g!ertʾay , gĕ dzakhē ir ampoghch ownetsʾadzĕ , ow gĕ knē ayt artĕ » .
40013045	« Tartseal , erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ nman ē aṛewtragani mĕ , or keghetsʾig markaritner gĕ pʾntṛē ,
40013046	ew shat batowagan markarit mĕ ktnelē etkʾ , knatsʾ , dzakhetsʾ ir ampoghch ownetsʾadzĕ , ow knetsʾ zayn » .
40013047	« Tartseal , erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ nman ē dzovĕ netowadz owṛgani mĕ , or amēn tesag tsowg gĕ zhoghvē .
40013048	Erp owṛganĕ letsʾowetsʾaw , hanetsʾin dzovezerkʾĕ ew nstan , hawakʾetsʾin lawerĕ amannerow mēch , isg towrs netetsʾin vaterĕ .
40013049	Aysbēs biti ĕllay ashkharhi vakhjanin . Hreshtagnerĕ biti ellen , artarnerown mēchēn biti zaten chʾarerĕ ,
40013050	ow biti neten zanonkʾ gragi hnotsʾin mēch : hon biti ĕllay latsʾ ew agṛanerow grjtowm » .
40013051	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Hasgtsʾakʾ ays amēnĕ » . Ĕsin anor : « Ayo , Tēr » .
40013052	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Asor hamar amēn tbir , or ashagert eghadz ē erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾean , nman ē tantiroch mĕ , or ir kantsēn gĕ hanē norn ow hinĕ » .
40013053	Erp Yisows awartetsʾ ays aṛagnerĕ , megnetsʾaw angē .
40013054	Knatsʾ ir pnakawaṛĕ ew gĕ sorvetsʾnēr anontsʾ , irentsʾ zhoghovaranin mēch , aynbēs or anonkʾ g!abshēin ow g!ĕsēin : « Asiga owrgē owni ays imastowtʾiwnĕ ew hrashkʾnerĕ .
40013055	Asiga hiwsnin ortin chʾē : asor mayrĕ Mariam chʾi gochʾowir . Asor eghpayrnerĕ , Yagopos , Yovsēs , Simon ow Yowta ,
40013056	ew asor kʾoyrerĕ , polorn al mer kʾov chʾen . Owremn asiga owrgē owni ays polor panerĕ » :
40013057	ow gĕ kaytʾagghēin anor batjaṛov . Paytsʾ Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Markarē mĕ aṛantsʾ batiwi chʾē , patsʾi ir pnakawaṛin ew ir tan mēch » .
40013058	Ow shat hrashkʾner chʾkordzetsʾ hon , anontsʾ anhawatowtʾean batjaṛov .
40014001	Ayt aten Herovtēs chʾorrortabetĕ lsetsʾ Yisowsi hampawĕ , ew ĕsaw ir dzaṛanerown :
40014002	« An Yovhannēs Mgrtichʾn ē , meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛadz : owsti hrashkʾner gĕ kordzowin anov » .
40014003	Artarew Herovtēs pṛner ēr Yovhannēsĕ , ow zayn gabelov pantĕ trer ēr , ir eghpōr , Pʾilibbosi gnoch , Herovtiayi batjaṛov :
40014004	orovhetew Yovhannēs g!ĕsēr anor : « Kʾezi artōnowadz chʾē gin aṛnel zinkʾ » .
40014005	Owsti g!owzēr sbannel zayn , paytsʾ gĕ vakhnar pazmowtʾenēn , orovhetew markarē gĕ ngatēin , , zayn .
40014006	Erp Herovtēsi dznowntin taretartsĕ gĕ tōnowēr , Herovtiayi aghchigĕ baretsʾ hantisagannerown aṛchew , ow hajetsʾowtsʾ Herovtēsĕ .
40014007	Owsti ertowmov khostatsʾaw or tar anor inchʾ or owzēr .
40014008	An al , nakhabēs khratowadz ĕllalov ir mōrmēn , ĕsaw : « Towr indzi Yovhannēs Mgrtichʾin klowkhĕ , apʾsēi mĕ vray » .
40014009	Tʾakaworĕ trtmetsʾaw : paytsʾ ertowmnerown ew iren het nstoghnerown batjaṛov , hramayetsʾ or trowi .
40014010	Ow mart ghrgelov , klkhatetsʾ Yovhannēsĕ pantin mēch .
40014011	Ew anor klowkhĕ perowetsʾaw apʾsēi mĕ vray ow trowetsʾaw aghchigin : an al towaw ir mōr .
40014012	Ew anor ashagertnerĕ egan , vertsʾowtsʾin marminĕ , tʾaghetsʾin zayn , ow katsʾin batmetsʾin Yisowsi .
40014013	Erp Yisows lsetsʾ , angē nawov megnetsʾaw amayi tegh mĕ , aṛantsin . Erp pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ lsetsʾin , otkʾov hetewetsʾan anor , irentsʾ kʾaghakʾnerēn .
40014014	Erp towrs elaw , tesnelov medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ , ktʾatsʾ anontsʾ vray ow pow zhetsʾ anontsʾ hiwantnerĕ .
40014015	Irigownĕ , ir ashagertnerĕ egan ew ĕsin : « Hos amayi tegh mĕn ē , ow zhamanagĕ artēn antsʾadz ē : artsagē pazmowtʾiwnĕ , orbēszi ertʾan kiwgherĕ ew geragowr knen irentsʾ » .
40014016	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Bētkʾ chʾgay or anonkʾ ertʾan , towkʾ towēkʾ anontsʾ , or owten » .
40014017	Anonkʾ al ĕsin : « Hos owrish pan chʾowninkʾ , paytsʾ miayn hink nganag ow ergow tsowg » .
40014018	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Hos , indzi perēkʾ zanonkʾ » .
40014019	Ew hramayetsʾ or pazmowtʾiwnĕ nstetsʾnen khotin vray . Hink nganagnern ow ergow tsowgerĕ aṛaw , tēbi erginkʾ nayelov , ōrhnetsʾ , ew gtrelov nganagnerĕ , towaw ashagertnerown , ashagertnern al , pazmowtʾean .
40014020	Polorĕ geran ow gshtatsʾan , ew vertsʾnelov aweltsʾadz pegornerĕ , tasnergow goghov letsʾowtsʾin .
40014021	Anonkʾ or geran , hink hazari chʾapʾ ayr martig ēin , ginerēn ow manowgnerēn zat .
40014022	Isgoyn hargatretsʾ ashagertnerĕ , or naw mtnen ew irmē aṛach antsʾnin miws ezerkʾĕ , minchʾ inkʾ pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ g!artsagēr .
40014023	Pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ artsagelē etkʾ , leṛĕ elaw aṛantsin , aghōtʾelow . Erp irigown eghaw , hon ēr , minagĕ :
40014024	isg nawĕ artēn dzovown mēchteghn ēr , alegodzowtʾean mēch , orovhetew hovĕ hagaṛag owghghowtʾeamp ēr .
40014025	Kisherowan chʾorrort bahown , Yisows knatsʾ tēbi nawĕ , kʾalelov dzovown vray .
40014026	Erp ashagertnerĕ tesan zayn , or gĕ kʾalēr dzovown vray , vrtovetsʾan ew ĕsin tʾē achʾkʾi erewoytʾ mĕn ē , ow vakhnalov aghaghagetsʾin .
40014027	Isgoyn Yisows khōsetsʾaw anontsʾ ew ĕsaw : « Kʾachalerowetsʾēkʾ , es em , mi vakhnakʾ » .
40014028	Betros bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Tēr , etʾē town es , hramayē indzi , or kam kʾezi chowrerown vrayēn » .
40014029	An al ĕsaw : « Egowr » . Erp Betros nawēn ichaw , kʾaletsʾ chowrerown vrayēn , Yisowsi kʾov ertʾalow hamar .
40014030	Paytsʾ tesnelov hovin sastig ĕllalĕ , vakhtsʾaw . Erp sgsaw ĕngghmil , aghaghagetsʾ : « Tēr , pʾrgē zis » .
40014031	Yisows isgoyn ergaretsʾ ir tseṛkʾĕ , pṛnetsʾ zinkʾ ow ĕsaw : « Tʾerahawat , inchʾow gasgadzetsʾar » .
40014032	Erp naw elan , hovĕ tatretsʾaw .
40014033	Anonkʾ or nawown mēch ēin , egan , ergrbaketsʾin anor ew ĕsin : « Jshmartabēs town Astowdzoy Ortin es » .
40014034	Antsʾnelov miws goghmĕ , hasan Kennesarētʾ .
40014035	Erp ayt teghi martigĕ janchʾtsʾan zinkʾ , mart ghrgetsʾin ampoghch shrchagaykʾĕ , perin anor polor akhtawornerĕ ,
40014036	ow g!aghachʾēin anor or miayn tbchʾēin ir hantertsin kʾghantsʾkʾin : ew anonkʾ or tban , p zhshgowetsʾan .
40015001	Ayn aten Yisowsi egan tbirner ow Pʾarisetsʾiner , oronkʾ Erowsaghēmēn ēin , ew ĕsin :
40015002	« Inchʾow kʾow ashagertnert zantsʾ g!ĕnen nakhnikʾnerown awantowtʾiwnĕ , kʾani or chʾen lowar irentsʾ tseṛkʾerĕ , erp hatsʾ g!owten » .
40015003	Inkʾ al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Haba towkʾ inchʾow zantsʾ g!ĕnēkʾ Astowdzoy batowiranĕ , tser awantowtʾean batjaṛov .
40015004	Artarew Astowadz batowiretsʾ : “ Batowē hayrt ow mayrt :
40015005	ew ov or anidzē ir hayrĕ gam mayrĕ , mahov tʾogh vakhjani ” .
40015006	Paytsʾ towkʾ g!ĕsēkʾ : “ Ov or ir hōr gam mōr ĕsē tʾē " inchʾ ōkowt or biti stanas intsmē , Astowdzoy talikʾ ĕndzay ē " , ew ir hayrĕ gam mayrĕ chʾbatowē , azat ē ” . Aysbēs , anvawer tartsowtsʾadz ēkʾ Astowdzoy batowiranĕ , tser awantowtʾean batjaṛov .
40015007	Geghdzaworner , Esayi jisht markarēatsʾaw tser masin , ĕselov :
40015008	“ Ays zhoghovowrtĕ miayn shrtʾownkʾov gĕ batowē zis , paytsʾ irentsʾ sirtĕ heṛow ē intsmē :
40015009	ew barab teghĕ gĕ bashten zis , martotsʾ batowērnerĕ sorvetsʾnelov ipr vartabetowtʾiwn ” » .
40015010	Ew pazmowtʾiwnĕ ganchʾelov iren , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Lsetsʾēkʾ ow hasgtsʾēkʾ :
40015011	ochʾ tʾē inchʾ or gĕ mtnē peranĕ , gĕ bghdzē martĕ , haba inchʾ or g!ellē peranēn , aniga gĕ bghdzē martĕ » .
40015012	Ayn aten ir ashagertnerĕ mōtetsʾan ew ĕsin iren : « Kites tʾē Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ kaytʾagghetsʾan , erp lsetsʾin ayt khōskʾĕ » .
40015013	An al bataskhanetsʾ : « Amēn towng , or im ergnawor Hayrs chʾē tngadz , biti khlowi .
40015014	Tʾoghowtsʾēkʾ zanonkʾ : irenkʾ goyr en , ow goyrerow aṛachnort . Etʾē goyrĕ aṛachnortē goyrĕ , ergowkʾn al pʾosĕ biti iynan » .
40015015	Betros ĕsaw anor : « Patsʾatrē mezi ays aṛagĕ » .
40015016	Yisows ĕsaw : « Towkʾ al tagawin ankhelkʾ ēkʾ :
40015017	chʾēkʾ hasgnar tʾē amēn inchʾ or gĕ mtnē peranĕ , gĕ barownagowi pʾorin mēch , ow gĕ tskowi artakʾnotsʾĕ .
40015018	Isg inchʾ or peranēn towrs g!ellē , sirtēn yaṛach gow kay , ew aniga gĕ bghdzē martĕ .
40015019	Orovhetew sirtēn g!ellen chʾar mtadzowmner , sbanowtʾiwnner , shnowtʾiwnner , boṛngowtʾiwnner , koghowtʾiwnner , sowt vgayowtʾiwnner ow hayhoyowtʾiwnner .
40015020	Asonkʾ en or gĕ bghdzen martĕ , paytsʾ anloway tseṛkʾov hatsʾ owtelĕ , chʾi bghdzer martĕ » .
40015021	Yisows angē megnelov , knatsʾ Tiwrosi ow Sitoni ergramaserĕ .
40015022	Ew aha kʾananatsʾi gin mĕ , ayt hoghamaserēn eladz , gĕ boṛar anor : « Oghormē indzi , Tēr , Tawitʾi orti , aghchigs sastig gĕ chʾarchʾarowi tewēn » .
40015023	Inkʾ ochʾ mēg khōskʾov bataskhanetsʾ anor : isg ir ashagertnerĕ mōtenalov , gĕ tʾakhantsēin iren ow g!ĕsēin : « Artsagē zayn , orovhetew g!aghaghagē mer etewēn » .
40015024	Inkʾ al bataskhanetsʾ : « Es ghrgowetsʾay miayn Israyēli tan gorsowadz ochʾkharnerown » .
40015025	Paytsʾ aniga egaw , ergrbaketsʾ anor ew ĕsaw : « Tēr , ōknē indzi » .
40015026	An al bataskhanetsʾ : « Law chʾē aṛnel zawagnerown hatsʾĕ ow netel shownerown » .
40015027	Aniga al ĕsaw : « Ayo , Tēr : sagayn shownerĕ gĕ geragrowin irentsʾ tiroch seghanēn ingadz pʾshrankʾnerov » .
40015028	Ayn aten Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Ov gin , medz ē hawatkʾt : tʾogh ĕllay kʾezi , inchʾ or g!owzes » . Ew noyn zhamown anor aghchigĕ p zhshgowetsʾaw .
40015029	Yisows angē megnetsʾaw : erp Kalileayi dzovezerkʾĕ hasaw , leṛĕ ellelov nstaw .
40015030	Ow medz pazmowtʾiwnner egan iren , oronkʾ ownēin irentsʾ het gagher , goyrer , hamrer , hashmantamner ew shat owrishner , ow tsketsʾin zanonkʾ Yisowsi otkʾĕ . An al pow zhetsʾ zanonkʾ :
40015031	aynbēs or pazmowtʾiwnĕ zmayletsʾaw , tesnelov or hamrerĕ gĕ khōsēin , hashmantamnerĕ gĕ p zhshgowēin , gagherĕ gĕ kʾalēin ew goyrerĕ gĕ tesnēin : ow gĕ pʾaṛapanēin Israyēli Astowadzĕ .
40015032	Yisows , kʾovĕ ganchʾelov ir ashagertnerĕ , ĕsaw : « Gĕ ktʾam ayt pazmowtʾean vray , orovhetew artēn erekʾ ōrē i ver kʾovs en , ew owtelikʾ ochʾinchʾ ownin . CHʾem owzer anōtʾi artsagel zanonkʾ , orbēszi jampan chʾbartasin » .
40015033	Ashagertnerĕ ĕsin anor : « Menkʾ anabatin mēch owrgē biti ownenankʾ aynchʾapʾ hatsʾ , or gshtatsʾnenkʾ ayschʾapʾ medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ » .
40015034	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Kʾani nganag ownikʾ » . Anonkʾ al ĕsin : « Eōtʾĕ , ow kʾani mĕ manr tsowg » .
40015035	Hramayetsʾ pazmowtʾean , or nstin ketinin vray .
40015036	Aṛaw eōtʾĕ nganagnern ow tsowgerĕ , shnorhagal eghaw , gtretsʾ ew towaw ashagertnerown , ashagertnern al , pazmowtʾean .
40015037	Polorĕ geran ow gshtatsʾan , ew vertsʾnelov aweltsʾadz pegornerĕ , eōtʾĕ zampiwgh letsʾowtsʾin .
40015038	Anonkʾ or geran , chʾors hazar ayr martig ēin , ginerēn ow manowgnerēn zat .
40015039	Erp artsagetsʾ pazmowtʾiwnĕ , naw mtaw ew knatsʾ Maktaghayi hoghamasĕ .
40016001	Pʾarisetsʾinern ow Satowgetsʾinerĕ kʾovĕ egan , pʾortselow hamar zinkʾ , ew gĕ khntrēin irmē or erginkʾēn nshan mĕ tsʾoytsʾ tay irentsʾ .
40016002	An al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Erp irigown ĕllay , g!ĕsēkʾ : “ Vaghĕ law ōt biti ĕllay , orovhetew erginkʾĕ shaṛakownadz ē ” ,
40016003	isg aṛtown : “ Aysōr mrrig biti ĕllay , orovhetew erginkʾĕ shaṛakownadz ow mtʾaknadz ē ” . Geghdzaworner , kitēkʾ znnel erginkʾi eresĕ , paytsʾ chʾēkʾ grnar kitnal zhamanagnerown nshannerĕ .
40016004	CHʾar ow shnatsʾogh serowntĕ nshan gĕ khntrē . Sagayn owrish nshan biti chʾtrowi anor , paytsʾ miayn Yovnan markarēin nshanĕ » . Ew tsketsʾ zanonkʾ ow knatsʾ .
40016005	Erp ir ashagertnerĕ antsʾan miws ezerkʾĕ , moṛtsʾadz ēin hatsʾ aṛnel .
40016006	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Owshatir eghēkʾ , zkowshatsʾēkʾ Pʾarisetsʾinerow ew Satowgetsʾinerow khmorēn » .
40016007	Anonkʾ al gĕ mtadzēin irentsʾ mēch , ĕselov : « Hatsʾ chʾperinkʾ mezi het » .
40016008	Erp Yisows ĕmpṛnetsʾ , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾow gĕ mtadzēkʾ tser mēch , tʾerahawatner , tʾē hatsʾ chʾaṛikʾ .
40016009	Tagawin chʾēkʾ hasgnar ew chʾēkʾ yisher hink nganagnerĕ , or pa zhnetsʾikʾ hink hazarin , ow kʾani goghov vertsʾowtsʾikʾ :
40016010	ochʾ al eōtʾĕ nganagnerĕ , or pa zhnetsʾikʾ chʾors hazarin , ew kʾani zampiwgh vertsʾowtsʾikʾ .
40016011	Inchʾbēs chʾēkʾ hasgnar tʾē hatsʾi hamar chʾĕsi tsezi : “ Zkowshatsʾēkʾ Pʾarisetsʾinerow ew Satowgetsʾinerow khmorēn ” » .
40016012	Ayt aten hasgtsʾan tʾē chʾĕsaw or zkowshanan hatsʾi khmorēn , haba , Pʾarisetsʾinerow ew Satowgetsʾinerow owsowtsʾowmēn .
40016013	Erp Yisows g!ertʾar Pʾilibbosi Gesariayin ergramasĕ , hartsʾowtsʾ ir ashagertnerown : « Martig inchʾ g!ĕsen , ov em es , martow Ortin » .
40016014	Anonkʾ ĕsin : « Omankʾ g!ĕsen tʾē Yovhannēs Mgrtichʾn es , owrishner , Eghian , owrishner al , Eremian gam markarēnerēn mēgĕ » .
40016015	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Isg towkʾ inchʾ g!ĕsēkʾ , ov em » .
40016016	Simon Betros bataskhanetsʾ : « Town Kʾristosn es , abrogh Astowdzoy Ortin » .
40016017	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Erani kʾezi , Simon , Yovnani orti : orovhetew ochʾ tʾē marminn ow ariwnĕ yaytnetsʾin kʾezi asiga , haba im Hayrs , or erginkʾn ē .
40016018	Es al gĕ yaytararem kʾezi : “ Town Betros es , ew ays vēmin vray biti gaṛowtsʾanem im egeghetsʾis , ow t zhokhkʾin tṛnerĕ biti chʾyaghtʾen anor .
40016019	Erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾean panalinerĕ biti tam kʾezi , ew inchʾ or ergri vray gabes , erginkʾi mēch gabowadz biti ĕllay , ow inchʾ or ergri vray artsages , erginkʾi mēch artsagowadz biti ĕllay ” » .
40016020	Ayn aten ashagertnerown batowiretsʾ , or ochʾ mēgown ĕsen tʾē inkʾ Kʾristosn ē .
40016021	Ayt atenēn etkʾ Yisows tsʾoytsʾ towaw ir ashagertnerown tʾē bētkʾ ēr or ertʾar Erowsaghēm , shat chʾarchʾarankʾner grēr erētsʾnerēn , kʾahanayabetnerēn ew tbirnerēn , sbannowēr ow yarowtʾiwn aṛnēr errort ōrĕ .
40016022	Betros mēgti aṛaw zinkʾ , ew sgsaw yantimanel zinkʾ , ĕselov : « Amenewin , Tēr : ayt panĕ chʾbatahi kʾezi » .
40016023	Inkʾ al taṛnalov , Betrosi ĕsaw : « Etews kna , Satanay , town kaytʾagghowtʾiwn es indzi : orovhetew ochʾ tʾē Astowdzoy panerĕ gĕ mtadzes , haba , martotsʾ panerĕ » .
40016024	Ayn aten Yisows ĕsaw ir ashagertnerown : « Etʾē mēgĕ owzē kal im etewēs , tʾogh owranay inkʾzinkʾ , vertsʾnē ir khachʾĕ , ow hetewi indzi .
40016025	Orovhetew ov or owzē pʾrgel ir antsĕ , biti gorsntsʾnē zayn , isg ov or gorsntsʾnē ir antsĕ , indzi hamar , biti ktnē zayn .
40016026	Kʾani or mart inchʾ ōkowt g!ownenay , etʾē shahi ampoghch ashkharhĕ paytsʾ gorsntsʾnē ir antsĕ : gam , mart inchʾ pʾrgankʾ biti tay ir antsin pʾokharēn .
40016027	Orovhetew martow Ortin biti kay ir Hōr pʾaṛkʾov , ir hreshtagnerown het , ew ayn aten biti hatowtsʾanē iwrakʾanchʾiwrin , ir kordzerown hamemat .
40016028	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Hos nergay eghoghnerēn gan omankʾ , or mah biti chʾhamtesen , minchʾew or tesnen martow Ortin , egadz ir tʾakaworowtʾeamp ” » .
40017001	Vetsʾ ōr etkʾ , Yisows aṛaw iren het Betrosĕ , Yagoposn ow anor eghpayrĕ , Yovhannēsĕ , hanetsʾ zanonkʾ partsr leṛ mĕ , aṛantsin ,
40017002	ew aylagerbetsʾaw anontsʾ aṛchew : ir eresĕ pʾayletsʾaw arewi bēs , ow ir hantertsnerĕ jermag eghan , loysi bēs .
40017003	Ew aha Movsēs ow Eghia erewtsʾan anontsʾ , ew gĕ khōsagtsʾēin iren het .
40017004	Betros ĕsaw Yisowsi : « Tēr , law ē or genankʾ hos : etʾē g!owzes , shinenkʾ hos erekʾ vran , mēgĕ , kʾezi , mēgĕ , Movsēsi , ow mēgĕ , Eghiayi » .
40017005	Minchʾ an gĕ khōsēr , lowsawor amb mĕ hovani eghaw anontsʾ vray , ew tsayn mĕ egaw ambēn , ĕselov : « Ays ē im sireli Ortis , orown hajetsʾay : anor mtig ĕrēkʾ » .
40017006	Erp ashagertnerĕ lsetsʾin , irentsʾ eresin vray ingan ow sastig vakhtsʾan .
40017007	Yisows mōtenalov , tbaw anontsʾ ew ĕsaw : « Otkʾi elēkʾ , mi vakhnakʾ » .
40017008	Irentsʾ achʾkʾerĕ partsratsʾowtsʾin ow ochʾ mēgĕ tesan , paytsʾ miayn Yisowsĕ .
40017009	Erp leṛnēn var g!ichnēin , Yisows hrahanketsʾ anontsʾ : « Ayt tesilkʾĕ ochʾ mēgown batmetsʾēkʾ , minchʾew or martow Ortin meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛnē » .
40017010	Ashagertnerĕ hartsʾowtsʾin iren : « Haba inchʾow tbirnerĕ g!ĕsen tʾē “ bētkʾ ē or nakh Eghia kay ” » .
40017011	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Iraw ē tʾē nakh Eghia biti kay ew verahastatē amēn pan .
40017012	Paytsʾ tsezi g!ĕsem tʾē Eghia artēn egadz ē , ow chʾjanchʾtsʾan zayn , haba inchʾ or owzetsʾin , ĕrin anor : noynbēs al martow Ortin biti chʾarchʾarowi anontsʾmē » .
40017013	Ayn aten ashagertnerĕ hasgtsʾan tʾē Yovhannēs Mgrtichʾin masin ĕsaw irentsʾ .
40017014	Erp egan pazmowtʾean kʾov , mart mĕ mōtetsʾaw anor , ew dznratrelov , ĕsaw : « Tēr , oghormē ortiis , or gĕ lowsnoti ow chʾarachʾar gĕ tanchowi : kʾani or yajakh gragi mēch g!iynay , ew yajakh , chowri mēch .
40017015	Zinkʾ peri kʾow ashagertnerowt , ow chʾgrtsʾan zinkʾ p zhshgel » .
40017016	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « Ov anhawat ew khotoreal serownt , minchʾew erp biti ĕllam tsezi het , minchʾew erp biti hantowr zhem tsezi . Hos , indzi perēkʾ zayn » .
40017017	Yisows sastetsʾ zayn , tewĕ elaw angē , ow batanin p zhshgowetsʾaw noyn zhamown .
40017018	Ayn aten ashagertnerĕ katsʾin Yisowsi kʾov , aṛantsin , ew ĕsin : « Menkʾ inchʾow chʾgrtsʾankʾ hanel zayn » .
40017019	Yisows ĕsaw : « TSer tʾerahawatowtʾean batjaṛov : kʾani or jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Etʾē mananekhi hatigi chʾapʾ hawatkʾ ownenakʾ , biti ĕsēkʾ ays leran : " Pʾokhatrowē asgē hon " , ow biti pʾokhatrowi , ew ochʾinchʾ angareli biti ĕllay tsezi ” .
40017020	Sagayn ays tesagĕ owrish panov towrs chʾ!eller , paytsʾ miayn aghōtʾkʾov ow dzomabahowtʾeamp » .
40017022	Minchʾ anonkʾ Kalileayi mēch gĕ mnayin , Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Martow Ortin biti matnowi martotsʾ tseṛkʾĕ ,
40017023	ow biti sbannen zinkʾ : paytsʾ yarowtʾiwn biti aṛnē errort ōrĕ » . Anonkʾ al chʾapʾazantsʾ trtmetsʾan .
40017024	Erp anonkʾ egan Gapʾaṛnayowm , ergtramean towrkʾĕ kantsoghnerĕ egan Betrosi ew ĕsin : « TSer vartabetĕ chʾi vjarer ergtrameanĕ » . An al ĕsaw : « Ayo , gĕ vjarē » .
40017025	Erp town mtaw , Yisows gankhetsʾ zinkʾ , ĕselov : « Inchʾ ē kʾow gardzikʾt , Simon : ergri tʾakawornerĕ ormē gĕ stanan hargĕ gam towrkʾĕ , irentsʾ ortinerēn , tʾē ōtarnerēn » .
40017026	Betros ĕsaw : « ōtarnerēn » . Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Owremn ortinerĕ azat en .
40017027	Paytsʾ orbēszi chʾkaytʾagghetsʾnenkʾ zanonkʾ , kna dzovĕ ow gartʾ netē , ew aṛ aṛachin tsowgĕ or g!ellē . Erp anor peranĕ panas , sater mĕ biti ktnes : aṛ zayn ow towr anontsʾ , indzi ew kʾezi hamar » .
40018001	Noyn zhamown ashagertnerĕ egan Yisowsi kʾov ow ĕsin : « Ov ē medzakoynĕ erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾean mēch » .
40018002	Yisows al ganchʾetsʾ iren manowg mĕ , gaynetsʾowtsʾ zayn anontsʾ mēchtegh ,
40018003	ew ĕsaw : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Etʾē tartsi chʾkakʾ ow manowgnerow bēs chʾĕllakʾ , pnaw biti chʾmtnēkʾ erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ ” .
40018004	Owremn ov or gĕ khonarhetsʾnē inkʾzinkʾ , ays pʾokʾr manowgin bēs , aniga ē medzakoynĕ erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾean mēch :
40018005	ew ov or g!ĕntowni aysbisi manowg mĕ , im anownovs , zis g!ĕntowni » .
40018006	« Ov or kaytʾagghetsʾnē mēgĕ ays bztignerēn , oronkʾ indzi gĕ hawatan , aweli ōktagar biti ĕllar anor , or ishow chaghatsʾkʾi kʾar mĕ gakhowēr ir vizēn , ow dzovown antowntĕ ĕngghmēr .
40018007	Vay ashkharhi , kaytʾagghowtʾiwnnerow batjaṛov : orovhetew harg ē or kaytʾagghowtʾiwnnerĕ kan , paytsʾ vay ayn martown , orown michotsʾov kaytʾagghowtʾiwnĕ gow kay .
40018008	Owremn etʾē tseṛkʾt gam otkʾt gĕ kaytʾagghetsʾnē kʾez , gtrē zayn ow netē kʾezmē : aweli law ē kʾezi , gagh gam bagasawor mtnel geankʾĕ , kʾan ergow tseṛkʾ gam ergow otkʾ ownenal ew netowil yawitenagan gragin mēch .
40018009	Etʾē achʾkʾt gĕ kaytʾagghetsʾnē kʾez , hanē zayn ow netē kʾezmē : aweli law ē kʾezi , mēg achʾkʾov mtnel geankʾĕ , kʾan ergow achʾkʾ ownenal ew netowil keheni gragin mēch » .
40018010	« Owshatir eghēkʾ or chʾarhamarhēkʾ ays bztignerēn mēgĕ : kʾani or g!ĕsem tsezi tʾē erginkʾi mēch anontsʾ hreshtagnerĕ amēn aten gĕ tesnen eresĕ im Hōrs , or erginkʾn ē .
40018011	Orovhetew martow Ortin egaw gorsowadzĕ pʾrgelow .
40018012	Inchʾ ē tser gardzikʾĕ : etʾē mart mĕ ownenay hariwr ochʾkhar ew anontsʾmē mēgĕ molori , innsowninĕ ochʾkharnerĕ leṛnerĕ chʾi tʾoghowr ow , , ertʾar , pʾntṛelow moloradzĕ .
40018013	Etʾē batahi or ktnē zayn , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē aweli g!owrakhanay anor hamar , kʾan innsowninnin , oronkʾ moloradz chʾēin .
40018014	Aysbēs , tser ergnawor Hayrĕ chʾi hajir or ays bztignerēn mēgĕ gorsowi » .
40018015	« Etʾē eghpayrt meghanchʾē kʾezi tēm , kna ew ĕsē iren ir yantsʾankʾĕ , erp town ow an minag ēkʾ : etʾē mtig ĕnē kʾezi , shahetsʾar eghpayrt .
40018016	Paytsʾ etʾē mtig chʾĕnē kʾezi , aṛ kʾezi het mēg gam ergow hoki ews , orbēszi amēn khōskʾ hastatowi ergow gam erekʾ vganerow peranov .
40018017	Etʾē anontsʾ al mtig chʾĕnē , ĕsē egeghetsʾiin : isg etʾē egeghetsʾiin al mtig chʾĕnē , tʾogh ĕllay kʾezi hetʾanosi ow makʾsawori bēs .
40018018	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Inchʾ or gabēkʾ ergri vray , gabowadz biti ĕllay erginkʾi mēch , ew inchʾ or artsagēkʾ ergri vray , artsagowadz biti ĕllay erginkʾi mēch ” .
40018019	Tartseal gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Etʾē tsezmē ergow hoki hamatsaynin ergri vray , orewē pan khntrelow , biti ĕllay anontsʾ im Hōrmēs , or erginkʾn ē ” .
40018020	Orovhetew owr or ergow gam erekʾ hoki hawakʾowadz ĕllan im anownovs , es hon em , anontsʾ mēch » .
40018021	Ayn aten Betros mōtetsʾaw anor ew ĕsaw : « Tēr , etʾē eghpayrs meghanchʾē indzi tēm , kʾani ankam nerem anor : minchʾew eōtʾĕ ankam » .
40018022	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Kʾezi chʾem ĕser , “ minchʾew eōtʾn ankam ” , haba , “ minchʾew eōtʾanasown ankam eōtʾĕ ” .
40018023	Owsti erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ gĕ nmani tʾakawori mĕ , or owzetsʾ hashiw aṛnel ir dzaṛanerēn .
40018024	Erp sgsaw hashiw aṛnel , tasĕ hazar taghanti bartaban mĕ perowetsʾaw iren .
40018025	Paytsʾ an vjarelow garoghowtʾiwn chʾownenalov , anor tērĕ hramayetsʾ , or an dzakhowi , naew anor ginn ow zawagnerĕ ew anor ampoghch ownetsʾadzĕ , ow bartkʾĕ vjarowi .
40018026	Isg dzaṛan iynalov , ergrbaketsʾ anor ew ĕsaw : “ Tēr , hamperatar eghir indzi hantēb , ow amēnĕ biti vjarem kʾezi ” .
40018027	DZaṛayin tērĕ , ktʾalov , artsagetsʾ zayn , ew neretsʾ anor bartkʾĕ .
40018028	Noyn dzaṛan knatsʾ , ktaw ir dzaṛayagitsʾnerēn mēgĕ , or hariwr tahegan gĕ bartēr iren , ow pṛnelov zayn , gĕ kheghtēr ew g!ĕsēr : “ Vjarē indzi ownetsʾadz bartkʾt ” .
40018029	Owsti ir dzaṛayagitsʾĕ ingaw anor otkʾĕ , g!aghachʾēr anor ow g!ĕsēr : “ Hamperatar eghir indzi , ew biti vjarem kʾezi ” .
40018030	Paytsʾ inkʾ chʾēr owzer : haba knatsʾ ow pantĕ netel towaw zayn , minchʾew or vjarēr bartkʾĕ .
40018031	Erp ir dzaṛayagitsʾnerĕ tesan inchʾ or batahetsʾaw , shat trtmetsʾan , ow egan ew batmetsʾin irentsʾ tiroch ampoghch batahadzĕ .
40018032	Ayn aten anor tērĕ ganchʾetsʾ zayn ow ĕsaw : “ CHʾar dzaṛay , ayt ampoghch bartkʾĕ neretsʾi kʾezi , kʾani or aghachʾetsʾir indzi :
40018033	owremn bētkʾ chʾēr or town al oghormēir dzaṛayagitsʾit , inchʾbēs es oghormetsʾay kʾezi ” .
40018034	Ew anor tērĕ parganalov , yantsnetsʾ zayn tanchoghnerown , minchʾew or vjarēr ampoghch bartkʾĕ .
40018035	Im ergnawor Hayrs al noynbēs biti ĕnē tsezi , etʾē tsezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ ir eghpōr srtantsʾ chʾnerē ir yantsʾankʾnerĕ » .
40019001	Erp Yisows awartetsʾ ays khōskʾerĕ , megnetsʾaw Kalileayēn ew knatsʾ Hrēastani hoghamasĕ , Yortanani miws goghmĕ .
40019002	Medz pazmowtʾiwnner hetewetsʾan anor , ow hon pow zhetsʾ zanonkʾ .
40019003	Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ mōtetsʾan anor ew pʾortsetsʾin zayn , ĕselov : « Artōnowadz ē , or mart mĕ artsagē ir ginĕ , orewē batjaṛi hamar » .
40019004	An al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « CHʾēkʾ gartatsʾer tʾē an , or sgizpēn steghdzetsʾ , arow ew ēk steghdzetsʾ zanonkʾ , ow ĕsaw :
40019005	“ Ays batjaṛov martĕ biti tʾoghow hayrn ow mayrĕ , ew biti yari ir gnoch , ow ergowkʾĕ biti ĕllan mēg marmin ” .
