40019006	Hetewapar al ergow chʾen , haba , mēg marmin : owremn martĕ tʾogh chʾzatē inchʾ or Astowadz irarow miatsʾowtsʾadz ē » .
40019007	Ĕsin iren : « Haba inchʾow Movsēs batowiretsʾ amowsnalowdzowmi vgayakir tal ew artsagel » .
40019008	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Movsēs tser sirtin gardzrowtʾean hamar artōnetsʾ tsezi , or artsagēkʾ tser ginerĕ : paytsʾ sgizpēn aynbēs chʾēr .
40019009	Sagayn gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ov or g!artsagē ir ginĕ , aṛantsʾ boṛngowtʾean batjaṛi , ow g!amowsnanay owrishi mĕ het , shnowtʾiwn g!ĕnē . Ew ov or artsagowadzin het g!amowsnanay , shnowtʾiwn g!ĕnē ” » .
40019010	Ir ashagertnerĕ ĕsin iren : « Etʾē ayt ē barakan martown ew ir gnoch michew , ōktagar chʾē amowsnanal » .
40019011	Paytsʾ inkʾ ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Polorĕ chʾen ĕntownir asiga , haba anonkʾ , orontsʾ trowadz ē .
40019012	Orovhetew gan nerkʾininer , oronkʾ aytbēs dznan , irentsʾ mōr orovaynēn : gan nerkʾininer , oronkʾ martotsʾmē nerkʾini eghan : ow gan nerkʾininer , oronkʾ irenkʾ zirenkʾ nerkʾini ĕrin , erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾean hamar . Ov or grnay ĕntownil , tʾogh ĕntowni » .
40019013	Ayn aten manowgner perowetsʾan iren , orbēszi tseṛkʾ tnē anontsʾ vray ew aghōtʾē : isg ashagertnerĕ gĕ yantimanēin zanonkʾ .
40019014	Yisows ĕsaw : « Tʾoyl towēkʾ manowgnerown , ow mi arkilēkʾ zanonkʾ , or kan indzi , orovhetew erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ aytbisinerownn ē » .
40019015	Ew tseṛkʾ tnelē etkʾ anontsʾ vray , megnetsʾaw angē .
40019016	Mēgĕ mōtenalov , ĕsaw anor : « Pari vartabet , inchʾ parikʾ kordzem , or ownenam yawitenagan geankʾĕ » .
40019017	An al ĕsaw anor : « Inchʾow pari gĕ gochʾes zis : mēgēn zat pari chʾgay , or Astowadz ē . Etʾē g!owzes mtnel geankʾĕ , bahē batowirannerĕ » .
40019018	Ĕsaw anor : « Oronkʾ » . Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « Sbanowtʾiwn mi ĕner , shnowtʾiwn mi ĕner , koghowtʾiwn mi ĕner , sowt vgayowtʾiwn mi tar ,
40019019	batowē hayrt ow mayrt , ew sirē ĕngert kʾow antsit , , bēs » .
40019020	Eritasartĕ ĕsaw anor : « Bahadz em ayt polorĕ , batanowtʾenēs i ver : tagawin inchʾ gĕ bagsi indzi » .
40019021	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Etʾē g!owzes gatareal ĕllal , kna , dzakhē inchʾkʾt ew towr aghkʾatnerown , ow kants biti ownenas erginkʾĕ : aba hetewē indzi » .
40019022	Erp eritasartĕ lsetsʾ ays khōskʾĕ , trtmadz knatsʾ , orovhetew shat statsʾowadzkʾ ownēr .
40019023	Yisows ĕsaw ashagertnerown : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Harowstĕ t zhowarowtʾeamp biti mtnē erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ ” .
40019024	Tartseal gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Aweli tiwrin ē or owghtĕ antsʾni aseghin dzagēn , kʾan tʾē harowstĕ mtnē Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ ” » .
40019025	Erp ashagertnerĕ lsetsʾin , chʾapʾazantsʾ abshetsʾan ew ĕsin : « Owremn ov grnay pʾrgowil » .
40019026	Yisows nayelov anontsʾ , ĕsaw : « Atiga angareli ē martotsʾ kʾov , paytsʾ amēn pan gareli ē Astowdzoy kʾov » .
40019027	Ayn aten Betros ĕsaw anor : « Aha menkʾ tʾoghowtsʾinkʾ amēn inchʾ ow hetewetsʾankʾ kʾezi : owremn inchʾ biti ĕllay mezi » .
40019028	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Towkʾ , or hetewetsʾakʾ indzi , miws kalowstin , , , erp martow Ortin pazmi ir pʾaṛkʾi kahin vray , towkʾ al biti pazmikʾ tasnergow kaherow vray , tatelow Israyēli tasnergow tohmerĕ ” .
40019029	Ov or tʾoghowtsʾadz ĕllay towner , eghpayrner , kʾoyrer , hayr , mayr , gin , zawagner , gam arter , im anownis hamar , biti stanay hariwrabatigĕ ew zhaṛankē yawitenagan geankʾĕ .
40019030	Paytsʾ shat aṛachinner biti ĕllan yetin , ow yetinner , aṛachin » .
40020001	« Artarew erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ nman ē hoghatiroch mĕ , or aṛtown ganowkh towrs elaw , kordzaworner vartselow ir aykiin hamar .
40020002	Erp hamatsaynetsʾaw kordzawornerown het , ōrĕ mēg tahegani , ghrgetsʾ zanonkʾ ir aykin .
40020003	Errort zhamowan , , atennerĕ towrs ellelov , tesaw owrishner , oronkʾ ankordz gaynadz ēin hrabaragĕ ,
40020004	ow ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Towkʾ al katsʾēkʾ im aykis , ew gow tam tsezi inchʾ or irawatsʾi ē » .
40020005	Anonkʾ al katsʾin . Tartseal towrs elaw vetsʾerort zhamowan ew innerort zhamowan atennerĕ , ow noynĕ ĕraw .
40020006	Tasnmēgerort zhamowan atennerĕ towrs elaw , owrishner ktaw , oronkʾ ankordz gaynadz ēin , ew anontsʾ ĕsaw : « Inchʾow hos ampoghch ōrĕ ankordz gaynadz ēkʾ » .
40020007	Ĕsin iren : « Orovhetew ochʾ mēgĕ vartsetsʾ mez » . Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Towkʾ al katsʾēkʾ aykin , ow biti stanakʾ inchʾ or irawatsʾi ē » .
40020008	Erp irigown eghaw , aykiin tērĕ ĕsaw ir tntesin : « Ganchʾē kordzawornerĕ ew towr anontsʾ vartskʾĕ , verchinnerēn sgselov minchʾew aṛachinnerĕ » .
40020009	Erp egan anonkʾ , or tasnmēgerort zhamowan atennerĕ katsʾer ēin , statsʾan mēgagan tahegan .
40020010	Aṛachinnerĕ kalov , gĕ gardzēin tʾē aweli biti stanan : paytsʾ irenkʾ al statsʾan mēgagan tahegan .
40020011	Erp statsʾan , trtnchetsʾin hoghatiroch tēm ew ĕsin :
40020012	« Ayt verchinnerĕ mēg zham ashkhatetsʾan , paytsʾ zanonkʾ hawasar ĕrir mezi , or gretsʾinkʾ ōrowan dzanrowtʾiwnn ow takʾowtʾiwnĕ » .
40020013	An al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾmē mēgown : « Ĕnger , es chʾem anirawer kʾez : mitʾē town indzi het chʾhamatsaynetsʾar mēg tahegani :
40020014	aṛ kʾowgt ew kna . G!owzem or tam ays verchinin , kʾezi towadzis chʾapʾ :
40020015	mitʾē artōnowadz chʾē indzi , ĕnel inchʾ or owzem im ownetsʾadzis . Mitʾē kʾow achʾkʾt chʾar ē , or es pari em » .
40020016	Aysbēs , yetinnerĕ biti ĕllan aṛachin , ew aṛachinnerĕ , yetin : orovhetew ganchʾowadznerĕ shat en , paytsʾ ĕntrowadznerĕ , kʾichʾ » .
40020017	Erp Yisows gĕ partsranar Erowsaghēm , jampan iren het aṛaw tasnergow ashagertnerĕ , aṛantsin , ew ĕsaw anontsʾ :
40020018	« Aha gĕ partsranankʾ Erowsaghēm , ow martow Ortin biti matnowi kʾahanayabetnerown ew tbirnerown , ow mahowan biti tatabarten zinkʾ :
40020019	hetʾanosnerown biti matnen zinkʾ , or dzaghrowi , kharazanowi ew khachʾowi : paytsʾ yarowtʾiwn biti aṛnē errort ōrĕ » .
40020020	Ayn aten Zepetēosi ortinerown mayrĕ egaw anor ir ortinerown het , g!ergrbakēr anor ow pan mĕ gĕ khntrēr angē .
40020021	An al ĕsaw anor : « Inchʾ g!owzes » . Ĕsaw anor : « Ĕsē , or kʾow tʾakaworowtʾeant mēch , ays ergow ortiners pazmin , mēgĕ , ach goghmt , ew miwsĕ , tsakh goghmt » .
40020022	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « CHʾēkʾ kiter tʾē inchʾ gĕ khntrēkʾ . Grnakʾ khmel ayn pa zhagĕ , or es biti khmem , gam mgrtowil ayn mgrtowtʾeamp , orov es biti mgrtowim » . Ĕsin iren : « Grnankʾ » .
40020023	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Artarew biti khmēkʾ im pa zhags , ow biti mgrtowikʾ ayn mgrtowtʾeamp , orov es mgrtowelow em : paytsʾ im ach gam tsakh goghms pazmilĕ , ims chʾē talĕ , haba biti trowi anontsʾ , orontsʾ hamar batrastowadz ē im Hōrmēs » .
40020024	Erp miws tasĕ ashagertnerĕ lsetsʾin , ĕntvzetsʾan ayt ergow eghpayrnerown tēm .
40020025	Isg Yisows iren ganchʾetsʾ zanonkʾ ew ĕsaw : « Kitēkʾ tʾē hetʾanosnerown ishkhannerĕ gĕ tirabeten anontsʾ vray , ow medzamedznerĕ g!ishkhen anontsʾ vray .
40020026	Paytsʾ aytbēs tʾogh chʾĕllay tser mēch : haba tsezmē ov or owzē medz ĕllal , aniga tser sbasargown tʾogh ĕllay ,
40020027	ow tsezmē ov or owzē klkhawor ĕllal , aniga tser strowgĕ tʾogh ĕllay :
40020028	inchʾbēs martow Ortin egaw ochʾ tʾē sbasargowtʾiwn ĕntownelow , haba , sbasargelow ew ir antsĕ pʾrgankʾ talow shaterow hamar » .
40020029	Erp anonkʾ towrs elan Erikʾovēn , medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ hetewetsʾaw anor .
40020030	Ew aha ergow goyrer nstadz ēin jampayin ezerkʾĕ : erp lsetsʾin tʾē Yisows g!antsʾni , aghaghagetsʾin : « Oghormē mezi , Tēr , Tawitʾi Orti » .
40020031	Pazmowtʾiwnĕ gĕ yantimanēr zanonkʾ , or lṛen , paytsʾ anonkʾ al aweli g!aghaghagēin : « Oghormē mezi , Tēr , Tawitʾi Orti » .
40020032	Yisows gank aṛnelov , ganchʾetsʾ zanonkʾ ew ĕsaw : « Inchʾ g!owzēkʾ or ĕnem tsezi » .
40020033	Ĕsin anor : « Tēr , tʾogh mer achʾkʾerĕ patsʾowin » .
40020034	Yisows ktʾalov , tbaw anontsʾ achʾkʾerown : isgoyn anontsʾ achʾkʾerĕ patsʾowetsʾan , ow hetewetsʾan anor .
40021001	Erp mōtetsʾan Erowsaghēmi ow hasan Petʾpʾakē , TSitʾeninerow leran mōt , Yisows ghrgetsʾ ergow ashagert ,
40021002	ĕselov anontsʾ : « Katsʾēkʾ ayt tser timatsʾi kiwghĕ , ow isgoyn biti ktnēkʾ gabowadz ēsh mĕ , ew anor het , awanag mĕ : artsagetsʾēkʾ zanonkʾ ow perēkʾ indzi .
40021003	Etʾē mēgĕ pan mĕ ĕsē tsezi , ĕsēkʾ : “ Tēroch bētkʾ en ” , ew isgoyn biti ghrgē zanonkʾ » .
40021004	Ays amēnĕ gatarowetsʾaw , orbēszi irakordzowi markarēin michotsʾov ĕsowadz khōskʾĕ :
40021005	« Ĕsēkʾ Sioni aghchigin : “ Aha Tʾakawort gow kay kʾezi , hez ew hedzadz ishow vray , ishow tsaki , awanagi vray ” » .
40021006	Ashagertnerĕ katsʾin , ew ĕrin inchʾbēs Yisows batowiradz ēr irentsʾ :
40021007	perin ēshn ow awanagĕ , trin anontsʾ vray irentsʾ hantertsnerĕ , ew nstaw anontsʾ vray .
40021008	Ahakin pazmowtʾiwn mĕ pʾṛetsʾ ir hantertsnerĕ jampayin vray : owrishner jiwgher gĕ gtrēin dzaṛerēn ow gĕ taradzēin jampayin vray .
40021009	Ew aṛchewēn katsʾogh ow iren hetewogh pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ g!aghaghagēin : « Ovsanna Tawitʾi Ortiin . ōrhneal ē an , or gow kay Tēroch anownov . Ovsanna amenapartsr vayrerown mēch » .
40021010	Erp an mtaw Erowsaghēm , ampoghch kʾaghakʾĕ shar zhetsʾaw ew ĕsaw : « Ov ē asiga » .
40021011	Pazmowtʾiwnĕ ĕsaw : « Ays ē Yisows markarēn , Kalileayi Nazarētʾēn » .
40021012	Yisows mtaw Astowdzoy tajarĕ , towrs hanetsʾ polor anonkʾ , or tajarin mēch gĕ dzakhēin ow gĕ knēin , ew tabaletsʾ lowmayapʾokhnerown seghannern ow aghawni dzakhoghnerown atʾoṛnerĕ ,
40021013	ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Krowadz ē : “ Im towns aghōtʾkʾi town biti gochʾowi ” , paytsʾ towkʾ awazagnerow kʾarayr ĕrikʾ zayn » .
40021014	Goyrer ow gagher egan iren , tajarin mēch , ew pow zhetsʾ zanonkʾ .
40021015	Erp kʾahanayabetnern ow tbirnerĕ tesan anor kordzadz skʾanchʾelikʾnerĕ , ew manowgnerĕ , oronkʾ tajarin mēch g!aghaghagēin : « Ovsanna Tawitʾi Ortiin » , ĕntvzetsʾan
40021016	ew ĕsin anor : « Gĕ lses inchʾ g!ĕsen atonkʾ » . Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ayo , pnaw chʾēkʾ gartatsʾadz krowadzĕ : “ Erakhanerown ow dzdzgernerown peranov kovapanowtʾiwn gataretsʾir ” » .
40021017	Aba tsketsʾ zanonkʾ , knatsʾ kʾaghakʾēn towrs , Petʾania , ow getsʾaw hon kisherĕ .
40021018	Aṛtown , minchʾ gĕ verataṛnar kʾaghakʾĕ , anōtʾetsʾaw .
40021019	Ow jampan tesnelov tʾzeni mĕ , kʾovĕ knatsʾ . Ochʾinchʾ ktaw anor vray , terewnerēn zat , ew ĕsaw anor : « Asgē etkʾ ochʾ mēg btowgh ĕllay vrat , yawitean » . Tʾzenin anmichabēs chʾortsʾaw .
40021020	Erp ashagertnerĕ tesan , zarmatsʾan ow ĕsin : « Inchʾbēs tʾzenin anmichabēs chʾortsʾaw » .
40021021	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Etʾē hawatkʾ ownenakʾ ow chʾtatamsikʾ , ochʾ miayn biti ĕnēkʾ ayt tʾzeniin eghadzĕ , ayl naew etʾē ĕsēkʾ ays leran : " Elir ow dzovĕ netowē " , biti ĕllay ” .
40021022	Amēn inchʾ or gĕ khntrēkʾ aghōtʾkʾi mēch , hawatkʾov , biti stanakʾ » .
40021023	Erp an egaw tajarĕ , kʾahanayabetnern ow zhoghovowrtin erētsʾnerĕ mōtetsʾan anor , minchʾ gĕ sorvetsʾnēr , ew ĕsin : « Inchʾ ishkhanowtʾeamp g!ĕnes ayt panerĕ : ov towaw kʾezi ayt ishkhanowtʾiwnĕ » .
40021024	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Es al tsezi hartsʾnem pan mĕ : etʾē ĕsēkʾ indzi , es al biti ĕsem tsezi tʾē inchʾ ishkhanowtʾeamp g!ĕnem ayt panerĕ .
40021025	“ Yovhannēsi mgrtowtʾiwnĕ owrgē ēr , erginkʾēn , tʾē martotsʾmē ” » . Anonkʾ gĕ mtadzēin irentsʾ mēch , ĕselov : « Etʾē bataskhanenkʾ : “ Erginkʾēn ” , biti ĕsē mezi : “ Haba inchʾow chʾhawatatsʾikʾ anor ” .
40021026	Isg etʾē bataskhanenkʾ : “ Martotsʾmē ” , pazmowtʾenēn gĕ vakhnankʾ , orovhetew polorn al markarē gĕ hamaren Yovhannēsĕ » .
40021027	Owsti bataskhanetsʾin Yisowsi : « CHʾenkʾ kiter » . Inkʾ al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Es al chʾem ĕser tsezi tʾē inchʾ ishkhanowtʾeamp g!ĕnem ayt panerĕ » .
40021028	« Inchʾ ē tser gardzikʾĕ : mart mĕ ownēr ergow zawag . Aṛachinin ĕsaw : “ Orteag , kna , kordzē aysōr aykiis mēch ” .
40021029	An al bataskhanetsʾ : “ CHʾem owzer ertʾal ” . Paytsʾ yetoy zghchatsʾ ow knatsʾ .
40021030	Miwsin al knatsʾ ew noynĕ ĕsaw . An al bataskhanetsʾ : “ G!ertʾam , tēr ” , sagayn chʾknatsʾ .
40021031	Ays ergowkʾēn ov kordzatretsʾ ir hōr gamkʾĕ » . Ĕsin anor : « Aṛachinĕ » . Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē makʾsawornern ow boṛnignerĕ tsezmē aṛach biti mtnen Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ .
40021032	Artarew Yovhannēs artarowtʾean jampayov egaw tsezi , ew towkʾ chʾhawatatsʾikʾ anor : paytsʾ makʾsawornern ow boṛnignerĕ hawatatsʾin anor , isg towkʾ tesakʾ ew yetoy chʾzghchatsʾikʾ , or hawatayikʾ anor » .
40021033	« Lsetsʾēkʾ owrish aṛag mĕn al . Hoghatēr mĕ gar , or ayki mĕ tngetsʾ , tsʾangov batetsʾ zayn , hntsan pʾoretsʾ anor mēch , ashtarag gaṛowtsʾanetsʾ , mshagnerow yantsnetsʾ zayn ew jamportetsʾ .
40021034	Erp btowghi atenĕ mōtetsʾaw , ir dzaṛanerĕ ghrgetsʾ mshagnerown , orbēszi stanan anor btowghnerĕ .
40021035	Mshagnerĕ pṛnetsʾin anor dzaṛanerĕ , mēgĕ dzedzetsʾin , miwsĕ sbannetsʾin , owrish mĕ kʾargodzetsʾin .
40021036	Tartseal dzaṛaner ghrgetsʾ , aṛachinnerēn shat , ew anontsʾ al noynbēs ĕrin .
40021037	Amenēn etkʾ ir ortin ghrgetsʾ anontsʾ , ĕselov : “ Tʾerews batgaṛin ortiēs ” .
40021038	Paytsʾ mshagnerĕ , erp tesan ortin , ĕsin irarow : “ Ays ē zhaṛankortĕ : egēkʾ sbannenkʾ zayn ew tiranankʾ anor zhaṛankowtʾean ” .
40021039	Ow pṛnetsʾin zayn , aykiēn towrs hanetsʾin ew sbannetsʾin .
40021040	Owremn erp aykiin tērĕ kay , inchʾ biti ĕnē ayt mshagnerown » .
40021041	Ĕsin iren : « CHʾarachʾar biti gorsntsʾnē ayt chʾarerĕ , ew aykin biti yantsnē owrish mshagnerow , oronkʾ btowghnerĕ irentsʾ atenin biti tan iren » .
40021042	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Pnaw chʾēkʾ gartatsʾer Kirkʾin mēch : “ Ayn kʾarĕ , or gaṛowtsʾanoghnerĕ mer zhetsʾin , aniga eghaw angiwnakʾarĕ . Asiga Tērochmēn eghaw , ew skʾanchʾeli ē mer achʾkʾerown ” .
40021043	Owsti gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ biti aṛnowi tsezmē , ow biti trowi aynbisi azki mĕ , or anor btowghnerĕ perē ” .
40021044	Ov or iynay ays kʾarin vray , biti gotrti , ew orown vray or iynay , biti pʾsorē zayn » .
40021045	Erp kʾahanayabetnern ow Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ lsetsʾin anor aṛagnerĕ , ĕmpṛnetsʾin or irentsʾ masin gĕ khōsēr :
40021046	ew gĕ chanayin pṛnel zayn . Paytsʾ pazmowtʾenēn gĕ vakhnayin , kʾani or ipr markarē g!ĕntownēin zayn .
40022001	Yisows tartseal aṛagnerov khōsetsʾaw anontsʾ ew ĕsaw :
40022002	« Erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ gĕ nmani tʾakawori mĕ , or harsanikʾ ĕraw ir ortiin , ow ghrgetsʾ ir dzaṛanerĕ , ganchʾelow harsanikʾin hrawirealnerĕ :
40022003	sagayn anonkʾ chʾowzetsʾin kal .
40022004	Tartseal owrish dzaṛaner ghrgetsʾ ew ĕsaw : “ Ĕsēkʾ hrawirealnerown : « Aha batrastetsʾi im jashs : zowaragners ow kēr anasownners mortʾowadz en , ew amēn pan batrast ē : egēkʾ harsanikʾi » ” .
40022005	Paytsʾ anonkʾ anhokowtʾiwn ĕnelov , katsʾin mēgĕ ir artĕ , ow miwsĕ , ir aṛewtowrin .
40022006	Owrishner , pṛnetsʾin anor dzaṛanerĕ , nakhatetsʾin ew sbannetsʾin .
40022007	Tʾakaworn al , erp lsetsʾ , pargatsʾaw : ghrgetsʾ ir zōrkʾerĕ , gorsntsʾowtsʾ ayt martasbannerĕ ow ayretsʾ anontsʾ kʾaghakʾĕ .
40022008	Ayn aten ĕsaw ir dzaṛanerown : “ Harsanikʾĕ batrast ē , paytsʾ hrawirealnerĕ ar zhani chʾēin .
40022009	Owremn katsʾēkʾ tēbi jampanerown klowkhnerĕ , ew ov or ktnēkʾ , hrawiretsʾēkʾ harsanikʾi ” .
40022010	Ayt dzaṛanerĕ towrs elan , tēbi jampanerown klowkhnerĕ , ew ov or ktan , tʾē chʾar , tʾē pari , polorn al hawakʾetsʾin : ow harsnetownĕ letsʾowetsʾaw hrawirealnerov .
40022011	Erp tʾakaworĕ mtaw , tesnelow harsnewornerĕ , tesaw mart mĕ , or hakadz chʾēr harsanikʾi hakowst .
40022012	Ĕsaw anor : “ Ĕnger , inchʾbēs mtar hos , aṛantsʾ harsanikʾi hakowsti ” . An al babantsetsʾaw .
40022013	Ayn aten tʾakaworĕ ĕsaw sbasargownerown : “ Gabetsʾēkʾ asor otkʾern ow tseṛkʾerĕ , ew aṛēkʾ ow netetsʾēkʾ zayn towrsi khawarĕ : hon biti ĕllay latsʾ ew agṛanerow grjtowm ” .
40022014	Orovhetew ganchʾowadznerĕ shat en , paytsʾ ĕntrowadznerĕ , kʾichʾ » .
40022015	Ayn aten Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ katsʾin khorhrtagtsʾelow , tʾē inchʾbēs khōskʾov tsken zayn dzowghagi mēch .
40022016	Ow ghrgetsʾin anor irentsʾ ashagertnerĕ , Herovtēseannerown het , ew ĕsin : « Vartabet , kitenkʾ tʾē jshmartakhōs es ow jshmartowtʾeamp gĕ sorvetsʾnes Astowdzoy jampan , ew hok chʾes ĕner oewē mēgown hamar , kʾani or eresbashtowtʾiwn chʾes ĕner martotsʾ .
40022017	Owsti ĕsē mezi , inchʾ ē kʾow gardzikʾt : “ Artōnowadz ē towrkʾ tal gaysrin , tʾē ochʾ ” » .
40022018	Yisows , kitnalov anontsʾ chʾaramtowtʾiwnĕ , ĕsaw : « Inchʾow gĕ pʾortsēkʾ zis , geghdzaworner .
40022019	TSʾoytsʾ towēkʾ indzi towrkʾin tramĕ » . Anonkʾ tahegan mĕ perin iren .
40022020	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Orownn en ays batgern ow krowtʾiwnĕ » .
40022021	Ĕsin anor : « Gaysrin » . Ayn aten ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Owremn inchʾ or gaysrinn ē , towēkʾ gaysrin , ew inchʾ or Astowdzoy ē , Astowdzoy » .
40022022	Erp lsetsʾin , zarmatsʾan , ow tʾoghowtsʾin zayn ew katsʾin .
40022023	Noyn ōrĕ anor kʾov egan Satowgetsʾinerĕ , oronkʾ g!ĕsen tʾē yarowtʾiwn chʾgay , ow hartsʾowtsʾin anor :
40022024	« Vartabet , Movsēs ĕsaw : “ Etʾē mēgĕ meṛni aṛantsʾ zawagi , anor eghpayrĕ tʾogh amowsnanay anor gnoch het , ew zarm hanē ir eghpōr ” .
40022025	Owremn eōtʾĕ eghpayrner gayin mer kʾov . Aṛachinĕ amowsnatsʾaw ow vakhjanetsʾaw , ew zarm chʾownenalown hamar , ir ginĕ tʾoghowtsʾ ir eghpōr .
40022026	Nmanabēs al ergrortn ow errortĕ , minchʾew eōtʾnerortĕ .
40022027	Amenēn etkʾ ginn al meṛaw .
40022028	Owremn , yarowtʾean aten , ayt eōtʾnēn orown ginĕ biti ĕllay : orovhetew polorn al ownetsʾan zayn ipr gin » .
40022029	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Towkʾ moloradz ēkʾ : ochʾ Kirkʾerĕ kitēkʾ , ochʾ al Astowdzoy zōrowtʾiwnĕ .
40022030	Kʾani or yarowtʾean aten , ochʾ g!amowsnanan ew ochʾ amowsnowtʾean gĕ trowin , haba erginkʾi mēch , Astowdzoy hreshtagnerown bēs en .
40022031	Paytsʾ meṛelnerown yarowtʾean masin chʾēkʾ gartatsʾer Astowdzmē tsezi ĕsowadz khōskʾĕ :
40022032	“ Es em Aprahami Astowadzĕ , Isahagi Astowadzĕ ew Yagopi Astowadzĕ ” . Astowadz meṛelnerown Astowadzĕ chʾē , haba , oghcherown » .
40022033	Pazmowtʾiwnĕ asiga lselov , g!abshēr anor owsowtsʾowmin vray .
40022034	Paytsʾ Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ , erp lsetsʾin tʾē an babantsetsʾowtsʾ Satowgetsʾinerĕ , tegh mĕ hawakʾowetsʾan ,
40022035	ew anontsʾmē ōrinagan mĕ hartsʾowtsʾ , zayn pʾortselov :
40022036	« Vartabet , or batowiranĕ medz ē ōrēnkʾin mēch » .
40022037	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « “ Sirē Tērĕ , kʾow Astowadzt , ampoghch sirtovt , ampoghch antsovt ew ampoghch mitkʾovt ” .
40022038	Ays ē aṛachin ow medz batowiranĕ .
40022039	Ew ergrortĕ , asor nman : “ Sirē ĕngert kʾow antsit , , bēs ” .
40022040	Ays ergow batowirannerēn gakhowadz en ampoghch ōrēnkʾn ow Markarēnerĕ » .
40022041	Erp Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ hawakʾowetsʾan , Yisows hartsʾowtsʾ anontsʾ :
40022042	« Kʾristosi masin inchʾ ē tser gardzikʾĕ : orow ortin ē » .
40022043	Ĕsin iren : « Tawitʾi » . Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Haba inchʾbēs Tawitʾ Hokiov zayn Tēr gĕ gochʾē ow g!ĕsē :
40022044	“ Tērĕ ĕsaw im Tērochs : « Pazmē im ach goghms , minchʾew or kʾow tʾshnaminert batowantan tnem otkʾerowt » ” .
40022045	Owremn etʾē Tawitʾ zayn Tēr gĕ gochʾē , inchʾbēs an ir ortin g!ĕllay » .
40022046	Ochʾ mēgĕ grnar khōskʾov mĕ bataskhanel anor . Ayt ōrēn etkʾ , ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ yantknēr pan mĕ hartsʾnel anor .
40023001	Ayn aten Yisows khōsetsʾaw pazmowtʾean ew ir ashagertnerown , ĕselov :
40023002	« Tbirnern ow Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ pazmadz en Movsēsi atʾoṛin vray .
40023003	Owremn inchʾ or ĕsen tsezi , or bahēkʾ , bahetsʾēkʾ ew ĕrēkʾ : paytsʾ mi ĕnēkʾ anontsʾ kordzerown bēs , orovhetew g!ĕsen , sagayn chʾen ĕner .
40023004	Artarew dzanr ow t zhowaragir peṛner gĕ gaben ew gĕ tnen martotsʾ owserown vray , ow irentsʾ matov isg chʾen owzer shar zhel zanonkʾ .
40023005	Irentsʾ polor kordzerĕ g!ĕnen martotsʾmē tesnowelow hamar : gĕ layntsʾnen irentsʾ krabanagnerĕ ew g!ergntsʾnen irentsʾ hantertsnerown kʾghantsʾkʾnerĕ :
40023006	gĕ siren aṛachin pazmotsʾnerĕ , ĕntʾrikʾnerow mēch , aṛachin atʾoṛnerĕ , zhoghovarannerow mēch , parewnerĕ , hrabaragnerow vray ,
40023007	ow “ ṛappi , ṛappi ” gochʾowil martotsʾmē .
40023008	Paytsʾ towkʾ mi gochʾowikʾ “ ṛappi ” , orovhetew mēg ē tser Owsowtsʾichʾĕ , Kʾristos ,
40023009	ew towkʾ polort eghpayr ēkʾ . Ow ergri vray ochʾ mēgĕ gochʾetsʾēkʾ tser “ hayrĕ ” , orovhetew mēg ē tser Hayrĕ , or erginkʾn ē .
40023010	Ew towkʾ mi gochʾowikʾ “ owsowtsʾichʾ ” , orovhetew mēg ē tser Owsowtsʾichʾĕ , Kʾristos .
40023011	Ow tser mēchēn medzakoynĕ , tser sbasargown tʾogh ĕllay .
40023012	Ov or partsratsʾnē inkʾzinkʾ , biti khonarhi , isg ov or khonarhetsʾnē inkʾzinkʾ , biti partsranay » .
40023013	« Vay tsezi , geghdzawor tbirner ew Pʾarisetsʾiner , or gĕ kotsʾēkʾ erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ martotsʾ aṛchew : towkʾ chʾēkʾ mtner , ow mtnoghnerown al tʾoyl chʾēkʾ tar , or mtnen .
40023014	Vay tsezi , geghdzawor tbirner ew Pʾarisetsʾiner , or gĕ lapʾēkʾ ayrinerown townerĕ , ow ipr batrowag , aghōtʾkʾĕ g!ergarēkʾ : owsti aweli khstowtʾeamp biti tatowikʾ , , .
40023015	Vay tsezi , geghdzawor tbirner ew Pʾarisetsʾiner , or gĕ shrchikʾ dzov ow tsʾamakʾ , mēgĕ norahawat ĕnelow , ew erp ĕllay , zayn tsezmē ergow ankam aweli keheni orti g!ĕnēkʾ .
40023016	Vay tsezi , goyr aṛachnortner , or g!ĕsēkʾ : “ Ov or ertowm g!ĕnē tajarin vray , pan mĕ chʾē , paytsʾ ov or ertowm g!ĕnē tajari osgiin vray , bartawor g!ĕllay ” .
40023017	Yimarner ow goyrer , orĕ medz ē , osgin , tʾē tajarĕ , or gĕ srpatsʾnē osgin .
40023018	Naew g!ĕsēkʾ : “ Ov or ertowm g!ĕnē zohaseghanin vray , pan mĕ chʾē , paytsʾ ov or ertowm g!ĕnē zohaseghanin vrayi ĕndzayin vray , bartawor g!ĕllay ” .
40023019	Yimarner ow goyrer , orĕ medz ē , ĕndzan , tʾē zohaseghanĕ , or gĕ srpatsʾnē ĕndzan .
40023020	Owremn , ov or ertowm g!ĕnē zohaseghanin vray , ertowm g!ĕnē anor vray ow anor vray eghadz polor panerown vray .
40023021	Ew ov or ertowm g!ĕnē tajarin vray , ertowm g!ĕnē anor vray ow anor mēch pnagoghin vray .
40023022	Ew ov or ertowm g!ĕnē erginkʾi vray , ertowm g!ĕnē Astowdzoy kahin vray ow anor vray pazmoghin vray .
40023023	Vay tsezi , geghdzawor tbirner ew Pʾarisetsʾiner , or gĕ vjarēkʾ ananowkhin , samitʾin ow chʾamanin tasanortĕ , paytsʾ gĕ tʾoghowkʾ ōrēnkʾin aweli dzanr panerĕ , irawownkʾĕ , garegtsʾowtʾiwnn ow hawatkʾĕ : asonkʾ bētkʾ ē ĕnēikʾ , ew zanonkʾ chʾtskēikʾ .
40023024	Goyr aṛachnortner , or gĕ kʾamēkʾ m zhghowgĕ ow gĕ gllēkʾ owghtĕ .
40023025	Vay tsezi , geghdzawor tbirner ew Pʾarisetsʾiner , or gĕ makʾrēkʾ kawatʾin ow bnagin towrsi goghmĕ , paytsʾ nersēn letsʾown en yapʾshtagowtʾeamp ew anirawowtʾeamp .
40023026	Goyr Pʾarisetsʾi , nakh makʾrē kawatʾin ow bnagin nersi goghmĕ , orbēszi anontsʾ towrsi goghmn al makʾowr ĕllay .
40023027	Vay tsezi , geghdzawor tbirner ew Pʾarisetsʾiner , or gĕ nmanikʾ dzepʾowadz kerezmannerow , oronkʾ artarew towrsēn keghetsʾig g!erewnan , paytsʾ nersēn letsʾown en meṛelnerow osgornerov ow amēn tesag anmakʾrowtʾeamp .
40023028	Noynbēs towkʾ towrsēn artar g!erewnakʾ martotsʾ , isg nersēn li ēkʾ geghdzaworowtʾeamp ew anōrēnowtʾeamp » .
40023029	« Vay tsezi , geghdzawor tbirner ow Pʾarisetsʾiner , or gĕ gaṛowtsʾanēkʾ markarēnerown tabannerĕ ew gĕ zartarēkʾ artarnerown kerezmannerĕ ,
40023030	ow g!ĕsēkʾ : “ Etʾē mer hayrerown ōrerĕ ĕllayinkʾ , anontsʾ het gamagitsʾ chʾēinkʾ ĕllar markarēnerown ariwnin tʾapʾowelown ” .
40023031	Hetewapar towkʾ gĕ vgayēkʾ tser masin , tʾē ortinern ēkʾ anontsʾ , or gĕ sbannēin markarēnerĕ .
40023032	Owsti towkʾ al tser hayrerown chʾapʾĕ letsʾowtsʾēkʾ .
40023033	ōtser , i zherow dznowntner , inchʾbēs biti khowsapʾikʾ keheni tatabartowtʾenēn .
40023034	Owsti aha es gĕ ghrgem tsezi markarēner ew imastownner ow tbirner . Anontsʾmē omankʾ biti sbannēkʾ ew khachʾēkʾ , omankʾ al biti kharazanēkʾ tser zhoghovarannerown mēch ow haladzēkʾ kʾaghakʾē kʾaghakʾ .
40023035	Orbēszi tser vray kay ergri vray tʾapʾowadz ampoghch artar ariwnĕ , artar Apēli ariwnēn minchʾew Parakʾiayi ortiin , Zakʾariayi ariwnĕ , or sbannetsʾikʾ tajarin ew zohaseghanin michew .
40023036	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ays polor panerĕ biti kan ays serowntin vray ” » .
40023037	« Ov Erowsaghēm , Erowsaghēm , or gĕ sbannēir markarēnerĕ ow gĕ kʾargodzēir kʾezi ghrgowadznerĕ : kʾani ankam owzetsʾi hawakʾel zawagnert , inchʾbēs hawĕ tʾewerown tag gĕ hawakʾē ir tsakerĕ , paytsʾ towkʾ chʾowzetsʾikʾ .
40023038	Aha tser townĕ amayi biti mnay tsezi .
40023039	Artarew g!ĕsem tsezi tʾē al asgē etkʾ biti chʾtesnēkʾ zis , minchʾew or ĕsēkʾ : “ ōrhneal ē an , or gow kay Tēroch anownov ” » .
40024001	Erp Yisows , tajarēn towrs ellelov , gĕ megnēr , ashagertnerĕ katsʾin anor kʾov , tsʾowtsʾnelow anor tajarin shēnkʾerĕ .
40024002	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « CHʾēkʾ tesner ayt polorĕ : jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Kʾar kʾari vray biti chʾmnay , amēnĕ biti kʾagowi ” » .
40024003	Ow erp an nstadz ēr TSitʾeninerow leṛĕ , ashagertnerĕ katsʾin iren , aṛantsin , ew ĕsin : « Ĕsē mezi , erp biti ĕllay atiga , ow inchʾ biti ĕllay nshanĕ kʾow kalowstit ew ashkharhi vakhjanin » .
40024004	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Zkowshatsʾēkʾ or ochʾ mēgĕ moloretsʾnē tsez .
40024005	Orovhetew shater biti kan im anownovs ew ĕsen : “ Es em Kʾristosĕ ” , ow biti moloretsʾnen shaterĕ .
40024006	Biti lsēkʾ baterazmnerow masin , ew baterazmnerow taratsaynowtʾiwnner : zkowshatsʾēkʾ , or chʾvrtovikʾ , orovhetew bētkʾ ē or ays amēnĕ ĕllay , paytsʾ teṛ vakhjanĕ chʾē .
40024007	Orovhetew azk azki tēm biti ellē , ow tʾakaworowtʾiwn , tʾakaworowtʾean tēm : ew tegh-tegh sover , zhantakhtner ow ergrashar zhner biti ĕllan .
40024008	Sagayn asonkʾ polorĕ tsʾawerown sgizpn en .
40024009	Ayn aten biti matnen tsez taṛabankʾnerow , biti sbannen tsez , ow polor azkerown ateli biti ĕllakʾ im anownis hamar .
40024010	Ew ayn aten shater biti kaytʾagghin , biti matnen zirar ow biti aten zirar .
40024011	SHat sowt markarēner biti ellen , ew biti moloretsʾnen shaterĕ .
40024012	Anōrēnowtʾean pazmanalown hamar , shaterown sērĕ biti baghi .
40024013	Paytsʾ ov or togay minchʾew vakhjanĕ , aniga biti pʾrgowi .
40024014	Ays arkʾayowtʾean awetaranĕ biti kʾarozowi ampoghch ergrakowntin mēch , ipr vgayowtʾiwn polor azkerown , ew ayn aten vakhjanĕ biti kay » .
40024015	« Owremn erp sowrp teghĕ hastatowadz tesnēkʾ aweroghin bghdzowtʾiwnĕ , , , - orow masin Taniēl markarēin michotsʾov khōsowadz ē , - ( ov or gartay , tʾogh hasgnay , )
40024016	ayn aten Hrēastani mēch eghoghnerĕ leṛnerĕ tʾogh pʾakhchʾin .
40024017	An or tanikʾin vray ē , tʾogh chʾichnē ir townēn orewē pan aṛnelow ,
40024018	ew an or artin mēch ē , tʾogh chʾverataṛnay ir hantertsnerĕ aṛnelow .
40024019	Paytsʾ vay ayt ōrerĕ yghi eghoghnerown ow dzidz towoghnerown .
40024020	Aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ , or tser pʾakhowstĕ tsmeṛĕ chʾĕllay , ochʾ al SHapatʾ ōrĕ :
40024021	kʾani or ayn aten aynbisi medz taṛabankʾ biti ĕllay , orown nmanĕ , ashkharhi sgizpēn minchʾew hima eghadz chʾē , ochʾ al biti ĕllay .
40024022	Etʾē ayt ōrerĕ chʾgarjnayin , ochʾ mēg marmin biti pʾrgowēr : paytsʾ ĕntrealnerown hamar , ayt ōrerĕ biti garjnan .
40024023	Ayn aten etʾē mēgĕ ĕsē tsezi : “ Aha hos ē Kʾristosĕ ” , gam : “ Hon ē ” , mi hawatakʾ .
40024024	Orovhetew sowt Kʾristosner ow sowt markarēner biti ellen , ew tsʾoytsʾ biti tan medz nshanner ow skʾanchʾelikʾner , orbēszi , etʾē gareli ĕllay , moloretsʾnen ĕntrealnern isg .
40024025	Aha nakhabēs ĕsi tsezi .
40024026	Owremn etʾē ĕsen tsezi : “ Aha anabatin mēch ē ” , mi ertʾakʾ : gam : “ Aha nerkʾin seneagnerown mēch ē ” , mi hawatakʾ .
40024027	Kʾani or inchʾbēs pʾaylagĕ g!ellē arewelkʾēn ow g!erewnay minchʾew arewmowtkʾ , aynbēs biti ĕllay martow Ortiin kalowstĕ .
40024028	Orovhetew owr or tiag gay , hon biti hawakʾowin ardziwnerĕ » .
40024029	« Ew ayt ōrerow taṛabankʾēn anmichabēs etkʾ , arewĕ biti khawari ow lowsinĕ biti chʾtay ir pʾaylĕ : astgherĕ biti iynan erginkʾēn , erginkʾi zōrowtʾiwnnerĕ biti sarsin ,
40024030	ew ayn aten martow Ortiin nshanĕ biti erewnay erginkʾi mēch . Ayn aten ergri polor tohmerĕ biti hedzedzen , ow biti tesnen martow Ortin , or gow kay erginkʾi amberown vray , zōrowtʾeamp ow medz pʾaṛkʾov .
40024031	Ew an biti ghrgē ir hreshtagnerĕ partsratsayn pʾoghov , ow biti hawakʾen ir ĕntrealnerĕ chʾors hoverēn , erginkʾi mēg dzayrēn minchʾew miws dzayrĕ » .
40024032	« Tʾzeniēn sorvetsʾēkʾ aṛag mĕ : erp anor osterĕ gagowghnan ew terewnerĕ tsʾtsʾowin , gĕ hasgnakʾ tʾē amaṛĕ mōt ē .
40024033	Noynbēs towkʾ , erp tesnēkʾ ays polor panerĕ , kittsʾēkʾ tʾē mōt ē , tṛnerown kʾov .
40024034	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ays serowntĕ biti chʾantsʾni , minchʾew or ays polor panerĕ ĕllan ” .
40024035	Erginkʾ ow ergir biti antsʾnin , paytsʾ im khōskʾers pnaw biti chʾantsʾnin » .
40024036	« Isg ayt ōrn ow zhamĕ , ochʾ mēg mart kitē , ochʾ al erginkʾi hreshtagnerĕ , haba , miayn im Hayrs .
40024037	Paytsʾ inchʾbēs Noyi ōrerown batahetsʾaw , aynbēs al biti ĕllay martow Ortiin kalowstĕ .
40024038	Orovhetew inchʾbēs chrhegheghēn aṛach eghadz ayn ōrerĕ , g!owtēin , gĕ khmēin , g!amowsnanayin ew amowsnowtʾean gow tayin , minchʾew ayn ōrĕ , erp Noy mtaw tabanĕ ,
40024039	ow chʾkittsʾan , minchʾew or chrhegheghĕ egaw ew kʾshetsʾ taraw polorĕ , aynbēs al biti ĕllay martow Ortiin kalowstĕ .
40024040	Ayn aten etʾē ergow martig arti mĕ mēch ĕllan , mēgĕ biti aṛnowi ew miwsĕ mnay :
40024041	ow etʾē ergow giner chaghatsʾkʾin mēch aghan , mēgĕ biti aṛnowi ew miwsĕ mnay .
40024042	Owremn artʾown getsʾēkʾ , orovhetew chʾēkʾ kiter tʾē tser Tērĕ or zhamown biti kay .
40024043	Paytsʾ sa kittsʾēkʾ tʾē etʾē tanowtērĕ kitnar tʾē kisherowan or bahown koghĕ gow kay , artʾown gĕ genar ew chʾēr tʾoylatrer , or dzagen ir townĕ .
40024044	Owsti towkʾ al batrast getsʾēkʾ , orovhetew martow Ortin biti kay aynbisi zhamow mĕ , or towkʾ chʾēkʾ agngaler » .
40024045	« Owremn ov ē ayn hawatarim ew imastown dzaṛan , or ir tērĕ nshanagetsʾ ir dzaṛanerown vray , orbēszi atenin geragowr tay anontsʾ .
40024046	Erani ayt dzaṛayin , or ir tērĕ , egadz atenĕ , biti ktnē tʾē aynbēs g!ĕnē .
40024047	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē biti nshanagē zayn ir ampoghch inchʾkʾin vray .
40024048	Haba etʾē ayt chʾar dzaṛan ĕsē ir sirtin mēch : “ Im tērs g!owshatsʾnē ir kalĕ ” ,
40024049	ew sgsi dzedzel ir dzaṛayagitsʾnerĕ , owtel ow khmel arpetsʾoghnerown het ,
40024050	ayt dzaṛayin tērĕ biti kay aynbisi ōr mĕ , erp chʾi sbaser , ew aynbisi zhamow mĕ , or chʾi kiter ,
40024051	ow ergowkʾi biti gtrē zayn ew biti tnē anor pa zhinĕ geghdzawornerown het : hon biti ĕllay latsʾ ow agṛanerow grjtowm » .
40025001	« Ayn aten erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ biti nmani tasĕ goyserow , oronkʾ , aṛnelov irentsʾ labternerĕ , katsʾin timaworelow pʾesan .
40025002	Asontsʾmē hinkĕ imastown ēin , isg hinkĕ , yimar .
40025003	Yimarnerĕ aṛin irentsʾ labternerĕ , paytsʾ tsētʾ chʾaṛin irentsʾ het :
40025004	sagayn imastownnerĕ , amannerov tsētʾ al aṛin irentsʾ labternerown het .
40025005	Erp pʾesan owshatsʾaw , polorn al tʾmretsʾan ow kʾnatsʾan .
40025006	Gēs kisherin kochʾiwn mĕ eghaw : “ Aha pʾesan gow kay : katsʾēkʾ timaworelow zinkʾ ” .
40025007	Ayn aten polor goyserĕ otkʾi elan ew yartaretsʾin irentsʾ labternerĕ .
40025008	Yimarnerĕ ĕsin imastownnerown : “ Towēkʾ mezi tser tsētʾēn , orovhetew mer labternerĕ gĕ marin ” .
40025009	Imastownnerĕ bataskhanetsʾin : “ Ochʾ : kowtsʾē chʾpawē mezi ow tsezi : ayl manawant katsʾēkʾ dzakhoghnerown ew knetsʾēkʾ tsezi hamar ” .
40025010	Erp anonkʾ katsʾin knelow , pʾesan egaw : batrast eghoghnerĕ harsanikʾi mtan anor het , ow towṛĕ kotsʾowetsʾaw .
40025011	Yetoy miws goyserĕ egan ew ĕsin : “ Tēr , Tēr , patsʾ mezi ” .
40025012	Paytsʾ an bataskhanetsʾ : “ Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : " Es chʾem janchʾnar tsez " ” .
40025013	Owremn artʾown getsʾēkʾ , orovhetew kitēkʾ ochʾ ōrĕ , ochʾ zhamĕ » .
40025014	« Artarew erginkʾi tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ gĕ nmani jamportogh martow mĕ , or ganchʾetsʾ ir dzaṛanerĕ , ew yantsnetsʾ anontsʾ ir inchʾkʾĕ :
40025015	mēgown towaw hink taghant , mēgown , ergow , ow mēgown , mēg : iwrakʾanchʾiwrin , ir garoghowtʾean chʾapʾov , ew isgoyn megnetsʾaw .
40025016	Hink taghant statsʾoghĕ knatsʾ , ōktakordzetsʾ zanonkʾ , ow shahetsʾaw owrish hink taghant .
40025017	Nmanabēs ergow statsʾoghĕ shahetsʾaw owrish ergow al .
40025018	Isg mēg statsʾoghĕ knatsʾ , pʾoretsʾ ketinĕ ew dzadzgetsʾ ir tiroch tramĕ .
40025019	SHat zhamanag etkʾ , ayt dzaṛanerown tērĕ egaw ow hashiw owzetsʾ anontsʾmē .
40025020	Hink taghant statsʾoghĕ mōtetsʾaw ew peraw owrish hink taghant , ĕselov : “ Tēr , hink taghant yantsnetsʾir indzi : aha owrish hink taghant al shahetsʾay anontsʾmē zat ” .
40025021	Tērĕ ĕsaw anor : “ Abris , pari ow hawatarim dzaṛay : town , or hawatarim eghar kʾichʾ pani mēch , biti nshanagem kʾez shat panerow vray : mtir tirocht owrakhowtʾean mēch ” .
40025022	Ergow taghant statsʾoghn al mōtetsʾaw ew ĕsaw : “ Tēr , ergow taghant yantsnetsʾir indzi : aha owrish ergow taghant al shahetsʾay anontsʾmē zat ” .
40025023	Tērĕ ĕsaw anor : “ Abris , pari ow hawatarim dzaṛay : town , or hawatarim eghar kʾichʾ pani mēch , biti nshanagem kʾez shat panerow vray : mtir tirocht owrakhowtʾean mēch ” .
40025024	Mēg taghant statsʾoghn al mōtetsʾaw ew ĕsaw : “ Tēr , kitēi tʾē town khist mart mĕn es : gĕ hntses chʾsermanadz teghēt , ow gĕ zhoghves chʾtsʾanadz teghēt :
40025025	owsti vakhnalov , katsʾi , bahetsʾi kʾow taghantt ketinin tag : owsti aha kʾowgt , kʾezi ” .
40025026	Ir tērĕ bataskhanetsʾ iren : “ CHʾar ew dzoyl dzaṛay : kitēir tʾē gĕ hntsem chʾsermanadz teghēs , ow gĕ zhoghvem chʾtsʾanadz teghēs :
40025027	owremn bētkʾ ēr or tnēir im trams seghanawornerown kʾov , orbēszi togosov stanayi egadz atens ” .
40025028	“ Owsti aṛēkʾ atgē taghantĕ , ow towēkʾ tasĕ taghant ownetsʾoghin :
40025029	orovhetew amēn ownetsʾoghi biti trowi , ew biti ĕllay aṛatowtʾean mēch , paytsʾ chʾownetsʾoghēn biti aṛnowi ownetsʾadzn al .
40025030	Isg netetsʾēkʾ ayt anbēt dzaṛan towrsi khawarĕ : hon biti ĕllay latsʾ ow agṛanerow grjtowm ” » .
40025031	« Erp martow Ortin kay ir pʾaṛkʾov , ew polor sowrp hreshtagnerĕ iren het , ayn aten biti pazmi ir pʾaṛkʾi kahin vray .
40025032	Polor azkerĕ biti hawakʾowin anor aṛchew , ow biti zatē zanonkʾ irarmē , inchʾbēs hoviw mĕ gĕ zatē ochʾkharnerĕ aydzerēn .
40025033	Ochʾkharnerĕ biti getsʾnē ir ach goghmĕ , isg aydzerĕ , tsakh goghmĕ .
40025034	Ayn aten tʾakaworĕ biti ĕsē ir ach goghmĕ eghoghnerown : “ Egēkʾ im Hōrs ōrhnadznerĕ , zhaṛanketsʾēkʾ ayn tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ , or batrastowadz ē tsezi hamar , ashkharhi himnatrowtʾenēn i ver .
40025035	Orovhetew anōtʾetsʾay , ew owtelikʾ towikʾ indzi , dzarawtsʾay , ow khmtsʾowtsʾikʾ indzi , ōtaragan ēi , ners ĕntownetsʾikʾ zis ,
40025036	merg ēi , hakowetsʾowtsʾikʾ zis , hiwant ēi , aytsʾeletsʾikʾ indzi , panti mēch ēi , egakʾ indzi ” .
40025037	Ayn aten artarnerĕ biti bataskhanen anor : “ Tēr , erp tesankʾ kʾez anōtʾetsʾadz , ew geragretsʾinkʾ , gam dzarawtsʾadz , ow khmtsʾowtsʾinkʾ :
40025038	erp tesankʾ kʾez ōtaragan , ew ners ĕntownetsʾinkʾ , gam merg , ow hakowetsʾowtsʾinkʾ :
40025039	erp tesankʾ kʾez hiwant gam panti mēch , ow egankʾ kʾezi ” .
40025040	Tʾakaworĕ biti bataskhanē anontsʾ : “ Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : " Kʾani im ays eghpayrnerows pʾokʾrakoynnerēn mēgown ĕrikʾ , indzi ĕrikʾ " ” .
40025041	Ayn aten biti ĕsē naew ir tsakh goghmĕ eghoghnerown : “ Heṛatsʾēkʾ intsmē , anidzealner , yawitenagan gragin mēch , or batrastowadz ē CHʾarakhōsin ew ir hreshtagnerown hamar .
40025042	Orovhetew anōtʾetsʾay , owtelikʾ chʾtowikʾ indzi , dzarawtsʾay , chʾkhmtsʾowtsʾikʾ indzi ,
40025043	ōtaragan ēi , ners chʾĕntownetsʾikʾ zis , merg ēi , chʾhakowetsʾowtsʾikʾ zis , hiwant ow panti mēch ēi , chʾaytsʾeletsʾikʾ indzi ” .
40025044	Ayn aten anonkʾ al biti bataskhanen : “ Tēr , erp tesankʾ kʾez anōtʾetsʾadz , gam dzarawtsʾadz , gam ōtaragan , gam merg , gam hiwant , gam panti mēch , ew chʾsbasargetsʾinkʾ kʾezi ” .
40025045	Ayn aten biti bataskhanē anontsʾ : “ Jshmartabēs g!ĕsem tsezi : " Kʾani asontsʾ pʾokʾrakoynnerēn mēgown chʾĕrikʾ , indzi al chʾĕrikʾ " ” .
40025046	Asonkʾ biti ertʾan yawitenagan batowhasin , isg artarnerĕ , yawitenagan geankʾin » .
40026001	Erp Yisows awartetsʾ ays polor khōskʾerĕ , ĕsaw ir ashagertnerown :
40026002	« Kitēkʾ tʾē ergow ōr etkʾ , Zatig biti ĕllay , ow martow Ortin biti matnowi , khachʾowelow hamar » .
40026003	Ayn aten kʾahanayabetnerĕ , tbirnerĕ ew zhoghovowrtin erētsʾnerĕ hawakʾowetsʾan kawitʾĕ kʾahanayabetin , or Gayiapʾa gĕ gochʾowēr ,
40026004	ow khorhrtagtsʾetsʾan nenkowtʾeamp pṛnel Yisowsĕ ew sbannel .
40026005	Paytsʾ g!ĕsēin : « Ochʾ tōnin atenĕ , orbēszi aghmowg chʾĕllay zhoghovowrtin mēch » .
40026006	Erp Yisows Petʾania ēr , porot Simoni townĕ ,
40026007	gin mĕ , or ownēr tʾangar zhēkʾ ōdzanelikʾi alabastrē shish mĕ , egaw anor ow tʾapʾetsʾ zayn anor klowkhin vray , erp an seghan nstadz ēr .
40026008	Anor ashagertnerĕ tesnelov , ĕntvzetsʾan ew ĕsin : « Inchʾow ays vatnowmĕ :
40026009	kʾani or ayt ōdzanelikʾĕ grnar sowgh kinov dzakhowil ow aghkʾatnerown trowil » .
40026010	Yisows hasgnalov , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾow g!anhankstatsʾnēkʾ ginĕ : an law kordz mĕ ĕraw indzi .
40026011	Orovhetew amēn aten ownikʾ aghkʾatnerĕ tsezi het , paytsʾ amēn aten chʾownikʾ zis .
40026012	An or tʾapʾetsʾ ayt ōdzanelikʾĕ marminis vray , ĕraw im tʾaghowmis hamar .
40026013	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ampoghch ashkharhi mēch , owr or ays awetaranĕ kʾarozowi , asor ĕradzn al biti batmowi , ir yishatagin hamar ” » .
40026014	Ayn aten tasnergowkʾēn mēgĕ , or gĕ gochʾowēr Yowta Isgariovtatsʾi , knatsʾ kʾahanayabetnerown ew ĕsaw :
40026015	« Inchʾ g!owzēkʾ tal indzi , orbēszi matnem zayn tsezi » . Anonkʾ al khostatsʾan anor eresown gtor ardzatʾ .
40026016	Ayt atenēn etkʾ batehowtʾiwn gĕ pʾntṛēr , orbēszi matnēr zayn anontsʾ .
40026017	Pagharchagerkʾi aṛachin ōrĕ , ashagertnerĕ egan Yisowsi ow ĕsin anor : « Owr g!owzes or batrastenkʾ kʾezi bētkʾ eghadzĕ , zatigĕ owtelow hamar » .
40026018	An bataskhanetsʾ : « Katsʾēkʾ kʾaghakʾĕ , aysinchʾ martown , ew ĕsēkʾ anor : “ Vartabetĕ g!ĕsē : " ZHamanags mōt ē , kʾow kʾovt biti gatarem Zatigĕ , ashagertnerows het " ” » .
40026019	Ashagertnern al ĕrin , inchʾbēs Yisows hramayetsʾ irentsʾ , ow batrastetsʾin zatigĕ .
40026020	Erp irigown eghaw , seghan nstaw tasnergowkʾin het .
40026021	Minchʾ g!owtēin , ĕsaw : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē tsezmē mēgĕ biti matnē zis » .
40026022	CHʾapʾazantsʾ trtmetsʾan ew anontsʾmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ sgsaw ĕsel anor : « Tēr , mitʾē es em » .
40026023	An al bataskhanetsʾ : « An or indzi het tʾatʾkhetsʾ ir tseṛkʾĕ bnagin mēch , aniga biti matnē zis » .
40026024	Irabēs martow Ortin g!ertʾay , inchʾbēs krowadz ē ir masin , paytsʾ vay ayn martown , orown michotsʾov martow Ortin gĕ matnowi . Ayt martown law biti ĕllar , or dznadz chʾĕllar » .
40026025	Yowta , or biti matnēr zayn , bataskhanetsʾ : « Vartabet , mitʾē es em » . Ĕsaw anor : « Town ĕsir » .
40026026	Minchʾ anonkʾ g!owtēin , Yisows hatsʾ aṛaw , ōrhnetsʾ , gtretsʾ , towaw ashagertnerown ew ĕsaw : « Aṛēkʾ , gerēkʾ : ays ē im marmins » .
40026027	Naew pa zhagĕ aṛaw , shnorhagal eghaw , towaw anontsʾ ow ĕsaw :
40026028	« Polort al khmetsʾēkʾ asgē : orovhetew ays ē im ariwns , nor owkhtin ariwnĕ , or gĕ tʾapʾowi , shaterown meghkʾerow nerowmin hamar .
40026029	Paytsʾ gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Asgē etkʾ pnaw biti chʾkhmem ortʾatowngin perkʾēn , minchʾew ayn ōrĕ , erp tsezi het nor gerbov khmem zayn im Hōrs tʾakaworowtʾean mēch ” » .
40026030	ōrhnerkelē etkʾ , katsʾin TSitʾeninerow leṛĕ .
40026031	Ayn aten Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Towkʾ polort biti kaytʾagghikʾ ays kisher im batjaṛovs , orovhetew krowadz ē : “ Hoviwĕ biti zarnem , ow hōtin ochʾkharnerĕ biti tsʾrowin ” .
40026032	Paytsʾ yarowtʾiwn aṛnelēs etkʾ , tsezmē aṛach biti ertʾam Kalilea » .
40026033	Betros bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Tʾēew polorn al kaytʾagghin kʾow batjaṛovt , es pnaw biti chʾkaytʾagghim » .
40026034	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem kʾezi : “ Ays kisher , teṛ akʾaghaghĕ chʾganchʾadz , erekʾ ankam biti owranas zis ” » .
40026035	Betros ĕsaw anor : « Noynisg etʾē bētkʾ ĕllay or kʾezi het meṛnim , pnaw biti chʾowranam kʾez » . Aysbēs g!ĕsēin naew polor ashagertnerĕ .
40026036	Ayn aten Yisows knatsʾ anontsʾ het vayr mĕ , or Ketʾsemani gĕ gochʾowēr , ew ĕsaw ashagertnerown : « Hos nstetsʾēkʾ , minchʾ es g!ertʾam hon , aghōtʾelow » .
40026037	Iren het aṛnelov Betrosn ow Zepetēosi ergow ortinerĕ , sgsaw trtmil ew shat vshtanal .
40026038	Ayn aten ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Im antss chʾapʾazantsʾ trtowm ē , meṛnelow astijan . Hos mnatsʾēkʾ ew artʾown getsʾēkʾ indzi het » .
40026039	Ow kʾichʾ mĕ aṛchew ertʾalov , ingaw ir eresin vray , ew aghōtʾetsʾ , ĕselov : « Im hayrs , etʾē gareli ē , ays pa zhagĕ tʾogh antsʾni intsmē : paytsʾ ochʾ tʾē inchʾbēs es g!owzem , haba , inchʾbēs town g!owzes » .
40026040	Erp egaw ashagertnerown , kʾnatsʾadz ktaw zanonkʾ ow ĕsaw Betrosi : « Aytbēs mēg zham al chʾgrtsʾakʾ artʾown genal indzi het .
40026041	Artʾown getsʾēkʾ ew aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ , orbēszi chʾmtnēkʾ pʾortsowtʾean mēch : artarew hokin yō zhar ē , paytsʾ marminĕ , tgar » .
40026042	Tartseal ergrort ankam knatsʾ aghōtʾetsʾ , ĕselov : « Im hayrs , etʾē gareli chʾē or ays pa zhagĕ antsʾni intsmē , aṛantsʾ khmelow angē , kʾow gamkʾt tʾogh ĕllay » .
40026043	Erp egaw , tartseal kʾnatsʾadz ktaw zanonkʾ , orovhetew anontsʾ achʾkʾerĕ dzanratsʾadz ēin .
40026044	Tʾoghowtsʾ zanonkʾ ow tartseal knatsʾ , errort ankam aghōtʾetsʾ , noyn khōskʾĕ ĕselov .
40026045	Ayn aten egaw ir ashagertnerown ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Asgē etkʾ kʾnatsʾēkʾ ow hankstatsʾēkʾ : aha zhamĕ mōtetsʾaw , ew martow Ortin biti matnowi meghawornerown tseṛkʾĕ .
40026046	Otkʾi elēkʾ , ertʾankʾ asgē : aha mōtetsʾaw an , or biti matnē zis » .
40026047	Minchʾ an teṛ gĕ khōsēr , Yowta , tasnergowkʾēn mēgĕ , egaw , ew iren het medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ , sowrerov ow pirerov , kʾahanayabetnerēn ew zhoghovowrtin erētsʾnerēn .
40026048	Zayn matnoghĕ nshan mĕ tower ēr anontsʾ , ĕselov : « Ov or hampowrem , an ē , pṛnetsʾēkʾ zayn » .
40026049	Ew isgoyn mōtenalov Yisowsi , ĕsaw : « Oghchoyn , Vartabet » , ow hampowretsʾ zayn .
40026050	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Ĕnger , ĕrē inchʾ pani hamar or egar » . Ayn aten mōtetsʾan , tseṛkʾ partsratsʾowtsʾin Yisowsi vray ow pṛnetsʾin zayn .
40026051	Yisowsi het eghoghnerēn mēgĕ , ergaretsʾ tseṛkʾĕ , ew kʾashelov ir sowrĕ , zargaw kʾahanayabetin dzaṛayin ow khletsʾ anor aganchĕ .
40026052	Ayn aten Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Veratartsowr sowrt ir teghĕ , orovhetew polor sowr aṛnoghnerĕ , sowrov biti gorsowin .
40026053	Gĕ gardzes tʾē chʾem grnar hima aghachʾel im Hōrs , or hastsʾnē indzi tasnergow lekēonēn aweli hreshtagner .
40026054	Paytsʾ inchʾbēs biti irakordzowin krowadznerĕ , tʾē aysbēs bētkʾ ē ĕllay » .
40026055	Ayt zhamown Yisows ĕsaw pazmowtʾiwnnerown : « Ipr tʾē awazagi tēm elakʾ , sowrerov ow pirerov pṛnelow zis . Amēn ōr tajarin mēch gĕ nstēi tsezi het ew gĕ sorvetsʾnēi , ow chʾpṛnetsʾikʾ zis .
40026056	Paytsʾ ays amēnĕ gatarowetsʾaw , orbēszi markarēnerown kradznerĕ irakordzowin » . Ayn aten polor ashagertnerĕ tʾoghowtsʾin zayn ew pʾakhan .
40026057	Anonkʾ or pṛnetsʾin Yisowsĕ , tarin Gayiapʾa kʾahanayabetin , owr tbirnern ow erētsʾnerĕ hawakʾowadz ēin .
40026058	Betros heṛowēn hetewetsʾaw anor , minchʾew kʾahanayabetin kawitʾĕ , ners mtaw ew nstaw sbasawornerown het , orbēszi tesnē vakhjanĕ .
40026059	Kʾahanayabetnern ow erētsʾnerĕ ew ampoghch ateanĕ gĕ pʾntṛēin sowt vgayowtʾiwn mĕ Yisowsi tēm , orbēszi meṛtsʾnen zayn :
40026060	paytsʾ chʾktan . Tʾēbēt shat sowt vganer al egan , ochʾinchʾ ktan . Yetoy ergow sowt vganer egan
40026061	ow ĕsin : « Asiga ĕsaw : “ Es grnam kʾagel Astowdzoy tajarĕ ew gaṛowtsʾanel zayn erekʾ ōrowan mēch ” » .
40026062	Kʾahanayabetĕ ganknelov , ĕsaw anor : « Ochʾinchʾ gĕ bataskhanes : inchʾ gĕ vgayen asonkʾ kʾezi tēm » .
40026063	Yisows lowṛ getsʾaw . Owsti kʾahanayabetĕ ĕsaw anor : « Abrogh Astowdzmov g!ertmnetsʾnem kʾez , or ĕses mezi tʾē town es Kʾristosĕ , Astowdzoy Ortin » .
40026064	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Town ĕsir . Paytsʾ gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Asgē etkʾ biti tesnēkʾ martow Ortin , pazmadz Zōrowtʾean ach goghmĕ , ow egadz erginkʾi amberown vray ” » .
40026065	Ayn aten kʾahanayabetĕ batṛetsʾ ir hantertsnerĕ ew ĕsaw : « Hayhoyetsʾ : al inchʾ bētkʾ owninkʾ vganerow . Aha hima lsetsʾikʾ ator hayhoyowtʾiwnĕ :
40026066	inchʾ gĕ mtadzēkʾ » . Anonkʾ bataskhanetsʾin : « Mahabart ē » .
40026067	Ayn aten tʾkʾnetsʾin anor eresĕ , ow gṛpʾaharetsʾin zayn . Omankʾ al abtagelov , ĕsin :
40026068	« Markarēatsʾir mezi , town , Kʾristos , ov ē an , or zargaw kʾezi » .
40026069	Erp Betros towrsĕ , kawitʾĕ nstadz ēr , aghakhin mĕ egaw anor ew ĕsaw : « Town al Kalileatsʾi Yisowsi het ēir » .
40026070	Paytsʾ an owratsʾaw polorin aṛchew , ĕselov : « CHʾem kiter inchʾ gĕ khōsis » .
40026071	Erp towrs elaw , nakhakawitʾĕ , owrish aghakhin mĕ tesaw zayn ow ĕsaw hon eghoghnerown : « Asiga al Yisows Nazovretsʾiin het ēr » .
40026072	Betros tartseal ertowm ĕnelov owratsʾaw : « CHʾem janchʾnar ayt martĕ » .
40026073	Kʾichʾ etkʾ , hon gaynoghnerĕ egan ew ĕsin Betrosi : « Jshmartabēs town al anontsʾmē es , orovhetew khōsowadzkʾt al gĕ yaytnē kʾez » .
40026074	Ayn aten sgsaw nzovel ow ertowm ĕnel , ĕselov : « CHʾem janchʾnar ayt martĕ » . Isgoyn akʾaghaghĕ ganchʾetsʾ .
40026075	Betros yishetsʾ Yisowsi khōskʾĕ , or iren ĕser ēr : « Teṛ akʾaghaghĕ chʾganchʾadz , erekʾ ankam biti owranas zis » : ew towrs ellelov , taṛnabēs latsʾaw .
40027001	Erp aṛtow eghaw , polor kʾahanayabetnern ow zhoghovowrtin erētsʾnerĕ khorhrtagtsʾetsʾan Yisowsi tēm , or meṛtsʾnen zayn .
40027002	Erp gabetsʾin zayn , tarin ew matnetsʾin Bontatsʾi Bighatos gaṛavarichʾin .
40027003	Ayn aten Yowta , or matnetsʾ zayn , tesnelov or tatabartowetsʾaw , zghchatsʾ , veratartsowtsʾ eresown gtor ardzatʾĕ kʾahanayabetnerown ow erētsʾnerown ,
40027004	ew ĕsaw : « Meghanchʾetsʾi , anmegh ariwn matnelov » . Anonkʾ ĕsin : « Mezi inchʾ , town antratartsir » .
40027005	An al tsketsʾ ardzatʾĕ tajarin mēch , towrs elaw , ow knatsʾ , kheghtetsʾ inkʾzinkʾ .
40027006	Kʾahanayabetnern al aṛnelov ardzatʾĕ , ĕsin : « Artōnowadz chʾē tnel atiga gorpanin mēch , , , kʾani or ariwni kin ē » .
40027007	Ew khorhrtagtsʾetsʾan , ow knetsʾin anov prowtin artĕ , ōtaragannerow kerezmanatown ĕllalow hamar .
40027008	Owsti ayt artĕ gochʾowetsʾaw « Ariwni art » minchʾew aysōr .
40027009	Ayn aten irakordzowetsʾaw Eremia markarēin michotsʾov ĕsowadz khōskʾĕ : « Ew aṛin eresown gtor ardzatʾĕ , kinĕ anor , or knahatowadz ēr , or Israyēli ortinerēn omankʾ knahatetsʾin ,
40027010	ow towin zayn prowtin artin , inchʾbēs Tērĕ hramayetsʾ indzi » .
40027011	Yisows gaynetsʾaw gaṛavarichʾin aṛchew . Gaṛavarichʾĕ hartsʾowtsʾ anor : « Town es Hreanerown tʾakaworĕ » . Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Town g!ĕses » .
40027012	Paytsʾ ochʾinchʾ bataskhanetsʾ , erp g!ampastanowēr kʾahanayabetnerēn ow erētsʾnerēn .
40027013	Ayn aten Bighatos ĕsaw anor : « CHʾes lser , orkʾan gĕ vgayen kʾezi tēm » .
40027014	Paytsʾ chʾbataskhanetsʾ anor : ochʾ mēg khōskʾ ĕsaw , aynbēs or gaṛavarichʾĕ medzabēs zarmatsʾaw .
40027015	Tōnin atenĕ gaṛavarichʾĕ sovorowtʾiwn ownēr pantargeal mĕ artsagel pazmowtʾean , ov or owzēin .
40027016	Ayn aten ownēin ereweli pantargeal mĕ , Parappa gochʾowadz .
40027017	Owremn erp hawakʾowetsʾan , Bighatos ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ov g!owzēkʾ or artsagem tsezi : Parappan , tʾē Yisowsĕ , or Kʾristos gĕ gochʾowi » .
40027018	Kʾani or kitēr tʾē nakhantsi hamar matnadz ēin zayn .
40027019	Erp inkʾ pazmadz ēr tataranĕ , ir ginĕ mēgĕ ghrgetsʾ iren ew ĕsaw : « Town kordz mi ownenar ayt artarin het , orovhetew aysōr shat chʾarchʾarowetsʾay erazis mēch , anor batjaṛov » .
40027020	Paytsʾ kʾahanayabetnern ow erētsʾnerĕ hamozetsʾin pazmowtʾiwnĕ , or Parappan khntren ew Yisowsĕ gorsntsʾnen .
40027021	Gaṛavarichʾĕ ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ays ergowkʾēn ov g!owzēkʾ , or artsagem tsezi » .
40027022	Anonkʾ ĕsin : « Parappan » . Bighatos ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Haba inchʾ ĕnem Yisowsĕ , or Kʾristos gĕ gochʾowi » .
40027023	Polorn al ĕsin anor : « Tʾogh khachʾowi » . Isg gaṛavarichʾĕ ĕsaw : « Paytsʾ inchʾ chʾarikʾ ĕradz ē » . Anonkʾ al aweli g!aghaghagēin : « Tʾogh khachʾowi » .
40027024	Bighatos , tesnelov tʾē anōkowt ē , ayl manawant aghmowg gĕ partsranay , , , chowr aṛaw , tseṛkʾerĕ lowatsʾ pazmowtʾean aṛchew ew ĕsaw : « Es anbart em ayt artarin ariwnēn : towkʾ antratartsēkʾ » .
40027025	Ampoghch zhoghovowrtĕ bataskhanetsʾ : « Ator ariwnĕ tʾogh ĕllay mer vray ow mer zawagnerown vray » .
40027026	Ayn aten Parappan artsagetsʾ anontsʾ , ew kharazanelov Yisowsĕ , yantsnetsʾ anontsʾ orbēszi khachʾowēr .
40027027	Ayn aten , gaṛavarichʾin zinowornerĕ aṛin Yisowsĕ balatēn ners , ow zinowornerown ampoghch kowntĕ hawakʾetsʾin anor showrch .
40027028	Mergatsʾnelov zayn , haktsʾowtsʾin anor ortan garmir verargow mĕ ,
40027029	ew hiwselov pʾowshē bsag mĕ , trin anor klowkhĕ , ow eghēk mĕ , anor ach tseṛkʾĕ : ew dznratrelov anor aṛchew , gĕ dzaghrēin zayn ow g!ĕsēin : « Oghchoyn , Hreanerow tʾakawor » .
40027030	Ew tʾkʾnelov anor vray , g!aṛnēin eghēkĕ ow gĕ zarnēin anor klowkhin .
40027031	Erp dzaghretsʾin zayn , hanetsʾin vrayēn verargown , haktsʾowtsʾin anor ir hantertsnerĕ , ow tarin zayn , orbēszi khachʾen .
40027032	Towrs ellelov , ktan giwrenatsʾi mart mĕ , Simon anownov , ew stibetsʾin zayn or vertsʾnē anor khachʾĕ .
40027033	Erp egan tegh mĕ , Koghkotʾa gochʾowadz , or gĕ nshanagē , Kangi tegh ,
40027034	towin anor leghiov khaṛnowadz kʾatsʾakh , orbēszi khmē . Erp hamtesetsʾ , chʾowzetsʾ khmel .
40027035	Aba khachʾetsʾin zayn , ow vijag tskelov , pa zhnetsʾin anor hantertsnerĕ : ( orbēszi irakordzowi markarēin michotsʾov khōsowadzĕ : « Im hantertsners pa zhnetsʾin irentsʾ mēch , ew im batmowjanis vray vijag tsketsʾin » . )
40027036	Ow nstadz , gĕ bahēin zayn :
40027037	ew anor klowkhin vray trin ir ampastanakirĕ : « Ays ē Yisowsĕ , Hreanerown tʾakaworĕ » .
40027038	Ayn aten ergow awazagner khachʾowetsʾan anor het , mēgĕ , ach goghmĕ , miwsĕ , tsakh goghmĕ .
40027039	Anonkʾ or g!antsʾnēin , gĕ hayhoyēin anor , irentsʾ klowkhĕ gĕ shar zhēin
40027040	ow g!ĕsēin : « Town , or gĕ kʾagēir tajarĕ ew gĕ gaṛowtsʾanēir erekʾ ōrowan mēch , pʾrgē town kʾez . Etʾē Astowdzoy Ortin es , ichir ayt khachʾēn » .
40027041	Nmanabēs kʾahanayabetnern al , tbirnerown ow erētsʾnerown het dzaghrelov g!ĕsēin :
40027042	« Owrishnerĕ pʾrgetsʾ , inkʾzinkʾ chʾi grnar pʾrgel . Etʾē Israyēli tʾakawor ē , hima tʾogh ichnē khachʾēn , ew hawatankʾ iren .
40027043	Astowdzoy vstahadz ēr : hima tʾogh azatē zinkʾ , etʾē g!owzē zinkʾ , orovhetew ĕsaw : “ Es Astowdzoy Ortin em ” » .
40027044	Iren het khachʾowadz awazagnern al noynbēs gĕ nakhatēin zayn .
40027045	Vetsʾerort zhamēn , , minchʾew innerort zhamĕ , khawar eghaw ampoghch ergrin vray .
40027046	ZHamĕ inni atennerĕ Yisows partsratsayn aghaghagetsʾ : « Ēli , Ēli , lama sapakʾtʾani » , or ĕsel ē : « Im Astowadzs , im Astowadzs , inchʾow lkʾetsʾir zis » .
40027047	Hon gaynoghnerēn omankʾ , erp lsetsʾin , ĕsin : « Asiga Eghian gĕ ganchʾē » .
40027048	Isgoyn anontsʾmē mēgĕ vazetsʾ , aṛaw sbownk mĕ , letsʾowtsʾ kʾatsʾakhov , ew antsʾĕnelov eghēki mĕ , towaw anor or khmē .
40027049	Miwsnerĕ ĕsin : « Tʾogh , tesnenkʾ tʾē Eghia biti kay , pʾrgelow zayn » .
40027050	Yisows tartseal partsratsayn aghaghagetsʾ ow hokin awantetsʾ .
40027051	Ew aha tajarin varakoyrĕ ergowkʾi batṛetsʾaw , verēn var , ergirĕ shar zhetsʾaw , zhayṛerĕ jeghkʾowetsʾan ,
40027052	kerezmannerĕ patsʾowetsʾan , ow shat mĕ sowrp nnchetsʾealnerow marminner yarowtʾiwn aṛin :
40027053	ew kerezmannerēn elan anor yarowtʾenēn etkʾ , mtan sowrp kʾaghakʾĕ ow erewtsʾan shaterow .
40027054	Paytsʾ hariwrabetĕ ew anor het Yisowsĕ bahoghnerĕ , erp tesan ergrashar zhn ow batahadznerĕ , chʾapʾazantsʾ vakhtsʾan , ew ĕsin : « Jshmartabēs asiga Astowdzoy Ortin ēr » .
40027055	Hon shat giner gayin , oronkʾ heṛowēn gĕ nayēin : anonkʾ Yisowsi hetewer ēin Kalileayēn , iren sbasargelow .
40027056	Anontsʾ mēch ēin Mariam Maktaghenatsʾin , Yagoposi ow Yovsēsi mayrĕ , Mariam , ew Zepetēosi ortinerown mayrĕ .
40027057	Erp irigown eghaw , harowst mart mĕ egaw Arimatʾeayēn , orown anownĕ Yovsēpʾ ēr , ew inkʾ al Yisowsi ashagert ēr .
40027058	An , ertʾalov Bighatosi kʾov , khntretsʾ Yisowsi marminĕ : ayn aten Bighatos hramayetsʾ , or marminĕ trowi .
40027059	Yovsēpʾ aṛaw marminĕ , pʾatʾtʾetsʾ makʾowr gtawov ,
40027060	ow traw ir nor kerezmanin mēch , or pʾoradz ēr zhayṛi mēch : ew medz kʾar mĕ klorelov kerezmanin towṛĕ , knatsʾ .
40027061	Mariam Maktaghenatsʾin ow miws Mariamĕ hon ēin , kerezmanin timatsʾ nstadz .
40027062	Heteweal ōrĕ , or Owrpatʾēn etkʾ ēr , kʾahanayabetnern ow Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ hawakʾowetsʾan Bighatosi kʾov ,
40027063	ew ĕsin : « Tēr , gĕ yishenkʾ tʾē ayt moloretsʾowtsʾichʾĕ , minchʾ tagawin oghch ēr , g!ĕsēr : “ Yarowtʾiwn biti aṛnem erekʾ ōrēn ” .
40027064	Owremn hramayē , or kerezmanĕ abahovowi , minchʾew errort ōrĕ : orbēszi ir ashagertnerĕ chʾkan kisherowan mēch , chʾkoghnan zayn ew chʾĕsen zhoghovowrtin : “ Meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛaw ” , ow verchin molorowtʾiwnĕ aweli kēsh ĕllay kʾan aṛachinĕ » .
40027065	Bighatos ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Towkʾ bahagazōrkʾ ownikʾ : katsʾēkʾ , abahovetsʾēkʾ , inchʾbēs or g!owzēkʾ » .
40027066	Anonkʾ al katsʾin ew abahovetsʾin kerezmanĕ , kʾarĕ gnkʾelov ow bahagazōrkʾov .
40028001	SHapatʾ kisherĕ , erp Mēgshaptʾin gĕ lowsnar , Mariam Maktaghenatsʾin ow miws Mariamĕ egan , tesnelow kerezmanĕ .
40028002	Ew aha hzōr ergrashar zh mĕ eghaw , orovhetew Tēroch hreshtagĕ erginkʾēn ichnelov , egaw , tṛnēn mēgti kloretsʾ kʾarĕ ow nstaw anor vray .
40028003	Anor teskʾĕ pʾaylagi bēs ēr , ew anor hakowstĕ , tsiwni bēs jermag .
40028004	Anor vakhēn , bahagnerĕ tsʾntsʾowetsʾan ow meṛeli bēs eghan .
40028005	Hreshtagĕ ĕsaw ginerown : « Towkʾ mi vakhnakʾ , kʾani or kitem tʾē gĕ pʾntṛēkʾ Yisowsĕ , or khachʾowetsʾaw .
40028006	An hos chʾē , orovhetew yarowtʾiwn aṛaw ( inchʾbēs ĕsadz ēr ) . Egēkʾ , tesēkʾ ayn teghĕ , owr Tērĕ trowadz ēr .
40028007	Yetoy showtov katsʾēkʾ , ĕsēkʾ anor ashagertnerown : “ An meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛaw , ow tser aṛchewēn g!ertʾay Kalilea : hon biti tesnēkʾ zayn ” . Aha ĕsi tsezi » .
40028008	Anonkʾ al showtov towrs elan kerezmanēn , vakhov ew medz owrakhowtʾeamp , ow vazetsʾin batmelow ashagertnerown .
40028009	Erp g!ertʾayin , batmelow anor ashagertnerown , Yisows timaworetsʾ zanonkʾ ew ĕsaw : « Oghchoyn » . Anonkʾ al mōtenalov , pṛnetsʾin anor otkʾerĕ ow ergrbaketsʾin anor .
40028010	Ayn aten Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Mi vakhnakʾ , katsʾēkʾ , lowr towēkʾ im eghpayrnerows or ertʾan Kalilea . Hon biti tesnen zis » .
40028011	Erp anonkʾ g!ertʾayin , bahagazōrkʾēn omankʾ katsʾin kʾaghakʾĕ ew batmetsʾin kʾahanayabetnerown polor batahadznerĕ .
40028012	Anonkʾ al , erētsʾnerown het hawakʾowelov ow khorhrtagtsʾelov , shat tram towin zinowornerown ,
40028013	ew ĕsin : « Sa ĕsēkʾ : “ Anor ashagertnerĕ egan kisherowan mēch ow koghtsʾan zayn , erp menkʾ gĕ kʾnanayinkʾ ” .
40028014	Etʾē ayt panĕ hasni gaṛavarichʾin aganchĕ , menkʾ gĕ hamozenkʾ zinkʾ ew abahov g!ĕnenkʾ tsez » .
40028015	Anonkʾ al aṛin tramĕ , ĕrin inchʾbēs or sorvetsʾowtsʾadz ēin irentsʾ , ew ays zroytsʾĕ minchʾew aysōr taradzowetsʾaw Hreanerown mēch .
40028016	Isg tasnmēg ashagertnerĕ katsʾin Kalilea , ayn leṛĕ , or Yisows oroshadz ēr .
40028017	Erp tesan zayn , ergrbaketsʾin anor : paytsʾ omankʾ gasgadzetsʾan .
40028018	Isg Yisows mōtetsʾaw ew khōsetsʾaw anontsʾ , ĕselov : « Amēn ishkhanowtʾiwn indzi trowetsʾaw , erginkʾi mēch ow ergri vray .
40028019	Owremn katsʾēkʾ , ashagertetsʾēkʾ polor azkerĕ , mgrtetsʾēkʾ zanonkʾ Hōr , Ortiin ew Sowrp Hokiin anownov .
40028020	Sorvetsʾowtsʾēkʾ anontsʾ bahel amēn inchʾ or batowiretsʾi tsezi . Ew aha amēn ōr es tsezi het em , minchʾew ashkharhi vakhjanĕ » . Amēn .
41001001	Astowdzoy Ortiin , Yisows Kʾristosi awetaranin sgizpĕ .
41001002	Inchʾbēs Markarēnerown mēch krowadz ē : « Aha es gĕ ghrgem im batkamawors kʾow aṛchewēt : an biti batrastē jampat , kʾow aṛchewt » .
41001003	« Anabatin mēch kochʾoghin tsaynĕ : “ Batrastetsʾēkʾ Tēroch jampan , shtgetsʾēkʾ anor shawighnerĕ ” » .
41001004	Yovhannēs gĕ mgrtēr anabatin mēch ew gĕ kʾarozēr abashkharowtʾean mgrtowtʾiwnĕ , meghkʾerow nerowmin hamar .
41001005	Ampoghch Hrēastani ergirĕ ow polor Erowsaghematsʾinerĕ g!ertʾayin anor . Polorĕ gĕ mgrtowēin angē Yortanan ketin mēch , irentsʾ meghkʾerĕ khostovanelov .
41001006	Yovhannēs hakadz ēr owghti mazē hakowst , ew ir mēchkʾĕ gabadz ēr gashiē kōti : ir geragowrĕ marakh ow vayri meghr ēr .
41001007	An gĕ kʾarozēr ow g!ĕsēr : « Intsmē hzōrĕ gow kay im etewēs . Es ar zhani chʾem dzṛelow ew anor gōshignerown gaberĕ kʾagelow .
41001008	Artarew es chowrov mgrtetsʾi tsez , paytsʾ an Sowrp Hokiov biti mgrtē tsez » .
41001009	Ayt ōrerĕ Yisows Kalileayi Nazarētʾēn egaw , ow Yovhannēsē mgrtowetsʾaw Yortanani mēch .
41001010	Isgoyn chowrēn towrs ellelov , tesaw erginkʾĕ patsʾowadz , ew Hokin , or aghawnii bēs g!ichnēr ir vray :
41001011	ow tsayn mĕ egaw erginkʾēn , or g!ĕsēr : « Town es im sireli Ortis , orown hajetsʾay » .
41001012	Isgoyn Hokin anabatĕ mghetsʾ zayn .
41001013	Kʾaṛasown ōr hon ēr , anabatin mēch , Satanayēn pʾortsowadz : kazannerow het ēr , ew hreshtagnerĕ gĕ sbasargēin iren .
41001014	Yovhannēsi matnowelēn etkʾ Yisows , Kalilea kalov , Astowdzoy arkʾayowtʾean awetaranĕ gĕ kʾarozēr
41001015	ow g!ĕsēr : « ZHamanagĕ lratsʾadz ē , ew Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ mōtetsʾadz ē : abashkharetsʾēkʾ , ow hawatatsʾēkʾ awetaranin » .
41001016	Erp Kalileayi dzovown ezerkʾĕ gĕ kʾalēr , tesaw Simonĕ ew Simoni eghpayrĕ , Antrēasĕ , dzovĕ owṛgan netadz , orovhetew tsgnors ēin .
41001017	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Egēkʾ im etewēs , ow martotsʾ orsort biti ĕnem tsez » .
41001018	Anonkʾ al isgoyn tʾoghowtsʾin irentsʾ owṛgannerĕ ew hetewetsʾan anor .
41001019	Angē kʾichʾ mĕ yaṛach ertʾalov , tesaw Zepetean Yagoposn ow anor eghpayrĕ , Yovhannēsĕ , oronkʾ nawown mēch gĕ gargtnēin irentsʾ owṛgannerĕ .
41001020	Isgoyn ganchʾetsʾ zanonkʾ : anonkʾ al katsʾin anor etewēn , nawown mēch tskelov irentsʾ hayrĕ , Zepetēosĕ vartsgannerown het .
41001021	Mtan Gapʾaṛnayowm , ew isgoyn SHapatʾ ōrĕ zhoghovaranĕ mtnelov , gĕ sorvetsʾnēr .
41001022	Anonkʾ g!abshēin anor owsowtsʾowmin vray , orovhetew anontsʾ gĕ sorvetsʾnēr ishkhanowtʾiwn ownetsʾoghi mĕ bēs , ochʾ tʾē tbirnerown bēs .
41001023	Anontsʾ zhoghovaranin mēch mart mĕ gar , anmakʾowr okiov . An aghaghagetsʾ :
41001024	« Tʾogh mez : town inchʾ ownis mezi het , Yisows Nazovretsʾi : mitʾē mez gorsntsʾnelow egar . Kitem tʾē ov es , Astowdzoy Sowrpĕ » .
41001025	Yisows zayn sastetsʾ , ĕselov : « Babantsē ow elir atgē » .
41001026	Anmakʾowr okin sastig tsʾntsʾetsʾ zayn , partsratsayn aghaghagetsʾ ew elaw angē .
41001027	Polorĕ aylayletsʾan , aynkʾan , or gĕ hartsʾnēin irarow : « Ays inchʾ ē : inchʾ nor owsowtsʾowm ē asiga , orovhetew anmakʾowr okinerown al gĕ hramayē ishkhanowtʾeamp , ow gĕ hnazantin iren » .
41001028	Ew isgoyn ir hampawĕ taradzowetsʾaw Kalileayi ampoghch shrchagaykʾĕ .
41001029	Isgoyn zhoghovaranēn ellelov , Yagoposi ow Yovhannēsi het mtaw Simoni ew Antrēasi townĕ .
41001030	Simoni zokʾanchʾĕ baṛgadz ēr , tentov hiwantatsʾadz : isgoyn anor masin ĕsin iren .
41001031	Yisows mōtetsʾaw , pṛnetsʾ anor tseṛkʾēn ow otkʾi hanetsʾ zayn : isgoyn tentĕ tʾoghowtsʾ zayn , ew gĕ sbasargēr anontsʾ .
41001032	Erp irigown eghaw , arewin mayr mtadz atenĕ , polor akhtawornern ow tiwaharnerĕ iren gĕ perēin .
41001033	Ampoghch kʾaghakʾĕ towṛĕ hawakʾowadz ēr .
41001034	SHat hiwantner , zanazan akhterē pow zhetsʾ , ew shat tewer towrs hanetsʾ . Tewerown tʾoyl chʾēr tar or khōsin , orovhetew gĕ janchʾnayin zinkʾ .
41001035	Aṛtown , arshaloysēn shat aṛach , ganknetsʾaw , towrs elaw , knatsʾ amayi tegh mĕ , ow hon aghōtʾetsʾ .
41001036	Simon ew iren het eghoghnerĕ hetabntetsʾin zayn .
41001037	Erp ktan zayn , ĕsin anor : « Polorĕ gĕ pʾntṛen kʾez » .
41001038	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Egēkʾ ertʾankʾ mertsagay kiwghakʾaghakʾnerĕ , orbēszi hon al kʾarozem , orovhetew egadz em ays nbatagov » .
41001039	Ew anontsʾ zhoghovarannerown mēch gĕ kʾarozēr , ampoghch Kalileayi mēch , ow tewer gĕ hanēr .
41001040	Porot mĕn al egaw : g!aghachʾēr , gĕ dznratrēr ow g!ĕsēr anor : « Etʾē owzes , grnas zis makʾrel » .
41001041	Yisows ktʾalov , ergaretsʾ tseṛkʾĕ , tbaw anor ew ĕsaw : « G!owzem , makʾrowē » .
41001042	Erp asiga ĕsaw anor , isgoyn porotowtʾiwnĕ knatsʾ angē , ow makʾrowetsʾaw .
41001043	Isg inkʾ aztararetsʾ anor ew isgoyn owghargetsʾ , ĕselov anor :
41001044	« Zkowshatsʾir or ochʾ mēgown pan mĕ ĕses : haba kna , tsʾoytsʾ towr kʾez kʾahanayin , ow matowtsʾanē kʾow makʾrowelowt ĕndzan , or Movsēs batowiretsʾ , ipr vgayowtʾiwn anontsʾ » .
41001045	Paytsʾ an towrs ellelov , sgsaw shat hrabaragel ew panĕ taradzel , aynbēs or al inkʾ chʾēr grnar patsʾayaytōrēn kʾaghakʾ mĕ mtnel , haba towrsĕ , amayi tegher ēr : sagayn amēn goghmē gow kayin iren .
41002001	Tartseal Gapʾaṛnayowm mtaw kʾani mĕ ōr etkʾ , ew lsowetsʾaw tʾē an tan mĕ mēch ē .
41002002	Isgoyn shat martig hawakʾowetsʾan , aynkʾan , or al tegh chʾgar , ochʾ isg tran showrch , ow gĕ kʾarozēr anontsʾ Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ .
41002003	Martig egan iren , perelov chʾors hokiov pʾokhatrowadz antamaloydz mĕ :
41002004	paytsʾ tesnelov or pazmowtʾenēn chʾēin grnar mōtenal anor , kʾagetsʾin tan tanikʾĕ , owr gĕ ktnowēr Yisows , ow dzag mĕ panalov , var ichetsʾowtsʾin mahijĕ , orown vray baṛgadz ēr antamaloydzĕ .
41002005	Yisows tesnelov anontsʾ hawatkʾĕ , ĕsaw antamaloydzin : « Orteag , meghkʾert nerowadz en kʾezi » .
41002006	Kʾani mĕ tbirner , or hon nstadz ēin , irentsʾ sirterown mēch gĕ mtadzēin :
41002007	« Inchʾow ays martĕ g!ĕsē aysbisi hayhoyowtʾiwnner : ov grnay meghkʾerĕ nerel , patsʾi Astowdzmē , , » .
41002008	Yisows isgoyn ĕmpṛnelov ir hokiin mēch , or anonkʾ aytbēs gĕ mtadzen irenkʾ irentsʾ mēch , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾow aytbēs gĕ mtadzēkʾ tser sirterown mēch .
41002009	Orĕ aweli tiwrin ē , “ meghkʾert nerowadz en kʾezi ” ĕselĕ antamaloydzin , tʾē , “ otkʾi elir , aṛ mahijt ow kʾalē ” ĕselĕ .
41002010	Paytsʾ orbēszi kitnakʾ tʾē martow Ortin ishkhanowtʾiwn owni ergri vray meghkʾerĕ nerelow , ( ĕsaw antamaloydzin : )
41002011	“ Kʾezi g!ĕsem : " Otkʾi elir , aṛ mahijt ow kna townt " ” » .
41002012	An al isgoyn otkʾi elaw , ew aṛnelov ir mahijĕ , towrs elaw polorin aṛchewēn , aynbēs or polorĕ zmayletsʾan , pʾaṛapanetsʾin Astowadz ow ĕsin : « Aysbisi pan amenewin tesadz chʾēinkʾ » .
41002013	Tartseal knatsʾ dzovezerkʾ . Ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ iren gow kar , ew anontsʾ gĕ sorvetsʾnēr .
41002014	Erp g!antsʾnēr , tesaw GHewi Alpʾēoseanĕ , or makʾs ĕntownelow teghĕ nstadz ēr , ew ĕsaw anor : « Hetewē indzi » . An al ganknetsʾaw ow hetewetsʾaw iren .
41002015	Erp seghan nstadz , , ēr anor tan mēch , shat makʾsaworner ow meghaworner al seghan nstadz ēin Yisowsi ew anor ashagertnerown het : orovhetew shater gĕ hetewēin anor .
41002016	Erp tbirnern ow Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ tesan tʾē an g!owtē makʾsawornerow ew meghawornerow het , ĕsin anor ashagertnerown : « Inchʾow g!owtē ow gĕ khmē makʾsawornerow ew meghawornerow het » .
41002017	Erp Yisows lsetsʾ , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ochʾ tʾē aṛoghchnerown p zhishg bētkʾ ē , haba , hiwantnerown . Es egay ochʾ tʾē artarnerĕ ganchʾelow , haba , meghawornerĕ » .
41002018	Yovhannēsi ow Pʾarisetsʾinerown ashagertnerĕ dzom gĕ bahēin . Owsti egan ew ĕsin anor : « Inchʾow Yovhannēsi ow Pʾarisetsʾinerown ashagertnerĕ dzom gĕ bahen , paytsʾ kʾow ashagertnert dzom chʾen baher » .
41002019	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Mitʾē gareli ē , or harsnewornerĕ dzom bahen , minchʾ pʾesan irentsʾ het ē . Aynkʾan aten or pʾesan irentsʾ het ē , gareli chʾē or dzom bahen .
41002020	Paytsʾ ōrerĕ biti kan , erp pʾesan biti vertsʾowi irentsʾmē : aba ayt ōrĕ dzom biti bahen .
41002021	Ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ garē nor latʾi gtor mĕ hin hantertsi vray : orovhetew ayt norĕ , or anor lrowtʾean hamar trowadz ē , gĕ kʾashē hinĕ , ow batṛowadzkʾĕ aweli kēsh g!ĕllay .
41002022	Ochʾ al mēgĕ gĕ tnē nor kinin hin tigerow mēch : kʾani or nor kinin gĕ batṛē tigerĕ , kinin gĕ tʾapʾi , ew tigerĕ gĕ gorsowin . Haba nor kinin trowelow ē nor tigerow mēch » .
41002023	SHapatʾ ōr mĕ inkʾ g!antsʾnēr arterow mēchēn , ew ir ashagertnerĕ , minchʾ g!ertʾayin , sgsan tsʾoreni hasger pʾrtsʾnel .
41002024	Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ ĕsin iren : « Nayē , inchʾ g!ĕnen SHapatʾ ōrĕ , or artōnowadz chʾē » .
41002025	Inkʾ al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Pnaw chʾēkʾ gartatsʾer Tawitʾi ĕradzĕ , erp bētkʾ ownetsʾaw ew anōtʾetsʾaw , inkʾ ow iren het eghoghnerĕ .
41002026	Inchʾbēs mtaw Astowdzoy townĕ , Apiatʾar kʾahanayabetin ōrov , ew geraw aṛachatrowtʾean hatsʾerĕ , - or ochʾ mēgown artōnowadz ēr owtel , patsʾi kʾahananerēn , - ow towaw iren het eghoghnerown » .
41002027	Ew aweltsʾowtsʾ : « SHapatʾĕ eghaw martown hamar , ochʾ tʾē martĕ , SHapatʾin hamar .
41002028	Hetewapar martow Ortin tērn ē naew SHapatʾin » .
41003001	Tartseal zhoghovaranĕ mtaw , owr mart mĕ gar , orown tseṛkʾĕ chʾortsʾadz ēr .
41003002	Anonkʾ gĕ hsgēin anor vray , tesnelow tʾē arteōkʾ biti pow zhē zayn SHapatʾ ōrĕ , orbēszi ampastanen zinkʾ .
41003003	Inkʾ al ĕsaw tseṛkʾĕ chʾortsʾadz martown : « Elir , gaynē mēchteghĕ » .
41003004	Yetoy ĕsaw anontsʾ : « SHapatʾ ōrĕ parikʾ ĕnel artōnowadz ē , tʾē chʾarikʾ ĕnel , ants mĕ pʾrgel , tʾē sbannel » . Anonkʾ lowṛ getsʾan .
41003005	Yisows pargowtʾeamp showrchĕ nayetsʾaw , anontsʾ vray , trtmelov anontsʾ sirtin gowrowtʾean hamar , aba ĕsaw ayt martown : « Ergarē tseṛkʾt » . An al ergaretsʾ , ew anor tseṛkʾĕ aṛoghchatsʾaw .
41003006	Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ , isgoyn towrs ellelov Herovtēseannerown het , khorhrtagtsʾetsʾan anor tēm , tʾē inchʾbēs gorsntsʾnen zayn .
41003007	Yisows ir ashagertnerown het megnetsʾaw dzovezerkʾĕ , ow medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ hetewetsʾaw anor , Kalileayēn ew Hrēastanēn ,
41003008	Erowsaghēmēn , Etovmēn ow Yortanani miws goghmēn : naew anonkʾ , or Tiwrosi ew Sitoni shrchagay tegherēn ēin , medz pazmowtʾeamp , erp lsetsʾin inchʾ or g!ĕnēr , egan iren .
41003009	Yisows ĕsaw ir ashagertnerown or nawag mĕ tramatrowi iren , pazmowtʾean batjaṛov , orbēszi chʾseghmen zinkʾ .
41003010	Orovhetew pow zhetsʾ shaterĕ , aynbēs or tanchankʾ ownetsʾoghner gĕ khṛnowēin showrchĕ , orbēszi tbchʾin iren .
41003011	Erp anmakʾowr okinerĕ tesnēin zinkʾ , g!iynayin ir aṛchew ow g!aghaghagēin :
41003012	« Town es Astowdzoy Ortin » . Isg inkʾ sastig gĕ hrahankēr anontsʾ , or chʾyaytnen zinkʾ .
41003013	Aba leṛĕ elaw ew iren ganchʾetsʾ ir owzadznerĕ , ow kʾovĕ katsʾin .
41003014	Ew ĕntretsʾ tasnergow hoki , orbēszi ĕllan iren het , ow ghrgē zanonkʾ , kʾarozelow ,
41003015	naew ishkhanowtʾiwn ownenalow , akhterĕ pow zhelow ew tewerĕ towrs hanelow hamar : -
41003016	Simonĕ , or Betros anowanetsʾ ,
41003017	Zepetean Yagoposn ow Yagoposi eghpayrĕ , Yovhannēsĕ , oronkʾ Panerekēs anowanetsʾ , or ĕsel ē : « Orotowmi ortiner » ,
41003018	Antrēasĕ , Pʾilibbosĕ , Partʾoghomēosĕ , Mattʾēosĕ , Tʾovmasĕ , Alpʾēosean Yagoposĕ , Tʾatēosĕ , Simon Gananatsʾin
41003019	ew Yowta Isgariovtatsʾin , or matnetsʾ zayn .
41003020	Town katsʾin , ow tartseal pazmowtʾiwnĕ hamakhmpowetsʾaw , aynbēs or chʾgrtsʾan noynisg hatsʾ owtel .
41003021	Erp irennerĕ lsetsʾin , katsʾin or pṛnen zinkʾ , kʾani or g!ĕsēin : « TSʾnoradz ē » .
41003022	Erowsaghēmēn ichadz tbirnern al g!ĕsēin : « Anor mēch Pēeghzepowgh gay , ew tewerown ishkhanov gĕ hanē tewerĕ » .
41003023	Yisows ganchʾelov zanonkʾ , aṛagnerov khōsetsʾaw anontsʾ : « Satanan inchʾbēs grnay towrs hanel Satanan .
41003024	Etʾē tʾakaworowtʾiwn mĕ pa zhnowi inkʾnir tēm , ayt tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ chʾi grnar genal .
41003025	Etʾē town mĕ pa zhnowi inkʾnir tēm , ayt townĕ chʾi grnar genal .
41003026	Etʾē Satanan ganknadz ow pa zhnowadz ē inkʾnir tēm , an chʾi grnar genal , haba anor vakhjanĕ hasadz ē .
41003027	Ochʾ mēgĕ grnay mtnel ow zhegh martow mĕ townĕ ew yapʾshtagel anor garasinerĕ , etʾē nakh chʾgabē ow zhegh martĕ , ew ayn aten goghobtē anor townĕ .
41003028	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Martotsʾ ortinerown biti nerowi amēn meghkʾ , naew hayhoyowtʾiwnnerĕ , orkʾan al hayhoyen .
41003029	Paytsʾ ov or hayhoyē Sowrp Hokiin tēm , yawitean nerowm biti chʾownenay , haba ar zhani biti ĕllay yawitenagan tatabartowtʾean ” » .
41003030	Orovhetew g!ĕsēin : « Anmakʾowr oki gay anor mēch » .
41003031	Yetoy anor mayrn ow eghpayrnerĕ egan , ew towrsĕ gaynelov , mart ghrgetsʾin ow ganchʾetsʾin zayn :
41003032	pazmowtʾiwnn al nstadz ēr anor showrchĕ . Erp ĕsin iren : « Aha kʾow mayrt ow eghpayrnert gĕ pʾntṛen kʾez towrsĕ » ,
41003033	an al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Ov ē im mayrs , gam oronkʾ en eghpayrners » .
41003034	Ew nayelov ir showrchĕ nstoghnerown , ĕsaw : « Aha mayrs ow eghpayrners :
41003035	orovhetew ov or gĕ kordzatrē Astowdzoy gamkʾĕ , aniga ē im eghpayrs , kʾoyrs ew mayrs » .
41004001	Tartseal sgsaw sorvetsʾnel dzovezerkʾĕ , ew medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ anor kʾov hawakʾowetsʾaw , aynbēs or inkʾ naw mtaw ow nstaw , dzovown vray : isg ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ tsʾamakʾn ēr , dzovezerkʾĕ .
41004002	SHat paner gĕ sorvetsʾnēr anontsʾ , aṛagnerov , ew g!ĕsēr anontsʾ ir owsowtsʾowmin mēch :
41004003	« Lsetsʾēkʾ , aha sermnatsʾan mĕ knatsʾ serm tsʾanelow .
41004004	Minchʾ gĕ tsʾanēr , kʾani mĕ sermer ingan jampayin ezerkʾĕ , ew tʾṛchʾownnerĕ egan ow lapʾetsʾin zanonkʾ .
41004005	Owrishner ingan zhayṛot tegh mĕ , owr shat hogh chʾgar , ew isgoyn powsan , hoghin khorowng chʾĕllalown hamar :
41004006	sagayn tōtʾagēz eghan erp arewĕ elaw , ow chʾortsʾan , kʾani or armat chʾownēin .
41004007	Owrishner al ingan pʾowsherow mēch : pʾowsherĕ partsratsʾan ew kheghtetsʾin zanonkʾ , ow btowgh chʾtowin .
41004008	Isg owrishner ingan law hoghi mēch , btowgh towin , partsranalov ew ajelov , ow perin , mēgĕ eresown , mēgĕ , vatʾsown , mēgĕ , hariwr » .
41004009	Ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « An or aganch owni lselow , tʾogh lsē » .
41004010	Erp aṛantsin ēr , ir showrchĕ eghoghnerĕ , tasnergowkʾin het hartsʾowtsʾin iren ays aṛagin masin .
41004011	Ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « TSezi trowadz ē kitnal Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean khorhowrtĕ , paytsʾ anontsʾ or towrsēn en , amēn inchʾ aṛeghdzowadz g!ĕllay :
41004012	orbēszi shat tesnen , paytsʾ chʾĕmpṛnen , shat lsen , paytsʾ chʾhasgnan , ow tartsi chʾkan ew irentsʾ meghkʾerĕ chʾnerowin » .
41004013	Aba ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ays aṛagĕ chʾēkʾ ĕmpṛner : owremn inchʾbēs biti hasgnakʾ polor aṛagnerĕ .
41004014	Sermnatsʾanĕ , khōskʾĕ gĕ tsʾanē .
41004015	Jampayin ezerkʾĕ eghoghnerĕ , owr khōskʾĕ gĕ tsʾanowi , anonkʾ en , or erp gĕ lsen , isgoyn Satanan gow kay ew gĕ vertsʾnē anontsʾ sirterown mēch tsʾanowadz khōskʾĕ .
41004016	Nmanabēs , zhayṛot tegherow vray tsʾanowadznerĕ anonkʾ en , or erp gĕ lsen khōskʾĕ , isgoyn g!ĕntownin zayn owrakhowtʾeamp .
41004017	Paytsʾ irentsʾ mēch armat chʾownenalov , kʾichʾ zhamanag gĕ togan : yetoy , erp taṛabankʾ gam haladzankʾ ĕllay khōskʾin batjaṛov , isgoyn gĕ kaytʾagghin .
41004018	Pʾowsherow mēch tsʾanowadznerĕ anonkʾ en , or khōskʾĕ gĕ lsen ,
41004019	paytsʾ ays ashkharhi hokerĕ , harstowtʾean khapēowtʾiwnĕ ew owrish panerow tsʾangowtʾiwnnerĕ ners mtnelov , gĕ kheghten khōskʾĕ , ow an g!ĕllay anbtowgh .
41004020	Isg law hoghi mēch tsʾanowadznerĕ anonkʾ en , or khōskʾĕ gĕ lsen , g!ĕntownin ew btowgh g!artatren , mēgĕ eresown , mēgĕ , vatʾsown , mēgĕ , hariwr » .
41004021	Yetoy ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Mitʾē jrakĕ krowanin gam mahijin tag trowelow hamar gow kay : arteōkʾ ashtanagin vray trowelow hamar chʾē .
41004022	Orovhetew chʾgay kaghtnikʾ mĕ , or patsʾayayt biti chʾĕllay , ew chʾē eghadz bahowadz pan mĕ , or erewan chʾellē .
41004023	Etʾē mēgĕ aganch owni lselow , tʾogh lsē » .
41004024	Aba ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Zkowshatsʾēkʾ tʾē inchʾ gĕ lsēkʾ : ayn chʾapʾov or towkʾ gĕ chʾapʾēkʾ , noyn chʾapʾov biti chʾapʾowi tsezi : ow tsezi or gĕ lsēkʾ , biti awelnay .
41004025	Orovhetew ov or owni , anor biti trowi : isg ov or chʾowni , ownetsʾadzn al angē biti aṛnowi » .
41004026	Naew g!ĕsēr : « Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ aynbēs ē , orbēs tʾē mart mĕ hoghin mēch hownt tsʾanē :
41004027	kʾnanay tʾē artʾnnay , kisher ow tsʾereg , howntĕ gĕ dzaghgi ew gĕ medznay , ow inkʾ chʾi kiter tʾē inchʾbēs .
41004028	Kʾani or hoghĕ inkʾnirmē btowgh g!artatrē : nakh , khotĕ , yetoy , hasgĕ , angē etkʾ , letsʾown tsʾorenĕ hasgin mēch .
41004029	Erp btowghĕ hasownnay , isgoyn mankaghĕ gĕ ghrgē , orovhetew howntskʾi atenĕ hasadz ē » .
41004030	Aba g!ĕsēr : « Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ inchʾ pani nmantsʾnenkʾ , gam inchʾ aṛagov patsʾatrenkʾ zayn .
41004031	Mananekhi hatigin nman ē , or hoghin mēch tsʾanowadz atenĕ , ergri vray eghadz sermerown amenēn bztign ē :
41004032	paytsʾ erp tsʾanowi , gĕ powsni , polor towngerēn al medz g!ĕllay ow medz jiwgher g!artsagē , aynbēs or erginkʾi tʾṛchʾownnerĕ grnan anor showkʾin tag pnagil » .
41004033	SHat aysbisi aṛagnerov gĕ kʾarozēr khōskʾĕ anontsʾ , aynkʾan , orkʾan grnayin mtig ĕnel .
41004034	Aṛantsʾ aṛagi chʾēr khōser anontsʾ , paytsʾ aṛantsin , ir ashagertnerown gĕ megnēr polorĕ .
41004035	Noyn ōrĕ , erp irigown g!ĕllar , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Egēkʾ dzovown miws ezerkʾĕ antsʾninkʾ » .
41004036	Anonkʾ al pazmowtʾiwnĕ artsagelov , aṛin zinkʾ , kʾani nawown mēch ēr : owrish nawagner al gayin anor het .
41004037	Ow hzōr pʾotʾorig mĕ eghaw ew alikʾnerĕ nawown vray gĕ khow zhēin , aynbēs or artēn gĕ letsʾowēr :
41004038	isg inkʾ , nawown etewi goghmĕ , partsi vray gĕ kʾnanar . Artʾntsʾowtsʾin zinkʾ ew ĕsin iren : « Vartabet , hok chʾes ĕner , or gĕ gorsowinkʾ » .
41004039	Owsti ellelov , sastetsʾ hovĕ ew ĕsaw dzovown : « Tatrē , lowṛ getsʾir » . Hovĕ tatretsʾaw , ow medz khaghaghowtʾiwn eghaw .
41004040	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾow aytbēs ergchʾot ēkʾ : inchʾbēs g!ĕllay , or hawatkʾ chʾownikʾ » .
41004041	Anonkʾ chʾapʾazantsʾ vakhtsʾan , ew g!ĕsēin irarow : « Arteōkʾ ov ē asiga , or noynisg hovn ow dzovĕ gĕ hnazantin iren » .
41005001	DZovown miws ezerkʾĕ egan , Kataratsʾinerown ergirĕ .
41005002	Erp inkʾ nawēn elaw , isgoyn kerezmannerēn eladz mart mĕ hantibetsʾaw iren , or anmakʾowr oki ownēr .
41005003	Anor pnagadz teghĕ kerezmannerown mēch ēr , ow shghtʾayov al ochʾ mēgĕ grnar gabel zayn :
41005004	orovhetew yajakh otnagaberov ew shghtʾanerov gabower ēr , paytsʾ shghtʾanerĕ gotrter ow otnagaberĕ pʾshrer ēr , ew ochʾ mēgĕ grnar nowajel zayn .
41005005	Amēn aten , kisher ow tsʾereg , kerezmannerown ew leṛnerown mēch , , g!aghaghagēr , ow ir marminĕ gĕ jeghkʾṛtēr kʾarerov .
41005006	Erp heṛowēn tesaw Yisowsĕ , vazetsʾ ow ergrbaketsʾ anor ,
41005007	ew partsratsayn aghaghagetsʾ : « Town inchʾ kordz ownis indzi het , Yisows , Amenapartsr Astowdzoy Orti : Astowdzmov g!ertmnetsʾnem kʾez , mi tancher zis » .
41005008	( Kʾani or g!ĕsēr anor : « Anmakʾowr oki , elir ayt martēn » . )
41005009	Hartsʾowtsʾ anor : « Inchʾ ē anownt » . An al bataskhanetsʾ : « Anowns Lekēon ē , orovhetew pazmatʾiw enkʾ » .
41005010	SHat g!aghachʾēin anor , or ayt ergrēn towrs chʾghrgē zirenkʾ .
41005011	Hon , leran mōt , khozerow medz eramag mĕ gar , or g!aradzēr .
41005012	Polor tewerĕ aghachʾetsʾin anor ew ĕsin : « Mez khozerown ghrgē , orbēszi anontsʾ mēch mtnenkʾ » .
41005013	Yisows isgoyn artōnetsʾ anontsʾ . Erp anmakʾowr okinerĕ towrs elan ow khozerown mēch mtan , eramagĕ kahavē zh teghēn dzovĕ vazetsʾ ( ergow hazari chʾapʾ gayin ) , ew dzovown mēch kheghtowetsʾan .
41005014	KHozaradznerĕ pʾakhan , ow batmetsʾin kʾaghakʾin ew arterown mēch , ow martig towrs elan , tesnelow tʾē inchʾ ēr batahadzĕ .
41005015	Egan Yisowsi kʾov , tesan lekēon ownetsʾogh tiwaharĕ , or nstadz ēr , hakowadz ew stʾapʾadz , ow vakhtsʾan .
41005016	Anonkʾ or teser ēin , batmetsʾin irentsʾ tʾē inchʾ batahetsʾaw tiwaharin , naew khozerown masin :
41005017	irenkʾ al sgsan aghachʾel anor , orbēszi irentsʾ hoghamasēn ertʾay .
41005018	Erp an naw mtaw , tiwaharĕ g!aghachʾēr anor , or ĕllay anor het .
41005019	Paytsʾ Yisows tʾoyl chʾtowaw anor , haba ĕsaw anor : « Kna townt , kʾowginnerowt kʾov , ow batmē anontsʾ amēn inchʾ or Tērĕ ĕraw kʾezi , ew inchʾbēs oghormetsʾaw kʾezi » .
41005020	An al knatsʾ , ew sgsaw Tegabolisi mēch hrabaragel amēn inchʾ or Yisows ĕraw iren : ow polorĕ gĕ zarmanayin .
41005021	Erp Yisows tartseal nawov antsʾaw dzovown miws ezerkʾĕ , medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ hawakʾowetsʾaw anor kʾov , ew inkʾ dzovezerkʾn ēr .
41005022	ZHoghovarani beterēn mēgĕ egaw , orown anownĕ Yayros ēr , ow erp tesaw zayn , ingaw anor otkʾĕ ,
41005023	shat aghachʾetsʾ anor ew ĕsaw : « Aghchigs meṛnelow mōt ē : egowr , tir tseṛkʾt anor vray , orbēszi pow zhowi , ow biti abri » .
41005024	An al knatsʾ anor het . Medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ iren gĕ hetewēr , ew gĕ seghmēr zinkʾ .
41005025	Gin mĕ , or ariwnahosowtʾiwn ownēr tasnergow tariē i ver ,
41005026	shat chʾarchʾarankʾ gradz ēr pazmatʾiw p zhishgnerē , ew ir ampoghch ownetsʾadzĕ dzakhsadz ēr paytsʾ pnaw chʾēr ōktowadz , ayl pʾokharēnĕ vijagĕ gĕ vattʾaranar .
41005027	Erp lsetsʾ Yisowsi masin , etewēn egaw , pazmowtʾean mēch , ow tbaw anor hantertsin :
41005028	kʾani or g!ĕsēr : « Etʾē miayn anor hantertsnerown tbchʾim , biti p zhshgowim » .
41005029	Isgoyn ir ariwnin aghpiwrĕ tsʾamkʾetsʾaw , ew ir marminin mēch kittsʾaw tʾē tanchankʾēn p zhshgowetsʾaw .
41005030	Yisows isgoyn kittsʾaw inkʾnir mēch tʾē zōrowtʾiwn mĕ elaw irmē towrs , tartsaw pazmowtʾean ow ĕsaw : « Ov tbaw im hantertsnerows » .
41005031	Ir ashagertnerĕ ĕsin iren : « Gĕ tesnes tʾē pazmowtʾiwnĕ gĕ seghmē kʾez , ew g!ĕses : “ Ov tbaw indzi ” » .
41005032	Ir showrchĕ gĕ nayēr , orbēszi tesnē ays panĕ ĕnoghĕ .
41005033	Ginĕ vakhtsʾaw ow toghatsʾ , orovhetew kitēr tʾē inchʾ batahetsʾaw iren : egaw , ingaw anor aṛchew , ew batmetsʾ anor ampoghch jshmartowtʾiwnĕ .
41005034	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Aghchig , hawatkʾt p zhshgetsʾ kʾez : kna khaghaghowtʾeamp , ow p zhshgowadz eghir kʾow tanchankʾēt » .
41005035	Erp inkʾ teṛ gĕ khōsēr , zhoghovarani betin townēn omankʾ egan ew ĕsin : « Aghchigt meṛaw , al inchʾow g!anhankstatsʾnes vartabetĕ » .
41005036	Isg Yisows , erp lsetsʾ ĕsowadz khōskʾĕ , isgoyn ĕsaw zhoghovarani betin : « Mi vakhnar , miayn hawata » .
41005037	Ow ochʾ mēgown tʾoyl towaw or iren owghegtsʾi , paytsʾ miayn Betrosi , Yagoposi ew Yagoposi eghpōr , Yovhannēsi .
41005038	ZHoghovarani betin townĕ hasnelov , nshmaretsʾ aghmowgĕ , naew anonkʾ , or shat gow layin ow gĕ hedzedzēin .
41005039	Ners mtnelov , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾow irar antsʾadz ēkʾ ew gow lakʾ : manowgĕ meṛadz chʾē , haba gĕ kʾnanay » .
41005040	Anonkʾ al zinkʾ dzaghretsʾin : paytsʾ inkʾ polorĕ towrs hanelov , iren het aṛaw manowgin hayrn ow mayrĕ , ew iren het eghoghnerĕ , ow mtaw hon , owr manowgĕ baṛgadz ēr .
41005041	Manowgin tseṛkʾēn pṛnelov , ĕsaw anor : « Talitʾa , gowmi » , or gĕ tʾarkmanowi : « Aghchig , ( kʾezi g!ĕsem , ) otkʾi elir » .
41005042	Isgoyn aghchigĕ ganknetsʾaw ew kʾaletsʾ , orovhetew tasnergow taregan ēr : ow tesnoghnerĕ hiatsʾowmēn zmayletsʾan .
41005043	Yisows sastig batowiretsʾ anontsʾ , or ochʾ mēgĕ kitnay ays panĕ , ew ĕsaw , or owtelikʾ tan anor .
41006001	Angē megnelov , knatsʾ ir pnakawaṛĕ , ew ir ashagertnerĕ hetewetsʾan anor .
41006002	Erp SHapatʾ ōrĕ hasaw , sgsaw zhoghovaranin mēch sorvetsʾnel . SHater lselov g!abshēin ow g!ĕsēin : « Asiga owrgē owni ays panerĕ : ays inchʾ imastowtʾiwn ē , iren trowadz , or aysbisi hrashkʾner gĕ kordzowin ir tseṛkʾov .
41006003	Asiga hiwsnĕ chʾē , Mariami ortin , ew Yagoposi , Yovsēsi , Yowtayi ow Simoni eghpayrĕ : ew ir kʾoyrerĕ hos , mer kʾov chʾen » . Owsti anor batjaṛov gĕ kaytʾagghēin .
41006004	Sagayn Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Markarē mĕ aṛantsʾ batiwi chʾē , patsʾi ir pnakawaṛin , ir azkagannerown ew ir tan mēch » .
41006005	Hon chʾēr grnar hrashkʾ kordzel : paytsʾ miayn kʾani mĕ hiwanti vray tseṛkʾ traw ow pow zhetsʾ zanonkʾ .
41006006	Ew anontsʾ anhawatowtʾean vray gĕ zarmanar , ow shrchagay kiwgherĕ ertʾalov , gĕ sorvetsʾnēr .
41006007	Iren ganchʾelov tasnergowkʾĕ , ergow-ergow ghrgetsʾ zanonkʾ , ew ishkhanowtʾiwn towaw anontsʾ , anmakʾowr okinerown vray .
41006008	Batowiretsʾ anontsʾ , or ochʾinchʾ aṛnen jamportowtʾean hamar , paytsʾ miayn kawazan mĕ : ochʾ barg , ochʾ hatsʾ , ochʾ tram , kōtinerown mēch ,
41006009	haba hoghatʾapʾ haknin . Ow ĕsaw : « Grgin pajgon mi haknikʾ » ,
41006010	ew aweltsʾowtsʾ : « Or townĕ or mtnēkʾ , hon mnatsʾēkʾ , minchʾew or angē megnikʾ .
41006011	Isg anonkʾ or chʾen ĕntownir tsez ow mtig chʾen ĕner tsezi , erp angē megnikʾ , tʾōtʾowetsʾēkʾ tser otkʾerown nerkʾewi pʾoshin , ipr vgayowtʾiwn anontsʾ . Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Sotomatsʾinerown ew Komoratsʾinerown aweli tiwrin biti ĕllay tatastanin ōrĕ , kʾan ayt kʾaghakʾin ” , , » .
41006012	Anonkʾ al megnelov , gĕ kʾarozēin , or martig abashkharen .
41006013	SHat tewer towrs gĕ hanēin , shat hiwantner iwghov g!ōdzēin ow zanonkʾ gĕ pow zhēin .
41006014	Erp Herovtēs tʾakaworĕ lsetsʾ , ( kʾani or anor anownĕ yaytni eghaw , ) ĕsaw : « Yovhannēs Mgrtichʾ meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛadz ē : owsti hrashkʾner gĕ kordzowin anov » .
41006015	Owrishner g!ĕsēin : « Eghian ē » , owrishner al g!ĕsēin : « Markarē mĕn ē , gam markarēnerēn mēgown bēs » .
41006016	Paytsʾ erp Herovtēs lsetsʾ , ĕsaw : « Asiga Yovhannēsn ē , or es klkhatetsʾi : meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛadz ē » .
