41006017	Artarew Herovtēs , inkʾ mart ghrgelov pṛner ēr Yovhannēsĕ , ow gabelov pantĕ trer ēr , ir eghpōr , Pʾilibbosi gnoch , Herovtiayi batjaṛov , kʾani or anor het amowsnatsʾadz ēr :
41006018	orovhetew Yovhannēs g!ĕsēr Herovtēsi : « Kʾezi artōnowadz chʾē eghpōrt ginĕ aṛnel » .
41006019	Herovtia okh ownēr anor tēm ew g!owzēr zayn sbannel , paytsʾ chʾēr grnar :
41006020	orovhetew Herovtēs gĕ vakhnar Yovhannēsē , kitnalov tʾē an artar ow sowrp mart mĕn ē , ew gĕ titēr zayn . Angē lselov , shat paner g!ĕnēr , ow hajoykʾov anor mtig g!ĕnēr .
41006021	Bateh ōr mĕ egaw , erp Herovtēs ir dznownti taretartsin aṛitʾov ĕntʾrikʾ mĕ sarkʾadz ēr ir medzamedznerown , hazarabetnerown ew Kalileayi klkhawornerown .
41006022	Herovtiayi aghchigĕ , hantēsin srahĕ mtnelov , baretsʾ , ow hajetsʾowtsʾ Herovtēsĕ ew iren het seghan nstoghnerĕ . Tʾakaworĕ ĕsaw aghchigin : « KHntrē intsmē inchʾ or g!owzes , ow biti tam kʾezi » .
41006023	Ew anor ertowm ĕraw , ĕselov : « Inchʾ or khntres intsmē , biti tam kʾezi , minchʾew tʾakaworowtʾeans gēsĕ » .
41006024	An towrs ellelov , hartsʾowtsʾ ir mōr : « Inchʾ owzem » . An al ĕsaw : « Yovhannēs Mgrtichʾin klowkhĕ » .
41006025	Isgoyn pʾowtʾalov tʾakaworin kʾov mtaw ow khntretsʾ , ĕselov : « G!owzem or anyabagh , apʾsēi mĕ vray , Yovhannēs Mgrtichʾin klowkhĕ tas indzi » .
41006026	Tʾakaworĕ chʾapʾazantsʾ trtmetsʾaw : paytsʾ ertowmnerown ew iren het seghan nstoghnerown batjaṛov , chʾowzetsʾ mer zhel anor khntrankʾĕ , , .
41006027	Owsti tʾakaworĕ isgoyn tahij mĕ ghrgetsʾ , ow hramayetsʾ perel anor klowkhĕ . An al knatsʾ , pantin mēch klkhatetsʾ zayn ,
41006028	apʾsēi mĕ vray peraw anor klowkhĕ ew towaw aghchigin : aghchign al towaw zayn ir mōr .
41006029	Erp anor ashagertnerĕ lsetsʾin , egan , vertsʾowtsʾin anor marminĕ ew trin kerezmani mĕ mēch .
41006030	Aṛakʾealnerĕ hawakʾowetsʾan Yisowsi kʾov ow batmetsʾin anor amēn pan , tʾē inchʾ or ĕrin , tʾē inchʾ or sorvetsʾowtsʾin .
41006031	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Towkʾ aṛantsin egēkʾ amayi tegh mĕ , ew hankchʾetsʾēkʾ kʾichʾ mĕ » : kʾani or shater gow kayin ow g!ertʾayin , ew hatsʾ owtelow isg zhamanag chʾēin tsker .
41006032	Owsti nawov amayi tegh mĕ katsʾin , aṛantsin .
41006033	Pazmowtʾiwnĕ tesaw zanonkʾ , or g!ertʾayin . SHater janchʾtsʾan zayn , ow otkʾov , polor kʾaghakʾnerēn hon vazetsʾin , ew anontsʾmē aṛach hasnelov , anor kʾov hamakhmpowetsʾan .
41006034	Yisows , erp towrs elaw , medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ tesnelov , ktʾatsʾ anontsʾ vray , orovhetew hoviw chʾownetsʾogh ochʾkharnerow bēs ēin : ow shat paner sorvetsʾowtsʾ anontsʾ .
41006035	Erp shat zhamer antsʾan , ir ashagertnerĕ egan iren ew ĕsin : « Hos amayi tegh mĕn ē , ow zhamanagĕ artēn shat owsh ē .
41006036	Artsagē zhoghovowrtĕ , orbēszi ertʾan shrchagay artern ow kiwgherĕ ew irentsʾ hatsʾ knen , orovhetew ochʾinchʾ ownin owtelow » .
41006037	Paytsʾ inkʾ bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Towkʾ towēkʾ atontsʾ , or owten » . Ĕsin iren : « Ertʾankʾ knenkʾ ergow hariwr tahegani hatsʾ ow tankʾ atontsʾ , or owten » .
41006038	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Kʾani nganag ownikʾ : katsʾēkʾ , nayetsʾēkʾ » . Erp kittsʾan , ĕsin : « Hink , ew ergow tsowg » .
41006039	Hramayetsʾ anontsʾ , or polorĕ ganachʾ khotin vray , khowmp-khowmp nstetsʾnen :
41006040	ow nstan , hariwragan ew yisownagan sharkʾerov .
41006041	Hink nganagnern ow ergow tsowgerĕ aṛaw , tēbi erginkʾ nayelov , ōrhnetsʾ , manretsʾ nganagnerĕ ew towaw ir ashagertnerown , orbēszi hramtsʾnen anontsʾ : ergow tsowgern al pa zhnetsʾ polorin .
41006042	Polorĕ geran , gshtatsʾan ,
41006043	ew vertsʾnelov pegornern ow tsowgerĕ , tasnergow goghov letsʾowtsʾin .
41006044	Ayt nganagnerēn owtoghnerĕ , hink hazari chʾapʾ ayr martig ēin .
41006045	Isgoyn ir ashagertnerĕ hargatretsʾ , or naw mtnen , ow irmē aṛach antsʾnin miws ezerkʾĕ , Petʾsayita , minchʾ inkʾ g!artsagēr pazmowtʾiwnĕ .
41006046	Ew anontsʾmē hra zhesht aṛnelē etkʾ , leṛĕ knatsʾ aghōtʾelow .
41006047	Erp irigown eghaw , nawĕ dzovown mēchteghn ēr , isg inkʾ tsʾamakʾin vray ēr , minag .
41006048	Tesaw zanonkʾ , or gĕ tanchowēin tʾi varelov , orovhetew hovĕ irentsʾ hagaṛag ēr . Kisherowan chʾorrort bahown atennerĕ , dzovown vray kʾalelov knatsʾ anontsʾ , ew g!owzēr antsʾnil anontsʾ kʾovēn .
41006049	Erp anonkʾ tesan , or dzovown vray gĕ kʾalēr , gardzetsʾin tʾē achʾkʾi erewoytʾ mĕn ē : owsti aghaghagetsʾin ,
41006050	kʾani or polorn al tesan zayn ow vrtovetsʾan . Ew inkʾ isgoyn khōsetsʾaw anontsʾ het ow ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Kʾachalerowetsʾēkʾ , es em , mi vakhnakʾ » .
41006051	Ew naw elaw anontsʾ kʾov , ow hovĕ tatretsʾaw . Anonkʾ irenkʾ irentsʾ mēch chʾapʾazantsʾ zmayladz ēin ew gĕ zarmanayin ,
41006052	orovhetew nganagnerown hrashkʾn isg chʾēin ngatadz , kʾani irentsʾ sirtĕ tʾmradz ēr .
41006053	Miws goghmĕ antsʾnelov , hasan Kennesarētʾi ergirĕ , ow nawĕ teghaworetsʾin .
41006054	Erp nawēn elan , ayt teghi martigĕ isgoyn janchʾtsʾan zayn ,
41006055	ew ampoghch shrchagaykʾĕ hos-hon vazelov , sgsan mahijnerov akhtaworner perel hon , owr gĕ lsēin tʾē gĕ ktnowēr .
41006056	Owr or mtnēr , kiwgherĕ , kʾaghakʾnerĕ gam arterĕ , hrabaragnerown vray gĕ tnēin hiwantnerĕ , ow g!aghachʾēin iren , or konē ir hantertsin kʾghantsʾkʾin tbchʾin . Ew anonkʾ or tban , p zhshgowetsʾan .
41007001	Pʾarisetsʾinerēn ow tbirnerēn omankʾ , or egadz ēin Erowsaghēmēn , ir kʾov hawakʾowetsʾan .
41007002	Erp tesan tʾē anor ashagertnerēn omankʾ , bighdz , aysinkʾn , anloway tseṛkʾerov hatsʾ g!owten , meghatretsʾin :
41007003	orovhetew Pʾarisetsʾinern ow polor Hreanerĕ hatsʾ chʾen owter , minchʾew or law mĕ lowan irentsʾ tseṛkʾerĕ , kʾani or nakhnikʾnerown awantowtʾiwnĕ gĕ bahen .
41007004	SHowgayēn egadz aten etʾē chʾlowatsʾowin , chʾen owter . Asontsʾ nman shat paner gan , oronkʾ ĕntownadz en ow gĕ bahen , inchʾbēs , kawatʾnerow , pʾarchʾerow , bghintsē anōtʾnerow ew seghannerow lowatsʾowmĕ .
41007005	Hetewapar Pʾarisetsʾinern ow tbirnerĕ hartsʾowtsʾin anor : « Inchʾow kʾow ashagertnert nakhnikʾnerown awantowtʾean hamatsayn chʾen shar zhir , ew anloway tseṛkʾerov hatsʾ g!owten » .
41007006	Inkʾ al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Esayi jisht markarēatsʾaw tser masin , geghdzaworner , inchʾbēs krowadz ē : “ Ays zhoghovowrtĕ miayn shrtʾownkʾov gĕ batowē zis , paytsʾ irentsʾ sirtĕ heṛow ē intsmē :
41007007	ow barab teghĕ gĕ bashten zis , martotsʾ batowērnerĕ ipr vartabetowtʾiwn sorvetsʾnelov ” .
41007008	Orovhetew Astowdzoy batowiranĕ tskelov , martotsʾ awantowtʾiwnĕ gĕ bahēkʾ , inchʾbēs , pʾarchʾerow ew kawatʾnerow lowatsʾowmĕ , ow asontsʾ nman shat owrish paner g!ĕnēkʾ » .
41007009	Ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Law g!anarkēkʾ Astowdzoy batowiranĕ , orbēszi tser awantowtʾiwnĕ bahēkʾ .
41007010	Kʾani or Movsēs ĕsaw : “ Batowē hayrt ow mayrt : ew ov or anidzē ir hayrĕ gam mayrĕ , mahov tʾogh vakhjani ” .
41007011	Paytsʾ towkʾ g!ĕsēkʾ : “ Etʾē mēgĕ ir hōr gam mōr ĕsē : " Inchʾ ōkowt or intsmē biti stanas , Astowdzoy talikʾ gorpan ē " , ( or gĕ nshanagē , ĕndzay , ) an azat g!ĕllay ” ,
41007012	ew al tʾoyl chʾēkʾ tar anor , pan mĕ ĕnel ir hōr gam mōr .
41007013	Anvawer gĕ tartsnēkʾ Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ , tser pʾokhantsʾadz awantowtʾeamp , ow shat owrish paner g!ĕnēkʾ , asor nman » .
41007014	Ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ iren ganchʾelov , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Polort al mtig ĕrēkʾ indzi , ow hasgtsʾēkʾ .
41007015	Ochʾinchʾ gay , or towrsēn mtnē martown mēch ow garogh ĕllay bghdzel zayn : haba inchʾ or towrs g!ellē angē , aniga ē or gĕ bghdzē martĕ .
41007016	Ov or aganch owni lselow , tʾogh lsē » .
41007017	Erp inkʾ , zatowelov ayt pazmowtʾenēn , town mtaw , ir ashagertnerĕ hartsʾowtsʾin iren ayt aṛagin masin .
41007018	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Towkʾ al aytbēs ankhelkʾ ēkʾ : chʾēkʾ ĕmpṛner tʾē amēn inchʾ , or towrsēn gĕ mtnē martown mēch , chʾi grnar bghdzel zayn ,
41007019	orovhetew ochʾ tʾē anor sirtin mēch gĕ mtnē , haba pʾorĕ , ew artakʾnotsʾĕ towrs g!ellē : owsti polor geragowrnerĕ makʾowr en , , » .
41007020	Naew ĕsaw : « Inchʾ or g!ellē martown nersēn , aniga gĕ bghdzē martĕ .
41007021	Orovhetew nersēn , martotsʾ sirtēn , g!ellen chʾar mtadzowmner , shnowtʾiwnner , boṛngowtʾiwnner , sbanowtʾiwnner ,
41007022	koghowtʾiwnner , akahowtʾiwnner , chʾarowtʾiwnner , nenkowtʾiwn , tsʾopʾowtʾiwn , chʾar achʾkʾ , hayhoyowtʾiwn , ampartawanowtʾiwn , anmtowtʾiwn .
41007023	Ays polor chʾar panerĕ nersēn g!ellen ow gĕ bghdzen martĕ » .
41007024	Ganknelov , angē knatsʾ Tiwrosi ew Sitoni hoghamaserĕ , ow town mĕ mtnelov , g!owzēr or ochʾ mēgĕ kitnay : paytsʾ chʾgrtsʾaw tʾakʾown mnal .
41007025	Orovhetew gin mĕ , orown aghchigĕ anmakʾowr oki ownēr ir mēch , lsetsʾ anor masin , egaw ew ingaw anor otkʾĕ .
41007026	Ayt ginĕ hetʾanos ēr , pʾiwnig-asori tsʾeghēn , ow gĕ tʾakhantsēr anor , or hanē tewĕ ir aghchigēn .
41007027	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Tʾoyl towr , or nakh zawagnerĕ gshtanan , kʾani or law chʾē aṛnel zawagnerown hatsʾĕ ew netel shownerown » .
41007028	An al bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Ayo , Tēr : sagayn shownern al , seghanin nerkʾew , gĕ geragrowin zawagnerown pʾshrankʾnerēn » .
41007029	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Ayt khōskʾit hamar , kna , tewĕ towrs elaw aghchigēt » .
41007030	Ginĕ ir townĕ ertʾalov , ktaw or tewĕ eladz ēr , isg aghchigĕ , baṛgadz mahijin vray .
41007031	Tartseal Tiwrosi ew Sitoni hoghamaserēn megnelov , knatsʾ Kalileayi dzovezerkʾĕ , Tegabolisi hoghamasin mēchēn .
41007032	Mēgĕ perin anor aṛchew , khowl ow t zhowarakhōs , ew g!aghachʾēin , or tseṛkʾ tnē anor vray .
41007033	Pazmowtʾenēn mēgti aṛnelov zayn , ir matnerĕ mkhetsʾ anor aganchnerown mēch ow tʾkʾnetsʾ , ew tbaw anor lezowin :
41007034	aba erginkʾ nayelov , haṛachʾetsʾ ow ĕsaw anor : « Epʾpʾatʾa » , ( or ĕsel ē , patsʾowē : )
41007035	isgoyn patsʾowetsʾan anor aganchnerĕ ew kʾagowetsʾaw anor lezowin gabĕ , ow shitag gĕ khōsēr .
41007036	Batowiretsʾ anontsʾ , or ochʾ mēgown ĕsen : sagayn inkʾ orkʾan gĕ batowirēr anontsʾ , anonkʾ al aweli gĕ hrabaragēin .
41007037	CHʾapʾazantsʾ g!abshēin ow g!ĕsēin : « An amēn inchʾ law g!ĕnē : khowlerown lsel gow tay , ew hamrerown , khōsil » .
41008001	Ayt ōrerĕ , pazmowtʾiwnĕ yoy zh shat ĕllalov ew owtelow ochʾinchʾ ownenalov , Yisows iren ganchʾetsʾ ir ashagertnerĕ ow ĕsaw anontsʾ :
41008002	« Gĕ ktʾam ayt pazmowtʾean vray , orovhetew artēn erekʾ ōr ē , or kʾovs en , ew ochʾinchʾ ownin owtelow .
41008003	Etʾē anōtʾi owghargem zanonkʾ irentsʾ townerĕ , biti bartasin jampan , orovhetew atontsʾmē omankʾ heṛawor teghē egadz en » .
41008004	Ir ashagertnerĕ bataskhanetsʾin iren : « Ays anabatin mēch owrgē grnay mēgĕ hatsʾov gshtatsʾnel atonkʾ » .
41008005	Hartsʾowtsʾ anontsʾ : « Kʾani nganag ownikʾ » . Anonkʾ ĕsin : « Eōtʾĕ » .
41008006	Hramayetsʾ pazmowtʾean , or nsti ketinin vray : ew aṛaw eōtʾĕ nganagnerĕ , shnorhagal eghaw , gtretsʾ ow towaw ashagertnerown , orbēszi hramtsʾnen pazmowtʾean : ew hramtsʾowtsʾin .
41008007	Kʾani mĕ manr tsowg al ownēin . ōrhnetsʾ ow ĕsaw , or zanonkʾ al hramtsʾnen anontsʾ .
41008008	Geran , gshtatsʾan , ew aweltsʾadz pegornerēn eōtʾĕ zampiwgh vertsʾowtsʾin .
41008009	Owtoghnerĕ chʾors hazari chʾapʾ ēin . Artsagetsʾ zanonkʾ ,
41008010	ew isgoyn naw mtnelov , ashagertnerown het knatsʾ Taghmanowtʾayi goghmerĕ .
41008011	Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ ellelov , sgsan anor het vijapanil , ow zayn pʾortselov , gĕ khntrēin irmē nshan mĕ erginkʾēn .
41008012	An al ir hokiin mēch haṛachʾelov , ĕsaw : « Inchʾow ays serowntĕ nshan gĕ khntrē . Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē ays serowntin nshan biti chʾtrowi » .
41008013	Ew zanonkʾ tʾoghowtsʾ , tartseal naw mtaw ow knatsʾ dzovown miws ezerkʾĕ .
41008014	Hatsʾ aṛnel moṛtsʾadz ēin : paytsʾ nawown mēch irentsʾ het miayn mēg nganag ownēin .
41008015	Batowiretsʾ anontsʾ ow ĕsaw : « Owshatir eghēkʾ , zkowshatsʾēkʾ Pʾarisetsʾinerow khmorēn ow Herovtēsi khmorēn » .
41008016	Isg anonkʾ irarow het gĕ mtadzēin ew g!ĕsēin : « Orovhetew hatsʾ chʾowninkʾ » .
41008017	Yisows kitnalov anontsʾ mtadzowmĕ , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾow gĕ mtadzēkʾ tʾē hatsʾ chʾownikʾ : tagawin chʾēkʾ ĕmpṛner ow chʾēkʾ hasgnar : tagawin tser sirtĕ gardzratsʾadz ē .
41008018	Achʾkʾer ownikʾ ew chʾēkʾ tesner , aganchner ownikʾ ow chʾēkʾ lser , ew chʾēkʾ yisher .
41008019	Erp hink nganagnerĕ gtretsʾi hink hazarin , pegornerov letsʾown kʾani goghov vertsʾowtsʾikʾ » . Ĕsin anor : « Tasnergow » .
41008020	« Ow erp eōtʾĕ nganagnerĕ gtretsʾi chʾors hazarin , pegornerov letsʾown kʾani zampiwgh vertsʾowtsʾikʾ » . Anonkʾ al ĕsin : « Eōtʾĕ » .
41008021	Ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Haba inchʾbēs chʾēkʾ hasgnar » .
41008022	Erp knatsʾ Petʾsayita , goyr mĕ perin anor aṛchew , ow g!aghachʾēin iren , or tbchʾi anor .
41008023	An al , pṛnelov goyrin tseṛkʾēn , towrs taraw kiwghēn , ew tʾkʾnelov anor achʾkʾerown , traw tseṛkʾĕ anor vray , ow hartsʾowtsʾ anor tʾē gĕ tesnē pan mĕ .
41008024	An al nayetsʾaw ew ĕsaw : « Gĕ tesnem martig , dzaṛerow bēs , or gĕ kʾalen » .
41008025	Tartseal traw tseṛkʾĕ anor achʾkʾerown vray ow nayil towaw anor : ew aṛoghchatsʾaw , ow ystagōrēn gĕ tesnēr polorĕ .
41008026	Yetoy , ghrgelov zayn ir townĕ , ĕsaw : « Mi mtner kiwghĕ , ochʾ al mēgow mĕ ĕsē kiwghin mēch » .
41008027	Yisows knatsʾ Pʾilibbosi Gesariayin kiwgherĕ , ir ashagertnerown het . Jampan hartsʾowtsʾ ir ashagertnerown : « Martig indzi hamar inchʾ g!ĕsen , ov em » .
41008028	Anonkʾ bataskhanetsʾin : « Omankʾ , Yovhannēs Mgrtichʾĕ , owrishner , Eghian , owrishner al , markarēnerēn mēgĕ » .
41008029	Ew inkʾ ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Isg towkʾ indzi hamar inchʾ g!ĕsēkʾ , ov em » . Betros bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Town Kʾristosn es » .
41008030	Sastig hrahanketsʾ anontsʾ , or ochʾ mēgown khōsin ir masin .
41008031	Aba sgsaw sorvetsʾnel anontsʾ : « Bētkʾ ē or martow Ortin shat chʾarchʾarankʾner grē , mer zhowi erētsʾnerēn , kʾahanayabetnerēn ew tbirnerēn , sbannowi , ow erekʾ ōrēn etkʾ yarowtʾiwn aṛnē » .
41008032	Ays khōskʾĕ ĕsaw patsʾoroshabēs . Owsti Betros mēgti aṛaw zinkʾ ew sgsaw yantimanel .
41008033	Isg inkʾ tartsaw , ir ashagertnerown nayelov , yantimanetsʾ Betrosĕ ew ĕsaw : « Etews kna , Satanay , orovhetew town ochʾ tʾē Astowdzoy panerĕ gĕ mtadzes , haba , martotsʾ panerĕ » .
41008034	Erp iren ganchʾetsʾ pazmowtʾiwnĕ , ir ashagertnerown het , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ov or owzē kal im etewēs , tʾogh owranay inkʾzinkʾ , vertsʾnē ir khachʾĕ , ow hetewi indzi .
41008035	Orovhetew ov or owzē pʾrgel ir antsĕ , biti gorsntsʾnē zayn , isg ov or gorsntsʾnē ir antsĕ , indzi ow awetaranin hamar , biti pʾrgē zayn .
41008036	Kʾani or inchʾ ōkowt ē martown , or shahi ampoghch ashkharhĕ , paytsʾ gorsntsʾnē ir antsĕ :
41008037	gam , mart inchʾ pʾrgankʾ biti tay ir antsin pʾokharēn .
41008038	Orovhetew ov or amōtʾ sebē zis ew im khōskʾers tawanilĕ , ays shnatsʾogh ow meghawor serowntin mēch , martow Ortin al amōtʾ biti sebē zayn tawanilĕ , erp kay ir Hōr pʾaṛkʾov sowrp hreshtagnerown het » .
41009001	Ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Hos nergay eghoghnerēn gan omankʾ , or mah biti chʾhamtesen , minchʾew or tesnen Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ , zōrowtʾeamp egadz ” » .
41009002	Vetsʾ ōr etkʾ , Yisows aṛaw iren het Betrosĕ , Yagoposn ow Yovhannēsĕ , hanetsʾ zanonkʾ partsr leṛ mĕ , aṛantsin , ew aylagerbetsʾaw anontsʾ aṛchew .
41009003	Ir hantertsnerĕ pʾaylown , chʾapʾazantsʾ jermag eghan , tsiwni bēs , aynbēs or ergri vray ochʾ mēg tʾapʾichʾ grnar aytbēs jermgtsʾnel .
41009004	Ow Eghia erewtsʾaw anontsʾ , Movsēsi het , ew gĕ khōsagtsʾēin Yisowsi het .
41009005	Aba Betros ĕsaw Yisowsi : « Ṛappi , law ē or genankʾ hos ew shinenkʾ erekʾ vran , mēgĕ , kʾezi , mēgĕ , Movsēsi ow mēgĕ , Eghiayi » :
41009006	orovhetew chʾēr kiter tʾē inchʾ gĕ khōsi , kʾani or zarhowradz ēin .
41009007	Amb mĕ hovani eghaw anontsʾ vray , ew tsayn mĕ egaw ambēn , ĕselov : « Ays ē im sireli Ortis , anor mtig ĕrēkʾ » .
41009008	Yangardz , erp irentsʾ showrchĕ nayetsʾan , owrish ochʾ mēgĕ tesan , haba miayn Yisowsĕ , irentsʾ het .
41009009	Erp var g!ichnēin leṛnēn , batowiretsʾ anontsʾ , or ochʾ mēgown batmen irentsʾ tesadzĕ , paytsʾ miayn , martow Ortiin meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛnelēn etkʾ .
41009010	Anonkʾ bahetsʾin ayt khōskʾĕ , ow gĕ hartsʾnēin irarow tʾē inchʾ gĕ nshanagē “ meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛnel ” .
41009011	Ew hartsʾowtsʾin iren : « Inchʾow tbirnerĕ g!ĕsen tʾē “ bētkʾ ē or nakh Eghia kay ” » .
41009012	An al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Artarew nakh Eghia gow kay ow gĕ verahastatē amēn pan : inchʾbēs krowadz ē martow Ortiin masin , tʾē bētkʾ ē shat chʾarchʾarankʾner grē ew anarkowi .
41009013	Paytsʾ g!ĕsem tsezi tʾē Eghia egaw al , ow inchʾ or owzetsʾin , ĕrin anor , inchʾbēs krowadz ēr ir masin » .
41009014	Ashagertnerown kʾov kalov , tesaw medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ anontsʾ showrchĕ , ow tbirner , or gĕ vijapanēin anontsʾ het .
41009015	Isgoyn ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ , erp tesaw zayn , shat aylayletsʾaw , ew yaṛach vazelov zayn gĕ parewēr .
41009016	Yisows hartsʾowtsʾ tbirnerown : « Inchʾ pani masin gĕ vijapanēikʾ anontsʾ het .
41009017	Pazmowtʾenēn mēgĕ bataskhanetsʾ : « Vartabet , ortis , or hamr oki owni , kʾezi peri .
41009018	Owr or al pṛnē zayn , ketin gĕ zarnē , , zayn : inkʾ al gĕ pʾrpʾri , ir agṛanerĕ gĕ grjtē ew gĕ tsʾamkʾi . Kʾow ashagertnerowt ĕsi or hanen zayn , paytsʾ chʾgrtsʾan » .
41009019	Inkʾ al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Ov anhawat serownt , minchʾew erp biti ĕllam tsezi het , minchʾew erp biti hantowr zhem tsezi : indzi perēkʾ zayn » .
41009020	Iren perin zayn . Erp tghan tesaw zinkʾ , isgoyn chʾar okin tsʾntsʾetsʾ zayn , ew ketin ingadz , gĕ tʾawalēr ow gĕ pʾrpʾrēr .
41009021	Yisows hartsʾowtsʾ anor hōr : « Orchʾapʾ aten ē , or ayt panĕ batahetsʾaw anor » . An al ĕsaw : « Mangowtʾenēn i ver .
41009022	Yajakh gragi ow chowri mēch gĕ netē zayn , orbēszi gorsntsʾnē : paytsʾ etʾē garoghowtʾiwn ownis , ōknē mezi , ktʾalov mer vray » .
41009023	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Etʾē grnas hawatal : amēn pan gareli ē anor , or gĕ hawatay » .
41009024	Isgoyn manowgin hayrĕ aghaghagetsʾ ew artsʾownkʾov ĕsaw : « Gĕ hawatam , Tēr : ōknē im anhawatowtʾeans » .
41009025	Yisows , erp tesaw tʾē pazmowtʾiwnĕ gĕ khṛnowi showrchĕ , sastetsʾ anmakʾowr okin ew ĕsaw anor : « Hamr ow khowl oki , gĕ hramayem kʾezi , elir atgē , ew ankam mĕn al mi mtner anor mēch » .
41009026	Okin aghaghagelov , sastig tsʾntsʾetsʾ zayn ow elaw : ew tghan meṛeli bēs eghaw , aynbēs or shater ĕsin : « Meṛaw » .
41009027	Isg Yisows anor tseṛkʾēn pṛnelov , otkʾi hanetsʾ zayn , an al ganknetsʾaw .
41009028	Erp inkʾ town mtaw , ir ashagertnerĕ aṛantsin hartsʾowtsʾin iren : « Menkʾ inchʾow chʾgrtsʾankʾ hanel zayn » .
41009029	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ayt tesagĕ gareli chʾē owrish panov hanel , paytsʾ miayn aghōtʾkʾov ow dzomabahowtʾeamp » .
41009030	Angē megnelov , Kalileayi mēchēn g!antsʾnēin , ew chʾēr owzer or mēgĕ kitnay :
41009031	orovhetew gĕ sorvetsʾnēr ir ashagertnerown ow g!ĕsēr anontsʾ : « Martow Ortin biti matnowi martotsʾ tseṛkʾĕ , biti sbannen zayn , ow erp sbannowi , yarowtʾiwn biti aṛnē errort ōrĕ » .
41009032	Anonkʾ chʾēin hasgnar ayt khōskʾĕ , ew gĕ vakhnayin hartsʾnel iren .
41009033	Egaw Gapʾaṛnayowm : ow erp town mtaw , hartsʾowtsʾ anontsʾ : « Inchʾ pani masin gĕ mtadzēikʾ jampan , irarow het » .
41009034	Anonkʾ lowṛ getsʾan , orovhetew jampan vijapanadz ēin irarow het , tʾē ov ē medzakoynĕ .
41009035	Erp nstaw , ganchʾetsʾ tasnergowkʾĕ ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Etʾē mēgĕ owzē aṛachin ĕllal , polorin yetinĕ tʾogh ĕllay , ow polorin sbasargown » .
41009036	Ew aṛaw manowg mĕ , gaynetsʾowtsʾ anontsʾ mēchtegh , aba ir kirgĕ aṛnelov zayn , ĕsaw anontsʾ :
41009037	« Ov or g!ĕntowni aysbisi manowgnerēn mēgĕ , im anownovs , zis g!ĕntowni : ew ov or zis g!ĕntowni , ochʾ tʾē zis g!ĕntowni , haba , zis ghrgoghĕ » .
41009038	Yovhannēs ĕsaw anor : « Vartabet , tesankʾ mēgĕ or tewer gĕ hanēr kʾow anownovt , paytsʾ mezi chʾi hetewir . Arkiletsʾinkʾ zayn , kʾani or mezi chʾi hetewir » .
41009039	Yisows ĕsaw : « Mi arkilēkʾ zayn , orovhetew chʾgay mēgĕ , or im anownovs hrashkʾ kordzē , ow garenay showtov zis anidzel :
41009040	an or mezi hagaṛag chʾē , mer , , goghmēn ē .
41009041	An or tsezi kawatʾ mĕ chowr khmtsʾnē im anownovs , , , kʾani or towkʾ Kʾristosi gĕ batganikʾ , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Aniga ir vartsatrowtʾiwnĕ biti chʾgorsntsʾnē ” » .
41009042	« Ov or kaytʾagghetsʾnē ays bztignerēn mēgĕ , or indzi gĕ hawatay , aweli law biti ĕllar , or chaghatsʾkʾi kʾar mĕ gakhowēr anor vizēn , ew dzovĕ netowēr .
41009043	Etʾē tseṛkʾt gĕ kaytʾagghetsʾnē kʾez , gtrē zayn : aweli law ē kʾezi , bagasawor mtnel geankʾĕ , kʾan ergow tseṛkʾ ownenal ow ertʾal kehenĕ , anshēch gragin mēch ,
41009044	owr anontsʾ ortĕ chʾi vakhjanir ew gragĕ chʾi marir .
41009045	Etʾē otkʾt gĕ kaytʾagghetsʾnē kʾez , gtrē zayn : aweli law ē kʾezi , gagh mtnel geankʾĕ , kʾan ergow otkʾ ownenal ow netowil kehenĕ , anshēch gragin mēch ,
41009046	owr anontsʾ ortĕ chʾi vakhjanir ew gragĕ chʾi marir .
41009047	Etʾē achʾkʾt gĕ kaytʾagghetsʾnē kʾez , hanē zayn : aweli law ē kʾezi , mēg achʾkʾov mtnel Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ , kʾan ergow achʾkʾ ownenal ow netowil keheni gragĕ ,
41009048	owr anontsʾ ortĕ chʾi vakhjanir ew gragĕ chʾi marir .
41009049	Orovhetew iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ gragov biti aghowi , ow amēn zoh aghov biti aghowi .
41009050	Aghĕ law ē : paytsʾ etʾē aghĕ taṛnay anham , inchʾov biti hamemēkʾ zayn : tser mēch agh ownetsʾēkʾ , ew irarow het khaghagh eghēkʾ » .
41010001	Ganknelov , angē knatsʾ Hrēastani hoghamasĕ , Yortanani miws ezerkʾēn . Tartseal pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ anor showrch gĕ hamakhmpowēin , ew inchʾbēs sovorowtʾiwn ownēr , tartseal gĕ sorvetsʾnēr anontsʾ .
41010002	Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ egan anor kʾov ow hartsʾowtsʾin , pʾortselow hamar zayn : « Artōnowadz ē martow mĕ , or artsagē ir ginĕ » .
41010003	An al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Movsēs inchʾ batowiretsʾ tsezi » .
41010004	Anonkʾ ĕsin : « Movsēs artōnetsʾ amowsnalowdzowmi vgayakir mĕ krel ew artsagel » .
41010005	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « TSer sirtin gardzrowtʾean hamar kretsʾ tsezi ayt batowērĕ :
41010006	paytsʾ ararchʾowtʾean sgizpēn , Astowadz zanonkʾ arow ew ēk steghdzetsʾ .
41010007	“ Ays batjaṛov martĕ biti tʾoghow hayrn ow mayrĕ , ew biti yari ir gnoch ,
41010008	ow ergowkʾĕ biti ĕllan mēg marmin ” . Owsti al ergow chʾen , haba , mēg marmin :
41010009	owremn martĕ tʾogh chʾzatē inchʾ or Astowadz irarow miatsʾowtsʾadz ē » .
41010010	Townĕ , ir ashagertnerĕ tartseal noyn panĕ hartsʾowtsʾin iren .
41010011	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ov or artsagē ir ginĕ ew amowsnanay owrishi mĕ het , shnowtʾiwn g!ĕnē anor tēm .
41010012	Ow etʾē gin mĕ artsagē ir amowsinĕ ew amowsnanay owrishi mĕ het , shnowtʾiwn g!ĕnē » .
41010013	Manowgner perin iren , orbēszi tbchʾi anontsʾ : paytsʾ ashagertnerĕ gĕ yantimanēin peroghnerĕ .
41010014	Erp Yisows tesaw , ĕntvzelov ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Tʾoyl towēkʾ ayt manowgnerown , or kan indzi , ew mi arkilēkʾ zanonkʾ , orovhetew Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ aytbisinerownn ē .
41010015	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ov or chʾĕntowni Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ bztig manowgi mĕ bēs , pnaw biti chʾmtnē anor mēch ” » .
41010016	Ow kirgĕ aṛaw zanonkʾ , tseṛkʾ traw anontsʾ vray ew ōrhnetsʾ zanonkʾ .
41010017	Erp an towrs elaw , jampan mart mĕ vazetsʾ , dznratretsʾ anor aṛchew ow hartsʾowtsʾ anor : « Pari vartabet , inchʾ ĕnem , or zhaṛankem yawitenagan geankʾĕ » .
41010018	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Inchʾow pari gĕ gochʾes zis : mēgēn zat pari chʾgay , or Astowadz ē .
41010019	Kites batowirannerĕ : shnowtʾiwn mi ĕner , sbanowtʾiwn mi ĕner , koghowtʾiwn mi ĕner , sowt vgayowtʾiwn mi tar , zrgankʾ mi ĕner , batowē hayrt ow mayrt » .
41010020	An al bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Vartabet , bahadz em ayt polorĕ , batanowtʾenēs i ver » .
41010021	Yisows anor nayelov , siretsʾ zayn ew ĕsaw anor : « Mēg pan gĕ bagsi kʾezi : kna , dzakhē ownetsʾadzt , towr aghkʾatnerown , ow kants biti ownenas erginkʾĕ : aba vertsʾowr khachʾĕ ow hetewē indzi » .
41010022	An al ays khōskʾin hamar kho zhoṛelov , trtmadz knatsʾ , orovhetew shat statsʾowadzkʾ ownēr .
41010023	Yisows , showrchĕ nayelov , ĕsaw ir ashagertnerown : « Orchʾapʾ t zhowar ē Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ mtnel anontsʾ , or tram ownin » .
41010024	Ashagertnerĕ aylayletsʾan anor khōskʾerēn : paytsʾ Yisows tartseal ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Zawagner , orchʾapʾ t zhowar ē Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ mtnel , irentsʾ tramin vstahoghnerown .
41010025	Tiwrin ē or owghtĕ aseghin dzagēn antsʾni , kʾan tʾē harowstĕ Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ mtnē » .
41010026	Anonkʾ chʾapʾazantsʾ abshetsʾan ew ĕsin irarow : « Al ov grnay pʾrgowil » .
41010027	Yisows nayelov anontsʾ , ĕsaw : « Atiga angareli ē martotsʾ kʾov , paytsʾ ochʾ , Astowdzoy kʾov : kʾani or amēn pan gareli ē Astowdzoy kʾov » .
41010028	Betros sgsaw ĕsel anor : « Aha menkʾ tʾoghowtsʾinkʾ amēn inchʾ ew hetewetsʾankʾ kʾezi » .
41010029	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ CHʾgay mēgĕ , or tʾoghowtsʾadz ĕllay town , eghpayrner , kʾoyrer , hayr , mayr , gin , zawagner , gam arter , indzi ew awetaranin hamar ,
41010030	ow chʾstanay hariwrabatigĕ hima , ays aten , towner , eghpayrner , kʾoyrer , mayrer , zawagner ew arter , haladzankʾnerow het , ow yawitenagan geankʾĕ , kalikʾ ashkharhin mēch ” .
41010031	Paytsʾ shat aṛachinner biti ĕllan yetin , ew yetinner , aṛachin » .
41010032	Erp anonkʾ tēbi Erowsaghēm partsratsʾogh jampan ēin , Yisows anontsʾ aṛchewēn g!ertʾar . Anonkʾ aylayladz ēin ow hetewelov , gĕ vakhnayin . Tartseal kʾovĕ aṛnelov tasnergowkʾĕ , sgsaw ĕsel anontsʾ , inchʾ or biti batahēr iren :
41010033	« Aha Erowsaghēm gĕ partsranankʾ , ew martow Ortin biti matnowi kʾahanayabetnerown ow tbirnerown : mahowan biti tatabarten zayn , hetʾanosnerown biti matnen zayn ,
41010034	biti dzaghren ow kharazanen zayn , biti tʾkʾnen anor vray ew sbannen zayn : paytsʾ yarowtʾiwn biti aṛnē errort ōrĕ » .
41010035	Aba Yagopos ow Yovhannēs , Zepetēosi ortinerĕ , katsʾin anor kʾov , ew ĕsin : « Vartabet , g!owzenkʾ or inchʾ or khntrenkʾ , ĕnes mezi hamar » .
41010036	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾ g!owzēkʾ , or ĕnem tsezi » .
41010037	Anonkʾ al ĕsin iren : « SHnorhē mezi , or pazminkʾ mezmē mēgĕ , ach goghmt , ow miwsĕ , tsakh goghmt kʾow pʾaṛkʾit mēch » .
41010038	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « CHʾēkʾ kiter inchʾ gĕ khntrēkʾ . Grnakʾ khmel ayn pa zhagĕ , or es gĕ khmem , ew mgrtowil ayn mgrtowtʾeamp , orov es gĕ mgrtowim » .
41010039	Anonkʾ ĕsin iren : « Grnankʾ » . Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Artarew biti khmēkʾ ayn pa zhagĕ , or es gĕ khmem , ow biti mgrtowikʾ ayn mgrtowtʾeamp , orov es gĕ mgrtowim :
41010040	paytsʾ im ach goghms ew tsakh goghms pazmilĕ , ims chʾē talĕ , haba biti trowi anontsʾ , orontsʾ hamar batrastowadz ē » .
41010041	Erp miws tasĕ ashagertnerĕ lsetsʾin , sgsan ĕntvzil Yagoposi ow Yovhannēsi tēm .
41010042	Isg Yisows iren ganchʾetsʾ zanonkʾ ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Kitēkʾ tʾē hetʾanosnerown ishkhan hamarowadznerĕ gĕ tirabeten irentsʾ vray , ew anontsʾ medzamedznerĕ g!ishkhen irentsʾ vray .
41010043	Paytsʾ aytbēs tʾogh chʾĕllay tser mēch : haba tsezmē ov or owzē medz ĕllal , aniga tser sbasargown ĕllay ,
41010044	ow tsezmē ov or owzē klkhawor ĕllal , aniga polorin strowgĕ ĕllay .
41010045	Kʾani or martow Ortin egaw ochʾ tʾē sbasargowtʾiwn ĕntownelow , haba , sbasargelow ew ir antsĕ ipr pʾrgankʾ talow shaterow hamar » .
41010046	Yetoy egan Erikʾov . Erp towrs g!ellēr Erikʾovēn , ashagertnerov ew medz pazmowtʾeamp , Timēosi ortin , goyr Partimēos , nstadz ēr jampayin ezerkʾĕ ow gĕ mowrar .
41010047	Erp lsetsʾ tʾē Yisows Nazovretsʾin ē , sgsaw aghaghagel : « Yisows , Tawitʾi Orti , oghormē indzi » .
41010048	SHater gĕ hrahankēin anor , or lṛē . Paytsʾ an al aweli g!aghaghagēr : « Tawitʾi Orti , oghormē indzi » .
41010049	Yisows gank aṛnelov , ĕsaw or ganchʾen zayn . Ganchʾetsʾin goyrĕ ew ĕsin anor : « Kʾachalerowē , otkʾi elir , kʾez gĕ ganchʾē » .
41010050	An al ir hantertsĕ netelov , ganknetsʾaw ow egaw Yisowsi .
41010051	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Inchʾ g!owzes , or ĕnem kʾezi » . Goyrĕ ĕsaw : « Ṛappowni , tʾogh achʾkʾers patsʾowin , , » .
41010052	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Kna : hawatkʾt p zhshgetsʾ kʾez » . Isgoyn anor achʾkʾerĕ patsʾowetsʾan , ow jampan gĕ hetewēr Yisowsi .
41011001	Erp mōtetsʾan Erowsaghēmi , ew hasan Petʾpʾakē ow Petʾania , TSitʾeninerow leran mōt , Yisows ir ashagertnerēn ergowkʾĕ ghrgetsʾ , ĕselov :
41011002	« Katsʾēkʾ ayt tser timatsʾi kiwghĕ : anor mēch mtnelov , isgoyn biti ktnēkʾ gabowadz awanag mĕ , orown vray mart nstadz chʾē : artsagetsʾēkʾ zayn ow perēkʾ .
41011003	Etʾē mēgĕ ĕsē tsezi : “ Ayt inchʾ g!ĕnēkʾ ” , ĕsēkʾ : “ Tēroch bētkʾ ē ” , ew isgoyn hos biti ghrgē zayn » .
41011004	Katsʾin ow ktan awanagĕ , towrsĕ , pʾoghotsʾin mēch , tran kʾov gabowadz , ew artsagetsʾin zayn .
41011005	Hon gaynoghnerēn omankʾ ĕsin irentsʾ : « Inchʾow g!artsagēkʾ ayt awanagĕ » .
41011006	Irenkʾ al bataskhanetsʾin anontsʾ inchʾbēs Yisows batowirer ēr , ew tʾoyl towin irentsʾ .
41011007	Erp awanagĕ perin Yisowsi , trin anor vray irentsʾ hantertsnerĕ , ow nstaw anor vray .
41011008	SHater irentsʾ hantertsnerĕ gĕ pʾṛēin jampayin vray : owrishner jiwgher gĕ gtrēin dzaṛerēn ew gĕ taradzēin jampayin vray .
41011009	Aṛchewēn katsʾoghnern ow iren hetewoghnerĕ g!aghaghagēin : « Ovsanna : ōrhneal ē an , or gow kay Tēroch anownov .
41011010	ōrhneal ē mer Tawitʾ hōr tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ , or gow kay , , . Ovsanna amenapartsr vayrerown mēch » .
41011011	Yisows mtaw Erowsaghēm ow knatsʾ tajarĕ . Erp showrchĕ nayetsʾaw , amēn pani vray , artēn irigowan zhamĕ ĕllalown , megnetsʾaw Petʾania tasnergowkʾin het .
41011012	Heteweal ōrĕ , erp g!ellēin Petʾaniayēn , anōtʾetsʾaw ,
41011013	ew heṛowēn tesnelov terewalitsʾ tʾzeni mĕ , knatsʾ , or tʾerews pan mĕ ktnē vran : paytsʾ erp knatsʾ anor kʾov , ochʾinchʾ ktaw , terewnerēn zat , orovhetew teṛ tʾowzi atenĕ chʾēr .
41011014	Owsti ĕsaw anor : « Asgē etkʾ ochʾ mēgĕ btowgh owtē kʾezmē yawitean » . Ew ir ashagertnerĕ lsetsʾin .
41011015	Err hasan Erowsaghēm , tajarĕ mtnelov , Yisows towrs hanetsʾ tajarin mēch dzakhoghnern ow knoghnerĕ , tabaletsʾ lowmayapʾokhnerown seghannerĕ ew aghawni dzakhoghnerown atʾoṛnerĕ ,
41011016	ow tʾoyl chʾtowaw or mēgĕ anōtʾ mĕ antsʾĕnē tajarin mēchēn .
41011017	Ew sorvetsʾowtsʾ anontsʾ , ĕselov : « Mitʾē krowadz chʾē : “ Im towns aghōtʾkʾi town biti gochʾowi polor azkerown ” : paytsʾ towkʾ zayn awazagnerow kʾarayr ĕrikʾ » .
41011018	Tbirnern ow kʾahanayabetnerĕ lselov asiga , gĕ pʾntṛēin tʾē inchʾbēs gorsntsʾnen zayn , kʾani gĕ vakhnayin angē : orovhetew ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ abshadz ēr anor owsowtsʾowmin vray .
41011019	Erp irigown eghaw , kʾaghakʾēn towrs elaw .
41011020	Aṛtown , erp g!antsʾnēin angē , tesan tʾzenin , armatēn chʾortsʾadz .
41011021	Betros veryishetsʾ ew ĕsaw anor : « Ṛappi , aha tʾzenin or anidzetsʾir , chʾortsʾadz ē » .
41011022	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Hawatkʾ ownetsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy vray .
41011023	Orovhetew jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ov or ĕsē ays leran : " Elir ow dzovĕ netowē " , ew chʾtatamsi ir sirtin mēch , haba hawatay tʾē inchʾ or ĕsē , g!ĕllay , biti ĕllay anor , inchʾ or ĕsē ” .
41011024	Owsti gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Inchʾ or gĕ khntrēkʾ aghōtʾkʾov , hawatatsʾēkʾ tʾē biti stanakʾ , ow biti ĕllay tsezi ” .
41011025	Erp gaynikʾ aghōtʾkʾi , neretsʾēkʾ , etʾē mēgown tēm pan mĕ ownikʾ , orbēszi tser Hayrn al , or erginkʾn ē , nerē tsezi tser yantsʾankʾnerĕ .
41011026	Isg etʾē towkʾ chʾnerēkʾ , tser Hayrn al , or erginkʾn ē , biti chʾnerē tser yantsʾankʾnerĕ » .
41011027	Tartseal egan Erowsaghēm . Erp gĕ kʾalēr tajarin mēch , kʾahanayabetnerĕ , tbirnern ow erētsʾnerĕ egan anor ,
41011028	ew ĕsin : « Inchʾ ishkhanowtʾeamp g!ĕnes ayt panerĕ : ov towaw kʾezi ayt ishkhanowtʾiwnĕ , or ĕnes ayt panerĕ » .
41011029	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Es al tsezi hartsʾnem pan mĕ : bataskhanetsʾēkʾ indzi , ow es biti ĕsem tsezi tʾē inchʾ ishkhanowtʾeamp g!ĕnem ayt panerĕ .
41011030	“ Yovhannēsi mgrtowtʾiwnĕ erginkʾēn ēr , tʾē martotsʾmē ” . Bataskhanetsʾēkʾ indzi » .
41011031	Anonkʾ gĕ mtadzēin irentsʾ mēch , ĕselov : « Etʾē bataskhanenkʾ : “ Erginkʾēn ” , biti ĕsē : “ Haba inchʾow chʾhawatatsʾikʾ anor ” .
41011032	Isg etʾē bataskhanenkʾ : “ Martotsʾmē ” p » . Gĕ vakhnayin zhoghovowrtēn , orovhetew polorĕ irabēs markarē gĕ ngatēin , , Yovhannēsĕ .
41011033	Owsti bataskhanetsʾin Yisowsi : « CHʾenkʾ kiter » . Yisows al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Es al chʾem ĕser tsezi tʾē inchʾ ishkhanowtʾeamp g!ĕnem ayt panerĕ » .
41012001	Aba sgsaw aṛagnerov khōsil anontsʾ het ow ĕsel : « Mart mĕ ayki tngetsʾ , tsʾang kʾashetsʾ anor showrchĕ , hntsani pʾos pʾoretsʾ , ashtarag gaṛowtsʾanetsʾ , mshagnerow yantsnetsʾ zayn , ew jamportetsʾ .
41012002	Atenin dzaṛay mĕ ghrgetsʾ mshagnerown , orbēszi mshagnerēn stanay aykiin btowghēn .
41012003	Isg anonkʾ pṛnetsʾin , dzedzetsʾin zayn ow barab jampetsʾin .
41012004	Tartseal owrish dzaṛay mĕn al ghrgetsʾ anontsʾ : zayn al kʾargodzelov , klowkhĕ viraworetsʾin ew anbatowowadz jampetsʾin .
41012005	Tartseal owrish mĕ ghrgetsʾ , ow zayn sbannetsʾin . SHat owrishner al ghrgetsʾ , orontsʾmē omankʾ dzedzetsʾin ew omankʾ sbannetsʾin .
41012006	Tagawin sireli orti mĕ ownēr : verchabēs zayn al ghrgetsʾ anontsʾ , ĕselov : “ Tʾerews batgaṛin ortiēs ” .
41012007	Paytsʾ ayt mshagnerĕ ĕsin irarow : “ Ays ē zhaṛankortĕ : egēkʾ sbannenkʾ zayn , ow zhaṛankowtʾiwnĕ merĕ biti ĕllay ” .
41012008	Pṛnetsʾin zayn , sbannetsʾin ew aykiēn towrs hanetsʾin .
41012009	Owremn aykiin tērĕ inchʾ biti ĕnē : biti kay ow gorsntsʾnē mshagnerĕ , ew aykin biti tay owrishnerow .
41012010	CHʾēkʾ gartatsʾer sa krowadzĕ : “ Ayn kʾarĕ , or gaṛowtsʾanoghnerĕ mer zhetsʾin , aniga eghaw angiwnakʾarĕ :
41012011	asiga Tērochmēn eghaw , ew skʾanchʾeli ē mer achʾkʾerown ” » .
41012012	Anonkʾ gĕ chanayin pṛnel zayn , paytsʾ pazmowtʾenēn gĕ vakhnayin : orovhetew kittsʾan tʾē ayt aṛagĕ khōsetsʾaw irentsʾ tēm . Owsti tʾoghowtsʾin zayn , ew katsʾin .
41012013	Pʾarisetsʾinerēn ow Herovtēseannerēn omankʾ ghrgetsʾin anor , orbēszi khōskʾov pṛnen zayn .
41012014	Anonkʾ egan ew ĕsin anor : « Vartabet , kitenkʾ tʾē jshmartakhōs es , ow ochʾ mēgown hamar hok g!ĕnes : kʾani or eresbashtowtʾiwn chʾes ĕner martotsʾ , haba jshmartowtʾeamp gĕ sorvetsʾnes Astowdzoy jampan . Artōnowadz ē gaysrin towrkʾ tal : tankʾ , tʾē chʾtankʾ » .
41012015	Yisows kitnalov anontsʾ geghdzaworowtʾiwnĕ , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾow zis gĕ pʾortsēkʾ . Perēkʾ indzi tahegan mĕ , or tesnem » .
41012016	Anonkʾ al perin . Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Orownn en ays batgern ow krowtʾiwnĕ » . Anonkʾ ĕsin iren : « Gaysrin » .
41012017	Yisows al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Inchʾ or gaysrinn ē , gaysrin towēkʾ , ew inchʾ or Astowdzoy ē , Astowdzoy otowēkʾp » . Ow zarmatsʾan ir vray .
41012018	Satowgetsʾinern al , oronkʾ g!ĕsen tʾē yarowtʾiwn chʾgay , egan anor kʾov ew hartsʾowtsʾin iren :
41012019	« Vartabet , Movsēs kretsʾ mezi : “ Etʾē mēgown eghpayrĕ meṛni , ow ginĕ ayri tskē ew zawag chʾtʾoghow , anor eghpayrĕ tʾogh aṛnē anor ginĕ ow zarm tay ir eghpōr ” .
41012020	Owremn eōtʾĕ eghpayrner gayin : aṛachinĕ gin aṛaw ew meṛaw , ow zarm chʾtʾoghowtsʾ .
41012021	Ergrortĕ aṛaw zayn ew meṛaw : an al zarm chʾtʾoghowtsʾ : noynbēs al errortĕ .
41012022	Eōtʾn al zayn aṛin ow zarm chʾtʾoghowtsʾin : polorēn etkʾ , ginn al meṛaw .
41012023	Owremn yarowtʾean aten , erp yarowtʾiwn aṛnen , anontsʾmē orown ginĕ biti ĕllay : orovhetew eōtʾn al ownetsʾan zayn ipr gin » .
41012024	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Arteōkʾ towkʾ moloradz chʾēkʾ , kʾani or ochʾ Kirkʾerĕ kitēkʾ , ochʾ al Astowdzoy zōrowtʾiwnĕ .
41012025	Artarew erp meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛnen , ochʾ g!amowsnanan ew ochʾ amowsnowtʾean gĕ trowin , haba erginkʾi hreshtagnerown bēs g!ĕllan .
41012026	Paytsʾ meṛelnerown masin , tʾē yarowtʾiwn g!aṛnen , Movsēsi kirkʾin mēch chʾēkʾ gartatsʾer , tʾē inchʾbēs Astowadz moreniin mēchēn khōsetsʾaw anor , ĕselov : “ Es em Aprahami Astowadzĕ , Isahagi Astowadzĕ ew Yagopi Astowadzĕ ” .
41012027	An meṛelnerown Astowadzĕ chʾē , haba , oghcherown : owremn towkʾ shat moloradz ēkʾ » .
41012028	Tbirnerēn mēgĕ mōtetsʾaw , mtig ĕraw anontsʾ , erp gĕ vijapanēin , ow nshmarelov tʾē law bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ , hartsʾowtsʾ anor : « Orn ē polor batowirannerown aṛachinĕ » .
41012029	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Polor batowirannerown aṛachinĕ sa ē : “ Mtig ĕrē , ov Israyēl : Tērĕ , mer Astowadzĕ , miag Tērn ē .
41012030	Sirē Tērĕ , kʾow Astowadzt , ampoghch sirtovt , ampoghch antsovt , ampoghch mitkʾovt ew ampoghch zōrowtʾeampt ” . Ays ē aṛachin batowiranĕ .
41012031	Ow ergrortĕ , asor nman : “ Sirē ĕngert kʾow antsit , , bēs ” . Asontsʾmē medz owrish batowiran chʾgay » .
41012032	Tbirĕ ĕsaw anor : « Law , vartabet , jshmartowtʾeamp ĕsir tʾē Astowadz mēg ē , ew angē zat owrish mĕ chʾgay :
41012033	naew ampoghch sirtov , ampoghch khelkʾov , ampoghch antsov ow ampoghch zōrowtʾeamp zayn sirelĕ , ew ĕngerĕ iren bēs sirelĕ , polor oghchagēznerēn ow zoherēn aweli ē » .
41012034	Yisows , tesnelov or an khelamtowtʾeamp bataskhanetsʾ , ĕsaw anor : « Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾenēn heṛow chʾes » . Ew al owrish ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ yantknēr pan mĕ hartsʾnel anor .
41012035	Erp Yisows gĕ sorvetsʾnēr tajarin mēch , ĕsaw : « Tbirnerĕ inchʾbēs g!ĕsen tʾē “ Kʾristos Tawitʾi ortin ē ” .
41012036	Artarew inkʾ , Tawitʾ , Sowrp Hokiov g!ĕsē : “ Tērĕ ĕsaw im Tērochs : « Pazmē im ach goghms , minchʾew or kʾow tʾshnaminert batowantan tnem otkʾerowt » ” .
41012037	Owremn inkʾ , Tawitʾ , Tēr gĕ gochʾē zayn : inchʾbēs an g!ĕllay ir ortin » . Pazmowtʾenēn shater hajoykʾov mtig g!ĕnēin anor .
41012038	Ir owsowtsʾowmin mēch g!ĕsēr anontsʾ : « Zkowshatsʾēkʾ tbirnerēn , oronkʾ g!owzen ergayn hantertsnerov shrchil , gĕ pʾntṛen parewnerĕ , hrabaragnerown vray ,
41012039	aṛachin atʾoṛnerĕ , zhoghovarannerow mēch , ew aṛachin pazmotsʾnerĕ , ĕntʾrikʾnerow mēch :
41012040	oronkʾ gĕ lapʾen ayrinerown townerĕ , ow ipr batrowag , aghōtʾkʾĕ g!ergaren . Asonkʾ aweli khstowtʾeamp biti tatowin , , » .
41012041	Yisows kantsanagin timatsʾ nstadz , gĕ nayēr tʾē pazmowtʾiwnĕ kantsanagin mēch inchʾbēs tram gĕ tskē . SHat harowstner , shat pan tsketsʾin .
41012042	Aghkʾat ayri mĕn al egaw ow ergow lowmay tsketsʾ , or nakʾaragit mĕ g!ĕnē .
41012043	Ir ashagertnerĕ ganchʾelov iren , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē ays aghkʾat ayrin , kantsanagĕ tram tskoghnerown polorēn aweli tsketsʾ :
41012044	orovhetew polorĕ irentsʾ aṛatowtʾenēn tsketsʾin , paytsʾ an , ir garōtowtʾenēn , tsketsʾ ir ampoghch ownetsʾadzĕ , ir ampoghch abrowstĕ » .
41013001	Minchʾ towrs g!ellēr tajarēn , ir ashagertnerēn mēgĕ ĕsaw iren : « Vartabet , tes inchʾbisi kʾarer en , ew inchʾ tesag shēnkʾer » .
41013002	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Gĕ tesnes ayt medz shēnkʾerĕ : kʾar kʾari vray biti chʾmnay , amēnĕ biti kʾagowi » .
41013003	Minchʾ an nstadz ēr TSitʾeninerow leṛĕ , tajarin timatsʾ , Betros , Yagopos , Yovhannēs ow Antrēas hartsʾowtsʾin iren , aṛantsin :
41013004	« Ĕsē mezi , erp biti ĕllay atiga , ew inchʾ nshan biti ĕllay ayt polorin gatarowelow atenĕ » .
41013005	Yisows bataskhanelov anontsʾ , sgsaw ĕsel : « Zkowshatsʾēkʾ or ochʾ mēgĕ moloretsʾnē tsez :
41013006	orovhetew shater biti kan im anownovs , ĕselov : “ Es em Kʾristosĕ ” , ow biti moloretsʾnen shaterĕ .
41013007	Paytsʾ erp lsēkʾ baterazmnerow masin , ew baterazmnerow taratsaynowtʾiwnner , mi vrtovikʾ , orovhetew bētkʾ ē or ays amēnĕ ĕllay , paytsʾ teṛ vakhjanĕ chʾē .
41013008	Artarew azk azki tēm biti ellē , ow tʾakaworowtʾiwn , tʾakaworowtʾean tēm , ew tegh-tegh ergrashar zhner biti ĕllan : sover ow khaṛnagowtʾiwnner al biti ĕllan . Asonkʾ tsʾawerown sgizpn en .
41013009	Zkowshatsʾēkʾ towkʾ tsezi hamar : kʾani or ateannerow biti matnen tsez , zhoghovarannerow mēch biti dzedzen tsez , ow gaṛavarichʾnerow ew tʾakawornerow aṛchew biti genakʾ , im batjaṛovs , anontsʾ vgayowtʾiwn ĕllalow hamar .
41013010	Paytsʾ nakh bētkʾ ē or awetaranĕ kʾarozowi polor azkerown .
41013011	Isg erp matnelow tanin tsez , nakhabēs mi mtahokowikʾ tʾē inchʾ biti khōsikʾ , ochʾ al khogatsʾēkʾ : haba ayt zhamown inchʾ or tsezi trowi , zayn khōsetsʾēkʾ : orovhetew ochʾ tʾē towkʾ ēkʾ or biti khōsikʾ , haba Sowrp Hokin » .
41013012	« Eghpayrĕ mahowan biti matnē eghpayrĕ , ow hayrĕ , zawagĕ : ew zawagner biti ellen irentsʾ dznoghnerown tēm ow meṛtsʾnen zanonkʾ .
41013013	Polorin ateli biti ĕllakʾ im anownis hamar . Paytsʾ ov or togay minchʾew vakhjanĕ , aniga biti pʾrgowi .
41013014	Erp tesnēkʾ tʾē aweroghin bghdzowtʾiwnĕ , , - orow masin Taniēl markarēin michotsʾov khōsowadz ē - hastatowadz ē hon owr bētkʾ chʾē ĕllar , ( ov or gartay , tʾogh hasgnay , ) ayn aten Hrēastani mēch eghoghnerĕ leṛnerĕ tʾogh pʾakhchʾin .
41013015	An or tanikʾin vray ē , tʾogh chʾichnē townĕ , ow chʾmtnē ir townēn pan mĕ aṛnelow :
41013016	ew an or artin mēch ē , tʾogh chʾverataṛnay ir hantertsĕ aṛnelow .
41013017	Paytsʾ vay ayt ōrerĕ yghi eghoghnerown ow dzidz towoghnerown .
41013018	Aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ , or tser pʾakhowstĕ tsmeṛĕ chʾĕllay .
41013019	Orovhetew ayt ōrerĕ aynbisi taṛabankʾ biti ĕllay , orown nmanĕ , Astowdzoy steghdzadz ashkharhi sgizpēn minchʾew hima eghadz chʾē , ochʾ al biti ĕllay .
41013020	Etʾē Tērĕ ayt ōrerĕ chʾgarjetsʾnēr , ochʾ mēg marmin biti pʾrgowēr : paytsʾ ayt ōrerĕ garjetsʾowtsʾ ĕntrealnerown hamar , or ĕntretsʾ .
41013021	Ayn aten etʾē mēgĕ ĕsē tsezi : “ Aha hos ē Kʾristosĕ ” , gam : “ Aha hon ē ” , mi hawatakʾ .
41013022	Orovhetew sowt kʾristosner ew sowt markarēner biti ellen , ow tsʾoytsʾ biti tan nshanner ew skʾanchʾelikʾner , orbēszi etʾē gareli ĕllay , moloretsʾnen noynisg ĕntrealnerĕ .
41013023	Isg towkʾ zkowshatsʾēkʾ : aha nakhabēs ĕsi tsezi amēn inchʾ » .
41013024	« Paytsʾ ayt ōrerĕ , ayt taṛabankʾēn etkʾ , arewĕ biti khawari ew lowsinĕ ir pʾaylĕ biti chʾtay :
41013025	astgherĕ erginkʾēn biti iynan , ow erginkʾi mēch eghogh zōrowtʾiwnnerĕ biti sarsin .
41013026	Ayn aten biti tesnen martow Ortin , amberow mēch egadz , medz zōrowtʾeamp ow pʾaṛkʾov .
41013027	Ayn aten biti ghrgē ir hreshtagnerĕ ew biti hawakʾē ir ĕntrealnerĕ chʾors hoverēn , ergri dzayrēn minchʾew erginkʾi dzayrĕ » .
41013028	« Tʾzeniēn sorvetsʾēkʾ aṛag mĕ : erp anor osterĕ gagowghnan ow terewnerĕ tsʾtsʾowin , gĕ hasgnakʾ tʾē amaṛĕ mōt ē .
41013029	Towkʾ al , erp eghadz tesnēkʾ asonkʾ , kittsʾēkʾ tʾē mōt ē , tṛnerown kʾov .
41013030	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ays serowntĕ biti chʾantsʾni , minchʾew or ays polorĕ batahin ” .
41013031	Erginkʾ ow ergir biti antsʾnin , paytsʾ im khōskʾers pnaw biti chʾantsʾnin » .
41013032	« Isg ayt ōrn ow zhamĕ , ochʾ mēg mart kitē , ochʾ al erginkʾi mēch eghogh hreshtagnerĕ , ochʾ isg Ortin , haba , miayn Hayrĕ .
41013033	Zkowshatsʾēkʾ , hsgetsʾēkʾ ew aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ , orovhetew chʾēkʾ kiter tʾē atenĕ erp ē .
41013034	Inchʾbēs jamportogh mart mĕ gĕ tʾoghow ir townĕ , irawasowtʾiwn gow tay ir dzaṛanerown , iwrakʾanchʾiwrin , ir kordzĕ , ow tṛnabanin gĕ hramayē or artʾown genay .
41013035	Owremn artʾown getsʾēkʾ , orovhetew chʾēkʾ kiter tʾē tan tērĕ erp biti kay , irigownĕ , tʾē gēs kisherin , akʾloraganchʾin , tʾē aṛtown .
41013036	Tʾerews yangardz kalov , tsez ktnē kʾowni mēch .
41013037	Ew inchʾ or g!ĕsem tsezi , g!ĕsem polorin : “ Artʾown getsʾēkʾ ” » .
41014001	Ergow ōr etkʾ , Zatig ow Pagharchagerkʾ ēr : ew kʾahanayabetnern ow tbirnerĕ gĕ pʾntṛēin tʾē inchʾbēs varbetowtʾeamp pṛnen zayn ew sbannen .
41014002	Paytsʾ g!ĕsēin : « Ochʾ tōnin atenĕ , orbēszi zhoghovowrtin mēch aghmowg chʾĕllay » .
41014003	Erp inkʾ Petʾania ēr , seghan nstadz , porot Simoni townĕ , gin mĕ egaw , or ownēr alabastrē shish mĕ , letsʾowadz medzadzakhs nartosi ōdzanelikʾov : gotretsʾ ayt shishĕ ow tʾapʾetsʾ ōdzanelikʾĕ anor klowkhin vray .
41014004	Omankʾ ĕntvzetsʾan irenkʾ irentsʾ mēch ew ĕsin : « Inchʾow ayt ōdzanelikʾĕ vatnowetsʾaw :
41014005	kʾani or atiga grnar dzakhowil erekʾ hariwr taheganēn aweli , ow trowil aghkʾatnerown » : ew sastig gĕ srtoghēin iren tēm .
41014006	Paytsʾ Yisows ĕsaw : « Tʾoghowtsʾēkʾ zayn , inchʾow g!anhankstatsʾnēkʾ zinkʾ : an law kordz mĕ ĕraw indzi .
41014007	Orovhetew amēn aten ownikʾ aghkʾatnerĕ tsezi het , ow erp owzēkʾ , grnakʾ parikʾ ĕnel anontsʾ : paytsʾ amēn aten chʾownikʾ zis .
41014008	An ĕraw inchʾ or grnar : marmins nakhabēs ōdzetsʾ , im tʾaghowmis hamar .
41014009	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ampoghch ashkharhi mēch , owr or ays awetaranĕ kʾarozowi , anor ĕradzn al biti batmowi , ir yishatagin hamar ” » .
41014010	Yowta Isgariovtatsʾin , tasnergowkʾēn mēgĕ , knatsʾ kʾahanayabetnerown , or zayn matnē anontsʾ .
41014011	Anonkʾ al lselov , owrakhatsʾan , ew iren tram al khostatsʾan . Owsti gĕ pʾntṛēr batehowtʾiwn mĕ , or matnēr zayn .
41014012	Pagharchagerkʾi aṛachin ōrĕ , erp gĕ mortʾēin zatigĕ , anor ashagertnerĕ ĕsin iren : « Owr g!owzes or ertʾankʾ batrastenkʾ , orbēszi owtes zatigĕ » .
41014013	Ir ashagertnerēn ergowkʾĕ ghrgetsʾ ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Katsʾēkʾ kʾaghakʾĕ , ow tsezi biti hantibi mart mĕ , or owsin vray gĕ tani chowri sapʾor mĕ : hetewetsʾēkʾ anor ,
41014014	ew owr or mtnē , tantiroch ĕsēkʾ : “ Vartabetĕ g!ĕsē : " Owr ē ichewanĕ , owr biti owtem zatigĕ , ashagertnerows het " ” .
41014015	An al biti tsʾowtsʾnē tsezi medz vernayarg mĕ , gahaworowadz ow batrast : hon batrastetsʾēkʾ mezi » .
41014016	Ir ashagertnerĕ katsʾin , mtan kʾaghakʾĕ , ew inchʾbēs irentsʾ ĕsaw , aynbēs ktan , ow batrastetsʾin zatigĕ .
41014017	Erp irigown eghaw , egaw tasnergowkʾin het .
41014018	Erp seghan nstan ew g!owtēin , Yisows ĕsaw : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē tsezmē mēgĕ , or hima indzi het g!owtē , biti matnē zis » .
41014019	Anonkʾ sgsan trtmil ow mēg aṛ mēg ĕsel anor : « Mitʾē es em » , ew owrish mĕ : « Mitʾē es em » .
41014020	An al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Tasnergowkʾēn an , or indzi het tʾatʾkhetsʾ ir tseṛkʾĕ bnagin mēch .
41014021	Artarew martow Ortin g!ertʾay , inchʾbēs krowadz ē iren hamar : paytsʾ vay ayn martown , orown michotsʾov gĕ matnowi martow Ortin . Ayt martown law biti ĕllar , or dznadz chʾĕllar » .
41014022	Erp anonkʾ g!owtēin , Yisows hatsʾ aṛaw , ōrhnetsʾ , gtretsʾ , towaw anontsʾ ew ĕsaw : « Aṛēkʾ , ays ē im marmins » .
41014023	Naew pa zhagĕ aṛaw , shnorhagal eghaw ow towaw anontsʾ : polorn al khmetsʾin angē .
41014024	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ays ē im ariwns , nor owkhtin ariwnĕ , or gĕ tʾapʾowi shaterow hamar .
41014025	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Asgē etkʾ ortʾatowngin perkʾēn pnaw biti chʾkhmem minchʾew ayn ōrĕ , erp nor khmem zayn Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean mēch ” » .
41014026	ōrhnerkelē etkʾ , katsʾin TSitʾeninerow leṛĕ .
41014027	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ays kisher polort al biti kaytʾagghikʾ im batjaṛovs : orovhetew krowadz ē : “ Hoviwĕ biti zarnem , ow ochʾkharnerĕ biti tsʾrowin ” .
41014028	Paytsʾ yarowtʾiwn aṛnelēs etkʾ , tsezmē aṛach biti ertʾam Kalilea » .
41014029	Betros ĕsaw anor : « Tʾēew polorn al kaytʾagghin , es , pnaw , , » .
41014030	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem kʾezi : “ Town aysōr , ays kisher isg , teṛ akʾaghaghĕ ergow ankam chʾganchʾadz , erekʾ ankam biti owranas zis ” » .
41014031	Betros aweli gĕ bntēr ow g!ĕsēr : « Noynisg etʾē bētkʾ ĕllay or kʾezi het meṛnim , pnaw biti chʾowranam kʾez » . Noynbēs g!ĕsēin polorn al .
41014032	Egan vayr mĕ , orown anownĕ Ketʾsemani ēr , ew ĕsaw ir ashagertnerown : « Hos nstetsʾēkʾ , minchʾew or es aghōtʾem » .
41014033	Iren het aṛnelov Betrosĕ , Yagoposn ow Yovhannēsĕ , sgsaw sastig aylaylil ew shat vshtanal .
41014034	Hetewapar ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Im antss chʾapʾazantsʾ trtowm ē , meṛnelow astijan : hos mnatsʾēkʾ ew artʾown getsʾēkʾ » .
41014035	Kʾichʾ mĕ aṛchew ertʾalov , ingaw ketin , ir eresin vray , ew aghōtʾetsʾ , or etʾē gareli ē , ayt zhamĕ antsʾni irmē .
41014036	An ĕsaw : « Appa , Hayr , amēn pan gareli ē kʾezi : heṛatsʾowr ays pa zhagĕ intsmē . Paytsʾ ochʾ tʾē inchʾbēs es g!owzem , haba , inchʾbēs town g!owzes » .
41014037	Erp egaw ow kʾnatsʾadz ktaw zanonkʾ , ĕsaw Betrosi : « Simon , gĕ kʾnanas : chʾgrtsʾar zham mĕ artʾown mnal .
41014038	Artʾown mnatsʾēkʾ ew aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ , orbēszi chʾmtnēkʾ pʾortsowtʾean mēch : iraw ē tʾē hokin yō zhar ē , paytsʾ marminĕ , tgar » .
41014039	Tartseal knatsʾ aghōtʾetsʾ , noyn khōskʾĕ ĕselov .
41014040	Aba veratartsaw ew tartseal kʾnatsʾadz ktaw zanonkʾ : orovhetew anontsʾ achʾkʾerĕ dzanratsʾadz ēin , ow chʾēin kiter inchʾ bataskhanel anor .
41014041	Errort ankam al egaw ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Asgē etkʾ kʾnatsʾēkʾ ow hankstatsʾēkʾ : pawagan ē , zhamĕ hasaw , aha martow Ortin biti matnowi meghawornerown tseṛkʾĕ .
41014042	Otkʾi elēkʾ , ertʾankʾ . Aha mōtetsʾaw an , or biti matnē zis » .
41014043	Minchʾ an teṛ gĕ khōsēr , isgoyn Yowta , tasnergowkʾēn mēgĕ , egaw , ew iren het , kʾahanayabetnerēn , tbirnerēn ow erētsʾnerēn ghrgowadz medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ , sowrerov ew pirerov .
41014044	Zayn matnoghĕ nshan mĕ tower ēr anontsʾ , ĕselov : « Ov or hampowrem , an ē , pṛnetsʾēkʾ zayn ow tarēkʾ abahovowtʾeamp » .
41014045	Erp inkʾ egaw , isgoyn mōtetsʾaw anor ew ĕsaw : « Ṛappi , Ṛappi » , ow hampowretsʾ zayn .
41014046	Ew anonkʾ tseṛkʾ partsratsʾowtsʾin anor vray ow pṛnetsʾin zayn .
41014047	Kʾovĕ gaynoghnerēn mēgĕ , kʾashetsʾ sowrĕ , zargaw kʾahanayabetin dzaṛayin ew khletsʾ anor aganchĕ .
41014048	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ipr tʾē awazagi tēm egakʾ , sowrerov ow pirerov pṛnelow zis .
41014049	Amēn ōr tser kʾov ēi ew tajarin mēch gĕ sorvetsʾnēi , ow chʾpṛnetsʾikʾ zis : paytsʾ ays polor panerĕ eghan , orbēszi krowadznerĕ irakordzowin » .
41014050	Polor ashagertnern al tʾoghowtsʾin zayn ew pʾakhan .
41014051	Eritasart mĕ anor gĕ hetewēr , merg marminin vray gtaw mĕ aṛadz , sagayn eritasartnerĕ pṛnetsʾin zayn .
41014052	An al tsketsʾ gtawĕ , ew merg pʾakhaw anontsʾmē .
41014053	Tarin Yisowsĕ kʾahanayabetin , ew anor kʾov hamakhmpowetsʾan polor kʾahanayabetnerĕ , erētsʾnern ow tbirnerĕ .
41014054	Betros heṛowēn hetewetsʾaw anor minchʾew nersĕ , kʾahanayabetin kawitʾĕ : nstaw sbasawornerown het , ow gĕ takʾnar gragin kʾov .
41014055	Kʾahanayabetnerĕ ew ampoghch ateanĕ vgayowtʾiwn gĕ pʾntṛēin Yisowsi tēm , orbēszi meṛtsʾnen zayn , ow chʾēin ktner :
41014056	orovhetew shater sowt vgayowtʾiwn gow tayin anor tēm , paytsʾ vgayowtʾiwnnerĕ hamanman chʾēin .
41014057	Omankʾ al ganknetsʾan ew sowt vgayowtʾiwn towin anor tēm , ĕselov :
41014058	« Menkʾ lsetsʾinkʾ atgē , or g!ĕsēr : “ Es biti kʾagem ayt tseṛagert tajarĕ , ew biti gaṛowtsʾanem owrish mĕ , antseṛagert , erekʾ ōrowan mēch ” » .
41014059	Paytsʾ aytbēs al irentsʾ vgayowtʾiwnĕ hamanman chʾēr .
41014060	Kʾahanayabetĕ , mēchtegh ganknelov , hartsʾowtsʾ Yisowsi : « Ochʾinchʾ gĕ bataskhanes : inchʾ gĕ vgayen asonkʾ kʾezi tēm » .
41014061	Paytsʾ an lowṛ gĕ genar ow ochʾinchʾ gĕ bataskhanēr . Kʾahanayabetĕ tartseal hartsʾowtsʾ anor : « Town es Kʾristosĕ , ōrhneal Astowdzoy Ortin » .
41014062	Yisows ĕsaw : « Es em : ew biti tesnēkʾ martow Ortin , pazmadz Zōrowtʾean ach goghmĕ , ow egadz erginkʾi amberov » .
41014063	Kʾahanayabetĕ batṛetsʾ ir hantertsnerĕ ew ĕsaw : « Al inchʾ bētkʾ owninkʾ vganerow .
41014064	Lsetsʾikʾ ator hayhoyowtʾiwnĕ : inchʾ gĕ tʾowi tsezi » . Polorĕ tatabartetsʾin zayn , tʾē mahabart ē .
41014065	Omankʾ sgsan tʾkʾnel anor vray , dzadzgel anor eresĕ , gṛpʾaharel zayn ew ĕsel anor : « Markarēatsʾir » . Isg sbasawornerĕ abtag gĕ zarnēin anor .
41014066	Betros varĕ , kawitʾn ēr . Kʾahanayabetin aghakhinnerēn mēgĕ egaw ,
41014067	ow tesnelov Betrosĕ , or gĕ takʾnar , nayetsʾaw anor ew ĕsaw : « Town al Yisows Nazovretsʾiin het ēir » .
41014068	Paytsʾ an owratsʾaw , ĕselov : « CHʾem kiter , ow chʾem hasgnar tʾē inchʾ gĕ khōsis » . Erp towrs elaw , nakhakawitʾĕ , akʾaghaghĕ ganchʾetsʾ .
41014069	Aghakhinĕ tartseal tesaw zayn , ew sgsaw ĕsel showrchĕ gaynoghnerown : « Asiga al anontsʾmē ē » .
41014070	An al tartseal owratsʾaw . Kʾichʾ mĕ atenēn etkʾ , tartseal showrchĕ gaynoghnerĕ ĕsin Betrosi : « Jshmartabēs town anontsʾmē es , orovhetew Kalileatsʾi es , ew khōsowadzkʾt al gĕ nmani » .
41014071	Paytsʾ an sgsaw nzovel ow ertowm ĕnel , ĕselov : « CHʾem janchʾnar ayt martĕ , orown masin gĕ khōsikʾ » .
41014072	Isgoyn ergrort ankam akʾaghaghĕ ganchʾetsʾ . Betros yishetsʾ ayn khōskʾĕ , or Yisows ĕser ēr iren : « Teṛ akʾaghaghĕ ergow ankam chʾganchʾadz , town erekʾ ankam biti owranas zis » : ew sgsaw lal .
41015001	Aṛtown , isgoyn kʾahanayabetnerĕ , erētsʾnerown ow tbirnerown het , naew ampoghch ateanĕ , khorhrtagtsʾetsʾan , gabetsʾin Yisowsĕ ow tarin matnetsʾin Bighatosi .
41015002	Bighatos hartsʾowtsʾ anor : « Town es Hreanerown tʾakaworĕ » . An al bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Town g!ĕses » .
41015003	Isg kʾahanayabetnerĕ g!ampastanēin zinkʾ shat panerov .
41015004	Bighatos tartseal hartsʾowtsʾ anor : « Ochʾinchʾ gĕ bataskhanes : nayē , orkʾan gĕ vgayen kʾezi tēm » .
41015005	Yisows tagawin ochʾinchʾ gĕ bataskhanēr , aynbēs or Bighatos zarmatsʾaw .
41015006	Tōnin atenĕ pantargeal mĕ g!artsagēr anontsʾ , ov or owzēin .
41015007	Mēgĕ gar , Parappa gochʾowadz , gabowadz iren het abstampoghnerown het , oronkʾ martasbanowtʾiwn kordzadz ēin abstampowtʾean aten .
41015008	Pazmowtʾiwnĕ , koṛalov , sgsaw khntrel , or ĕnē , inchʾbēs misht g!ĕnēr irentsʾ .
41015009	Bighatos bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « G!owzēkʾ or artsagem tsezi Hreanerown tʾakaworĕ » :
41015010	orovhetew kitēr tʾē kʾahanayabetnerĕ nakhantsi hamar matnadz ēin zayn .
41015011	Paytsʾ kʾahanayabetnerĕ krkṛetsʾin pazmowtʾiwnĕ , or an pʾokharēnĕ Parappan artsagē irentsʾ .
41015012	Tartseal Bighatos ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Haba inchʾ g!owzēkʾ or ĕnem anor , or gĕ gochʾēkʾ Hreanerown tʾakaworĕ » .
41015013	Anonkʾ tartseal aghaghagetsʾin : « KHachʾē zayn » .
41015014	Bighatos ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Paytsʾ inchʾ chʾarikʾ ĕradz ē » . Anonkʾ al aweli g!aghaghagēin : « KHachʾē zayn » .
41015015	Bighatos al , pʾapʾakʾelov kohatsʾnel pazmowtʾiwnĕ , Parappan artsagetsʾ anontsʾ , ow kharazanelov Yisowsĕ , yantsnetsʾ anontsʾ orbēszi khachʾowēr .
41015016	Zinowornerĕ ners tarin zayn , kawitʾĕ , aysinkʾn , gaṛavarichʾin balatĕ , ew hawakʾetsʾin ampoghch kowntĕ .
41015017	DZirani haktsʾowtsʾin anor , ow hiwselov pʾowshē bsag mĕ , trin anor klowkhĕ :
41015018	ew sgsan parewel zayn ow ĕsel : « Oghchoyn , Hreanerow tʾakawor » .
41015019	Eghēkov gĕ zarnēin anor klowkhin , gĕ tʾkʾnēin anor vray , ew dznratrelov , g!ergrbakēin anor .
41015020	Erp dzaghretsʾin zayn , hanetsʾin vrayēn dziranin , haktsʾowtsʾin anor ir hantertsnerĕ , ow towrs tarin zayn , orbēszi khachʾen .
41015021	Stibetsʾin mēgĕ , Simon Giwrenatsʾin , Aghekʾsantrosi ow Ṛowpʾosi hayrĕ , or atgē g!antsʾnēr , artēn kalov , orbēszi vertsʾnē anor khachʾĕ .
41015022	Ew tarin zayn Koghkotʾa gochʾowadz teghĕ , ( or gĕ tʾarkmanowi , Kangi tegh , )
41015023	ow towin anor zmowṛsov khaṛnowadz kini , or khmē : paytsʾ inkʾ chʾaṛaw .
41015024	Erp khachʾetsʾin zayn , pa zhnetsʾin anor hantertsnerĕ , vijag tskelov anontsʾ vray , tʾē ov , inchʾ biti aṛnē .
41015025	Errort zhamn , , ēr , erp khachʾetsʾin zayn .
41015026	Anor ampastanakirin vray krowadz ēr : « Hreanerown tʾakaworĕ » .
41015027	Ergow awazagner al khachʾetsʾin anor het , mēgĕ , anor ach goghmĕ , ow miwsĕ , tsakh goghmĕ .
41015028	Aysbēs irakordzowetsʾaw krowadzĕ , or g!ĕsē : « Anōrēnnerow het sebowetsʾaw » .
41015029	Anonkʾ or g!antsʾnēin , gĕ hayhoyēin anor , gĕ shar zhēin irentsʾ klowkhĕ ew g!ĕsēin : « Awagh , or gĕ kʾagēir tajarĕ , ow gĕ gaṛowtsʾanēir erekʾ ōrowan mēch :
41015030	pʾrgē town kʾez ew ichir khachʾēn » .
41015031	Nmanabēs kʾahanayabetnern al , tbirnerown het , irentsʾ mēch dzaghrelov g!ĕsēin : « Owrishnerĕ pʾrgetsʾ , inkʾzinkʾ chʾi grnar pʾrgel .
41015032	Ayt Kʾristosĕ , Israyēli tʾakaworĕ , hima tʾogh ichnē khachʾēn , orbēszi tesnenkʾ ow hawatankʾ » . Iren het khachʾowadznern al gĕ nakhatēin zayn .
41015033	Erp vetsʾerort zhamĕ hasaw , khawar eghaw ampoghch ergrin vray , minchʾew innerort zhamĕ .
41015034	Innerort zhamown , Yisows partsratsayn kochʾetsʾ : « Ēlohi , Ēlohi , lama sapakʾtʾani » , or gĕ tʾarkmanowi : « Im Astowadzs , im Astowadzs , inchʾow lkʾetsʾir zis » .
41015035	Kʾovĕ gaynoghnerēn omankʾ , erp lsetsʾin , ĕsin : « Eghian gĕ ganchʾē » .
41015036	Ow mēgĕ vazetsʾ , letsʾowtsʾ sbownk mĕ kʾatsʾakhov , antsʾowtsʾ eghēki mĕ ew towaw anor or khmē , ĕselov : « Tʾoghowtsʾēkʾ , tesnenkʾ tʾē Eghia biti kay , ichetsʾnelow zayn » .
41015037	Yisows partsr tsayn mĕ artsagetsʾ ow hokin towaw .
41015038	Tajarin varakoyrĕ ergowkʾi batṛetsʾaw , verēn var .
41015039	Hariwrabetĕ , or getsʾadz ēr anor timatsʾ , tesnelov or aysbēs aghaghagelov hokin towaw , ĕsaw : « Jshmartabēs ays martĕ Astowdzoy Ortin ēr » .
41015040	Giner al gayin , oronkʾ heṛowēn gĕ nayēin . Anontsʾ mēch ēin Mariam Maktaghenatsʾin , Grtser Yagoposi ow Yovsēsi mayrĕ , Mariam , ew Soghovmē ,
41015041	oronkʾ , erp Yisows Kalilea ēr , hetewer ow sbasarger ēin anor . Owrish shat giner al gayin , oronkʾ anor het eladz ēin Erowsaghēm .
41015042	Erp artēn irigown eghaw , kʾani or ayt ōrĕ Owrpatʾ ēr , aysinkʾn , SHapatʾin nakhort ōrĕ ,
41015043	Yovsēpʾ Arimatʾeatsʾin , medzayark khorhrtagan mĕ , or inkʾ al gĕ sbasēr Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean , egaw ow yantknowtʾeamp mtaw Bighatosi kʾov , ew khntretsʾ Yisowsi marminĕ .
41015044	Bighatos zarmatsʾaw or artēn meṛadz ē . Ganchʾelov hariwrabetĕ , hartsʾowtsʾ anor tʾē shatontsʾ meṛadz ē .
41015045	Ow erp stoykĕ kittsʾaw hariwrabetēn , barkewetsʾ marminĕ Yovsēpʾi .
41015046	Yovsēpʾ gtaw knetsʾ , ew ichetsʾnelov zayn , pʾatʾtʾetsʾ gtawov , traw kerezmani mĕ mēch , or pʾorowadz ēr zhayṛi mēch , ow kʾar mĕ kloretsʾ kerezmanin towṛĕ .
41015047	Mariam Maktaghenatsʾin , ew Yovsēsi mayrĕ , Mariam , gĕ nayēin tʾē owr gĕ tnēin zayn .
41016001	Erp SHapatʾĕ antsʾaw , Mariam Maktaghenatsʾin , Yagoposi mayrĕ , Mariam , ow Soghovmē poyrer knetsʾin , orbēszi ertʾan ew ōdzen zayn .
41016002	Mēgshaptʾi aṛtown , shat ganowkh , erp arewĕ gĕ dzakēr , katsʾin kerezmanĕ ,
41016003	ow g!ĕsēin irarow : « Mezi hamar ov biti klorē kʾarĕ , kerezmanin tṛnēn » ,
41016004	orovhetew shat medz ēr . Paytsʾ nayelov , tesan tʾē kʾarĕ klorowadz ēr .
41016005	Mtnelov kerezmanēn ners , tesan eritasart mĕ , or nstadz ēr ach goghmĕ , jermag barekōt hakadz , ew zarhowretsʾan .
41016006	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Mi zarhowrikʾ : Yisows Nazovretsʾin gĕ pʾntṛēkʾ , or khachʾowetsʾaw . An yarowtʾiwn aṛaw , hos chʾē . Aha ayn teghĕ , owr trin zayn .
41016007	Owremn katsʾēkʾ , ĕsēkʾ anor ashagertnerown ow Betrosi , tʾē aha tsezmē aṛach g!ertʾay Kalilea : hon biti tesnēkʾ zayn , inchʾbēs ĕsaw tsezi » .
41016008	Anonkʾ , toghov ew hiatsʾowmov hamagowadz , towrs elan , , ow pʾakhan kerezmanēn , ew ochʾ mēg pan ĕsin oewē mēgown , kʾani or gĕ vakhnayin .
41016009	Yisows , Mēgshaptʾi aṛtown yarowtʾiwn aṛadz , nakh erewtsʾaw Mariam Maktaghenatsʾiin , ormē haner ēr eōtʾĕ tew .
41016010	Inkʾ al knatsʾ ew batmetsʾ anontsʾ , oronkʾ anor het ēin , minchʾ gĕ skayin ow gow layin .
41016011	Isg erp anonkʾ lsetsʾin tʾē an oghch ē ew inkʾ tesadz ē zayn , chʾhawatatsʾin .
41016012	Yetoy owrish gerbarankʾov erewtsʾaw anontsʾmē ergowkʾin , oronkʾ kʾalelov artĕ g!ertʾayin .
41016013	Irenkʾ al katsʾin ow batmetsʾin miwsnerown : paytsʾ irentsʾ al chʾhawatatsʾin .
41016014	Yetoy erewtsʾaw tasnmēgin , erp seghan nstadz ēin , ow gshtampetsʾ anontsʾ anhawatowtʾiwnĕ ew sirti gardzrowtʾiwnĕ , orovhetew chʾhawatatsʾin anontsʾ , orontsʾ inkʾ erewtsʾaw , meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛadz .
41016015	Naew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Katsʾēkʾ ampoghch ashkharhĕ , ow kʾarozetsʾēkʾ awetaranĕ polor araradznerown .
41016016	An or hawatay ew mgrtowi , biti pʾrgowi : an or chʾhawatay , biti tatabartowi .
41016017	Sa nshannerĕ biti hetewin anontsʾ , or gĕ hawatan : - tewer towrs biti hanen im anownovs , nor lezowner biti khōsin ,
41016018	ōtser biti aṛnen irentsʾ tseṛkʾerown mēch , ow etʾē khmen mahaṛitʾ tegh mĕ , biti chʾvnasē irentsʾ : tseṛkʾ biti tnen hiwantnerow vray , ew anonkʾ biti aṛoghchanan » .
41016019	Aysbēs , anontsʾ het khōselēn etkʾ , Tērĕ hampartsaw erginkʾ , ow pazmetsʾaw Astowdzoy ach goghmĕ :
41016020	isg anonkʾ katsʾin ew gĕ kʾarozēin amēnowrekʾ . Tērĕ anontsʾ kordzagitsʾ ēr , ow gĕ hastatēr khōskʾĕ , ĕngeratsʾogh nshannerov . Amēn .
42001001	Kʾani shater tseṛnargetsʾin garki tnel mer mēch hastat kittsʾowadz panerown batmowtʾiwnĕ ,
42001002	inchʾbēs sgizpēn awantetsʾin mezi aganates vganerĕ ew khōskʾin sbasawornerĕ ,
42001003	indzi al , or sgizpēn hetewadz ēi ayt polor panerown , yarmar tʾowetsʾaw garkov krel kʾezi , batowagan Tʾēopʾilos ,
42001004	orbēszi kitnas stoykĕ ayn panerown masin , orontsʾ hamatsayn grtʾowetsʾar .
42001005	Hrēastani Herovtēs tʾakaworin ōrerĕ , Apiayi tasēn Zakʾaria anownov kʾahanay mĕ gar , orown ginĕ Aharoni aghchignerēn ēr , anownĕ , Eghisapētʾ .
42001006	Ergowkʾn al Astowdzoy aṛchew artar ēin , anmeghatreli gerbov ĕntʾanalov Tēroch polor batowirannerown ew ganonnerown hamatsayn .
42001007	Zawag chʾownēin , orovhetew Eghisapētʾ amowl ēr , ow ergowkʾn al yaṛachatsʾadz tarikʾ ownēin .
42001008	Minchʾ an , ir tasin ōrerĕ hasnelown hamar , kʾahanayowtʾiwn gĕ gatarēr Astowdzoy aṛchew ,
42001009	kʾahanayowtʾean sovorowtʾean hamatsayn , iren vijagowetsʾaw Tēroch tajarĕ mtnel ew khowng dzkhel .
42001010	ZHoghovowrtin ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ towrsĕ aghōtʾkʾi gaynadz ēr , khowngi zhamown .
42001011	Ayt aten Tēroch hreshtagĕ erewtsʾaw anor , ow gaynetsʾaw khowngi zohaseghanin ach goghmĕ .
42001012	Erp Zakʾaria tesaw , vrtovetsʾaw , ew vakhĕ hamagetsʾ zinkʾ , , .
42001013	Hreshtagĕ ĕsaw anor : « Mi vakhnar , Zakʾaria , orovhetew kʾow aghersankʾt ĕntownowetsʾaw . Gint , Eghisapētʾ orti mĕ biti dznani kʾezi , ew anor anownĕ Yovhannēs biti gochʾes .
42001014	Kʾezi owrakhowtʾiwn ow tsʾndzowtʾiwn biti ĕllay , ew shater biti owrakhanan anor dznowntin hamar :
42001015	orovhetew Tēroch aṛchew medz biti ĕllay . Ochʾ kini biti khmē , ochʾ al ōghi , ow teṛ ir mōr orovaynēn Sowrp Hokiov biti letsʾowi ,
42001016	ew Israyēli ortinerēn shaterĕ biti tartsnē Tēroch , irentsʾ Astowdzoyn .
42001017	Inkʾ biti kay anor aṛchewēn , Eghiayi hokiov ow zōrowtʾeamp , hayrerown sirtĕ veratartsnelow tēbi zawagnerĕ , ew anhnazantnerĕ , artarnerown imastowtʾean , orbēszi batrastē Tēroch pareyō zhar zhoghovowrt mĕ » .
42001018	Zakʾaria ĕsaw hreshtagin : « Inchʾbēs kitnam atiga , orovhetew es dzer em , ow gins yaṛachatsʾadz tarikʾ owni » .
42001019	Hreshtagĕ bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Es Kapriēln em , or gĕ gaynim Astowdzoy aṛchew , ow ghrgowetsʾay kʾezi , khōselow ew ays panerĕ kʾezi awetelow .
42001020	Aha town hamr biti ĕllas , ow biti chʾgarenas khōsil minchʾew ayn ōrĕ , erp ays panerĕ ĕllan , kʾani or chʾhawatatsʾir im khōskʾerows , oronkʾ biti irakordzowin irentsʾ atenin » .
42001021	ZHoghovowrtĕ gĕ sbasēr Zakʾariayi , ew gĕ zarmanayin or an g!owshanar tajarin mēch .
42001022	Erp towrs elaw , chʾēr grnar khōsil anontsʾ het : owsti ĕmpṛnetsʾin tʾē tesilkʾ mĕ tesadz ē tajarin mēch . Ew inkʾ nshan g!ĕnēr anontsʾ , ow hamr gĕ mnar .
42001023	Erp ir bashtōnin ōrerĕ lratsʾan , ir townĕ knatsʾ .
42001024	Ayt ōrerēn etkʾ anor ginĕ , Eghisapētʾ yghatsʾaw , ew hink amis gĕ bahowĕtēr ow g!ĕsēr :
42001025	« Aysbēs ĕraw indzi Tērĕ , ays ōrerows , or im vras nayetsʾaw , nakhatinkʾs martotsʾ mēchēn vertsʾnelow hamar » .
42001026	Vetsʾerort amsowan mēch , Kapriēl hreshtagĕ Astowdzmē ghrgowetsʾaw Kalileayi mēg kʾaghakʾĕ , orown anownĕ Nazarētʾ ēr ,
42001027	goysi mĕ , martow mĕ nshanowadz , orown anownĕ Yovsēpʾ ēr , Tawitʾi townēn : ayt goysin anownĕ Mariam ēr .
42001028	Hreshtagĕ anor kʾov mtnelov , ĕsaw : « Oghchoyn , shnorhĕngal goys , Tērĕ kʾezi het ē . Town ginerown mēch ōrhneal es » .
42001029	Tesnelov zayn , shpʾotʾetsʾaw anor khōskʾēn , ew inkʾniren gĕ mtadzēr tʾē inchʾ tesag parew ēr atiga .
42001030	Hreshtagĕ ĕsaw anor : « Mi vakhnar , Mariam , orovhetew shnorhkʾ ktar Astowdzoy kʾov .
42001031	Aha biti yghanas orovaynit mēch ow orti mĕ biti dznanis , ew anor anownĕ Yisows biti gochʾes .
42001032	An medz biti ĕllay ow Amenapartsrin Ortin biti gochʾowi . Tēr Astowadz anor biti tay ir hōr , Tawitʾi kahĕ , ew Yagopi tan vray yawitean biti tʾakaworē .
42001033	Anor tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ vakhjan biti chʾownenay » .
42001034	Mariam ĕsaw hreshtagin : « Inchʾbēs biti ĕllay ayt panĕ , kʾani or es ayr mart chʾem kiter » .
42001035	Hreshtagĕ bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Sowrp Hokin biti kay vrat , ow Amenapartsrin zōrowtʾiwnĕ hovani biti ĕllay kʾezi : owsti ayn sowrpĕ or kʾezmē biti dzni , Astowdzoy Orti biti gochʾowi .
42001036	Aha kʾow azkagant , Eghisapētʾ , inkʾ al , ir dzerowtʾean aten , ortiov mĕ yghi ē : ew asiga vetsʾerort amisn ē anor , or amowl gochʾowadz ēr :
42001037	orovhetew ochʾinchʾ angareli ē Astowdzoy » .
42001038	Mariam ĕsaw : « Aha es Tēroch aghakhinn em , kʾow khōskʾit hamatsayn tʾogh ĕllay indzi » . Ow hreshtagĕ knatsʾ anor kʾovēn .
42001039	Ayt ōrerĕ Mariam ganknetsʾaw , pʾowtʾalov knatsʾ leṛnagoghmĕ , Yowtayi mēg kʾaghakʾĕ ,
42001040	mtaw Zakʾariayi townĕ ew parewetsʾ Eghisapētʾĕ .
42001041	Erp Eghisapētʾ lsetsʾ Mariami parewĕ , erakhan khaytatsʾ anor orovaynin mēch : isg Eghisapētʾ letsʾowetsʾaw Sowrp Hokiov ,
42001042	ow partsratsayn kochʾelov ĕsaw : « Town ōrhneal es ginerown mēch , ew ōrhneal ē orovaynit btowghĕ .
42001043	Ays inchʾbēs eghaw , or im Tērochs mayrĕ egaw indzi :
42001044	orovhetew aha erp kʾow parewit tsaynĕ hasaw aganchis , erakhan tsʾndzowtʾenēn khaytatsʾ orovaynis mēch .
42001045	Erani anor , or hawatatsʾadz ē , orovhetew , , biti gatarowin ayn panerĕ , oronkʾ Tērochmēn ĕsowetsʾan iren » .
42001046	Mariam ĕsaw : « Im antss gĕ medzarē Tērĕ ,
42001047	ew im hokis tsʾndzatsʾ im Pʾrgichʾ Astowdzmovs ,
42001048	kʾani or nayetsʾaw ir aghakhinin nowastowtʾean : artarew aha asgē etkʾ , polor serowntnerĕ eraneli biti gochʾen zis ,
42001049	orovhetew Hzōrĕ medzamedz paner ĕraw indzi . Anor anownĕ sowrp ē ,
42001050	ew anor oghormowtʾiwnĕ irmē vakhtsʾoghnerown vray ē , serowntē serownt .
42001051	Ir pazowgov zōrowtʾiwn tsʾoytsʾ towaw , tsʾrowetsʾ ampartawannerĕ irentsʾ sirtin erewagayowtʾeamp .
42001052	Zōrawornerĕ ichetsʾowtsʾ irentsʾ kaherēn , ow partsratsʾowtsʾ nowastnerĕ .
42001053	Anōtʾinerĕ liatsʾowtsʾ parikʾnerov , ew barab jampetsʾ harowstnerĕ .
42001054	ōknowtʾean hasaw ir Israyēl dzaṛayin , yishelov ir oghormowtʾiwnĕ
42001055	inchʾbēs inkʾ khostatsʾadz ēr mer hayrerown - Aprahami ew anor zarmin hantēb , yawitean » .
42001056	Mariam anor kʾov mnatsʾ , kretʾē erekʾ amis , aba veratartsaw ir townĕ .
42001057	Eghisapētʾi dznanelow zhamanagĕ lratsʾaw , ow orti mĕ dznaw .
42001058	Erp lsetsʾin anonkʾ , or gĕ pnagēin anor showrchĕ , naew anor azkagannerĕ , tʾē Tērĕ medzaradz ēr zayn ir oghormowtʾeamp , anor het owrakhatsʾan .
42001059	Owtʾerort ōrĕ egan manowgĕ tʾlpʾatelow , ew Zakʾaria gĕ gochʾēin zayn , ir hōr anownov .
42001060	Isg anor mayrĕ ĕsaw : « Ochʾ , ayl , Yovhannēs biti gochʾowi » .
42001061	Iren ĕsin : « Kʾow azkagannerowt mēch chʾgay mēgĕ , or ays anownov gochʾowi » .
42001062	Nshan ĕrin anor hōr tʾē inchʾ anownov g!owzē or an gochʾowi .
42001063	Inkʾ al takhtag mĕ owzetsʾ ow kretsʾ : « Yovhannēs ē anor anownĕ » . Polorn al zarmatsʾan .
42001064	Anmichabēs patsʾowetsʾaw ir peranĕ , naew , lezown , ow khōsetsʾaw ew ōrhnetsʾ Astowadz .
42001065	Vakhĕ hamagetsʾ polor anontsʾ showrchĕ pnagoghnerĕ , ew ays polor panerĕ gĕ batmowēin Hrēastani ampoghch leṛnagoghmĕ .
42001066	Polor lsoghnerĕ anontsʾ masin gĕ mtadzēin , , ow g!ĕsēin : « Arteōkʾ inchʾ biti ĕllay ays manowgĕ » . Ew Tēroch tseṛkʾĕ anor het ēr .
42001067	Anor hayrĕ , Zakʾaria , Sowrp Hokiov letsʾowadz , markarēatsʾaw ow ĕsaw :
42001068	« ōrhneal ĕllay Tērĕ , Israyēli Astowadzĕ , or aytsʾeletsʾ ir zhoghovowrtin ew azatakretsʾ zayn .
42001069	Mezi pʾrgowtʾean eghchiwr mĕ hanetsʾ ir Tawitʾ dzaṛayin townēn ,
42001070	( inchʾbēs khōsetsʾaw sowrperown peranov , oronkʾ tarerow sgizpēn i ver anor markarēnern ēin , )
42001071	pʾrgowtʾiwn talow mer tʾshnaminerēn ow polor mez atoghnerown tseṛkʾēn ,
42001072	irakordzelow mer hayrerown khostatsʾadz oghormowtʾiwnĕ ew yishelow ir sowrp owkhtĕ ,
42001073	( ayn ertowmĕ or mer hōr , Aprahami ĕraw , ) orbēszi mezi shnorhē ,
42001074	mer tʾshnaminerown tseṛkʾēn azatelov , aṛantsʾ vakhi bashtel zinkʾ ,
42001075	srpowtʾeamp ew artarowtʾeamp ĕntʾanalov ir aṛchew , mer geankʾin polor ōrerown mēch .
42001076	Isg town , manowg , Amenapartsrin markarēn biti gochʾowis , orovhetew “ biti ertʾas Tēroch aṛchewēn , anor jampanerĕ batrastelow ,
42001077	anor zhoghovowrtin kittsʾnelow irentsʾ pʾrgowtʾiwnĕ , irentsʾ meghkʾerown nerowmov ” ,
42001078	mer Astowdzoyn ktʾaṛat oghormowtʾeamp , orov DZakogh arewĕ partsrēn aytsʾeletsʾ mezi ,
42001079	“ pʾaylelow khawari ew mahowan showkʾi mēch pnagoghnerown vray ” , ow mer otkʾerĕ owghghelow tēbi khaghaghowtʾean jampan » .
42001080	Manowgĕ gĕ medznar ow gĕ zōranar hokiov , ew anabatnerown mēch ēr , minchʾew ayn ōrĕ , erp tartseal tsʾoytsʾ towaw inkʾzinkʾ Israyēli .
42002001	Ayt ōrerĕ ōkostos gaysrēn hramanakir elaw , or ampoghch ergrakowntĕ artsanakrowi .
42002002	( Ays aṛachin ashkharhakirĕ eghaw , erp Giwrenos Sowriayi vray gaṛavarichʾ ēr . )
42002003	Polorĕ g!ertʾayin artsanakrowelow , iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ , ir kʾaghakʾin mēch .
42002004	Yovsēpʾ al , Kalileayēn , Nazarētʾ kʾaghakʾēn , partsratsʾaw tēbi Hrēastan , Tawitʾi kʾaghakʾĕ , or Petʾlehēm gĕ gochʾowi , ( kʾani inkʾ Tawitʾi townēn ew kertastanēn ēr , )
42002005	artsanakrowelow Mariami het , or ir nshanadzn ēr ow yghi ēr .
42002006	Erp anonkʾ hon ēin , anor dznanelow ōrerĕ lratsʾan :
42002007	ew ir antranig ortin dznaw , khantsarowrov pʾatʾtʾetsʾ zayn ow msowrin mēch baṛgetsʾowtsʾ , orovhetew ichewanin mēch tegh chʾgar irentsʾ .
42002008	Ayt ergramasĕ tashtapnag hoviwner gayin , oronkʾ irentsʾ hōterĕ gĕ bahbanēin kisherowan mēch .
42002009	Ew aha Tēroch hreshtagĕ anontsʾ vray hasaw , Tēroch pʾaṛkʾĕ anontsʾ showrchĕ pʾayletsʾaw , ow sastig vakhtsʾan .
42002010	Paytsʾ hreshtagĕ ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Mi vakhnakʾ , orovhetew aha es medz owrakhowtʾean awetis mĕ gow tam tsezi , or ampoghch zhoghovowrtin biti ĕllay :
42002011	orovhetew aysōr , Tawitʾi kʾaghakʾin mēch , Pʾrgichʾ mĕ dznaw tsezi , or ōdzeal Tērn ē .
42002012	Ew sa tsezi nshan mĕ biti ĕllay : erakhay mĕ biti ktnēkʾ , khantsarowrov pʾatʾtʾowadz ow msowri mēch baṛgadz » .
42002013	Yangardz ayt hreshtagin het ergnayin zōrkʾerow pazmowtʾiwn mĕ eghaw , oronkʾ Astowadz gĕ kovapanēin ew g!ĕsēin :
42002014	« Amenapartsr vayrerown mēch , Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾ , ergri vray , khaghaghowtʾiwn , martotsʾ mēch , pareatsʾagamowtʾiwn » .
42002015	Erp hreshtagnerĕ erginkʾ vertsʾowetsʾan anontsʾmē , hoviwnerĕ ĕsin irarow : « Egēkʾ , ertʾankʾ minchʾew Petʾlehēm , ow tesnenkʾ tʾē inchʾ ē ays eghadz panĕ , or Tērĕ kittsʾowtsʾ mezi » .
42002016	Owsti katsʾin ajabarelov , ew ktan Mariamn ow Yovsēpʾĕ , ew msowrin mēch baṛgadz erakhan .
42002017	Erp tesan , kittsʾowtsʾin ayn khōskʾĕ , or ays manowgin masin ĕsowetsʾaw irentsʾ .
42002018	Polor lsoghnerĕ gĕ zarmanayin ayn panerown vray , or hoviwnerĕ gĕ batmēin irentsʾ .
42002019	Isg Mariam gĕ bahēr ays polor panerĕ ir sirtin mēch , ew gĕ khorhrtadzēr .
42002020	Yetoy hoviwnerĕ veratartsan , pʾaṛapanelov ow kovapanelov Astowadz ayn polor panerown hamar , or lsetsʾin ew tesan , inchʾbēs irentsʾ ĕsowadz ēr .
42002021	Erp owtʾ ōrerĕ lratsʾan , manowgĕ tarin tʾlpʾatelow . Anor anownĕ trowetsʾaw Yisows , or hreshtagin gochʾadz anownn ēr , teṛ inkʾ mōrĕ orovaynin mēch chʾyghatsʾowadz .
42002022	Erp anontsʾ makʾrowtʾean ōrerĕ lratsʾan , Movsēsi ōrēnkʾin hamatsayn , Erowsaghēm tarin zayn , Tēroch nergayatsʾnelow ,
42002023	( inchʾbēs krowadz ē Tēroch ōrēnkʾin mēch : « Amēn arow or arkant gĕ panay , biti gochʾowi “ Tēroch srpatsʾadz ” » , )
42002024	ow Tēroch ōrēnkʾin mēch ĕsowadzin hamatsayn zoh mĕ ĕndzayelow , zoyk mĕ tatrag , gam aghawnii ergow tsak .
42002025	Ayt aten , , Erowsaghēmi mēch mart mĕ gar , orown anownĕ Simēon ēr . An artar ew parebasht ēr , Israyēli mkhitʾarowtʾean gĕ sbasēr , ow Sowrp Hokin anor vray ēr .
42002026	An batkam statsʾadz ēr Sowrp Hokiēn tʾē mah biti chʾtesnēr , minchʾew or tesnēr Tēroch ōdzealĕ .
42002027	An al , aṛachnortowelov Hokiēn , egaw tajarĕ : ow erp dznoghnerĕ perin Yisows manowgĕ , orbēszi ōrēnkʾin sovorowtʾean hamatsayn gataren anor hamar ,
42002028	inkʾ al aṛaw zayn ir kirgĕ , ōrhnetsʾ Astowadz ew ĕsaw :
42002029	« Hima , Tēr , artsagē dzaṛat khaghaghowtʾeamp , kʾow khōskʾit hamatsayn :
42002030	orovhetew achʾkʾers tesan kʾow pʾrgowtʾiwnt ,
42002031	or batrastetsʾir polor zhoghovowrtnerown aṛchew ,
42002032	loys mĕ , hetʾanosnerĕ lowsaworelow , ow pʾaṛkʾ , Israyēli , kʾow zhoghovowrtit » .
42002033	Yovsēpʾ ew anor mayrĕ zarmatsʾadz ēin ayn panerown vray , or gĕ khōsowēin anor masin .
42002034	Simēon ōrhnetsʾ zanonkʾ , ew ĕsaw anor mōr , Mariami : « Aha ays manowgĕ sahmanowadz ē shat martotsʾ iynalown ow ellelown hamar , Israyēli mēch , ew hagajaṛowtʾean nshan mĕ ĕllalow hamar :
42002035	( ew kʾow sirtit mēchēn al tʾowr mĕ biti antsʾni , , : ) orbēszi shat sirterow mtadzowmnerĕ yaytnowin » .
42002036	Naew hon ēr Anna markarēowhin , Pʾanowēli aghchigĕ , Aseri tohmēn . An yaṛachatsʾadz tarikʾ ownēr : amowsinin het eōtʾĕ tari abradz ēr ir gowsowtʾenēn etkʾ ,
42002037	ow ayri ēr , kretʾē owtʾsownchʾors taregan . An chʾēr heṛanar tajarēn , haba dzomov ew aghersankʾov gĕ bashtēr Astowadz , kisher ow tsʾereg .
42002038	Ayt noyn bahown an egaw , nerpoghetsʾ Tērĕ , ew khōsetsʾaw anor masin polor anontsʾ , or Erowsaghēmi mēch gĕ sbasēin azatakrowtʾean .
42002039	Erp kordzatretsʾin amēn pan , Tēroch ōrēnkʾin hamatsayn , veratartsan Kalilea , irentsʾ Nazarētʾ kʾaghakʾĕ .
42002040	Ew manowgĕ gĕ medznar ow hokiov gĕ zōranar , imastowtʾeamp letsʾowadz , ew Astowdzoy shnorhkʾĕ anor vray ēr .
42002041	Anor dznoghnerĕ amēn tari , Zatigi tōnin , g!ertʾayin Erowsaghēm .
42002042	Ow erp an eghaw tasnergow taregan , partsratsʾan Erowsaghēm , tōnin sovorowtʾean hamatsayn .
42002043	Erp ōrerĕ awartetsʾin ow veratartsan , Yisows batanin mnatsʾ Erowsaghēm . Paytsʾ Yovsēpʾ ew anor mayrĕ chʾēin kiter :
42002044	haba gardzelov tʾē an owghegitsʾnerown het ē , mēg ōrowan jampay katsʾin , ow gĕ pʾntṛēin zayn irentsʾ azkagannerown ew dzanōtʾnerown mēch .
42002045	Erp chʾktan , Erowsaghēm veratartsan zayn pʾntṛelow .
42002046	Erekʾ ōr etkʾ ktan zayn tajarin mēch : nstadz ēr vartabetnerown het , mtig g!ĕnēr anontsʾ ew pan gĕ hartsʾnēr .
42002047	Polor zayn lsoghnerĕ gĕ zmaylēin anor khelkʾēn ow bataskhannerēn .
42002048	Erp tesan zayn , abshadz mnatsʾin , ew mayrĕ ĕsaw anor : « Orteag , inchʾow aytbēs ĕrir mezi : aha hayrt ow es gĕ pʾntṛēinkʾ kʾez , chʾapʾazantsʾ mormokʾadz » .
42002049	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾow gĕ pʾntṛēikʾ zis : chʾēikʾ kiter tʾē es bētkʾ ē ĕllam im Hōrs townĕ » .
42002050	Sagayn anonkʾ chʾhasgtsʾan ays khōskʾĕ , or ĕsaw irentsʾ .
42002051	Yetoy ichaw anontsʾ het ow knatsʾ Nazarētʾ , ew gĕ hbatagēr anontsʾ : paytsʾ anor mayrĕ ays polor khōskʾerĕ gĕ bahēr ir sirtin mēch .
42002052	Yisows gĕ zarkanar imastowtʾeamp ow hasagov , ew shnorhkʾ ktnelov Astowdzoy ow martotsʾ kʾov .
42003001	Tiperios gaysrin kahagalowtʾean tasnhinkerort tarin , erp Bontatsʾi Bighatos Hrēastani vray gaṛavarichʾ ēr , Herovtēs , Kalileayi vray chʾorrortabet , anor eghpayrĕ , Pʾilibbos , Itowrayi ow Trakʾonatsʾinerow ergrin vray chʾorrortabet , ew Liwsanias , Apilenēi vray chʾorrortabet ,
42003002	Annayi ow Gayiapʾayi kʾahanayabetowtʾean aten , Astowadz khōsetsʾaw , , Zakʾariayi ortiin , Yovhannēsi , anabatin mēch .
42003003	An al egaw Yortanani shrchagaykʾĕ ew abashkharowtʾean mgrtowtʾiwn gĕ kʾarozēr , meghkʾerow nerowmin hamar ,
42003004	inchʾbēs krowadz ē Esayi markarēin khōskʾerown kirkʾin mēch : « Anabatin mēch kochʾoghin tsaynĕ : “ Batrastetsʾēkʾ Tēroch jampan , shtgetsʾēkʾ anor shawighnerĕ .
42003005	Amēn tsor biti letsʾowi , ew amēn leṛ ow plowr biti tsʾadznay : dzowṛĕ biti shtgowi , khortowport tegherĕ biti ĕllan hartʾ jampaner ,
42003006	ew amēn marmin biti tesnē Astowdzoy pʾrgowtʾiwnĕ ” » .
42003007	Irmē mgrtowelow egogh pazmowtʾean ĕsaw : « I zherow dznowntner , ov imatsʾowtsʾ tsezi , khowsapʾil kalikʾ pargowtʾenēn .
42003008	Owremn abashkharowtʾean ar zhanavayel btowgh perēkʾ , ew mi sgsikʾ tser mēch ĕsel : “ Menkʾ Aprahamĕ owninkʾ ipr hayr ” : kʾani or gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē Astowadz garogh ē ays kʾarerēn hanel Aprahami zawagner .
42003009	Gatsʾinĕ artēn isg trowadz ē dzaṛerow armatin kʾov : owremn amēn dzaṛ , or law btowgh chʾi perer , biti gtrowi ow gragĕ netowi » .
42003010	Pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ hartsʾowtsʾin iren : « Owremn inchʾ ĕnenkʾ » .
42003011	An al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Ov or ergow pajgon owni , mēgĕ tʾogh tay chʾownetsʾoghin , ew ov or geragowr owni , noynbēs ĕnē » .
42003012	Makʾsaworner al egan mgrtowelow , ew ĕsin anor : « Vartabet , menkʾ inchʾ ĕnenkʾ » .
42003013	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Mi bahanchēkʾ aweli , kʾan inchʾ or tsezi batowirowadz ē » .
42003014	Zinowornern al gĕ hartsʾnēin anor : « Menkʾ inchʾ ĕnenkʾ » . Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ochʾ mēgĕ harstaharetsʾēkʾ , ochʾ mēgĕ zrbartetsʾēkʾ , haba pawararowetsʾēkʾ tser tʾoshagov » .
42003015	Kʾani zhoghovowrtĕ agngalowtʾean mēch ēr , ew polorĕ gĕ mtadzēin irentsʾ sirtin mēch Yovhannēsi masin , tʾē arteōkʾ inkʾ ē Kʾristosĕ ,
42003016	Yovhannēs bataskhanetsʾ polorin : « Artarew es gĕ mgrtem tsez chowrov , paytsʾ intsmē aweli hzōrĕ gow kay , orown gōshignerown gaberĕ kʾagelow ar zhani chʾem : aniga biti mgrtē tsez Sowrp Hokiov ow gragov .
42003017	Anor hedzanotsʾĕ ir tseṛkʾn ē : ir galĕ biti makʾrē ew tsʾorenĕ biti zhoghvē ir amparĕ , isg yartĕ biti ayrē anshēch gragov » .
42003018	Owrish shat paner al g!awetēr , zhoghovowrtĕ yortorelov .
42003019	Paytsʾ Herovtēs chʾorrortabetĕ , gshtampowelov angē ir eghpōr gnoch , Herovtiayi hamar , naew polor chʾarikʾnerown hamar , or Herovtēs ĕradz ēr ,
42003020	sa al aweltsʾowtsʾ ayt polorin vray : - pantargetsʾ Yovhannēsĕ .
42003021	Ampoghch zhoghovowrtĕ mgrtowetsʾaw : Yisows al mgrtowetsʾaw , ow erp g!aghōtʾēr , erginkʾĕ patsʾowetsʾaw ,
42003022	ew Sowrp Hokin ichaw anor vray marmnawor erewoytʾov , aghawnii bēs , ow tsayn mĕ egaw erginkʾēn , or g!ĕsēr : « Town es im sireli Ortis , kʾezi hajetsʾay » .
42003023	Ew inkʾ , Yisows , sgsadz ēr kretʾē eresown taregan ĕllal . ( Inchʾbēs gĕ gardzowēr , ) an ortin ēr Yovsēpʾi , or Heghii , or Matatʾi ,
42003024	or GHewii , or Meghkʾii , or Yannēi , or Yovsēpʾi ,
42003025	or Matatʾiayi , or Amovsi , or Nawowmi , or Esghii , or Nankēi ,
42003026	or Maatʾi , or Matatʾiayi , or Semēii , or Yovsēpʾi , or Yowtayi ,
42003027	or Yovhannayi , or Resayi , or Zōrapapēli , or Saghatʾiēli , or Nerii ,
42003028	or Meghkʾii , or Attii , or Govsami , or Eghmovtati , or Ēri ,
42003029	or Yovsēsi , or Eghiazari , or Yovrimi , or Matatʾi , or GHewii ,
42003030	or Simēoni , or Yowtayi , or Yovsēpʾi , or Yovnani , or Eghiagimi ,
42003031	or Meleayi , or Maynani , or Matatʾayi , or Natʾani , or Tawitʾi ,
42003032	or Yessēi , or Ovpētʾi , or Poosi , or Saghmoni , or Naasoni ,
42003033	or Aminatapi , or Arami , or Esroni , or Pʾarēsi , or Yowtayi ,
42003034	or Yagopi , or Isahagi , or Aprahami , or Tʾarayi , or Nakʾovri ,
42003035	or Serowki , or Ṛakawi , or Pʾaghēgi , or Eperi , or Saghayi ,
42003036	or Gaynani , or Arpʾakʾsati , or Sēmi , or Noyi , or GHamēkʾi ,
42003037	or Matʾowsaghayi , or Enovkʾi , or Yareti , or Maghaghiēli , or Gaynani ,
42003038	or Enovsi , or Sētʾi , or Atami , or Astowdzoy ortin ēr .
42004001	Yisows , Sowrp Hokiov letsʾowadz , veratartsaw Yortananēn , ow Hokiēn tarowetsʾaw anabatĕ ,
42004002	owr kʾaṛasown ōr pʾortsowetsʾaw CHʾarakhōsēn . Ayt ōrerĕ ochʾinchʾ geraw : ew ayt ōrerown lranalēn etkʾ , anōtʾetsʾaw .
42004003	Ew CHʾarakhōsĕ ĕsaw anor : « Etʾē Astowdzoy Ortin es , ĕsē ayt kʾarin , or hatsʾ ĕllay » .
42004004	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Krowadz ē : “ Miayn hatsʾov chʾē or martĕ biti abri , haba , Astowdzoy amēn khōskʾov ” » .
42004005	CHʾarakhōsĕ , hanelov zayn partsr leṛ mĕ , tsʾowtsʾowtsʾ anor ergrakowntin polor tʾakaworowtʾiwnnerĕ vayrgeani mĕ mēch ,
42004006	ow CHʾarakhōsĕ ĕsaw anor : « Ays ampoghch ishkhanowtʾiwnĕ ew anontsʾ pʾaṛkʾĕ biti tam kʾezi : orovhetew indzi yantsnowadz ē , ow orown or owzem , gow tam zayn .
42004007	Owremn etʾē town im aṛchews iynalov ergrbakes , polorĕ kʾowgt biti ĕllan » .
42004008	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Krowadz ē : “ Tēroch , kʾow Astowdzoyt ergrbakē , ew miayn zinkʾ bashtē ” » .
42004009	Aba taraw zayn Erowsaghēm , gaynetsʾowtsʾ tajarin ashtaragin vray , ew ĕsaw anor : « Etʾē town Astowdzoy Ortin es , var netē kʾez asgē :
42004010	orovhetew krowadz ē : “ Ir hreshtagnerown biti hrahankē kʾezi hamar , or bahen kʾez ,
42004011	ew irentsʾ tseṛkʾerown vray biti gren kʾez , orbēszi kʾari mĕ chʾzarnes otkʾt ” » .
42004012	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Ĕsowadz ē : “ Mi pʾortser Tērĕ , kʾow Astowadzt ” » .
42004013	Erp CHʾarakhōsĕ lmntsʾowtsʾ ampoghch pʾortsowtʾiwnĕ , aten mĕ heṛatsʾaw angē .
42004014	Yisows Hokiin zōrowtʾeamp veratartsaw Kalilea , ew anor hampawĕ taradzowetsʾaw ayt kawaṛin ampoghch shrchagaykʾĕ .
42004015	Inkʾ gĕ sorvetsʾnēr anontsʾ zhoghovarannerown mēch , ow gĕ pʾaṛaworowēr polorēn .
42004016	Erp egaw Nazarētʾ , owr inkʾ medztsʾadz ēr , ir sovorowtʾean hamatsayn SHapatʾ ōrĕ mtaw zhoghovaranĕ , ow ganknetsʾaw or gartay .
