42004017	Towin anor Esayi markarēin kirkʾĕ . Erp patsʾaw kirkʾĕ , ktaw ayn teghĕ , owr krowadz ēr :
42004018	« Tēroch Hokin im vras ē : orovhetew ōdzetsʾ zis aghkʾatnerown awetaranelow , ghrgetsʾ zis gotradz sirt ownetsʾoghnerĕ p zhshgelow ,
42004019	kerinerown , azat artsagowm ew goyrerown tesoghowtʾiwn yaytararelow , harstaharowtʾiwn groghnerĕ azat artsagelow , Tēroch parehajowtʾean tarin yaytararelow » .
42004020	Yetoy kotsʾetsʾ kirkʾĕ , towaw sbasaworin , ow nstaw . Polor zhoghovaranĕ eghoghnerĕ irentsʾ achʾkʾerĕ seweṛadz ēin anor vray .
42004021	Owsti sgsaw ĕsel anontsʾ : « Aysōr ays krowadzĕ irakordzowetsʾaw , ow tser aganchnerĕ lsetsʾin » .
42004022	Polorĕ gĕ vgayēin anor masin , gĕ zarmanayin anor peranēn eladz shnorhali khōskʾerown vray , ew g!ĕsēin : « Asiga Yovsēpʾi ortin chʾē » .
42004023	Inkʾ al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Iraw towkʾ indzi biti ĕsēkʾ sa aṛadzĕ : “ P zhishg , town kʾez pow zhē . Orchʾapʾ paner lsetsʾinkʾ , or Gapʾaṛnayowmi mēch gatarowetsʾan : hos al ĕrē , kʾow pnakawaṛit mēch ” » .
42004024	Ew sharownagetsʾ : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ochʾ mēg markarē ĕntowneli ē ir pnakawaṛin mēch ” .
42004025	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ SHat ayriner gayin Israyēli mēch , Eghiayi ōrerĕ , erp erginkʾ kotsʾowetsʾaw erekʾ tari ow vetsʾ amis , ew medz sov eghaw ampoghch ergrin mēch :
42004026	paytsʾ Eghia anontsʾmē ochʾ mēgown ghrgowetsʾaw , haba miayn Sitonatsʾinerown Sarepʾtʾa kʾaghakʾĕ pnagogh ayri gnoch mĕ .
42004027	Naew shat porotner gayin Israyēli mēch , Eghisē markarēin atenĕ , ew anontsʾmē ochʾ mēgĕ makʾrowetsʾaw , haba miayn , Nēeman Asorin ” » .
42004028	ZHoghovaranin mēch polorn al zayroytʾov letsʾowetsʾan , erp lsetsʾin ays khōskʾerĕ :
42004029	owsti ganknelov , towrs hanetsʾin zayn kʾaghakʾēn , ew tarin zayn minchʾew ayn leran tsʾtsʾowadz dzayrĕ , orown vray irentsʾ kʾaghakʾĕ gaṛowtsʾanowadz ēr , orbēszi partsr teghēn var neten zayn .
42004030	Paytsʾ inkʾ , anontsʾ mēchēn antsʾnelov , knatsʾ .
42004031	Aba ichaw Kalileayi Gapʾaṛnayowm kʾaghakʾĕ , ow SHapatʾ ōrerĕ gĕ sorvetsʾnēr anontsʾ .
42004032	G!abshēin anor owsowtsʾowmin vray , orovhetew ishkhanowtʾeamp ēr anor khōskʾĕ .
42004033	ZHoghovaranin mēch mart mĕ gar , or anmakʾowr tewi oki ownēr , ew partsratsayn aghaghagetsʾ :
42004034	« Tʾogh mez : town inchʾ ownis mezi het , Yisows Nazovretsʾi : mitʾē mez gorsntsʾnelow egar . Kitem tʾē ov es , Astowdzoy Sowrpĕ » .
42004035	Yisows sastetsʾ zayn , ĕselov : « Babantsē ow elir atgē » . Tewĕ ketin zargaw zayn , polorin mēchtegh , elaw angē ew chʾvnasetsʾ anor .
42004036	Polorĕ aylayladz , irarow het khōsagtsʾelov g!ĕsēin : « Ays inchʾ khōskʾ ē , or ishkhanowtʾeamp ew zōrowtʾeamp gĕ hramayē anmakʾowr okinerown , ow g!ellen » .
42004037	Ew anor hampawĕ taradzowetsʾaw shrchagaykʾin polorĕ tegherĕ .
42004038	Ellelov zhoghovaranēn , mtaw Simoni townĕ . Simoni zokʾanchʾĕ gĕ towaytēr sastig tentov , ow tʾakhantsetsʾin iren , anor hamar .
42004039	Yisows gaynelov anor kʾov , sastetsʾ tentĕ , or tʾoghowtsʾ zayn . An al anmichabēs ganknetsʾaw , ew anontsʾ gĕ sbasargēr .
42004040	Arewin mayr mtadz atenĕ , polor anonkʾ , or zanazan akhterov hiwantner ownēin , iren perin zanonkʾ : inkʾ al anontsʾmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrin vray tseṛkʾ tnelov , pow zhetsʾ zanonkʾ .
42004041	SHaterēn tewer al towrs g!ellēin , aghaghagelov : « Town es Kʾristosĕ , Astowdzoy Ortin » . Paytsʾ inkʾ gĕ sastēr ow chʾēr tʾoylatrer anontsʾ , or khōsin , orovhetew kitēin tʾē inkʾ Kʾristosn ē .
42004042	Erp tsʾereg eghaw , megnetsʾaw ow knatsʾ amayi tegh mĕ : ew pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ gĕ pʾntṛēin zayn . Egan anor kʾov , ow gĕ pṛnēin , or chʾheṛanay irentsʾmē .
42004043	Paytsʾ an ĕsaw irentsʾ : « Bētkʾ ē or owrish kʾaghakʾnerow al awetem Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ , kʾani or ghrgowadz em ays nbatagov » .
42004044	Ew gĕ kʾarozēr Kalileayi zhoghovarannerown mēch .
42005001	Erp pazmowtʾiwnĕ khṛnowetsʾaw anor showrchĕ , Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ lselow hamar , inkʾ Kennesarētʾi dzovagin ezerkʾĕ ganknadz ēr ,
42005002	ow tesaw ergow nawer , or dzovagin ezerkʾĕ getsʾadz ēin , ew tsgnorsnerĕ , anontsʾmē ichadz , owṛgannerĕ gĕ lowayin .
42005003	Inkʾ mtaw ayt nawerēn mēgown mēch , or Simoninn ēr , khntretsʾ angē , or kʾichʾ mĕ tsʾamakʾēn dzovown mēch tani : ow nstelov nawown mēch , gĕ sorvetsʾnēr pazmowtʾiwnnerown .
42005004	Erp tatretsʾaw khōselēn , ĕsaw Simoni : « Yaṛach tar nawĕ , tēbi khorowngĕ , ew netetsʾēkʾ tser owṛgannerĕ , tsowg orsalow » .
42005005	Simon bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Vartabet , ampoghch kisherĕ ashkhatetsʾankʾ ow ochʾinchʾ orsatsʾinkʾ : paytsʾ gĕ netem owṛganĕ , kʾow khōskʾit hamar » .
42005006	Erp atiga ĕrin , medz kʾanagowtʾeamp tsowg pṛnetsʾin , ew irentsʾ owṛganĕ gĕ batṛtēr .
42005007	Nshan g!ĕnēin miws nawown mēch eghogh irentsʾ ĕngeragitsʾnerown , or kan , ōknen irentsʾ . Egan ow ergow nawern al letsʾowtsʾin , ew kretʾē ĕngghmelow mōt ēin .
42005008	Erp Simon Betros tesaw , ingaw Yisowsi dzowngerown ow ĕsaw : « Tēr , heṛatsʾir im kʾovēs , kʾani or es meghawor mart mĕn em » .
42005009	Orovhetew aylayladz ēr , inchʾbēs naew polor iren het eghoghnerĕ , irentsʾ pṛnadz tsowgerow aṛatowtʾean hamar :
42005010	noynbēs al Zepetēosi ortinerĕ , Yagopos ew Yovhannēs , oronkʾ Simoni ĕngernern ēin . Yisows ĕsaw Simoni : « Mi vakhnar , asgē etkʾ martotsʾ orsort , , biti ĕllas » .
42005011	Ow nawerĕ tsʾamakʾ hanelov , tʾoghowtsʾin amēn inchʾ ew hetewetsʾan anor .
42005012	Erp inkʾ kʾaghakʾi mĕ mēch ēr , aha mart mĕ , porotowtʾeamp letsʾown , tesnelov Yisowsĕ , ingaw eresi vray , aghersetsʾ anor ew ĕsaw : « Tēr , etʾē owzes , grnas makʾrel zis » .
42005013	Yisows ergarelov ir tseṛkʾĕ , tbaw anor ow ĕsaw : « G!owzem , makʾrowē » : ew isgoyn porotowtʾiwnĕ knatsʾ angē .
42005014	Inkʾ batowiretsʾ anor , or ochʾ mēgown ĕsē , haba , ĕsaw : « Kna , tsʾoytsʾ towr kʾez kʾahanayin , ew Movsēsi batowiradzin hamatsayn , matowtsʾanē kʾow makʾrowelowt ĕndzan , ipr vgayowtʾiwn anontsʾ » .
42005015	Sagayn anor hampawĕ al aweli gĕ taradzowēr : ow medz pazmowtʾiwnner gĕ hamakhmpowēin , mtig ĕnelow ew pow zhowelow irentsʾ hiwantowtʾiwnnerēn .
42005016	Paytsʾ inkʾ gĕ kʾashowēr amayi tegher ow g!aghōtʾēr .
42005017	ōr mĕ , inkʾ gĕ sorvetsʾnēr , ow Pʾarisetsʾiner ew ōrēnkʾi vartabetner nstadz ēin , - oronkʾ zhoghvowadz ēin Kalileayi , Hrēastani ow Erowsaghēmi polor kiwgherēn , - ew Tēroch zōrowtʾiwnĕ nergay ēr p zhshgelow hamar , , .
42005018	Ew aha kʾani mĕ martig perin antamaloydz mart mĕ , mahijov , ow gĕ chanayin ners mttsʾnel zayn ew tnel anor aṛchew .
42005019	Erp pazmowtʾean batjaṛov chʾgrtsʾan jampay ktnel , or ners mttsʾnen zayn , elan tanikʾĕ , ew gghmintrnerown mēchēn , mahijov ichetsʾowtsʾin zayn mēchteghĕ , Yisowsi aṛchew .
42005020	An al , tesnelov anontsʾ hawatkʾĕ , ĕsaw anor : « Mart , meghkʾert nerowadz en kʾezi » .
42005021	Tbirnern ow Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ sgsan mtadzel , ĕselov : « Ov ē asiga , or hayhoyowtʾiwnner g!ĕsē . Ov grnay meghkʾerĕ nerel , patsʾi Astowdzmē , , » .
42005022	Erp Yisows ĕmpṛnetsʾ anontsʾ mtadzowmnerĕ , bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Inchʾ gĕ mtadzēkʾ tser sirterown mēch .
42005023	Orĕ aweli tiwrin ē , “ meghkʾert nerowadz en kʾezi ” ĕselĕ , tʾē , “ otkʾi elir ow kʾalē ” ĕselĕ .
42005024	Paytsʾ orbēszi kitnakʾ tʾē martow Ortin ishkhanowtʾiwn owni , ergri vray meghkʾerĕ nerelow , ( ĕsaw antamaloydzin , ) kʾezi g!ĕsem : “ Otkʾi elir , aṛ mahijt ow kna townt ” » .
42005025	An al anmichabēs ganknetsʾaw anontsʾ aṛchew , vran aṛaw inchʾ pani vray or baṛgadz ēr , ew knatsʾ ir townĕ , pʾaṛapanelov Astowadz .
42005026	Polorĕ , hiatsʾowmov hamagowadz , pʾaṛapanetsʾin Astowadz , ow vakhov hamagowadz , g!ĕsēin : « Aysōr artagark paner tesankʾ » .
42005027	Atgē etkʾ , megnetsʾaw , ew tesaw makʾsawor mĕ , orown anownĕ GHewi ēr : an nstadz ēr makʾs ĕntownelow teghĕ . Ĕsaw anor : « Hetewē indzi » .
42005028	An al tsketsʾ amēn inchʾ , ganknetsʾaw ew anor hetewetsʾaw .
42005029	GHewi medz gochʾownkʾ mĕ sarkʾetsʾ ir tan mēch : ow medz pazmowtʾiwn gar makʾsawornerow ew owrishnerow , or anontsʾ het seghan nstadz , , ēin .
42005030	Anontsʾ tbirnern ow Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ gĕ trtnchēin anor ashagertnerown tēm , ĕselov : « Inchʾow g!owtēkʾ ow gĕ khmēkʾ makʾsawornerow ew meghawornerow het » .
42005031	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Ochʾ tʾē aṛoghchnerown p zhishg bētkʾ ē , haba , hiwantnerown .
42005032	Es egay ochʾ tʾē artarnerĕ ganchʾelow , haba meghawornerĕ , abashkharowtʾean » .
42005033	Anonkʾ al ĕsin : « Inchʾow Yovhannēsi ashagertnerĕ yajakh dzom gĕ bahen ew aghersankʾ gĕ matowtsʾanen , nmanabēs Pʾarisetsʾinerown ashagertnerĕ , paytsʾ kʾowginnert g!owten ow gĕ khmen » .
42005034	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Grnakʾ dzom bahel tal harsnewornerown , minchʾ pʾesan irentsʾ het ē .
42005035	Paytsʾ ōrerĕ biti kan , erp pʾesan biti vertsʾowi irentsʾmē : aba ayt ōrerĕ dzom biti bahen » .
42005036	Aṛag mĕn al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ tskē nor latʾi gtor mĕ hin hantertsi vray . Aylabēs , ayt norĕ batṛowadzkʾ al g!ĕnē , ow hintsʾadzin het chʾi yarmarir ayt nor latʾēn eghadz gtorĕ .
42005037	Naew ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ tnē nor kinin hin tigerow mēch . Aylabēs , nor kinin gĕ batṛē tigerĕ : inkʾ gĕ tʾapʾi , ow tigerĕ gĕ gorsowin .
42005038	Haba nor kinin trowelow ē nor tigerow mēch , orbēszi ergowkʾn al bahowin .
42005039	Ew ochʾ mēgĕ hin kinin khmelēn etkʾ , isgoyn g!owzē norĕ , kʾani or g!ĕsē : “ Hinĕ aweli akhor zhaham ē ” » .
42006001	Aṛachin amsowan ergrort SHapatʾ ōrĕ , inkʾ g!antsʾnēr arterow mēchēn , ew ir ashagertnerĕ tsʾoreni hasger pʾrtsʾnelov , irentsʾ tseṛkʾerown mēch gĕ shpʾēin ow g!owtēin .
42006002	Pʾarisetsʾinerēn omankʾ ĕsin anontsʾ : « Inchʾow g!ĕnēkʾ inchʾ or artōnowadz chʾē ĕnel SHapatʾ ōrerĕ » .
42006003	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « CHʾēkʾ gartatsʾer Tawitʾi ĕradzĕ , erp inkʾ ew iren het eghoghnerĕ anōtʾetsʾan :
42006004	inchʾbēs mtaw Astowdzoy townĕ , aṛaw aṛachatrowtʾean hatsʾerĕ ow geraw , naew towaw iren het eghoghnerown : ochʾ mēgown artōnowadz ēr owtel zanonkʾ , patsʾi kʾahananerēn » .
42006005	Ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Martow Ortin tērn ē naew SHapatʾin » .
42006006	Owrish SHapatʾ ōr mĕn al mtaw zhoghovaranĕ ew gĕ sorvetsʾnēr . Hon mart mĕ gar , orown ach tseṛkʾĕ chʾortsʾadz ēr .
42006007	Tbirnern ow Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ gĕ hsgēin ir vray , tesnelow tʾē biti pow zhē zayn SHapatʾ ōrĕ , orbēszi ampastanowtʾean aṛitʾ mĕ ktnen iren tēm .
42006008	Isg inkʾ , kitnalov anontsʾ mtadzowmnerĕ , ĕsaw ayn martown , orown tseṛkʾĕ chʾortsʾadz ēr : « Otkʾi elir , gaynē mēchteghĕ » . An al elaw ow gaynetsʾaw .
42006009	Owsti Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « TSezi pan mĕ hartsʾnem : “ SHapatʾ ōrĕ orĕ artōnowadz ē , parikʾ ĕnel , tʾē chʾarikʾ ĕnel , ants mĕ pʾrgel , tʾē gorsntsʾnel ” » .
42006010	Ew showrchĕ nayelov , polorin vray , ĕsaw anor : « Ergarē tseṛkʾt » . An al aynbēs ĕraw , ow anor tseṛkʾĕ aṛoghchatsʾaw miwsin bēs .
42006011	Isg anonkʾ letsʾowetsʾan moleknowtʾeamp , ew gĕ khōsēin irarow het , tʾē inchʾ ĕnen Yisowsi .
42006012	Ayt ōrerĕ , leṛĕ knatsʾ aghōtʾelow , ew ampoghch kisherĕ antsʾowtsʾ Astowdzoy aghōtʾelov .
42006013	Aṛtown , ganchʾetsʾ ir ashagertnerĕ , ew ĕntretsʾ anontsʾmē tasnergow hoki , ow aṛakʾeal anowanetsʾ zanonkʾ : -
42006014	Simonĕ , or Betros al anowanetsʾ , ew anor eghpayrĕ , Antrēasĕ , Yagoposn ow Yovhannēsĕ ,
42006015	Pʾilibbosĕ ew Partʾoghomēosĕ , Mattʾēosn ow Tʾovmasĕ , Alpʾēosean Yagoposĕ ew Nakhantsayoyz gochʾowadz Simonĕ ,
42006016	Yagoposi eghpayrĕ , Yowtan , ow Isgariovtatsʾi Yowtan , or matnichʾ eghaw .
42006017	Anontsʾ het ichnelov , tapʾarag tegh mĕ gaynetsʾaw , inchʾbēs naew ir ashagertnerown khowmpĕ ew zhoghovowrti medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ , ampoghch Hrēastanēn , Erowsaghēmēn , ow Tiwrosi ew Sitoni dzovezerkʾēn :
42006018	anonkʾ egadz ēin mtig ĕnelow anor khōskʾerĕ , ow pow zhowelow irentsʾ akhterēn . Anmakʾowr okinerēn tanchowoghnern al egan ew p zhshgowetsʾan .
42006019	Ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ gĕ chanar tbchʾil iren , orovhetew zōrowtʾiwn g!ellēr irmē ow polorĕ gĕ p zhshgēr .
42006020	Ayn aten achʾkʾerĕ partsratsʾowtsʾ tēbi ir ashagertnerĕ ew ĕsaw : « Erani tsezi , aghkʾatnerowt , orovhetew tsern ē Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ .
42006021	Erani tsezi , or hima anōtʾi ēkʾ , orovhetew biti gshtanakʾ . Erani tsezi , or hima gow lakʾ , orovhetew biti khntakʾ .
42006022	Erani tsezi , erp martig aten tsez , ow erp zaten tsez irentsʾ ĕngerowtʾenēn , nakhaten ew vargapegen tser anownĕ , martow Ortiin batjaṛov .
42006023	Owrakhatsʾēkʾ ayt ōrĕ ow tsʾndzatsʾēkʾ , kʾani or tser vartsatrowtʾiwnĕ shat ē erginkʾĕ : artarew irentsʾ hayrerĕ noynbēs g!ĕnēin markarēnerown .
42006024	Paytsʾ vay tsezi , harowstnerowt , orovhetew ownetsʾadz ēkʾ tser mkhitʾarowtʾiwnĕ .
42006025	Vay tsezi , or gowsht ēkʾ , orovhetew biti anōtʾenakʾ : vay tsezi , or hima gĕ khntakʾ , orovhetew biti skakʾ ow lakʾ .
42006026	Vay tsezi , erp martig law khōsin tser masin , orovhetew irentsʾ hayrerĕ aytbēs g!ĕnēin sowt markarēnerown » .
42006027	« Paytsʾ gĕ yaytararem tsezi , or mtig g!ĕnēkʾ : “ Siretsʾēkʾ tser tʾshnaminerĕ , parikʾ ĕrēkʾ tsez atoghnerown ,
42006028	ōrhnetsʾēkʾ tsez anidzoghnerĕ , aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ tsez bakharagoghnerown hamar .
42006029	Etʾē mēgĕ zarnē aytit , miwsn al mōtetsʾowr anor : etʾē aṛnē hantertst kʾezmē , mi arkiler or aṛnē pajgont al .
42006030	Towr amēn martow , or kʾezmē g!owzē , ow kʾow panert aṛnoghēn mi bahancher zanonkʾ .
42006031	Inchʾbēs g!owzēkʾ or martig ĕnen tsezi , noynbēs al towkʾ ĕrēkʾ anontsʾ .
42006032	Etʾē sirēkʾ tsez siroghnerĕ , inchʾ shnorhkʾ g!ownenakʾ : orovhetew meghawornern al gĕ siren zirenkʾ siroghnerĕ .
42006033	Etʾē parikʾ ĕnēkʾ tsezi parikʾ ĕnoghnerown , inchʾ shnorhkʾ g!ownenakʾ : orovhetew meghawornern al noyn panĕ g!ĕnen .
42006034	Etʾē pʾokh takʾ aynbisi martotsʾ , orontsʾmē yoys ownikʾ verstanalow , inchʾ shnorhkʾ g!ownenakʾ : orovhetew meghawornern al pʾokh gow tan meghawornerown , orbēszi verstanan noyn chʾapʾov .
42006035	Haba towkʾ , siretsʾēkʾ tser tʾshnaminerĕ ow parikʾ ĕrēkʾ , pʾokh towēkʾ , aṛantsʾ pʾokharēnĕ pan mĕ sbaselow , ew tser vartsatrowtʾiwnĕ shat biti ĕllay ow Amenapartsrin ortinerĕ biti ĕllakʾ , orovhetew an kʾaghtsʾr ē aberakhtnerown ow chʾarerown hantēb .
42006036	Owremn arkahatogh eghēkʾ , inchʾbēs tser Hayrn al arkahatogh ē ” » .
42006037	« Mi tatēkʾ , ow biti chʾtatowikʾ : mi tatabartēkʾ , ew biti chʾtatabartowikʾ : neretsʾēkʾ , ow biti nerowi tsezi .
42006038	Towēkʾ , ew biti trowi tsezi : law chʾapʾov , gokhowadz , tsʾntsʾowadz , lepʾletsʾown biti trowi tser kokĕ : kʾani or biti chʾapʾowi tsezi ayn chʾapʾov , orov towkʾ gĕ chʾapʾēkʾ » .
42006039	Aṛag mĕn al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Goyrĕ grnay aṛachnortel goyrĕ : mitʾē ergowkʾn al pʾosĕ biti chʾiynan .
42006040	Ashagertĕ ir vartabetēn keriver chʾē : paytsʾ amēn gatareal ashagert , ir vartabetin bēs biti ĕllay .
42006041	Inchʾow gĕ tesnes eghpōrt achʾkʾin mēchi shiwghĕ , ow chʾes nshmarer kʾow achʾkʾit mēchi keranĕ .
42006042	Gam inchʾbēs grnas ĕsel eghpōrt : “ Eghpayr , tʾoyl towr or hanem achʾkʾit mēchi shiwghĕ ” , erp town chʾes tesner kʾow achʾkʾit mēchi keranĕ . Geghdzawor , nakh hanē kʾow achʾkʾēt keranĕ , ew ayn aten ystag biti tesnes , hanelow hamar eghpōrt achʾkʾin mēchi shiwghĕ » .
42006043	« Artarew chʾgay law dzaṛ mĕ , or vat btowgh perē , ochʾ al vat dzaṛ mĕ , or law btowgh perē :
42006044	kʾani or iwrakʾanchʾiwr dzaṛ gĕ janchʾtsʾowi ir btowghēn . Orovhetew pʾowsherēn tʾowz chʾen kʾagher , ow moreniēn khaghogh chʾen gtʾer .
42006045	Pari martĕ , parowtʾiwn gĕ pkhetsʾnē ir sirtin pari kantsēn , isg chʾar martĕ , chʾarikʾ gĕ pkhetsʾnē ir sirtin chʾar kantsēn : kʾani peranĕ gĕ khōsi sirtin liowtʾenēn » .
42006046	« Inchʾow “ Tēr , Tēr ” gĕ gochʾēkʾ zis , paytsʾ chʾēkʾ kordzatrer inchʾ or g!ĕsem .
42006047	Ov or gow kay indzi , gĕ lsē im khōskʾers ow gĕ kordzatrē zanonkʾ , tsʾoytsʾ tam tsezi tʾē orow gĕ nmani .
42006048	An gĕ nmani town gaṛowtsʾanogh martow mĕ , or pʾoretsʾ , khoratsʾaw ew himĕ traw vēmi vray : erp oghoghowm eghaw , hegheghĕ zargaw ayt tan paytsʾ chʾgrtsʾaw sarsel zayn , orovhetew vēmi vray himnowadz ēr .
42006049	Isg an or gĕ lsē im khōskʾers ow chʾi kordzatrer , gĕ nmani martow mĕ , or hoghi vray town gaṛowtsʾanetsʾ , aṛantsʾ himi : hegheghĕ zargaw anor ew isgoyn pʾlaw , ow medz eghaw ayt tan awerowmĕ » .
42007001	Erp lmntsʾowtsʾ ir polor khōskʾerĕ zhoghovowrtin aganchnerown ĕselĕ , mtaw Gapʾaṛnayowm .
42007002	Hariwrabeti mĕ dzaṛan , or sireli ēr iren , dzanrōrēn hiwantatsʾadz ĕllalov , vakhjanelow mōt ēr .
42007003	Erp lsetsʾ Yisowsi masin , Hreanerēn kʾani mĕ erētsʾner ghrgelov , tʾakhantsetsʾ anor , or kay ew abretsʾnē ir strowgĕ .
42007004	Anonkʾ al egan Yisowsi , pʾowtʾachanowtʾeamp g!aghachʾēin anor ow g!ĕsēin : « An , orown biti ĕnes ays shnorhkʾĕ , ar zhani ē ,
42007005	orovhetew gĕ sirē mer azkĕ , ew inkʾ gaṛowtsʾanetsʾ zhoghovaranĕ mezi hamar » .
42007006	Yisows knatsʾ anontsʾ het , ow erp townēn shat heṛow chʾēr , hariwrabetĕ kʾani mĕ paregamner ghrgetsʾ ew ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , mi anhankstanar , orovhetew es ar zhani chʾem or town mtnes im yargis tag :
42007007	owsti es al ar zhani chʾngatetsʾi zis , kalow kʾezi : haba ĕsē khōskʾ mĕ , , , ow dzaṛas biti p zhshgowi .
42007008	Orovhetew es al ishkhanowtʾean tag trowadz mart mĕn em , ew zinoworner ownim im hramanis tag . Asor g!ĕsem : “ Kna ” , ow g!ertʾay : ew miwsin : “ Egowr ” , ow gow kay : ew strowgis : “ Ĕrē ays panĕ ” , ow g!ĕnē » .
42007009	Yisows lselov asiga , zarmatsʾaw anor vray , ew taṛnalov iren hetewogh pazmowtʾean , ĕsaw : « TSezi gĕ yaytararem tʾē Israyēli mēch ankam es chʾktay ayschʾapʾ medz hawatkʾ » .
42007010	Batkamawornerĕ town veratartsan , ew aṛoghchatsʾadz ktan hiwant dzaṛan .
42007011	Heteweal ōrĕ g!ertʾar kʾaghakʾ mĕ , orown anownĕ Nayin ēr . Anor het g!ertʾayin ir ashagertnerēn shaterĕ , naew medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ .
42007012	Erp mōtetsʾaw kʾaghakʾin tran , aha meṛel mĕ towrs gĕ hanēin , ir mōr mēg hatig ortin . An ayri ēr , ow kʾaghakʾēn medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ anor het ēr .
42007013	Tērĕ tesnelov zayn , ktʾatsʾ anor vray ew ĕsaw anor : « Mi lar » .
42007014	Ow mōtenalov , tbaw takaghin : groghnerĕ gank aṛin , ew ĕsaw : « Eritasart , kʾezi g!ĕsem : “ Otkʾi elir ” » .
42007015	Meṛeln al elaw , nstaw , ew sgsaw khōsil : Yisows towaw zayn ir mōr .
42007016	Vakhĕ hamagetsʾ polorĕ , ow Astowadz gĕ pʾaṛapanēin , ĕselov : « Medz markarē mĕ eladz ē mer mēch , ew Astowadz aytsʾeladz ē ir zhoghovowrtin » .
42007017	Anor masin ays taratsaynowtʾiwnĕ taradzowetsʾaw ampoghch Hrēastani mēch , ow ampoghch shrchagaykʾĕ .
42007018	Yovhannēsi ashagertnerĕ batmetsʾin iren ays polor panerown masin .
42007019	Yovhannēs al ir ashagertnerēn ergowkʾĕ ganchʾetsʾ iren ow ghrgetsʾ Yisowsi , ĕselov : « Town es an , or biti kar , tʾē owrishi mĕ sbasenkʾ » .
42007020	Erp ayt martigĕ egan anor kʾov , ĕsin : « Yovhannēs Mgrtichʾĕ mez ghrgetsʾ kʾezi , ĕselov : “ Town es an , or biti kar , tʾē owrishi mĕ sbasenkʾ ” » .
42007021	Noyn zhamown shater p zhshgetsʾ irentsʾ akhterēn , tanchankʾnerēn ew chʾar okinerēn , ow shat goyrerow tesowtʾiwn shnorhetsʾ .
42007022	Aba Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Katsʾēkʾ , batmetsʾēkʾ Yovhannēsi inchʾ or tesakʾ ew lsetsʾikʾ , tʾē goyrerĕ gĕ tesnen , gagherĕ gĕ kʾalen , porotnerĕ gĕ makʾrowin , khowlerĕ gĕ lsen , meṛelnerĕ yarowtʾiwn g!aṛnen , aghkʾatnerown g!awetaranowi .
42007023	Erani anor , or chʾi kaytʾagghir im batjaṛovs » .
42007024	Erp Yovhannēsi batkamawornerĕ katsʾin , Yisows sgsaw pazmowtʾiwnnerown khōsil Yovhannēsi masin : « Inchʾ tesnelow katsʾikʾ anabatĕ : hovēn tatanogh eghēk mĕ .
42007025	Haba inchʾ tesnelow katsʾikʾ : pʾapʾowg hantertsner hakadz mart mĕ . Aha anonkʾ , or pʾaṛawor batmowjannerov ow pʾapʾgowtʾean mēch en , tʾakaworagan balatnern en .
42007026	Haba inchʾ tesnelow katsʾikʾ : markarē mĕ . Ayo , gĕ yaytararem tsezi , aweli kʾan markarē mĕ .
42007027	Orovhetew asiga ē an , orown masin krowadz ē : “ Aha es gĕ ghrgem im batkamawors kʾow aṛchewēt : an biti batrastē jampat , kʾow aṛchewt ” .
42007028	Artarew gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ginerē dznadznerown mēch , Yovhannēs Mgrtichʾēn aweli medz markarē chʾgay ” : sagayn Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean mēch , amenēn bztigĕ angē aweli medz ē » .
42007029	Erp ampoghch zhoghovowrtn ow makʾsawornerĕ lsetsʾin , artaratsʾowtsʾin Astowadz , or Yovhannēsi mgrtowtʾeamp mgrtowetsʾan .
42007030	Paytsʾ Pʾarisetsʾinern ow ōrinagannerĕ anarketsʾin Astowdzoy dzrakirĕ irentsʾ hantēb , angē chʾmgrtowelov .
42007031	« Owremn orow nmantsʾnem ays serowntin martigĕ , ew orow gĕ nmanin .
42007032	Gĕ nmanin manowgnerow , oronkʾ hrabaragnerĕ nstelov , gĕ kochʾen irarow ew g!ĕsen : “ Srink nowaketsʾinkʾ tsezi , ow chʾbaretsʾikʾ , oghpatsʾinkʾ tsezi , ow chʾlatsʾikʾ ” .
42007033	Orovhetew Yovhannēs Mgrtichʾĕ egaw , ochʾ hatsʾ g!owtēr ew ochʾ kini gĕ khmēr , ow g!ĕsēikʾ : “ Tew gay anor mēch ” .
42007034	Martow Ortin egaw , g!owtē ew gĕ khmē , ow g!ĕsēkʾ : “ Aha shatager ow kinesēr mart mĕ , makʾsawornerow ew meghawornerow paregam ” .
42007035	Ew imastowtʾiwnĕ artaratsʾaw ir polor zawagnerov » .
42007036	Pʾarisetsʾinerēn mēgĕ gĕ tʾakhantsēr , or an iren het hatsʾ owtē . An al mtaw Pʾarisetsʾiin townĕ ow seghan nstaw .
42007037	Kʾaghakʾin mēch meghawor gin mĕ gar : erp kittsʾaw tʾē an seghan nstadz ē Pʾarisetsʾiin townĕ , anowshahot ōdzanelikʾi alabastrē shish mĕ peraw ,
42007038	lalov getsʾaw anor otkʾerown kʾov , etewi goghmĕ , ew sgsaw artsʾownkʾov tʾrchel anor otkʾerĕ . Ir klowkhin mazerov gĕ srpēr ow gĕ hampowrēr anor otkʾerĕ , ew ōdzanelikʾov g!ōdzēr .
42007039	Erp zinkʾ hrawirogh Pʾarisetsʾin tesaw , ĕsaw inkʾniren : « Etʾē asiga markarē ĕllar , biti kitnar tʾē ov ew inchʾbisi gin ē iren tbchʾoghĕ , orovhetew meghawor ē » .
42007040	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Simon , pan mĕ ownim kʾezi ĕselow » . An al ĕsaw : « Ĕsē , vartabet » .
42007041	Yisows ĕsaw : « Pʾokhatow mĕ ownēr ergow bartaban : mēgĕ hink hariwr tahegan gĕ bartēr , ow miwsĕ , yisown .
42007042	Ergowkʾin al shnorhetsʾ bartkʾĕ , kʾani garoghowtʾiwn chʾownēin vjarelow . Hima ĕsē , anontsʾmē ov aweli biti sirē zayn » .
42007043	Simon bataskhanetsʾ : « G!entʾatrem tʾē an , orown shat shnorhetsʾ » . An al ĕsaw anor : « SHitag tatetsʾir » .
42007044	Ow taṛnalov tēbi ayt ginĕ , ĕsaw Simoni : « Gĕ tesnes ays ginĕ . Es townt mtay , ew town chowr chʾtowir otkʾerows : paytsʾ asiga ir artsʾownkʾov tʾrchetsʾ otkʾers , ew ir mazerov srpetsʾ .
42007045	Town indzi hampoyr mĕ chʾtowir , paytsʾ asiga hos mtnelēs i ver , chʾtatretsʾaw otkʾers hampowrelē .
42007046	Town klowkhs chʾōdzetsʾir anowshahot iwghov , paytsʾ asiga otkʾers ōdzetsʾ anowshahot ōdzanelikʾov .
42007047	Owsti gĕ yaytararem kʾezi : “ Asor pazmatʾiw meghkʾerĕ nerowadz en , orovhetew shat siretsʾ : paytsʾ an , orown kʾichʾ gĕ nerowi , aniga kʾichʾ gĕ sirē ” :
42007048	Ew ĕsaw anor : « Kʾow meghkʾert nerowadz en » .
42007049	Iren het seghan nstoghnerĕ sgsan ĕsel irentsʾ mēch : « Ov ē asiga , or meghkʾern al gĕ nerē » .
42007050	Isg inkʾ ĕsaw gnoch : « Hawatkʾt pʾrgetsʾ kʾez , kna khaghaghowtʾeamp » .
42008001	Angē etkʾ , inkʾ gĕ kʾarozēr , kʾaghakʾē kʾaghakʾ ow kiwghē kiwgh shrchelov , ew g!awetēr Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ . Tasnergowkʾĕ iren het ēin ,
42008002	naew kʾani mĕ giner , oronkʾ chʾar okinerē ow hiwantowtʾiwnnerē pow zhowadz ēin : - Mariam , or gĕ gochʾowēr Maktaghenatsʾi ew ormē eōtʾĕ tew eler ēr ,
42008003	Yovhanna , Herovtēsi tan veragatsʾowin , Kʾowzayi ginĕ , SHowshan ow shat owrishner , oronkʾ gĕ sbasargēin anor irentsʾ inchʾkʾov .
42008004	Erp medz pazmowtʾiwn hawakʾowetsʾaw ew amēn kʾaghakʾē iren egan , aṛag mĕ ĕsaw anontsʾ :
42008005	« Sermnatsʾan mĕ knatsʾ ir howntĕ tsʾanelow . Minchʾ gĕ tsʾanēr , kʾani mĕ hownter ingan jampayin ezerkʾĕ ew gokhgṛtowetsʾan , ow erginkʾi tʾṛchʾownnerĕ lapʾetsʾin zanonkʾ .
42008006	Owrishner ingan zhayṛi vray , ew haziw powsadz , chʾortsʾan , kʾani powsahogh chʾgar .
42008007	Owrishner al ingan pʾowsherow mēch , ow pʾowsherĕ powsnelov anontsʾ het , kheghtetsʾin zanonkʾ .
42008008	Isg owrishner ingan law hoghi mēch , ow powsnelov , hariwrabatig btowgh towin » . Erp ĕsaw ays panerĕ , kochʾetsʾ : « An or aganch owni lselow , tʾogh lsē » .
42008009	Ir ashagertnerĕ hartsʾowtsʾin iren : « Inchʾ ē imastĕ ays aṛagin » .
42008010	An al ĕsaw : « TSezi trowadz ē hasgnal Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean khorhowrtnerĕ , paytsʾ owrishnerown , aṛagnerov gĕ khōsim : orbēszi nayelov , chʾtesnen , ow lselov , chʾhasgnan » .
42008011	« Owremn sa ē aṛagin imastĕ : howntĕ , Astowdzoy khōskʾn ē .
42008012	Jampayin ezerkʾĕ eghoghnerĕ anonkʾ en , or gĕ lsen : yetoy CHʾarakhōsĕ gow kay ew gĕ vertsʾnē anontsʾ sirtēn khōskʾĕ , orbēszi chʾhawatan ow chʾpʾrgowin .
42008013	ZHayṛi vrayinnerĕ anonkʾ en , or erp lsen , owrakhowtʾeamp g!ĕntownin khōskʾĕ . Paytsʾ armat chʾownin : aten mĕ gĕ hawatan , ew pʾortsowtʾean zhamanag gĕ heṛanan .
42008014	Pʾowsherow mēch ingadznerĕ anonkʾ en , or lselē etkʾ , g!ertʾan , paytsʾ gĕ kheghtowin ays geankʾin hokerov , harstowtʾeamp ow hajoykʾnerov , ew btowgh chʾen hasowntsʾner .
42008015	Isg law hoghi mēch tsʾanowadznerĕ anonkʾ en , or khōskʾĕ lselov , bargesht ow pari sirti mĕ mēch gĕ bahen zayn , ew hamperowtʾeamp btowgh g!artatren » .
42008016	« Ochʾ mēgĕ , jrak mĕ vaṛelē etkʾ , gĕ dzadzgē zayn anōtʾov mĕ , gam gĕ tnē mahiji mĕ nerkʾew : haba gĕ tnē ashtanagi mĕ vray , orbēszi ners mtnoghnerĕ tesnen loysĕ .
42008017	Orovhetew chʾgay kaghtnikʾ mĕ , or patsʾayayt biti chʾĕllay , ochʾ al bahowadz pan mĕ , or biti chʾkittsʾowi ow erewan chʾellē .
42008018	Owremn zkowshatsʾēkʾ tʾē inchʾbēs gĕ lsēkʾ : orovhetew ov or owni , biti trowi anor , isg ov or chʾowni , angē biti aṛnowi noynisg inchʾ or inkʾ gĕ gardzē tʾē owni » .
42008019	Anor mayrn ow eghpayrnerĕ egan iren , paytsʾ pazmowtʾenēn chʾēin grnar mōtenal iren .
42008020	Anor lowr towin , ĕselov : « Kʾow mayrt ow eghpayrnert towrsĕ gaynadz en ew g!owzen tesnel kʾez » .
42008021	An al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Im mayrs ow eghpayrners anonkʾ en , or gĕ lsen Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ ew gĕ kordzatren zayn » .
42008022	ōr mĕ , inkʾ naw mtaw ir ashagertnerown het , ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « DZovagin miws ezerkʾĕ antsʾninkʾ » . Megnetsʾan :
42008023	paytsʾ minchʾ gĕ nawargēin , inkʾ kʾnatsʾaw . Hovi pʾotʾorig mĕ ichaw dzovagin vray : nawĕ gĕ letsʾowēr chowrov , ew irenkʾ vtanki mēch ēin .
42008024	Mōtetsʾan , artʾntsʾowtsʾin zinkʾ ow ĕsin : « Vartabet , vartabet , gĕ gorsowinkʾ » . An al otkʾi elaw , sastetsʾ hovn ow alikʾnerĕ : ew anonkʾ hantartetsʾan ow khaghaghowtʾiwn eghaw .
42008025	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Owr ē tser hawatkʾĕ » . Anonkʾ , vakhov hamagowadz , zarmatsʾan , ew g!ĕsēin irarow : « Arteōkʾ ov ē asiga , or gĕ hramayē noynisg hoverown ow chowrin , ew gĕ hnazantin iren » .
42008026	Nawargelov ichan Kataratsʾinerown ergirĕ , or Kalileayi timatsʾn ē .
42008027	Erp inkʾ tsʾamakʾ elaw , kʾaghakʾēn mart mĕ hantibetsʾaw iren . An tewer ownēr nersĕ , ergar zhamanagē i ver : hanterts chʾēr hakner , ochʾ al tan mēch gĕ pnagēr , haba , kerezmannerow mēch .
42008028	Tesnelov Yisowsĕ , aghaghagetsʾ , ingaw anor aṛchew ew ĕsaw partsratsayn : « Town inchʾ kordz ownis indzi het , Yisows , Amenapartsr Astowdzoy Orti : g!aghersem kʾezi , mi tancher zis » .
42008029	( Orovhetew hramayetsʾ anmakʾowr okiin , or ellē ayt martēn : artarew ergar aten ēr or krawadz ēr zayn , ew an gabowadz gĕ bahowēr , shghtʾanerov ow otnagaberov , paytsʾ gĕ gotrtēr gaberĕ ew tewēn gĕ kʾshowēr anabatĕ . )
42008030	Yisows hartsʾowtsʾ anor : « Inchʾ ē anownt » . An al ĕsaw : « Lekēon » : orovhetew shat tewer mtadz ēin anor mēch .
42008031	Anonkʾ g!aghachʾēin iren , or chʾhramayē irentsʾ , antowntĕ ertʾal .
42008032	Hon khozerow medz eramag mĕ gar , or leṛĕ garadzēr . Aghachʾetsʾin anor , or artōnē irentsʾ anontsʾ mēch mtnel : ew artōnetsʾ irentsʾ .
42008033	Owsti tewerĕ , towrs ellelov martēn , mtan khozerown mēch : ow eramagĕ kahavē zh teghēn dzovagĕ vazetsʾ ew kheghtowetsʾaw .
42008034	KHozaradznerĕ tesnelov batahadzĕ , pʾakhan , ow batmetsʾin kʾaghakʾĕ ew arterĕ .
42008035	Martig towrs elan , batahadzĕ tesnelow . Egan Yisowsi kʾov , ow ktan ayn martĕ , ormē tewerĕ eladz ēin , nstadz Yisowsi otkʾerown kʾov , hakowadz ew stʾapʾadz : ow vakhtsʾan .
42008036	Anonkʾ or teser ēin batahadzĕ , batmetsʾin anontsʾ tʾē inchʾ gerbov tiwaharĕ pow zhowetsʾaw .
42008037	Kataratsʾinerown shrchagaykʾĕ eghogh ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ gĕ tʾakhantsēr anor , or ertʾay irentsʾmē , orovhetew medz vakhov hamagowadz ēin . An al naw mtnelov veratartsaw .
42008038	Martĕ , ormē tewerĕ eladz ēin , g!aghersēr anor or ĕngeranay iren . Paytsʾ Yisows artsagetsʾ zayn ew ĕsaw :
42008039	« Veratartsir townt , ow batmē amēn inchʾ or Astowadz ĕraw kʾezi » . An al knatsʾ , ew ampoghch kʾaghakʾin mēch hrabaragetsʾ amēn inchʾ or Yisows ĕraw iren .
42008040	Erp Yisows veratartsaw , pazmowtʾiwnĕ ĕntownetsʾ zinkʾ , orovhetew polorĕ gĕ sbasēin iren .
42008041	Ew aha Yayros anownov mart mĕ egaw , or zhoghovarani bet ēr . Yisowsi otkʾĕ iynalov , g!aghachʾēr anor or ir townĕ mtnē ,
42008042	orovhetew ownēr mēg hatig aghchig mĕ , kretʾē tasnergow taregan , or mahamerts ēr . Erp Yisows g!ertʾar , pazmowtʾiwnĕ gĕ seghmēr zinkʾ .
42008043	Gin mĕ , or ariwnahosowtʾiwn ownēr tasnergow tariē i ver , ew ir ampoghch ownetsʾadzĕ dzakhsadz ēr p zhishgnerown , paytsʾ ochʾ mēgēn grtsʾadz ēr pow zhowil ,
42008044	etewēn mōtenalov , anor hantertsin kʾghantsʾkʾin tbaw , ew ir ariwnahosowtʾiwnĕ anmichabēs tatretsʾaw .
42008045	Ow Yisows ĕsaw : « Ov ēr an , or tbaw indzi » . Erp polorĕ g!owranayin , Betros ew iren het eghoghnerĕ ĕsin : « Vartabet , pazmowtʾiwnĕ kʾez gĕ seghmē ow gĕ jnshē , ew g!ĕses : “ Ov tbaw indzi ” » .
42008046	Yisows ĕsaw : « Mēgĕ tbaw indzi , orovhetew kitagtsʾetsʾay tʾē zōrowtʾiwn mĕ towrs elaw intsmē » .
42008047	Erp ginĕ tesaw tʾē ĕradzĕ angē tʾakʾown chʾmnatsʾ , toghalov egaw , anor aṛchew ingaw , ew ampoghch zhoghovowrtin aṛchew yaytararetsʾ anor tʾē inchʾ batjaṛov tber ēr anor , ew tʾē inchʾbēs anmichabēs p zhshgowetsʾaw .
42008048	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Kʾachalerowē , aghchig , hawatkʾt p zhshgetsʾ kʾez : kna khaghaghowtʾeamp » .
42008049	Erp inkʾ teṛ gĕ khōsēr , zhoghovarani betin townēn mēgĕ egaw ew ĕsaw : « Aghchigt meṛaw , al mi anhankstatsʾner vartabetĕ » .
42008050	Paytsʾ erp Yisows lsetsʾ asiga , ĕsaw anor : « Mi vakhnar , miayn hawata , ow biti abri » .
42008051	Erp townĕ mtaw , ochʾ mēgown tʾoyl towaw or mtnē , paytsʾ miayn , Betrosi , Yagoposi ow Yovhannēsi , ew aghchigin hōr ow mōr .
42008052	Polorn al gow layin ew gĕ hedzedzēin anor vray : paytsʾ inkʾ ĕsaw : « Mi lakʾ : an meṛadz chʾē , haba gĕ kʾnanay » .
42008053	Anonkʾ al zinkʾ dzaghretsʾin , kʾani kitēin tʾē meṛaw .
42008054	Isg inkʾ polorn al towrs hanelov , pṛnetsʾ anor tseṛkʾēn , ow kochʾetsʾ , ĕselov : « Aghchig , otkʾi elir » .
42008055	Anor hokin veratartsaw , ew an anmichabēs ganknetsʾaw . Yisows hramayetsʾ , or anor owtelikʾ tan .
42008056	Anor dznoghnerĕ zmayladz mnatsʾin , ew inkʾ batowiretsʾ anontsʾ , or batahadzĕ ochʾ mēgown ĕsen .
42009001	Ir tasnergow ashagertnerĕ hawakʾelov , zōrowtʾiwn ow ishkhanowtʾiwn towaw anontsʾ polor tewerown vray , ew akhterĕ p zhshgelow .
42009002	Ow ghrgetsʾ zanonkʾ , or kʾarozen Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ ew p zhshgen hiwantnerĕ .
42009003	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Jamportowtʾean hamar ochʾinchʾ aṛēkʾ , ochʾ kawazan ew ochʾ barg , ochʾ hatsʾ ew ochʾ tram : ochʾ al grgin pajgon ownetsʾēkʾ , , .
42009004	Orow town or mtnēkʾ , hon mnatsʾēkʾ , aba angē megnetsʾēkʾ .
42009005	Isg anonkʾ or chʾen ĕntownir tsez , erp towrs ellēkʾ ayt kʾaghakʾēn , tʾōtʾowetsʾēkʾ tser otkʾerown pʾoshin ankam , ipr vgayowtʾiwn anontsʾ tēm » .
42009006	Anonkʾ al megnetsʾan ew kiwghē kiwgh gĕ shrchēin , amēnowrekʾ awetaranelov ow pow zhelov .
42009007	Herovtēs chʾorrortabetĕ , anor polor gataradznerown masin lselov , taragoysi mēch ēr , orovhetew omankʾ ĕsadz ēin :
42009008	« Yovhannēs meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛaw » , ew omankʾ : « Eghia yaytnowetsʾaw » , isg owrishner al : « Nakhgin markarēnerēn mēgĕ yarowtʾiwn aṛaw » .
42009009	Herovtēs ĕsaw : « Yovhannēsĕ es klkhatetsʾi , isg ov biti ĕllay asiga , orown masin aysbisi paner gĕ lsem » . Ow gĕ chanar tesnel zayn .
42009010	Aṛakʾealnerĕ veratartsan , ow batmetsʾin anor , inchʾ or ĕrin : ew aṛnelov zanonkʾ , mēgti kʾashowetsʾaw amayi tegh mĕ , kʾaghakʾi mĕ kʾov , orown anownĕ Petʾsayita ēr .
42009011	Erp pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ kittsʾan , anor hetewetsʾan . Inkʾ al zanonkʾ ĕntownelov , gĕ khōsēr anontsʾ Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean masin , ew gĕ p zhshgēr anonkʾ , or pow zhowmi bētkʾ ownēin .
42009012	Erp ōrĕ sgsaw mtʾnnal , tasnergowkʾĕ mōtetsʾan ew ĕsin anor : « Artsagē pazmowtʾiwnĕ , orbēszi ertʾan shrchagay kiwghern ow arterĕ , ichewanin ew owtelikʾ ktnen , orovhetew hos amayi tegh mĕn enkʾ » .
42009013	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Towkʾ anontsʾ geragowr towēkʾ » . Anonkʾ al ĕsin : « Menkʾ hink nganagēn ow ergow tsowgēn aweli pan chʾowninkʾ , etʾē chʾertʾankʾ ayt ampoghch zhoghovowrtin hamar geragowr chʾknenkʾ » .
42009014	( Artarew hink hazari chʾapʾ ayr martig gayin . ) Ĕsaw ir ashagertnerown : « Nstetsʾowtsʾēkʾ atonkʾ , yisownagan sharkʾerov » .
42009015	Aytbēs ĕrin , ow polorn al nstetsʾowtsʾin .
42009016	Inkʾ al aṛaw ayt hink nganagnern ow ergow tsowgerĕ , tēbi erginkʾ nayelov , ōrhnetsʾ zanonkʾ , gtretsʾ ow towaw ashagertnerown , orbēszi hramtsʾnen pazmowtʾean .
42009017	Geran , polorn al gshtatsʾan , ew vertsʾnelov aweltsʾadz pegornerĕ , tasnergow goghov letsʾowtsʾin .
42009018	Erp inkʾ aṛantsin g!aghōtʾēr , ashagertnerĕ iren het ēin , ew hartsʾowtsʾ anontsʾ : « Pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ indzi hamar inchʾ g!ĕsen , ov em » .
42009019	Anonkʾ al bataskhanetsʾin : « Omankʾ , Yovhannēs Mgrtichʾĕ , owrishner , Eghian , owrishner al , nakhgin markarēnerēn mēgĕ , or yarowtʾiwn aṛadz ē » .
42009020	Inkʾ ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Isg towkʾ inchʾ g!ĕsēkʾ , ov em » . Betros bataskhanetsʾ : « Astowdzoy Kʾristosĕ » .
42009021	Yisows aztararetsʾ anontsʾ , ow batowiretsʾ or ochʾ mēgown ĕsen ays panĕ .
42009022	Ew ĕsaw : « Bētkʾ ē or martow Ortin shat chʾarchʾarankʾner grē , mer zhowi erētsʾnerēn , kʾahanayabetnerēn ew tbirnerēn , sbannowi ow yarowtʾiwn aṛnē errort ōrĕ » .
42009023	Ew g!ĕsēr polorin : « Etʾē mēgĕ owzē kal im etewēs , tʾogh owranay inkʾzinkʾ , amēn ōr vertsʾnē ir khachʾĕ ow hetewi indzi :
42009024	orovhetew ov or owzē pʾrgel ir antsĕ , biti gorsntsʾnē zayn , isg ov or gorsntsʾnē ir antsĕ , indzi hamar , biti pʾrgē zayn .
42009025	Kʾani or mart inchʾ ōkowt g!ownenay , etʾē shahi ampoghch ashkharhĕ paytsʾ gorsntsʾnē inkʾzinkʾ , gam tow zhē .
42009026	Orovhetew ov or amōtʾ sebē zis ew im khōskʾers tawanilĕ , martow Ortin al amōtʾ biti sebē zayn tawanilĕ , erp kay ir ow Hōr ew sowrp hreshtagnerown pʾaṛkʾov .
42009027	Paytsʾ jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Hos gaynoghnerēn gan omankʾ , or mah biti chʾhamtesen , minchʾew or tesnen Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ ” » .
42009028	Ays khōskʾerēn kretʾē owtʾ ōr etkʾ , aṛnelov Betrosĕ , Yovhannēsn ow Yagoposĕ , leṛĕ elaw aghōtʾelow .
42009029	Minchʾ g!aghōtʾēr , ir eresin teskʾĕ pʾokhowetsʾaw , ew ir batmowjanĕ jermag ow pʾaylown eghaw .
42009030	Ew aha ergow martig gĕ khōsagtsʾēin iren het : anonkʾ ֊ Movsēsn ow Eghian ,
42009031	pʾaṛkʾov erewtsʾadz , ew gĕ khōsēin anor ays geankʾēn megnowmin masin , or biti irakordzowēr Erowsaghēmi mēch .
42009032	Betros ow anor het eghoghnerĕ kʾownov dzanratsʾadz ēin : erp artʾntsʾan , tesan anor pʾaṛkʾĕ ew ayt ergow martigĕ , or anor kʾov getsʾadz ēin .
42009033	Erp anonkʾ zatowetsʾan anor kʾovēn , Betros ĕsaw Yisowsi : « Vartabet , law ē or genankʾ hos ew shinenkʾ erekʾ vran , mēgĕ , kʾezi , mēgĕ , Movsēsi ow mēgĕ , Eghiayi » : orovhetew chʾēr kiter tʾē inchʾ gĕ khōsēr .
42009034	Minchʾ aysbēs gĕ khōsēr , amb mĕ egaw ew hovani eghaw anontsʾ vray : ow erp anonkʾ ambin tag mtan , vakhtsʾan .
42009035	TSayn mĕ egaw ambēn , ĕselov : « Ays ē im sireli Ortis , anor mtig ĕrēkʾ » .
42009036	Erp lsetsʾin ayt tsaynĕ , Yisows minag mnatsʾ . Irenkʾ al lowṛ getsʾan , ew ayt ōrerĕ ochʾ mēgown pan mĕ batmetsʾin irentsʾ tesadznerēn .
42009037	Heteweal ōrĕ , erp anonkʾ leṛnēn var ichan , medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ timaworetsʾ zayn .
42009038	Pazmowtʾenēn mart mĕ kochʾetsʾ : « Vartabet , g!aghersem kʾezi , nayē ortiis , kʾani or im mēg hatigs ē .
42009039	Aha oki mĕ gĕ pṛnē zinkʾ , inkʾ al yangardz g!aghaghagē : okin zinkʾ tsʾntsʾelov gĕ pʾrpʾrtsʾnē , ow haziw gĕ heṛanay irmē , chakhchakhelov zinkʾ .
42009040	Aghersetsʾi kʾow ashagertnerowt , or towrs hanen zayn , paytsʾ chʾgrtsʾan » .
42009041	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « Ov anhawat ow khotoreal serownt , minchʾew erp tsezi het biti ĕllam ew tsezi hantowr zhem . Hos per ortit » .
42009042	Erp gĕ mōtenar , tewĕ ketin zargaw zayn ow sastig tsʾntsʾetsʾ .
42009043	Isg Yisows sastetsʾ anmakʾowr okin , p zhshgetsʾ batanin ew towaw zayn ir hōr .
42009044	Polorĕ g!abshēin Astowdzoy medzamedz kordzerown vray . Minchʾ polorn al gĕ skʾanchʾanayin Yisowsi polor ĕradznerown vray , an ĕsaw ir ashagertnerown : « Towkʾ ays khōskʾerĕ tser mitkʾĕ bahetsʾēkʾ , , , orovhetew martow Ortin biti matnowi martotsʾ tseṛkʾĕ » .
42009045	Paytsʾ anonkʾ chʾēin hasgnar ays khōskʾĕ , ew anontsʾmē dzadzgowadz ēr , orbēszi chʾĕmpṛnen : ow gĕ vakhnayin hartsʾnel iren ayt khōskʾin masin .
42009046	Mtadzowm mĕn al dzaketsʾaw anontsʾ mēch , tʾē arteōkʾ ov ē medzakoynĕ irentsʾ mēch .
42009047	Yisows ĕmpṛnelov anontsʾ sirtin mtadzowmĕ , aṛaw manowg mĕ , gaynetsʾowtsʾ zayn ir kʾov ,
42009048	ow ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ov or g!ĕntowni ays manowgĕ im anownovs , zis g!ĕntowni , ew ov or zis g!ĕntowni , zis ghrgoghĕ g!ĕntowni : orovhetew an or amenēn bztign ē tser polorin mēch , aniga biti ĕllay medzĕ » .
42009049	Yovhannēs ĕsaw : « Vartabet , mēgĕ tesankʾ or tewer gĕ hanēr kʾow anownovt , ew arkiletsʾinkʾ zayn , kʾani or mezi chʾi hetewir » .
42009050	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Mi arkilēkʾ , orovhetew an or mezi hagaṛag chʾē , mer , , goghmēn ē » .
42009051	Erp ir ashkharhēn veranalow zhamanagĕ hasaw , , , hastatabēs oroshetsʾ , , Erowsaghēm ertʾal .
42009052	Ew ir aṛchewēn ghrgetsʾ batkamaworner , oronkʾ erp katsʾin , mtan Samaratsʾinerown mēg kiwghĕ , orbēszi batrastowtʾiwn tesnen iren hamar .
42009053	Paytsʾ chʾĕntownetsʾin zayn , orovhetew anor eresĕ tēbi Erowsaghēm owghghowadz ēr .
42009054	Erp ir ashagertnerĕ , Yagopos ow Yovhannēs , tesan asiga , ĕsin anor : « Tēr , g!owzes or ĕsenkʾ , orbēszi erginkʾēn grag ichnē ew sbaṛē zanonkʾ , inchʾbēs Eghia al ĕraw » .
42009055	Tartsaw ow yantimanetsʾ zanonkʾ , ĕselov : « CHʾēkʾ kiter tʾē inchʾ hokii tēr ēkʾ :
42009056	orovhetew martow Ortin egaw ochʾ tʾē martotsʾ antserĕ gorsntsʾnelow , haba , pʾrgelow , , » . Ew owrish kiwgh mĕ katsʾin .
42009057	Erp anonkʾ jampan g!ertʾayin , mēgĕ ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , biti hetewim kʾezi , owr or ertʾas » .
42009058	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Aghowēsnerĕ orcher ownin , ow erginkʾi tʾṛchʾownnerĕ , poyner , paytsʾ martow Ortin tegh mĕ chʾowni , owr hankchʾetsʾnē ir klowkhĕ » .
42009059	Owrishi mĕn al ĕsaw : « Hetewē indzi » . Isg an ĕsaw : « Tēr , artōnē indzi , or nakh ertʾam , tʾaghem hayrs » .
42009060	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Tʾogh meṛelnerown , tʾaghel irentsʾ meṛelnerĕ , isg town kna ow kʾarozē Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ » .
42009061	Owrish mĕn al ĕsaw : « Tēr , biti hetewim kʾezi : paytsʾ artōnē or nakh hra zhesht aṛnem tans mēch eghoghnerēn » .
42009062	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Ochʾ mēgĕ , or gĕ tnē tseṛkʾĕ majin vray ow etew gĕ nayi , yarmar ē Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean » .
42010001	Asgē etkʾ , Tērĕ owrish eōtʾanasown al oroshetsʾ , ew ir aṛchewēn ergow-ergow ghrgetsʾ zanonkʾ polor kʾaghakʾnern ow tegherĕ , owr inkʾ biti ertʾar .
42010002	Ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Howntskʾĕ irabēs shat ē , paytsʾ kordzawornerĕ , kʾichʾ : owremn howntskʾin Tēroch aghersetsʾēkʾ , or kordzaworner owghargē ir howntskʾin .
42010003	Katsʾēkʾ : aha es gĕ ghrgem tsez ipr kaṛnowgner , kaylerow mēch .
42010004	TSezi het mi aṛnēkʾ , , ochʾ kʾsag , ochʾ barg , ochʾ al gōshigner , ow jampan ochʾ mēgĕ parewetsʾēkʾ .
42010005	Orewē town or mtnēkʾ , nakh ĕsēkʾ : “ Parew ays tan ” .
42010006	Etʾē hon parewi ar zhani mart gay , tser parewĕ biti hankchʾi anor vray : aylabēs , biti taṛnay tsezi .
42010007	Mnatsʾēkʾ ayt tan mēch , ew gerēkʾ ow khmetsʾēkʾ anontsʾ kʾov , orovhetew kordzaworĕ ar zhani ē ir vartskʾin : mi ertʾakʾ townē town .
42010008	Orewē kʾaghakʾ or mtnēkʾ ew ĕntownin tsez , gerēkʾ inchʾ or hramtsʾnen tsezi .
42010009	Pow zhetsʾēkʾ anor mēchi hiwantnerĕ ew ĕsēkʾ anontsʾ : “ Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ mōtetsʾadz ē tsezi ” .
42010010	Paytsʾ orewē kʾaghakʾ or mtnēkʾ ow chʾĕntownin tsez , ertʾalov anor hrabaragnerĕ , ĕsēkʾ :
42010011	“ Ayn pʾoshin al , or mer otkʾerown pʾagadz ē tser kʾaghakʾēn , gĕ tʾōtʾowenkʾ tsezi : paytsʾ sa kittsʾēkʾ , or Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ mōtetsʾadz ē tsezi ” .
42010012	Gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ayn ōrĕ Sotomi tatastanĕ aweli tiwrin biti ĕllay , kʾan ayt kʾaghakʾin ” » .
42010013	« Vay kʾezi , Kʾorazin , vay kʾezi , Petʾsayita : orovhetew etʾē Tiwrosi ow Sitoni mēch gatarowadz ĕllayin ayn hrashkʾnerĕ , oronkʾ gatarowetsʾan tser mēch , shatontsʾ abashkharadz biti ĕllayin , kʾowrtsov ew mokhiri mēch nstelov .
42010014	Paytsʾ tatastanin ōrĕ , aweli tiwrin biti ĕllay Tiwrosi ow Sitoni , kʾan tsezi .
42010015	Ew town , Gapʾaṛnayowm , or partsratsʾadz es minchʾew erginkʾ , biti ichnes minchʾew t zhokhkʾ .
42010016	An or mtig g!ĕnē tsezi , mtig g!ĕnē indzi : isg an or g!anarkē tsez , g!anarkē zis , ew an or g!anarkē zis , g!anarkē zis ghrgoghĕ » .
42010017	Eōtʾanasown ashagertnerĕ veratartsan owrakhowtʾeamp , ew ĕsin : « Tēr , kʾow anownovt , tewern al gĕ hbatagēin mezi » .
42010018	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Gĕ tesnēi Satanan , or var g!iynar erginkʾēn , pʾaylagi nman .
42010019	Aha tsezi ishkhanowtʾiwn gow tam , gokhelow ōtserow , garijnerow , ew tʾshnamiin ampoghch zōrowtʾean vray : pnaw pan mĕ biti chʾvnasē tsezi .
42010020	Paytsʾ towkʾ mi owrakhanakʾ , or chʾar okinerĕ gĕ hbatagin tsezi : ayl manawant owrakhatsʾēkʾ , or tser anownnerĕ krowadz en erginkʾĕ » .
42010021	Ayt noyn zhamown , Yisows Hokiov tsʾndzatsʾ ew ĕsaw : « Gĕ nerpoghem kʾez , Hayr , Tēr erginkʾi ow ergri , or ays panerĕ dzadzgetsʾir imastownnerēn ew khelatsʾinerēn , ow yaytnetsʾir erakhanerown . Ayo , Hayr , orovhetew aysbēs hajeli eghaw kʾow aṛchewt .
42010022	Amēn pan yantsnowetsʾaw indzi , im Hōrmēs , ow ochʾ mēgĕ kitē tʾē ov ē Ortin , paytsʾ miayn , Hayrĕ , ew tʾē ov ē Hayrĕ , paytsʾ miayn , Ortin , ew an , orown Ortin pʾapʾakʾi yaytnel » .
42010023	Ashagertnerown taṛnalov , aṛantsin ĕsaw : « Erani ayn achʾkʾerown , or gĕ tesnen tser tesadznerĕ :
42010024	artarew gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ SHat markarēner ow tʾakaworner owzetsʾin tesnel tser tesadznerĕ , paytsʾ chʾtesan , ew lsel tser lsadznerĕ , paytsʾ chʾlsetsʾin ” » .
42010025	Aha ōrinagan mĕ ganknetsʾaw , ow pʾortselov zayn , ĕsaw : « Vartabet , inchʾ ĕnem , or zhaṛankem yawitenagan geankʾĕ » .
42010026	An al ĕsaw anor : « Inchʾ krowadz ē ōrēnkʾin mēch , inchʾbēs gĕ gartas » .
42010027	An bataskhanetsʾ : « Sirē Tērĕ , kʾow Astowadzt , ampoghch sirtovt , ampoghch antsovt , ampoghch zōrowtʾeampt ew ampoghch mitkʾovt , ow ĕngert , kʾow antsit , , bēs » .
42010028	Inkʾ al ĕsaw anor : « SHitag bataskhanetsʾir , ĕrē atiga , ow biti abris » .
42010029	Isg an , owzelov artaratsʾnel inkʾzinkʾ , ĕsaw Yisowsi : « Paytsʾ ov ē im ĕngers » .
42010030	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « Mēgĕ Erowsaghēmēn Erikʾov g!ichnēr ew awazagnerow tseṛkʾĕ ingaw , oronkʾ mergatsʾowtsʾin zayn , viraworelov gisameṛ tʾoghowtsʾin ow katsʾin .
42010031	Batahetsʾaw or kʾahanay mĕ ichnē ayt jampayēn : tesnelov zayn , miws goghmēn antsʾaw .
42010032	Nmanabēs GHewtatsʾi mĕ hasnelov ayt teghĕ , knatsʾ ew tesaw , ow miws goghmēn antsʾaw .
42010033	Paytsʾ Samaratsʾi mĕ , or gĕ jamportēr , egaw anor kʾov , ew tesnelov zayn , ktʾatsʾ .
42010034	Mōtetsʾaw , pʾatʾtʾetsʾ anor vērkʾerĕ , vran tsētʾ ow kini tʾapʾelov ew ir krastin vray tnelov , taraw zayn bantog mĕ , ow hok taraw anor .
42010035	Heteweal ōrĕ , erp gĕ megnēr angē , hanetsʾ ergow tahegan , towaw bantogabetin ew ĕsaw anor : « Hok tar ator , ow inchʾ or aweli dzakhses , biti vjarem kʾezi erp verataṛnam » .
42010036	Owremn ays erekʾēn ov gĕ gardzes tʾē ĕngerĕ eghaw awazagnerow tseṛkʾĕ ingoghin » .
42010037	An al ĕsaw : « An , or garegtsʾetsʾaw anor » . Owsti Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Kna , town al noynbēs ĕrē » .
42010038	Erp anonkʾ g!ertʾayin , inkʾ kiwgh mĕ mtaw , ew gin mĕ , Martʾa anownov , ĕntownetsʾ zayn ir townĕ .
42010039	An kʾoyr mĕ ownēr , orown anownĕ Mariam ēr : an egaw , nstaw Yisowsi otkʾerown kʾov , ew mtig g!ĕnēr anor khōskʾerĕ .
42010040	Paytsʾ Martʾa shat zpaghadz ēr sbasargowtʾeamp . Egaw anor kʾov ow ĕsaw : « Tēr , hok chʾes ĕner , or kʾoyrs minag tsketsʾ zis sbasargowtʾean mēch : owremn ĕsē iren , or ōknē indzi » .
42010041	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Martʾa , Martʾa , town shat panerow hamar gĕ mtahokowis ew irar g!antsʾnis :
42010042	paytsʾ mēg pan bētkʾ ē , ow Mariam ĕntretsʾ ayt law pa zhinĕ , or biti chʾaṛnowi irmē » .
42011001	Erp tegh mĕ g!aghōtʾēr , tatrelēn etkʾ ir ashagertnerēn mēgĕ ĕsaw iren : « Tēr , aghōtʾel sorvetsʾowr mezi , inchʾbēs Yovhannēs sorvetsʾowtsʾ ir ashagertnerown » .
42011002	Owsti ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Erp g!aghōtʾēkʾ , ĕsēkʾ : “ Hayr mer , or erginkʾn es , , , kʾow anownt sowrp ĕllay : kʾow tʾakaworowtʾiwnt kay : kʾow gamkʾt ĕllay , inchʾbēs erginkʾĕ , noynbēs ergri vray , , .
42011003	Mer amēnōreay hatsʾĕ , towr mezi ōrē ōr :
42011004	nerē mezi mer meghkʾerĕ , kʾani or menkʾ al gĕ nerenkʾ polor anontsʾ , or bartaban en mezi : ow mi tanir mez pʾortsowtʾean , haba azatē mez CHʾarēn , , ” » .
42011005	Naew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Etʾē tsezmē mēgĕ , , paregam mĕ ownenay , ow gēs kisherin ertʾay anor ew ĕsē : “ Paregam , indzi erekʾ nganag pʾokh towr :
42011006	orovhetew mēg paregams jamportadz aten indzi egaw , ew ochʾinchʾ ownim , anor hramtsʾnelow ” ,
42011007	ow etʾē an nersēn bataskhanē : “ Zis mi anhankstatsʾner : artēn towṛĕ kotsʾowadz ē , ow zawagners im kʾovs , angoghinin mēch en : chʾem grnar ganknil ew kʾezi hatsʾ tal ” ,
42011008	gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Tʾēew paregamowtʾean hamar otkʾi chʾellē , anor talow , anor batjaṛadz taghtowgin , , hamar biti gankni ow bētkʾ eghadzĕ tay anor ” .
42011009	Es al gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ KHntretsʾēkʾ , ew biti trowi tsezi : pʾntṛetsʾēkʾ , ow biti ktnēkʾ : towṛĕ pakhetsʾēkʾ , ew biti patsʾowi tsezi .
42011010	Orovhetew ov or khntrē , gĕ stanay , ov or pʾntṛē , gĕ ktnē , ew ov or towṛĕ pakhē , biti patsʾowi anor .
42011011	Etʾē orti mĕ hatsʾ owzē tsezmē oewē mēgēn , or hayr ē , mitʾē kʾar biti tay anor : gam etʾē tsowg owzē , mitʾē tsowgin tegh ōts biti tay anor :
42011012	gam etʾē hawgitʾ owzē , mitʾē garij biti tay anor .
42011013	Owremn etʾē towkʾ or chʾar ēkʾ , kitēkʾ tser zawagnerown pari nowērner tal , orchʾapʾ aweli tser Hayrĕ erginkʾēn Sowrp Hokin biti tay anontsʾ , or gĕ khntren irmē ” » .
42011014	Yisows gĕ hanēr tew mĕ , or hamr ēr . Erp tewĕ towrs elaw , hamrĕ khōsetsʾaw , ew pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ skʾanchʾatsʾan .
42011015	Paytsʾ anontsʾmē omankʾ ĕsin : « An tewerow Pēeghzepowgh ishkhanin michotsʾov gĕ hanē tewerĕ » .
42011016	Owrishner al , pʾortselow hamar , gĕ khntrēin irmē nshan mĕ erginkʾēn .
42011017	Paytsʾ inkʾ kitnalov anontsʾ mtadzowmnerĕ , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inkʾnir tēm pa zhnowadz orewē tʾakaworowtʾiwn , g!aweri , ew town mĕ inkʾnir tēm pa zhnowadz , gĕ pʾlchʾi .
42011018	Haba etʾē Satanan inkʾnir tēm pa zhnowadz ē , anor tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ inchʾbēs biti genay : orovhetew g!ĕsēkʾ tʾē Pēeghzepowghov gĕ hanem tewerĕ .
42011019	Isg etʾē es Pēeghzepowghov gĕ hanem tewerĕ , tser ortinerĕ inchʾov gĕ hanen : owsti anonkʾ biti ĕllan tser tatawornerĕ .
42011020	Paytsʾ etʾē es Astowdzoy matov gĕ hanem tewerĕ , owremn Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ hasadz ē tser vray .
42011021	Erp ow zhegh mart mĕ , zēnkʾerĕ vran aṛadz , bahbanē ir tan kawitʾĕ , anor inchʾkʾĕ gĕ mnay khaghaghowtʾean mēch .
42011022	Paytsʾ erp irmē aweli ow zheghĕ yartsagi vran ow yaghtʾē anor , gĕ krawē anor zēnkʾerĕ , orontsʾ an vstahadz ēr , ew gĕ pashkhē irmē aṛadz goghobowtĕ .
42011023	An or indzi het chʾē , indzi hagaṛag ē , ew an or indzi het chʾi hawakʾer , gĕ tsʾrowē » .
42011024	« Erp anmakʾowr okin towrs ellē martē mĕ , gĕ shrchi anchowr tegher , hankstowtʾiwn gĕ pʾntṛē , ow etʾē chʾktnē , g!ĕsē : “ Verataṛnam im towns , owrgē elay ” .
42011025	Ew gow kay , zayn gĕ ktnē awlowadz ow zartarowadz .
42011026	Ayn aten g!ertʾay , ew iren het g!aṛnē owrish eōtʾĕ okiner , irmē aweli chʾar , ow mtnelov , gĕ pnagin hon , ew ayt martown verchin vijagĕ aṛachinēn aweli kēsh g!ĕllay » .
42011027	Erp an ays panerĕ gĕ khōsēr , pazmowtʾean mēchēn gin mĕ tsaynĕ partsratsʾowtsʾ ow ĕsaw anor : « Erani ayn orovaynin , or gretsʾ kʾez , ew ayn dzidzerown , oronkʾ gatʾ towin kʾezi , , » .
42011028	Isg inkʾ ĕsaw : « Manawant erani anontsʾ , or gĕ lsen Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ ow gĕ bahen » .
42011029	Erp pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ gĕ khṛnowēin anor showrch , inkʾ ĕsaw : « Ays serowntĕ chʾar ē , nshan gĕ khntrē : sagayn owrish nshan biti chʾtrowi anor , paytsʾ miayn Yovnan markarēin nshanĕ .
42011030	Orovhetew inchʾbēs Yovnan nshan eghaw Ninowētsʾinerown , aynbēs martow Ortin biti ĕllay ays serowntin .
42011031	Harawi tʾakowhin , tatastanin ōrĕ otkʾi biti ellē ays serowntin martotsʾ tēm ow biti tatabartē asonkʾ , orovhetew egaw ergri dzayrerēn , lselow Soghomoni imastowtʾiwnĕ : ew aha Soghomonē medz mēgĕ gay hos .
42011032	Ninowēi martigĕ tatastanin ōrĕ biti ganknin ays serowntin tēm ow biti tatabarten zayn , orovhetew zghchatsʾin Yovnani kʾarozowtʾeamp : ew aha Yovnanē medz mēgĕ gay hos » .
42011033	« Ochʾ mēgĕ , jrakĕ vaṛelē etkʾ , gĕ tnē dzadzowg tegh mĕ , gam al , krowani tag , haba , ashtanagi vray , orbēszi ners mtnoghnerĕ tesnen pʾaylĕ .
42011034	Marminin jrakĕ achʾkʾn ē : owremn erp achʾkʾt barz ē , ampoghch marmint al lowsawor g!ĕllay , paytsʾ erp achʾkʾt chʾar ē , marmint al khawaramadz g!ĕllay .
42011035	Owsti owshatir eghir , or kʾow mēcht eghadz loysĕ khawar chʾĕllay .
42011036	Owremn etʾē ampoghch marmint lowsawor ē ow mowtʾ mas mĕ chʾowni , ampoghchovin lowsawor g!ĕllay , inchʾbēs erp jrak mĕ gĕ lowsaworē kʾez ir pʾaylov » .
42011037	Erp ays panerĕ gĕ khōsēr , Pʾarisetsʾi mĕ gĕ tʾakhantsēr anor , or ir kʾov jashē . An al mtaw ew seghan nstaw .
42011038	Erp Pʾarisetsʾin tesaw , zarmatsʾaw , orovhetew jashēn aṛach chʾlowatsʾowetsʾaw .
42011039	Tērĕ ĕsaw anor : « Hima towkʾ , Pʾarisetsʾiner , gĕ makʾrēkʾ kawatʾin ow bnagin artakʾinĕ , paytsʾ tser nerkʾinĕ letsʾown ē yapʾshtagowtʾeamp ew chʾarowtʾeamp .
42011040	Anmitner , an or artakʾinĕ ĕraw , nerkʾinn al inkʾ chʾĕraw .
42011041	Sagayn oghormowtʾiwn towēkʾ anontsʾ mēch eghadznerēn , ew aha amēn pan makʾowr g!ĕllay tsezi » .
42011042	« Paytsʾ vay tsezi , Pʾarisetsʾinerowt , or gĕ vjarēkʾ ananowkhin , pʾekenayin ew amēn tesag panchareghēni tasanortĕ , paytsʾ zantsʾ g!ĕnēkʾ irawownkʾĕ ew Astowdzoy sērĕ : asonkʾ bētkʾ ē ĕnēikʾ , ow zanonkʾ chʾtʾoghowikʾ .
42011043	Vay tsezi , Pʾarisetsʾinerowt , or gĕ sirēkʾ aṛachin atʾoṛnerĕ , zhoghovarannerow mēch , ew parewnerĕ , hrabaragnerown vray .
42011044	Vay tsezi , geghdzawor tbirner ow Pʾarisetsʾiner , or nman ēkʾ anyayt kerezmannerow , orontsʾ vrayēn martig gĕ kʾalen ew chʾen kiter » .
42011045	ōrinagannerēn mēgĕ ĕsaw anor : « Vartabet , aysbēs khōselov , mez al gĕ nakhates » .
42011046	Isg an ĕsaw : « TSezi al vay , ōrinagannerowt , or t zhowaragir peṛner gĕ peṛtsʾnēkʾ martotsʾ , paytsʾ towkʾ , tser mēg matov chʾēkʾ hbir ayt peṛnerown .
42011047	Vay tsezi , or kerezmanner gĕ gaṛowtsʾanēkʾ markarēnerown , minchʾteṛ tser hayrerĕ sbannetsʾin zanonkʾ .
42011048	Owsti gĕ vgayēkʾ ew hawanowtʾiwn gow takʾ tser hayrerown kordzerown : orovhetew isgabēs irenkʾ sbannetsʾin zanonkʾ , ow towkʾ kerezmanner gĕ gaṛowtsʾanēkʾ anontsʾ .
42011049	Hetewapar , Astowdzoy imastowtʾiwnĕ naew ĕsaw : “ Anontsʾ biti ghrgem markarēner ew aṛakʾealner . Anontsʾmē omankʾ biti sbannen ow omankʾ haladzen ,
42011050	orbēszi ashkharhi himnatrowtʾenēn i ver tʾapʾowadz polor markarēnerown ariwnĕ bahanchowi ays serowntēn .
42011051	Apēli ariwnēn minchʾew Zakʾariayi ariwnĕ , or tʾapʾowetsʾaw zohaseghanin ow tajarin mēchtegh , ayo , gĕ yaytararem tsezi , biti bahanchowi ays serowntēn ” .
42011052	Vay tsezi , ōrinagannerowt , or vertsʾowtsʾikʾ kitowtʾean panalin : towkʾ chʾmtakʾ , ew mtnoghnern al arkiletsʾikʾ » .
42011053	Erp ays panerĕ g!ĕsēr anontsʾ , tbirnern ow Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ sgsan powṛn gerbov jnshel zinkʾ , ew khōsetsʾnel shat panerow masin :
42011054	anor taran batrastelov , gĕ pʾntṛēin tʾē inchʾbēs anor peranēn khōskʾ mĕ , , orsan , orbēszi ampastanen zinkʾ .
42012001	Ayt michotsʾin , erp piwrawor pazmowtʾiwnner hawakʾowetsʾan , - aynkʾan , or zirar gĕ gokhgṛtēin , - sgsaw nakh ĕsel ir ashagertnerown : « Zkowshatsʾēkʾ , , Pʾarisetsʾinerow khmorēn , or geghdzaworowtʾiwnn ē .
42012002	Orovhetew ochʾinchʾ gay dzadzgowadz , or biti chʾyaytnowi , ochʾ al kaghtni , or biti chʾkittsʾowi .
42012003	Owsti inchʾ or ĕsikʾ khawarin mēch , biti lsowi loysin mēch , ew ayn or aganchin khōsetsʾakʾ nerkʾin seneagnerown mēch , biti hrabaragowi tanikʾnerown vray » .
42012004	« Paytsʾ tsezi , im paregamnerows , g!ĕsem : “ Mi vakhnakʾ anontsʾmē , or gĕ sbannen marminĕ , ew garoghowtʾiwn chʾownin angē aweli pan mĕ ĕnelow .
42012005	Haba tsezi tsʾoytsʾ tam tʾē ormē bētkʾ ē vakhnakʾ . Vakhtsʾēkʾ angē , or sbannelē etkʾ ishkhanowtʾiwn owni kehenĕ netelow . Ayo , gĕ yaytararem tsezi , angē vakhtsʾēkʾ ” .
42012006	Hink jnjghowg ergow tanki chʾen dzakhowir : sagayn anontsʾmē ochʾ mēgĕ moṛtsʾowadz ē Astowdzoy aṛchew .
42012007	Paytsʾ tser klowkhin polor mazern al hamrowadz en : owremn mi vakhnakʾ , orovhetew towkʾ shat jnjghowgnerē aweli g!ar zhēkʾ » .
42012008	« Gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ov or tawani zis martotsʾ aṛchew , martow Ortin al biti tawani zayn Astowdzoy hreshtagnerown aṛchew .
42012009	Paytsʾ an or owranay zis martotsʾ aṛchew , inkʾ al biti owratsʾowi Astowdzoy hreshtagnerown aṛchew .
42012010	Ov or khōskʾ mĕ ĕsē martow Ortiin tēm , biti nerowi anor , paytsʾ an or hayhoyē Sowrp Hokiin tēm , biti chʾnerowi anor ” .
42012011	Erp tanin tsez zhoghovarannerow , ishkhanowtʾiwnnerow ew betowtʾiwnnerow aṛchew , mi mtahokowikʾ tʾē inchʾbēs gam inchʾ panov biti chatakovēkʾ towkʾ tsez , gam inchʾ biti ĕsēkʾ :
42012012	orovhetew Sowrp Hokin biti sorvetsʾnē tsezi noyn zhamown , inchʾ or bētkʾ ē khōsil » .
42012013	Pazmowtʾean mēchēn mēgĕ ĕsaw anor : « Vartabet , ĕsē eghpōrs , or indzi het pa zhnē mezi ingadz zhaṛankowtʾiwnĕ » .
42012014	An al ĕsaw anor : « Mart , ov nshanagetsʾ zis irawarar gam pa zhnogh , tser vray » .
42012015	Aba ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Owshatir eghēkʾ ew zkowshatsʾēkʾ akahowtʾenē : orovhetew mēgown statsʾowadzkʾnerown aṛatowtʾenēn gakhowadz chʾē ir geankʾĕ » .
42012016	Aṛag mĕn al khōsetsʾaw anontsʾ , ĕselov : « Harowst martow mĕ arterĕ towin aṛat perkʾer ,
42012017	ew an gĕ mtadzēr inkʾniren , ĕselov : “ Inchʾ ĕnem , orovhetew tegh chʾownim , owr perkʾers zhoghvem ” . Ew ĕsaw :
42012018	“ Sa biti ĕnem : biti kʾantem amparners , biti gaṛowtsʾanem aweli medzerĕ , hon biti zhoghvem im polor perkʾers ow parikʾners ,
42012019	ew biti ĕsem antsis : « Ov im antss , shat parikʾner ownis , tizowadz shat tarinerow hamar : hankchʾē , ger , khmē ew zowarjatsʾir » ” .
42012020	Paytsʾ Astowadz ĕsaw anor : “ Anmit , ays kisher antst biti bahanchowi kʾezmē : owsti orow biti ĕllan ayt batrastadz panert ” .
42012021	Aysbēs ē an , or kants gĕ tizē inkʾniren hamar , paytsʾ chʾi harstanar Astowdzoy mōt » .
42012022	Ew ĕsaw ir ashagertnerown : « Owsti gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Mi mtahokowikʾ tser antsin hamar , tʾē inchʾ biti owtēkʾ , ochʾ al marminin hamar , tʾē inchʾ biti haknikʾ :
42012023	orovhetew antsĕ geragowrēn aweli ē , ow marminĕ , hakowstēn .
42012024	Titetsʾēkʾ akṛawnerĕ , oronkʾ ochʾ gĕ sermanen ew ochʾ gĕ hntsen , oronkʾ ochʾ shtemaranner ownin , ochʾ al amparner , paytsʾ Astowadz gĕ geragrē zanonkʾ : towkʾ orchʾapʾ aweli g!ar zhēkʾ tʾṛchʾownnerēn .
42012025	TSezmē ov grnay mtahokowelov gankown mĕ aweltsʾnel hasagin vray .
42012026	Haba etʾē chʾēkʾ grnar amenapʾokʾr panĕ pʾokhel , inchʾow gĕ mtahokowikʾ owrish panerow hamar .
42012027	Titetsʾēkʾ showshannerĕ , tʾē inchʾbēs g!ajin . Ochʾ g!ashkhatin ew ochʾ gĕ manen : paytsʾ gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē Soghomon al , ir ampoghch pʾaṛaworowtʾean mēch , chʾhakowetsʾaw anontsʾmē mēgown bēs .
42012028	Owsti etʾē khotĕ , or aysōr tashti mēch ē ow vaghĕ pʾowṛĕ biti netowi , Astowadz aytbēs gĕ hakowetsʾnē , orchʾapʾ aweli tsez , tʾerahawatner .
42012029	Al towkʾ mi pʾntṛēkʾ tʾē inchʾ biti owtēkʾ ew inchʾ biti khmēkʾ , ow mi shpʾotʾikʾ :
42012030	orovhetew ashkharhi azkerĕ gĕ pʾntṛen ayt polor panerĕ , ew tser Hayrĕ kitē tʾē asonkʾ bētkʾ en tsezi .
42012031	Haba towkʾ khntretsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ , ow ayt polor panern al biti trowin tsezi ” » .
42012032	« Mi vakhnar , bztig hōt , orovhetew tser Hayrĕ parehajetsʾaw , or tsezi tay tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ .
42012033	DZakhetsʾēkʾ tser inchʾkʾĕ ew oghormowtʾiwn towēkʾ : chʾmashogh kʾsagner batrastetsʾēkʾ tsezi hamar , ow chʾbagsogh kants mĕ , erginkʾĕ , owr ochʾ koghĕ gĕ mōtenay ew ochʾ tsʾetsʾĕ g!abaganē .
42012034	Orovhetew owr or ē tser kantsĕ , hon biti ĕllay naew tser sirtĕ » .
42012035	« TSer mēchkʾerĕ tʾogh kōteworowadz ĕllan , ow jraknerĕ , vaṛowadz :
42012036	ew towkʾ nman eghēkʾ ayn martotsʾ , or gĕ sbasen irentsʾ tiroch tʾē erp biti verataṛnay harsanikʾēn : orbēszi erp kay ow towṛĕ pakhē , isgoyn panan anor .
42012037	Erani ayn dzaṛanerown , or tērĕ artʾown biti ktnē , erp kay . Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē inkʾ kōtin mēchkʾĕ biti gabē , seghan pazmetsʾnē zanonkʾ , ew aṛchew antsʾnelov , biti sbasargē anontsʾ .
42012038	Etʾē kisherowan ergrort bahown kay , gam errort bahown kay ew aynbēs ktnē , eraneli en ayt dzaṛanerĕ .
42012039	Paytsʾ sa hasgtsʾēkʾ : etʾē tanowtērĕ kitnar tʾē koghĕ or zhamown biti kay , artʾown gĕ genar ow tʾoyl chʾēr tar , or dzagē ir townĕ .
42012040	Owremn towkʾ al batrast getsʾēkʾ , kʾani or martow Ortin biti kay aynbisi zhamow mĕ , or towkʾ chʾēkʾ gardzer » .
42012041	Betros ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , ayt aṛagĕ mezi g!ĕses , tʾē polorin al » .
42012042	Tērĕ ĕsaw : « Owremn ov ē ayn hawatarim ew imastown tntesĕ , or tērĕ biti nshanagē ir dzaṛanerown vray , orbēszi atenin tay anontsʾ owtelikʾĕ .
42012043	Erani ayt dzaṛayin , orown tērĕ , erp kay , biti ktnē tʾē aytbēs g!ĕnē .
42012044	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē biti nshanagē zayn ir ampoghch inchʾkʾin vray .
42012045	Haba etʾē ayt dzaṛan ĕsē ir sirtin mēch : “ Im tērs g!owshatsʾnē ir kalĕ ” , ew sgsi dzedzel dzaṛanern ow aghakhinnerĕ , owtel , khmel ew arpenal ,
42012046	ayt dzaṛayin tērĕ biti kay aynbisi ōr mĕ , erp chʾi sbaser , ew aynbisi zhamow mĕ , or chʾi kiter : ergowkʾi biti gtrē zayn , ow biti tnē anor pa zhinĕ anhawatarimnerown het .
42012047	Ayn dzaṛan , or kitē ir tiroch gamkʾĕ ew chʾi batrastowir , ochʾ al gĕ kordzē anor gamkʾin hamatsayn , shat biti dzedzowi .
42012048	Paytsʾ an or chʾi kiter ow dzedzi ar zhani paner ĕnē , kʾichʾ biti dzedzowi . Orown or shat trowetsʾaw , shat biti bahanchowi angē , ew orown or aweli yantsnowetsʾaw , al aweli biti owzowi angē » .
42012049	« Es grag tskelow egay ergri vray , ew inchʾ g!owzem , etʾē artēn porpokʾadz ē .
42012050	Paytsʾ mgrtowtʾiwnov mĕ biti mgrtowim , ew inchʾbēs gĕ gsgdzim , minchʾew or gatarowi .
42012051	Gĕ gardzēkʾ tʾē es egay , ergri vray khaghaghowtʾiwn talow . G!ĕsem tsezi : “ Ochʾ , haba , pa zhanowm ” .
42012052	Orovhetew asgē etkʾ , mēg tan mēch hinkĕ pa zhnowadz biti ĕllan irarmē : erekʾĕ , ergowkʾēn , ow ergowkʾĕ , erekʾēn .
42012053	Hayrĕ biti pa zhnowi ortiēn , ow ortin , hōrmēn : mayrĕ , aghchigēn , ew aghchigĕ , mōrmēn : gesowrĕ , ir harsēn , ow harsĕ , ir gesowrēn » .
42012054	Naew ĕsaw pazmowtʾiwnnerown : « Erp tesnēkʾ amb mĕ , arewmowtkʾēn eladz , isgoyn g!ĕsēkʾ : “ Antsrew biti kay ” , ew aytbēs g!ĕllay .
42012055	Ow erp harawayin hovĕ pʾchʾē , g!ĕsēkʾ : “ Takʾ biti ĕllay ” , ew aytbēs g!ĕllay .
42012056	Geghdzaworner , kitēkʾ ergri ow erginkʾi eresĕ kʾnnel , haba inchʾbēs chʾēkʾ kʾnner ays zhamanagĕ » .
42012057	« Ew inchʾow towkʾ tsezmē chʾēkʾ orosher irawownkʾĕ .
42012058	Erp osokhit het ertʾas ishkhanin , jampan pʾowtʾa azatil angē , orbēszi tataworin aṛchew chʾkʾashgṛtē kʾez , tataworĕ , ostiganin chʾyantsnē kʾez , ow ostigann al pantĕ chʾnetē .
42012059	Gĕ yaytararem kʾezi : “ Towrs biti chʾelles angē , minchʾew or vjares verchin lowman ” » .
42013001	Ayt aten nergay eghoghnerēn omankʾ batmetsʾin anor ayn Kalileatsʾinerown masin , orontsʾ ariwnĕ Bighatos khaṛnetsʾ irentsʾ zoherown het .
42013002	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Gĕ gardzēkʾ tʾē ayt Kalileatsʾinerĕ aweli meghawor ēin polor Kalileatsʾinerēn , kʾani or aysbisi chʾarchʾarankʾner gretsʾin .
42013003	G!ĕsem tsezi , ochʾ . Haba etʾē chʾabashkharēkʾ , polort al noynbēs biti gorsowikʾ .
42013004	Gam tʾē ayn tasnowtʾ hokinerĕ , orontsʾ vray Selovami ashtaragĕ ingaw ew sbannetsʾ zanonkʾ , gĕ gardzēkʾ tʾē anonkʾ Erowsaghēm pnagogh polor martotsʾmē aweli yantsʾawor ēin .
42013005	G!ĕsem tsezi , ochʾ . Haba etʾē chʾabashkharēkʾ , polort al nmanabēs biti gorsowikʾ » .
42013006	Sa aṛagn al ĕsaw : « Mēgĕ ir aykiin mēch ownēr tngowadz tʾzeni mĕ : egaw btowgh pʾntṛelow anor vray , paytsʾ chʾktaw .
42013007	Owsti ĕsaw aykebanin : “ Aha erekʾ tari ē , or gow kam , btowgh gĕ pʾntṛem ayt tʾzeniin vray , ow chʾem ktner : al gtrē zayn , inchʾow khapʾanē ketinĕ ” .
42013008	An al bataskhanetsʾ anor : “ Tēr , ays tari al tskē zayn , minchʾew or prem anor showrchĕ ow tʾrikʾ tnem .
42013009	Etʾē btowgh tay , law : aylabēs , yetakayin gtrē zayn ” » .
42013010	SHapatʾ ōrĕ , inkʾ gĕ sorvetsʾnēr zhoghovarannerēn mēgown mēch .
42013011	Ew aha gin mĕ gar hon , or tasnowtʾ tariē i ver ownēr hiwantowtʾean oki mĕ : gkʾadz ēr , ew amenewin chʾēr grnar shitag gaynil .
42013012	Yisows tesnelov zayn , ganchʾetsʾ ow ĕsaw anor : « Gin , artsagowadz es hiwantowtʾenēt » ,
42013013	ew tseṛkʾĕ traw anor vray . An anmichabēs shtgowetsʾaw , ow pʾaṛapanetsʾ Astowadz .
42013014	Kʾani or Yisows pow zhetsʾ SHapatʾ ōrĕ , zhoghovaranin betĕ ĕntvzelov ĕsaw pazmowtʾean : « Vetsʾ ōr gay , orontsʾ mēch bētkʾ ē kordzēkʾ : owremn ayt ōrerĕ egēkʾ ow pow zhowetsʾēkʾ , ochʾ tʾē SHapatʾ ōrĕ » .
42013015	Owsti Tērĕ bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Geghdzawor , tsezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ SHapatʾ ōrĕ ir ezĕ gam ēshĕ msowrēn chʾ!artsager , orbēszi tani , chowr tay .
42013016	Haba asiga , or Aprahami aghchig ēr , ew aha tasnowtʾ tari Satanan gabadz ēr zayn , bētkʾ chʾēr or SHapatʾ ōrĕ artsagowēr ayt gabēn » .
42013017	Erp ays panerĕ ĕsaw , ir polor hagaṛagortnerĕ amōtʾahar eghan : isg ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ owrakhatsʾaw ayn polor pʾaṛawor kordzerown hamar , or an gĕ gatarēr .
42013018	Ew ĕsaw : « Inchʾ pani nman ē Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ , gam inchʾ pani nmantsʾnem zayn .
42013019	Nman ē mananekhi hatigi mĕ , or mart mĕ aṛaw , ir bartēzĕ tsʾanetsʾ : ew ajetsʾaw , medz dzaṛ mĕ eghaw , ow erginkʾi tʾṛchʾownnerĕ pnagetsʾan anor jiwgherown vray » .
42013020	Tartseal ĕsaw : « Inchʾ pani nmantsʾnem Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ .
42013021	Nman ē khmorin , or gin mĕ aṛaw ow erekʾ kriw aliwri mēch bahetsʾ , minchʾew or ampoghchĕ khmorowetsʾaw » .
42013022	Ew kʾaghakʾnern ow kiwgherĕ shrchelov , gĕ sorvetsʾnēr , ew tēbi Erowsaghēm gĕ jamportēr .
42013023	Mēgĕ ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , kʾichʾowor en anonkʾ , or biti pʾrgowin » .
42013024	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Baykʾaretsʾēkʾ , or mtnēkʾ negh tṛnēn : kʾani or g!ĕsem tsezi tʾē shater biti chanan mtnel , paytsʾ biti chʾgaroghanan .
42013025	Angē etkʾ , erp tanowtērĕ otkʾi ellē , kotsʾē towṛĕ ew towkʾ mnakʾ towrsĕ , ow sgsikʾ pakhel towṛĕ ew ĕsel : “ Tēr , Tēr , patsʾ mezi ” , an al biti bataskhanē tsezi : “ CHʾem janchʾnar tsez , owrgē ēkʾ ” .
42013026	Ayn aten biti sgsikʾ ĕsel : “ Menkʾ kʾow aṛchewt gerankʾ ow khmetsʾinkʾ , ew town mer hrabaragnerown mēch sorvetsʾowtsʾir ” .
42013027	Paytsʾ an biti ĕsē : “ G!ĕsem tsezi : " CHʾem janchʾnar tsez , owrgē ēkʾ : heṛatsʾēkʾ intsmē polort , anirawowtʾiwn kordzoghner " ” .
42013028	Hon biti ĕllay latsʾ ow agṛanerow grjtowm , erp tesnēkʾ Aprahamĕ , Isahagĕ , Yagopĕ ew polor markarēnerĕ , Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean mēch , isg towkʾ , towrs hanowadz .
42013029	Ayntegh biti kan arewelkʾēn ew arewmowtkʾēn , hiwsisēn ow harawēn , ew biti pazmin Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean mēch .
42013030	Ow aha yetinner gan , oronkʾ biti ĕllan aṛachin , ew aṛachinner , oronkʾ biti ĕllan yetin » .
42013031	Noyn ōrĕ kʾani mĕ Pʾarisetsʾiner egan kʾovĕ ew ĕsin iren : « Elir ow heṛatsʾir asgē , orovhetew Herovtēs g!owzē sbannel kʾez » .
42013032	Inkʾ al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Katsʾēkʾ , ĕsēkʾ ayt aghowēsin : “ Aha es tewer towrs gĕ hanem ow p zhshgowtʾiwnner g!ĕnem aysōr ew vaghĕ , ow errort ōrĕ awartadz biti ĕllam ” .
42013033	Sagayn bētkʾ ē or aysōr ew vaghĕ ow miws ōr kʾalem , orovhetew gareli chʾē or markarē mĕ gorsowi Erowsaghēmēn towrs .
42013034	Erowsaghēm , Erowsaghēm , town or gĕ sbannēir markarēnerĕ ew gĕ kʾargodzēir kʾezi ghrgowadznerĕ : kʾani ankam owzetsʾi hawakʾel zawagnert , inchʾbēs hawĕ tʾewerown tag gĕ hawakʾē ir tsakerĕ , paytsʾ towkʾ chʾowzetsʾikʾ .
42013035	Aha tser townĕ amayi biti mnay tsezi . Sagayn g!ĕsem tsezi tʾē al biti chʾtesnēkʾ zis , minchʾew or kay ayn zhamanagĕ , erp biti ĕsēkʾ : “ ōrhneal ē an , or gow kay Tēroch anownov ” » .
42014001	Erp inkʾ SHapatʾ ōr mĕ mtaw Pʾarisetsʾinerow beterēn mēgown townĕ , hatsʾ owtelow , anonkʾ gĕ hsgēin ir vray .
42014002	Ew aha chrkogheal mart mĕ gar hon , ir aṛchew .
42014003	Yisows khōsetsʾaw ōrinagannerown ow Pʾarisetsʾinerown , ĕselov : « Artōnowadz ē SHapatʾ ōrĕ pow zhel » .
42014004	Anonkʾ hantart getsʾan . Isg inkʾ pṛnetsʾ zayn , p zhshgetsʾ ew ghrgetsʾ :
42014005	Aba ĕsaw anontsʾ : « TSezmē orown ēshĕ gam ezĕ etʾē horĕ iynay , isgoyn chʾi haner zayn , SHapatʾ ōrĕ » .
42014006	Ays masin chʾgrtsʾan timatartsel anor .
42014007	Aṛag mĕn al ĕsaw hrawirealnerown , erp tesaw tʾē inchʾbēs g!ĕntrēin aṛachin pazmotsʾnerĕ . Ĕsaw anontsʾ :
42014008	« Erp martē mĕ hrawirowis harsanikʾi , mi nstir aṛachin pazmotsʾin vray : orbēszi etʾē kʾezmē aweli batowawor mēgĕ hrawirowadz ĕllay ,
42014009	an , or kʾez ow zayn hrawiretsʾ , chʾkay ew chʾĕsē kʾezi : “ Tegh towr asor ” : ow angē etkʾ , sgsis amchʾnalov krawel yetin teghĕ .
42014010	Haba erp hrawirowis , kna ew nstē yetin teghĕ : orbēszi erp kʾez hrawiroghĕ kay , ĕsē kʾezi : “ Paregam , ver hrammē ” : ayn aten pʾaṛkʾ g!ownenas kʾezi het seghan nstoghnerown aṛchew .
42014011	Orovhetew ov or gĕ partsratsʾnē inkʾzinkʾ , biti khonarhi , isg ov or gĕ khonarhetsʾnē inkʾzinkʾ , biti partsranay » .
42014012	Zinkʾ hrawiroghin al ĕsaw : « Erp jash gam ĕntʾrikʾ gĕ sarkʾes , mi ganchʾer paregamnert , ochʾ al eghpayrnert : ochʾ azkagannert , ochʾ harowst tratsʾinert , orbēszi anonkʾ al pʾokharēnĕ chʾhrawiren kʾez , ow hatowtsʾowm chʾĕllay kʾezi .
42014013	Haba erp gochʾownkʾ gĕ sarkʾes , hrawirē aghkʾatnerĕ , bagasawornerĕ , gagherĕ ew goyrerĕ ,
42014014	ow eraneli biti ĕllas , orovhetew anonkʾ chʾen grnar pʾokharēnĕ hatowtsʾanel kʾezi : artarew artarnerown yarowtʾiwn aṛadz atenĕ pʾokharēnĕ biti hatowtsʾanowi kʾezi » .
42014015	Hetĕ seghan nstoghnerēn mēgĕ , erp lsetsʾ asiga , ĕsaw anor : « Erani anor , or hatsʾ biti owtē Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean mēch » .
42014016	Inkʾ ĕsaw anor : « Mart mĕ sarkʾetsʾ medz ĕntʾrikʾ mĕ , ow hrawiretsʾ shat martig .
42014017	Ĕntʾrikʾi zhamown , ghrgetsʾ ir dzaṛan , orbēszi ĕsē hrawirealnerown : “ Egēkʾ , orovhetew artēn amēn pan batrast ē ” .
42014018	Polorn al miaperan sgsan hra zharil . Aṛachinĕ ĕsaw anor : “ Es art mĕ knetsʾi , ew harg ē or megnim ow tesnem zayn : gĕ khntrem kʾezmē , hra zharadz ngatē zis ” .
42014019	Miwsĕ ĕsaw : “ Hink zoyk ez knetsʾi , ew g!ertʾam or pʾortsargem zanonkʾ : gĕ khntrem kʾezmē , hra zharadz ngatē zis ” .
42014020	Miwsĕ ĕsaw : “ Gnoch mĕ het amowsnatsʾay : owsti chʾem grnar kal ” .
42014021	DZaṛan egaw ow batmetsʾ ir tiroch ays panerĕ . Ayt aten tanowtērĕ pargatsʾaw ew ĕsaw ir dzaṛayin : “ SHowtov towrs elir , tēbi kʾaghakʾin hrabaragnern ow pʾoghotsʾnerĕ , ew hos per aghkʾatnerĕ , bagasawornerĕ , gaghern ow goyrerĕ ” .
42014022	DZaṛan al ĕsaw : “ Tēr , gatarowetsʾaw inchʾ or hramayetsʾir , paytsʾ tagawin tegh gay ” .
42014023	Tērĕ ĕsaw dzaṛayin : “ Towrs elir tēbi jampanerown klowkhnern ow tsʾangabaterĕ , ew hargatrē ktadznert , or hos mtnen , orbēszi towns letsʾowi ” .
42014024	Orovhetew , g!ĕsem tsezi , ayt hrawirowadz martotsʾmēn ochʾ mēgĕ biti jashagē im ĕntʾrikʾēs » .
42014025	Iren het medz pazmowtʾiwnner g!ertʾayin : taṛnalov anontsʾ , ĕsaw :
42014026	« Etʾē mēgĕ indzi kay , paytsʾ chʾatē ir hayrn ow mayrĕ , ginĕ ew zawagnerĕ , eghpayrnern ow kʾoyrerĕ , naew ir antsĕ , chʾi grnar im ashagerts ĕllal .
42014027	Ov or chʾi grer ir khachʾĕ ew chʾi kar im etewēs , chʾi grnar im ashagerts ĕllal .
42014028	Orovhetew tsezmē ov , etʾē owzē gaṛowtsʾanel ashtarag mĕ , nakh chʾi nstir ow hashower dzakhsĕ , tʾē zayn lratsʾnelow garoghowtʾiwn owni :
42014029	orbēszi erp himĕ tnē ew chʾgaroghanay awartel , polor tesnoghnerĕ chʾsgsin dzaghrel zinkʾ
42014030	ow ĕsel : “ Ays martĕ sgsaw gaṛowtsʾanel , paytsʾ chʾgaroghatsʾaw awartel ” .
42014031	Gam tʾē or tʾakaworĕ , owrish tʾakawori mĕ het baterazmelow ertʾalē aṛach , chʾi nstir ow khorhrtagtsʾir , tʾē arteōkʾ tasĕ hazarov grnay timaworel an , or kʾsan hazarov gow kay iren tēm .
42014032	Etʾē chʾi grnar , kʾani teṛ an heṛow ē , tesban ghrgelov khaghaghowtʾiwn gĕ khntrē .
42014033	Aha aysbēs al tsezmē an or chʾhra zhari ir ampoghch inchʾkʾēn , chʾi grnar im ashagerts ĕllal » .
42014034	« Aghĕ law pan ē : paytsʾ etʾē aghĕ ir hamĕ gorsntsʾnē , inchʾov biti hamemowi .
42014035	Ochʾ hoghi , ochʾ al tʾrikʾi yarmar g!ĕllay : owsti towrs gĕ neten zayn . An or aganch owni lselow , tʾogh lsē » .
42015001	Polor makʾsawornern ow meghawornerĕ anor gĕ mōtenayin , zinkʾ lselow hamar .
42015002	Isg Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ ew tbirnerĕ gĕ trtnchēin ow g!ĕsēin : « Asiga g!ĕntowni meghawornerĕ ew g!owtē anontsʾ het » .
42015003	An al sa aṛagĕ khōsetsʾaw anontsʾ :
42015004	« TSezmē ov ē ayn martĕ , or etʾē ownenay hariwr ochʾkhar ow gorsntsʾnē anontsʾmē mēgĕ , chʾi tsker innsowninĕ anabatin mēch ew ertʾar ayt gorsowadzin etewēn , minchʾew or ktnē zayn .
42015005	Ow erp ktnē , owrakhanalov gĕ tnē zayn ir owserown vray ,
42015006	ew town kalov , gĕ hrawirē paregamnern ow tratsʾinerĕ , ew g!ĕsē anontsʾ : “ Owrakhatsʾēkʾ indzi het , orovhetew ktay gorsowadz ochʾkhars ” .
42015007	Gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē aysbēs owrakhowtʾiwn biti ĕllay erginkʾĕ mēg meghawori hamar , or g!abashkharē , kʾan innsowninĕ artarnerow hamar , orontsʾ abashkharowtʾiwn bētkʾ chʾē » .
42015008	« Gam , ov ē ayn ginĕ , or etʾē tasĕ tram ownenay ow tram mĕ gorsntsʾnē , jrak chʾi vaṛer , townĕ chʾ!awler ew owshatrowtʾeamp pʾntṛer , minchʾew or ktnē .
42015009	Ow erp ktnē , gĕ hrawirē paregamnern ow tratsʾinerĕ , ew g!ĕsē : “ Owrakhatsʾēkʾ indzi het , orovhetew ktay gorsntsʾowtsʾadz trams ” .
42015010	Aytbēs al , gĕ yaytararem tsezi , owrakhowtʾiwn g!ĕllay Astowdzoy hreshtagnerown aṛchew mēg meghawori hamar , or g!abashkharē » .
42015011	Aba ĕsaw : « Mart mĕ ownēr ergow orti .
42015012	Anontsʾmē grtserĕ ĕsaw hōrĕ : “ Hayr , towr indzi kʾow ownetsʾadzēt indzi vijagowelikʾ pa zhinĕ ” . An al pa zhnetsʾ anontsʾ ir ownetsʾadzĕ .
42015013	SHat ōrer chʾantsʾadz , grtser ortin zhoghvetsʾ polor panerĕ , megnetsʾaw heṛawor ergir mĕ , ow hon pʾjatsʾowtsʾ ir ownetsʾadzĕ , anaṛagowtʾeamp abrelov .
42015014	Erp dzakhsetsʾ amēnĕ , sastig sov mĕ eghaw ayt ergrin mēch , ew inkʾ sgsaw garōtowtʾean mēch ĕllal .
42015015	Owsti knatsʾ , ayt ergrin kʾaghakʾatsʾinerēn mēgown kʾov mtaw : an al ir artĕ ghrgetsʾ zayn , khoz aradzelow hamar .
42015016	Gĕ tsʾangar khozerown geradz eghchiwrēn ir pʾorĕ letsʾnel , paytsʾ ochʾ mēgĕ gow tar anor .
42015017	Ew inkʾniren kalov , ĕsaw : “ Kʾani vartsganner gan hōrs townĕ , hatsʾov liatsʾadz , ow es hos sovamah gĕ gorsowim .
42015018	Ganknim , ertʾam hōrs kʾov ew ĕsem anor : « Hayr , meghanchʾetsʾi erginkʾi tēm ow kʾow aṛchewt ,
42015019	ew al ar zhani chʾem kʾow ortit gochʾowelow : ĕrē zis vartsgannerēt mēgown bēs » ” .
42015020	Owsti ganknetsʾaw ow knatsʾ ir hōr kʾov . Minchʾ inkʾ teṛ shat heṛow ēr , hayrĕ tesaw zayn ew ktʾatsʾ : vazelov , anor vizin vray ingaw ow hampowretsʾ zayn .
42015021	Ortin al ĕsaw anor : “ Hayr , meghanchʾetsʾi erginkʾi tēm ow kʾow aṛchewt , ew al ar zhani chʾem kʾow ortit gochʾowelow ” .
42015022	Paytsʾ hayrĕ ĕsaw ir dzaṛanerown : “ Hanetsʾēkʾ aṛachin barekōtĕ ew haktsʾowtsʾēkʾ anor , matani trēkʾ anor tseṛkʾĕ ow gōshigner , anor otkʾerĕ .
42015023	Ew perēkʾ barart zowaragĕ , mortʾetsʾēkʾ , owtenkʾ ow zowarjanankʾ :
42015024	orovhetew ays ortis meṛadz ēr , ew verabretsʾaw , gorsowadz ēr , ow ktnowetsʾaw ” . Ew sgsan zowarjanal .
42015025	Anor erētsʾ ortin artn ēr : erp egaw ow mōtetsʾaw tan , lsetsʾ nowakarannerow ew barerow tsaynĕ ,
42015026	ow iren ganchʾelov dzaṛanerēn mēgĕ , hartsʾapʾortsetsʾ tʾē inchʾ ēr ayt .
42015027	An al ĕsaw anor : “ Eghpayrt egaw , ow hayrt mortʾetsʾ barart zowaragĕ , orovhetew oghch aṛoghch verstatsʾaw zayn ” .
42015028	Isg inkʾ pargatsʾaw ew chʾēr owzer ners mtnel : owsti ir hayrĕ towrs ellelov , g!aghachʾēr anor .
42015029	An al bataskhanetsʾ ir hōr : “ Aha ayschʾapʾ tari ē , or gĕ dzaṛayem kʾezi , ow pnaw kʾow batowirant zantsʾ chʾĕri : sagayn erpekʾ owl mĕ chʾtowir indzi , or zowarjanayi paregamnerows het .
42015030	Paytsʾ erp egaw ayt ortit , or lapʾetsʾ kʾow ownetsʾadzt boṛnignerow het , mortʾetsʾir anor barart zowaragĕ ” .
42015031	An al ĕsaw anor : “ Orteag , town misht indzi het es , ow ampoghch ownetsʾadzs kʾowgt ē .
42015032	Sagayn bētkʾ ēr zowarjanal ew owrakhanal , orovhetew ays eghpayrt meṛadz ēr , ow verabretsʾaw , gorsowadz ēr , ew ktnowetsʾaw ” » .
42016001	Ir ashagertnerown al ĕsaw : « Harowst mart mĕ gar , or tntes mĕ ownēr : asiga ampastanowetsʾaw anor aṛchew , orbēs tʾē gĕ pʾjatsʾnē anor inchʾkʾĕ .
42016002	Owsti ganchʾetsʾ zayn ew ĕsaw anor : “ Ays inchʾ ē , or kʾow masit gĕ lsem : tntesowtʾeant hashiwĕ towr , orovhetew al chʾes grnar tntes ĕllal ” .
42016003	Tntesĕ ĕsaw inkʾniren : “ Inchʾ ĕnem , orovhetew tērs tntesowtʾiwnĕ g!aṛnē intsmē : chʾem grnar hoghakordz ĕllal , , , g!amchʾnam mowral .
42016004	Kitem inchʾ biti ĕnem , orbēszi erp heṛatsʾowim im tntesowtʾenēs , ĕntownin zis irentsʾ townĕ .
42016005	Ew iren ganchʾelov ir tiroch bartabannerēn iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ , ĕsaw aṛachinin : “ Town orchʾapʾ gĕ bartis im tirochs ” .
42016006	An al ĕsaw : “ Hariwr mar tsētʾ ” . Ĕsaw anor : “ Aṛ mowrhagt , ow showtov nstē , « yisown » krē ” .
42016007	Yetoy ĕsaw miwsin : “ Town orchʾapʾ gĕ bartis ” . An al ĕsaw : “ Hariwr kʾoṛ tsʾoren ” . Ĕsaw anor : “ Aṛ mowrhagt ew « owtʾsown » krē ” .
42016008	Tērĕ kovetsʾ aniraw tntesĕ , or owshimowtʾeamp varowetsʾaw : orovhetew ays ashkharhi ortinerĕ aweli owshim en irentsʾ serowntin mēch , kʾan loysi ortinerĕ .
42016009	Es al g!ĕsem tsezi : “ Paregamner ĕrēkʾ tsezi aniraw mamonayēn , orbēszi erp an bagsi , , , ĕntownin tsez yawitenagan pnagarannerow mēch ” .
42016010	An or amenapʾokʾr panin mēch hawatarim ē , shatin mēch al hawatarim g!ĕllay , ew an or amenapʾokʾrin mēch aniraw ē , shatin mēch al aniraw g!ĕllay .
42016011	Owremn etʾē aniraw mamonayin mēch hawatarim chʾĕllakʾ , jshmarit harstowtʾiwnĕ ov biti vstahi tsezi .
42016012	Etʾē owrishin panin mēch hawatarim chʾĕllakʾ , tserĕ ov biti tay tsezi .
42016013	Ochʾ mēg dzaṛay grnay dzaṛayel ergow tiroch : orovhetew gam mēgĕ biti atē ew miwsĕ sirē , gam mēgown biti yari , , ow miwsĕ arhamarhē . CHʾēkʾ grnar dzaṛayel Astowdzoy ew mamonayin » .
42016014	Pʾarisetsʾinern al , oronkʾ ardzatʾasēr ēin , ays polor panerĕ lselov , gĕ kʾamahrēin zayn .
42016015	Ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Towkʾ ēkʾ or martotsʾ aṛchew g!artaratsʾnēkʾ towkʾ tsez , paytsʾ Astowadz kitē tser sirterĕ : orovhetew martotsʾ mēch partsr knahatowadzĕ , karsheli ē Astowdzoy aṛchew .
42016016	ōrēnkʾn ow Markarēnerĕ minchʾew Yovhannēs ēin : ayt atenēn etkʾ Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ g!awetowi , ew amēn mēgĕ g!artoray mtnel anor mēch .
42016017	Aweli tiwrin ē , or erginkʾn ow ergirĕ antsʾnin , kʾan ōrēnkʾēn mēg nshanakir iynay .
42016018	Ov or g!artsagē ir ginĕ ew g!amowsnanay owrishi mĕ het , shnowtʾiwn g!ĕnē , ew ov or g!amowsnanay ir amowsinēn artsagowadz gnoch mĕ het , shnowtʾiwn g!ĕnē » .
42016019	« Harowst mart mĕ gar , or dzirani ow pehez gĕ haknēr , ew amēn ōr pʾaṛahegh khrakhjankʾ gĕ sarkʾēr , , .
42016020	GHazaros anownov aghkʾat mĕn al gar , balarnerov dzadzgowadz , or baṛgadz ēr anor tran kʾov ,
42016021	ow gĕ tsʾangar gshtanal harowstin seghanēn ingadz pʾshrankʾnerēn : naew shownern al gow kayin ew gĕ lzēin anor balarnerĕ .
42016022	Ayt aghkʾatĕ meṛaw , ow hreshtagnerĕ Aprahami kokĕ tarin zayn . Harowstn al meṛaw ew tʾaghowetsʾaw .
42016023	Minchʾ t zhokhkʾĕ , tanchankʾi mēch ēr , ir achʾkʾerĕ partsratsʾnelov , heṛowēn tesaw Aprahamĕ , ow GHazarosĕ , anor kokĕ hankist nstadz .
42016024	Owsti kochʾetsʾ : “ Hayr Apraham , oghormē indzi ow ghrgē GHazarosĕ , orbēszi chowri mēch tʾatʾkhē ir matin dzayrĕ ew zovatsʾnē lezows , orovhetew gĕ tanchowim ays potsʾin mēch ” .
42016025	Apraham ĕsaw : “ Orteag , yishē tʾē town geankʾit ĕntʾatsʾkʾin statsʾar parikʾnert , nmanabēs GHazaros , chʾarikʾner : hima an ( hos ) gĕ mkhitʾarowi , ow town gĕ tanchowis .
42016026	Ays polorēn zat , mer ew tser mēchtegh hastatowadz medz antownt mĕ gay , orbēszi asgē tsezi antsʾnil owzoghnerĕ chʾgarenan , ochʾ al atgē mezi kal owzoghnerĕ , antsʾnin ” .
42016027	An al ĕsaw : “ Owremn gĕ khntrem kʾezmē , hayr , or ghrges zayn hōrs townĕ ,
42016028	kʾani or hink eghpayr ownim : orbēszi vgayē anontsʾ , or anonkʾ al chʾkan ays tanchankʾi teghĕ ” .
42016029	Apraham ĕsaw anor : “ Anonkʾ ownin Movsēsn ow markarēnerĕ , tʾogh anontsʾ mtig ĕnen ” .
42016030	An al ĕsaw : “ Ochʾ , hayr Apraham : haba etʾē meṛelnerēn mēgĕ ertʾay anontsʾ , biti abashkharen ” .
42016031	Isg an ĕsaw anor : “ Etʾē mtig chʾen ĕner Movsēsi ew markarēnerown , biti chʾhamozowin , noynisg etʾē mēgĕ meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛnē ” » .
42017001	Ew ĕsaw ir ashagertnerown : « Angareli ē or kaytʾagghowtʾiwnner chʾkan : paytsʾ vay anor , orown michotsʾov gow kan .
42017002	Aweli ōktagar biti ĕllar anor , or ishow chaghatsʾkʾi kʾar mĕ gakhowēr ir vizēn ow dzovĕ tskowēr , kʾan tʾē kaytʾagghetsʾnēr ays bztignerēn mēgĕ .
42017003	Owshatir eghēkʾ towkʾ tsezi . Etʾē eghpayrt meghanchʾē kʾezi tēm , yantimanē zayn : ow etʾē abashkharē , nerē anor .
42017004	Etʾē ōrĕ eōtʾn ankam meghanchʾē kʾezi tēm , ew ōrĕ eōtʾn ankam verataṛnay kʾezi ow ĕsē , “ g!abashkharem ” , nerē anor » .
42017005	Aṛakʾealnerĕ ĕsin Tēroch : « Aweltsʾowr mer hawatkʾĕ » .
42017006	Tērĕ ĕsaw : « Etʾē mananekhi hatigi chʾapʾ hawatkʾ ownenayikʾ , grnayikʾ ĕsel ays tʾtʾeniin : “ Armatakhil eghir ew tngowē dzovown mēch ” : an al biti hnazantēr tsezi » .
42017007	« Paytsʾ tsezmē ov , ownenalov ergrakordz gam hoviw dzaṛay mĕ , erp an town mtnē artēn , isgoyn g!ĕsē anor : “ Kna , seghan nstē ” .
42017008	Haba chʾ!ĕser anor : “ Batrastē im ĕntʾrikʾs , ow kōtit gabadz , sbasargē indzi , minchʾew or es owtem ew khmem : yetoy town al ger ow khmē ” .
42017009	Mitʾē shnorhabart g!ĕllay ayt dzaṛayin , iren hramayowadz panerĕ ĕnelown hamar : chʾem gardzer .
42017010	Noynbēs towkʾ , erp ĕnēkʾ tsezi hramayowadz polor panerĕ , ĕsēkʾ : “ Menkʾ anbēt dzaṛaner enkʾ : ĕrinkʾ inchʾ or bartagan ēinkʾ ĕnel ” » .
42017011	Erp inkʾ Erowsaghēm g!ertʾar , Samariayi ew Kalileayi mēchteghēn antsʾaw .
42017012	Ow erp kiwgh mĕ biti mtnēr , tasĕ porot martig hantibetsʾan anor . Anonkʾ heṛown gaynetsʾan ,
42017013	irentsʾ tsaynerĕ partsratsʾowtsʾin ew ĕsin : « Yisows vartabet , oghormē mezi » .
42017014	Tesnelov , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Katsʾēkʾ , tsʾoytsʾ towēkʾ towkʾ tsez kʾahananerown » . Erp g!ertʾayin , makʾrowetsʾan .
42017015	Anontsʾmē mēgĕ , erp tesaw tʾē p zhshgowetsʾaw , veratartsaw ew partsratsayn Astowadz gĕ pʾaṛapanēr ,
42017016	ow eresi vray anor otkʾĕ iynalov , shnorhagal g!ĕllar angē : ew inkʾ Samaratsʾi ēr .
42017017	Yisows ĕsaw : « Mitʾē tasn al chʾmakʾrowetsʾan : isg owr en miws inĕ .
42017018	Ays ōtarazkiēn zat chʾktnowetsʾan owrishner , or verataṛnalov pʾaṛapanēin Astowadz » .
42017019	Ew ĕsaw anor : « Ganknē ow kna : hawatkʾt p zhshgetsʾ kʾez » .
42017020	Erp Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ hartsʾowtsʾin iren : « Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ erp biti kay » , bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ chʾi kar towrsēn erewtsʾadz panerov .
42017021	Ew biti chʾĕsen : “ Aha hos ē ” , gam : “ Aha hon ” : orovhetew aha Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ tser nersn ē » .
42017022	Ashagertnerown al ĕsaw : « ōrer biti kan , erp towkʾ biti tsʾangakʾ tesnel martow Ortiin ōrerēn mēgĕ , paytsʾ biti chʾtesnēkʾ .
42017023	Ow etʾē ĕsen tsezi : “ Aha hos ē ” , gam : “ Aha hon ” , mi ertʾakʾ ew hetamowt mi ĕllakʾ .
