42017024	Orovhetew inchʾbēs pʾaylagĕ , erginkʾin tag mēg dzayrēn pʾaylatagelov , gĕ lowsaworē minchʾew erginkʾin tag miws dzayrĕ , noynbēs biti ĕllay martow Ortin , ir kalowstin ōrĕ .
42017025	Sagayn bētkʾ ē or inkʾ nakh shat chʾarchʾarankʾner grē ow mer zhowi ays serowntēn .
42017026	Inchʾbēs batahetsʾaw Noyi ōrerown , aynbēs biti ĕllay martow Ortiin ōrerown al .
42017027	G!owtēin , gĕ khmēin , g!amowsnanayin , amowsnowtʾean gow tayin , minchʾew ayn ōrĕ , erp Noy mtaw tabanĕ , ow chrhegheghĕ egaw ew gorsntsʾowtsʾ polorĕ .
42017028	Nmanabēs , inchʾbēs GHovti ōrerown al batahetsʾaw , g!owtēin , gĕ khmēin , gĕ knēin , gĕ dzakhēin , gĕ tngēin , gĕ gaṛowtsʾanēin .
42017029	Paytsʾ ayn ōrĕ , erp GHovt towrs elaw Sotomēn , erginkʾēn grag ow dzdzowmp teghatsʾ ew gorsntsʾowtsʾ polorĕ .
42017030	Noynbēs biti ĕllay ayn ōrĕ , erp martow Ortin yaytnowi .
42017031	Ayt ōrĕ , an or tanikʾin vray ē ew ir garasinerĕ , tan mēch , tʾogh chʾichnē , zanonkʾ aṛnelow : nmanabēs an or artin mēch ē , tʾogh chʾverataṛnay .
42017032	Yishetsʾēkʾ GHovti ginĕ .
42017033	Ov or chanay pʾrgel ir antsĕ , biti gorsntsʾnē zayn , isg ov or gorsntsʾnē ir antsĕ , biti abretsʾnē zayn .
42017034	Gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ayt kisherĕ etʾē ergow antser mēg mahiji mēch ĕllan , mēgĕ biti aṛnowi ow miwsĕ mnay :
42017035	etʾē ergow giner miasin aghan , mēgĕ biti aṛnowi ew miwsĕ mnay : etʾē ergow martig arti mĕ mēch ĕllan , mēgĕ biti aṛnowi ow miwsĕ mnay ” » .
42017036	Anonkʾ bataskhanetsʾin anor : « Tēr , owr biti ĕllay ays panĕ » .
42017037	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Owr marmin gay , hon biti hawakʾowin ardziwnerĕ » .
42018001	Aṛag mĕn al ĕsaw anontsʾ , or kitnan tʾē bētkʾ ē amēn aten aghōtʾel , aṛantsʾ tsantsranalow .
42018002	Ĕsaw : « Kʾaghakʾi mĕ mēch tatawor mĕ gar , or Astowdzmē chʾēr vakhnar ow mart chʾēr yarker .
42018003	Noyn kʾaghakʾin mēch ayri mĕn al gar , or gow kar anor ew g!ĕsēr : “ Bashtbanē im irawownkʾs , osokhis tēm ” .
42018004	An zhamanag mĕ chʾēr owzer anor mtig ĕnel : paytsʾ yetoy ĕsaw inkʾniren : “ Tʾēbēt Astowdzmē chʾem vakhnar ow mart chʾem yarker ,
42018005	konē bashtbanem ays ayriin irawownkʾĕ , zis anhankstatsʾnelown hamar , orbēszi chʾkay amēn aten tʾakhantsē indzi ” » .
42018006	Ew Tērĕ ĕsaw : « Lsetsʾēkʾ inchʾ g!ĕsē aniraw tataworĕ .
42018007	Haba Astowadz biti chʾbashtbanē ir ĕntrealnerown irawownkʾĕ , oronkʾ gĕ kochʾen iren tsʾereg ow kisher , tʾēew hamperatar ĕllay anontsʾ hantēb .
42018008	Gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē showtov biti bashtbanē anontsʾ irawownkʾĕ : paytsʾ erp martow Ortin kay , arteōkʾ hawatkʾ biti ktnē ergri vray » .
42018009	Sa aṛagn al ĕsaw omantsʾ , oronkʾ irenkʾ irentsʾ vray gĕ vstahēin tʾē artar en , ew g!anarkēin owrishnerĕ :
42018010	« Ergow mart tajarĕ partsratsʾaw aghōtʾelow , mēgĕ , Pʾarisetsʾi , ow miwsĕ , makʾsawor .
42018011	Pʾarisetsʾin gaynadz ēr ew sabēs g!aghōtʾēr inkʾniren : “ Ov Astowadz , shnorhagal em kʾezmē , or owrish martotsʾ bēs chʾem , yapʾshtagogh , aniraw , shnatsʾogh , gam al ays makʾsaworin bēs :
42018012	haba shapatʾĕ ergow ankam dzom gĕ bahem , ew ampoghch egamowtis tasanortĕ gow tam ” .
42018013	Isg makʾsaworĕ heṛown gaynadz ēr , ow chʾēr owzer achʾkʾn al partsratsʾnel erginkʾ , haba , dzedzelov ir gowrdzkʾĕ , g!ĕsēr : “ Astowadz , nerē indzi , meghaworis ” .
42018014	Gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē asiga ayn miwsēn aweli artaratsʾadz ichaw ir townĕ : orovhetew ov or gĕ partsratsʾnē inkʾzinkʾ , biti khonarhi , isg ov or gĕ khonarhetsʾnē inkʾzinkʾ , biti partsranay » .
42018015	Erakhaner al perin iren , orbēszi tbchʾi anontsʾ . Ashagertnerĕ tesnelov , gĕ yantimanēin zanonkʾ .
42018016	Paytsʾ Yisows iren ganchʾelov zanonkʾ , ĕsaw : « Tʾoyl towēkʾ ayt manowgnerown , or indzi kan , ew mi arkilēkʾ zanonkʾ , orovhetew Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ aytbisinerownn ē .
42018017	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ov or Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ chʾĕntowni manowgi mĕ bēs , pnaw biti chʾmtnē anor mēch ” » .
42018018	Bet mĕ hartsʾowtsʾ anor : « Pari vartabet , inchʾ ĕnem , or zhaṛankem yawitenagan geankʾĕ » .
42018019	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Inchʾow pari gĕ gochʾes zis : Astowdzmē zat pari chʾgay .
42018020	Batowirannerĕ kites : shnowtʾiwn mi ĕner , sbanowtʾiwn mi ĕner , koghowtʾiwn mi ĕner , sowt vgayowtʾiwn mi tar , batowē hayrt ow mayrt » .
42018021	An al ĕsaw : « Bahadz em ayt polorĕ , batanowtʾenēs i ver » .
42018022	Lselov asiga , Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Tagawin mēg pan gĕ bagsi kʾezi : dzakhē ampoghch ownetsʾadzt ew pashkhē aghkʾatnerown , ow kants biti ownenas erginkʾĕ : aba hetewē indzi » .
42018023	An al , erp lsetsʾ ays khōskʾĕ , shat trtmetsʾaw , orovhetew shat harowst ēr .
42018024	Erp Yisows tesaw zayn , shat trtmadz , ĕsaw : « Orchʾapʾ t zhowar ē mtnel Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ anontsʾ , or tram ownin .
42018025	Orovhetew aweli tiwrin ē , or owghtĕ antsʾni aseghin dzagēn , kʾan tʾē harowstĕ mtnē Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ » .
42018026	Anonkʾ or lsetsʾin , ĕsin : « Al ov grnay pʾrgowil » .
42018027	Inkʾ ĕsaw : « Martotsʾ kʾov angareli eghadz panerĕ , Astowdzoy kʾov gareli en » .
42018028	Betros ĕsaw : « Aha menkʾ tʾoghowtsʾinkʾ amēn inchʾ ow hetewetsʾankʾ kʾezi » .
42018029	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ CHʾgay mēgĕ , or tʾoghowtsʾadz ĕllay town , dznoghner , eghpayrner , gin , gam zawagner , Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean hamar ,
42018030	ew chʾstanay pazmabatigĕ ays aten , ow yawitenagan geankʾĕ , kalikʾ ashkharhin mēch ” » .
42018031	Tasnergowkʾĕ ir kʾov aṛnelov , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Aha menkʾ Erowsaghēm gĕ partsranankʾ , ow markarēnerown michotsʾov martow Ortiin masin polor krowadznerĕ biti gatarowin .
42018032	Orovhetew hetʾanosnerown biti matnowi ew biti dzaghrowi , biti nakhatowi ow biti tʾkʾnen anor vray ,
42018033	biti kharazanen ew sbannen zayn : ow yarowtʾiwn biti aṛnē errort ōrĕ » .
42018034	Paytsʾ anonkʾ ays panerēn ochʾ mēgĕ hasgtsʾan : ays khōskʾĕ dzadzgowadz ēr anontsʾmē , ew chʾēin hasgnar ĕsadz panerĕ .
42018035	Erp inkʾ Erikʾovi gĕ mōtenar , goyr mĕ nstadz ēr jampayin ezerkʾĕ , mowralow .
42018036	Erp lsetsʾ pazmowtʾean antsʾnilĕ , hartsʾapʾortsetsʾ tʾē inchʾ ēr ayt .
42018037	Lowr towin iren tʾē Yisows Nazovretsʾin g!antsʾni .
42018038	An al kochʾetsʾ : « Yisows , Tawitʾi Orti , oghormē indzi » .
42018039	Anonkʾ or aṛchewēn g!ertʾayin , gĕ yantimanēin zayn , orbēszi lṛē . Paytsʾ an al aweli g!aghaghagēr : « Tawitʾi Orti , oghormē indzi » .
42018040	Yisows gank aṛnelov , hramayetsʾ or iren peren zayn . Erp an mōtetsʾaw , hartsʾowtsʾ anor :
42018041	« Inchʾ g!owzes , or ĕnem kʾezi » . An al ĕsaw : « Tēr , tʾogh achʾkʾers patsʾowin , , » .
42018042	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Tʾogh patsʾowin : hawatkʾt pow zhetsʾ kʾez » .
42018043	Anmichabēs ir achʾkʾerĕ patsʾowetsʾan , ew gĕ hetewēr anor , pʾaṛapanelov Astowadz . Ampoghch zhoghovowrtn al , erp tesaw , kovapanetsʾ Astowadz .
42019001	Erikʾov mtnelov , kʾaghakʾin mēchēn g!antsʾnēr ,
42019002	erp aha harowst mart mĕ , Zakʾēos gochʾowadz , or makʾsabet ēr ,
42019003	gĕ chanar tesnel tʾē ov ē Yisowsĕ : paytsʾ pazmowtʾean batjaṛov chʾēr grnar , orovhetew garjahasag ēr .
42019004	Owsti yaṛach vazetsʾ ew zhantatʾzenii mĕ vray elaw , orbēszi tesnē zayn , kʾani or angē biti antsʾnēr .
42019005	Erp Yisows ayt teghĕ egaw , ver nayelov , tesaw zayn ow ĕsaw anor : « Zakʾēos , ajabarē , ichir atgē : orovhetew aysōr townt bētkʾ ē mnam » .
42019006	An al ajabarelov ichaw , ew owrakhowtʾeamp ĕntownetsʾ zayn .
42019007	Erp polorn al tesan , gĕ trtnchēin ow g!ĕsēin : « Meghawor martow kʾov knatsʾ , ichewanelow » .
42019008	Isg Zakʾēos gaynetsʾaw ew ĕsaw Tēroch : « Tēr , aha inchʾkʾis gēsĕ gow tam aghkʾatnerown : ow etʾē zrbartowtʾeamp oewē mēgĕ zrgadz em , kʾaṛabatig gĕ hatowtsʾanem anor » .
42019009	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Aysōr pʾrgowtʾiwn eghaw ays tan , kʾani or inkʾ al Aprahami orti ē .
42019010	Artarew martow Ortin egaw , orbēszi pʾntṛē gorsowadzĕ ew pʾrgē » .
42019011	Erp anonkʾ gĕ lsēin ays panerĕ , aṛag mĕn al ĕsaw , kʾani or inkʾ Erowsaghēmi gĕ mōtenar ew anonkʾ gĕ gardzēin tʾē Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ anmichabēs biti erewnar .
42019012	Owremn ĕsaw : « Aznowagan mart mĕ knatsʾ heṛawor ergir mĕ , iren tʾakaworowtʾiwn stanalow ew verataṛnalow .
42019013	Ir tasĕ dzaṛanerĕ ganchʾelov , tasĕ mnas towaw anontsʾ , ow ĕsaw anontsʾ : “ SHahargetsʾēkʾ , minchʾew or kam ” .
42019014	Anor kʾaghakʾatsʾinerĕ g!atēin zayn , ew batowiragowtʾiwn mĕ ghrgetsʾin anor etewēn , ĕselov : “ CHʾenkʾ owzer or asiga tʾakaworē mer vray ” .
42019015	Paytsʾ erp an veratartsaw , tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ stanalov , iren ganchʾetsʾ ayn dzaṛanerĕ , orontsʾ tram tower ēr , orbēszi kitnay tʾē ov inchʾbēs shahakordzadz ēr .
42019016	Aṛachinĕ egaw ew ĕsaw : “ Tēr , kʾow mnast , tasĕ mnas vastgetsʾaw ” .
42019017	An al ĕsaw anor : “ Abris , pari dzaṛay : orovhetew amenapʾokʾr panin mēch hawatarim eghar , tasĕ kʾaghakʾi vray ishkhanowtʾiwn ownetsʾir ” .
42019018	Ergrortĕ egaw ow ĕsaw : “ Tēr , kʾow mnast , hink mnas peraw ” .
42019019	Ew ĕsaw anor : “ Town al hink kʾaghakʾi vray eghir ” .
42019020	Owrish mĕ egaw ow ĕsaw : “ Tēr , aha kʾow mnast , or gĕ bahēi tʾashginagi mĕ mēch dzraradz ,
42019021	kʾani or gĕ vakhnayi kʾezmē : orovhetew town khist mart mĕn es , gĕ vertsʾnes chʾtradz pant , ew gĕ hntses chʾsermanadzt ” .
42019022	An al ĕsaw anor : “ Peranovt biti tatem kʾez , chʾar dzaṛay . Kitēir tʾē es khist mart mĕn em , gĕ vertsʾnem chʾtradz pans ow gĕ hntsem chʾsermanadzs :
42019023	owremn inchʾow chʾtowir im trams seghanawornerown , orbēszi egadz atens , togosov bahanchēi zayn ” .
42019024	Kʾovĕ gaynoghnerown ĕsaw : “ Aṛēkʾ atgē mnasĕ , ew towēkʾ anor , or tasĕ mnas owni :
42019025	( Ĕsin iren : " Tēr , an tasĕ mnas owni " : )
42019026	orovhetew gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē amēn ownetsʾoghi biti trowi , ow chʾownetsʾoghin , ownetsʾadzn al biti aṛnowi irmē .
42019027	Paytsʾ ayt tʾshnaminers , oronkʾ chʾēin owzer or irentsʾ vray tʾakaworem , perēkʾ hos ew meṛtsʾowtsʾēkʾ im aṛchews ” » .
42019028	Ays panerĕ khōselēn etkʾ , yaṛach knatsʾ , or partsranay Erowsaghēm .
42019029	Erp mōtetsʾaw Petʾpʾakēi ow Petʾaniayi , ayn leran mōt , or TSitʾeninerow leṛ gĕ gochʾowi , ir ashagertnerēn ergowkʾĕ ghrgetsʾ
42019030	ew ĕsaw : « Katsʾēkʾ mer timatsʾi kiwghĕ : erp mtnēkʾ anor mēch , biti ktnēkʾ gabowadz awanag mĕ , orown vray pnaw mart nstadz chʾē : artsagetsʾēkʾ zayn ow perēkʾ .
42019031	Etʾē mēgĕ hartsʾnē tsezi : “ Inchʾow g!artsagēkʾ ” , sa ĕsēkʾ anor : “ Tēroch bētkʾ ē ” » .
42019032	GHrgowadznerĕ katsʾin , ew ktan inchʾbēs ĕsadz ēr irentsʾ .
42019033	Minchʾ awanagĕ g!artsagēin , anor tērerĕ ĕsin anontsʾ : « Inchʾow g!artsagēkʾ ayt awanagĕ » .
42019034	Anonkʾ al ĕsin : « Tēroch bētkʾ ē » .
42019035	Yisowsi perin zayn , ew awanagin vray tskelov irentsʾ hantertsnerĕ , hedztsʾowtsʾin Yisowsĕ .
42019036	Minchʾ g!ertʾar , martig irentsʾ hantertsnerĕ gĕ pʾṛēin jampayin vray .
42019037	Erp al mōtetsʾaw ow TSitʾeninerow leran zaṛivayrēn g!ichnēr , ashagertnerown ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ sgsaw owrakhowtʾeamp partsratsayn Astowadz kovapanel , ayn polor hrashkʾnerown hamar , or teser ēin .
42019038	Ew g!ĕsēin : « ōrhneal ē ayt tʾakaworĕ , or gow kay Tēroch anownov : erginkʾi mēch khaghaghowtʾiwn , ow pʾaṛkʾ , amenapartsr vayrerown mēch » .
42019039	Pʾarisetsʾinerēn omankʾ pazmowtʾean mēchēn ĕsin anor : « Vartabet , yantimanē kʾow ashagertnert » .
42019040	An al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Etʾē atonkʾ lṛen , kʾarerĕ biti aghaghagen ” » .
42019041	Erp mōtetsʾaw , kʾaghakʾĕ tesnelov , latsʾaw anor vray ew ĕsaw :
42019042	« Konē ays ōrowant mēch kitnayir kʾow khaghaghowtʾiwnt : paytsʾ hima dzadzgowetsʾaw achʾkʾerēt .
42019043	Orovhetew ōrerĕ biti kan kʾow vrat , erp tʾshnaminert batnēsh biti shinen showrcht , biti basharen kʾez , amēn goghmē biti seghmen kʾez ,
42019044	ew himnayatag biti ĕnen kʾez ow mēcht eghadz zawagnert : ew amenewin kʾar mĕ kʾari vray biti chʾtʾoghown mēcht , kʾani or chʾkittsʾar aytsʾelowtʾeant atenĕ » .
42019045	Mtnelov tajarĕ , sgsaw towrs hanel anor mēch dzakhoghnern ow knoghnerĕ ,
42019046	ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Krowadz ē : “ Im towns aghōtʾkʾi town ē ” , paytsʾ towkʾ awazagnerow kʾarayr ĕrikʾ zayn » .
42019047	Amēn ōr gĕ sorvetsʾnēr tajarin mēch . Isg kʾahanayabetnerĕ , tbirnern ow zhoghovowrtin klkhawornerĕ gĕ pʾntṛēin tʾē inchʾbēs gorsntsʾnen zayn :
42019048	paytsʾ chʾēin grnar ktnel tʾē inchʾ ĕnen , orovhetew ampoghch zhoghovowrtĕ shat owshatrowtʾeamp mtig g!ĕnēr anor .
42020001	Ayt ōrerēn mēgĕ , erp tajarin mēch gĕ sorvetsʾnēr zhoghovowrtin ew g!awetaranēr , kʾahanayabetnern ow tbirnerĕ vray hasan , erētsʾnerown het ,
42020002	ew khōsetsʾan anor , ĕselov : « Ĕsē mezi , inchʾ ishkhanowtʾeamp g!ĕnes ayt panerĕ , gam ov ē ayt ishkhanowtʾiwnĕ kʾezi towoghĕ » .
42020003	An al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Es al tsezi hartsʾnem pan mĕ , ew ĕsēkʾ indzi :
42020004	“ Yovhannēsi mgrtowtʾiwnĕ erginkʾēn ēr , tʾē martotsʾmē ” » .
42020005	Anonkʾ irentsʾ mēch mtadzetsʾin ow ĕsin :
42020006	« Etʾē bataskhanenkʾ : “ Erginkʾēn ” , biti ĕsē : “ Haba inchʾow chʾhawatatsʾikʾ anor ” . Isg etʾē bataskhanenkʾ : “ Martotsʾmē ” , ampoghch zhoghovowrtĕ biti kʾargodzē mez , orovhetew hastat hamozowadz en tʾē Yovhannēs markarē ēr » .
42020007	Owsti bataskhanetsʾin tʾē chʾen kiter owrgē ēr .
42020008	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Es al chʾem ĕser tsezi tʾē inchʾ ishkhanowtʾeamp g!ĕnem ayt panerĕ » .
42020009	Ew sgsaw sa aṛagĕ ĕsel zhoghovowrtin : « Mart mĕ ayki tngetsʾ ow mshagnerow yantsnetsʾ zayn , ew jamportetsʾ , ergar zhamanagi hamar .
42020010	Atenin , dzaṛay mĕ ghrgetsʾ mshagnerown , orbēszi aykiin btowghēn tan anor : isg mshagnerĕ dzedzetsʾin zayn ow barab jampetsʾin .
42020011	Owrish dzaṛay mĕn al ghrgetsʾ : anonkʾ dzedzetsʾin naew zayn , anbatowetsʾin ew barab jampetsʾin .
42020012	Errort mĕ ews ghrgetsʾ : anonkʾ viraworetsʾin zayn al , ow towrs hanetsʾin .
42020013	Owsti aykiin tērĕ ĕsaw : “ Inchʾ ĕnem : ghrgem sireli ortis , tʾerews batgaṛin , tesnelov zayn ” .
42020014	Paytsʾ mshagnerĕ , erp tesan zayn , mtadzetsʾin irarow het , ĕselov : “ Ays ē zhaṛankortĕ : egēkʾ sbannenkʾ zayn , orbēszi zhaṛankowtʾiwnĕ mezi mnay ” .
42020015	Ew aykiēn towrs hanetsʾin zayn ow sbannetsʾin . Owremn aykiin tērĕ inchʾ biti ĕnē anontsʾ :
42020016	biti kay ow gorsntsʾnē ayt mshagnerĕ , ew aykin biti tay owrishnerow » .
42020017	Erp asiga lsetsʾin , ĕsin : « Amenewin » . Inkʾ al nayetsʾaw anontsʾ ow ĕsaw : « Haba inchʾ ē sa krowadzĕ : “ Ayn kʾarĕ , or gaṛowtsʾanoghnerĕ mer zhetsʾin , aniga eghaw angiwnakʾarĕ ” .
42020018	Ov or iynay ayt kʾarin vray , biti gotrti , ew orown vray or iynay , biti pʾsorē zayn » .
42020019	Kʾahanayabetnern ow tbirnerĕ gĕ chanayin noyn zhamown tseṛkʾ partsratsʾnel anor vray , paytsʾ gĕ vakhnayin zhoghovowrtēn : kʾani or ĕmpṛnetsʾin tʾē ayt aṛagĕ khōsetsʾaw irentsʾ tēm .
42020020	Anor vray hsgelov , ghrgetsʾin kʾani mĕ lrtesner , oronkʾ geghdzaworowtʾeamp artar gĕ tsewatsʾnēin irenkʾ zirenkʾ , orbēszi khōskʾov pṛnen zayn , tērowtʾean ow gaṛavarichʾin ishkhanowtʾean matnelow hamar .
42020021	Hartsʾowtsʾin anor : « Vartabet , kitenkʾ tʾē shitag gĕ khōsis ow gĕ sorvetsʾnes , ew achʾaṛowtʾiwn chʾes ĕner , haba jshmartowtʾeamp gĕ sorvetsʾnes Astowdzoy jampan .
42020022	Mezi artōnowadz ē gaysrin towrkʾ tal , tʾē ochʾ » .
42020023	Yisows , nshmarelov anontsʾ khoramangowtʾiwnĕ , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾow gĕ pʾortsēkʾ zis .
42020024	TSʾoytsʾ towēkʾ indzi tahegan mĕ : orown batgern ow krowtʾiwnĕ owni vran » . Anonkʾ bataskhanetsʾin : « Gaysrin » .
42020025	Inkʾ al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Owremn inchʾ or gaysrinn ē , towēkʾ gaysrin , ew inchʾ or Astowdzoy ē , Astowdzoy » .
42020026	Aysbēs , chʾgrtsʾan ir khōskʾerov pṛnel zayn zhoghovowrtin aṛchew , ow lṛetsʾin , zarmanalov anor bataskhanin vray .
42020027	Satowgetsʾinerēn omankʾ egan ( oronkʾ gĕ hagajaṛen tʾē yarowtʾiwn chʾgay , ) ew hartsʾowtsʾin anor :
42020028	« Vartabet , Movsēs kretsʾ mezi : “ Etʾē mēgown eghpayrĕ meṛni , gin mĕ ownenalov , paytsʾ aṛantsʾ zawagi , anor eghpayrĕ tʾogh aṛnē ayt ginĕ ow zarm tay ir eghpōr ” .
42020029	Owremn eōtʾĕ eghpayrner gayin . Aṛachinĕ gin mĕ aṛnelov , anzawag meṛaw .
42020030	Ergrortn al aṛaw ayt ginĕ ew inkʾ al anzawag meṛaw .
42020031	Errortn al aṛaw zayn : noynbēs eōtʾn al , ow zawag chʾtsketsʾin ew meṛan .
42020032	Amenēn etkʾ ginn al meṛaw .
42020033	Owremn yarowtʾean aten , anontsʾmē orown ginĕ biti ĕllay , orovhetew eōtʾn al ownetsʾan zayn ipr gin » .
42020034	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Ays ashkharhi ortinerĕ g!amowsnanan ew amowsnowtʾean gĕ trowin .
42020035	Paytsʾ anonkʾ , or biti ar zhananan hasnil ayn ashkharhin ow meṛelnerēn yarowtʾean , ochʾ biti amowsnanan , ochʾ al amowsnowtʾean biti trowin ,
42020036	kʾani or al chʾen grnar meṛnil : artarew hreshtagnerown hawasar en ew Astowdzoy ortiner en , yarowtʾean ortiner ĕllalov .
42020037	Paytsʾ meṛelnerown yarowtʾiwn aṛnelĕ , Movsēs al tsʾoytsʾ towaw moreniin batmowtʾean mēch , erp gĕ gochʾē Tērĕ , “ Aprahami Astowadzĕ , Isahagi Astowadzĕ ew Yagopi Astowadzĕ ” .
42020038	Astowadz meṛelnerown Astowadzĕ chʾē , haba , oghcherown , orovhetew anor hamar , polorĕ g!abrin » .
42020039	Tbirnerēn omankʾ ĕsin : « Vartabet , jisht ĕsir » .
42020040	Ew al chʾēin yantkner pan mĕ hartsʾnel anor .
42020041	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾbēs g!ĕsen tʾē “ Kʾristos Tawitʾi ortin ē ” .
42020042	Tawitʾ inkʾ Saghmosnerow kirkʾin mēch g!ĕsē : “ Tērĕ ĕsaw im Tērochs : « Pazmē im ach goghms ,
42020043	minchʾew or kʾow tʾshnaminert batowantan tnem otkʾerowt » ” .
42020044	Owremn Tawitʾ zayn Tēr gĕ gochʾē : haba inchʾbēs ir ortin g!ĕllay an » .
42020045	Ampoghch zhoghovowrtin aṛchew ĕsaw ir ashagertnerown :
42020046	« Zkowshatsʾēkʾ tbirnerēn , oronkʾ g!owzen ergayn barekōtnerov shrchil , gĕ siren parewnerĕ , hrabaragnerown vray , aṛachin atʾoṛnerĕ , zhoghovarannerow mēch , ew aṛachin pazmotsʾnerĕ , ĕntʾrikʾnerow mēch :
42020047	oronkʾ ayrinerown townerĕ gĕ lapʾen , ow martotsʾ erewnalow hamar , aghōtʾkʾĕ g!ergaren . Anonkʾ aweli khstowtʾeamp biti tatowin , , » .
42021001	Minchʾ gĕ nayēr , tesaw harowstnerĕ , or kantsanagĕ gĕ tskēin irentsʾ ĕndzanerĕ .
42021002	Tnang ayri mĕn al tesaw , or ergow lowmay tsketsʾ hon .
42021003	Owsti ĕsaw : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē ays aghkʾat ayrin , polorēn aweli tsketsʾ :
42021004	orovhetew anonkʾ irentsʾ aṛatowtʾenēn tsketsʾin Astowdzoy ĕndzanerown mēch , paytsʾ asiga tsketsʾ ir garōtowtʾenēn , ir ampoghch ownetsʾadz abrowstĕ » .
42021005	Erp omankʾ g!ĕsēin tajarin masin tʾē “ zartarowadz ē keghetsʾig kʾarerov ow nowērnerov ” ,
42021006	ĕsaw : « Asonkʾ or gĕ tesnēkʾ , ōrerĕ biti kan , erp kʾar kʾari vray biti chʾmnay : amēnĕ biti kʾagowi » .
42021007	Hartsʾowtsʾin iren : « Vartabet , erp biti ĕllay atiga , ew inchʾ ē nshanĕ , tʾē ayt panerĕ biti ĕllan » .
42021008	An al ĕsaw : « Zkowshatsʾēkʾ or chʾmolorikʾ : orovhetew shater biti kan im anownovs , ĕselov : “ Es em Kʾristosĕ , ow zhamanagĕ mōtetsʾadz ē ” : owremn mi ertʾakʾ anontsʾ etewēn .
42021009	Paytsʾ erp lsēkʾ baterazmnerow ew khaṛnagowtʾiwnnerow masin , mi sarsapʾikʾ , orovhetew bētkʾ ē or nakh ayt panerĕ ĕllan , paytsʾ vakhjanĕ isgoyn chʾē » .
42021010	Ayn aten ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Azk azki tēm biti ellē , ew tʾakaworowtʾiwn , tʾakaworowtʾean tēm :
42021011	tegh-tegh medz ergrashar zhner biti ĕllan , sover ow zhantakhtner : naew erginkʾēn sosgali paner ew medz nshanner biti ĕllan .
42021012	Paytsʾ ays panerēn aṛach , irentsʾ tseṛkʾerĕ biti partsratsʾnen tser vray ow haladzen tsez : zhoghovarannerow ew panterow biti matnen , ow tʾakawornerow ew gaṛavarichʾnerow aṛchew biti tarowikʾ , im anownis hamar .
42021013	Ew asiga vgayowtʾean aṛitʾi biti yanki tsezi hamar .
42021014	Owremn oroshetsʾēkʾ or nakhabēs chʾmtadzēkʾ , tʾē inchʾbēs biti bashtbanēkʾ towkʾ tsez .
42021015	Orovhetew es tsezi peran ow imastowtʾiwn biti tam , orown biti chʾgarenan ĕnttimakhōsel gam timatrel tser polor hagaṛagortnerĕ .
42021016	Biti matnowikʾ dznoghnerē , eghpayrnerē , azkagannerē ew paregamnerē , ow tsezmē omankʾ biti meṛtsʾowin .
42021017	Polorin ateli biti ĕllakʾ im anownis hamar :
42021018	paytsʾ maz mĕ biti chʾgorsowi tser klowkhēn .
42021019	TSer hamperowtʾeamp biti tiranakʾ tser antserown » .
42021020	« Erp tesnēkʾ Erowsaghēmĕ , chʾors goghmēn zōrkʾerov shrchabatowadz , ayn aten kittsʾēkʾ tʾē mōt ē anor awerowmĕ .
42021021	Ayn aten Hrēastani mēch eghoghnerĕ leṛnerĕ tʾogh pʾakhchʾin , ew anor mēch eghoghnerĕ tʾogh heṛanan , ow anonkʾ or artern en , tʾogh chʾmtnen anor mēch :
42021022	orovhetew ayt ōrerĕ , vrē zhkhntrowtʾean ōrer en , orbēszi irakordzowin polor krowadznerĕ .
42021023	Paytsʾ vay ayt ōrerĕ yghi eghoghnerown ew dzidz towoghnerown , orovhetew medz hargatrankʾ biti ĕllay ergri vray , ow pargowtʾiwn biti kay ays zhoghovowrtin vray .
42021024	Ew sowri peranov biti iynan , polor azkerown mēch keri biti tarowin , ow Erowsaghēmĕ hetʾanosnerown otkʾi gokhan biti ĕllay , minchʾew or lranan hetʾanosnerown zhamanagnerĕ » .
42021025	« Ew arewin , lowsinin ow astgherown vray nshanner biti ĕllan , ergri vray , azkerĕ varanowmov biti gsgdzin , ew dzovn ow alikʾnerĕ biti koṛan .
42021026	Martotsʾ sirterĕ biti nowaghin irentsʾ vakhēn ew ergrakowntin vray egogh panerown sbaselēn , orovhetew erginkʾi zōrowtʾiwnnerĕ biti sarsin .
42021027	Ayn aten biti tesnen martow Ortin ambi mēch egadz , zōrowtʾeamp ow medz pʾaṛkʾov .
42021028	Erp ays panerĕ sgsin ĕllal , elēkʾ ew vertsʾowtsʾēkʾ tser klowkhĕ , orovhetew tser azatakrowtʾiwnĕ gĕ mōtenay » .
42021029	Aṛag mĕn al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Tesēkʾ tʾzenin ow polor dzaṛerĕ .
42021030	Erp artēn poghpochin , tesnelov towkʾ tsezmē gĕ kitnakʾ tʾē artēn amaṛĕ mōt ē .
42021031	Noynbēs towkʾ , erp eghadz tesnēkʾ asonkʾ , kittsʾēkʾ tʾē Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ mōt ē .
42021032	Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ays serowntĕ biti chʾantsʾni , minchʾew or ays polor panerĕ ĕllan ” .
42021033	Erginkʾn ow ergirĕ biti antsʾnin , paytsʾ im khōskʾers pnaw biti chʾantsʾnin » .
42021034	« Owshatir eghēkʾ towkʾ tsezi , orbēszi tser sirterĕ chʾdzanranan gerowkhowmov , arpetsʾowtʾeamp ew ays geankʾin hokerov , ow ayt ōrĕ anagngalōrēn chʾhasni tser vray :
42021035	orovhetew varmi mĕ bēs biti hasni ampoghch ergri polor pnagichʾnerown vray .
42021036	Owremn hsgetsʾēkʾ ew amēn aten aghersetsʾēkʾ , orbēszi ar zhananakʾ zerdz mnalow ays polorēn , oronkʾ biti ĕllan , ow gaynelow martow Ortiin aṛchew » .
42021037	Yisows tsʾeregnerĕ gĕ sorvetsʾnēr tajarin mēch : isg kishernerĕ , towrs g!ellēr ow gĕ genar TSitʾeninerow gochʾowadz leṛĕ .
42021038	Ampoghch zhoghovowrtĕ aṛtown ganowkh g!ertʾar iren , tajarin mēch lselow ir khōskʾerĕ .
42022001	Pagharchagerkʾi tōnĕ , or Zatig gĕ gochʾowēr , mōtetsʾaw ,
42022002	ew kʾahanayabetnern ow tbirnerĕ gĕ pʾntṛēin tʾē inchʾbēs meṛtsʾnen zayn , kʾani or gĕ vakhnayin zhoghovowrtēn .
42022003	Satanan mtaw Isgariovtatsʾi maganowaneal Yowtayi nersĕ , or tasnergowkʾēn mēgn ēr ,
42022004	ew an knatsʾ panagtsʾelow kʾahanayabetnerown ow medzawornerown het , tʾē inchʾbēs matnē zayn anontsʾ .
42022005	Anonkʾ owrakhatsʾan ew miatsaynetsʾan tram tal anor .
42022006	Inkʾ al khostatsʾaw , ow gĕ pʾntṛēr batehowtʾiwn mĕ zayn matnelow anontsʾ , aṛantsʾ pazmowtʾean .
42022007	Pagharchagerkʾi ōrĕ egaw , erp bētkʾ ēr mortʾel zatigĕ .
42022008	Owsti ghrgetsʾ Betrosn ow Yovhannēsĕ , ĕselov : « Katsʾēkʾ , batrastetsʾēkʾ mezi zatigĕ , orbēszi owtenkʾ » .
42022009	Anonkʾ al ĕsin anor : « Owr g!owzes or batrastenkʾ » .
42022010	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Aha erp mtnēkʾ kʾaghakʾĕ , mart mĕ biti hantibi tsezi , or owsin vray owni chowri sapʾor mĕ : hetewetsʾēkʾ anor minchʾew ayn townĕ , owr inkʾ gĕ mtnē ,
42022011	ew ĕsēkʾ tantiroch : « Vartabetĕ g!ĕsē kʾezi : “ Owr ē ichewanĕ , owr biti owtem zatigĕ ashagertnerows het ” .
42022012	An al biti tsʾowtsʾnē tsezi gahaworowadz medz vernayarg mĕ : hon batrastetsʾēkʾ » .
42022013	Katsʾin , ktan inchʾbēs ĕsaw irentsʾ , ew batrastetsʾin zatigĕ .
42022014	Erp zhamĕ hasaw , seghan nstaw , ow tasnergow aṛakʾealnerĕ iren het .
42022015	Ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « CHʾapʾazantsʾ tsʾangatsʾi or ays zatigĕ owtem tsezi het , im chʾarchʾarowelēs aṛach :
42022016	orovhetew gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Al pnaw biti chʾowtem asgē , minchʾew or irakordzowi Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean mēch ” » .
42022017	Ow pa zhagĕ aṛaw , shnorhagal eghaw ew ĕsaw : « Aṛēkʾ asiga ow pa zhnetsʾēkʾ tser mēch .
42022018	Artarew gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Pnaw ortʾatowngin perkʾēn biti chʾkhmem , minchʾew or kay Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ ” » .
42022019	Aba hatsʾ aṛaw , shnorhagal eghaw , gtretsʾ ow towaw anontsʾ , ew ĕsaw : « Ays ē im marmins , or gĕ trowi tsezi hamar : ĕrēkʾ asiga , im yishatagis hamar » .
42022020	Noynbēs al pa zhagĕ aṛaw ĕntʾrikʾēn etkʾ , ew ĕsaw : « Ays pa zhagĕ nor owkhtn ē , im ariwnovs , or gĕ tʾapʾowi tsezi hamar » .
42022021	« Paytsʾ aha zis matnoghin tseṛkʾĕ indzi het , ays seghanin vray ē .
42022022	Iraw ē tʾē martow Ortin g!ertʾay , inchʾbēs sahmanowadz ē : paytsʾ vay ayn martown , orown michotsʾov gĕ matnowi an » .
42022023	Anonkʾ al sgsan hartsʾnel irarow tʾē irentsʾmē ov ēr , or biti ĕnēr ayt panĕ .
42022024	Vēj mĕn al eghaw anontsʾ mēch , tʾē irentsʾmē ov biti hamarowi medzakoynĕ .
42022025	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Hetʾanosnerown tʾakawornerĕ gĕ tiren irentsʾ , ew anonkʾ or g!ishkhen irentsʾ vray , parerar gĕ gochʾowin .
42022026	Paytsʾ towkʾ aynbēs bētkʾ chʾē ĕllakʾ : haba an or tser mēch medzakoynn ē , grtserin bēs tʾogh ĕllay , ow hramayoghĕ , sbasargowin bēs .
42022027	Kʾani or ov ē medzĕ , seghan nstoghĕ , tʾē sbasargown . Mitʾē seghan nstoghĕ chʾē : sagayn es tser mēch sbasargowi mĕ bēs em .
42022028	Ew towkʾ anonkʾ ēkʾ , or misht indzi het gĕ mnayikʾ pʾortsowtʾiwnnerows mēch :
42022029	es al tʾakaworowtʾiwn mĕ gĕ gtagem tsezi , inchʾbēs im Hayrs tʾakaworowtʾiwn mĕ gtagetsʾ indzi :
42022030	orbēszi towkʾ owtēkʾ ow khmēkʾ im seghanēs , im tʾakaworowtʾeans mēch , ew pazmikʾ kaherow vray , tatelow Israyēli tasnergow tohmerĕ » .
42022031	Tērĕ ĕsaw : « Simon , Simon , aha Satanan shat owzetsʾ kharpalel tsez tsʾoreni bēs .
42022032	Paytsʾ es aghersetsʾi kʾezi hamar , orbēszi hawatkʾt chʾbagsi : ew town erp tartsi kas , eghpayrnert al amratsʾowr » .
42022033	Isg inkʾ ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , es batrast em kʾezi het tʾē pant ertʾalow , tʾē meṛnelow » .
42022034	An al ĕsaw : « Betros , gĕ yaytararem kʾezi : “ Aysōr akʾaghaghĕ biti chʾganchʾē , minchʾew or town erekʾ ankam owranas , tʾē zis gĕ janchʾnas ” » .
42022035	Naew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Erp ghrgetsʾi tsez aṛantsʾ kʾsagi , bargi ow gōshignerow , orewē pan bagsetsʾaw tsezi » .
42022036	Anonkʾ al ĕsin : « Ochʾ mēg pan » . Yetoy ĕsaw : « Paytsʾ hima , an or kʾsag owni , tʾogh aṛnē zayn , nmanabēs bargĕ : ew an or sowr chʾowni , tʾogh dzakhē ir hantertsĕ ow sowr mĕ knē iren .
42022037	Kʾani or gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē bētkʾ ē or sa krowadzn al gatarowi im vras : “ Anōrēnnerow het sebowetsʾaw ” : orovhetew awartelow vray en indzi veraperogh panerĕ » .
42022038	Anonkʾ al ĕsin : « Tēr , aha hos ergow sowr gay » . An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Gĕ pawē » .
42022039	Yetoy towrs ellelov , ir sovorowtʾean hamatsayn knatsʾ TSitʾeninerow leṛĕ : ashagertnern al hetewetsʾan iren .
42022040	Erp hasaw ayt teghĕ , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ , orbēszi pʾortsowtʾean mēch chʾmtnēkʾ » .
42022041	Aba megowsatsʾaw anontsʾmē , kʾarĕngētsʾi mĕ chʾapʾ , ow dznratrelov , g!aghōtʾēr
42022042	ew g!ĕsēr : « Hayr , etʾē pʾapʾakʾis , heṛatsʾowr ays pa zhagĕ intsmē : paytsʾ ochʾ tʾē im gamkʾs , haba kʾowgt tʾogh ĕllay » .
42022043	Erginkʾēn hreshtag mĕ erewtsʾaw iren , ow gĕ zōratsʾnēr zinkʾ . Jkna zhami mēch ĕllalov , aweli chermeṛantowtʾeamp g!aghōtʾēr ,
42022044	ew ir kʾrtinkʾĕ , ketin ingogh ariwni medz gatʾilnerow bēs ēr .
42022045	Aghōtʾkʾēn ganknelov , egaw ashagertnerown kʾov , ow ktaw zanonkʾ , trtmowtʾenēn kʾnatsʾadz .
42022046	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾow gĕ kʾnanakʾ : ganknetsʾēkʾ ew aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ , orbēszi chʾmtnēkʾ pʾortsowtʾean mēch » .
42022047	Erp teṛ gĕ khōsēr , aha pazmowtʾiwn mĕ egaw : Yowta gochʾowadzn al , tasnergowkʾēn mēgĕ , g!ertʾar anor aṛchewēn , ow mōtetsʾaw Yisowsi , orbēszi hampowrē zayn .
42022048	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Yowta , hampowrelov gĕ matnes martow Ortin » .
42022049	Erp anor showrchĕ eghoghnerĕ tesan inchʾ or biti ĕllar , ĕsin anor : « Tēr , zarnenkʾ sowrov » .
42022050	Ew anontsʾmē mēgĕ zargaw kʾahanayabetin dzaṛayin , ow khletsʾ anor ach aganchĕ .
42022051	Yisows ĕsaw : « Tʾoylatretsʾēkʾ minchʾew ayt teghĕ » . Ew tbaw anor aganchin ow p zhshgetsʾ zayn .
42022052	Yisows ĕsaw iren egadz kʾahanayabetnerown , tajarin medzawornerown ew erētsʾnerown : « Ipr tʾē awazagi tēm egakʾ , sowrerov ow pirerov .
42022053	Amēn ōr tsezi het ēi , tajarin mēch , ew tseṛkʾ chʾergaretsʾikʾ im vras : paytsʾ asiga ē tser zhamn ow khawarin ishkhanowtʾiwnĕ » .
42022054	Pṛnelov zayn , tarin ew mttsʾowtsʾin kʾahanayabetin townĕ : Betros al gĕ hetewēr anor heṛowēn .
42022055	Erp grag vaṛetsʾin kawitʾin mēchteghĕ ow nstan miasin , Betros al nstaw anontsʾ mēch .
42022056	Aghakhin mĕ tesnelov zayn , or nstadz ēr gragin kʾov , agnabish nayetsʾaw anor ew ĕsaw : « Asiga al anor het ēr » .
42022057	Paytsʾ Betros owratsʾaw zayn , ĕselov : « Gin , chʾem janchʾnar zayn » .
42022058	Garj bahē mĕ etkʾ , owrish mĕ tesaw zinkʾ ew ĕsaw : « Town al anontsʾmē es » . Betros ĕsaw : « Mart , es anontsʾmē chʾem » .
42022059	Kretʾē zham mĕ etkʾ , owrish mĕn al gĕ bntēr ow g!ĕsēr : « Jshmartabēs asiga al anor het ēr , orovhetew Kalileatsʾi ē » .
42022060	Paytsʾ Betros ĕsaw : « Mart , chʾem kiter inchʾ gĕ khōsis » . Anmichabēs , minchʾ inkʾ teṛ gĕ khōsēr , akʾaghaghĕ ganchʾetsʾ .
42022061	Tērĕ tartsaw ow nayetsʾaw Betrosi . Betros al mtaperetsʾ Tēroch khōskʾĕ , or ĕser ēr iren : « Teṛ akʾaghaghĕ chʾganchʾadz , erekʾ ankam biti owranas zis » .
42022062	Betros towrs ellelov , taṛnabēs latsʾaw .
42022063	Ayn martigĕ , or pṛnadz ēin Yisowsĕ , gĕ dzaghrēin zayn ow gĕ dzedzēin :
42022064	DZadzgelov anor achʾkʾerĕ , gĕ zarnēin anor eresin ew gĕ hartsʾnēin iren : « Markarēatsʾir : ov ē an , or zargaw kʾezi » .
42022065	Owrish shat paner al g!ĕsēin anor tēm , hayhoyelov .
42022066	Erp aṛtow eghaw , zhoghovowrtin erētsʾnerow zhoghovĕ , kʾahanayabetnern ow tbirnerĕ hawakʾowetsʾan , tarin zayn irentsʾ ateanin aṛchew ew ĕsin : « Etʾē Kʾristosĕ town es , ĕsē mezi » .
42022067	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Etʾē ĕsem al tsezi , biti chʾhawatakʾ :
42022068	ow etʾē hartsʾnem tsezi pan mĕ , biti chʾbataskhanēkʾ indzi , ochʾ al biti artsagēkʾ zis .
42022069	Asgē etkʾ , martow Ortin biti pazmi Astowdzoy zōrowtʾean ach goghmĕ » .
42022070	Polorĕ ĕsin : « Owremn town Astowdzoy Ortin es » . Inkʾ al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Towkʾ g!ĕsēkʾ tʾē es em » .
42022071	Ew anonkʾ ĕsin : « Al inchʾ bētkʾ owninkʾ vgayowtʾean , orovhetew menkʾ isg lsetsʾinkʾ anor peranēn » .
42023001	Anontsʾ ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ ganknetsʾaw , tarin zayn Bighatosi ,
42023002	ew sgsan ampastanel zinkʾ ow ĕsel : « Asiga ktankʾ , or gĕ khotoretsʾnēr mer azkĕ , g!arkilēr gaysrin harg tal , ew g!ĕsēr ir masin tʾē inkʾ Kʾristosn ē , tʾakaworĕ » .
42023003	Bighatos hartsʾowtsʾ anor : « Town es Hreanerown tʾakaworĕ » . An al bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Town g!ĕses » .
42023004	Owsti Bighatos ĕsaw kʾahanayabetnerown ew pazmowtʾean : « Es ochʾ mēg yantsʾankʾ gĕ ktnem ays martown vray » .
42023005	Paytsʾ anonkʾ gĕ bntēin ow g!ĕsēin : « Gĕ krkṛē zhoghovowrtĕ , ew gĕ sorvetsʾnē ampoghch Hrēastani mēch , Kalileayēn sgsadz minchʾew aystegh » .
42023006	Bighatos , lselov Kalileayi masin , hartsʾowtsʾ tʾē ayt martĕ Kalileatsʾi ē .
42023007	Erp kittsʾaw tʾē Herovtēsi ishkhanowtʾean gĕ batgani , ghrgetsʾ zayn Herovtēsi , kʾani or an al Erowsaghēm ēr ayt ōrerĕ .
42023008	Erp Herovtēs tesaw Yisowsĕ , chʾapʾazantsʾ owrakhatsʾaw , orovhetew shatontsʾ g!owzēr tesnel zayn : kʾani or shat paner lsadz ēr anor masin , ow gĕ yowsar tesnel nshan mĕ , gatarowadz anov .
42023009	SHat khōskʾerov hartsʾakʾnnetsʾ zayn , paytsʾ an ochʾinchʾ bataskhanetsʾ anor .
42023010	Kʾahanayabetnern ow tbirnern al getsʾadz ēin , ew sastig g!ampastanēin zinkʾ .
42023011	Herovtēs al , ir zōragannerown het , anarketsʾ zayn , ow dzaghrelēn etkʾ , haktsʾowtsʾ anor pʾaṛahegh taraz mĕ ew et ghrgetsʾ Bighatosi .
42023012	Ayt ōrĕ Bighatos ow Herovtēs paregam eghan irarow het : orovhetew nakhabēs tʾshnamowtʾiwn gar irentsʾ michew .
42023013	Bighatos hawakʾetsʾ kʾahanayabetnerĕ , betern ow zhoghovowrtĕ ,
42023014	ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ays martĕ perikʾ aṛchews , zhoghovowrtĕ khotoretsʾnoghi mĕ bēs , paytsʾ es , tser aṛchew hartsʾakʾnnelov , tser ampastanowtʾiwnnerēn ochʾ mēg yantsʾankʾ ktay ays martown vray ,
42023015	ochʾ al Herovtēs , orovhetew anor ghrgetsʾi tsez : ew aha mahowan ar zhani ochʾinchʾ ĕradz ē .
42023016	Owremn bat zhem zayn , ow artsagem » .
42023017	( Artarew tōnin atenĕ , harg ēr or mēgĕ artsagēr anontsʾ . )
42023018	Ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ miasin aghaghagetsʾ : « Vertsʾowr asiga , ew Parappan artsagē mezi »
42023019	( or pantĕ netowadz ēr , kʾaghakʾin mēch eghadz abstampowtʾean mĕ ow martasbanowtʾean hamar ) .
42023020	Isg Bighatos , owzelov Yisowsĕ artsagel , tartseal khōsetsʾaw anontsʾ .
42023021	Paytsʾ anonkʾ gĕ kochʾēin : « KHachʾē , khachʾē zayn » .
42023022	Inkʾ errort ankam ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Paytsʾ inchʾ chʾarikʾ ĕradz ē : es mahowan ar zhani ochʾ mēg batjaṛ ktay anor vray : owremn bat zhem zayn ew artsagem » .
42023023	Isg anonkʾ gĕ bntēin partsratsayn aghaghagnerov ow gĕ bahanchēin or khachʾowi : ew anontsʾ ow kʾahanayabetnerown tsaynerĕ yaghtʾetsʾin .
42023024	Owsti Bighatos vjṛetsʾ or anontsʾ bahanchadzĕ ĕllay .
42023025	Artsagetsʾ anontsʾ , irentsʾ bahanchadz martĕ , or pantĕ netowadz ēr abstampowtʾean ow martasbanowtʾean hamar , isg yantsnetsʾ Yisowsĕ anontsʾ gamkʾin .
42023026	Erp gĕ tanēin zayn , pṛnetsʾin Simon Giwrenatsʾi gochʾowadz mēgĕ , or artēn gow kar , ew trin khachʾĕ anor vray , orbēszi grē Yisowsi etewēn .
42023027	ZHoghovowrtĕ gĕ hetewēr anor , medz pazmowtʾeamp , naew giner , oronkʾ gĕ hedzedzēin ow g!oghpayin anor vray .
42023028	Yisows tartsaw anontsʾ ew ĕsaw : « Erowsaghēmi aghchigner , mi lakʾ im vras , haba latsʾēkʾ towkʾ tser vray ow tser zawagnerown vray .
42023029	Orovhetew aha gow kan ōrerĕ , orontsʾ mēch biti ĕsen : “ Erani amowlnerown ew ayn orovaynnerown , oronkʾ chʾdznan , ow dzidzerown , oronkʾ gatʾ chʾtowin , , ” .
42023030	Ayn aten biti sgsin ĕsel leṛnerown : “ Ingēkʾ mer vray ” , ow plowrnerown : “ DZadzgetsʾēkʾ mez ” .
42023031	Orovhetew etʾē aysbēs g!ĕnen talar pʾaytin , haba inchʾ biti ĕnen chʾorin » .
42023032	Ergow owrishner al , chʾarakordzner , tarin anor het , orbēszi meṛtsʾowin .
42023033	Erp hasan Kakatʾ gochʾowadz teghĕ , hon khachʾetsʾin zayn ew ayt chʾarakordznern al , mēgĕ ach goghmĕ ow miwsĕ tsakh goghmĕ .
42023034	Yisows ĕsaw : « Hayr , nerē anontsʾ , orovhetew chʾen kiter tʾē inchʾ g!ĕnen » . Yetoy anor hantertsnerĕ pa zhnelow aten , vijag tsketsʾin .
42023035	ZHoghovowrtĕ gaynadz , gĕ titēr : betern al anontsʾ het gĕ kʾamahrēin zayn ow g!ĕsēin : « Owrishnerĕ pʾrgetsʾ , inkʾzinkʾn al tʾogh pʾrgē , etʾē inkʾ ē Kʾristosĕ , Astowdzoy ĕntrealĕ » .
42023036	Zinowornern al gĕ dzaghrēin zayn : gow kayin aṛchewĕ , kʾatsʾakh gĕ matowtsʾanēin anor ,
42023037	ow g!ĕsēin : « Etʾē town es Hreanerown tʾakaworĕ , pʾrgē town kʾez » .
42023038	Ew krowtʾiwn mĕ krowadz ēr anor vray , yownarēn , latinerēn ow eprayerēn kirerov : « Ays ē Hreanerown tʾakaworĕ » .
42023039	Ayt gakhowadz chʾarakordznerēn mēgĕ gĕ hayhoyēr anor ow g!ĕsēr : « Etʾē town es Kʾristosĕ , pʾrgē town kʾez , naew mez » .
42023040	Isg miwsĕ , yantimanelov zayn , ĕsaw : « Town chʾes vakhnar Astowdzmē , orovhetew noyn tatabartowtʾean mēch es .
42023041	Menkʾ , isgabēs artarapar , kʾani or aha gĕ stanankʾ mer ĕradznerown ar zhanawor hatowtsʾowmĕ : paytsʾ asiga anteghi ochʾ mēg pan ĕraw » .
42023042	Ew ĕsaw Yisowsi : « Tēr , yishē zis , erp kas kʾow tʾakaworowtʾeampt » .
42023043	Yisows al ĕsaw anor : « Jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem kʾezi : “ Town aysōr indzi het biti ĕllas trakhtin mēch ” » .
42023044	Kretʾē vetsʾerort zhamn , , ēr , erp khawar eghaw ampoghch ergrin vray , minchʾew zhamĕ inĕ : arewĕ khawaretsʾaw ,
42023045	ow tajarin varakoyrĕ batṛetsʾaw mēchteghēn .
42023046	Yisows partsratsayn kochʾetsʾ : « Hayr , kʾow tseṛkʾerowt mēch g!awantem im hokis » . Ow erp ĕsaw asiga , hokin towaw .
42023047	Hariwrabetĕ , tesnelov batahadzĕ , pʾaṛapanetsʾ Astowadz ew ĕsaw : « Irabēs ays martĕ artar ēr » .
42023048	Ays tesaranĕ titelow hamar hawakʾowadz ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ , batahadznerĕ tesnelov , gĕ dzedzēr gowrdzkʾĕ ow gĕ verataṛnar .
42023049	Ir polor dzanōtʾnern al heṛown gaynadz ēin , noynbēs al ginerĕ , or owghegtsʾer ēin iren Kalileayēn , ew gĕ tesnēin ays panerĕ .
42023050	Mart mĕ gar , Yovsēpʾ anownov , or khorhrtagan ēr , pari ew artar mart mĕ ,
42023051	( asiga hawanowtʾiwn towadz chʾēr anontsʾ dzrakirin ow ararkʾin , ) Hreanerown Arimatʾea kʾaghakʾēn : inkʾ al gĕ sbasēr Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean .
42023052	Asiga knatsʾ Bighatosi kʾov ew khntretsʾ Yisowsi marminĕ .
42023053	Ow khachʾēn ichetsʾnelov zayn , pʾatʾtʾetsʾ gtawov ew traw vimapʾor kerezmani mĕ mēch , owr pnaw mēgĕ trowadz chʾēr .
42023054	Ayt ōrĕ Owrpatʾ ēr , ow SHapatʾĕ biti sgsēr .
42023055	Ayn ginerĕ , or anor het eger ēin Kalileayēn , hetewetsʾan ow tesan kerezmanĕ , ew tʾē inchʾbēs hon trowetsʾaw anor marminĕ .
42023056	Ow verataṛnalov , poyrer ew ōdzanelikʾner batrastetsʾin , ow SHapatʾ ōrĕ hankchʾetsʾan , batowiranin hamatsayn .
42024001	Mēgshaptʾi ōrĕ , aṛtown shat ganowkh , egan kerezmanĕ , ow perin ayn poyrerĕ , or batrastadz ēin : owrish omankʾ al egan anontsʾ het .
42024002	Ktan kʾarĕ , kerezmanēn mēgti klorowadz ,
42024003	ow ners mtnelov , hon chʾktan Tēr Yisowsi marminĕ .
42024004	Erp medz taragoysi mēch ēin ays masin , aha ergow martig , lowsapʾayl tarazov , hasan anontsʾ .
42024005	Kʾani vakhtsʾadz ĕllalov , khonarhetsʾowtsʾin irentsʾ eresnerĕ tēbi ketin , ayt martigĕ ĕsin anontsʾ : « Inchʾow oghchĕ gĕ pʾntṛēkʾ meṛelnerown mēch .
42024006	An hos chʾē , haba yarowtʾiwn aṛaw : yishetsʾēkʾ tʾē inchʾbēs khōsetsʾaw tsezi , erp teṛ Kalileayi mēch ēr , ĕselov :
42024007	“ Martow Ortin bētkʾ ē or matnowi meghawor martotsʾ tseṛkʾĕ , khachʾowi , ew yarowtʾiwn aṛnē errort ōrĕ ” » .
42024008	Ayn aten yishetsʾin anor khōskʾerĕ ,
42024009	ow verataṛnalov kerezmanēn , batmetsʾin ays polorĕ tasnmēgin ew owrishnerow .
42024010	Ays ginern ēin , Mariam Maktaghenatsʾin , Yovhanna , Yagoposi mayrĕ , Mariam , ew anontsʾ het owrishner al , oronkʾ batmetsʾin ays panerĕ aṛakʾealnerown .
42024011	Sagayn asontsʾ aṛchew zaṛantsʾankʾ tʾowetsʾan anontsʾ khōskʾerĕ , ow chʾēin hawatar anontsʾ .
42024012	Paytsʾ Betros ganknetsʾaw ew vazetsʾ tēbi kerezmanĕ : dzṛelov , tesaw tʾē latʾerĕ aṛantsin trowadz ēin , ow knatsʾ , inkʾniren zarmanalov ayt batahadzin vray .
42024013	Ew aha noyn ōrĕ ashagertnerēn ergowkʾĕ g!ertʾayin Ēmmawows anownov kiwgh mĕ , or Erowsaghēmēn vatʾsown asbarēz heṛow ēr .
42024014	Anonkʾ gĕ khōsēin irarow het ays polor bataharnerown masin .
42024015	Minchʾ anonkʾ gĕ khōsagtsʾēin ow gĕ vijapanēin , Yisows inkʾ al , mōtenalov , g!ertʾar anontsʾ het :
42024016	paytsʾ anontsʾ achʾkʾerĕ dzadzgowadz ēin , orbēszi chʾjanchʾnan zinkʾ .
42024017	Ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾi masin gĕ khōsagtsʾikʾ , irarow het kʾalelov , ow trtowm al ēkʾ » .
42024018	Anontsʾmē mēgĕ , orown anownĕ Gghēovbas ēr , bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Miayn town es or , Erowsaghēmi mēch bantkhtatsʾadz ĕllalov , chʾes kiter tʾē inchʾer batahetsʾan hon , ays ōrers » .
42024019	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾ » . Anonkʾ al ĕsin anor : « Inchʾ or gĕ veraperi Nazovretsʾi Yisowsi , or kordzov ow khōskʾov eghaw zōrawor markarē mĕ , Astowdzoy ew ampoghch zhoghovowrtin aṛchew :
42024020	inchʾbēs kʾahanayabetnern ow mer beterĕ mahowan matnetsʾin zayn , ew khachʾetsʾin .
42024021	Isg menkʾ gĕ yowsayinkʾ tʾē inkʾn ēr or biti azatakrēr Israyēlĕ . Patsʾi ays polorēn , ays errort ōrn ē , or ays panerĕ batahetsʾan .
42024022	Noynisg mer mēchēn kʾani mĕ giner shshmetsʾowtsʾin mez : anonkʾ aṛtow ganowkh katsʾin kerezmanĕ ,
42024023	ow chʾktnelov anor marminĕ , egan ew ĕsin tʾē hreshtagnerow tesilkʾ al tesan , oronkʾ ĕser en tʾē “ an oghch ē ” .
42024024	Mezmē omankʾ al katsʾin kerezmanĕ , ow aynbēs ktan , inchʾbēs ĕsin ayt ginerĕ : sagayn chʾtesan zinkʾ » .
42024025	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ov yimarner ew tantaghamitner , hawatalow ayn polor panerown , or markarēnerĕ khōsetsʾan .
42024026	Mitʾē Kʾristos bētkʾ chʾēr aysbēs chʾarchʾarowēr , ow mtnēr ir pʾaṛkʾĕ » .
42024027	Ew sgselov Movsēsēn ow polor Markarēnerēn , , , gĕ megnēr anontsʾ , inchʾ or krowadz ēr ir masin polor Kirkʾerown mēch .
42024028	Erp mōtetsʾan ayn kiwghin , owr g!ertʾayin , inkʾ gĕ tsewatsʾnēr tʾē biti ertʾar aweli heṛawor tegh mĕ .
42024029	Paytsʾ stibetsʾin zinkʾ , ĕselov : « Mnatsʾir mer kʾov , orovhetew irigownĕ mōt ē ew ōrĕ , mtʾntsʾadz » . Ow mtaw , mnalow anontsʾ het .
42024030	Erp seghan nstaw , , anontsʾ het , aṛaw hatsʾĕ , ōrhnetsʾ , ew gtrelov towaw anontsʾ .
42024031	Ayn aten anontsʾ achʾkʾerĕ patsʾowetsʾan ow janchʾtsʾan zinkʾ , isg inkʾ anerewoytʾ eghaw anontsʾmē .
42024032	Anonkʾ al ĕsin irarow : « Mer sirterĕ chʾēin porpokʾer mer nersĕ , erp inkʾ gĕ khōsēr jampan mezi het , ow Kirkʾerĕ gĕ patsʾatrēr mezi » .
42024033	Ew ganknetsʾan , noyn zhamown veratartsan Erowsaghēm , ow hamakhmpowadz ktan tasnmēgĕ ew anontsʾ het eghoghnerĕ ,
42024034	oronkʾ g!ĕsēin : « Irabēs Tērĕ yarowtʾiwn aṛaw ow erewtsʾaw Simoni » .
42024035	Irenkʾ al batmetsʾin inchʾ or batahetsʾaw jampan , ew tʾē inchʾbēs inkʾzinkʾ janchʾtsʾowtsʾ irentsʾ , hatsʾĕ gtradz aten .
42024036	Minchʾ anonkʾ aysbēs gĕ khōsēin , Yisows inkʾ gaynetsʾaw anontsʾ mēchtegh ow ĕsaw anontsʾ : « KHaghaghowtʾiwn tsezi » .
42024037	Paytsʾ anonkʾ , sarsapʾadz ew vakhtsʾadz , gĕ gardzēin tʾē oki mĕ gĕ tesnen .
42024038	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾow vrtovadz ēkʾ , ew inchʾow mtadzowmner gĕ dzakin tser sirterown mēch .
42024039	Tesēkʾ tseṛkʾers ow otkʾers , or es inkʾs em : shōshapʾetsʾēkʾ zis ew tesēkʾ , orovhetew okin marmin ow osgorner chʾ!ownenar , inchʾbēs gĕ tesnēkʾ zis , or ownim » .
42024040	Asiga ĕselov , tsʾowtsʾowtsʾ anontsʾ tseṛkʾern ow otkʾerĕ .
42024041	Erp irentsʾ owrakhowtʾenēn , tagawin chʾēin hawatar ew zarmankʾi mēch ēin , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Geragowr mĕ ownikʾ hos » .
42024042	Anonkʾ al gtor mĕ khorovadz tsowg ow meghrakhoriskh towin iren .
42024043	Aṛaw , geraw anontsʾ aṛchew ,
42024044	ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ahawasig ayn khōskʾerĕ , or ĕsi tsezi , erp teṛ tsezi het ēi : “ Bētkʾ ē or irakordzowin polor panerĕ , oronkʾ krowadz en im masis Movsēsi ōrēnkʾin mēch , Markarēnerown mēch ew Saghmosnerown mēch ” » .
42024045	Ayn aten patsʾaw anontsʾ mitkʾerĕ , orbēszi hasgnan Kirkʾerĕ ,
42024046	ow ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ays krowadz ē , ew aysbēs bētkʾ ēr or Kʾristos chʾarchʾarowēr , ow meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛnēr errort ōrĕ :
42024047	ew anor anownov abashkharowtʾiwn ow meghkʾerow nerowm kʾarozowēr polor azkerown mēch , sgselov Erowsaghēmēn .
42024048	Towkʾ ēkʾ ays panerown vganerĕ .
42024049	Ew aha es gĕ ghrgem tser vray im Hōrs khostowmĕ : paytsʾ towkʾ getsʾēkʾ Erowsaghēm kʾaghakʾin mēch , minchʾew or partsrēn ghrgowadz zōrowtʾiwn haknikʾ » .
42024050	Ow towrs hanetsʾ zanonkʾ , minchʾew Petʾania , ew ir tseṛkʾerĕ vertsʾnelov , ōrhnetsʾ zanonkʾ .
42024051	Minchʾ g!ōrhnēr zanonkʾ , zatowetsʾaw anontsʾmē , ow veratsʾaw erginkʾ .
42024052	Anonkʾ al ergrbakelov anor , veratartsan Erowsaghēm medz owrakhowtʾeamp .
42024053	Ew amēn aten tajarin mēch ēin , ow gĕ kovapanēin ew g!ōrhnēin Astowadz . Amēn .
43001001	Sgizpēn ēr KHōskʾĕ , ow KHōskʾĕ Astowdzoy kʾov ēr , ew KHōskʾĕ Astowadz ēr :
43001002	an sgizpēn Astowdzoy kʾov ēr .
43001003	Amēn inchʾ eghaw anov : eghadznerēn ochʾ mēgĕ eghaw aṛantsʾ anor .
43001004	Geankʾĕ anov ēr , ow geankʾĕ martotsʾ loysn ēr :
43001005	loysĕ gĕ pʾaylēr khawari mēch , paytsʾ khawarĕ chʾjanchʾtsʾaw zayn .
43001006	Astowdzmē ghrgowadz mart mĕ gar , orown anownĕ Yovhannēs ēr .
43001007	Asiga egaw vgayowtʾean hamar , or vgayē Loysin masin , orbēszi polorĕ hawatan anor michotsʾov .
43001008	Inkʾ chʾēr ayt Loysĕ , haba egaw , orbēszi vgayē Loysin masin .
43001009	Jshmarit Loysĕ an ēr , or gĕ lowsaworē ashkharh egogh , , amēn mart .
43001010	Inkʾ ashkharhi mēch ēr , ew ashkharhĕ eghaw irmov , paytsʾ ashkharhĕ chʾjanchʾtsʾaw zinkʾ .
43001011	Irennerown egaw , sagayn irennerĕ chʾĕntownetsʾin zinkʾ .
43001012	Paytsʾ anontsʾ , or ĕntownetsʾin zinkʾ - anontsʾ , or gĕ hawatan ir anownin - irawasowtʾiwn towaw Astowdzoy zawagner ĕllalow .
43001013	Anonkʾ ochʾ ariwnēn ew ochʾ marmini gamkʾēn dznan , ochʾ al martow gamkʾēn , haba , Astowdzmē .
43001014	Ew KHōskʾĕ marmin eghaw ow mer mēch pnagetsʾaw , ( ew titetsʾinkʾ anor pʾaṛkʾĕ , Hōrĕ miadzini pʾaṛkʾin bēs , ) shnorhkʾov ow jshmartowtʾeamp letsʾown .
43001015	Yovhannēs vgayetsʾ anor masin , ew aghaghagetsʾ : « Asiga ē an , orown masin g!ĕsēi : “ An or im etewēs gow kay , im aṛchews eghaw , orovhetew intsmē aṛach ēr ” .
43001016	Ew anor liowtʾenēn menkʾ polors statsʾankʾ shnorhkʾ shnorhkʾi vray .
43001017	Orovhetew ōrēnkʾĕ trowetsʾaw Movsēsi michotsʾov , paytsʾ shnorhkʾn ow jshmartowtʾiwnĕ eghan Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov .
43001018	Ochʾ mēgĕ erpekʾ tesadz ē Astowadz : paytsʾ miadzin Ortin , or Hōrĕ dzotsʾn ē , inkʾ batmetsʾ anor masin » .
43001019	Sa ē Yovhannēsi vgayowtʾiwnĕ , erp Hreanerĕ Erowsaghēmēn ghrgetsʾin kʾahananer ow GHewtatsʾiner , orbēszi hartsʾnen anor : « Town ov es » .
43001020	An khostovanetsʾaw ow chʾowratsʾaw , haba yaytararetsʾ : « Es Kʾristosĕ chʾem » .
43001021	Hartsʾowtsʾin anor : « Haba ov : Eghian es » . Ĕsaw : « CHʾem » . Hartsʾowtsʾin : « Ayn markarēn es » . Bataskhanetsʾ : « Ochʾ » .
43001022	Owremn ĕsin anor : « Town ov es : ĕsē mezi , orbēszi bataskhan mĕ taninkʾ mez ghrgoghnerown : inchʾ g!ĕses kʾow masit » .
43001023	Ĕsaw : « Es anor tsaynn em , or gĕ kochʾē anabatin mēch : “ SHtgetsʾēkʾ Tēroch jampan ” , inchʾbēs Esayi markarēn ĕsaw » .
43001024	Ayt ghrgowadznerĕ Pʾarisetsʾinerēn ēin ,
43001025	ow hartsʾowtsʾin iren : « Haba inchʾow gĕ mgrtes , etʾē town ochʾ Kʾristosn es , ochʾ Eghian , ochʾ al markarēn » .
43001026	Yovhannēs bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Es chowrov gĕ mgrtem , paytsʾ mēgĕ gay tser mēch , or towkʾ chʾēkʾ janchʾnar :
43001027	inkʾ ē im etewēs egoghĕ , or im aṛchews eghaw , orown gōshigin gabĕ kʾagelow ar zhani chʾem » .
43001028	Ays panerĕ batahetsʾan Petʾaparayi mēch , Yortanani miws goghmĕ , owr Yovhannēs gĕ genar ow gĕ mgrtēr .
43001029	Heteweal ōrĕ Yovhannēs tesaw Yisowsĕ , or iren gow kar , ew ĕsaw : « Aha Astowdzoy Kaṛĕ , or gĕ kʾawē ashkharhi meghkʾĕ .
43001030	Asiga ē an , orown masin g!ĕsēi : “ Im etewēs mart mĕ gow kay , or im aṛchews eghaw , orovhetew intsmē aṛach ēr ” .
43001031	Es chʾēi janchʾnar zayn : paytsʾ egay chowrov mgrtelow , orbēszi an yaytnowi Israyēli » .
43001032	Ow Yovhannēs vgayelov ĕsaw : « Tesay Hokin , or aghawnii bēs g!ichnēr erginkʾēn ew gĕ mnar anor vray .
43001033	Es chʾēi janchʾnar zayn , paytsʾ an or ghrgetsʾ zis chowrov mgrtelow , inkʾ ĕsaw indzi : “ Orown vray or tesnes tʾē Hokin g!ichnē ow gĕ mnay , aniga ē , or Sowrp Hokiov gĕ mgrtē ” .
43001034	Es al tesay , ew vgayetsʾi tʾē ays ē Astowdzoy Ortin » .
43001035	Heteweal ōrĕ Yovhannēs tartseal gaynadz ēr , ew ir ashagertnerēn ergowkʾĕ .
43001036	Nayelov Yisowsi , or gĕ kʾalēr , ĕsaw : « Aha Astowdzoy Kaṛĕ » .
43001037	Ergow ashagertnerĕ lsetsʾin angē , erp gĕ khōsēr , ow hetewetsʾan Yisowsi .
43001038	Erp Yisows tartsaw ew tesaw tʾē anonkʾ gĕ hetewēin iren , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾ gĕ pʾntṛēkʾ » . Anonkʾ al ĕsin iren : « Ṛappi , ( or tʾarkmanowelov , vartabet ĕsel ē , ) owr gĕ pnagis » .
43001039	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Egēkʾ ew tesēkʾ » . Katsʾin ow tesan tʾē owr gĕ pnagēr : ew ayt ōrĕ mnatsʾin anor kʾov , orovhetew kretʾē tasnerort zhamn , , ēr .
43001040	Simon Betrosi eghpayrĕ , Antrēas mēgn ēr ayn ergowkʾēn , or lsetsʾin Yovhannēsē ow hetewetsʾan anor .
43001041	An nakh ktaw ir eghpayrĕ , Simonĕ , ew ĕsaw anor : « Ktankʾ Mesian » ( or gĕ tʾarkmanowi , Kʾristos ) :
43001042	aba taraw zayn Yisowsi kʾov . Yisows nayelov anor , ĕsaw : « Town Simonn es , Yovnani ortin : town Gepʾas biti gochʾowis » , or gĕ tʾarkmanowi , Betros .
43001043	Heteweal ōrĕ , Yisows owzetsʾ Kalilea ertʾal , ew ktnelov Pʾilibbosĕ , ĕsaw anor : « Hetewē indzi » .
43001044	Pʾilibbos Petʾsayitayēn ēr : Antrēasi ow Betrosi kʾaghakʾēn .
43001045	Pʾilibbos ktaw Natʾanayēlĕ ew ĕsaw anor : « Ktankʾ an , orown masin Movsēs kretsʾ ōrēnkʾin mēch , ow markarēnern al , aysinkʾn , Yisows Nazovretsʾin , Yovsēpʾi ortin » .
43001046	Natʾanayēl ĕsaw anor : « Gareli ē or Nazarētʾēn pari pan mĕ ellē » . Pʾilibbos ĕsaw anor : « Egowr ow tes » .
43001047	Yisows , erp tesaw Natʾanayēlĕ , or iren gow kar , ĕsaw anor masin : « Aha jshmartabēs Israyelatsʾi mĕ , orown nersĕ nenkowtʾiwn chʾgay » .
43001048	Natʾanayēl ĕsaw anor : « Owrgē gĕ janchʾnas zis » . Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Teṛ Pʾilibbos kʾez chʾganchʾadz , town , or tʾzeniin tagn ēir , es tesay kʾez » .
43001049	Natʾanayēl bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Ṛappi , town es Astowdzoy Ortin , town es Israyēli tʾakaworĕ » .
43001050	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Gĕ hawatas , kʾani or ĕsi kʾezi tʾē tesay kʾez tʾzeniin nerkʾew . Asgē aweli medz paner biti tesnes » .
43001051	Naew ĕsaw anor : « Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Asgē etkʾ biti tesnēkʾ erginkʾĕ patsʾowadz , ew Astowdzoy hreshtagnerĕ , or g!ellen ow g!ichnen martow Ortiin vray ” » .
43002001	Errort ōrĕ harsanikʾ mĕ gar Kalileayi Gana kʾaghakʾĕ , ew Yisowsi mayrĕ hon ēr .
43002002	Yisows al hrawirowetsʾaw ayt harsanikʾin , naew , ir ashagertnerĕ .
43002003	Erp kinin bagsetsʾaw , Yisowsi mayrĕ ĕsaw anor : « Kini chʾownin » .
43002004	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Gin , town inchʾ ownis indzi het : im zhams teṛ hasadz chʾē » .
43002005	Ir mayrĕ ĕsaw sbasargownerown : « Inchʾ or ĕsē tsezi , ĕrēkʾ » .
43002006	Hon vetsʾ kʾarē garas trowadz ēr , Hreanerown makʾrowelow sovorowtʾean hamatsayn : iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ gĕ barownagēr ergow gam erekʾ mar .
43002007	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Letsʾowtsʾēkʾ ayt garasnerĕ chowrov » : ow letsʾowtsʾin zanonkʾ , minchʾew peranĕ .
43002008	Ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Hima hanetsʾēkʾ ow tarēkʾ seghanabetin » : anonkʾ al tarin .
43002009	Erp seghanabetĕ hamtesetsʾ kini tartsadz chowrĕ , chʾēr kiter owrgē ĕllalĕ ( paytsʾ sbasargownerĕ , oronkʾ haner ēin chowrĕ , kitēin ) . Seghanabetĕ ganchʾetsʾ pʾesan
43002010	ew ĕsaw anor : « Amēn mart nakh gĕ matowtsʾanē law kinin , ow erp arpetsʾadz ĕllan , ayn aten tsʾadzoragĕ : paytsʾ town law kinin bahetsʾir minchʾew hima » .
43002011	Yisows ir nshannerown sgizpĕ ĕraw asiga , Kalileayi Gana kʾaghakʾin mēch , ew tsʾoytsʾ towaw ir pʾaṛkʾĕ : ow ir ashagertnerĕ hawatatsʾin iren .
43002012	Yetoy Yisows Gapʾaṛnayowm ichaw , inkʾ , ir mayrn ow ir eghpayrnerĕ , ew ir ashagertnerĕ : paytsʾ shat ōrer chʾmnatsʾin hon .
43002013	Hreanerown Zatigĕ mōt ēr , owsti Yisows partsratsʾaw Erowsaghēm .
43002014	Tajarin mēch ktaw archaṛ , ochʾkhar ew aghawni dzakhoghner , naew lowmayapʾokhner , oronkʾ nstadz ēin .
43002015	Ew chʾowanē kharazan mĕ shinelov , tajarēn towrs hanetsʾ polorĕ , ochʾkharnern ow archaṛnern al : tʾapʾetsʾ lowmayapʾokhnerown lowmanerĕ , tabaletsʾ seghannerĕ ,
43002016	ew ĕsaw aghawni dzakhoghnerown : « Vertsʾowtsʾēkʾ atonkʾ asgē : aṛewtowri town mi ĕnēkʾ im Hōrs townĕ » .
43002017	Ew ir ashagertnerĕ yishetsʾin , or krowadz ē : « Kʾow tant nakhantsakhntrowtʾiwnĕ glanetsʾ zis » .
43002018	Hetewapar Hreanerĕ ĕsin anor : « Inchʾ nshan tsʾoytsʾ gow tas mezi , kʾani g!ĕnes ayt panerĕ » .
43002019	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Kʾagetsʾēkʾ ays tajarĕ , ow erekʾ ōrowan mēch biti ganknetsʾnem zayn » .
43002020	Isg Hreanerĕ ĕsin : « Kʾaṛasownvetsʾ tarowan mēch shinowetsʾaw ays tajarĕ , ew town erekʾ ōrowan mēch biti ganknetsʾnes zayn » .
43002021	Paytsʾ inkʾ gĕ khōsēr ir marminin tajarin masin .
43002022	Owsti erp inkʾ meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛaw , ir ashagertnerĕ yishetsʾin tʾē ĕsadz ēr asiga , ow hawatatsʾin Kirkʾin ew Yisowsi ĕsadz khōskʾin .
43002023	Erp Zatigi tōnin atenĕ Erowsaghēm ēr , shat martig hawatatsʾin anor anownin , tesnelov anor ĕradz nshannerĕ .
43002024	Paytsʾ inkʾ , Yisows , chʾēr hawatar anontsʾ , orovhetew gĕ janchʾnar amēn mart :
43002025	bētkʾ chʾownēr , or mēgĕ owrish martow masin vgayēr iren , kʾani or inkʾ kitēr tʾē inchʾ gay martown mēch .
43003001	Pʾarisetsʾinerēn mart mĕ gar , Nigotemos anownov , or Hreanerow bet mĕn ēr .
43003002	Asiga kisherowan mēch egaw Yisowsi kʾov ew ĕsaw anor : « Ṛappi , kitenkʾ tʾē town Astowdzmē vartabet egadz es : orovhetew mēgĕ chʾi grnar ĕnel ayn nshannerĕ , or town g!ĕnes , etʾē Astowadz iren het chʾĕllay » .
43003003	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem kʾezi : “ Etʾē mēgĕ verstin chʾdzni , chʾi grnar tesnel Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ ” » .
43003004	Nigotemos ĕsaw anor : « Inchʾbēs grnay dznil mart mĕ , or dzeratsʾadz ē . Gareli ē , or ergrort ankam mtnē ir mōr orovaynĕ ew dzni » .
43003005	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem kʾezi : “ Etʾē mēgĕ chowrēn ow Hokiēn chʾdzni , chʾi grnar mtnel Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ ” .
43003006	Marminēn dznadzĕ , marmin ē , ew Hokiēn dznadzĕ , hoki ē .
43003007	Town mi zarmanar or ĕsi kʾezi : “ Towkʾ bētkʾ ē verstin dznikʾ ” .
43003008	Hovĕ gĕ pʾchʾē owr or owzē : gĕ lses anor tsaynĕ , paytsʾ chʾes kiter owrgē gow kay , gam owr g!ertʾay . Ov or Hokiēn gĕ dzni , aysbēs ē » .
43003009	Nigotemos ĕsaw anor : « Inchʾbēs grnay ĕllal atiga » .
43003010	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Town Israyēli mēch vartabet mĕn es , ow chʾes kiter ays panerĕ .
43003011	Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem kʾezi tʾē inchʾ or kitenkʾ , gĕ khōsinkʾ , ew inchʾ or tesankʾ , gĕ vgayenkʾ , ow chʾēkʾ ĕntownir mer vgayowtʾiwnĕ .
43003012	Etʾē ergrayin panerow masin khōsetsʾay tsezi ew chʾēkʾ hawatar , inchʾbēs biti hawatakʾ , etʾē ergnayin panerow masin khōsim tsezi .
43003013	Ochʾ mēgĕ erginkʾ partsratsʾaw , patsʾi angē , or erginkʾēn ichaw , martow Ortin , or erginkʾn ē .
43003014	Ew inchʾbēs Movsēs partsratsʾowtsʾ ōtsĕ anabatin mēch , aynbēs bētkʾ ē or partsranay martow Ortin :
43003015	orbēszi ov or hawatay anor , chʾgorsowi , haba ownenay yawitenagan geankʾĕ .
43003016	Orovhetew Astowadz aynbēs siretsʾ ashkharhĕ , or minchʾew ankam towaw ir miadzin Ortin , orbēszi ov or hawatay anor , chʾgorsowi , haba ownenay yawitenagan geankʾĕ .
43003017	Kʾani or Astowadz ashkharh ghrgetsʾ ir Ortin , ochʾ tʾē ashkharhĕ tatabartelow , haba , orbēszi ashkharhĕ pʾrgowi anov .
43003018	An or gĕ hawatay anor , chʾi tatabartowir , isg an or chʾi hawatar , aniga artēn tatabartowadz ē , orovhetew chʾhawatatsʾ Astowdzoy miadzin Ortiin anownin .
43003019	Sa ē tatabartowtʾiwnĕ , or loysĕ ashkharh egaw , paytsʾ martig siretsʾin khawarĕ , pʾokhanag loysin , kʾani or irentsʾ kordzerĕ chʾar ēin .
43003020	Orovhetew ov or chʾarikʾ gĕ kordzē , aniga g!atē loysĕ ew chʾi kar loysin kʾov , orbēszi chʾgshtampowin ir kordzerĕ .
43003021	Paytsʾ an or gĕ girargē jshmartowtʾiwnĕ , gow kay loysin kʾov , orbēszi ir kordzerĕ yaytnaperowin tʾē kordzowetsʾan Astowdzmov » .
43003022	Asgē etkʾ , Yisows ew ir ashagertnerĕ egan Hrēastani ergirĕ : hon gĕ genar , anontsʾ het , ow gĕ mgrtēr .
43003023	Yovhannēs al gĕ mgrtēr Ayenoni mēch , Saghimi mōt , orovhetew hon shat chowr gar : gow kayin ew gĕ mgrtowēin ,
43003024	orovhetew Yovhannēs teṛ pantĕ netowadz chʾēr .
43003025	Owsti vijapanowtʾiwn mĕ eghaw Yovhannēsi ashagertnerēn omantsʾ ew Hreanerown michew , makʾrowtʾean masin .
43003026	Ow egan Yovhannēsi kʾov ew ĕsin anor : « Ṛappi , an or kʾezi het , Yortanani miws goghmn ēr , orown masin town vgayetsʾir , aha inkʾ gĕ mgrtē ow polorĕ g!ertʾan anor » .
43003027	Yovhannēs bataskhanetsʾ : « Mart mĕ ochʾinchʾ grnay stanal , etʾē erginkʾēn trowadz chʾĕllay iren .
43003028	Towkʾ tsezmē gĕ vgayēkʾ indzi hamar , tʾē ĕsi : “ Es Kʾristosĕ chʾem , haba ghrgowadz em anor aṛchewēn ” .
43003029	An or owni harsĕ , aniga ē pʾesan : paytsʾ pʾesayin paregamĕ , or gĕ genay ew gĕ lsē zayn , medzabēs g!owrakhanay pʾesayin tsaynin hamar . Owremn aha liatsʾadz ē im owrakhowtʾiwns .
43003030	Bētkʾ ē or an medznay , isg es , bztignam » .
43003031	An or gow kay verēn , polorēn ver ē . An or ergrēn ē , ergrawor ē , ow gĕ khōsi ergrēn : an or gow kay erginkʾēn , polorēn ver ē ,
43003032	ew inchʾ or tesaw ow lsetsʾ , gĕ vgayē anontsʾ masin , ew ochʾ mēgĕ g!ĕntowni anor vgayowtʾiwnĕ .
43003033	An or g!ĕntowni anor vgayowtʾiwnĕ , gĕ gnkʾē tʾē Astowadz jshmartakhōs ē :
43003034	orovhetew an or Astowadz ghrgetsʾ , gĕ kʾarozē Astowdzoy khōskʾerĕ , kʾani or Astowadz anor chʾapʾov chʾi tar Hokin .
43003035	Hayrĕ gĕ sirē Ortin , ew amēn pan towadz ē anor tseṛkʾĕ .
43003036	An or gĕ hawatay Ortiin , owni yawitenagan geankʾĕ : isg an or chʾ!ansar Ortiin , biti chʾtesnē geankʾĕ , haba Astowdzoy pargowtʾiwnĕ gĕ mnay anor vray .
43004001	Owremn erp Tērĕ kittsʾaw tʾē Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ lser en , tʾē Yisows Yovhannēsē aweli ashagertner g!ĕnē ow gĕ mgrtē ,
43004002	( tʾēbēt , ochʾ tʾē Yisows inkʾ gĕ mgrtēr , haba ir ashagertnerĕ , )
43004003	tʾoghowtsʾ Hrēastanĕ ew tartseal Kalilea knatsʾ :
43004004	ow bētkʾ ēr or antsʾnēr Samariayi mēchēn .
43004005	Owsti egaw Samaratsʾinerown mēg kʾaghakʾĕ , or Sowkʾar gĕ gochʾowēr , ayn vayrin mōt , or Yagop towaw ir ortiin , Yovsēpʾi .
43004006	Hon gar Yagopi mēg aghpiwrĕ : owremn Yisows , jamportowtʾenēn yoknadz ĕllalov , nstaw ayt aghpiwrin kʾov . Kretʾē vetsʾerort zhamn , , ēr .
43004007	Samariayēn gin mĕ egaw chowr kʾashelow . Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Indzi chowr towr , khmelow » :
43004008	( kʾani or ir ashagertnerĕ kʾaghakʾĕ katsʾer ēin , geragowr knelow hamar . )
43004009	Owsti samaratsʾi ginĕ ĕsaw anor : « Town , or Hreay es , inchʾbēs g!owzes chowr khmel intsmē , samaratsʾi gnochmē mĕ » : orovhetew Hreanerĕ chʾen haghortagtsʾir Samaratsʾinerown het .
43004010	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Etʾē town kitnayir Astowdzoy barkewĕ , ew tʾē ov ē an , or g!ĕsē kʾezi : “ Indzi chowr towr khmelow ” , town biti owzēir irmē , ow inkʾ genarar chowr biti tar kʾezi » .
43004011	Ginĕ ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , town ochʾinchʾ ownis , chowr kʾashelow hamar , ew ays horĕ khorowng ē : owremn owrgē biti ownenas ayt genarar chowrĕ .
43004012	Mitʾē town aweli medz es kʾan mer hayrĕ , Yagop , or towaw mezi ays horĕ , ow asgē khmetsʾin inkʾ , ir ortinerĕ ew ir anasownnerĕ » .
43004013	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Ov or khmē ays chowrēn , tartseal biti dzarawnay , paytsʾ ov or khmē ayn chowrēn , or es biti tam anor , yawitean biti chʾdzarawnay .
43004014	Haba ayn chowrĕ , or es biti tam anor , biti ĕllay anor mēch chowri aghpiwr mĕ , or gĕ pkhi yawitenagan geankʾi hamar » .
43004015	Ginĕ ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , towr indzi ayt chowrĕ , orbēszi chʾdzarawnam , ew hos chʾkam , chowr kʾashelow » .
43004016	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Kna , ganchʾē amowsint ow hos egowr » .
43004017	Ginĕ bataskhanetsʾ : « Es amowsin chʾownim » . Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Jisht ĕsir : “ Amowsin chʾownim ” ,
43004018	orovhetew town hink amowsin ownetsʾer es , ew an or hima ownis , amowsint chʾē : jisht ĕsir atiga » .
43004019	Ginĕ ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , gĕ nshmarem tʾē town markarē mĕn es .
43004020	Mer hayrerĕ ergrbaketsʾin ays leran vray : paytsʾ towkʾ g!ĕsēkʾ tʾē Erowsaghēm ē miag teghĕ , owr bētkʾ ē ergrbakel » .
43004021	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Gin , hawata indzi , or zhamĕ biti kay , erp ochʾ ays leran vray ew ochʾ Erowsaghēmi mēch biti ergrbakēkʾ Hōrĕ .
43004022	Towkʾ g!ergrbakēkʾ anor , or chʾēkʾ janchʾnar : menkʾ g!ergrbakenkʾ anor , or gĕ janchʾnankʾ : orovhetew pʾrgowtʾiwnĕ Hreanerēn ē .
43004023	Paytsʾ zhamĕ biti kay ew hima al ē , erp jshmarit ergrbakoghnerĕ biti ergrbaken Hōrĕ , hokiov ow jshmartowtʾeamp , orovhetew Hayrn al g!owzē aytbisiner , iren ergrbakelow hamar .
43004024	Astowadz Hoki ē , ew iren ergrbakoghnern al bētkʾ ē or ergrbaken hokiov ow jshmartowtʾeamp » .
43004025	Ginĕ ĕsaw anor : « Kitem tʾē Mesian biti kay , ( Kʾristos gochʾowadzĕ : ) erp inkʾ kay , biti haghortē mezi amēn pan » .
43004026	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Es , or kʾezi het gĕ khōsim , an em » .
43004027	Ayt aten ir ashagertnerĕ egan , ow zarmatsʾan or gĕ khōsagtsʾēr ayt gnoch het , paytsʾ anontsʾmē ochʾ mēgĕ ĕsaw : « Inchʾ g!owzes » , gam : « Inchʾ gĕ khōsis anor het » .
43004028	Owsti ginĕ tʾoghowtsʾ ir sapʾorĕ ew knatsʾ kʾaghakʾĕ , ow ĕsaw kʾaghakʾatsʾinerown :
43004029	« Egēkʾ , tesēkʾ mart mĕ , or ĕsaw indzi amēn inchʾ or kordzer em : arteōkʾ an ē Kʾristosĕ » .
43004030	Anonkʾ al elan kʾaghakʾēn ew gow kayin anor .
43004031	Ayt michotsʾin ashagertnerĕ iren gĕ tʾakhantsēin ow g!ĕsēin : « Ṛappi , ger » .
43004032	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Es , owtelow hamar , ownim geragowr mĕ , or towkʾ chʾēkʾ kiter » .
43004033	Owremn ashagertnerĕ g!ĕsēin irarow : « Arteōkʾ mēgĕ owtelikʾ peraw iren » .
43004034	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Im geragowrs , kordzatrel ē zis ghrgoghin gamkʾĕ , ew awartel anor kordzĕ .
43004035	Towkʾ chʾēkʾ ĕser : “ Tagawin chʾors amis gay , or howntskʾi atenĕ kay ” . Aha es gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Partsratsʾowtsʾēkʾ tser achʾkʾerĕ ew titetsʾēkʾ arterĕ : artēn jermgadz ow hntsowelow batrast en ” .
43004036	An or gĕ hntsē , vartskʾ gĕ stanay , ew btowgh gĕ zhoghvē yawitenagan geankʾi hamar , orbēszi sermanoghn ow hntsoghĕ owrakhanan miasin .
43004037	Orovhetew ays panin mēch jshmarit ē ayn khōskʾĕ : “ Mēgĕ gĕ sermanē , ew owrish mĕ gĕ hntsē ” .
43004038	Es ghrgetsʾi tsez hntselow zayn , orown hamar chʾashkhatetsʾakʾ : owrishnerĕ ashkhatetsʾan , ow towkʾ mtakʾ anontsʾ ashkhatankʾin mēch » .
43004039	Ayt kʾaghakʾēn shat Samaratsʾiner hawatatsʾin iren , ayt gnoch khōskʾin hamar , or vgayetsʾ : « Inchʾ or kordzer ēi , amēnĕ ĕsaw indzi » .
43004040	Erp Samaratsʾinerĕ egan iren , gĕ tʾakhantsēin or mnay irentsʾ kʾov : ow mnatsʾ hon ergow ōr .
43004041	SHater iren hawatatsʾin , ir khōskʾin hamar ,
43004042	ew g!ĕsēin gnoch : « Al gĕ hawatankʾ , ochʾ tʾē kʾow khōskʾit hamar , ayl menkʾ isg lsetsʾinkʾ , ow kitenkʾ tʾē ays ē jshmartabēs ashkharhi Pʾrgichʾĕ , Kʾristosĕ » .
43004043	Ergow ōr etkʾ , megnetsʾaw angē ew knatsʾ Kalilea ,
43004044	orovhetew Yisows inkʾ vgayetsʾ tʾē “ markarē mĕ batiw chʾ!ownenar ir pnakawaṛin mēch ” .
43004045	Owremn erp Kalilea hasaw , Kalileatsʾinerĕ ĕntownetsʾin zinkʾ , kʾani or tesadz ēin ayn polor hrashkʾnerĕ , or inkʾ ĕraw tōnin atenĕ , Erowsaghēmi mēch : orovhetew irenkʾ al katsʾer ēin ayt tōnin .
43004046	Yisows tartseal egaw Kalileayi Gana kʾaghakʾĕ , owr chowrĕ pʾokhadz ēr kinii . Hon balatagan mĕ gar , orown ortin hiwant ēr , Gapʾaṛnayowmi mēch .
43004047	Asiga , lselov tʾē Yisows Hrēastanēn egadz ē Kalilea , egaw anor ow gĕ tʾakhantsēr , or ichnē ew p zhshgē ir ortin , orovhetew meṛnelow mōt ēr .
43004048	Isg Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Etʾē nshanner ow skʾanchʾelikʾner chʾtesnēkʾ , pnaw biti chʾhawatakʾ » .
43004049	Balataganĕ ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , ichir , kʾani teṛ tghas meṛadz chʾē » .
43004050	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Kna , ortit g!abri » . Martn al hawatatsʾ ayn khōskʾin , or Yisows ĕsaw iren , ow knatsʾ .
43004051	Erp artēn g!ichnēr , ir dzaṛanerĕ timaworetsʾin zinkʾ ew lowr towin , ĕselov : « Ortit oghch ē » .
43004052	Owsti hartsʾapʾortsetsʾ zanonkʾ tʾē or zhamown sgsaw lawanal . Ĕsin iren : « Erēg eōtʾnerort zhamown , , tentĕ tʾoghowtsʾ zayn » .
43004053	Owsti anor hayrĕ kittsʾaw tʾē ayn zhamn ēr , erp Yisows ĕsaw iren : « Ortit g!abri » , ow hawatatsʾ , inkʾ ew ir ampoghch townĕ .
43004054	Yisows tartseal ĕraw ays ergrort nshanĕ , erp Hrēastanēn Kalilea egaw .
43005001	Asgē etkʾ Hreanerown tōnn ēr , ow Yisows Erowsaghēm partsratsʾaw .
43005002	Erowsaghēmi mēch , Ochʾkharnerow tran kʾov awazan mĕ gay , or eprayerēn Petʾhezta gĕ gochʾowi ew hink srah owni .
43005003	Asontsʾ mēch baṛgadz ēr hiwantnerow medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ , goyrer , gagher , chʾortsʾadzner , oronkʾ gĕ sbasēin chowrin khaṛnowelown :
43005004	orovhetew hreshtag mĕ aten-aten g!ichnēr awazanĕ ow gĕ khaṛnēr chowrerĕ , ew ov or chowrin khaṛnowelēn etkʾ anor mēch aṛachinĕ mtnēr , g!aṛoghchanar , inchʾ akht al ownenar .
43005005	Hon mart mĕ gar , or hiwantowtʾiwn mĕ ownēr eresownowtʾ tariē i ver .
43005006	Erp Yisows tesaw zayn , baṛgadz , ow kittsʾaw tʾē artēn shat zhamanagē i ver hiwant ēr , ĕsaw anor : « G!owzes aṛoghchanal » .
43005007	Hiwantĕ bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Tēr , mart mĕ chʾownim , or erp chowrerĕ khaṛnowin , tskē zis awazanĕ : haba , minchʾ g!ertʾam , intsmē aṛach owrish mĕ g!ichnē » .
43005008	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Otkʾi elir , aṛ mahijt ow kʾalē » .
43005009	Isgoyn martĕ aṛoghchatsʾaw , ew aṛnelov ir mahijĕ , gĕ kʾalēr : isg ayt ōrĕ SHapatʾ ēr .
43005010	Owremn Hreanerĕ ĕsin p zhshgowadz martown : « SHapatʾ ē , ew artōnowadz chʾē , or vertsʾnes mahijt » .
43005011	Bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « An or p zhshgetsʾ zis , inkʾ ĕsaw indzi : “ Aṛ mahijt ow kʾalē ” » .
43005012	Owremn hartsʾowtsʾin anor : « Ov ē ayn martĕ , or ĕsaw kʾezi : “ Aṛ mahijt ow kʾalē ” » .
43005013	Ew p zhshgowoghĕ chʾēr kiter tʾē ov ē an , orovhetew Yisows mēgti kʾashowetsʾaw , ayntegh pazmowtʾiwn ĕllalown hamar .
43005014	Angē etkʾ Yisows , ktnelov zayn tajarin mēch , ĕsaw anor : « Aha p zhshgowetsʾar : al mi meghanchʾer , or aweli kēsh pan mĕ chʾbatahi kʾezi » .
43005015	Martĕ knatsʾ ow haghortetsʾ Hreanerown tʾē Yisows ēr , or p zhshgetsʾ zinkʾ .
43005016	Owsti Hreanerĕ gĕ haladzēin Yisowsĕ ew gĕ chanayin sbannel zayn , kʾani or SHapatʾ ōrĕ g!ĕnēr ays panerĕ .
43005017	Paytsʾ Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Im Hayrs minchʾew hima gĕ kordzē , es al gĕ kordzem » .
43005018	Owsti Hreanerĕ al aweli gĕ chanayin sbannel zayn , kʾani or ochʾ miayn SHapatʾ ōrĕ gĕ lowdzēr , haba naew Astowadz ir Hayrĕ gĕ gochʾēr , ew aysbēs , inkʾzinkʾ Astowdzoy hawasar g!ĕnēr .
43005019	Isg Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ortin inkʾnirmē ochʾinchʾ grnay ĕnel , haba miayn inchʾ or tesnē , or Hayrĕ g!ĕnē : orovhetew inchʾ or an g!ĕnē , nmanabēs Ortin al g!ĕnē ayt panerĕ ” .
43005020	Kʾani or Hayrĕ gĕ sirē Ortin , ew amēn pan tsʾoytsʾ gow tay anor , inchʾ or inkʾ g!ĕnē . Asontsʾmē aweli medz kordzer al tsʾoytsʾ biti tay anor , orbēszi towkʾ zarmanakʾ :
43005021	orovhetew inchʾbēs Hayrĕ meṛelnerĕ gĕ yarowtsʾanē ew geankʾ gow tay , noynbēs al Ortin geankʾ gow tay , anontsʾ or owzē .
43005022	Kʾani or Hayrĕ ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ tatē , haba amēn tatastan Ortiin towaw :
43005023	orbēszi polorĕ batowen Ortin , inchʾbēs gĕ batowen Hayrĕ . An or chʾi batower Ortin , chʾi batower Hayrĕ , or ghrgetsʾ zayn .
43005024	Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ An or mtig g!ĕnē im khōskʾs , ow gĕ hawatay anor , or ghrgetsʾ zis , owni yawitenagan geankʾĕ , ew chʾ!iynar tatabartowtʾean tag , haba antsʾadz ē mahēn tēbi geankʾ ” .
43005025	Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ ZHamĕ biti kay ow hima al ē , erp meṛelnerĕ biti lsen Astowdzoy Ortiin tsaynĕ : ew anonkʾ or gĕ lsen , biti abrin ” .
43005026	Orovhetew inchʾbēs Hayrĕ inkʾnir mēch geankʾ owni , aynbēs al Ortiin towaw , or inkʾnir mēch geankʾ ownenay :
43005027	naew anor towaw tatastan girargelow ishkhanowtʾiwn , kʾani or an martow Ortin ē .
43005028	Mi zarmanakʾ asor vray : orovhetew zhamĕ biti kay , erp polor kerezmannerow mēch eghoghnerĕ biti lsen anor tsaynĕ ,
43005029	ow towrs biti kan : anonkʾ or parikʾ kordzer en , geankʾi yarowtʾean hamar , ew anonkʾ or chʾarikʾ kordzer en , tatabartowtʾean yarowtʾean hamar » .
43005030	« Es intsmē ochʾinchʾ grnam ĕnel : inchʾbēs gĕ lsem , aynbēs gĕ tatem , ew im tatastans artar ē : orovhetew ochʾ tʾē im gamkʾs gĕ pʾntṛem , haba anor gamkʾĕ , or ghrgetsʾ zis .
43005031	Etʾē es vgayem im masis , im vgayowtʾiwns jshmarit chʾē .
43005032	Owrish mĕn ē , or gĕ vgayē im masis : ow es kitem tʾē jshmarit ē ayn vgayowtʾiwnĕ , or inkʾ vgayetsʾ im masis .
43005033	Towkʾ mart ghrgetsʾikʾ Yovhannēsi , ew inkʾ vgay eghaw jshmartowtʾean .
43005034	Paytsʾ es ochʾ tʾē martotsʾmē vgayowtʾiwn gĕ stanam , haba ays panerĕ g!ĕsem , orbēszi towkʾ pʾrgowikʾ .
43005035	An jrak mĕn ēr , or gĕ vaṛēr ow gĕ pʾaylēr , ew towkʾ owzetsʾikʾ zhamanag mĕ tsʾndzal anor loysov .
43005036	Sagayn es ownim aweli medz vgayowtʾiwn , kʾan Yovhannēsinĕ : orovhetew ayn kordzerĕ or Hayrĕ towaw indzi , orbēszi awartem zanonkʾ , ayt noyn kordzerĕ or es g!ĕnem , gĕ vgayen im masis tʾē Hayrĕ ghrgetsʾ zis .
43005037	Ew Hayrĕ , or ghrgetsʾ zis , inkʾ vgayetsʾ im masis . Towkʾ pnaw lsadz chʾēkʾ anor tsaynĕ , ochʾ al tesadz anor gerbarankʾĕ :
43005038	anor khōskʾn al pnagadz chʾē tser mēch , orovhetew towkʾ chʾēkʾ hawatar anor , or inkʾ ghrgetsʾ .
43005039	Znnetsʾēkʾ Kirkʾerĕ , orovhetew towkʾ gĕ gardzēkʾ anontsʾmov ownenal yawitenagan geankʾĕ : pown anonkʾ en , or gĕ vgayen im masis .
43005040	Towkʾ chʾēkʾ owzer indzi kal , or geankʾ ownenakʾ .
43005041	Es pʾaṛkʾ chʾem stanar martotsʾmē :
43005042	paytsʾ kitem tsez , or chʾownikʾ tser mēch Astowdzoy sērĕ .
43005043	Es egay im Hōrs anownov , ow chʾēkʾ ĕntownir zis : etʾē owrish mēgĕ kay inkʾnir anownov , biti ĕntownikʾ zinkʾ .
43005044	Inchʾbēs grnakʾ hawatal , towkʾ or pʾaṛkʾ gĕ stanakʾ irarmē , ew chʾēkʾ pʾntṛer ayn pʾaṛkʾĕ , or gow kay miayn Astowdzmē .
43005045	Mi gardzēkʾ tʾē es biti ampastanem tsez Hōrĕ aṛchew . Gay mēgĕ , or g!ampastanē tsez , Movsēs , orown gĕ yowsakʾ .
43005046	Orovhetew etʾē Movsēsi hawatayikʾ , indzi al biti hawatayikʾ , kʾani or an kretsʾ im masis .
43005047	Paytsʾ etʾē chʾēkʾ hawatar anor kradznerown , inchʾbēs biti hawatakʾ im khōskʾerows » .
43006001	Asgē etkʾ , Yisows knatsʾ Kalileayi , aysinkʾn Tiperiayi dzovown miws goghmĕ .
43006002	Medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ gĕ hetewēr anor , orovhetew gĕ tesnēin ayn nshannerĕ , or g!ĕnēr hiwantnerown vray .
43006003	Yisows leṛĕ elaw ow nstaw hon , ir ashagertnerown het .
43006004	Hreanerown Zatigi tōnĕ mōt ēr .
43006005	Erp Yisows achʾkʾerĕ partsratsʾowtsʾ ow tesaw tʾē medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ gow kar iren , ĕsaw Pʾilibbosi : « Owrgē hatsʾ knenkʾ , orbēszi asonkʾ owten » .
43006006	( Asiga g!ĕsēr , zayn pʾortselow hamar , kʾani or inkʾ kitēr tʾē inchʾ biti ĕnēr . )
43006007	Pʾilibbos bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Ergow hariwr tahegani hatsʾ chʾi pawer anontsʾ , orbēszi iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ kʾichʾ mĕ aṛnē » .
43006008	Ir ashagertnerēn mēgĕ , Simon Betrosi eghpayrĕ , Antrēas , ĕsaw iren :
43006009	« Hos batani mĕ gay , or owni hink kariē nganag ow ergow tsowg : paytsʾ inchʾ en anonkʾ , aytchʾapʾ martotsʾ hamar » .
43006010	Yisows ĕsaw : « Nstetsʾowtsʾēkʾ ayt martigĕ » . Hon aṛat khot gar , ow martigĕ nstan , tʾiwov hink hazari chʾapʾ .
43006011	Yisows aṛaw nganagnerĕ , shnorhagal eghaw ew pashkhetsʾ ashagertnerown , ashagertnern al , nstoghnerown : nmanabēs tsowgerēn , orchʾapʾ or owzetsʾin .
43006012	Erp gshtatsʾan , ĕsaw ir ashagertnerown : « ZHoghvetsʾēkʾ aweltsʾadz pegornerĕ , orbēszi ochʾinchʾ gorsowi » .
43006013	Owsti zhoghvetsʾin , ew tasnergow goghov letsʾowtsʾin ayt hink kariē nganagnerēn mnatsʾadz pegornerov , oronkʾ owtoghnerēn aweltsʾan .
43006014	Isg martigĕ , erp tesan Yisowsi ĕradz nshanĕ , g!ĕsēin : « Jshmartabēs asiga ē ayn markarēn , or ashkharh biti kar » .
43006015	Owremn Yisows , kitnalov tʾē biti kan yapʾshtagelow zinkʾ , orbēszi tʾakawor ĕnen zinkʾ , tartseal leṛĕ knatsʾ , aṛantsin .
43006016	Erp irigown eghaw , ir ashagertnerĕ ichan dzovezerkʾĕ ,
43006017	ow naw mtnelov g!ertʾayin dzovown miws goghmĕ , Gapʾaṛnayowm . Artēn mtʾntsʾadz ēr , paytsʾ teṛ Yisows egadz chʾēr irentsʾ .
43006018	DZovn al alegodz ēr , sastig pʾchʾogh hovēn .
43006019	Erp tʾi varelov kʾsanhink gam eresown asbarēzi chʾapʾ katsʾin , tesan Yisowsĕ , or gĕ mōtenar nawown , dzovown vray kʾalelov , ow vakhtsʾan .
43006020	Paytsʾ inkʾ ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Es em , mi vakhnakʾ » .
43006021	Owsti owzetsʾin ĕntownil zinkʾ nawown mēch : ew nawĕ isgoyn hasaw ayn ergirĕ , owr g!ertʾayin .
43006022	Heteweal ōrĕ , pazmowtʾiwnĕ , or dzovown miws ezerkʾn ēr , tesaw tʾē owrish nawag chʾgar ayn mēgēn zat , orown mēch anor ashagertnerĕ mtadz ēin , ew tʾē Yisows ir ashagertnerown het mtadz chʾēr nawagĕ , ayl anor ashagertnerĕ aṛantsin katsʾer ēin
43006023	( paytsʾ Tiperiayēn owrish nawagner egan ayn teghin mōt , owr gerer ēin hatsʾĕ , Tēroch shnorhagal ĕllalēn etkʾ ) .
43006024	Owremn pazmowtʾiwnĕ , tesnelov tʾē ochʾ Yisows hon ē , ochʾ al anor ashagertnerĕ , irenkʾ al naw mtan ew katsʾin Gapʾaṛnayowm , pʾntṛelow Yisowsĕ .
43006025	Erp ktan zinkʾ , dzovown miws ezerkʾĕ , ĕsin iren : « Ṛappi , erp egar hos » .
43006026	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Towkʾ zis gĕ pʾntṛēkʾ , ochʾ tʾē kʾani or nshanner tesakʾ , haba , orovhetew nganagnerēn gerakʾ ow gshtatsʾakʾ ” .
43006027	Katsʾēkʾ , kordzetsʾēkʾ ochʾ tʾē gorstagan geragowrin hamar , haba ayn geragowrin hamar , or gĕ mnay yawitenagan geankʾin mēch , ew martow Ortin biti tay tsezi , orovhetew Hayrĕ , Astowadz zinkʾ gnkʾetsʾ » .
43006028	Owremn ĕsin iren : « Inchʾ ĕnenkʾ , orbēszi gatarenkʾ Astowdzoy kordzerĕ » .
43006029	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Sa ē Astowdzoy kordzĕ , or hawatakʾ anor ghrgadzin » .
43006030	Owsti ĕsin iren : « Paytsʾ town inchʾ nshan g!ĕnes , or tesnenkʾ ow hawatankʾ kʾezi : inchʾ gĕ kordzes .
43006031	Mer hayrerĕ anabatin mēch mananan geran , inchʾbēs krowadz ē : “ Erginkʾēn hatsʾ towaw anontsʾ , orbēszi owten ” » .
43006032	Isg Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Movsēs chʾtowaw tsezi ergnayin hatsʾĕ , paytsʾ im Hayrs gow tay tsezi jshmarit ergnayin hatsʾĕ ” :
43006033	orovhetew Astowdzoy hatsʾĕ an ē , or g!ichnē erginkʾēn ew geankʾ gow tay ashkharhi » .
43006034	Owremn ĕsin iren : « Tēr , amēn aten towr mezi ayt hatsʾĕ » .
43006035	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Es em geankʾi hatsʾĕ : an or gow kay indzi , erpekʾ biti chʾanōtʾenay , ew an or gĕ hawatay indzi , biti chʾdzarawnay .
43006036	Paytsʾ es ĕsi tsezi : “ Towkʾ zis tesakʾ al , ow chʾēkʾ hawatar ” .
43006037	Polor anonkʾ or Hayrĕ gow tay indzi , biti kan indzi , ew an or gow kay indzi , pnaw biti chʾvtarem .
43006038	Orovhetew es ichay erginkʾēn , kordzatrelow ochʾ tʾē im gamkʾs , haba anor gamkʾĕ , or ghrgetsʾ zis .
43006039	Ew zis ghrgogh Hōrĕ gamkʾĕ sa ē , or ochʾ mēgĕ gorsntsʾnem polor anontsʾmē , or inkʾ towaw indzi , haba yarowtsʾanem zanonkʾ , verchin ōrĕ .
43006040	Orovhetew zis ghrgoghin gamkʾĕ sa ē , or ov or tesnē Ortin ow hawatay iren , ownenay yawitenagan geankʾĕ : es al biti yarowtsʾanem zayn , verchin ōrĕ » .
43006041	Owsti Hreanerĕ gĕ trtnchēin iren tēm , orovhetew ĕsaw : « Es em erginkʾēn ichadz hatsʾĕ » ,
43006042	ew g!ĕsēin : « Asiga Yovsēpʾi ortin , Yisowsĕ chʾē , orown hayrn ow mayrĕ gĕ janchʾnankʾ : haba inchʾbēs asiga g!ĕsē : “ Es ichay erginkʾēn ” » .
43006043	Yisows al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Mi trtnchēkʾ tser mēch .
43006044	Ochʾ mēgĕ grnay kal indzi , etʾē zis ghrgogh Hayrĕ chʾkʾashē zayn : ow es biti yarowtsʾanem zayn , verchin ōrĕ .
43006045	Markarēnerown mēch krowadz ē : “ Polorn al sorvadz biti ĕllan Astowdzmē ” . Ov or gĕ lsē Hōrmēn ow gĕ sorvi , indzi gow kay .
43006046	Ochʾ mēgĕ tesadz ē Hayrĕ , patsʾi angē , or Astowdzmē ē : aniga tesadz ē Hayrĕ .
43006047	Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ An or gĕ hawatay indzi , owni yawitenagan geankʾĕ ” .
43006048	Es em geankʾi hatsʾĕ .
43006049	TSer hayrerĕ geran mananan anabatin mēch , paytsʾ meṛan .
43006050	Ays ē ayn hatsʾĕ , or g!ichnē erginkʾēn , orbēszi etʾē mēgĕ owtē asgē , chʾmeṛni .
43006051	Es em genarar hatsʾĕ , or ichay erginkʾēn . Etʾē mēgĕ owtē ays hatsʾēn , biti abri yawitean : ew ayn hatsʾĕ or es biti tam , im marmins ē , or biti tam ashkharhi geankʾin hamar » .
43006052	Owsti Hreanerĕ gĕ vijēin irarow het ew g!ĕsēin : « Inchʾbēs asiga grnay tal mezi ir marminĕ , owtelow » .
43006053	Isg Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Etʾē chʾowtēkʾ martow Ortiin marminĕ ow chʾkhmēkʾ anor ariwnĕ , geankʾĕ chʾēkʾ ownenar tser mēch ” .
43006054	Ov or g!owtē im marmins ew gĕ khmē im ariwns , owni yawitenagan geankʾĕ , ow es biti yarowtsʾanem zayn , verchin ōrĕ :
43006055	orovhetew im marmins jshmartabēs geragowr ē , ew im ariwns , jshmartabēs khmelikʾ .
43006056	An or g!owtē im marmins ow gĕ khmē im ariwns , aniga gĕ pnagi im mēchs , ew es , anor mēch .
43006057	Inchʾbēs abrogh Hayrĕ ghrgetsʾ zis , ow es g!abrim Hōrĕ michotsʾov , aynbēs al an or g!owtē zis , inkʾ al biti abri intsmov .
43006058	Ays ē ayn hatsʾĕ , or ichadz ē erginkʾēn . An or owtē ays hatsʾĕ , biti abri yawitean : ochʾ tʾē tser hayrerown bēs , oronkʾ geran mananan , paytsʾ meṛan » .
43006059	Ays panerĕ khōsetsʾaw zhoghovaranin mēch , erp gĕ sorvetsʾnēr Gapʾaṛnayowmi mēch .
43006060	Isg ashagertnerēn shaterĕ , erp lsetsʾin , ĕsin : « KHist ē ayt khōskʾĕ , ov grnay mtig ĕnel zayn » .
43006061	Erp Yisows inkʾniren hasgtsʾaw tʾē ir ashagertnerĕ gĕ trtnchen ator hamar , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Atiga gĕ kaytʾagghetsʾnē tsez .
43006062	Haba inchʾ biti mtadzēkʾ , etʾē tesnēkʾ martow Ortiin partsranalĕ hon , owr nakhabēs ēr .
43006063	Hokin ē geankʾ towoghĕ : marminĕ ōkowt mĕ chʾowni . Ayn khōskʾerĕ or g!ĕsem tsezi , Hoki ow geankʾ en .
43006064	Paytsʾ tser mēch gan omankʾ , or chʾen hawatar » . Orovhetew Yisows sgizpēn kitēr tʾē oronkʾ en anonkʾ , or chʾen hawatar , ew ov ē an , or biti matnē zinkʾ .
43006065	Ow ĕsaw : « Asor hamar ĕsi tsezi : “ Ochʾ mēgĕ grnay kal indzi , etʾē im Hōrmēs trowadz chʾĕllay anor ” » .
43006066	Ays batjaṛov ir ashagertnerēn shater heṛatsʾan , ew al chʾēin shrcher iren het .
43006067	Owsti Yisows ĕsaw tasnergowkʾin : « Mitʾē towkʾ al g!owzēkʾ ertʾal » .
43006068	Simon Betros bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Tēr , orown biti ertʾankʾ : town ownis yawitenagan geankʾi khōskʾerĕ .
43006069	Menkʾ hawatatsʾinkʾ ow kittsʾankʾ tʾē town es Kʾristosĕ , Astowdzoy Ortin » .
43006070	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Es chʾĕntretsʾi tsez , tasnergowkʾt : paytsʾ tsezmē mēgĕ chʾarakhōs ē » .
43006071	An gĕ khōsēr Isgariovtatsʾi Simonean Yowtayi masin , orovhetew aniga ēr or biti matnēr zinkʾ , tʾēbēt tasnergowkʾēn mēgn ēr .
43007001	Asgē etkʾ Yisows gĕ shrchēr Kalileayi mēch , kʾani or chʾēr owzer shrchil Hrēastani mēch , orovhetew Hreanerĕ gĕ chanayin sbannel zinkʾ .
43007002	Hreanerown Taghawarnerow tōnĕ mōt ēr :
43007003	owsti ir eghpayrnerĕ ĕsin iren : « Megnē asgē ow kna Hrēastan , orbēszi ashagertnert al tesnen kʾow kordzert , or g!ĕnes .
43007004	Orovhetew ochʾ mēgĕ kaghtni g!ĕnē orewē pan , erp gĕ chanay patsʾoroshabēs janchʾtsʾnel inkʾzinkʾ : etʾē g!ĕnes ayt panerĕ , town kʾez patsʾayaytē ashkharhi » .
43007005	Kʾani or ir eghpayrnern al chʾēin hawatar iren .
43007006	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Im zhamanags teṛ hasadz chʾē , paytsʾ tser zhamanagĕ batrast ē amēn aten .
43007007	Ashkharhĕ chʾi grnar atel tsez , paytsʾ g!atē zis , orovhetew es gĕ vgayem anor masin tʾē ir kordzerĕ chʾar en .
43007008	Towkʾ partsratsʾēkʾ ays tōnin : es ( teṛ ) chʾem partsranar ays tōnin , orovhetew zhamanags teṛ lratsʾadz chʾē » .
43007009	Asiga ĕselov anontsʾ , inkʾ mnatsʾ Kalilea .
43007010	Paytsʾ erp ir eghpayrnerĕ partsratsʾan , inkʾn al partsratsʾaw tōnin : ochʾ tʾē patsʾayaytōrēn , haba , kaghtni .
43007011	Isg Hreanerĕ gĕ pʾntṛēin zinkʾ tōnin atenĕ , ow g!ĕsēin : « Owr ē an » .
43007012	Pazmowtʾean mēch shat trtownch gar anor masin . Omankʾ g!ĕsēin : « Pari mart ē » . Owrishner g!ĕsēin : « Ochʾ , ayl ĕnthagaṛagĕ , pazmowtʾiwnĕ gĕ moloretsʾnē » .
43007013	Sagayn ochʾ mēgĕ patsʾoroshabēs gĕ khōsēr anor masin , Hreanerow vakhēn .
43007014	Isg erp tōnĕ gēs eghaw , Yisows partsratsʾaw tajarĕ , ew gĕ sorvetsʾnēr .
43007015	Hreanerĕ gĕ zarmanayin ow g!ĕsēin : « Inchʾbēs asiga kitē Kirkʾerĕ , kʾani pnaw sorvadz chʾē zanonkʾ » .
43007016	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Im owsowtsʾowms , ims chʾē , haba zis ghrgoghinn ē .
43007017	Etʾē mēgĕ owzē kordzatrel anor gamkʾĕ , biti kitnay tʾē ays owsowtsʾowmĕ Astowdzmē ē , tʾē es intsmē gĕ khōsim .
43007018	An or gĕ khōsi inkʾnirmē , gĕ pʾntṛē ir isg pʾaṛkʾĕ , paytsʾ an or gĕ pʾntṛē zinkʾ ghrgoghin pʾaṛkʾĕ , aniga jshmartakhōs ē , ew anor kʾov anirawowtʾiwn chʾgay .
43007019	Movsēs chʾtowaw tsezi ōrēnkʾĕ : paytsʾ tsezmē ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ kordzatrē ōrēnkʾĕ .
43007020	Inchʾow gĕ chanakʾ sbannel zis » . Pazmowtʾiwnĕ bataskhanetsʾ : « Tew gay kʾow nerst : ov gĕ chanay sbannel kʾez » .
43007021	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Kordz mĕ ĕri , ew polort al gĕ zarmanakʾ .
43007022	Movsēs towaw tsezi tʾlpʾatowtʾiwnĕ , ( or ochʾ tʾē Movsēsē ēr , haba nakhnikʾnerēn , ) ow mart gĕ tʾlpʾatēkʾ SHapatʾ ōrĕ .
43007023	Etʾē mart gĕ tʾlpʾatowi SHapatʾ ōrĕ , orbēszi Movsēsi ōrēnkʾĕ chʾlowdzowi , gĕ taṛnanakʾ indzi tēm , or ampoghch mart mĕ p zhshgetsʾi SHapatʾ ōrĕ .
43007024	Mi tatēkʾ erewoytʾin hamemat , haba tatetsʾēkʾ artarowtʾeamp » .
43007025	Owsti Erowsaghematsʾinerēn omankʾ g!ĕsēin : « Asiga chʾē an , or gĕ chanan sbannel .
43007026	Aha hamartsagōrēn gĕ khōsi , ow ochʾinchʾ g!ĕsen anor : mitʾē beterĕ kittsʾan tʾē jshmartabēs ays ē Kʾristosĕ .
