43007027	Sagayn menkʾ kitenkʾ tʾē asiga owrgē ē : paytsʾ erp Kʾristos kay , ochʾ mēgĕ biti kitnay anor owrgē ĕllalĕ » .
43007028	Isg Yisows , sorvetsʾnelow aten , tajarin mēch aghaghagetsʾ : « Zis al gĕ janchʾnakʾ , ew owrgē ĕllals al kitēkʾ . Es intsmē egadz chʾem , haba an or ghrgetsʾ zis , jshmarit ē . Towkʾ chʾēkʾ janchʾnar zayn :
43007029	paytsʾ es gĕ janchʾnam zayn , orovhetew es angē em , ew an ghrgetsʾ zis » .
43007030	Owsti gĕ chanayin tserpagalel zinkʾ : paytsʾ ochʾ mēgĕ tseṛkʾ partsratsʾowtsʾ ir vray , orovhetew ir zhamĕ teṛ hasadz chʾēr .
43007031	Pazmowtʾenēn shater hawatatsʾin iren , ow g!ĕsēin : « Erp Kʾristos kay , mitʾē aweli nshanner biti ĕnē , kʾan anonkʾ or asiga ĕraw » .
43007032	Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ lsetsʾin pazmowtʾean ays trtownchĕ anor masin : ew Pʾarisetsʾinern ow kʾahanayabetnerĕ sbasaworner ghrgetsʾin , orbēszi tserpagalen zayn .
43007033	Isg Yisows ĕsaw : « Kʾichʾ mĕ zhamanag al tsezi het em , aba g!ertʾam anor , or ghrgetsʾ zis .
43007034	Towkʾ biti pʾntṛēkʾ zis , paytsʾ biti chʾktnēkʾ , ew chʾēkʾ grnar kal im eghadz teghs » .
43007035	Owremn Hreanerĕ ĕsin irarow : « Owr biti ertʾay , or menkʾ biti chʾktnenkʾ zinkʾ : mitʾē hetʾanosnerown mēch tsʾrowadznerown biti ertʾay , ew hetʾanosnerown biti sorvetsʾnē .
43007036	Inchʾ ē ayn khōskʾĕ , or ĕsaw : “ Towkʾ biti pʾntṛēkʾ zis paytsʾ biti chʾktnēkʾ , ew chʾēkʾ grnar kal im eghadz teghs ” » .
43007037	Tōnin verchin medz ōrĕ , Yisows gaynadz ēr ow g!aghaghagēr : « Etʾē mēgĕ dzaraw ē , tʾogh kay indzi ew khmē .
43007038	An or hawatay indzi , genarar chowri keter biti pkhin anor pʾorēn , inchʾbēs Kirkʾĕ g!ĕsē » .
43007039	Asiga ĕsaw Hokiin masin , or iren hawatatsʾoghnerĕ biti ĕntownēin : orovhetew Sowrp Hokin trowadz chʾēr tagawin , kʾani or Yisows pʾaṛaworowadz chʾēr tagawin .
43007040	Pazmowtʾenēn shater , erp lsetsʾin ays khōskʾĕ , g!ĕsēin : « Jshmartabēs ays ē markarēn » .
43007041	Owrishner g!ĕsēin : « Ays ē Kʾristosĕ » . Owrishner al g!ĕsēin : « Mitʾē Kʾristos Kalileayēn biti kay .
43007042	Mitʾē Kirkʾĕ chʾ!ĕser tʾē Kʾristos biti kay Tawitʾi zarmēn ow Tawitʾi eghadz kiwghēn , Petʾlehēmēn » .
43007043	Owsti baṛagtowm eghaw pazmowtʾean mēch , anor batjaṛov .
43007044	Anontsʾmē omankʾ owzetsʾin tserpagalel zayn , paytsʾ ochʾ mēgĕ tseṛkʾ partsratsʾowtsʾ anor vray .
43007045	Owsti sbasawornerĕ egan kʾahanayabetnerown ew Pʾarisetsʾinerown kʾov , oronkʾ ĕsin anontsʾ : « Inchʾow hos chʾperikʾ zayn » .
43007046	Sbasawornerĕ bataskhanetsʾin : « Ochʾ mēgĕ erpekʾ khōsadz ē ays martown bēs » .
43007047	Owsti Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ bataskhanetsʾin anontsʾ : « Mitʾē towkʾ al moloretsʾakʾ .
43007048	Beterēn gam Pʾarisetsʾinerēn mēgĕ hawatatsʾ anor :
43007049	paytsʾ ays pazmowtʾiwnĕ , or chʾi kiter ōrēnkʾĕ , anidzeal ē » .
43007050	Nigotemos ĕsaw anontsʾ , ( or nakhabēs , kisherowan mēch katsʾer ēr iren , ew anontsʾmē mēgn ēr : )
43007051	« Mitʾē mer ōrēnkʾĕ gĕ tatē mart mĕ , etʾē nakhabēs chʾlsē zayn , ew chʾkitnay tʾē inchʾ g!ĕnē » .
43007052	Bataskhanetsʾin anor : « Mitʾē town al Kalileayēn es : znnē ow nayē , or Kalileayēn markarē chʾ!eller » .
43007053	Aba iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ knatsʾ ir townĕ .
43008001	Yisows knatsʾ TSitʾeninerow leṛĕ .
43008002	Erp aṛtown ganowkh tartseal egaw tajarĕ , ampoghch zhoghovowrtĕ gow kar iren , ew inkʾ , nstadz gĕ sorvetsʾnēr anontsʾ .
43008003	Tbirnern ow Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ perin anor shnowtʾean mēch pṛnowadz gin mĕ , ew mēchtegh gaynetsʾnelov zayn ,
43008004	ĕsin iren : « Vartabet , ays ginĕ shnowtʾean mēch pṛnowetsʾaw , ays meghkʾĕ kordzadz aten .
43008005	ōrēnkʾin mēch , Movsēs batowiretsʾ mezi kʾargodzel aysbisinerĕ : isg town inchʾ g!ĕses » .
43008006	Asiga g!ĕsēin , zayn pʾortselow hamar , orbēszi aṛitʾ ownenan zinkʾ ampastanelow : paytsʾ Yisows , var dzṛadz , matov gĕ krēr ketinin vray .
43008007	Sagayn erp sharownagetsʾin hartsʾnel iren , ver nayetsʾaw ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « TSezmē anmegh eghoghĕ , aṛach inkʾ tʾogh kʾar netē ator vray » .
43008008	Ow tartseal var dzṛelov , ketinin vray gĕ krēr .
43008009	Isg anonkʾ , lselov asiga ew gshtampowelov irentsʾ khghjmtankʾēn , towrs g!ellēin mēg aṛ mēg , amenēn taretsʾnerēn sgseal , minchʾew yetinnerĕ : ow Yisows minag mnatsʾ , ew ginĕ , mēchtegh gaynadz .
43008010	Yisows ver nayelov ow gnochmēn zat ochʾ mēgĕ tesnelov , ĕsaw anor : « Gin , owr en anonkʾ , or g!ampastanēin kʾez : ochʾ mēgĕ tatabartetsʾ kʾez » .
43008011	An al ĕsaw : « Ochʾ mēgĕ , Tēr » . Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Es al chʾem tatabarter kʾez : kna , ew asgē etkʾ al mi meghanchʾer » .
43008012	Yisows tartseal khōsetsʾaw anontsʾ ew ĕsaw : « Es em ashkharhi loysĕ : an or gĕ hetewi indzi , biti chʾkʾalē khawari mēch , haba biti ownenay geankʾi loysĕ » .
43008013	Isg Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ ĕsin anor : « Town gĕ vgayes kʾow masit : kʾow vgayowtʾiwnt jshmarit chʾē » .
43008014	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Tʾēbēt es gĕ vgayem im masis , im vgayowtʾiwns jshmarit ē , orovhetew kitem owrgē egay ew owr g!ertʾam : isg towkʾ chʾēkʾ kiter owrgē gow kam gam owr g!ertʾam .
43008015	Towkʾ gĕ tatēkʾ marminin hamatsayn : es ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ tatem .
43008016	Noynisg etʾē tatem , im tatastans jshmarit ē , orovhetew es minag chʾem , haba , es ew Hayrĕ , or ghrgetsʾ zis .
43008017	TSer ōrēnkʾin mēch al krowadz ē tʾē ergow martow vgayowtʾiwnĕ jshmarit ē .
43008018	Es em , or gĕ vgayem im masis , ow Hayrn al , or ghrgetsʾ zis , gĕ vgayē im masis » .
43008019	Owsti ĕsin anor : « Owr ē kʾow Hayrt » . Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « Ochʾ zis gĕ janchʾnakʾ , ew ochʾ , im Hayrs : etʾē janchʾnayikʾ zis , biti janchʾnayikʾ naew im Hayrs » .
43008020	Yisows ĕsaw ays khōskʾerĕ , kantsatownĕ , erp gĕ sorvetsʾnēr tajarin mēch , ow ochʾ mēgĕ tserpagaletsʾ zayn , orovhetew teṛ anor zhamĕ hasadz chʾēr .
43008021	Yisows tartseal ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Es g!ertʾam , ow biti pʾntṛēkʾ zis , ew biti meṛnikʾ tser meghkʾerown mēch : owr es g!ertʾam , towkʾ chʾēkʾ grnar kal » .
43008022	Owremn Hreanerĕ g!ĕsēin : « Mitʾē inkʾzinkʾ biti sbannē , kʾani or g!ĕsē : “ Owr es g!ertʾam , towkʾ chʾēkʾ grnar kal ” » .
43008023	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Towkʾ varēn ēkʾ , es verēn em : towkʾ ays ashkharhēn ēkʾ , es ays ashkharhēn chʾem .
43008024	Owsti ĕsi tsezi tʾē biti meṛnikʾ tser meghkʾerown mēch : artarew etʾē chʾhawatakʾ tʾē es em , biti meṛnikʾ tser meghkʾerown mēch » .
43008025	Owremn ĕsin anor : « Town ov es » . Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Inchʾ or sgizpēn g!ĕsem tsezi .
43008026	SHat paner ownim tser masin khōselow ew tatelow : paytsʾ an or ghrgetsʾ zis , jshmartakhōs ē , ow es inchʾ or lsetsʾi irmē , zayn gĕ khōsim ashkharhi mēch » .
43008027	Anonkʾ chʾhasgtsʾan tʾē Hōrĕ masin gĕ khōsēr irentsʾ .
43008028	Owsti Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Erp partsratsʾnēkʾ martow Ortin , ayn aten biti kitnakʾ tʾē es em , ew tʾē es intsmē ochʾinchʾ g!ĕnem , haba gĕ khōsim ays panerĕ , inchʾbēs Hayrĕ sorvetsʾowtsʾ indzi .
43008029	Ow zis ghrgoghĕ indzi het ē : Hayrĕ minag chʾtʾoghowtsʾ zis , orovhetew es amēn aten g!ĕnem iren hajeli eghadz panerĕ » .
43008030	Erp aysbēs khōsetsʾaw , shat martig hawatatsʾin iren .
43008031	Owsti Yisows ĕsaw iren hawatatsʾogh Hreanerown : « Etʾē im khōskʾis mēch mnakʾ , jshmartabēs im ashagertners g!ĕllakʾ :
43008032	ow jshmartowtʾiwnĕ biti kitnakʾ , ew ayt jshmartowtʾiwnĕ biti azatē tsez » .
43008033	Bataskhanetsʾin iren : « Menkʾ Aprahami zarmn enkʾ , ow erpekʾ strowg chʾenkʾ eghadz oewē mēgown . Town inchʾbēs g!ĕses : “ Azat biti ĕllakʾ ” » .
43008034	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ov or meghkʾ gĕ kordzē , aniga meghkʾin strowgn ē ” .
43008035	Ew strowgĕ tan mēch yawitean chʾi genar , paytsʾ ortin yawitean gĕ genay .
43008036	Owremn etʾē Ortin azatē tsez , irabēs azat biti ĕllakʾ .
43008037	Kitem tʾē Aprahami zarmn ēkʾ : paytsʾ gĕ chanakʾ sbannel zis , orovhetew im khōskʾs tegh chʾowni tser mēch .
43008038	Es inchʾ or tesay im Hōrs kʾov , zayn gĕ khōsim , ow towkʾ al inchʾ or tesakʾ tser hōr kʾov , zayn g!ĕnēkʾ » .
43008039	Bataskhanetsʾin anor : « Mer hayrĕ , Aprahamn ē » . Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Etʾē Aprahami ortinerĕ ĕllayikʾ , Aprahami kordzerĕ biti ĕnēikʾ .
43008040	Paytsʾ hima gĕ chanakʾ sbannel zis , aynbisi mart mĕ , or khōsetsʾaw tsezi jshmartowtʾiwnĕ , or lsetsʾi Astowdzmē : Apraham chʾĕraw ayt panĕ .
43008041	Towkʾ g!ĕnēkʾ tser hōr kordzerĕ » . Anonkʾ al ĕsin anor : « Menkʾ boṛngowtʾenē dznadz chʾenkʾ : menkʾ owninkʾ mēg Hayr , or Astowadz ē » .
43008042	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Etʾē Astowadz ĕllar tser Hayrĕ , biti sirēikʾ zis , orovhetew es Astowdzmē elay ow egay : ochʾ tʾē es intsmē egay , haba inkʾ ghrgetsʾ zis .
43008043	Inchʾow chʾēkʾ hasgnar im khōsadzs : kʾani or chʾēkʾ grnar mtig ĕnel im khōskʾs .
43008044	Towkʾ tser hōrmēn , CHʾarakhōsēn ēkʾ , ew g!owzēkʾ tser hōr tsʾangowtʾiwnnerĕ kordzatrel : an sgizpēn martasban ēr , ow jshmartowtʾean mēch chʾgetsʾaw , orovhetew anor mēch jshmartowtʾiwn chʾgay . Erp an sowt khōsi , gĕ khōsi pown ir ēowtʾenēn , kʾani or an stakhōs ē , ew sowtin hayrĕ .
43008045	Paytsʾ orovhetew es gĕ khōsim jshmartowtʾiwnĕ , chʾēkʾ hawatar indzi .
43008046	TSezmē ov grnay gshtampel zis , meghkʾi hamar : isg etʾē es gĕ khōsim jshmartowtʾiwnĕ , inchʾow chʾēkʾ hawatar indzi .
43008047	An or Astowdzmē ē , mtig g!ĕnē Astowdzoy khōskʾerĕ : owsti towkʾ mtig chʾēkʾ ĕner , kʾani or Astowdzmē chʾēkʾ » .
43008048	Hreanerĕ bataskhanetsʾin anor : « Menkʾ jisht chʾenkʾ ĕser tʾē town Samaratsʾi es , ow tew gay kʾow nerst » .
43008049	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « Im nerss tew chʾgay , haba es gĕ batowem im Hayrs : paytsʾ towkʾ , g!anbatowēkʾ zis .
43008050	Isg es chʾem pʾntṛer im pʾaṛkʾs . Gay mēgĕ , or gĕ pʾntṛē ow gĕ tatē .
43008051	Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Etʾē mēgĕ bahē im khōskʾs , mah biti chʾtesnē yawitean ” » .
43008052	Owsti Hreanerĕ ĕsin anor : « Hima kittsʾankʾ tʾē tew gay kʾow nerst . Apraham meṛaw , ow markarēnern al , isg town g!ĕses : “ Etʾē mēgĕ bahē im khōskʾs , mah biti chʾhamtesē yawitean ” .
43008053	Mitʾē town aweli medz es , kʾan mer hayrĕ , Apraham , or meṛaw , ow markarēnern al meṛan : town kʾez ov g!ĕnes » .
43008054	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « Etʾē es zis pʾaṛaworem , im pʾaṛkʾs ochʾinchʾ ē . Im Hayrs ē , or gĕ pʾaṛaworē zis , orown hamar towkʾ g!ĕsēkʾ tʾē “ mer Astowadzn ē ” ,
43008055	paytsʾ chʾēkʾ janchʾnar zayn . Isg es gĕ janchʾnam zayn , ow etʾē ĕsēi tʾē “ chʾem janchʾnar zayn ” , tsezi bēs stakhōs g!ĕllayi : minchʾteṛ es gĕ janchʾnam zayn , ew gĕ bahem anor khōskʾĕ .
43008056	TSer hayrĕ , Apraham , tsʾangatsʾ tesnel im ōrs , ow tesaw ew tsʾndzatsʾ » .
43008057	Isg Hreanerĕ ĕsin anor : « Town tagawin yisown taregan chʾes : Aprahamn al tesar » .
43008058	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Aprahami ĕllalēn aṛach , es em ” » .
43008059	Owsti kʾarer vertsʾowtsʾin , orbēszi neten anor vray : paytsʾ Yisows inkʾzinkʾ dzadzgetsʾ anontsʾ achʾkʾerēn , ow anontsʾ mēchēn antsʾnelov , towrs elaw tajarēn , ew aysbēs knatsʾ .
43009001	Erp g!antsʾnēr , tesaw mart mĕ , goyr dznadz .
43009002	Ir ashagertnerĕ hartsʾowtsʾin iren : « Ṛappi , ov meghanchʾetsʾ , asiga tʾē anor dznoghnerĕ , or an goyr dznaw » .
43009003	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « Ochʾ asiga meghanchʾadz ē , ochʾ al anor dznoghnerĕ , haba , orbēszi Astowdzoy kordzerĕ yaytnaperowin ir vray .
43009004	Minchʾ tsʾereg ē , bētkʾ ē or kordzem zis ghrgoghin kordzerĕ : kisherĕ gow kay , erp ochʾ mēgĕ grnay kordzel .
43009005	Aynkʾan aten or es ashkharhi mēch em , ashkharhi loysn em » .
43009006	Erp ĕsaw asiga , tʾkʾnetsʾ ketin , gaw shinetsʾ tʾowkʾov , ayt gawov dzepʾetsʾ goyrin achʾkʾerĕ
43009007	ew ĕsaw anor : « Kna , lowatsʾowē Selovami awazanin mēch » ( or gĕ tʾarkmanowi , ghrgowadz ) . An al knatsʾ ew lowatsʾowetsʾaw , egaw , ow gĕ tesnēr .
43009008	Isg tratsʾinerĕ , ew anonkʾ or nakhabēs tesadz ēin zinkʾ , tʾē goyr ēr , g!ĕsēin : « Asiga chʾēr an , or gĕ nstēr ow gĕ mowrar » . Omankʾ g!ĕsēin : « Aniga ē » .
43009009	Owrishner g!ĕsēin : « Anor nman mēgn ē » . Isg inkʾ g!ĕsēr : « Es em » .
43009010	Owremn ĕsin iren : « Haba inchʾbēs achʾkʾert patsʾowetsʾan » .
43009011	Inkʾ bataskhanetsʾ : « Yisows gochʾowadz mart mĕ gaw shinetsʾ , dzepʾetsʾ achʾkʾers ow ĕsaw indzi : “ Kna Selovami awazanĕ ew lowatsʾowē ” . Es al katsʾi , lowatsʾowetsʾay , ow gĕ tesnem » .
43009012	Owsti ĕsin iren : « Owr ē an » . Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « CHʾem kiter » .
43009013	Pʾarisetsʾinerown tarin zayn , or zhamanagin goyr ēr ,
43009014	ow SHapatʾ ōr ēr , erp Yisows shinetsʾ gawĕ ew patsʾaw anor achʾkʾerĕ .
43009015	Owsti Pʾarisetsʾinern al tartseal gĕ hartsʾnēin iren tʾē inchʾbēs achʾkʾerĕ patsʾowetsʾan , , . An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Gaw traw achʾkʾerows vray , ow lowatsʾowetsʾay ew gĕ tesnem » .
43009016	Owsti Pʾarisetsʾinerēn omankʾ g!ĕsēin : « Ayt martĕ Astowdzmē chʾē , orovhetew chʾi baher SHapatʾ ōrĕ » . Owrishner g!ĕsēin : « Meghawor mart mĕ inchʾbēs grnay ĕnel aysbisi nshanner » : ew baṛagtowm eghaw anontsʾ mēch .
43009017	Tartseal ĕsin goyrin : « Town inchʾ g!ĕses anor masin , or patsʾaw achʾkʾert » . An al ĕsaw : « Markarē mĕn ē » .
43009018	Isg Hreanerĕ chʾēin hawatar tʾē an goyr ēr ew achʾkʾerĕ patsʾowetsʾan , minchʾew or ganchʾetsʾin ayt achʾkʾerĕ patsʾowadz martown dznoghnerĕ ,
43009019	ow hartsʾowtsʾin anontsʾ : « Ays ē tser ortin , orown masin towkʾ g!ĕsēkʾ tʾē goyr dznaw : haba inchʾbēs hima gĕ tesnē » .
43009020	Anor dznoghnerĕ bataskhanetsʾin anontsʾ : « Kitenkʾ tʾē ays ē mer ortin , ew tʾē inkʾ goyr dznaw .
43009021	Paytsʾ hima inchʾ gerbov gĕ tesnē , chʾenkʾ kiter , gam tʾē ov patsʾaw ator achʾkʾerĕ , menkʾ chʾenkʾ kiter : inkʾ chʾapʾahas ē , iren hartsʾowtsʾēkʾ , inkʾ tʾogh khōsi ir masin » .
43009022	Anor dznoghnerĕ ĕsin asiga , orovhetew gĕ vakhnayin Hreanerēn : kʾani or Hreanerĕ artēn miatsaynadz ēin , or etʾē mēgĕ tawani zayn orbēs Kʾristos , vṛntowi zhoghovaranēn .
43009023	Owsti anor dznoghnerĕ ĕsin : « Inkʾ chʾapʾahas ē , iren hartsʾowtsʾēkʾ » .
43009024	Owremn grgin ganchʾetsʾin ayt martĕ , or goyr ēr , ew ĕsin anor : « Pʾaṛkʾ towr Astowdzoy : menkʾ kitenkʾ tʾē ayt martĕ meghawor ē » .
43009025	An al bataskhanetsʾ : « CHʾem kiter tʾē meghawor ē , tʾē ochʾ : mēg pan kitem , tʾē goyr ēi , ow hima gĕ tesnem » .
43009026	Tartseal ĕsin anor : « Inchʾ ĕraw kʾezi , inchʾbēs patsʾaw achʾkʾert » .
43009027	Bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Artēn ĕsi tsezi , ow chʾlsetsʾikʾ : inchʾow g!owzēkʾ tartseal lsel : mitʾē towkʾ al g!owzēkʾ ĕllal anor ashagertnerĕ » .
43009028	Isg anonkʾ heknelov zayn , ĕsin : « Town es anor ashagertĕ , isg menkʾ , Movsēsi ashagertnern enkʾ .
43009029	Menkʾ kitenkʾ tʾē Astowadz khōsetsʾaw Movsēsi : paytsʾ chʾenkʾ kiter tʾē asiga owrgē ē » .
43009030	Martĕ bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Ayt ē zarmanalin , or towkʾ chʾēkʾ kiter tʾē owrgē ē an , tʾēbēt inkʾ patsʾaw im achʾkʾers .
43009031	Kitenkʾ tʾē Astowadz mtig chʾ!ĕner meghawornerown : paytsʾ etʾē mēgĕ astowadzabasht ĕllay ew anor gamkʾĕ kordzatrē , mtig g!ĕnē anor .
43009032	Tarerow sgizpēn i ver lsowadz chʾē , or mēgĕ patsʾadz ĕllay dznowntov goyri mĕ achʾkʾerĕ .
43009033	Etʾē aniga Astowdzmē chʾĕllar , ochʾinchʾ grnar ĕnel » .
43009034	Bataskhanetsʾin anor : « Town ampoghchovin meghkʾerow mēch dznadz es , ow mezi gĕ sorvetsʾnes » , ew vtaretsʾin zayn .
43009035	Yisows lsetsʾ tʾē vtaretsʾin zayn : erp ktaw zayn , ĕsaw anor : « Town gĕ hawatas Astowdzoy Ortiin » .
43009036	An bataskhanetsʾ : « Tēr , ov ē , or hawatam anor » .
43009037	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Tʾē tesar zayn , tʾē al inkʾn ē kʾezi het khōsoghĕ » .
43009038	An al ĕsaw : « Gĕ hawatam , Tēr » , ow ergrbaketsʾ anor .
43009039	Yisows ĕsaw : « Es ays ashkharhĕ egay , tatastani hamar , orbēszi chʾtesnoghnerĕ , tesnen , isg tesnoghnerĕ , gowranan » .
43009040	Pʾarisetsʾinerēn omankʾ , or iren het ēin , lselov asiga , ĕsin iren : « Mitʾē menkʾ al goyr enkʾ » .
43009041	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Etʾē goyr ĕllayikʾ , meghkʾ chʾēikʾ ownenar : paytsʾ hima g!ĕsēkʾ : “ Gĕ tesnenkʾ ” : owremn tser meghkʾĕ gĕ mnay tser vray » .
43010001	« Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ An or tṛnēn chʾi mtner ochʾkharnerown pagĕ , haba owrish teghē gĕ partsranay , aniga kogh ew awazag ē :
43010002	paytsʾ an or tṛnēn gĕ mtnē , ochʾkharnerown hoviwn ē ” .
43010003	Tṛnabanĕ gĕ panay anor , ew ochʾkharnerĕ gĕ lsen anor tsaynĕ : ir ochʾkharnerĕ gĕ ganchʾē irentsʾ anownov ow towrs gĕ hanē zanonkʾ .
43010004	Erp hanē ir ochʾkharnerĕ , g!ertʾay anontsʾ aṛchewēn , ow ochʾkharnerĕ gĕ hetewin iren , orovhetew gĕ janchʾnan ir tsaynĕ .
43010005	Sagayn chʾen hetewir ōtari mĕ , haba gĕ pʾakhchʾin angē , orovhetew chʾen janchʾnar ōtarnerow tsaynĕ » .
43010006	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ ays aṛagĕ , paytsʾ anonkʾ chʾēin hasgnar tʾē inchʾ ēr , or gĕ khōsēr irentsʾ .
43010007	Owremn Yisows tartseal ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Es em ochʾkharnerown towṛĕ ” .
43010008	Polor anonkʾ , or egan intsmē aṛach , kogh ew awazag ēin , paytsʾ ochʾkharnerĕ mtig chʾĕrin anontsʾ .
43010009	“ Es em towṛĕ ” : etʾē mēgĕ ners mtnē intsmē , biti pʾrgowi : biti mtnē ow ellē , ew arōt ktnē .
43010010	Koghĕ owrish pani hamar chʾi kar , paytsʾ miayn , koghnalow , sbannelow ew gorsntsʾnelow hamar . Es egay or geankʾ ownenan , ew jokhowtʾeamp ownenan .
43010011	“ Es em pari hoviwĕ ” : pari hoviwĕ g!ĕndzayē ir antsĕ ochʾkharnerown hamar .
43010012	Paytsʾ vartsganĕ , or hoviw chʾē ew ochʾkharnerĕ ir sepʾaganĕ chʾen , erp tesnē tʾē kaylĕ gow kay , gĕ tʾoghow ochʾkharnerĕ ow gĕ pʾakhchʾi : ew kaylĕ gĕ yapʾshtagē ochʾkharnerĕ ow gĕ tsʾrowē zanonkʾ .
43010013	Ew vartsganĕ gĕ pʾakhchʾi , orovhetew inkʾ vartsgan ē , ow chʾi hokar ochʾkharnerĕ .
43010014	“ Es em pari hoviwĕ ” : gĕ janchʾnam iminners ow gĕ janchʾtsʾowim iminnerēs .
43010015	Inchʾbēs Hayrĕ gĕ janchʾnay zis , es al gĕ janchʾnam Hayrĕ , ew im antss g!ĕndzayem ochʾkharnerown hamar .
43010016	Owrish ochʾkharner al ownim , oronkʾ ays pagēn chʾen : zanonkʾ al bētkʾ ē perem : ow im tsayns biti lsen , ew ĕllan mēg hōt ow mēg hoviw .
43010017	Im Hayrs gĕ sirē zis , kʾani or es im antss g!ĕndzayem , orbēszi tartseal aṛnem zayn .
43010018	Ochʾ mēgĕ g!aṛnē zayn intsmē , haba es intsmē g!ĕndzayem zayn . Ishkhanowtʾiwn ownim ĕndzayelow zayn , ew ishkhanowtʾiwn ownim tartseal aṛnelow zayn : ays batowērĕ statsʾay im Hōrmēs » .
43010019	Ays khōskʾerown hamar , tartseal baṛagtowm eghaw Hreanerown mēch .
43010020	Anontsʾmē shater g!ĕsēin : « Tew gay ator mēch , ow khelakaradz ē : inchʾow mtig g!ĕnēkʾ ator » .
43010021	Owrishner g!ĕsēin : « Ays khōskʾerĕ tiwahari khōskʾer chʾen : mitʾē tewĕ grnay panal goyrerown achʾkʾerĕ » .
43010022	Ayt aten Erowsaghēmi mēch Nawagatikʾi tōnĕ gĕ gatarowēr , , , ow tsmeṛ ēr :
43010023	Yisows gĕ kʾalēr tajarin mēch , Soghomoni srahĕ .
43010024	Owsti Hreanerĕ shrchabatetsʾin zinkʾ ew ĕsin iren : « Minchʾew erp biti mtatanches mez : etʾē Kʾristosĕ town es , patsʾoroshabēs ĕsē mezi » .
43010025	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Ĕsi tsezi , ow chʾēkʾ hawatar . Ayn kordzerĕ , or es g!ĕnem im Hōrs anownov , anonkʾ gĕ vgayen im masis .
43010026	Paytsʾ towkʾ chʾēkʾ hawatar , orovhetew im ochʾkharnerēs chʾēkʾ , inchʾbēs ĕsi tsezi , , .
43010027	Im ochʾkharners gĕ lsen im tsayns , es al gĕ janchʾnam zanonkʾ , ew gĕ hetewin indzi .
43010028	Es gow tam anontsʾ yawitenagan geankʾĕ , ow yawitean biti chʾgorsowin , ew ochʾ mēgĕ biti yapʾshtagē zanonkʾ im tseṛkʾēs .
43010029	Im Hayrs , or indzi towaw zanonkʾ , polorēn medz ē , ow ochʾ mēgĕ grnay yapʾshtagel im Hōrs tseṛkʾēn .
43010030	Es ew Hayrĕ mēg enkʾ » .
43010031	Owsti Hreanerĕ tartseal kʾarer vertsʾowtsʾin , orbēszi kʾargodzen zinkʾ .
43010032	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « SHat pari kordzer tsʾoytsʾ towi tsezi , im Hōrmēs : anontsʾmē or kordzin hamar gĕ kʾargodzēkʾ zis » .
43010033	Hreanerĕ bataskhanetsʾin anor : « Kʾez chʾenkʾ kʾargodzer pari kordzi hamar , haba , hayhoyowtʾean hamar : orovhetew town , or mart es , town kʾez Astowadz g!ĕnes » .
43010034	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Mitʾē tser ōrēnkʾin mēch krowadz chʾē : “ Es ĕsi : " Towkʾ astowadzner ēkʾ " ” .
43010035	Etʾē astowadzner gĕ gochʾē anonkʾ , orontsʾ trowetsʾaw Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ , ( ow gareli chʾē or ayt krowadzĕ awrowi , )
43010036	haba zayn , or Hayrĕ srpatsʾowtsʾ ew ashkharh ghrgetsʾ , towkʾ inchʾbēs g!ĕsēkʾ anor : “ Gĕ hayhoyes ” , orovhetew ĕsi : “ Astowdzoy Orti em ” .
43010037	Etʾē chʾem ĕner im Hōrs kordzerĕ , mi hawatakʾ indzi .
43010038	Isg etʾē g!ĕnem , tʾēbēt chʾēkʾ hawatar indzi , konē kordzerown hawatatsʾēkʾ , orbēszi kitnakʾ ew hawatakʾ tʾē Hayrĕ im mēchs ē , ow es , anor mēch » .
43010039	Tartseal gĕ chanayin tserpagalel zayn : paytsʾ knatsʾ anontsʾ tseṛkʾēn ,
43010040	ew tartseal megnetsʾaw Yortanani miws goghmĕ , ayn teghĕ , owr Yovhannēs nakhabēs gĕ mgrtēr , ow mnatsʾ hon .
43010041	SHater katsʾin anor ew ĕsin : « Iraw Yovhannēs nshan mĕ chʾĕraw :
43010042	paytsʾ inchʾ or Yovhannēs ĕsaw asor masin , amēnĕ jshmarit ēr » . Ow hon shater hawatatsʾin anor .
43011001	Mariami ew anor kʾroch , Martʾayi kiwghēn , Petʾaniayēn , GHazaros anownov mēgĕ hiwant ēr .
43011002	( Asiga ayn Mariamn ēr , or ōdzetsʾ Tērĕ ōdzanelikʾov ow srpetsʾ anor otkʾerĕ ir mazerov : anor eghpayrĕ , GHazaros hiwant ēr . )
43011003	Owremn ir kʾoyrerĕ mart ghrgetsʾin anor ew ĕsin : « Tēr , aha an , or town gĕ sires , hiwant ē » .
43011004	Erp Yisows lsetsʾ , ĕsaw : « Ays hiwantowtʾiwnĕ mahowan hamar chʾē , haba Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾin hamar , orbēszi Astowdzoy Ortin pʾaṛaworowi anov » .
43011005	Artarew Yisows gĕ sirēr Martʾan ew anor kʾoyrn ow GHazarosĕ .
43011006	Owremn erp lsetsʾ tʾē hiwant ē , eghadz teghĕ ergow ōr al mnatsʾ :
43011007	yetoy ĕsaw ashagertnerown : « Egēkʾ , tartseal Hrēastan ertʾankʾ » .
43011008	Ashagertnerĕ ĕsin iren : « Ṛappi , Hreanerĕ hima gĕ pʾntṛēin kʾez , kʾargodzelow hamar , ow tartseal hon g!ertʾas » .
43011009	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « ōrĕ tasnergow zham chʾē . Etʾē mēgĕ tsʾeregĕ kʾalē , chʾi saytʾakʾir , orovhetew ays ashkharhi loysĕ gĕ tesnē :
43011010	paytsʾ etʾē mēgĕ kisherowan mēch kʾalē , gĕ saytʾakʾi , orovhetew iren het loys chʾgay » .
43011011	Ays panerĕ khōselē etkʾ , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « GHazaros , mer paregamĕ , kʾnatsʾadz ē : paytsʾ g!ertʾam , orbēszi artʾntsʾnem zayn » .
43011012	Ir ashagertnerĕ ĕsin : « Tēr , etʾē kʾnatsʾadz ē , biti aṛoghchanay » .
43011013	Yisows gĕ khōsēr anor mahowan masin , paytsʾ anonkʾ gĕ gardzēin tʾē kʾownov hankstanalown masin gĕ khōsēr .
43011014	Ayn aten Yisows patsʾoroshabēs ĕsaw anontsʾ : « GHazaros meṛaw :
43011015	ow es owrakh em tsezi hamar , or hon chʾēi , orbēszi towkʾ hawatakʾ : paytsʾ egēkʾ , ertʾankʾ anor » .
43011016	Tʾovmas , or Ergoworeag gĕ gochʾowēr , ĕsaw ashagertagitsʾnerown : « Menkʾ al ertʾankʾ , orbēszi meṛninkʾ anor het » .
43011017	Erp Yisows egaw , ktaw or an artēn chʾors ōrē i ver kerezmanĕ trowadz ēr .
43011018	Petʾania Erowsaghēmi mōt ēr , tasnhink asbarēzi chʾapʾ :
43011019	ew Hreanerēn shater egadz ēin Martʾayi ow Mariami , orbēszi spʾopʾen zanonkʾ irentsʾ eghpōr hamar .
43011020	Owsti , erp Martʾa lsetsʾ tʾē Yisows gow kay , knatsʾ timaworelow zayn : paytsʾ Mariam nstadz ēr tan mēch .
43011021	Martʾa ĕsaw Yisowsi : « Tēr , etʾē hos ĕllayir , eghpayrs chʾēr meṛner :
43011022	Paytsʾ kitem tʾē hima al , town inchʾ or khntres Astowdzmē , Astowadz biti tay kʾezi » .
43011023	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Eghpayrt yarowtʾiwn biti aṛnē » .
43011024	Martʾa ĕsaw anor : « Kitem tʾē yarowtʾean zhamanagĕ , verchin ōrĕ , yarowtʾiwn biti aṛnē » .
43011025	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Es em yarowtʾiwnn ow geankʾĕ . An or gĕ hawatay indzi , tʾēew meṛni , biti abri :
43011026	Ew ov or g!abri ew gĕ hawatay indzi , yawitean biti chʾmeṛni . Town gĕ hawatas asor » .
43011027	Ĕsaw anor : « Ayo , Tēr , es gĕ hawatam tʾē town es Kʾristosĕ , Astowdzoy Ortin , or ashkharh biti kar » .
43011028	Erp ĕsaw asiga , knatsʾ , ow dzadzgapar ganchʾetsʾ ir kʾoyrĕ , Mariamĕ , ĕselov : « Vartabetĕ egadz ē , ew gĕ ganchʾē kʾez » .
43011029	Erp an lsetsʾ , showtov otkʾi elaw ow egaw anor kʾov .
43011030	Yisows teṛ egadz chʾēr kiwghĕ , haba ayn teghn ēr , owr Martʾa timaworetsʾ zinkʾ .
43011031	Paytsʾ Hreanerĕ , or tan mēch ēin anor het ew gĕ spʾopʾēin zayn , erp tesan tʾē Mariam showtov ganknetsʾaw ow knatsʾ , irenkʾ al hetewetsʾan anor , ĕselov : « Kerezmanĕ g!ertʾay , orbēszi hon lay » .
43011032	Isg Mariam , erp hasaw Yisowsi eghadz teghĕ ow tesaw zinkʾ , anor otkʾĕ iynalov , ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , etʾē hos ĕllayir , eghpayrs chʾēr meṛner » .
43011033	Owremn erp Yisows tesaw zayn , or gow lar , ew anor het egogh Hreanerĕ , oronkʾ gow layin , srtoghetsʾaw ir hokiin mēch ow vrtovetsʾaw ,
43011034	ew ĕsaw : « Owr tradz ēkʾ zayn » . Ĕsin iren : « Tēr , egowr ow tes » .
43011035	Yisows latsʾaw .
43011036	Owsti Hreanerĕ g!ĕsēin : « Nayetsʾēkʾ , orchʾapʾ gĕ sirēr zayn » .
43011037	Anontsʾmē omankʾ al g!ĕsēin : « Asiga , or goyrin achʾkʾerĕ patsʾaw , chʾēr grnar aynbēs ĕnel , or ays al chʾmeṛnēr » .
43011038	Owremn Yisows , tartseal srtoghelov inkʾnir mēch , knatsʾ kerezman : an kʾarayr mĕn ēr , orown vray kʾar mĕ trowadz ēr .
43011039	Yisows ĕsaw : « Vertsʾowtsʾēkʾ ayt kʾarĕ » . Meṛelin kʾoyrĕ , Martʾa , ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , artēn nekhadz biti ĕllay , orovhetew chʾors ōrowan ē » .
43011040	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Kʾezi chʾĕsi tʾē biti tesnes Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾĕ , etʾē hawatas » .
43011041	Owsti vertsʾowtsʾin kʾarĕ . Yisows partsratsʾowtsʾ ir achʾkʾerĕ ew ĕsaw : « Hayr , shnorhagal em kʾezmē , or lsetsʾir zis .
43011042	Ow es kitēi tʾē amēn aten gĕ lses zis : paytsʾ ĕsi showrchs gaynogh pazmowtʾean hamar , orbēszi hawatan tʾē town ghrgetsʾir zis » .
43011043	Asiga ĕselēn etkʾ , partsratsayn boṛatsʾ : « GHazaros , towrs egowr » .
43011044	Meṛeln al elaw , otkʾern ow tseṛkʾerĕ batankʾov gabowadz , ew tēmkʾĕ , varshamagov batowadz . Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Artsagetsʾēkʾ zinkʾ , ow tʾoyl towēkʾ or ertʾay » .
43011045	Hreanerēn shater , or egadz ēin Mariami kʾov , erp tesan Yisowsi ĕradzĕ , hawatatsʾin iren .
43011046	Paytsʾ anontsʾmē omankʾ katsʾin Pʾarisetsʾinerown ow batmetsʾin anontsʾ Yisowsi ĕradzĕ .
43011047	Owsti kʾahanayabetnern ow Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ zhoghov kowmaretsʾin , , ew ĕsin : « Inchʾ ĕnenkʾ , kʾani or ays martĕ pazmatʾiw nshanner g!ĕnē .
43011048	Etʾē tʾoyl tankʾ anor , or aysbēs sharownagē , polorn al biti hawatan anor , ow Hṛomayetsʾinerĕ biti kan ew gordzanen mer teghn ow azkĕ » .
43011049	Anontsʾmē mēgĕ , Gayiapʾa anownov , or ayt tarowan kʾahanayabetn ēr , ĕsaw anontsʾ :
43011050	« Towkʾ ochʾinchʾ kitēkʾ , ow chʾēkʾ al mtadzer tʾē aweli ōktagar ē mezi , or mēg mart meṛni zhoghovowrtin hamar , ew ampoghch azkĕ chʾgorsowi » .
43011051	Paytsʾ ays panĕ ochʾ tʾē inkʾnirmē ĕsaw , haba ayt tarowan kʾahanayabetĕ ĕllalov , markarēatsʾaw tʾē Yisows biti meṛnēr azkin hamar :
43011052	ew ochʾ miayn azkin hamar , ayl naew hawakʾelov miatsʾnelow hamar Astowdzoy tsʾrowadz ortinerĕ .
43011053	Owremn ayt ōrēn etkʾ khorhrtagtsʾetsʾan , or sbannen zayn .
43011054	Owsti al Yisows patsʾoroshabēs chʾēr shrcher Hreanerown mēch , haba angē knatsʾ anabatin mōt ergramas mĕ , kʾaghakʾ mĕ , or Epʾrayim gĕ gochʾowēr , ew hon getsʾaw ir ashagertnerown het .
43011055	Erp Hreanerown Zatigĕ mōtetsʾaw , ayt ergramasēn shater Erowsaghēm partsratsʾan Zatigēn aṛach , orbēszi makʾrakordzen irenkʾ zirenkʾ .
43011056	Owsti gĕ pʾntṛēin Yisowsĕ , ow tajarin mēch getsʾadz aten , g!ĕsēin irarow : « Inchʾ ē tser gardzikʾĕ : arteōkʾ pnaw biti chʾkay ays tōnin » .
43011057	Isg kʾahanayabetnern ow Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ batowirer ēin , or etʾē mēgĕ kitnay anor owr ĕllalĕ , tsʾoytsʾ tay , orbēszi tserpagalen zayn .
43012001	Isg Yisows Zatigēn vetsʾ ōr aṛach egaw Petʾania , owr gĕ ktnowēr meṛadz GHazarosĕ , or inkʾ meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanetsʾ .
43012002	Hon , ĕntʾrikʾ mĕ sarkʾetsʾin anor : Martʾa gĕ sbasargēr , ow GHazaros anor het seghan nstoghnerēn , , mēgn ēr .
43012003	Isg Mariam , aṛnelov mēg litr tʾangakin nartosi ōdzanelikʾ , ōdzetsʾ Yisowsi otkʾerĕ , ew srpetsʾ anor otkʾerĕ ir mazerov : ow townĕ letsʾowetsʾaw ōdzanelikʾin hotov .
43012004	Owsti ashagertnerēn mēgĕ , Isgariovtatsʾi Simonean Yowta , or biti matnēr zinkʾ , ĕsaw :
43012005	« Inchʾow ayt ōdzanelikʾĕ chʾdzakhowetsʾaw erekʾ hariwr tahegani , or trowēr aghkʾatnerown » .
43012006	Asiga ĕsaw , ochʾ tʾē aghkʾatnerĕ hokalown hamar , haba , kʾani or kogh ēr ew inkʾ ownēr kantsanagĕ , ow gĕ grēr inchʾ or tskowēr .
43012007	Isg Yisows ĕsaw : « Tʾoyl towr anor : ayt panĕ bahetsʾ im tʾaghowmis ōrowan hamar .
43012008	Orovhetew aghkʾatnerĕ amēn aten ownikʾ tsezi het , paytsʾ zis amēn aten chʾownikʾ » .
43012009	Owsti Hreanerēn medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ kittsʾaw anor hon ĕllalĕ , ow egaw , ochʾ miayn Yisowsi hamar , ayl naew tesnelow GHazarosĕ , or meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanadz ēr .
43012010	Isg kʾahanayabetnerĕ khorhrtagtsʾetsʾan , or sbannen GHazarosn al :
43012011	orovhetew Hreanerēn shater anor batjaṛov g!ertʾayin ow gĕ hawatayin Yisowsi .
43012012	Heteweal ōrĕ , medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ , or egadz ēr tōnin , erp lsetsʾ tʾē Yisows gow kay Erowsaghēm ,
43012013	aṛaw armawenii oster , towrs elaw zayn timaworelow , ew g!aghaghagēr : « Ovsanna , ōrhneal ē Israyēli tʾakaworĕ , or gow kay Tēroch anownov » .
43012014	Yisows , ktnelov awanag mĕ , nstaw anor vray , inchʾbēs krowadz ē :
43012015	« Mi vakhnar , Sioni aghchig : aha Tʾakawort gow kay , nstadz ishow awanagi vray » .
43012016	Anor ashagertnerĕ nakhabēs chʾhasgtsʾan ayt panerĕ : paytsʾ erp Yisows pʾaṛaworowetsʾaw , ayn aten yishetsʾin tʾē atonkʾ krowadz ēin anor masin , ew tʾē irenkʾ ĕrin anor ayt panerĕ .
43012017	Iren het eghogh pazmowtʾiwnĕ gĕ vgayēr tʾē kerezmanēn towrs ganchʾetsʾ GHazarosĕ ow meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanetsʾ zayn .
43012018	Ays batjaṛov al pazmowtʾiwnĕ timaworetsʾ zinkʾ , orovhetew lsetsʾin tʾē inkʾ ĕradz ēr ays nshanĕ .
43012019	Isg Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ g!ĕsēin irarow : « Gĕ nshmarēkʾ tʾē anōkowt ē : aha ampoghch ashkharhĕ gĕ hetewi anor , , » .
43012020	Hon , tōnin ergrbakelow partsratsʾoghnerown mēch , kʾani mĕ Yoyner gayin .
43012021	Asonkʾ mōtetsʾan Pʾilibbosi , or Kalileayi Petʾsayitayēn ēr , ow gĕ tʾakhantsēin anor , ĕselov : « Tēr , g!owzenkʾ Yisowsĕ tesnel » .
43012022	Pʾilibbos egaw ew ĕsaw Antrēasi , aba tartseal Antrēas ow Pʾilibbos miasin ĕsin Yisowsi .
43012023	Yisows al bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « ZHamĕ hasaw , or martow Ortin pʾaṛaworowi .
43012024	Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Etʾē tsʾorenin hatigĕ hoghin mēch iynalov chʾmeṛni , inkʾ minag gĕ mnay : paytsʾ etʾē meṛni , shat btowgh gĕ perē ” .
43012025	An or gĕ sirē ir antsĕ , biti gorsntsʾnē zayn , ew an or g!atē ir antsĕ ays ashkharhi mēch , yawitenagan geankʾin hamar biti bahē zayn .
43012026	Etʾē mēgĕ gĕ sbasargē indzi , tʾogh hetewi indzi : ow es owr or em , im sbasargows al hon biti ĕllay : etʾē mēgĕ gĕ sbasargē indzi , Hayrĕ biti batowē zinkʾ » .
43012027	« Hima im antss vrtovadz ē , ew inchʾ ĕsem : “ Hayr , azatē zis ays zhamēn ” . Paytsʾ es egadz em asor hamar , ays zhamown .
43012028	“ Hayr , pʾaṛaworē kʾow anownt ” » . Owsti tsayn mĕ egaw erginkʾēn : « Pʾaṛaworetsʾi al , ow tartseal biti pʾaṛaworem » .
43012029	Pazmowtʾiwnĕ , or gaynadz ēr ow gĕ lsēr , g!ĕsēr : « Orotowm g!ĕllay » . Omankʾ al g!ĕsēin : « Hreshtag mĕ khōsetsʾaw iren het » .
43012030	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « Ays tsaynĕ egaw ochʾ tʾē indzi hamar , haba , tsezi hamar .
43012031	Hima ē ays ashkharhi tatastanĕ , hima biti vtarowi ays ashkharhi ishkhanĕ .
43012032	Es al , erp partsranam ergrēn , polort al biti kʾashem indzi » .
43012033	Ays panĕ g!ĕsēr , matnanshelov tʾē inchʾ tesag mahov biti meṛnēr .
43012034	Pazmowtʾiwnĕ bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Menkʾ lsetsʾinkʾ ōrēnkʾēn tʾē Kʾristos yawitean gĕ mnay . Town inchʾbēs g!ĕses : “ Martow Ortin bētkʾ ē partsranay ” . Ov ē ayt martow Ortin » .
43012035	Owsti Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Kʾichʾ mĕ aten al loysĕ tsezi het ē : kʾaletsʾēkʾ , minchʾ tagawin loysĕ ownikʾ , orbēszi khawarĕ chʾhasni tser vray : orovhetew khawari mēch kʾaloghĕ chʾi kiter tʾē owr g!ertʾay .
43012036	Minchʾ loysĕ ownikʾ , hawatatsʾēkʾ ayt loysin , orbēszi loysi ortiner ĕllakʾ » . Yisows ays panerĕ khōsetsʾaw , aba knatsʾ , inkʾzinkʾ dzadzgelov anontsʾ achʾkʾerēn .
43012037	Tʾēbēt aynkʾan nshanner ĕradz ēr anontsʾ aṛchew , anonkʾ chʾēin hawatar iren :
43012038	orbēszi irakordzowi Esayi markarēin khōskʾĕ , or ĕsadz ēr : « Tēr , ov hawatatsʾ mer towadz lowrin , ow Tēroch pazowgĕ orown yaytnowetsʾaw » .
43012039	CHʾēin grnar hawatal , kʾani or Esayi tartseal ĕsadz ē :
43012040	« Gowrtsʾowtsʾ anontsʾ achʾkʾerĕ ew gardzratsʾowtsʾ anontsʾ sirtĕ , orbēszi chʾtesnen irentsʾ achʾkʾerov , chʾhasgnan irentsʾ sirtov ow tartsi chʾkan , ew es chʾp zhshgem zanonkʾ » .
43012041	Esayi ĕsaw asiga , erp tesaw anor pʾaṛkʾĕ ow khōsetsʾaw anor masin .
43012042	Sagayn mia zhamanag , beterēn al shater hawatatsʾin iren : paytsʾ chʾēin tawaner zayn , Pʾarisetsʾinerown batjaṛov , orbēszi chʾvṛntowin zhoghovaranēn :
43012043	orovhetew aweli siretsʾin martotsʾ pʾaṛkʾĕ , kʾan Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾĕ .
43012044	Yisows g!aghaghagēr : « An or gĕ hawatay indzi , gĕ hawatay ochʾ tʾē indzi , haba , zis ghrgoghin :
43012045	ew an or gĕ tesnē zis , gĕ tesnē zis ghrgoghĕ .
43012046	Es ashkharh egay ipr loys , orbēszi ov or hawatay indzi , chʾmnay khawari mēch .
43012047	Etʾē mēgĕ lsē im khōskʾers ow chʾhawatay , es chʾem tater zinkʾ , kʾani or es egay , ochʾ tʾē tatelow ashkharhĕ , haba , pʾrgelow ashkharhĕ .
43012048	An or g!anarkē zis ew chʾ!ĕntownir im khōskʾers , owni mēgĕ , or gĕ tatē zinkʾ : ayn khōskʾĕ , or es ĕsi , aniga biti tatē zinkʾ , verchin ōrĕ .
43012049	Orovhetew es intsmē chʾkhōsetsʾay , haba Hayrĕ , or ghrgetsʾ zis , inkʾ batowiretsʾ indzi tʾē inchʾ biti ĕsem ew inchʾ biti khōsim .
43012050	Ew kitem tʾē anor batowiradzĕ , yawitenagan geankʾn ē : owremn inchʾ or gĕ khōsim , aynbēs gĕ khōsim , inchʾbēs Hayrĕ ĕsaw indzi » .
43013001	Zatigi tōnēn aṛach , Yisows , kitnalov tʾē ir zhamĕ hasadz ē , or megni ays ashkharhēn Hōrĕ kʾov , siradz ĕllalov irennerĕ , oronkʾ ashkharhi mēch ēin , siretsʾ zanonkʾ minchʾew vakhjanĕ .
43013002	Erp ĕntʾrikʾĕ g!ĕllar , ( CHʾarakhōsĕ artēn Isgariovtatsʾi Simonean Yowtan trtadz ēr , or matnē zayn , )
43013003	Yisows , kitnalov tʾē Hayrĕ amēn pan towaw ir tseṛkʾĕ , ew tʾē inkʾ egaw Astowdzmē ow g!ertʾay Astowdzoy kʾov ,
43013004	otkʾi elaw ĕntʾrikʾēn , mēgti traw hantertsnerĕ , ew aṛnelov ghenchag mĕ , gabetsʾ mēchkʾin .
43013005	Yetoy chowr letsʾowtsʾ gonkʾin mēch , ew sgsaw lowal ashagertnerown otkʾerĕ ow srpel mēchkʾin gabadz ghenchagov .
43013006	Owsti egaw Simon Betrosi : an al ĕsaw iren : « Tēr , town biti lowas im otkʾers » .
43013007	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Inchʾ or es g!ĕnem , town hima chʾes ĕmpṛner , paytsʾ yetoy biti ĕmpṛnes » .
43013008	Betros ĕsaw anor : « Town pnaw biti chʾlowas im otkʾers » . Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Etʾē chʾlowam kʾez , town pa zhin chʾownis indzi het » .
43013009	Simon Betros ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , ochʾ miayn otkʾers , ayl naew , tseṛkʾers ow klowkhs » .
43013010	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « An or loktsʾadz ē , miayn otkʾerĕ lowalow bētkʾ owni , or ampoghchovin makʾowr ĕllay : ew towkʾ makʾowr ēkʾ , paytsʾ ochʾ polort » .
43013011	Artarew kitēr tʾē ov biti matnēr zinkʾ . Owsti ĕsaw : « Polort makʾowr chʾēkʾ » .
43013012	Erp lowatsʾ anontsʾ otkʾerĕ , ew aṛnelov ir hantertsnerĕ , tartseal seghan nstaw , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Kitēkʾ inchʾ ĕri tsezi .
43013013	Towkʾ Vartabet ow Tēr gĕ gochʾēkʾ zis , ew jisht g!ĕsēkʾ , orovhetew aynbēs em .
43013014	Owsti etʾē es , Tērs ow Vartabets , lowatsʾi tser otkʾerĕ , towkʾ al bartawor ēkʾ lowal irarow otkʾerĕ .
43013015	Orovhetew ōrinag mĕ towi tsezi , orbēszi inchʾbēs es ĕri tsezi , towkʾ al ĕnēkʾ .
43013016	Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ DZaṛan ir tirochmēn medz chʾē , ochʾ al ghrgowadzĕ , zinkʾ ghrgoghēn medz ē ” .
43013017	Etʾē kitēkʾ ays panerĕ , eraneli ēkʾ , etʾē ĕnēkʾ zanonkʾ .
43013018	Es gĕ khōsim , ochʾ tʾē tser polorin hamar , orovhetew es gĕ janchʾnam im ĕntradzners : haba , orbēszi irakordzowi ayn krowadzĕ : “ An or hatsʾ g!owtēr indzi het , growng vertsʾowtsʾ indzi tēm ” .
43013019	Ay zhmēn g!ĕsem tsezi , ĕllalēn aṛach , orbēszi erp ĕllay , hawatakʾ tʾē es an em .
43013020	Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Ov or ĕntowni an , or es gĕ ghrgem , g!ĕntowni zis , ew ov or g!ĕntowni zis , g!ĕntowni zis ghrgoghĕ ” » .
43013021	Erp Yisows ĕsaw asiga , vrtovetsʾaw ir hokiin mēch , ew vgayetsʾ , ĕselov : « Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi tʾē tsezmē mēgĕ biti matnē zis » .
43013022	Owsti ashagertnerĕ irarow gĕ nayēin , varanadz , tʾē orow masin gĕ khōsēr .
43013023	Ashagertnerēn mēgĕ gar , Yisowsi kʾov nstadz , or Yisows gĕ sirēr .
43013024	Owremn Simon Betros nshan g!ĕnēr anor , hartsʾapʾortselow tʾē ov biti ĕllay an , orown masin gĕ khōsēr .
43013025	An al , iynalov Yisowsi gowrdzkʾin vray , ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , ov ē aniga » .
43013026	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « An ē , orown tʾatʾkhelov gow tam ays bataṛĕ » . Ew tʾatʾkhelov bataṛĕ , towaw Isgariovtatsʾi Simonean Yowtayi .
43013027	Bataṛēn etkʾ , Satanan mtaw anor nersĕ : owsti Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Inchʾ or biti ĕnes , showtov ĕrē » .
43013028	Paytsʾ seghan nstoghnerēn ochʾ mēgĕ hasgtsʾaw tʾē inchʾow ĕsaw anor asiga :
43013029	orovhetew omankʾ gĕ gardzēin tʾē kʾani or Yowta ownēr kantsanagĕ , Yisows g!ĕsēr anor : « Knē inchʾ or bētkʾ ē mezi ays tōnin » : gam , orbēszi pan mĕ tay aghkʾatnerown .
43013030	An al , stanalov bataṛĕ , isgoyn towrs elaw : sagayn kisher ēr .
43013031	Erp an towrs elaw , Yisows ĕsaw : « Hima martow Ortin pʾaṛaworowetsʾaw , ew Astowadz pʾaṛaworowetsʾaw anov .
43013032	Etʾē Astowadz pʾaṛaworowetsʾaw anov , Astowadz al irmov biti pʾaṛaworē zayn , ow showtov biti pʾaṛaworē zayn .
43013033	Orteagner , kʾichʾ mĕ aten al tsezi het em : biti pʾntṛēkʾ zis , ew inchʾbēs Hreanerown ĕsi : “ Towkʾ chʾēkʾ grnar kal owr or es g!ertʾam ” , hima tsezi al g!ĕsem .
43013034	Nor batowiran mĕ gow tam tsezi : “ Siretsʾēkʾ zirar ” : inchʾbēs es siretsʾi tsez , towkʾ al siretsʾēkʾ zirar .
43013035	Asov polorĕ biti kitnan tʾē im ashagertners ēkʾ , etʾē sēr ownenakʾ irarow hantēb » .
43013036	Simon Betros ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , owr g!ertʾas » . Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Owr or es g!ertʾam , town hima chʾes grnar hetewil indzi : paytsʾ yetoy biti hetewis indzi » .
43013037	Betros ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , inchʾow hima chʾem grnar hetewil kʾezi : es im antss al biti ĕndzayem kʾezi hamar » .
43013038	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Kʾow antst biti ĕndzayes indzi hamar . Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem kʾezi : “ Akʾaghaghĕ biti chʾganchʾē , minchʾew or town erekʾ ankam owranas zis ” » .
43014001	« TSer sirtĕ tʾogh chʾvrtovi : hawatatsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy , hawatatsʾēkʾ naew indzi .
43014002	SHat pnagaranner gan im Hōrs tan mēch : etʾē aytbēs chʾĕllar , mitʾē biti ĕsēi tsezi tʾē g!ertʾam , or tegh batrastem tsezi .
43014003	Erp ertʾam ew tegh batrastem tsezi , tartseal biti kam ow kʾovs ĕntownim tsez , orbēszi owr es em , towkʾ al hon ĕllakʾ .
43014004	Kitēkʾ owr g!ertʾam , kitēkʾ naew jampan » .
43014005	Tʾovmas ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , chʾenkʾ kiter owr g!ertʾas , ew inchʾbēs grnankʾ kitnal jampan » .
43014006	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Es em jampan , jshmartowtʾiwnn ow geankʾĕ : ochʾ mēgĕ gow kay Hōrĕ kʾov , paytsʾ miayn intsmov .
43014007	Etʾē janchʾnayikʾ zis , biti janchʾnayikʾ naew im Hayrs : ew ay zhmēn isg gĕ janchʾnakʾ zayn , ow tesadz ēkʾ zayn » .
43014008	Pʾilibbos ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , tsʾoytsʾ towr mezi Hayrĕ , ow gĕ pawē mezi » .
43014009	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Ayskʾan zhamanag es tsezi het em , ew chʾjanchʾtsʾar zis , Pʾilibbos . An or tesaw zis , tesaw Hayrĕ : town inchʾbēs g!ĕses : “ TSʾoytsʾ towr mezi Hayrĕ ” .
43014010	CHʾes hawatar tʾē es Hōrĕ mēchn em , ow Hayrĕ im mēchs ē . Ayn khōskʾerĕ , or g!ĕsem tsezi , es intsmē chʾem ĕser : haba Hayrĕ , or pnagadz ē im mēchs , aniga g!ĕnē ayt kordzerĕ .
43014011	Hawatatsʾēkʾ indzi , tʾē es Hōrĕ mēchn em , ow Hayrĕ im mēchs ē .
43014012	Aylabēs , konē kordzerown hamar hawatatsʾēkʾ indzi . Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ An or gĕ hawatay indzi , inkʾ al biti ĕnē ayn kordzerĕ , or es g!ĕnem , ew anontsʾmē aweli medz kordzer biti ĕnē , orovhetew es g!ertʾam Hōrs kʾov ” .
43014013	Inchʾ or khntrēkʾ im anownovs , biti ĕnem zayn , orbēszi Hayrĕ pʾaṛaworowi Ortiov .
43014014	Etʾē orewē pan khntrēkʾ im anownovs , biti ĕnem » .
43014015	« Etʾē gĕ sirēkʾ zis , bahetsʾēkʾ im batowiranners .
43014016	Es al biti tʾakhantsem Hōrĕ , ew owrish Mkhitʾarichʾ mĕ biti tay tsezi , orbēszi yawitean pnagi tsezi het : -
43014017	Jshmartowtʾean Hokin , or ays ashkharhĕ chʾi grnar ĕntownil , orovhetew chʾi tesner zayn ow chʾi janchʾnar zayn : paytsʾ towkʾ gĕ janchʾnakʾ zayn , orovhetew gĕ pnagi tser kʾov ew biti ĕllay tser mēch .
43014018	TSez orp biti chʾtʾoghowm : biti kam tsezi .
43014019	Kʾichʾ mĕ atenēn etkʾ ashkharhĕ al biti chʾtesnē zis : paytsʾ towkʾ biti tesnēkʾ zis , orovhetew es g!abrim , ew towkʾ al biti abrikʾ .
43014020	Ayn ōrĕ biti kitnakʾ tʾē es im Hōrs mēch em , ow towkʾ , im mēchs , es al , tser mēch .
43014021	An or owni im batowiranners ew gĕ bahē zanonkʾ , aniga ē zis siroghĕ . An or gĕ sirē zis , biti sirowi im Hōrmēs : ow es biti sirem zayn , ew zis biti yaytnem anor » .
43014022	Yowta ( ochʾ Isgariovtatsʾin ) ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , inchʾbēs g!ĕllay , or town kʾez biti yaytnes mezi , paytsʾ ochʾ , ashkharhin » .
43014023	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Etʾē mēgĕ sirē zis , biti bahē im khōskʾs , ow im Hayrs biti sirē zayn : ew biti kankʾ anor ow pnaginkʾ anor het .
43014024	An or chʾi sirer zis , chʾi baher im khōskʾers . Ayn khōskʾĕ or gĕ lsēkʾ , ims chʾē , haba Hōrs , or ghrgetsʾ zis .
43014025	Ays panerĕ khōsetsʾay tsezi , kʾani teṛ gĕ mnam tser kʾov .
43014026	Paytsʾ Mkhitʾarichʾĕ , Sowrp Hokin , or Hayrĕ biti ghrgē im anownovs , aniga biti sorvetsʾnē tsezi amēnĕ , ew inchʾ or ĕsi tsezi , biti yishetsʾnē tsezi .
43014027	KHaghaghowtʾiwn gĕ tʾoghowm tsezi , im khaghaghowtʾiwns gow tam tsezi : es chʾem tar tsezi aynbēs , inchʾbēs ashkharhĕ gow tay . TSer sirtĕ tʾogh chʾvrtovi ow chʾergnchʾi .
43014028	Lsetsʾikʾ tʾē ĕsi tsezi : “ Es g!ertʾam , paytsʾ tartseal biti kam tsezi ” . Etʾē sirēikʾ zis , biti owrakhanayikʾ , or es g!ertʾam Hōrĕ kʾov , orovhetew im Hayrs intsmē medz ē .
43014029	Ew ay zhmēn , teṛ chʾeghadz , ĕsi tsezi , orbēszi erp ĕllay , hawatakʾ .
43014030	Al shat biti chʾkhōsim tsezi het , orovhetew ays ashkharhi ishkhanĕ gow kay : paytsʾ ochʾ mēg heghinagowtʾiwn owni im vras .
43014031	Sagayn ashkharhĕ tʾogh kitnay tʾē es gĕ sirem Hayrĕ , ew g!ĕnem aynbēs , inchʾbēs Hayrĕ batowiretsʾ indzi . Otkʾi elēkʾ , ertʾankʾ asgē » .
43015001	« Es em jshmarit ortʾatowngĕ , ew im Hayrs , mshagn ē .
43015002	Amēn jiwgh , or im vras ē ow btowgh chʾi perer , gĕ vertsʾnē zayn : isg amēn jiwgh or btowgh gĕ perē , gĕ makʾrē zayn , orbēszi al aweli btowgh perē .
43015003	Towkʾ artēn makʾowr ēkʾ ayn khōskʾov , or ĕsi tsezi .
43015004	Im mēchs mnatsʾēkʾ , ow es , tser mēch : inchʾbēs jiwghĕ chʾi grnar inkʾnirmē btowgh perel , etʾē ortʾatowngin vray chʾmnay , noynbēs al towkʾ chʾēkʾ grnar , etʾē im mēchs chʾmnakʾ .
43015005	Es ortʾatowngn em , ew towkʾ jiwghern ēkʾ : an or im mēchs gĕ mnay , ow es , anor mēch , aniga shat btowgh biti perē , orovhetew aṛantsʾ indzi ochʾinchʾ grnakʾ ĕnel .
43015006	Etʾē mēgĕ im mēchs chʾmnay , an towrs gĕ netowi , jiwghi mĕ bēs , ew gĕ chʾornay : zanonkʾ gĕ zhoghven ow gragĕ gĕ neten , ew anonkʾ g!ayrin .
43015007	Etʾē towkʾ mnakʾ im mēchs , ow im khōskʾers al mnan tser mēch , inchʾ or owzēkʾ , biti khntrēkʾ , ew biti ĕllay tsezi .
43015008	Im Hayrs gĕ pʾaṛaworowi , erp towkʾ shat btowgh perēkʾ : aysbēs , im ashagertners g!ĕllakʾ .
43015009	Inchʾbēs Hayrĕ siretsʾ zis , es al siretsʾi tsez : mnatsʾēkʾ im siroys mēch .
43015010	Etʾē bahēkʾ im batowiranners , biti mnakʾ im siroys mēch , inchʾbēs es bahetsʾi im Hōrs batowirannerĕ ew gĕ mnam anor siroyn mēch .
43015011	Ays panerĕ khōsetsʾay tsezi , orbēszi im owrakhowtʾiwns mnay tser mēch , ow tser owrakhowtʾiwnĕ lman ĕllay .
43015012	Sa ē im batowirans , or sirēkʾ zirar , inchʾbēs es siretsʾi tsez .
43015013	Ochʾ mēgĕ owni aweli medz sēr , kʾan ayn , erp mēgĕ g!ĕndzayē ir antsĕ ir paregamnerown hamar .
43015014	Towkʾ im paregamners ēkʾ , etʾē ĕnēkʾ inchʾ or es gĕ batowirem tsezi .
43015015	Aylews dzaṛay chʾem gochʾer tsez , orovhetew dzaṛan chʾi kiter tʾē ir tērĕ inchʾ g!ĕnē : haba es paregam gochʾetsʾi tsez , orovhetew amēn inchʾ or lsetsʾi im Hōrmēs , kittsʾowtsʾi tsezi .
43015016	Ochʾ tʾē towkʾ ĕntretsʾikʾ zis , haba es ĕntretsʾi tsez , ow nshanagetsʾi tsez , orbēszi ertʾakʾ ew btowgh perēkʾ , ow tser btowghĕ mnay : orbēszi inchʾ or khntrēkʾ Hōrmēn , im anownovs , tay tsezi .
43015017	Asiga gĕ batowirem tsezi , or sirēkʾ zirar » .
43015018	« Etʾē ashkharhĕ g!atē tsez , kittsʾēkʾ tʾē atetsʾ zis tsezmē aṛach .
43015019	Etʾē ashkharhēn eghadz ĕllayikʾ , ashkharhĕ gĕ sirēr irennerĕ : paytsʾ kʾani or ashkharhēn chʾēkʾ , haba es tsez ĕntretsʾi ashkharhēn , ashkharhĕ g!atē tsez .
43015020	Yishetsʾēkʾ ayn khōskʾĕ , or ĕsi tsezi : “ DZaṛan ir tirochmēn medz chʾē ” : etʾē haladzetsʾin zis , biti haladzen naew tsez : etʾē bahetsʾin im khōskʾs , biti bahen naew tserĕ .
43015021	Paytsʾ ays polor panerĕ biti ĕnen tsezi , im anownis hamar , orovhetew chʾjanchʾtsʾan an , or ghrgetsʾ zis .
43015022	Etʾē es egadz ew khōsadz chʾĕllayi anontsʾ , meghkʾ chʾēin ownenar : paytsʾ hima batrowag mĕ chʾownin irentsʾ meghkʾin .
43015023	An or g!atē zis , g!atē naew im Hayrs .
43015024	Etʾē irentsʾ mēch ĕradz chʾĕllayi ayn kordzerĕ , or owrish ochʾ mēgĕ ĕradz ē , anonkʾ meghkʾ chʾēin ownenar : paytsʾ hima tesan ew atetsʾin zis al , im Hayrs al .
43015025	Sagayn atiga eghaw , orbēszi irakordzowi ayn khōskʾĕ , or krowadz ē irentsʾ ōrēnkʾin mēch : “ Zowr teghĕ atetsʾin zis ” .
43015026	Paytsʾ erp Mkhitʾarichʾĕ kay , or es Hōrmēn biti ghrgem tsezi , Jshmartowtʾean Hokin , or gĕ pkhi Hōrmēn , aniga biti vgayē im masis .
43015027	Ew towkʾ al gĕ vgayēkʾ , orovhetew sgizpēn i ver indzi het ēkʾ » .
43016001	« Ays panerĕ khōsetsʾay tsezi , orbēszi chʾkaytʾagghikʾ .
43016002	Irentsʾ zhoghovarannerēn biti vṛnten tsez : noynisg zhamĕ biti kay , erp ov or sbannē tsez , aynbēs biti gardzē tʾē bashtamownkʾ gĕ gatarē Astowdzoy .
43016003	Ew ays panerĕ biti ĕnen tsezi , orovhetew ochʾ Hayrĕ janchʾtsʾan , ochʾ al , zis .
43016004	Paytsʾ ays panerĕ khōsetsʾay tsezi , orbēszi erp zhamĕ kay , yishēkʾ tʾē es ĕsi tsezi . Asonkʾ sgizpēn chʾĕsi tsezi , orovhetew tsezi het ēi » .
43016005	« Sagayn hima g!ertʾam zis ghrgoghin kʾov , ew tsezmē ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ hartsʾnē indzi : “ Owr g!ertʾas ” .
43016006	Paytsʾ kʾani or ays panerĕ khōsetsʾay tsezi , tser sirtĕ trtmowtʾeamp letsʾowetsʾaw .
43016007	Sagayn es jshmartowtʾiwnĕ g!ĕsem tsezi : “ Aweli ōktagar ē tsezi , etʾē es ertʾam ” . Orovhetew etʾē chʾertʾam , Mkhitʾarichʾĕ chʾi kar tsezi : isg etʾē megnim , zinkʾ biti ghrgem tsezi .
43016008	Ow erp inkʾ kay , biti gshtampē ashkharhĕ meghkʾi hamar , artarowtʾean hamar ow tatastani hamar .
43016009	Meghkʾi hamar , kʾani or chʾen hawatar indzi :
43016010	artarowtʾean hamar , orovhetew es g!ertʾam im Hōrs kʾov , ew al biti chʾtesnēkʾ zis :
43016011	tatastani hamar , kʾani or ays ashkharhi ishkhanĕ tatowadz ē .
43016012	Tagawin shat paner ownim , tsezi ĕselow , paytsʾ hima chʾēkʾ grnar hantowr zhel .
43016013	Isg erp inkʾ , Jshmartowtʾean Hokin kay , ampoghch jshmartowtʾean biti aṛachnortē tsez : orovhetew biti chʾkhōsi inkʾnirmē , haba inchʾ or lsē , zayn biti ĕsē , ow kalikʾnerĕ biti haghortē tsezi .
43016014	Inkʾ biti pʾaṛaworē zis , orovhetew biti stanay iminēs ow haghortē tsezi .
43016015	Amēn inchʾ or Hayrĕ owni , ims ē : owsti ĕsi tsezi tʾē biti aṛnē iminēs ow haghortē tsezi » .
43016016	« Kʾichʾ mĕ atenēn , al biti chʾtesnēkʾ zis : ew kʾichʾ mĕ atenēn , tartseal biti tesnēkʾ zis , kʾani or es g!ertʾam Hōrĕ kʾov » .
43016017	Owsti ashagertnerēn omankʾ g!ĕsēin irarow : « Inchʾ ē asiga , or g!ĕsē mezi : “ Kʾichʾ mĕ atenēn , al biti chʾtesnēkʾ zis : ew kʾichʾ mĕ atenēn , tartseal biti tesnēkʾ zis ” . Naew : “ Kʾani or es g!ertʾam Hōrĕ kʾov ” » .
43016018	Owremn g!ĕsēin : « Inchʾ ē asiga , or g!ĕsē : “ Kʾichʾ mĕ atenēn ” : chʾenkʾ kiter inchʾ gĕ khōsi » .
43016019	Owsti Yisows , kitnalov tʾē g!owzen hartsʾnel iren , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Zirar gĕ hartsʾapʾortsēkʾ , kʾani or ĕsi : “ Kʾichʾ mĕ atenēn , al biti chʾtesnēkʾ zis : ew kʾichʾ mĕ atenēn , tartseal biti tesnēkʾ zis ” .
43016020	Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Towkʾ biti lakʾ ow oghpakʾ , paytsʾ ashkharhĕ biti owrakhanay : towkʾ biti trtmikʾ , sagayn tser trtmowtʾiwnĕ biti pʾokhowi owrakhowtʾean ” .
43016021	Gin mĕ trtmowtʾiwn g!ownenay dznntaperowtʾean aten , orovhetew ir zhamĕ hasadz ē : paytsʾ erp dznani manowgĕ , al chʾi yisher taṛabankʾĕ , owrakhanalov or mart mĕ dznaw ashkharhi mēch .
43016022	Owremn towkʾ al trtmowtʾiwn ownikʾ hima : paytsʾ es tartseal biti tesnem tsez ow tser sirtĕ biti owrakhanay , ew ochʾ mēgĕ tsezmē biti yapʾshtagē tser owrakhowtʾiwnĕ .
43016023	Ayt ōrĕ , ochʾinchʾ biti hartsʾnēkʾ indzi . Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem tsezi : “ Inchʾ or khntrēkʾ Hōrmēn , im anownovs , biti tay tsezi .
43016024	Minchʾew hima , ochʾinchʾ khntretsʾikʾ im anownovs : khntretsʾēkʾ , ow biti stanakʾ , orbēszi tser owrakhowtʾiwnĕ lman ĕllay ” » .
43016025	« Ays panerĕ aṛagnerov khōsetsʾay tsezi : paytsʾ zhamĕ biti kay , erp al aṛagnerov biti chʾkhōsim tsezi , haba patsʾoroshabēs biti haghortem tsezi Hōrĕ masin .
43016026	Ayt ōrĕ , im anownovs biti khntrēkʾ . CHʾem ĕser tsezi tʾē biti tʾakhantsem Hōrĕ , tsezi hamar :
43016027	kʾani or inkʾ , Hayrĕ gĕ sirē tsez , orovhetew towkʾ siretsʾikʾ zis ow hawatatsʾikʾ tʾē es Astowdzmē elay .
43016028	Hōrmēn elay ew ashkharh egay : tartseal gĕ tʾoghowm ashkharhĕ ow g!ertʾam Hōrĕ kʾov » .
43016029	Ir ashagertnerĕ ĕsin iren : « Aha patsʾoroshabēs gĕ khōsis hima , ew aṛag mĕn al chʾes ĕser .
43016030	Kitenkʾ hima , tʾē town kites amēn pan , ew bētkʾ chʾownis , or mēgĕ hartsʾnē kʾezi orewē pan : asov gĕ hawatankʾ tʾē Astowdzmē elar » .
43016031	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Gĕ hawatakʾ hima .
43016032	Aha zhamĕ biti kay ow hasadz al ē , erp biti tsʾrowikʾ , iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ ir teghĕ , ew minag biti tʾoghowkʾ zis : paytsʾ es minag chʾem , orovhetew Hayrĕ indzi het ē .
43016033	Ays panerĕ khōsetsʾay tsezi , orbēszi khaghaghowtʾiwn ownenakʾ intsmov : ashkharhi mēch taṛabankʾ biti ownenakʾ , paytsʾ kʾachalerowetsʾēkʾ , es yaghtʾetsʾi ashkharhin » .
43017001	Erp Yisows khōsetsʾaw asonkʾ , partsratsʾowtsʾ ir achʾkʾerĕ tēbi erginkʾ ew ĕsaw : « Hayr , zhamĕ hasadz ē : pʾaṛaworē kʾow Ortit , orbēszi kʾow Ortit al pʾaṛaworē kʾez ,
43017002	kʾani ishkhanowtʾiwn towir iren amēn marmini vray , or tay yawitenagan geankʾĕ polor anontsʾ , or towir iren .
43017003	Ew sa ē yawitenagan geankʾĕ : - janchʾnal kʾez , mimiayn jshmarit Astowadzĕ , ow Yisows Kʾristosĕ , or town ghrgetsʾir .
43017004	Es pʾaṛaworetsʾi kʾez ergri vray : awartetsʾi ayn kordzĕ , or towir indzi ĕnelow .
43017005	Ew hima , Hayr , pʾaṛaworē zis kʾow kʾovt ayn pʾaṛkʾov , or ownēi kʾovt ashkharhi ĕllalēn aṛach .
43017006	Patsʾayaytetsʾi kʾow anownt ayn martotsʾ , or towir indzi ashkharhēn . Kʾowgt ēin , ew indzi towir zanonkʾ , ow bahetsʾin kʾow khōskʾt .
43017007	Hima kittsʾan tʾē amēn inchʾ or towir indzi , kʾezmē ē :
43017008	orovhetew ayn khōskʾerĕ or towir indzi , es towi anontsʾ , anonkʾ al ĕntownetsʾin ew jshmartabēs kittsʾan tʾē es kʾezmē elay , ow hawatatsʾin tʾē town ghrgetsʾir zis .
43017009	Es gĕ tʾakhantsem anontsʾ hamar : ochʾ tʾē gĕ tʾakhantsem ashkharhin hamar , ayl anontsʾ hamar , or town towir indzi , orovhetew anonkʾ kʾowgt en .
43017010	Ew amēn inchʾ or ims ē , kʾowgt ē , ew inchʾ or kʾowgt ē , ims ē , ow es pʾaṛaworowadz em anontsʾmov .
43017011	Al es ashkharhi mēch chʾem : paytsʾ anonkʾ ashkharhi mēch en , ow es gow kam kʾezi . Sowrp Hayr , bahē kʾow anownovt anonkʾ , or town towir indzi , orbēszi mēg ĕllan , inchʾbēs menkʾ mēg enkʾ .
43017012	Minchʾ anontsʾ het ēi ashkharhi mēch , zanonkʾ gĕ bahēi kʾow anownovt . Anonkʾ or town towir indzi , es bahetsʾi , ew anontsʾmē ochʾ mēgĕ gorsowetsʾaw , paytsʾ miayn , ayn gorowsti ortin , orbēszi krowadzĕ irakordzowi .
43017013	Al hima gow kam kʾezi , ew ays panerĕ gĕ khōsim ashkharhi mēch , orbēszi im owrakhowtʾiwns lman ĕllay irentsʾ mēch .
43017014	Kʾow khōskʾt towi anontsʾ , ew ashkharhĕ atetsʾ zanonkʾ , orovhetew ashkharhēn chʾen , inchʾbēs es ashkharhēn chʾem .
43017015	CHʾem tʾakhantser or vertsʾnes zanonkʾ ashkharhēn , haba , or bahes zanonkʾ chʾarēn .
43017016	Anonkʾ ashkharhēn chʾen , inchʾbēs es ashkharhēn chʾem .
43017017	Srpatsʾowr zanonkʾ kʾow jshmartowtʾeampt : kʾow khōskʾt jshmartowtʾiwn ē .
43017018	Inchʾbēs town ashkharh ghrgetsʾir zis , es al ashkharh ghrgetsʾi zanonkʾ .
43017019	Anontsʾ hamar es zis gĕ srpatsʾnem , orbēszi irenkʾ al srpatsʾadz ĕllan jshmartowtʾeamp .
43017020	Paytsʾ gĕ tʾakhantsem ochʾ miayn asontsʾ hamar , ayl naew anontsʾ hamar , or biti hawatan indzi irentsʾ khōskʾov .
43017021	Orbēszi polorn al mēg ĕllan , inchʾbēs town , Hayr , im mēchs , ow es , kʾow mēcht : or anonkʾ al mēg ĕllan mer mēch , orbēszi ashkharhĕ hawatay tʾē town ghrgetsʾir zis .
43017022	Ayn pʾaṛkʾĕ , or town towir indzi , es towi anontsʾ , orbēszi mēg ĕllan , inchʾbēs menkʾ mēg enkʾ :
43017023	( es , anontsʾ mēch , ow town , im mēchs : ) orbēszi irenkʾ gatarelabēs mēg ĕllan , ew ashkharhĕ kitnay tʾē town ghrgetsʾir zis , ow siretsʾir zanonkʾ , inchʾbēs siretsʾir zis .
43017024	Hayr , anonkʾ or towir indzi , g!owzem or irenkʾ al ĕllan indzi het , owr or es em , orbēszi tesnen im pʾaṛkʾs , or towir indzi : orovhetew town siretsʾir zis ashkharhi himnatrowtʾenēn aṛach .
43017025	Artar Hayr , ashkharhĕ chʾjanchʾtsʾaw kʾez : paytsʾ es janchʾtsʾay kʾez , ew asonkʾ kittsʾan tʾē town ghrgetsʾir zis .
43017026	Kʾow anownt janchʾtsʾowtsʾi anontsʾ , ow biti janchʾtsʾnem : orbēszi ayn sērĕ , orov town siretsʾir zis , ĕllay anontsʾ mēch , ow es al anontsʾ mēch » .
43018001	Asonkʾ ĕselēn etkʾ , Yisows knatsʾ ir ashagertnerown het Getron vtagin miws goghmĕ , owr bartēz mĕ gar , orown mēch mtan inkʾ ew ir ashagertnerĕ .
43018002	Yowta al , or biti matnēr zinkʾ , kitēr ayt teghĕ , orovhetew Yisows yajakh hawakʾowadz ēr hon , ir ashagertnerown het .
43018003	Owsti Yowta , aṛnelov iren het zinowornerown kowntĕ , ew sbasaworner , kʾahanayabetnerēn ow Pʾarisetsʾinerēn , egaw hon , chaherov , labternerov ew zēnkʾerov .
43018004	Isg Yisows , kitnalov iren batahelikʾ polor panerĕ , knatsʾ ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ov gĕ pʾntṛēkʾ » .
43018005	Bataskhanetsʾin anor : « Nazovretsʾi Yisowsĕ » . Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Es em » . Yowta al , or biti matnēr zinkʾ , gaynadz ēr anontsʾ het .
43018006	Erp ĕsaw : « Es em » , nahanchetsʾin ow ketin ingan .
43018007	Owsti tartseal hartsʾowtsʾ anontsʾ : « Ov gĕ pʾntṛēkʾ » . Anonkʾ al ĕsin : « Nazovretsʾi Yisowsĕ » .
43018008	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « TSezi ĕsi tʾē “ es em ” : owremn etʾē zis gĕ pʾntṛēkʾ , asontsʾ tʾoyl towēkʾ , or ertʾan » :
43018009	orbēszi irakordzowi ayn khōskʾĕ , or ĕser ēr : « Ochʾ mēgĕ gorsntsʾowtsʾi anontsʾmē , or town towir indzi » .
43018010	Isg Simon Betros , or ownēr sowr mĕ , kʾashetsʾ zayn , ow zarnelov kʾahanayabetin dzaṛayin , gtretsʾ anor ach aganchĕ : ayt dzaṛayin anownĕ Maghkʾos ēr .
43018011	Hetewapar Yisows ĕsaw Betrosi : « Tir sowrt ir bateanĕ : mitʾē biti chʾkhmem ayn pa zhagĕ , or Hayrĕ towaw indzi » .
43018012	Owsti zinowornerown kowntĕ , hazarabetn ow Hreanerown sbasawornerĕ pṛnetsʾin Yisowsĕ , gabetsʾin ,
43018013	ew tarin zayn nakh Annayi , kʾani or inkʾ anern ēr ayt tarowan kʾahanayabetin , Gayiapʾayi .
43018014	Ays Gayiapʾan ēr , or tʾelatretsʾ Hreanerown : « Aweli ōktagar ē or mēg mart meṛni zhoghovowrtin hamar »
43018015	Simon Betros ew owrish ashagert mĕ gĕ hetewēin Yisowsi . Ayt ashagertĕ dzanōtʾ ēr kʾahanayabetin , ow mtaw Yisowsi het kʾahanayabetin kawitʾĕ .
43018016	Paytsʾ Betros gĕ genar towrsĕ , tran kʾov : owsti miws ashagertĕ , or dzanōtʾ ēr kʾahanayabetin , towrs elaw , khōsetsʾaw tṛnabanin , ow ners peraw Betrosĕ .
43018017	Isg tṛnaban aghchigĕ ĕsaw Betrosi : « Mitʾē town al ayt martown ashagertnerēn es » . An al ĕsaw : « CHʾem » .
43018018	DZaṛanern ow sbasawornerĕ gaynadz ēin hon , ew grag vaṛadz , gĕ takʾnayin , kʾani or tsʾowrt ēr . Betros al gaynadz ēr anontsʾ het , ow gĕ takʾnar .
43018019	Kʾahanayabetĕ hartsʾowtsʾ Yisowsi , ir ashagertnerown ew owsowtsʾowmin masin .
43018020	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Es patsʾoroshabēs khōsetsʾay ashkharhin : amēn aten sorvetsʾowtsʾi zhoghovarannerown mēch ow tajarin mēch , owr polor Hreanerĕ gĕ hamakhmpowēin , ew ochʾinchʾ khōsetsʾay kaghtni .
43018021	Inchʾow indzi gĕ hartsʾnes , lsoghnerown hartsʾowr tʾē inchʾ khōsetsʾay irentsʾ : aha irenkʾ kiten inchʾ or khōsetsʾay » .
43018022	Erp ĕsaw asiga , sbasawornerēn mēgĕ , or kʾovĕ gaynadz ēr , abtag mĕ zargaw Yisowsi , ĕselov : « Aytbēs gĕ bataskhanes kʾahanayabetin » .
43018023	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Etʾē kēsh khōsetsʾay , vgayē kēshin masin : isg etʾē law khōsetsʾay , inchʾow gĕ zarnes indzi » .
43018024	Yetoy Anna gabowadz ghrgetsʾ zayn Gayiapʾa kʾahanayabetin .
43018025	Simon Betros gaynadz ēr hon , ow gĕ takʾnar . Owremn ĕsin iren : « Mitʾē town al anor ashagertnerēn es » . An owratsʾaw , ĕselov : « CHʾem » .
43018026	Kʾahanayabetin dzaṛanerēn mēgn al , azkaganĕ anor , orown aganchĕ Betros gtrer ēr , ĕsaw : « Es chʾtesay kʾez bartēzin mēch , anor het » .
43018027	Owsti Betros tartseal owratsʾaw : ew isgoyn akʾaghaghĕ ganchʾetsʾ .
43018028	Gayiapʾayi townēn tarin Yisowsĕ gaṛavarichʾin balatĕ : ew al aṛtow ēr . Irenkʾ chʾmtan balatĕ , orbēszi chʾbghdzowin , ayl garenan owtel zatigĕ .
43018029	Owsti Bighatos towrs elaw , anontsʾ kʾov , ew ĕsaw : « Inchʾ ampastanowtʾiwn gĕ nergayatsʾnēkʾ ays martown tēm » .
43018030	Bataskhanetsʾin iren : « Etʾē an chʾarakordz mĕ chʾĕllar , kʾezi chʾēinkʾ matner zayn » .
43018031	Owsti Bighatos ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Towkʾ aṛēkʾ zayn , ow tatetsʾēkʾ tser ōrēnkʾin hamatsayn » . Isg Hreanerĕ ĕsin iren : « Mezi artōnowadz chʾē meṛtsʾnel oewē mēgĕ » :
43018032	orbēszi irakordzowi Yisowsi khōskʾĕ , or ĕser ēr , matnanshelov tʾē inchʾ mahov biti meṛnēr .
43018033	Isg Bighatos tartseal mtaw balatĕ , ganchʾetsʾ Yisowsĕ ew ĕsaw anor : « Town es Hreanerown tʾakaworĕ » .
43018034	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Asiga town kʾezmē g!ĕses , tʾē owrishner ĕsin kʾezi , im masis » .
43018035	Bighatos bataskhanetsʾ : « Mitʾē es Hreay em : kʾow azkt ew kʾahanayabetnerĕ matnetsʾin kʾez indzi : town inchʾ ĕradz es » .
43018036	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « Im tʾakaworowtʾiwns ays ashkharhēn chʾē . Etʾē im tʾakaworowtʾiwns ays ashkharhēn ĕllar , im sbasaworners gĕ baykʾarēin , or es chʾmatnowim Hreanerown tseṛkʾĕ . Paytsʾ hima , im tʾakaworowtʾiwns asgē chʾē » .
43018037	Hetewapar Bighatos ĕsaw anor : « Owremn town tʾakawor mĕn es » . Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « Town g!ĕses tʾē tʾakawor em . Es sa nbatagov dznadz em , sa nbatagov ashkharh egadz em , orbēszi vgayem jshmartowtʾean hamar : ov or jshmartowtʾenēn ē , gĕ lsē im tsayns » .
43018038	Bighatos ĕsaw anor : « Inchʾ ē jshmartowtʾiwnĕ » . Erp ĕsaw asiga , tartseal towrs elaw Hreanerown kʾov , ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Es ochʾ mēg yantsʾankʾ gĕ ktnem anor vray .
43018039	Paytsʾ kʾani sovorowtʾiwn ownikʾ , or mart mĕ artsagem tsezi Zatigin , gĕ pʾapʾakʾikʾ or artsagem tsezi Hreanerown tʾakaworĕ » .
43018040	Ayn aten polorn al tartseal boṛatsʾin : « Ochʾ asiga , haba , Parappan » , minchʾteṛ Parappa awazag mĕn ēr .
43019001	Ayn aten Bighatos aṛaw Yisowsĕ ew kharazanetsʾ .
43019002	Zinowornern al hiwsetsʾin pʾowshē bsag mĕ ow trin anor klowkhĕ , ew haktsʾowtsʾin anor dzirani hanterts mĕ
43019003	ow g!ĕsēin : « Oghchoyn , Hreanerow tʾakawor » , ew abtagner gĕ zarnēin anor .
43019004	Bighatos tartseal towrs elaw ow ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Aha towrs gĕ perem zayn tsezi , orbēszi kitnakʾ tʾē es ochʾ mēg yantsʾankʾ gĕ ktnem anor vray » .
43019005	Owsti Yisows towrs elaw , grelov pʾowshē bsagn ow dzirani hantertsĕ , ew Bighatos ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Aha ayt martĕ » .
43019006	Erp kʾahanayabetnern ow sbasawornerĕ tesan zayn , boṛatsʾin : « KHachʾē , khachʾē zayn » . Bighatos ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Towkʾ aṛēkʾ zayn ow khachʾetsʾēkʾ , orovhetew es ochʾ mēg yantsʾankʾ gĕ ktnem anor vray » .
43019007	Hreanerĕ bataskhanetsʾin iren : « Menkʾ ōrēnkʾ mĕ owninkʾ , ew mer ōrēnkʾin hamatsayn , bartawor ē meṛnil , orovhetew Astowdzoy Orti ĕraw inkʾzinkʾ » .
43019008	Isg erp Bighatos lsetsʾ ays khōskʾĕ , al aweli vakhtsʾaw ,
43019009	ow tartseal mtnelov balatĕ , ĕsaw Yisowsi : « Town owrgē es » . Paytsʾ Yisows bataskhan chʾtowaw anor .
43019010	Owsti Bighatos ĕsaw anor : « CHʾes khōsir indzi het : chʾes kiter tʾē ishkhanowtʾiwn ownim khachʾelow kʾez , ew ishkhanowtʾiwn ownim artsagelow kʾez » .
43019011	Yisows bataskhanetsʾ : « Town ochʾ mēg ishkhanowtʾiwn g!ownenayir im vras , etʾē verēn trowadz chʾĕllar kʾezi . Owsti an or matnetsʾ zis kʾezi , aweli medz meghkʾ owni » .
43019012	Atgē etkʾ Bighatos gĕ chanar artsagel zayn : paytsʾ Hreanerĕ g!aghaghagēin : « Etʾē artsages atiga , gaysrin paregamĕ chʾes : ov or tʾakawor g!ĕnē inkʾzinkʾ , gĕ khōsi gaysrin tēm » .
43019013	Owremn Bighatos , erp lsetsʾ ays khōskʾĕ , towrs hanetsʾ Yisowsĕ , pazmetsʾaw tataranĕ , ayn teghĕ , or Kʾarayatag gĕ gochʾowēr , isg eprayerēn , Gabbatʾa ,
43019014	( Zatigi Owrpatʾn ēr , kretʾē vetsʾerort zhamĕ , , , ) ew ĕsaw Hreanerown : « Aha tser tʾakaworĕ » .
43019015	Paytsʾ anonkʾ boṛatsʾin : « Vertsʾowr , vertsʾowr , khachʾē zayn » . Bighatos ĕsaw anontsʾ : « TSer tʾakaworĕ khachʾem » . Kʾahanayabetnerĕ bataskhanetsʾin : « Menkʾ tʾakawor chʾowninkʾ , gaysrēn zat » .
43019016	Ayn aten yantsnetsʾ zayn anontsʾ , orbēszi khachʾowēr .
43019017	Anonkʾ al aṛin Yisowsĕ ow tarin : ew inkʾ , vertsʾnelov ir khachʾĕ , knatsʾ Kang gochʾowadz teghĕ , or eprayerēn Koghkotʾa gĕ gochʾowi .
43019018	Hon khachʾetsʾin zayn , ow ergow owrishner al anor het , mēg goghmēn ew miws goghmēn , isg mēchteghĕ , Yisowsĕ .
43019019	Bighatos kretsʾ titghos mĕ ow traw khachʾin vray : krowadz ēr : « Yisows Nazovretsʾi , Hreanerown tʾakaworĕ » .
43019020	Owsti Hreanerēn shater gartatsʾin ayt titghosĕ , orovhetew ayn teghĕ , owr Yisows khachʾowetsʾaw , mōt ēr kʾaghakʾin : krowadz ēr eprayerēn , yownarēn ow latinerēn .
43019021	Isg Hreanerown kʾahanayabetnerĕ ĕsin Bighatosi : « Mi krer : “ Hreanerown tʾakaworĕ ” , haba krē tʾē inkʾ ĕsaw : “ Hreanerown tʾakaworn em ” » .
43019022	Bighatos bataskhanetsʾ : « Inchʾ or kretsʾi , kretsʾi » .
43019023	Erp zinowornerĕ khachʾetsʾin Yisowsĕ , aṛin anor hantertsnerĕ ow pa zhnetsʾin chʾorsi , iwrakʾanchʾiwr zinowori , pa zhin mĕ : naew pajgonĕ . Pajgonĕ aṛantsʾ gari ēr , ampoghchovin hiwsowadz , verēn var .
43019024	Owsti ĕsin irarow : « CHʾbatṛenkʾ zayn , haba vijag tskenkʾ anor vray , tʾē orow biti ĕllay » : orbēszi irakordzowi ayn krowadzĕ , or g!ĕsē : « Im hantertsners pa zhnetsʾin irentsʾ mēch , ew im batmowjanis vray vijag tsketsʾin » . Owremn zinowornerĕ ĕrin ays panerĕ .
43019025	Yisowsi khachʾin kʾov gaynadz ēin ir mayrĕ ew ir mōr kʾoyrĕ , Mariam , Gghēovbasi ginĕ , ow Mariam Maktaghenatsʾin .
43019026	Owremn erp Yisows tesaw ir mayrĕ , ew ayn ashagertĕ or gĕ sirēr , kʾovĕ gaynadz , ĕsaw ir mōr : « Gin , aha kʾow ortit » .
43019027	Yetoy ĕsaw ashagertin : « Aha kʾow mayrt » . Ew ayt zhamēn etkʾ , ashagertĕ ĕntownetsʾ zayn ir kʾov .
43019028	Angē etkʾ , Yisows , kitnalov tʾē artēn amēn pan gatarowadz ē , ( orbēszi krowadzĕ ampoghchanay , ) ĕsaw : « DZaraw em » .
43019029	Hon anōtʾ mĕ trowadz ēr , li kʾatsʾakhov : anonkʾ al letsʾowtsʾin sbownk mĕ kʾatsʾakhov , antsʾowtsʾin zobayi mshtigi mĕ ew matowtsʾanetsʾin anor peranin .
43019030	Owsti erp Yisows aṛaw kʾatsʾakhĕ , ĕsaw : « Amēn pan gatarowetsʾaw » : ow khonarhetsʾnelov klowkhĕ , awantetsʾ hokin .
43019031	Kʾani or Owrpatʾ ēr , Hreanerĕ tʾakhantsetsʾin Bighatosi , or anontsʾ srownkʾnerĕ gotrowin ow vertsʾowin , orbēszi marminnerĕ chʾmnan khachʾin vray minchʾew SHapatʾ ( orovhetew ayt SHapatʾĕ medz ōr ēr ) .
43019032	Owsti zinowornerĕ egan ew gotretsʾin aṛachinin srownkʾnerĕ : naew miwsin , or khachʾowadz ēr anor het .
43019033	Paytsʾ erp egan Yisowsi , ow tesan tʾē artēn meṛadz ēr , chʾgotretsʾin anor srownkʾnerĕ :
43019034	haba zinowornerēn mēgĕ , keghartov khotsʾetsʾ anor goghĕ , ew isgoyn ariwn ow chowr towrs elan .
43019035	An or tesaw ays panerĕ , vgayetsʾ , ew anor vgayowtʾiwnĕ jshmarit ē , ow inkʾ kitē tʾē g!ĕsē jshmartowtʾiwnĕ , or towkʾ ( al ) hawatakʾ .
43019036	Artarew ays panerĕ gatarowetsʾan , orbēszi irakordzowi ayn krowadzĕ : « Anor ochʾ mēg osgorĕ biti gotrowi » .
43019037	Ew tartseal owrish krowadz mĕ g!ĕsē : « Biti nayin anor , or khotsʾetsʾin » .
43019038	Asgē etkʾ , Yovsēpʾ Arimatʾeatsʾin , ( or Yisowsi ashagert eghadz ēr , paytsʾ kaghtni , Hreanerēn vakhnalov , ) tʾakhantsetsʾ Bighatosi , or vertsʾnē Yisowsi marminĕ . Bighatos al artōnetsʾ : owremn egaw ow vertsʾowtsʾ Yisowsi marminĕ .
43019039	Nigotemos al egaw ( or nakhabēs , kisherowan mēch katsʾer ēr Yisowsi ) , ew peraw zmowṛsi ow halowēi khaṛnowrt mĕ , hariwr litri chʾapʾ .
43019040	Owremn aṛin Yisowsi marminĕ , ew pʾatʾtʾetsʾin zayn poyrerown het , latʾerow mēch , inchʾbēs Hreanerĕ sovorowtʾiwn ownin tʾaghelow .
43019041	Ayn teghĕ owr khachʾowetsʾaw , bartēz mĕ gar , ew bartēzin mēch , nor kerezman mĕ , orown mēch amenewin mart trowadz chʾēr .
43019042	Owsti hon trin Yisowsĕ , Hreanerow Owrpatʾin batjaṛov , orovhetew kerezmanĕ mōt ēr .
43020001	Mēgshaptʾi ōrĕ , Mariam Maktaghenatsʾin , aṛtown , teṛ chʾlowstsʾadz , g!ertʾay kerezman , ew gĕ tesnē tʾē kʾarĕ vertsʾowadz ē kerezmanin tṛnēn .
43020002	Owsti gĕ vazē , gow kay Simon Betrosi , ow miws ashagertin , or Yisows gĕ sirēr , ew g!ĕsē anontsʾ : « Vertsʾowtsʾadz en Tērĕ kerezmanēn , ow chʾenkʾ kiter owr tradz en zayn » .
43020003	Owremn Betros ew miws ashagertĕ megnetsʾan , ow g!ertʾayin tēbi kerezmanĕ .
43020004	Ergowkʾn al gĕ vazēin miasin : sagayn miws ashagertĕ , Betrosēn aweli arak vazelov , angē aṛach hasaw kerezmanĕ ,
43020005	dzṛelov nayetsʾaw , ew tesaw tʾē latʾerĕ trowadz ēin hon : paytsʾ ners chʾmtaw .
43020006	Simon Betros al , or gĕ hetewēr anor , hasaw , mtaw kerezmanĕ , ow tesaw latʾerĕ , oronkʾ trowadz ēin hon :
43020007	isg varshamagĕ , or anor klowkhn ēr , miws latʾerown het trowadz chʾēr , haba dzalowadz , zat tegh mĕn ēr .
43020008	Ayn aten miws ashagertn al , or aweli aṛach egadz ēr kerezmanĕ , ners mtaw , tesaw ew hawatatsʾ .
43020009	Orovhetew teṛ chʾēin kiter krowadzĕ , tʾē bētkʾ ē or an yarowtʾiwn aṛnē meṛelnerēn .
43020010	Owsti ashagertnerĕ veratartsan irentsʾ townĕ .
43020011	Paytsʾ Mariam gaynadz ēr kerezmanin towrsĕ , ew gow lar . Minchʾ gow lar , dzṛetsʾaw tēbi kerezmanĕ , nayelow ,
43020012	ow tesaw ergow hreshtagner , jermag hantertsnerov , or nstadz ēin hon , owr Yisowsi marminĕ trowadz ēr , mēgĕ klowkhin goghmĕ , ew miwsĕ , otkʾin .
43020013	Anonkʾ ĕsin iren : « Gin , inchʾow gow las » . Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Orovhetew vertsʾowtsʾadz en im Tērs kerezmanēn , ow chʾem kiter owr tradz en zayn » .
43020014	Erp ĕsaw asiga , etew tartsaw , ew tesaw Yisowsĕ , or gaynadz ēr , ow chʾēr kiter tʾē Yisowsn ē .
43020015	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Gin , inchʾow gow las , ov gĕ pʾntṛes » . Inkʾ , gardzelov tʾē an bartizbann ē , ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , etʾē town teghapʾokhetsʾir zayn , ĕsē indzi , owr trir zayn , orbēszi vertsʾnem zayn » .
43020016	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Mariam » . An al tartsaw ew ĕsaw anor ( eprayerēn ) : « Ṛappowni » , or ĕsel ē , Vartabet .
43020017	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Mi tbchʾir indzi , orovhetew teṛ partsratsʾadz chʾem Hōrs kʾov : haba kna eghpayrnerows ew ĕsē anontsʾ : “ Es gĕ partsranam im Hōrs kʾov ow tser Hōr kʾov , im Astowdzoys kʾov ew tser Astowdzoyn kʾov ” » .
43020018	Mariam Maktaghenatsʾin knatsʾ , ow batmetsʾ ashagertnerown tʾē inkʾ tesaw Tērĕ , ew tʾē an ĕsaw iren ays panerĕ .
43020019	Noyn ōrĕ , Mēgshaptʾi irigown , ashagertnerown hawakʾowadz teghin tṛnerĕ kotsʾ ēin , kʾani or gĕ vakhnayin Hreanerēn . Yisows egaw , gaynetsʾaw anontsʾ mēchtegh ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « KHaghaghowtʾiwn tsezi » .
43020020	Asiga ĕselov , tsʾowtsʾowtsʾ anontsʾ ir tseṛkʾern ow goghĕ : ashagertnern al owrakhatsʾan , erp tesan Tērĕ .
43020021	Yisows tartseal ĕsaw anontsʾ : « KHaghaghowtʾiwn tsezi : inchʾbēs Hayrĕ ghrgetsʾ zis , es al gĕ ghrgem tsez » .
43020022	Asiga ĕselov , pʾchʾetsʾ anontsʾ vray ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ĕntownetsʾēkʾ Sowrp Hokin .
43020023	Orontsʾ meghkʾerĕ or nerēkʾ , nerowadz ĕllan anontsʾ , ew orontsʾ meghkʾerĕ or bahēkʾ , bahowadz ĕllan » .
43020024	Paytsʾ tasnergowkʾēn mēgĕ , Ergoworeag gochʾowadz Tʾovmas , anontsʾ het chʾēr , erp Yisows egaw .
43020025	Owremn miws ashagertnerĕ ĕsin anor : « Tērĕ tesankʾ » . An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Biti chʾhawatam , etʾē chʾtesnem kamerown tibĕ , ir tseṛkʾerown vray , ow chʾmkhem mats kamerown tibin mēch , ew chʾmkhem tseṛkʾs anor goghin mēch » .
43020026	Owtʾ ōr etkʾ , tartseal ashagertnerĕ nersn ēin , Tʾovmas al , anontsʾ het . Yisows egaw , tʾēbēt tṛnerĕ kotsʾ ēin , gaynetsʾaw anontsʾ mēchtegh ew ĕsaw : « KHaghaghowtʾiwn tsezi » .
43020027	Yetoy ĕsaw Tʾovmasi : « Hos per matt ow tes tseṛkʾers , per tseṛkʾt ew mkhē goghis mēch , ow mi ĕllar anhawat , haba , hawatatsʾeal » .
43020028	Tʾovmas bataskhanetsʾ anor : « Im Tērs ew Astowadzs » .
43020029	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Town hawatatsʾir , orovhetew tesar zis : erani anontsʾ or gĕ hawatan , aṛantsʾ tesnelow » .
43020030	Yisows ĕraw owrish pazmatʾiw nshanner al ir ashagertnerown aṛchew , oronkʾ krowadz chʾen ays kirkʾin mēch .
43020031	Paytsʾ asonkʾ krowetsʾan , orbēszi hawatakʾ tʾē Yisows , Kʾristosn ē , Astowdzoy Ortin , ew hawatalov geankʾ ownenakʾ , anor anownov .
43021001	Asgē etkʾ , Yisows tartseal patsʾayaytetsʾ inkʾzinkʾ ir ashagertnerown , Tiperiayi dzovown ezerkʾĕ : ew sabēs patsʾayaytetsʾ .
43021002	Simon Betros , Tʾovmas , Ergoworeag gochʾowadzĕ , Natʾanayēl , or Kalileayi Gana kʾaghakʾēn ēr , Zepetēosi ortinerĕ , naew ashagertnerēn ergow owrishner miasin ēin .
43021003	Simon Betros ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Es g!ertʾam tsowg orsalow » . Ĕsin anor : « Menkʾ al gow kankʾ kʾezi het » . Towrs elan ew isgoyn naw mtan : paytsʾ ayt kisher ochʾinchʾ pṛnetsʾin .
43021004	Erp artēn aṛtow eghaw , Yisows gaynadz ēr dzovezerkʾĕ , paytsʾ ashagertnerĕ chʾjanchʾtsʾan tʾē Yisowsn ē .
43021005	Isg Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Zawagner , ownikʾ owtelikʾ pan mĕ » . Bataskhanetsʾin iren : « Ochʾ » .
43021006	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Netetsʾēkʾ owṛganĕ nawown ach goghmĕ , ow biti ktnēkʾ » . Owremn netetsʾin , ew tsowgerown shatowtʾenēn , al garogh chʾēin kʾashel zayn .
43021007	Owsti ayn ashagertĕ or Yisows gĕ sirēr , ĕsaw Betrosi : « Aniga Tērn ē » . Erp Simon Betros lsetsʾ tʾē Tērn ē , vran aṛaw pajgonĕ , orovhetew merg ēr , ow netowetsʾaw dzovĕ .
43021008	Isg miws ashagertnerĕ egan nawagov , ( orovhetew tsʾamakʾēn heṛow chʾēin , miayn ergow hariwr gankowni chʾapʾ , ) ew gĕ kʾashēin owṛganĕ , tsowgerov letsʾown .
43021009	Erp tsʾamakʾ elan , hon tesan vaṛowadz grag mĕ , ow vran trowadz tsowg , ew hatsʾ .
43021010	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Perēkʾ ayt tsowgerēn , or pṛnetsʾikʾ hima » .
43021011	Simon Betros naw mtaw ew tsʾamakʾ kʾashetsʾ owṛganĕ , li hariwr yisownerekʾ khoshor tsowgerov : tʾēbēt aytkʾan pan gar , owṛganĕ chʾbatṛetsʾaw .
43021012	Yisows ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Egēkʾ , jashetsʾēkʾ » . Ashagertnerēn ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ yantknēr hartsʾnel anor : « Town ov es » , orovhetew kitēin tʾē Tērn ē .
43021013	Owsti Yisows egaw , aṛaw hatsʾĕ ew towaw anontsʾ , nmanabēs , tsowgĕ .
43021014	Ays artēn errort ankamn ēr , or Yisows patsʾayaytetsʾ inkʾzinkʾ ir ashagertnerown , meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛnelēn etkʾ .
43021015	Err jashetsʾin , Yisows ĕsaw Simon Betrosi : « Simon , Yovnani orti , gĕ sires zis asontsʾmē aweli » . An ĕsaw anor : « Ayo , Tēr , town kites tʾē gĕ sirem kʾez » . Ĕsaw anor : « Aradzē im kaṛnowgners » .
43021016	Tartseal ergrort ankam ĕsaw anor : « Simon , Yovnani orti , gĕ sires zis » . Ĕsaw anor : « Ayo , Tēr , town kites tʾē gĕ sirem kʾez » . Ĕsaw anor : « Hovowē im ochʾkharners » .
43021017	Ĕsaw anor errort ankam : « Simon , Yovnani orti , gĕ sires zis » . Betros trtmetsʾaw or erekʾ ankam ĕsaw iren : « Gĕ sires zis » , ew ĕsaw anor : « Tēr , town amēn pan kites , town kites tʾē gĕ sirem kʾez » . Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Aradzē im ochʾkharners .
43021018	Jshmartabēs , jshmartabēs gĕ yaytararem kʾezi : “ Erp teṛati ēir , inkʾnirmēt kōti gĕ gabēir , ew owr owzēir , g!ertʾayir : paytsʾ erp dzeranas , biti ergares tseṛkʾert , owrishĕ kōti biti gabē kʾezi , ow biti tani hon , owr chʾes owzer ” » .
43021019	Asiga khōsetsʾaw , matnanshelov tʾē an inchʾ mahov biti pʾaṛaworēr Astowadz . Erp khōsetsʾaw asiga , ĕsaw anor : « Hetewē indzi » .
43021020	Betros etew tartsaw , ow tesaw tʾē iren gĕ hetewēr ayn ashagertĕ , or Yisows gĕ sirēr : ( an naew inger ēr anor gowrdzkʾin vray , ĕntʾrikʾin atenĕ , ew ĕser ēr : « Tēr , ov ē an , or biti matnē kʾez » : )
43021021	Betros , tesnelov zayn , ĕsaw Yisowsi : « Tēr , haba asiga inchʾ biti ĕllay » .
43021022	Yisows ĕsaw anor : « Etʾē es owzem , or an mnay , minchʾew or kam , kʾow inchʾ hokt ē : town hetewē indzi » .
43021023	Owsti sa khōskʾĕ taradzowetsʾaw eghpayrnerown mēch , tʾē ayt ashagertĕ biti chʾmeṛni . Sagayn Yisows chʾĕsaw anor : « Biti chʾmeṛni » , haba : « Etʾē es owzem , or an mnay , minchʾew or kam , kʾow inchʾ hokt ē » .
43021024	Ays ashagertn ē , or gĕ vgayē ays panerown masin , ew kretsʾ asonkʾ : ow kitenkʾ tʾē anor vgayowtʾiwnĕ jshmarit ē .
43021025	Owrish shat paner al gan , or Yisows ĕraw : etʾē anonkʾ mēg aṛ mēg krowadz ĕllayin , gardzem tʾē noynisg ashkharhn al pawagan biti chʾĕllar , barownagelow ayn kirkʾerĕ , or krowadz biti ĕllayin . Amēn .
44001001	Aṛachin batmowtʾiwnĕ kretsʾi , ov Tʾēopʾilos , amēn inchʾi masin , or Yisows sgsaw ĕnel ew sorvetsʾnel ,
44001002	minchʾew ayn ōrĕ , erp Sowrp Hokiin michotsʾov batowērner towaw ir ĕntradz aṛakʾealnerown , ow hampartsaw .
44001003	Naew inkʾzinkʾ oghch tsʾoytsʾ towaw anontsʾ ir chʾarchʾarankʾnerēn etkʾ , shat abatsʾoytsʾnerov , kʾaṛasown ōr tesnowelov anontsʾmē ew khōselov Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean masin .
44001004	Anontsʾ het eghadz aten hramayetsʾ anontsʾ , or Erowsaghēmēn chʾheṛanan , haba sbasen Hōrĕ khostowmin , « or intsmē lsetsʾikʾ » , ĕsaw :
44001005	« orovhetew iraw ē tʾē Yovhannēs mgrtetsʾ chowrov , paytsʾ towkʾ , shat ōrer chʾantsʾadz , biti mgrtowikʾ Sowrp Hokiov » .
44001006	Anonkʾ al hamakhmpowelov , hartsʾowtsʾin iren : « Tēr , ays zhamanagin biti verahastates Israyēli tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ » .
44001007	Ĕsaw anontsʾ : « TSezi chʾi veraperir kitnal zhamanagnern ow atennerĕ , or Hayrĕ ir ishkhanowtʾean mēch traw :
44001008	paytsʾ Sowrp Hokiin tser vray egadz atenĕ , zōrowtʾiwn biti stanakʾ , ew indzi hamar vganer biti ĕllakʾ Erowsaghēmi mēch , ampoghch Hrēastani ow Samariayi mēch , ew minchʾew ergri dzayrerĕ » .
44001009	Erp khōsetsʾaw ays panerĕ , minchʾ gĕ nayēin , hampartsaw , ew amb mĕ vertsʾowtsʾ zayn anontsʾ achʾkʾerēn .
44001010	Minchʾ agnabish gĕ nayēin tēbi erginkʾ , erp an ver g!ellēr , aha ergow martig , jermag tarazov , gaynetsʾan irentsʾ kʾov
44001011	ew ĕsin : « Kalileatsʾi martig , inchʾow gaynadz , gĕ nayikʾ tēbi erginkʾ : ays Yisowsĕ , or erginkʾ hampartsaw tsezmē , noynbēs biti kay , inchʾbēs tesakʾ anor erginkʾ ertʾalĕ » .
44001012	Ayn aten Erowsaghēm veratartsan TSitʾeninerow gochʾowadz leṛnēn , or SHapatʾ ōrowan jampayi chʾapʾ mōt ē Erowsaghēmi .
44001013	Erp mtan kʾaghakʾĕ , partsratsʾan vernatownĕ , owr gĕ pnagēin Betros ow Yagopos , Yovhannēs ew Antrēas , Pʾilibbos ow Tʾovmas , Partʾoghomēos ew Mattʾēos , Yagopos Alpʾēosean ow Simon Nakhantsayoyz ew Yowta Yagopean .
44001014	Asonkʾ polorĕ miapanowtʾeamp gĕ yaratewēin aghōtʾkʾi ew aghersankʾi mēch , ginerown het , ow Yisowsi mōr , Mariami ew anor eghpayrnerown het .
44001015	Ayt ōrerĕ , Betros ganknetsʾaw ashagertnerown mēch , ( hawakʾowadz pazmowtʾiwnĕ hariwr kʾsan hokii chʾapʾ ēr , ) ew ĕsaw :
44001016	« Martig eghpayrner , bētkʾ ēr or irakordzowēr ayn krowadzĕ , or nakhabēs Sowrp Hokin ĕser ēr Tawitʾi peranov , Yowtayi masin , or aṛachnort eghaw Yisowsĕ pṛnoghnerown :
44001017	orovhetew an mezi het , mer hamrankʾēn ēr , ew pa zhin vijagowadz ēr anor ays sbasargowtʾenēn .
44001018	Owremn asiga tiratsʾaw akaragi mĕ , anirawowtʾean vartskʾov , ow klkhivayr iynalov , mēchteghēn jeghkʾowetsʾaw , ew ir polor aghikʾnerĕ towrs tʾapʾetsʾan .
44001019	Erowsaghēmi polor pnagichʾnerĕ kittsʾan ays panĕ , aynbēs or ayt akaragĕ gochʾowetsʾaw irentsʾ parpaṛov Ageghtama , aysinkʾn , Ariwni akarag .
44001020	Orovhetew krowadz ē Saghmosnerow kirkʾin mēch : “ Anor pnagaranĕ amayi tʾogh ĕllay , ew anor mēch ochʾ mēgĕ pnagi ” , naew : “ Anor bashtōnĕ owrishĕ aṛnē ” .
44001021	Owremn bētkʾ ē or ays martotsʾmēn , oronkʾ mezi het ēin ayn ampoghch zhamanagĕ , erp Tēr Yisows mtaw ow elaw mer mēch ,
44001022	Yovhannēsi mgrtowtʾenēn sgseal minchʾew ayn ōrĕ , erp hampartsaw mezmē , asontsʾmē mēgĕ mezi het vgay ĕllay anor yarowtʾean » .
44001023	Owsti ergow hoki gaynetsʾowtsʾin , Yovsēpʾĕ , or Parsapa gĕ gochʾowēr ew Yowstos maganowanowetsʾaw , ow Matatʾian ,
44001024	ew aghōtʾelov , ĕsin : « Tēr , town or gĕ janchʾnas polorin sirterĕ , yaytnē mezi tʾē or mēgĕ ĕntretsʾir ays ergowkʾēn :
44001025	orbēszi pa zhin aṛnē ays sbasargowtʾenēn ow aṛakʾelowtʾenēn , ormē Yowta ingaw , ertʾalow hamar ir teghĕ » .
44001026	Ew anontsʾ hamar vijag tsketsʾin , ow vijagĕ elaw Matatʾiayi : ew an hamrowetsʾaw tasnmēg aṛakʾealnerown het .
44002001	Erp Bentegostēi tōnĕ hasaw , polorn al miapan , mēg tegh ēin .
44002002	Yangardz shaṛachʾ mĕ eghaw erginkʾēn , sastgashownchʾ hovi mĕ tsaynin bēs , ow letsʾowtsʾ ampoghch townĕ , owr nstadz ēin .
44002003	Ew pa zhnowadz lezowner erewtsʾan irentsʾ , orbēs tʾē gragē , ow hankchʾetsʾan anontsʾmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrin vray .
44002004	Polorn al letsʾowetsʾan Sowrp Hokiov ew sgsan khōsil owrish lezownerov , inchʾbēs Hokin irentsʾ khōsil gow tar .
44002005	Erowsaghēm pnagogh Hreaner gayin , parebasht martig , erginkʾi tag eghadz amēn azkē .
44002006	Erp ays tsaynĕ eghaw , pazmowtʾiwnĕ hamakhmpowetsʾaw ow shpʾotʾetsʾaw , orovhetew gĕ lsēin tʾē anonkʾ gĕ khōsēin irentsʾmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrin sepʾagan parpaṛov .
44002007	Polorn al zmayladz ēin ew gĕ zarmanayin , irarow ĕselov : « Aha asonkʾ polorn al , or gĕ khōsin , mitʾē Kalileatsʾi chʾen .
44002008	Owremn inchʾbēs gĕ lsenkʾ , mer iwrakʾanchʾiwrin sepʾagan parpaṛov , ayn ergrin , orown mēch dznadz enkʾ :
44002009	Bartʾewner , Marer ow Eghamatsʾiner , ew anonkʾ or gĕ pnagin Michaketkʾi , Hrēastani , Gabatovgiayi , Bontosi , Asiayi ,
44002010	Pʾṛiwkiayi , Bampʾiwliayi ow Ekibtosi mēch , ew Giwrenēi mōt , Libiayi goghmerĕ , naew Hṛomēn kaghtʾadz Hreaner ow norahawatner ,
44002011	Gretatsʾiner ew Arapner , gĕ lsenkʾ tʾē anonkʾ gĕ khōsin Astowdzoy medzamedz kordzerown masin , mer lezownerov » .
44002012	Polorn al zmayladz ēin , ow taragowsadz , g!ĕsēin irarow : « Inchʾ grnay ĕllal asiga » .
44002013	Omankʾ al dzaghrelov g!ĕsēin : « Anonkʾ li en anoysh kiniov » .
44002014	Paytsʾ Betros ganknetsʾaw tasnmēgin het , partsratsʾowtsʾ tsaynĕ ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Ov Hrēastantsʾiner , ow towkʾ polort , or gĕ pnagikʾ Erowsaghēm , sa kittsʾēkʾ ew mtig ĕrēkʾ im khōskʾers :
44002015	orovhetew asonkʾ ochʾ tʾē arpetsʾadz en , inchʾbēs towkʾ g!entʾatrēkʾ , kʾani teṛ ōrowan errort zhamn , , ē ,
44002016	haba asiga ayn ē , or ĕsowetsʾaw Yovēl markarēin michotsʾov :
44002017	“ Verchin ōrerĕ , - g!ĕsē Astowadz , - im Hokiēs biti tʾapʾem amēn marmini vray , ew tser ortinern ow aghchignerĕ biti markarēanan , tser eritasartnerĕ tesilkʾner biti tesnen , ow tser dzererĕ erazner biti tesnen .
44002018	Im dzaṛanerows ew aghakhinnerows vray al ayt ōrerĕ im Hokiēs biti tʾapʾem , ow biti markarēanan .
44002019	Verĕ , erginkʾĕ , skʾanchʾelikʾner tsʾoytsʾ biti tam , ew varĕ , ergirĕ , nshanner , ariwn , grag ow dzowkhi maṛakhowgh :
44002020	arewĕ biti pʾokhowi khawari , ew lowsinĕ , ariwni , teṛ Tēroch medz ow ereweli ōrĕ chʾegadz .
44002021	Ew ov or ganchʾē Tēroch anownĕ , biti pʾrgowi ” .
44002022	Israyelatsʾi martig , lsetsʾēkʾ sa khōskʾerĕ : Yisows Nazovretsʾin , Astowdzmē tsezi tsʾoytsʾ trowadz mart mĕ , hrashkʾnerov , skʾanchʾelikʾnerov ow nshannerov - or Astowadz anor michotsʾov ĕraw tser mēch , inchʾbēs towkʾ al kitēkʾ - ,
44002023	Astowdzoy oroshadz dzrakirov ew gankhakitowtʾeamp matnowadz ĕllalov , aṛikʾ ew sbannetsʾikʾ anōrēnnerow tseṛkʾov , pʾayti vray kamelov .
44002024	Paytsʾ Astowadz yarowtsʾanetsʾ zayn , kʾagelov mahowan tsʾawerĕ , kʾani or gareli chʾēr or an pṛnowēr angē .
44002025	Orovhetew Tawitʾ g!ĕsē anor masin : “ Amēn aten gĕ tesnem Tērĕ im aṛchews , kʾani or im ach goghms ē , orbēszi chʾsasanim .
44002026	Owsti im sirts owrakhatsʾaw ew im lezows tsʾndzatsʾ : naew im marmins al biti hankstanay yoysov :
