44002027	orovhetew im antss biti chʾtʾoghows t zhokhkʾin mēch , ow biti chʾtʾoylatres or kʾow Sowrpt abaganowtʾiwn tesnē .
44002028	Geankʾi jampanerĕ kittsʾowtsʾir indzi : kʾow eresit owrakhowtʾeamp biti letsʾnes zis ” .
44002029	Martig eghpayrner , artōnowadz ē indzi hamartsagowtʾeamp khōsil tsezi Tawitʾ nahabetin masin , or vakhjanetsʾaw ow tʾaghowetsʾaw , ew anor kerezmanĕ minchʾew aysōr mer mēch ē .
44002030	Owremn , orovhetew an markarē ēr , - ew kitēr tʾē Astowadz ertowmov iren khostatsʾaw , tʾē biti yarowtsʾanē marmini hamemat ir mēchkʾin btowghēn eghogh Kʾristosĕ , or pazmi ir kahin vray , -
44002031	inkʾ gankhatesowtʾeamp khōsetsʾaw Kʾristosi yarowtʾean masin , tʾē anor antsĕ t zhokhkʾĕ chʾmnatsʾ ew anor marminĕ abaganowtʾiwn chʾtesaw .
44002032	Astowadz ays Yisowsĕ yarowtsʾanetsʾ , orown menkʾ polors al vgay enkʾ .
44002033	Owsti Astowdzoy ach tseṛkʾov partsranalov ow Hōrmēn stanalov Sowrp Hokiin khostowmĕ , tʾapʾetsʾ asiga , or towkʾ hima gĕ tesnēkʾ ow gĕ lsēkʾ .
44002034	Orovhetew Tawitʾ erginkʾ chʾelaw , paytsʾ inkʾ g!ĕsē : “ Tērĕ ĕsaw im Tērochs : « Pazmē im ach goghms ,
44002035	minchʾew or kʾow tʾshnaminert batowantan tnem otkʾerowt » ” .
44002036	Owremn Israyēli ampoghch townĕ stowkabēs tʾogh kitnay tʾē Astowadz zayn Tēr al ĕraw , ōdzeal al , ayt Yisowsĕ , or towkʾ khachʾetsʾikʾ » .
44002037	Erp lsetsʾin asiga , zghchatsʾin irentsʾ sirtin mēch ew ĕsin Betrosi ow miws aṛakʾealnerown : « Martig eghpayrner , inchʾ ĕnenkʾ » .
44002038	Betros ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Abashkharetsʾēkʾ , ow tsezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ tʾogh mgrtowi Yisows Kʾristosi anownov , meghkʾerow nerowmin hamar , ew biti stanakʾ Sowrp Hokiin barkewĕ .
44002039	Orovhetew khostowmĕ tsezi hamar ē , naew tser zawagnerown , ow polor heṛow eghoghnerown , or Tērĕ , mer Astowadzĕ biti ganchʾē » .
44002040	Ew owrish shat khōskʾerov gĕ vgayēr , gĕ yortorēr zanonkʾ ow g!ĕsēr : « Azatetsʾēkʾ towkʾ tsez ays gamagor serowntēn » .
44002041	Owsti anonkʾ , or sirayō zhar ĕntownetsʾin anor khōskʾerĕ , mgrtowetsʾan : ew ayt ōrĕ erekʾ hazar antsi chʾapʾ aweltsʾan egeghetsʾiin tʾiwin vray .
44002042	Anonkʾ misht gĕ yaratewēin aṛakʾealnerown owsowtsʾowmin ow haghortowtʾean , hatsʾ gtrelow ew aghōtʾelow mēch .
44002043	Vakhĕ hamagetsʾ amēn ants , , , ew shat skʾanchʾelikʾner ow nshanner gatarowetsʾan aṛakʾealnerown michotsʾov .
44002044	Polor hawatatsʾealnerĕ miasin ēin , ew polor panerĕ hasaragatsʾ ēin .
44002045	Gĕ dzakhēin irentsʾ statsʾowadzkʾnern ow inchʾkʾerĕ , ew anontsʾ kinĕ gĕ pa zhnēin polorin , orow or bētkʾ ĕllar .
44002046	Amēn ōr gĕ yaratewēin miapanowtʾeamp tajarĕ ertʾalow mēch , ew hatsʾ gtrelov irentsʾ townerown mēch , irentsʾ geragowrĕ g!owtēin tsʾndzowtʾeamp ow barzamtowtʾeamp .
44002047	Astowadz gĕ kovapanēin ew shnorhkʾ gĕ ktnēin ampoghch zhoghovowrtin aṛchew : ow Tērĕ ōrē ōr pʾrgowadzner g!aweltsʾnēr egeghetsʾiin tʾiwin vray .
44003001	Betros ow Yovhannēs innerort zhamow , , aghōtʾkʾin atenĕ miasin tajarĕ gĕ partsranayin .
44003002	Ir mōr orovaynēn gagh dznadz mart mĕ gĕ perowēr ew amēn ōr tajarin Keghetsʾig gochʾowadz tran kʾov gĕ trowēr , orbēszi tajarĕ mtnoghnerēn oghormowtʾiwn khntrē .
44003003	An , tesnelov Betrosn ow Yovhannēsĕ , oronkʾ tajarĕ biti mtnēin , oghormowtʾiwn khntretsʾ .
44003004	Isg Betros , Yovhannēsi het achʾkʾerĕ anor vray seweṛelov , ĕsaw : « Nayē mezi » .
44003005	An al owshatrowtʾiwn tartsowtsʾ anontsʾ , ew g!agngalēr pan mĕ stanal anontsʾmē .
44003006	Betros ĕsaw : « Ardzatʾ ow osgi chʾownim , haba inchʾ or ownim , zayn gow tam kʾezi : Nazovretsʾi Yisows Kʾristosi anownov , otkʾi elir ow kʾalē » .
44003007	Ew pṛnelov anor ach tseṛkʾēn , otkʾi hanetsʾ zayn . Anmichabēs anor otkʾerown nerpannern ow gojerĕ amratsʾan ,
44003008	ew ver tsʾatgelov , gaynetsʾaw , kʾaletsʾ ow anontsʾ het tajarĕ mtaw , kʾalelov , tsʾatgelov ew Astowadz kovapanelov .
44003009	Ampoghch zhoghovowrtĕ tesaw zayn , or gĕ kʾalēr ow Astowadz gĕ kovapanēr .
44003010	Kitēin tʾē an gĕ nstēr tajarin Keghetsʾig gochʾowadz tran kʾov , oghormowtʾean hamar : owsti aylayletsʾan ew hiatsʾowmov letsʾowetsʾan anor batahadzin hamar .
44003011	Kʾani or an gaṛchʾadz ēr Betrosi ow Yovhannēsi , ampoghch zhoghovowrtĕ , aylayladz , miasin vazetsʾ anontsʾ kʾov , Soghomoni gochʾowadz srahĕ .
44003012	Betros , tesnelov asiga , ĕsaw zhoghovowrtin : « Israyelatsʾi martig , inchʾow zarmatsʾadz ēkʾ asor vray , gam inchʾow aytbēs agnabish gĕ nayikʾ mezi , ipr tʾē menkʾ mer zōrowtʾeamp gam parebashtowtʾeamp kʾalel towinkʾ ator .
44003013	Aprahami , Isahagi ow Yagopi Astowadzĕ , mer hayrerown Astowadzĕ , pʾaṛaworetsʾ ir Ortin , Yisowsĕ , or towkʾ matnetsʾikʾ ew owratsʾakʾ Bighatosi aṛchew , erp inkʾ vjṛetsʾ or artsagē .
44003014	Paytsʾ towkʾ owratsʾakʾ ayt Sowrpĕ ew Artarĕ , ow khntretsʾikʾ or martasban mĕ shnorhowi tsezi ,
44003015	ew sbannetsʾikʾ geankʾi Ṛahviran . Isg Astowadz meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanetsʾ zayn , ow menkʾ vgay enkʾ ator .
44003016	Anor anownin hawatkʾov , anor anownĕ amratsʾowtsʾ asiga , or towkʾ gĕ tesnēkʾ ew gĕ janchʾnakʾ . Anov eghadz hawatkʾn ē , or aṛoghchatsʾowtsʾ zayn tser polorin aṛchew .
44003017	Ew hima , eghpayrner , kitem tʾē ankitowtʾeamp ĕrikʾ , inchʾbēs tser betern al .
44003018	Paytsʾ inchʾ or Astowadz nakhabēs , ir polor markarēnerown peranov , dzanowtsʾanadz ēr Kʾristosi chʾarchʾarowelown masin , aysbēs irakordzetsʾ .
44003019	Owremn abashkharetsʾēkʾ ow tartsi egēkʾ , orbēszi tser meghkʾerĕ chnchowin :
44003020	orbēszi gaztowrowmi atennerĕ kan Tēroch nergayowtʾenēn , ew ghrgē nakhabēs tsezi kʾarozowadz , , Yisows Kʾristosĕ .
44003021	Erginkʾĕ bētkʾ ē ĕntowni zayn minchʾew ayn zhamanagnerĕ , erp polor panerĕ verahastatowin , orontsʾ masin Astowadz khōsadz ē ir sowrp markarēnerown peranov , tarerow sgizpēn i ver .
44003022	Movsēs ĕsaw mer hayrerown : “ Tērĕ , tser Astowadzĕ , tser eghpayrnerēn biti hanē tsezi markarē mĕ , indzi nman : anor mtig ĕrēkʾ , amēn inchʾ or khōsi tsezi .
44003023	Ew amēn ants or mtig chʾĕnē ayt markarēin , biti pnachnchowi zhoghovowrtin mēchēn ” .
44003024	Ow polor markarēnerĕ , polor anonkʾ or yachortapar khōsetsʾan Samowēlē sgseal , nakhabēs dzanowtsʾanetsʾin ays ōrern al .
44003025	Towkʾ ēkʾ ortinerĕ markarēnerown ew ayn owkhtin , or Astowadz hastatetsʾ mer hayrerown het ow ĕsaw Aprahami : “ Kʾow zarmovt biti ōrhnowin ergri polor kertastannerĕ ” .
44003026	Astowadz ir Ortin yarowtsʾanelov , nakh tsezi ghrgetsʾ zayn , orbēszi ōrhnē tsez , iwrakʾanchʾiwrt tartsnelov tser chʾarowtʾiwnnerēn » .
44004001	Erp anonkʾ gĕ khōsēin zhoghovowrtin , kʾahananerĕ , tajarin medzaworn ow Satowgetsʾinerĕ hasan anontsʾ vray ,
44004002	neghanalov or anonkʾ gĕ sorvetsʾnēin zhoghovowrtin ew gĕ hṛchʾagēin Yisowsi michotsʾov meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛnelĕ .
44004003	TSeṛkʾ partsratsʾowtsʾin anontsʾ vray ow arkelaran trin zanonkʾ minchʾew heteweal ōrĕ , orovhetew artēn irigown ēr .
44004004	Paytsʾ ayt khōskʾĕ lsoghnerēn shater hawatatsʾin , ew martotsʾ tʾiwĕ hasaw kretʾē hink hazari .
44004005	Heteweal ōrĕ , Erowsaghēmi mēch hawakʾowetsʾan anontsʾ beterĕ , erētsʾnern ow tbirnerĕ ,
44004006	naew Anna kʾahanayabetĕ ew Gayiapʾa , Yovhannēs ow Aghekʾsantros , ew polor anonkʾ , or kʾahanayabeti ĕntanikʾnerē ēin .
44004007	Zanonkʾ mēchtegh gaynetsʾowtsʾadz , gĕ hartsʾakʾnnēin : « Inchʾ zōrowtʾeamp gam inchʾ anownov ĕrikʾ ays panĕ » .
44004008	Ayn aten Betros , Sowrp Hokiov letsʾowadz , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « ZHoghovowrti beter ew Israyēli erētsʾner ,
44004009	etʾē menkʾ gĕ hartsʾakʾnnowinkʾ aysōr , tgar martow mĕ eghadz parikʾin hamar , tʾē inchʾ gerbov p zhshgowetsʾaw ,
44004010	kittsʾēkʾ towkʾ polort ew ampoghch Israyēli zhoghovowrtĕ , tʾē Nazovretsʾi Yisows Kʾristosi anownov , or towkʾ khachʾetsʾikʾ paytsʾ Astowadz meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanetsʾ , aha anov asiga p zhshgowadz getsʾadz ē hos , tser aṛchew .
44004011	Ays ē ayn kʾarĕ , tsezmē , gaṛowtsʾanoghnerēt anarkowadz , or angiwnakʾarĕ eghaw .
44004012	Ew owrish ochʾ mēgov pʾrgowtʾiwn gay : orovhetew angē zat owrish anown mĕ chʾgay erginkʾi tag , martotsʾ mēch trowadz , orov garenankʾ pʾrgowil » .
44004013	Isg anonkʾ , nayelov Betrosi ow Yovhannēsi hamartsagowtʾean , ew ĕmpṛnelov tʾē anows ow tkēt martig en , zarmatsʾan , ew kittsʾan tʾē anonkʾ Yisowsi het ēin .
44004014	Tesnelov ayt pow zhowadz martĕ , or gaynadz ēr anontsʾ het , ochʾinchʾ grtsʾan khōsil anontsʾ tēm .
44004015	Owsti hramayelov anontsʾ , or towrs ellen ateanēn , khorhrtagtsʾetsʾan irarow het
44004016	ew ĕsin : « Inchʾ ĕnenkʾ ays martotsʾ : orovhetew Erowsaghēmi polor pnagichʾnerown patsʾayayt ē tʾē isgabēs ereweli nshan mĕ gatarowetsʾaw asontsʾ michotsʾov , ow menkʾ chʾenkʾ grnar owranal .
44004017	Sagayn , orbēszi zhoghovowrtin mēch al aweli chʾtaradzowi , sastig sbaṛnankʾ anontsʾ , or aylews ochʾ mēgown khōsin ayt anownov » .
44004018	Aba ganchʾelov zanonkʾ , batowiretsʾin anontsʾ or amenewin chʾkhōsin ew chʾsorvetsʾnen Yisowsi anownov .
44004019	Paytsʾ Betros ow Yovhannēs bataskhanetsʾin anontsʾ : « Etʾē Astowdzoy aṛchew irawatsʾi ē , or Astowdzmē aweli tsezi mtig ĕnenkʾ , towkʾ tatetsʾēkʾ :
44004020	orovhetew menkʾ chʾenkʾ grnar chʾkhōsil mer tesadzin ow lsadzin masin » .
44004021	Isg anonkʾ tartseal sbaṛnalē etkʾ , artsagetsʾin zanonkʾ , aṛantsʾ zirenkʾ batowhaselow gerb mĕ ktnelow , zhoghovowrtin batjaṛov , kʾani or polorn al gĕ pʾaṛapanēin Astowadz gatarowadzin hamar :
44004022	orovhetew ayn martĕ , orown vray ays p zhshgowtʾean nshanĕ eghaw , kʾaṛasown tareganēn aweli ēr .
44004023	Erp artsagowetsʾan , katsʾin irentsʾ khowmpin kʾov , ow batmetsʾin inchʾ or kʾahanayabetnerĕ ew erētsʾnerĕ ĕsadz ēin irentsʾ .
44004024	Anonkʾ al , erp lsetsʾin , miapanowtʾeamp irentsʾ tsaynĕ partsratsʾowtsʾin Astowdzoy , ĕselov : « Tēr , town es ayn Astowadzĕ , or steghdzetsʾir erginkʾn ow ergirĕ , dzovĕ ew polor anontsʾ mēch eghadznerĕ ,
44004025	or ĕsir kʾow dzaṛayit , Tawitʾi peranov : “ Inchʾow hetʾanosnerĕ moleknetsʾan ow zhoghovowrtnerĕ ownayn paner khogatsʾin :
44004026	ergri tʾakawornerĕ irarow kʾov gaynetsʾan ow beterĕ hawakʾowetsʾan , Tēroch tēm ew anor ōdzealin tēm ” .
44004027	Orovhetew jshmartabēs ( ays kʾaghakʾin mēch ) hawakʾowetsʾan kʾow sowrp Ortiit , Yisowsi tēm , or town ōdzetsʾir , Herovtēs ow Bontatsʾi Bighatos , hetʾanosnerown het ew Israyēli zhoghovowrtin het ,
44004028	ĕnelow ayn , inchʾ or kʾow tseṛkʾt ow dzrakirt nakhabēs oroshadz ēin , or gatarowin .
44004029	Ew hima , Tēr , nayē anontsʾ sbaṛnalikʾnerown , ow shnorhē kʾow dzaṛanerowt , orbēszi lman hamartsagowtʾeamp kʾarozenkʾ kʾow khōskʾt ,
44004030	ergarelov kʾow tseṛkʾt , or p zhshgowtʾiwnner , nshanner ew skʾanchʾelikʾner gatarowin kʾow sowrp Ortiit , Yisowsi anownov » .
44004031	Erp anonkʾ aghersetsʾin , sarsetsʾaw ayn teghĕ , owr hawakʾowadz ēin , ow polorĕ letsʾowetsʾan Sowrp Hokiov ew hamartsagowtʾeamp gĕ kʾarozēin Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ .
44004032	Hawatatsʾealnerown pazmowtʾiwnĕ mēg sirt ow mēg hoki ēr . Anontsʾmē ochʾ mēgĕ g!ĕsēr ir orewē statsʾowadzkʾin hamar tʾē “ irn ē ” : haba irentsʾ polor panerĕ hasaragatsʾ gĕ sebēin .
44004033	Aṛakʾealnerĕ medz zōrowtʾeamp gĕ vgayēin Tēr Yisowsi yarowtʾean masin , ew medz shnorhkʾ gar anontsʾ polorin vray .
44004034	Anontsʾ mēch ochʾ mēg garōteal gar : orovhetew anonkʾ or tēr ēin arterow gam townerow , gĕ dzakhēin , gĕ perēin dzakhowadznerown hasoytʾnerĕ
44004035	ow gĕ tnēin aṛakʾealnerow tramatrowtʾean tag , , , ew iwrakʾanchʾiwrin gĕ pashkhowēr ir garikʾin hamemat .
44004036	Yovsēs , or aṛakʾealnerēn Paṛnapas maganowanowetsʾaw , ( or gĕ tʾarkmanowi , Mkhitʾarowtʾean orti , ) GHewtatsʾi , dznowntov , Gibratsʾi ,
44004037	akarag mĕ ownenalov , dzakhetsʾ , peraw tramĕ ow traw aṛakʾealnerow tramatrowtʾean tag .
44005001	Paytsʾ mart mĕ , Anania anownov , ir gnoch , Sapʾirayi het statsʾowadzkʾ mĕ dzakhetsʾ ,
44005002	anor hasoytʾēn khoretsʾ ir gnoch kitagtsʾowtʾeamp , ow mas mĕ perelov , traw aṛakʾealnerow tramatrowtʾean tag , , .
44005003	Betros ĕsaw : « Anania , inchʾow Satanan letsʾowtsʾ sirtt , or stes Sowrp Hokiin ew khores artin hasoytʾēn .
44005004	Kʾowgt chʾēr an , kʾani getsʾadz ēr , ow dzakhowadz al , ishkhanowtʾeant tag ēr . Inchʾow ays panĕ trir sirtit mēch : town stetsʾir ochʾ tʾē martotsʾ , haba , Astowdzoy » .
44005005	Anania , lselov ays khōskʾerĕ , ingaw ew shownchʾĕ pʾchʾetsʾ : ow medz vakh hamagetsʾ polor anonkʾ , , or lsetsʾin asiga .
44005006	Eritasartnerĕ ganknetsʾan , batankʾov pʾatʾtʾetsʾin zayn , ew towrs hanelov tʾaghetsʾin .
44005007	Kretʾē erekʾ zham etkʾ , anor ginĕ ners mtaw , chʾkitnalov batahadzĕ .
44005008	Betros ĕsaw anor : « Ĕsē indzi , artĕ ayt kinov dzakhetsʾikʾ » . An al ĕsaw : « Ayo , ayt kinov » .
44005009	Owsti Betros ĕsaw anor : « Ayt inchʾ ē , or towkʾ hamatsaynetsʾakʾ , Tēroch Hokin pʾortselow : aha amowsint tʾaghoghnerown otkʾerĕ tran kʾov en , kʾez al biti hanen towrs » .
44005010	Ew anmichabēs ginĕ ingaw anor otkʾerown kʾov ow shownchʾĕ pʾchʾetsʾ . Eritasartnerĕ , ners mtnelov , meṛadz ktan zayn , ew towrs hanelov , tʾaghetsʾin ir amowsinin kʾov .
44005011	Medz vakh mĕ hamagetsʾ ampoghch egeghetsʾin , ow polor anonkʾ , or lsetsʾin ays panerĕ .
44005012	SHat nshanner ew skʾanchʾelikʾner gĕ kordzowēin aṛakʾealnerown tseṛkʾov , zhoghovowrtin mēch , ow polorĕ miapanowtʾeamp Soghomoni srahin mēch ēin .
44005013	Owrishnerēn ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ yantknēr yaril anontsʾ , paytsʾ zhoghovowrtĕ gĕ medzarēr zanonkʾ .
44005014	Tēroch hawatatsʾoghnerĕ al aweli gĕ shatnayin , ayr martig ow giner , pazmowtʾeamp :
44005015	aynbēs or hiwantnerĕ gĕ hanēin hrabaragnerĕ ew gĕ tnēin batkaragnerov ow mahijnerov , orbēszi Betrosi antsʾnelow aten , konē anor showkʾĕ iynay anontsʾmē mēgown vray .
44005016	SHrchagay kʾaghakʾnerown pazmowtʾiwnĕ Erowsaghēm gĕ hamakhmpowēr , hiwantner ew anmakʾowr okinerē tanchowoghner perelov , oronkʾ polorn al gĕ pow zhowēin .
44005017	Isg kʾahanayabetn ow polor iren het eghoghnerĕ , oronkʾ Satowgetsʾinerow aghantēn ēin , ganknetsʾan , nakhantsov letsʾowadz ,
44005018	tseṛkʾ partsratsʾowtsʾin aṛakʾealnerown vray ew trin zanonkʾ hanrayin arkelaranĕ .
44005019	Paytsʾ Tēroch hreshtagĕ kisherowan mēch patsʾaw pantin tṛnerĕ , ow towrs hanelov zanonkʾ , ĕsaw :
44005020	« Katsʾēkʾ , ew tajarin mēch gaynelov , zhoghovowrtin kʾarozetsʾēkʾ ays geankʾin polor khōskʾerĕ » .
44005021	Erp lsetsʾin asiga , tajarĕ mtan aṛtown ganowkh , ew gĕ sorvetsʾnēin . Isg kʾahanayabetĕ egaw , naew iren het eghoghnerĕ , zhoghovi ganchʾetsʾin ateanĕ ew Israyēli ortinerown ampoghch dzeragoytĕ , ow mart ghrgetsʾin pantĕ , orbēszi peren zanonkʾ .
44005022	Erp sbasawornerĕ katsʾin , chʾktnelov zanonkʾ pantin mēch , veratartsan , batmetsʾin
44005023	ew ĕsin : « Iraw ē tʾē ktankʾ pantĕ , amēn abahovowtʾeamp kotsʾowadz , ow bahabannerĕ , tṛnerown aṛchew gaynadz : paytsʾ panalov , ochʾ mēgĕ ktankʾ nersĕ » .
44005024	Erp medz kʾahanan ew tajarin medzaworn ow kʾahanayabetnerĕ lsetsʾin ays khōskʾerĕ , gĕ taragowsēin tʾē inchʾ eghadz ēr anontsʾ .
44005025	Mēgĕ egaw ew batmetsʾ irentsʾ : « Aha ayn martigĕ , or pantĕ tradz ēikʾ , tajarĕ gaynadz en ow zhoghovowrtin gĕ sorvetsʾnen » .
44005026	Ayn aten medzaworĕ knatsʾ sbasawornerown het ew peraw zanonkʾ aṛantsʾ pṛnowtʾean , orovhetew gĕ vakhnayin zhoghovowrtēn , or chʾkʾargodzowin .
44005027	Erp perin zanonkʾ , nergayatsʾowtsʾin ateanin , ow kʾahanayabetĕ hartsʾowtsʾ anontsʾ :
44005028	« Sastig chʾbatowiretsʾinkʾ tsezi , or chʾsorvetsʾnēkʾ ayt anownov : paytsʾ towkʾ Erowsaghēmĕ letsʾowtsʾikʾ tser owsowtsʾowmov , ew gĕ pʾapʾakʾikʾ mer vray perel ayn martown ariwnĕ » .
44005029	Betros ew miws aṛakʾealnerĕ bataskhanetsʾin : « Astowdzoy bētkʾ ē hnazantil , pʾokhanag martotsʾ .
44005030	Mer hayrerown Astowadzĕ Yisowsĕ yarowtsʾanetsʾ , or towkʾ sbannetsʾikʾ , pʾaytēn gakhelov .
44005031	Astowadz ir ach tseṛkʾov partsratsʾowtsʾ zayn , ipr Ṛahviray ow Pʾrgichʾ , orbēszi abashkharowtʾiwn ow meghkʾerow nerowm tay Israyēli .
44005032	Ew menkʾ anor vganern enkʾ , ays panerown hamar , naew Sowrp Hokin , or Astowadz towaw iren hnazant eghoghnerown » .
44005033	Isg anonkʾ lselov asiga , sastig krkṛowetsʾan , ow khorhrtagtsʾetsʾan or sbannen zanonkʾ .
44005034	Paytsʾ pʾarisetsʾi mĕ , orown anownĕ Kamaghiēl ēr , ōrēnkʾi vartabet mĕ , batowawor mēgĕ , ampoghch zhoghovowrtin aṛchew , ganknetsʾaw ateanin mēch , ew hramayetsʾ or aṛakʾealnerĕ garj bah mĕ towrs hanen :
44005035	aba ĕsaw : « Israyelatsʾi martig , towkʾ tsezi owshatir eghēkʾ tʾē inchʾ biti ĕnēkʾ ays martotsʾ hantēb .
44005036	Kʾani or ays ōrerēn aṛach Tʾewtas elaw , ir masin ĕselov tʾē ereweli mēgn ē , ow tʾiwov chʾors hariwri chʾapʾ martig yaretsʾan iren : inkʾ sbannowetsʾaw , ew polor anonkʾ or ansatsʾin iren , tsʾrowetsʾan ow ochʾnchʾatsʾan .
44005037	Angē etkʾ Yowta Kalileatsʾin elaw , ashkharhakir eghadz ōrerĕ , ew shat zhoghovowrt kʾashetsʾ ir etewēn : inkʾ al gorsowetsʾaw , ow polor anonkʾ or ansatsʾin iren , tsʾrowetsʾan .
44005038	Ew hima g!ĕsem tsezi : “ Heṛow mnatsʾēkʾ , , ayt martotsʾmēn , ow tʾoghowtsʾēkʾ zanonkʾ : orovhetew etʾē ayt dzrakirĕ gam kordzĕ martotsʾmē ē , biti kʾantowi ,
44005039	isg etʾē Astowdzmē ē , chʾēkʾ grnar kʾantel atiga : orbēszi Astowdzoy tēm isg gṛowogh chʾktnowikʾ ” » .
44005040	Anonkʾ al ansatsʾin anor : ew aṛakʾealnerĕ ganchʾelov , dzedzetsʾin , ow batowirelov or aylews Yisowsi anownov chʾkhōsin , artsagetsʾin zanonkʾ .
44005041	Irenkʾ al megnetsʾan ateanin aṛchewēn , owrakhanalov or ar zhanatsʾan Tēroch anownin hamar anbatowowelow .
44005042	Ow amēn ōr tajarĕ ew townerown mēch chʾēin tatrer sorvetsʾnelē ow Yisows Kʾristosĕ awetelē .
44006001	Ayt ōrerĕ , erp ashagertnerĕ shattsʾan , Hellenatsʾinerown goghmēn trtownch mĕ eghaw Eprayetsʾinerown tēm : orovhetew irentsʾ ayrinerĕ g!antesowēin amēn ōrowan oghormowtʾean sbasargowtʾean aten .
44006002	Tasnergowkʾĕ ganchʾetsʾin ashagertnerown pazmowtʾiwnĕ ew ĕsin : « Mezi chʾi vayler tskel Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ , ew sbasargel seghannerow .
44006003	Owremn , eghpayrner , pʾntṛetsʾēkʾ tser mēch eōtʾĕ hoki , pari vgayowadz , Sowrp Hokiov ow imastowtʾeamp letsʾown , orbēszi nshanagenkʾ zanonkʾ ays zpaghowmin hamar ,
44006004	isg menkʾ yaratewenkʾ aghōtʾkʾi ew Astowdzoy khōskʾin sbasargowtʾean mēch » .
44006005	Ays khōskʾĕ hajetsʾowtsʾ ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ : owsti ĕntretsʾin Stepʾanosĕ , hawatkʾov ow Sowrp Hokiov letsʾown mart mĕ , Pʾilibbosĕ , Brokʾoronĕ , Niganovran , Timovnan , Barmenan ew Nigoghayos norahawat Antiokʾtsʾin .
44006006	Asonkʾ nergayatsʾowtsʾin aṛakʾealnerown : anonkʾ al aghōtʾelov , irentsʾ tseṛkʾerĕ trin anontsʾ vray .
44006007	Ew Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ g!ajēr , ashagertnerown tʾiwĕ chʾapʾazantsʾ gĕ shatnar Erowsaghēmi mēch , ow kʾahananerēn medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ gĕ hnazantēr nor hawatkʾin .
44006008	Stepʾanos , or hawatkʾov ow zōrowtʾeamp letsʾowadz mart mĕn ēr , medz skʾanchʾelikʾner ew nshanner g!ĕnēr zhoghovowrtin mēch .
44006009	Paytsʾ omankʾ , ayn zhoghovaranēn , or gĕ gochʾowēr Azatakrowadznerown , Giwrenatsʾinerown ow Aghekʾsantratsʾinerown zhoghovaranĕ , ew omankʾ , or Giligiayēn ow Asiayēn ēin , ganknetsʾan ew gĕ vijapanēin Stepʾanosi het :
44006010	paytsʾ garogh chʾēin timatrel ayn imastowtʾean ow hokiin , orov an gĕ khōsēr .
44006011	Ayn aten gashaṛetsʾin kʾani mĕ martig , orbēszi ĕsen : « Menkʾ lsetsʾinkʾ tʾē an hayhoyagan khōskʾer g!artasanēr Movsēsi ew Astowdzoy tēm » .
44006012	Aysbēs , krkṛetsʾin zhoghovowrtĕ , erētsʾnern ow tbirnerĕ , ew hasnelov anor vray , yapʾshtagetsʾin zinkʾ ow tarin ateanin aṛchew .
44006013	Sowt vganer nergayatsʾowtsʾin , oronkʾ g!ĕsēin : « Ays martĕ chʾi tatrir hayhoyagan khōskʾer artasanelē ays sowrp teghin ew ōrēnkʾin tēm .
44006014	Orovhetew lsetsʾinkʾ irmē , or g!ĕsēr tʾē “ ays Nazovretsʾi Yisowsĕ biti kʾagē ays teghĕ , ow biti pʾokhē Movsēsi mezi awantadz sovorowtʾiwnnerĕ ” » .
44006015	Polor ateanin mēch pazmoghnerĕ erp agnabish nayetsʾan anor , anor eresĕ tesan , hreshtagi eresi bēs .
44007001	Kʾahanayabetĕ ĕsaw : « Ayt panerĕ aytbēs en irabēs » .
44007002	An al ĕsaw : « Martig eghpayrner ow hayrer , mtig ĕrēkʾ : pʾaṛkʾi Astowadzĕ erewtsʾaw mer hōr , Aprahami , erp Michaketkʾi mēch ēr , teṛ KHaṛani mēch chʾpnagadz , ew ĕsaw anor :
44007003	“ Elir kʾow ergrēt ow azkagannerēt , ew kna ayn ergirĕ , or es biti tsʾowtsʾnem kʾezi ” .
44007004	Ayn aten , ellelov Kʾaghtēatsʾinerow ergrēn , pnagetsʾaw KHaṛani mēch , ew anor hōr meṛnelēn etkʾ , angē pʾokhatretsʾ zayn ays ergirĕ , owr towkʾ gĕ pnagikʾ hima .
44007005	Ochʾ mēg zhaṛankowtʾiwn towaw anor ays ergrin mēch , ochʾ isg otkʾi kʾayli mĕ chʾapʾ tegh : paytsʾ khostatsʾaw asiga ipr galowadz tal iren , ew irmē etkʾ , ir zarmin , erp teṛ inkʾ zawag chʾownēr .
44007006	Astowadz sabēs khōsetsʾaw : “ Anor zarmĕ bantowkht biti ĕllay ōtar ergri mĕ mēch , ow zayn strowg biti ĕnen ew chʾarchʾaren chʾors hariwr tari .
44007007	Paytsʾ es biti tatem ayn azkĕ , orown strowg biti ĕllan , - ĕsaw Astowadz , - ew angē etkʾ biti ellen ow ays teghin mēch biti bashten zis ” .
44007008	Anor towaw tʾlpʾatowtʾean owkhtĕ , ew yetoy Apraham dznaw Isahagĕ , ow tʾlpʾatetsʾ zayn owtʾerort ōrĕ . Isahag dznaw Yagopĕ , Yagop al , tasnergow nahabetnerĕ .
44007009	« Nahabetnerĕ , nakhantselov Yovsēpʾi , dzakhetsʾin zayn Ekibtos tarowelow hamar : paytsʾ Astowadz anor het ēr ,
44007010	ow azatetsʾ zayn ir polor taṛabankʾnerēn . SHnorhkʾ ew imastowtʾiwn towaw anor Ekibtosi Pʾarawon tʾakaworin aṛchew : an al gaṛavarichʾ nshanagetsʾ zayn Ekibtosi ow ir ampoghch tan vray .
44007011	Erp Ekibtosi ew Kʾanani ampoghch ergrin mēch sov eghaw , ow medz taṛabankʾ , mer hayrerĕ owtelikʾ chʾēin ktner .
44007012	Yagop , erp lsetsʾ tʾē Ekibtosi mēch tsʾoren gĕ ktnowi , aṛachin ankam jampetsʾ mer hayrerĕ .
44007013	Ergrort ankam , Yovsēpʾ janchʾtsʾowtsʾ inkʾzinkʾ ir eghpayrnerown , ew Yovsēpʾi tsʾeghĕ yaytni eghaw Pʾarawoni .
44007014	Yovsēpʾ mart ghrgetsʾ ow ganchʾetsʾ ir hayrĕ , Yagopĕ , ew polor azkagannerĕ , eōtʾanasownhink ants .
44007015	Yagop ichaw Ekibtos , owr vakhjanetsʾan inkʾ ow mer hayrerĕ ,
44007016	ew pʾokhatrowelov Siwkʾēm , trowetsʾan ayn kerezmanin mēch , or Apraham ardzatʾov knadz ēr Siwkʾēmi hōr , Emovri ortinerēn .
44007017	Erp mōtetsʾaw zhamanagĕ khostowmin , orown hamar Astowadz ertowm ĕradz ēr Aprahami , zhoghovowrtĕ ajetsʾaw ow pazmatsʾaw Ekibtosi mēch ,
44007018	minchʾew or owrish tʾakawor mĕ elaw , or chʾēr janchʾnar Yovsēpʾĕ .
44007019	An khoramangowtʾeamp varowetsʾaw mer tsʾeghin tēm ew chʾarchʾaretsʾ mer hayrerĕ , minchʾew ankam anontsʾ erakhanerĕ towrs netel talov , orbēszi chʾabretsʾnē .
44007020	« Ayt aten Movsēs al dznaw , or keghetsʾig ēr Astowdzoy aṛchew , ow erekʾ amis medztsʾaw ir hōr townĕ .
44007021	Erp an towrs trowetsʾaw , Pʾarawoni aghchigĕ taraw zayn ew medztsʾowtsʾ ipr ir ortin .
44007022	Movsēs grtʾowetsʾaw Ekibtatsʾinerown ampoghch imastowtʾeamp , ow zōrawor ēr ir khōskʾerov ew kordzerov .
44007023	Erp lman kʾaṛasown taregan eghaw , ir sirtĕ pʾapʾakʾetsʾaw aytsʾelel ir eghpayrnerown , Israyēli ortinerown .
44007024	Anirawowadz tesnelov Israyelatsʾinerēn mēgĕ , bashtbanetsʾ zayn , ew ĕngjowadzin vrē zhĕ aṛaw , zarnelov Ekibtatsʾin .
44007025	Gĕ gardzēr tʾē ir eghpayrnerĕ biti hasgnayin tʾē Astowadz irentsʾ pʾrgowtʾiwn biti tar ir tseṛkʾov : paytsʾ anonkʾ chʾhasgtsʾan .
44007026	Heteweal ōrĕ hantibetsʾaw anontsʾ , erp gĕ gṛowēin , ew owzetsʾ hashtetsʾnel zanonkʾ , ĕselov : “ Martig , towkʾ eghpayrner ēkʾ : inchʾow g!anirawēkʾ zirar ” .
44007027	Paytsʾ an or g!anirawēr ĕngerĕ , vanetsʾ zinkʾ ow ĕsaw : “ Ov kʾez bet ew irawarar nshanagetsʾ mer vray .
44007028	Zis al g!owzes sbannel , inchʾbēs erēg sbannetsʾir Ekibtatsʾin ” .
44007029	Ays khōskʾēn etkʾ Movsēs pʾakhaw ow bantkhtatsʾaw Matiami ergrin mēch , owr dznaw ergow orti .
44007030	Erp kʾaṛasown tarin lratsʾaw , Tēroch hreshtagĕ erewtsʾaw anor Sina leran anabatin mēch , morenii gragi potsʾov .
44007031	Movsēs al , erp nshmaretsʾ , zarmatsʾaw ayt tesilkʾin vray , ow erp mōtetsʾaw titelow , Tēroch tsaynĕ egaw anor , or g!ĕsēr :
44007032	“ Es em kʾow hayrerowt Astowadzĕ , Aprahami Astowadzĕ , Isahagi Astowadzĕ ew Yagopi Astowadzĕ ” . Movsēs al , vakhēn toghalov , chʾēr yantkner titel .
44007033	Tērĕ ĕsaw anor : “ Hanē otkʾerowt gōshignerĕ , orovhetew sowrp ergir ē ayn teghĕ , owr gaynadz es .
44007034	Irabēs tesay Ekibtosi mēch eghogh zhoghovowrtis chʾarchʾarankʾĕ , lsetsʾi anontsʾ haṛachʾankʾĕ , ew ichay zanonkʾ azatelow : ow hima egowr , kʾez ghrgem Ekibtos ” .
44007035	« Ays Movsēsĕ , or owratsʾan , ĕselov : “ Ov bet ew irawarar nshanagetsʾ kʾez ” , zayn ghrgetsʾ Astowadz ipr bet ew azatarar , ayn hreshtagin tseṛkʾov , or erewtsʾaw anor moreniin mēch .
44007036	Aniga towrs hanetsʾ zanonkʾ , skʾanchʾelikʾner ow nshanner tsʾoytsʾ talov Ekibtosi ergrin ew Garmir dzovown , ow kʾaṛasown tari , anabatin mēch .
44007037	Ays Movsēsn ē or ĕsaw Israyēli ortinerown : “ Tērĕ , tser Astowadzĕ , tser eghpayrnerēn biti hanē tsezi markarē mĕ , indzi nman : mtig ĕrēkʾ anor ” .
44007038	Asiga an ē or hamakhmpowmin mēch ēr , anabatĕ , Sina leran vray iren khōsogh hreshtagin ew mer hayrerown het . An genarar batkamner ĕntownetsʾ , mezi talow :
44007039	paytsʾ mer hayrerĕ chʾowzetsʾin anor hnazantil , haba zayn vanetsʾin irentsʾmē ow Ekibtos tartsan irentsʾ sirtin mēch ,
44007040	ĕselov Aharoni : “ Astowadzner shinē mezi , orbēszi ertʾan mer aṛchewēn : orovhetew ayt Movsēsĕ , or hanetsʾ mez Ekibtosi ergrēn , chʾenkʾ kiter tʾē inchʾ eghaw anor ” .
44007041	Ayn ōrerĕ shinetsʾin hortʾ mĕ , zoh matowtsʾanetsʾin gowṛkʾin , ew g!owrakhanayin irentsʾ tseṛkʾerown kordzerov .
44007042	Astowadz al eres tartsowtsʾ ow matnetsʾ zanonkʾ bashtelow erginkʾi astgherĕ , inchʾbēs krowadz ē Markarēnerow kirkʾin mēch : “ Mitʾē indzi matowtsʾanetsʾikʾ mortʾowadz anasownner ew zoher , kʾaṛasown tari anabatin mēch , ov Israyēli townĕ .
44007043	Haba gretsʾikʾ Moghokʾi vranĕ ow tser Hṛempʾa astowdzoyn astghĕ , tser gertadz batgernerĕ , anontsʾ ergrbakelow hamar . Es al biti tarakrem tsez Papeloni miws goghmĕ ” .
44007044	« Anabatin mēch , mer hayrerĕ ownēin vgayowtʾean khoranĕ , inchʾbēs Movsēsi het khōsoghĕ batowiradz ēr or shinē zayn , tesadz tibarin bēs .
44007045	Anontsʾ yachortogh mer hayrern al , zayn stanalov , Yesowi het mttsʾowtsʾin galowadzĕ ayn hetʾanosnerown , or Astowadz vanetsʾ mer hayrerown aṛchewēn . Hon mnatsʾ minchʾew Tawitʾi ōrerĕ ,
44007046	or Astowdzoy aṛchew shnorhkʾ ktaw ew owzetsʾ pnagaran mĕ gaṛowtsʾanel Yagopi Astowdzoyn :
44007047	paytsʾ Soghomon town mĕ gaṛowtsʾanetsʾ anor .
44007048	Sagayn Amenapartsrĕ chʾi pnagir tseṛagert tajarnerow mēch , inchʾbēs markarēn g!ĕsē :
44007049	“ Erginkʾĕ im kahs ē , ow ergirĕ im otkʾerows batowantann ē : inchʾbisi town biti gaṛowtsʾanēkʾ indzi , - g!ĕsē Tērĕ , - gam inchʾbēs biti ĕllay im hankstavayris teghĕ :
44007050	mitʾē im tseṛkʾs chʾē shiner ays polorĕ ” .
44007051	« KHstabaranotsʾner ow sirtov ew aganchov antʾlpʾatner , towkʾ misht g!ĕnttimanakʾ Sowrp Hokiin , inchʾbēs tser hayrerĕ , aynbēs al towkʾ .
44007052	Markarēnerēn orĕ chʾhaladzetsʾin tser hayrerĕ , ow chʾsbannetsʾin anonkʾ , or nakhabēs dzanowtsʾanetsʾin ayn Artarin kalowstĕ . Anor matnichʾnerĕ ew sbannoghnerĕ eghakʾ hima ,
44007053	towkʾ , or statsʾakʾ ōrēnkʾĕ hreshtagnerow garkatrowtʾeamp , paytsʾ chʾbahetsʾikʾ zayn » .
44007054	Ays panerĕ lselov , anonkʾ gĕ moleknēin irentsʾ sirterown mēch ew gĕ grjtēin irentsʾ agṛanerĕ anor tēm .
44007055	Paytsʾ an , letsʾowadz Sowrp Hokiov , agnabish nayetsʾaw tēbi erginkʾ , tesaw Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾĕ ow Yisowsn al , or Astowdzoy ach goghmĕ gaynadz ēr ,
44007056	ew ĕsaw : « Aha gĕ tesnem erginkʾĕ patsʾowadz , ow martow Ortin , Astowdzoy ach goghmĕ gaynadz » .
44007057	Isg anonkʾ partsratsayn aghaghagelov , kotsʾetsʾin irentsʾ aganchnerĕ , ew polorĕ miapanowtʾeamp khow zhetsʾin anor vray ,
44007058	ow kʾaghakʾēn towrs hanelov , kʾargodzetsʾin zayn : ew vganerĕ irentsʾ hantertsnerĕ bah trin eritasarti mĕ otkʾerown kʾov , or gĕ gochʾowēr Sōghos .
44007059	Ow gĕ kʾargodzēin Stepʾanosĕ , or gĕ kochʾēr : « Tēr Yisows , ĕntownē im hokis » .
44007060	Ew dznratrelov , partsratsayn aghaghagetsʾ : « Tēr , ays meghkʾĕ mi seber atontsʾ » . Asiga ĕselov , nnchetsʾ . Sōghos al gamagitsʾ ēr anor sbannowelown .	
44008001	Ayt ōrĕ medz haladzankʾ eghaw Erowsaghēmi mēch eghogh egeghetsʾiin tēm . Aṛakʾealnerēn zat , polorn al tsʾrowetsʾan Hrēastani ow Samariayi ergramaserown mēch .
44008002	Parebasht martig vertsʾowtsʾin Stepʾanosĕ , ew medzabēs hedzedzetsʾin anor vray .
44008003	Isg Sōghos g!awerēr egeghetsʾin : gĕ mtnēr townerĕ , gĕ kʾashgṛtēr ayr martig ow giner , ew gĕ matnēr zanonkʾ , pant netowelow .
44008004	Owremn anonkʾ or tsʾrowadz ēin , gĕ shrchēin khōskʾĕ awetelov .
44008005	Pʾilibbos al Samariayi mēg kʾaghakʾĕ ichnelov , Kʾristosĕ gĕ kʾarozēr anontsʾ .
44008006	Ew pazmowtʾiwnĕ , miapan , owshatir ēr Pʾilibbosi ĕsadznerown , lselov ow tesnelov anor ĕradz nshannerĕ .
44008007	Orovhetew anmakʾowr okinerĕ partsratsayn koṛalov towrs g!ellēin pazmatʾiw tiwaharnerē ,
44008008	ew shat antamaloydzner ow gagher gĕ pow zhowēin .
44008009	Owsti medz owrakhowtʾiwn eghaw ayt kʾaghakʾin mēch . Paytsʾ mart mĕ gar , Simon anownov , or nakhabēs mokowtʾiwn g!ĕnēr ayt kʾaghakʾin mēch ew gĕ shshmetsʾnēr Samariayi azkĕ , ir masin ĕselov tʾē medz mēgn ē .
44008010	Polorn al , bztigēn minchʾew medzĕ , owshatir ēin anor ow g!ĕsēin : « Asiga Astowdzoy medz ( gochʾowadz ) zōrowtʾiwnn ē » .
44008011	Owshatrowtʾiwn gĕ tartsnēin iren , orovhetew gĕ shshmetsʾnēr zirenkʾ mokowtʾiwnnerov , ergar zhamanagē i ver .
44008012	Paytsʾ erp hawatatsʾin Pʾilibbosi , or g!awetēr Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean ow Yisows Kʾristosi anownin masin , mgrtowetsʾan tʾē ayr martig ew tʾē giner .
44008013	Simon inkʾ al hawatatsʾ , ow mgrtowelov , chʾēr tʾoghowr Pʾilibbosĕ , , , ew gĕ zmaylēr , tesnelov gatarowadz hrashkʾnern ow medz nshannerĕ .
44008014	Erp Erowsaghēmi mēch eghogh aṛakʾealnerĕ lsetsʾin tʾē Samaratsʾinerĕ ĕntownadz en Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ , ghrgetsʾin anontsʾ Betrosn ow Yovhannēsĕ ,
44008015	oronkʾ hon hasnelov , aghōtʾetsʾin anontsʾ hamar , orbēszi stanan Sowrp Hokin .
44008016	( Orovhetew teṛ anontsʾmē oewē mēgown vray ichadz chʾēr , haba miayn mgrtowadz ēin Tēr Yisowsi anownov . )
44008017	Ayn aten irentsʾ tseṛkʾerĕ trin anontsʾ vray , ow gĕ stanayin Sowrp Hokin .
44008018	Simon , tesnelov tʾē Sowrp Hokin gĕ trowi , aṛakʾealnerown tseṛnatrowtʾeamp , tram matowtsʾanetsʾ anontsʾ ew ĕsaw :
44008019	« Indzi al towēkʾ ays ishkhanowtʾiwnĕ , orbēszi orow vray or tseṛkʾ tnem , stanay Sowrp Hokin » .
44008020	Betros ĕsaw anor : « Kʾow ardzatʾt tʾogh gorsowi kʾezi het , orovhetew gardzetsʾir tʾē Astowdzoy barkewĕ gĕ statsʾowi tramov .
44008021	Town mas ow pa zhin chʾownis ayt panin mēch , orovhetew sirtt owghigh chʾē Astowdzoy aṛchew .
44008022	Owremn zghcha ayt chʾaramtowtʾenēt ew aghersē Astowdzoy : tʾerews nerowi kʾezi sirtit chʾar mtadzowmĕ .
44008023	Orovhetew gĕ tesnem kʾez maghtsi taṛnowtʾean ew anirawowtʾean gabin mēch » .
44008024	Simon bataskhanetsʾ : « Towkʾ aghersetsʾēkʾ Tēroch indzi hamar , orbēszi ayt tser ĕsadznerēn ochʾinchʾ batahi indzi , , » .
44008025	Anonkʾ al , vgayelē ow Tēroch khōskʾĕ kʾarozelē etkʾ , veratartsan Erowsaghēm , awetaranelov Samaratsʾinerow pazmatʾiw kiwgherown mēch .
44008026	Tēroch hreshtagĕ khōsetsʾaw Pʾilibbosi , ĕselov : « Ganknē ow kna harawayin goghmĕ , ayn jampan , or g!ichnē Erowsaghēmēn tēbi Kaza ew amayi ē » .
44008027	An al ganknetsʾaw ow knatsʾ . Ew aha etʾovbiatsʾi nerkʾini mĕ , Etʾovbiatsʾinerow Gantaga tʾakowhiin mēg balataganĕ , - or anor polor kantserown veragatsʾown ēr ow Erowsaghēm egadz ēr ergrbakelow , -
44008028	gĕ verataṛnar ew ir gaṛkʾĕ nstadz , gĕ gartar Esayi markarēin kirkʾĕ .
44008029	Hokin ĕsaw Pʾilibbosi : « Mōtetsʾir ow kna ayt gaṛkʾin kʾov » .
44008030	Pʾilibbos al vazelov knatsʾ mōtĕ , lsetsʾ tʾē gĕ gartar Esayi markarēin kirkʾĕ ,
44008031	ew ĕsaw : « Arteōkʾ gĕ hasgnas gartatsʾadzt » . An al ĕsaw : « Inchʾbēs grnam hasgnal , etʾē mēgĕ chʾaṛachnortē zis » : ew aghachʾetsʾ Pʾilibbosi , or ellē ir kʾov nsti .
44008032	Kirkʾin mēch gartatsʾadz hatowadzĕ sa ēr : « Ochʾkhari bēs sbantanotsʾ tarowetsʾaw , ow zinkʾ khowzoghin aṛchew mownch getsʾogh kaṛi bēs , ir peranĕ chʾpatsʾaw .
44008033	Ir nowastatsʾowmin mēch , ir irawownkʾĕ aṛnowetsʾaw , ew ov biti batmē anor serowntin masin : orovhetew anor geankʾĕ ergrēn vertsʾowadz ē » .
44008034	Nerkʾinin hartsʾowtsʾ Pʾilibbosi : « G!aghersem kʾezi , markarēn orow hamar g!ĕsē asiga : inkʾniren hamar , tʾē owrishi mĕ hamar » .
44008035	Owsti Pʾilibbos patsʾaw ir peranĕ , ew sgselov Kirkʾin ayt khōskʾēn , Yisowsĕ awetetsʾ anor .
44008036	Minchʾ g!ertʾayin irentsʾ jampan , egan chowri mĕ kʾov . Nerkʾinin ĕsaw : « Aha chowr , al inchʾ g!arkilē zis mgrtowelē » .
44008037	( Pʾilibbos ĕsaw anor : « Etʾē gĕ hawatas ampoghch sirtovt , artōnowadz ē » . An al bataskhanetsʾ : « Gĕ hawatam tʾē Yisows Kʾristos , Astowdzoy Ortin ē » . )
44008038	Ow hramayetsʾ or gaynetsʾnen gaṛkʾĕ . Ergowkʾn al ichan chowrĕ , tʾē Pʾilibbos , tʾē nerkʾinin : ow mgrtetsʾ zayn .
44008039	Erp towrs elan chowrēn , Tēroch Hokin yapʾshtagetsʾ Pʾilibbosĕ : nerkʾinin al chʾtesaw zayn , ew knatsʾ ir jampan owrakhowtʾeamp .
44008040	Isg Pʾilibbos ktnowetsʾaw Azovtosi mēch , ow shrchelov awetaranetsʾ polor kʾaghakʾnerown mēch , minchʾew or hasaw Gesaria .
44009001	Paytsʾ Sōghos tagawin sbaṛnalikʾ ew sbanowtʾiwn gĕ pʾchʾēr Tēroch ashagertnerown tēm . Kʾahanayabetin kʾov knatsʾ
44009002	ow namagner owzetsʾ angē , Tamasgosi zhoghovarannerĕ tanelow , orbēszi , etʾē ktnē ayt jampayin hetewoghner , ayr martig gam giner , gabadz perē Erowsaghēm .
44009003	Erp g!ertʾar ow mōtetsʾaw Tamasgosi , yangardz erginkʾēn loys mĕ pʾaylatagetsʾ ir showrchĕ ,
44009004	ew inkʾ ketin iynalov , lsetsʾ tsayn mĕ or g!ĕsēr iren : « Sawowgh , Sawowgh , inchʾow gĕ haladzes zis » .
44009005	An al ĕsaw : « Town ov es , Tēr » . Ow Tērĕ ĕsaw : « Es Yisowsn em , or town gĕ haladzes : ta zhaneli ē kʾezi , akʾatsʾel khtʾani tēm » .
44009006	An al , toghalov ew aylayladz , ĕsaw : « Tēr , inchʾ g!owzes or ĕnem » .
44009007	Tērĕ ĕsaw anor , , : « Ganknē ow mtir kʾaghakʾĕ , ew biti ĕsowi kʾezi tʾē inchʾ bētkʾ ē ĕnes » . Ayn martigĕ , or iren g!owghegtsʾēin , ankhōs getsʾadz ēin : miayn tsaynĕ gĕ lsēin , paytsʾ ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ tesnēin .
44009008	Sōghos ketinēn otkʾi elaw , sagayn ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ tesnēr patsʾ achʾkʾerov : owsti pṛnetsʾin anor tseṛkʾēn ow mttsʾowtsʾin Tamasgos .
44009009	Erekʾ ōr getsʾaw , aṛantsʾ tesnelow : ochʾ geraw , ochʾ al khmetsʾ .
44009010	Ashagert mĕ gar Tamasgosi mēch , Anania anownov . Tērĕ ĕsaw anor tesilkʾi mēch : « Anania » . An al ĕsaw : « Tēr , aha hos em » .
44009011	Tērĕ ĕsaw anor : « Ganknē ow kna ayn pʾoghotsʾĕ , or Owghigh gĕ gochʾowi , ew hon , Yowtayi tan mēch pʾntṛē Sōghos anownov Tarsontsʾi mĕ : orovhetew aha an g!aghōtʾē ,
44009012	ow tesilkʾi mēch tesaw mart mĕ , Anania anownov , kʾovĕ mtadz ew tseṛkʾĕ tradz ir vray , orbēszi verstin tesnē » .
44009013	Anania al bataskhanetsʾ : « Tēr , shaterē lsetsʾi ayt martown masin tʾē orchʾapʾ chʾarikʾ ĕraw kʾow sowrperowt , Erowsaghēmi mēch :
44009014	ew hos al kʾahanayabetnerēn irawasowtʾiwn owni gabelow polor anonkʾ , or gĕ ganchʾen kʾow anownt » .
44009015	Tērĕ ĕsaw anor : « Town kna , orovhetew an intsmē ĕntrowadz anōtʾ mĕn ē , im anowns grelow hetʾanosnerown , tʾakawornerown ew Israyēli ortinerown aṛchew ,
44009016	ow es tsʾoytsʾ biti tam anor tʾē orchʾapʾ bētkʾ ē chʾarchʾarowi im anownis hamar » .
44009017	Owsti Anania knatsʾ , mtaw ayt townĕ , ew tnelov tseṛkʾerĕ anor vray , ĕsaw : « Sawowgh eghpayr , Tērĕ ghrgetsʾ zis , ayn Yisowsĕ , or jampan erewtsʾaw kʾezi erp gow kayir , orbēszi verstin tesnes ow Sowrp Hokiov letsʾowis » .
44009018	Isgoyn tʾepʾerow bēs paner ingan anor achʾkʾerēn , ew anmichabēs tesoghowtʾiwnĕ verstatsʾaw : ganknetsʾaw , mgrtowetsʾaw ,
44009019	ow geragowr owtelov , zōratsʾaw , ew kʾani mĕ ōr getsʾaw Tamasgosi mēch eghogh ashagertnerown het .
44009020	Isgoyn zhoghovarannerown mēch gĕ kʾarozēr Yisowsĕ , tʾē an ē Astowdzoy Ortin .
44009021	Polor lsoghnerĕ medzabēs zmayladz ēin ow g!ĕsēin : « Asiga chʾē an , or Erowsaghēmi mēch gĕ tabalēr ays anownĕ ganchʾoghnerĕ : hos al egadz ēr asor hamar , orbēszi zanonkʾ gabadz , kʾahanayabetnerown tani » .
44009022	Paytsʾ Sōghos al aweli gĕ zōranar ew gĕ shpʾotʾetsʾnēr Tamasgos pnagogh Hreanerĕ , abatsʾowtsʾanelov tʾē ays ē Kʾristosĕ .
44009023	SHat ōrer antsʾnelēn etkʾ , Hreanerĕ khorhrtagtsʾetsʾan or sbannen zayn :
44009024	paytsʾ Sōghosi yaytnowetsʾaw anontsʾ tawatrowtʾiwnĕ . TSʾereg ow kisher gĕ hsgēin tṛnerĕ , orbēszi sbannen zayn .
44009025	Isg ashagertnerĕ kisherowan mēch aṛin zayn ew barisbēn var ichetsʾowtsʾin , zampiwghi mĕ mēch .
44009026	Erp Sōghos egaw Erowsaghēm , gĕ tsktēr mianal ashagertnerown : paytsʾ polorn al gĕ vakhnayin irmē , chʾhawatalov tʾē an ashagert ēr .
44009027	Paytsʾ Paṛnapas , aṛnelov zayn , taraw aṛakʾealnerown ow batmetsʾ anontsʾ tʾē inchʾbēs jampan tesaw Tērĕ , or khōsetsʾaw iren het , ew tʾē inchʾbēs hamartsagowtʾeamp kʾarozetsʾ Yisowsi anownov , Tamasgosi mēch .
44009028	Owsti gĕ mtnēr ow g!ellēr anontsʾ het Erowsaghēmi mēch , hamartsagowtʾeamp kʾarozelov Tēr Yisowsi anownov .
44009029	Naew gĕ khōsēr ew gĕ vijapanēr Hellenatsʾinerown het : anonkʾ al gĕ tsktēin sbannel zinkʾ .
44009030	Isg eghpayrnerĕ , asiga kitnalov , zinkʾ ichetsʾowtsʾin Gesaria , ew angē jampetsʾin Tarson .
44009031	Owremn egeghetsʾinerĕ khaghaghowtʾiwn ownetsʾan ampoghch Hrēastani , Kalileayi ow Samariayi mēch , ew gĕ shinowēin ow gĕ pazmanayin , ĕntʾanalov Tēroch vakhov ew Sowrp Hokiin mkhitʾarowtʾeamp .
44009032	Kʾani Betros amēn goghm gĕ shrchēr , Liwttea pnagogh sowrperown kʾov al ichaw .
44009033	Hon ktaw mart mĕ , Enea anownov , or mahijĕ baṛgadz ēr owtʾ tariē i ver , antamaloydz ĕllalov .
44009034	Betros ĕsaw anor : « Enea , Yisows Kʾristos gĕ p zhshgē kʾez : ganknē ew shtgē angoghint » . An al isgoyn ganknetsʾaw .
44009035	Liwtteayi ow Saroni polor pnagichʾnerĕ tesan zayn , ew tartsan Tēroch .
44009036	Ashagert eghadz gin mĕ gar Yobbēi mēch , Tapitʾa anownov , or tʾarkmanowtʾeamp Aydzemnig gĕ gochʾowi : asiga letsʾowadz ēr ir ĕradz pari kordzerov ew oghormowtʾiwnnerov .
44009037	Ayt ōrerĕ hiwantatsʾaw ow meṛaw . Lowatsʾin zinkʾ , ew trin vernatown mĕ .
44009038	Liwttea mōt ēr Yobbēi : owsti ashagertnerĕ , lselov tʾē Betros hon ē , ghrgetsʾin anor ergow mart , aghachʾelov or chʾyamenay ew kay irentsʾ kʾov .
44009039	Betros al ganknetsʾaw ow knatsʾ anontsʾ het . Erp hasaw , hanetsʾin zinkʾ vernatownĕ . Polor ayrinerĕ gaynetsʾan anor showrch , gow layin ew gĕ tsʾowtsʾnēin ayn pajgonnern ow hantertsnerĕ , or Aydzemnig gĕ shinēr , erp irentsʾ het ēr .
44009040	Betros al , towrs hanelov polorĕ , dznratretsʾ , aghōtʾetsʾ , ew taṛnalov tēbi marminĕ , ĕsaw : « Tapitʾa , ganknē » . An al patsʾaw ir achʾkʾerĕ , ow tesnelov Betrosĕ , owghigh nstaw .
44009041	Inkʾ al tseṛkʾĕ towaw anor , ganknetsʾowtsʾ zayn , ew ganchʾelov sowrpern ow ayrinerĕ , oghch nergayatsʾowtsʾ zayn anontsʾ aṛchew .
44009042	Ays panĕ kittsʾowetsʾaw ampoghch Yobbēi mēch , ow shater hawatatsʾin Tēroch .
44009043	Ew inkʾ shat ōrer mnatsʾ Yobbē , Simon anownov gashekordzi mĕ kʾov .
44010001	Mart mĕ gar Gesariayi mēch , Goṛnelios anownov , hariwrabet , Italagan gochʾowadz kowntin mēch ,
44010002	parebasht , ew astowadzavakh , ir ampoghch townov : an shat oghormowtʾiwnner gow tar zhoghovowrtin ow amēn aten g!aghersēr Astowdzoy .
44010003	Kretʾē ōrowan innerort zhamown , , tesilkʾi mēch an patsʾayaytōrēn tesaw Astowdzoy hreshtagĕ , or mtaw ir kʾov ew ĕsaw iren : « Goṛnelios » .
44010004	Erp agnabish nayetsʾaw anor , vakhtsʾadz ĕsaw : « Inchʾ ē , Tēr » . Isg an ĕsaw anor : « Kʾow aghōtʾkʾnert ow oghormowtʾiwnnert partsratsʾan Astowdzoy aṛchew , yishatagi hamar .
44010005	Hima martig ghrgē Yobbē , ew ganchʾē Simon anownov mēgĕ , or Betros maganowaneal ē .
44010006	An hiwrĕngalowadz ē Simon anownov gashekordzi mĕ kʾov , orown townĕ dzovown mōt ē » .
44010007	Erp iren het khōsogh hreshtagĕ megnetsʾaw , ganchʾetsʾ ir tan dzaṛanerēn ergowkʾĕ , naew iren tramatrowadz zinowornerēn parebasht mēgĕ , , ,
44010008	ew amēn pan batmelov , ghrgetsʾ zanonkʾ Yobbē .
44010009	Heteweal ōrĕ , minchʾ anonkʾ gĕ jamportēin ow gĕ mōtenayin kʾaghakʾin , Betros , vetsʾerort zhamow , , atennerĕ , tanikʾĕ partsratsʾaw aghōtʾelow .
44010010	SHat anōtʾetsʾadz ĕllalov , g!owzēr jashagel : minchʾ jashĕ gĕ batrastowēr , veratsʾowm ownetsʾaw .
44010011	Tesaw erginkʾĕ patsʾowadz , ow chʾors dzayrerēn gabowadz anōtʾ mĕ , medz latʾi mĕ bēs , or ichaw ergri vray :
44010012	anor mēch gayin ergri amēn tesag chʾorkʾotaninerĕ , kazannern ow soghownnerĕ , naew erginkʾi tʾṛchʾownnerĕ .
44010013	Ew tsayn mĕ egaw iren : « Ganknē , Betros , mortʾē ow ger » .
44010014	Paytsʾ Betros ĕsaw : « Amenewin , Tēr : orovhetew es pnaw chʾem gerer bighdz gam anmakʾowr pan » .
44010015	Tartseal tsaynĕ grgin egaw iren : « Inchʾ or Astowadz makʾretsʾ , town bighdz mi seber » .
44010016	Asiga batahetsʾaw erekʾ ankam , yetoy anōtʾĕ tartseal veratsʾaw erginkʾ .
44010017	Minchʾ Betros inkʾniren gĕ taragowsēr tʾē inchʾ grnar ĕllal ir tesadz ays tesilkʾĕ , aha Goṛneliosē ghrgowadz martigĕ , hartsʾnelov Simoni tan masin , gaynetsʾan tran aṛchew ,
44010018	ew ganchʾelov hartsʾapʾortsetsʾin : « Simonĕ , or Betros maganowaneal ē , hos hiwrĕngalowadz ē » .
44010019	Minchʾ Betros gĕ mtadzēr tesilkʾin masin , Sowrp Hokin ĕsaw anor : « Aha erekʾ martig kʾez gĕ pʾntṛen .
44010020	Hetewapar ganknē , ichir , ow kna anontsʾ het , aṛantsʾ tatamselow , orovhetew es ghrgetsʾi zanonkʾ » .
44010021	Betros al ichaw ayt martotsʾ kʾov , ew ĕsaw : « Aha es em an , or gĕ pʾntṛēkʾ : inchʾow egadz ēkʾ » .
44010022	Anonkʾ al ĕsin : « Goṛnelios hariwrabetĕ , artar ow astowadzavakh mart mĕ , pari vgayowadz ampoghch Hreanerow azkēn , batkam statsʾaw sowrp hreshtagē mĕ , or ganchʾē kʾez ir townĕ ew lsē kʾow khōskʾert » .
44010023	Owsti ners ganchʾetsʾ zanonkʾ ow hiwrĕngaletsʾ . Heteweal ōrĕ , Betros elaw ew megnetsʾaw anontsʾ het : iren het katsʾin naew Yobbēēn eghogh kʾani mĕ eghpayrner .
44010024	Yachort ōrĕ mtan Gesaria : Goṛnelios al gĕ sbasēr anontsʾ , hrawiradz ĕllalov ir azkagannern ow mterim paregamnerĕ .
44010025	Erp Betros ners mtaw , Goṛnelios timaworetsʾ zayn , ew anor otkʾĕ iynalov g!ergrbakēr .
44010026	Paytsʾ Betros otkʾi hanetsʾ zayn , ĕselov : « Ganknē , es inkʾs al mart em » .
44010027	Ow anor het khōsagtsʾelov , ners mtaw , shater ktaw , hamakhmpowadz ,
44010028	ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Towkʾ kitēkʾ tʾē ōrinawor chʾē hreay martow mĕ , haghortagtsʾil ōtarazkii mĕ het gam mōtenal anor : paytsʾ Astowadz tsʾoytsʾ towaw indzi or martotsʾmē ochʾ mēgĕ bighdz gam anmakʾowr gochʾem .
44010029	Owsti erp ganchʾowetsʾay , egay aṛantsʾ hagajaṛowtʾean : owremn gĕ hartsʾnem , inchʾ pani hamar ganchʾetsʾikʾ zis » .
44010030	Goṛnelios al ĕsaw : « CHʾors ōr aṛach , minchʾew ays zhamĕ dzom gĕ bahēi , ow innerort zhamown tans mēch g!aghōtʾēi : ew aha pʾaylown tarazov mart mĕ gaynetsʾaw aṛchews ow ĕsaw :
44010031	“ Goṛnelios , kʾow aghōtʾkʾt ĕntownowetsʾaw , ew oghormowtʾiwnnert Astowdzoy aṛchew yishowetsʾan .
44010032	Owremn mart ghrgē Yobbē ow ganchʾē Simonĕ , or Betros maganowaneal ē : an dzovown mōt , Simon anownov gashekordzi mĕ tan mēch hiwrĕngalowadz ē : erp kay , biti khōsi kʾezi ” .
44010033	Owsti anyabagh mart ghrgetsʾi kʾezi , ew koh em , , or egar . Owremn hima menkʾ polors nergay enkʾ Astowdzoy aṛchew , lselow amēn inchʾ or Astowdzmē hramayowadz ē kʾezi » .
44010034	Betros patsʾaw ir peranĕ ow ĕsaw : « Jshmartabēs g!ĕmpṛnem tʾē Astowdzoy kʾov achʾaṛowtʾiwn chʾgay ,
44010035	haba amēn azki mēch iren ĕntowneli ē an , or irmē gĕ vakhnay ew artarowtʾiwn gĕ kordzē .
44010036	Ayn khōskʾĕ , or Astowadz ghrgetsʾ Israyēli ortinerown , awetelow khaghaghowtʾiwnĕ , Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov , ( an ē polorin Tērĕ , )
44010037	towkʾ law kitēkʾ ayt khōskʾĕ , or eghaw ampoghch Hrēastani mēch , Kalileayēn sgselov , ayn mgrtowtʾenēn etkʾ , or Yovhannēs kʾarozetsʾ .
44010038	Nazarētʾēn eghogh Yisowsĕ , or Astowadz ōdzetsʾ Sowrp Hokiov ew zōrowtʾeamp , shrchetsʾaw parikʾ kordzelov ow p zhshgelov polor CHʾarakhōsēn jnshowadznerĕ , kʾani or Astowadz iren het ēr :
44010039	ew menkʾ vgay enkʾ ayn polor panerown , or ĕraw Hrēastani ow Erowsaghēmi mēch . Zayn sbannetsʾin , pʾaytēn gakhelov .
44010040	Astowadz yarowtsʾanetsʾ zayn errort ōrĕ , ew patsʾayaytetsʾ zayn
44010041	ochʾ tʾē ampoghch zhoghovowrtin , haba , mezi - nakhabēs Astowdzmē ĕntrowadznerows , vgay ĕllalow - , or gerankʾ ow khmetsʾinkʾ iren het , ir meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛnelēn etkʾ .
44010042	Ew inkʾ batowiretsʾ mezi , or kʾarozenkʾ ow vgayenkʾ zhoghovowrtin tʾē inkʾ ē Astowdzmē sahmanowadz Tataworĕ oghcherown ew meṛelnerown .
44010043	Polor markarēnerĕ gĕ vgayen anor masin tʾē ov or hawatay anor , biti stanay meghkʾerow nerowm anor anownov » .
44010044	Minchʾ Betros g!ĕsēr ays khōskʾerĕ , Sowrp Hokin ichaw polor anontsʾ vray , or gĕ lsēin khōskʾĕ .
44010045	Tʾlpʾatowadznerēn eghogh polor hawatatsʾealnerĕ , or egadz ēin Betrosi het , zmayletsʾan or hetʾanosnerown vray al tʾapʾowetsʾaw Sowrp Hokiin barkewĕ :
44010046	orovhetew gĕ lsēin tʾē anonkʾ gĕ khōsēin owrish lezownerov ew gĕ medzarēin Astowadz .
44010047	Ayn aten Betros ĕsaw : « Grnay mēgĕ arkilel , or chowrov mgrtowin asonkʾ , oronkʾ statsʾan Sowrp Hokin mezi bēs » .
44010048	Ow hramayetsʾ or mgrtowin Tēroch anownov . Ayn aten khntretsʾin irmē , or hon mnay kʾani mĕ ōr .
44011001	Aṛakʾealnern ow eghpayrnerĕ , oronkʾ Hrēastani goghmern ēin , lsetsʾin tʾē hetʾanosnern al ĕntownadz en Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ .
44011002	Erp Betros Erowsaghēm partsratsʾaw , tʾlpʾatowadznerĕ gĕ vijēin anor het
44011003	ow g!ĕsēin : « Town antʾlpʾat martotsʾ kʾov mtar ew anontsʾ het hatsʾ gerar » .
44011004	Betros al sgsaw tēbkʾĕ garkov patsʾatrel anontsʾ , ĕselov :
44011005	« Es g!aghōtʾēi Yobbē kʾaghakʾĕ , erp , veratsʾowmi mēch , tesay tesilkʾ mĕ : anōtʾ mĕ , medz latʾi bēs , chʾors dzayrerēn gakhowadz , ichaw erginkʾēn ow hasaw minchʾew indzi .
44011006	Minchʾ gĕ titēi , achʾkʾers seweṛadz anor vray , tesay ergri chʾorkʾotaninerĕ , kazannern ow soghownnerĕ , naew erginkʾi tʾṛchʾownnerĕ .
44011007	Ow lsetsʾi tsayn mĕ , or g!ĕsēr indzi : “ Ganknē , Betros , mortʾē ew ger ” .
44011008	Paytsʾ es ĕsi : “ Amenewin , Tēr : orovhetew bighdz gam anmakʾowr pan mĕ pnaw mtadz chʾē perans ” .
44011009	Grgin ayt tsaynĕ erginkʾēn bataskhanetsʾ indzi : “ Inchʾ or Astowadz makʾretsʾ , town bighdz mi seber ” .
44011010	Asiga batahetsʾaw erekʾ ankam , ow amēn inchʾ tartseal ver kʾashowetsʾaw , tēbi erginkʾ .
44011011	Ew aha anyabagh erekʾ martig , Gesariayēn ghrgowadz indzi , egan ow getsʾan ayn tan aṛchew , owr hiwrĕngalowadz ēi .
44011012	Hokin al ĕsaw indzi , or ertʾam anontsʾ het aṛantsʾ tatamselow . Ays vetsʾ eghpayrnern al katsʾin indzi het , ow mtankʾ ayt martown townĕ .
44011013	An al batmetsʾ mezi tʾē inchʾbēs ir tan mēch tesaw hreshtag mĕ , or gaynadz ēr ew g!ĕsēr iren : “ Mart ghrgē Yobbē ow ganchʾē Simonĕ , or Betros maganowaneal ē .
44011014	An khōskʾer biti ĕsē kʾezi , orbēszi pʾrgowikʾ , town ew ampoghch townt ” .
44011015	Erp sgsay khōsil , Sowrp Hokin ichaw anontsʾ vray , inchʾbēs nakhabēs mer vray al .
44011016	Ew yishetsʾi Tēroch ĕsadz khōskʾĕ : “ Artarew Yovhannēs mgrtetsʾ chowrov , paytsʾ towkʾ biti mgrtowikʾ Sowrp Hokiov ” .
44011017	Owremn etʾē Astowadz towaw anontsʾ miewnoyn barkewĕ , inchʾbēs mezi , erp hawatatsʾin Tēr Yisows Kʾristosi , es ov ēi , or garenayi arkilel Astowadz » .
44011018	Ays panerĕ lselov , hantartetsʾan , ow pʾaṛapanetsʾin Astowadz , ĕselov : « Owremn Astowadz hetʾanosnerown al abashkharowtʾiwn shnorhetsʾ , geankʾi hamar » .
44011019	Stepʾanosi mahēn etkʾ eghadz haladzankʾēn tsʾrowadznerĕ , hasan naew minchʾew Pʾiwnigē , Gibros ew Antiokʾ , kʾarozelov Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ ochʾ mēgown , paytsʾ miayn Hreanerown .
44011020	Anontsʾmē omankʾ gibratsʾi ow giwrenatsʾi martig ēin , oronkʾ erp mtan Antiokʾ , gĕ khōsēin Hellenatsʾinerown het , awetelov Tēr Yisowsĕ .
44011021	Tēroch tseṛkʾĕ anontsʾ het ēr , ew pazmatʾiw martig hawatatsʾin ow tartsan Tēroch .
44011022	Ays panerown lowrĕ hasaw Erowsaghēmi egeghetsʾiin aganchĕ , ew jampetsʾin Paṛnapasĕ , or ertʾay minchʾew Antiokʾ .
44011023	Erp an egaw ow tesaw Astowdzoy shnorhkʾĕ , owrakhatsʾaw , ew gĕ yortorēr polorn al , or yarin Tēroch yō zhar sirtov , , :
44011024	( kʾani or inkʾ pari mart ēr , Sowrp Hokiov ow hawatkʾov letsʾown : ) ew medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ aweltsʾaw Tēroch egeghetsʾiin tʾiwin vray .
44011025	Yetoy Paṛnapas megnetsʾaw Tarson , pʾntṛelow Sōghosĕ , ow ktnelov zayn , peraw Antiokʾ .
44011026	Anonkʾ lman tari mĕ egeghetsʾiin het hawakʾowelov , medz pazmowtʾean mĕ sorvetsʾowtsʾin , ew Antiokʾi mēch ashagertnerĕ Kʾristoneay gochʾowetsʾan aṛachin ankam .
44011027	Ayt ōrerĕ , Erowsaghēmēn markarēner ichan Antiokʾ .
44011028	Anontsʾmē mēgĕ , Akapos anownov , ganknetsʾaw ew matnanshetsʾ Hokiin zōrowtʾeamp , tʾē medz sov mĕ biti ĕllay ampoghch ergrakowntin mēch : an irabēs eghaw Gghōtiosi ōrerĕ .
44011029	Owsti ashagertnerĕ oroshetsʾin ōknowtʾiwn ghrgel Hrēastani mēch pnagogh eghpayrnerown , iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ ir egamowtin hamemat .
44011030	Aytbēs al ĕrin , ghrgelov zayn erētsʾnerown , Paṛnapasi ow Sōghosi tseṛkʾov .
44012001	Ayt atennerĕ Herovtēs tʾakaworĕ tseṛkʾ traw egeghetsʾiēn omantsʾ vray , chʾarchʾarelow hamar .
44012002	Sowrov sbannetsʾ Yovhannēsi eghpayrĕ , Yagoposĕ ,
44012003	ew tesnelov tʾē hajeli ē Hreanerown , sharownagelov pṛnetsʾ naew Betrosĕ . ( Pagharchagerkʾi ōrern ēin . )
44012004	Erp tserpagaletsʾ zayn , pantĕ traw , ow yantsnetsʾ chʾorsagan zinoworē paghgatsʾadz chʾors chogati , orbēszi bahen : ew gĕ pʾapʾakʾēr nergayatsʾnel zayn zhoghovowrtin , Zatigēn etkʾ .
44012005	Owsti Betros bahowadz ēr pantin mēch , paytsʾ egeghetsʾin chermeṛantowtʾeamp g!aghōtʾēr Astowdzoy , anor hamar .
44012006	Erp Herovtēs biti nergayatsʾnēr zayn tataranin , ayt ōrowan nakhort kisherĕ , Betros gĕ kʾnanar ergow zinowornerow mēchtegh , grgin shghtʾanerov gabowadz : isg bahabannerĕ gĕ bahēin pantĕ , tran aṛchew .
44012007	Yangardz Tēroch hreshtagĕ anor vray hasaw , ow loys mĕ pʾayletsʾaw tan mēch . Aba Betrosi goghĕ khtʾelov , artʾntsʾowtsʾ zayn ew ĕsaw : « Ganknē showtov » . SHghtʾanerĕ var ingan anor tseṛkʾerēn ,
44012008	ow hreshtagĕ ĕsaw anor : « Gabē kōtit ow hakir hoghatʾapʾnert » . An al ĕraw aynbēs . Yetoy ĕsaw anor : « Vrat aṛ hantertst ow hetewē indzi » .
44012009	An al towrs ellelov , hetewetsʾaw anor : paytsʾ chʾēr kiter tʾē hreshtagin gataradzĕ iragan ē , haba gĕ gardzēr tʾē tesilkʾ gĕ tesnē .
44012010	Erp anonkʾ antsʾan aṛachin ow ergrort bahabannerēn , egan minchʾew ergatʾē towṛĕ , or kʾaghakʾĕ gĕ tanēr ew inkʾniren patsʾowetsʾaw anontsʾ aṛchew . Angē towrs ellelov , pʾoghotsʾ mĕ antsʾan , ow hreshtagĕ isgoyn heṛatsʾaw angē .
44012011	Betros inkʾniren kalov , ĕsaw : « Hima jshmartabēs kitem tʾē Tērĕ ghrgetsʾ ir hreshtagĕ ew azatetsʾ zis Herovtēsi tseṛkʾēn ow Hreanerow zhoghovowrtin ampoghch agngalowtʾenēn » .
44012012	Ew kitagitsʾ ĕllalov , knatsʾ Margos maganowaneal Yovhannēsi mōr Mariami townĕ , owr shater hamakhmpowadz g!aghōtʾēin .
44012013	Erp pakhetsʾ tan towrsi towṛĕ , Hṛovtē anownov aghakhin mĕ mōtetsʾaw , mtig ĕnelow .
44012014	Janchʾnalov Betrosi tsaynĕ , owrakhowtʾenēn chʾpatsʾaw towṛĕ , haba ners vazelov , lowr towaw tʾē Betros gaynadz ē tran aṛchew .
44012015	Isg anonkʾ ĕsin anor : « KHelakaradz es » . Paytsʾ inkʾ gĕ bntēr tʾē aytbēs ē . Anonkʾ al g!ĕsēin : « Anor hreshtagn ē » .
44012016	Sagayn Betros gĕ sharownagēr pakhel , ow erp patsʾin , shshmetsʾan zinkʾ tesnelov .
44012017	Isg an tseṛkʾĕ shar zhetsʾ , or anonkʾ lṛen , ow batmetsʾ anontsʾ tʾē inchʾbēs Tērĕ hanetsʾ zinkʾ pantēn , ew ĕsaw : « Batmetsʾēkʾ ays panerĕ Yagoposi ow eghpayrnerown » . Yetoy megnetsʾaw ew knatsʾ owrish tegh mĕ .
44012018	Erp aṛtow eghaw , medz khlrtowm gar zinowornerown mēch , tʾē arteōkʾ Betros inchʾ eghadz ēr .
44012019	Isg Herovtēs , erp pʾntṛetsʾ zayn ow chʾktaw , hartsʾakʾnnetsʾ bahabannerĕ ew hramayetsʾ or meṛtsʾowin . Aba Hrēastanēn ichaw Gesaria , ow hon gĕ genar .
44012020	Herovtēs chʾapʾazantsʾ zayratsʾadz ēr Tiwratsʾinerown ew Sitonatsʾinerown tēm . Anonkʾ al miapanowtʾeamp egan iren , ow hashtowtʾiwn khntretsʾin , hamozelov tʾakaworin Pghastos senegabetĕ : orovhetew irentsʾ ergirĕ gĕ geragrowēr tʾakaworin ergrēn .
44012021	Oroshowadz ōr mĕ , Herovtēs , hakadz tʾakaworagan tarazĕ ew pazmadz tataranĕ , gĕ jaṛakhōsēr anontsʾ .
44012022	Ampokhn al g!aghaghagēr : “ Atiga Astowdzoy tsayn ē , ochʾ tʾē martow ” .
44012023	Anmichabēs Tēroch hreshtagĕ zargaw zayn , pʾaṛkʾĕ Astowdzoy chʾtalown hamar : ow ortnalitsʾ ĕllalov , shownchʾĕ pʾchʾetsʾ .
44012024	Isg Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ g!ajēr ow gĕ pazmanar .
44012025	Paṛnapas ew Sōghos , erp kordzatretsʾin irentsʾ yantsnowadz sbasargowtʾiwnĕ , veratartsan Erowsaghēmēn , irentsʾ het aṛnelov naew Yovhannēsĕ , or Margos maganowaneal ēr .
44013001	Kʾani mĕ markarēner ow vartabetner gayin Antiokʾ eghogh egeghetsʾiin mēch : - Paṛnapas , SHmawon , or Niker gĕ gochʾowēr , GHowgios Giwrenatsʾin , Manayēn , Herovtēs chʾorrortabetin snntagitsʾĕ , ew Sōghos .
44013002	Minchʾ anonkʾ Tēroch bashtōn gĕ gatarēin ow dzom gĕ bahēin , Sowrp Hokin ĕsaw : « Zatetsʾēkʾ indzi Paṛnapasĕ ew Sōghosĕ , ayn kordzin hamar , orown es ganchʾadz em zanonkʾ » .
44013003	Owsti , dzom bahelov ow aghōtʾelov , tseṛkʾ trin anontsʾ vray ew owghargetsʾin .
44013004	Anonkʾ al Sowrp Hokiēn ghrgowadz , Selewgia ichan , ew angē nawargetsʾin tēbi Gibros .
44013005	Hasnelov Saghamina , gĕ hṛchʾagēin Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ Hreanerow zhoghovarannerown mēch : Yovhannēs al gĕ sbasaworēr irentsʾ .
44013006	SHrchelov ayt ( ampoghch ) gghzin minchʾew Bapʾos , ktan mok mĕ , Hreay sowt markarē mĕ , orown anownĕ Pareyesow ēr :
44013007	an pʾokh-hiwbatosin het ēr , or gĕ gochʾowēr Serkios Bōghos , khelatsʾi mart mĕ . Asiga , ganchʾelov Paṛnapasĕ ew Sōghosĕ , owzetsʾ lsel Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ .
44013008	Sagayn anontsʾ ĕnttimatsʾaw Eghimas mokĕ ( orovhetew aysbēs gĕ tʾarkmanowi anor anownĕ ) , or gĕ chanar khotoretsʾnel pʾokh-hiwbatosĕ hawatkʾēn .
44013009	Paytsʾ Sōghos , or Bōghos al gĕ gochʾowi , Sowrp Hokiov letsʾowadz , agnabish nayetsʾaw anor
44013010	ow ĕsaw : « Ov amēn nenkowtʾeamp ew amēn chʾarakordzowtʾeamp letsʾown CHʾarakhōsi orti , tʾshnami ampoghch artarowtʾean , biti chʾtatris kheghatʾiwrelē Tēroch owghigh jampanerĕ .
44013011	Aha hima Tēroch tseṛkʾĕ kʾow vrat ē : goyr biti ĕllas ew aten mĕ biti chʾtesnes arewĕ » . Anmichabēs mtʾowtʾiwn ow khawar ichaw anor vray , ew shrchelov mēgĕ gĕ pʾntṛēr , or tseṛkʾēn pṛnelov tanēr zinkʾ .
44013012	Ayn aten pʾokh-hiwbatosĕ hawatatsʾ , erp tesaw gatarowadzĕ , medzabēs abshelov Tēroch owsowtsʾowmin vray .
44013013	Bōghos ew ir ĕngeragitsʾnerĕ nawargetsʾin Bapʾosēn , ow katsʾin Bampʾiwliayi Berkēn : paytsʾ Yovhannēs , zatowelov anontsʾmē , veratartsaw Erowsaghēm .
44013014	Anonkʾ al katsʾin Berkēēn ew hasan Bisitiayi Antiokʾĕ , ow SHapatʾ ōrĕ mtnelov zhoghovaranĕ , nstan .
44013015	ōrēnkʾin ew Markarēnerown gartatsʾowelēn etkʾ , zhoghovaranin beterĕ mart ghrgetsʾin irentsʾ ow ĕsin : « Martig eghpayrner , etʾē towkʾ yortoragan khōskʾ mĕ ownikʾ zhoghovowrtin , ĕsēkʾ » .
44013016	Owsti Bōghos ganknetsʾaw , ew shar zhelov tseṛkʾĕ , ĕsaw : « Israyelatsʾi martig , ow towkʾ , or gĕ vakhnakʾ Astowdzmē , mtig ĕrēkʾ .
44013017	Ays zhoghovowrtin , Israyēli Astowadzĕ ĕntretsʾ mer hayrerĕ , partsratsʾowtsʾ zhoghovowrtĕ , erp anonkʾ bantkhtatsʾadz ēin Ekibtosi ergrin mēch , ew zōrawor pazowgov towrs hanetsʾ zanonkʾ .
44013018	Kretʾē kʾaṛasown tari geragretsʾ zanonkʾ anabatin mēch .
44013019	Kʾanani ergrin mēch , pnachnchelov eōtʾĕ azk , anontsʾ ergirĕ towaw irentsʾ , or zhaṛanken .
44013020	Angē etkʾ , kretʾē chʾors hariwr yisown tari , tataworner towaw irentsʾ , minchʾew Samowēl markarēn .
44013021	Yetoy tʾakawor owzetsʾin , ew Astowadz towaw irentsʾ Gisi ortin , Sawowghĕ , Peniamini tohmēn mart mĕ , kʾaṛasown tari .
44013022	Erp bashtōnē heṛatsʾowtsʾ zayn , Tawitʾĕ nshanagetsʾ irentsʾ vray ipr tʾakawor , orown masin vgayelov , ĕsaw : « Yessēi ortin , Tawitʾĕ ktay , im sirtis hamatsayn mart mĕ , or biti kordzatrē im ampoghch gamkʾs » .
44013023	Asor zarmēn Astowadz , ir khostowmin hamatsayn , hanetsʾ Israyēli Pʾrgichʾ mĕ , Yisowsĕ .
44013024	Teṛ an chʾegadz , Yovhannēs nakhabēs kʾarozetsʾ abashkharowtʾean mgrtowtʾiwnĕ , Israyēli ampoghch zhoghovowrtin .
44013025	Erp Yovhannēs gĕ lratsʾnēr ir ĕntʾatsʾkʾĕ , ĕsaw : “ Ov gĕ gardzēkʾ , tʾē em : es Kʾristosĕ chʾem , haba aha im etewēs gow kay mēgĕ , orown otkʾerown gōshignerĕ kʾagelow ar zhani chʾem ” .
44013026	Martig eghpayrner , Aprahami tsʾeghin ortiner , ays pʾrgowtʾean khōskʾĕ ghrgowetsʾaw tsezi , ew anontsʾ , or tser mēch astowadzavakh en .
44013027	Kʾani or Erowsaghēm pnagoghnerĕ ew anontsʾ beterĕ , ochʾ zayn janchʾtsʾan , ochʾ al markarēnerown tsaynerĕ , oronkʾ gĕ gartatsʾowin amēn SHapatʾ ōr : paytsʾ irakordzetsʾin krowadznerĕ , tatelov zayn .
44013028	Tʾēbēt chʾktan mahowan ar zhani batjaṛ mĕ , khntretsʾin Bighatosēn , or an sbannowi .
44013029	Erp kordzatretsʾin amēn inchʾ or krowadz ēr anor masin , var ichetsʾnelov pʾaytēn , trin kerezmani mĕ mēch .
44013030	Paytsʾ Astowadz meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanetsʾ zayn .
44013031	An shat ōrer erewtsʾaw anontsʾ , or Kalileayēn Erowsaghēm eler ēin iren het : anonkʾ en hima ir vganerĕ zhoghovowrtin aṛchew .
44013032	Menkʾ al g!awetenkʾ tsezi ayn khostowmĕ , or eghadz ēr hayrerown :
44013033	Astowadz irakordzetsʾ zayn mezi hamar , or anontsʾ zawagnern enkʾ , yarowtsʾanelov Yisowsĕ , inchʾbēs krowadz al ē ergrort Saghmosin mēch : “ Town im Ortis es , aysōr dznay kʾez ” .
44013034	An sa g!ĕsē zinkʾ meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanelow masin , or ankam mĕn al abaganowtʾean chʾverataṛnay : “ TSezi biti tam Tawitʾi mnayown garegtsʾowtʾiwnnerĕ ” .
44013035	Ays masin owrish Saghmosi mĕ mēch al g!ĕsē : “ Biti chʾtʾoylatres or kʾow Sowrpt abaganowtʾiwn tesnē ” .
44013036	Orovhetew Tawitʾ nnchetsʾ , Astowdzoy dzrakirov sbasaworelē etkʾ ir serowntin , trowetsʾaw ir hayrerown kʾov ew abaganowtʾiwn tesaw .
44013037	Paytsʾ an , or Astowadz yarowtsʾanetsʾ , abaganowtʾiwn chʾtesaw .
44013038	Owremn kittsʾēkʾ , martig eghpayrner , tʾē asor michotsʾov meghkʾerow nerowm gĕ hṛchʾagowi tsezi ,
44013039	ew tʾē irmov amēn hawatatsʾeal g!artaranay ayn polor panerēn , orontsʾmē chʾgrtsʾakʾ artaranal Movsēsi ōrēnkʾov .
44013040	Owremn zkowshatsʾēkʾ , orbēszi tsezi chʾbatahi , , inchʾ or ĕsowadz ē Markarēnerown mēch :
44013041	“ Tesēkʾ , arhamarhoghner , ew zarmatsʾēkʾ ow ochʾnchʾatsʾēkʾ : orovhetew biti gatarem ararkʾ mĕ , tser ōrerown mēch , aynbisi ararkʾ mĕ , or etʾē mēgĕ batmē tsezi , biti chʾhawatakʾ ” » .
44013042	Erp angē towrs elan , g!aghachʾēin , or heteweal SHapatʾ al kʾarozen irentsʾ noyn khōskʾerĕ .
44013043	Erp zhoghovowrtĕ artsagowetsʾaw , Hreanerēn ew parebasht norahawatnerēn shater hetewetsʾan Bōghosi ow Paṛnapasi , oronkʾ gĕ khōsēin anontsʾ het ew gĕ yortorēin zanonkʾ , or yaratewen Astowdzoy shnorhkʾin mēch .
44013044	Heteweal SHapatʾ ōrĕ , kretʾē ampoghch kʾaghakʾĕ hawakʾowetsʾaw , lselow Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ .
44013045	Isg Hreanerĕ , erp tesan pazmowtʾiwnnerĕ , letsʾowetsʾan nakhantsov , ow tēm gĕ khōsēin Bōghosi ĕsadznerown , hagajaṛelov ew hayhoyelov .
44013046	Owsti Bōghos ow Paṛnapas hamartsagelov ĕsin : « Harg ēr or Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ kʾarozowēr nakh tsezi : paytsʾ kʾani or gĕ vanēkʾ zayn tsezmē , ew towkʾ tsez ar zhani chʾēkʾ seber yawitenagan geankʾi , aha menkʾ gĕ taṛnankʾ hetʾanosnerown .
44013047	Orovhetew Tērĕ sa batowiradz ē mezi : “ Kʾez ipr loys tri hetʾanosnerown , orbēszi town pʾrgowtʾean batjaṛ ĕllas , minchʾew ergri dzayrerĕ ” » .
44013048	Lselov asiga , hetʾanosnerĕ g!owrakhanayin ow gĕ pʾaṛaworēin Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ , ew anonkʾ or sahmanowadz ēin yawitenagan geankʾin , hawatatsʾin .
44013049	Tēroch khōskʾĕ gĕ taradzowēr ampoghch ergramasin mēch .
44013050	Paytsʾ Hreanerĕ krkṛetsʾin parebasht ew medzayark ginern ow kʾaghakʾin klkhawornerĕ , ew Bōghosi ow Paṛnapasi tēm haladzankʾ hanelov , irentsʾ hoghamasēn towrs trin zanonkʾ .
44013051	Anonkʾ al , irentsʾ otkʾerown pʾoshin tʾōtʾowelov anontsʾ tēm , katsʾin Igonion :
44013052	isg ashagertnerĕ letsʾowadz ēin owrakhowtʾeamp ew Sowrp Hokiov , , .
44014001	Igonioni mēch , anonkʾ miasin mtan Hreanerown zhoghovaranĕ , ow aynbēs khōsetsʾan , or Hreanerow ew Yoynerow medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ hawatatsʾ .
44014002	Paytsʾ chʾhnazantogh Hreanerĕ , trtetsʾin hetʾanosnerĕ , ew anontsʾ antserĕ chʾarowtʾean krkṛetsʾin eghpayrnerown tēm .
44014003	Isg anonkʾ ergar zhamanag hon genalov , hamartsagowtʾeamp gĕ kʾarozēin Tērochmov , or ir shnorhkʾi khōskʾin vgayowtʾiwn gow tar , tʾoylatrelov or nshanner ew skʾanchʾelikʾner gatarowin anontsʾ tseṛkʾov .
44014004	Kʾaghakʾin pazmowtʾiwnĕ pa zhnowetsʾaw : mas mĕ pṛnetsʾ Hreanerown goghmĕ , mas mĕn al , aṛakʾealnerown .
44014005	Erp hetʾanosnern ow Hreanerĕ , irentsʾ beterov , yartsagetsʾan , or nakhaten ew kʾargodzen zanonkʾ ,
44014006	irenkʾ al , kitagtsʾelov , pʾakhan Ligayoniayi kʾaghakʾnerĕ , Liwstra ow Terpē ew shrchagaykʾĕ ,
44014007	ow hon g!awetaranēin .
44014008	Mart mĕ nstadz ēr Liwstrayi mēch , anzōr otkʾerov , ir mōr orovaynēn gagh dznadz , or pnaw kʾaladz chʾēr .
44014009	Asiga mtig g!ĕnēr Bōghosi khōskʾerĕ , or agnabish nayelov anor ow nshmarelov tʾē pow zhowelow hawatkʾ owni ,
44014010	partsratsayn ĕsaw : « Owghigh ganknē otkʾerowt vray » . An al tsʾatgetsʾ ew kʾaletsʾ .
44014011	Erp pazmowtʾiwnĕ tesaw Bōghosi ĕradzĕ , partsratsʾnelov irentsʾ tsaynĕ , ĕsin ligayonerēn : « Astowadznerĕ ichadz en mezi , martotsʾ nmanowtʾeamp » .
44014012	Paṛnapasĕ gĕ gochʾēin Tios , ow Bōghosĕ , Hermēs , kʾani or an ēr klkhawor khōsoghĕ .
44014013	Isg Tiosi kʾowrmĕ , or kʾaghakʾin aṛchew ēr , tsʾowler ew dzaghgebsagner perelov tṛnerown kʾov , g!owzēr zoh matowtsʾanel pazmowtʾean het .
44014014	Paytsʾ erp aṛakʾealnerĕ , Paṛnapas ow Bōghos , lsetsʾin , batṛetsʾin irentsʾ hantertsnerĕ ew towrs tsʾatgetsʾin pazmowtʾean mēch , aghaghagelov :
44014015	« Martig , inchʾow ayt panerĕ g!ĕnēkʾ . Menkʾ al martig enkʾ , girkʾerow entʾagay tsezi nman , ow g!awetaranenkʾ tsezi , orbēszi ayt ownayn panerēn taṛnakʾ abrogh Astowdzoy , or steghdzetsʾ erginkʾĕ , ergirĕ , dzovn ow polor anontsʾ mēch eghadznerĕ .
44014016	Antsʾeal serowntnerown mēch an tʾoylatretsʾ polor azkerown , or ertʾan irentsʾ jampanerēn .
44014017	Sagayn inkʾzinkʾ chʾtʾoghowtsʾ aṛantsʾ vgayowtʾean , parikʾ ĕnelov , antsrew talov mezi erginkʾēn , naew btghaper eghanagner , ow mer sirterĕ letsʾnelov geragowrnerov ew owrakhowtʾeamp » .
44014018	Ays panerĕ ĕselov , haziw grtsʾan hankstatsʾnel pazmowtʾiwnĕ , or zoh chʾmatowtsʾanē irentsʾ .
44014019	Sagayn Hreaner hasan Antiokʾēn ew Igonionēn , hamozetsʾin pazmowtʾiwnĕ , kʾargodzetsʾin Bōghosĕ ow kʾaghakʾēn towrs kʾashgṛtetsʾin , gardzelov tʾē meṛadz ē .
44014020	Paytsʾ erp ashagertnerĕ shrchabatetsʾin zinkʾ , ganknetsʾaw , mtaw kʾaghakʾĕ , ow heteweal ōrĕ megnetsʾaw Terpē , Paṛnapasi het .
44014021	Ayt kʾaghakʾin mēch awetaranelē ow shaterĕ ashagertelē etkʾ , anonkʾ veratartsan Liwstra , Igonion ew Antiokʾ ,
44014022	amratsʾnelov ashagertnerown antserĕ ew yortorelov , or yaratewen hawatkʾin mēch , ĕselov : « SHat taṛabankʾov bētkʾ ē mtnenkʾ Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ » .
44014023	Erp erētsʾner tseṛnatretsʾin anontsʾ , amēn egeghetsʾii mēch , dzomabahowtʾeamp aghōtʾelov yantsnetsʾin zanonkʾ Tēroch , orown hawatatsʾadz ēin .
44014024	Ew antsʾnelov Bisitiayi mēchēn , katsʾin Bampʾiwlia .
44014025	Berkēi mēch al Tēroch khōskʾĕ kʾarozelē etkʾ , ichan Atalia ,
44014026	angē al nawargetsʾin tēbi Antiokʾ , owrgē Astowdzoy shnorhkʾin yantsnararowadz ēin ayn kordzin hamar , or gataretsʾin .
44014027	Erp egan , hawakʾelov egeghetsʾin , batmetsʾin inchʾ or Astowadz ĕrer ēr irentsʾ het , ew tʾē hawatkʾi towṛĕ patsʾer ēr hetʾanosnerown .
44014028	Ow hon ergar zhamanag getsʾan ashagertnerown het .	
44015001	Omankʾ , ichnelov Hrēastanēn , gĕ sorvetsʾnēin eghpayrnerown ow g!ĕsēin : « Etʾē Movsēsi awantadz sovorowtʾean hamatsayn chʾtʾlpʾatowikʾ , chʾēkʾ grnar pʾrgowil » .
44015002	Owsti , erp Bōghos ow Paṛnapas sastig ĕntvzetsʾan ew vijapanetsʾan anontsʾ het , vjṛetsʾin or Bōghos ow Paṛnapas , naew anontsʾmē kʾani mĕ owrishner , partsranan Erowsaghēm , aṛakʾealnerown ow erētsʾnerown kʾov , ays hartsʾin hamar .
44015003	Anonkʾ al , egeghetsʾiēn owghargowadz , antsʾan Pʾiwnigēēn ew Samariayēn , ow batmelov hetʾanosnerown tartsi kalĕ , medzabēs owrakhatsʾowtsʾin polor eghpayrnerĕ .
44015004	Erp hasan Erowsaghēm , ĕntownowetsʾan egeghetsʾiēn , aṛakʾealnerēn ow erētsʾnerēn , ew batmetsʾin inchʾ or Astowadz ĕrer ēr irentsʾ het .
44015005	Paytsʾ Pʾarisetsʾinerow aghantēn kʾani mĕ hawatatsʾealner gaynetsʾan ew ĕsin : « Bētkʾ ē tʾlpʾatel zanonkʾ , ow batowirel , or bahen Movsēsi ōrēnkʾĕ » .
44015006	Owsti aṛakʾealnern ow erētsʾnerĕ hawakʾowetsʾan , ngati aṛnelow hamar ays panĕ .
44015007	SHat vijapanowtʾiwn ĕllalē etkʾ , Betros ganknetsʾaw ew ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Martig eghpayrner , towkʾ kitēkʾ tʾē aṛachin ōrerēn i ver Astowadz ĕntretsʾ zis mer mēchēn , orbēszi im peranovs hetʾanosnerĕ lsen awetaranin khōskʾĕ , ow hawatan .
44015008	Srtakētn Astowadz vgayetsʾ anontsʾ , Sowrp Hokin talov anontsʾ , inchʾbēs mezi al ,
44015009	ow ochʾ mēg khtrowtʾiwn traw mer ew anontsʾ michew , makʾrelov anontsʾ sirterĕ hawatkʾov .
44015010	Owsti hima inchʾow gĕ pʾortsēkʾ Astowadz , ashagertnerown vizin vray tnelov aynbisi lowdz mĕ , or ochʾ mer hayrerĕ , ochʾ al menkʾ garoghatsʾankʾ grel .
44015011	Paytsʾ gĕ hawatankʾ tʾē Tēr Yisowsi shnorhkʾov gĕ pʾrgowinkʾ menkʾ , inchʾbēs naew anonkʾ » .
44015012	Ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ lṛetsʾ , ow mtig g!ĕnēr Paṛnapasi ew Bōghosi , oronkʾ gĕ batmēin tʾē Astowadz orchʾapʾ nshanner ew skʾanchʾelikʾner kordzadz ēr hetʾanosnerown mēch , irentsʾ michotsʾov .
44015013	Erp anonkʾ lṛetsʾin , Yagopos ĕsaw : « Martig eghpayrner , indzi mtig ĕrēkʾ :
44015014	SHmawon batmetsʾ tʾē inchʾbēs Astowadz aṛachin ankam aytsʾeletsʾ hetʾanosnerown , orbēszi anontsʾ mēchēn aṛnē zhoghovowrt mĕ , grelow hamar ir anownĕ .
44015015	Ays panin het gĕ hamatsaynin markarēnerown khōskʾern al , inchʾbēs krowadz ē :
44015016	“ Asgē etkʾ biti verataṛnam ow biti veragaṛowtsʾanem Tawitʾi pʾladz khoranĕ : biti veragaṛowtsʾanem anor aweragnerĕ ew veraganknem zayn ,
44015017	orbēszi mnatsʾadz martigĕ pʾntṛen Tērĕ , naew polor hetʾanosnerĕ , oronkʾ im anownovs gochʾowadz en , , , - g!ĕsē Tērĕ , or g!ĕnē ays polor panerĕ ” .
44015018	Astowadz kitē ir polor kordzerĕ , tarerow sgizpēn i ver .
44015019	Owsti es yarmar gĕ tatem chʾneghel anonkʾ , or hetʾanosnerēn gĕ taṛnan Astowdzoy :
44015020	haba namag mĕ krel anontsʾ , or et genan gowṛkʾerow bghdzowtʾiwnnerēn , boṛngowtʾenē , kheghtowadzē ew ariwnē .
44015021	Orovhetew Movsēs nakhgin serowntnerēn i ver owni zinkʾ kʾarozoghner amēn kʾaghakʾi mēch , ow gĕ gartatsʾowi zhoghovarannerow mēch amēn SHapatʾ ōr » .
44015022	Ayn aten aṛakʾealnerown ow erētsʾnerown , ampoghch egeghetsʾiin het , hajeli tʾowetsʾaw , or martig ĕntren irentsʾmē ew Antiokʾ ghrgen , Bōghosi ow Paṛnapasi het : - Parsapa maganowaneal Yowtan ew SHighan , oronkʾ gaṛavarogh martig ēin eghpayrnerown mēch .
44015023	Anontsʾ michotsʾov ghrgetsʾin namag mĕ , sabēs krowadz : « Aṛakʾealnerēn , erētsʾnerēn ow eghpayrnerēn , oghchoyn Antiokʾi , Sowriayi ew Giligiayi mēch eghogh eghpayrnerown , oronkʾ hetʾanosnerēn tartsadz en .
44015024	Kʾani lsetsʾinkʾ tʾē mer mēchēn eladz omankʾ , vrtovadz en tsez khōskʾerov , ow tsʾntsʾadz tser antserĕ , ĕselov tʾē bētkʾ ē tʾlpʾatowil ew ōrēnkʾĕ bahel , - orontsʾ menkʾ aysbēs chʾbatowiretsʾinkʾ , -
44015025	mezi , miapanowtʾeamp hawakʾowadznerows , yarmar tʾowetsʾaw , or martig ĕntrelov ghrgenkʾ tsezi , mer sirelinerown , Paṛnapasi ow Bōghosi het ,
44015026	oronkʾ mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi anownin hamar irentsʾ antserĕ ĕndzayadz martig en .
44015027	Owsti ghrgetsʾinkʾ Yowtan ew SHighan , orbēszi irenkʾ al peranov noyn panerĕ batmen tsezi .
44015028	Orovhetew yarmar tʾowetsʾaw Sowrp Hokiin ow mezi al , aweli dzanrowtʾiwn chʾtnel tser vray , sa hargawor panerēn zat : -
44015029	et genal gowṛkʾerow zohowadzē , ariwnē , kheghtowadzē ew boṛngowtʾenē . Koh g!ĕllakʾ , , etʾē heṛow mnakʾ , , atontsʾmē . Oghch eghēkʾ » .
44015030	Anonkʾ al , pa zhnowelov , katsʾin Antiokʾ , ow hawakʾelov pazmowtʾiwnĕ , towin namagĕ .
44015031	Erp gartatsʾin , owrakhatsʾan trowadz mkhitʾarowtʾean hamar .
44015032	Isg Yowta ew SHigha , irenkʾ al markarē ĕllalov , shat khōskʾerov yortoretsʾin eghpayrnerĕ , ow amratsʾowtsʾin .
44015033	ZHamanag mĕ hon genalē etkʾ , eghpayrnerēn khaghaghowtʾeamp owghargowetsʾan , ew aṛakʾealnerown tartsan .
44015034	Paytsʾ SHighayi hajeli tʾowetsʾaw hon mnal .
44015035	Bōghos ow Paṛnapas al Antiokʾi mēch gĕ genayin , ew owrish shaterow het gĕ sorvetsʾnēin ow g!awetēin Tēroch khōskʾĕ .
44015036	Kʾani mĕ ōr etkʾ , Bōghos ĕsaw Paṛnapasi : « Verataṛnankʾ ew aytsʾelenkʾ eghpayrnerown , ayn polor kʾaghakʾnerown mēch , owr Tēroch khōskʾĕ hṛchʾagetsʾinkʾ , ow tesnenkʾ tʾē inchʾbēs en .
44015037	Paṛnapas g!owzēr aṛnel Yovhannēsn al , or Margos gĕ gochʾowēr :
44015038	paytsʾ Bōghos mtadzetsʾ tʾē law chʾē irentsʾ het aṛnel Bampʾiwliayi mēch irentsʾmē heṛatsʾoghĕ ew irentsʾ het kordzi chʾkatsʾoghĕ .
44015039	Aysbēs , taragardzowtʾiwn eghaw anontsʾ michew , ayn astijan , or zatowetsʾan irarmē . Paṛnapas aṛaw Margosĕ ew nawargetsʾ tēbi Gibros .
44015040	Bōghos al ĕntretsʾ SHighan ow megnetsʾaw , eghpayrnerēn yantsnararowadz ĕllalov Astowdzoy shnorhkʾin ,
44015041	ew gĕ shrchēr Sowriayi ow Giligiayi mēch , amratsʾnelov egeghetsʾinerĕ .
44016001	Yetoy hasaw Terpē ow Liwstra . Ew aha ashagert mĕ gar hon , Timotʾēos anownov , or ortin ēr hawatatsʾeal hreay gnoch mĕ , isg hayrĕ Yoyn ēr .
44016002	An pari vgayowadz ēr naew Liwstrayi ew Igoniayi eghpayrnerēn .
44016003	Bōghos owzetsʾ or an ertʾay iren het : owsti aṛaw ow tʾlpʾatetsʾ zayn , ayntegh eghogh Hreanerown batjaṛov , orovhetew polorn al kitēin tʾē anor hayrĕ Yoyn ēr .
44016004	Erp g!antsʾnēin kʾaghakʾnerēn , g!awantēin anontsʾ Erowsaghēm eghadz aṛakʾealnerēn ow erētsʾnerēn batowirowadz hramannerĕ , orbēszi bahen .
44016005	Egeghetsʾinern al g!amranayin hawatkʾi mēch , ew anontsʾ tʾiwĕ gĕ pazmanar ōrē ōr .
44016006	Erp shrchetsʾan Pʾṛiwkia ow Kaghatiayi ergirĕ , Sowrp Hokin arkiletsʾ kʾarozel Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ Asiayi mēch .
44016007	Hasnelov Miwsiayi goghmerĕ , gĕ pʾortsēin ertʾal tēbi Piwtʾania : paytsʾ ( Yisowsi ) Hokin chʾtʾoylatretsʾ anontsʾ .
44016008	Owsti , antsʾnelov Miwsiayi kʾovēn , ichan Trovata .
44016009	Hon , kisherĕ tesilkʾ mĕ erewtsʾaw Bōghosi : Magetonatsʾi mĕ gaynadz ēr ow g!aghachʾēr iren , ĕselov : « Antsʾir Magetonia ew ōknē mezi » .
44016010	Erp tesaw ayt tesilkʾĕ , isgoyn chanatsʾinkʾ megnil Magetonia , ezragatsʾnelov tʾē Tērĕ gĕ ganchʾē mez anontsʾ awetaranelow .
44016011	Owsti Trovatayēn nawargelov , owghigh ĕntʾatsʾkʾov katsʾinkʾ Samotʾragē , ow heteweal ōrĕ , Nēabolis :
44016012	angē al , Pʾilibbē , or Magetoniayi mēg masin klkhawor kʾaghakʾn ē , naew , kaghowtʾ . Kʾani mĕ ōr getsʾankʾ ayt kʾaghakʾin mēch .
44016013	SHapatʾ ōrĕ towrs elankʾ kʾaghakʾēn , ketezerkʾĕ , owr sovorowtʾiwn ownēin aghōtʾelow : nstankʾ ew khōsetsʾankʾ hamakhmpowadz ginerown .
44016014	Astowadzabasht gin mĕ , Litia anownov , or dziranavajaṛ ēr , Tʾiwatir kʾaghakʾēn , mtig g!ĕnēr : Tērĕ patsʾaw anor sirtĕ , or owshatir ĕllay Bōghosi ĕsadznerown .
44016015	Erp inkʾ ew ir ĕntanikʾĕ mgrtowetsʾan , aghachʾetsʾ , ĕselov : « Etʾē Tēroch hawatarim gĕ sebēkʾ zis , im towns mtēkʾ ow hon mnatsʾēkʾ » . Ew stibelov , taraw mez .
44016016	Minchʾ aghōtʾkʾi g!ertʾayinkʾ , mezi hantibetsʾaw aghakhin mĕ , or hartsʾowg oki ownēr ew kowshagowtʾeamp shat vastag gĕ perēr ir tērerown .
44016017	Asiga gĕ hetewēr Bōghosi ow mezi , ew g!aghaghagēr : « Ays martigĕ Amenapartsr Astowdzoy dzaṛanern en , ow gĕ kʾarozen mezi pʾrgowtʾean jampan » .
44016018	SHat ōrer g!ĕnēr ays panĕ : Bōghos al , neghanalov , tartsaw ew ĕsaw ayt okiin : « Yisows Kʾristosi anownov gĕ hramayem kʾezi , elir atgē » . Ow noyn zhamown elaw .
44016019	Erp anor tērerĕ tesan tʾē irentsʾ vastagin yoysĕ knatsʾ , pṛnetsʾin Bōghosĕ ew SHighan , ow kʾashetsʾin hrabaragĕ , beterown aṛchew .
44016020	Aba tarin zanonkʾ medzawornerown kʾov ew ĕsin : « Ays martigĕ , or Hreay en , irar g!antsʾĕnen mer kʾaghakʾĕ ,
44016021	ow gĕ kʾarozen aynbisi sovorowtʾiwnner , or artōnowadz chʾē mezi ĕntownil , ochʾ al kordzatrel , orovhetew Hṛomayetsʾi enkʾ » .
44016022	Pazmowtʾiwnĕ khṛnowetsʾaw anontsʾ showrch : medzawornern al pṛnowtʾeamp hanetsʾin anontsʾ hantertsnerĕ , ew hramayetsʾin kharazanel zanonkʾ .
44016023	SHat harowadzner talē etkʾ anontsʾ , pantĕ netetsʾin zanonkʾ , batowirelov pantabahin , or abahovowtʾeamp bahē zanonkʾ .
44016024	An al , aysbisi batowēr stanalov , nersi pantĕ netetsʾ zanonkʾ , ow gojghi mēch amratsʾowtsʾ anontsʾ otkʾerĕ .
44016025	Gēs kisherin , Bōghos ew SHigha g!aghōtʾēin ow g!ōrhnerkēin Astowdzoy : pantargealnern al mtig g!ĕnēin anontsʾ .
44016026	Yangardz hzōr ergrashar zh mĕ eghaw , aynbēs or pantin himerĕ sarsetsʾan : anmichabēs polor tṛnerĕ patsʾowetsʾan ew polorin gaberĕ kʾagowetsʾan .
44016027	Pantabahĕ , erp artʾntsʾaw ow patsʾowadz tesaw pantin tṛnerĕ , kʾashetsʾ sowrĕ ew biti sbannēr inkʾzinkʾ , gardzelov tʾē pantargealnerĕ pʾakhadz en .
44016028	Paytsʾ Bōghos partsratsayn kochʾetsʾ : « Mi vnaser town kʾezi , orovhetew polors al hos enkʾ » .
44016029	An al , jrak mĕ owzelov , vazetsʾ ners , toghalov ingaw Bōghosi ew SHighayi aṛchew ,
44016030	ow towrs perelov zanonkʾ , ĕsaw : « Tērer , inchʾ bētkʾ ē ĕnem , or pʾrgowim » .
44016031	Anonkʾ al ĕsin : « Hawata Tēr Yisows Kʾristosi , ow biti pʾrgowis , town ew townt » .
44016032	Ow Tēroch khōskʾĕ kʾarozetsʾin anor ew polor anontsʾ , or anor tan mēch ēin .
44016033	Inkʾ al , kisherowan noyn zhamown , aṛaw zanonkʾ , lowatsʾ anontsʾ vērkʾerĕ ew anmichabēs mgrtowetsʾaw , inkʾ ow polor irennerĕ .
44016034	Aba ir townĕ tanelov zanonkʾ , seghan traw anontsʾ aṛchew , ew tsʾndzatsʾ ampoghch ĕntanikʾov , hawatalov Astowdzoy .
44016035	Erp aṛtow eghaw , medzawornerĕ yisnabetner ghrgetsʾin ew ĕsin : « Artsagē ayt martigĕ » .
44016036	Pantabahn al haghortetsʾ Bōghosi ayt khōskʾerĕ , ĕselov : « Medzawornerĕ mart ghrgetsʾin , or artsagowikʾ : owsti hima towrs elēkʾ ow megnetsʾēkʾ khaghaghowtʾeamp » .
44016037	Paytsʾ Bōghos ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Tʾēbēt chʾtatabartowadz Hṛomayetsʾiner enkʾ , hrabaragaw dzedzelov mez , pantĕ netetsʾin , ew hima dzadzgapar gĕ hanen mez . Ochʾ aytbēs , haba irenkʾ tʾogh kan ow towrs tanin mez » .
44016038	Yisnabetnerĕ medzawornerown haghortetsʾin ays khōskʾerĕ . Anonkʾ al , erp lsetsʾin tʾē Hṛomayetsʾi en , vakhtsʾan , ow egan , aghachʾetsʾin anontsʾ ,
44016039	ew towrs hanelov , gĕ tʾakhantsēin or megnin ayt kʾaghakʾēn .
44016040	Anonkʾ al elan pantēn ow mtan Litiayi townĕ , ew tesnelov eghpayrnerĕ , yortoretsʾin zanonkʾ ow megnetsʾan .
44017001	Ampʾibolisēn ew Aboghoniayēn antsʾnelov , Tʾesaghonigē egan , owr Hreanerown zhoghovaranĕ gar .
44017002	Bōghos al , ir sovorowtʾean hamatsayn , mtaw anontsʾ mēch , ow erekʾ SHapatʾ ōrer khōsetsʾaw anontsʾ het Kirkʾerown masin ,
44017003	patsʾatrelov ew pʾastargelov anontsʾ tʾē Kʾristos bētkʾ ē chʾarchʾarowēr ow meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛnēr : ew ĕsaw : “ Ays Yisowsĕ , or es gĕ hṛchʾagem tsezi , Kʾristosn ē ” .
44017004	Anontsʾmē omankʾ ansatsʾin ow miatsʾan Bōghosi ew SHighayi , naew , parebasht Yoynerēn medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ : aṛachnagark ginerēn hawatatsʾoghnern al sagawatʾiw chʾēin .
44017005	Paytsʾ chʾansatsʾogh Hreanerĕ nakhantsetsʾan , ew kʾani mĕ tatargabort , kṛehig martig aṛnelov , pazmowtʾiwn zhoghvetsʾin , ampoghch kʾaghakʾin mēch aghmowg hanetsʾin , ow Yasoni tan vray yartsagelov gĕ pʾntṛēin zanonkʾ , or ampokhin tanin .
44017006	Erp chʾktan zanonkʾ , Yasonĕ ew kʾani mĕ eghpayrner kʾashgṛtelov tarin kʾaghakʾabetnerown aṛchew , koṛalov : « Anonkʾ or ergrakowntĕ tagnowvray ĕrin , hos al hasadz en ,
44017007	ow Yason ĕntownadz ē zanonkʾ . Asonkʾ polorĕ gĕ kordzen gaysrin hramannerown tēm , ĕselov tʾē owrish tʾakawor mĕ gay , Yisows anownov » .
44017008	Pazmowtʾiwnn ow kʾaghakʾabetnerĕ vrtovetsʾan , lselov ays panerĕ .
44017009	Paytsʾ erp erashkhikʾ aṛin Yasonēn ew miwsnerēn , artsagetsʾin zanonkʾ .
44017010	Eghpayrnern al isgoyn , kisherowan mēch , Peria ghrgetsʾin Bōghosn ow SHighan , oronkʾ hon hasnelov , katsʾin Hreanerown zhoghovaranĕ .
44017011	Asonkʾ aweli azniw ēin , kʾan Tʾesaghonigēi mēch eghoghnerĕ : Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ ĕntownetsʾin lman yō zharowtʾeamp , ew amēn ōr gĕ znnēin Kirkʾerĕ , tesnelow tʾē aytbēs en ayt panerĕ .
44017012	Owsti anontsʾmē shaterĕ hawatatsʾin , ow medzayark yoyn ginerēn ew ayr martotsʾmēn hawatatsʾoghnern al sagawatʾiw chʾēin .
44017013	Paytsʾ erp tʾesaghonigetsʾi Hreanerĕ kittsʾan tʾē Periayi mēch al Bōghos hṛchʾagetsʾ Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ , hon al egan ow krkṛetsʾin pazmowtʾiwnĕ .
44017014	Ayn aten eghpayrnerĕ isgoyn Bōghosĕ jampetsʾin , or ertʾay minchʾew dzovezerkʾĕ , paytsʾ SHigha ew Timotʾēos mnatsʾin hon .
44017015	Anonkʾ or gĕ tanēin Bōghosĕ , hastsʾowtsʾin zayn minchʾew Atʾēnkʾ , aba megnetsʾan , batowēr stanalov SHighayi ow Timotʾēosi hamar , or showtov kan iren .
44017016	Minchʾ Atʾēnkʾi mēch Bōghos gĕ sbasēr anontsʾ , ir hokin krkṛowadz ēr ir mēch , tesnelov kʾaghakʾĕ , letsʾowadz gowṛkʾerov .
44017017	Owsti zhoghovaranin mēch gĕ khōsēr Hreanerown ow parebasht martotsʾ , naew amēn ōr hrabaragnerown mēch , anontsʾ or hantibēr .
44017018	Kʾani mĕ Ebigowrean ew Stoyigean pʾilisopʾaner al gĕ khorhrtagtsʾēin iren het . Omankʾ g!ĕsēin : « Inchʾ ĕsel g!owzē ays sermnakʾaghĕ » . Owrishner al gĕsēin : « Gĕ tʾowi tʾē ōtar astowadznerow kʾarozichʾ ē » : orovhetew g!awetēr anontsʾ Yisowsĕ ew yarowtʾiwnĕ .
44017019	Owsti aṛnelov zayn , tarin Arisbakos ow g!ĕsēin : « Grnankʾ kitnal tʾē inchʾ ē ayt nor owsowtsʾowmĕ , or town gĕ kʾarozes ,
44017020	orovhetew kʾani mĕ tarōrinag paner lsel gow tas mezi , , . Owremn g!owzenkʾ kitnal tʾē inchʾ grnan ĕllal atonkʾ » .
44017021	( Orovhetew polor Atʾenatsʾinerown ew hon kaghtʾadz ōtaragannerown zhamantsʾĕ owrish ochʾinchʾ ē , kʾan nor pan ĕsel gam lsel . )
44017022	Hetewapar Bōghos gaynetsʾaw Arisbakosi mēch ew ĕsaw : « Atʾenatsʾi martig , gĕ nshmarem tʾē amēn inchʾov chʾapʾazantsʾ grōnasēr ēkʾ .
44017023	Kʾani or es shrchelov ow tser bashtamownkʾĕ znnelov , ktay zohaseghan mĕ , orown vray krowadz ēr : « Andzanōtʾ Astowdzoyn » . Owsti an , ormē towkʾ g!agnadzikʾ aṛantsʾ janchʾnalow , es zayn gĕ hṛchʾagem tsezi .
44017024	Astowadz , or steghdzetsʾ ashkharhĕ ew anor mēch eghadz polor panerĕ , inkʾ , or Tērn ē erginkʾi ow ergri , ochʾ gĕ pnagi tseṛagert tajarnerow mēch ,
44017025	ochʾ al gĕ khnamowi martotsʾ tseṛkʾov , ipr tʾē orewē pani garōt ĕllar : kʾani or inkʾ gow tay polorin geankʾ , shownchʾ , ew amēn inchʾ .
44017026	Mēg ariwnē steghdzetsʾ martotsʾ polor azkerĕ , orbēszi pnagin ampoghch ergri mageresin vray , ow sahmanetsʾ nakhabēs oroshowadz zhamanagnerĕ ew anontsʾ pnagarani sahmannerĕ , or pʾntṛen Tērĕ ,
44017027	ow tʾerews ktnen zinkʾ kharkhapʾelov , tʾēbēt mezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrēn al heṛow chʾē .
44017028	Artarew anov g!abrinkʾ , gĕ shar zhinkʾ ew gankʾ , inchʾbēs tser panasteghdznerēn omankʾ al ĕsin : “ Kʾani or menkʾ anor tsʾeghēn isg enkʾ ” .
44017029	Owremn , Astowdzoy tsʾeghēn ĕllalov , bētkʾ chʾē gardzenkʾ , , tʾē astowadzowtʾiwnĕ nman ē osgii gam ardzatʾi gam kʾari , kʾantagowadz martgayin arowestov ow erewagayowtʾeamp , , .
44017030	Ew hima Astowadz , anteselov ays ankitowtʾean zhamanagnerĕ , amēnowrekʾ gĕ batowirē polor martotsʾ , or abashkharen .
44017031	Orovhetew sahmanadz ē ōr mĕ , erp biti tatē ergrakowntĕ artarowtʾeamp , ir oroshadz martown michotsʾov : ew ays masin hawastikʾ towaw polorin , meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanelov zayn » .
44017032	Erp lsetsʾin meṛelnerow yarowtʾean masin , omankʾ dzaghretsʾin , isg owrishner ĕsin : « Ays masin tartseal mtig biti ĕnenkʾ kʾezi » .
44017033	Aysbēs Bōghos megnetsʾaw anontsʾ mēchēn .
44017034	Sagayn kʾani mĕ martig yaretsʾan iren , ow hawatatsʾin : anontsʾ mēch ēin Tionesios Arisbakatsʾin , Tamaris anownov gin mĕ , ew irentsʾ het owrishner .
44018001	Asgē etkʾ Bōghos , heṛanalov Atʾēnkʾēn , egaw Gorntʾos ,
44018002	ktaw Hreay mĕ , Agiwghas anownov , dznowntov , Bontatsʾi , or ir Brisgigha gnoch het nor egadz ēr Italiayēn ( kʾani or Gghōtios batowiradz ēr polor Hreanerown , heṛanal Hṛomēn ) , ew knatsʾ anontsʾ kʾov .
44018003	Kʾani inkʾ arhestagitsʾ ēr , anontsʾ kʾov pnagetsʾaw ew ashkhatetsʾaw , orovhetew arhestov vranakordz ēin .
44018004	Isg amēn SHapatʾ ōr gĕ khōsēr zhoghovaranin mēch , ew gĕ hamozēr Hreanern ow Yoynerĕ .
44018005	Erp SHigha ew Timotʾēos ichan Magetoniayēn , Bōghos hokii gsgidzov gĕ vgayēr Hreanerown tʾē Yisows , Kʾristosn ē .
