44018006	Paytsʾ erp anonkʾ ĕnttimatsʾan ow gĕ hayhoyēin , ir hantertsnerĕ tʾōtʾowelov , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « TSer ariwnĕ tser klowkhĕ ĕllay , es anbart em : asgē etkʾ , hetʾanosnerown biti ertʾam » .
44018007	Ew megnelov angē , mtaw Yowstos anownov mēgow mĕ townĕ , or astowadzabasht ēr : anor townĕ zhoghovaranin gitsʾ ēr .
44018008	ZHoghovaranin betĕ , Grisbos , hawatatsʾ Tēroch ir ampoghch ĕntanikʾov . Gorntʾatsʾinerēn shater al lselov , hawatatsʾin ow mgrtowetsʾan .
44018009	Kisherĕ tesilkʾi mēch Tērĕ ĕsaw Bōghosi : « Mi vakhnar , haba khōsē ew lowṛ mi genar :
44018010	orovhetew es kʾezi het em , ow ochʾ mēgĕ tseṛkʾĕ vrat biti tnē , kʾezi vnaselow hamar : kʾani or es shat zhoghovowrt ownim ays kʾaghakʾin mēch » .
44018011	Hon tari mĕ ow vetsʾ amis getsʾaw , ew Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ gĕ sorvetsʾnēr anontsʾ mēch .
44018012	Akʾayiayi pʾokh-hiwbatosin , Kaghioni ōrerĕ , Hreanerĕ miapanelov , ĕmpostatsʾan Bōghosi tēm , ew tataranĕ tarin zayn ,
44018013	ĕselov : « Asiga gĕ hamozē martigĕ , or bashten Astowadz ōrēnkʾin hagaṛag gerbov » .
44018014	Erp Bōghos biti panar ir peranĕ , Kaghion ĕsaw Hreanerown : « Etʾē anirawowtʾean mĕ gam chʾar lrpowtʾean mĕ hamar ĕllar , ov Hreaner , g!ar zhēr or hantowr zhēi tsezi :
44018015	paytsʾ etʾē hartsʾĕ , khōskʾi , anownnerow ew tser ōrēnkʾin masin ē , towkʾ tsezmē tesēkʾ tatĕ : orovhetew es chʾem pʾapʾakʾir aytbisi panerow tatawor ĕllal » :
44018016	ow zanonkʾ vṛntetsʾ tataranēn .
44018017	Owsti polor Yoynerĕ pṛnetsʾin Sostʾenēsĕ , zhoghovaranin betĕ , ew dzedzetsʾin tataranin aṛchew . Paytsʾ Kaghion pnaw hok chʾēr ĕner ays masin .
44018018	Isg Bōghos , tagawin shat ōrer hon mnalē etkʾ , hra zhesht aṛaw eghpayrnerēn ow nawargetsʾ tēbi Sowria - Brisgigha ew Agiwghas al iren het - , nakhabēs ir klowkhĕ khowzadz ĕllalov Genkʾreayi mēch , orovhetew owkht ĕradz ēr .
44018019	Erp hasaw Epʾesos , hon tsketsʾ zanonkʾ , isg inkʾ mtnelov zhoghovaranĕ , gĕ khōsēr Hreanerown het .
44018020	Iren tʾakhantsetsʾin or aweli ergar zhamanag mnay irentsʾ kʾov : paytsʾ chʾhawanetsʾaw ,
44018021	haba hra zhesht aṛaw anontsʾmē , ĕselov : « Bētkʾ ē or anbatjaṛ ays yaṛachigay tōnĕ gatarem Erowsaghēmi mēch , paytsʾ , , Astowdzoy gamkʾov tartseal biti verataṛnam tsezi » . Ow Epʾesosēn nawargetsʾ
44018022	ew Gesaria hasnelov , Erowsaghēm partsratsʾaw , parewetsʾ egeghetsʾin , ow yetoy ichaw Antiokʾ .
44018023	ZHamanag mĕ hon genalē etkʾ , megnetsʾaw , ew garkov Kaghatatsʾinerown ergirn ow Pʾṛiwkia gĕ shrchēr , polor ashagertnerĕ amratsʾnelov .
44018024	Aboghos anownov Hreay mĕ , dznowntov , Aghekʾsantratsʾi , jartasan mart mĕ , or hmowt ēr Sowrp Kirkʾerown , egaw hasaw Epʾesos .
44018025	An grtʾowadz ēr Tēroch jampayin mēch , ow eṛantown hokiov , gĕ khōsēr ew jshkrtowtʾeamp gĕ sorvetsʾnēr Tēroch masin : paytsʾ inkʾ kitēr miayn Yovhannēsi mgrtowtʾiwnĕ .
44018026	An sgsaw zhoghovaranin mēch kʾarozel hamartsagowtʾeamp . Erp Agiwghas ow Brisgigha lsetsʾin zayn , irentsʾ kʾov aṛin zinkʾ , ew aweli jshkrtowtʾeamp patsʾatretsʾin iren Astowdzoy jampan .
44018027	Erp an pʾapʾakʾetsʾaw ertʾal Akʾayia , eghpayrnerĕ namag kretsʾin ow khrakhowsetsʾin aynteghi ashagertnerĕ , or ĕntownin zinkʾ . Ew hon hasnelov , Astowdzoy shnorhkʾov shat ōktagar eghaw hawatatsʾealnerown :
44018028	kʾani or hrabaragaw ow zhknōrēn gĕ hamozēr Hreanerĕ , Sowrp Kirkʾerēn tsʾoytsʾ talov tʾē Yisows , Kʾristosn ē .
44019001	Minchʾ Aboghos Gorntʾosi mēch ēr , Bōghos , veri ergramaserĕ shrchelē etkʾ , hasaw Epʾesos , ew ktnelov kʾani mĕ ashagertner ,
44019002	ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Erp hawatatsʾikʾ , arteōkʾ statsʾakʾ Sowrp Hokin » . Anonkʾ bataskhanetsʾin iren : « Paytsʾ menkʾ lsadz isg chʾenkʾ , tʾē Sowrp Hoki mĕ gay » .
44019003	An al ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Haba inchʾov mgrtowetsʾakʾ » . Anonkʾ bataskhanetsʾin : « Yovhannēsi mgrtowtʾeamp » .
44019004	Bōghos al ĕsaw : « Yovhannēs mgrtetsʾ abashkharowtʾean mgrtowtʾeamp , ĕselov zhoghovowrtin or hawatan anor , or biti kar irmē etkʾ , aysinkʾn , Kʾristos Yisowsi » .
44019005	Erp asiga lsetsʾin , mgrtowetsʾan Tēr Yisowsi anownov :
44019006	ow erp Bōghos tseṛkʾ traw anontsʾ vray , Sowrp Hokin egaw anontsʾ vray , ew lezowner gĕ khōsēin ow gĕ markarēanayin .
44019007	Polorĕ kretʾē tasnergow mart ēin .
44019008	Aba zhoghovaranĕ mtnelov , erekʾ amis hamartsagowtʾeamp gĕ khōsēr Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean masin , ew gĕ hamozēr .
44019009	Paytsʾ erp omankʾ gĕ yamaṛēin ow chʾēin ansar , anidzelov ayt jampan pazmowtʾean aṛchew , heṛatsʾaw anontsʾmē , zatetsʾ ashagertnerĕ , ew amēn ōr gĕ khōsēr Tiwran anownov mēgow mĕ tbranotsʾin mēch .
44019010	Asiga tewetsʾ ergow tari , aynbēs or ampoghch Asiayi mēch pnagogh Hreanern ow Yoynerĕ lsetsʾin Tēroch khōskʾĕ .
44019011	Astowadz artasovor hrashkʾner gĕ kordzēr Bōghosi tseṛkʾov :
44019012	minchʾew isg anor marminēn tʾashginagner ow koknotsʾner gĕ tarowēin hiwantnerown , oronkʾ g!azatēin irentsʾ akhterēn ow chʾar okinerĕ towrs g!ellēin .
44019013	Owsti tʾapʾaṛashrchig Hreanerēn omankʾ , oronkʾ okiner gĕ hanēin , , , pʾortsetsʾin Tēr Yisowsi anownĕ ganchʾel chʾar okiner ownetsʾoghnerown vray , ĕselov : « G!ertmnetsʾnenkʾ tsez Yisowsov , or Bōghos gĕ kʾarozē » .
44019014	Ays panĕ ĕnoghnerĕ , Sgewa gochʾowadz hreay kʾahanayabeti mĕ eōtʾĕ ortinern ēin .
44019015	CHʾar okin bataskhanetsʾ anontsʾ : « Gĕ janchʾnam Yisowsĕ ow kitem Bōghosĕ , paytsʾ towkʾ ov ēkʾ » .
44019016	Ew ayt martĕ , orown mēch ēr chʾar okin , tsʾatgetsʾ anontsʾ vray , tirabetetsʾ ow yaghtʾetsʾ anontsʾ , aynbēs or towrs pʾakhan ayt townēn , merg ew virawor .
44019017	Epʾesos pnagogh polor Hreanern ow Yoynerĕ kittsʾan ays panĕ : vakhĕ hamagetsʾ zanonkʾ polorĕ , , , ew Tēr Yisowsi anownĕ gĕ medzarowēr .
44019018	Hawatatsʾealnerēn shater gow kayin , gĕ khostovanēin ow gĕ yaytararēin irentsʾ ararkʾnerĕ .
44019019	Tiwtʾowtʾiwn girargoghnerēn shater , miasin gĕ perēin irentsʾ kirkʾerĕ , ow g!ayrēin polorin aṛchew . Erp hashowetsʾin anontsʾ kinĕ , ktan tʾē yisown hazar gtor ardzatʾ g!ar zhēr .
44019020	Aysbēs , Tēroch khōskʾĕ medzabēs g!ajēr ow gĕ zōranar .
44019021	Erp ays panerĕ gatarowetsʾan , Bōghos hokiin mēch oroshetsʾ Erowsaghēm ertʾal , Magetoniayēn ew Akʾayiayēn antsʾnelov , ow g!ĕsēr : « Hon ĕllalēs etkʾ , bētkʾ ē Hṛomn al tesnem » .
44019022	Iren sbasargoghnerēn ergowkʾĕ , Timotʾēosn ow Erastosĕ , ghrgetsʾ Magetonia , ew inkʾ zhamanag mĕn al Asia mnatsʾ .
44019023	Ayt aten medz khlrtowm eghaw , Tēroch jampayin hamar .
44019024	Orovhetew Temetrios anownov ardzatʾakordz mĕ , or gĕ shinēr Artemisi pʾokʾrig ardzatʾē tajarner ow medz vastag gĕ perēr arhestawornerown ,
44019025	hamakhmpetsʾ zanonkʾ , noyn arhestin kordzawornerown het , ew ĕsaw : « Martig , towkʾ kitēkʾ tʾē ays kordzēn ē mer egamowtĕ :
44019026	ow gĕ tesnēkʾ ew gĕ lsēkʾ tʾē ays Bōghosĕ ochʾ miayn Epʾesosi mēch , ayl naew kretʾē ampoghch Asiayi mēch medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ hamozetsʾ ow moloretsʾowtsʾ , ĕselov tʾē “ tseṛkʾov shinowadznerĕ astowadzner chʾen ” .
44019027	Owsti vtank gay , or ochʾ miayn ays mer goghmĕ anarkowi , ayl medz astowadzowhiin , Artemisi tajarn al ochʾinchʾ sebowi , ew khortagowi medzapʾaṛowtʾiwnĕ anor , or ampoghch Asian ow ergrakowntĕ gĕ bashten » .
44019028	Erp lsetsʾin asiga , zayroytʾov letsʾowadz g!aghaghagēin : « Medz ē Epʾesatsʾinerown Artemisĕ » .
44019029	Ampoghch kʾaghakʾĕ letsʾowetsʾaw khaṛnashpʾotʾowtʾeamp , ow yapʾshtagelov Kayios ew Aristarkʾos Magetonatsʾinerĕ , Bōghosi jamportagitsʾnerĕ , polorĕ miapanowtʾeamp vazetsʾin tʾatronĕ .
44019030	Isg erp Bōghos owzetsʾ mtnel ampokhin mēch , ashagertnerĕ chʾtʾoylatretsʾin iren .
44019031	Asiabetnerēn omankʾ al , or ir paregamnern ēin , mart ghrgelov iren , g!aghachʾēin or chʾyantkni ertʾal tʾatronĕ .
44019032	Owsti omankʾ pan mĕ g!aghaghagēin , owrishner , owrish pan , orovhetew hamakhmpowmĕ shpʾotʾadz ēr : shater al chʾēin kiter tʾē inchʾow hamakhmpowadz en .
44019033	Aba pazmowtʾean mēchēn towrs kʾashetsʾin Aghekʾsantrosĕ , or Hreanerĕ yaṛach kʾshetsʾin : Aghekʾsantros al , tseṛkʾĕ shar zhelov , g!owzēr chatakovel inkʾzinkʾ ampokhin aṛchew .
44019034	Erp kittsʾan tʾē an Hreay ē , polorĕ miaperan , kretʾē ergow zham aghaghagetsʾin : « Medz ē Epʾesatsʾinerown Artemisĕ » .
44019035	Sagayn atenatbirĕ , hantartetsʾnelov pazmowtʾiwnĕ , ĕsaw : « Epʾesatsʾi martig , ov ē ayn martĕ or chʾi kiter tʾē Epʾesatsʾinerown kʾaghakʾĕ , bahabann ē medz Artemisi ow Tiosē ingadz gowṛkʾin tajarin .
44019036	Owremn , ngatelov or ays panerĕ anvijeli en , towkʾ bētkʾ ē hantart genakʾ ew yantknowtʾeamp ochʾinchʾ ĕnēkʾ .
44019037	Kʾani or towkʾ hos perikʾ ayt martigĕ , oronkʾ ochʾ tajar goghobtoghner en , ochʾ al tser astowadzowhiin hayhoyoghner .
44019038	Owremn , etʾē Temetrios ew iren het eghogh arhestawornerĕ pan mĕ ownin oewē mēgown tēm , tati ōrer gan ow pʾokh-hiwbatosner : tʾogh ampastanen zirar .
44019039	Isg etʾē tser bahanchĕ owrish pani mĕ masin ē , tʾogh patsʾatrowi ōrinawor hamakhmpowmi mēch .
44019040	Orovhetew menkʾ al aysōrowan eghadzin hamar , ipr abstamp ampastanowelow vtankin mēch enkʾ , kʾani or batjaṛ mĕ chʾgay , orov garenankʾ hashiw tal ays khaṛnijaghanjin hamar » . Ow erp aysbēs khōsetsʾaw , artsagetsʾ hamakhmpowmĕ .
44019041	
44020001	Aghmowgin tatrelēn etkʾ , Bōghos iren ganchʾetsʾ ashagertnerĕ , ow parewelov zanonkʾ , megnetsʾaw or Magetonia ertʾay .
44020002	Ayt vayrerĕ shrchelē ew shat khōskʾerov zanonkʾ yortorelē etkʾ , Yownastan knatsʾ ,
44020003	ow erekʾ amis hon getsʾaw . Erp biti nawargēr tēbi Sowria , Hreanerĕ tawatretsʾin iren tēm : owsti oroshetsʾ verataṛnal , Magetoniayēn antsʾnelov .
44020004	Periatsʾi ( Biṛosi ortin ) Sobatros , minchʾew Asia iren het knatsʾ , naew Tʾesaghonigetsʾinerēn , Aristarkʾos ow Segowntos , Kayios Terpatsʾin , Timotʾēos , isg Asiayēn , Tiwkʾigos ew Tropʾimos .
44020005	Asonkʾ nakhabēs katsʾin ow Trovatayi mēch sbasetsʾin mezi .
44020006	Menkʾ al , Pagharchagerkʾi ōrerēn etkʾ , Pʾilibbēēn nawargetsʾinkʾ , hink ōrowan mēch hasankʾ Trovata , anontsʾ kʾov , ow hon getsʾankʾ eōtʾĕ ōr .
44020007	Mēgshaptʾi ōrĕ , erp hawakʾowadz ēinkʾ , , hatsʾ gtrelow , Bōghos gĕ kʾarozēr anontsʾ , orovhetew heteweal ōrĕ biti megnēr : ow khōskʾĕ ergaretsʾ minchʾew gēs kisher .
44020008	SHat labterner gayin ayn vernatownĕ , owr menkʾ hawakʾowadz ēinkʾ .
44020009	Eritasart mĕ , Ewtikʾos anownov , or batowhanin mēch nstadz ēr , mtaw khorowng kʾowni mēch . Erp Bōghos ergaretsʾ kʾarozĕ , an , tarowadz kʾownēn , ingaw errort yargēn var , ow meṛadz vertsʾowtsʾin zayn .
44020010	Bōghos var ichaw , ingaw anor vray , krgetsʾ zayn ew ĕsaw : « Mi vrtovikʾ , orovhetew anor hokin ir mēchn ē » .
44020011	Owsti , erp ver elaw , gtretsʾ hatsʾĕ , jashagetsʾ , ow ergar khōsetsʾaw , minchʾew aṛtow : yetoy megnetsʾaw .
44020012	Isg ayt batanin oghch perin , ew chʾapʾazantsʾ mkhitʾarowetsʾan .
44020013	Isg menkʾ , nakhabēs naw mtnelov , megnetsʾankʾ tēbi Asos , owrgē biti aṛnēinkʾ Bōghosĕ , orovhetew aytbēs batowiradz ēr : kʾani or inkʾ biti ertʾar tsʾamakʾov .
44020014	Erp Asosi mēch miatsʾaw mezi , aṛinkʾ zinkʾ ew katsʾinkʾ Mitilinē .
44020015	Angē al nawargelov , heteweal ōrĕ hasankʾ Kʾiosi timatsʾ : miws ōrĕ hasankʾ Samos , ow kisherĕ mnalov Trokilion , yachort ōrĕ katsʾinkʾ Miletos .
44020016	Artarew Bōghos oroshadz ēr nawargel Epʾesosi kʾovēn , orovhetew chʾēr owzer zhamanag antsʾĕnel Asiayi mēch , kʾani or g!ajabarēr Erowsaghēm ĕllal Bentegostēi ōrĕ , etʾē gareli ĕllar iren .
44020017	Owsti Miletosēn mart ghrgetsʾ Epʾesos , ow ganchʾetsʾ egeghetsʾiin erētsʾnerĕ .
44020018	Erp egan ir kʾov , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Towkʾ kitēkʾ tʾē inchʾbēs varowetsʾay tsezi het ampoghch zhamanagĕ , aṛachin ōrēn i ver erp Asia egay ,
44020019	dzaṛayelov Tēroch lman khonarhowtʾeamp , ew shat artsʾownkʾov ow pʾortsowtʾiwnnerov , oronkʾ batahetsʾan indzi Hreanerown tawatrowtʾiwnnerov :
44020020	inchʾbēs chʾĕngrgetsʾay ōktagar panerēn orewē mēgĕ haghortelē ew sorvetsʾnelē tsezi , hrabaragaw ow townerow mēch ,
44020021	vgayelov tʾē Hreanerown ew tʾē Yoynerown , tēbi Astowadz abashkharowtʾean ow mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi hantēb hawatkʾin masin .
44020022	Ew hima aha g!ertʾam Erowsaghēm , hokiov gabowadz , ow chʾem kiter tʾē hon inchʾ biti batahi indzi :
44020023	sagayn Sowrp Hokin gĕ vgayē amēn kʾaghakʾi mēch , ew g!ĕsē tʾē gaber ow taṛabankʾner gĕ sbasen indzi .
44020024	Paytsʾ es ochʾ mēg pan gĕ hashowem , ochʾ al indzi hamar batowagan gĕ ngatem , , im antss , orbēszi owrakhowtʾeamp awartem ĕntʾatsʾkʾs , naew ayn sbasargowtʾiwnĕ or statsʾay Tēr Yisowsēn , vgay ĕllalow Astowdzoy shnorhkʾi awetaranin .
44020025	Ow hima aha es kitem tʾē towkʾ polort , orontsʾ mēch shrchetsʾay Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ kʾarozelov , al im eress biti chʾtesnēkʾ .
44020026	Owsti aysōr gĕ vgayem tsezi tʾē es anbart em polorin ariwnēn :
44020027	orovhetew chʾĕngrgetsʾay Astowdzoy ampoghch dzrakirĕ haghortelē tsezi .
44020028	Owremn owshatir eghēkʾ towkʾ tsezi ew ampoghch hōtin , orown vray Sowrp Hokin tesowchʾ traw tsez , hovowelow Astowdzoy egeghetsʾin , or statsʾaw ir ariwnov .
44020029	Kʾani or kitem tʾē im megnowmēs etkʾ , tser mēch biti mtnen yapʾshtagogh kayler , oronkʾ biti chʾkhnayen hōtin .
44020030	Ow tsezmē al biti ellen aynbisi martig , oronkʾ biti khōsin khotor paner , kʾashelow hamar ashagertnerĕ irentsʾ etewēn .
44020031	Owsti artʾown getsʾēkʾ , ew yishetsʾēkʾ tʾē erekʾ tari , kisher ow tsʾereg , chʾtatretsʾay tsezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ artsʾownkʾov khratelē .
44020032	Ew hima , eghpayrner , gĕ yantsnem tsez Astowdzoy ow anor shnorhkʾi khōskʾin , or garogh ē shinel ew tsezi zhaṛankowtʾiwn tal , polor srpatsʾadznerown het .
44020033	Ochʾ mēgown ardzatʾin , gam osgiin , gam batmowjanin tsʾangatsʾi .
44020034	Towkʾ tsezmē kitēkʾ tʾē ays tseṛkʾers hokatsʾin im ow indzi het eghoghnerown garikʾnerĕ .
44020035	Amēn pan tsʾoytsʾ towi tsezi , tʾē aysbēs bētkʾ ē ashkhatil ew ōknel tgarnerown , ow yishel Tēr Yisowsi khōskʾĕ , or inkʾ ĕsaw : “ Aweli eraneli ē talĕ , kʾan stanalĕ ” » .
44020036	Erp aysbēs khōsetsʾaw , dznratretsʾ ew polorin het aghōtʾetsʾ .
44020037	Polorn al shat latsʾin , ow Bōghosi vizin vray iynalov , hampowretsʾin zayn .
44020038	Gĕ mormokʾēin manawant ayn khōskʾin hamar , or ĕsaw tʾē al biti chʾtesnēin ir eresĕ . Ew owghegtsʾetsʾan anor minchʾew nawĕ .
44021001	Erp anchatowetsʾankʾ anontsʾmē ow megnetsʾankʾ , owghigh ĕntʾatsʾkʾov katsʾinkʾ Gov , ow miws ōrĕ , Hṛoton , angē al , Batara .
44021002	Ew ktnelov naw mĕ , or g!ertʾar Pʾiwnigē , mtankʾ anor mēch ow megnetsʾankʾ .
44021003	Erp Gibros erewtsʾaw , tʾoghowtsʾinkʾ zayn tsakh goghmĕ , nawargetsʾinkʾ tēbi Sowria ow hasankʾ Tiwros , orovhetew nawĕ hon biti barbēr ir abrankʾĕ .
44021004	Ktnelov ashagertnerĕ , eōtʾĕ ōr mnatsʾinkʾ hon : anonkʾ Sowrp Hokiov g!ĕsēin Bōghosi , or chʾpartsranay Erowsaghēm .
44021005	Paytsʾ erp ayt ōrerĕ lratsʾan , megnetsʾankʾ : erp g!ertʾayinkʾ , polorn al , ginerov ow zawagnerov , owghegtsʾetsʾan mezi minchʾew kʾaghakʾēn towrs , ew dznratrelov dzovezerkʾĕ , aghōtʾetsʾinkʾ .
44021006	Aba hra zhesht aṛnelov irarmē , menkʾ naw elankʾ , anonkʾ al veratartsan irentsʾ townerĕ .
44021007	Isg menkʾ , awartelov Tiwrosēn sgsadz nawargowtʾiwnĕ , hasankʾ Btoghemayis , parewetsʾinkʾ eghpayrnerĕ , ew ōr mĕ mnatsʾinkʾ anontsʾ kʾov .
44021008	Heteweal ōrĕ , megnetsʾankʾ ow egankʾ Gesaria , ew mtnelov Pʾilibbos awetaranichʾin townĕ , or eōtʾĕ sargawaknerēn mēgn ēr , mnatsʾinkʾ anor kʾov .
44021009	An ownēr chʾors goys aghchigner , oronkʾ gĕ markarēanayin .
44021010	Kʾani or shat ōrer mnatsʾinkʾ hon , Hrēastanēn markarē mĕ ichaw , Akapos anownov :
44021011	erp egaw mezi , aṛaw Bōghosi kōtin , gabetsʾ ir tseṛkʾern ow otkʾerĕ , ew ĕsaw : « Sa gĕ yaytararē Sowrp Hokin : “ Erowsaghēmi mēch , Hreanerĕ aysbēs biti gaben ayn martĕ , orownn ē ays kōtin , ow biti matnen hetʾanosnerown tseṛkʾĕ ” » .
44021012	Erp lsetsʾinkʾ ays panerĕ , aghachʾetsʾinkʾ , menkʾ al , teghatsʾinern al , or chʾpartsranay Erowsaghēm .
44021013	Isg Bōghos bataskhanetsʾ : « Inchʾ g!ĕnēkʾ : inchʾow gow lakʾ ow gĕ jmlēkʾ im sirts : kʾani or es batrast em Erowsaghēmi mēch ochʾ miayn gabowelow , haba naew meṛnelow , Tēr Yisowsi anownin hamar » .
44021014	Erp inkʾ chʾhamozowetsʾaw , hantart getsʾankʾ ew ĕsinkʾ : « Tēroch gamkʾĕ tʾogh ĕllay » .
44021015	Ayt ōrerēn etkʾ , batrastowetsʾankʾ ow partsratsʾankʾ Erowsaghēm .
44021016	Gesaratsʾi ashagertnerēn al omankʾ egan mezi het , ow tarin mez aṛachin ōrerēn ashagert eghadz , , Gibratsʾi Mnasoni , orown kʾov biti hiwrĕngalowēinkʾ .
44021017	Erp mtankʾ Erowsaghēm , eghpayrnerĕ owrakhowtʾeamp ĕntownetsʾin mez .
44021018	Heteweal ōrĕ Bōghos mezi het knatsʾ Yagoposi kʾov , ow polor erētsʾnern al egan .
44021019	Parewelē etkʾ zanonkʾ , mēg aṛ mēg gĕ batmēr inchʾ or Astowadz ĕraw hetʾanosnerown mēch , ir sbasargowtʾeamp .
44021020	Anonkʾ al lselov , pʾaṛaworetsʾin Tērĕ , ew ĕsin iren : « Gĕ tesnes , eghpayr , kʾani piwrawor hawatatsʾeal Hreaner gan . Polorn al ōrēnkʾin nakhantsakhntir en ,
44021021	paytsʾ teghegatsʾan kʾow masit , tʾē hetʾanosnerown mēch eghogh polor Hreanerown gĕ sorvetsʾnes hra zharil Movsēsēn , ĕselov or chʾtʾlpʾaten irentsʾ zawagnerĕ ew chʾĕntʾanan sovorowtʾiwnnerown hamatsayn .
44021022	Owremn inchʾ biti ĕllay : anshowsht pazmowtʾiwn biti hamakhmpowi , orovhetew biti lsen tʾē egadz es .
44021023	Owsti ĕrē inchʾ or g!ĕsenkʾ kʾezi . Mer kʾov chʾors martig gan , oronkʾ owkht ĕradz en :
44021024	aṛ zanonkʾ , makʾrakordzē town kʾez , irentsʾ het , ew vjarē anontsʾ dzakhsĕ , or adzilen irentsʾ klowkhĕ : orbēszi polorn al kitnan tʾē skhal en kʾow masit irentsʾ statsʾadz teghegowtʾiwnnerĕ , haba town al mezi het g!ĕntʾanas , bahelov ōrēnkʾĕ .
44021025	Paytsʾ hawatkʾĕ ĕntownogh hetʾanosnerown masin , menkʾ kretsʾinkʾ , ezragatsʾnelov or anonkʾ pnaw chʾbahen aysbisi paner , paytsʾ miayn zkowshanan gowṛkʾerow zohowadzē , ariwnē , kheghtowadzē ow boṛngowtʾenē » .
44021026	Ayn aten Bōghos aṛaw ayt martigĕ , ew heteweal ōrĕ , anontsʾ het makʾrakordzowelē etkʾ , mtaw tajarĕ irentsʾ makʾrakordzowmi ōrerown ampoghchatsʾowmĕ yaytararelow hamar , tʾē erp ĕndzay biti matowtsʾanowēr irentsʾmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrin hamar .
44021027	Eōtʾĕ ōrerĕ lranalow mōt ēin , erp asiatsʾi Hreanerĕ , tesnelov zayn tajarin mēch , khaṛnagetsʾin ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ , ew anor vray tseṛkʾ partsratsʾnelov , g!aghaghagēin :
44021028	« Israyelatsʾi martig , ōknowtʾean hasēkʾ . Ays ē ayn martĕ , or amēnowrekʾ gĕ sorvetsʾnē polorin , zhoghovowrtin , ōrēnkʾin ew ays teghin tēm : noynisg Yoyner al mttsʾowtsʾ tajarin mēch ow bghdzetsʾ ays sowrp teghĕ »
44021029	( orovhetew nakhabēs teser ēin Epʾesatsʾi Tropʾimosĕ iren het , kʾaghakʾin mēch , ow gĕ gardzēin tʾē Bōghos tajarĕ mttsʾowtsʾadz ēr zayn ) .
44021030	Ampoghch kʾaghakʾĕ shar zhetsʾaw ow zhoghovowrtĕ khṛnowetsʾaw : Bōghosĕ pṛnelov , kʾashetsʾin tajarēn towrs , ew isgoyn tṛnerĕ kotsʾowetsʾan .
44021031	Erp anonkʾ gĕ chanayin sbannel zayn , lowr hasaw kowntin hazarabetin tʾē ampoghch Erowsaghēmĕ khaṛnashpʾotʾowtʾean mēch ē .
44021032	An al anyabagh zinoworner ew hariwrabetner aṛadz , vazetsʾ anontsʾ kʾov . Anonkʾ al tesnelov hazarabetn ow zinowornerĕ , tatretsʾan Bōghosĕ dzedzelē .
44021033	Ayn aten hazarabetĕ mōtetsʾaw , pṛnetsʾ zayn , ow hramayetsʾ or gaben grgin shghtʾayov : aba hartsʾapʾortsetsʾ tʾē ov ēr an ew inchʾ ĕradz ēr .
44021034	Sagayn pazmowtʾean mēchēn , mēgĕ pan mĕ gĕ koṛar , miwsĕ , owrish pan . Erp chʾgrtsʾaw kitnal stoykĕ aghmowgin masin , hramayetsʾ or pertĕ tanin zayn .
44021035	Erp santowkhĕ hasaw , aynbēs batahetsʾaw or zinowornerĕ gretsʾin zayn , pazmowtʾean pṛnowtʾean hamar :
44021036	orovhetew zhoghovowrtin pazmowtʾiwnĕ gĕ hetewēr , aghaghagelov : « Vertsʾowr zayn » .
44021037	Erp Bōghos gĕ mtnēr pertĕ , ĕsaw hazarabetin : « Arteōkʾ artōnowadz ē or pan mĕ ĕsem kʾezi » . An al ĕsaw : « Yownarēn kites .
44021038	Town chʾes ayn Ekibtatsʾin , or asgē ōrer aṛach chʾors hazar srigay martig abstampetsʾowtsʾ ew towrs taraw , anabatĕ » .
44021039	Bōghos al ĕsaw : « Es hreay mart mĕn em , Giligiayi Tarsonēn , ochʾ annshan kʾaghakʾi mĕ kʾaghakʾatsʾi : g!aghersem kʾezi , artōnē indzi , or khōsim zhoghovowrtin » .
44021040	Erp an artōnetsʾ , Bōghos , santowkhin vray gaynelov , tseṛkʾĕ shar zhetsʾ zhoghovowrtin . Erp khor lṛowtʾiwn eghaw , eprayagan parpaṛov khōsetsʾaw anontsʾ ew ĕsaw :
44022001	« Martig eghpayrner ew hayrer , lsetsʾēkʾ hima im chatakovagans , owghghowadz tsezi » .
44022002	( Erp lsetsʾin tʾē eprayagan parpaṛov gĕ khōsēr irentsʾ , al aweli hantart getsʾan . )
44022003	Ew an ĕsaw : « Es hreay mart mĕn em , dznadz Giligiayi Tarsonin mēch , paytsʾ medztsʾadz hos , ays kʾaghakʾin mēch , Kamaghiēli otkʾĕ , ew jshkrtabēs grtʾowadz mer hayrerow ōrēnkʾin hamatsayn . Nakhantsakhntir ēi Astowdzoy , inchʾbēs aysōr towkʾ polort .
44022004	Ayr martig ow giner gabelov ew panterow matnelov , ays jampan haladzetsʾi minchʾew mah ,
44022005	inchʾbēs kʾahanayabetn al gĕ vgayē im masis , ew ampoghch erētsʾnerow zhoghovĕ : naew anontsʾmē namagner ĕntownelov , Tamasgos g!ertʾayi , orbēszi hon eghadznern al gabowadz perem Erowsaghēm , or bat zhowin » .
44022006	« Minchʾ g!ertʾayi ow mōtetsʾay Tamasgosi , gēsōrowan atennerĕ yangardz erginkʾēn medz loys mĕ pʾaylatagetsʾ im showrchs ,
44022007	ew ketin ingay ow lsetsʾi tsayn mĕ , or g!ĕsēr indzi : « Sawowgh , Sawowgh , inchʾow gĕ haladzes zis » .
44022008	Es al bataskhanetsʾi : « Town ov es , Tēr » . An al ĕsaw indzi : « Es Yisows Nazovretsʾin em , or town gĕ haladzes » .
44022009	Anonkʾ or indzi het ēin , artarew tesan loysĕ ow vakhtsʾan , sagayn chʾlsetsʾin indzi khōsoghin tsaynĕ .
44022010	Isg es ĕsi : « Inchʾ ĕnem , Tēr » . Tērĕ ĕsaw indzi : « Ganknē , kna Tamasgos , ow hon biti khōsowi kʾezi ayn polor panerown masin , oronkʾ oroshowadz en kʾezi hamar , orbēszi ĕnes » .
44022011	Kʾani chʾēi tesner , ayt loysin pʾaṛaworowtʾean batjaṛov , indzi het eghoghnerown tseṛkʾēn pṛnelov , mtay Tamasgos .
44022012	Anania anownov mart mĕ , ōrēnkʾin hamemat parebasht , ew pari vgayowadz Tamasgos pnagogh polor Hreanerēn ,
44022013	egaw indzi ow gaynelov kʾovs , ĕsaw indzi : « Sawowgh eghpayr , verstatsʾir tesoghowtʾiwnt » .
44022014	Noyn zhamown verstatsʾay tesoghowtʾiwns ew nayetsʾay iren : inkʾ al ĕsaw : « Mer hayrerown Astowadzĕ nakhabēs sahmanetsʾ kʾez or kitnas ir gamkʾĕ , tesnes ayn Artarĕ ew lses anor tsaynĕ , ir peranēn :
44022015	kʾani or polor martotsʾ aṛchew biti ĕllas ir vgan ayn panerown masin , or tesar ow lsetsʾir .
44022016	Ew hima al inchʾow gĕ yamenas : ganknē , mgrtowē ow lowa meghkʾert , ganchʾelov ir anownĕ » .
44022017	Erp veratartsay Erowsaghēm , minchʾ g!aghōtʾēi tajarin mēch , veratsʾowm ownetsʾay
44022018	ow tesay zinkʾ , or g!ĕsēr indzi : « Ajabarē , showtov towrs elir Erowsaghēmēn , orovhetew biti chʾĕntownin kʾow vgayowtʾiwnt , im masis » .
44022019	Es al ĕsi : « Tēr , irenkʾ law kiten tʾē es ēi , or gĕ pantargēi kʾezi hawatatsʾoghnerĕ ew gĕ dzedzēi zhoghovarannerown mēch :
44022020	erp kʾow Stepʾanos vgayit ariwnĕ gĕ tʾapʾowēr , es inkʾs al nergay ēi , gamagitsʾ ĕllalov anor sbannowelown , , , ow es gĕ bahēi zayn sbannoghnerown hantertsnerĕ » .
44022021	Paytsʾ ĕsaw indzi : « Kna , orovhetew es biti ghrgem kʾez heṛawor hetʾanosnerown » .
44022022	Anonkʾ mtig ĕrin iren minchʾew ays khōskʾĕ , yetoy partsratsʾowtsʾin irentsʾ tsaynerĕ ew ĕsin : « Vertsʾowr ashkharhēn aytbisi mart mĕ , kʾani or chʾi batshajir anor abril » .
44022023	Minchʾ gĕ boṛayin , irentsʾ hantertsnerĕ gĕ netēin ow pʾoshi gĕ tsʾanēin ōtin mēch ,
44022024	hazarabetĕ hramayetsʾ or pertĕ mttsʾnen zayn , ew ĕsaw or kharazanelov hartsʾakʾnnen zayn , orbēszi kitnay tʾē inchʾow aytbēs gĕ kochʾēin anor tēm .
44022025	Erp gabetsʾin zinkʾ pʾogerov , Bōghos ĕsaw veragatsʾow hariwrabetin : « Artōnowadz ē tsezi , kharazanel mart mĕ , or Hṛomayetsʾi ē ow tatabartowadz al chʾē » .
44022026	Erp hariwrabetĕ lsetsʾ asiga , mōtetsʾaw ow batmetsʾ hazarabetin , ĕselov : « Inchʾ biti ĕnes , orovhetew ays martĕ Hṛomayetsʾi ē » .
44022027	Owsti hazarabetĕ knatsʾ anor kʾov ew ĕsaw : « Ĕsē indzi , town Hṛomayetsʾi es » . An al ĕsaw : « Ayo » .
44022028	Hazarabetĕ bataskhanetsʾ : « Es medz kowmarov tiratsʾay ays kʾaghakʾatsʾiowtʾean » . Bōghos ĕsaw : « Isg es dznowntov em » .
44022029	Owsti anonkʾ or biti hartsʾakʾnnēin zinkʾ , isgoyn heṛatsʾan irmē : hazarabetn al vakhtsʾaw , erp kittsʾaw tʾē Hṛomayetsʾi ē , orovhetew gabadz ēr zayn .
44022030	Heteweal ōrĕ , owzelov kitnal stoykĕ , tʾē inchʾow an ampastanowadz ēr Hreanerēn , artsagetsʾ zayn ew hramayetsʾ or kʾahanayabetnern ow ampoghch ateanĕ kan : ew ichetsʾnelov Bōghosĕ , nergayatsʾowtsʾ anontsʾ .
44023001	Bōghos , agnabish nayelov ateanin , ĕsaw : « Martig eghpayrner , es minchʾew aysōr polorovin pari khghjmtankʾov geankʾ varer em Astowdzoy aṛchew » .
44023002	Anania kʾahanayabetn al hramayetsʾ ir kʾov gaynoghnerown , or zarnen anor peranin .
44023003	Ayn aten Bōghos ĕsaw anor : « Astowadz biti zarnē kʾezi , dzepʾowadz bat . Town pazmadz es , tatelow zis ōrēnkʾin hamatsayn , ew gĕ hramayes ōrēnkʾin hagaṛag , or zarnen indzi » .
44023004	SHowrchĕ gaynoghnerĕ ĕsin : « Astowdzoy kʾahanayabetĕ gĕ heknes » .
44023005	Bōghos al ĕsaw : « Eghpayrner , chʾēi kiter tʾē kʾahanayabet ē , orovhetew krowadz ē : “ Kʾow zhoghovowrtit betin tēm chʾarakhōsowtʾiwn mi ĕner ” » .
44023006	Erp Bōghos kittsʾaw tʾē mēg masĕ Satowgetsʾiner ēin , ow miwsĕ , Pʾarisetsʾiner , aghaghagetsʾ ateanin mēch : « Martig eghpayrner , es Pʾarisetsʾi em , Pʾarisetsʾii orti : gĕ tatowim meṛelnerow yarowtʾean yoysin hamar » .
44023007	Erp ĕsaw asiga , ĕntvzowm mĕ dzaketsʾaw Pʾarisetsʾinerown ew Satowgetsʾinerown michew , ow pazmowtʾiwnĕ pa zhnowetsʾaw :
44023008	kʾani or Satowgetsʾinerĕ g!ĕsen tʾē ochʾ yarowtʾiwn gay , ochʾ al hreshtag gam hoki , isg Pʾarisetsʾinerĕ gĕ tawanin ergowkʾn al .
44023009	Hzōr kochʾiwn mĕ partsratsʾaw , ew Pʾarisetsʾinerow goghmēn eghogh tbirnerĕ ganknetsʾan ow makʾaṛetsʾan , ĕselov : « Menkʾ ochʾ mēg chʾarowtʾiwn gĕ ktnenkʾ ays martown vray : haba etʾē hoki mĕ gam hreshtag mĕ khōsadz ē anor , inchʾ grnankʾ ĕnel , , » .
44023010	Erp aghmowgĕ sastgatsʾaw , , , hazarabetĕ , vakhnalov or Bōghos pzkʾtowi anontsʾmē , hramayetsʾ zōrkʾerown or ichnen , yapʾshtagen zayn anontsʾ mēchēn ow peren pertĕ .
44023011	Heteweal kisherĕ Tērĕ gaynetsʾaw anor kʾov ew ĕsaw : « Kʾachalerowē , Bōghos , orovhetew inchʾbēs vgayetsʾir indzi hamar Erowsaghēmi mēch , aynbēs al bētkʾ ē vgayes Hṛomi mēch » .
44023012	Erp aṛtow eghaw , Hreanerēn omankʾ miapanetsʾan ew nzovetsʾin irenkʾ zirenkʾ , ĕselov tʾē ochʾ biti owten , ochʾ al khmen , minchʾew or sbannen Bōghosĕ .
44023013	Ays ertowmĕ ĕnoghnerĕ , kʾaṛasownē aweli ēin .
44023014	Anonkʾ katsʾin kʾahanayabetnerown ow erētsʾnerown , ew ĕsin : « Sastig nzovetsʾinkʾ menkʾ mez , or ochʾ mēg pan jashagenkʾ , minchʾew or sbannenkʾ Bōghosĕ .
44023015	Owsti towkʾ hima , ateanin het , khntrankʾ yaytnetsʾēkʾ hazarabetin , or vaghĕ ichetsʾnē zayn tsezi , ipr tʾē g!owzēkʾ aweli jshkrit teghegowtʾiwn ownenal anor masin : isg menkʾ , anor mōtenalēn aṛach , batrast enkʾ sbannel zayn » .
44023016	Paytsʾ Bōghosi kʾroch ortin , lselov ays taranagalowtʾiwnĕ , knatsʾ , mtaw pertĕ , ow batmetsʾ Bōghosi .
44023017	Bōghos al ganchʾetsʾ hariwrabetnerēn mēgĕ ew ĕsaw : « Tar ays eritasartĕ hazarabetin , orovhetew lowr mĕ owni , talow anor » .
44023018	An al aṛaw zayn , taraw hazarabetin ew ĕsaw : « Pantargeal Bōghosĕ ganchʾetsʾ zis ow khntretsʾ , or perem kʾezi ays eritasartĕ , kʾani or ĕselikʾ owni kʾezi » .
44023019	Hazarabetĕ anor tseṛkʾēn pṛnelov , mēgti kʾashowetsʾaw ew hartsʾowtsʾ : « Inchʾ lowr ownis , talow indzi » .
44023020	An al ĕsaw : « Hreanerĕ miatsaynetsʾan tʾakhantsel kʾezi , or vaghĕ ateanin aṛchew ichetsʾnes Bōghosĕ , orbēs tʾē g!owzen aweli jshkrtowtʾeamp hartsʾakʾnnel zayn .
44023021	Paytsʾ town mtig mi ĕner anontsʾ , orovhetew anontsʾmē kʾaṛasownē aweli martig taran mtadz en anor hamar , ew irenkʾ zirenkʾ nzovadz , or ochʾ owten , ochʾ al khmen , minchʾew or sbannen zayn : ow hima batrast en , ew gĕ sbasen kʾow khostowmit » .
44023022	Hetewapar hazarabetĕ artsagetsʾ eritasartĕ , batowirelov anor : « Ochʾ mēgown ĕsē tʾē ays panerĕ yaytnetsʾir indzi » .
44023023	Aba ganchʾelov hariwrabetnerēn ergowkʾĕ , ĕsaw : « Batrastetsʾēkʾ ergow hariwr zinowor , eōtʾanasown tsiawor ow ergow hariwr keghartawor , orbēszi ertʾan minchʾew Gesaria , kisherowan errort zhamown , , :
44023024	naew haytʾaytʾetsʾēkʾ krastner , orbēszi hedztsʾnen Bōghosĕ ew abahovowtʾeamp tanin Pʾelikʾs gaṛavarichʾin » .
44023025	Namag mĕn al kretsʾ , sa tibarin hamatsayn :
44023026	« Gghōtios Liwsias , batowagan Pʾelikʾs gaṛavarichʾin : oghchoyn .
44023027	Ays martĕ pṛnowadz ēr Hreanerēn ew biti sbannowēr anontsʾmē : isg es vray hasay zōrkʾerov ew azatetsʾi zayn , hasgnalov or Hṛomayetsʾi ē .
44023028	Owzelov kitnal batjaṛĕ , orown hamar g!ampastanēin zinkʾ , tari zinkʾ anontsʾ ateanin aṛchew ,
44023029	ew ktay tʾē ampastanowadz ēr irentsʾ ōrēnkʾin verapereal hartsʾerow hamar , paytsʾ mahowan gam gaberow ar zhani ochʾ mēg yantsʾankʾ ownēr .
44023030	Erp teghegatsʾay tʾē Hreanerĕ gĕ tawatren ayt martown tēm , anyabagh ghrgetsʾi kʾezi , batowirelov ampastanoghnerown al , or khōsin kʾow aṛchewt anor tēm . Oghch eghir » .
44023031	Zinowornern al aṛin Bōghosĕ ew kisherowan mēch tarin Antibatros , irentsʾ hramayowadzin hamatsayn .
44023032	Heteweal ōrĕ , tʾoghowtsʾin tsiawornerĕ or ertʾan anor het , isg irenkʾ veratartsan pertĕ .
44023033	Anonkʾ al mtan Gesaria , towin namagĕ gaṛavarichʾin ow nergayatsʾowtsʾin Bōghosĕ anor .
44023034	Erp gartatsʾ , hartsʾowtsʾ tʾē or kawaṛēn ē , ew hasgnalov tʾē Giligiayēn ē ,
44023035	ĕsaw : « Mtig biti ĕnem kʾezi , erp kan kʾez ampastanoghnern al » . Ow hramayetsʾ or bahen zayn Herovtēsi balatin mēch .
44024001	Hink ōr etkʾ , Anania kʾahanayabetĕ , erētsʾnerown ew Tertiwghos anownov jartasani mĕ het ichaw , ow yaytnetsʾin gaṛavarichʾin irentsʾ ampastanowtʾiwnĕ , Bōghosi tēm .
44024002	Erp ganchʾetsʾin zayn , Tertiwghos sgsaw ampastanel ew ĕsel : « Orovhetew khor khaghaghowtʾiwn gĕ vayelenkʾ kʾow michotsʾovt , ow parepastig garkatrowtʾiwnner eghadz en ays azkin , kʾow gankhamtadzowtʾeampt ,
44024003	amēn aten ew amēn tegh g!ĕntowninkʾ zanonkʾ ampoghch shnorhagalowtʾeamp , batowagan Pʾelikʾs .
44024004	Paytsʾ orbēszi al aweli chʾtsantsratsʾnem kʾez , g!aghachʾem , kʾow neroghamtowtʾeampt mtig ĕrē mezi : hamaṛōtapar biti khōsinkʾ .
44024005	Menkʾ ktankʾ tʾē ays martĕ zhantakht mĕn ē : abstampowtʾean gĕ mghē ampoghch ergrakowntin polor Hreanerĕ , ow baraklowkhn ē Nazovretsʾinerow aghantin .
44024006	An noynisg pʾortsetsʾ tajarĕ srpabghdzel : owsti pṛnetsʾinkʾ zayn ew owzetsʾinkʾ tatel mer ōrēnkʾin hamatsayn .
44024007	Paytsʾ Liwsias hazarabetĕ egaw , medz pṛnowtʾeamp aṛaw zayn mer tseṛkʾēn ,
44024008	ow hramayetsʾ zayn ampastanoghnerown or kan kʾezi . Town inkʾt hartsʾakʾnnelov zinkʾ , biti garenas kitnal ayn polor panerĕ , orontsʾ hamar menkʾ g!ampastanenkʾ zayn » .
44024009	Hreanern al miatsaynetsʾan , hawastelov tʾē ayt panerĕ aytbēs en .
44024010	Erp gaṛavarichʾĕ nshan ĕraw iren , or khōsi , Bōghos bataskhanetsʾ : « Kitnalov or shat tarinerē i ver town ays azkin tataworn es , aweli sirayō zharowtʾeamp gĕ chatakovem zis :
44024011	orovhetew grnas kitnal tʾē es tasnergow ōrēn aweli chʾē or partsratsʾay Erowsaghēm , ergrbakelow .
44024012	Zis erpekʾ chʾktan , oewē mēgown het vijapanelow gam pazmowtʾiwn mēgteghelow aten , ochʾ tajarin , ochʾ zhoghovarannerown ,
44024013	ochʾ kʾaghakʾin mēch : ochʾ al grnan abatsʾowtsʾanel ayn panerĕ , orontsʾ hamar hima g!ampastanen zis .
44024014	Paytsʾ sa gĕ tawanim kʾow aṛchewt , , , tʾē gĕ bashtem im hayrerows Astowadzĕ ayn jampayin hamatsayn , or irenkʾ gĕ gochʾen hertsowadz , hawatalov ōrēnkʾin ow Markarēnerown mēch krowadz polor panerown .
44024015	Yoys ownim Astowdzoy vray , inchʾbēs asonkʾ al agngalowtʾiwn ownin , tʾē meṛelnerown yarowtʾiwn biti ĕllay , tʾē artarnerown ew tʾē anartarnerown .
44024016	Owsti ays panin hamar es jik gĕ tʾapʾem , or amēn aten ownenam ansaytʾakʾ khghjmtankʾ mĕ , Astowdzoy ow martotsʾ aṛchew .
44024017	Owremn es , shat tariner etkʾ , egay oghormowtʾiwnner perelow im azkis , naew ĕndzaner .
44024018	Aysbēs , kʾani mĕ asiatsʾi Hreaner ktan zis tajarin mēch , makʾrakordzowadz , aṛantsʾ pazmowtʾean gam aghmowgi :
44024019	bētkʾ ēr or anonkʾ kayin aṛchewt ew ampastanēin , etʾē ownēin indzi tēm ĕselikʾ pan mĕ .
44024020	Gam tʾē asonkʾ , irenkʾ tʾogh ĕsen , inchʾ anirawowtʾiwn ktan im vras , erp gaynadz ēi ateanin aṛchew .
44024021	Tʾerews miayn sa mēg aghaghags , or partsratsʾowtsʾi erp irentsʾ mēch gaynadz ēi : « Meṛelnerow yarowtʾean hamar es aysōr tsezmē gĕ tatowim » .
44024022	Pʾelikʾs yetatsketsʾ anontsʾ hartsʾĕ , orovhetew jshkrit teghegowtʾiwn ownēr ayt jampayin masin , ew ĕsaw : « Erp Liwsias hazarabetĕ hos ichnē , biti kʾnnem tser kordzĕ » .
44024023	Ow hramayetsʾ hariwrabetin or bahē zayn , paytsʾ antorrowtʾiwn tay ew irennerēn ochʾ mēgĕ arkilē , sbasaworelow anor gam ertʾalow anor kʾov .
44024024	Kʾani mĕ ōr etkʾ , Pʾelikʾs egaw ir Trowsigha gnoch het , or Hreay ēr , ganchʾetsʾ Bōghosĕ , ew lsetsʾ angē Kʾristos Yisowsi vray eghadz hawatkʾi masin .
44024025	Erp an gĕ khōsēr artarowtʾean , zhow zhgalowtʾean ow kalikʾ tatastanin masin , Pʾelikʾs , ahapegadz , bataskhanetsʾ : « Kna hima , ow erp aten ownenam , gĕ ganchʾem kʾez » .
44024026	Naew yoys ownēr or Bōghos iren tram tay : owsti yajakh gĕ ganchʾēr zayn ew gĕ khōsagtsʾēr anor het .
44024027	Paytsʾ erp ergow tari antsʾaw , Pʾelikʾsi yachortetsʾ Borgios Pʾestos : Pʾelikʾs al , owzelov shnorhkʾ ĕnel Hreanerown , gabowadz tsketsʾ Bōghosĕ .
44025001	Erp Pʾestos hasaw ir ishkhanowtʾean kawaṛĕ , erekʾ ōr etkʾ partsratsʾaw Gesariayēn Erowsaghēm .
44025002	Kʾahanayabetn ow Hreanerown klkhawornern al yaytnetsʾin anor irentsʾ ampastanowtʾiwnĕ , Bōghosi tēm ,
44025003	ew aghachʾetsʾin iren ow shnorhkʾ khntretsʾin anor tēm , or Erowsaghēm ganchʾē zayn : minchʾ irenkʾ taran gĕ batrastēin , jampan sbannelow hamar zayn .
44025004	Sagayn Pʾestos bataskhanetsʾ tʾē Bōghos bahowelow ēr Gesaria , ew tʾē inkʾ showtov biti megnēr hon .
44025005	Owsti ĕsaw : « TSezmē anonkʾ or garogh en , tʾogh ichnen indzi het , ow etʾē yantsʾankʾ mĕ gay ayt martown vray , tʾogh ampastanen zinkʾ » .
44025006	Hon owtʾ gam tasĕ ōrē aweli chʾgetsʾaw , , , yetoy ichaw Gesaria : heteweal ōrĕ tataranĕ pazmetsʾaw ew hramayetsʾ or peren Bōghosĕ .
44025007	Erp an egaw , Erowsaghēmēn ichnogh Hreanerĕ anor showrchĕ gaynetsʾan ow Bōghosi vray partetsʾin pazmatʾiw ew dzanr ampastanowtʾiwnner , or chʾēin grnar abatsʾowtsʾanel .
44025008	Artarew Bōghos gĕ chatakovēr inkʾzinkʾ , ĕselov : « Es ochʾ Hreanerow ōrēnkʾin , ochʾ tajarin , ochʾ al gaysrin tēm meghanchʾadz em » .
44025009	Paytsʾ Pʾestos , owzelov Hreanerown shnorhkʾ ĕnel , bataskhanetsʾ Bōghosi : « G!owzes partsranal Erowsaghēm ow hon tatowil im aṛchews , ayt panerown hamar » .
44025010	Bōghos al ĕsaw : « Gaysrin tataranĕ gaynadz em , owr bētkʾ ē tatowim . Hreanerĕ anirawadz chʾem , inchʾbēs town al law kites .
44025011	Artarew etʾē anirawadz em gam ĕradz em mahowan ar zhani pan mĕ , chʾem mer zher meṛnil . Paytsʾ etʾē im vras ochʾ mēgĕ gay ayn panerēn , orontsʾ hamar asonkʾ g!ampastanen zis , ochʾ mēgĕ grnay yantsnel zis atontsʾ . Gaysrin gĕ poghokʾem » .
44025012	Ayn aten Pʾestos , khōsagtsʾelē etkʾ khorhrtagannerown het , bataskhanetsʾ : « Gaysrin poghokʾetsʾir : gaysrin biti ertʾas » .
44025013	Kʾani mĕ ōr antsʾnelē etkʾ , Akribbas tʾakaworĕ ew Perinigē egan Gesaria , parewelow Pʾestosĕ .
44025014	Erp shat ōrer mnatsʾin hon , Pʾestos nergayatsʾowtsʾ tʾakaworin Bōghosi barakan , ĕselov : « Hos mart mĕ gay , or Pʾelikʾs pantargowadz tskadz ē .
44025015	Erp Erowsaghēm katsʾi , kʾahanayabetnern ow Hreanerown erētsʾnerĕ yaytnetsʾin indzi irentsʾ ampastanowtʾiwnĕ , tatabartowtʾean vjiṛ khntrelov anor tēm .
44025016	Anontsʾ bataskhanetsʾi tʾē Hṛomayetsʾinerown sovorowtʾiwnĕ chʾē mahowan matnel mart mĕ , minchʾew or ampastanealĕ ir timatsʾ chʾownenay ampastanoghnerĕ , ew batehowtʾiwn chʾtrowi iren , chatakovelow inkʾzinkʾ ayt yantsʾankʾin tēm .
44025017	Owsti erp anonkʾ hamakhmpowetsʾan hos , aṛantsʾ orewē yetatskowmi , heteweal ōrĕ tataranĕ pazmelov hramayetsʾi or peren martĕ .
44025018	Anor ampastanoghnern al nergayanalov , im entʾatradz ampastanowtʾiwnnerēs ochʾ mēgĕ yaṛach perin :
44025019	Haba anor het ownēin kʾani mĕ hartsʾer , irentsʾ grōnin verapereal , ow Yisows anownov meṛadzi mĕ masin , orown hamar Bōghos gĕ hawastēr tʾē oghch ē .
44025020	Minchʾ gĕ varanēi aysbisi hartsʾerow kʾnnowtʾean hamar , ĕsi iren tʾē g!owzēr ertʾal Erowsaghēm ew hon tatowil ays panerown hamar .
44025021	Paytsʾ erp Bōghos poghokʾetsʾ or verabahowi , ōkostapʾaṛ gaysrin timatsʾ ellelow , hramayetsʾi or bahen zinkʾ , minchʾew or ghrgem gaysrin » .
44025022	Akribbas ĕsaw Pʾestosi : « Es al g!owzēi mtig ĕnel ayt martown » . An al ĕsaw : « Vaghĕ mtig g!ĕnes » .
44025023	Heteweal ōrĕ , erp Akribbas ow Perinigē egan medz hantēsov ew mtan owngntrowtʾean teghĕ , hazarabetnerown ow kʾaghakʾin batowawor martotsʾ het , Pʾestos hramayetsʾ or Bōghosĕ perowi .
44025024	Pʾestos ĕsaw : « Akribbas tʾakawor , ew towkʾ al , polor martig , or mezi het nergay ēkʾ , gĕ tesnēkʾ asiga , orown masin Hreanerown ampoghch pazmowtʾiwnĕ kankatetsʾaw indzi Erowsaghēmi mēch ew hos al , ow gĕ koṛayin tʾē “ al bētkʾ chʾē or an abri ” .
44025025	Paytsʾ es ĕmpṛnetsʾi tʾē an mahowan ar zhani ochʾinchʾ ĕradz ē : ew kʾani or inkʾ poghokʾetsʾ ōkostapʾaṛ gaysr in , oroshetsʾi or ghrgem zayn .
44025026	Anor masin stoyk pan mĕ chʾownim krelow im tirochs : owsti nergayatsʾowtsʾi zayn tsezi , ew manawant kʾezi , Akribbas tʾakawor , orbēszi ownenam krelikʾ pan mĕ , hartsʾakʾnnelē etkʾ :
44025027	orovhetew indzi antramapanagan gĕ tʾowi ghrgel pantargeal mĕ , aṛantsʾ naew matnanshelow anor vray partowadz yantsʾankʾnerĕ » .
44026001	Ayn aten Akribbas ĕsaw Bōghosi : « Artōnowadz ē kʾezi , khōsil town kʾezi hamar » . Bōghos al , ergarelov tseṛkʾĕ , chatakovetsʾ inkʾzinkʾ :
44026002	« Akribbas tʾakawor , es eraneli gĕ hamarem zis , or aysōr kʾow aṛchewt biti chatakovem zis , Hreanerown indzi tēm ĕradz polor ampastanowtʾiwnnerown hamar :
44026003	manawant or town law kites Hreanerown polor sovorowtʾiwnnern ow hartsʾerĕ . Owsti g!aghersem or hamperatarowtʾeamp mtig ĕnes indzi .
44026004	Polor Hreanerĕ tegheag en im gentsʾaghis , batanowtʾenēs i ver , sgizpēn Erowsaghēm , im azkis mēch ĕllalows hamar :
44026005	anonkʾ sgizpēn i ver gĕ janchʾnan zis , ( etʾē owzen vgayel , ) kitnalov tʾē abradz em mer grōnin amenēn khist aghantin hamatsayn , ipr Pʾarisetsʾi .
44026006	Ew hima tataran nergayatsʾadz em ow gĕ tatowim , Astowdzmē mer hayrerown eghadz khostowmi yoysin hamar ,
44026007	orown gĕ yowsan hasnil mer tasnergow tohmerĕ , chermeṛantowtʾeamp bashtelov Astowadz kisher ow tsʾereg . Es g!ampastanowim Hreanerēn ays yoysin hamar , Akribbas tʾakawor .
44026008	Inchʾow anhawatali gĕ tʾowi tsezi , tʾē Astowadz gĕ yarowtsʾanē meṛelnerĕ .
44026009	Es inkʾs al gĕ gardzēi tʾē shat paner bētkʾ ēr ĕnel Yisows Nazovretsʾii anownin tēm :
44026010	ew ĕri al Erowsaghēmi mēch , ow kʾahanayabetnerēn irawasowtʾiwn statsʾadz , pantargetsʾi sowrperēn shaterĕ , ew hawanowtʾiwn towi anontsʾ meṛtsʾowadz atenĕ .
44026011	Polor zhoghovarannerown mēch yajakh bat zhelov zanonkʾ , gĕ hargatrēi or hayhoyen , ew sastig khelakaradz anontsʾ tēm , gĕ haladzēi zanonkʾ minchʾew ankam ōtar kʾaghakʾnerow mēch » .
44026012	« Aysbēs , erp Tamasgos al g!ertʾayi , kʾahanayabetnerown irawasowtʾeamp ow hrahankov ,
44026013	gēsōrin , ov tʾakawor , jampan tesay arewēn aweli baydzaṛ loys mĕ , or erginkʾēn pʾayletsʾaw im showrchs , naew indzi het katsʾoghnerown showrchĕ .
44026014	Erp menkʾ polors ketin ingankʾ , lsetsʾi tsayn mĕ , or g!ĕsēr indzi eprayagan parpaṛov : “ Sawowgh , Sawowgh , inchʾow gĕ haladzes zis : ta zhaneli ē kʾezi , akʾatsʾel khtʾani tēm ” .
44026015	Es al ĕsi : “ Town ov es , Tēr ” . Ew an ĕsaw : “ Es Yisowsn em , or town gĕ haladzes .
44026016	Paytsʾ ganknē ow getsʾir otkʾerowt vray : orovhetew erewtsʾay kʾezi , orbēszi garkem kʾez sbasawor ew vgay tʾē ayn panerown , or tesar , tʾē al ayn panerown , orontsʾmov biti erewnam kʾezi .
44026017	Biti azatem kʾez ayt zhoghovowrtēn ow hetʾanosnerēn , orontsʾ hima gĕ ghrgem kʾez ,
44026018	anontsʾ achʾkʾerĕ panalow , khawarēn , loysi , ew Satanayi ishkhanowtʾenēn , Astowdzoy tartsnelow , orbēszi anonkʾ stanan meghkʾerow nerowm , naew zhaṛankowtʾiwn anontsʾ het , or srpatsʾadz en hawatalov indzi ” » .
44026019	« Owsti , Akribbas tʾakawor , es anhnazant chʾeghay ayt ergnayin tesilkʾin .
44026020	Haba , nakh Tamasgos eghoghnerown , yetoy Erowsaghēm , ampoghch Hrēastani ergirĕ ow hetʾanosnerown kʾarozetsʾi or abashkharen , taṛnan Astowdzoy , ew abashkharowtʾean ar zhanavayel kordzer gataren .
44026021	Ays batjaṛov Hreanerĕ pṛnetsʾin zis tajarin mēch , ow gĕ tsktēin sbannel .
44026022	Sagayn Astowdzmē hasadz ōknowtʾeamp , minchʾew aysōr oghch mnatsʾi , bztigin tʾē medzin vgayelov , ochʾinchʾ ĕselov ayn panerēn towrs , or markarēnerĕ ew Movsēs khōsetsʾan tʾē biti ĕllayin :
44026023	tʾē Kʾristos biti chʾarchʾarowēr , inkʾ biti ĕllar aṛachinĕ , or meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn biti aṛnēr , ow loys biti kʾarozēr zhoghovowrtin ew hetʾanosnerown » .
44026024	Minchʾ an aysbēs gĕ chatakovēr inkʾzinkʾ , Pʾestos partsratsayn ĕsaw : « Gĕ tsʾnoris , Bōghos : shat gartatsʾadz ĕllalt kʾez gĕ khelakaretsʾnē » .
44026025	Bōghos al ĕsaw : « Es chʾem khelakarir , batowagan Pʾestos , haba g!ĕsem jshmartowtʾean ow khohemowtʾean khōskʾer :
44026026	kʾani or tʾakaworĕ kitē ays panerĕ , ew anor aṛchew al hamartsagowtʾeamp gĕ khōsim . Artarew hamozowadz em tʾē asontsʾmē ochʾinchʾ tʾakʾown mnatsʾadz ē irmē , orovhetew ays panĕ angiwni mĕ mēch eghadz chʾē .
44026027	Markarēnerown gĕ hawatas , Akribbas tʾakawor . Kitem tʾē gĕ hawatas » .
44026028	Akribbas ĕsaw Bōghosi : « Kʾichʾ mnatsʾ or hamozes zis kʾristoneay ĕllalow » .
44026029	Bōghos al ĕsaw : « Astowdzmē biti khntrēi or ochʾ miayn town , ayl naew polor anonkʾ , or aysōr gĕ lsen zis , polorovin indzi bēs ĕllan , ays gaberēn zat » .
44026030	Tʾakaworĕ , gaṛavarichʾĕ , Perinigē , ew anonkʾ , or pazmadz ēin irentsʾ het , ganknetsʾan :
44026031	ow erp aṛantsnatsʾan , irarow het khōsagtsʾetsʾan ew ĕsin : « Ays martĕ mahowan gam gaberow ar zhani ochʾinchʾ g!ĕnē » .
44026032	Akribbas al ĕsaw Pʾestosi : « Gareli ēr artsagel ays martĕ , etʾē poghokʾadz chʾĕllar gaysrin » .
44027001	Erp oroshowetsʾaw nawargel tēbi Italia , Bōghosĕ ew owrish kʾani mĕ pantargealner yantsnetsʾin hariwrabeti mĕ , orown anownĕ Yowlios ēr , Sepastean kowntēn .
44027002	Mtnelov atramintagan naw mĕ , megnetsʾankʾ , ew biti nawargēinkʾ Asiayi dzovezerkʾēn : mezi het ēr naew Aristarkʾos Magetonatsʾin , Tʾesaghonigēēn .
44027003	Heteweal ōrĕ ichankʾ Siton : Yowlios , martasirowtʾeamp varowelov Bōghosi het , artōnetsʾ or ertʾay paregamnerown ew vayelē anontsʾ khnamkʾĕ .
44027004	Megnelov angē , nawargetsʾinkʾ Gibrosi vari goghmēn , kʾani or hoverĕ hagaṛag ēin .
44027005	Yetoy , nawargelov Giligiayi ow Bampʾiwliayi dzovown mēchēn , ichankʾ Ligiayi Miwṛa kʾaghakʾĕ .
44027006	Hariwrabetĕ ktaw hon aghekʾsantriagan naw mĕ , or g!ertʾar Italia , ow mez mttsʾowtsʾ anor mēch .
44027007	SHat ōrer tantaghōrēn nawargelē etkʾ , haziw hasankʾ Gnitosi timatsʾ : kʾani hovĕ chʾēr tʾoylatrer , Gretēi vari goghmēn , Saghmonayi timatsʾēn nawargetsʾinkʾ ,
44027008	ew t zhowarowtʾeamp angē antsʾnelov , egankʾ tegh mĕ , or gĕ gochʾowēr Keghetsʾig nawahankist : anor mōt ēr GHasea kʾaghakʾĕ .
44027009	Erp pawagan zhamanag antsʾaw , ow nawargowtʾiwnĕ artēn vtankawor ēr , kʾani or dzomin atenn al artēn antsʾadz ēr , Bōghos yortoretsʾ zanonkʾ ,
44027010	ĕselov : « Martig , es gĕ nshmarem tʾē ays nawargowtʾiwnĕ biti ĕllay vnasov ow gorowstov , ochʾ miayn peṛin ew nawown , haba mer antserown al » .
44027011	Paytsʾ hariwrabetĕ g!ansar aweli nawavarin ow nawatiroch , kʾan Bōghosi khōskʾerown .
44027012	Ew kʾani or ayt nawahankistĕ anyarmar ēr tsmerelow , shater gĕ tʾelatrēin megnil angē , orbēszi chanayin hasnil Pʾiwnigē , or Gretēi mēg nawahankistn ē ow gĕ nayi tēbi haraw-arewmowtkʾ ew hiwsis-arewmowtkʾ , ow hon tsmerel .
44027013	Erp harawayin hovĕ meghmowtʾeamp pʾchʾetsʾ , gardzelov tʾē hasadz en irentsʾ aṛachatrowtʾean , tʾowltsʾowtsʾin khariskhĕ ow nawargetsʾin Gretēi kʾovēn .
44027014	Paytsʾ kʾichʾ etkʾ , anor tēm elaw mrrgalitsʾ hov mĕ , or gĕ gochʾowēr Ewragiglon .
44027015	Erp nawĕ yapʾshtagowetsʾaw ew chʾgrtsʾaw timatrel hovin , tʾoghowtsʾinkʾ or kʾshowi .
44027016	Sowralov Gghōta gochʾowogh pʾokʾr gghzii mĕ vari goghmēn , haziw grtsʾankʾ pṛnel magoygĕ .
44027017	Erp vertsʾowtsʾin zayn , ōknowtʾean michotsʾner kordzadzelov , tagēn gabetsʾin nawĕ . Vakhnalov or iynan yortsanowtĕ , ichetsʾowtsʾin aṛakastĕ , ew aytbēs gĕ kʾshowēin .
44027018	Kʾani sastig mrrigi mēch ēinkʾ , yachort ōrĕ towrs netetsʾin peṛnerĕ .
44027019	Isg errort ōrĕ , menkʾ mer tseṛkʾerov towrs netetsʾinkʾ nawown kordzikʾnerĕ .
44027020	Erp shat ōrer , ochʾ arew , ochʾ al astgher erewtsʾan , ow sastig mrrig gar mezi tēm , al pʾrgowelow amēn yoys gtrowetsʾaw mezmē .
44027021	Kʾani or shat ōrerē i ver anōtʾi ēin , Bōghos , gaynelov anontsʾ mēch , ĕsaw : « Martig , bētkʾ ēr or mtig ĕnēikʾ indzi ow chʾnawargēikʾ Gretēēn , ew chʾgrēikʾ ays vnasn ow gorowstĕ .
44027022	Isg hima gĕ yortorem tsez or okeworowikʾ , kʾani or tsezmē ochʾ mēgown antsĕ biti gorsowi , paytsʾ miayn nawĕ .
44027023	Artarew ays kisher kʾovs gaynetsʾaw hreshtagĕ ayn Astowdzoyn , orown gĕ batganim ew or gĕ bashtem ,
44027024	ow ĕsaw : “ Mi vakhnar , Bōghos : town bētkʾ ē or gaysrin nergayanas : ew aha Astowadz shnorhetsʾ kʾezi polor anonkʾ , or gĕ nawargen kʾezi het ” .
44027025	Owsti , martig , okeworowetsʾēkʾ , orovhetew es gĕ hawatam Astowdzoy : biti ĕllay aynbēs , inchʾbēs ĕsowetsʾaw indzi .
44027026	Sagayn bētkʾ ē or nawĕ gghzii mĕ aṛchew khri , , » .
44027027	Erp tasnchʾorrort kishern ēr , or gĕ tarowperowēinkʾ Atriagan dzovown mēch , gēs kisherin nawastinerĕ entʾatretsʾin tʾē mōtetsʾadz en tsʾamakʾi mĕ .
44027028	TSkelov khorachʾapʾĕ , ktan kʾsan krgachʾapʾ : kʾichʾ mĕ yaṛach ertʾalov , tartseal tsketsʾin , ow ktan tasnhink krgachʾapʾ .
44027029	Vakhnalov or kowtsʾē zarnowinkʾ kharagnerow , , , etewi goghmēn tsketsʾin chʾors khariskh , ew g!ĕghtsayin or aṛtow ĕllay .
44027030	Isg nawastinerĕ gĕ chanayin pʾakhchʾil nawēn , ow dzovĕ ichetsʾowtsʾin magoygĕ , batrowagelov tʾē aṛchewi goghmēn al biti tsken khariskhner .
44027031	Paytsʾ Bōghos ĕsaw hariwrabetin ow zinowornerown : « Etʾē asonkʾ chʾmnan nawown mēch , towkʾ chʾēkʾ grnar pʾrgowil » .
44027032	Ayn aten zinowornerĕ gtretsʾin magoygin chʾowannerĕ , ew tʾoghowtsʾin or towrs iynay .
44027033	Minchʾ aṛtown gĕ mōtenar , Bōghos g!aghachʾēr polorin or geragowr owten , ĕselov : « Aysōr tasnchʾors ōr ē , or towkʾ sbaselov anōtʾi mnatsʾadz ēkʾ , ow ochʾinchʾ geradz ēkʾ .
44027034	Owsti g!aghachʾem tsezi , or geragowr owtēkʾ , orovhetew asiga al tser pʾrgowtʾean hamar ē : kʾani or tsezmē ochʾ mēgown klowkhēn maz mĕ biti iynay » .
44027035	Aysbēs khōselē etkʾ , hatsʾ aṛaw , polorin aṛchew shnorhagal eghaw Astowdzmē , ow gtrelov sgsaw owtel .
44027036	Polorn al okeworowetsʾan , ew irenkʾ al geragowr geran .
44027037	Nawown mēch , polors ergow hariwr eōtʾanasownvetsʾ ants ēinkʾ .
44027038	Erp gshtatsʾan geragowrov , tʾetʾewtsʾowtsʾin nawĕ , dzovĕ tʾapʾelov tsʾorenĕ .
44027039	Erp aṛtow eghaw , chʾēin janchʾnar tsʾamakʾĕ : paytsʾ nshmarelov dzotsʾ mĕ , or dzovezerkʾ ownēr , dzrakretsʾin nawĕ khrel anor mēch , etʾē gareli ĕllar .
44027040	Owsti dzovĕ tʾoghowtsʾin khariskhnerĕ , gtrelov barannerĕ , tʾowltsʾowtsʾin ghegerown barannerĕ , ew hovin panalov aṛakastĕ , owghghowetsʾan tēbi ayt dzovezerkʾĕ .
44027041	Zarnowelov awazagoyti mĕ , , , khretsʾin nawĕ : aṛchewi goghmĕ mkhrjowelov , mnatsʾ anshar zh , isg etewi goghmĕ gĕ kʾagowēr alikʾnerown sastgowtʾenēn .
44027042	Zinowornern al dzrakretsʾin sbannel pantargealnerĕ , orbēszi anontsʾmē ochʾ mēgĕ loghalov pʾakhchʾi .
44027043	Paytsʾ hariwrabetĕ , or gĕ pʾapʾakʾēr pʾrgel Bōghosĕ , arkelkʾ eghaw anontsʾ dzrakirin . Hramayetsʾ or loghal kittsʾoghnerĕ nakh dzov netowin ow tsʾamakʾ ellen :
44027044	isg miwsnerĕ hetewin , omankʾ takhtagnerov , ew omankʾ , nawown owrish panerov . Aysbēs , polorĕ azatelov tsʾamakʾ hasan .
44028001	Erp pʾrgowetsʾan , kittsʾan tʾē ayt gghziin anownĕ Melitē ēr . Pnig zhoghovowrtĕ artasovor martasirowtʾiwn tsʾoytsʾ towaw mezi :
44028002	orovhetew grag vaṛetsʾin ew mez polors al ĕntownetsʾin , egadz antsrewin ow tsʾowrtin batjaṛov .
44028003	Erp Bōghos aṛat khṛiw zhoghvetsʾ ew traw gragin vray , chermowtʾenēn i zh mĕ elaw ow gaṛchʾetsʾaw anor tseṛkʾin .
44028004	Erp pnignerĕ tesan ayt anasownĕ , gakhowadz anor tseṛkʾēn , ĕsin irarow : « Anshowsht asiga martasban mĕn ē : tʾēbēt pʾrgowetsʾaw dzovēn , artarowtʾiwnĕ chʾtʾoylatretsʾ or an abri » .
44028005	Isg inkʾ tʾōtʾowetsʾ anasownĕ gragin mēch , ew ochʾ mēg vnas gretsʾ .
44028006	Anonkʾ al gĕ sbasēin or an owṛi , gam yangardz meṛadz iynay : paytsʾ erp shat sbasetsʾin ow tesan tʾē ochʾ mēg anteghi pan eghaw anor , irentsʾ gardzikʾĕ pʾokhelov ĕsin tʾē “ astowadz mĕn ē ” .
44028007	Ayt teghin shrchagaykʾĕ gĕ ktnowēin akaragnerĕ gghziin klkhawor martown , orown anownĕ Bobghios ēr . An ĕntownetsʾ mez , ew paresrtowtʾeamp hiwrĕngaletsʾ mez erekʾ ōr .
44028008	Bobghiosi hayrĕ gĕ baṛgēr , tentov ow tʾanchʾkʾov hiwantatsʾadz . Bōghos mtaw anor kʾov , ew aghōtʾelov , tseṛkʾerĕ traw anor vray ow p zhshgetsʾ zayn .
44028009	Erp asiga batahetsʾaw , owrish hiwantner al , or ayt gghziin mēch gĕ ktnowēin , egan ew pow zhowetsʾan .
44028010	Asonkʾ al medzabēs batowetsʾin mez , ow erp gĕ megnēinkʾ , haytʾaytʾetsʾin mezi bētkʾ eghadz panerĕ .
44028011	Erekʾ amis etkʾ , megnetsʾankʾ aghekʾsantriagan nawov mĕ , or tsmeradz ēr ayt gghzin ew ownēr Tiosgowratsʾinerown zinanshanĕ .
44028012	Siragowsa ichnelov , erekʾ ōr mnatsʾinkʾ hon :
44028013	angē al shrchakayelov , hasankʾ Hṛekion . Mēg ōr etkʾ , erp harawayin hovĕ pʾchʾetsʾ , ergrort ōrĕ hasankʾ Bateoghos .
44028014	Hon ktankʾ eghpayrner , oronkʾ aghachʾetsʾin or eōtʾĕ ōr mnankʾ irentsʾ kʾov : ew aysbēs katsʾinkʾ Hṛom .
44028015	Erp eghpayrnerĕ lsetsʾin mer masin , angē egan minchʾew Abpʾiosi Hrabaragĕ ow Erekʾ Bantognerĕ , timaworelow mez . Bōghos al tesnelov zanonkʾ , shnorhagal eghaw Astowdzmē ew kʾachalerowetsʾaw .
44028016	Erp mtankʾ Hṛom , hariwrabetĕ yantsnetsʾ pantargealnerĕ zōraklowkhin : isg Bōghosi artōnowetsʾaw or aṛantsin pnagi , zinkʾ bahogh zinowori mĕ het .
44028017	Erekʾ ōr etkʾ an hrawiretsʾ Hreanerown klkhawornerĕ , ow erp hamakhmpowetsʾan , ĕsaw anontsʾ : « Martig eghpayrner , tʾēbēt es zhoghovowrtin gam hayrenagan sovorowtʾiwnnerown tēm ochʾinchʾ ĕrer ēi , Erowsaghēmi mēch Hṛomayetsʾinerown tseṛkʾĕ matnowetsʾay ipr pantargeal .
44028018	Erp anonkʾ hartsʾakʾnnetsʾin zis , owzetsʾin artsagel , orovhetew im vras mahowan ar zhani ochʾ mēg batjaṛ gar .
44028019	Paytsʾ erp Hreanerĕ hagajaṛetsʾin , hargatrowetsʾay poghokʾel gaysrin , sagayn aṛantsʾ orewē ampastanowtʾiwn ownenalow azkis tēm .
44028020	Owremn asor hamar ganchʾetsʾi tsez , orbēszi tesnem tsez ew khōsim tsezi : orovhetew Israyēli yoysin hamar gĕ grem ays shghtʾan » .
44028021	Anonkʾ al ĕsin iren : « Menkʾ kʾow masit Hrēastanēn ochʾ krowtʾiwn ĕntownetsʾinkʾ , ochʾ al eghpayrnerēn mēgĕ hos kalov , chʾarowtʾiwn mĕ batmetsʾ gam khōsetsʾaw kʾow masit .
44028022	Paytsʾ ar zhanavayel ē lsel kʾezmē tʾē town inchʾ gĕ mtadzes : orovhetew menkʾ teghegatsʾadz enkʾ ayt aghantin masin , tʾē amēnowrekʾ ator tēm gĕ khōsin » .
44028023	Erp oroshetsʾin ōr mĕ anor het , shater katsʾin anor kʾov , ir hiwranotsʾĕ . Anontsʾ gĕ patsʾatrēr Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ ew gĕ vgayēr anor masin : aṛtowĕnē minchʾew irigown gĕ hamozēr zanonkʾ , pʾastargelov Yisowsi masin tʾē Movsēsi ōrēnkʾēn , tʾē al Markarēnerēn .
44028024	Omankʾ ansatsʾin ĕsadznerown , omankʾ al chʾhawatatsʾin .
44028025	Irarow het chʾhamatsaynadz , pa zhnowetsʾan , erp Bōghos khōskʾ mĕn al ĕsaw : « Sowrp Hokin jisht khōsetsʾaw mer hayrerown , Esayi markarēin michotsʾov ,
44028026	ĕselov : “ Kna ays zhoghovowrtin ew ĕsē : « SHat biti lsēkʾ , paytsʾ biti chʾhasgnakʾ , shat biti tesnēkʾ , paytsʾ biti chʾĕmpṛnēkʾ .
44028027	Orovhetew ays zhoghovowrtin sirtĕ tʾantsratsʾaw : irentsʾ aganchnerov dzanr lsetsʾin ew irentsʾ achʾkʾerĕ kotsʾetsʾin , orbēszi irentsʾ achʾkʾerov chʾtesnen , aganchnerov chʾlsen , sirtov chʾhasgnan ew tartsi chʾkan , ow es chʾp zhshgem zanonkʾ » ” .
44028028	Owremn kittsʾēkʾ tʾē Astowdzoy pʾrgowtʾiwnĕ ghrgowetsʾaw hetʾanosnerown , ew anonkʾ mtig biti ĕnen » .
44028029	Ow erp ĕsaw asiga , Hreanerĕ megnetsʾan , sastig vijapanelov irarow het .
44028030	Bōghos lman ergow tari pnagetsʾaw ir vartsadz townĕ ,
44028031	kʾarozelov Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ ew sorvetsʾnelov Tēr Yisows Kʾristosi masin , ampoghch hamartsagowtʾeamp , aṛantsʾ arkelkʾi .
45001001	Bōghos , dzaṛay Yisows Kʾristosi , ganchʾowadz , aṛakʾeal ĕllalow , nshanagowadz , kʾarozelow Astowdzoy awetaranĕ ,
45001002	( or nakhabēs khostatsʾadz ēr ir markarēnerown michotsʾov , Sowrp kirkʾerown mēch , )
45001003	or ir Ortiin , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi masin ē - an marmini hamemat , eghaw Tawitʾi zarmēn ,
45001004	ow srpowtʾean Hokiin hamemat , zōrowtʾeamp sahmanowetsʾaw ipr Astowdzoy Orti , meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛnelov - ,
45001005	orown michotsʾov shnorhkʾ ew aṛakʾelowtʾiwn statsʾankʾ , orbēszi polor azkerĕ aṛachnortenkʾ ir anownin hawatkʾi hnazantowtʾean
45001006	( anontsʾ mēch towkʾ al ganchʾowadz ēkʾ Yisows Kʾristosē ) :
45001007	tser polorin , or Hṛomi mēch ēkʾ , Astowdzoy sirelinerowt ow sowrp ĕllalow ganchʾowadznerowt , shnorhkʾ ew khaghaghowtʾiwn tsezi Astowdzmē , mer Hōrmēn , ow Tēr Yisows Kʾristosē .
45001008	Nakh shnorhagal em tser polorin hamar im Astowdzmēs , Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov , or tser hawatkʾĕ gĕ batmowi ampoghch ashkharhi mēch .
45001009	Kʾani or vgay ē indzi Astowadz , or es gĕ bashtem hokiovs , anor Ortiin awetaranĕ kʾarozelov ,
45001010	tʾē inchʾbēs antatar gĕ yishem tsez amēn aten , aghōtʾkʾnerows mēch , agherselov or verchabēs ankam mĕ yachoghim kal tsezi Astowdzoy gamkʾov .
45001011	Orovhetew gĕ tenchʾam tesnel tsez , or pʾokhantsʾem tsezi hokewor shnorh mĕ , orbēszi amranakʾ :
45001012	aysinkʾn es al mkhitʾarowim tsezi het , tser ew im pʾokhatarts hawatkʾin michotsʾov .
45001013	Sagayn chʾem owzer or ankitanakʾ , eghpayrner , or yajakh aṛachatretsʾi kal tsezi , ( ew minchʾew hima arkilowetsʾay , ) orbēszi tser mēch al btowgh mĕ ownenam , inchʾbēs miws hetʾanosnerown mēch .
45001014	Es bartagan em tʾē Yoynerown ew tʾē ōtarnerown , tʾē imastownnerown ew tʾē anmitnerown .
45001015	Owsti , inchʾ gĕ veraperi indzi , yō zhar em awetaranelow naew tsezi , or Hṛomi mēch ēkʾ .
45001016	Artarew es amōtʾ chʾem seber awetaranĕ , kʾani or an Astowdzoy zōrowtʾiwnn ē , amēn hawatatsʾeali pʾrgowtʾean hamar , nakh Hreayin ew aba Yoynin :
45001017	orovhetew anov Astowdzoy artarowtʾiwnĕ , or hawatkʾov ē , gĕ yaytnowi hawatkʾi hamar , inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Artarĕ biti abri hawatkʾov » .
45001018	Artarew Astowdzoy pargowtʾiwnĕ erginkʾēn gĕ yaytnowi martotsʾ ampoghch amparshtowtʾean ew anirawowtʾean vray , kʾani anonkʾ anirawowtʾeamp keri pṛnadz en jshmartowtʾiwnĕ .
45001019	Orovhetew inchʾ or gareli ē kitnal Astowdzoy masin , patsʾayayt ē irentsʾ mēch , kʾani Astowadz patsʾayaytetsʾ zayn anontsʾ .
45001020	Artarew anor antesaneli panerĕ , aysinkʾn , ir yawer zhagan zōrowtʾiwnĕ ew astowadzowtʾiwnĕ , gĕ tesnowin ashkharhi ararchʾowtʾenēn i ver ow gĕ hasgtsʾowin anor steghdzadznerov , orbēszi anartaranali ĕllan .
45001021	Tʾēbēt irenkʾ gĕ janchʾnayin Astowadz , Astowdzoy bēs chʾpʾaṛaworetsʾin gam shnorhagal chʾeghan : haba ownaynatsʾan irentsʾ mtadzowmnerown mēch , ew irentsʾ sirtĕ ankhelkʾowtʾeamp , , khawaretsʾaw .
45001022	Hawastelov tʾē irenkʾ imastown en , yimaratsʾan ,
45001023	ow pʾokhetsʾin aneghdz Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾĕ , nmantsʾnelov eghdzaneli martow , tʾṛchʾownnerow , chʾorkʾotaninerow ew soghownnerow batgerin .
45001024	Hetewapar Astowadz al matnetsʾ zanonkʾ anmakʾrowtʾean , irentsʾ sirti tsʾangowtʾiwnnerown hamatsayn , orbēszi irentsʾ marminnerĕ anbatowen irenkʾ irentsʾ mēch :
45001025	kʾani or Astowdzoy jshmartowtʾiwnĕ pʾokhetsʾin sowti het , ew agnadzetsʾan araradzēn ow bashtetsʾin zayn , kʾan Ararichʾĕ , or ōrhneal ē yawitean . Amēn .
45001026	Ays batjaṛov Astowadz matnetsʾ zanonkʾ anbatiw girkʾerow : kʾani or irentsʾ ēkern ankam pnagan yaraperowtʾiwnĕ pʾokhetsʾin pnowtʾean tēm eghogh yaraperowtʾean .
45001027	Nmanabēs arownern al , tʾoghowtsʾadz ēkin pnagan yaraperowtʾiwnĕ , irentsʾ tṛpʾankʾov vaṛetsʾan irarow het : arownerĕ arownerow het anvayelchʾowtʾiwn gĕ kordzatrēin , ew irentsʾ molorowtʾean ar zhani hatowtsʾowmĕ gĕ stanayin irentsʾ vray .
45001028	Kʾani chʾknahatetsʾin bahel Astowadz irentsʾ kitagtsʾowtʾean mēch , Astowadz al matnetsʾ zanonkʾ khoteli mitkʾi mĕ , ĕnelow anbatshaj paner .
45001029	Letsʾowadz amēn tesag anirawowtʾeamp , boṛngowtʾeamp , chʾarowtʾeamp , akahowtʾeamp ew chʾaramtowtʾeamp , li nakhantsov , martasbanowtʾeamp , hagamartowtʾeamp , nenkowtʾeamp ow chʾarasrtowtʾeamp , ew ĕllalov pansargow ,
45001030	pampasogh , Astowadz atogh , nakhatogh , ampartawan , boṛotakhōs , chʾar paner hnarogh , dznoghnerow anhnazant ,
45001031	ankhelkʾ , owkhtatrow zh , ankowtʾ , anhasht ew anoghorm ,
45001032	anonkʾ , kitnalov hanterts Astowdzoy tatavjiṛĕ , tʾē aysbisi paner ĕnoghnerĕ ar zhani en mahowan , ochʾ miayn g!ĕnen ayt panerĕ , ayl naew pareatsʾagam g!ĕllan zanonkʾ ĕnoghnerown hantēb .
45002001	Owsti , ov mart , ov al ĕllas , town or gĕ tates , chʾownis artaratsʾowm : kʾani or inchʾ panov or gĕ tates owrishĕ , anov gĕ tatabartes town kʾez : orovhetew town or gĕ tates , g!ĕnes noyn panerĕ .
45002002	Paytsʾ kitenkʾ tʾē Astowdzoy tatastanĕ gĕ girargowi jshmartowtʾeamp anontsʾ hantēb , or g!ĕnen aysbisi paner .
45002003	Owsti , ov mart , town or gĕ tates aysbisi paner ĕnoghnerĕ , paytsʾ g!ĕnes noyn panerĕ , gĕ gardzes tʾē zerdz biti mnas Astowdzoy tatastanēn .
45002004	Gam tʾē g!arhamarhes anor kʾaghtsʾrowtʾean , hantowr zhoghowtʾean ow hamperatarowtʾean jokhowtʾiwnĕ , ankitanalov tʾē Astowdzoy kʾaghtsʾrowtʾiwnĕ g!aṛachnortē kʾez abashkharowtʾean .
45002005	Paytsʾ town , khstowtʾeampt ew anzeghch sirtovt , pargowtʾiwn gĕ gowtages kʾow vrat pargowtʾean ōrowan hamar , erp Astowdzoy artar tatastanĕ yaytnowi .
45002006	An biti hatowtsʾanē iwrakʾanchʾiwrin , ir kordzerown pʾokharēnĕ : -
45002007	yawitenagan geankʾ anontsʾ , or hamperowtʾeamp yaratewelov pari kordzerow mēch , gĕ pʾntṛen pʾaṛkʾ , batiw ew anmahowtʾiwn :
45002008	isg srtoghowm ow pargowtʾiwn anontsʾ , or hagaṛagogh en , chʾen ansar jshmartowtʾean paytsʾ g!ansan anirawowtʾean :
45002009	taṛabankʾ ew taknab amēn martow antsin vray , or chʾarikʾ gĕ kordzē ,
45002010	nakh Hreayin , aba , Yoynin : isg pʾaṛkʾ , batiw ow khaghaghowtʾiwn amēn mēgown , or parikʾ gĕ kordzē , nakh Hreayin , aba , Yoynin :
45002011	orovhetew Astowdzoy kʾov achʾaṛowtʾiwn chʾgay .
45002012	Polor anonkʾ or meghanchʾetsʾin aṛantsʾ ōrēnkʾi , biti gorsowin aṛantsʾ ōrēnkʾi , ew anonkʾ or meghanchʾetsʾin ōrēnkʾi tag , biti tatowin ōrēnkʾov ,
45002013	( orovhetew Astowdzoy aṛchew ochʾ tʾē ōrēnkʾĕ lsoghnerĕ artar en , haba ōrēnkʾĕ kordzatroghnerĕ biti artaranan :
45002014	kʾani or hetʾanosnerĕ , oronkʾ ōrēnkʾ chʾownin , erp pnowtʾeamp gĕ kordzatren ōrēnkʾin barownagadz panerĕ , ōrēnkʾ chʾownenalov , pown irenkʾ g!ĕllan irentsʾ ōrēnkʾĕ :
45002015	anonkʾ tsʾoytsʾ gow tan tʾē ōrēnkʾin kordzĕ irentsʾ sirtin mēch krowadz ē , irentsʾ khghjmtankʾin mia zhamanag vgayowtʾeamp , ow irentsʾ mtadzowmnerown zirar ampastanelov ew gam chatakovelov , )
45002016	ayn ōrĕ , erp Astowadz biti tatē martotsʾ kaghtnikʾnerĕ Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov , im kʾarozadz awetaranis hamatsayn .
45002017	Aha town Hreay gĕ gochʾowis , gṛtʾnadz es ōrēnkʾin , ew gĕ bardzenas Astowdzmov :
45002018	kites anor gamkʾĕ , gĕ zatoroshes tarper panerĕ , khratowadz ĕllalov ōrēnkʾēn ,
45002019	ow hamozowadz es , tʾē aṛachnort es goyrerown , loys , khawari mēch eghoghnerown ,
45002020	grtʾichʾ , anmitnerown ew var zhabet , erakhanerown , ōrēnkʾin mēch ownenalov kitowtʾean ow jshmartowtʾean artayaytowtʾiwnĕ .
45002021	Owremn town , or ĕngerit gĕ sorvetsʾnes , town kʾezi chʾes sorvetsʾner . Gĕ kʾarozes chʾkoghnal , paytsʾ town gĕ koghnas .
45002022	G!ĕses , shnowtʾiwn mi ĕner , sagayn town shnowtʾiwn g!ĕnes . Gĕ zzowis gowṛkʾerēn , paytsʾ town tajar gĕ goghobtes .
45002023	ōrēnkʾov gĕ bardzenas , ew town ōrēnkʾĕ peganelov , Astowadz g!anbatowes .
45002024	Orovhetew tser batjaṛov Astowdzoy anownĕ gĕ hayhoyowi hetʾanosnerown mēch , inchʾbēs krowadz ē .
45002025	Artarew tʾlpʾatowtʾiwnĕ shah g!ownenay , etʾē girarges ōrēnkʾĕ : isg etʾē yantsʾawor es ōrēnkʾin tēm , kʾow tʾlpʾatowtʾiwnt g!ĕllay antʾlpʾatowtʾiwn .
45002026	Owremn etʾē antʾlpʾatĕ bahē ōrēnkʾin artarowtʾiwnĕ , mitʾē tʾlpʾatowtʾiwn biti chʾsebowi anor antʾlpʾatowtʾiwnĕ ,
45002027	ew pnig antʾlpʾatĕ , ōrēnkʾĕ kordzatrelov , biti chʾtatabartē kʾez , or kirov ow tʾlpʾatowtʾeamp zantsʾ g!ĕnes ōrēnkʾĕ .
45002028	Orovhetew Hreay chʾē an , or erewoytʾov ē , ew tʾlpʾatowtʾiwn chʾē ayn , or erewoytʾov ē , marminov .
45002029	Haba Hreay ē an , or dzadzowg ē , ow isgagan tʾlpʾatowtʾiwnĕ , sirtinn ē , hokiov ew ochʾ tʾē kirov : ow anor kovestĕ ochʾ tʾē martotsʾmē ē , haba , Astowdzmē .
45003001	Owremn inchʾ aṛawelowtʾiwn owni Hrean , gam inchʾ shah gay tʾlpʾatowtʾenēn :
45003002	shat , amēn gerbov . Nakh ayn , or Astowdzoy batkamnerĕ vstahowetsʾan anontsʾ .
45003003	Owremn inchʾ : etʾē anontsʾmē omankʾ hawatarim chʾeghan , mitʾē anontsʾ anhawatarmowtʾiwnĕ ochʾnchʾatsʾowtsʾ Astowdzoy hawatarmowtʾiwnĕ : amenewin .
45003004	Haba Astowadz jshmartakhōs biti janchʾtsʾowi , , , ew polor martig , stakhōs : inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Hetewapar town artar biti ĕllas khōskʾerowt mēch , ew yaghtʾes , erp tatowis » .
45003005	Owremn etʾē mer anirawowtʾiwnĕ g!abatsʾowtsʾanē Astowdzoy artarowtʾiwnĕ , inchʾ ĕsenkʾ : mitʾē aniraw ē Astowadz , or pargowtʾiwn gĕ tsʾowtsʾaperē
45003006	( martgōrēn g!ĕsem ) : amenewin . Aylabēs , Astowadz inchʾbēs biti tatē ashkharhĕ .
45003007	Orovhetew etʾē Astowdzoy jshmartowtʾiwnĕ gĕ jokhanay im stowtʾeamps , ir pʾaṛkʾin hamar , al es inchʾow gĕ tatowim ipr meghawor .
45003008	Ew inchʾow batshaj chʾē ĕsel : « CHʾarikʾ kordzenkʾ , or parikʾ yaṛach kay » , inchʾbēs omankʾ mezi hayhoyelov gĕ zrbarten , , tʾē menkʾ aytbēs g!ĕsenkʾ . Atontsʾ tatabartowtʾiwnĕ artaratsʾi ē .
45003009	Owremn al inchʾ ĕsenkʾ , kerazantsʾ enkʾ hetʾanosnerēn . Ochʾ mēg gerbov : orovhetew nakhabēs meghatretsʾinkʾ Hreanerĕ ew Yoynerĕ , tʾē polorĕ meghkʾi tag en ,
45003010	inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Ochʾ mēg artar gay , ochʾ isg mēg hat .
45003011	Ochʾ mēgĕ gay or hasgnay , ochʾ mēgĕ gay or pʾntṛē Astowadz .
45003012	Polorĕ khotoretsʾan , miasin anbēt tartsan : ochʾ mēg parikʾ ĕnogh gay , ochʾ isg mēg hat » .
45003013	« Anontsʾ gogortĕ patsʾ kerezman ē , irentsʾ lezowov nenkawor eghan » . « I zherow tʾoyn gay anontsʾ shrtʾownkʾnerown tag » .
45003014	« Anontsʾ peranĕ letsʾown ē anēdzkʾov ow taṛnowtʾeamp » .
45003015	« Anontsʾ otkʾerĕ g!ajabaren ariwn tʾapʾelow :
45003016	gordzanowm ew tʾshowaṛowtʾiwn gay anontsʾ jampanerown mēch .
45003017	CHʾjanchʾtsʾan khaghaghowtʾean jampan » .
45003018	« Astowdzoy vakhĕ chʾgay anontsʾ achʾkʾerown aṛchew » .
45003019	Paytsʾ kitenkʾ tʾē inchʾ or g!ĕsē ōrēnkʾĕ , g!ĕsē anontsʾ , or ōrēnkʾin tag en , orbēszi amēn peran kotsʾowi ew ampoghch ashkharhĕ tatabartowi Astowdzoy aṛchew .
45003020	Owsti ochʾ mēg marmin biti artaranay anor aṛchew ōrēnkʾin kordzerov , kʾani or ōrēnkʾin michotsʾov g!ĕllay meghkʾi kitagtsʾowtʾiwnĕ .
45003021	Paytsʾ hima , aṛantsʾ ōrēnkʾin , Astowdzoy artarowtʾiwnĕ patsʾayayt eghadz ē , vgayowadz ĕllalov ōrēnkʾēn ow Markarēnerēn :
45003022	aysinkʾn Astowdzoy artarowtʾiwnĕ , or Yisows Kʾristosi vray eghadz hawatkʾov ē polor hawatatsʾoghnerown hamar , kʾani or khtrowtʾiwn chʾgay .
45003023	Artarew polorĕ meghanchʾetsʾin , ew zrgowadz en Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾēn :
45003024	paytsʾ tsri g!artaranan anor shnorhkʾov , Kʾristos Yisowsov eghadz azatakrowtʾeamp .
45003025	Astowadz nakhabēs sahmanetsʾ zayn , kʾawowtʾiwn ĕllalow anor ariwnin hawatatsʾoghnerown , orbēszi tsʾoytsʾ tay ir artarowtʾiwnĕ , nerelov nakhabēs - Astowdzoy hantowr zhoghowtʾean zhamanag - kordzowadz meghkʾerĕ .
45003026	Aysinkʾn , ir artarowtʾiwnĕ ays aten tsʾoytsʾ talow hamar , orbēszi inkʾ artar ĕllay ew artaratsʾnē Yisowsi hawatatsʾoghĕ .
45003027	Owremn owr mnatsʾ bardzankʾĕ : patsʾaṛowetsʾaw . Or ōrēnkʾēn , kordzerow ōrēnkʾēn . Ochʾ , haba hawatkʾi ōrēnkʾēn :
45003028	orovhetew menkʾ gĕ hetewtsʾnenkʾ tʾē mart g!artaranay hawatkʾov , aṛantsʾ ōrēnkʾin kordzerown .
45003029	Mitʾē Astowadz miayn Hreanerownn ē ow hetʾanosnerownĕ chʾē : ayo , naew hetʾanosnerownĕ .
45003030	Kʾani or mēg Astowadz gay , or tʾlpʾatowtʾiwnĕ g!artaratsʾnē hawatkʾov , naew antʾlpʾatowtʾiwnĕ , noyn hawatkʾov .
45003031	Owsti menkʾ g!ochʾnchʾatsʾnenkʾ ōrēnkʾĕ hawatkʾov . Amenewin : noynisg gĕ hastatenkʾ ōrēnkʾĕ .
45004001	Owremn inchʾ biti ĕsenkʾ tʾē ktaw Apraham , marmini hamemat mer nakhahayrĕ :
45004002	orovhetew etʾē Apraham artaratsʾadz ĕllar kordzerov , biti bardzenar anontsʾmov , paytsʾ ochʾ Astowdzoy aṛchew .
45004003	Artarew inchʾ g!ĕsē Kirkʾĕ : « Apraham hawatatsʾ Astowdzoy , ew atiga artarowtʾiwn sebowetsʾaw iren » .
45004004	Paytsʾ an or gĕ kordzē , anor vartsatrowtʾiwnĕ shnorhkʾē eghadz chʾi sebowir , haba , bartkʾē .
45004005	Isg an or chʾi kordzer , paytsʾ gĕ hawatay anor , or g!artaratsʾnē amparishtĕ , ir hawatkʾĕ artarowtʾiwn gĕ sebowi iren .
45004006	Inchʾbēs Tawitʾ al gĕ khōsi eranowtʾean masin ayn martown , orown Astowadz artarowtʾiwn gĕ sebē , aṛantsʾ kordzerow .
45004007	« Erani anontsʾ , - g!ĕsē , - orontsʾ anōrēnowtʾiwnnerĕ nerowetsʾan , ew orontsʾ meghkʾerĕ dzadzgowetsʾan .
45004008	Erani ayn martown , orown meghkʾ chʾi seber Tērĕ » .
45004009	Owremn ays eranowtʾiwnĕ miayn tʾlpʾatowadznerown hamar ē , tʾē antʾlpʾatnerown hamar al : kʾani or g!ĕsenkʾ tʾē “ hawatkʾĕ artarowtʾiwn sebowetsʾaw Aprahami ” .
45004010	Owremn inchʾbēs sebowetsʾaw : tʾlpʾatowtʾean mēch eghadz atenĕ , tʾē antʾlpʾatowtʾean mēch . Ochʾ tʾē tʾlpʾatowtʾean mēch , haba , antʾlpʾatowtʾean .
45004011	Yetoy tʾlpʾatowtʾean nshanĕ statsʾaw , ipr gnikʾ antʾlpʾatowtʾean atenĕ ownetsʾadz hawatkʾin artarowtʾean , orbēszi inkʾ ĕllay hayrĕ ayn polor hawatatsʾoghnerown , oronkʾ antʾlpʾat en ( anontsʾ al artarowtʾiwn sebowelow hamar ) ,
45004012	naew hayrĕ tʾlpʾatowtʾean , anontsʾ hamar , oronkʾ ochʾ miayn tʾlpʾatowadz en , ayl naew g!ĕntʾanan mer hōr Aprahami antʾlpʾatowtʾean aten ownetsʾadz hawatkʾin hetkʾerov .
45004013	Artarew Aprahami ew anor zarmin , ashkharhĕ zhaṛankelow hamar trowadz khostowmĕ ochʾ tʾē ōrēnkʾov eghaw , haba hawatkʾin artarowtʾeamp .
45004014	Kʾani or etʾē ōrēnkʾēn eghoghnerĕ zhaṛankort ĕllayin , hawatkʾĕ biti pʾjanar , ew khostowmĕ ochʾnchʾanar .
45004015	Orovhetew ōrēnkʾĕ pargowtʾiwn gĕ kordzatrē : kʾani or owr ōrēnkʾ chʾgay , ōrinazantsʾowtʾiwn al chʾgay .
45004016	Owsti zhaṛankort ĕllalĕ hawatkʾēn ē , or shnorhkʾov eghadz ĕllay , orbēszi khostowmĕ mnayown ĕllay ampoghch zarmin : ochʾ miayn anor , or ōrēnkʾēn ē , ayl naew anor , or Aprahami hawatkʾēn ē . An mer polorin hayrn ē
45004017	( inchʾbēs krowadz ē : “ Kʾez shat azkerow hayr ĕri ” ) Astowdzoy aṛchew , orown inkʾ hawatatsʾ , or geankʾ gow tay meṛelnerown ow chʾeghadz panerĕ gĕ gochʾē eghadznerow bēs .
45004018	CHʾyowsatsʾowadz panin , yoysov hawatatsʾ , tʾē inkʾ shat azkerow hayr biti ĕllay ( inchʾbēs ĕsowetsʾaw al tʾē “ kʾow zarmt aysbēs biti ĕllay ” ) :
45004019	ew hawatkʾi mēch chʾtgaranalov , owshatir chʾeghaw ir marminin , or artēn meṛadzi bēs ēr , ( orovhetew inkʾ hariwr taregani chʾapʾ ēr , ) ochʾ al Saṛayi arkantin meṛadz ĕllalown .
45004020	Anhawatowtʾeamp chʾtatamsetsʾaw Astowdzoy khostowmin hantēb , haba hawatkʾov zōratsʾadz , pʾaṛkʾ towaw Astowdzoy ,
45004021	ew lman hamozowetsʾaw tʾē inchʾ or an khostatsʾaw , garogh ē naew irakordzel .
45004022	Owsti artarowtʾiwn sebowetsʾaw iren .
45004023	Paytsʾ krowetsʾaw ochʾ miayn anor hamar , tʾē “ sebowetsʾaw iren ” ,
45004024	ayl naew mezi hamar , orontsʾ biti sebowi , kʾani or gĕ hawatankʾ anor , or meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanetsʾ Yisowsĕ , mer Tērĕ ,
45004025	or matnowetsʾaw mer yantsʾankʾnerown hamar ow yarowtʾiwn aṛaw mez artaratsʾnelow hamar .
45005001	Owremn menkʾ , hawatkʾov artaratsʾadz ĕllalov , khaghaghowtʾiwn owninkʾ Astowdzoy het mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov .
45005002	Anov naew artōnowtʾiwn ownetsʾankʾ hawatkʾov mōtenalow ays shnorhkʾin , orown mēch getsʾadz enkʾ , ew gĕ bardzenankʾ Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾin yoysov .
45005003	Ochʾ miayn ayskʾan , haba gĕ bardzenankʾ taṛabankʾnerow mēch al : orovhetew kitenkʾ tʾē taṛabankʾĕ g!irakordzē hamperowtʾiwn ,
45005004	hamperowtʾiwnĕ , pʾortsaṛowtʾiwn , ow pʾortsaṛowtʾiwnĕ , yoys :
45005005	ew yoysĕ amōtʾahar chʾ!ĕner , orovhetew Astowdzoy sērĕ mer sirterown mēch spʾṛowadz ē Sowrp Hokiin michotsʾov , or trowetsʾaw mezi .
45005006	Artarew minchʾ menkʾ tagawin tgar ēinkʾ , yarmar zhamanagin , Kʾristos meṛaw amparishtnerown hamar :
45005007	haziw tʾē artari mĕ hamar mēgĕ owzē meṛnil , ( tʾerews pari martow mĕ hamar mēgĕ yō zhari meṛnil , )
45005008	minchʾteṛ Astowadz mezi hantēb ownetsʾadz ir sērĕ abatsʾowtsʾanetsʾ ayn iroghowtʾeamp , or erp tagawin meghawor ēinkʾ ,
45005009	Kʾristos meṛaw mezi hamar : owremn hima or artaratsʾankʾ ir ariwnov , orchʾapʾ aweli pargowtʾenēn biti pʾrgowinkʾ irmov .
45005010	Orovhetew etʾē mer tʾshnami eghadz atenĕ hashtowetsʾankʾ Astowdzoy het ir Ortiin mahov , orchʾapʾ aweli mer hashtowadz atenĕ biti pʾrgowinkʾ anor geankʾov .
45005011	Ew ochʾ miayn asiga , ayl naew gĕ bardzenankʾ Astowdzmov , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov , orov hima statsʾankʾ hashtowtʾiwnĕ .
45005012	Owsti inchʾbēs mēg martov meghkʾĕ ashkharh mtaw , ow meghkʾov , mahĕ , ew aynbēs , mahĕ pʾokhantsʾowetsʾaw polor martotsʾ , kʾani or polorn al meghanchʾetsʾin :
45005013	( orovhetew minchʾew ōrēnkʾin trowilĕ , ashkharhi mēch meghkʾ gar , paytsʾ meghkʾ chʾēr verakrower , erp ōrēnkʾ chʾgar .
45005014	Sagayn mahĕ tʾakaworetsʾ Atamēn minchʾew Movsēs , noynisg Atami ōrinazantsʾowtʾean nman chʾmeghanchʾoghnerown vray : inkʾ nakhatibn ēr anor , or yetoy biti kar .
45005015	Paytsʾ shnorhĕ yantsʾankʾin bēs chʾē : orovhetew etʾē mēgin yantsʾankʾov shater meṛan , al orchʾapʾ aweli shaterown vray aṛatatsʾaw Astowdzoy shnorhkʾĕ , ew barkewĕ , or shnorhowetsʾaw mēg martow , Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov .
45005016	Ew barkewĕ aynbēs chʾē , inchʾbēs mēg meghanchʾoghin batahadzĕ : orovhetew tatastanĕ mēgin meghkʾov tatabartowtʾean matnetsʾ , paytsʾ shnorhĕ shat yantsʾankʾnerē artarowtʾean aṛachnortetsʾ .
45005017	Kʾani or etʾē mēg martow yantsʾankʾov , mahĕ tʾakaworetsʾ ayt mēgov , orchʾapʾ aweli anonkʾ , or gĕ stanan shnorhkʾi ow artarowtʾean barkewin aṛatowtʾiwnĕ , geankʾi mēch biti tʾakaworen miag Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov . )
45005018	Owremn , inchʾbēs polor martotsʾ tatabartowtʾean vjiṛ trowetsʾaw mēgin yantsʾankʾov , aynbēs al polor martotsʾ geankʾ towogh artarowtʾiwn shnorhowetsʾaw mēgin artarowtʾeamp .
45005019	Orovhetew inchʾbēs shater meghawor eghan mēg martow anhnazantowtʾeamp , aynbēs shater artar biti ĕllan mēgin hnazantowtʾeamp .
45005020	Sagayn ōrēnkʾĕ ners sbrtetsʾaw , orbēszi yantsʾankʾĕ awelnay : paytsʾ hon , owr meghkʾĕ aweltsʾaw , shnorhkʾĕ chʾapʾazantsʾ aṛatatsʾaw .
45005021	Orbēszi , inchʾbēs meghkʾĕ tʾakaworetsʾ minchʾew mah , aynbēs al shnorhkʾĕ tʾakaworē artarowtʾeamp , minchʾew yawitenagan geankʾ , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov .
45006001	Owremn inchʾ biti ĕsenkʾ : arteōkʾ yaratewenkʾ meghkʾi mēch , orbēszi shnorhkʾĕ awelnay .
45006002	Amenewin . Menkʾ , or meṛadz enkʾ meghkʾin hantēb , inchʾbēs tagawin abrinkʾ anor mēch .
45006003	CHʾēkʾ kiter tʾē menkʾ polors , or mgrtowetsʾankʾ Yisows Kʾristosov , mgrtowetsʾankʾ anor mahov .
45006004	Owremn anor het tʾaghowetsʾankʾ mgrtowtʾeamp , mahowan hamar : orbēszi inchʾbēs Kʾristos meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛaw , Hōrĕ pʾaṛkʾov , aynbēs al menkʾ ĕntʾanankʾ nor geankʾi mēch .
45006005	Orovhetew etʾē menkʾ tngagitsʾ eghankʾ anor mahowan nmanowtʾeamp , naew gtsʾort biti ĕllankʾ anor yarowtʾean nmanowtʾeamp .
45006006	Sa kitnankʾ , tʾē mer hin martĕ khachʾowetsʾaw anor het , or meghkʾi marminĕ ochʾnchʾanay , orbēszi aylews meghkʾin strowgĕ chʾĕllankʾ .
45006007	Orovhetew an or meṛadz ē meghkʾin , artaratsʾadz ē meghkʾēn .
45006008	Owremn etʾē menkʾ meṛankʾ Kʾristosi het , gĕ hawatankʾ tʾē biti abrinkʾ al anor het .
45006009	Kʾani or kitenkʾ tʾē Kʾristos meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛadz ĕllalov , aylews chʾi meṛnir : al mahĕ chʾi tirer anor vray .
45006010	Orovhetew erp an meṛaw , meghkʾi hamar meṛaw , mēg ankam ĕntmisht , ew hima or g!abri , Astowdzoy hamar g!abri .
45006011	Noynbēs towkʾ tsez meṛadz sebetsʾēkʾ meghkʾin , paytsʾ oghch , Astowdzoy , mer Tēroch , Kʾristos Yisowsi michotsʾov .
45006012	Owremn al meghkʾĕ tʾogh chʾtʾakaworē tser mahganatsʾow marminin vray , or hnazantikʾ anor tsʾangowtʾiwnnerown :
45006013	ow tser marminin antamnerĕ mi yantsnēkʾ meghkʾin , anirawowtʾean kordzikʾ ĕllalow . Haba towkʾ tsez ĕndzayetsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy , orbēs meṛelnerēn verabroghner , ew tser antamnerĕ ĕndzayetsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy , ipr artarowtʾean kordzikʾner .
45006014	Artarew meghkʾĕ biti chʾishkhē tser vray : orovhetew ochʾ tʾē ōrēnkʾi tag ēkʾ , haba , shnorhkʾi tag .
45006015	Owremn inchʾ : meghanchʾenkʾ , kʾani or ōrēnkʾi tag chʾenkʾ , haba , shnorhkʾi tag . Amenewin .
45006016	CHʾēkʾ kiter tʾē orown or towkʾ tsez ipr strowg yantsnēkʾ , hnazantelow hamar , strowg g!ĕllakʾ anor , orown gĕ hnazantikʾ , tʾē meghkʾin , or g!aṛachnortē mahowan , ew tʾē hnazantowtʾean , or g!aṛachnortē artarowtʾean .
45006017	Paytsʾ shnorhagalowtʾiwn Astowdzoy , or meghkʾin strowg ĕllalē etkʾ , srtantsʾ hnazantetsʾakʾ ayn owsowtsʾowmi tibarin , or awantowetsʾaw tsezi .
45006018	Owsti towkʾ , azatadz ĕllalov meghkʾēn , strowg eghakʾ artarowtʾean :
45006019	( martgayin gerbov gĕ khōsim , tser marminin tgarowtʾean batjaṛov : ) kʾani or inchʾbēs yantsnetsʾikʾ tser antamnerĕ anōrēnowtʾean , strowg ĕllalow anmakʾrowtʾean ew anōrēnowtʾean , aynbēs al hima ĕndzayetsʾēkʾ tser antamnerĕ srpowtʾean , strowg ĕllalow artarowtʾean .
45006020	Orovhetew erp towkʾ strowg ēikʾ meghkʾin , azat ēikʾ artarowtʾenēn .
45006021	Owremn ayn aten inchʾ btowgh ownēikʾ ayn panerēn , orontsʾ hamar hima g!amchʾnakʾ : orovhetew anontsʾ vakhjanĕ mah ē .
45006022	Isg hima , meghkʾēn azatadz ew Astowdzoy strowg eghadz ĕllalov , tser btowghĕ ownikʾ , srpowtʾeamp , ow vakhjanĕ , yawitenagan geankʾĕ .
45006023	Orovhetew meghkʾin vartsatrowtʾiwnĕ mah ē , paytsʾ Astowdzoy shnorhĕ , yawitenagan geankʾ ē , Yisows Kʾristosi , mer Tēroch michotsʾov .
45007001	Mitʾē chʾēkʾ kiter , eghpayrner , ( kʾani or es ōrēnkʾĕ kittsʾoghnerown gĕ khōsim , ) tʾē ōrēnkʾĕ gĕ tirē martown vray , aynkʾan aten or an g!abri .
45007002	Orovhetew amowsin ownetsʾogh ginĕ ōrēnkʾov gabowadz ē ir amowsinin , kʾani teṛ an g!abri : paytsʾ etʾē amowsinĕ meṛni , artsagowadz ē amowsinin ōrēnkʾēn .
45007003	Owremn , kʾani teṛ amowsinĕ g!abri , shnatsʾogh biti gochʾowi , etʾē owrish martow mĕ gin ĕllay : paytsʾ etʾē amowsinĕ meṛni , azat g!ĕllay ayt ōrēnkʾēn , aynbēs or shnatsʾogh chʾ!ĕllar , etʾē owrish martow mĕ gin ĕllay .
45007004	Hetewapar towkʾ al , eghpayrners , ōrēnkʾin meṛakʾ Kʾristosi marminov , orbēszi ĕllakʾ owrishi mĕ , anor , or meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛaw , orbēszi btowgh artatrenkʾ Astowdzoy .
45007005	Kʾani or erp menkʾ marminov ēinkʾ , meghkʾerow girkʾerĕ , oronkʾ gĕ trtowēin ōrēnkʾēn , gĕ nerkordzēin mer antamnerown mēch , orbēszi btowgh artatrenkʾ mahowan .
45007006	Isg hima artsagowetsʾankʾ ōrēnkʾēn : orovhetew menkʾ meṛankʾ anor , or keri pṛnadz ēr mez , orbēszi dzaṛayenkʾ norokowadz hokiov , ew ochʾ tʾē hnamash kirin hamatsayn .
45007007	Owremn inchʾ ĕsenkʾ : ōrēnkʾĕ meghkʾ ē . Amenewin . Noynisg es biti chʾkitnayi meghkʾĕ , etʾē ōrēnkʾĕ chʾĕllar : naew biti chʾkitnayi tsʾangowtʾiwnĕ , etʾē ōrēnkʾĕ ĕsadz chʾĕllar : « Mi tsʾangar » .
45007008	Paytsʾ meghkʾĕ , aṛitʾ aṛnelov batowiranēn , mēchs irakordzetsʾ amēn tesag tsʾangowtʾiwn , orovhetew meghkʾĕ meṛadz ēr aṛantsʾ ōrēnkʾin .
45007009	Artarew es zhamanag mĕ oghch ēi , aṛantsʾ ōrēnkʾin : paytsʾ erp batowiranĕ egaw , meghkʾĕ verabretsʾaw ,
45007010	ow es meṛay : ew ayn batowiranĕ , or geankʾi hamar ēr , noynĕ indzi mahowan hamar eghaw .
45007011	Orovhetew meghkʾĕ , batowiranēn aṛitʾ aṛnelov , khapetsʾ zis , ew sbannetsʾ anov .
45007012	Hetewapar ōrēnkʾĕ sowrp ē , ow batowiranĕ , sowrp , artar ew pari .
45007013	Owremn inchʾ or pari ē , mah batjaṛetsʾ indzi . Amenewin . Haba meghkʾn ēr or mah irakordzetsʾ im mēchs , pariin michotsʾov , orbēszi meghkʾĕ kerazantsʾōrēn meghawor erewnay , batowiranin michotsʾov .
45007014	Artarew kitenkʾ tʾē ōrēnkʾĕ hokewor ē , paytsʾ es marmnawor em , dzakhowadz meghkʾin hbatagowtʾean :
45007015	orovhetew inchʾ or gĕ kordzatrem , chʾem ĕmpṛner . Ochʾ tʾē inchʾ or g!owzem , zayn g!ĕnem , haba inchʾ or g!atem , zayn g!ĕnem .
45007016	Owremn etʾē chʾowzadzs g!ĕnem , hawanowtʾiwn gow tam ōrēnkʾin , tʾē pari ē .
45007017	Isg hima , ochʾ tʾē es gĕ kordzatrem zayn , haba meghkʾĕ , or gĕ pnagi im mēchs .
45007018	Kʾani or kitem tʾē im mēchs , aysinkʾn marminis mēch , ochʾ mēg pari pan gĕ pnagi : orovhetew gamenalĕ kʾovs ē , paytsʾ chʾem ktner parin kordzatrelĕ .
45007019	Artarew parin or g!owzem , chʾem ĕner , haba chʾarĕ or chʾem owzer , zayn g!ĕnem .
45007020	Isg etʾē g!ĕnem inchʾ or chʾem owzer , al ochʾ tʾē es gĕ kordzatrem zayn , haba meghkʾĕ , or im mēchs gĕ pnagi .
45007021	Owremn es gĕ ktnem ōrēnkʾ mĕ , or erp gamenam parin ĕnelĕ , chʾarĕ kʾovs g!ĕllay .
45007022	Orovhetew nerkʾin martown hamatsayn , gĕ hawnim Astowdzoy ōrēnkʾĕ :
45007023	paytsʾ antamnerows mēch gĕ tesnem owrish ōrēnkʾ mĕ , or gĕ martnchʾi mitkʾis ōrēnkʾin tēm ew keri gĕ tartsnē zis meghkʾi ōrēnkʾin , or antamnerows mēch ē .
45007024	Inchʾ tʾshowaṛ mart em : ov biti azatē zis ays mahganatsʾow marminēn .
45007025	SHnorhagalowtʾiwn Astowdzoy , , , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov . Owremn es inkʾs mitkʾov gĕ dzaṛayem Astowdzoy ōrēnkʾin , isg marminov , meghkʾi ōrēnkʾin .
45008001	Owremn hima tatabartowtʾiwn chʾgay Kʾristos Yisowsov eghoghnerown , oronkʾ marminin hamatsayn chʾen ĕntʾanar :
45008002	kʾani or geankʾi Hokiin ōrēnkʾĕ , Kʾristos Yisowsov azatetsʾ zis meghkʾi ew mahowan ōrēnkʾēn .
45008003	Artarew inchʾ or ōrēnkʾĕ angarogh ēr ĕnel , orovhetew marminĕ tgaratsʾowtsʾadz ēr zayn , Astowadz irakordzetsʾ : ir Ortin ghrgetsʾ , meghanchʾagan marmini nmanowtʾeamp ew meghkʾin batjaṛov , ow tatabartetsʾ meghkʾĕ ayt marminin mēch ,
45008004	orbēszi ōrēnkʾin artarowtʾiwnĕ kordzatrowi mer mēch , or chʾenkʾ ĕntʾanar marminin hamatsayn , ayl , Hokiin .
45008005	Artarew marminin hamatsayn abroghnerĕ , gĕ mtadzen marminin panerĕ , isg Hokiin hamatsayn abroghnerĕ , Hokiin panerĕ :
45008006	naew marmnawor mtadzowmĕ mah ē , isg hokewor mtadzowmĕ , geankʾ ow khaghaghowtʾiwn .
45008007	Artarew marmnawor mtadzowmĕ Astowdzoy tēm tʾshnamowtʾiwn ē , kʾani Astowdzoy ōrēnkʾin chʾi hbatagir : manawant chʾi grnar al ,
45008008	orovhetew marminin hamatsayn abroghnerĕ chʾen grnar hajetsʾnel Astowadz .
45008009	Paytsʾ towkʾ chʾēkʾ abrir marminin hamatsayn , haba , Hokiin hamatsayn , etʾē isgabēs Astowdzoy Hokin pnagadz ē tser mēch : isg etʾē mēgĕ Kʾristosi Hokin chʾowni , inkʾ anorĕ chʾē .
45008010	Sagayn etʾē Kʾristos tser mēch ē , marminĕ meṛadz ē meghkʾin batjaṛov , isg Hokin geankʾ gĕ barkewē artarowtʾean batjaṛov .
45008011	Ow etʾē Yisowsĕ meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanoghin Hokin pnagadz ē tser mēch , owremn an , or meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanetsʾ Kʾristosĕ , geankʾ biti tay naew tser mahganatsʾow marminnerown , ir Hokiov , or gĕ pnagi tser mēch .
45008012	Owremn , eghpayrner , bartagan enkʾ , paytsʾ ochʾ marminin , marminin hamatsayn abrelow hamar .
45008013	Orovhetew etʾē marminin hamatsayn abrikʾ , biti meṛnikʾ , isg etʾē Hokiov marminin kordzerĕ meṛtsʾnēkʾ , biti abrikʾ .
45008014	Artarew polor anonkʾ or g!aṛachnortowin Astowdzoy Hokiov , anonkʾ en Astowdzoy ortinerĕ :
45008015	kʾani or towkʾ chʾstatsʾakʾ strgowtʾean hokin , tartseal vakhnalow hamar , haba statsʾakʾ ortekrowtʾean Hokin , orown michotsʾov gĕ kochʾenkʾ , , : « Appa , Hayr » .
45008016	Noyninkʾn Hokin vgayowtʾiwn gow tay mer hokiin het tʾē menkʾ Astowdzoy zawagnern enkʾ :
45008017	ow etʾē zawagner , owremn zhaṛankortner , Astowdzoy zhaṛankortner ew Kʾristosi zhaṛankagitsʾner , orbēszi etʾē chʾarchʾarowinkʾ iren het , naew pʾaṛaworowinkʾ iren het .
45008018	Artarew es aynbēs gĕ sebem tʾē ays nergay zhamanagin chʾarchʾarankʾnerĕ , ar zhani chʾen paghtatowelow kalikʾ pʾaṛkʾin het , or biti yaytnowi mer mēch .
