45008019	Kʾani or araradznerĕ eṛantown agngalowtʾeamp gĕ sbasen Astowdzoy ortinerown yaytnowtʾean .
45008020	Orovhetew araradznerĕ hbatagetsʾan ownaynowtʾean , ( ochʾ tʾē irentsʾ gamkʾov , haba anor batjaṛov , or hbatagetsʾowtsʾ zirenkʾ , )
45008021	ayn yoysov , or araradznerĕ irenkʾ al , azatelov abaganowtʾean strgowtʾenēn , hasnin Astowdzoy zawagnerown pʾaṛawor azatowtʾean .
45008022	Kʾani or kitenkʾ tʾē polor araradznerĕ miasin gĕ haṛachʾen ow ergownkʾi tsʾaw gĕ kʾashen minchʾew hima .
45008023	Ew ochʾ miayn anonkʾ , haba menkʾ al , or owninkʾ Hokiin erakhayrikʾĕ , noynisg menkʾ mer mēch gĕ haṛachʾenkʾ , sbaselov ortekrowtʾean , aysinkʾn mer marminin azatakrowtʾean .
45008024	Orovhetew menkʾ yoysov pʾrgowetsʾankʾ : paytsʾ ayn yoysĕ or gĕ tesnowi , yoys chʾē : kʾani or inchʾow mēgĕ tagawin yowsay ayn panin , or artēn gĕ tesnē .
45008025	Isg etʾē gĕ yowsankʾ mer chʾtesadz panin , al hamperowtʾeamp sbasenkʾ anor .
45008026	Noynbēs Hokin al g!ōknē mer tgarowtʾiwnnerown mēch : kʾani or chʾenkʾ kiter inchʾ pani hamar aghōtʾelow enkʾ , inchʾbēs bētkʾ ē : paytsʾ Hokin inkʾ gĕ parekhōsē mezi hamar , anparpaṛ haṛachʾankʾnerov .
45008027	Ew an , or gĕ znnē sirterĕ , kitē Hokiin inchʾ mtadzelĕ , kʾani or gĕ parekhōsē sowrperown hamar Astowdzoy gamkʾin hamatsayn .
45008028	Naew kitenkʾ tʾē polor panerĕ pariin kordzagitsʾ g!ĕllan anontsʾ , or gĕ siren Astowadz , anontsʾ , or ganchʾowadz en ir aṛachatrowtʾean hamatsayn .
45008029	Orovhetew anonkʾ , or nakhabēs janchʾtsʾaw , naew nakhasahmanetsʾ , gerbaranagitsʾ ĕllalow ir Ortiin batgerin , orbēszi an ĕllay antranigĕ pazmatʾiw eghpayrnerow mēch .
45008030	Ew anonkʾ or nakhasahmanetsʾ , naew ganchʾetsʾ , anonkʾ or ganchʾetsʾ , naew artaratsʾowtsʾ , ew anonkʾ or artaratsʾowtsʾ , naew pʾaṛaworetsʾ .
45008031	Owremn inchʾ ĕsenkʾ ays panerown masin : etʾē Astowadz mer goghmn ē , ov hagaṛag ē mezi .
45008032	An , or chʾkhnayetsʾ ir isg Ortiin , haba matnetsʾ zayn mer polorin hamar , inchʾbēs anor het naew biti chʾbarkewē mezi polor panerĕ .
45008033	Ov biti meghatrē Astowdzoy ĕntradznerĕ : Astowadz ē artaratsʾnoghĕ .
45008034	Owremn ov ē tatabartoghĕ : Kʾristos , or meṛaw , manawant yarowtʾiwn aṛaw ew Astowdzoy ach goghmn ē , an gĕ parekhōsē mezi hamar .
45008035	Owremn ov biti zatē mez Kʾristosi sērēn : taṛabankʾĕ , gam taknabĕ , gam haladzankʾĕ , gam sovĕ , gam mergowtʾiwnĕ , gam vtankĕ , gam sowrĕ .
45008036	( Inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Kʾezi hamar ampoghch ōrĕ gĕ meṛtsʾowinkʾ : sbantanotsʾi ochʾkhari bēs gĕ sebowinkʾ » . )
45008037	Noynisg ays polor panerown mēch aweli kʾan yaghtʾogh g!ĕllankʾ anov , or siretsʾ mez .
45008038	Orovhetew es hamozowadz em tʾē ochʾ mahĕ , ochʾ geankʾĕ , ochʾ hreshtagnerĕ , ochʾ ishkhanowtʾiwnnerĕ , ochʾ zōrowtʾiwnnerĕ , ochʾ nergay panerĕ , ochʾ kalikʾ panerĕ ,
45008039	ochʾ partsrowtʾiwnĕ , ochʾ khorowngowtʾiwnĕ , ochʾ al oewē owrish araradz biti garenay zatel mez Astowdzoy sērēn , or Kʾristos Yisowsov , mer Tērochmov ē .
45009001	Jshmartowtʾiwnĕ g!ĕsem Kʾristosov ow chʾem ster , ( im khghjmtankʾs al gĕ vgayē indzi Sowrp Hokiov , )
45009002	tʾē medz trtmowtʾiwn ownim , ew sirtis mēch , yaratew tsʾaw .
45009003	Kʾani or g!ĕghtsayi es inkʾs nzovowadz ĕllal Kʾristosē , im eghpayrnerows , marmini goghmēn azkagannerows hamar ,
45009004	oronkʾ Israyelatsʾi en . Anontsʾn en ortekrowtʾiwnĕ , pʾaṛkʾĕ , owkhterĕ , ōrēnstrowtʾiwnĕ , bashtamownkʾn ow khostowmnerĕ .
45009005	Irentsʾn en nakhahayrerĕ : irentsʾmē al marmini goghmēn egaw Kʾristos , or polorin vray ē , yawitean ōrhneal Astowadz . Amēn .
45009006	Paytsʾ Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ abartiwn ngatowelow chʾē : kʾani or polor Israyēlē eghoghnerĕ Israyelatsʾi chʾen ,
45009007	ochʾ al polorĕ zawagner en , kʾani or Aprahami zarmn en : haba ĕsowetsʾaw : « Isahagi anownov biti gochʾowi kʾow zarmt » .
45009008	Aysinkʾn anonkʾ or marmini zawagnern en , Astowdzoy zawagnerĕ chʾen : haba khostowmin zawagnerĕ zarm gĕ sebowin .
45009009	Orovhetew khostowmin khōskʾĕ sa ēr : « Ays aten biti kam , ow Saṛa orti mĕ biti ownenay » .
45009010	Ew ochʾ miayn ayt , ayl naew erp Ṛepega yghatsʾaw mēgēn , mer Isahag hōrmēn ,
45009011	( kʾani or zawagnerĕ teṛ chʾdznadz , ochʾ al orewē parikʾ gam chʾarikʾ kordzadz , orbēszi Astowdzoy aṛachatrowtʾiwnĕ hastat mnay , ĕntrowtʾean hamatsayn ,
45009012	aysinkʾn ochʾ tʾē kordzerēn ĕllay , haba angē or ganchʾetsʾ , ) anor ĕsowetsʾaw :
45009013	« Erētsʾĕ biti dzaṛayē grtserin » , inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Yagopĕ siretsʾi , isg Esawĕ atetsʾi » .
45009014	Owremn inchʾ ĕsenkʾ : mitʾē Astowdzoy kʾov anirawowtʾiwn gay . Amenewin .
45009015	Orovhetew an Movsēsi g!ĕsē : « Anor or biti oghormim , g!oghormim , ew anor vray or biti ktʾam , gĕ ktʾam » .
45009016	Owremn ochʾ martown owzelēn , ochʾ al vazelēn , , gakheal ē , haba Astowdzmē , or g!oghormi .
45009017	Kʾani or Kirkʾĕ g!ĕsē Pʾarawoni : « Partsratsʾowtsʾi kʾez , orbēszi im zōrowtʾiwns tsʾoytsʾ tam kʾow michotsʾovt , ew im anowns hṛchʾagowi ampoghch ergrin mēch » .
45009018	Owremn g!oghormi orown or owzē , ew gĕ khstatsʾnē zayn or owzē .
45009019	Hetewapar town biti ĕses indzi tʾē “ al inchʾow gĕ meghatrē , orovhetew ov grnay ĕnttimanal anor dzrakirin ” .
45009020	Paytsʾ town ov es , ov mart , or gĕ timatartses Astowdzoy . Mitʾē gertowadz ĕ grnay ĕsel zinkʾ gertoghin : « Inchʾow aysbēs shinetsʾir zis » .
45009021	Mitʾē prowtĕ irawasowtʾiwn chʾowni gawin vray , or noyn zankowadzēn shinē anōtʾ mĕ , batiwi hamar , isg owrish mĕ , anbatowowtʾean hamar .
45009022	Inchʾ grnankʾ ĕsel , etʾē Astowadz , owzelov tsʾoytsʾ tal ir pargowtʾiwnĕ ew kittsʾnel ir zōrowtʾiwnĕ , shat hamperatarowtʾeamp togatsʾ gorsowelow batrastowadz pargowtʾean anōtʾnerown ,
45009023	orbēszi kittsʾnē ir pʾaṛkʾin jokhowtʾiwnĕ , oghormowtʾiwn ktnogh anōtʾnerown , or nakhabēs batrastetsʾ pʾaṛkʾi hamar ,
45009024	aysinkʾn , mezi , or ganchʾetsʾ ochʾ miayn Hreanerēn , ayl naew hetʾanosnerēn ,
45009025	inchʾbēs Ovsēēi mēch al g!ĕsē : « Im zhoghovowrts chʾeghoghĕ , “ im zhoghovowrts ” biti gochʾem , ow sireli chʾeghoghĕ , “ sireli ” .
45009026	Ew ayn teghĕ , owr anontsʾ ĕsowadz ēr : “ Towkʾ im zhoghovowrts chʾēkʾ ” , hon anonkʾ biti gochʾowin “ abrogh Astowdzoy ortinerĕ ” .
45009027	Esayi al Israyēli masin g!aghaghagē : « Noynisg etʾē Israyēli ortinerown tʾiwĕ dzovow awazin chʾapʾ ĕllay , miayn mnatsʾort mĕ biti pʾrgowi .
45009028	Kʾani or an biti gatarē ir khōskʾĕ , gtrowg gerbov ew artarowtʾeamp : Tērĕ gtrowg gerbov biti irakordzē ir khōskʾĕ ergri vray » .
45009029	Ew inchʾbēs Esayi nakhabēs ĕsaw : « Etʾē zōrkʾerow Tērĕ zarm mĕ tʾoghowtsʾadz chʾĕllar mezi , menkʾ biti ĕllayinkʾ Sotomi bēs , ow biti nmanēinkʾ Komori » .
45009030	Owremn inchʾ ĕsenkʾ . Hetewealĕ , tʾē hetʾanosnerĕ , oronkʾ hetamowt chʾēin artarowtʾean , hasan artarowtʾean , ayn artarowtʾean , or hawatkʾēn ē :
45009031	isg Israyēl , or hetamowt ēr artarowtʾean ōrēnkʾin , chʾhasaw artarowtʾean ōrēnkʾin .
45009032	Inchʾow : orovhetew owzetsʾ artaranal ochʾ tʾē hawatkʾov , haba orbēs tʾē ōrēnkʾin kordzerov . Artarew anonkʾ kaytʾetsʾan saytʾakʾowmi kʾarin vray ,
45009033	inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Aha Sioni mēch gĕ tnem saytʾakʾowmi kʾar mĕ ow kaytʾagghowtʾean zhayṛ mĕ , ew ov or hawatay anor , amōtʾahar biti chʾĕllay » .
45010001	Eghpayrner , sirtis paghtsankʾn ē , naew Astowdzoy owghghadz aghersankʾs , Israyēli hamar , or anonkʾ pʾrgowin .
45010002	Orovhetew es anontsʾ hamar gĕ vgayem tʾē nakhantsakhntrowtʾiwn ownin Astowdzoy hantēb , paytsʾ ochʾ tʾē kitagtsʾowtʾeamp .
45010003	Kʾani or , ankitanalov Astowdzoy artarowtʾiwnĕ ew chanalov hastatel irentsʾ artarowtʾiwnĕ , anonkʾ chʾhbatagetsʾan Astowdzoy artarowtʾean .
45010004	Orovhetew Kʾristos ē ōrēnkʾin vakhjanĕ , amēn hawatatsʾeali artarowtʾean hamar .
45010005	Artarew Movsēs ōrēnkʾēn eghogh artarowtʾean masin gĕ krē : « Ayn martĕ or gĕ kordzatrē ayt panerĕ , biti abri anontsʾmov » .
45010006	Paytsʾ hawatkʾēn eghogh artarowtʾiwnĕ sa g!ĕsē : « Mi ĕser sirtit mēch : “ Ov biti partsranay erginkʾĕ ” , ( aysinkʾn , Kʾristosĕ var ichetsʾnelow , )
45010007	gam : “ Ov biti ichnē antowntĕ ” ( aysinkʾn , Kʾristosĕ meṛelnerēn ver hanelow ) » .
45010008	Haba inchʾ g!ĕsē an : « KHōskʾĕ mōt ē kʾezi , peranit ew sirtit mēch ē » : aysinkʾn hawatkʾin khōskʾĕ , or menkʾ gĕ kʾarozenkʾ .
45010009	Orovhetew etʾē peranovt Tēr tawanis Yisowsĕ , ow sirtit mēch hawatas tʾē Astowadz meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanetsʾ zayn , biti pʾrgowis :
45010010	( orovhetew sirtov gĕ hawatay mēgĕ , artaranalow hamar , ow peranov gĕ tawani , pʾrgowelow hamar . )
45010011	Kʾani or Kirkʾĕ g!ĕsē : « Ov or anor hawatay , amōtʾahar biti chʾĕllay » .
45010012	Artarew khtrowtʾiwn chʾgay Hreayin ow Yoynin michew , orovhetew polorin vray eghogh noyn Tērĕ jokhowtʾeamp gĕ hasni polor anontsʾ , or zinkʾ gĕ ganchʾen .
45010013	Kʾani or “ ov or Tēroch anownĕ ganchʾē , biti pʾrgowi ” .
45010014	Owremn inchʾbēs biti ganchʾen zayn , orown hawatatsʾadz chʾen : gam inchʾbēs biti hawatan anor , orown masin lsadz chʾen : gam inchʾbēs biti lsen , aṛantsʾ kʾarozichʾi .
45010015	Gam inchʾbēs biti kʾarozen , etʾē chʾghrgowin , inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Inchʾ keghetsʾig en otkʾerĕ anontsʾ , oronkʾ khaghaghowtʾiwn g!aweten , pari paner g!aweten » .
45010016	Paytsʾ polorĕ chʾhnazantetsʾan awetaranin , kʾani or Esayi g!ĕsē : « Tēr , ov hawatatsʾ mer towadz lowrin » .
45010017	Owremn hawatkʾĕ gow kay lselēn , ow lselĕ , Astowdzoy khōskʾēn .
45010018	Paytsʾ g!ĕsem : « Mitʾē chʾlsetsʾin . Angasgadz : “ Anontsʾ hnchʾiwnĕ knatsʾ ampoghch ergirĕ , ew anontsʾ khōskʾĕ , minchʾew ergrakowntin dzayrerĕ ” » .
45010019	Paytsʾ g!ĕsem : « Mitʾē Israyēl chʾkittsʾaw » . Nakh Movsēs g!ĕsē : « Es biti krkṛem tser nakhantsĕ anbitan azkov , , mĕ , biti pargatsʾnem tsez ankhelkʾ azkov mĕ » .
45010020	Paytsʾ Esayi shat yantowkn ē , ow g!ĕsē : « Es ktnowetsʾay anontsʾmē , oronkʾ chʾēin pʾntṛer zis , yaytnowetsʾay anontsʾ , oronkʾ chʾēin hartsʾner im masis » .
45010021	Sagayn Israyēli hamar g!ĕsē : « Ampoghch ōrĕ ergaretsʾi im tseṛkʾers , chʾansatsʾogh ew hagajaṛogh zhoghovowrti mĕ » .
45011001	Owremn g!ĕsem : « Mitʾē Astowadz vanetsʾ ir zhoghovowrtĕ » . Amenewin : orovhetew es al Israyelatsʾi em , Aprahami zarmēn , Peniamini tohmēn .
45011002	Astowadz chʾvanetsʾ ir zhoghovowrtĕ , or nakhabēs janchʾtsʾadz ēr . Mitʾē chʾēkʾ kiter tʾē Kirkʾĕ inchʾ g!ĕsē Eghiayi masin , tʾē inchʾbēs an gĕ kankatēr Astowdzoy , Israyēli tēm , ĕselov :
45011003	« Tēr , kʾow markarēnert sbannetsʾin ow kʾow zohaseghannert pʾltsʾowtsʾin : es minag mnatsʾadz em , ew im antss al gĕ pʾntṛen » .
45011004	Paytsʾ inchʾ g!ĕsē anor Astowdzoy batkamĕ : « Indzi bahetsʾi eōtʾĕ hazar mart , oronkʾ Pahaghi chʾdznratretsʾin » .
45011005	Noynbēs al ays nergay atenĕ mnatsʾort mĕ gay , shnorhkʾi ĕntrowtʾean hamatsayn .
45011006	Ew etʾē shnorhkʾov ē , owremn al kordzerēn chʾē : aylabēs , shnorhkʾĕ al shnorhkʾ chʾ!ĕllar . Isg etʾē kordzerēn ē , al shnorhkʾ chʾē : aylabēs , kordzĕ al kordz chʾ!ĕllar . , ,
45011007	Owremn inchʾ : Israyēl chʾhasaw ayn panin , or gĕ pʾntṛēr : sagayn ĕntrowadznerĕ hasan anor , isg miwsnerĕ gowrtsʾan
45011008	( inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Astowadz anontsʾ towaw tʾmrowtʾean oki : achʾkʾer , or chʾtesnen , ew aganchner , or chʾlsen » : ) minchʾew aysōr .
45011009	Ow Tawitʾ g!ĕsē : « Anontsʾ seghanĕ varm , orokaytʾ , kaytʾagghowtʾiwn ew hatowtsʾowm tʾogh ĕllay irentsʾ .
45011010	Anontsʾ achʾkʾerĕ tʾogh khawarin , orbēszi chʾtesnen , ew anontsʾ gṛnagĕ amēn aten var dzṛē » .
45011011	Owremn g!ĕsem : « Mitʾē anonkʾ saytʾakʾetsʾan , orbēszi iynan » . Amenewin . Haba , pʾrgowtʾiwnĕ hasaw hetʾanosnerown anontsʾ angowmov , orbēszi krkṛē anontsʾ nakhantsĕ .
45011012	Owsti etʾē anontsʾ angowmĕ ashkharhi harstowtʾiwn eghaw , ew anontsʾ nowastatsʾowmĕ , hetʾanosnerown harstowtʾiwn , al orchʾapʾ aweli , anontsʾ liowtʾiwnĕ .
45011013	Paytsʾ tsezi , hetʾanosnerowt g!ĕsem : « Kʾani or hetʾanosnerown aṛakʾealn em , gĕ pʾaṛaworem im sbasargowtʾiwns ,
45011014	yowsalov pari nakhantsĕ krkṛel im marminēs eghoghnerown , ew pʾrgel anontsʾmē omankʾ » .
45011015	Orovhetew etʾē anontsʾ megowsatsʾowilĕ ashkharhi hashtowtʾiwn eghaw , haba inchʾ biti ĕllay anontsʾ verstin ĕntownowilĕ , etʾē ochʾ , geankʾ meṛelnerēn .
45011016	Owremn , etʾē erakhayrikʾĕ sowrp ē , noynn ē naew zankowadzĕ : ow etʾē armatĕ sowrp ē , owremn jiwghern al .
45011017	Etʾē ayt jiwgherēn omankʾ gtrowetsʾan , ow town , or vayri tsitʾeni ēir , batowastowetsʾar anontsʾ mēchtegh ew haghortagitsʾ eghar anontsʾ het tsitʾeniin armatin ow barartowtʾean ,
45011018	mi bardzenar jiwgherown tēm . Isg etʾē bardzenas , kittsʾir tʾē town chʾes or gĕ gres armatĕ , haba armatĕ , kʾez .
45011019	Owremn biti ĕses : « Jiwgherĕ gtrowetsʾan , orbēszi es batowastowim » .
45011020	Law : anonkʾ gtrowetsʾan anhawatowtʾean batjaṛov , ow town hastat mnatsʾadz es hawatkʾov . Medzamit mi ĕllar , haba vakhtsʾir :
45011021	orovhetew etʾē Astowadz chʾkhnayetsʾ pnagan jiwgherown , kowtsʾē chʾkhnayē naew kʾezi .
45011022	Owremn tes Astowdzoy kʾaghtsʾrowtʾiwnn ow khstowtʾiwnĕ : khstowtʾiwn , ingadznerown hantēb , isg parowtʾiwn , kʾezi hantēb , etʾē yaratewes anor kʾaghtsʾrowtʾean mēch : aylabēs , town al biti gtrowis .
45011023	Isg anonkʾ al biti batowastowin , etʾē chʾmnan irentsʾ anhawatowtʾean mēch , orovhetew Astowadz garogh ē tartseal batowastel zanonkʾ .
45011024	Kʾani or etʾē town gtrowetsʾar ayn tsitʾeniēn , or pnowtʾeamp vayri ēr , ew hagaṛag pnowtʾean , batowastowetsʾar law tsitʾenii mĕ vray , al orchʾapʾ aweli asonkʾ , or pnagan jiwghern en , biti batowastowin irentsʾ sepʾagan tsitʾeniin vray .
45011025	Orovhetew chʾem owzer , eghpayrner , or ankitanakʾ sa khorhowrtin , ( orbēszi towkʾ tsez imastown chʾsebēkʾ , ) tʾē masnagi gowrowtʾiwn batahetsʾaw Israyēli , minchʾew or ners mtnē hetʾanosnerown liowtʾiwnĕ .
45011026	Ew aysbēs , ampoghch Israyēlĕ biti pʾrgowi , inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Azatararĕ Sionēn biti kay , ow Yagopēn biti heṛatsʾnē amparshtowtʾiwnĕ .
45011027	Ew ays ē im owkhts anontsʾ het , erp kʾawem anontsʾ meghkʾerĕ » .
45011028	Awetaranin hamatsayn , anonkʾ tʾshnaminer en tser batjaṛov : paytsʾ ĕntrowtʾean hamatsayn , sireli en irentsʾ hayrerown batjaṛov ,
45011029	kʾani or Astowdzoy shnorhnern ow gochʾowmĕ antaṛnali en .
45011030	Orovhetew inchʾbēs zhamanagin towkʾ al chʾēikʾ hnazanter Astowdzoy , paytsʾ hima oghormowtʾiwn ktakʾ anontsʾ anhnazantowtʾeamp ,
45011031	noynbēs anonkʾ al hima chʾhnazantetsʾan , orbēszi anonkʾ al oghormowtʾiwn ktnen tser ktadz oghormowtʾeamp , , .
45011032	Orovhetew Astowadz nerpʾagetsʾ polorĕ anhnazantowtʾean mēch , orbēszi oghormi polorin .
45011033	« Ov Astowdzoy jokhowtʾean , imastowtʾean ow kitowtʾean khorowtʾiwnĕ : inchʾbēs ankʾnneli en ir tatastannerĕ , ew anznneli , ir jampanerĕ .
45011034	Orovhetew ov kittsʾaw Tēroch mitkʾĕ , gam ov anor khorhrtatow eghaw .
45011035	Gam ov nakhabēs anor towaw pan mĕ , or hatowtsʾanowi iren » .
45011036	Orovhetew angē , anov ew anorn en polor panerĕ , orown pʾaṛkʾ yawitean . Amēn .
45012001	Owremn g!aghachʾem tsezi , eghpayrner , Astowdzoy garegtsʾowtʾeamp , or tser marminnerĕ nergayatsʾnēkʾ orbēs abrogh zoh mĕ , sowrp , astowadzahajoy : ayt ē tser panagan bashtamownkʾĕ .
45012002	Ew mi hamagerbikʾ ays ashkharhin , haba pʾokhagerbowetsʾēkʾ tser mitkʾin norokowtʾeamp , orbēszi kʾnnēkʾ tʾē inchʾ ē Astowdzoy gamkʾĕ , or pari , hajeli ew gatareal ē .
45012003	Kʾani or indzi trowadz shnorhkʾov g!ĕsem tsezmē amēn mēgown , or ir masin aweli partsr hamarowm chʾownenay , kʾan inchʾ or bētkʾ ē mtadzē , haba khohemowtʾeamp mtadzē , hawatkʾi chʾapʾin hamemat , or Astowadz pashkhadz ē iwrakʾanchʾiwrin .
45012004	Orovhetew inchʾbēs mēg marmini mēch owninkʾ shat antamner , ew ayt polor antamnerĕ miewnoyn bashtōnĕ chʾownin ,
45012005	noynbēs menkʾ , shat ĕllalov , mēg marmin enkʾ Kʾristosov , ew iwrakʾanchʾiwrs , irarow antamner .
45012006	Owsti , ownenalov shnorhner , oronkʾ gĕ tarperin ayn shnorhkʾin hamemat , or mezi trowadz ē , etʾē markarēowtʾiwn ē , markarēanankʾ hawatkʾin hamematowtʾeamp ,
45012007	etʾē sbasargowtʾiwn , sbasargenkʾ : an or gĕ sorvetsʾnē , tʾogh yaratewē sorvetsʾnelov ,
45012008	an or gĕ yortorē , yortorelov : an or gĕ pashkhē , tʾogh yaratewē barzamtowtʾeamp , an or veragatsʾow ē , pʾowtʾachanowtʾeamp , an or g!oghormi , owrakhowtʾeamp .
45012009	Sērĕ tʾogh ĕllay aṛantsʾ geghdzikʾi : chʾarēn zzowetsʾēkʾ , pariin yaretsʾēkʾ .
45012010	Irarow hantēb korovalitsʾ eghēkʾ , eghpayragan sirov : batowelow mēch , zirar keratasetsʾēkʾ .
45012011	Pʾowtʾachanowtʾean mēch dzoyl mi ĕllakʾ : eṛantown hokiov Tēroch dzaṛayetsʾēkʾ .
45012012	Yoysov owrakhatsʾēkʾ : taṛabankʾi mēch hamperetsʾēkʾ : aghōtʾkʾi mēch yaratewetsʾēkʾ .
45012013	Sowrperow garikʾnerown haghortagitsʾ eghēkʾ : hiwrasirowtʾean hetamowt eghēkʾ .
45012014	TSez haladzoghnerĕ ōrhnetsʾēkʾ : ōrhnetsʾēkʾ ew mi anidzēkʾ .
45012015	Owrakhatsʾoghnerown het owrakhatsʾēkʾ , ow latsʾoghnerown het latsʾēkʾ .
45012016	Irarow hantēb miewnoyn mtadzowmĕ ownetsʾēkʾ . Partsr panerow vray mi mtadzēkʾ , haba khonarhetsʾēkʾ tēbi nowastnerĕ : towkʾ tsez imastown mi sebēkʾ .
45012017	CHʾarikʾi pʾokharēn chʾarikʾ mi hatowtsʾanetsʾēkʾ oewē mēgown : mtatretsʾēkʾ ĕnel inchʾ or bargesht ē polor martotsʾ aṛchew .
45012018	Orchʾapʾ gareli ē tsezi , khaghaghowtʾiwn bahetsʾēkʾ amēn martow het .
45012019	Sireliner , vrē zhkhntir mi ĕllakʾ towkʾ tsezi hamar , haba tegh towēkʾ Astowdzoy pargowtʾean : orovhetew krowadz ē : « Vrē zhkhntrowtʾiwnĕ ims ē , es biti hatowtsʾanem , - g!ĕsē Tērĕ » .
45012020	Owremn « etʾē kʾow tʾshnamit anōtʾetsʾadz ē , snowtsʾanē zayn , ow etʾē dzarawtsʾadz ē , khmtsʾowr anor : kʾani or aysbēs ĕnelov , gragi gaydzer biti gowtages anor klowkhin vray » .
45012021	CHʾarēn mi yaghtʾowir , haba pariov yaghtʾē chʾarin .
45013001	Amēn ants tʾogh hbatagi ir vray eghadz ishkhanowtʾiwnnerown : orovhetew chʾgay ishkhanowtʾiwn mĕ , or Astowdzmē chʾĕllay , ew anonkʾ or gan , garkowadz en Astowdzmē .
45013002	Hetewapar ov or g!ĕnttimanay ishkhanowtʾean , gĕ timatrē Astowdzoy garkatrowtʾean : ew anonkʾ or gĕ timatren , irenkʾ zirenkʾ gĕ tatabarten , , .
45013003	Kʾani or ishkhannerĕ , pari kordzerow hamar vakh chʾen azter , haba , chʾar kordzerow . Owsti g!owzes chʾvakhnal ishkhanowtʾenēn : parin kordzē , ew kovest biti ĕntownis angē .
45013004	Orovhetew an Astowdzoy sbasargown ē kʾezi hamar , or parin kordzes : paytsʾ etʾē chʾarĕ kordzes , vakhtsʾir , kʾani or zowr teghĕ chʾē or sowr gĕ grē mēchkʾĕ : orovhetew Astowdzoy sbasargown ē , ew vrē zhkhntir , pargowtʾiwn hastsʾnelow anor vray , or chʾarikʾ gĕ kordzē .
45013005	Owsti harg ē hbatagil : ochʾ miayn pargowtʾean hamar , ayl naew khghjmtankʾi hamar .
45013006	Ays batjaṛov ē or towrkʾ al gĕ vjarēkʾ : orovhetew Astowdzoy bashtōneanern en , pown ays panin yatgatsʾowadz .
45013007	Owremn hatowtsʾanetsʾēkʾ polorin inchʾ or gĕ bartikʾ : orown or towrkʾ trowelow ē , towrkʾĕ , orown or makʾs , makʾsĕ , orown or vakh , vakhĕ , orown or batiw , batiwĕ .
45013008	Ochʾ mēg bartkʾ ownetsʾēkʾ oewē mēgown , patsʾi zirar sirelē : orovhetew ov or gĕ sirē ĕngerĕ , kordzatradz g!ĕllay ōrēnkʾĕ .
45013009	Artarew ayn ĕsowadzĕ : « SHnowtʾiwn mi ĕner , sbanowtʾiwn mi ĕner , koghowtʾiwn mi ĕner , sowt vgayowtʾiwn mi tar , mi tsʾangar » , ew etʾē gay owrish orewē batowiran , hamaṛōtapar gĕ povantagowi sa khōskʾin mēch : « Sirē ĕngert kʾow antsit , , bēs » .
45013010	Sērĕ ochʾ mēg chʾarikʾ gĕ kordzē ir ĕngerin : owremn sērn ē ōrēnkʾin kordzatrowtʾiwnĕ .
45013011	Naew kitnankʾ atenĕ , tʾē artēn zhamn ē kʾownēn artʾnnalow , orovhetew hima mer pʾrgowtʾiwnĕ aweli mōt ē , kʾan erp hawatatsʾinkʾ .
45013012	Kisherĕ shat yaṛachatsʾadz ē , ow tsʾeregĕ , mōtetsʾadz : owremn tʾōtʾapʾenkʾ khawarin kordzerĕ , ow hakninkʾ loysin zrahĕ .
45013013	Vayelchʾowtʾeamp ĕntʾanankʾ , inchʾbēs tsʾereg aten , ochʾ tʾē zekhowtʾeamp ow arpetsʾowtʾeamp , ochʾ tʾē khaṛnag angoghinov ew tsʾopʾowtʾeamp , ochʾ tʾē gṛiwov ow nakhantsov :
45013014	haba hakēkʾ Tēr Yisows Kʾristosĕ , ew mi mtatrēkʾ marminin tsʾangowtʾiwnnerĕ kohatsʾnel .
45014001	Ĕntownetsʾēkʾ hawatkʾi mēch tgar eghoghĕ , aṛantsʾ kʾnnatatelow gardzikʾnerĕ :
45014002	kʾani or mēgĕ gĕ hawatay tʾē amēn pan grnay owtel , isg owrish mĕ , or tgar ē , panchareghēn g!owtē .
45014003	An or g!owtē , tʾogh chʾanarkē chʾowtoghĕ , ew an or chʾ!owter , tʾogh chʾtatē owtoghĕ , orovhetew Astowadz ĕntownadz ē zayn .
45014004	Town ov es , or gĕ tates owrishin dzaṛan : hastatown genay gam iynay , ir isgagan Tēroch hamar ē . Paytsʾ gankown biti bahowi , orovhetew Astowadz garogh ē gankown bahel zayn .
45014005	Mēgĕ gĕ ngatē ōr mĕ owrishē mĕ keratas , miwsn al gĕ ngatē polor ōrerĕ hawasar : iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ lman hamozowadz tʾogh ĕllay ir mitkʾin mēch .
45014006	An or hamarowm gĕndzayē mēg ōrowan , Tēroch hamar hamarowm gĕndzayē , isg an or hamarowm chʾ!ĕndzayer mēg ōrowan , Tēroch hamar hamarowm chʾ!ĕndzayer . An or g!owtē , Tēroch hamar g!owtē , kʾani or Astowdzmē shnorhagal g!ĕllay : isg an or chʾ!owter , Tēroch hamar chʾ!owter , paytsʾ Astowdzmē shnorhagal g!ĕllay .
45014007	Artarew mezmē ochʾ mēgĕ inkʾniren hamar g!abri , gam inkʾniren hamar gĕ meṛni :
45014008	kʾani or etʾē abrinkʾ , Tēroch hamar g!abrinkʾ , ow etʾē meṛninkʾ , Tēroch hamar gĕ meṛninkʾ . Owremn tʾē abrinkʾ ew tʾē meṛninkʾ , menkʾ Tērochn enkʾ .
45014009	Orovhetew Kʾristos sa nbatagov meṛaw ow verabretsʾaw , orbēszi Tēr ĕllay tʾē meṛelnerown ew tʾē oghcherown .
45014010	Isg town inchʾow gĕ tates eghpayrt , gam inchʾow g!anarkes eghpayrt , kʾani polors al biti nergayanankʾ Kʾristosi tataranĕ .
45014011	Artarew krowadz ē : « Es g!abrim , - g!ĕsē Tērĕ : - amēn dzowng biti gkʾi im aṛchews , ew amēn lezow biti tawani zis ipr Astowadz » .
45014012	Owremn mezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ hashiw biti tay Astowdzoy , inkʾniren hamar .
45014013	Owsti al chʾtatenkʾ zirar : ayl manawant sa vjṛetsʾēkʾ , or ochʾ mēgĕ saytʾakʾowm gam kaytʾagghowtʾiwn tnē ir eghpōr aṛchew .
45014014	Kitem , ow hamozowadz em Tēr Yisowsov , tʾē ochʾinchʾ inkʾnirmē bighdz ē : paytsʾ ov or bighdz gĕ sebē orewē pan , anor hamar bighdz ē atiga .
45014015	Sagayn etʾē eghpayrt trtmi geragowri hamar , al sirov chʾes ĕntʾanar : kʾow geragowrovt mi gorsntsʾner an , orown hamar Kʾristos meṛaw .
45014016	Owremn hayhoyowtʾiwn tʾogh chʾĕllay tser pariin hamar ,
45014017	kʾani or Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ geragowr ow khmelikʾ chʾē , haba artarowtʾiwn , khaghaghowtʾiwn ew owrakhowtʾiwn , Sowrp Hokiov .
45014018	Artarew ov or ays gerbov Kʾristosi gĕ dzaṛayē , Astowdzoy hajeli ow martotsʾmē knahatowadz ē .
45014019	Owremn hetamowt ĕllankʾ ayn panerown , oronkʾ khaghaghowtʾiwn gĕ haytʾaytʾen , ew ayn panerown , orontsʾmov shinowtʾiwn g!ĕllay irarow .
45014020	Mi kʾantēkʾ Astowdzoy kordzĕ geragowri hamar . Artarew polor panerĕ makʾowr en : sagayn kēsh en ayn martown hamar , or g!owtē kaytʾagghetsʾnelov .
45014021	Law ē ochʾ mis owtel , ochʾ kini khmel , ochʾ al orewē pan ĕnel , orov eghpayrt gĕ saytʾakʾi , gĕ kaytʾagghi gam gĕ tgaranay .
45014022	Town hawatkʾ ownis : kʾezi verabahē zayn , Astowdzoy aṛchew : erani anor , or chʾi tatabarter inkʾzinkʾ anov , or inkʾ gĕ knahatē , , .
45014023	Paytsʾ an or gĕ tatamsi , etʾē owtē , gĕ tatabartowi , kʾani or hawatkʾov chʾē or g!owtē : artarew amēn inchʾ or hawatkʾov chʾē , meghkʾ ē .
45015001	Owsti menkʾ , or zōrawor enkʾ , bartawor enkʾ grel tgarnerown tgarowtʾiwnĕ , ew ochʾ tʾē hajetsʾnel menkʾ mez .
45015002	Mezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ tʾogh hajetsʾnē ir ĕngerĕ , shinowtʾean hamar , anor parikʾin hamar .
45015003	Kʾani or Kʾristos al chʾhajetsʾowtsʾ inkʾzinkʾ , haba , inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Kʾez anarkoghnerown nakhatinkʾnerĕ ingan im vras » .
45015004	Orovhetew nakhabēs krowadz amēn inchʾ , krowetsʾaw or menkʾ sorvinkʾ , orbēszi yoys ownenankʾ , hamperowtʾeamp ow Kirkʾerown mkhitʾarowtʾeamp .
45015005	Owremn hamperowtʾean ow mkhitʾarowtʾean Astowadzĕ tʾogh shnorhē tsezi hamakhoh ĕllal irarow het , Kʾristos Yisowsi hamatsayn ,
45015006	orbēszi miapan ow miaperan pʾaṛapanēkʾ Astowadz , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi Hayrĕ .
45015007	Owsti ĕntownetsʾēkʾ zirar , inchʾbēs Kʾristos al ĕntownetsʾ mez , Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾin hamar .
45015008	Artarew g!ĕsem tʾē Yisows Kʾristos sbasargow eghaw tʾlpʾatowtʾean , Astowdzoy jshmartowtʾean hamar , orbēszi hastatē nakhahayrerown trowadz khostowmnerĕ
45015009	ew hetʾanosnerĕ Astowadz pʾaṛapanen , ir oghormowtʾean hamar , inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Asor hamar biti nerpoghem kʾez hetʾanosnerown mēch , ew saghmos biti erkem kʾow anownit » .
45015010	Tartseal g!ĕsē : « Hetʾanosner , owrakhatsʾēkʾ anor zhoghovowrtin het » .
45015011	Ew tartseal : « Kovapanetsʾēkʾ Tērĕ , polor hetʾanosner , ow kovetsʾēkʾ zayn , polor zhoghovowrtner » .
45015012	Tartseal Esayi g!ĕsē : « Yessēi mēg armatĕ biti ĕllay , ew ganknelov , hetʾanosnerown vray biti ishkhē : anor biti yowsan hetʾanosnerĕ » .
45015013	Owremn yoysi Astowadzĕ tʾogh letsʾnē tsez amēn owrakhowtʾeamp ow khaghaghowtʾeamp , tser hawatkʾin hamemat , orbēszi tser yoysĕ aṛatanay Sowrp Hokiin zōrowtʾeamp .
45015014	Es inkʾs al hamozowadz em tser masin , im eghpayrners , tʾē towkʾ al li ēkʾ parowtʾeamp , amēn kitowtʾeamp letsʾowadz , ew grnakʾ zirar khratel .
45015015	Sagayn , eghpayrner , gerbov mĕ aweli yantknowtʾeamp kretsʾi tsezi , ipr tʾē yishetsʾnelov tsezi , Astowdzmē indzi trowadz shnorhkʾin batjaṛov ,
45015016	or Yisows Kʾristosi bashtōnean ĕllam hetʾanosnerown mēch , Astowdzoy awetaranin kʾahanayowtʾiwnĕ gatarelov , orbēszi hetʾanosnerĕ ĕllan ĕntowneli ĕndzay , Sowrp Hokiov srpatsʾadz .
45015017	Owremn Kʾristos Yisowsi michotsʾov batjaṛ ownim bardzenalow Astowdzoy veraperogh panerown mēch .
45015018	Paytsʾ chʾem yantknir khōsil ayn panerēn orewē mēgown masin , or Kʾristos intsmov kordzatradz chʾē hetʾanosnerĕ hnazantetsʾnelow hamar , khōskʾov ow kordzov ,
45015019	zōrawor nshannerov ow skʾanchʾelikʾnerov , Astowdzoy Hokiin zōrowtʾeamp : aynbēs or , sgselov Erowsaghēmēn ew anor shrchagaykʾēn , minchʾew Illiwrigowm , liovin kʾarozetsʾi Kʾristosi awetaranĕ .
45015020	Aysbēs , batiw hamaretsʾi awetaranel hon , owr Kʾristos kʾarozowadz chʾēr , orbēszi owrishi mĕ tradz himin vray chʾgaṛowtsʾanem , haba , inchʾbēs krowadz ē :
45015021	« Anonkʾ , orontsʾ chʾēr batmowadz anor masin , biti tesnen , ew anonkʾ or chʾēin lsadz , biti hasgnan » .
45015022	Ator hamar al shat ankam arkilowetsʾay tsezi kalē .
45015023	Isg hima , ays goghmerĕ aylews kʾarozelow tegh chʾownenalov , ow shat tarinerē i ver tenchʾalov tsezi kal ,
45015024	erp tēbi Sbania jamportem , gĕ yowsam jamportowtʾeans ĕntʾatsʾkʾin tsezi hantibil , ow tsezmē owghargowadz hon ertʾal , anshowsht nakh tsezmov masamp yakenalē etkʾ .
45015025	Isg hima Erowsaghēm g!ertʾam , sowrperown sbasargelow .
45015026	Orovhetew Magetonatsʾinern ow Akʾayiatsʾinerĕ parehajetsʾan haghortagitsʾ ĕllal Erowsaghēm eghogh aghkʾat sowrperow garikʾnerown .
45015027	Isgabēs parehajetsʾan , ew anontsʾ bartagan al en . Orovhetew etʾē hetʾanosnerĕ haghortagtsʾetsʾan anontsʾ hokewor panerown , bartawor en naew ōknel anontsʾ , marmnawor panerown mēch .
45015028	Owremn erp gatarem asiga ew gnkʾem anontsʾ ays btowghĕ , Sbania biti ertʾam tser kʾovēn antsʾnelov .
45015029	Ew kitem tʾē erp kam tsezi , biti kam Kʾristosi awetaranin ōrhnowtʾean liowtʾeamp .
45015030	G!aghachʾem tsezi , eghpayrner , mer Tērochmov , Yisows Kʾristosov ow Hokiin sirov , or baykʾarikʾ indzi het tser aghōtʾkʾnerown mēch , oronkʾ Astowdzoy owghghowadz en indzi hamar ,
45015031	orbēszi azatim Hrēastani anhnazantnerēn , ew sowrperēn ĕntownowi Erowsaghēmi mēch ĕnelikʾ im sbasargowtʾiwns ,
45015032	ow es owrakhowtʾeamp kam tsezi Astowdzoy gamkʾov , ew hankstanam tsezi het .
45015033	KHaghaghowtʾean Astowadzĕ tser polorin het . Amēn .
45016001	TSezi gĕ yantsnararem mer Pʾipē kʾoyrĕ , or Genkʾreayi egeghetsʾiin sargawakowhin ē :
45016002	orbēszi ĕntownikʾ zinkʾ Tērochmov , inchʾbēs ar zhanavayel ē sowrperown , ew ōknēkʾ anor , inchʾ pani mēch or bētkʾ ownenay tsezi : kʾani or inkʾ shaterow hokatar eghaw , naew indzi .
45016003	Parewetsʾēkʾ Brisgēn ew Agiwghasĕ , Kʾristos Yisowsov im kordzagitsʾners ,
45016004	( oronkʾ vtanki mēch trin irentsʾ vizerĕ , im antsis hamar : orontsʾmē ochʾ miayn es shnorhagal em , haba naew hetʾanosnerown polor egeghetsʾinerĕ , )
45016005	nmanabēs egeghetsʾin , or anontsʾ tan mēch ē . Parewetsʾēkʾ Ebenetosĕ , im sirelis , or Akʾayiayi erakhayrikʾn ē Kʾristosi hamar .
45016006	Parewetsʾēkʾ Mariamĕ , or shat ashkhatetsʾaw mezi hamar .
45016007	Parewetsʾēkʾ Antronigosn ow Yownian , im azkaganners ow kerowtʾean ĕngerners , oronkʾ ereweli en aṛakʾealnerown mēch ew Kʾristosi batganetsʾan intsmē al aṛach .
45016008	Parewetsʾēkʾ Ambghian , im sirelis Tērochmov .
45016009	Parewetsʾēkʾ Owrpanosĕ , mer kordzagitsʾĕ Kʾristosov , ew Stakʾēsĕ , im sirelis .
45016010	Parewetsʾēkʾ Abeghesĕ , or knahatowadz ē Kʾristosov .
45016011	Parewetsʾēkʾ anonkʾ , or Aristapowghosi townēn en . Parewetsʾēkʾ Herovtionĕ , im azkagans . Parewetsʾēkʾ Nargēsi townēn eghoghnerĕ , oronkʾ Tērochn en .
45016012	Parewetsʾēkʾ Tripʾonĕ ew Tripʾosĕ , oronkʾ g!ashkhatin Tērochmov . Parewetsʾēkʾ sireli Bersitēn , or shat ashkhatetsʾaw Tērochmov .
45016013	Parewetsʾēkʾ Ṛowpʾosĕ , Tērochmov ĕntrealĕ , ew anor mayrĕ , or ims al ē .
45016014	Parewetsʾēkʾ Asingritosĕ , Pʾghekonĕ , Hermasĕ , Batropan , Hermēsn ow anontsʾ het eghogh eghpayrnerĕ .
45016015	Parewetsʾēkʾ Pʾighoghokosĕ ew Yowlian , Nerēosn ow anor kʾoyrĕ , Oghimbasĕ ew anontsʾ het eghogh polor sowrperĕ .
45016016	Parewetsʾēkʾ zirar sowrp hampoyrov . Kʾristosi ( polor ) egeghetsʾinerĕ gĕ parewen tsez .
45016017	G!aghachʾem tsezi , eghpayrner , owshatir eghēkʾ anontsʾ , or gĕ koyatsʾnen pa zhanowmner ew kaytʾagghowtʾiwnner , hagaṛag tser sorvadz owsowtsʾowmin , ow heṛatsʾēkʾ anontsʾmē .
45016018	Orovhetew aytbisinerĕ gĕ dzaṛayen ochʾ tʾē mer Tēroch , Kʾristosi , haba irentsʾ orovaynin , ew anmeghnerown sirterĕ gĕ khapen pari khōskʾerov ow kovestnerov .
45016019	Kʾani or tser hnazantowtʾiwnĕ polorin dzanōtʾ ē , es al tsezi hamar owrakh em : paytsʾ naew g!owzem , or towkʾ imastown ĕllakʾ pariin hantēb , ew annenk , chʾarin .
45016020	Ew khaghaghowtʾean Astowadzĕ showtov biti chakhchakhē Satanan tser otkʾerown tag . Mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi shnorhkʾĕ tsezi het .
45016021	Timotʾēos , im kordzagitsʾs , ew GHowgios , Yason ow Sosibatros , im azkaganners , gĕ parewen tsez .
45016022	( Es al , Tertios , or kretsʾi ays namagĕ , gĕ parewem tsez Tērochmov . )
45016023	Kayios , im ew ampoghch egeghetsʾiin hiwrĕngalĕ , gĕ parewē tsez . Erastos , kʾaghakʾin kantsabetĕ , gĕ parewē tsez , naew Gowartos eghpayrĕ .
45016024	Mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi shnorhkʾĕ tser polorin het . Amēn .
45016025	Ew hima , anor , or garogh ē tsez amratsʾnel , im awetaranis ow Yisows Kʾristosi kʾarozowtʾean hamatsayn , ayn khorhowrtin yaytnowtʾean hamatsayn , or lṛowtʾean mēch mnatsʾadz ēr tarerow zhamanagnerēn i ver ,
45016026	paytsʾ hima patsʾayayt eghaw ow Markarēnerown kirkʾerov - yawitenagan Astowdzoy hramanin hamatsayn - polor hetʾanosnerown kittsʾowetsʾaw , hawatkʾi hnazantowtʾean hamar ,
45016027	miag imastown Astowdzoy , Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov pʾaṛkʾ yawitean . Amēn .
46001001	Bōghos , ganchʾowadz Astowdzoy gamkʾov , Yisows Kʾristosi aṛakʾeal ĕllalow , ow Sostʾenēs eghpayrĕ ,
46001002	Gorntʾosi mēch eghadz Astowdzoy egeghetsʾiin , anontsʾ , or Kʾristos Yisowsov srpatsʾadz en , ganchʾowadz , sowrper ĕllalow polor anontsʾ het , or amēn tegh gĕ ganchʾen mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi anownĕ , tʾē irentsʾ ew tʾē mer Tēroch :
46001003	shnorhkʾ ow khaghaghowtʾiwn tsezi Astowdzmē , mer Hōrmēn , ew Tēr Yisows Kʾristosē .
46001004	Amēn aten shnorhagal g!ĕllam im Astowdzmēs tsezi hamar , kʾani or Astowdzoy shnorhkʾĕ trowadz ē tsezi Kʾristos Yisowsov ,
46001005	ow towkʾ amēn pani mēch harstatsʾadz ēkʾ anov , amēn khōskʾov ew amēn kitowtʾeamp .
46001006	Aysbēs , Kʾristosi vgayowtʾiwnĕ hastatowetsʾaw tser mēch ,
46001007	orbēszi ochʾ mēg shnorh bagsi tsezi , minchʾ gĕ sbasēkʾ mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi yaytnowtʾean .
46001008	Inkʾ naew biti hastatē tsez minchʾew vakhjanĕ , or anmeghatreli ĕllakʾ mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi ōrĕ .
46001009	Hawatarim ē Astowadz , orow michotsʾov ganchʾowetsʾakʾ haghortagitsʾ ĕllalow ir Ortiin , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi .
46001010	G!aghachʾem tsezi , eghpayrner , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi anownov , or towkʾ polort ownenakʾ noyn khōskʾĕ , ow baṛagtowmner chʾĕllan tser mēch : haba hastatowadz ĕllakʾ noyn mitkʾov ow noyn tatowmov .
46001011	Orovhetew , eghpayrners , tser masin patsʾayaytowetsʾaw indzi Kʾghowēi townēn eghoghnerēn , tʾē gṛiwner gan tser mēch .
46001012	Hima sa g!ĕsem tsezi : ipr tʾē tsezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ g!ĕsē : « Es Bōghosean em » , gam : « Es Aboghosean em » , gam : « Es Gepʾasean em » , gam : « Es Kʾristosean em » .
46001013	Mitʾē Kʾristos pa zhnowadz ē : mitʾē Bōghos khachʾowetsʾaw tsezi hamar , gam tʾē Bōghosi anownov mgrtowetsʾakʾ .
46001014	SHnorhagal g!ĕllam Astowdzmē , or tsezmē ochʾ mēgĕ mgrtetsʾi , paytsʾ miayn Grisbosĕ ew Kayiosĕ : orbēszi ochʾ mēgĕ ĕsē
46001015	tʾē es mgrtadz em im anownovs .
46001016	Stepʾanasi ĕntanikʾn al mgrtetsʾi . CHʾem kiter amenewin , tʾē al owrish mēgĕ mgrtetsʾi .
46001017	Orovhetew Kʾristos ghrgetsʾ zis ochʾ tʾē mgrtelow , haba awetaranelow : paytsʾ ochʾ khōskʾerow imastowtʾeamp , orbēszi Kʾristosi khachʾĕ ĕntownayn chʾĕllay .
46001018	Artarew khachʾin kʾarozowtʾiwnĕ yimarowtʾiwn ē anontsʾ hamar , or gĕ gorsowin , isg mezi hamar , or pʾrgowadz enkʾ , Astowdzoy zōrowtʾiwnn ē .
46001019	Orovhetew krowadz ē : « Imastownnerown imastowtʾiwnĕ biti gorsntsʾnem , ow khelatsʾinerown khelkʾĕ biti chnchem » .
46001020	Owr ē imastownĕ , owr ē tbirĕ , owr ē ays ashkharhi vijapanoghĕ : mitʾē Astowadz chʾyimaratsʾowtsʾ ays ashkharhi imastowtʾiwnĕ .
46001021	Artarew , kʾani ashkharhĕ ir imastowtʾeamp chʾjanchʾtsʾaw Astowadz , anor imastowtʾean mēch , Astowadz parehajetsʾaw kʾarozowtʾean yimarowtʾeamp pʾrgel anonkʾ , or gĕ hawatan :
46001022	orovhetew Hreanerĕ nshan gĕ bahanchen , ew Yoynerĕ imastowtʾiwn gĕ pʾntṛen ,
46001023	isg menkʾ gĕ kʾarozenkʾ khachʾeal Kʾristosĕ , kaytʾagghowtʾiwn , Hreanerown , ow yimarowtʾiwn , Yoynerown :
46001024	paytsʾ anontsʾ or ganchʾowadz en , tʾē Hreanerown ew tʾē Yoynerown , Kʾristosĕ , Astowdzoy zōrowtʾiwnĕ ew Astowdzoy imastowtʾiwnĕ :
46001025	orovhetew Astowdzoy yimarowtʾiwnĕ martotsʾmē aweli imastown ē , ew Astowdzoy tgarowtʾiwnĕ martotsʾmē aweli ow zhegh ē .
46001026	Artarew towkʾ gĕ tesnēkʾ tser gochʾowmĕ , eghpayrner , tʾē inchʾbēs ochʾ tʾē shat imastownner , marmini hamemat , shat zōraworner , shat aznowaganner ganchʾowetsʾan ,
46001027	haba Astowadz ĕntretsʾ ashkharhi yimarnerĕ , orbēszi amōtʾahar ĕnē imastownnerĕ . Astowadz ĕntretsʾ ashkharhi tgarnerĕ , orbēszi amōtʾahar ĕnē hzōrnerĕ :
46001028	Astowadz ĕntretsʾ ashkharhi storinnerĕ , anarkowadznern ow pan mĕ chʾeghoghnerĕ , orbēszi ochʾnchʾatsʾnē pan mĕ eghoghnerĕ :
46001029	orbēszi ochʾ mēg marmin bardzenay Astowdzoy aṛchew .
46001030	Paytsʾ towkʾ Kʾristos Yisowsov angē ēkʾ , or Astowdzmē mezi hamar imastowtʾiwn , artarowtʾiwn , srpowtʾiwn ew azatakrowtʾiwn eghaw :
46001031	orbēszi , inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Ov or bardzenay , tʾogh bardzenay Tērochmov » .
46002001	Ow es , eghpayrner , erp egay tsezi , chʾegay khōskʾi gam imastowtʾean kerazantsʾowtʾeamp , hṛchʾagelow tsezi Astowdzoy vgayowtʾiwnĕ :
46002002	orovhetew oroshetsʾi owrish orewē pan chʾkitnal tser mēch , paytsʾ miayn Yisows Kʾristosĕ , ew zayn , khachʾowadz .
46002003	Es tsezi het eghay tgarowtʾeamp , ahov ow shat toghov :
46002004	ew im khōskʾs ow kʾarozowtʾiwns , ochʾ tʾē martgayin imastowtʾean hamozichʾ khōskʾerov ēin , haba , Hokiin ew zōrowtʾean abatsʾoytsʾov :
46002005	orbēszi tser hawatkʾĕ ĕllay ochʾ tʾē martotsʾ imastowtʾeamp , haba , Astowdzoy zōrowtʾeamp .
46002006	Sagayn gatarealnerown gĕ khōsinkʾ imastowtʾean masin : paytsʾ ochʾ ays ashkharhi , ochʾ al ays ashkharhi ochʾnchʾatsʾogh ishkhannerown imastowtʾean masin ,
46002007	haba , Astowdzoy khorhrtawor ew dzadzgowadz imastowtʾean masin gĕ khōsinkʾ , or Astowadz tarerēn aṛach sahmanetsʾ mer pʾaṛkʾin hamar .
46002008	Ays ashkharhi ishkhannerēn ochʾ mēgĕ janchʾtsʾaw zayn : kʾani or etʾē janchʾtsʾadz ĕllayin , chʾēin khachʾer pʾaṛkʾi Tērĕ .
46002009	Paytsʾ inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Achʾkʾ chʾē teser , aganch chʾē lser , ochʾ al martow sirtin mēch mter en ayn panerĕ , or Astowadz batrastadz ē zinkʾ siroghnerown » .
46002010	Sagayn Astowadz zanonkʾ yaytnadz ē mezi ir Hokiov , orovhetew Hokin gĕ znnē polor panerĕ , minchʾew ankam Astowdzoy khorowng panerĕ .
46002011	Artarew ov kitē martown panerĕ , paytsʾ miayn martown hokin , or ir mēchn ē : noynbēs al ochʾ mēgĕ kitē Astowdzoy panerĕ , ayl miayn Astowdzoy Hokin .
46002012	Isg menkʾ statsʾankʾ ochʾ tʾē ays ashkharhi hokin , haba ayn Hokin , or Astowdzmē ē : orbēszi menkʾ kitnankʾ ayn panerĕ , or Astowadz shnorhetsʾ mezi :
46002013	naew anontsʾ masin gĕ khōsinkʾ , ochʾ tʾē ayn khōskʾerov , or martgayin imastowtʾiwnĕ gĕ sorvetsʾnē , haba Hokiin sorvetsʾowtsʾadznerov , hamematelov hokewor panerĕ hokewori het .
46002014	Isg shnchʾawor martĕ chʾ!ĕntownir Astowdzoy Hokiin panerĕ , orovhetew anonkʾ iren hamar yimarowtʾiwn en , ochʾ al grnay hasgnal , kʾani or gĕ znnowin hokewor gerbov .
46002015	Paytsʾ an or hokewor ē , gĕ znnē amēn pan , sagayn inkʾ gĕ znnowi ochʾ mēgēn .
46002016	Orovhetew ov kittsʾaw Tēroch mitkʾĕ , or sorvetsʾnē anor : paytsʾ menkʾ owninkʾ Kʾristosi mitkʾĕ .
46003001	Paytsʾ es , eghpayrner , chʾgrtsʾay khōsil tsezi , orbēs hokewornerow , haba orbēs marmnawornerow , noynisg orbēs Kʾristosov erakhanerow .
46003002	TSez snowtsʾanetsʾi gatʾov , ochʾ tʾē geragowrov : orovhetew minchʾew hima chʾēikʾ grnar hantowr zhel , ew ochʾ isg nergayis grnakʾ , kʾani or tagawin marmnawor ēkʾ .
46003003	Artarew , kʾani tagawin nakhants , gṛiw ew pa zhanowmner gan tser mēch , mitʾē marmnawor chʾēkʾ ow martgōrēn chʾēkʾ ĕntʾanar .
46003004	Orovhetew erp tsezmē mēgĕ ĕsē : « Es Bōghosean em » , ew miwsĕ : « Es Aboghosean em » , mitʾē marmnawor chʾēkʾ .
46003005	Isg ov ē Bōghos , gam ov ē Aboghos : log sbasargowner , orontsʾmov towkʾ hawatatsʾikʾ , inchʾbēs Tērĕ towaw anontsʾmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrin .
46003006	Es tngetsʾi , Aboghos chretsʾ , paytsʾ Astowadz ajetsʾowtsʾ .
46003007	Owsti ochʾ tngoghĕ pan mĕn ē , ew ochʾ chroghĕ , haba Astowadz , or ajetsʾowtsʾ .
46003008	Owremn tngoghn ow chroghĕ mēg en , ew iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ biti stanay ir vartsatrowtʾiwnĕ , ir ashkhatankʾin hamemat :
46003009	orovhetew menkʾ Astowdzoy kordzagitsʾ enkʾ : towkʾ Astowdzoy mshagowtʾiwnn ēkʾ , Astowdzoy shinowadzkʾn ēkʾ .
46003010	Astowdzoy shnorhkʾin hamemat , or trowetsʾaw indzi , him tri imastown jartarabeti mĕ bēs , paytsʾ owrish mĕ gĕ shinē anor vray : sagayn iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ tʾogh zkowshanay tʾē inchʾbēs gĕ shinē anor vray .
46003011	Artarew ochʾ mēgĕ al owrish him grnay tnel , trowadzēn zat , or Yisows Kʾristosn ē .
46003012	Etʾē mēgĕ ays himin vray shinē osgiov , ardzatʾov , batowagan kʾarerov , pʾaytov , kharov , khozanov ,
46003013	iwrakʾanchʾiwrin kordzĕ patsʾayayt biti ĕllay : kʾani or ōrĕ biti patsʾayaytē , orovhetew gragov biti yaytnowi ew iwrakʾanchʾiwrin kordzin inchʾbēs ĕllalĕ gragĕ biti pʾortsargē .
46003014	Etʾē mēgown kordzĕ , or shinadz ē anor vray , mnay , inkʾ vartsatrowtʾiwn biti stanay :
46003015	etʾē mēgown kordzĕ ayri , biti gorsntsʾnē , isg inkʾ biti pʾrgowi , sagayn ipr tʾē gragi mēchēn .
46003016	CHʾēkʾ kiter tʾē towkʾ Astowdzoy tajarn ēkʾ , ew Astowdzoy Hokin gĕ pnagi tser mēch .
46003017	Etʾē mēgĕ abaganē Astowdzoy tajarĕ , Astowadz al biti kʾantē zinkʾ : orovhetew Astowdzoy tajarĕ sowrp ē , ew towkʾ ēkʾ ayt tajarĕ .
46003018	Ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh khapē inkʾzinkʾ . Etʾē tsezmē mēgĕ gĕ gardzē imastown ĕllal ays ashkharhi mēch , tʾogh yimar taṛnay , orbēszi imastown ĕllay .
46003019	Orovhetew ays ashkharhi imastowtʾiwnĕ , Astowdzoy kʾov yimarowtʾiwn ē : kʾani or krowadz ē : « An imastownnerĕ gĕ pṛnē irentsʾ khoramangowtʾean mēch » .
46003020	Ew tartseal : « Tērĕ kitē imastownnerown mtadzowmnerĕ , or pʾowj en » .
46003021	Hetewapar ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh bardzenay martotsʾmov :
46003022	orovhetew amēn pan tsern ē : tʾē Bōghos , tʾē Aboghos , tʾē Gepʾas , tʾē ashkharhĕ , tʾē geankʾĕ , tʾē mahĕ , tʾē nergay panerĕ ew tʾē kalikʾnerĕ . Amēn pan tsern ē :
46003023	towkʾ al Kʾristosinn ēkʾ , ow Kʾristos , Astowdzoy .
46004001	Martig tʾogh seben mez , orbēs Kʾristosi sbasawornern ow Astowdzoy khorhowrtnerown tntesnerĕ .
46004002	Isg tntesē mĕ gĕ bahanchowi or hawatarim ktnowi .
46004003	Paytsʾ indzi hamar chʾnchʾin pan ē or tatowim tsezmē , gam martotsʾ tatastanēn : noynisg es chʾem tater zis :
46004004	( orovhetew es ochʾinchʾov kitagitsʾ em im masis : paytsʾ ochʾ tʾē asov g!artaranam : ) haba zis tatoghĕ , Tērn ē .
46004005	Hetewapar atenēn aṛach mi tatēkʾ , minchʾew or Tērĕ kay : inkʾ biti lowsaworē khawarin kaghtnikʾĕ ow erewan biti hanē sirterown dzrakirnerĕ , ew ayn aten iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ kovest biti ownenay Astowdzmē .
46004006	Ays panerĕ , eghpayrner , ōrinagov mĕ girargetsʾi , , indzi ew Aboghosi , tsezi hamar , or towkʾ mezmov sorvikʾ krowadzēn aweli pan mĕ chʾmtadzel martotsʾ masin , orbēszi tsezmē ochʾ mēgĕ hbartanay mēgown hamar owrishi mĕ tēm .
46004007	Orovhetew ov ē an , or tarper g!ĕnē kʾez owrishnerēn , ew inchʾ ownis , or chʾes statsʾadz : ow etʾē statsʾar , inchʾow gĕ bardzenas , ipr tʾē statsʾadz chʾĕllas .
46004008	Artēn yaketsʾadz ēkʾ , artēn harowst ēkʾ , aṛantsʾ mezi tʾakaworetsʾikʾ : ow erani tʾē tʾakaworēikʾ , orbēszi menkʾ al tʾakaworēinkʾ tsezi het ,
46004009	kʾani or gĕ gardzem tʾē Astowadz yetinner ĕraw mez , aṛakʾealners , mahabartnerow bēs : orovhetew tesaran eghankʾ ashkharhin , hreshtagnerown ow martotsʾ .
46004010	Menkʾ yimarner enkʾ Kʾristosi hamar , isg towkʾ , imastownner Kʾristosov . Menkʾ , tgar , paytsʾ towkʾ , ow zhegh . Towkʾ , pʾaṛaworowadz , isg menkʾ , anbatowowadz .
46004011	Minchʾew ays zhamĕ tʾē g!anōtʾenankʾ , tʾē gĕ dzarawnankʾ , tʾē merg gĕ mnankʾ , tʾē gĕ gṛpʾaharowinkʾ , tʾē orosh pnagavayr chʾowninkʾ ,
46004012	tʾē al gĕ tkʾninkʾ , mer tseṛkʾerov kordzelov . Erp mez heknen , g!ōrhnenkʾ : erp haladzen , gĕ hantowr zhenkʾ :
46004013	erp hayhoyen , g!aghachʾenkʾ . Ashkharhi aghteghowtʾiwnĕ tartsankʾ , polorin aweltsʾowkʾĕ , minchʾew hima .
46004014	Ays panerĕ gĕ krem , ochʾ tʾē tsez amchʾtsʾnelow hamar , haba gĕ khratem tsez , sireli zawagnerows bēs .
46004015	Orovhetew , noynisg etʾē towkʾ tasĕ hazar var zhabetner ownenakʾ Kʾristosov , ochʾ tʾē shat hayrer ownikʾ : kʾani or Kʾristos Yisowsov es dznay tsez , awetaranin michotsʾov .
46004016	Owremn g!aghachʾem tsezi , nmanetsʾēkʾ indzi .
46004017	Asor hamar tsezi ghrgetsʾi Timotʾēosĕ , or sireli zawags ē , ow hawatarim ē Tērochmov : an biti veryishetsʾnē tsezi im jampaners , or Kʾristosi mēch en , inchʾbēs amēnowrekʾ polor egeghetsʾinerown mēch gĕ sorvetsʾnem .
46004018	Omankʾ hbartatsʾan , orbēs tʾē es biti chʾkam tsezi .
46004019	Paytsʾ showtov biti kam tsezi , etʾē Tērĕ gamenay , ew biti hasgnam ochʾ tʾē hbartatsʾoghnerown khōskʾerĕ , haba zōrowtʾiwnĕ .
46004020	Orovhetew Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ ochʾ tʾē khōskʾov ē , haba zōrowtʾeamp .
46004021	Inchʾbēs g!owzēkʾ : kawazanov kam tsezi , tʾē sirov ew hezowtʾean hokiov .
46005001	Aṛhasarag gĕ lsowi tʾē tser mēch boṛngowtʾiwn gay : ew aynbisi boṛngowtʾiwn , or hetʾanosnerown mēch isg chʾgay , orbēs tʾē mēgĕ ownenay ir hōr ginĕ .
46005002	Ow towkʾ hbartatsʾadz ēkʾ , pʾokhanag skalow , orbēszi tser mēchēn vertsʾowi an , or ays ararkʾĕ gataretsʾ .
46005003	Artarew es - tʾēbēt marminov patsʾagay em , paytsʾ hokiov , nergay - artēn isg tatetsʾi aysbisi ararkʾ kordzoghĕ , orbēs tʾē nergay ĕllalov .
46005004	Mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi anownov , erp hawakʾowikʾ , towkʾ ew im hokis , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi zōrowtʾeamp ,
46005005	matnetsʾēkʾ aytbisi mēgĕ Satanayin , marminin awerowmin hamar , orbēszi hokin pʾrgowi Tēr Yisowsi ōrĕ .
46005006	Ayt tser bardzankʾĕ law chʾē . CHʾēkʾ kiter tʾē kʾichʾ mĕ khmorĕ , gĕ khmorē ampoghch zankowadzĕ .
46005007	Owremn makʾrowetsʾēkʾ hin khmorēn , orbēszi ĕllakʾ nor zankowadz mĕ , kʾani or ankhmor ēkʾ . Orovhetew Kʾristos , mer zatigĕ , zohowetsʾaw mezi hamar :
46005008	hetewapar tōn gatarenkʾ , ochʾ tʾē hin khmorov , ochʾ al chʾaramtowtʾean ew chʾarowtʾean khmorov , haba angeghdzowtʾean ow jshmartowtʾean ankhmor hatsʾov .
46005009	Kretsʾi tsezi namagin mēch , or chʾyaraperikʾ boṛngoghnerown het .
46005010	Sagayn ochʾ anshowsht ays ashkharhi boṛngoghnerown , gam akahnerown , gam yapʾshtagoghnerown , gam gṛabashtnerown het : aylabēs , bartawor biti ĕllayikʾ ashkharhēn towrs ellel .
46005011	Isg hima kretsʾi tsezi or chʾyaraperikʾ , etʾē oewē mēgĕ , or eghpayr gĕ gochʾowi , , , ĕllay boṛngogh , gam akah , gam gṛabasht , gam heknogh , gam arpetsʾogh , gam yapʾshtagogh : aytbisi martow het mi owtēkʾ ankam .
46005012	Orovhetew inchʾ bētkʾ ownim tatelow towrsinnerĕ : mitʾē towkʾ chʾēkʾ tater nersinnerĕ :
46005013	isg Astowadz biti tatē towrsinnerĕ . Owsti vertsʾowtsʾēkʾ chʾarĕ tser mēchēn .
46006001	Etʾē tsezmē mēgĕ khntir mĕ ownenay owrishi mĕ het , mitʾē gĕ yantkni anartarnerown aṛchew tatowil , ew ochʾ tʾē sowrperown aṛchew .
46006002	CHʾēkʾ kiter tʾē sowrperĕ biti taten ashkharhĕ : ow etʾē ashkharhĕ gĕ tatowi tsezmē , towkʾ ar zhani chʾēkʾ tatelow chʾnchʾin khntirnerĕ .
46006003	CHʾēkʾ kiter tʾē menkʾ biti tatenkʾ hreshtagnerĕ : haba orchʾapʾ aweli ays geankʾin panerĕ .
46006004	Owremn etʾē tater ownikʾ , ays geankʾi panerown hamar , tatawor nshanagetsʾēkʾ egeghetsʾiin anarknerĕ .
46006005	TSez amchʾtsʾnelow hamar g!ĕsem : iraw imastown mĕ chʾgay tser mēch , ochʾ isg mēg hat , or garenay vjṛel ir eghpayrnerown michew .
46006006	Haba eghpayr , eghpōr het tat gĕ varē , ayn al , anhawatnerown aṛchew .
46006007	Owremn artēn dzanr yantsʾankʾ mĕ gay tser mēch , kʾani or irarow het tater ownikʾ : inchʾow pʾokharēnĕ towkʾ chʾēkʾ anirawowir : inchʾow pʾokharēnĕ towkʾ zrgankʾ chʾēkʾ grer .
46006008	Noynisg towkʾ g!anirawēkʾ ow gĕ zrgēkʾ , ayn al , eghpayrnerown :
46006009	chʾēkʾ kiter tʾē anirawnerĕ biti chʾ zhaṛanken Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ . Mi molorikʾ : ochʾ boṛngoghnerĕ , ochʾ gṛabashtnerĕ , ochʾ shnatsʾoghnerĕ ,
46006010	ochʾ ikatsʾealnerĕ , ochʾ arowakētnerĕ , ochʾ kogherĕ , ochʾ akahnerĕ , ochʾ arpetsʾoghnerĕ , ochʾ heknoghnerĕ , ochʾ al yapʾshtagoghnerĕ biti zhaṛanken Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ .
46006011	Ew tsezmē omankʾ aytbisiner ēin : paytsʾ lowatsʾowetsʾakʾ , paytsʾ srpatsʾakʾ , paytsʾ artaratsʾakʾ Tēr Yisowsi anownov ow mer Astowdzoyn Hokiov .
46006012	Amēn pan indzi artōnowadz ē , paytsʾ amēn pan ōktagar chʾē . Amēn pan indzi artōnowadz ē , paytsʾ es ochʾ mēgown ishkhanowtʾean tag biti ĕllam .
46006013	Geragowrnerĕ pʾorin hamar en , pʾorn al , geragowrnerown : paytsʾ Astowadz asiga al , anonkʾ al biti ochʾnchʾatsʾnē . Isg marminĕ boṛngowtʾean hamar chʾē , haba , Tēroch , ow Tērĕ , marminin hamar .
46006014	Ew Astowadz , or yarowtsʾanetsʾ Tērĕ , biti yarowtsʾanē naew mez , ir zōrowtʾeamp .
46006015	CHʾēkʾ kiter tʾē tser marminnerĕ Kʾristosi antamnern en . Owremn Kʾristosi antamnerĕ aṛnelov boṛnigi antamner ĕnem . Amenewin .
46006016	CHʾēkʾ kiter tʾē an or boṛnigi gĕ mianay , anor het mēg marmin g!ĕllay : kʾani or Kirkʾĕ g!ĕsē : « Ergowkʾĕ biti ĕllan mēg marmin » .
46006017	Isg an or Tēroch gĕ mianay , anor het mēg hoki g!ĕllay .
46006018	Pʾakhēkʾ boṛngowtʾenēn . Amēn meghkʾ , or mart gĕ kordzē , ir marminēn towrs ē : paytsʾ an or gĕ boṛngi , gĕ meghanchʾē ir marminin tēm .
46006019	CHʾēkʾ kiter tʾē tser marminĕ tajarn ē Sowrp Hokiin , or tser mēchn ē : zayn Astowdzmē statsʾakʾ , ew towkʾ tsezi chʾēkʾ batganir ,
46006020	kʾani or medz kinov mĕ knowetsʾakʾ : owsti pʾaṛaworetsʾēkʾ Astowadz tser marminin ow tser hokiin mēch , oronkʾ gĕ batganin Astowdzoy .
46007001	Owremn , inchʾ gĕ veraperi ayn panerown , orontsʾ masin kretsʾikʾ indzi , law ē martown hamar , or gnoch chʾmertsenay .
46007002	Paytsʾ boṛngowtʾenēn khowsapʾelow hamar , iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ tʾogh ownenay ir ginĕ , ew amēn gin tʾogh ownenay ir amowsinĕ .
46007003	Amowsinĕ tʾogh hatowtsʾanē gnoch inchʾ or gĕ barti , nmanabēs ginn al , ir amowsinin .
46007004	Ginĕ ishkhanowtʾiwn chʾowni ir marminin vray , haba , amowsinĕ : nmanabēs amowsinn al ishkhanowtʾiwn chʾowni ir marminin vray , haba , ginĕ .
46007005	Mi zrgēkʾ zirar , paytsʾ miayn hamatsaynowtʾeamp , ateni mĕ hamar , or towkʾ tsez aghōtʾkʾi yatgatsʾnēkʾ ow tartseal kakʾ irarow kʾov , orbēszi Satanan chʾpʾortsē tsez , tser an zhow zhgalowtʾean hamar .
46007006	Asiga g!ĕsem , artōnelov , ochʾ tʾē hramayelov .
46007007	Orovhetew g!owzēi or polor martig ĕllayin indzi bēs : paytsʾ iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ owni ir yatowg shnorhĕ Astowdzmē , mēgĕ , aysbēs , isg miwsĕ , aynbēs .
46007008	Owsti g!ĕsem amowrinerown ew ayrinerown : « Law g!ĕllay anontsʾ hamar , etʾē mnan indzi bēs » .
46007009	Paytsʾ etʾē zhow zhgalowtʾiwn chʾownin , tʾogh amowsnanan : orovhetew aweli law ē amowsnanal , kʾan porpokʾil .
46007010	Isg amowsnatsʾadznerown gĕ hramayem , ochʾ tʾē es , haba , Tērĕ : « Ginĕ tʾogh chʾzatowi ir amowsinēn ,
46007011	( isg etʾē zatowi al , tʾogh mnay anamowsin , gam hashtowi ir amowsinin het , ) ew amowsinĕ tʾogh chʾtskē ir ginĕ » .
46007012	Paytsʾ miwsnerown es g!ĕsem , ochʾ tʾē Tērĕ : « Etʾē eghpayr mĕ ownenay anhawat gin mĕ ew anor hajeli ĕllay pnagil iren het , tʾogh chʾtskē zayn .
46007013	Ew gin mĕ or owni anhawat amowsin mĕ , etʾē anor hajeli ĕllay pnagil iren het , tʾogh chʾtskē zayn » .
46007014	Orovhetew anhawat amowsinĕ srpatsʾadz ē gnochmov , ew anhawat ginĕ srpatsʾadz ē amowsinov . Aylabēs , tser zawagnerĕ anmakʾowr biti ĕllayin : paytsʾ hima sowrp en .
46007015	Isg etʾē anhawatĕ zatowi , tʾogh zatowi . Eghpayr mĕ gam kʾoyr mĕ strowg chʾē aytbisi barakanerow mēch : sagayn Astowadz ganchʾetsʾ mez khaghaghowtʾean .
46007016	Orovhetew town inchʾ kites , gin : tʾerews biti pʾrges amowsint . Gam town inchʾ kites , mart : tʾerews biti pʾrges gint .
46007017	Aylabēs , inchʾbēs Tērĕ pashkhetsʾ iwrakʾanchʾiwrin , inchʾbēs Astowadz ganchʾetsʾ iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ , aynbēs tʾogh ĕntʾanay . Es aysbēs gĕ batowirem polor egeghetsʾinerown mēch .
46007018	Etʾē tʾlpʾatowadz mēgĕ ganchʾowetsʾaw hawatkʾi , tʾogh antʾlpʾat chʾtaṛnay . Etʾē mēgĕ ganchʾowetsʾaw antʾlpʾatowtʾean mēch , tʾogh chʾtʾlpʾatowi .
46007019	Orovhetew tʾlpʾatowtʾiwnĕ pan mĕ chʾē , ew antʾlpʾatowtʾiwnn al pan mĕ chʾē , haba Astowdzoy batowirannerown bahbanowmn ē ēaganĕ .
46007020	Iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ inchʾ gochʾowmi mēch or ganchʾowetsʾaw , tʾogh mnay anor mēch .
46007021	Strowg ēir erp ganchʾowetsʾar : hok mi ĕner ayt masin : paytsʾ etʾē grnas azatakrowil , aṛawelabēs ōktowē aṛitʾēn .
46007022	Orovhetew ov or ganchʾowadz ē Tērochmov , strowg ĕllalov , Tēroch azatakrealn ē : nmanabēs ov or ganchʾowadz ē , azat ĕllalov , Kʾristosi strowgn ē .
46007023	Towkʾ knowetsʾakʾ medz kinov mĕ : mi ĕllakʾ martotsʾ strowg .
46007024	Eghpayrner , iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ inchʾ vijagi mēch or ganchʾowetsʾaw , tʾogh mnay anor mēch , Astowdzoy het .
46007025	Goyserown masin Tērochmēn hraman mĕ chʾownim : sagayn gĕ yaytnem im tatowms , ipr mēgĕ , or oghormowtʾiwn ktadz ē Tērochmēn , hawatarim ĕllalow .
46007026	Owremn es gĕ gardzem tʾē sa law ē nergay hargatrankʾin batjaṛov , aysinkʾn law ē martow mĕ , or mnay inchʾbēs or ē , , .
46007027	Gabowadz es gnoch : mi chanar artsagowil . Artsagowadz es gnochmē mĕ : mi pʾntṛer gin .
46007028	Isg etʾē amowsnanas , chʾes meghanchʾer : ow etʾē goysĕ amowsnanay , chʾi meghanchʾer . Paytsʾ aytbisinerĕ marmini mēch taṛabankʾ biti ownenan : isg es g!owzem khnayel tsezi .
46007029	Paytsʾ sa g!ĕsem , eghpayrner , tʾē zhamanagĕ garj ē . Al anonkʾ or gin ownin , aynbēs ĕllan , orbēs tʾē chʾownin :
46007030	anonkʾ or gow lan , orbēs tʾē chʾen lar : anonkʾ or g!owrakhanan , orbēs tʾē chʾen owrakhanar : anonkʾ or gĕ knen , orbēs tʾē ochʾ mēg pani tiratsʾadz en :
46007031	ew anonkʾ or ays ashkharhĕ g!ōktakordzen , orbēs tʾē chʾen chʾarashaher : orovhetew ays ashkharhi gerbarĕ g!antsʾni .
46007032	Paytsʾ es g!owzēi or towkʾ anhok ĕllakʾ : orovhetew amowrin gĕ hokay Tēroch panerĕ , tʾē inchʾbēs hajetsʾnē Tērĕ .
46007033	Isg amowsnatsʾadzĕ gĕ hokay ashkharhi panerĕ , tʾē inchʾbēs hajetsʾnē ir ginĕ .
46007034	Noynbēs tarperowtʾiwn gay amowsnatsʾadz gnoch ew goysin michew : chʾamowsnatsʾadz ginĕ gĕ hokay Tēroch panerĕ , orbēszi inkʾ sowrp ĕllay marminov ow hokiov : isg amowsnatsʾadz ginĕ gĕ hokay ashkharhi panerĕ , tʾē inchʾbēs hajetsʾnē ir amowsinĕ .
46007035	Asiga g!ĕsem tser ōkowtin hamar : ochʾ tʾē dzowghag tskelow tser vray , haba vayelchʾowtʾean hamar , orbēszi tser owshatrowtʾiwnĕ tartsnēkʾ Tēroch , aṛantsʾ mtatsʾir ĕllalow .
46007036	Isg etʾē mēgĕ gĕ gardzē tʾē anvayelchʾowtʾeamp gĕ veraperi ir goysin hantēb , etʾē antsʾni anor amowsnowtʾean tarikʾĕ , ew bartawor ē , tʾogh ĕnē inchʾ or g!owzē , chʾi meghanchʾer : tʾogh amowsnanan .
46007037	Sagayn an or hastat gĕ genay ir sirtin mēch ow hargatrankʾ chʾowni , haba g!ishkhē inkʾnir gamkʾin vray ew vjṛadz ē ir sirtin mēch , or bahē ir goysĕ , law g!ĕnē .
46007038	Owsti an or g!amowsnatsʾnē ir goysĕ , , , law g!ĕnē : isg an or chʾ!amowsnatsʾner , aweli law g!ĕnē .
46007039	Ginĕ gabowadz ē aynkʾan aten or ir amowsinĕ g!abri : paytsʾ etʾē ir amowsinĕ meṛni , azat ē amowsnanalow , orow het or owzē , miayn tʾē , Tērochmov .
46007040	Sagayn im tatowmovs , an aweli erchanig g!ĕllay etʾē mnay aytbēs : ew gĕ gardzem tʾē es al ownim Astowdzoy Hokin .
46008001	Ay zhm , inchʾ gĕ veraperi gowṛkʾerown zohowadz panerown , kitenkʾ tʾē polors al kitowtʾiwn owninkʾ . Kitowtʾiwnĕ gĕ hbartatsʾnē , paytsʾ sērĕ gĕ shinē .
46008002	Etʾē mēgĕ gĕ gardzē tʾē pan mĕ kitē , teṛ ochʾinchʾ kitē aynbēs , inchʾbēs bētkʾ ē kitnal .
46008003	Sagayn etʾē mēgĕ gĕ sirē Astowadz , inkʾ janchʾtsʾowadz ē angē .
46008004	Owremn , inchʾ gĕ veraperi gowṛkʾerown zohowadz panerĕ owtelow , kitenkʾ tʾē gowṛkʾĕ ochʾinchʾ ē ashkharhi mēch , ew tʾē owrish oewē Astowadz chʾgay , mēgēn zat .
46008005	Kʾani or , tʾēew ĕllan astowadz gochʾowadzner , tʾē erginkʾĕ ew tʾē ergri vray , ( inchʾbēs gan shat astowadzner ow shat tērer , )
46008006	menkʾ owninkʾ mēg Astowadz , Hayrĕ , ormē en polor panerĕ , ew menkʾ , anor gĕ batganinkʾ , , , ow mēg Tēr , Yisows Kʾristos , orov koyowtʾiwn ownin , , polor panerĕ , ew menkʾ , anov gankʾ .
46008007	Paytsʾ polorĕ chʾownin ays kitowtʾiwnĕ : orovhetew omankʾ , minchʾew hima khghjmtankʾi hartsʾ ownenalov gowṛkʾi masin , g!owten zanonkʾ orbēs gowṛkʾi zohowadz pan : ew irentsʾ khghjmtankʾĕ gĕ bghdzowi , kʾani or tgar ē .
46008008	Sagayn geragowrĕ chʾē or gĕ mōtetsʾnē mez Astowdzoy , , : kʾani or ochʾ aṛatowtʾean mēch g!ĕllankʾ , etʾē owtenkʾ , ochʾ al garōtowtʾean mēch g!ĕllankʾ , etʾē chʾowtenkʾ .
46008009	Paytsʾ zkowshatsʾēkʾ or tser ays azatowtʾiwnĕ tgarnerown saytʾakʾowm chʾĕllay .
46008010	Kʾani or etʾē mēgĕ tesnē kʾez , or kitowtʾiwn ownis , seghan nstadz , , gṛatowni mēch , ayt tgar eghoghin khghjmtankʾĕ biti chʾkhrakhowsowi owtel ayn panerĕ , or gowṛkʾerown zohowadz en :
46008011	ew kʾow kitowtʾeampt , ayt tgar eghpayrĕ biti gorsowi , orown hamar Kʾristos meṛaw .
46008012	Isg erp aysbēs gĕ meghanchʾēkʾ eghpayrnerown tēm ow gĕ viraworēkʾ anontsʾ tgar khghjmtankʾĕ , gĕ meghanchʾēkʾ Kʾristosi tēm .
46008013	Owsti etʾē geragowrĕ gĕ kaytʾagghetsʾnē eghpayrs , yawēt mis biti chʾowtem , orbēszi chʾkaytʾagghetsʾnem eghpayrs .
46009001	Mitʾē es aṛakʾeal chʾem : mitʾē es azat chʾem : mitʾē achʾkʾerovs chʾtesay Yisows Kʾristosĕ , mer Tērĕ : towkʾ im kordzs chʾēkʾ Tērochmov .
46009002	Noynisg etʾē owrishnerown aṛakʾeal chʾĕllam , konē tsezi hamar , em : orovhetew im aṛakʾelowtʾeans gnikʾĕ towkʾ ēkʾ Tērochmov .
46009003	Sa ē im chatakovagans anontsʾ , or gĕ hartsʾakʾnnen zis :
46009004	« Mitʾē menkʾ irawownkʾ chʾowninkʾ owtelow ew khmelow .
46009005	Mitʾē menkʾ irawownkʾ chʾowninkʾ Kʾristosov kʾoyr eghogh gin mĕ mezi het tanelow , inchʾbēs miws aṛakʾealnerĕ , Tēroch eghpayrnern ow Gepʾas g!ĕnen .
46009006	Gam miayn es ow Paṛnapas irawownkʾ chʾowninkʾ ashkhatelē zerdz ĕllalow .
46009007	Ov erpekʾ martnchʾelow g!ertʾay ir sepʾagan dzakhsov : ov ayki gĕ tngē ew anor btowghēn chʾ!owter : gam ov gĕ hovowē ow hōtin gatʾov chʾi snanir , , .
46009008	Mitʾē martgōrēn g!ĕsem ays panerĕ , gam arteōkʾ ōrēnkʾn al noynĕ chʾ!ĕser .
46009009	Kʾani or Movsēsi ōrēnkʾin mēch krowadz ē : « Mi gaber gali mēch ashkhatogh , , ezin townchʾĕ » . Mitʾē Astowadz eznerĕ gĕ hokay ,
46009010	tʾē ochʾ , anshowsht mezi hamar g!ĕsē . Angasgadz mezi hamar krowadz ē : orovhetew an or gĕ hergē , bartawor ē yoysov hergel , ew an or gĕ gamnē , pa zhin aṛnelow yoysov , , .
46009011	Etʾē menkʾ tser mēch hokewor paner sermanetsʾinkʾ , medz pan ē , etʾē tsezmē marmnawor paner hntsenkʾ .
46009012	Etʾē owrishner pa zhin ownin ays irawownkʾin , tser vray , aṛawelabēs menkʾ chʾowninkʾ : paytsʾ menkʾ ays irawownkʾĕ chʾōktakordzetsʾinkʾ , haba amēn pani gĕ timanankʾ , orbēszi arkelkʾ chʾĕllankʾ Kʾristosi awetaranin .
46009013	CHʾēkʾ kiter tʾē sowrp panerown bashtōneanerĕ , tajarēn g!owten , ew anonkʾ or zohaseghanin gĕ sbasaworen , zohaseghanēn pa zhin g!aṛnen .
46009014	Noynbēs al Tērĕ batowiretsʾ or awetaranĕ hṛchʾagoghnerĕ , awetaranēn abrin .
46009015	Paytsʾ es asontsʾmē ochʾ mēgĕ ōktakordzetsʾi , ochʾ al ays panerĕ kretsʾi , or aytbēs ĕllay indzi hantēb : orovhetew aweli law ē indzi , or meṛnim , kʾan tʾē mēgĕ im bardzankʾs ochʾnchʾatsʾnē .
46009016	Artarew etʾē awetaranem , bardzenalikʾ ochʾinchʾ ownim , orovhetew im vras trowadz harg mĕn ē : manawant vay ē indzi , etʾē chʾawetaranem .
46009017	Kʾani or etʾē asiga gamovin ĕnem , vartsatrowtʾiwn g!ownenam : isg etʾē agamay , ayt indzi vstahowadz tntesowtʾiwn mĕn ē .
46009018	Owremn inchʾ ē im vartsatrowtʾiwns : ayn , or awetaranelow atens tsri tam Kʾristosi awetaranĕ , orbēszi chʾarachʾar chʾkordzadzem awetaranēn statsʾadz im irawownkʾs .
46009019	Kʾani or , tʾēbēt polorēn azat ēi , es zis polorin dzaṛay ĕri , orbēszi shaterĕ shahim .
46009020	Hreanerown het Hreayi bēs eghay , orbēszi Hreanerĕ shahim .
46009021	ōrēnkʾi tag eghoghnerown het , ipr tʾē ōrēnkʾi tag , ( ochʾ tʾē es ōrēnkʾi tag ēi , ) orbēszi ōrēnkʾi tag eghoghnern al shahim . Aṛantsʾ ōrēnkʾi eghoghnerown het , ipr tʾē aṛantsʾ ōrēnkʾi , ( ochʾ tʾē es Astowdzmē ōrēnkʾ chʾownēi , haba Kʾristosi ōrēnkʾin tag ēi , ) orbēszi aṛantsʾ ōrēnkʾi eghoghnern al shahim .
46009022	Tgarnerown het tgari bēs eghay , orbēszi tgarnerĕ shahim : polorin het amēn inchʾ eghay , orbēszi anbayman omankʾ pʾrgem .
46009023	Ew asiga g!ĕnem awetaranin hamar , or haghortagitsʾ ĕllam anor .
46009024	CHʾēkʾ kiter tʾē asbarēzin mēch vazoghnerĕ , polorĕ gĕ vazen , paytsʾ mēgĕ gĕ stanay mrtsʾanagĕ . Owsti aynbēs vazetsʾēkʾ , or stanakʾ .
46009025	Ov or gĕ mrtsʾi , chʾapʾaworowtʾiwn gĕ bahē amēn pani mēch : anonkʾ , eghdzaneli bsagĕ stanalow hamar , isg menkʾ , aneghdzanelin .
46009026	Owsti es aytbēs gĕ vazem , ochʾ tʾē anstowkowtʾeamp : es aytbēs gṛpʾamart g!ĕnem , ochʾ tʾē hovĕ dzedzelov :
46009027	paytsʾ gĕ jnshem ow gĕ nowajem marmins , orbēszi , owrishnerown kʾarozelē etkʾ , es inkʾs khoteli chʾĕllam .
46010001	Eghpayrner , chʾem owzer or ankitanakʾ tʾē mer hayrerĕ , polorn al ambin tag ēin , polorn al dzovēn antsʾan ,
46010002	ow polorn al Movsēsov mgrtowetsʾan ambin ew dzovown mēch .
46010003	Polorn al geran noyn hokewor geragowrĕ ,
46010004	ow polorn al khmetsʾin noyn hokewor khmelikʾĕ , orovhetew gĕ khmēin ayn hokewor vēmēn , or irentsʾ gĕ hetewēr , ew ayt vēmĕ , Kʾristosn ēr .
46010005	Paytsʾ anontsʾmē shaterĕ hajeli chʾeghan Astowdzoy , kʾani or anabatin mēch pʾṛowadz ingan .
46010006	Owremn ayt panerĕ mezi tibar eghan , orbēszi chʾtsʾangankʾ chʾar panerow , inchʾbēs anonkʾ tsʾangatsʾin .
46010007	Ochʾ al gṛabasht ĕllakʾ , anontsʾmē omantsʾ bēs , inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « ZHoghovowrtĕ nstaw owtelow ew khmelow , yetoy ganknetsʾan zpōsnelow » .
46010008	Ochʾ al boṛnginkʾ , inchʾbēs anontsʾmē omankʾ boṛngetsʾan , ow mēg ōrowan mēch kʾsanerekʾ hazar hoki ingan .
46010009	Ochʾ al pʾortsenkʾ Kʾristosĕ , inchʾbēs anontsʾmē omankʾ pʾortsetsʾin , ew ōtserēn chartowetsʾan .
46010010	Ochʾ al trtnchetsʾēkʾ , inchʾbēs anontsʾmē omankʾ trtnchetsʾin , ow chartowetsʾan pnachnchoghēn .
46010011	Isg ayt polor panerĕ gĕ batahēin anontsʾ , ipr tibar , ew krowetsʾan khratelow hamar mez , or hasadz enkʾ tarerow vakhjanin .
46010012	Hetewapar an or gĕ gardzē tʾē hastatown getsʾadz ē , tʾogh zkowshanay , or chʾiynay .
46010013	TSezi batahadz chʾē pʾortsowtʾiwn mĕ , or martgayin chʾĕllay : paytsʾ Astowadz hawatarim ē , ew biti chʾtʾoylatrē or pʾortsowikʾ tser garoghowtʾenēn aweli , haba pʾortsowtʾean het elkʾ mĕn al biti tay , orbēszi garenakʾ grel .
46010014	Owsti , sireliners , pʾakhēkʾ gṛabashtowtʾenēn .
46010015	Gĕ khōsim orbēs tʾē imastownnerow het : towkʾ tatetsʾēkʾ inchʾ or g!ĕsem .
46010016	ōrhnowtʾean pa zhagĕ , or menkʾ g!ōrhnenkʾ , mitʾē Kʾristosi ariwnin haghortowtʾiwnĕ chʾē : hatsʾĕ , or menkʾ gĕ gtrenkʾ , mitʾē Kʾristosi marminin haghortowtʾiwnĕ chʾē .
46010017	Artarew menkʾ , shat ĕllalov , mēg hatsʾ , mēg marmin enkʾ , orovhetew polors al pa zhnegitsʾ enkʾ ayt mēg hatsʾin .
46010018	Nayetsʾēkʾ marmnawor Israyēlin : anonkʾ or zoherēn g!owten , zohaseghanin haghortagitsʾ chʾen ĕllar .
46010019	Owremn inchʾ g!ĕsem : gowṛkʾĕ pan mĕn ē , gam gowṛkʾerow zohowadzĕ pan mĕn ē .
46010020	Paytsʾ sa g!ĕsem , tʾē ayn panerĕ , or hetʾanosnerĕ gĕ zohen , gĕ zohen tewerown , ew ochʾ tʾē Astowdzoy : owsti chʾem owzer or towkʾ haghortagitsʾ ĕllakʾ tewerown . CHʾēkʾ grnar khmel Tēroch pa zhagĕ ow tewerown pa zhagĕ :
46010021	chʾēkʾ grnar pa zhnegtsʾil Tēroch seghanin ew tewerow seghanin .
46010022	Nakhantsi krkṛenkʾ Tērĕ : mitʾē menkʾ irmē ow zhegh enkʾ .
46010023	Amēn pan indzi artōnowadz ē , paytsʾ amēn pan ōktagar chʾē : amēn pan indzi artōnowadz ē , paytsʾ amēn pan shinichʾ chʾē .
46010024	Ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh pʾntṛē miayn ir shahĕ , haba amēn mēgĕ , owrishinn al .
46010025	Gerēkʾ amēn inchʾ or gĕ dzakhowi vajaṛanotsʾĕ , aṛantsʾ znnelow , khghjmtankʾi batjaṛov :
46010026	orovhetew « Tērochn ē ergirĕ ew anor liowtʾiwnĕ » .
46010027	Etʾē anhawatnerēn mēgĕ jashi hrawirē tsez ow tramatir ĕllakʾ ertʾalow , gerēkʾ amēn inchʾ , or gĕ hramtsʾowi tsezi , aṛantsʾ hartsʾnelow , khghjmtankʾi batjaṛov .
46010028	Paytsʾ etʾē mēgĕ ĕsē tsezi : « Atiga gowṛkʾerow zohowadz ē » , anor batjaṛov , or tsʾoytsʾ towaw tsezi , ew khghjmtankʾi batjaṛov , mi owtēkʾ .
46010029	Sagayn erp khghjmtankʾ g!ĕsem , ochʾ tʾē kʾowgt ē , haba , owrishinĕ . Paytsʾ inchʾow im azatowtʾiwns gĕ tatowi owrishi mĕ khghjmtankʾēn .
46010030	Etʾē es shnorhagalowtʾeamp gĕ pa zhnegtsʾim , inchʾow hayhoyowim ayn panin batjaṛov , orown hamar es shnorhagal g!ĕllam .
46010031	Owremn , tʾē owtēkʾ , tʾē khmēkʾ , ew tʾē inchʾ or ĕnēkʾ , amēnĕ ĕrēkʾ Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾin hamar .
46010032	Mi saytʾakʾetsʾnēkʾ ochʾ Hreanerĕ , ochʾ Yoynerĕ , ochʾ al Astowdzoy egeghetsʾin .
46010033	Inchʾbēs es al gĕ hajetsʾnem polorĕ , amēn pani mēch , pʾntṛelov ochʾ tʾē im ōkowts , haba , shaterownĕ , orbēszi pʾrgowin .
46011001	Indzi nmanetsʾēkʾ , inchʾbēs es al , Kʾristosi .
46011002	Gĕ kovem tsez , eghpayrner , or amēn pani mēch gĕ yishēkʾ zis ow gĕ bahēkʾ sorvetsʾowtsʾadzners , inchʾbēs es awantetsʾi tsezi .
46011003	Paytsʾ g!owzem or kitnakʾ tʾē amēn ayr martow klowkhĕ Kʾristosn ē , ow gnoch klowkhĕ , ayr martĕ , ew Kʾristosi klowkhĕ , Astowadz .
46011004	Amēn ayr mart , or g!aghōtʾē gam gĕ markarēanay dzadzgowadz klowkhov , g!anbatowē ir klowkhĕ .
46011005	Isg amēn gin , or g!aghōtʾē gam gĕ markarēanay chʾdzadzgowadz klowkhov , g!anbatowē ir klowkhĕ : kʾani or miewnoynn ē , orbēs tʾē adzilowadz ĕllar .
46011006	Orovhetew etʾē ginĕ chʾi dzadzgowir , tʾogh gtrē ir mazern al : isg etʾē amōtʾ ē gnoch mĕ , ir mazerĕ gtrelĕ gam adzilowilĕ , tʾogh dzadzgowi .
46011007	Artarew ayr martĕ bartawor chʾē dzadzgel klowkhĕ , kʾani or Astowdzoy batgern ow pʾaṛkʾn ē : paytsʾ ginĕ , martown pʾaṛkʾn ē .
46011008	Orovhetew ochʾ tʾē ayr martĕ gnochmēn ē , haba , ginĕ ayr martēn :
46011009	ochʾ al ayr martĕ steghdzowetsʾaw gnoch hamar , haba , ginĕ martown hamar .
46011010	Hetewapar ginĕ bartawor ē showkʾ tnel ir klowkhin , hreshtagnerown batjaṛov .
46011011	Sagayn ochʾ ayr martĕ aṛantsʾ gnoch ē , ochʾ al ginĕ aṛantsʾ ayr martow , Tērochmov .
46011012	Orovhetew inchʾbēs ginĕ ayr martēn ē , noynbēs al ayr martĕ gnoch michotsʾov : paytsʾ amēn pan , Astowdzmē .
46011013	Towkʾ tsezmē tatetsʾēkʾ : batshaj ē or gin mĕ aghōtʾē Astowdzoy , chʾdzadzgowadz klowkhov .
46011014	Noyninkʾn pnowtʾiwnn al chʾi sorvetsʾner tsezi , tʾē ayr mart mĕ etʾē ergar mazer owni , atiga anbatowowtʾiwn ē iren .
46011015	Isg gin mĕ etʾē ergar mazer owni , atiga pʾaṛkʾ ē iren : orovhetew mazerĕ dzadzgotsʾi tegh trowadz en iren .
46011016	Sagayn etʾē mēgown yarmar tʾowi hagaṛagil , ochʾ menkʾ aytbisi sovorowtʾiwn owninkʾ , ochʾ al Astowdzoy egeghetsʾinerĕ .
46011017	Paytsʾ asiga batowirelov , chʾem kover tsez , orovhetew tser hamakhmpowmĕ ochʾ tʾē aweli law , haba aweli kēsh artiwnkʾ g!ownenay :
46011018	kʾani or nakh , erp gĕ hamakhmpowikʾ egeghetsʾiin mēch , gĕ lsem tʾē baṛagtowmner g!ĕllan tser mēch , ew masamp gĕ hawatam .
46011019	Artarew bētkʾ ē or hertsowadzner al ĕllan tser mēch , orbēszi erewan ellen anonkʾ , or knahateli en tser mēch .
46011020	Owremn erp towkʾ gĕ hamakhmpowikʾ tegh mĕ , atiga Tēroch ĕntʾrikʾĕ owtel chʾē :
46011021	orovhetew , owtelow aten , iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ nakh g!owtē ir ĕntʾrikʾĕ : mēgĕ anōtʾi gĕ mnay , isg miwsĕ g!arpenay .
46011022	Mitʾē town chʾownikʾ , owtelow ew khmelow hamar : gam g!arhamarhēkʾ Astowdzoy egeghetsʾin , ew g!amchʾtsʾnēkʾ chʾkʾawornerĕ . Inchʾ ĕsem tsezi , kovem tsez ays panin hamar : chʾem kover .
46011023	Artarew es Tērochmēn ĕntownetsʾi zayn , or tsezi al awantetsʾi , tʾē Tēr Yisows , ir matnowadz kisherĕ , hatsʾ aṛaw ,
46011024	ow shnorhagal ĕllalē etkʾ , gtretsʾ ew ĕsaw : « Aṛēkʾ ow gerēkʾ , ays ē im marmins , or gĕ gtrowi tsezi hamar : ĕrēkʾ asiga , im yishatagis hamar » .
46011025	Noynbēs al , ĕntʾrikʾēn etkʾ , pa zhagĕ aṛaw ow ĕsaw : « Ays pa zhagĕ nor owkhtn ē , im ariwnovs : ĕrēkʾ asiga , kʾani ankam or khmēkʾ , im yishatagis hamar .
46011026	Orovhetew kʾani ankam or owtēkʾ ays hatsʾĕ ew khmēkʾ ays pa zhagĕ , Tēroch mahĕ gĕ batmēkʾ , minchʾew or inkʾ kay » .
46011027	Hetewapar ov or owtē ays hatsʾĕ gam khmē Tēroch pa zhagĕ anar zhanapar , bartaban biti ĕllay Tēroch marminin ew ariwnin .
46011028	Owremn iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ tʾogh kʾnnē inkʾzinkʾ , ow aytbēs owtē hatsʾēn ew khmē pa zhagēn .
46011029	Orovhetew an or g!owtē ow gĕ khmē anar zhanapar , g!owtē ow gĕ khmē inkʾnir tatabartowtʾiwnĕ , kʾani or chʾi zatorosher Tēroch marminĕ .
46011030	Ays batjaṛov shater tser mēch tgar ew hiwant en , ow shater al gĕ nnchen .
46011031	Orovhetew etʾē menkʾ mez tatēinkʾ , chʾēinkʾ tatower .
46011032	Isg erp gĕ tatowinkʾ , gĕ bat zhowinkʾ Tērochmēn , orbēszi chʾtatabartowinkʾ ashkharhi het .
46011033	Hetewapar , eghpayrners , erp gĕ hamakhmpowikʾ owtelow hamar , sbasetsʾēkʾ irarow .
46011034	Isg etʾē mēgĕ anōtʾi ē , tʾogh owtē ir tan mēch , orbēszi chʾhamakhmpowikʾ tatabartowtʾean hamar . Mnatsʾadzĕ biti batowirem , erp kam .
46012001	Hokewor barkewnerown masin chʾem owzer or ankēt ĕllakʾ , eghpayrner .
46012002	Towkʾ kitēkʾ tʾē erp hetʾanos ēikʾ , gĕ tarowēikʾ tēbi mownch gowṛkʾerĕ , inchʾbēs or g!aṛachnortowēikʾ .
46012003	Owsti sa gĕ hasgtsʾnem tsezi , tʾē Astowdzoy Hokiov khōsogh ochʾ mēgĕ g!ĕsē : « Nzoveal ĕllay Yisows » . Ew ochʾ mēgĕ grnay ĕsel : « Yisows Tēr ē » , paytsʾ miayn , Sowrp Hokiov .
46012004	Owremn shnorhnerĕ zanazan en , paytsʾ noyn Hokin ē ,
46012005	sbasargowtʾiwnnerĕ zanazan en , paytsʾ noyn Tērn ē ,
46012006	nerkordzowtʾiwnnerĕ zanazan en , paytsʾ noyn Astowadzn ē or gĕ nerkordzē amēn inchʾ , polorin mēch .
46012007	Sagayn Hokiin yaytnaperowmĕ iwrakʾanchʾiwrin trowadz ē , polorin ōkowtin hamar .
46012008	Mēgown trowadz ē imastowtʾean khōskʾ , Hokiov : owrishin , kitowtʾean khōskʾ , noyn Hokiov :
46012009	owrishin , hawatkʾ , noyn Hokiov : owrishin , p zhshgelow shnorhner , noyn Hokiov :
46012010	owrishin , hrashakordzowtʾiwnner , owrishin , markarēowtʾiwn , owrishin , hokinerow zatoroshowtʾiwn , owrishin , zanazan lezownerow tesagner , owrishin , lezownerow tʾarkmanowtʾiwn .
46012011	Ays amēnĕ , miewnoyn Hokin gĕ nerkordzē , ew iwrakʾanchʾiwrin gĕ pa zhnē zat-zat , inchʾbēs or inkʾ pʾapʾakʾi .
46012012	Artarew , inchʾbēs marminĕ mēg ē paytsʾ shat antamner owni , ew ayn marminin polor antamnerĕ , tʾēbēt shat , mēg marmin en , noynbēs al Kʾristos .
46012013	Kʾani or menkʾ polors mgrtowetsʾankʾ mēg Hokiov , mēg marmin ĕllalow , tʾē Hreaner , tʾē Yoyner , tʾē strowgner , tʾē azatner , ew polors al mēg Hokiēn khmetsʾinkʾ .
46012014	Orovhetew marminĕ mēg antam chʾē , haba , shat .
46012015	Etʾē otkʾĕ ĕsē : « Kʾani es tseṛkʾ chʾem , marminēn chʾem » , hetewapar al marminēn chʾē .
46012016	Ow etʾē aganchĕ ĕsē : « Kʾani es achʾkʾ chʾem , marminēn chʾem » , hetewapar al marminēn chʾē .
46012017	Etʾē ampoghch marminĕ achʾkʾ ĕllar , owr biti ĕllar lselikʾĕ : ew etʾē ampoghchĕ lselikʾ ĕllar , owr biti ĕllar hototelikʾĕ .
46012018	Paytsʾ Astowadz antamner traw marminin mēch , anontsʾmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ , inchʾbēs inkʾ gametsʾaw .
46012019	Etʾē ampoghchĕ ĕllar miayn mēg antam , owr biti ĕllar marminĕ .
46012020	Paytsʾ antamnerĕ shat en , isg marminĕ , mēg .
46012021	Achʾkʾĕ chʾi grnar ĕsel tseṛkʾin : « Bētkʾ chʾownim kʾezi » , ew ochʾ al klowkhĕ , otkʾerown : « Bētkʾ chʾownim tsezi » .
46012022	Noynisg marminin ayn antamnerĕ , or aweli tgar gĕ tʾowin , shat aweli hargawor en :
46012023	ow marminin ayn antamnerĕ , or nowaz batowawor gĕ hamarenkʾ , anontsʾ aweli medz batiw g!ĕndzayenkʾ . Aysbēs , mer anvayelowchʾ antamnerĕ aweli shat vayelchʾowtʾiwn ownin :
46012024	isg mer vayelowchʾ antamnerown pan mĕ bētkʾ chʾē . Paytsʾ Astowadz marminĕ yōrinetsʾ , aweli medz batiw talov angē zrgowadzin ,
46012025	orbēszi baṛagtowm chʾĕllay marminin mēch , haba antamnerĕ miewnoyn khnamkʾĕ tanin irarow .
46012026	Etʾē mēg antamĕ chʾarchʾarowi , polor antamnerĕ gĕ chʾarchʾarowin anor het , ow etʾē mēg antamĕ batowowi , polor antamnerĕ g!owrakhanan anor het .
46012027	Owremn towkʾ Kʾristosi marminn ēkʾ , ew anhatapar , anor antamnerĕ .
46012028	Astowadz nshanagetsʾ tsezmē omankʾ egeghetsʾiin mēch , nakh , aṛakʾealner , ergrort , markarēner , errort , vartabetner , yetoy , hrashkʾner kordzoghner , aba , p zhshgelow , ōknelow , ghegavarelow , zanazan lezownerow shnorhner ownetsʾoghner .
46012029	Mitʾē polorĕ aṛakʾeal en : mitʾē polorĕ markarē en : mitʾē polorĕ vartabet en : mitʾē polorĕ hrashkʾner gĕ kordzen :
46012030	mitʾē polorĕ p zhshgelow shnorhner ownin : mitʾē polorĕ lezowner gĕ khōsin : mitʾē polorĕ gĕ tʾarkmanen .
46012031	Paytsʾ towkʾ nakhantsakhntir eghēkʾ lawakoyn shnorhnerown , ow es tagawin tsʾoytsʾ biti tam tsezi kerazantsʾ jampay mĕ .
46013001	Etʾē khōsim martotsʾ ew hreshtagnerown lezownerĕ , paytsʾ sēr chʾownenam , es hnchʾogh bghintsi bēs g!ĕllam , gam ghōghanchogh dzndzghayi bēs .
46013002	Ow etʾē ownenam markarēowtʾean barkewĕ , hasgnam polor khorhowrtnerĕ ew ampoghch kitowtʾiwnĕ , ow etʾē ownenam ampoghch hawatkʾĕ , or garenam leṛner teghapʾokhel , paytsʾ sēr chʾownenam , es ochʾinchʾ em .
46013003	Ew etʾē snowtsʾanem aghkʾatnerĕ , im ampoghch inchʾkʾovs , ow marmins ayrowelow ĕndzayem , paytsʾ sēr chʾownenam , es ōkowt mĕ chʾem ownenar .
46013004	Sērĕ hamperatar ē , kʾaghtsʾr ē : sērĕ chʾi nakhantsir : sērĕ chʾi koṛozanar , chʾi hbartanar :
46013005	anvayel varmownkʾ chʾ!ownenar , irenĕ chʾi pʾntṛer , chʾi krkṛowir , chʾarowtʾiwn chʾi mtadzer :
46013006	anirawowtʾean hamar chʾ!owrakhanar , haba jshmartowtʾean owrakhagitsʾ g!ĕllay :
46013007	amēn pani gĕ hantowr zhē , amēn pani gĕ hawatay , amēn pani gĕ yowsay , amēn pani gĕ togay .
46013008	Sērĕ pnaw chʾ!iynar : paytsʾ etʾē markarēowtʾiwnner ĕllan , biti ochʾnchʾanan , etʾē lezowner , biti tatrin , etʾē kitowtʾiwn , biti ochʾnchʾanay .
46013009	Artarew hima masamp kitenkʾ ow masamp gĕ markarēanankʾ :
46013010	paytsʾ erp gatarealĕ kay , masnagin biti ochʾnchʾanay .
46013011	Erp manowg ēi , manowgi bēs gĕ khōsēi , manowgi bēs gĕ mtadzēi , manowgi gardzikʾ ownēi : paytsʾ erp ayr mart eghay , mangagan panerĕ mēg goghm tri .
46013012	Hima gĕ tesnenkʾ hayelii mĕ mēchēn , aghōt gerbov , paytsʾ ayn aten , biti tesnenkʾ eres aṛ eres . Hima es masamp gĕ janchʾnam , paytsʾ ayn aten biti janchʾnam aynbēs , inchʾbēs es janchʾtsʾowadz em .
46013013	Isg hima sa erekʾĕ gĕ mnan , hawatkʾĕ , yoysĕ , sērĕ : paytsʾ sērn ē asontsʾ medzakoynĕ .
46014001	Siroy hetamowt eghēkʾ , ow nakhantsakhntir eghēkʾ hokewor barkewnerow , manawant , markarēanalow .
46014002	Orovhetew an or gĕ khōsi andzanōtʾ lezowov , gĕ khōsi ochʾ tʾē martotsʾ , haba Astowdzoy , kʾani or ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ hasgnay zinkʾ : sagayn an khorhowrtner g!artayaytē hokiov .
46014003	Isg an or gĕ markarēanay , gĕ khōsi martotsʾ , shinowtʾiwn , yortor ew spʾopʾankʾ talow .
46014004	An or andzanōtʾ lezowov gĕ khōsi , inkʾzinkʾ gĕ shinē : paytsʾ an or gĕ markarēanay , egeghetsʾin gĕ shinē .
46014005	G!owzem or towkʾ polort lezowner khōsikʾ , manawant , markarēanakʾ : orovhetew an or gĕ markarēanay , aweli medz ē kʾan an or lezowner gĕ khōsi , patsʾi etʾē inkʾ tʾarkmanē , orbēszi egeghetsʾin shinowtʾiwn stanay .
46014006	Isg hima , eghpayrner , etʾē es kam tsezi , lezowner khōselov , inchʾ ōkowt biti stanakʾ intsmē , etʾē chʾkhōsim tsezi gam yaytnowtʾeamp , gam kitowtʾeamp , gam markarēowtʾeamp ew gam owsowtsʾowmov .
46014007	TSayn towogh anshownchʾ panern ankam , ĕllay srink tʾē kʾnar , etʾē hnchʾiwnnerow zanazanowtʾiwn chʾtan , inchʾbēs biti janchʾtsʾowi srinkov gam kʾnarov nowakowadzĕ .
46014008	Orovhetew etʾē pʾoghn al anorosh tsayn tay , ov biti batrastowi baterazmi .
46014009	Noynbēs al towkʾ , etʾē lezowov tiwrahasgnali khōskʾer chʾartaperēkʾ , inchʾbēs biti hasgtsʾowi khōsowadzĕ : orovhetew khōsadz biti ĕllakʾ ōtin .
46014010	TSaynerow orkʾan tesagner al ĕllan ashkharhi mēch , anontsʾmē ochʾ mēgĕ anĕmpṛneli ē .
46014011	Owremn etʾē chʾkitnam tsaynin imastĕ , es ōtaragan mĕ biti ĕllam khōsoghin , khōsoghn al ōtaragan mĕ biti ĕllay indzi .
46014012	Noynbēs al towkʾ , kʾani nakhantsakhntir ēkʾ hokewor barkewnerow , chanatsʾēkʾ kerazantsʾ ĕllal , egeghetsʾiin shinowtʾean hamar .
46014013	Owsti an or gĕ khōsi andzanōtʾ lezowov , tʾogh aghōtʾē , or garenay tʾarkmanel .
46014014	Kʾani or etʾē es aghōtʾem andzanōtʾ lezowov , hokis g!aghōtʾē , paytsʾ mitkʾs anbtowgh ē .
46014015	Owremn inchʾ ĕnelow em . Biti aghōtʾem hokiov , biti aghōtʾem mitkʾov al : saghmos biti erkem hokiov , saghmos biti erkem mitkʾov al .
46014016	Aylabēs , erp town ōrhnapanes hokiov , inchʾbēs an or tkēti teghĕ krawadz ē , « amēn » biti ĕsē kʾow shnorhagalowtʾeant aten , kʾani or chʾi hasgnar kʾow ĕsadzt .
46014017	Artarew town law shnorhagal g!ĕllas , paytsʾ miwsĕ chʾi shinowir .
46014018	SHnorhagal em Astowdzmē , or tser polorēn aweli lezowner gĕ khōsim :
46014019	sagayn gĕ nakhĕntrem egeghetsʾiin mēch hink khōskʾ ĕsel mitkʾovs , orbēszi owrishnerown al sorvetsʾnem , kʾan piwrawor khōskʾer , andzanōtʾ lezowov .
46014020	Eghpayrner , ĕmpṛnowmov manowg mi ĕllakʾ , haba chʾaramtowtʾean mēch manowg eghēkʾ , isg ĕmpṛnowmov , chʾapʾahas .
46014021	ōrēnkʾin mēch krowadz ē : « Owrish lezownerov ew owrish shrtʾownkʾnerov biti khōsim ays zhoghovowrtin , sagayn aytbēs al mtig biti chʾĕnen indzi , - g!ĕsē Tērĕ » .
46014022	Hetewapar lezownerĕ nshani hamar en , ochʾ tʾē hawatatsʾealnerown , haba anhawatnerown : isg markarēowtʾiwnĕ , ochʾ tʾē anhawatnerown , haba , hawatatsʾealnerown .
46014023	Owremn , etʾē ampoghch egeghetsʾin hamakhmpowi tegh mĕ ew polorn al khōsin andzanōtʾ lezowner , ow hon mtnen tkētner gam anhawatner , biti chʾĕsen tʾē towkʾ khelakaradz ēkʾ .
46014024	Isg etʾē polorn al markarēanan , ow hon mtnē anhawat mĕ gam tkēt mĕ , polorēn al gĕ gshtampowi , polorēn al gĕ tatowi .
46014025	Ew aysbēs , anor sirtin kaghtnikʾnerĕ erewan g!ellen , ow eresi vray iynalov biti ergrbakē Astowdzoy , ew yaytararē tʾē irabēs Astowadz tser mēch ē .
46014026	Owremn inchʾ , eghpayrner . Erp gĕ hamakhmpowikʾ , etʾē tsezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ owni saghmos mĕ , owsowtsʾowm mĕ , lezow mĕ , yaytnowtʾiwn mĕ , megnowtʾiwn mĕ , , , amēn pan tʾogh ĕllay shinowtʾean hamar .
46014027	Etʾē mēgĕ khōsi andzanōtʾ lezowov , ergow , gam amenēn shatĕ , erekʾ hoki tʾogh ĕllan , ew khōsin garkov : mēgn al tʾogh tʾarkmanē .
46014028	Paytsʾ etʾē tʾarkmanogh chʾĕllay , tʾogh lṛē egeghetsʾiin mēch , ow tʾogh khōsi inkʾniren ew Astowdzoy het .
46014029	Markarēnerĕ tʾogh khōsin , ergow gam erekʾ hoki , ow miwsnerĕ vjṛen .
46014030	Isg etʾē owrishi mĕ , or nstadz ē , pan mĕ yaytnowi , aṛachinĕ tʾogh lṛē .
46014031	Orovhetew polort al grnakʾ mēg aṛ mēg markarēanal , orbēszi polorn al sorvin , ew polorn al mkhitʾarowin .
46014032	Ew markarēnerown hokinerĕ markarēnerown gĕ hbatagin :
46014033	kʾani or Astowadz khaṛnagowtʾean Astowadz chʾē , haba , khaghaghowtʾean , inchʾbēs sowrperown polor egeghetsʾinerown mēch .
46014034	Egeghetsʾinerown mēch , tser ginerĕ tʾogh lṛen , orovhetew anontsʾ artōnowadz chʾē khōsil , haba , hbatagil , inchʾbēs g!ĕsē ōrēnkʾn al .
46014035	Isg etʾē owzen orewē pan sorvil , tʾogh hartsʾnen tan mēch , irentsʾ amowsinnerown : kʾani or ginerown amōtʾ ē egeghetsʾiin mēch khōsil .
46014036	Mitʾē Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ tsezmē elaw , gam miayn tsezi hasaw .
46014037	Etʾē mēgĕ gĕ gardzē tʾē inkʾ markarē ē , gam hokewor , tʾogh kitagtsʾi tʾē tsezi kradz paners , Tēroch batowirannern en .
46014038	Paytsʾ etʾē mēgĕ ankēt ē , tʾogh ankēt ĕllay .
46014039	Hetewapar , eghpayrner , nakhantsakhntir eghēkʾ markarēanalow , ow mi arkilēkʾ lezowner khōsiln al .
46014040	Amēn pan tʾogh ĕllay vayelchʾowtʾeamp ew garkov .
46015001	Eghpayrner , gĕ kittsʾnem tsezi ayn awetaranĕ , or kʾarozetsʾi tsezi , ow towkʾ al ĕntownetsʾikʾ ew anor mēch hastat gĕ genakʾ .
46015002	Anov naew gĕ pʾrgowikʾ , etʾē yishoghowtʾean mēch bahēkʾ inchʾ or awetetsʾi tsezi : aylabēs , zowr teghĕ hawatatsʾadz g!ĕllakʾ .
46015003	Orovhetew nakh awantetsʾi tsezi ayn , or es al ĕntownetsʾi , tʾē Kʾristos meṛaw mer meghkʾerown hamar , Kirkʾerown hamatsayn ,
46015004	tʾaghowetsʾaw , yarowtʾiwn aṛaw errort ōrĕ , Kirkʾerown hamatsayn ,
46015005	ow erewtsʾaw Gepʾasi , aba tasnergowkʾin .
46015006	Yetoy mia zhamanag erewtsʾaw hink hariwrē aweli eghpayrnerow , orontsʾ medz masĕ gĕ mnay minchʾew ay zhm , isg omankʾ al nnchetsʾin .
46015007	Aba erewtsʾaw Yagoposi , yetoy , polor aṛakʾealnerown .
46015008	Polorēn etkʾ , erewtsʾaw naew indzi , orbēs tʾē vi zhadzi mĕ .
46015009	Orovhetew es aṛakʾealnerown pʾokʾrakoynn em , ew ar zhani al chʾem aṛakʾeal gochʾowelow , kʾani or haladzetsʾi Astowdzoy egeghetsʾin .
46015010	Paytsʾ Astowdzoy shnorhkʾovn em , inchʾ or em . Ew anor shnorhkʾĕ , or im vras ē , ĕntownayn chʾeghaw : haba es anontsʾ polorēn shat aweli ashkhatetsʾay : sagayn ochʾ tʾē es , haba Astowdzoy shnorhkʾĕ , or indzi het ēr .
46015011	Owsti , tʾē es , tʾē anonkʾ aysbēs gĕ kʾarozenkʾ , ow towkʾ aysbēs hawatatsʾikʾ .
46015012	Owremn etʾē gĕ kʾarozowi tʾē Kʾristos meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛadz ē , inchʾbēs tsezmē omankʾ g!ĕsen tʾē “ meṛelnerow yarowtʾiwn chʾgay ” .
46015013	Paytsʾ etʾē meṛelnerow yarowtʾiwn chʾgay , owremn Kʾristos al yarowtʾiwn aṛadz chʾē .
46015014	Ow etʾē Kʾristos yarowtʾiwn aṛadz chʾē , owremn mer kʾarozowtʾiwnĕ ownayn ē , ow tser hawatkʾn al ownayn ē .
46015015	Isg menkʾ al Astowdzoy sowt vganerĕ g!ĕllankʾ , orovhetew Astowdzoy hamar vgayetsʾinkʾ tʾē meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanetsʾ Kʾristosĕ : minchʾteṛ yarowtsʾanadz chʾē zayn , etʾē irabēs meṛelnerĕ yarowtʾiwn chʾen aṛner .
46015016	Kʾani or etʾē meṛelnerĕ yarowtʾiwn chʾen aṛner , Kʾristos al yarowtʾiwn aṛadz chʾē :
46015017	ow etʾē Kʾristos yarowtʾiwn aṛadz chʾē , tser hawatkʾĕ pʾowj ē , ew tagawin tser meghkʾerown mēch ēkʾ :
46015018	owremn Kʾristosov nnchetsʾealnern al gorsowadz en .
46015019	Etʾē miayn ays geankʾin hamar Kʾristosi yowsatsʾadz enkʾ , menkʾ polor martotsʾmēn aweli khghjali enkʾ .
46015020	Isg hima , Kʾristos meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛadz ē , ow eghadz erakhayrikʾĕ anontsʾ , or nnchetsʾin .
46015021	Orovhetew , kʾani martov eghaw mahĕ , martov al eghaw meṛelnerow yarowtʾiwnĕ .
46015022	Orovhetew inchʾbēs Atamov polorĕ gĕ meṛnin , noynbēs al Kʾristosov polorĕ geankʾ biti stanan .
46015023	Paytsʾ iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ ir garkov : nakh erakhayrikʾĕ , Kʾristos , yetoy Kʾristosi batganoghnerĕ , ir kalowstin .
46015024	Aba biti kay vakhjanĕ , erp tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ biti yantsnē Astowdzoy , Hōrĕ , ochʾnchʾatsʾnelē etkʾ amēn betowtʾiwn , amēn ishkhanowtʾiwn ow zōrowtʾiwn .
46015025	Orovhetew an bētkʾ ē tʾakaworē , minchʾew or polor tʾshnaminerĕ tnē ir otkʾerown tag .
46015026	Verchin tʾshnamin or biti ochʾnchʾatsʾowi , mahn ē , orovhetew Kirkʾĕ g!ĕsē : « Amēn pan traw anor otkʾerown tag » :
