46015027	Paytsʾ erp g!ĕsē tʾē “ amēn pan trowadz ē anor tag ” , patsʾayayt ē tʾē patsʾi angē , or amēn pan traw anor tag .
46015028	Ow erp amēn pan hbatagi anor , ayn aten Ortin , inkʾ al , biti hbatagi anor , or amēn pan traw iren tag , orbēszi Astowadz ĕllay amēn inchʾ , polorin mēch .
46015029	Aylabēs , inchʾ biti ĕnen anonkʾ , or gĕ mgrtowin meṛelnerown hamar , etʾē meṛelnerĕ erpekʾ yarowtʾiwn chʾen aṛner . Owremn inchʾow gĕ mgrtowin anontsʾ hamar :
46015030	ew inchʾow menkʾ al vtanki mēch enkʾ amēn zham .
46015031	Es amēn ōr gĕ meṛnim : vgay gĕ perem ayn bardzankʾĕ , or ownim tser vray Kʾristos Yisowsov , mer Tērochmov .
46015032	Etʾē Epʾesosi mēch gṛowadz ĕllayi kazannerow tēm , martotsʾ nman , inchʾ ōkowt ēr indzi , etʾē meṛelnerĕ yarowtʾiwn chʾen aṛner : owtenkʾ , , ow khmenkʾ , orovhetew vaghĕ biti meṛninkʾ .
46015033	Mi molorikʾ : chʾar ĕngeragtsʾowtʾiwnnerĕ g!abaganen pari parkʾĕ .
46015034	Stʾapʾetsʾēkʾ artarowtʾeamp abrelow hamar , ow mi meghanchʾēkʾ : orovhetew tsezmē omankʾ chʾownin Astowdzoy kitowtʾiwnĕ : asiga g!ĕsem , tsez amchʾtsʾnelow hamar .
46015035	Paytsʾ mēgĕ biti ĕsē : « Inchʾbēs meṛelnerĕ yarowtʾiwn g!aṛnen , ew inchʾ marminov gow kan » .
46015036	Anmit , inchʾ or town gĕ sermanes , geankʾ chʾi stanar etʾē chʾmeṛni .
46015037	Isg inchʾ or gĕ sermanes , ochʾ tʾē ayn marminĕ or biti powsni , gĕ sermanes , haba merg hatigĕ , ĕllay an tsʾoreni tʾē owrish sermi :
46015038	paytsʾ Astowadz marmin gow tay anor , inchʾbēs gĕ gamenay , ew iwrakʾanchʾiwr sermin , ir yatowg marminĕ .
46015039	Amēn marmin noyn marminĕ chʾē : haba owrish ē martotsʾ marminĕ , owrish , anasownnerown marminĕ , owrish , tsowgerownĕ , ew owrish , tʾṛchʾownnerownĕ .
46015040	Gan naew ergnawor marminner ow ergrawor marminner : paytsʾ ergnawornerown pʾaṛkʾĕ owrish ē , ergrawornerownĕ , owrish .
46015041	Arewin pʾaṛkʾĕ owrish ē , lowsinin pʾaṛkʾĕ , owrish , ew astgherown pʾaṛkʾĕ , owrish : orovhetew mēg astghĕ pʾaṛkʾov gĕ tarperi miws astghēn .
46015042	Aysbēs ē naew meṛelnerown yarowtʾiwnĕ . Marminĕ gĕ sermanowi abaganowtʾeamp , ew yarowtʾiwn g!aṛnē anabaganowtʾeamp :
46015043	gĕ sermanowi anbatowowtʾeamp , ow yarowtʾiwn g!aṛnē pʾaṛkʾov : gĕ sermanowi tgarowtʾeamp , ew yarowtʾiwn g!aṛnē zōrowtʾeamp .
46015044	Gĕ sermanowi ipr shnchʾawor marmin , ow yarowtʾiwn g!aṛnē ipr hokewor marmin . SHnchʾawor marmin gay , naew hokewor marmin gay ,
46015045	ew sa krowadz ē : « Aṛachin martĕ , Atam , eghaw abrogh ants » : isg verchin Atamĕ , abretsʾnogh hoki .
46015046	Paytsʾ ochʾ tʾē nakh hokeworĕ , haba , shnchʾaworĕ , ow yetoy , hokeworĕ .
46015047	Aṛachin martĕ ergrēn ē , hogheghēn , paytsʾ ergrort martĕ Tērn ē , erginkʾēn .
46015048	Inchʾbēs hogheghēnn ē , noynbēs al hogheghēnnern en , ew inchʾbēs ergnaworn ē , noynbēs al ergnawornern en .
46015049	Inchʾbēs gĕ grenkʾ hogheghēnin batgerĕ , naew biti grenkʾ ergnaworin batgerĕ .
46015050	Owremn sa g!ĕsem , eghpayrner , tʾē marmin ew ariwn chʾen grnar zhaṛankel Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ , ochʾ al abaganowtʾiwnĕ gĕ zhaṛankē anabaganowtʾiwn .
46015051	Aha gĕ yaytnem tsezi khorhowrt mĕ : « Polors biti chʾnnchenkʾ , paytsʾ polors al biti pʾokhowinkʾ :
46015052	anmichabēs , agntʾartʾi mĕ mēch , verchin pʾoghin hnchʾelow atenĕ : orovhetew pʾoghĕ biti hnchʾē , meṛelnerĕ yarowtʾiwn biti aṛnen , aṛantsʾ abaganowtʾean , ow menkʾ al biti pʾokhowinkʾ » .
46015053	Orovhetew bētkʾ ē or ays abaganatsʾow marminĕ hakni anabaganowtʾiwn , ew ays mahganatsʾown hakni anmahowtʾiwn .
46015054	Owsti erp ays abaganatsʾow marminĕ hakni anabaganowtʾiwn , ew ays mahganatsʾown hakni anmahowtʾiwn , ayn aten biti irakordzowi ayn khōskʾĕ , or krowetsʾaw : « Mahĕ ĕngghmetsʾaw yaghtʾowtʾean mēch » .
46015055	« Mah , owr ē khaytʾotsʾt : t zhokhkʾ , owr ē yaghtʾowtʾiwnt » .
46015056	Mahowan khaytʾotsʾĕ meghkʾn ē , ow meghkʾin zōrowtʾiwnĕ , ōrēnkʾĕ .
46015057	Paytsʾ shnorhagalowtʾiwn Astowdzoy , or mezi yaghtʾowtʾiwn gow tay mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov .
46015058	Hetewapar , sireli eghpayrners , hastatown ew anshar zh eghēkʾ , ow amēn aten yaṛachtimetsʾēkʾ Tēroch kordzin mēch , kitnalov tʾē tser ashkhatankʾĕ ĕntownayn chʾē Tērochmov .
46016001	Inchʾ gĕ veraperi sowrperown hamar ĕllalikʾ hankanagowtʾean , inchʾbēs batowiretsʾi Kaghatatsʾinerow egeghetsʾinerown , towkʾ al aynbēs ĕrēkʾ .
46016002	Amēn Mēgshaptʾi , tsezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ tʾogh mēgti tnē ir kʾov inchʾ or yachoghadz ē khnayel ,
46016003	orbēszi hankanagowtʾiwnner chʾĕllan erp es kam . Ow erp kam , anonkʾ or zatoroshēkʾ , zirenkʾ biti ghrgem namagnerov , , , orbēszi Erowsaghēm tanin tser barkewnerĕ .
46016004	Etʾē im ertʾals al ar zhanavayel ĕllay , anonkʾ biti ertʾan indzi het .
46016005	Owremn es biti kam tsezi , erp antsʾnim Magetoniayēn : ( kʾani or biti antsʾnim Magetoniayēn : )
46016006	ew tʾerews mnam tser kʾov ow tsmerem al tsezi het : orbēszi towkʾ owghargēkʾ zis , owr or ertʾam .
46016007	Orovhetew chʾem owzer tesnel tsez hima , antsʾadz atens , paytsʾ gĕ yowsam or zhamanag mĕ mnam tser kʾov , etʾē Tērĕ artōnē .
46016008	Sagayn Epʾesos biti mnam minchʾew Bentegostē :
46016009	orovhetew medz ew artiwnawor towṛ mĕ patsʾowadz ē indzi , ow pazmatʾiw hagaṛagortner gan .
46016010	Owremn etʾē Timotʾēos kay , owshatir eghēkʾ or mnay tser kʾov aṛantsʾ vakhi : kʾani or an g!ĕnē Tēroch kordzĕ , inchʾbēs es al .
46016011	Owsti ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh anarkē zayn : haba khaghaghowtʾeamp owghargetsʾēkʾ zayn , or indzi kay , orovhetew anor gĕ sbasem eghpayrnerown het .
46016012	Isg inchʾ gĕ veraperi Aboghos eghpōr , shat aghachʾetsʾi anor , or tsezi kay eghpayrnerown het , paytsʾ pnaw pʾapʾakʾ chʾownetsʾaw or hima kay : sagayn biti kay , erp batehowtʾiwn ownenay .
46016013	Artʾown mnatsʾēkʾ , hawatkʾi mēch hastatown getsʾēkʾ , kʾach eghēkʾ , zōratsʾēkʾ .
46016014	TSer polor panerĕ sirov ĕllan .
46016015	G!aghachʾem tsezi , eghpayrner , ( towkʾ gĕ janchʾnakʾ Stepʾanasi ĕntanikʾĕ , or Akʾayiayi erakhayrikʾn ē , ew irenkʾ zirenkʾ nowiretsʾin sowrperown sbasargowtʾean , )
46016016	or hbatagikʾ aytbisinerown ew polorin , or gĕ kordzagtsʾin mezi ow g!ashkhatin .
46016017	Owrakh em Stepʾanasi , Pʾortownatosi ew Akʾayigosi kalowstin hamar , orovhetew irenkʾ lratsʾowtsʾin tser bagasĕ ,
46016018	kʾani or hankstatsʾowtsʾin im hokis ow tserĕ : owremn janchʾtsʾēkʾ aytbisinerĕ .
46016019	Asiayi egeghetsʾinerĕ gĕ parewen tsez : Tērochmov shat gĕ parewen tsez Agiwghas ew Brisgigha , irentsʾ tan mēch eghogh egeghetsʾiin het .
46016020	Polor eghpayrnerĕ gĕ parewen tsez : parewetsʾēkʾ zirar sowrp hampoyrov .
46016021	Es , Bōghos , im tseṛkʾovs gĕ krem ays parewĕ .
46016022	Etʾē mēgĕ chʾi sirer Tēr Yisows Kʾristosĕ , nzoveal ĕllay erp mer Tērĕ kay , , .
46016023	Tēr Yisows Kʾristosi shnorhkʾĕ tsezi het .
46016024	Im sērs tser polorin het , Kʾristos Yisowsov . Amēn .
47001001	Bōghos , Astowdzoy gamkʾov Yisows Kʾristosi aṛakʾealĕ , ow Timotʾēos mer eghpayrĕ , Gorntʾosi mēch eghadz Astowdzoy egeghetsʾiin ew Akʾayiayi mēch eghogh polor sowrperown :
47001002	shnorhkʾ ow khaghaghowtʾiwn tsezi Astowdzmē , mer Hōrmēn , ew Tēr Yisows Kʾristosē .
47001003	ōrhneal ĕllay Astowadz , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi Hayrĕ , arkahatankʾi Hayrĕ ew amēn mkhitʾarowtʾean Astowadzĕ ,
47001004	or gĕ mkhitʾarē mez mer ampoghch taṛabankʾin mēch , orbēszi menkʾ garenankʾ mkhitʾarel anonkʾ , or orewē taṛabankʾi mēch en , ayn mkhitʾarowtʾeamp , orov menkʾ gĕ mkhitʾarowinkʾ Astowdzmē :
47001005	orovhetew inchʾbēs Kʾristosi chʾarchʾarankʾnerĕ g!aṛatanan mer mēch , nmanabēs mer mkhitʾarowtʾiwnn al g!aṛatanay Kʾristosi michotsʾov .
47001006	Etʾē taṛabinkʾ , tser mkhitʾarowtʾean ew pʾrgowtʾean hamar ē , or artiwnawor g!ĕllay , hamperelov ayn noyn chʾarchʾarankʾnerown , orontsʾmov menkʾ al gĕ chʾarchʾarowinkʾ : ow etʾē mkhitʾarowinkʾ , tser mkhitʾarowtʾean ew pʾrgowtʾean hamar ē .
47001007	Mer yoysĕ hastatown ē tser vray , orovhetew kitenkʾ tʾē inchʾbēs haghortagitsʾ ēkʾ mer chʾarchʾarankʾnerown , noynbēs al mkhitʾarowtʾean biti ĕllakʾ .
47001008	Orovhetew chʾenkʾ owzer , eghpayrner , or ankitanakʾ Asiayi mēch mezi batahadz taṛabankʾĕ : chʾapʾēn aweli dzanrapeṛnowetsʾankʾ , mer garoghowtʾenēn aweli , aynkʾan , or noynisg yowsahatetsʾankʾ geankʾēn .
47001009	Paytsʾ mahowan vjiṛĕ ownēinkʾ mer vray , orbēszi vstahinkʾ ochʾ tʾē menkʾ mezi , haba Astowdzoy , or meṛelnerĕ gĕ yarowtsʾanē .
47001010	An aytbisi medz mahē mĕ azatetsʾ mez , ow g!azatē :
47001011	ew gĕ yowsankʾ tʾē an tagawin biti azatē . Towkʾ al gĕ kordzagtsʾikʾ , mezi hamar agherselov , orbēszi shater shnorhagal ĕllan mer batjaṛov , shat antserow aghōtʾkʾin michotsʾov mezi eghadz shnorhin hamar .
47001012	Artarew sa ē mer bardzankʾĕ , mer khghjmtankʾin vgayowtʾiwnĕ , tʾē menkʾ , barzamtowtʾeamp ew Astowdzoy angeghdzowtʾeamp , ochʾ tʾē marmnawor imastowtʾeamp , haba Astowdzoy shnorhkʾov varowetsʾankʾ ashkharhi mēch , ew al aweli tsezi hantēb .
47001013	Orovhetew owrish pan chʾenkʾ krer tsezi , kʾan inchʾ or towkʾ gĕ gartakʾ ow gĕ hasgnakʾ : ew gĕ yowsam tʾē minchʾew vakhjann al biti hasgnakʾ ,
47001014	inchʾbēs naew masamp hasgtsʾakʾ mez , tʾē menkʾ tser bardzankʾn enkʾ , inchʾbēs towkʾ al merĕ , Tēr Yisowsi ōrĕ .
47001015	Ays vstahowtʾeamp gĕ pʾapʾakʾēi nakh kal tsezi , orbēszi towkʾ ergrort shnorhkʾ mĕ ĕntownikʾ ,
47001016	antsʾnil tsezmē tēbi Magetonia , ew Magetoniayēn tartseal kal tsezi , ow tsezmē owghargowadz , ertʾal Hrēastan .
47001017	Owremn erp aysbēs pʾapʾakʾetsʾay , mitʾē tʾetʾewowtʾeamp varowetsʾay : ew gam , inchʾ or es gĕ dzrakrem , marmnaworabēs gĕ dzrakrem , orbēszi im kʾovs « ayo » n , ayo ĕllay , ew « ochʾ » ĕ , ochʾ , , .
47001018	Sagayn Astowadz hawatarim ē , or tsezi hasadz mer khōskʾĕ « ayo » ew « ochʾ » chʾēr :
47001019	kʾani or Astowdzoy Ortin , Yisows Kʾristos , or kʾarozowetsʾaw tsezi mer michotsʾov , ( intsmov , Sighowanosov ow Timotʾēosov , ) « ayo » ew « ochʾ » chʾeghaw , haba ir mēch eghaw « ayo » n .
47001020	Artarew Astowdzoy polor khostowmnerĕ , ir mēch « ayo » en , ew ir mēch « amēn » en , Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾin hamar mer michotsʾov .
47001021	Owremn an or hastatetsʾ mez Kʾristosov , tsezi het , ew ōdzetsʾ mez , Astowadz ē ,
47001022	or naew gnkʾetsʾ mez ow towaw mezi Hokiin krawaganĕ , mer sirterown mēch .
47001023	Paytsʾ es Astowadz vgay gĕ ganchʾem im antsis , tʾē tagawin Gorntʾos chʾegay , khnayelow hamar tsezi .
47001024	Ochʾ tʾē gĕ tirenkʾ tser hawatkʾin vray , haba kordzagitsʾner enkʾ tser owrakhowtʾean : orovhetew towkʾ hawatkʾov gĕ genakʾ .
47002002	Orovhetew etʾē es trtmetsʾnem tsez , al ov ē or biti owrakhatsʾnē zis , etʾē ochʾ an , or trtmetsʾaw intsmē .
47002003	Asiga kretsʾi , or erp kam , trtmowtʾiwn mĕ chʾgrem anontsʾmē , or bētkʾ ē owrakhatsʾnen zis : kʾani or tser polorin masin hamozowadz em tʾē im owrakhowtʾiwns tser polorinn ē .
47002004	Orovhetew shat taṛabankʾi mēch ew sirti gsgidzov kretsʾi tsezi , shat artsʾownkʾov : ochʾ tʾē , orbēszi trtmikʾ , haba kitnakʾ ayn yortaṛat sērĕ , or ownim tsezi hantēb .
47002005	Isg etʾē mēgĕ trtmetsʾowtsʾ , ochʾ tʾē trtmetsʾowtsʾ zis , haba masamp ( orbēszi chʾdzanrapeṛnem ) tsez polort , , .
47002006	Pawagan ē aytbisi martown ayn bati zhĕ , or trowetsʾaw shaterē .
47002007	Hetewapar , ĕnthagaṛagĕ , bētkʾ ē pʾokharēnĕ nerel anor ow mkhitʾarel zayn , orbēszi aynbisin chʾyowsalkʾowi chʾapʾazantsʾ trtmowtʾenēn .
47002008	Owsti g!aghachʾem tsezi , or anor hantēb vaweratsʾnēkʾ tser sērĕ :
47002009	( kʾani or sa nbatagov al kretsʾi , orbēszi tsez pʾortselov kitnam tʾē amēn pani mēch hnazant ēkʾ .
47002010	Anor , orown towkʾ orewē pan nerēkʾ , es al gĕ nerem : orovhetew etʾē orewē pan neradz em , tser batjaṛov anor neradz em , Kʾristosi antsov : )
47002011	orbēszi Satanan mez chʾgeghekʾē , kʾani or chʾenkʾ ankitanar anor titaworowtʾiwnnerĕ .
47002012	Owremn erp hasay Trovata , Kʾristosi awetaranĕ kʾarozelow , tʾēbēt Tērĕ towṛ mĕ patsʾadz ēr indzi ,
47002013	antorrowtʾiwn chʾownetsʾay hokiis mēch , orovhetew hon chʾktay eghpayrs , Titosĕ : haba hra zhesht aṛnelov anontsʾmē , megnetsʾay Magetonia .
47002014	SHnorhagalowtʾiwn Astowdzoy , or amēn aten mezi yaghtʾowtʾiwn gĕ batjaṛē Kʾristosov , ow zinkʾ janchʾnalown hotĕ mezmov gĕ yaytnaperē amēn tegh .
47002015	Orovhetew menkʾ , Astowdzoy hamar , Kʾristosi anoysh hotn enkʾ , tʾē pʾrgowadznerown ew tʾē gorsowoghnerown mēch .
47002016	Omantsʾ , mahowan hot tēbi mah , omantsʾ al , geankʾi hot tēbi geankʾ . Ew ov ĕntownag ē ĕnelow ays panerĕ .
47002017	Kʾani or menkʾ shaterown bēs chʾenkʾ , oronkʾ gĕ khartakhen Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ : haba angeghdzowtʾeamp , Astowdzmē ghrgowadz ew Astowdzoy aṛchew gĕ khōsinkʾ , Kʾristosov .
47003001	Sgsinkʾ tartseal menkʾ mez yantsnararel : gam tʾē , omantsʾ bēs , bētkʾ en mezi yantsnararagan namagner tsezi , gam yantsnararowtʾiwn tsezmē .
47003002	Towkʾ ēkʾ mer namagĕ , mer sirterown mēch krowadz , janchʾtsʾowadz ow gartatsʾowadz polor martotsʾmēn :
47003003	patsʾayayt ĕllalov or towkʾ Kʾristosi namagn ēkʾ , mer sbasargowtʾeamp , ochʾ tʾē melanov krowadz , haba , abrogh Astowdzoy Hokiov : ochʾ tʾē kʾareghēn takhtagnerow vray , haba , sirtin marmneghēn takhtagnerown vray .
47003004	Menkʾ aysbisi vstahowtʾiwn owninkʾ Astowdzoy vray , Kʾristosi michotsʾov .
47003005	Ochʾ tʾē menkʾ mezmē ĕntownag enkʾ mtadzel orewē pan , orbēs tʾē mezmē , haba mer ĕntownagowtʾiwnĕ Astowdzmē ē .
47003006	An naew ĕntownag ĕraw mez Nor Gtagaranin sbasargowner ĕllalow : ochʾ tʾē kirin , haba , Hokiin , orovhetew kirĕ gĕ sbannē , paytsʾ Hokin geankʾ gow tay .
47003007	Isg etʾē kʾarerow vray pʾorakrowadz mahowan sbasargowtʾiwnĕ aynkʾan pʾaṛawor eghaw , or Israyēli ortinerĕ chʾēin grnar agnabish nayil Movsēsi eresin , anor tēmkʾin baydzaṛowtʾean batjaṛov , or biti ochʾnchʾanar ,
47003008	owremn orkʾan aweli pʾaṛawor biti ĕllay hokiin sbasargowtʾiwnĕ :
47003009	kʾani or etʾē tatabartowtʾean sbasargowtʾiwnĕ pʾaṛawor ēr , orchʾapʾ aweli kerazantsʾ biti ĕllay artarowtʾean sbasargowtʾean pʾaṛkʾĕ :
47003010	orovhetew inchʾ or pʾaṛawor eghadz ēr , al pʾaṛkʾ chʾownēr ays gabagtsʾowtʾeamp , zinkʾ kerazantsʾogh pʾaṛkʾin batjaṛov .
47003011	Artarew etʾē ayn or biti ochʾnchʾanar , pʾaṛawor ēr , orchʾapʾ aweli pʾaṛawor biti ĕllay ayn , or mnayown ē .
47003012	Owremn , ngatelov or owninkʾ aysbisi yoys mĕ , medz hamartsagowtʾeamp gĕ varowinkʾ mer khōskʾin mēch :
47003013	ochʾ tʾē inchʾbēs Movsēs , or dzadzgotsʾ gĕ tnēr ir eresin vray , orbēszi Israyēli ortinerĕ agnabish chʾnayēin ochʾnchʾanalow sahmanowadzin vakhjanin .
47003014	Sagayn anontsʾ mitkʾerĕ gowrtsʾan : orovhetew , minchʾew aysōr , noyn dzadzgotsʾĕ tskowadz gĕ mnay Hin Gtagarani ĕntʾertsʾowmin vray , ( an Kʾristosov g!ochʾnchʾanay , )
47003015	haba minchʾew aysōr , erp Movsēsi kirkʾĕ gĕ gartatsʾowi , dzadzgotsʾĕ trowadz gĕ mnay anontsʾ sirtin vray .
47003016	Paytsʾ erp Tēroch taṛnan , dzadzgotsʾĕ biti vertsʾowi .
47003017	Owremn Tērĕ ayt Hokin ē , ew owr Tēroch Hokin gay , hon azatowtʾiwn gay .
47003018	Isg menkʾ polors , patsʾ eresov Tēroch pʾaṛkʾĕ tesnelov , orbēs tʾē hayelii mēch , gĕ pʾokhowinkʾ noyn batgerin , pʾaṛkʾē pʾaṛkʾ , orbēs tʾē Tēroch Hokiin michotsʾov .
47004001	Owsti , kʾani owninkʾ ays sbasargowtʾiwnĕ , oghormowtʾiwn ktadz ĕllalov , chʾenkʾ tsantsranar :
47004002	haba hra zharetsʾankʾ amōtʾali dzadzowg panerēn , khoramangowtʾeamp chʾenkʾ ĕntʾanar ew Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ chʾenkʾ khartakher : ayl jshmartowtʾiwnĕ patsʾayaytelov menkʾ mez gĕ yantsnararenkʾ amēn martow khghjmtankʾin , Astowdzoy aṛchew .
47004003	Isg etʾē mer awetaranĕ dzadzgowadz ē , gorsowadznerown hamar dzadzgowadz ē :
47004004	orontsʾ mēch ays ashkharhi astowadzĕ gowrtsʾowtsʾ anhawatnerown mitkʾerĕ , orbēszi Kʾristosi , Astowdzoy batgerin , pʾaṛkʾi awetaranin loysĕ anontsʾ vray chʾshoghay .
47004005	Artarew menkʾ mez chʾē or gĕ kʾarozenkʾ , haba , Kʾristos Yisows Tērĕ , ow mez , tser dzaṛanerĕ Yisowsi hamar :
47004006	orovhetew Astowadz , or hramayetsʾ loysin , pʾaylil khawarin mēchēn , inkʾ pʾayletsʾaw mer sirterown mēch , Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾin kitowtʾean loysĕ talow hamar Yisows Kʾristosi tēmkʾin vray .
47004007	Paytsʾ menkʾ owninkʾ ays kantsĕ hoghē anōtʾnerow mēch , orbēszi zōrowtʾean kerazantsʾowtʾiwnĕ ĕllay Astowdzmē , ew ochʾ tʾē mezmē .
47004008	Amēn goghmē gĕ taṛabinkʾ , paytsʾ taknabadz chʾenkʾ : varanowmi mēch enkʾ , paytsʾ yowsahatadz chʾenkʾ :
47004009	haladzowadz enkʾ , paytsʾ lkʾowadz chʾenkʾ : khortagowadz enkʾ , paytsʾ gorsowadz chʾenkʾ .
47004010	Amēn aten Yisowsi mahĕ gĕ grenkʾ mer marminin mēch , orbēszi Yisowsi geankʾn al yaytnaperowi mer marminin mēch .
47004011	Orovhetew menkʾ or g!abrinkʾ , amēn aten Yisowsi hamar mahowan gĕ matnowinkʾ , orbēszi Yisowsi geankʾn al yaytnaperowi mer mahganatsʾow marminin mēch .
47004012	Owsti , mahĕ gĕ nerkordzē mer mēch , isg geankʾĕ , tser mēch .
47004013	Paytsʾ hawatkʾin noyn hokin owninkʾ , inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Hawatatsʾi , owsti khōsetsʾay » . Menkʾ al gĕ hawatankʾ , owsti gĕ khōsinkʾ .
47004014	Kitenkʾ tʾē an , or yarowtsʾanetsʾ Tēr Yisowsĕ , mez al biti yarowtsʾanē Yisowsi michotsʾov , ew anor biti nergayatsʾnē , tsezi het .
47004015	Orovhetew amēn pan tsezi hamar ē , orbēszi ayn shnorhkʾĕ , aweltsʾadz shaterow shnorhagalowtʾeamp , jokhanay Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾin hamar .
47004016	Hetewapar chʾenkʾ tsantsranar : ew tʾēbēt mer artakʾin martĕ g!abagani , nerkʾin martĕ ōrē ōr gĕ norokowi .
47004017	Artarew mer tʾetʾew , vayrgenagan taṛabankʾĕ , mezi hamar gĕ batrastē kerazantsʾ ow yawitenagan gshiṛkʾ ownetsʾogh pʾaṛkʾ mĕ :
47004018	kʾani or menkʾ gĕ nayinkʾ ochʾ tʾē tesaneli panerown , haba , antesanelinerown : orovhetew tesaneli panerĕ zhamanagawor en , isg antesanelinerĕ , yawitenagan .
47005001	Artarew kitenkʾ tʾē etʾē mer vrani nman ergrayin townĕ kʾagowi , shinowadzkʾ mĕ owninkʾ Astowdzmē , antseṛagert yawitenagan town mĕ , erginkʾi mēch :
47005002	ew irabēs asor mēch gĕ haṛachʾenkʾ , tenchʾalov haknil mer ergnawor pnagowtʾiwnĕ :
47005003	sagayn erp zayn hakninkʾ , merg chʾktnowinkʾ .
47005004	Orovhetew menkʾ , or ays vranin tagn enkʾ , dzanrowtʾean tag gĕ haṛachʾenkʾ : ochʾ tʾē g!owzenkʾ hanowil , haba , haknil zayn asor vray , orbēszi mahganatsʾowtʾiwnĕ ĕngghmi geankʾin mēch .
47005005	Owremn an , or batrastetsʾ mez ayt noyn panin hamar , Astowadz ē , or naew towaw mezi Hokiin krawaganĕ .
47005006	Owsti amēn aten vstahowtʾiwn owninkʾ , kitnalov tʾē minchʾ marmini mēch enkʾ , heṛow enkʾ Tērochmēn :
47005007	( orovhetew hawatkʾov g!ĕntʾanankʾ , ew ochʾ tʾē tesoghowtʾeamp : )
47005008	vstahowtʾiwn owninkʾ , ew aṛawelabēs g!owzenkʾ heṛanal marminēn ow mōt ĕllal Tēroch .
47005009	Owsti batiw gĕ hamarenkʾ ĕntowneli ĕllal anor , mōt tʾē heṛow .
47005010	Orovhetew bētkʾ ē or polors al nergayanankʾ Kʾristosi tataranin aṛchew , orbēszi iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ stanay ayn panerown hamemat , or ir marminin mēch eghadz aten ĕradz ē , pari gam chʾar .
47005011	Owremn , kitnalov Tēroch vakhĕ , gĕ hamozenkʾ martig : sagayn menkʾ patsʾayayt enkʾ Astowdzoy aṛchew , ew gĕ yowsam tʾē patsʾayayt enkʾ naew tser khghjmtankʾin mēch .
47005012	Orovhetew menkʾ mez tartseal chʾenkʾ yantsnararer tsezi , haba aṛitʾ gow tankʾ tsezi , mezmov bardzenalow : orbēszi pan mĕ ownenakʾ bataskhanelow anontsʾ , or gĕ bardzenan erewoytʾov , ew ochʾ tʾē sirtov .
47005013	Kʾani or etʾē tsʾnoradz enkʾ , atiga Astowdzoy hamar ē , ow etʾē khohem enkʾ , atiga tsezi hamar ē .
47005014	Orovhetew Kʾristosi sērĕ gĕ bartatrē mez , ow mer tatowmĕ sa ē , tʾē etʾē mēgĕ meṛaw polorin hamar , owremn polorn al meṛan .
47005015	An polorin hamar meṛaw , orbēszi abroghnerĕ aylews chʾabrin irenkʾ irentsʾ hamar , haba anor hamar , or meṛaw irentsʾ hamar , ew yarowtʾiwn aṛaw .
47005016	Hetewapar asgē etkʾ menkʾ ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ janchʾnankʾ marminov : tʾēbēt Kʾristosĕ janchʾtsʾankʾ marminov , hima al aynbēs chʾenkʾ janchʾnar .
47005017	Owremn etʾē mēgĕ Kʾristosi mēch ē , an nor araradz mĕn ē : nakhgin panerĕ antsʾan , ew aha amēn pan nor eghaw .
47005018	Ew amēn pan Astowdzmē ē , or hashtetsʾowtsʾ mez iren het , Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov , ow towaw mezi hashtowtʾean sbasargowtʾiwnĕ :
47005019	aysinkʾn Astowadz ēr , or Kʾristosov hashtetsʾowtsʾ ashkharhĕ iren het , anontsʾ yantsʾankʾnerĕ chʾverakrelov irentsʾ , ow yantsnetsʾ mezi hashtowtʾean khōskʾĕ .
47005020	Owremn menkʾ tesbanner enkʾ Kʾristosi hamar , orbēs tʾē Astowadz g!aghachʾēr tsezi mer michotsʾov : g!aghersenkʾ tsezi Kʾristosi goghmēn , hashtowetsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy het .
47005021	Orovhetew Astowadz mezi hamar meghawor hamaretsʾ , , an , or meghkʾ chʾēr kiter , orbēszi menkʾ Astowdzoy artarowtʾiwnĕ ĕllankʾ anov .
47006002	Orovhetew g!ĕsē : « Bateh zhamanagin bataskhanetsʾi kʾezi , ew pʾrgowtʾean ōrĕ ōknetsʾi kʾezi » . Aha hima ē bateh zhamanagĕ , aha hima ē pʾrgowtʾean ōrĕ .
47006003	Pnaw saytʾakʾowm chʾenkʾ batjaṛer , orewē pani mēch , orbēszi mer sbasargowtʾiwnĕ chʾarataworowi .
47006004	Haba amēn pani mēch menkʾ mez gĕ hastatenkʾ orbēs Astowdzoy sbasargowner , shat hamperowtʾeamp , taṛabankʾnerow mēch , hargatrankʾnerow , taknabnerow ,
47006005	dzedzerow , panterow , khaṛnagowtʾiwnnerow , ashkhatankʾnerow , hsgowmnerow , dzomerow mēch ,
47006006	makʾragetsʾowtʾeamp , kitowtʾeamp , hamperatarowtʾeamp , kʾaghtsʾrowtʾeamp , Sowrp Hokiov , angeghdz sirov ,
47006007	jshmartowtʾean khōskʾov , Astowdzoy zōrowtʾeamp , artarowtʾean zrahov , or ach goghmēn ow tsakh goghmēn ē :
47006008	pʾaṛkʾov ew anbatowowtʾeamp , vat hampawov tʾē pari hampawov , moloretsʾowtsʾichʾnerow bēs , paytsʾ jshmartakhōsner ,
47006009	andzanōtʾnerow bēs , sagayn law janchʾtsʾowadzner : mahamertsi bēs , ew aha g!abrinkʾ , bat zhowadznerow bēs , ow chʾenkʾ meṛtsʾowadz :
47006010	trtmadznerow bēs , paytsʾ misht g!owrakhanankʾ , aghkʾatnerow bēs , sagayn gĕ harstatsʾnenkʾ shaterĕ , ochʾinchʾ ownetsʾoghnerow bēs , minchʾteṛ tiratsʾadz enkʾ amēn pani .
47006011	Gorntʾatsʾiner , mer peranĕ patsʾowadz ē tsezi , ew mer sirtĕ , layntsʾadz .
47006012	Towkʾ mer mēch neghĕ ingadz , , chʾēkʾ , haba tser sirtin mēch , , neghĕ ingadz ēkʾ .
47006013	Owremn , pʾokharēnĕ hatowtsʾanelow hamar ( gĕ khōsim tsezi , ipr zawagnerows ) , towkʾ al tser sirtĕ layntsʾowtsʾēkʾ , , .
47006014	Anhawatnerown het anyarir ldzagitsʾ , , mi ĕllakʾ : kʾani or inchʾ ĕngeragtsʾowtʾiwn owni artarowtʾiwnĕ anōrēnowtʾean het , inchʾ haghortowtʾiwn owni loysĕ khawarin het ,
47006015	ew inchʾ miapanowtʾiwn owni Kʾristos Peliari het : gam inchʾ pa zhin owni hawatatsʾealĕ anhawatin het ,
47006016	ew inchʾ hamatsaynowtʾiwn owni Astowdzoy tajarĕ gowṛkʾerown het , orovhetew towkʾ abrogh Astowdzoy tajarn ēkʾ , inchʾbēs Astowadz ĕsaw : « Anontsʾ mēch biti pnagim ew anontsʾ mēch biti shrchim : anontsʾ Astowadz biti ĕllam ow anonkʾ indzi zhoghovowrt biti ĕllan .
47006017	Owsti elēkʾ anontsʾ mēchēn ew zatowetsʾēkʾ , - g!ĕsē Tērĕ . - Anmakʾowr pani mi tbchʾikʾ ,
47006018	ow es biti ĕntownim tsez : es Hayr biti ĕllam tsezi , ow towkʾ , im ortiners ew aghchigners biti ĕllakʾ , - g!ĕsē Amenagal Tērĕ » .
47007001	Owremn , sireliner , ays khostowmnerĕ ownenalov , makʾrenkʾ menkʾ mez marmini ow hokii amēn tesag bghdzowtʾenē , ew gatarelakordzenkʾ srpatsʾowmĕ Astowdzoy vakhov .
47007002	Ĕntownetsʾēkʾ mez , , . Ochʾ mēgĕ anirawetsʾinkʾ , ochʾ mēgĕ abaganetsʾinkʾ ew ochʾ mēgĕ geghekʾetsʾinkʾ .
47007003	CHʾem ĕser asiga , tatabartelow hamar tsez , orovhetew nakhabēs ĕser em tʾē towkʾ mer sirtin mēch ēkʾ , miasin meṛnelow ew abrelow .
47007004	Medz ē khōskʾi hamartsagowtʾiwns tsezi hantēb , medz ē tsezmov bardzankʾs , letsʾowadz em mkhitʾarowtʾeamp , chʾapʾazantsʾ owrakh em mer ampoghch taṛabankʾin mēch .
47007005	Orovhetew , erp menkʾ Magetonia hasankʾ , mer marminĕ pnaw antorrowtʾiwn chʾownetsʾaw , ayl amēn goghmē gĕ taṛabēinkʾ : towrsēn gṛiwner gayin , isg nersēn , vakher .
47007006	Paytsʾ Astowadz , or khonarhnerĕ gĕ mkhitʾarē , mez mkhitʾaretsʾ Titosi kalowstov .
47007007	Ew ochʾ miayn anor kalowstov , ayl naew ayn mkhitʾarowtʾeamp , orov inkʾ mkhitʾarowadz ēr tsezmov , erp batmetsʾ mezi tser tenchʾankʾĕ , tser godzĕ , indzi hantēb tser ownetsʾadz nakhantsakhntrowtʾiwnĕ , aynbēs or al aweli owrakhatsʾay .
47007008	Orovhetew , tʾēbēt trtmetsʾowtsʾi tsez ayt namagov , chʾem zghchar , ( tʾēbēt zghchatsʾer ēi , ) kʾani or gĕ nshmarem tʾē ayt namagĕ trtmetsʾowtsʾ tsez , tʾēbēt miayn zhamanag mĕ .
47007009	Owremn g!owrakhanam , ochʾ tʾē kʾani or trtmetsʾakʾ , haba , orovhetew trtmetsʾakʾ abashkharowtʾean hamar : kʾani or trtmetsʾakʾ Astowdzoy owzadz gerbov , orbēszi ochʾinchʾ gorsntsʾowtsʾadz ĕllakʾ mer michotsʾov .
47007010	Artarew Astowdzoy owzadz trtmowtʾiwnĕ gĕ batjaṛē , , abashkharowtʾiwn , pʾrgowtʾean hamar , or chʾi zghchatsʾner : paytsʾ ashkharhi trtmowtʾiwnĕ gĕ batjaṛē mah .
47007011	Kʾani towkʾ trtmetsʾakʾ Astowdzoy owzadz gerbov , aha ayt panĕ tser mēch inchʾ pʾowtʾachanowtʾiwn koyatsʾowtsʾ , noynisg chatakovowtʾiwn , ĕntvzowm , vakh , tenchʾankʾ , nakhantsakhntrowtʾiwn , vrē zhkhntrowtʾiwn : amēn gerbov towkʾ tsezi hawanowtʾiwn towikʾ tʾē ayt khntirin mēch angeghdz ēkʾ .
47007012	Owremn inchʾ or kretsʾi tsezi , ochʾ tʾē anirawowtʾiwnĕ ĕnoghin batjaṛov ēr , ew ochʾ al anirawowtʾiwnĕ groghin batjaṛov , haba , orbēszi erewnay tsezi Astowdzoy aṛchew mer ownetsʾadz pʾowtʾachanowtʾiwnĕ tsezi hantēb .
47007013	Owsti tser mkhitʾarowtʾeamp menkʾ mkhitʾarowetsʾankʾ : ew al aweli owrakhatsʾankʾ Titosi owrakhowtʾean hamar , orovhetew anor hokin hankstatsʾadz ēr polorēt :
47007014	kʾani or amōtʾahar chʾem ĕllar , tsezmov orewē pani mēch bardzenalows hamar anor aṛchew : haba , inchʾbēs amēn pan jshmartowtʾeamp khōsetsʾankʾ tsezi , noynbēs Titosi aṛchew mer bardzankʾn al jshmarit ktnowetsʾaw .
47007015	Naew ir korovĕ aweli aṛat ē tsezi hantēb , minchʾ gĕ veryishē tser polorin hnazantowtʾiwnĕ , tʾē inchʾbēs ahov ow toghov ĕntownetsʾikʾ zinkʾ .
47007016	Owsti g!owrakhanam or amēn pani mēch vstahowtʾiwn ownim tser vray .
47008001	Eghpayrner , tsezi gĕ teghegatsʾnenkʾ Astowdzoy shnorhkʾin masin , or trowadz ē Magetoniayi egeghetsʾinerown :
47008002	tʾē inchʾbēs , taṛabankʾi medz pʾortsi mĕ mēch , irentsʾ aṛat owrakhowtʾiwnĕ ew irentsʾ dzanr aghkʾatowtʾiwnĕ jokhatsʾan irentsʾ harowst aṛatatseṛnowtʾeamp .
47008003	Orovhetew es gĕ vgayem tʾē irentsʾ garoghowtʾean hamemat , ow garoghowtʾenēn al aweli yō zharagam ĕllalov ,
47008004	shat bntowmov g!aghersēin mezi , or ĕntowninkʾ shnorhkʾĕ ew sowrperown hamar eghadz sbasargowtʾean haghortagtsʾowtʾiwnĕ .
47008005	Ochʾ tʾē inchʾbēs menkʾ gĕ yowsayinkʾ , haba irenkʾ zirenkʾ al towin , nakh Tēroch , ow yetoy mezi , Astowdzoy gamkʾov .
47008006	Aynkʾan , or aghachʾetsʾinkʾ Titosi , or inchʾbēs an nakhabēs sgsaw , noynbēs naew awartē tser mēch ayt shnorhkʾn al .
47008007	Hetewapar , inchʾbēs towkʾ jokhatsʾadz ēkʾ amēn panov , ( hawatkʾov , khōskʾov , kitowtʾeamp , ampoghch pʾowtʾachanowtʾeamp ew mezi hantēb tser tadzadz sirov , ) jokhatsʾēkʾ naew ays shnorhkʾov .
47008008	Gĕ khōsim ochʾ tʾē hramayelov , haba , owrishnerown pʾowtʾachanowtʾean aṛitʾov , ow pʾortsargelow hamar tser siroyn angeghdzowtʾiwnĕ .
47008009	Kʾani or towkʾ kitēkʾ mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi shnorhkʾĕ , or tʾēbēt harowst ēr , tsezi hamar aghkʾat eghaw , orbēszi towkʾ harstanakʾ anor aghkʾatanalov .
47008010	Ew ays masin gardzikʾ mĕ gow tam , orovhetew asiga ōktagar ē tsezi , towkʾ , or nakhabēs sgsakʾ , antsʾeal tarowĕnē , ochʾ miayn ĕnel , ayl naew gamenal .
47008011	Isg hima ĕneln al gataretsʾēkʾ , orbēszi , inchʾbēs yō zharowtʾiwn gar , noynbēs al gatarowm ĕllay , tser ownetsʾadzēn .
47008012	Orovhetew etʾē nakhabēs yō zharowtʾiwn ĕllay , talĕ ĕntowneli ē , mēgow mĕ ownetsʾadzin hamemat , ew ochʾ tʾē chʾownetsʾadzin hamemat .
47008013	Kʾani or es chʾem owzer or owrishnerĕ antorr ĕllan ow towkʾ taṛabikʾ :
47008014	haba hawasarowtʾeamp , hima , ays aten , tser liowtʾiwnĕ lratsʾnē anontsʾ bagasĕ , orbēszi anontsʾ liowtʾiwnn al ōr mĕ lratsʾnē tser bagasĕ , ew aysbēs hawasarowtʾiwn ĕllay .
47008015	Inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Anor or shat zhoghvetsʾ , ochʾinchʾ aweltsʾaw , isg anor or kʾichʾ zhoghvetsʾ , ochʾinchʾ nowazetsʾaw » .
47008016	Paytsʾ shnorhagalowtʾiwn Astowdzoy , or ays noyn antsgalitsʾ pʾowtʾachanowtʾiwnĕ traw Titosi sirtin mēch , tsezi hamar .
47008017	Artarew an ĕntownetsʾ mer yortorĕ : paytsʾ aweli pʾowtʾachan ĕllalov , ir isg hamatsaynowtʾeamp knatsʾ tsezi .
47008018	Anor het ghrgetsʾinkʾ naew ayn eghpayrĕ , orown kovestĕ g!ĕllay polor egeghetsʾinerown mēch , awetaranin hamar .
47008019	Ew ochʾ miayn ayskʾan , haba naew egeghetsʾinerēn ĕntrowetsʾaw ipr mezi jamportagitsʾ , ays shnorhkʾin het , or menkʾ gĕ sbasargenkʾ noyn Tēroch pʾaṛkʾin hamar , ow tser yō zharowtʾeamp .
47008020	Gĕ zkowshanayinkʾ or ochʾ mēgĕ mez arataworē ays jokhowtʾean mēch , or gĕ sbasargowi mer michotsʾov :
47008021	kʾani or gĕ mtatrēinkʾ ochʾ miayn Tēroch aṛchew , haba martotsʾ aṛchew al ĕnel inchʾ or bargesht ē .
47008022	Anontsʾ het ghrgetsʾinkʾ mer eghpayrĕ , orown pʾowtʾachanowtʾiwnĕ yajakh pʾortsargadz enkʾ shat panerow mēch , isg hima al aweli pʾowtʾachan ē , kʾani or medz vstahowtʾiwn owni tser vray .
47008023	Inchʾ gĕ veraperi Titosi , an haghortagitsʾs ē ow tser mōt im kordzagitsʾs : isg mer eghpayrnerĕ , egeghetsʾinerēn ghrgowadznern en , ew Kʾristosi pʾaṛkʾĕ .
47008024	Owremn atontsʾ ow egeghetsʾinerown aṛchew tsʾoytsʾ towēkʾ tser siroyn ew tsezi hantēb mer bardzankʾin abatsʾoytsʾĕ .
47009001	Artarew awelort ē or krem tsezi , sowrperown sbasargowtʾean masin ,
47009002	kʾani kitem tser yō zharowtʾiwnĕ : anor masin gĕ bardzenam tsezmov Magetonatsʾinerown aṛchew , ĕselov tʾē Akʾayiatsʾinerĕ antsʾeal tarowĕnē batrastowadz ēin : ow tser nakhantsakhntrowtʾiwnĕ trtetsʾ shat shaterĕ .
47009003	Sagayn ghrgetsʾi eghpayrnerĕ , orbēszi tsezi hantēb mer bardzankʾĕ ĕntownayn chʾĕllay ays masin , haba , inchʾbēs ĕser em , batrastowadz ĕllakʾ :
47009004	orbēszi , erp Magetonatsʾinerĕ kan indzi het ew anbatrast ktnen tsez , menkʾ ( or chʾĕsenkʾ , towkʾ ) amōtʾahar chʾĕllankʾ ays noyn bardzankʾin vstahowtʾean hamar .
47009005	Owremn hargawor hamaretsʾi yortorel eghpayrnerĕ , or nakhabēs kan tsezi ow gankhaw hamakhmpen tser nakhabēs dzanowtsʾanadz aṛatatseṛnowtʾiwnĕ , orbēszi an batrast ĕllay ipr aṛatatseṛnowtʾiwn , ochʾ tʾē ipr akahowtʾiwn .
47009006	Paytsʾ sa kittsʾēkʾ , tʾē an or khnayelov gĕ sermanē , khnayelov al biti hntsē , ew an or aṛatatseṛnowtʾeamp gĕ sermanē , aṛatatseṛnowtʾeamp biti hntsē .
47009007	Iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ tʾogh tay , inchʾbēs oroshadz ē ir sirtin mēch , ochʾ tʾē trtmowtʾeamp gam hargatrapar : orovhetew Astowadz gĕ sirē tsʾndzowtʾeamp towoghĕ .
47009008	Ew Astowadz garogh ē polor shnorhkʾnerov jokhatsʾnel tsez , orbēszi towkʾ , amēn pani mēch amēn aten lman inkʾnapawowtʾiwn ownenalov , jokhanakʾ amēn pari kordzov ,
47009009	inchʾbēs krowadz ē : « Spʾṛetsʾ ew aghkʾatnerown towaw : anor artarowtʾiwnĕ yawitean gĕ mnay » .
47009010	Owremn an , or serm gĕ haytʾaytʾē sermnatsʾanin , geragowri hamar hatsʾ haytʾaytʾē tsezi ow pazmatsʾnē tser howntĕ , , , ew ajetsʾnē tser artarowtʾean btowghnerĕ .
47009011	Amēn pani mēch harstatsʾadz ēkʾ amēn tesag aṛatatseṛnowtʾeamp , inchʾ or mer michotsʾov shnorhagalowtʾiwn gĕ koyatsʾnē Astowdzoy hantēb :
47009012	orovhetew ays bashtōnin sbasargowmĕ ochʾ miayn gĕ lratsʾnē sowrperown bagasĕ , ayl naew gĕ jokhanay shat shnorhagalowtʾiwnnerov , owghghowadz Astowdzoy .
47009013	Ays sbasargowtʾean pʾortsaṛowtʾeamp anonkʾ biti pʾaṛaworen Astowadz , Kʾristosi awetaranin tser tawanadz entʾargowmin hamar , naew tser aṛatatseṛn haghortagtsʾowtʾean hamar , anontsʾ ew polorin het :
47009014	ow biti aghersen tsezi hamar , garōtnalov tsez Astowdzoy kerazantsʾ shnorhkʾin hamar , or tser mēch ē .
47009015	SHnorhagalowtʾiwn Astowdzoy , ir anbatmeli barkewin hamar .
47010001	Es inkʾs , Bōghos , g!aghachʾem tsezi Kʾristosi hezowtʾeamp ew aznowowtʾeamp , es , or tser nergayowtʾean mēch khonarh em , paytsʾ patsʾagay ĕllalov , khizakh em tsezi hantēb .
47010002	G!aghersem or nergay eghadz atens khizakh chʾĕllam ayn vstahowtʾeamp , orov gĕ mtadzem yantowkn ĕllal omantsʾ tēm , oronkʾ mer masin gĕ mtadzen aynbēs , ipr tʾē g!ĕntʾanankʾ marmnaworabēs .
47010003	Kʾani or , tʾēbēt marminov g!ĕntʾanankʾ , ochʾ tʾē marminin hamatsayn gĕ martnchʾinkʾ :
47010004	orovhetew mer martin zēnkʾerĕ marmnawor chʾen , paytsʾ Astowdzoy michotsʾov zōrawor en , amrotsʾnerow kʾantowmin hamar .
47010005	Menkʾ gĕ kʾantenkʾ tramapanowtʾiwnner ew Astowdzoy kitowtʾean tēm inkʾzinkʾ bandzatsʾnogh amēn partsr pan , ow Kʾristosi hnazantowtʾean keri gĕ tartsnenkʾ amēn mtadzowm .
47010006	Ew batrast enkʾ vrē zh aṛnelow amēn anhnazantowtʾean hamar , erp tser hnazantowtʾiwnĕ lman ĕllay .
47010007	Panerow artakʾin erewoytʾin gĕ nayikʾ . Etʾē oewē mēgĕ gĕ vstahi inkʾnir vray , tʾē inkʾ Kʾriotosinn ē , tartseal tʾogh mtadzē inkʾnirmē , tʾē inchʾbēs inkʾ Kʾristosinn ē , noynbēs al , menkʾ .
47010008	Kʾani or noynisg etʾē aweli bardzenayi mer ishkhanowtʾean vray , or Tērĕ towadz ē mezi , shinowtʾean hamar , ew ochʾ tʾē tser kʾantowmin hamar , biti chʾamchʾnayi .
47010009	Orbēszi chʾtʾowi tʾē es g!owzem zarhowretsʾnel tsez namagnerov :
47010010	kʾani or g!ĕsen : « Anor namagnerĕ dzanr ow hzōr en , paytsʾ anor marmnagan nergayowtʾiwnĕ tgar ē , ew ir khōskʾĕ , anark » .
47010011	Aytbisin tʾogh mtadzē tʾē inchʾbēs or enkʾ khōskʾov , namagnerown mēch , erp patsʾagay enkʾ , noynbēs al biti ĕllankʾ kordzov , erp nergay ĕllankʾ .
47010012	Orovhetew menkʾ chʾenkʾ yantknir menkʾ mez tasel gam paghtatel omantsʾ het , or irenkʾ zirenkʾ gĕ yantsnararen : anonkʾ chʾen hasgnar tʾē irenkʾ irentsʾmov gĕ chʾapʾowin ew irarow michew gĕ paghtatowin :
47010013	isg menkʾ chʾapʾē towrs biti chʾbardzenankʾ , haba chʾapʾin hamemat ayn sahmanin , or Astowadz pashkhetsʾ mezi , orbēszi hasninkʾ minchʾew tsez .
47010014	Artarew menkʾ mez chʾenkʾ ĕntartsager mer chʾapʾēn aweli , orbēs tʾē hasadz chʾĕllayinkʾ tsezi : kʾani or irabēs hasankʾ minchʾew tsez , Kʾristosi awetaranov .
47010015	Mer chʾapʾēn towrs biti chʾbardzenankʾ , owrishnerown ashkhatankʾnerov , haba yoys owninkʾ or , erp tser hawatkʾĕ aji , aṛatōrēn medzarowinkʾ tsezmov , mer sahmanin hamemat :
47010016	orbēszi tsezmē antin al awetaranenkʾ , ew ochʾ tʾē bardzenankʾ owrishi sahmanin mēch eghadz batrast panerov .
47010017	Paytsʾ ov or bardzenay , Tērochmov tʾogh bardzenay :
47010018	orovhetew knahateli ē ochʾ tʾē an , or inkʾzinkʾ gĕ yantsnararē , haba an , or Tērĕ gĕ yantsnararē .
47011001	Erani tʾē garenayikʾ kʾichʾ mĕ hantowr zhel im anmtowtʾeans : ew isgabēs , hantowr zhetsʾēkʾ indzi .
47011002	Orovhetew nakhantsakhntir em tsezi hantēb , Astowdzoy nakhantsakhntrowtʾeamp : kʾani or mēg amowsini nshanetsʾi tsez , orbēszi Kʾristosi nergayatsʾnem tsez , makʾragentsʾagh goysi mĕ bēs .
47011003	Paytsʾ gĕ vakhnam or , inchʾbēs ōtsĕ khapetsʾ Ewan ir khoramangowtʾeamp , noynbēs tser mitkʾerĕ abaganin Kʾristosi hantēb eghadz barzamtowtʾenēn .
47011004	Orovhetew etʾē mēgĕ kar ew kʾarozēr owrish Yisows mĕ , or menkʾ chʾenkʾ kʾarozadz , gam stanayikʾ owrish hoki mĕ , or chʾēkʾ statsʾadz , gam owrish awetaran , or chʾēkʾ ĕntownadz , law gĕ hantowr zhēikʾ aytbisiin .
47011005	Kʾani or es gĕ sebem tʾē ochʾinchʾov et mnatsʾadz em kerakoyn aṛakʾealnerēn :
47011006	ow tʾēbēt anvar zh em khōskʾi mēch , paytsʾ ochʾ , kitowtʾeamp : sagayn amēn pani mēch menkʾ mez ampoghchovin patsʾayaytetsʾinkʾ tsezi .
47011007	Mitʾē skhal kordzadz eghay es zis khonarhetsʾnelov , orbēszi towkʾ partsranakʾ , kʾani or tsri kʾarozetsʾi tsezi Astowdzoy awetaranĕ :
47011008	goghobtetsʾi owrish egeghetsʾiner , tʾoshag aṛnelov anontsʾmē , orbēszi sbasargem tsezi .
47011009	TSer mēch nergay eghadz atens , erp garōtowtʾean mēch ēi , tsezmē ochʾ mēgown peṛ eghay : orovhetew Magetoniayēn egogh eghpayrnerĕ lratsʾowtsʾin inchʾ or gĕ bagsēr indzi : ew amēn gerbov zkowshatsʾay tsezi dzanrowtʾiwn ĕllalē , ow tartseal biti zkowshanam .
47011010	Kʾani or Kʾristosi jshmartowtʾiwnĕ im mēchs ē , ochʾ mēgĕ biti arkilē zis ays bardzankʾēn , Akʾayiayi shrchannerĕ .
47011011	Inchʾow : kʾani or chʾem sirer tsez . Astowadz kitē .
47011012	Paytsʾ inchʾ or ĕri , tartseal biti ĕnem zayn , orbēszi aṛitʾĕ zlanam anontsʾ , or aṛitʾ g!owzen , orbēszi irenkʾ al mezi bēs ktnowin inchʾov or gĕ bardzenan .
47011013	Orovhetew aytbisinerĕ sowt aṛakʾealner en , nenk kordzaworner , or irenkʾ zirenkʾ gĕ gerbaranapʾokhen Kʾristosi aṛakʾealnerow .
47011014	Ew zarmanali chʾē , orovhetew noyninkʾn Satanan lowsawor hreshtagi gĕ gerbaranapʾokhowi .
47011015	Owremn medz pan mĕ chʾē , or anor sbasargownern al artarowtʾean sbasargownerow gerbaranapʾokhowin . Anontsʾ vakhjanĕ biti ĕllay irentsʾ kordzerown hamemat .
47011016	Tartseal g!ĕsem , ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh gardzē tʾē es anmit em : aylabēs , konē anmiti mĕ bēs ĕntownetsʾēkʾ zis , orbēszi es al kʾichʾ mĕ bardzenam intsmov .
47011017	Inchʾ or gĕ khōsim , gĕ khōsim ochʾ tʾē Tēroch goghmēn , haba , orbēs tʾē anmtowtʾeamp , ays bardzankʾin vstahowtʾeamp .
47011018	Kʾani shater gĕ bardzenan marmini hamemat , es al biti bardzenam :
47011019	kʾani or towkʾ hajoykʾov gĕ hantowr zhēkʾ anmitnerown , towkʾ tsez imastown ngatelov .
47011020	Orovhetew gĕ hantowr zhēkʾ , etʾē mēgĕ strowg ĕnē tsez , etʾē mēgĕ lapʾē tser statsʾowadzkʾĕ , etʾē mēgĕ pan mĕ aṛnē tsezmē , etʾē mēgĕ bandzatsʾnē inkʾzinkʾ , etʾē mēgĕ zarnē tser eresin .
47011021	Gĕ khōsim orbēs anbatowowtʾiwn , ipr tʾē menkʾ tgar eghadz ĕllayinkʾ : paytsʾ inchʾ pani mēch or mēgĕ yantowkn ē , ( anmtowtʾeamp gĕ khōsim , ) es al yantowkn em .
47011022	Anonkʾ Eprayetsʾi en : es al . Israyelatsʾi en : es al .
47011023	Aprahami zarmēn en : es al . Kʾristosi sbasargowner en : ( anmtowtʾeamp gĕ khōsim ) al aweli es . Ashkhatankʾnerov , aweli shat , dzedzerov , chʾapʾēn aweli , panterow mēch , aweli shat , mahowan vtanknerov , yajakh .
47011024	Hreanerēn hink ankam kʾaṛasownēn mēg bagas dzedz statsʾay .
47011025	Erekʾ ankam tsaghgov dzedzowetsʾay : mēg ankam kʾargodzowetsʾay : erekʾ ankam nawapegowtʾiwn gretsʾi : kisher mĕ ow tsʾereg mĕ mnatsʾi dzovow antowntin mēch .
47011026	Yajakh chʾarchʾarowetsʾay jamportowtʾiwnnerow mēch : gretsʾi vtankner keterēn , vtankner awazagnerēn : vtankner im tsʾeghēs , vtankner hetʾanosnerēn : vtankner kʾaghakʾi mēch , vtankner anabati mēch : vtankner dzovow vray , vtankner sowt eghpayrnerow mēch .
47011027	Ashkhatankʾi ow ta zhankʾi mēch ēi , yajakh , hsgowmnerow mēch , anōtʾowtʾean ew dzarawi mēch , shat ankam , dzomabahowtʾean , tsʾowrti ow mergowtʾean mēch .
47011028	Patsʾi ayt artakʾin panerēn , polor egeghetsʾinerown hokĕ gĕ partowēr vras amēn ōr .
47011029	Ov tgar ē , ow es al tgar chʾem : ov gĕ kaytʾagghi , ew im sirts chʾi vaṛir .
47011030	Etʾē bētkʾ ĕllay bardzenal , biti bardzenam im tgarowtʾiwnnerows verapereal panerov .
47011031	Mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi Astowadzĕ ew Hayrĕ , or yawitean ōrhneal ē , kitē tʾē chʾem ster .
47011032	Tamasgosi mēch , Areta tʾakaworin azkabetĕ , Tamasgostsʾinerown kʾaghakʾĕ gĕ bahbanēr bahagazōrkʾov , owzelov tserpagalel zis .
47011033	Paytsʾ barisbēn var ichetsʾowtsʾin zis , batowhanē mĕ , zampiwghi mĕ mēch , ow khowsapʾetsʾay anor tseṛkʾerēn .
47012001	Bardzenal , irabēs ōktagar chʾē indzi : sagayn biti kam Tēroch tesilkʾnerown ew yaytnowtʾiwnnerown .
47012002	Gĕ janchʾnam mart mĕ Kʾristosov , aweli kʾan tasnchʾors tari aṛach : ( arteōkʾ marminov ēr , chʾem kiter : arteōkʾ marminēn towrs ēr , chʾem kiter : Astowadz kitē : ) aytbisi mēgĕ yapʾshtagowetsʾaw minchʾew errort erginkʾĕ .
47012003	Ew kitem tʾē aytbisi mart mĕ , ( arteōkʾ marminov ēr tʾē marminēn towrs ēr , chʾem kiter , Astowadz kitē , )
47012004	yapʾshtagowetsʾaw trakhtĕ ow lsetsʾ anjaṛeli khōskʾer , orontsʾ masin martow mĕ hamar artōnowadz chʾē khōsil .
47012005	Es biti bardzenam aytbisi mēgov : sagayn biti chʾbardzenam es intsmov , paytsʾ miayn im tgarowtʾiwnnerovs .
47012006	Orovhetew , noynisg etʾē owzem bardzenal , anmit biti chʾĕllam , kʾani or biti ĕsem jshmartowtʾiwnĕ : paytsʾ gĕ khnayem khōskʾs , or ochʾ mēgĕ im vras aweli hamarowm ownenay , kʾan inchʾ or gĕ tesnē im vras gam gĕ lsē im masis .
47012007	Ew orbēszi chʾapʾēn aweli chʾbandzam yaytnowtʾiwnnerown kerazantsʾowtʾeamp , marmini pʾowsh mĕ trowetsʾaw indzi , Satanayi batkamawor mĕ , gṛpʾaharelow hamar zis , orbēszi chʾbandzam chʾapʾēn aweli .
47012008	Asor hamar erekʾ ankam aghachʾetsʾi Tēroch , or heṛanay intsmē .
47012009	Paytsʾ ĕsaw indzi : « Im shnorhkʾs gĕ pawē kʾezi , orovhetew im zōrowtʾiwns g!irakordzowi tgarowtʾean mēch » . Owremn medz hajoykʾov biti bardzenam aṛawelabēs im tgarowtʾiwnnerovs , orbēszi Kʾristosi zōrowtʾiwnĕ hankchʾi im vras .
47012010	Owsti gĕ yō zharim tgarowtʾiwnnerow , arhamarhankʾnerow , hargatrankʾnerow , haladzankʾnerow ew taknabnerow , Kʾristosi hamar , orovhetew erp tgar em , ayn aten zōrawor em .
47012011	Es anmit eghay bardzenalov : towkʾ hargatretsʾikʾ zis : orovhetew es bartawor ēi yantsnararowadz ĕllal tsezmē , kʾani or ochʾinchʾov et gĕ mnam kerakoyn aṛakʾealnerēn , tʾēbēt es ochʾinchʾ em .
47012012	Irabēs aṛakʾeali mĕ nshannerĕ kordzowetsʾan tser mēch , ampoghch hamperowtʾeamp , nshannerov , skʾanchʾelikʾnerov ew hrashkʾnerov .
47012013	Orovhetew inchʾov et mnatsʾikʾ miws egeghetsʾinerēn , patsʾi anov , or es peṛ chʾeghay tsezi . Neretsʾēkʾ indzi ays anirawowtʾiwnĕ .
47012014	Aha ays errort ankamn ē or batrast em kalow tsezi : paytsʾ peṛ biti chʾĕllam tsezi , orovhetew gĕ pʾntṛem ochʾ tʾē tser ownetsʾadzĕ , haba , tsez . Kʾani or zawagnerĕ bartawor chʾen kants tizel dznoghnerown hamar , haba dznoghnerĕ , zawagnerown hamar .
47012015	Ow es medz hajoykʾov biti dzakhsem ew dzakhsowim al tsezi hamar , tʾēew nowaz sirowim tsezmē , minchʾ shat aweli gĕ sirem tsez .
47012016	Sagayn aytbēs tʾogh ĕllay , es tsez chʾdzanrapeṛnetsʾi : paytsʾ tʾerews mēgĕ ĕsē tʾē khoramang ĕllalov , nenkowtʾeamp pṛnetsʾi tsez .
47012017	Mitʾē tsez geghekʾetsʾi oewē mēgown michotsʾov , or ghrgetsʾi tsezi .
47012018	Aghachʾetsʾi Titosi , ow eghpayr mĕ ghrgetsʾi anor het : mitʾē Titos geghekʾetsʾ tsez . Menkʾ noyn hokiov chʾĕntʾatsʾankʾ , noyn hetkʾerov chʾkʾaletsʾinkʾ .
47012019	Tartseal , gĕ gardzēkʾ tʾē menkʾ mez gĕ chatakovenkʾ tser aṛchew . Menkʾ Kʾristosov gĕ khōsinkʾ , Astowdzoy aṛchew : paytsʾ amēn pan g!ĕnenkʾ , sireliner , tser shinowtʾean hamar .
47012020	Orovhetew gĕ vakhnam or erp kam , kowtsʾē chʾktnem tsez owzadzis bēs , ow es al , tsezi hamar , ktnowim tser chʾowzadzin bēs : tʾerews tser mēch ĕllan hagamartowtʾiwnner , nakhantsner , zayroytʾner , hagaṛagowtʾiwnner , pampasankʾner , pansargowtʾiwnner , yokhortankʾner , khaṛnagowtʾiwnner .
47012021	Tʾerews erp tartseal kam , im Astowadzs nowastatsʾnē zis tser kʾov , ow skam shaterown hamar , or nakhabēs meghanchʾadz en paytsʾ abashkharadz chʾen irentsʾ kordzadz anmakʾrowtʾenēn , boṛngowtʾenēn ow tsʾopʾowtʾenēn .
47013001	Ays errort ankamn ē or gow kam tsezi : amēn khōskʾ biti hastatowi ergow gam erekʾ vganerow peranov .
47013002	Nakhabēs ĕsi , ow ergrort ankam gankhaw g!ĕsem ( orbēs tʾē nergay ĕllam ) : tʾēbēt hima patsʾagay em , gĕ krem aṛachowan meghanchʾoghnerown ew polor miwsnerown , or etʾē tartseal kam , biti chʾkhnayem :
47013003	orovhetew abatsʾoytsʾ gĕ pʾntṛēkʾ tʾē Kʾristos gĕ khōsi intsmov . An tgar chʾē tsezi hantēb , haba hzōr ē tser mēch :
47013004	kʾani or , tʾēbēt khachʾowetsʾaw tgarowtʾeamp , g!abri Astowdzoy zōrowtʾeamp : menkʾ al tgar enkʾ anov , paytsʾ biti abrinkʾ anor het , Astowdzoy zōrowtʾeamp , tsezi sbasargelow hamar .
47013005	Pʾortsetsʾēkʾ towkʾ tsez , tʾē hawatkʾin mēchn ēkʾ : kʾnnetsʾēkʾ towkʾ tsez . CHʾēkʾ kiter towkʾ tsezmē , tʾē Yisows Kʾristos tser mēchn ē , etʾē khoteli chʾĕllakʾ .
47013006	Paytsʾ gĕ yowsam tʾē biti kitnakʾ , tʾē menkʾ khoteli chʾenkʾ .
47013007	G!aghōtʾem Astowdzoy , or towkʾ ochʾ mēg chʾarikʾ ĕnēkʾ : ochʾ tʾē , orbēszi menkʾ knahateli erewinkʾ , haba , orbēszi towkʾ ĕnēkʾ inchʾ or bargesht ē , tʾēew menkʾ khoteli tʾowinkʾ .
47013008	Orovhetew jshmartowtʾean tēm ochʾinchʾ grnankʾ ĕnel , haba , jshmartowtʾean hamar .
47013009	Kʾani or g!owrakhanankʾ , erp menkʾ tgar enkʾ , isg towkʾ , zōrawor ēkʾ : sa g!ĕghtsankʾ naew - tser gatarelowtʾiwnĕ .
47013010	Owsti gĕ krem tsezi ays panerĕ , patsʾagay ĕllalov , orbēszi erp nergay ĕllam , sastgowtʾeamp chʾvarowim ayn irawasowtʾean hamemat , or Tērĕ towaw indzi , shinelow , ew ochʾ tʾē kʾantelow hamar .
47013011	Verchabēs , eghpayrner , oghch eghēkʾ . Gatareal eghēkʾ , law mkhitʾarowetsʾēkʾ , miapan eghēkʾ , khaghaghowtʾeamp abretsʾēkʾ : ew siroy ow khaghaghowtʾean Astowadzĕ tsezi het biti ĕllay .
47013012	Parewetsʾēkʾ zirar sowrp hampoyrov : polor sowrperĕ gĕ parewen tsez .
47013013	
47013014	Tēr Yisows Kʾristosi shnorhkʾĕ , Astowdzoy sērĕ ew Sowrp Hokiin haghortowtʾiwnĕ tser polorin het . Amēn .
48001001	Bōghos , aṛakʾeal eghadz , ochʾ martotsʾmē , ochʾ al martow michotsʾov , haba Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov , ew Hayr Astowdzoy , or meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanetsʾ zayn ,
48001002	ow polor eghpayrnerĕ , or indzi het en , Kaghatiayi egeghetsʾinerown :
48001003	shnorhkʾ ew khaghaghowtʾiwn tsezi Hayr Astowdzmē , ow mer Tērochmēn , Yisows Kʾristosē ,
48001004	or ĕndzayetsʾ inkʾzinkʾ mer meghkʾerown hamar , orbēszi azatē mez ays nergay chʾar ashkharhēn , Astowdzoy ew mer Hōr gamkʾin hamatsayn ,
48001005	orown pʾaṛkʾ tarē tar , , . Amēn .
48001006	Gĕ zarmanam or aytchʾapʾ showt antsʾadz ēkʾ ayn awetaranēn , or ganchʾetsʾ tsez Kʾristosi shnorhkʾin , owrish awetarani mĕ :
48001007	an owrish awetaran mĕ chʾē , ayl gan omankʾ , or gĕ vrtoven tsez , ow g!owzen kheghatʾiwrel Kʾristosi awetaranĕ .
48001008	Paytsʾ noynisg etʾē menkʾ , gam erginkʾēn hreshtag mĕ , kʾarozē tsezi owrish orewē awetaran , kʾan zayn or menkʾ kʾarozetsʾinkʾ tsezi , nzoveal ĕllay .
48001009	Inchʾbēs nakhabēs ĕsinkʾ , hima al es tartseal g!ĕsem : « Etʾē mēgĕ kʾarozē tsezi owrish orewē awetaran , kʾan zayn or towkʾ ĕntownetsʾikʾ , nzoveal ĕllay » .
48001010	Orovhetew hima martig gĕ hamozem , tʾē Astowadz : gam martig gĕ chanam hajetsʾnel . Kʾani or etʾē es tagawin martig hajetsʾnēi , al Kʾristosi dzaṛay chʾēi ĕllar .
48001011	Paytsʾ tsezi gĕ dzanowtsʾanem , eghpayrner , tʾē intsmē kʾarozowadz awetaranĕ , martow hamatsayn chʾē .
48001012	Orovhetew es zayn ochʾ martē ĕntownetsʾi , ochʾ al mēgē mĕ sorvetsʾay , haba , Yisows Kʾristosi yaytnowtʾean michotsʾov .
48001013	Kʾani or towkʾ lsadz ēkʾ im nakhgin varkʾis masin , hrēowtʾean mēch , tʾē inchʾbēs chʾapʾēn aweli gĕ haladzēi Astowdzoy egeghetsʾin , ow gĕ tabalēi zayn .
48001014	Ew hrēowtʾean mēch gĕ yaṛachtimēi , aweli kʾan im tsʾeghis mēch eghadz shat mĕ hasagagitsʾners , kerazantsʾōrēn aweli nakhantsakhntir ĕllalov hayrerows awantowtʾiwnnerown .
48001015	Paytsʾ erp Astowadz , ( or zatetsʾ zis mōrs orovaynēn ew ganchʾetsʾ ir shnorhkʾin michotsʾov , )
48001016	parehajetsʾaw ir Ortin yaytnel indzi , orbēszi awetem zayn hetʾanosnerown mēch , isgoyn , marminin ew ariwnin het chʾkhorhrtagtsʾetsʾay ,
48001017	ochʾ al Erowsaghēm elay , intsmē aṛach aṛakʾeal eghoghnerown kʾov , haba Arapia katsʾi , aba tartseal Tamasgos veratartsay .
48001018	Yetoy , erekʾ tari etkʾ , Erowsaghēm elay Betrosĕ tesnelow , ew tasnhink ōr anor het getsʾay .
48001019	Sagayn aṛakʾealnerēn owrish ochʾ mēgĕ tesay , ayl miayn Yagoposĕ , Tēroch eghpayrĕ .
48001020	Inchʾ or gĕ krem tsezi , aha Astowdzoy aṛchew gĕ hastatem , tʾē chʾem ster .
48001021	Aba katsʾi Sowriayi ow Giligiayi shrchannerĕ .
48001022	Es tēmkʾov andzanōtʾ ēi Hrēastani mēch eghadz Kʾristosi egeghetsʾinerown :
48001023	anonkʾ miayn lsadz ēin tʾē “ an or zhamanagin gĕ haladzēr mez , hima g!awetē ayn hawatkʾĕ , or atenōkʾ gĕ tabalēr ” ,
48001024	ew intsmov gĕ pʾaṛaworēin Astowadz .
48002001	Yetoy , tasnchʾors tari etkʾ , tartseal partsratsʾay Erowsaghēm , Paṛnapasi het , Titosn al miasin aṛnelov .
48002002	Partsratsʾadz ēi yaytnowtʾeamp , ew anontsʾ nergayatsʾowtsʾi ayn awetaranĕ , or hetʾanosnerown mēch gĕ kʾarozem : paytsʾ aṛantsin anontsʾ , or ereweliner ēin , orbēszi ĕntownayn chʾvazem gam vazadz chʾĕllam .
48002003	Paytsʾ ochʾ isg indzi het eghogh Titosĕ , or Yoyn ēr , hargatrowetsʾaw tʾlpʾatowil ,
48002004	kaghtni ners perowadz sowt eghpayrnerown batjaṛov , oronkʾ ners sbrtadz ēin , lrteselow hamar Kʾristos Yisowsov mer ownetsʾadz azatowtʾiwnĕ , orbēszi strowg ĕnen mez :
48002005	anontsʾ teghi chʾtowinkʾ , noynisg kʾichʾ mĕ aten , , entʾargowelov , orbēszi awetaranin jshmartowtʾiwnĕ tser mēch mnay .
48002006	Isg anonkʾ or gĕ gardzowēin pan mĕ ĕllal - inchʾ or ēin , atiga indzi hartsʾ chʾē , kʾani or Astowadz martotsʾ achʾaṛowtʾiwn chʾ!ĕner - , aynbēs gardzowadznerĕ aweli ochʾinchʾ haghortetsʾin indzi :
48002007	haba , ĕnthagaṛagĕ , erp tesan tʾē antʾlpʾatnerown awetaranĕ indzi vstahowadz ē , inchʾbēs Betrosi al , tʾlpʾatowadznerownĕ ,
48002008	( orovhetew an or nerkordzetsʾ Betrosi mēch , tʾlpʾatowadznerown aṛakʾelowtʾean hamar , noynbēs nerkordzetsʾ im mēchs , hetʾanosnerown hantēb , )
48002009	ow erp Yagopos , Gepʾas ew Yovhannēs , oronkʾ siwner gardzowadz ēin , kitagtsʾetsʾan indzi trowadz shnorhkʾin , irentsʾ ach tseṛkʾĕ towin indzi ow Paṛnapasi , ipr nshan haghortagtsʾowtʾean , orbēszi menkʾ kʾarozenkʾ hetʾanosnerown , isg irenkʾ , tʾlpʾatowadznerown .
48002010	Miayn tʾē g!owzēin or aghkʾatnerĕ yishenkʾ , inchʾ or es al pʾowtʾatsʾi ĕnel .
48002011	Sagayn erp Betros egaw Antiokʾ , es timatartsetsʾi anor , orovhetew barsaweli ēr .
48002012	Artarew Yagoposi kʾovēn omantsʾ kalēn aṛach , inkʾ hetʾanosnerown het ankhtrapar g!owtēr : paytsʾ erp egan , ĕngrgetsʾaw ew inkʾzinkʾ zatetsʾ , tʾlpʾatowadznerēn vakhnalov .
48002013	Miws Hreanern al noynbēs anor het geghdzetsʾin , aynkʾan , or Paṛnapas al anontsʾ geghdzikʾēn tbaworowetsʾaw .
48002014	Paytsʾ erp tesay tʾē owghigh chʾen ĕntʾanar , awetaranin jshmartowtʾean hamatsayn , polorin aṛchew Betrosi ĕsi : « Etʾē town , or Hreay es , hetʾanosnerow bēs g!abris , ew ochʾ tʾē Hreanerow bēs , inchʾow gĕ hargatres hetʾanosnerĕ , or Hreanerow bēs abrin » .
48002015	Menkʾ , or pnig Hreaner enkʾ , ew ochʾ tʾē hetʾanos meghaworner ,
48002016	kitnalov tʾē mart ōrēnkʾin kordzerov chʾē or g!artaranay , haba Yisows Kʾristosi hawatkʾov , menkʾ al hawatatsʾinkʾ Kʾristos Yisowsi , orbēszi artaranankʾ Kʾristosi hawatkʾov , ochʾ tʾē ōrēnkʾin kordzerov : orovhetew ōrēnkʾin kordzerov ochʾ mēgĕ biti artaranay .
48002017	Isg etʾē menkʾ al , Kʾristosov artaranalow mer chankʾin mēch , meghawor ktnowinkʾ , owremn Kʾristos meghkʾi sbasargow g!ĕllay . Amenewin .
48002018	Kʾani or etʾē im kʾagadz paners tartseal gaṛowtsʾanem , es zis ōrinazantsʾ gĕ tartsnem .
48002019	Orovhetew es , ōrēnkʾin michotsʾov , meṛay ōrēnkʾin , orbēszi abrim Astowdzoy hamar .
48002020	Kʾristosi het khachʾowetsʾay : sagayn g!abrim , paytsʾ al ochʾ tʾē es , haba Kʾristos g!abri im mēchs . Isg ayn geankʾĕ or hima marminovs g!abrim , Astowdzoy Ortiin hawatkʾov g!abrim , or siretsʾ zis ew inkʾzinkʾ ĕndzayetsʾ indzi hamar .
48002021	Es Astowdzoy shnorhkʾĕ chʾem chncher : orovhetew etʾē artarowtʾiwnĕ ōrēnkʾēn ē , owremn Kʾristos ĕntownayn meṛaw .
48003001	Ov anmit Kaghatatsʾiner , ov tsez hmayetsʾ , minchʾteṛ tser mēch , tser achʾkʾerown aṛchew Yisows Kʾristos nakhabēs ngarakrowetsʾaw , khachʾowadz .
48003002	Sa miayn g!owzem sorvil tsezmē : - towkʾ Hokin statsʾakʾ ōrēnkʾin kordzerov tʾē hawatkʾin hnazantelov .
48003003	Aytkʾan anmit ēkʾ : Hokiov sgsakʾ , ew hima marminov g!awartēkʾ .
48003004	Zowr teghĕ aytkʾan chʾarchʾarowetsʾakʾ ( etʾē zowr teghn al ĕllar ) .
48003005	Owremn an , or tsezi Hokin gĕ haytʾaytʾē ow tser mēch hrashkʾner gĕ kordzē , mitʾē tser gataradz ōrēnkʾi kordzerown hamar g!ĕnē , tʾē hawatkʾi hnazantowtʾean hamar :
48003006	inchʾbēs Apraham hawatatsʾ Astowdzoy , ew atiga artarowtʾiwn sebowetsʾaw anor .
48003007	Owremn kittsʾēkʾ tʾē anonkʾ or hawatkʾēn en , anonkʾ en Aprahami ortinerĕ .
48003008	Kirkʾĕ , nakhateselov tʾē Astowadz hetʾanosnerĕ biti artaratsʾnē hawatkʾi michotsʾov , nakhabēs awetetsʾ Aprahami , ĕselov : « Kʾezmov biti ōrhnowin polor azkerĕ » .
48003009	Owsti anonkʾ or hawatkʾēn en , g!ōrhnowin hawatatsʾeal Aprahami het .
48003010	Orovhetew polor anonkʾ or ōrēnkʾin kordzerēn en , anēdzkʾi tag en , kʾani or krowadz ē : « Anidzeal ĕllay ov or chʾi yaratewer ōrēnkʾi kirkʾin polor krowadznerown mēch , zanonkʾ kordzatrelow hamar » .
48003011	Isg patsʾayayt ē tʾē ochʾ mēgĕ g!artaranay Astowdzoy aṛchew ōrēnkʾov , kʾani or “ artarĕ hawatkʾov biti abri ” .
48003012	Paytsʾ ōrēnkʾĕ hawatkʾēn chʾē , haba , “ ayn martĕ or gĕ kordzatrē zanonkʾ , biti abri anontsʾmov ” .
48003013	Kʾristos pʾrgankʾov knetsʾ mez ōrēnkʾi anēdzkʾēn , mezi hamar anidzowelov , ( orovhetew krowadz ē : « Anidzeal ē ov or pʾaytēn gĕ gakhowi » )
48003014	orbēszi Aprahami ōrhnowtʾiwnĕ kay hetʾanosnerown vray , Kʾristos Yisowsi michotsʾov : orbēszi menkʾ al stanankʾ Hokiin khostowmĕ , hawatkʾi michotsʾov .
48003015	Martotsʾ sovorowtʾean hamatsayn gĕ khōsim , eghpayrner . Noynisg martow mĕ vaweratsʾowtsʾadz gtagĕ ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ chnchē , gam al anor vray owrish pan mĕ g!aweltsʾnē .
48003016	Owremn khostowmnerĕ eghan Aprahami ew anor zarmin . CHʾ!ĕser : « Ew kʾow zarmerowt » , aysinkʾn , shaterow . Haba gĕ khōsi mēg zarmi masin : « Ew kʾow zarmit » , or Kʾristos ē .
48003017	Paytsʾ sa g!ĕsem : ayn owkhtĕ , or nakhabēs Astowdzmē vaweratsʾowetsʾaw Kʾristosov , chʾi grnar chʾors hariwr eresown tari etkʾ anvawer taṛnal ōrēnkʾēn , khostowmĕ ochʾnchʾatsʾnelov .
48003018	Orovhetew etʾē zhaṛankowtʾiwnĕ ōrēnkʾēn ē , owremn al khostowmēn chʾē : paytsʾ Astowadz khostowmov shnorhetsʾ zayn Aprahami .
48003019	Haba inchʾow trowetsʾaw ōrēnkʾĕ . An aweltsʾaw , ōrinazantsʾowtʾiwnnerĕ yaytnelow hamar , ( minchʾew or kar ayn zarmĕ , orown eghadz ēr khostowmĕ , ) ew hreshtagnerow goghmē batowirowetsʾaw michnorti mĕ tseṛkʾov .
48003020	Isg michnortĕ , miayn mēg antsi michnort chʾē : sagayn Astowadz mēg ē .
48003021	Owremn ōrēnkʾĕ hagaṛag ē Astowdzoy khostowmnerown . Amenewin : kʾani or etʾē trowadz ĕllar aynbisi ōrēnkʾ mĕ , or garenar geankʾ tal , ayn aten irabēs artarowtʾiwnĕ ōrēnkʾov g!ĕllar .
48003022	Paytsʾ Kirkʾĕ polorĕ pʾagetsʾ meghkʾi tag , orbēszi Yisows Kʾristosi hawatkʾov eghadz khostowmĕ trowi hawatatsʾealnerown .
48003023	Paytsʾ hawatkʾin kalēn aṛach , ōrēnkʾin tag bahbanowadz ēinkʾ , pʾagowadz ayn hawatkʾēn , or yetakayin biti yaytnowēr .
48003024	Hetewapar ōrēnkʾĕ eghaw mer tastiaragĕ , mez aṛachnortelow Kʾristosi , orbēszi menkʾ hawatkʾov artaranankʾ .
48003025	Paytsʾ hawatkʾin kalēn etkʾ , aylews tastiaragi tag chʾenkʾ ,
48003026	orovhetew towkʾ polort Astowdzoy ortiner ēkʾ , Kʾristos Yisowsi vray eghadz hawatkʾov :
48003027	kʾani or towkʾ polort , or Kʾristosov mgrtowetsʾakʾ , Kʾristosĕ hakakʾ .
48003028	Al ochʾ Hreay gay , ochʾ Yoyn : ochʾ strowg gay , ochʾ azat : ochʾ arow gay , ochʾ ēk : orovhetew towkʾ polort mēg ēkʾ Kʾristos Yisowsov .
48003029	Isg etʾē towkʾ Kʾristosinn ēkʾ , owremn Aprahami zarmn ēkʾ , ew khostowmin hamatsayn , zhaṛankortner .
48004001	Paytsʾ aynkʾan aten or zhaṛankortĕ manowg ē , g!ĕsem tʾē ochʾinchʾov gĕ tarperi strowgē mĕ , tʾēbēt polorin tērn ē :
48004002	haba khnamagalnerow ew hokatarnerow heghinagowtʾean tag ē , minchʾew hōrĕ jshtadz baymana zhamĕ .
48004003	Noynbēs al menkʾ , erp manowg ēinkʾ , ashkharhi sgzpownkʾnerown tag strowg ēinkʾ .
48004004	Paytsʾ erp zhamanagĕ lrowmin hasaw , Astowadz ghrgetsʾ ir Ortin , or gnochmē dznaw ew ōrēnkʾin tag mtaw ,
48004005	orbēszi pʾrgankʾov knē ōrēnkʾin tag eghoghnerĕ : orbēszi menkʾ ortekrowtʾiwnĕ stanankʾ .
48004006	Ew kʾani or towkʾ ortiner ēkʾ , Astowadz tser sirterown mēch ghrgetsʾ ir Ortiin Hokin , or g!aghaghagē : « Appa , Hayr » .
48004007	Hetewapar al strowg chʾes , haba , orti : ow etʾē orti , owremn , Astowdzoy zhaṛankortĕ Kʾristosi michotsʾov .
48004008	Owremn ayn aten erp chʾēikʾ janchʾnar Astowadz , gĕ dzaṛayēikʾ anontsʾ , or pnowtʾeamp astowadzner chʾēin .
48004009	Sagayn hima or janchʾtsʾakʾ Astowadz , gam manawant , janchʾtsʾowetsʾakʾ Astowdzmē , inchʾbēs gĕ verataṛnakʾ ayn tgar ew aghkʾat sgzpownkʾnerown , orontsʾ tartseal g!owzēkʾ strowg ĕllal .
48004010	Gĕ bahēkʾ ōrerĕ , amisnerĕ , zhamanagnern ow tarinerĕ :
48004011	gĕ vakhnam tsezi hamar , or kowtsʾē zowr teghĕ ashkhatadz ĕllam tser vray .
48004012	Eghpayrner , g!aghersem tsezi , indzi bēs eghēkʾ , orovhetew es al tsezi bēs eghay : towkʾ pnaw vnasadz chʾēkʾ indzi .
48004013	Towkʾ kitēkʾ tʾē inchʾbēs , marminis tgarowtʾeamp , awetaranetsʾi tsezi aṛachin ankam :
48004014	paytsʾ marminis vray gradz pʾortsowtʾiwns chʾanarketsʾikʾ , ochʾ al b zhkatsʾikʾ : haba Astowdzoy hreshtagi mĕ bēs ĕntownetsʾikʾ zis , Kʾristos Yisowsi bēs .
48004015	Owsti owr ē , , tser ayt atenowan eranowtʾiwnĕ : kʾani or es gĕ vgayem tsezi tʾē etʾē gareli ĕllar , tser achʾkʾerĕ biti khlēikʾ ew zanonkʾ indzi tayikʾ .
48004016	Mitʾē tser tʾshnamin eghay , tsezi jshmartowtʾiwnĕ khōselov .
48004017	Anonkʾ nakhantsakhntir en tsezi hantēb , paytsʾ ochʾ pari nbatagov : noynisg g!owzen mez vtarel , orbēszi nakhantsakhntir ĕllakʾ irentsʾ hantēb .
48004018	Sagayn law ē nakhantsakhntir ĕllal pariin hantēb , amēn aten , ew ochʾ tʾē miayn erp tser mēch nergay em .
48004019	Orteagners , tsezi hamar tartseal ergownkʾi tsʾaw gĕ kʾashem , minchʾew or Kʾristos tser mēch gerbaworowi .
48004020	G!owzēi hima tser mēch nergay ĕllal ow sheshts pʾokhel , orovhetew tser masin varanowmi mēch em .
48004021	Ĕsēkʾ indzi , towkʾ or g!owzēkʾ ōrēnkʾin tag ĕllal , ōrēnkʾĕ chʾēkʾ lser :
48004022	orovhetew krowadz ē tʾē Apraham ergow orti ownēr , mēgĕ , aghakhinēn , miwsĕ , azat gnochmēn .
48004023	Paytsʾ an or aghakhinēn ēr , marminin hamemat dznadz ēr , isg an or azat gnochmēn ēr , khostowmov .
48004024	Asontsʾ megnowtʾiwnĕ aylapanōrēn g!ĕllay , kʾani or asonkʾ ergow Owkhtern en : mēgĕ , Sina leṛnēn , or Hakarn ē , strgowtʾean hamar gĕ dznani :
48004025	orovhetew Hakar , Sina leṛn ē , Arapiayi mēch , ow gĕ hamabataskhanē ay zhmow Erowsaghēmin , ew strgowtʾean mēch ē ir zawagnerown het .
48004026	Paytsʾ verin Erowsaghēmĕ , or mer polorin mayrn ē , azat ē .
48004027	Artarew krowadz ē : « Owrakhatsʾir , chʾdznanogh amowl : boṛtʾga tsʾndzowtʾeamp ew kochʾē , ergownkʾi tsʾaw chʾkʾashogh : orovhetew lkʾealin zawagnerĕ shat aweli en , kʾan amowsin ownetsʾoghin zawagnerĕ » .
48004028	Owremn menkʾ , eghpayrner , Isahagi bēs khostowmi zawagner enkʾ .
48004029	Paytsʾ inchʾbēs ayn aten marminin hamemat dznadzĕ gĕ haladzēr an , or Hokiin hamemat dznadz ēr , noynbēs al hima .
48004030	Sagayn inchʾ g!ĕsē Kirkʾĕ : « Vtarē ayt aghakhinĕ ew anor ortin , kʾani or aghakhinin ortin zhaṛankort biti chʾĕllay azat gnoch ortiin het » .
48004031	Owremn , eghpayrner , menkʾ aghakhinin zawagnerĕ chʾenkʾ , haba , azat gnoch .
48005001	Owsti hastatown getsʾēkʾ ayn azatowtʾeamp , orov Kʾristos azatetsʾ mez , ew tartseal strgowtʾean lowdzin tag mi gashgantowikʾ .
48005002	Aha es , Bōghos , tsezi g!ĕsem : « Etʾē tʾlpʾatowikʾ , Kʾristos ochʾ mēg ōkowt g!ownenay tsezi » .
48005003	Ew amēn tʾlpʾatowogh martow tartseal gĕ vgayem tʾē bartawor ē kordzatrel ampoghch ōrēnkʾĕ .
48005004	Kʾristos ochʾinchʾ tartsadz ē tsezi hamar , aysinkʾn tsezmē polor anontsʾ , or ōrēnkʾov artaranal g!owzen . Towkʾ shnorhkʾēn ingadz ēkʾ ,
48005005	orovhetew menkʾ Hokiin michotsʾov gĕ sbasenkʾ hawatkʾov eghadz artarowtʾean yoysin .
48005006	Artarew Kʾristos Yisowsi mēch eghoghin , ochʾ tʾlpʾatowtʾiwnĕ orewē aztetsʾowtʾiwn owni , ochʾ al antʾlpʾatowtʾiwnĕ , haba hawatkʾĕ , or gĕ nerkordzē sirov .
48005007	Towkʾ law gĕ vazēikʾ : ov gasetsʾowtsʾ tsez , or jshmartowtʾean chʾansakʾ .
48005008	Ays trtowmĕ angē chʾē , or tsez ganchʾetsʾ .
48005009	Kʾichʾ mĕ khmorĕ ampoghch zankowadzĕ gĕ khmorē .
48005010	Paytsʾ es tser masin hamozowadz em Tērochmov , tʾē pnaw owrish gerb biti chʾmtadzēkʾ . Isg an or tsez gĕ vrtovē , ov or ĕllay , biti grē ir tatabartowtʾiwnĕ .
48005011	Sagayn , eghpayrner , al inchʾow gĕ haladzowim , etʾē es tagawin tʾlpʾatowtʾiwn gĕ kʾarozem : owremn khachʾin kaytʾagghowtʾiwnĕ ochʾnchʾatsʾadz ē .
48005012	Erani tʾē noynisg gtrowēin anonkʾ , or tsez tagnowvray g!ĕnen .
48005013	Orovhetew towkʾ azatowtʾean ganchʾowadz ēkʾ , eghpayrner : miayn tʾē tser azatowtʾiwnĕ marmini tsʾangowtʾiwnnerow aṛitʾ chʾĕllay , haba sirov irarow dzaṛayetsʾēkʾ .
48005014	Kʾani or ampoghch ōrēnkʾĕ sa mēg khōskʾin mēch gĕ kordzatrowi : « Sirē ĕngert kʾow antsit , , bēs » .
48005015	Paytsʾ etʾē zirar khadznēkʾ ew lapʾēkʾ , zkowshatsʾēkʾ or irarmē chʾsbaṛikʾ .
48005016	Owsti sa g!ĕsem : « Hokiov ĕntʾatsʾēkʾ , ow marminin tsʾangowtʾiwnĕ biti chʾkordzatrēkʾ » .
48005017	Orovhetew marminĕ gĕ tsʾangay Hokiin hagaṛag , ow Hokin , marminin hagaṛag : ew asonkʾ irarow hagaṛag en , orbēszi chʾĕnēkʾ inchʾ or owzēkʾ .
48005018	Paytsʾ etʾē Hokiēn aṛachnortowikʾ , al ōrēnkʾin tag chʾēkʾ ĕllar .
48005019	Marminin kordzerĕ patsʾayayt en : anonkʾ en , shnowtʾiwn , boṛngowtʾiwn , anmakʾrowtʾiwn , tsʾopʾowtʾiwn ,
48005020	gṛabashtowtʾiwn , gakhartowtʾiwn , tʾshnamowtʾiwn , ergbaṛagowtʾiwn , mrtsʾagtsʾowtʾiwnner , zayroytʾ , hagaṛagowtʾiwn , khṛovowtʾiwn , hertsowadzner ,
48005021	chʾar nakhantsner , martasbanowtʾiwnner , arpetsʾowtʾiwnner , zekhowtʾiwnner ew inchʾ or asontsʾ nman ē : orontsʾ masin gankhaw g!ĕsem tsezi , inchʾbēs zhamanagin al ĕsadz em , tʾē aysbisi paner ĕnoghnerĕ biti chʾ zhaṛanken Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ .
48005022	Paytsʾ Hokiin btowghn ē , sēr , owrakhowtʾiwn , khaghaghowtʾiwn , hamperatarowtʾiwn ,
48005023	kʾaghtsʾrowtʾiwn , parowtʾiwn , hawatarmowtʾiwn , hezowtʾiwn , zhow zhgalowtʾiwn : aysbisi panerow tēm ōrēnkʾ chʾgay .
48005024	Anonkʾ or Kʾristosinnern en , irentsʾ marminĕ khachʾetsʾin , pnagan girkʾerown ow tsʾangowtʾiwnnerown het .
48005025	Etʾē Hokiov g!abrinkʾ , naew ĕntʾanankʾ Hokiin hamatsayn .
48005026	Snapʾaṛ chʾĕllankʾ , zirar krkṛelov ew irarow nakhantselov .
48006001	Eghpayrner , etʾē mart mĕ orewē yantsʾankʾi mēch pṛnowi , towkʾ or hokewor ēkʾ , aytbisin hezowtʾean hokiov owghghetsʾēkʾ : owshatir eghir town kʾezi , or town al chʾpʾortsowis .
48006002	Gretsʾēkʾ irarow dzanrowtʾiwnnerĕ , ew aytbēs kordzatretsʾēkʾ Kʾristosi ōrēnkʾĕ .
48006003	Artarew etʾē mēgĕ , or ochʾinchʾ ē , gardzē tʾē inkʾ pan mĕn ē , inkʾzinkʾ gĕ khapē .
48006004	Paytsʾ iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ tʾogh kʾnnē ir kordzĕ , ew ayn aten bardzenay , miayn inkʾnir vray , ochʾ tʾē owrishi vray :
48006005	orovhetew iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ biti grē ir peṛĕ .
48006006	KHōskʾin ashagertĕ haghortagitsʾ tʾogh ĕnē ir vartabetĕ amēn pari pani .
48006007	Mi khapowikʾ , Astowadz chʾi dzaghrowir :
48006008	orovhetew inchʾ or mart gĕ sermanē , zayn al biti hntsē . An or ir marminin hamar gĕ sermanē , ayt marminēn abaganowtʾiwn biti hntsē : isg an or Hokiin hamar gĕ sermanē , ayt Hokiēn yawitenagan geankʾ biti hntsē .
48006009	Owsti parikʾ kordzelē chʾtsantsranankʾ , kʾani or yatowg atenin biti hntsenkʾ , etʾē chʾbartasinkʾ .
48006010	Owremn , kʾani batehowtʾiwn owninkʾ , parikʾ ĕnenkʾ polorin , manawant , hawatkʾi ĕntanikʾēn eghoghnerown .
48006011	Nayetsʾēkʾ , orkʾan medz kirerov kretsʾi tsezi , im tseṛkʾovs .
48006012	Polor anonkʾ , or g!owzen marminin hamemat law erewnal , gĕ hargatren tsez or tʾlpʾatowikʾ , miayn , orbēszi chʾhaladzowin Kʾristosi khachʾin hamar .
48006013	Artarew ochʾ isg irenkʾ , tʾlpʾatowadznerĕ gĕ bahen ōrēnkʾĕ : paytsʾ g!owzen or towkʾ tʾlpʾatowikʾ , orbēszi bardzenan tser marminov .
48006014	Paytsʾ es amenewin biti chʾbardzenam , ayl miayn mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi khachʾov : anov ashkharhĕ khachʾowadz ē indzi hamar , es al , ashkharhi .
48006015	Orovhetew Kʾristos Yisowsov ochʾ tʾlpʾatowtʾiwnĕ orewē aztetsʾowtʾiwn owni , ochʾ antʾlpʾatowtʾiwnĕ , haba , nor araradz ĕllalĕ .
48006016	KHaghaghowtʾiwn ow oghormowtʾiwn polor anontsʾ vray , or ays ganonin hamatsayn g!ĕntʾanan , ew Astowdzoy Israyēlin vray .
48006017	Asgē etkʾ ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh anhankstatsʾnē zis : orovhetew es marminis vray gĕ grem Tēr Yisowsi vērkʾin sbinerĕ .
48006018	Eghpayrner , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi shnorhkʾĕ tser hokiin het . Amēn .
49001001	Bōghos , Astowdzoy gamkʾov Yisows Kʾristosi aṛakʾeal , Epʾesosi mēch eghadz sowrperown ow Kʾristos Yisowsov hawatarimnerown :
49001002	shnorhkʾ ew khaghaghowtʾiwn tsezi Astowdzmē , mer Hōrmēn , ow Tēr Yisows Kʾristosē .
49001003	ōrhneal ĕllay Astowadz ew mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi Hayrĕ , or Kʾristosov ōrhnetsʾ mez amēn tesag hokewor ōrhnowtʾiwnnerov , ergnayin vayrerow mēch ,
49001004	inchʾbēs anov ĕntretsʾ mez ashkharhi himnatrowtʾenēn aṛach , orbēszi menkʾ ir aṛchew sowrp ew anarat ĕllankʾ siroy mēch .
49001005	Nakhasahmanetsʾ mez ir ortekrowtʾean , Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov , ir gamkʾin parehajowtʾean hamatsayn ,
49001006	orbēszi kovapanenkʾ ir shnorhkʾin pʾaṛkʾĕ : anov ĕntowneli tartsowtsʾ mez , Sireliin michotsʾov .
49001007	Irmov menkʾ owninkʾ azatakrowtʾiwn , ir ariwnin michotsʾov , ow meghkʾerow nerowm , ir shnorhkʾin jokhowtʾean hamemat :
49001008	anov jokhatsʾowtsʾ mez , ampoghch imastowtʾeamp ew owshimowtʾeamp .
49001009	Kittsʾowtsʾ mezi ir gamkʾin khorhowrtĕ , ir parehajowtʾean hamatsayn , or ir mēch , , aṛachatradz ēr :
49001010	orbēszi zhamanagnerow lrowmin tntesowtʾean mēch , Kʾristosov hamakhmpē amēn pan , anor mēch miatsʾnē tʾē erginkʾi mēch eghoghnerĕ , tʾē ergri vray eghoghnerĕ .
49001011	Anov statsʾankʾ naew zhaṛankowtʾiwn mĕ , nakhasahmanowadz ĕllalov hamatsayn aṛachatrowtʾean anor , or gĕ nerkordzē amēn pan ir gamkʾin dzrakirin hamatsayn ,
49001012	orbēszi menkʾ , nakhabēs Kʾristosi abawinoghners , kovowtʾiwn ĕllankʾ ir pʾaṛkʾin .
49001013	Towkʾ al abawinetsʾakʾ anor , erp lsetsʾikʾ jshmartowtʾean khōskʾĕ , tser pʾrgowtʾean awetaranĕ , ew hawatalē etkʾ anor , gnkʾowetsʾakʾ khostatsʾeal Sowrp Hokiov ,
49001014	or mer zhaṛankowtʾean krawagann ē minchʾew statsʾowadzkʾin azatakrowtʾiwnĕ , ir pʾaṛkʾin kovowtʾean hamar .
49001015	Owsti es al , lselē etkʾ Tēr Yisowsi vray tser ownetsʾadz hawatkʾin ow polor sowrperown hantēb tser ownetsʾadz siroyn masin ,
49001016	chʾem tatrir shnorhagal ĕllalē tsezi hamar , yishelov tsez im aghōtʾkʾnerows mēch :
49001017	orbēszi mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi Astowadzĕ , pʾaṛkʾi Hayrĕ , tay tsezi imastowtʾean ew yaytnowtʾean hokin , ir kitagtsʾowtʾeamp .
49001018	Orbēszi tser mitkʾin achʾkʾerĕ lowsaworowelov , kitnakʾ tʾē inchʾ ē anor gochʾowmin yoysĕ , inchʾ ē anor zhaṛankowtʾean pʾaṛkʾin jokhowtʾiwnĕ , sowrperown mēch ,
49001019	ew inchʾ ē ir zōrowtʾean kerazantsʾ medzowtʾiwnĕ hawatatsʾealnerows mēch , kordzatrowtʾean hamemat ir ow zhegh zōrowtʾean ,
49001020	or nerkordzetsʾ Kʾristosi mēch , erp meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanetsʾ zayn ow pazmetsʾowtsʾ ir ach goghmĕ , erginkʾi mēch ,
49001021	amēn betowtʾenē , ishkhanowtʾenē , zōrowtʾenē ew tērowtʾenē shat aweli ver , ow amēn anownē ver , or g!anowanowi , ochʾ miayn ays ashkharhin mēch , haba naew kalikʾin mēch .
49001022	Traw amēn pan anor otkʾerown tag , ow towaw zayn , ipr klowkh amēn pani vray , egeghetsʾiin ,
49001023	or anor marminn ē , lrowmĕ anor , or gĕ letsʾnē amēn inchʾ , polorin mēch .
49002001	Towkʾ meṛadz ēikʾ yantsʾankʾnerow ew meghkʾerow mēch , paytsʾ inkʾ tsez abretsʾowtsʾ .
49002002	Anontsʾ mēch zhamanagin g!ĕntʾanayikʾ , ays ashkharhi ĕntʾatsʾkʾin hamatsayn , ōti ishkhanowtʾean ishkhanin hamatsayn , ayn okiin , or hima gĕ nerkordzē anhnazantowtʾean ortinerown mēch .
49002003	Anontsʾmov menkʾ polors al zhamanagin gĕ varowēinkʾ , mer marminin tsʾangowtʾiwnnerov , marminin ow mitkʾin pʾapʾakʾnerĕ kordzatrelov : pnowtʾeamp pargowtʾean zawagner ēinkʾ , owrishnerow nman .
49002004	Paytsʾ Astowadz , or harowst ē oghormowtʾeamp , ir medz siroyn hamar , orov siretsʾ mez ,
49002005	erp meṛadz ēinkʾ meghkʾerow mēch , geankʾ towaw mezi Kʾristosi het , ( towkʾ shnorhkʾov pʾrgowadz ēkʾ : )
49002006	anor het yarowtsʾanetsʾ mez ew anor het pazmetsʾowtsʾ mez ergnayin vayrerow mēch , Kʾristos Yisowsov ,
49002007	orbēszi kalikʾ tarerown mēch tsʾoytsʾ tay ir shnorhkʾin kerazantsʾ jokhowtʾiwnĕ , Kʾristos Yisowsi michotsʾov mezi hantēb tsʾoytsʾ towadz kʾaghtsʾrowtʾeamp .
49002008	Orovhetew towkʾ shnorhkʾov pʾrgowadz ēkʾ , hawatkʾi michotsʾov , ew atiga ochʾ tʾē tsezmē ē , haba Astowdzoy ĕndzan ē :
49002009	ochʾ tʾē kordzerēn ē , orbēszi ochʾ mēgĕ bardzenay .
49002010	Kʾani or menkʾ anor tseṛagertn enkʾ , Kʾristos Yisowsov steghdzowadz , pari kordzerow hamar : Astowadz nakhabēs batrastetsʾ zanonkʾ , orbēszi menkʾ ĕntʾanankʾ anontsʾ mēch .
49002011	Owsti yishetsʾēkʾ tʾē towkʾ zhamanagin marminov hetʾanosner ēikʾ , ( oronkʾ antʾlpʾat gĕ gochʾowin anontsʾmē , or tʾlpʾatowadz gĕ gochʾowin , marmini mēch , tseṛkʾov eghadz : )
49002012	ayt aten towkʾ aṛantsʾ Kʾristosi ēikʾ , owdzatsʾadz ĕllalov Israyēli hasaragowtʾenēn , ew ōtaratsʾadz , khostowmin owkhterēn : ochʾ yoys ownēikʾ , ochʾ al Astowadz , ashkharhi mēch .
49002013	Isg hima , Kʾristos Yisowsov , towkʾ or zhamanagin heṛawor ēikʾ , mertsawor eghakʾ Kʾristosi ariwnov .
49002014	Orovhetew an ē mer khaghaghowtʾiwnĕ : inkʾ ergowkʾĕ , mēg ĕraw , ow kʾagetsʾ mēchteghi anchatogh batĕ , ir marminin mēch ochʾnchʾatsʾnelov irarow michew eghadz tʾshnamowtʾiwnĕ ,
49002015	aysinkʾn , hramannerov eghadz batowirannerown ōrēnkʾĕ : orbēszi irmov ayt ergowkʾēn steghdzē nor mart mĕ , aysbēs khaghaghowtʾiwn ĕnelov ,
49002016	ow ergowkʾn al hashtetsʾnē Astowdzoy het mēg marmini mēch , khachʾin michotsʾov . Anov sbannetsʾ tʾshnamowtʾiwnĕ ,
49002017	ew egaw khaghaghowtʾiwn awetetsʾ tsezi , or heṛawor ēikʾ , ow anontsʾ , or mertsawor ēin .
49002018	Kʾani or anor michotsʾov menkʾ polors al artōnowtʾiwn owninkʾ mōtenalow Hōrĕ , mēg Hokiov .
49002019	Owremn hima towkʾ aylews ōtaraganner ow bantowkhtner chʾēkʾ , haba sowrperown kʾaghakʾagitsʾnerĕ , ew Astowdzoy ĕntanikʾĕ ,
49002020	shinowadz aṛakʾealnerown ow markarēnerown himin vray , orown dzayrakoyn angiwnakʾarĕ , noyninkʾn Yisows Kʾristos ē .
49002021	Anov ampoghch shēnkʾĕ , yarmarowtʾeamp miasin gazmowadz , g!aji , sowrp tajar mĕ ĕllalow Tērochmov :
49002022	anov towkʾ al miasin gĕ shinowikʾ , Astowdzoy pnagavayr ĕllalow Sowrp Hokiin michotsʾov .
49003001	Owsti es , Bōghos , Yisows Kʾristosi pantargealĕ tsezi , hetʾanosnerowt hamar ,
49003002	( etʾē konē lsadz ēkʾ Astowdzoy shnorhkʾin tntesowtʾean masin , or trowadz ē indzi tsezi hamar ,
49003003	tʾē inchʾbēs an yaytnowtʾeamp kittsʾowtsʾ indzi ayn khorhowrtĕ - inchʾbēs nakhabēs al hamaṛōtapar kretsʾi tsezi ,
49003004	orbēszi , erp gartakʾ , garenakʾ hasgnal im ĕmpṛnowms Kʾristosi khorhowrtin masin - ,
49003005	or owrish serowntnerow mēch martotsʾ ortinerown chʾkittsʾowetsʾaw , inchʾbēs an hima , Sowrp Hokiin michotsʾov , yaytnowadz ē ir sowrp aṛakʾealnerown ow markarēnerown ,
49003006	tʾē hetʾanosnerĕ Kʾristosov biti ĕllan zhaṛankagitsʾ , marmnagitsʾ , ew ir khostowmin pa zhnegitsʾ , awetaranin michotsʾov ,
49003007	orown es sbasargow eghay Astowdzoy shnorhkʾin barkewin hamemat , or trowetsʾaw indzi ir zōrowtʾean nerkordzowtʾeamp .
49003008	Indzi , or polor sowrperown amenapʾokʾrēn aweli pʾokʾr em , trowetsʾaw ays shnorhkʾĕ , orbēszi hetʾanosnerown mēch awetem Kʾristosi anznneli jokhowtʾiwnĕ ,
49003009	ew polorin tesnel tam tʾē inchʾ ē haghortagtsʾowtʾiwnĕ ayn khorhowrtin , or tarerow sgizpēn i ver dzadzgowadz ēr Astowdzoy mēch , or steghdzetsʾ amēn pan :
49003010	orbēszi Astowdzoy pazmagoghmani imastowtʾiwnĕ , egeghetsʾiin michotsʾov hima kittsʾowi ergnayin vayrerow mēch eghogh betowtʾiwnnerown ew ishkhanowtʾiwnnerown ,
49003011	ir yawitenagan aṛachatrowtʾean hamatsayn , or irakordzetsʾ mer Tērochmov , Kʾristos Yisowsov .
49003012	Anov menkʾ owninkʾ hamartsagowtʾiwn ow vstahowtʾeamp mōtenalow artōnowtʾiwn , hawatalov iren .
49003013	Owsti gĕ khntrem or chʾtsantsranakʾ tsezi hamar gradz taṛabankʾnerows batjaṛov , inchʾ or tser pʾaṛkʾn ē . )
49003014	Owsti gĕ dznratrem mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi Hōr aṛchew ,
49003015	ormē g!anowanowi amēn kertastan , erginkʾi mēch ow ergri vray ,
49003016	orbēszi shnorhē tsezi , ir pʾaṛkʾin jokhowtʾean hamemat , zōrowtʾeamp ow zhovnal nerkʾin martown mēch , ir Hokiin michotsʾov :
49003017	orbēszi Kʾristos pnagi tser sirterown mēch , hawatkʾov , ew towkʾ , siroy mēch armatanalov ow himnowelov ,
49003018	garoghanakʾ ĕmpṛnel polor sowrperown het tʾē inchʾ ē laynowtʾiwnĕ , ergaynowtʾiwnĕ , khorowtʾiwnĕ ew partsrowtʾiwnĕ :
49003019	aysinkʾn kitnal Kʾristosi sērĕ , or kitowtʾenēn kerazantsʾ ē , orbēszi letsʾowikʾ Astowdzoy ampoghch liowtʾeamp .
49003020	Owremn anor , or garogh ē kerazantsʾōrēn aweli ĕnel , kʾan amēn inchʾ or menkʾ gĕ khntrenkʾ gam g!ĕmpṛnenkʾ , ayn zōrowtʾean hamemat , or gĕ nerkordzē mer mēch ,
49003021	iren pʾaṛkʾ egeghetsʾiin mēch , Kʾristos Yisowsov , polor serowntnerown mēch , tarē tar , , . Amēn .
49004001	Owsti es , Tēroch pantargealĕ , g!aghachʾem tsezi , or tser ĕntʾatsʾkʾĕ ar zhanavayel ĕllay ayn gochʾowmin , orov ganchʾowetsʾakʾ ,
49004002	lman khonarhowtʾeamp ow hezowtʾeamp , hamperatarowtʾeamp , sirov irarow hantowr zhelov ,
49004003	chanalov bahel Sowrp Hokiin miapanowtʾiwnĕ , khaghaghowtʾean gabov .
49004004	Mēg marmin gay , ew mēg Hoki , inchʾbēs mēg yoysov ganchʾowetsʾakʾ tser gochʾowmin .
49004005	Tērĕ mēg ē , hawatkʾĕ , mēg , mgrtowtʾiwnĕ , mēg .
49004006	Mēg ē Astowadz ew polorin Hayrĕ , or polorēn ver , polorin het ew tser polorin mēchn ē .
49004007	Paytsʾ mezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrin shnorhkʾ trowadz ē , Kʾristosi barkewin chʾapʾin hamemat .
49004008	Owsti g!ĕsē : « Erp elaw partsr teghĕ , kerevaretsʾ kerowtʾiwnĕ ew nowērner towaw martotsʾ » .
49004009	( Isg ayt « elaw » ĕ inchʾ ĕsel ē , etʾē ochʾ nshanagel , tʾē inkʾ naew nakhabēs ichaw ergri storin maserĕ .
49004010	An , or ichaw , naew noynn ē , or elaw polor erginkʾnerēn aweli ver , orbēszi letsʾnē amēn pan . )
49004011	Ew inkʾ towaw omankʾ , aṛakʾealner ĕllalow , omankʾ , markarēner , omankʾ , awetaranichʾner , omankʾ , hoviwner ow vartabetner ,
49004012	sowrperown gatarelowtʾean hamar , sbasargowtʾean kordzin hamar , Kʾristosi marminin shinowtʾean hamar :
49004013	minchʾew or polors hasninkʾ hawatkʾin ew Astowdzoy Ortin janchʾnalow miapanowtʾean , gatareal martow vijagin , Kʾristosi liowtʾean hasagi chʾapʾin .
49004014	Orbēszi al asgē etkʾ manowg chʾĕllankʾ , tarowperadz ow vartabetowtʾean amēn hovē hos-hon kʾshowadz , martotsʾ khapepayowtʾeamp , oronkʾ gĕ moloretsʾnen khoramangowtʾean hnarkʾnerov :
49004015	haba , jshmartowtʾiwnĕ khōselov siroy mēch , amēn pani mēch ajinkʾ anov , or klowkhn ē , aysinkʾn , Kʾristosov .
49004016	Anov ē or ampoghch marminĕ , yarmarowtʾeamp miasin gazmowadz ew irarow gtsʾowadz amēn yōti ō zhantagowtʾeamp , amēn masi nerkordzowtʾean chʾapʾin hamemat , g!aji siroy mēch , ir shinowtʾean hamar .
49004017	Owremn sa gĕ yaytararem ow Tērochmov gĕ vgayem , or towkʾ aylews chʾĕntʾanakʾ aynbēs , inchʾbēs owrish hetʾanosnerĕ g!ĕntʾanan , irentsʾ mitkʾin ownaynowtʾean mēch .
49004018	Anontsʾ mitkʾĕ khawaradz ē , ew irenkʾ owdzatsʾadz en Astowdzoy geankʾēn , irentsʾ mēch eghadz ankitowtʾean ew irentsʾ sirtin gowrowtʾean batjaṛov .
49004019	Anzkay tartsadz , antsnatowr eghan tsʾopʾowtʾean , orbēszi amēn tesag anmakʾrowtʾiwn kordzen akahowtʾeamp .
49004020	Paytsʾ towkʾ aysbēs chʾsorvetsʾakʾ Kʾristosĕ ,
49004021	etʾē isgabēs lsetsʾikʾ zinkʾ ew sorvetsʾakʾ irmē , Yisowsi mēch eghogh jshmartowtʾean hamatsayn ,
49004022	orbēszi tʾōtʾapʾēkʾ tser nakhgin varkʾin veraperogh hin martĕ , - or abaganadz ē khapepay tsʾangowtʾiwnnerov , -
49004023	norokowikʾ tser mitkʾin hokiov ,
49004024	ow haknikʾ nor martĕ , or steghdzowadz ē artarowtʾeamp ew jshmarit srpowtʾeamp , Astowdzoy batgerin hamatsayn .
49004025	Owsti , tʾōtʾapʾelov stelĕ , jshmartowtʾiwnĕ khōsetsʾēkʾ irarow het , , , orovhetew menkʾ irarow antamner enkʾ .
49004026	Pargatsʾēkʾ , paytsʾ mi meghanchʾēkʾ : arewĕ tʾogh mayr chʾmtnē tser pargatsʾadz vijagin vray ,
49004027	ow tegh mi takʾ CHʾarakhōsin .
49004028	An or gĕ koghnar , al tʾogh chʾkoghnay : ayl manawant tʾogh ashkhati , ir tseṛkʾerov kordzelov inchʾ or pari ē , orbēszi pan mĕ ownenay talow garōtealin .
49004029	Ochʾ mēg vat khōskʾ tʾogh ellē tser peranēn , haba , inchʾ or pari ē , shinowtʾean garikʾin hamemat , orbēszi shnorhkʾ tay lsoghnerown .
49004030	Ew mi trtmetsʾnēkʾ Astowdzoy Sowrp Hokin , orov towkʾ gnkʾowetsʾakʾ azatakrowtʾean ōrowan hamar .
49004031	Amēn tesag taṛnowtʾiwn , zayroytʾ , pargowtʾiwn , kochʾiwn ow hayhoyowtʾiwn tʾogh vertsʾowin tsezmē , amēn tesag chʾaramtowtʾean het .
49004032	Ew kʾaghtsʾr eghēkʾ irarow hantēb , ktʾadz , nerelov irarow , inchʾbēs Astowadz Kʾristosov neretsʾ tsezi .
49005001	Owremn nmanetsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy , sireli zawagnerow bēs ,
49005002	ew ĕntʾatsʾēkʾ siroy mēch , inchʾbēs Kʾristos al mez siretsʾ ow mezi hamar ĕndzayetsʾ inkʾzinkʾ Astowdzoy , orbēs batarak ow zoh , anowshapoyr hot ĕllalov .
49005003	Paytsʾ boṛngowtʾean ew amēn tesag anmakʾrowtʾean gam akahowtʾean anownn isg tʾogh chʾyishowi tser mēch , ( inchʾbēs gĕ batshaji sowrperown , )
49005004	ochʾ al lrpowtʾean , yimar khōsagtsʾowtʾean gam kheghgatagowtʾean , oronkʾ chʾen batshajir : ayl pʾokharēnĕ shnorhagalowtʾiwn yaytnetsʾēkʾ .
49005005	Kʾani or kitēkʾ , , tʾē ochʾ mēg boṛngogh , gam anmakʾowr , gam akah , or gṛabasht ē , owni orewē zhaṛankowtʾiwn Kʾristosi ew Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean mēch .
49005006	Ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh khapē tsez ownayn khōskʾerov , orovhetew ays panerown batjaṛov Astowdzoy pargowtʾiwnĕ gow kay anhnazantowtʾean ortinerown vray .
49005007	Owremn pa zhnegitsʾ mi ĕllakʾ anontsʾ ,
49005008	orovhetew zhamanagin towkʾ khawar ēikʾ , paytsʾ hima loys ēkʾ Tērochmov : owsti ĕntʾatsʾēkʾ loysi zawagnerow bēs ,
49005009	kʾani or Hokiin btowghĕ amēn tesag parowtʾeamp , artarowtʾeamp ow jshmartowtʾeamp ē .
49005010	Kʾnnetsʾēkʾ tʾē inchʾ ē Tēroch hajelin ,
49005011	ew ĕngeragitsʾ mi ĕllakʾ khawarin anbtowgh kordzerown , ayl pʾokharēnĕ gshtampetsʾēkʾ zanonkʾ .
49005012	Orovhetew anontsʾ ĕradz kaghtni panerown masin khōsiln isg amōtʾ ē :
49005013	paytsʾ amēn pan or gshtampowadz ē , gĕ yaytnaperowi loysin michotsʾov , orovhetew loysn ē or gĕ yaytnaperē amēn inchʾ .
49005014	Owsti g!ĕsē : « Artʾntsʾir , town or gĕ kʾnanas , ow ganknē meṛelnerēn , ew Kʾristos biti pʾayli kʾow vrat » .
49005015	Owremn zkowshatsʾēkʾ or ĕntʾanakʾ shrchahayetsʾowtʾeamp : ochʾ tʾē ankhohemnerow bēs ,
49005016	haba , imastownnerow bēs . Knetsʾēkʾ zhamanagĕ , orovhetew ōrerĕ chʾar en .
49005017	Owsti anmit mi ĕllakʾ , haba hasgtsʾēkʾ tʾē inchʾ ē Tēroch gamkʾĕ .
49005018	Mi arpenakʾ kiniov , orown mēch anaṛagowtʾiwn gay , haba Hokiov letsʾowetsʾēkʾ .
49005019	Saghmosnerov , ōrhnerkerov ew hokewor erkerov towkʾ tser mēch khōsagtsʾelov , erketsʾēkʾ ow saghmos ĕsēkʾ Tēroch tser sirterown mēch .
49005020	Amēn aten , amēn pani hamar shnorhagal eghēkʾ Astowdzmē ew Hōrmēn , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi anownov .
49005021	Irarow hbatagetsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy vakhov .
49005022	Giner , hbatagetsʾēkʾ tser amowsinnerown , orbēs tʾē Tēroch :
49005023	orovhetew amowsinĕ gnoch klowkhn ē , inchʾbēs Kʾristos al egeghetsʾiin klowkhn ē , ew inkʾn ē marminin Pʾrgichʾĕ .
49005024	Hetewapar , inchʾbēs egeghetsʾin hbatag ē Kʾristosi , noynbēs al ginerĕ tʾogh ĕllan irentsʾ amowsinnerown , amēn pani mēch .
49005025	Amowsinner , siretsʾēkʾ tser ginerĕ , inchʾbēs Kʾristos al siretsʾ egeghetsʾin ew ĕndzayetsʾ inkʾzinkʾ anor hamar ,
49005026	orbēszi srpatsʾnē zayn ow makʾrē chowri lowatsʾowmov , khōskʾin michotsʾov :
49005027	orbēszi nergayatsʾnē zayn iren , ipr pʾaṛawor egeghetsʾi mĕ , or chʾownenay pidz , gam gnjiṛ , gam nman orewē pan , haba ĕllay sowrp ew anarat .
49005028	Noynbēs al amowsinnerĕ bartawor en sirel irentsʾ ginerĕ , irentsʾ marminnerown bēs : an or gĕ sirē ir ginĕ , gĕ sirē inkʾzinkʾ .
49005029	Artarew ochʾ mēgĕ erpekʾ atadz ē ir marminĕ , haba gĕ geragrē zayn ow gĕ pʾaypʾayē , inchʾbēs Tērn al , egeghetsʾin :
49005030	kʾani or menkʾ anor marminin antamnern enkʾ , anor misēn ew anor osgornerēn .
49005031	“ Ator hamar martĕ biti tʾoghow hayrn ow mayrĕ , ew biti yari ir gnoch , ow ergowkʾĕ biti ĕllan mēg marmin ” .
49005032	Asiga medz khorhowrt mĕn ē : paytsʾ es gĕ khōsim Kʾristosi ew egeghetsʾiin masin .
49005033	Sagayn tsezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ tʾogh sirē ir ginĕ aynbēs , inchʾbēs inkʾzinkʾ , ow ginĕ tʾogh agnadzi ir amowsinēn .
49006001	Zawagner , hnazantetsʾēkʾ tser dznoghnerown , Tērochmov , orovhetew ayt ē irawatsʾin .
49006002	Batowē hayrt ow mayrt , ( or aṛachin batowirann ē khostowmov , )
49006003	orbēszi parikʾ ĕllay kʾezi , ow ergar abris ergri vray .
49006004	Ew towkʾ , hayrer , mi pargatsʾnēkʾ tser zawagnerĕ , haba medztsʾowtsʾēkʾ zanonkʾ Tēroch grtʾowtʾeamp ow khratov .
49006005	Strowgner , hnazantetsʾēkʾ tser marmnawor tērerown , ahov ow toghov , tser sirtin barzamtowtʾeamp , orbēs tʾē Kʾristosi :
49006006	ochʾ tʾē dzaṛayelov achʾkʾi aṛchew , martahajonerow bēs , haba Kʾristosi strowgnerow bēs , srtantsʾ kordzatrelov Astowdzoy gamkʾĕ .
49006007	DZaṛayetsʾēkʾ yō zharowtʾeamp , orbēs tʾē Tēroch ew ochʾ tʾē martotsʾ ,
49006008	kitnalov tʾē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ , inchʾ parikʾ or kordzē , noynĕ biti stanay Tērochmēn , strowg ĕllay tʾē azat .
49006009	Isg towkʾ , tērer , ĕrēkʾ anontsʾ noyn panerĕ , hra zharelov sbaṛnalikʾēn . Kittsʾēkʾ tʾē anontsʾ al , tser al Tērĕ erginkʾn ē , ow achʾaṛowtʾiwn chʾgay anor kʾov .
