49006010	Verchabēs , eghpayrners , zōratsʾēkʾ Tērochmov ew anor hzōr garoghowtʾeamp .
49006011	Hakēkʾ Astowdzoy ampoghch zrahĕ , orbēszi garenakʾ timatrel CHʾarakhōsin hnarkʾnerown .
49006012	Orovhetew mer kōtemartĕ marmini ew ariwni het chʾē , haba betowtʾiwnnerow , ishkhanowtʾiwnnerow , ays khawar ashkharhin , , ishkhanawornerown het , ergnawor vayrerow mēch eghogh chʾar okinerown het .
49006013	Owsti aṛēkʾ tser vray Astowdzoy ampoghch zrahĕ , orbēszi garenakʾ timatrel chʾar ōrĕ ,
49006014	ow amēn pan gatarelē etkʾ , hastatown gaynil . Owsti gaynetsʾēkʾ tser teghĕ , tser mēchkʾĕ kōtebntadz jshmartowtʾeamp ew hakadz artarowtʾean zrahĕ ,
49006015	ow tser otkʾerown ipr gōshig antsʾowtsʾadz khaghaghowtʾean awetaranin batrastowtʾiwnĕ .
49006016	Polorin vray , aṛēkʾ hawatkʾin vahanĕ , orov biti garenakʾ marel CHʾarin polor hravaṛ neterĕ :
49006017	ew aṛēkʾ pʾrgowtʾean saghawartn ow Hokiin sowrĕ , or Astowdzoy khōskʾn ē .
49006018	Amēn aten aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ Hokiov , amēn tesag aghōtʾkʾov ew aghersankʾov . Hsgetsʾēkʾ asor vray polorovin yaratewowtʾeamp ow aghersankʾov , polor sowrperown hamar :
49006019	indzi hamar al , orbēszi khōskʾ trowi indzi , or hamartsagowtʾeamp panam perans , kittsʾnelow khorhowrtĕ awetaranin ,
49006020	orown hamar es tesban mĕn em , shghtʾanerov : orbēszi anov hamartsagowtʾeamp khōsim , inchʾbēs bētkʾ ē khōsim .
49006021	Paytsʾ orbēszi towkʾ al kitnakʾ im masis , tʾē inchʾ g!ĕnem , amēn pan biti kittsʾnē tsezi Tiwkʾigos sireli eghpayrn ow Tērochmov hawatarim sbasargown .
49006022	Zinkʾ yatgabēs ghrgetsʾi tsezi , orbēszi kitnakʾ mer masin , ew inkʾ mkhitʾarē tser sirterĕ .
49006023	KHaghaghowtʾiwn eghpayrnerown , ow sēr , hawatkʾov miasin , Hayr Astowdzmē ow Tēr Yisows Kʾristosē .
49006024	SHnorhkʾ polor anontsʾ het , or angeghdzowtʾeamp gĕ siren mer Tērĕ , Yisows Kʾristosĕ . Amēn .
50001001	Bōghos ew Timotʾēos , Yisows Kʾristosi dzaṛanerĕ , Kʾristos Yisowsov polor sowrperown , or Pʾilibbēi goghmern en , ebisgobosnerov ow sargawaknerov :
50001002	shnorhkʾ ew khaghaghowtʾiwn tsezi Astowdzmē , mer Hōrmēn , ow Tēr Yisows Kʾristosē .
50001003	SHnorhagal g!ĕllam im Astowdzmēs , tsezmē ownetsʾadz polor yishatagnerows hamar ,
50001004	amēn aten , amēn aghersankʾis mēch . Owrakhowtʾeamp g!aghersem tser polorin hamar ,
50001005	kʾani or haghortagitsʾ eghakʾ awetaranin , aṛachin ōrēn minchʾew hima :
50001006	ays masin hamozowadz em tʾē an or sgsaw pari kordz mĕ tser mēch , biti awartē minchʾew Yisows Kʾristosi ōrĕ .
50001007	Irawatsʾi al ē indzi aysbēs mtadzel tser polorin masin , kʾani or tsez ownim im sirtis mēch , , , ow towkʾ polort haghortagtsʾetsʾakʾ indzi eghadz shnorhkʾin , tʾē im gaberows , tʾē al awetaranin chatakovowtʾean ew hastatowtʾean mēch .
50001008	Orovhetew Astowadz vgay ē tʾē orkʾan garōttsʾadz em tsez polort , Kʾristos Yisowsi kowtʾov ,
50001009	ow sabēs g!aghōtʾem , or tser sērĕ hetzhetē aweli aṛatanay kitagtsʾowtʾeamp ew ampoghch tatoghowtʾeamp ,
50001010	orbēszi towkʾ zatoroshēkʾ tarper panerĕ , angeghdz ew ansaytʾakʾ ĕllalow hamar minchʾew Kʾristosi ōrĕ ,
50001011	letsʾowadz artarowtʾean btowghnerov Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov , Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾin ow kovowtʾean hamar .
50001012	G!owzem or kitnakʾ , eghpayrner , tʾē inchʾ or batahetsʾaw indzi , aṛawelabēs batjaṛ eghaw awetarani yaṛachtimowtʾean ,
50001013	aynbēs or Kʾristosi hamar gradz gabers , patsʾayayt eghan ampoghch balatin mēch ew amēnowrekʾ ,
50001014	ow Tērochmov eghpayrnerēn shaterĕ , vstahowtʾiwn aṛnelov gaberēs , al aweli yantowkn en , kʾarozelow Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ aṛantsʾ vakhi .
50001015	Artarew omankʾ gĕ kʾarozen Kʾristosĕ , nakhantsē ow gṛiwē mghowadz , omankʾ al , pareatsʾagamowtʾeamp .
50001016	Anonkʾ gĕ hṛchʾagen Kʾristosĕ , hagaṛagowtʾean hamar , ochʾ tʾē angeghdzowtʾeamp , gardzelov tʾē taṛabankʾ g!aweltsʾnen gaberows vray :
50001017	isg asonkʾ , siroy hamar , orovhetew kiten tʾē es sahmanowadz em awetaranin chatakovowtʾean hamar .
50001018	Sagayn inchʾ pʾoytʾ : amēn gerbov , tʾē batrowagov ew tʾē jshmartowtʾeamp , Kʾristos gĕ hṛchʾagowi , ow g!owrakhanam asor hamar , ew biti owrakhanam al .
50001019	Kʾani or kitem tʾē asiga biti yanki im pʾrgowtʾeans , tser aghersankʾnerov ow Yisows Kʾristosi Hokiin ō zhantagowtʾeamp ,
50001020	im eṛantown agngalowtʾeans ew yoysis hamemat , tʾē pnaw biti chʾamchʾnam : haba , polorovin hamartsagowtʾeamp , inchʾbēs amēn aten , noynbēs al hima , Kʾristos biti medzarowi marminis mēch , gam geankʾov , gam mahov :
50001021	orovhetew indzi hamar , abrilĕ Kʾristos ē , ow meṛnilĕ , shah .
50001022	Paytsʾ etʾē marmini mēch abrils btowgh gĕ perē im kordzis , al chʾem kiter or mēgĕ ĕntrem .
50001023	Ergowkʾēn al bartatrowadz em : tsʾangowtʾiwn ownim megnelow ew Kʾristosi het ĕllalow , inchʾ or shat aweli law ē :
50001024	sagayn marmini mēch mnalĕ aweli hargawor ē tsezi hamar .
50001025	Ays hamozowmĕ ownenalov , kitem tʾē biti mnam ow tser polorin het genam , or towkʾ yaṛachtimēkʾ ew owrakh ĕllakʾ hawatkʾov :
50001026	orbēszi im vras tser ownetsʾadz bardzankʾĕ jokhanay Kʾristos Yisowsov , tartseal tsezi kalows batjaṛov .
50001027	Sagayn abretsʾēkʾ Kʾristosi awetaranin ar zhanavayel gerbov : orbēszi etʾē kam ow tesnem tsez , ew gam patsʾagay ĕllam , tser masin lsem tʾē hastatown gĕ genakʾ , mēg hokiov , ow miasin gĕ martnchʾikʾ , ipr mēg ants , awetarani hawatkʾin hamar ,
50001028	ochʾ mēg panov sosgalov hagaṛagortnerēn . Atiga anontsʾ hamar abatsʾoytsʾ mĕn ē gorowsti , isg tsezi hamar , pʾrgowtʾean ,
50001029	or Astowdzmē ē : orovhetew , Kʾristosi batjaṛov , tsezi shnorhowetsʾaw ochʾ miayn hawatal anor , ayl naew chʾarchʾarowil anor hamar ,
50001030	mghelov noyn baykʾarĕ , or tesakʾ im mēchs , ow hima gĕ lsēkʾ tʾē im mēchs ē .
50002001	Owremn , etʾē mkhitʾarowtʾiwn gay Kʾristosov , etʾē gan siroy spʾopʾankʾ , Hokii haghortowtʾiwn , kowtʾ ow garegtsʾowtʾiwn ,
50002002	liatsʾowtsʾēkʾ im owrakhowtʾiwns , ĕllalov hamakhoh ew ownenalov miewnoyn sērĕ , mēg ants ow mēg mtadzowm .
50002003	Ochʾ mēg pan ĕrēkʾ hagaṛagowtʾeamp gam snapʾaṛowtʾeamp : haba , khonarhowtʾeamp owrishĕ tsezmē kerazantsʾ hamaretsʾēkʾ , , .
50002004	Iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ tʾogh ngati chʾaṛnē miayn ir shahĕ , ayl naew owrishnerownĕ .
50002005	Ownetsʾēkʾ ayn mtadzowmĕ , or Kʾristos Yisowsi mēch ēr :
50002006	Astowdzoy gerbarankʾĕ ownenalov , an yapʾshtagowtʾiwn mĕ chʾhamaretsʾ Astowdzoy hawasar ĕllalĕ ,
50002007	haba ownaynatsʾowtsʾ inkʾzinkʾ , ir vray aṛaw dzaṛayi mĕ gerbarankʾĕ ew nmanetsʾaw martotsʾ : ktnowelov martgayin gerbarov ,
50002008	khonarhetsʾowtsʾ inkʾzinkʾ ow hnazant eghaw minchʾew mah , noynisg , khachʾin mahĕ .
50002009	Owsti Astowadz al medzabēs partsratsʾowtsʾ zayn ew shnorhetsʾ anor anown mĕ , or amēn anownē kerazantsʾ ē ,
50002010	orbēszi Yisowsi anownin dznratren polorĕ , ergnawornerĕ , ergrawornern ow santarametagannerĕ ,
50002011	ew amēn lezow tawani tʾē Yisows Kʾristos Tēr ē , Hayr Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾin hamar .
50002012	Hetewapar , sireliners , inchʾbēs amēn aten hnazantetsʾakʾ , ochʾ miayn im nergayowtʾeans mēch , haba al aweli hima , im patsʾagayowtʾeans aten , kordzatretsʾēkʾ tser pʾrgowtʾiwnĕ , ahov ow toghov :
50002013	orovhetew Astowadz ē or tser mēch gĕ nerkordzē tʾē gamenalĕ ew tʾē ĕnelĕ , ir parehajowtʾean hamatsayn .
50002014	Ĕrēkʾ amēn inchʾ , aṛantsʾ trtownchnerow ew aṛargowtʾiwnnerow ,
50002015	orbēszi ĕllakʾ anmeghatreli ow annenk , Astowdzoy anarat zawagner , gamagor ew khotoreal serownti mĕ mēch . Towkʾ gĕ pʾaylikʾ anontsʾ mēch , orbēs lowsaworner ashkharhi mēch ,
50002016	amowr pṛnelov geankʾin khōskʾĕ , orbēszi garenam bardzenal Kʾristosi ōrĕ , tʾē ĕntownayn chʾem vazadz , ochʾ al ĕntownayn ashkhatadz .
50002017	Noynisg etʾē ĕndzayowim tser zohin ow hawatkʾi bashtōnin hamar , g!owrakhanam ew owrakhagitsʾ g!ĕllam tser polorin .
50002018	Noynbēs al towkʾ owrakhatsʾēkʾ ew owrakhagitsʾ eghēkʾ indzi .
50002019	Tēr Yisowsov gĕ yowsam showtov tsezi ghrgel Timotʾēosĕ , orbēszi im sirts al hankchʾi , erp kitnam tser vijagĕ .
50002020	Orovhetew anor nman ochʾ mēg srtagitsʾ ownim , or angeghdzapar hokay tsez :
50002021	kʾani or polorĕ gĕ pʾntṛen irentsʾ shahĕ , ochʾ tʾē Yisows Kʾristosinĕ .
50002022	Paytsʾ towkʾ pʾortsov kitēkʾ tʾē an dzaṛayetsʾ awetaranin indzi het , inchʾbēs zawag mĕ hōrĕ het .
50002023	Owsti gĕ yowsam tsezi ghrgel zinkʾ anyabagh , erp tesnem tʾē inchʾ biti ĕllay vijags .
50002024	Sagayn vstahowtʾiwn ownim Tērochmov , tʾē es al showtov biti kam .
50002025	Paytsʾ hargawor hamaretsʾi hima tsezi ghrgel Ebapʾrotitosĕ , im eghpayrs , kordzagitsʾs ow zinagitsʾs , or towkʾ ghrgadz ēikʾ ipr garikʾnerows bashtōnean .
50002026	Orovhetew inkʾ al garōttsʾadz ē polort , ew gĕ vshtanar or lser ēikʾ tʾē hiwantatsʾer ēr .
50002027	Artarew inkʾ hiwantatsʾaw ow shat mōtetsʾaw mahowan , paytsʾ Astowadz oghormetsʾaw anor : ochʾ miayn anor , haba indzi al , orbēszi chʾownenam trtmowtʾiwn trtmowtʾean vray .
50002028	Owsti aweli pʾowtʾachanowtʾeamp ghrgetsʾi , orbēszi , tesnelov zayn , tartseal owrakhanakʾ ow es nowaz trtmim .
50002029	Owremn ĕntownetsʾēkʾ zayn Tērochmov , polorovin owrakhowtʾeamp , ew batowetsʾēkʾ aytbisinerĕ :
50002030	kʾani or mahowan mōtetsʾaw Kʾristosi kordzin hamar , vtankelov ir antsĕ , orbēszi lratsʾnē inchʾ or gĕ bagsēr tser gatarelikʾ bashtōnin , indzi hantēb .
50003001	Verchabēs , eghpayrners , owrakhatsʾēkʾ Tērochmov . Artarew noyn panerĕ krel tsezi , tsantsroytʾ chʾē indzi , paytsʾ abahovowtʾiwn ē tsezi .
50003002	Zkowshatsʾēkʾ shownerēn , zkowshatsʾēkʾ chʾar kordzawornerēn , zkowshatsʾēkʾ tʾlpʾatowtʾenēn :
50003003	orovhetew tʾlpʾatowtʾiwnĕ menkʾ enkʾ , or gĕ bashtenkʾ Astowadz Hokiov ew gĕ bardzenankʾ Kʾristos Yisowsov , ow vstahowtʾiwn chʾowninkʾ marmini vray :
50003004	tʾēew es al ownenalow ēi noyn vstahowtʾiwnĕ marmini vray . Etʾē owrish mēgĕ gĕ gardzē tʾē vstahowtʾiwn owni marmini vray , al aweli es ,
50003005	owtʾerort ōrĕ tʾlpʾatowadz , Israyēli tsʾeghēn , Peniamini tohmēn , Eprayetsʾi mĕ , Eprayetsʾinerēn , ōrēnkʾin hamemat , Pʾarisetsʾi ,
50003006	nakhantsakhntrowtʾean hamemat , egeghetsʾin gĕ haladzēi , ōrēnkʾēn eghadz artarowtʾean hamemat , anmeghatreli ēi .
50003007	Paytsʾ inchʾ or shah ēr indzi , vnas hamaretsʾi zayn , Kʾristosi hamar .
50003008	Ow noynisg polor panern al vnas gĕ hamarem , im Tērochs Kʾristos Yisowsi kitowtʾean kerazantsʾowtʾean hamar . Polor panerēn zrgowetsʾay anor hamar , ew aghp gĕ hamarem zanonkʾ , orbēszi shahim Kʾristosĕ
50003009	ow ktnowim ir mēch , ownenalov ochʾ tʾē im artarowtʾiwns , or ōrēnkʾēn ē , haba ayn , or Kʾristosi hawatkʾin michotsʾov ē , artarowtʾiwnĕ , or Astowdzmē ē , hawatkʾov :
50003010	orbēszi janchʾnam zinkʾ ew ir yarowtʾean zōrowtʾiwnĕ , ow haghortagitsʾ ĕllam ir chʾarchʾarankʾnerown , gerbaranagitsʾ taṛnalov ir mahowan ,
50003011	orbēszi garenam hasnil , , meṛelnerown yarowtʾean .
50003012	Ochʾ tʾē es artēn statsʾadz em mrtsʾanagĕ , gam artēn gatareal eghadz em : haba hetamowt em pṛnelow zayn , orown hamar al pṛnowetsʾay Kʾristos Yisowsē .
50003013	Eghpayrner , es chʾem seber tʾē pṛnadz em . Haba g!ĕnem sa mēg panĕ : moṛtsʾadz em etewi eghadznerĕ , ew gĕ timem aṛchewi eghadznerown .
50003014	Gĕ hetabntem nbatagagētĕ , Kʾristos Yisowsov eghadz Astowdzoy verin gochʾowmin mrtsʾanagin hamar .
50003015	Owremn menkʾ polors , or gatareal enkʾ , mtadzenkʾ aysbēs : isg etʾē tarper gerbov mtadzēkʾ pani mĕ masin , Astowadz zayn al biti yaytnē tsezi .
50003016	Sagayn inchʾ astijani or hasadz enkʾ , ĕntʾanankʾ noyn ganonin hamatsayn , mtadzenkʾ noynbēs .
50003017	Eghpayrner , polort miasin nmanetsʾēkʾ indzi , ew owshatir eghēkʾ anontsʾ , or g!ĕntʾanan aynbēs , inchʾbēs menkʾ , or ownikʾ ipr tibar .
50003018	Orovhetew shater g!ĕntʾanan , orontsʾ masin yajakh g!ĕsēi tsezi ew hima g!ĕsem , noynisg lalov , aysinkʾn , Kʾristosi khachʾin tʾshnaminerĕ :
50003019	anontsʾ vakhjanĕ gorowst ē , anontsʾ astowadzĕ , irentsʾ orovaynn ē , ow anontsʾ pʾaṛkʾĕ , irentsʾ amōtʾn ē . Anonkʾ gĕ mtadzen miayn ergrayin panerow masin :
50003020	isg mer kʾaghakʾatsʾiowtʾiwnĕ erginkʾn ē , owrgē gĕ sbasenkʾ Pʾrgichʾin , Tēr Yisows Kʾristosi ,
50003021	or biti gerbaranapʾokhē mer nowastatsʾadz marminĕ , gerbaranagitsʾ ĕllalow ir pʾaṛawor marminin , ayn nerkordzowtʾean hamemat , or garogh ē naew amēn inchʾ hbatagetsʾnel iren .
50004001	Hetewapar , sireli ow garōtali eghpayrners , im owrakhowtʾiwns ow bsags , aysbēs hastatown getsʾēkʾ Tērochmov , sireliners .
50004002	G!aghachʾem Ewotiayi ow g!aghachʾem Siwntikʾi , or ownenan miewnoyn mtadzowmĕ Tērochmov .
50004003	Ew gĕ khntrem kʾezmē al , im harazat ldzagitsʾs , ōknē asontsʾ , or awetaranin hamar martnchʾetsʾan indzi het , naew Gghemēsi ew miws kordzagitsʾnerows het , orontsʾ anownnerĕ geankʾi kirkʾin mēch en .
50004004	Amēn aten owrakhatsʾēkʾ Tērochmov : tartseal g!ĕsem , owrakhatsʾēkʾ .
50004005	TSer aznowowtʾiwnĕ tʾogh yaytni ĕllay polor martotsʾ : Tērĕ mōt ē .
50004006	Mi mtahokowikʾ orewē pani hamar : haba amēn pani mēch , aghōtʾkʾov ow aghersankʾov , shnorhagalowtʾeamp miasin , kittsʾowtsʾēkʾ tser khntrankʾnerĕ Astowdzoy :
50004007	ew Astowdzoy khaghaghowtʾiwnĕ , or amēn mitkʾē keriver ē , biti bahbanē tser sirtern ow mtadzowmnerĕ , Yisows Kʾristosov .
50004008	Verchabēs , eghpayrner , inchʾ or jshmarit ē , inchʾ or , batgaṛeli , inchʾ or , artar , inchʾ or , angeghdz , inchʾ or , siralir , inchʾ or , pari hampawov , inchʾ or aṛakʾinowtʾeamp ew inchʾ or koveli ē , atontsʾ masin mtadzetsʾēkʾ .
50004009	Inchʾ or sorvetsʾakʾ , ĕntownetsʾikʾ , lsetsʾikʾ ow tesakʾ im vras , zanonkʾ ĕrēkʾ , ew khaghaghowtʾean Astowadzĕ biti ĕllay tsezi het .
50004010	Medzabēs owrakhatsʾay Tērochmov , or hima verchabēs norokowetsʾaw im vras tser ownetsʾadz mtadzmownkʾĕ , inchʾbēs gĕ mtadzēikʾ al , sagayn batehowtʾiwn chʾownēikʾ .
50004011	Garōtowtʾean hamar chʾē or g!ĕsem : orovhetew es sorvetsʾay inkʾnapaw ĕllal im eghadz vijagis mēch .
50004012	Tʾē kitem nowastanal , tʾē al kitem aṛatowtʾean mēch ĕllal . Amēn pani mēch , amēn gerbov var zhowadz em tʾē gshtanal , tʾē al anōtʾenal , tʾē aṛatowtʾean ew tʾē garōtowtʾean mēch ĕllal .
50004013	Amēn pani garogh em anov , or zōratsʾowtsʾ zis .
50004014	Sagayn law ĕrikʾ , or haghortagitsʾ eghakʾ taṛabankʾis .
50004015	Towkʾ al kitēkʾ , Pʾilibbetsʾiner , tʾē awetaranin kʾarozowtʾean sgizpĕ , erp megnetsʾay Magetoniayēn , ochʾ mēg egeghetsʾi haghortagitsʾ eghaw indzi , talow ew ĕntownelow hamar , haba miayn towkʾ :
50004016	orovhetew noynisg minchʾew Tʾesaghonigē ghrgetsʾikʾ indzi bētkʾ eghadzĕ , mēg-ergow ankam .
50004017	Es gĕ pʾntṛem ochʾ tʾē nowēr , haba gĕ pʾntṛem btowgh , or awelnay tser hashiwin vray .
50004018	Isg es amēn pan ownim , ew aṛatōrēn : liatsʾadz em , stanalov Ebapʾrotitosi michotsʾov tser ghrgadznerĕ , or anowshapoyr hot mĕn ē , ĕntowneli zoh mĕ , hajeli , Astowdzoy .
50004019	Ew im Astowadzs biti letsʾnē tser polor garikʾnerĕ , ir jokhowtʾean hamemat , pʾaṛkʾov , Kʾristos Yisowsi michotsʾov .
50004020	Owremn pʾaṛkʾ Astowdzoy ow mer Hōr , tarē tar , , . Amēn .
50004021	Gĕ parewen tsez indzi het eghogh eghpayrnerĕ . Parewetsʾēkʾ polor sowrperĕ Yisows Kʾristosov .
50004022	Gĕ parewen tsez polor sowrperĕ , manawant anonkʾ , or Gaysrin townēn en .
50004023	Tēr Yisows Kʾristosi shnorhkʾĕ tser polorin het . Amēn .
51001001	Bōghos , Astowdzoy gamkʾov Yisows Kʾristosi aṛakʾealĕ , ew Timotʾēos eghpayrĕ ,
51001002	Goghosayi mēch eghogh sowrperown ow Kʾristosov hawatarim eghpayrnerown :
51001003	shnorhkʾ ew khaghaghowtʾiwn tsezi Astowdzmē , mer Hōrmēn , ow Tēr Yisows Kʾristosē , , . Amēn aten aghōtʾelov tsezi hamar , shnorhagal g!ĕllankʾ Astowdzmē ow mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi Hōrmēn ,
51001004	lselov Kʾristos Yisowsi vray tser ownetsʾadz hawatkʾin ew polor sowrperown hantēb tser tadzadz siroyn masin ,
51001005	ayn yoysin batjaṛov , or erginkʾĕ verabahowadz ē tsezi hamar . Anor masin nakhabēs lsetsʾikʾ , awetaranin jshmartowtʾean khōskʾov ,
51001006	or hasaw tsezi , inchʾbēs ampoghch ashkharhi , ow btowgh g!artatrē ( ew g!aji ) noynbēs tser mēch al , ayn ōrēn i ver , erp lsetsʾikʾ ow jshmartowtʾeamp kittsʾakʾ Astowdzoy shnorhkʾĕ ,
51001007	inchʾbēs sorvetsʾakʾ mer sireli dzaṛayagitsʾēn , Ebapʾrasēn . An Kʾristosi hawatarim sbasargow mĕn ē tsezi hamar ,
51001008	ew inkʾ al patsʾayaytetsʾ mezi tser sērĕ , Hokiov .
51001009	Hetewapar menkʾ al , ayn ōrēn erp lsetsʾinkʾ , chʾenkʾ tatrir aghōtʾelē tsezi hamar , ew khntrelē or letsʾowadz ĕllakʾ anor gamkʾin kitagtsʾowtʾeamp , ampoghch imastowtʾeamp ow hokewor ĕmpṛnowmov ,
51001010	orbēszi ĕntʾanakʾ Tēroch ar zhanavayel gerbov , hajetsʾnelov zinkʾ amēn pani mēch , btghaper ĕllalov amēn tesag pari kordzov , ew ajelov Astowdzoy janachʾowmov :
51001011	ow zōratsʾadz ampoghch oy zhov , ir pʾaṛawor zōrowtʾean hamemat , owrakhowtʾeamp hamperogh ew hamperatar ĕllakʾ ,
51001012	shnorhagal ĕllalov Hayr Astowdzmē , or ar zhanatsʾowtsʾ mez masnagitsʾ ĕllalow loysi mēch pnagogh sowrperow zhaṛankowtʾean ,
51001013	ew azatetsʾ mez khawari ishkhanowtʾenēn ow pʾokhatretsʾ ir sireli Ortiin tʾakaworowtʾean :
51001014	anov menkʾ azatakrowtʾiwn owninkʾ , ir ariwnov , aysinkʾn , meghkʾi nerowm .
51001015	An antesaneli Astowdzoy batgern ē , polor araradznerown antranigĕ ,
51001016	orovhetew anov steghdzowetsʾaw amēn pan , inchʾ or erginkʾi mēch ē ew inchʾ or ergri vray gay , tesaneli gam antesaneli : tʾē kaherĕ , tʾē tērowtʾiwnnerĕ , tʾē betowtʾiwnnerĕ , tʾē ishkhanowtʾiwnnerĕ . Polor panerĕ steghdzowetsʾan anov ew anor hamar .
51001017	An amēn panē aṛach ē , ow anov amēn pan hastat gĕ genay .
51001018	An ē marminin , aysinkʾn , egeghetsʾiin klowkhĕ : an ē sgizpĕ , meṛelnerēn antranigĕ , orbēszi nakhabatiw ĕllay amēn pani mēch :
51001019	orovhetew Hayrĕ parehajetsʾaw or Astowadzowtʾean ampoghch liowtʾiwnĕ pnagi anor mēch ,
51001020	ew anov hashtetsʾnē iren het polorĕ , tʾē ergri vray ow tʾē erginkʾi mēch eghoghnerĕ , khaghaghowtʾiwn ĕnelov anor ariwnov , or tʾapʾowetsʾaw khachʾin vray .
51001021	Ew tsez al , or zhamanagin owdzatsʾadz ow tser mitkʾov tʾshnaminer ēikʾ , chʾar kordzerov ,
51001022	hima hashtetsʾowtsʾ anor pown marminov , mahowan michotsʾov , orbēszi anor aṛchew sowrp , anarat ew anmeghatreli nergayatsʾnē tsez ,
51001023	etʾē himnowadz ow hastatowadz mnakʾ hawatkʾin vray , aṛantsʾ khakhtelow yoysēn ayn awetaranin , or towkʾ lsetsʾikʾ : an kʾarozowetsʾaw erginkʾi tag eghadz polor araradznerown , ow es , Bōghos , sbasargow eghay anor .
51001024	Hima owrakh em tsezi hamar gradz chʾarchʾarankʾnerows mēch , ow Kʾristosi gradz taṛabankʾnerown bagasĕ gĕ lratsʾnem im marminis mēch , anor marminin hamar , or egeghetsʾin ē .
51001025	Es sbasargow eghay anor Astowdzoy tntesowtʾeamp , or trowetsʾaw indzi tsezi hamar , orbēszi liovin kʾarozem Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ ,
51001026	ayn khorhowrtĕ , or dzadzgowadz ēr polor tarerēn ow serowntnerēn , isg hima yaytnaperowetsʾaw ir sowrperown ,
51001027	orontsʾ Astowadz owzetsʾ kittsʾnel tʾē inchʾ ē ays khorhowrtin pʾaṛkʾin jokhowtʾiwnĕ hetʾanosnerown mēch , aysinkʾn , Kʾristos tser mēch , pʾaṛkʾi yoysĕ .
51001028	Menkʾ gĕ hṛchʾagenkʾ zinkʾ , khratelov amēn mart ew sorvetsʾnelov amēn martow , ampoghch imastowtʾeamp , orbēszi nergayatsʾnenkʾ amēn mart gatareal , Kʾristos Yisowsov .
51001029	Asor hamar es g!ashkhatim , baykʾarelov ir nerkordzowtʾean hamemat , or zōrowtʾeamp gĕ kordzē im mēchs .
51002001	Artarew g!owzem or kitnakʾ tʾē inchʾbēs medz baykʾar gĕ mghem tsezi , Lawotigetsʾinerown ow polor anontsʾ hamar , or chʾen teser im eress marminov ,
51002002	orbēszi anontsʾ sirterĕ mkhitʾarowin , sirov irarow gtsʾowadz , ew ĕmpṛnen lman vstahowtʾean ampoghch jokhowtʾiwnĕ , aysinkʾn kitagtsʾin Hayr Astowdzoy ow Kʾristosi khorhowrtin ,
51002003	orown mēch bahowadz en imastowtʾean ew kitowtʾean polor kantserĕ .
51002004	G!ĕsem asiga , orbēszi ochʾ mēgĕ khapē tsez hrabowrichʾ khōskʾerov :
51002005	orovhetew tʾēbēt patsʾagay em marminov , tsezi het em hokiov , ow g!owrakhanam , tesnelov tser garkabahowtʾiwnĕ ew tser hawatkʾin amrowtʾiwnĕ , Kʾristosi vray .
51002006	Owremn , inchʾbēs ĕntownetsʾikʾ Kʾristos Yisows Tērĕ , aynbēs ĕntʾatsʾēkʾ anov ,
51002007	armatatsʾadz ow shinowadz anor vray , ew hastatowadz hawatkʾin mēch , inchʾbēs sorvetsʾakʾ , ow jokhatsʾēkʾ anor mēch shnorhagalowtʾeamp .
51002008	Zkowshatsʾēkʾ or ochʾ mēgĕ orsay tsez pʾilisopʾayowtʾeamp ew ownayn khapēowtʾeamp , martotsʾ awantowtʾean ow ashkharhi sgzpownkʾnerown hamatsayn , ew ochʾ tʾē Kʾristosi vartabetowtʾean hamatsayn :
51002009	orovhetew Astowadzowtʾean ampoghch liowtʾiwnĕ gĕ pnagi anor mēch marmnabēs ,
51002010	ow towkʾ al ampoghchatsʾadz ēkʾ anov , or klowkhn ē amēn betowtʾean ew ishkhanowtʾean .
51002011	Anov al tʾlpʾatowetsʾakʾ , antseṛagert tʾlpʾatowtʾeamp , merganalov meghkʾerow marminēn , , Kʾristosi tʾlpʾatowtʾeamp .
51002012	Anor het tʾaghowetsʾakʾ mgrtowtʾeamp , naew anov ew anor het yarowtʾiwn aṛikʾ , hawatalov Astowdzoy nerkordzowtʾean , or meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanetsʾ zayn ,
51002013	ew tsezi al , or zhamanagin meṛadz ēikʾ yantsʾankʾnerow mēch ow tser marminin antʾlpʾatowtʾean mēch , geankʾ towaw anor het . Mer polor yantsʾankʾnerĕ neretsʾ mezi ,
51002014	ew mezi tēm hramannerov eghadz bartamowrhagĕ , or hagaṛag ēr mezi , chnchetsʾ , ow mēchteghēn vertsʾowtsʾ zayn , kamelov khachʾapʾaytin vray :
51002015	ew mergatsʾowtsʾ betowtʾiwnnern ow ishkhanowtʾiwnnerĕ , ew hanrowtʾean nshawag tartsowtsʾ , anov yaghtʾelov anontsʾ .
51002016	Owremn al ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh tatē tsez geragowri gam khmelikʾi hamar , gam tōnerow , amsaklowkhnerow gam SHapatʾnerow gabagtsʾowtʾeamp ,
51002017	oronkʾ kalikʾ panerown showkʾn en : paytsʾ marminĕ Kʾristosi ē .
51002018	Ochʾ mēgĕ tsez tʾogh zrgē tser mrtsʾanagēn , yō zharagam khonarhowtʾeamp ow hreshtagnerow grōnov , michamowkh ĕllalov chʾtesadz panerown , zowr teghĕ hbartanalov ir marmnawor mitkʾov ,
51002019	ew chʾpṛnelov klowkhĕ , ormē ampoghch marminĕ , yōterov ow yōtagaberov haytʾaytʾowadz ew irarow gtsʾowadz , g!aji Astowdzoy ajowmov .
51002020	Owremn , etʾē towkʾ meṛakʾ Kʾristosi het , ays ashkharhi sgzpownkʾnerown hantēb , al inchʾow , ashkharhi mēch abroghnerow nman , entʾagay g!ĕllakʾ hramannerow , inchʾbēs ,
51002021	« mi mertsenar , mi hamteser , mi tbchʾir » ,
51002022	( asonkʾ , polorĕ kordzadzowtʾeamp sahmanowadz en abaganowtʾean , ) martotsʾ batowērnerown ow vartabetowtʾiwnnerown hamatsayn .
51002023	Asonkʾ artarew imastowtʾean gerbarankʾ mĕ ownin , inkʾnagam grōnov , khonarhowtʾeamp ew marminin chʾkhnayelov : paytsʾ ar zhani en ochʾ mēg batiwi , haba gĕ dzaṛayen marminĕ kohatsʾnelow .
51003001	Owremn , etʾē yarowtʾiwn aṛikʾ Kʾristosi het , pʾntṛetsʾēkʾ ayn panerĕ , or vern en , owr Kʾristos gĕ pazmi , Astowdzoy ach goghmĕ .
51003002	Mtadzetsʾēkʾ veri panerown masin , ochʾ tʾē ergri vray eghogh panerown masin :
51003003	orovhetew towkʾ meṛakʾ , ow tser geankʾĕ bahowadz ē Kʾristosi het , Astowdzoy mēch .
51003004	Erp Kʾristos , mer geankʾĕ , erewnay , ayn aten towkʾ al pʾaṛkʾov biti erewnakʾ , anor het .
51003005	Owremn meṛtsʾowtsʾēkʾ tser ergrawor antamnerĕ : - boṛngowtʾiwnĕ , anmakʾrowtʾiwnĕ , ansants girkʾĕ , chʾar tsʾangowtʾiwnĕ ew akahowtʾiwnĕ , or gṛabashtowtʾiwn ē .
51003006	Asontsʾ hamar Astowdzoy pargowtʾiwnĕ gow kay anhnazantowtʾean ortinerown vray ,
51003007	orontsʾ mēch towkʾ al zhamanagin g!ĕntʾanayikʾ , erp g!abrēikʾ anontsʾ mēch .
51003008	Paytsʾ hima towkʾ al tʾōtʾapʾetsʾēkʾ sa amēnĕ : - pargowtʾiwnĕ , zayroytʾĕ , chʾaramtowtʾiwnĕ , hayhoyowtʾiwnĕ , lirp khōskʾerĕ , tser peranēn .
51003009	Mi stēkʾ irarow : hanetsʾēkʾ tser vrayēn hin martĕ , ir kordzerov ,
51003010	ow hakēkʾ ayn norĕ , or norokowadz ē kitagtsʾowtʾeamp , ir Ararichʾin batgerin hamatsayn ,
51003011	ew orown mēch ochʾ Yoyn gay , ochʾ al Hreay , tʾlpʾatowtʾiwn gam antʾlpʾatowtʾiwn , ōtar , Sgiwtʾatsʾi , strowg gam azat : haba Kʾristos ē amēn inchʾ , ew polorin mēch .
51003012	Owremn , orbēs Astowdzoy ĕntrealner , sowrp ow sireli , hakēkʾ kowtʾĕ , garegtsʾowtʾiwnĕ , kʾaghtsʾrowtʾiwnĕ , khonarhowtʾiwnĕ , hezowtʾiwnĕ , hamperatarowtʾiwnĕ ,
51003013	hantowr zhelov irarow ew nerelov irarow , etʾē mēgĕ trtownch mĕ ownenay miwsin tēm : inchʾbēs Kʾristos neretsʾ tsezi , noynbēs al towkʾ neretsʾēkʾ .
51003014	Ew ays polor panerown vray , hakēkʾ sērĕ , or gatarelowtʾean gabn ē .
51003015	TSer sirterown mēch tʾogh hovanaworē Astowdzoy khaghaghowtʾiwnĕ , orown al ganchʾowetsʾakʾ , mēg marminov , ow shnorhagal eghēkʾ .
51003016	Kʾristosi khōskʾĕ jokhowtʾeamp tʾogh pnagi tser mēch , orbēszi ampoghch imastowtʾeamp sorvetsʾnēkʾ irarow ew khratēkʾ zirar , saghmosnerov , ōrhnerkerov ow hokewor erkerov , shnorhagalowtʾeamp erkelov Astowdzoy , tser sirterown mēch .
51003017	Ew amēn inchʾ or g!ĕnēkʾ , tʾē khōskʾov ew tʾē kordzov , ĕrēkʾ Tēr Yisowsi anownov , shnorhagal ĕllalov Astowdzmē ow Hōrmēn , anor michotsʾov .
51003018	Giner , hbatagetsʾēkʾ tser amowsinnerown , inchʾbēs gĕ batshaji Tērochmov .
51003019	Amowsinner , siretsʾēkʾ tser ginerĕ ew mi taṛnanakʾ anontsʾ tēm .
51003020	Zawagner , hnazantetsʾēkʾ tser dznoghnerown amēn pani mēch , orovhetew ayt ē Tēroch hajelin .
51003021	Hayrer , mi krkṛēkʾ tser zawagnerĕ , orbēszi chʾvhatin .
51003022	Strowgner , hnazantetsʾēkʾ tser marmnawor tērerown amēn pani mēch : ochʾ tʾē achʾkʾi aṛchew dzaṛayelov , martahajonerow bēs , haba , barzamtowtʾeamp , Tērochmēn vakhnalov .
51003023	Inchʾ or g!ĕnēkʾ , srtantsʾ ĕrēkʾ , orbēs tʾē Tēroch ew ochʾ tʾē martotsʾ ,
51003024	kitnalov tʾē Tērochmēn biti stanakʾ zhaṛankowtʾean hatowtsʾowmĕ , orovhetew Tēr Kʾristosi gĕ dzaṛayēkʾ .
51003025	Paytsʾ anirawĕ biti stanay ir anirawowtʾean bati zhĕ , ew achʾaṛowtʾiwn chʾgay .
51004001	Tērer , hatowtsʾanetsʾēkʾ tser strowgnerown , irawownkʾov ow hawasarowtʾeamp , kitnalov tʾē towkʾ al ownikʾ Tēr mĕ , erginkʾĕ .
51004002	Yaratewetsʾēkʾ aghōtʾkʾi mēch , ew artʾown getsʾēkʾ anor mēch , shnorhagalowtʾeamp .
51004003	Mia zhamanag aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ naew mezi hamar , or Astowadz khōskʾi towṛ mĕ panay mezi , khōselow Kʾristosi khorhowrtin masin , orown hamar gabowadz al em ,
51004004	orbēszi yaytnaperem zayn aynbēs , inchʾbēs bētkʾ ē khōsim .
51004005	Imastowtʾeamp varowetsʾēkʾ towrsinnerown het , knelov zhamanagĕ .
51004006	TSer khōskʾĕ amēn aten shnorhkʾov tʾogh ĕllay , aghov hamemowadz , or kitnakʾ tʾē inchʾbēs bētkʾ ē bataskhanēkʾ iwrakʾanchʾiwrin .
51004007	Im masis amēn inchʾ biti kittsʾnē tsezi Tiwkʾigos , sireli eghpayrĕ , hawatarim sbasargown ew dzaṛayagitsʾĕ Tērochmov .
51004008	Zinkʾ sa nbatagov ghrgetsʾi tsezi , orbēszi kitnay tser masin , , ow mkhitʾarē tser sirterĕ ,
51004009	Onesimos hawatarim ew sireli eghpōr het , or tsezmē ē : irenkʾ biti kittsʾnen tsezi amēn inchʾ or gay hos .
51004010	Gĕ parewē tsez Aristarkʾos , kerowtʾean ĕngers : naew Margos , Paṛnapasi eghpōrortin , ( orown masin batowērner statsʾakʾ : ĕntownetsʾēkʾ zinkʾ , etʾē kay tsezi , )
51004011	ew Yisows , or Yowstos gĕ gochʾowi , oronkʾ tʾlpʾatowtʾenēn en . Miayn asonkʾ kordzagtsʾetsʾan indzi , Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean mēch , ew mkhitʾarowtʾiwn eghan indzi .
51004012	Gĕ parewē tsez Ebapʾras , Kʾristosi dzaṛan , or tsezmē ē : amēn aten aghōtʾkʾi mēch gĕ baykʾari tsezi hamar , orbēszi towkʾ gatareal ow lman genakʾ , Astowdzoy ampoghch gamkʾin mēch .
51004013	Anor hamar gĕ vgayem tʾē shat nakhantsakhntrowtʾiwn owni , tsezi , inchʾbēs naew Lawotigēi ow Yerabolisi mēch eghoghnerown hamar .
51004014	Gĕ parewen tsez GHowgas , sireli p zhishgĕ , ew Temas .
51004015	Parewetsʾēkʾ eghpayrnerĕ , or Lawotigē en , ow Nimpʾas ew anor tan mēch eghogh egeghetsʾin .
51004016	Erp ays namagĕ gartatsʾowi tser mēch , gartal towēkʾ naew Lawotigetsʾinerow egeghetsʾiin mēch . Towkʾ al gartatsʾēkʾ Lawotigēēn egadz namagĕ ,
51004017	ew ĕsēkʾ Arkʾibbosi : « Zkowshatsʾir kʾow sbasargowtʾeant hamar , or statsʾar Tērochmov , orbēszi kordzatres zayn » .
51004018	Es , Bōghos , im tseṛkʾovs gĕ krem ays parewĕ . Yishetsʾēkʾ gabers . SHnorhkʾĕ tsezi het . Amēn .
52001001	Bōghos , Sighowanos ew Timotʾēos , Tʾesaghonigetsʾinerow egeghetsʾiin , Hayr Astowdzmov ow Tēr Yisows Kʾristosov :
52001002	shnorhkʾ ew khaghaghowtʾiwn tsezi Astowdzmē , mer Hōrmēn , ow Tēr Yisows Kʾristosē . Amēn aten shnorhagal g!ĕllankʾ Astowdzmē , tser polorin hamar , yishelov tsez mer aghōtʾkʾnerown mēch ,
52001003	antatar yishelov tser hawatkʾin kordzĕ , siroy ashkhatankʾĕ , ew mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi yoysin hamperowtʾiwnĕ , Astowdzoy ow mer Hōr aṛchew ,
52001004	kitnalov , sireli eghpayrner , tʾē Astowadz ĕntretsʾ tsez .
52001005	Orovhetew mer awetaranĕ kʾarozowetsʾaw tsezi ochʾ miayn khōskʾov , ayl naew zōrowtʾeamp , Sowrp Hokiov ow lman vstahowtʾeamp . Towkʾ al kitēkʾ tʾē inchʾbēs getsʾankʾ tser mēch , tsezi hamar ,
52001006	ew towkʾ nmanetsʾakʾ mezi ow Tēroch , ĕntownelov khōskʾĕ shat taṛabankʾi mēch , Sowrp Hokiin owrakhowtʾeamp .
52001007	Hetewapar towkʾ tibar eghakʾ polor hawatatsʾealnerown , or Magetoniayi ew Akʾayiayi mēch en ,
52001008	orovhetew ochʾ miayn Magetoniayi ew Akʾayiayi mēch hṛchʾagowetsʾaw Tēroch khōskʾĕ tsezmē , ayl naew amēn tegh taradzowetsʾaw Astowdzoy vray tser ownetsʾadz hawatkʾĕ , aynbēs or bētkʾ chʾowninkʾ orewē pan khōselow :
52001009	kʾani or irenkʾ irentsʾmē gĕ batmen mer masin , tʾē inchʾbisi mowtkʾ ownetsʾankʾ tser mēch , ew inchʾbēs towkʾ gowṛkʾerēn tartsakʾ Astowdzoy , abrogh ow jshmarit Astowdzoy dzaṛayelow hamar ,
52001010	ew erginkʾēn sbaselow anor Ortiin , or inkʾ meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanetsʾ , aysinkʾn Yisowsi , or g!azatē mez kalikʾ pargowtʾenēn .
52002001	Eghpayrner , towkʾ tsezmē kitēkʾ tʾē mer mowtkʾĕ ĕntownayn chʾeghaw tser mēch :
52002002	haba , nakhabēs Pʾilibbēi mēch chʾarchʾarowelē ew nakhatowelē etkʾ , inchʾbēs kitēkʾ , Astowdzmov hamartsagetsʾankʾ kʾarozel tsezi Astowdzoy awetaranĕ , shat baykʾarelov .
52002003	Orovhetew mer yortorĕ ochʾ molorowtʾenē ēr , ochʾ anmakʾrowtʾenē , ochʾ al nenkowtʾeamp :
52002004	ayl gĕ khōsinkʾ aynbēs , inchʾbēs menkʾ zatoroshowetsʾankʾ Astowdzmē , orbēszi awetaranĕ vstahowi mezi , ochʾ tʾē martig hajetsʾnelow hamar , haba Astowadz , or gĕ kʾnnē mer sirterĕ .
52002005	Kʾani or menkʾ pnaw chʾkordzadzetsʾinkʾ shoghokʾortʾowtʾean khōskʾer , - inchʾbēs kitēkʾ , - ochʾ al akahowtʾean batrowag mĕ , - Astowadz vgay ē : -
52002006	ew pʾaṛkʾ chʾpʾntṛetsʾinkʾ martotsʾmē , - ochʾ tsezmē , ochʾ al owrishnerēn . -
52002007	Tʾēew grnayinkʾ , ipr Kʾristosi aṛakʾealner , dzanrowtʾiwn ĕllal tsezi , menkʾ hezahampoyr eghankʾ tser mēch .
52002008	Inchʾbēs tayeag mĕ gĕ pʾaypʾayē ir zawagnerĕ , noynbēs menkʾ , korovakowtʾ ĕllalov tsezi hantēb , gĕ yō zharēinkʾ tal tsezi ochʾ miayn Astowdzoy awetaranĕ , haba mer antsern al , orovhetew towkʾ sireli eghakʾ mezi .
52002009	Gĕ yishēkʾ , eghpayrner , mer ashkhatankʾn ow ta zhankʾĕ : kisher ow tsʾereg kordzelov kʾarozetsʾinkʾ tsezi Astowdzoy awetaranĕ , chʾdzanrapeṛnelow hamar tsezmē oewē mēgĕ .
52002010	Towkʾ vgay ēkʾ , ew Astowadz al , tʾē inchʾbēs srpowtʾeamp , artarowtʾeamp ow anmeghatreli gerbov varowetsʾankʾ tsezi het , or gĕ hawatakʾ .
52002011	Noynbēs kitēkʾ tʾē tsezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ , inchʾbēs hayr mĕ ir zawagnerĕ ,
52002012	yortoretsʾinkʾ ew spʾopʾetsʾinkʾ , ow vgayetsʾinkʾ orbēszi tser ĕntʾatsʾkʾĕ ar zhanavayel ĕllay Astowdzoy , or ganchʾetsʾ tsez ir tʾakaworowtʾean ew pʾaṛkʾin .
52002013	Hetewapar menkʾ al antatar shnorhagal g!ĕllankʾ Astowdzmē , orovhetew erp ĕntownetsʾikʾ Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ , or mezmē lsetsʾikʾ , ĕntownetsʾikʾ zayn ochʾ tʾē ipr martotsʾ khōskʾ , haba - inchʾ or an jshmartabēs ē - orbēs Astowdzoy khōskʾ : ew an gĕ nerkordzē naew tser mēch , or gĕ hawatakʾ .
52002014	Artarew towkʾ , eghpayrner , nmanetsʾakʾ Astowdzoy egeghetsʾinerown , or Hrēastani mēch en Kʾristos Yisowsov , orovhetew towkʾ al gretsʾikʾ noyn chʾarchʾarankʾnerĕ tser tohmagitsʾnerēn , inchʾbēs anonkʾ , Hreanerēn ,
52002015	or sbannetsʾin tʾē Tēr Yisowsĕ , tʾē al markarēnerĕ , ow haladzetsʾin mez . Astowdzoy anhajoy ew polor martotsʾ hagaṛag en ,
52002016	ow g!arkilen mez khōsil hetʾanosnerown , anontsʾ pʾrgowtʾean masin , orbēszi letsʾnen irentsʾ meghkʾerown chʾapʾĕ , amēn aten : paytsʾ pargowtʾiwnĕ hasadz ē anontsʾ vray , minchʾew vakhjanĕ .
52002017	Isg menkʾ , eghpayrner , kʾichʾ mĕ aten tsezmē orp mnatsʾadz ĕllalov , - eresov ew ochʾ tʾē sirtov , - al aweli pʾowtʾatsʾinkʾ tesnel tser eresĕ , medz tsʾangowtʾeamp .
52002018	Owsti owzetsʾinkʾ kal tsezi - es inkʾs , Bōghos , mēg-ergow ankam - , paytsʾ Satanan arkiletsʾ mez .
52002019	Kʾani or inchʾ ē mer yoysĕ , gam owrakhowtʾiwnĕ , gam mer bardzankʾin bsagĕ . Mitʾē towkʾ chʾēkʾ , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi aṛchew , anor kalowstin atenĕ :
52002020	orovhetew towkʾ ēkʾ mer pʾaṛkʾĕ ew owrakhowtʾiwnĕ .
52003001	Owsti , chʾgarenalov al aweli timanal , yō zharetsʾankʾ aṛantsin mnal Atʾēnkʾ ,
52003002	ew ghrgetsʾinkʾ Timotʾēosĕ - mer eghpayrĕ , Astowdzoy sbasargown ow mer kordzagitsʾĕ Kʾristosi awetaranin mēch - , amratsʾnelow tsez ew yortorelow tser hawatkʾin mēch :
52003003	orbēszi ays taṛabankʾnerown mēch tsezmē ochʾ mēgĕ khakhti , orovhetew towkʾ tsezmē kitēkʾ tʾē menkʾ sahmanowadz enkʾ atontsʾ hamar .
52003004	Kʾani or erp menkʾ tser kʾov ēinkʾ , gankhaw g!ĕsēinkʾ tsezi tʾē taṛabankʾner biti grenkʾ , inchʾbēs eghaw al ow towkʾ kitēkʾ .
52003005	Hetewapar es al , chʾgarenalov aweli timanal , mart ghrgetsʾi , kitnalow tser hawatkʾĕ , tʾē arteōkʾ Pʾortsichʾĕ pʾortsadz ē tsez , ow mer ashkhatankʾĕ ĕntownayn eghadz ē .
52003006	Paytsʾ hima Timotʾēos tsezmē egaw mezi ew tser hawatkʾin ow siroyn awetisĕ towaw mezi , ew ĕsaw tʾē amēn aten law yishatag ownikʾ mezmē , tenchʾalov tesnel mez , inchʾbēs menkʾ al , tsez .
52003007	Hetewapar , eghpayrner , tser masin mkhitʾarowetsʾankʾ mer polor taṛabankʾnerown ow hargatrankʾnerown mēch , tser hawatkʾov :
52003008	orovhetew hima menkʾ g!abrinkʾ , etʾē towkʾ hastatown genakʾ Tērochmov .
52003009	Kʾani or inchʾbēs grnankʾ shnorhagal ĕllal Astowdzmē , tsezi hamar , ayn ampoghch owrakhowtʾean hamar , or tser batjaṛov g!owrakhatsʾnē mez mer Astowdzoyn aṛchew :
52003010	kisher ow tsʾereg chʾapʾazantsʾ g!aghersenkʾ , orbēszi tesnenkʾ tser eresĕ ew lratsʾnenkʾ inchʾ or gĕ bagsi tser hawatkʾin .
52003011	Noyninkʾn Astowadz , mer Hayrĕ , ow mer Tērĕ , Yisows Kʾristos , tʾogh owghghen mer jampan tēbi tsez .
52003012	Tērĕ tʾogh ajetsʾnē ew aṛatatsʾnē tser sērĕ irarow hantēb ow polorin hantēb , inchʾbēs menkʾ owninkʾ tsezi hantēb ,
52003013	orbēszi amratsʾnē tser sirterĕ , srpowtʾean mēch anmeghatreli ĕllalow Astowdzoy ew mer Hōr aṛchew , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi kalowstin atenĕ , ir polor sowrperown het .
52004001	Owremn , eghpayrner , gĕ tʾakhantsenkʾ tsezi ow gĕ yortorenkʾ tsez Tēr Yisowsov , orbēszi , inchʾbēs ĕntownetsʾikʾ mezmē tʾē inchʾbēs bētkʾ ē ĕntʾanakʾ ew hajetsʾnēkʾ Astowadz , al aweli jokhanakʾ anor mēch ,
52004002	kʾani or kitēkʾ tʾē inchʾ batowērner towinkʾ tsezi , Tēr Yisowsov .
52004003	Orovhetew Astowdzoy gamkʾĕ , tser srpatsʾowmn ē , or et genakʾ boṛngowtʾenē ,
52004004	ow tsezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ kitnay ir anōtʾin tiranal srpowtʾeamp ew batiwov :
52004005	ochʾ tʾē tsʾangowtʾean girkʾov , inchʾbēs hetʾanosnerĕ , or chʾen janchʾnar Astowadz .
52004006	Ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh chʾapʾazantsʾē ayt panin , , mēch ow geghekʾē ir eghpayrĕ , kʾani or Tērĕ vrē zhkhntir ē ayt polorin hamar , inchʾbēs menkʾ al nakhabēs ĕsinkʾ tsezi ew vgayetsʾinkʾ :
52004007	orovhetew Astowadz ganchʾetsʾ mez ochʾ tʾē anmakʾrowtʾean , haba , srpowtʾean .
52004008	Owsti an or g!anarkē , g!anarkē ochʾ tʾē mart mĕ , haba Astowadz , or ir Sowrp Hokin al towaw mezi .
52004009	Isg eghpayrsirowtʾean masin bētkʾ chʾownikʾ or krem tsezi , orovhetew towkʾ artēn Astowdzmē sorvadz ēkʾ sirel zirar ,
52004010	ew artarew atiga g!ĕnēkʾ ampoghch Magetoniayi mēch eghogh polor eghpayrnerown hantēb . Sagayn g!aghachʾenkʾ tsezi , eghpayrner , or al aweli jokhanakʾ ,
52004011	ow batiw hamarēkʾ hantart genal , tser kordzerov zpaghil ew tser tseṛkʾerov ashkhatil , ( inchʾbēs batowiretsʾinkʾ tsezi , )
52004012	orbēszi towrsinnerown het varowikʾ vayelchʾowtʾeamp ow ochʾ mēg pani , , bētkʾ ownenakʾ .
52004013	Eghpayrner , chʾenkʾ owzer or ankēt ĕllakʾ nnchetsʾealnerown masin , orbēszi chʾtrtmikʾ inchʾbēs owrishnerĕ , or yoys chʾownin .
52004014	Artarew etʾē gĕ hawatankʾ tʾē Yisows meṛaw ew yarowtʾiwn aṛaw , noynbēs al hawatankʾ tʾē Astowadz biti perē Yisowsov nnchoghnerĕ , anor het .
52004015	Orovhetew sa gĕ yaytararenkʾ tsezi , Tēroch khōskʾov , tʾē menkʾ , minchʾew Tēroch kalowstĕ oghch mnatsʾoghners , pnaw biti chʾgankhenkʾ nnchetsʾealnerĕ .
52004016	Kʾani or noyninkʾn Tērĕ biti ichnē erginkʾēn , aztararowtʾean hramanov , hreshtagabetin tsaynov ew Astowdzoy pʾoghov , ow nakh Kʾristosov meṛadznerĕ yarowtʾiwn biti aṛnen .
52004017	Aba menkʾ , oghch mnatsʾoghners , anontsʾ het biti yapʾshtagowinkʾ amberov , Tērĕ timaworelow ōtin mēch , ew aytbēs Tēroch het biti ĕllankʾ yawitean .
52004018	Hetewapar mkhitʾaretsʾēkʾ zirar ays khōskʾerov .
52005001	Paytsʾ , eghpayrner , bētkʾ chʾownikʾ or krem tsezi ayt zhamanagnerown ew atennerown masin ,
52005002	kʾani or towkʾ isg jshkrtowtʾeamp kitēkʾ tʾē Tēroch ōrĕ gow kay kisherowan koghin bēs .
52005003	Erp martig ĕsen tʾē “ khaghaghowtʾiwn ew abahovowtʾiwn ē ” , ayn aten awerowmĕ anagngalōrēn biti hasni anontsʾ vray , yghiin ergownkʾin bēs , ow zerdz biti chʾmnan .
52005004	Paytsʾ towkʾ , eghpayrner , khawari mēch chʾēkʾ , or ayt ōrĕ koghi mĕ bēs hasni tser vray :
52005005	orovhetew towkʾ polort loysi ortiner ēkʾ , ew tsʾeregowan ortiner :
52005006	kisherowan ortiner chʾenkʾ , ochʾ al khawari . Owremn chʾkʾnanankʾ owrishnerow nman , haba ĕllankʾ artʾown ow zkast :
52005007	kʾani or anonkʾ or gĕ kʾnanan , kisherĕ gĕ kʾnanan , ew anonkʾ or g!arpenan , kisherĕ g!arpenan .
52005008	Isg menkʾ , or tsʾeregowan ortinern enkʾ , zkast ĕllankʾ , haknelov hawatkʾi ow siroy zrahĕ , ew ipr saghawart , pʾrgowtʾean yoysĕ .
52005009	Orovhetew Astowadz oroshetsʾ mez ochʾ tʾē pargowtʾean hamar , haba , pʾrgowtʾean tiranalow mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov .
52005010	An meṛaw mezi hamar , orbēszi menkʾ abrinkʾ iren het , artʾown ĕllankʾ tʾē kʾnatsʾadz .
52005011	Owsti yortoretsʾēkʾ zirar ew shinetsʾēkʾ zirar , inchʾbēs artēn g!ĕnēkʾ .
52005012	Gĕ tʾakhantsenkʾ tsezi , eghpayrner , or janchʾnakʾ tser mēch ashkhatoghnerĕ , Tērochmov veragatsʾownern ow tsez khratoghnerĕ .
52005013	Batowetsʾēkʾ zanonkʾ medz sirov , irentsʾ kordzin hamar . KHaghaghowtʾiwn ownetsʾēkʾ irarow het .
52005014	Gĕ yortorenkʾ tsez , eghpayrner , khratetsʾēkʾ angarknerĕ , spʾopʾetsʾēkʾ tʾowlasirtnerĕ , tseṛntow eghēkʾ tgarnerown , hamperatar eghēkʾ polorin hantēb .
52005015	Zkowshatsʾēkʾ , ochʾ mēgĕ chʾarikʾi pʾokharēn chʾarikʾ hatowtsʾanē oewē mēgown : haba , amēn aten hetamowt eghēkʾ pariin , tʾē tser michew , tʾē polorin hantēb .
52005016	Amēn aten owrakh eghēkʾ .
52005017	Antatar aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ .
52005018	Amēn pani mēch shnorhagal eghēkʾ , orovhetew ays ē Astowdzoy gamkʾĕ tsezi hantēb , Kʾristos Yisowsov .
52005019	Mi marēkʾ Sowrp Hokin .
52005020	Mi anarkēkʾ markarēowtʾiwnnerĕ .
52005021	Kʾnnetsʾēkʾ amēn pan , parin amowr pṛnetsʾēkʾ .
52005022	Et getsʾēkʾ amēn tesag chʾarowtʾenē .
52005023	Noyninkʾn khaghaghowtʾean Astowadzĕ ampoghchovin srpatsʾnē tsez , ew tser hokin , antsn ow marminĕ ampoghchowtʾeamp anmeghatreli bahowin minchʾew mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi kalowstĕ .
52005024	An or ganchʾetsʾ tsez , hawatarim ē : naew inkʾ biti gatarē atiga .
52005025	Eghpayrner , aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ mezi hamar .
52005026	Parewetsʾēkʾ polor eghpayrnerĕ sowrp hampoyrov .
52005027	Gĕ bartatrem , , tsez Tērochmov , or gartakʾ ays namagĕ polor sowrp eghpayrnerown .
52005028	Mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi shnorhkʾĕ tsezi het . Amēn .
53001001	Bōghos , Sighowanos ow Timotʾēos , Tʾesaghonigetsʾinerow egeghetsʾiin , mer Hayr Astowdzmov ow Tēr Yisows Kʾristosov :
53001002	shnorhkʾ ew khaghaghowtʾiwn tsezi Astowdzmē , mer Hōrmēn , ow Tēr Yisows Kʾristosē .
53001003	Bartagan enkʾ amēn aten Astowdzmē shnorhagal ĕllal tsezi hamar , eghpayrner , inchʾbēs or ar zhanavayel ē : kʾani or tser hawatkʾĕ shat g!aji , ew tsezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrin sērĕ g!awelnay irarow hantēb .
53001004	Owsti menkʾ al gĕ bardzenankʾ tsezmov Astowdzoy egeghetsʾinerown mēch , tser hamperowtʾean ow hawatkʾin hamar , tser polor haladzankʾnerown ew taṛabankʾnerown mēch , orontsʾ gĕ hantowr zhēkʾ .
53001005	Asiga Astowdzoy artar tatastanin abatsʾoytsʾn ē , orbēszi towkʾ ar zhananakʾ Astowdzoy tʾakaworowtʾean , orown hamar gĕ chʾarchʾarowikʾ al .
53001006	Kʾani or Astowdzoy kʾov artarowtʾiwn ē taṛabankʾ hatowtsʾanel tsez taṛabetsʾnoghnerown ,
53001007	isg tsezi , taṛabankʾ groghnerowt , antorrowtʾiwn mezi het , erp Tēr Yisows yaytnowi erginkʾēn , ir hzōr hreshtagnerov ,
53001008	potsʾavaṛ gragov vrē zh aṛnelow anontsʾmē , or chʾen janchʾnar Astowadz , ow chʾen hnazantir mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi awetaranin .
53001009	Anonkʾ biti bat zhowin yawitenagan awerowmov , vtarowelov Tēroch nergayowtʾenēn ew anor oy zhin pʾaṛkʾēn ,
53001010	erp inkʾ kay pʾaṛaworowelow ir sowrperown mēch , ow ayt ōrĕ skʾanchʾatsʾowmi aṛargay ĕllalow polor hawatatsʾealnerown mēch ( orovhetew towkʾ hawatatsʾikʾ tser mēch trowadz mer vgayowtʾean ) .
53001011	Hetewapar amēn aten g!aghōtʾenkʾ tsezi hamar , or mer Astowadzĕ ar zhanatsʾnē tsez tser gochʾowmin , ew zōrowtʾeamp irakordzē ir parowtʾean ampoghch parehajowtʾiwnn ow hawatkʾin kordzĕ :
53001012	orbēszi mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi anownĕ pʾaṛaworowi tser mēch , ew towkʾ al anor mēch , mer Astowdzoyn ow Tēr Yisows Kʾristosi shnorhkʾin hamatsayn .
53002001	Gĕ tʾakhantsenkʾ tsezi , eghpayrner , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi kalowstin ew anor kʾov mer hawakʾowelown masin ,
53002002	or showtov chʾsarsikʾ tser mitkʾin mēch , ow chʾvrtovikʾ , ochʾ hokiov , ochʾ khōskʾov , ochʾ al namagov mĕ , ipr tʾē mezmē krowadz , orbēs tʾē Kʾristosi ōrĕ egadz hasadz ĕllay .
53002003	Ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh khapē tsez orewē gerbov : orovhetew ayt ōrĕ biti chʾkay , etʾē nakh chʾkay owkhtatr zhowmĕ ow chʾyaytnowi meghkʾi martĕ , gorowsti ortin ,
53002004	or biti hagaṛagi ew bandzatsʾnē inkʾzinkʾ amēn panē ver , or Astowadz gĕ gochʾowi gam gĕ bashtowi : minchʾew ankam biti pazmi Astowdzoy tajarin mēch , nergayatsʾnelov inkʾzinkʾ ipr Astowadz .
53002005	CHʾēkʾ yisher tʾē erp tagawin tser kʾov ēi , g!ĕsēi tsezi ays panerĕ .
53002006	Ew hima towkʾ tsezmē kitēkʾ tʾē inchʾĕ gĕ zsbē , or inkʾ yaytnowi ir atenin .
53002007	Orovhetew anōrēnowtʾean khorhowrtĕ artēn gĕ nerkordzē : paytsʾ an or hima gĕ zsbē , biti zsbē , minchʾew or inkʾ vertsʾowi mēchteghēn .
53002008	Ayn aten biti yaytnowi ayt anōrēnĕ , or Tēr ( Yisows ) biti sbaṛē ir peranin shownchʾov ew biti ochʾnchʾatsʾnē ir kalowstin pʾaylov .
53002009	Anōrēnĕ biti kay Satanayin nerkordzowtʾeamp , amēn tesag hrashkʾnerov , nshannerov ow sowt skʾanchʾelikʾnerov ,
53002010	ew anirawowtʾean ampoghch khapēowtʾeamp , anontsʾ hamar , or gĕ gorsowin , kʾani or anonkʾ chʾĕntownetsʾin jshmartowtʾean sērĕ , orbēszi pʾrgowin .
53002011	Ays batjaṛov Astowadz al biti ghrgē anontsʾ aztetsʾig molorowtʾiwn mĕ , or hawatan stowtʾean ,
53002012	orbēszi tatabartowin polor anonkʾ , or chʾhawatatsʾin jshmartowtʾean , haba yō zharetsʾan anirawowtʾean .
53002013	Paytsʾ menkʾ bartagan enkʾ amēn aten shnorhagal ĕllal Astowdzmē , tsezi hamar , Tērochmēn sirowadz eghpayrner , kʾani or Astowadz sgizpēn ĕntretsʾ tsez pʾrgowtʾean hamar , Hokiin srpatsʾowmov ew jshmartowtʾean hawatkʾov ,
53002014	orown ganchʾetsʾ tsez mer awetaranov , orbēszi tiranakʾ mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi pʾaṛkʾin .
53002015	Owremn , eghpayrner , hastatown getsʾēkʾ , ow bahetsʾēkʾ ayn awantowtʾiwnnerĕ , or sorvetsʾakʾ gam khōskʾov , gam mer namagov .
53002016	Ew mer Tērĕ , noyninkʾn Yisows Kʾristos , ow mer Hayrĕ , Astowadz , or siretsʾ mez ew towaw mezi yawitenagan mkhitʾarowtʾiwn ow pari yoys , shnorhkʾov ,
53002017	tʾogh mkhitʾaren tser sirterĕ ew amratsʾnen tsez amēn pari khōskʾi ow kordzi mēch .
53003001	Verchabēs , eghpayrner , aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ mezi hamar , orbēszi Tēroch khōskʾĕ arak ĕntʾanay ow pʾaṛaworowi amēn tegh , inchʾbēs tser mēch ,
53003002	ew menkʾ azatinkʾ vat ow chʾar martotsʾmē : orovhetew polorĕ hawatkʾ chʾownin .
53003003	Paytsʾ Tērĕ hawatarim ē : an biti amratsʾnē tsez ew bahē CHʾarēn .
53003004	Ow menkʾ hamozowm owninkʾ tser vray Tērochmov , tʾē inchʾ or batowiretsʾinkʾ tsezi , g!ĕnēkʾ ew biti ĕnēkʾ al .
53003005	Tērĕ tʾogh owghghē tser sirterĕ tēbi Astowdzoy sērn ow Kʾristosi hamperowtʾiwnĕ .
53003006	Gĕ batowirenkʾ tsezi , eghpayrner , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi anownov , or zkowshanakʾ amēn eghpōrmē , or g!ĕntʾanay angarkowtʾeamp , ew ochʾ tʾē ayn awantowtʾean hamatsayn , or ĕntownetsʾikʾ mezmē .
53003007	Orovhetew towkʾ tsezmē kitēkʾ tʾē inchʾbēs bētkʾ ē nmanikʾ mezi : kʾani or menkʾ angarkowtʾeamp chʾĕntʾatsʾankʾ tser mēch ,
53003008	ochʾ al tsri gerankʾ mēgown hatsʾĕ , ayl kisher ow tsʾereg gĕ kordzēinkʾ , ashkhatankʾov ew ta zhankʾov , tsezmē ochʾ mēgĕ dzanrapeṛnelow hamar .
53003009	Ochʾ tʾē irawownkʾ chʾownēinkʾ , haba menkʾ mez tibar tartsowtsʾinkʾ tsezi , orbēszi nmanikʾ mezi .
53003010	Orovhetew erp tser kʾov ēinkʾ , sa gĕ batowirēinkʾ tsezi , tʾē “ an or chʾ!owzer kordzel , hatsʾ al tʾogh chʾowtē ” .
53003011	Artarew gĕ lsenkʾ tʾē tser mēchēn omankʾ g!ĕntʾanan angarkowtʾeamp , pnaw chʾen kordzer , haba hetakʾrkʾramol g!ĕllan .
53003012	Aytbisinerown gĕ batowirenkʾ ow gĕ yortorenkʾ mer Tērochmov , Yisows Kʾristosov , or kordzen hantartowtʾeamp ew owten irentsʾ hatsʾĕ .
53003013	Isg towkʾ , eghpayrner , mi tsantsranakʾ parikʾ kordzelē .
53003014	Etʾē oewē mēgĕ chʾhnazanti ays namagin mēch mer ĕsadz khōskʾin , nshanagetsʾēkʾ zayn ow mi yaraperikʾ anor het , orbēszi amchʾnay .
53003015	Paytsʾ tʾshnami mi hamarēkʾ zinkʾ , haba khratetsʾēkʾ ipr eghpayr .
53003016	Noyninkʾn khaghaghowtʾean Tērĕ khaghaghowtʾiwn tay tsezi , amēn aten ew amēn gerbov : Tērĕ tser polorin het .
53003017	Es , Bōghos , im tseṛkʾovs gĕ krem ays parewĕ , or amēn namagi mēch im nshans ē : es aysbēs gĕ krem .
53003018	Mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi shnorhkʾĕ tser polorin het . Amēn .
54001001	Bōghos , Yisows Kʾristosi aṛakʾeal mer Pʾrgichʾ Astowdzoy ew mer yoysĕ eghogh Kʾristos Yisowsi , , hramanov ,
54001002	Timotʾēosi , hawatkʾov harazat zawagis : shnorhkʾ , oghormowtʾiwn ow khaghaghowtʾiwn Astowdzmē , mer Hōrmēn , ew Kʾristos Yisowsē , mer Tērochmēn .
54001003	Kʾezi aghachʾetsʾi or Epʾesos mnas , erp es Magetonia g!ertʾayi , orbēszi batowires omantsʾ , owrish gerbov chʾsorvetsʾnel ,
54001004	ochʾ al owshatrowtʾiwn tartsnel aṛasbelnerow ew anverchanali azkapanowtʾiwnnerow , oronkʾ gĕ batjaṛen vējer , pʾokhanag Astowdzoy hajeli shinowtʾean , or g!ĕllay hawatkʾov .
54001005	Isg batowērin vakhjanĕ sērn ē , pkhadz sowrp sirtē , pari khghjmtankʾē ew angeghdz hawatkʾē .
54001006	Asontsʾmē vribelov , omankʾ khotoretsʾan pʾowj khōskʾerow mēch :
54001007	g!owzen ōrēnkʾi vartabet ĕllal , paytsʾ chʾen hasgnar ochʾ inchʾ or gĕ khōsin , ochʾ al ayn panerĕ , orontsʾ vray gĕ bnten .
54001008	Sagayn kitenkʾ tʾē ōrēnkʾĕ law ē , etʾē mēgĕ kordzadzē zayn ōrinawor gerbov ,
54001009	sa kitnalov tʾē ōrēnkʾĕ trowadz ē ochʾ tʾē artarnerown hamar , haba , anōrēnnerown ew ĕmpostnerown , amparishtnerown ow meghawornerown , ansowrperown ew srpabighdznerown , hayr zarnoghnerown , mayr zarnoghnerown , martasbannerown ,
54001010	boṛngoghnerown , arowakētnerown , mart koghtsʾoghnerown , stakhōsnerown , ertmnazantsʾnerown , ew owrish orewē pani hamar , or hagaṛag ē oghchamit vartabetowtʾean ,
54001011	hamatsayn eraneli Astowdzoy pʾaṛawor awetaranin , or vstahowetsʾaw indzi .
54001012	SHnorhabart em zis zōratsʾnogh Kʾristos Yisowsi , mer Tēroch , kʾani or hawatarim hamaretsʾ zis ow traw ays sbasargowtʾean mēch .
54001013	Nakhabēs hayhoyichʾ ēi , haladzogh ew nakhatogh : paytsʾ oghormowtʾiwn ktay , orovhetew ankitanalov ĕri , anhawatowtʾean mēch :
54001014	ew mer Tēroch shnorhkʾĕ yortetsʾaw indzi hantēb , hawatkʾov ow sirov , or Kʾristos Yisowsov ē .
54001015	Sa vstaheli ew polorovin ĕntownowelow ar zhani khōskʾ mĕn ē , tʾē Kʾristos Yisows ashkharh egaw , pʾrgelow meghawornerĕ , orontsʾ klkhaworĕ es em .
54001016	Paytsʾ oghormowtʾiwn ktay sa batjaṛov , or Yisows Kʾristos nakh im vras tsʾoytsʾ tay ir hamperatarowtʾiwnĕ , tibar ĕllalow anontsʾ or biti hawatayin iren , yawitenagan geankʾi hamar .
54001017	Owremn yawitenagan Tʾakaworin , or aneghdz ew antesaneli ē , miag Astowdzoyn , batiw ow pʾaṛkʾ tarē tar , , . Amēn .
54001018	Sa batowērĕ g!awantem kʾezi , orteags Timotʾēos , kʾezi hamar nakhabēs eghadz markarēowtʾiwnnerown hamatsayn , or anontsʾmov martnchʾis pari martĕ ,
54001019	bahelov hawatkʾn ow pari khghjmtankʾĕ , or omankʾ vanetsʾin irentsʾmē ew hawatkʾi verapereal nawagodzowtʾiwn gretsʾin .
54001020	Asontsʾmē en Himenos ew Aghekʾsantros , or matnetsʾi Satanayin , orbēszi var zhowin chʾhayhoyel .
54002001	Owremn gĕ yortorem or amēn panē aṛach aghersankʾ , aghōtʾkʾ , baghatankʾ ow shnorhagalowtʾiwn matowtsʾanēkʾ polor martotsʾ hamar ,
54002002	manawant tʾakawornerown ew ishkhanawornerown hamar , orbēszi khaghagh ow hantart geankʾ varenkʾ , ampoghch parebashtowtʾeamp ow batgaṛankʾov :
54002003	orovhetew ayt ē parin ew ĕntownelin mer Pʾrgichʾ Astowdzoyn aṛchew .
54002004	An g!owzē or polor martigĕ pʾrgowin ow kan jshmartowtʾean kitagtsʾowtʾean :
54002005	kʾani or mēg Astowadz gay ew mēg michnort Astowdzoy ow martotsʾ michew , Kʾristos Yisows martĕ ,
54002006	or inkʾzinkʾ ipr pʾrgankʾ ĕndzayetsʾ polorin teghĕ , yatowg atenin vgayowtʾiwn ĕllalow .
54002007	Es anor kʾarozichʾ ew aṛakʾeal nshanagowetsʾay , ( jshmartowtʾiwnĕ g!ĕsem Kʾristosov , chʾem ster , ) ow hetʾanosnerown vartabet eghay , hawatkʾov ew jshmartowtʾeamp .
54002008	Owremn gĕ pʾapʾakʾim or ayr martig amēn tegh aghōtʾen , sowrp tseṛkʾer vertsʾnelov , aṛantsʾ pargowtʾean ew aṛargowtʾean .
54002009	Noynbēs al ginerĕ irenkʾ zirenkʾ zartaren hamest tarazov , amōtʾkhadzowtʾeamp ew khohemowtʾeamp , ochʾ tʾē hiwsowadzkʾnerov , osgiov , markaritnerov gam medzadzakhs batmowjannerov ,
54002010	haba pari kordzerov , inchʾbēs gĕ batshaji astowadzbashtowtʾiwn tawanogh ginerown .
54002011	Ginĕ tʾogh sorvi , hantart genalov , polorovin entʾargowelov .
54002012	Paytsʾ gnoch chʾem artōner or sorvetsʾnē , ochʾ al ishkhē ayr martown : haba tʾogh hantart genay .
54002013	Orovhetew nakh Atam gertowetsʾaw , ow yetoy , Ewa :
54002014	ew Atam chʾkhapowetsʾaw , haba ginĕ khapowelov ōrinazantsʾ eghaw .
54002015	Sagayn an biti pʾrgowi ortedznowtʾeamp , etʾē khohemowtʾeamp yaratewē hawatkʾi , siroy ow srpowtʾean mēch .
54003001	Sa khōskʾĕ vstaheli ē : etʾē mēgĕ ebisgobosowtʾean gĕ paghtsay , pari kordzi gĕ tsʾangay .
54003002	Owsti ebisgobosĕ bētkʾ ē ĕllay anarat , mēg gnoch amowsin , zkast , khohem , hamest , hiwrasēr , sorvetsʾnelow ĕntownag ,
54003003	ochʾ kinemol , ochʾ zarnogh , haba , azniw , ochʾ gṛowazan , ochʾ ardzatʾasēr ,
54003004	ir tan law veragatsʾow eghogh , entʾargowadz zawagner ownetsʾogh , ampoghch batgaṛankʾov :
54003005	( kʾani or etʾē mēgĕ chʾkitnay veragatsʾow ĕllal ir tan , inchʾbēs hok biti tani Astowdzoy egeghetsʾiin : )
54003006	ochʾ al norahawat , or hbartanalov chʾiynay CHʾarakhōsin sahmanowadz tatabartowtʾean mēch .
54003007	Naew bētkʾ ē ownenay pari vgayowtʾiwn towrsinnerēn al , orbēszi chʾiynay nakhatinkʾi ow CHʾarakhōsin tʾagartin mēch .
54003008	Nmanabēs sargawaknerĕ bētkʾ ē ĕllan batgaṛeli , ochʾ erglezow , ochʾ kinemol , ochʾ amōtʾali shahakhntrowtʾean hetamowt eghogh ,
54003009	haba hawatkʾin khorhowrtĕ bahogh , makʾowr khghjmtankʾov .
54003010	Asonkʾ al nakh tʾogh pʾortsargowin , ow yetoy gataren sargawakowtʾiwn , etʾē anmeghatreli ktnowin .
54003011	Noynbēs al anontsʾ ginerĕ bētkʾ ē ĕllan batgaṛeli , ochʾ chʾarakhōs , haba zkast , hawatarim , amēn pani mēch .
54003012	Sargawaknerĕ tʾogh ĕllan mēg gnoch amowsin , ew law veragatsʾow irentsʾ zawagnerown ow tan :
54003013	orovhetew anonkʾ or law gĕ gataren sargawakowtʾiwnĕ , gĕ tiranan pari astijani mĕ , ow shat hamartsagowtʾean , Kʾristos Yisowsi vray eghadz hawatkʾin mēch .
54003014	Gĕ krem kʾezi ays panerĕ , tʾēbēt gĕ yowsam showtov kal kʾezi ,
54003015	orbēszi , etʾē yabaghim , kitnas tʾē inchʾbēs bētkʾ ē varowis Astowdzoy tan mēch , or abrogh Astowdzoy egeghetsʾin ē , jshmartowtʾean siwnn ow khariskhĕ .
54003016	Anvijeliōrēn medz ē parebashtowtʾean khorhowrtĕ : Astowadz erewtsʾaw marminov , artaratsʾaw Hokiov , tesnowetsʾaw hreshtagnerēn , kʾarozowetsʾaw hetʾanosnerown mēch , hawatatsʾowetsʾaw ashkharhi mēch , ew hampartsaw pʾaṛkʾov .
54004001	Hokin yatgabēs g!ĕsē tʾē verchin atennerĕ , omankʾ biti heṛanan hawatkʾēn , owshatrowtʾiwn tartsnelov moloretsʾowtsʾichʾ okinerow ew tewerow vartabetowtʾiwnnerow .
54004002	Geghdzaworowtʾeamp sowt biti khōsin , khantsowadz khghjmtankʾ biti ownenan ,
54004003	biti arkilen amowsnanal ow et biti bahen geragowrnerēn , or Astowadz steghdzer ē orbēszi hawatatsʾealnerĕ ew jshmartowtʾiwnĕ kittsʾoghnerĕ shnorhagalowtʾeamp ĕntownin :
54004004	orovhetew amēn inchʾ or Astowadz steghdzadz ē , pari ē , ow ochʾinchʾ mer zhowelow ē , etʾē ĕntownowi shnorhagalowtʾeamp ,
54004005	kʾani or gĕ srpatsʾowi Astowdzoy khōskʾov ew aghōtʾkʾov .
54004006	Etʾē tʾelatres ays panerĕ eghpayrnerown , biti ĕllas Yisows Kʾristosi pari sbasargow mĕ , snadz khōskʾerov hawatkʾin ow pari vartabetowtʾean , orown hetewetsʾar .
54004007	Paytsʾ mer zhē srpabighdz ow baṛawagan aṛasbelnerĕ , ew town kʾez var zhetsʾowr parebashtowtʾean :
54004008	orovhetew marminin var zhowtʾiwnĕ ōktagar ē kʾichʾ pani , paytsʾ parebashtowtʾiwnĕ ōktagar ē amēn pani , ownenalov tʾē nergay ew tʾē abakay geankʾin khostowmĕ .
54004009	Ays khōskʾĕ vstaheli ē ow polorovin ĕntownowelow ar zhani .
54004010	Artarew menkʾ g!ashkhatinkʾ ew gĕ nakhatowinkʾ sa nbatagov , orovhetew gĕ yowsankʾ abrogh Astowdzoy , or Pʾrgichʾn ē polor martotsʾ , manawant , hawatatsʾealnerown .
54004011	Batowirē ew sorvetsʾowr ays panerĕ .
54004012	Ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh arhamarhē kʾow eritasartowtʾiwnt , haba tibar eghir hawatatsʾealnerown , khōskʾov , varkʾov , sirov , hawatkʾov ow makʾragetsʾowtʾeamp .
54004013	Minchʾew or kam , owshatir eghir gartalow , yortorelow , sorvetsʾnelow .
54004014	Anhok mi ĕllar kʾow mēcht eghadz shnorhin hantēb , or markarēowtʾeamp trowetsʾaw kʾezi , erētsʾnerown tseṛnatrowtʾeamp .
54004015	KHoga ayt panerown masin ew zpaghē atontsʾmov , orbēszi kʾow yaṛachtimowtʾiwnt erewnay amenown .
54004016	Owshatir eghir town kʾezi ow vartabetowtʾean , ew misht yaratewē atontsʾ mēch : kʾani or aytbēs ĕnelov , biti pʾrges tʾē kʾez , tʾē kʾez lsoghnerĕ .
54005001	Mi saster taretsʾĕ , haba yortorē zayn , hōr mĕ bēs : eritasartnerĕ , eghpayrnerow bēs ,
54005002	taretsʾ ginerĕ , mayrerow bēs , teṛahasagnerĕ , kʾoyrerow bēs , polorovin makʾragetsʾowtʾeamp .
54005003	Batowē ayn ayrinerĕ , or irabēs ayri en .
54005004	Paytsʾ etʾē ayri mĕ owni zawagner gam tʾoṛner , anonkʾ tʾogh sorvin nakh irentsʾ tan mēch parebashtowtʾiwn tsʾoytsʾ tal , ow pʾokharēnĕ hatowtsʾanel irentsʾ dznoghnerown : orovhetew ayt ē parin ew ĕntownelin Astowdzoy aṛchew .
54005005	Isg an or irabēs ayri ē ow minag mnatsʾadz , gĕ yowsay Astowdzoy , ew kisher-tsʾereg gĕ yaratewē aghersankʾi ow aghōtʾkʾi mēch :
54005006	minchʾteṛ pʾapʾgasēr ayrin meṛadz ē , tʾēbēt g!abri .
54005007	Batowirē ays panerĕ , orbēszi anarat ĕllan .
54005008	Paytsʾ etʾē mēgĕ chʾi hokar irennerĕ ow manawant ir ĕntanikʾĕ , an owratsʾadz ē hawatkʾĕ , ew aweli kēsh ē , kʾan anhawat mĕ .
54005009	Ipr ayri tʾogh tasowi an , or vatʾsown tareganēn grtser chʾē , mēg martow gin eghadz ē ,
54005010	ow pari kordzerov vgayowadz : etʾē zawagner medztsʾowtsʾadz ē , hiwrer ĕntownadz , sowrperown otkʾerĕ lowatsʾadz , taṛabealnerown nbastadz , amēn pari kordzi hetamowt eghadz .
54005011	Paytsʾ mer zhē teṛahasag ayrinerĕ : kʾani or erp berjankʾĕ heṛatsʾnē zirenkʾ Kʾristosē , g!owzen amowsnanal
54005012	ew tatabartowtʾiwn gĕ gren , , , orovhetew g!anarken irentsʾ aṛachin hawatkʾĕ .
54005013	Naew gĕ sorvin tatargabort ĕllal , shrchelov townē town : ew ochʾ miayn tatargabort , ayl naew shaghagrat ow hetakʾrkʾramol , khōselov anbateh paner .
54005014	Owremn gĕ pʾapʾakʾim or teṛahasag ginerĕ amowsnanan , zawagner dznanin , irentsʾ townĕ gaṛavaren , , , ew heknelow aṛitʾ chʾtan hagaṛagortin ,
54005015	kʾani or artēn omankʾ khotoretsʾan , ertʾalov Satanayi etewēn .
54005016	Etʾē hawatatsʾeal ayr mart mĕ gam gin mĕ owni ayriner , inkʾ tʾogh nbastē anontsʾ , orbēszi egeghetsʾin chʾdzanrapeṛnowi ow garenay nbastel iragan ayrinerown .
54005017	Law veragatsʾow eghogh erētsʾnerĕ , manawant anonkʾ , orontsʾ ashkhatankʾn ē khōskʾĕ kʾarozel ew sorvetsʾnel , tʾogh ar zhananan grgnabatig batiwi ,
54005018	orovhetew Kirkʾĕ g!ĕsē : « Mi gaber gali mēch ashkhatogh , , ezin townchʾĕ » . Naew : « Kordzaworĕ ar zhani ē ir vartskʾin » .
54005019	Erētsʾi tēm ampastanowtʾiwn mi ĕntownir , paytsʾ miayn ergow gam erekʾ vgayi aṛchew .
54005020	Anonkʾ or gĕ meghanchʾen , gshtampē polorin aṛchew , orbēszi miwsnern al vakhnan .
54005021	Gĕ vgayem Astowdzoy , Yisows Kʾristosi ew ĕntreal hreshtagnerown aṛchew , or bahes ays panerĕ aṛantsʾ nakhĕntrankʾi , ochʾinchʾ ĕnelov goghmnagalowtʾeamp .
54005022	Ajabarelov tseṛkʾ mi tner oewē mēgown vray , ew mi haghortagtsʾir owrishnerown meghkʾerown . Town kʾez makʾragentsʾagh bahē .
54005023	Aylews miayn chowr mi khmer , haba kʾichʾ mĕn al kini kordzadzē , stamokʾsit ow yajakhatēb hiwantowtʾiwnnerowt hamar .
54005024	Gark mĕ martotsʾ meghkʾerĕ aṛachowĕnē yaytni en , nakhkʾan irentsʾ tatastanĕ : isg omantsʾ meghkʾerĕ yetoy gĕ yaytnowin , , .
54005025	Noynbēs al omantsʾ pari kordzerĕ yaytni en : isg anonkʾ or tarper en , chʾen grnar bahowil .
54006001	Lowdzi tag eghogh polor strowgnerĕ tʾogh ar zhani hamaren irentsʾ tērerĕ amēn batiwi , orbēszi Astowdzoy anownn ow vartabetowtʾiwnĕ chʾhayhoyowin .
54006002	Isg anonkʾ or hawatatsʾeal tērer ownin , tʾogh chʾarhamarhen zanonkʾ , orovhetew eghpayrner en : ayl manawant tʾogh dzaṛayen anontsʾ yō zharowtʾeamp , kʾani parerarowtʾenēn ōktowoghnerĕ hawatatsʾeal en ow sireli . Sorvetsʾowr ays panerĕ ew yortorē .
54006003	Etʾē mēgĕ sorvetsʾnē owrish gerbov , ow chʾyari mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi oghchamit khōskʾerown ew ayn vartabetowtʾean , or hamatsayn ē parebashtowtʾean ,
54006004	aytbisin hbartatsʾadz ē ow ochʾinchʾ kitē , haba varagowadz ē vējerow ew panagṛiwnerow akhtēn , orontsʾmē gĕ yaṛachanan nakhants , gṛiw , hayhoyowtʾiwnner , chʾar entʾatrowtʾiwnner ,
54006005	zrapanowtʾiwnner , mitkʾov abaganadz ow jshmartowtʾenēn zrgowadz martotsʾ , or gĕ gardzen tʾē parebashtowtʾiwnĕ shahavajaṛowtʾiwn ē : heṛatsʾir aytbisinerēn .
54006006	Sagayn parebashtowtʾiwnĕ , inkʾnapawowtʾeamp miasin , medz shahavajaṛowtʾiwn mĕn ē :
54006007	orovhetew ochʾinchʾ perinkʾ ashkharh , ew patsʾayayt ē tʾē ochʾinchʾ grnankʾ towrs hanel angē :
54006008	owsti geragowr ow haknelikʾ ownenalov , pawararowinkʾ anontsʾmov .
54006009	Paytsʾ anonkʾ or gĕ pʾapʾakʾin harstanal , g!iynan pʾortsowtʾean ew tʾagarti , ow shat anmit ew vnasagar tsʾangowtʾiwnnerow mēch , oronkʾ g!ĕngghmen martigĕ awerowmi gam gorowsti mēch :
54006010	orovhetew polor chʾarikʾnerown armatĕ , ardzatʾsirowtʾiwnn ē , orown paghtsalov , omankʾ moloretsʾan hawatkʾēn ew irenkʾ zirenkʾ khotsʾetsʾin shat tsʾawerov .
54006011	Paytsʾ town , ov Astowdzoy mart , pʾakhir ays panerēn , ew hetamowt eghir artarowtʾean , parebashtowtʾean , hawatkʾi , siroy , hamperowtʾean ow hezowtʾean .
54006012	Baykʾarē hawatkʾin pari baykʾarĕ , pṛnē yawitenagan geankʾĕ , orown hamar ganchʾowetsʾar ew towir pari tawanowtʾiwnĕ shat vganerow aṛchew .
54006013	Gĕ batowirem kʾezi , Astowdzoy aṛchew , or geankʾ gow tay polor panerown , ow Kʾristos Yisowsi aṛchew , or vgayetsʾ pari tawanowtʾiwnĕ Bontatsʾi Bighatosi aṛchew ,
54006014	or bahes ays batowērĕ , abrelov anpidz , anarat , minchʾew mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi erewowmĕ .
54006015	Zayn ir atenin tsʾoytsʾ biti tay Eranelin ew miag Hzōrĕ , Tʾakawornerown tʾakaworn ow Tērerown tērĕ .
54006016	Miayn inkʾ owni anmahowtʾiwn , ew gĕ pnagi anmertsenali loysi mēch . Martotsʾmē ochʾ mēgĕ teser ē zinkʾ , ochʾ al grnay tesnel . Iren batiw ow zōrowtʾiwn yawitean . Amēn .
54006017	Batowirē ays ashkharhi mēch harowst eghoghnerown , or medzamit chʾĕllan , ochʾ al yowsan anstoyk harstowtʾean , haba , abrogh Astowdzoy , or amēn pan gow tay mezi jokhowtʾeamp , vayelelow hamar .
54006018	Parikʾ tʾogh kordzen , pari kordzerov tʾogh harstanan , aṛatatseṛn ew owrishin garikʾnerown haghortagitsʾ ĕllan ,
54006019	abakayin hamar irenkʾ irentsʾ law him tnelov ipr bahest , orbēszi pṛnen yawitenagan geankʾĕ .
54006020	Ov Timotʾēos , bahē kʾezi yantsnowadz awantĕ , khowsapʾelov srpabighdz ownaynapanowtʾiwnnerēn ow sowtanown kitowtʾean hagatrowtʾiwnnerēn :
54006021	omankʾ vribetsʾan hawatkʾēn , tawanelov zanonkʾ . SHnorhkʾĕ kʾezi het . Amēn .
55001001	Bōghos , Yisows Kʾristosi aṛakʾeal Astowdzoy gamkʾov , geankʾi khostowmin hamatsayn , or Kʾristos Yisowsov ē ,
55001002	Timotʾēosi , sireli zawagis : shnorhkʾ , oghormowtʾiwn ow khaghaghowtʾiwn Hayr Astowdzmē , ew Kʾristos Yisowsē , mer Tērochmēn .
55001003	SHnorhabart em Astowdzoy , or gĕ bashtem nakhnikʾnerows nman , makʾowr khghjmtankʾov , ( antatar gĕ yishem kʾez im aghersankʾnerows mēch , kisher ow tsʾereg ,
55001004	tenchʾalov tesnel kʾez , ew yishelov artsʾownkʾnert , orbēszi letsʾowim owrakhowtʾeamp , )
55001005	erp gĕ mtaperem kʾow mēcht eghadz angeghdz hawatkʾĕ , or nakh pnagetsʾaw medz mōrt , Lawoteayi ow mōrt , Ewnigēi mēch , ew hamozowadz em tʾē kʾow mēcht al gay .
55001006	Owsti gĕ veryishetsʾnem kʾezi , or ardzardzes Astowdzoy shnorhĕ , or trowetsʾaw kʾezi , erp tseṛnatretsʾi kʾez :
55001007	orovhetew Astowadz towaw mezi ochʾ tʾē ergchʾotowtʾean , ayl zōrowtʾean , siroy ow khohemowtʾean Hokin .
55001008	Owremn mi amchʾnar mer Tēroch vgayowtʾean hamar , ochʾ al indzi , anor pantargealin hamar : haba masnagtsʾē awetaranin chʾarchʾarankʾnerown , Astowdzoy zōrowtʾean hamemat .
55001009	An pʾrgetsʾ mez ew ganchʾetsʾ sowrp gochʾowmov , ochʾ tʾē mer kordzerown hamemat , haba , ir aṛachatrowtʾean ow shnorhkʾin hamatsayn , or Kʾristos Yisowsov trowetsʾaw mezi , tarerow zhamanagnerēn aṛach ,
55001010	paytsʾ hima patsʾayaytowetsʾaw , mer Pʾrgichʾ Yisows Kʾristosi erewowmov . An ochʾnchʾatsʾowtsʾ mahĕ , ew lowsaworetsʾ geankʾn ow anmahowtʾiwnĕ , awetaranov ,
55001011	orown nshanagowetsʾay kʾarozichʾ , aṛakʾeal , ew hetʾanosnerow vartabet .
55001012	Ays batjaṛov al gĕ grem ays chʾarchʾarankʾnerĕ : paytsʾ chʾem amchʾnar , orovhetew kitem tʾē orown hawatatsʾadz em , ow hamozowadz em tʾē an garogh ē bahel im iren yantsnadz awants minchʾew ayn ōrĕ .
55001013	Amowr pṛnē tibarĕ ayn oghchamit khōskʾerown , or lsetsʾir intsmē , hawatkʾov ew Kʾristos Yisowsi mēch eghadz sirov .
55001014	Bahē ayt pari awantĕ Sowrp Hokiin michotsʾov , or gĕ pnagi mer mēch .
55001015	Sa kites , tʾē intsmē eres tartsowtsʾin polor anonkʾ , or Asia ēin : asontsʾmē en Pʾikeghos ew Hermokenēs .
55001016	Tērĕ oghormowtʾiwn shnorhē Onesipʾorosi tan , orovhetew yajakh gaztowretsʾ zis ew amōtʾ chʾsebetsʾ shghtʾas ,
55001017	haba , erp egaw Hṛom , pʾowtʾachanowtʾeamp pʾntṛetsʾ zis ew ktaw .
55001018	( Tērĕ shnorhē iren , or ayn ōrĕ oghormowtʾiwn ktnē Tērochmēn : ) ow town shat law kites tʾē orchʾapʾ sbasargetsʾ indzi Epʾesosi mēch al .
55002001	Owremn town , orteags , zōratsʾir ayn shnorhkʾov , or Kʾristos Yisowsi mēch ē ,
55002002	ew inchʾ or lsetsʾir intsmē shat vganerov , awantē hawatarim martotsʾ , oronkʾ ĕntownag ĕllan sorvetsʾnel naew owrishnerown .
55002003	CHʾarchʾarankʾ grē Yisows Kʾristosi pari zinowori mĕ bēs .
55002004	Ochʾ mēg zinoworakreal gĕ gashgantowi ays geankʾin kordzaṛnowtʾiwnnerov , orbēszi hajetsʾnē ir zōravarĕ :
55002005	ew marzig mĕ bsag chʾi stanar , etʾē chʾmrtsʾi ōrinawor gerbov .
55002006	Ashkhatogh mshagĕ bētkʾ ē aṛachinĕ ĕllay , btowghnerēn pa zhin stanalow .
55002007	Hasgtsʾir inchʾ or g!ĕsem : Tērĕ tʾogh tay kʾezi ĕmpṛnowm amēn pani mēch .
55002008	Yishē tʾē Tawitʾi zarmēn eghogh Yisows Kʾristos , meṛelnerēn yarowtʾiwn aṛadz ē , hamatsayn im kʾarozadz awetaranis ,
55002009	orown mēch gĕ chʾarchʾarowim chʾarakordzi mĕ bēs , minchʾew ankam gaberov : paytsʾ Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ gabowadz chʾē .
55002010	Owsti gĕ togam amēn pani , ĕntrealnerown hamar , orbēszi anonkʾ al hasnin ayn pʾrgowtʾean , or Kʾristos Yisowsi mēch ē , yawitenagan pʾaṛkʾov .
55002011	Ays khōskʾĕ vstaheli ē : orovhetew etʾē meṛankʾ anor het , biti abrinkʾ al anor het :
55002012	etʾē togankʾ , biti tʾakaworenkʾ al anor het . Etʾē owranankʾ zinkʾ , inkʾ al biti owranay mez :
55002013	etʾē hawatarim chʾĕllankʾ , inkʾ hawatarim gĕ mnay , chʾi grnar owranal inkʾzinkʾ .
55002014	Yishetsʾowr anontsʾ ays panerĕ , Tēroch aṛchew vgayelov or panagṛiw chʾĕnen , inchʾ or bitani chʾē , haba miayn gĕ gordzanē lsoghnerĕ .
55002015	CHana town kʾez knahateli tsʾoytsʾ tal Astowdzoy aṛchew , ĕllalov aynbisi kordzawor mĕ , or biti chʾamchʾnay , shitag patsʾatrelov jshmartowtʾean khōskʾĕ .
55002016	Paytsʾ heṛow getsʾir srpabighdz ownaynapanowtʾiwnnerēn , kʾani or anonkʾ aweli biti yaṛachtimen amparshtowtʾean mēch ,
55002017	ew anontsʾ khōskʾĕ biti jaragē kʾaghtsʾgeghi bēs . Asontsʾmē en Himenos ew Pʾighetos ,
55002018	oronkʾ vribadz en jshmartowtʾenēn , ĕselov tʾē meṛelnerown yarowtʾiwnĕ artēn eghadz ē , ew gĕ gordzanen omantsʾ hawatkʾĕ .
55002019	Sagayn Astowdzoy himĕ amowr gĕ genay ew owni sa gnikʾĕ : “ Tērĕ gĕ janchʾnay anonkʾ or irn en ” , naew : “ Ov or gartasanē Kʾristosi anownĕ , tʾogh heṛanay anirawowtʾenē ” .
55002020	Medz tan mĕ mēch gan ochʾ miayn osgiē ow ardzatʾē anōtʾner , ayl naew pʾaytē ew hoghē anōtʾner . Omankʾ batiwi hamar en , ow omankʾ , anbatowowtʾean hamar .
55002021	Owsti etʾē mēgĕ makʾrē inkʾzinkʾ asontsʾmē , biti ĕllay batiwi anōtʾ mĕ , srpatsʾadz ew bitani ir Tēroch , batrastowadz amēn pari kordzi hamar .
55002022	Pʾakhir naew eritasartagan tsʾangowtʾiwnnerēn , ow hetamowt eghir artarowtʾean , hawatkʾi , siroy , khaghaghowtʾean , anontsʾ het , or gĕ ganchʾen Tēroch anownĕ makʾowr sirtov .
55002023	Paytsʾ hra zharē yimar ew animast vējerēn , kitnalov or gṛiwner gĕ dznin anontsʾmē .
55002024	Tēroch dzaṛan bētkʾ chʾē gṛowi , haba , ĕllay hezahampoyr polorin hantēb , sorvetsʾnelow ĕntownag , anokhagal ,
55002025	ĕnttimatsʾoghnerĕ hezowtʾeamp grtʾogh , or tʾerews Astowadz abashkharowtʾiwn tay anontsʾ , jshmartowtʾiwnĕ kitnalow hamar ,
55002026	ow stʾapʾin CHʾarakhōsin tʾagartēn , ormē pṛnowadz en , anor gamkʾin dzaṛayelow .
55003001	Kittsʾir tʾē verchin ōrerĕ ta zhan zhamanagner biti kan :
55003002	orovhetew martig biti ĕllan antsnasēr , ardzatʾasēr , boṛotakhōs , ampartawan , hayhoyichʾ , dznoghnerow anhnazant , aberakht , ansowrp ,
55003003	ankowtʾ , anhasht , chʾarakhōs , an zhow zhgal , ta zhanaparoy , parin chʾsirogh ,
55003004	matnichʾ , yantowkn , hbart , aweli hajoyasēr kʾan astowadzasēr .
55003005	Anonkʾ ownin parebashtowtʾean trserewoytʾĕ , paytsʾ owratsʾadz en anor zōrowtʾiwnĕ . Town heṛatsʾir anontsʾmē :
55003006	orovhetew asontsʾmē en anonkʾ , or gĕ mtnen townerēn ners , ew gĕ kerevaren meghkʾov peṛnaworowadz tgaramit ginerĕ , zanazan tsʾangowtʾiwnnerē trtowadz ,
55003007	oronkʾ misht gĕ sorvin paytsʾ pnaw chʾen grnar hasnil jshmartowtʾean kitagtsʾowtʾean .
55003008	Haba , inchʾbēs Yanēs ow Yamrēs ĕnttimatsʾan Movsēsi , noynbēs asonkʾ al g!ĕnttimanan jshmartowtʾean . Mitkʾov abaganadz martig , or khoteli en hawatkʾi mēch :
55003009	paytsʾ aweli biti chʾyaṛachtimen , orovhetew irentsʾ anmtowtʾiwnĕ patsʾayayt biti ĕllay polorin , inchʾbēs eghaw anontsʾ ergowkʾinĕ .
55003010	Isg town hetewetsʾar im vartabetowtʾeans , abrelagerbis , aṛachatrowtʾeans , hawatkʾis , hamperatarowtʾeans , siroys , hamperowtʾeans ,
55003011	haladzankʾnerows ew chʾarchʾarankʾnerows , oronkʾ batahetsʾan indzi Antiokʾi , Igonioni ow Liwstrayi mēch . Inchʾ haladzankʾner gretsʾi : paytsʾ Tērĕ azatetsʾ zis polorēn .
55003012	Ew polor anonkʾ , or g!owzen parebashtowtʾeamp abril Kʾristos Yisowsov , biti haladzowin .
55003013	Paytsʾ chʾar ow zeghdzarar martig aweli biti yaṛachanan chʾarowtʾean mēch , moloretsʾnelov ew molorelov .
55003014	Sagayn town hastat getsʾir ayn panerown mēch , or sorvetsʾar ow orontsʾ hawatatsʾir , orovhetew kites tʾē ormē sorvetsʾar .
55003015	Naew mangowtʾenēt i ver kites Sowrp Kirkʾerĕ , oronkʾ grnan imastown ĕnel kʾez , pʾrgowelow Kʾristos Yisowsi vray eghadz hawatkʾov .
55003016	Ampoghch Kirkʾĕ astowadzashownchʾ ē , ew ōktagar , sorvetsʾnelow , gshtampelow , owghghelow ew artarowtʾean mēch grtʾelow hamar :
55003017	orbēszi Astowdzoy martĕ ĕllay gatareal , batrastowadz amēn pari kordzi hamar .
55004001	Owremn gĕ vgayem Astowdzoy ew Tēr Yisows Kʾristosi aṛchew , or biti tatē oghchern ow meṛelnerĕ ir erewowmin ew tʾakaworowtʾean atenĕ :
55004002	kʾarozē khōskʾĕ , bntē zhamanagin tʾē an zhamanag , gshtampē , yantimanē , yortorē ampoghch hamperatarowtʾeamp ew owsowtsʾowmov .
55004003	Orovhetew biti kay atenĕ , erp biti chʾhantowr zhen oghchamit vartabetowtʾean : haba , irentsʾ aganchnerown marmachov ow tsʾangowtʾiwnnerown hamatsayn vartabetner biti gowtagen irentsʾ hamar :
55004004	irentsʾ aganchnerĕ biti tartsnen jshmartowtʾenēn , ew biti khotorin , hetewelov aṛasbelnerow .
55004005	Paytsʾ town artʾown eghir amēn pani mēch , toga chʾarchʾarankʾnerow , awetaranichʾi kordz ĕrē , lman gatarē kʾow sbasargowtʾiwnt :
55004006	orovhetew es artēn ĕndzayowadz em zoh ĕllalow , ew im megnowmis atenĕ hasadz ē .
55004007	Baykʾaretsʾay pari baykʾarĕ , awartetsʾi ĕntʾatsʾkʾĕ , bahetsʾi hawatkʾĕ .
55004008	Asgē etkʾ verabahowadz ē indzi artarowtʾean bsagĕ , or Tērĕ , artar Tataworĕ , biti tay indzi ayn ōrĕ : ew ochʾ miayn indzi , ayl naew polor anontsʾ , or gĕ siren anor erewowmĕ .
55004009	CHana showtov kal indzi :
55004010	orovhetew Temas lkʾetsʾ zis , sirelov ays nergay ashkharhĕ , ow megnetsʾaw Tʾesaghonigē . Grēsgēs knatsʾ Kaghatia , Titos , Taghmatia :
55004011	miayn GHowgas indzi het ē . Aṛ Margosĕ ew per kʾezi het , orovhetew bitani ē indzi , sbasargowtʾean hamar .
55004012	Tiwkʾigosĕ ghrgetsʾi Epʾesos .
55004013	Ayn verargown , or tsketsʾi Trovata , Garbosi kʾov , per , erp kas , naew kirkʾerĕ , manawant makaghatʾnerĕ .
55004014	Tarpin Aghekʾsantrosĕ shat chʾarikʾ ĕraw indzi : Tērĕ anor hatowtsʾanē ir ararkʾnerown hamemat .
55004015	Town al zkowshatsʾir angē , orovhetew medzabēs ĕnttimatsʾaw mer khōskʾerown .
55004016	Aṛachin ankam , erp tataranin aṛchew gĕ chatakovēi zis , ochʾ mēgĕ egaw hets , haba polorn al lkʾetsʾin zis : atiga yantsʾankʾ tʾogh chʾverakrowi irentsʾ .
55004017	Sagayn Tērĕ gaynetsʾaw kʾovs ow zōratsʾowtsʾ zis , orbēszi kʾarozowtʾiwnĕ lman ĕllay im michotsʾovs ew polor hetʾanosnerĕ lsen , ow es azatetsʾay aṛiwdzin erakhēn .
55004018	Tērĕ biti azatē zis amēn chʾar kordzē , ew biti pʾrgē , ir ergnayin tʾakaworowtʾean hastsʾnelov . Iren pʾaṛkʾ tarē tar , , . Amēn .
55004019	Parewē Brisgēn ew Agiwghasĕ , ow Onesipʾorosi ĕntanikʾĕ .
55004020	Erastos mnatsʾ Gorntʾos , isg Tropʾimosĕ tsketsʾi Miletos , hiwantatsʾadz .
55004021	CHana tsmeṛēn aṛach kal . Ewpowghos , Bowtēs , Linos , Gghōtia ow polor eghpayrnerĕ gĕ parewen kʾez .
55004022	Tēr Yisows Kʾristos kʾow hokiit het . SHnorhkʾĕ tsezi het . Amēn .
56001001	Bōghos , Astowdzoy dzaṛay ew Yisows Kʾristosi aṛakʾeal , hamatsayn Astowdzoy ĕntrealnerown hawatkʾin ow parebashtowtʾeamp eghadz jshmartowtʾean kitagtsʾowtʾean ,
56001002	yawitenagan geankʾi yoysov , or ansowtn Astowadz khostatsʾaw tarerow zhamanagnerēn aṛach
56001003	- paytsʾ yatowg atenin ir khōskʾĕ patsʾayaytetsʾ kʾarozowtʾeamp , or vstahowetsʾaw indzi mer Pʾrgichʾ Astowdzoy hramanov - ,
56001004	Titosi , harazat zawagis hasaragatsʾ hawatkʾin hamemat : shnorhkʾ ew khaghaghowtʾiwn Hayr Astowdzmē ow Tēr Yisows Kʾristosē , mer Pʾrgichʾēn .
56001005	Es tsketsʾi kʾez Gretē , orbēszi owghghes polor bagas mnatsʾadz panerĕ ow erētsʾner nshanages amēn kʾaghakʾi mēch , inchʾbēs batowiretsʾi kʾezi :
56001006	etʾē mēgĕ ĕllay anmeghatreli , mēg gnoch amowsin , ew ownenay hawatarim zawagner , oronkʾ anaṛagowtʾean hamar ampastanowadz gam ĕmpost chʾĕllan .
56001007	Orovhetew ebisgobosĕ , ipr Astowdzoy tntes , bētkʾ ē ĕllay anmeghatreli : ochʾ inkʾnahawan , ochʾ pargatsʾogh , ochʾ kinemol , ochʾ zarnogh , ochʾ amōtʾali shahakhntrowtʾean hetamowt eghogh ,
56001008	haba , hiwrasēr , paresēr , khohem , artar , sowrp , zhow zhgal ,
56001009	hastat pṛnelov vartabetowtʾean hawatarim khōskʾĕ , orbēszi garenay tʾē yortorel oghchamit vartabetowtʾeamp , tʾē gshtampel hagajaṛoghnerĕ .
56001010	Kʾani or shat en ĕmpostnerĕ , tatargakhōsnern ow hrabowroghnerĕ , manawant anonkʾ , or tʾlpʾatowtʾenēn en .
56001011	Bētkʾ ē babantsetsʾnel zanonkʾ : anonkʾ gĕ gordzanen ampoghch towner , ew gĕ sorvetsʾnen anbateh paner , amōtʾali shahakhntrowtʾean hamar .
56001012	Anontsʾmē mēgĕ , irentsʾ sepʾagan markarēn , ĕsadz ē : « Gretatsʾinerĕ misht stakhōs en , chʾar kazanner , tatargabortner » .
56001013	Ays vgayowtʾiwnĕ jshmarit ē : owsti sastig gshtampē zanonkʾ , orbēszi aṛoghchanan hawatkʾin mēch ,
56001014	owshatrowtʾiwn chʾtartsnelov hrēagan aṛasbelnerown ow jshmartowtʾenēn khotorogh martotsʾ batowērnerown .
56001015	Makʾowrnerown , amēn pan makʾowr ē : paytsʾ bighdzerown ew anhawatnerown , ochʾinchʾ makʾowr ē , haba anontsʾ mitkʾn al , khghjmtankʾn al bghdzowadz en .
56001016	Gĕ tawanin tʾē gĕ janchʾnan Astowadz : paytsʾ g!owranan zayn irentsʾ kordzerov , ĕllalov karsheli ew anhnazant , ow khoteli , amēn pari kordzi hantēb .
56002001	Isg town khōsē inchʾ or gĕ batshaji oghchamit vartabetowtʾean .
56002002	Taretsʾnerĕ tʾogh ĕllan zkast , batgaṛeli , khohem , ew oghchamit , hawatkʾov , sirov ow hamperowtʾeamp .
56002003	Taretsʾ ginern al tʾogh varowin aynbēs , inchʾbēs gĕ vaylē srpowtʾean , ew ĕllan ochʾ chʾarakhōs , ochʾ kinemol , haba , pari paner sorvetsʾnogh :
56002004	orbēszi sorvetsʾnen teṛahasag ginerown , sirel irentsʾ amowsinnerĕ , sirel irentsʾ zawagnerĕ ,
56002005	ew ĕllal khohem , makʾragentsʾagh , tnashēn , parekordz , irentsʾ amowsinnerown hbatag , or Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ chʾhayhoyowi .
56002006	Noynbēs yortorē eritasartnerĕ or ĕllan khohem .
56002007	Amēn pani mēch town kʾez tsʾoytsʾ towr ipr tibar , pari kordzerow : vartabetowtʾean mēch , tsʾoytsʾ towr aneghdzowtʾiwn , batgaṛankʾ ,
56002008	oghchamit ew anbarsaweli khōskʾ , orbēszi hagaṛagoghĕ amchʾnay , mer masin chʾarakhōselikʾ ochʾinchʾ ownenalov .
56002009	Yortorē strowgnerĕ , or hbatagin irentsʾ tērerown ow hajeli ĕllan anontsʾ , amēn pani mēch : chʾhagajaṛen ,
56002010	chʾkhoren , haba polorovin pari hawatarmowtʾiwn tsʾoytsʾ tan , orbēszi zartaren mer Pʾrgichʾ Astowdzoy vartabetowtʾiwnĕ , amēn pani mēch .
56002011	Kʾani or Astowdzoy pʾrgarar shnorhkʾĕ erewtsʾaw polor martotsʾ ,
56002012	grtʾelov mez , or owranankʾ amparshtowtʾiwnn ow ashkharhayin tsʾangowtʾiwnnerĕ , ew abrinkʾ khohemowtʾeamp , artarowtʾeamp ow parebashtowtʾeamp , ays nergay ashkharhin mēch ,
56002013	sbaselov ayn eraneli yoysin ew medz Astowdzoy ow mer Pʾrgichʾ Yisows Kʾristosi pʾaṛkʾin erewowmin .
56002014	An ĕndzayetsʾ inkʾzinkʾ mezi hamar , orbēszi azatakrē mez amēn anōrēnowtʾenē , ew makʾrelov , ĕnē ir sepʾagan zhoghovowrtĕ , nakhantsakhntir pari kordzerow .
56002015	Ĕsē ays panerĕ , yortorē ow gshtampē ampoghch heghinagowtʾeamp . Ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh arhamarhē kʾez .
56003001	Yishetsʾowr anontsʾ , or hbatagin betowtʾiwnnerown ew ishkhanowtʾiwnnerown , ansan betowtʾean , ow batrast ĕllan amēn pari kordzi :
56003002	ochʾ mēgown hayhoyen , ĕllan ochʾ tʾē gṛowazan , haba , azniw , polorovin hezowtʾiwn tsʾoytsʾ talov amēn martow .
56003003	Orovhetew menkʾ al zhamanagin anmit ēinkʾ , anhnazant , moloreal , ow gĕ dzaṛayēinkʾ zanazan tsʾangowtʾiwnnerow ew hajoykʾnerow : gĕ varowēinkʾ chʾaramtowtʾeamp ow nakhantsov , hagagreli ēinkʾ ew g!atēinkʾ zirar .
56003004	Paytsʾ erp mer Pʾrgichʾ Astowdzoy kʾaghtsʾrowtʾiwnn ow martasirowtʾiwnĕ erewtsʾan ,
56003005	an pʾrgetsʾ mez - ochʾ tʾē mer ĕradz artarowtʾean kordzerov , haba ir oghormowtʾean hamatsayn - awazanin verstin dznowntov ew Sowrp Hokiin norokowtʾeamp .
56003006	Zayn jokhowtʾeamp tʾapʾetsʾ mer vray , mer Pʾrgichʾ Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov ,
56003007	orbēszi , anor shnorhkʾov artaratsʾadz ĕllalov , zhaṛankort taṛnankʾ , yawitenagan geankʾi yoysin hamatsayn .
56003008	Ays khōskʾĕ vstaheli ē , ew gĕ pʾapʾakʾim or bntes ays panerown vray , orbēszi Astowdzoy hawatatsʾoghnerĕ jik tʾapʾen matagarar ĕllalow pari kordzerow : ays panerĕ pari en , ow martotsʾ ōktagar .
56003009	Paytsʾ heṛow getsʾir yimar vējerēn , azkapanowtʾiwnnerēn , hagaṛagowtʾiwnnerēn ew ōrēnkʾin showrch eghadz gṛiwnerēn , orovhetew anōkowt en ow pʾowj .
56003010	Hra zharē hertsowadzogh martēn , aṛachin ew ergrort khratēn etkʾ ,
56003011	kitnalov tʾē aytbisin khotoradz ē ow gĕ meghanchʾē , tatabartelov inkʾzinkʾ .
56003012	Erp Arteman gam Tiwkʾigosĕ ghrgem kʾezi , pʾowtʾa kal indzi , Nigobolis , orovhetew oroshetsʾi hon tsmerel .
56003013	Pʾowtʾachanowtʾeamp owghargē Zenas ōrinaganĕ ew Aboghosĕ , hok tanelov or ochʾinchʾ bagsi anontsʾ .
56003014	Merinnern al tʾogh sorvin matagarar ĕllal pari kordzerow , hargawor garikʾnerow hamar , orbēszi anbtowgh chʾĕllan .
56003015	Gĕ parewen kʾez polor anonkʾ , or indzi het en : parewē hawatkʾin mēch mez siroghnerĕ . SHnorhkʾĕ tser polorin het . Amēn .
57001001	Bōghos , Yisows Kʾristosi pantargealĕ , ew Timotʾēos eghpayrĕ , Pʾilimoni , mer sireliin ow kordzagitsʾin ,
57001002	Abpʾia sireliin , Arkʾibbosi , mer zinagitsʾin , ow kʾow tant mēch hawakʾowogh egeghetsʾiin :
57001003	shnorhkʾ ew khaghaghowtʾiwn tsezi Astowdzmē , mer Hōrmēn , ow Tēr Yisows Kʾristosē .
57001004	SHnorhagal g!ĕllam im Astowdzmēs , amēn aten yishelov kʾez im aghōtʾkʾnerows mēch ,
57001005	erp gĕ lsem kʾow siroyt ew hawatkʾit masin , or ownis Tēr Yisowsi ow polor sowrperown hantēb ,
57001006	orbēszi kʾow hawatkʾit haghortagtsʾowtʾiwnĕ artiwnawor ĕllay , Kʾristos Yisowsov tser mēch eghadz amēn parikʾi kitagtsʾowtʾeamp .
57001007	Kʾani or medz owrakhowtʾiwn ew mkhitʾarowtʾiwn owninkʾ kʾow siroyt hamar , orovhetew sowrperown sirtĕ kʾezmov hankstatsʾadz ē , eghpayr .
57001008	Owsti , tʾēbēt Kʾristosov shat hamartsagowtʾiwn ownim hramayelow kʾezi inchʾ or batshaj ē ,
57001009	pʾokharēnĕ g!aghachʾem , siroy hamar , ĕllalov aynbisi mēgĕ , inchʾbēs em es , Bōghos , dzeratsʾadz , ew hima , naew Yisows Kʾristosi pantargealĕ .
57001010	G!aghachʾem kʾezi zawagis , Onesimosi hamar , or dznay im gaberows mēch .
57001011	An zhamanagin anbēt ēr kʾezi : isg hima bitani ē tʾē kʾezi , tʾē indzi .
57001012	Et ghrgetsʾi zayn kʾezi : isg town ĕntownē zinkʾ ipr im sirts .
57001013	G!owzēi im kʾovs bahel zayn , orbēszi kʾow goghmēt sbasargē indzi , awetarani gaberown mēch :
57001014	paytsʾ owzetsʾi ochʾinchʾ ĕnel aṛantsʾ kʾow gardzikʾit , orbēszi kʾow parikʾt chʾĕllay orbēs tʾē hargatrapar , haba , ĕllay gamovin .
57001015	Tʾerews an zhamanag mĕ zatowetsʾaw , orbēszi yawitean ownenas zinkʾ :
57001016	al ochʾ tʾē strowgi mĕ bēs , haba strowgē mĕ keriver , sireli eghpōr mĕ bēs . Ow etʾē sireli ē manawant indzi , orchʾapʾ aweli biti ĕllay kʾezi , tʾē marmini hamemat , tʾē al Tērochmov .
57001017	Owremn etʾē zis haghortagitsʾ gĕ ngates , , kʾezi , ĕntownē zayn , orbēs tʾē zis .
57001018	Ow etʾē anirawadz ē kʾez gam bartkʾ mĕ owni , antsʾowr zayn im hashiwis .
57001019	Es , Bōghos , kretsʾi im tseṛkʾovs : es gĕ vjarem , or chʾĕsem kʾezi tʾē town al , town kʾez gĕ bartis indzi .
57001020	Ayo , eghpayr , kʾezmē ays ōkowtĕ tʾogh ownenam Tērochmov : hankstatsʾowr im sirts Tērochmov .
57001021	Vstahelov hnazantowtʾeant , kretsʾi kʾezi , kʾani or kitem tʾē ĕsadzēs al aweli biti ĕnes .
57001022	Mia zhamanag indzi al batrastē hiwranotsʾ mĕ , orovhetew gĕ yowsam tʾē biti shnorhowim tsezi , tser aghōtʾkʾnerown michotsʾov .
57001023	Gĕ parewē kʾez Ebapʾras , kerowtʾean ĕngers Kʾristos Yisowsov :
57001024	naew Margos , Aristarkʾos , Temas , GHowgas , kordzagitsʾners .
57001025	Mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi shnorhkʾĕ tser hokiin het . Amēn .
58001001	Astowadz , or vaghowtsʾ , shat ankamner ow shat gerberov , khōsadz ēr hayrerown markarēnerov ,
58001002	ays verchin ōrerĕ khōsetsʾaw mezi ir Ortiov , or zhaṛankort nshanagetsʾ amēn pani ew tiezerkʾn al steghdzetsʾ anov .
58001003	An ir pʾaṛkʾin shoghn ē ow ir ēowtʾean ngarakrowtʾiwnĕ , ew ir zōrowtʾean khōskʾov hastat gĕ pṛnē amēn pan . Inkʾ ēr or , makʾrelē etkʾ mer meghkʾerĕ , pazmetsʾaw partsrerĕ , Astowdzoy medzapʾaṛowtʾean ach goghmĕ ,
58001004	aynchʾapʾ keratas ĕllalov hreshtagnerēn , kʾani or anontsʾmē kerazantsʾ anown mĕ zhaṛanketsʾ .
58001005	Artarew hreshtagnerēn orown ĕsaw erpekʾ : « Town im Ortis es , aysōr dznay kʾez » . Ew tartseal : « Es Hayr biti ĕllam anor , an al Orti biti ĕllay indzi » .
58001006	Tartseal , erp Antranigĕ gĕ mttsʾnē ergrakowntĕ , g!ĕsē : « Astowdzoy polor hreshtagnern al tʾogh ergrbaken anor » .
58001007	Naew hreshtagnerown masin g!ĕsē : « Ir hreshtagnerĕ hokiner g!ĕnē , ew ir bashtōneanerĕ , gragi potsʾ » .
