58001008	Isg Ortiin g!ĕsē : « Kʾow kaht , ov Astowadz , gĕ genay tarē tar , , : kʾow tʾakaworowtʾeant maganĕ owghghamtowtʾean magan ē .
58001009	Town siretsʾir artarowtʾiwnĕ ew atetsʾir anōrēnowtʾiwnĕ : hetewapar , ov Astowadz , kʾow Astowadzt ōdzetsʾ kʾez tsʾndzowtʾean iwghov , ĕngeragitsʾnerēt aweli » .
58001010	Naew : « Tēr , town sgizpēn trir ergri himerĕ , ow kʾow tseṛkʾerowt kordzn ē erginkʾĕ .
58001011	Anonkʾ biti gorsowin , paytsʾ town gĕ mnas : polorĕ biti mashin hantertsi bēs .
58001012	Biti olores zanonkʾ dzadzgotsʾi bēs , ew biti pʾokhowin : isg town , misht noynn es , ow kʾow tarinert biti chʾbagsin » .
58001013	Ew hreshtagnerēn orown ĕsaw erpekʾ : « Pazmē im ach goghms , minchʾew or kʾow tʾshnaminert batowantan tnem otkʾerowt » .
58001014	Mitʾē anonkʾ polorĕ bashtōn gatarogh hokiner chʾen , ghrgowadz sbasargelow anontsʾ , or biti zhaṛanken pʾrgowtʾiwnĕ .
58002001	Owsti bētkʾ ē al aweli owshatir ĕllankʾ mer lsadz panerown , orbēszi chʾzrgowinkʾ anontsʾmē .
58002002	Orovhetew etʾē hreshtagnerown ĕsadz khōskʾĕ hastatowetsʾaw , ew orewē ōrinazantsʾowtʾiwn ow anhnazantowtʾiwn , statsʾaw artar vartsatrowtʾiwn ,
58002003	menkʾ inchʾbēs zerdz biti mnankʾ , etʾē anhok ĕllankʾ aynbisi medz pʾrgowtʾean mĕ hantēb , or sgizp aṛaw Tēroch khōskʾov ow mer mēch hastatowetsʾaw lsoghnerown michotsʾov :
58002004	Astowadz al vgayetsʾ nshannerov ew skʾanchʾelikʾnerov , ow zanazan hrashkʾnerov ew Sowrp Hokiin pashkhowmnerov , ir gamkʾin hamatsayn .
58002005	Artarew hreshtagnerown chʾhbatagetsʾowtsʾ ayn kalikʾ ergrakowntĕ , orown masin menkʾ gĕ khōsinkʾ ,
58002006	haba mēgĕ tegh mĕ vgayetsʾ ew ĕsaw : « Martĕ inchʾ ē , or gĕ yishes zayn , gam martow ortin , or g!aytsʾeles anor .
58002007	Hreshtagnerēn kʾichʾ mĕ var ĕrir zayn : pʾaṛkʾov ow batiwov bsagetsʾir zayn , ew kʾow tseṛkʾerowt kordzerown vray nshanagetsʾir zayn :
58002008	amēn pan hbatagetsʾowtsʾir anor otkʾerown nerkʾew » . Kʾani or polorĕ hbatagetsʾowtsʾ anor , anor tēm ĕmpostatsʾogh ochʾinchʾ tʾoghowtsʾ : paytsʾ hima polorĕ anor hbatagadz chʾenkʾ tesner .
58002009	Sagayn pʾaṛkʾov ow batiwov bsagowadz gĕ tesnenkʾ Yisowsĕ , or hreshtagnerēn kʾichʾ mĕ var eghadz ēr mahowan chʾarchʾarankʾin hamar , orbēszi Astowdzoy shnorhkʾov mah hamtesē polorin hamar .
58002010	Orovhetew gĕ batshajēr anor , - orown hamar ē amēn pan , ew anov eghadz ē amēn pan , - or shat ortiner pʾaṛkʾi mēch mttsʾnelow hamar , chʾarchʾarankʾnerov gatareal ĕnē anontsʾ pʾrgowtʾean Ṛahviran .
58002011	Artarew an or gĕ srpatsʾnē ew anonkʾ or gĕ srpanan , polorn al mēgē mĕn en . Ays batjaṛov inkʾ amōtʾ chʾi seber eghpayr gochʾel zanonkʾ , ĕselov :
58002012	« Kʾow anownt biti haghortem eghpayrnerows , hamakhmpowmin mēch biti ōrhnerkem kʾezi » .
58002013	Ew tartseal : « Es biti vstahim anor » . Ow tartseal : « Ahawasig es ew ayn zawagnerĕ , or Astowadz towaw indzi » .
58002014	Owremn , kʾani or zawagnerĕ haghortagtsʾetsʾan marminin ow ariwnin , inkʾ al nmanabēs pa zhnegitsʾ eghaw anontsʾ , orbēszi ir mahov ochʾnchʾatsʾnē an , or mahowan ishkhanowtʾiwnĕ ownēr , aysinkʾn , CHʾarakhōsĕ ,
58002015	ew azatē anonkʾ , or , mahowan vakhov , entʾagay ēin strgowtʾean , irentsʾ ampoghch geankʾi ĕntʾatsʾkʾin .
58002016	Artarew an gĕ pṛnē ochʾ tʾē hreshtagnerown tseṛkʾĕ , haba gĕ pṛnē Aprahami zarmin tseṛkʾĕ .
58002017	Owsti bartawor ēr polorovin nmanil ir eghpayrnerown , orbēszi ĕllar oghormadz ow hawatarim kʾahanayabet mĕ Astowdzoy kʾov , kʾawelow hamar zhoghovowrtin meghkʾerĕ .
58002018	Hetewapar garogh ē ōknel anontsʾ , or gĕ pʾortsowin , orovhetew inkʾ isg chʾarchʾarowetsʾaw , pʾortsowelov .
58003001	Owsti , sowrp eghpayrner , ergnayin gochʾowmin pa zhnegitsʾner , owshatir eghēkʾ mer tawanowtʾean Aṛakʾealin ow Kʾahanayabetin , Kʾristos Yisowsi ,
58003002	or hawatarim ēr zinkʾ nshanagoghin , inchʾbēs Movsēs al , anor ampoghch tan mēch .
58003003	Orovhetew inkʾ ar zhanatsʾaw Movsēsēn aynkʾan aweli pʾaṛkʾi , orkʾan aweli batiw g!ownenay town gaṛowtsʾanoghĕ , kʾan townĕ .
58003004	Kʾani or amēn town owni gaṛowtsʾanogh mĕ : paytsʾ an or gaṛowtsʾanetsʾ polor panerĕ , Astowadz ē .
58003005	Artarew Movsēs anor ampoghch tan mēch hawatarim ēr ipr dzaṛay , ĕsowelikʾnerown vgay ĕllalow hamar :
58003006	paytsʾ Kʾristos , ipr orti gĕ tirē ir isg tan vray . Menkʾ enkʾ anor townĕ , etʾē kētʾ minchʾew vakhjanĕ amowr pṛnenkʾ hamartsagowtʾiwnĕ ew yoysin bardzankʾĕ .
58003007	Owsti , inchʾbēs Sowrp Hokin g!ĕsē : « Aysōr , etʾē biti lsēkʾ anor tsaynĕ ,
58003008	mi khstatsʾnēkʾ tser sirterĕ , inchʾbēs taṛnowtʾean aten , pʾortsowtʾean ōrĕ , anabatin mēch ,
58003009	owr tser hayrerĕ pʾortsetsʾin ow kʾnnetsʾin zis , tʾēbēt kʾaṛasown tari tesan im kordzers .
58003010	Owsti zzowetsʾay ayt serowntēn ew ĕsi : “ Anonkʾ misht moloradz en irentsʾ sirtov , ow chʾkittsʾan im jampaners ” .
58003011	Hetewapar ertowm ĕri im pargowtʾeans mēch : “ Anonkʾ biti chʾmtnen im hankstavayrs ” » .
58003012	Zkowshatsʾēkʾ , eghpayrner , orbēszi tsezmē ochʾ mēgown nersĕ anhawatowtʾean chʾar sirt mĕ ĕllay , heṛanalov abrogh Astowdzmēn .
58003013	Haba amēn ōr yortoretsʾēkʾ zirar , kʾani « aysōr » g!ĕsowi , orbēszi tsezmē ochʾ mēgĕ khstanay meghkʾin khapēowtʾeamp .
58003014	Artarew menkʾ pa zhnegitsʾ eghadz enkʾ Kʾristosi , etʾē kētʾ minchʾew vakhjanĕ hastat pṛnenkʾ mer sgizpi vstahowtʾiwnĕ ,
58003015	minchʾ g!ĕsowi : « Aysōr , etʾē biti lsēkʾ anor tsaynĕ , mi khstatsʾnēkʾ tser sirterĕ , inchʾbēs taṛnowtʾean aten » .
58003016	Kʾani or omankʾ , lselē etkʾ , taṛnatsʾowtsʾin : sagayn ochʾ , , polorĕ , or Ekibtosēn eladz ēin Movsēsi michotsʾov .
58003017	Isg orontsʾmē zzowetsʾaw kʾaṛasown tari : meghanchʾoghnerēn chʾēr , orontsʾ tiagnerĕ ingan anabatin mēch .
58003018	Ew orontsʾ ertowm ĕraw , tʾē biti chʾmtnen ir hankstavayrĕ , etʾē ochʾ , anhnazantnerown .
58003019	Ow gĕ tesnenkʾ tʾē chʾgrtsʾan mtnel , irentsʾ anhawatowtʾean batjaṛov .
58004001	Owremn vakhnankʾ , orbēszi tsezmē ochʾ mēgĕ zrgowadz tʾowi anor hankstavayrĕ mtnelow khostowmēn , or mnatsʾadz ē mezi .
58004002	Orovhetew mezi al awetowadz ēr , inchʾbēs anontsʾ : paytsʾ anontsʾ ōktagar chʾeghaw ayt khōskʾĕ lselĕ , kʾani or hawatkʾi miatsʾadz chʾēr lsoghnerown mēch .
58004003	Isg menkʾ , or hawatatsʾinkʾ , biti mtnenkʾ hankistĕ , inchʾbēs ĕsaw : « Hetewapar ertowm ĕri im pargowtʾeans mēch : “ Anonkʾ biti chʾmtnen im hankstavayrs ” » , tʾēbēt ir kordzerĕ ashkharhi himnatrowtʾenēn i ver eghadz ēin .
58004004	Orovhetew Kirkʾĕ sa g!ĕsē tegh mĕ , eōtʾnerort ōrowan hamar : « Ew Astowadz eōtʾnerort ōrĕ hankstatsʾaw ir polor kordzerēn » .
58004005	Ow hos tartseal g!ĕsē : « Anonkʾ biti chʾmtnen im hankstavayrs » .
58004006	Owremn , kʾani or omantsʾ gĕ mnay hon mtnel , isg anonkʾ or nakhabēs statsʾadz ēin awetisĕ , anhnazantowtʾean batjaṛov chʾmtan ,
58004007	tartseal ōr mĕ gĕ sahmanē , aynkʾan zhamanagē etkʾ , ew Tawitʾi peranov g!ĕsē , « aysōr » , inchʾbēs ĕsowetsʾaw : « Aysōr , etʾē biti lsēkʾ anor tsaynĕ , mi khstatsʾnēkʾ tser sirterĕ » .
58004008	Orovhetew etʾē Yesow hankstatsʾowtsʾadz ĕllar zanonkʾ , al angē etkʾ biti chʾkhōsēr owrish ōrowan masin .
58004009	Owremn teṛ hankisti SHapatʾ mĕ gĕ mnay Astowdzoy zhoghovowrtin :
58004010	orovhetew an or mtaw anor hankstavayrĕ , inkʾ al hankstatsʾaw ir kordzerēn , inchʾbēs Astowadz , irennerēn .
58004011	Owremn chanankʾ mtnel ayt hankstavayrĕ , orbēszi ochʾ mēgĕ iynay , noyn anhnazantowtʾean ōrinagin bēs .
58004012	Orovhetew Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ genarar ē , aztow , ew amēn ergsayri sowrē gtrowg . An tʾapʾantsʾelov gĕ pa zhnē antsn ow hokin , yōterĕ ew dzowdzĕ : gĕ kʾnnargē sirtin mtadzowmnern ow mtatrowtʾiwnnerĕ .
58004013	CHʾgay araradz mĕ , or anerewoytʾ ĕllay anor aṛchew , haba amēn pan merg ow patsʾ ē anor achʾkʾerown aṛchew , orown biti tankʾ mer hashiwĕ .
58004014	Owremn , kʾani or owninkʾ erginkʾĕ antsʾadz medz Kʾahanayabet mĕ , Yisowsĕ , Astowdzoy Ortin , amowr pṛnenkʾ mer tawanowtʾiwnĕ .
58004015	Artarew menkʾ chʾowninkʾ kʾahanayabet mĕ , or angarogh ĕllay garegtsʾil mer tgarowtʾiwnnerown , haba inkʾ amēn pani mēch pʾortsowadz ē mezi nman , sagayn aṛantsʾ meghkʾi .
58004016	Owremn hamartsagowtʾeamp mōtenankʾ shnorhkʾi kahin , orbēszi oghormowtʾiwn stanankʾ ew shnorhkʾ ktnenkʾ , bateh aten ōknelow mezi .
58005001	Artarew , martotsʾ mēchēn aṛnowadz amēn kʾahanayabet , nshanagowadz ē martotsʾ hamar , orbēszi Astowdzoy matowtsʾanē ĕndzaner ow meghkʾerow hamar zoher .
58005002	An grnay hasgatsʾogh ĕllal anontsʾ , or ankēt ew moloreal en , orovhetew inkʾ al hamagowadz ē tgarowtʾeamp :
58005003	ew ays batjaṛov bartawor ē meghkʾi batarak matowtsʾanel , inchʾbēs zhoghovowrtin hamar , noynbēs al iren hamar .
58005004	Ochʾ mēgĕ inkʾniren g!aṛnē ays batiwĕ , haba miayn an , or ganchʾowadz ē Astowdzmē , inchʾbēs Aharon .
58005005	Noynbēs al ochʾ tʾē Kʾristos pʾaṛaworetsʾ inkʾzinkʾ , kʾahanayabet ĕllalow hamar , haba an , or ĕsaw iren : « Town im Ortis es , aysōr dznay kʾez » .
58005006	Inchʾbēs owrish tegh mĕn al g!ĕsē : « Town yawitean kʾahanay es , Melkʾisetegi garkin hamemat » .
58005007	An , ir marminin ōrerĕ , sastig kochʾiwnov ew artsʾownkʾov , aghersankʾ ow baghatankʾ matowtsʾanetsʾ anor , or garogh ēr mahēn pʾrgel zinkʾ : ew ĕntownowetsʾaw , ir parebashtowtʾean batjaṛov , , .
58005008	Tʾēbēt inkʾ Orti ēr , hnazantowtʾiwn sorvetsʾaw ir chʾarchʾarankʾnerēn :
58005009	ow erp gatareal eghaw , yawitenagan pʾrgowtʾiwn batjaṛetsʾ polor iren hnazantoghnerown ,
58005010	ew Astowdzmē yorchorchowetsʾaw , Kʾahanayabet Melkʾisetegi garkin hamemat .
58005011	Anor masin owninkʾ shat ĕselikʾ , or t zhowar ē megnapanel , kʾani or lselow mēch anpʾoytʾ ēkʾ .
58005012	Artarew , minchʾ zhamanagin hamemat bartawor ēikʾ var zhabet ĕllal , towkʾ bētkʾ ownikʾ tartseal sorvelow tʾē oronkʾ en Astowdzoy batkamnerown nakhakʾaylerĕ . Towkʾ bētkʾ ownikʾ gatʾi , ochʾ tʾē amowr geragowri :
58005013	kʾani or amēn gatʾnger , artarowtʾean khōskʾin anhmowt ē , orovhetew erakhay ē :
58005014	paytsʾ amowr geragowrĕ chʾapʾahasnerown hamar ē , orontsʾ zkayarankʾnerĕ sovorowtʾeamp var zhowadz en zatoroshel parin ow chʾarĕ .
58006001	Owsti , tskenkʾ Kʾristosi verapereal nakhapanĕ ow yaṛachanankʾ tēbi gatarelowtʾiwn , pʾokhanag tartseal himĕ tnelow meṛadz kordzerēn abashkharowtʾean ew Astowdzoy hantēb hawatkʾin ,
58006002	mgrtowtʾiwnnerow owsowtsʾowmin ow tseṛnatrowtʾean , meṛelnerow yarowtʾean ew yawitenagan tatastanin :
58006003	ays ē or biti ĕnenkʾ , etʾē kētʾ Astowadz artōnē .
58006004	Artarew angareli ē anontsʾ , oronkʾ ankam mĕ lowsaworowetsʾan , hamtesetsʾin ergnayin barkewĕ , pa zhnegitsʾ tartsan Sowrp Hokiin ,
58006005	ew hamtesetsʾin Astowdzoy pari khōskʾn ow kalikʾ ashkharhin skʾanchʾelikʾnerĕ ,
58006006	or veranorokowin abashkharowtʾeamp , etʾē saytʾakʾin : kʾani or grgin gĕ khachʾen Astowdzoy Ortin irenkʾ irentsʾ hamar , ow gĕ khaytaṛagen zayn .
58006007	Orovhetew ayn ergirĕ , or gĕ khmē ir vray yajakh egadz antsrewĕ , ew g!artatrē yarmar poyser anontsʾ , orontsʾ hamar gĕ mshagowi , ōrhnowtʾiwn gĕ stanay Astowdzmē :
58006008	paytsʾ an or g!artatrē pʾowsher ow tatasgner , anbēt ē ew anidzowelow mōt : anor vakhjann ē ayrowil .
58006009	Tʾēbēt aysbēs gĕ khōsinkʾ , tser masin , sireliner , menkʾ hamozowm owninkʾ lawakoyn panerow , oronkʾ gĕ veraperin pʾrgowtʾean .
58006010	Kʾani or Astowadz aniraw chʾē , or moṛnay tser kordzĕ , ew ayn sērĕ , or tsʾoytsʾ towikʾ ir anownin hamar , erp sbasargetsʾikʾ sowrperown ow gĕ sbasargēkʾ al .
58006011	Sagayn gĕ tsʾangankʾ or tsezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ tsʾoytsʾ tay noyn pʾowtʾachanowtʾiwnĕ , minchʾew vakhjanĕ bahelow hamar yoysi lman vstahowtʾiwnĕ :
58006012	orbēszi towkʾ anpʾoytʾ chʾĕllakʾ , haba nmanikʾ anontsʾ , or hawatkʾov ow hamperatarowtʾeamp zhaṛanketsʾin khostowmnerĕ .
58006013	Artarew , erp Astowadz khostowm ĕraw Aprahami , kʾani or irmē medzĕ chʾgar , or ertowm ĕnēr anor vray ,
58006014	ertowm ĕraw inkʾnir vray ew ĕsaw : « Ayo , medzabēs biti ōrhnem kʾez ow medzabēs biti pazmatsʾnem kʾez » .
58006015	Ew aysbēs , an hamperatarowtʾeamp hasaw khostowmin .
58006016	Artarew martig ertowm g!ĕnen irentsʾmē medzin vray , ow irentsʾ hamar , ertowmĕ gĕ hastatē amēn hagajaṛowtʾean awartĕ .
58006017	Owsti Astowadz , pʾapʾakʾelov aweli jokhowtʾeamp tsʾoytsʾ tal ir dzrakirin anpʾopʾokh ĕllalĕ khostowmi zhaṛankortnerown , michnortetsʾ ertowmov mĕ ,
58006018	orbēszi ergow anpʾopʾokheli panerov - orontsʾ mēch angareli ē or Astowadz stē - hzōr mkhitʾarowtʾiwn ownenankʾ menkʾ , or ipr abastan amowr pṛnetsʾinkʾ mezi aṛachargowadz yoysĕ .
58006019	Menkʾ owninkʾ zayn orbēs abahov ew hastat khariskh mer antsin : an gĕ mtnē varakoyrin nersi goghmn al ,
58006020	hon owr Yisows , ipr yaṛachĕntʾatsʾ , mtaw mezi hamar , yawitenagan Kʾahanayabet eghadz , Melkʾisetegi garkin hamemat .
58007001	Artarew ays Melkʾisetegn ēr , Saghēmi tʾakaworn ow Amenapartsr Astowdzoy kʾahanan , or timaworetsʾ Aprahamĕ , erp an gĕ verataṛnar tʾakawornerow gotoradzēn , ew ōrhnetsʾ zayn :
58007002	Apraham al tasanort towaw anor ir polor panerēn . An nakh Artarowtʾean tʾakawor ē , tʾarkmanowtʾean hamatsayn , ow yetoy , naew Saghēmi tʾakawor , aysinkʾn , KHaghaghowtʾean tʾakawor .
58007003	Aṛantsʾ hōr , aṛantsʾ mōr , aṛantsʾ azkapanowtʾean , an owni ochʾ ōrerow sgizp , ochʾ al geankʾi vakhjan : paytsʾ nmantsʾowadz ē Astowdzoy Ortiin ew mshtnchenabēs gĕ mnay kʾahanay .
58007004	Owremn tesēkʾ tʾē inchʾ medz mēgn ēr an , orown Apraham nahabetn al towaw awarin tasanortĕ .
58007005	Artarew GHewii ortinerēn eghoghnerĕ , oronkʾ kʾahanayowtʾiwn gĕ stanan , ōrēnkʾin hamatsayn batowēr ownin tasanort aṛnelow zhoghovowrtēn , aysinkʾn , irentsʾ eghpayrnerēn , tʾēbēt anonkʾ Aprahami mēchkʾēn eladz en .
58007006	Paytsʾ an , orown azkapanowtʾiwnĕ anontsʾmē chʾēr , tasanort statsʾaw Aprahamēn ew ōrhnetsʾ khostowmnerĕ ownetsʾoghĕ .
58007007	Isg aṛantsʾ orewē hagajaṛowtʾean , grtserĕ g!ōrhnowi keratasēn .
58007008	Hos , mahganatsʾow martig tasanort gĕ stanan , paytsʾ hon gĕ stanay an , orown hamar vgayowadz ē tʾē g!abri .
58007009	Naew grnay ĕsowil tʾē GHewi al , or tasanort gĕ stanay , tasanort towaw Aprahami michotsʾov :
58007010	orovhetew tagawin ir hōr mēchkʾn ēr , erp Melkʾiseteg timaworetsʾ zayn .
58007011	Owremn , etʾē gatarelowtʾiwnĕ GHewtatsʾinerow kʾahanayowtʾeamp ĕllar , ( kʾani or zhoghovowrtĕ ōrēnkʾin tag trowetsʾaw anor atenĕ , ) al inchʾ bētkʾ gar or owrish kʾahanay mĕ ellēr , Melkʾisetegi garkin hamemat , ew chʾgochʾowēr Aharoni garkin hamemat .
58007012	Artarew , kʾahanayowtʾean pʾopʾokhowmov , harg ēr or pʾopʾokhowtʾiwn ĕllar naew ōrēnkʾin .
58007013	Ew iraw eghaw , orovhetew an , orown masin g!ĕsowin ays panerĕ , gĕ batganēr owrish tohmi , ormē ochʾ mēgĕ mōtetsʾadz ēr zohaseghanin :
58007014	kʾani or yaytni ē tʾē mer Tērĕ seradz ē Yowtayi tohmēn . Isg ayt tohmin masin Movsēs ochʾinchʾ ĕsaw , kʾahanayowtʾean verapereal .
58007015	Asiga al aweli yaytni ē , kʾani or Melkʾisetegi nmanowtʾeamp owrish kʾahanay mĕ g!ellē ,
58007016	or eghadz ē ochʾ tʾē marmnawor batowēri mĕ ōrēnkʾin hamatsayn , haba , ankʾagteli geankʾi mĕ zōrowtʾean hamemat .
58007017	Orovhetew gĕ vgayē : « Town yawitean kʾahanay es , Melkʾisetegi garkin hamemat » .
58007018	Artarew nakhgin batowērĕ gĕ chnchowi ir tgarowtʾean ow anshaheganowtʾean hamar ,
58007019	( orovhetew ōrēnkʾĕ ochʾinchʾ gatareal ĕraw , ) ew anor tegh gĕ mtnē lawakoyn yoys mĕ , orov gĕ mōtenankʾ Astowdzoy .
58007020	Ew kʾani or asiga chʾeghaw aṛantsʾ ertowmi , ( orovhetew anonkʾ kʾahanay eghadz en aṛantsʾ ertowmi ,
58007021	isg asiga , ertowmov , anor michotsʾov , or ĕsaw iren : « Tērĕ ertowm ĕrer ē ow biti chʾzghchay : “ Town yawitean kʾahanay es , Melkʾisetegi garkin hamemat ” » , )
58007022	Yisows erashkhawor eghaw lawakoyn owkhti mĕ .
58007023	Irabēs shat eghadz en kʾahananerĕ , kʾani or mahĕ g!arkilēr or anonkʾ misht mnan .
58007024	Paytsʾ asiga owni anpʾopʾokh kʾahanayowtʾiwn , orovhetew yawitean gĕ mnay .
58007025	Owsti garogh al ē gatarelabēs pʾrgel anonkʾ , or irmov gow kan Astowdzoy : orovhetew inkʾ misht g!abri , anontsʾ parekhōs ĕllalow hamar .
58007026	Artarew jisht aysbisi kʾahanayabet mĕ gĕ batshajēr mezi , sowrp , anmegh , anarat , meghawornerēn zatowadz ow erginkʾēn aweli ver partsratsʾadz .
58007027	Anor hargawor chʾē amēn ōr zoh matowtsʾanel , miws kʾahanayabetnerown bēs , nakh ir meghkʾerown hamar , yetoy zhoghovowrtin meghkʾerown hamar : orovhetew inkʾ ĕraw asiga mēg ankam ĕntmisht , matowtsʾanelov inkʾzinkʾ .
58007028	Artarew , ōrēnkʾĕ kʾahanayabet gĕ nshanagē tgarowtʾiwn ownetsʾogh martig , paytsʾ ertowmin khōskʾĕ , or ōrēnkʾēn etkʾ ēr , Ortin , or gatareal eghadz ē yawitean .
58008001	Ahawasig mer ĕsadz khōskʾerown klkhaworĕ : - menkʾ owninkʾ aynbisi kʾahanayabet mĕ , or pazmadz ē erginkʾĕ , Astowdzoy medzapʾaṛowtʾean kahin ach goghmĕ ,
58008002	ipr bashtōneay srparanin ow jshmarit khoranin , or Tērĕ ganknetsʾ , ew ochʾ tʾē martĕ .
58008003	Kʾani or amēn kʾahanayabet nshanagowadz ē ĕndzaner ow zoher matowtsʾanelow hamar , harg ēr or asiga al ownenar matowtsʾanelikʾ pan mĕ .
58008004	An kʾahanay ankam biti chʾĕllar , etʾē ergri vray ĕllar , orovhetew gan kʾahananer , or ĕndzaner gĕ matowtsʾanen ōrēnkʾin hamatsayn .
58008005	( Anonkʾ bashtamownkʾ gĕ gataren ergnayin panerown ōrinagov ew showkʾov , inchʾbēs Astowadz batkam towaw Movsēsi , erp biti shinēr khoranĕ , kʾani or ĕsaw : « Tes , orbēszi amēn pan ĕnes leṛĕ kʾezi tsʾoytsʾ trowadz tibarin hamatsayn » . )
58008006	Isg hima Yisows hasaw kerazantsʾ bashtōni mĕ , kʾani or michnort ē lawakoyn owkhti mĕ , or ōrinatrowadz ē lawakoyn khostowmnerow vray .
58008007	Artarew etʾē aṛachinĕ anmeghatreli ĕllar , pnaw tegh chʾēr pʾntṛower ergrortin hamar .
58008008	Orovhetew g!ĕsē , meghatrelov zanonkʾ : « Aha gow kan ōrerĕ , - g!ĕsē Tērĕ , - erp nor owkht mĕ biti gnkʾem Israyēli tan het ow Yowtayi tan het .
58008009	Sagayn ochʾ ayn owkhtin bēs , or gnkʾetsʾi anontsʾ hayrerown het , ayn ōrĕ erp pṛnetsʾi anontsʾ tseṛkʾēn , Ekibtosi ergrēn hanelow hamar zanonkʾ : kʾani anonkʾ chʾyaratewetsʾin im owkhtis mēch , es al anhok eghay anontsʾ hantēb , - g!ĕsē Tērĕ . -
58008010	Artarew sa ē ayn owkhtĕ , or biti hastatem Israyēli tan het ayt ōrerēn etkʾ , - g!ĕsē Tērĕ : - im ōrēnkʾners biti tnem anontsʾ mitkʾin mēch , zanonkʾ biti krem anontsʾ sirtin vray , ow es biti ĕllam anontsʾ Astowadzĕ , anonkʾ al biti ĕllan im zhoghovowrts .
58008011	Al iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ biti chʾsorvetsʾnē ir ĕngerin , ochʾ al iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ ir eghpōr , ĕselov : “ Janchʾtsʾir Tērĕ ” , kʾani or anontsʾ bztigēn minchʾew medzĕ , biti janchʾnan zis :
58008012	artarew es biti kʾawem anontsʾ anirawowtʾiwnnerĕ , ew al biti chʾyishem anontsʾ meghkʾern ow anōrēnowtʾiwnnerĕ » .
58008013	“ Nor owkht ” gochʾelov , hintsʾowtsʾ aṛachinĕ : isg inchʾ or gĕ hinnay ew gĕ dzeranay , mōt ē anerewowtʾanalow .
58009001	Artarew aṛachin owkhtn al ownēr bashtamownkʾi ganonner , naew ashkharhayin srparan mĕ :
58009002	orovhetew khoran mĕ gaṛowtsʾanowadz ēr . Aṛachinĕ , orown mēch gayin ashtanagĕ , seghanĕ ew aṛachatrowtʾean hatsʾĕ , Srpowtʾiwn gĕ gochʾowēr .
58009003	Isg ergrort varakoyrin etew gar khoran mĕ , or Srpowtʾiwnnerow srpowtʾiwn gĕ gochʾowēr :
58009004	anor mēch ēin osgiē powrvaṛĕ ew amēn goghmē osgebat owkhtin tabanagĕ , orown mēch gayin osgiē sapʾorĕ , mananayov letsʾown , Aharoni kawazanĕ , or dzaghgetsʾaw , ew owkhtin takhtagnerĕ .
58009005	Anor vray al , pʾaṛkʾi kʾerovpēnerĕ , or hovani g!ĕnēin Kʾawowtʾean vray . Ays masin hima manramasn khōselow garikʾ chʾgay .
58009006	Asonkʾ aysbēs gaṛowtsʾanowadz ĕllalov , kʾahananerĕ amēn aten gĕ mtnēin aṛachin khoranĕ , bashtamownkʾ gatarelow .
58009007	Isg miayn kʾahanayabetĕ gĕ mtnēr ergrortin mēch , tarin mēg ankam : paytsʾ ochʾ aṛantsʾ ariwni , or gĕ matowtsʾanēr iren hamar , naew zhoghovowrtin ankitowtʾean meghkʾerown hamar .
58009008	Sowrp Hokin sa gĕ patsʾayaytēr , tʾē srparanin jampan yaytnaperowadz chʾēr , kʾani teṛ gĕ genar aṛachin khoranĕ ,
58009009	or nakhatibar mĕn ēr nergay atenin hamar . Anor mēch gĕ matowtsʾanowēin ĕndzaner ow zoher , oronkʾ chʾēin grnar gatareal ĕnel bashtamownkʾ gataroghĕ , khghjmtankʾin hantēb : haba , geragowrnerov , khmelikʾnerov
58009010	ew tarper lowatsʾowmnerov , miayn marmnawor ganonner ēin , oronkʾ gĕ bartatrowēin minchʾew owghghowmi atenĕ .
58009011	Paytsʾ erp Kʾristos egaw ipr kalikʾ parikʾnerow Kʾahanayabet , antsʾaw aweli medz ow gatareal khoranin mēchēn , or antseṛagert ē , ( aysinkʾn , ays ararchʾowtʾenēn chʾē , )
58009012	ew ir isg ariwnov - ochʾ tʾē nokhaznerow ew zowaragnerow ariwnov - mēg ankam ĕntmisht mtaw srparanĕ , yawitenagan azatakrowtʾiwn stanalov .
58009013	Orovhetew etʾē tsʾowlerown ow nokhaznerown ariwnĕ , ew bighdzerown vray srsgowogh erinchin mokhirĕ , gĕ srpatsʾnēin , marmini makʾrowtʾean hamar ,
58009014	al orchʾapʾ aweli Kʾristosi ariwnĕ , or yawitenagan Hokiin michotsʾov matowtsʾanetsʾ inkʾzinkʾ Astowdzoy , ipr anarat zoh , biti makʾrē tser khghjmtankʾĕ meṛadz kordzerēn , bashtelow hamar abrogh Astowadzĕ .
58009015	Hetewapar inkʾ nor owkhtin michnortn ē , kʾani or ir mahĕ eghaw aṛachin owkhtin zhamanag kordzowadz ōrinazantsʾowtʾiwnnerown azatakrowtʾean hamar , orbēszi ganchʾowadznerĕ stanan yawitenagan zhaṛankowtʾean khostowmĕ .
58009016	Orovhetew hon , owr gtag mĕ gay , harg ē or gtagararĕ meṛni .
58009017	Artarew gtagĕ gĕ hastatowi mahēn etkʾ : aylabēs oy zh chʾowni , aynkʾan aten or gtagararĕ oghch ē .
58009018	Hetewapar aṛachin owkhtn al chʾēr grnar hastatowil , , aṛantsʾ ariwni :
58009019	kʾani or erp Movsēs ampoghch zhoghovowrtin haghortetsʾ ōrēnkʾin polor batowērnerĕ , tsʾowlerown ew nokhaznerown ariwnĕ aṛaw ow noyninkʾn Kirkʾin ew ampoghch zhoghovowrtin vray srsgetsʾ , chowrov , ortan garmir powrtov ow zobayov ,
58009020	ew ĕsaw : « Ays ē ariwnĕ ayn owkhtin , or Astowadz hrahanketsʾ tsezi » .
58009021	Ow khoranin vray , ew bashtōnin polor aṛarganerown vray noynbēs srsgetsʾ ariwnĕ .
58009022	ōrēnkʾin hamatsayn , kretʾē amēn pan gĕ makʾrowi ariwnov : ew aṛantsʾ ariwn tʾapʾelow , nerowm chʾ!ĕllar .
58009023	Owremn harg ēr or ergnayin panerown ōrinagnerĕ makʾrowēin asontsʾmov , isg noyninkʾn ergnawornerĕ , asontsʾmē lawakoyn zoherov .
58009024	Kʾani or Kʾristos mtaw ochʾ tʾē tseṛagert srparanĕ , or jshmaritin grgnatibn ēr , haba noyninkʾn erginkʾĕ , orbēszi hima Astowdzoy aṛchew erewnay mezi hamar :
58009025	ochʾ al mtaw , inkʾzinkʾ yajakh ipr zoh matowtsʾanelow hamar , inchʾbēs kʾahanayabetĕ , or amēn tari srparanĕ gĕ mtnē owrishin ariwnov :
58009026	aylabēs , bētkʾ ēr or yajakh chʾarchʾarowēr , ashkharhi himnatrowtʾenēn i ver . Paytsʾ hima , tarerow vakhjanin , mēg ankam erewtsʾaw , chnchelow hamar meghkʾĕ inkʾzinkʾ zohelov .
58009027	Ew inchʾbēs martotsʾ verabahowadz ē mēg ankam meṛnil , isg angē etkʾ , tatastanĕ ,
58009028	noynbēs al Kʾristos mēg ankam ipr zoh matowtsʾanowetsʾaw , kʾawelow hamar shaterow meghkʾerĕ , ow ergrort ankam biti erewnay , aṛantsʾ meghkʾi , pʾrgelow hamar anonkʾ , or gĕ sbasen iren .
58010001	Artarew ōrēnkʾĕ , ownenalov kalikʾ parikʾnerown showkʾĕ , ochʾ tʾē ayt panerown pown batgerĕ , erpekʾ chʾi grnar gatareal ĕnel anonkʾ , or gĕ mōtenan , sharownag amēn tari matowtsʾanowadz noyn zoherov .
58010002	Aylabēs , biti chʾtatrēin matowtsʾanowelē , kʾani or bashtamownkʾ gataroghnerĕ , mēg ankam makʾrowelēn etkʾ , al khghjaharowtʾiwn biti chʾownenayin meghkʾerow hamar .
58010003	Paytsʾ amēn tari meghkʾerow yishatagowtʾiwn g!ĕllay anontsʾmov :
58010004	orovhetew nokhaznerown ow tsʾowlerown ariwnĕ angarogh ē kʾawel meghkʾerĕ .
58010005	Owsti erp mtaw ashkharh , ĕsaw : « Zoh ew ĕndzay chʾowzetsʾir , haba marmin mĕ batrastetsʾir indzi .
58010006	Oghchagēznerow ew meghkʾi bataraknerow chʾparehajetsʾar .
58010007	Ayn aten ĕsi : “ Aha gow kam ( im masis krowadz ē Kirkʾi batatin mēch ) kʾow gamkʾt kordzatrelow , ov Astowadz ” » .
58010008	Verĕ g!ĕsē : « Zoh , ĕndzay , oghchagēzner ow meghkʾi batarakner chʾowzetsʾir ew anontsʾ chʾparehajetsʾar » , ( oronkʾ gĕ matowtsʾanowēin ōrēnkʾin hamatsayn , )
58010009	yetoy g!ĕsē : « Aha gow kam kʾow gamkʾt kordzatrelow , ov Astowadz » . Gĕ vertsʾnē aṛachinĕ , orbēszi hastatē ergrortĕ .
58010010	Ayt gamkʾov ē or menkʾ srpatsʾankʾ , Yisows Kʾristosi marminin mēg ankam ĕntmisht batarakowelov .
58010011	Amēn kʾahanay amēn ōr gĕ gayni , bashtōn gatarelow ew noyn zoherĕ yajakh matowtsʾanelow , oronkʾ erpekʾ chʾen grnar kʾawel meghkʾerĕ .
58010012	Minchʾteṛ asiga mshtnchenabēs Astowdzoy ach goghmĕ pazmetsʾaw , meghkʾerow hamar mēg zoh matowtsʾanelov ,
58010013	ew angē etkʾ gĕ sbasē , minchʾew or ir tʾshnaminerĕ batowantan trowin ir otkʾerown :
58010014	orovhetew mēg batarakov mshtnchenabēs gatareal ĕraw srpatsʾadznerĕ .
58010015	Sowrp Hokin al gĕ vgayē mezi , kʾani or nakhabēs ĕselēn etkʾ :
58010016	« Sa ē ayn owkhtĕ , or biti hastatem anontsʾ het ayt ōrerēn etkʾ , - g!ĕsē Tērĕ : - im ōrēnkʾners biti tnem anontsʾ sirtin mēch , ew zanonkʾ biti krem anontsʾ mitkʾin mēch :
58010017	anontsʾ meghkʾern ow anōrēnowtʾiwnnerĕ al biti chʾyishem » .
58010018	Owsti , owr or asontsʾ nerowm trowetsʾaw , al meghkʾi hamar batarak bētkʾ chʾē .
58010019	Owremn , eghpayrner , hamartsagowtʾiwn owninkʾ srparanĕ mtnelow , Yisowsi ariwnov ,
58010020	nor ow genarar jampayov mĕ - orown patsʾowmĕ gataretsʾ mezi hamar - varakoyrin mēchēn , or ir marminn ē :
58010021	naew owninkʾ medz kʾahanay mĕ , nshanagowadz Astowdzoy tan vray .
58010022	Owsti mōtenankʾ jshmarit sirtov , hawatkʾi lman vstahowtʾeamp , mer sirterĕ srsgowmov makʾrowadz chʾar khghjmtankʾēn , ew mer marminnerĕ makʾowr chowrov lowatsʾowadz .
58010023	Amowr pṛnenkʾ mer yoysin tawanowtʾiwnĕ , aṛantsʾ ereralow , orovhetew hawatarim ē an , or khostatsʾaw .
58010024	Owshatir ĕllankʾ zirar hrahrelow siroy ow pari kordzerow .
58010025	Ew chʾlkʾenkʾ mer hawakʾoytʾnerĕ , inchʾbēs omantsʾ sovorowtʾiwnn ē : haba yortorenkʾ zirar , aynchʾapʾ aweli , orchʾapʾ gĕ tesnēkʾ ayn ōrowan mōtenalĕ .
58010026	Artarew etʾē gamovin meghanchʾenkʾ , jshmartowtʾean kitagtsʾowtʾiwnĕ stanalē etkʾ , al owrish zoh chʾi mnar meghkʾerow hamar ,
58010027	haba gĕ mnay tatastani ahargow sbasowm mĕ ow nakhantsakhntrowtʾean grag mĕ , or biti lapʾē hagaṛagortnerĕ .
58010028	An , or g!anarkēr Movsēsi ōrēnkʾĕ , gĕ meṛnēr aṛantsʾ arkahatankʾi , ergow gam erekʾ vganerov .
58010029	Al orchʾapʾ aweli khist bati zhi gĕ gardzēkʾ tʾē biti ar zhananay an , or otnagokh ĕradz ē Astowdzoy Ortin , bighdz hamaradz ē owkhtin ariwnĕ , orov inkʾ srpatsʾaw , ew nakhatadz ē shnorhkʾi Hokin .
58010030	Kʾani or gĕ janchʾnankʾ an , or ĕsaw : « Vrē zhkhntrowtʾiwnĕ ims ē , es biti hatowtsʾanem , - g!ĕsē Tērĕ » . Ew tartseal : « Tērĕ biti tatē ir zhoghovowrtĕ » .
58010031	Ahargow pan ē iynal abrogh Astowdzoy tseṛkʾĕ .
58010032	Owremn veryishetsʾēkʾ nakhgin ōrerĕ , erp , lowsaworowelē etkʾ , togatsʾikʾ chʾarchʾarankʾnerow medz marti mĕ :
58010033	erpemn tesaran eghakʾ , nakhatinkʾnerov ow taṛabankʾerov , erpemn al haghortagtsʾetsʾakʾ aytbisi vijagi mēch eghoghnerown het .
58010034	Orovhetew im gaberows mēch indzi , , garegtsʾetsʾakʾ , ew tser inchʾkʾin yapʾshtagowilĕ ĕntownetsʾikʾ owrakhowtʾeamp , kitnalov tʾē tsezi hamar lawakoyn ow mnayown inchʾkʾer ownikʾ erginkʾĕ .
58010035	Owremn mi lkʾēkʾ tser hamartsagowtʾiwnĕ , or owni medz vartsatrowtʾiwn .
58010036	Orovhetew hamperowtʾiwn bētkʾ ē tsezi , orbēszi stanakʾ khostowmĕ , kordzatradz ĕllalov Astowdzoy gamkʾĕ .
58010037	Kʾani or « kʾichʾ mĕ atenēn biti kay an , or kalikʾ ē , ow biti chʾowshanay .
58010038	Ew artarĕ hawatkʾov biti abri : isg etʾē mēgĕ ĕngrgi , im antss biti chʾparehaji anor » .
58010039	Paytsʾ menkʾ anontsʾmē chʾenkʾ , or g!ĕngrgin gorowsti hamar , haba anontsʾmē , or gĕ hawatan , irentsʾ antsin pʾrgowtʾean hamar .
58011001	Isg hawatkʾĕ , yowsatsʾowadz panerown khariskhn ē , ew antesaneli panerown abatsʾoytsʾĕ :
58011002	orovhetew anov nakhnikʾnerĕ ĕntownetsʾin pari vgayowtʾiwn mĕ .
58011003	Hawatkʾov g!ĕmpṛnenkʾ tʾē tiezerkʾĕ gazmowetsʾaw Astowdzoy khōskʾov , aynbēs or tesaneli panerĕ koyatsʾan anerewoytʾ panerēn .
58011004	Hawatkʾov Apēl aweli law zoh matowtsʾanetsʾ Astowdzoy , kʾan Gayēn , orov vgayowetsʾaw tʾē artar ēr , kʾani or Astowadz vgayetsʾ ir ĕndzanerown masin : ew anov , tʾēbēt meṛaw , tagawin gĕ khōsi .
58011005	Hawatkʾov Enovkʾ pʾokhatrowetsʾaw ergrēn , orbēszi mah chʾtesnē , ow ochʾ mēg tegh gĕ ktnowēr , orovhetew Astowadz pʾokhatretsʾ zayn , kʾani or anor pʾokhatrowelēn aṛach vgayowetsʾaw tʾē hajeli ēr Astowdzoy .
58011006	Sagayn aṛantsʾ hawatkʾi angareli ē hajeli ĕllal Astowdzoy : orovhetew an , or gĕ mōtenay Astowdzoy , bētkʾ ē hawatay tʾē Astowadz gay , ew gĕ vartsatrē anonkʾ , or gĕ pʾntṛen zinkʾ .
58011007	Hawatkʾov Noy , batkam stanalov Astowdzmē , tagawin antesaneli panerow masin , ergiwghadzowtʾeamp gertetsʾ taban mĕ , ir ĕntanikʾin pʾrgowtʾean hamar , orov tatabartetsʾ ashkharhĕ ew zhaṛankort eghaw ayn artarowtʾean , or g!ĕllay hawatkʾov .
58011008	Hawatkʾov Apraham hnazantetsʾaw , erp ganchʾowetsʾaw megnelow tegh mĕ , or biti stanar ipr zhaṛankowtʾiwn , ow megnetsʾaw , aṛantsʾ kitnalow tʾē owr g!ertʾar .
58011009	Hawatkʾov bantkhtatsʾaw khostatsʾowadz ergrin mēch , orbēs tʾē ōtarowtʾean mēch , vrannerow mēch pnagelov Isahagi ew Yagopi het , oronkʾ zhaṛankagitsʾnern ēin noyn khostowmin :
58011010	orovhetew inkʾ gĕ sbasēr himer ownetsʾogh kʾaghakʾi mĕ , orown jartarabetn ow gaṛowtsʾanoghĕ Astowadz ē .
58011011	Hawatkʾov Saṛa inkʾ al garoghowtʾiwn statsʾaw serntakordzelow , ow hasownowtʾean mēch zawag dznaw , kʾani or hawatarim hamaretsʾ an , or khostatsʾadz ēr .
58011012	Owsti ayt mēgēn - or meṛadzi bēs ēr - dznan aynkʾan pazmatʾiw , orkʾan erginkʾi astgherĕ , ew anhamar , inchʾbēs dzovezerkʾi awazĕ .
58011013	Asonkʾ polorn al meṛan hawatkʾov , aṛantsʾ statsʾadz ĕllalow khostowmnerĕ , paytsʾ heṛowēn tesan zanonkʾ ew parewetsʾin , ĕntownelov tʾē irenkʾ ōtaraganner ow kaghtʾaganner en ergri vray :
58011014	orovhetew anonkʾ or gĕ khōsin aysbisi paner , gĕ yaytnen tʾē gĕ pʾntṛen pnakawaṛ mĕ .
58011015	Artarew , etʾē yishēin ayn hayrenikʾĕ , owrgē towrs eladz ēin , batehowtʾiwn gownenayin hon verataṛnalow .
58011016	Isg hima gĕ paghtsan lawakoyn hayrenikʾi mĕ , aysinkʾn , ergnayinin : owsti Astowadz amōtʾ chʾi seber anontsʾ Astowadzĕ gochʾowil , orovhetew inkʾ kʾaghakʾ mĕ batrastetsʾ anontsʾ .
58011017	Hawatkʾov Apraham , erp gĕ pʾortsowēr , Isahagĕ zoh matowtsʾanetsʾ . Inkʾ , or ĕntownadz ēr khostowmnerĕ , matowtsʾanetsʾ ir mēg hatig ortin , -
58011018	orown hamar ĕsowadz ēr : « Isahagi anownov biti gochʾowi kʾow zarmt » , -
58011019	orovhetew gĕ mtadzēr tʾē Astowadz garogh ē yarowtsʾanel zayn , noynisg meṛelnerēn : owrgē al statsʾaw zayn , orbēs nakhatibar .
58011020	Hawatkʾov Isahag , markarēanalov kalikʾ panerown masin , ōrhnetsʾ Yagopn ow Esawĕ .
58011021	Hawatkʾov Yagop , erp mahamerts ēr , ōrhnetsʾ Yovsēpʾi ortinerēn iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ , ow ergrbaketsʾ , yenelov ir kawazanin dzayrin vray .
58011022	Hawatkʾov Yovsēpʾ , erp gĕ vakhjanēr , yishetsʾ Israyēli ortinerown megnowmĕ Ekibtosēn , ow batowēr towaw ir osgornerown hamar .
58011023	Hawatkʾov Movsēs , erp dznaw , erekʾ amis bahowetsʾaw ir dznoghnerown goghmē , orovhetew tesan keghetsʾig manowgĕ , ow chʾvakhtsʾan tʾakaworin hramanēn .
58011024	Hawatkʾov Movsēs , erp medztsʾaw , mer zhetsʾ Pʾarawoni aghchigin orti gochʾowil ,
58011025	nakhĕntrelov chʾarchʾarowil Astowdzoy zhoghovowrtin het , kʾan vayelel meghkʾin zhamanagawor zowarjowtʾiwnĕ .
58011026	Aweli medz harstowtʾiwn hamaretsʾ Kʾristosi nakhatinkʾĕ , kʾan Ekibtosi kantserĕ , orovhetew gĕ titēr vartsatrowtʾiwnĕ .
58011027	Hawatkʾov tsketsʾ Ekibtosĕ , aṛantsʾ vakhnalow tʾakaworin zayroytʾēn , orovhetew hastat mnatsʾ orbēs tʾē tesnelov Antesanelin .
58011028	Hawatkʾov gataretsʾ zatigĕ ew ariwnin heghowmĕ , orbēszi antranignerĕ pnachnchoghĕ chʾtbchʾi irentsʾ .
58011029	Hawatkʾov Garmir dzovēn antsʾan , orbēs tʾē tsʾamakʾē , inchʾ or Ekibtatsʾinerĕ pʾortsetsʾin , sagayn ĕngghmetsʾan .
58011030	Hawatkʾov Erikʾovi barisbnerĕ ingan , erp Israyelatsʾinerĕ eōtʾĕ ōr tartsan anontsʾ showrchĕ .
58011031	Hawatkʾov Ṛakhap boṛnigĕ chʾgorsowetsʾaw anhnazantnerown het , khaghaghowtʾeamp ĕntownadz ĕllalov lrtesnerĕ .
58011032	Ew al inchʾ ĕsem : orovhetew zhamanagĕ biti bagsi , batmelow Ketēoni , Paragi , Sampʾsoni , Yepʾtʾayēi , Tawitʾi , Samowēli ew owrish markarēnerow masin ,
58011033	oronkʾ hawatkʾov baykʾaretsʾan tʾakaworowtʾiwnnerow tēm , artarowtʾiwn kordzetsʾin , khostowmnerow hasan , aṛiwdznerow erakhner kotsʾetsʾin ,
58011034	gragi zōrowtʾiwn maretsʾin , sowri peranē khowsapʾetsʾan , tgarowtʾenē zōratsʾan , baterazmi mēch ow zheghatsʾan , ōtarnerow panagner ĕngjetsʾin .
58011035	Giner ĕntownetsʾin irentsʾ meṛelnerĕ , yarowtʾiwn aṛadz : isg owrishner kanagodzowetsʾan , chʾĕntownelov azatakrowtʾiwnĕ , orbēszi hasnin lawakoyn yarowtʾean mĕ .
58011036	Owrishner al pʾortsaṛowtʾiwnĕ ownetsʾan dzaghrankʾi ew kharazani , naew gaberow ow panterow :
58011037	kʾargodzowetsʾan , sghotsʾowetsʾan , tanchowetsʾan , sowrov sbannowetsʾan , ochʾkhari mortʾerov ew aydzi mortʾerov shrchetsʾan , zrgowelov , taṛabelov , chʾarchʾarowelov ,
58011038	( orontsʾ ar zhani chʾēr ashkharhĕ , ) molorelov anabatnerow , leṛnerow , kʾarayrnerow ew ergri khoṛochʾnerown mēch .
58011039	Asonkʾ polorn al ĕntownetsʾin pari vgayowtʾiwn mĕ irentsʾ hawatkʾin hamar , sagayn khostowmĕ chʾstatsʾan ,
58011040	kʾani or Astowadz mezi hamar nakhatesadz ēr aweli law pan mĕ , orbēszi anonkʾ chʾhasnin khostowmin irakordzowmin , , aṛantsʾ mezi .
58012001	Owsti menkʾ al , kʾani or shrchabatowadz enkʾ ayschʾapʾ shat vganerow pazmowtʾeamp , tʾōtʾapʾenkʾ amēn dzanrapeṛnowm , ew meghkʾĕ , or tiwraw gĕ basharē mez , ow hamperowtʾeamp vazenkʾ mezi aṛachargowadz mrtsʾarshawĕ ,
58012002	nayelov Yisowsi , mer hawatkʾi ṛahvirayin ew irakordzoghin : iren aṛachargowadz owrakhowtʾean hamar , an togatsʾ khachʾin , arhamarhetsʾ amōtʾĕ , ow pazmetsʾaw Astowdzoy kahin ach goghmĕ .
58012003	Artarew mtadzetsʾēkʾ anor masin , or togatsʾ meghawornerown iren tēm aysbēs hagajaṛelown , orbēszi tser antserĕ chʾtʾowlnan ow chʾbartasin .
58012004	Tagawin ariwn tʾapʾelow chʾapʾ chʾtimatretsʾikʾ , baykʾarelov meghkʾin tēm ,
58012005	ew moṛtsʾakʾ ayn yortorĕ or gĕ khōsi tsezi het , orbēs tʾē ortinerow het : « Orteags , mi anteser Tēroch bati zhĕ , ow mi bartasir , erp gshtampowis irmē .
58012006	Orovhetew Tērĕ gĕ bat zhē ir siradzĕ , ew gĕ kharazanē amēn orti , or g!ĕntowni » .
58012007	Etʾē togakʾ bati zhi , Astowadz gĕ veraperi tsezi het , ipr ortiner : kʾani or ov ē ayn ortin , orown hayrĕ chʾi bat zher zinkʾ .
58012008	Isg etʾē ĕllakʾ aṛantsʾ bati zhi , orown polorĕ pa zhnegitsʾ en , owremn abōrini zawag ēkʾ , ew ochʾ tʾē harazat orti .
58012009	Yetoy , erp mer marmnawor hayrerĕ gĕ bat zhēin mez , gĕ batgaṛēinkʾ anontsʾmē : shat aweli biti chʾhbataginkʾ hokinerown Hōr , or abrinkʾ .
58012010	Artarew anonkʾ kʾichʾ ōrer gĕ bat zhēin mez , irentsʾ tatowmin hamatsayn : paytsʾ Astowadz , mer ōkowtin hamar , orbēszi pa zhin stanankʾ ir srpowtʾenēn .
58012011	Ochʾ mēg bati zh noyn bahown gĕ tʾowi owrakharar , haba , trtmarar : paytsʾ yetoy gow tay artarowtʾean khaghagharar btowghĕ , anov grtʾowadznerown .
58012012	Owsti hastatetsʾēkʾ tʾowltsʾadz tseṛkʾern ow gtʾot dzowngerĕ ,
58012013	ew batrastetsʾēkʾ owghigh arahetner , tser otkʾerown hamar , orbēszi ov or gagh ē , chʾkhotori , ayl pʾokharēnĕ p zhshgowi .
58012014	Hetamowt eghēkʾ khaghaghowtʾean , polorin het , ew srpowtʾean , aṛantsʾ orown ochʾ mēgĕ biti tesnē Tērĕ .
58012015	Owshatir eghēkʾ , or ochʾ mēgĕ zrgowi Astowdzoy shnorhkʾēn : taṛnowtʾean armat mĕ powsnelov , tʾogh chʾvrtovē tsez , ew shater chʾbghdzowin anov .
58012016	Ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh ĕllay boṛngogh , gam srpabighdz , Esawi bēs , or mēg geragowri hamar dzakhetsʾ ir antrangowtʾean irawownkʾĕ .
58012017	Kʾani or kitēkʾ tʾē yetoy , erp owzetsʾ zhaṛankel ōrhnowtʾiwnĕ , mer zhowetsʾaw , tʾēbēt pʾntṛetsʾ zayn artsʾownkʾov , orovhetew ir abashkharowtʾiwnĕ anōkowt eghaw , , .
58012018	Artarew towkʾ mōtetsʾadz chʾēkʾ shōshapʾeli leran , or gĕ vaṛēr gragov , ochʾ al mtʾowtʾean , khawarin ow mrrigin ,
58012019	ew pʾoghin shaṛachʾin ow khōskʾerown tsaynin : zayn lsoghnerĕ khntretsʾin or ayt khōskʾĕ aylews chʾĕsowi irentsʾ .
58012020	( Artarew chʾēin grnar togal ayt batowērin : « Etʾē noynisg anasown mĕ tbchʾi leran , biti kʾargodzowi » .
58012021	Aynbēs ahargow ēr erewoytʾĕ , or Movsēs ĕsaw : « Sastig gĕ zarhowrim ow gĕ togham » . )
58012022	Paytsʾ towkʾ mōtetsʾadz ēkʾ Sion leran , abrogh Astowdzoy kʾaghakʾin , ergnayin Erowsaghēmin , piwrawor hreshtagnerow hama zhoghovin ,
58012023	erginkʾĕ artsanakrowadz antranignerow hamakhmpowmin , Astowdzoy , or polorin Tataworn ē , artarnerown hokinerown , oronkʾ gatarelowtʾean hasadz , , en ,
58012024	Yisowsi , or nor owkhti michnortn ē , ew srsgowmi ariwnin , or gĕ khōsi Apēli ariwnēn aweli law .
58012025	Zkowshatsʾēkʾ or chʾmer zhēkʾ an , or gĕ khōsi tsezi : orovhetew etʾē bati zhē chʾkhowsapʾetsʾan anonkʾ , or mer zhetsʾin ergri vray Astowdzoy batkamnerĕ towoghĕ , orchʾapʾ aweli menkʾ , etʾē eres tartsnenkʾ erginkʾēn khōsoghēn .
58012026	Ayn aten anor tsaynĕ shar zhetsʾ ergirĕ , isg hima khostatsʾadz ē , ĕselov : « Ankam mĕn al biti shar zhem : ochʾ miayn ergirĕ , ayl naew erginkʾĕ » .
58012027	Ays « ankam mĕn al » khōskʾĕ gĕ patsʾayaytē shar zhowadz panerown pʾopʾokhowtʾiwnĕ , ipr shinowadz paner , orbēszi anshar zh panerĕ mnan hastatown .
58012028	Owsti , ĕntownadz ĕllalov anshar zh tʾakaworowtʾiwn mĕ , shnorhagal ĕllankʾ , ew bashtenkʾ Astowadz iren hajeli gerbov , agnadzankʾov ow parebashtowtʾeamp :
58012029	orovhetew mer Astowadzĕ sbaṛogh grag ē .
58013001	Yaratewetsʾēkʾ eghpayrsirowtʾean mēch .
58013002	Mi moṛnakʾ hiwrasirowtʾiwnĕ , orovhetew omankʾ anov hreshtagner hiwrĕngaletsʾin tʾakʾown gerbov .
58013003	Yishetsʾēkʾ pantargealnerĕ , orbēs tʾē towkʾ al gabowadz ēkʾ anontsʾ het , ew chʾarchʾarowoghnerĕ , orbēs tʾē towkʾ al marmini mēch ēkʾ .
58013004	Amowsnowtʾiwnĕ tʾogh batowagan hamarowi polorēn , ow angoghinĕ , anarat bahowi , kʾani or Astowadz biti tatē boṛngoghnern ow shnatsʾoghnerĕ .
58013005	TSer varowelagerbĕ tʾogh ĕllay aṛantsʾ ardzatʾsirowtʾean : pawararowetsʾēkʾ tser ownetsʾadzov , orovhetew inkʾ ĕsaw : « Pnaw biti chʾtʾoghowm kʾez , ochʾ al biti lkʾem kʾez » .
58013006	Hetewapar vstahowtʾeamp ĕsenkʾ : « Tērĕ im ōknagans ē , owsti biti chʾvakhnam : martĕ inchʾ biti ĕnē indzi » .
58013007	Yishetsʾēkʾ tsez gaṛavaroghnerĕ , or Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ kʾarozetsʾin tsezi , ew hetewetsʾēkʾ anontsʾ hawatkʾin , znnelov anontsʾ varkʾin awartĕ .
58013008	Yisows Kʾristos noynn ē , erēg , aysōr ow yawitean .
58013009	Mi tarowikʾ pazmazan ew ōtaroti owsowtsʾowmnerē , kʾani or law ē or sirtĕ hastatowi shnorhkʾov , ew ochʾ tʾē geragowrnerov , oronkʾ ōktagar chʾeghan anontsʾ hamatsayn ĕntʾatsʾoghnerown .
58013010	Menkʾ owninkʾ zohaseghan mĕ , ormē owtelow irawownkʾ chʾownin anonkʾ , or gĕ dzaṛayen khoranin :
58013011	kʾani or panagavayrēn towrs g!ayrowin marminnerĕ ayn gentaninerown , orontsʾ ariwnĕ gĕ tarowi srparanĕ , kʾahanayabetin michotsʾov , meghkʾi kʾawowtʾean hamar .
58013012	Owsti Yisows al chʾarchʾarowetsʾaw tṛnēn towrs , orbēszi ir ariwnov srpatsʾnē zhoghovowrtĕ .
58013013	Owremn ertʾankʾ anor , panagavayrēn towrs , grelov ir nakhatinkʾĕ :
58013014	orovhetew menkʾ hos chʾowninkʾ mnayown kʾaghakʾ , haba gĕ pʾntṛenkʾ kalikʾ kʾaghakʾĕ .
58013015	Owsti , anor michotsʾov amēn aten kovapanowtʾean zoh matowtsʾanenkʾ Astowdzoy , aysinkʾn , ir anownĕ tawanogh shrtʾownkʾnerown btowghĕ .
58013016	Paytsʾ mi moṛnakʾ parekordzowtʾiwnn ow garōtealnerown haghortagtsʾowtʾiwnĕ , kʾani or aytbisi zoher hajeli en Astowdzoy .
58013017	Ansatsʾēkʾ tsez gaṛavaroghnerown ew entʾargowetsʾēkʾ anontsʾ , orovhetew anonkʾ gĕ hsgen tser antserown vray , orontsʾ hamar hashiw biti tan : orbēszi owrakhowtʾeamp ĕnen ayt kordzĕ , ew ochʾ tʾē haṛachʾelov , kʾani or atiga ōktagar chʾē tsezi .
58013018	Aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ mezi hamar , orovhetew hamozowadz enkʾ tʾē owninkʾ pari khghjmtankʾ ow g!owzenkʾ amēn pani mēch varowil bargeshtowtʾeamp .
58013019	Paytsʾ aṛawelabēs g!aghachʾem or ĕnēkʾ atiga , orbēszi aweli showt veratartsowim tsezi .
58013020	KHaghaghowtʾean Astowadzĕ , or meṛelnerēn ver hanetsʾ mer Tērĕ , Yisowsĕ - ochʾkharnerown medz Hoviwĕ , yawitenagan owkhtin ariwnov - ,
58013021	amēn pari kordzi mēch hastatē tsez , ir gamkʾĕ kordzatrelow , tser mēch irakordzelov ir aṛchew hajeli eghadzĕ , Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov , orown pʾaṛkʾ tarē tar , , . Amēn .
58013022	G!aghachʾem tsezi , eghpayrner , or hantowr zhēkʾ ays yortoragan khōskʾis , orovhetew hamaṛōtapar kretsʾi tsezi .
58013023	Kittsʾēkʾ tʾē mer eghpayrĕ , Timotʾēos artsagowadz ē : etʾē showtov kay , anor het biti tesnem tsez .
58013024	Parewetsʾēkʾ polor tsez gaṛavaroghnern ow polor sowrperĕ : gĕ parewen tsez anonkʾ , or Italiayēn en .
58013025	SHnorhkʾĕ tser polorin het . Amēn .
59001001	Yagopos , Astowdzoy ow Tēr Yisows Kʾristosi dzaṛay , tasnergow tohmerown , or tsʾrowadz en amēn goghm : oghchoyn .
59001002	Eghpayrners , polorovin owrakhowtʾiwn hamaretsʾēkʾ , erp zanazan pʾortsowtʾiwnnerow mēch iynakʾ ,
59001003	kitnalov tʾē tser hawatkʾin pʾortsĕ hamperowtʾiwn g!irakordzē .
59001004	Paytsʾ hamperowtʾiwnĕ tʾogh ownenay ir gatareal kordzĕ , orbēszi gatareal ew ampoghch ĕllakʾ , ew ochʾinchʾ bagsi tsezi .
59001005	Isg etʾē imastowtʾiwn gĕ bagsi tsezmē mēgown , tʾogh khntrē Astowdzmē , or polorin gow tay aṛatabēs , aṛantsʾ gshtampelow , ew biti trowi anor .
59001006	Paytsʾ hawatkʾov tʾogh khntrē , aṛantsʾ tatamselow : orovhetew an or gĕ tatamsi , nman ē dzovown hoghmagodzeal ow tataneal alikʾnerown .
59001007	Ayt martĕ tʾogh chʾgardzē tʾē orewē pan biti stanay Tērochmēn :
59001008	ergmit martĕ anhastat ē ir polor jampanerown mēch .
59001009	Nowast eghpayrĕ tʾogh bardzenay ir partsratsʾowmov ,
59001010	isg harowstĕ , ir nowastatsʾowmov , orovhetew inkʾ biti antsʾni khoti dzaghigin bēs :
59001011	kʾani or arewĕ gĕ dzaki ayrogh takʾowtʾeamp ow gĕ chʾortsʾnē khotĕ , anor dzaghigĕ gĕ tʾapʾi , ew anor teskʾin vayelchʾowtʾiwnn al gĕ gorsowi . Aytbēs al harowstĕ biti tʾaṛami ir jampanerown mēch .
59001012	Erani ayn martown , or gĕ togay pʾortsowtʾean : orovhetew erp pʾortsargowi ew ĕntir ktnowi , biti stanay geankʾi bsagĕ , or Tērĕ khostatsʾaw zinkʾ siroghnerown .
59001013	Ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh ĕsē , erp gĕ pʾortsowi : « Astowdzmē gĕ pʾortsowim » : orovhetew Astowadz chʾarēn chʾi pʾortsowir , ochʾ al inkʾ gĕ pʾortsē oewē mēgĕ .
59001014	Sagayn iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ gĕ pʾortsowi , hrabowrowadz ow khapowadz ir tsʾangowtʾenēn :
59001015	Yetoy , tsʾangowtʾiwnĕ yghanalov meghkʾ gĕ dznani , isg erp meghkʾĕ gatarowi , mah gĕ dznani .
59001016	Mi molorikʾ , sireli eghpayrners :
59001017	amēn pari nowēr ew amēn gatareal barkew , verēn ē , ow g!ichnē loysi Hōrmēn , orown mēch pnaw pʾopʾokhowtʾiwn chʾgay , ochʾ al taṛnalow showkʾ .
59001018	An ir pʾapʾakʾov dznaw mez , jshmartowtʾean khōskʾov , orbēszi menkʾ erakhayrikʾ mĕ ĕllankʾ ir araradznerown .
59001019	Hetewapar , sireli eghpayrners , amēn mart tʾogh arak ĕllay , lselow mēch , tantagh , khōselow mēch , tantagh , parganalow mēch :
59001020	orovhetew martown pargowtʾiwnĕ chʾ!irakordzer Astowdzoy artarowtʾiwnĕ .
59001021	Owsti , tʾōtʾapʾelov amēn aghteghowtʾiwn ow chʾaramtowtʾean aweltsʾowkʾ , hezowtʾeamp ĕntownetsʾēkʾ tser mēch tngowadz khōskʾĕ , or garogh ē pʾrgel tser antserĕ .
59001022	Sagayn khōskʾĕ kordzatroghner eghēkʾ , ew ochʾ tʾē miayn lsoghner , towkʾ tsez khapelov .
59001023	Artarew , etʾē mēgĕ miayn lsē khōskʾĕ ow chʾkordzatrē , gĕ nmani martow mĕ , or hayelii mēch gĕ titē ir pnagan eresĕ ,
59001024	orovhetew gĕ titē inkʾzinkʾ ow g!ertʾay , ew isgoyn gĕ moṛnay tʾē inchʾbēs ēr .
59001025	Paytsʾ an or agngaṛoytsʾ gĕ nayi azatowtʾean gatareal ōrēnkʾin ow gĕ genay anor mēch , - ochʾ tʾē moṛatsʾgot lsogh mĕ ĕllalov , haba , kordzĕ gatarogh mĕ , - eraneli biti ĕllay ir ĕradzin mēch .
59001026	Etʾē mēgĕ gĕ gardzē grōnasēr ĕllal ow chʾi santser ir lezown , ayl gĕ khapē ir sirtĕ , anor grōnasirowtʾiwnĕ pʾowj ē .
59001027	Astowdzoy ew Hōrĕ aṛchew , makʾowr ow anarat grōnasirowtʾiwnĕ sa ē : - aytsʾelel orperown ew ayrinerown , irentsʾ taṛabankʾin mēch , ow inkʾzinkʾ anpidz bahel ashkharhēn .
59002001	Eghpayrners , aṛantsʾ achʾaṛowtʾean tʾogh ĕllay mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi , pʾaṛkʾi Tēroch hawatkʾĕ .
59002002	Artarew etʾē tser zhoghovaranin mēch mtnē mart mĕ , osgiē mataniov ow pʾaylown tarazov , ew mtnē naew aghkʾat mĕ , aghtot tarazov ,
59002003	ow nayikʾ anor , or pʾaylown taraz gĕ grē , ew ĕsēkʾ : « Hos nstē , batiwov » , isg aghkʾatin ĕsēkʾ : « Hon otkʾi gaynē , gam hos nstē , batowantanis kʾov » ,
59002004	mitʾē tser mēch khtrowtʾiwn tradz chʾēkʾ ĕllar , ow chʾar mtadzowmnerow tatawor eghadz .
59002005	Lsetsʾēkʾ , sireli eghpayrners : mitʾē Astowadz chʾĕntretsʾ ays ashkharhi aghkʾatnerĕ , oronkʾ harowst en hawatkʾov , ow zhaṛankort arkʾayowtʾean , or khostatsʾaw zinkʾ siroghnerown .
59002006	Paytsʾ towkʾ anbatowetsʾikʾ aghkʾatnerĕ . Harowstnerĕ chʾen , or gĕ harstaharen tsez ow tatarannerĕ gĕ kʾashen .
59002007	Anonkʾ chʾen or gĕ hayhoyen ayn pari anownĕ , orov gochʾowadz ēkʾ .
59002008	Owremn , etʾē towkʾ gĕ kordzatrēkʾ arkʾayagan ōrēnkʾĕ , Kirkʾin ĕsadzin hamatsayn : « Sirē ĕngert kʾow antsit , , bēs » , law g!ĕnēkʾ .
59002009	Paytsʾ etʾē achʾaṛowtʾiwn g!ĕnēkʾ , meghkʾ gĕ kordzēkʾ , ew gĕ gshtampowikʾ ōrēnkʾēn , ōrinazantsʾnerow bēs :
59002010	kʾani or ov or bahē ampoghch ōrēnkʾĕ sagayn saytʾakʾi mēg pani mēch , bartaban g!ĕllay polorin .
59002011	Artarew an or ĕsaw : « SHnowtʾiwn mi ĕner » , ĕsaw naew : « Mi sbanner » . Owsti etʾē shnowtʾiwn chʾĕnes paytsʾ sbannes , ōrinazantsʾ g!ĕllas .
59002012	Aynbēs khōsetsʾēkʾ ew aynbēs kordzetsʾēkʾ , orbēs tʾē biti tatowikʾ azatowtʾean ōrēnkʾov .
59002013	Orovhetew tatastanĕ anoghorm biti ĕllay anor , or chʾē oghormadz : sagayn oghormowtʾiwnĕ gĕ bardzenay tatastanin timatsʾ .
59002014	Inchʾ ōkowt owni , eghpayrners , etʾē mēgĕ ĕsē tʾē hawatkʾ owni sagayn kordzer chʾownenay : mitʾē hawatkʾĕ grnay pʾrgel zinkʾ .
59002015	Etʾē eghpayr mĕ gam kʾoyr mĕ merg ĕllay ew ōrowan geragowrin garōt ,
59002016	ow tsezmē mēgĕ ĕsē anontsʾ : « Katsʾēkʾ khaghaghowtʾeamp , takʾtsʾēkʾ ew gshtatsʾēkʾ » , paytsʾ marminin hargawor panerĕ chʾtay anontsʾ , inchʾ ōkowt owni .
59002017	Aytbēs al hawatkʾĕ , etʾē kordzer chʾownenay iren het , meṛadz ē inkʾnir mēch .
59002018	Noynisg mēgĕ grnay ĕsel : « Town hawatkʾ ownis , es al kordzer ownim : tsʾoytsʾ towr indzi kʾow hawatkʾt , aṛantsʾ kordzerow , isg es tsʾoytsʾ biti tam kʾezi im hawatkʾs , kordzerovs ” .
59002019	Town gĕ hawatas tʾē Astowadz mēg ē : law g!ĕnes . Tewern al gĕ hawatan ow gĕ sarsṛan .
59002020	Paytsʾ g!owzes kitnal , ov snoti mart , tʾē hawatkʾĕ meṛadz ē aṛantsʾ kordzerow .
59002021	Apraham , mer hayrĕ , kordzerov chʾartaratsʾaw , erp ir ortin , Isahagĕ matowtsʾanetsʾ zohaseghanin vray .
59002022	Gĕ tesnes tʾē hawatkʾĕ kordzagitsʾ eghaw anor kordzerown , ow kordzerov hawatkʾĕ gatareal eghaw ,
59002023	ew irakordzowetsʾaw Kirkʾin khōskʾĕ , or g!ĕsē : « Apraham hawatatsʾ Astowdzoy , ow atiga artarowtʾiwn sebowetsʾaw anor , ew inkʾ Astowdzoy paregam gochʾowetsʾaw » .
59002024	Gĕ ngatēkʾ tʾē mart g!artaranay kordzerov , ow ochʾ tʾē , miayn hawatkʾov .
59002025	Nmanabēs Ṛakhap boṛnign al chʾartaratsʾaw kordzerov , erp ĕntownetsʾ batkamawornerĕ ew owrish jampayov owghargetsʾ zanonkʾ .
59002026	Artarew inchʾbēs marminĕ meṛadz ē aṛantsʾ hokii , aytbēs al hawatkʾĕ meṛadz ē aṛantsʾ kordzerow .
59003001	Eghpayrners , tser mēch shat vartabetner tʾogh chʾĕllan , kitnalov tʾē aweli khstowtʾeamp biti tatowinkʾ , , .
59003002	Orovhetew polors al gĕ saytʾakʾinkʾ shat panerow mēch : etʾē mēgĕ chʾi saytʾakʾir khōskʾov , gatareal mart ē , garogh , santselow naew ampoghch marminĕ .
59003003	Aha tsierown peranĕ sants gĕ tnenkʾ , orbēszi hnazantin mezi , ew gĕ gaṛavarenkʾ anontsʾ ampoghch marminĕ .
59003004	Aha nawern al , or aytchʾapʾ medz en ow gĕ kʾshowin sastig hoverēn , gĕ gaṛavarowin amenapʾokʾr ghegov mĕ , inchʾbēs nawowghighĕ pʾapʾakʾi .
59003005	Aytbēs al lezown bztig antam mĕn ē , paytsʾ gĕ bardzenay medz panerov . Aha orchʾapʾ niwtʾ gĕ vaṛowi kʾichʾ mĕ gragov .
59003006	Lezown al grag mĕn ē , anirawowtʾean ashkharh mĕ . Lezown aynbēs trowadz ē mer antamnerown mēch , or g!abaganē ampoghch marminĕ ow gĕ pṛngetsʾnē pnowtʾean shrchanĕ , isg inkʾ gĕ pṛngi kehenēn .
59003007	Kazannerow , tʾṛchʾownnerow , soghownnerow ew dzovayin araradznerow amēn pnowtʾiwn , gĕ nowajowi ow nowajowadz ē martgayin pnowtʾenēn .
59003008	Paytsʾ ochʾ mēgĕ grnay nowajel lezown : an anzowsb chʾar ē , li mahaper tʾoynov .
59003009	Anov g!ōrhnapanenkʾ Astowadz ow Hayrĕ , ew anov g!anidzenkʾ martig , or steghdzowadz en Astowdzoy nmanowtʾeamp .
59003010	Miewnoyn peranēn g!ellen ōrhnapanowtʾiwn ew anēdzkʾ . Eghpayrners , bētkʾ chʾē or ays aysbēs ĕllay .
59003011	Mitʾē aghpiwr mĕ miewnoyn agēn gĕ pkhetsʾnē anoysh ow taṛn chowr .
59003012	Eghpayrners , tʾzenin grnay tsitʾabtowgh tal , gam ortʾatowngĕ , tʾowz . Nmanabēs , ochʾ mēg aghpiwr grnay tal tʾē aghi , tʾē anoysh chowr .
59003013	Ov or imastown ow khelatsʾi ē tser mēch , pari varkʾov tʾogh tsʾoytsʾ tay ir kordzerĕ , imastowtʾean hezowtʾeamp .
59003014	Paytsʾ etʾē taṛn nakhants ew hagaṛagowtʾiwn ownenakʾ tser sirterown mēch , jshmartowtʾean tēm mi bardzenakʾ ow mi stēkʾ .
59003015	Ays imastowtʾiwnĕ chʾ!ichner verēn , haba , ergrayin , shnchʾawor ew tiwagan ē .
59003016	Orovhetew owr gay nakhants ow hagaṛagowtʾiwn , hon gay khaṛnagowtʾiwn ew amēn tesag chʾar pan .
59003017	Paytsʾ verēn eghogh imastowtʾiwnĕ , nakh angeghdz ē , yetoy , khaghagharar , azniw , hlow , li oghormowtʾeamp ow pari btowghnerov , angoghmnagal ew angeghdz .
59003018	Artarowtʾean btowghĕ khaghaghowtʾeamp gĕ sermanowi anontsʾ michotsʾov , or khaghaghowtʾiwn g!ĕnen .
59004001	Owrgē gĕ dzakin baterazmnern ow gṛiwnerĕ tser mēch . Mitʾē chʾen dzakir tser girkʾerēn , oronkʾ gĕ martnchʾin tser antamnerown mēch .
59004002	Gĕ tsʾangakʾ , paytsʾ chʾownikʾ : gĕ sbannēkʾ ow gĕ nakhantsikʾ , sagayn chʾēkʾ grnar hasnil tser owzadzin . Gĕ gṛowikʾ ew gĕ baterazmikʾ , paytsʾ chʾownikʾ , orovhetew chʾēkʾ khntrer .
59004003	Gĕ khntrēkʾ , sagayn chʾēkʾ stanar , orovhetew gĕ khntrēkʾ chʾaramtōrēn , orbēszi vatnēkʾ tser girkʾerown hamar .
59004004	SHnatsʾoghner , chʾēkʾ kiter tʾē ays ashkharhi paregamowtʾiwnĕ , Astowdzoy tēm tʾshnamowtʾiwn ē : owremn ov or gĕ pʾapʾakʾi paregam ĕllal ashkharhi , inkʾzinkʾ tʾshnami g!ĕnē Astowdzoy .
59004005	Gam gĕ gardzēkʾ tʾē Kirkʾĕ ĕntownayn g!ĕsē : « Nakhantsi gĕ tenchʾay mer mēch pnagogh hokin » , , .
59004006	Sagayn aweli medz shnorhkʾ mĕ gow tay , owsti g!ĕsē : « Astowadz g!ĕnttimanay ampartawannerown , paytsʾ shnorhkʾ gow tay khonarhnerown » .
59004007	Owremn hbatagetsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy . Timatretsʾēkʾ CHʾarakhōsin , ew an biti pʾakhchʾi tsezmē .
59004008	Mōtetsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy , ew an biti mōtenay tsezi . Makʾretsʾēkʾ tser tseṛkʾerĕ , meghaworner , ow srpatsʾowtsʾēkʾ tser sirterĕ , ergmitner .
59004009	Zkatsʾēkʾ tser tʾshowaṛowtʾiwnĕ , skatsʾēkʾ ew latsʾēkʾ : tser khntowkʾĕ tʾogh pʾokhowi sowki , ow tser owrakhowtʾiwnĕ , trtmowtʾean .
59004010	KHonarhetsʾēkʾ Tēroch aṛchew , ew an biti partsratsʾnē tsez .
59004011	Mi pampasēkʾ zirar , eghpayrner . An or gĕ pampasē ir eghpayrĕ gam gĕ tatē ir eghpayrĕ , gĕ pampasē ōrēnkʾĕ ew gĕ tatē ōrēnkʾĕ . Isg etʾē tates ōrēnkʾĕ , al ōrēnkʾĕ kordzatrogh chʾes , haba , tatawor .
59004012	Miayn mēg ōrēnstir ( ow Tatawor ) gay , or garogh ē pʾrgel ew gorsntsʾnel . Town ov es , or gĕ tates owrishĕ .
59004013	Hima kankʾ tsezi , or g!ĕsēkʾ : « Aysōr gam vaghĕ biti ertʾankʾ aysinchʾ kʾaghakʾĕ , hon tari mĕ biti genankʾ , aṛewtowr biti ĕnenkʾ ow biti shahinkʾ » .
59004014	( Towkʾ , or chʾēkʾ kiter tʾē inchʾ biti ĕllay vaghĕ .
59004015	Kʾani or inchʾ ē tser geankʾĕ : artarew shoki mĕn ē , or kʾichʾ mĕ aten g!erewnay , yetoy g!anerewowtʾanay . ) Pʾokharēnĕ ĕselow ēikʾ : « Etʾē Tērĕ gamenay , biti abrinkʾ ew biti ĕnenkʾ ays gam ayn panĕ » .
59004016	Paytsʾ hima gĕ bardzenakʾ tser boṛotakhōsowtʾeamp : aytbisi amēn bardzankʾ chʾar ē .
59004017	Owremn ov or kitē parin ĕnel , paytsʾ chʾ!ĕner , atiga meghkʾ ē iren hamar .
59005001	Hima kankʾ tsezi , harowstner : latsʾēkʾ ew vayetsʾēkʾ ayn tʾshowaṛowtʾiwnnerown hamar , or biti batahin tsezi , , .
59005002	TSer harstowtʾiwnĕ pʾtadz ē , ow tser hantertsnerĕ tsʾetsʾi ger eghadz en .
59005003	TSer osgin ew ardzatʾĕ zhankotadz en : anontsʾ zhankĕ vgay biti ĕllay tsezi tēm ow gragi bēs biti owtē tser marminĕ . Kants tizetsʾikʾ verchin ōrerown hamar :
59005004	sagayn aha tser arterĕ kʾaghogh kordzawornerown vartskʾĕ , ormē zrgetsʾikʾ zanonkʾ , g!aghaghagē , ew hntsowornerown ganchʾĕ hasaw zōrkʾerow Tēroch aganchnerown .
59005005	Heshtankʾov ow tsʾopʾowtʾeamp abretsʾakʾ ergri vray , geragretsʾikʾ tser sirterĕ , orbēs tʾē mortʾowelow ōrowan hamar .
59005006	Tatabartetsʾikʾ , sbannetsʾikʾ artarĕ , or chʾēr ĕnttimanar tsezi .
59005007	Owremn hamperatar eghēkʾ , eghpayrner , minchʾew Tēroch kalowstĕ . Aha mshagĕ gĕ sbasē ergri batowagan btowghin , hamperatar ĕllalov anor hamar , minchʾew or stanay aṛachin antsrewn ow verchin antsrewĕ .
59005008	Towkʾ al hamperatar eghēkʾ ew amratsʾowtsʾēkʾ tser sirterĕ , orovhetew Tēroch kalowstĕ gĕ mōtenay .
59005009	Mi haṛachʾēkʾ irarow tēm , eghpayrner , orbēszi chʾtatabartowikʾ . Aha Tataworĕ gaynadz ē tran aṛchew .
59005010	Eghpayrners , chʾarchʾarankʾnerow ew hamperatarowtʾean hamar ōrinag aṛēkʾ markarēnerēn , oronkʾ khōsetsʾan Tēroch anownov .
59005011	Aha eraneli gĕ gochʾenkʾ togatsʾoghnerĕ . Towkʾ lsetsʾikʾ Yopi hamperowtʾean masin , ew tesakʾ Tēroch anor shnorhadz vakhjanĕ , orovhetew Tērĕ pazmakowtʾ ē , ew arkahatogh .
59005012	Paytsʾ amēn panē aṛach , eghpayrners , ertowm mi ĕnēkʾ , ochʾ erginkʾi vray , ochʾ ergri vray : ochʾ al owrish orewē ertowm . Haba tser « ayo » n , ayo ĕllay , ow « ochʾ » ĕ , ochʾ , orbēszi chʾiynakʾ tatabartowtʾean tag .
59005013	TSezmē mēgĕ gĕ chʾarchʾarowi : tʾogh aghōtʾē . Mēgĕ okeworowadz ē : tʾogh saghmos erkē .
59005014	TSezmē mēgĕ hiwant ē : tʾogh ganchʾē egeghetsʾiin erētsʾnerĕ , ew anonkʾ tʾogh aghōtʾen ir vray , iwghov ōdzelov zinkʾ Tēroch anownov .
59005015	Hawatkʾov eghadz aghōtʾkʾĕ biti pʾrgē hiwantĕ , ew Tērĕ otkʾi biti hanē zayn : ow etʾē meghkʾ al kordzadz ē , biti nerowi anor .
59005016	KHostovanetsʾēkʾ irarow tser yantsʾankʾnerĕ , ew aghōtʾetsʾēkʾ irarow hamar , orbēszi p zhshgowikʾ . Artarin nerkordzogh aghersankʾĕ shat aztetsʾig ē .
59005017	Eghia girkʾerow entʾagay mart mĕn ēr , mezi nman . An aghōtʾetsʾ or antsrew chʾteghay , ow ergri vray antsrew chʾteghatsʾ erekʾ tari ew vetsʾ amis .
59005018	Aba tartseal aghōtʾetsʾ , ow erginkʾ antsrew towaw ew ergir dzaghgetsʾowtsʾ ir btowghĕ .
59005019	Eghpayrner , etʾē tsezmē oewē mēgĕ molori jshmartowtʾenēn , ow mēgĕ veratartsnē zayn ,
59005020	tʾogh kitnay tʾē an , or gĕ veratartsnē meghaworĕ ir molorowtʾean jampayēn , gĕ pʾrgē ants mĕ mahēn , ow gĕ dzadzgē meghkʾerow pazmowtʾiwn mĕ .
60001001	Betros , Yisows Kʾristosi aṛakʾeal , Bontosi , Kaghatiayi , Gabatovgiayi , Asiayi ow Piwtʾaniayi mēch tsʾrowadz kaghtʾagannerown ,
60001002	oronkʾ ĕntrowadz en Hayr Astowdzoy gankhakitowtʾean hamatsayn , Hokiin srpatsʾowmov , Yisows Kʾristosi hnazantowtʾean ew ariwnin srsgowmin hamar : shnorhkʾ ow khaghaghowtʾiwn tʾogh shatnan tser vray .
60001003	ōrhneal ĕllay Astowadz , mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi Hayrĕ , or ir aṛat oghormowtʾean hamatsayn verstin dznaw mez genarar yoysi mĕ hamar , Yisows Kʾristosi meṛelnerēn yarowtʾeamp ,
60001004	ew aneghdzaneli , anarat ow antʾaṛam zhaṛankowtʾean mĕ hamar , or erginkʾĕ verabahowadz ē tsezi .
60001005	Towkʾ Astowdzoy zōrowtʾeamp ow hawatkʾov bahbanowadz ēkʾ pʾrgowtʾean hamar , or batrast ē yaytnowelow verchin atenĕ :
60001006	owsti tsʾndzatsʾēkʾ anov , tʾēbēt hima , kʾichʾ mĕ aten , etʾē bētkʾ ĕllay , gĕ trtmikʾ pazmazan pʾortsowtʾiwnnerov ,
60001007	orbēszi tser hawatkʾin pʾortsĕ ( or gorstagan osgiēn shat aweli batowagan ē , tʾēbēt an gĕ pʾortsargowi gragov , ) ktnowi kovestov , batiwov ew pʾaṛkʾov , Yisows Kʾristosi yaytnowtʾean atenĕ .
60001008	Towkʾ gĕ sirēkʾ zayn , chʾtesadz : gĕ hawatakʾ anor , tʾēbēt hima chʾēkʾ tesner zayn , ew gĕ tsʾndzakʾ anbatmeli ow pʾaṛawor owrakhowtʾeamp ,
60001009	stanalov tser antserown pʾrgowtʾiwnĕ , orbēs vakhjanĕ tser hawatkʾin .
60001010	Ayt pʾrgowtʾiwnĕ pʾntṛetsʾin ew znnetsʾin markarēnerĕ , oronkʾ markarēatsʾan tsezi sahmanowadz shnorhkʾin masin .
60001011	Gĕ znnēin tʾē inchʾ gam inchʾbisi aten gĕ patsʾayaytēr irentsʾ mēch eghadz Kʾristosi Hokin , erp gankhaw gĕ vgayēr Kʾristosi chʾarchʾarankʾnerown ew anontsʾ hetewogh pʾaṛkʾin masin .
60001012	Anontsʾ yaytnowetsʾaw tʾē ochʾ tʾē irentsʾ , haba mezi gĕ sbasargēin ayn panerĕ , oronkʾ hima haghortowetsʾan tsezi anontsʾ michotsʾov , or awetaranetsʾin tsezi erginkʾēn ghrgowadz Sowrp Hokiov . Ayt panerown ē or hreshtagnerĕ gĕ tsʾangan agngaṛoytsʾ nayil .
60001013	Owsti kōtebntetsʾēkʾ tser mitkʾin mēchkʾĕ , zkast eghēkʾ , ow gatarelabēs yowsatsʾēkʾ ayn shnorhkʾin , or biti trowi tsezi Yisows Kʾristosi yaytnowtʾean atenĕ .
60001014	Hnazant zawagnerow bēs , mi hamagerbikʾ tser ankitowtʾean atenowan nakhgin tsʾangowtʾiwnnerown .
60001015	Haba , inchʾbēs tsez ganchʾoghĕ sowrp ē , towkʾ al sowrp eghēkʾ tser ampoghch varkʾin mēch .
60001016	Orovhetew krowadz ē : « Sowrp eghēkʾ , kʾani or es sowrp em » .
60001017	Etʾē Hayr gĕ gochʾēkʾ an , or aṛantsʾ achʾaṛowtʾean gĕ tatē iwrakʾanchʾiwrin ararkʾin hamemat , ergiwghadzowtʾeamp ĕntʾatsʾēkʾ hos , tser bantkhtowtʾean zhamanag .
60001018	Orovhetew towkʾ kitēkʾ tʾē ochʾ tʾē abaganatsʾow ardzatʾov gam osgiov azatakrowetsʾakʾ tser hayrerēn awantowadz pʾowj varkʾēn ,
60001019	haba Kʾristosi batowagan ariwnov , orbēs anarat ew anpidz kaṛi mĕ ariwnĕ .
60001020	Artarew an nakhabēs janchʾtsʾowadz ēr , ashkharhi himnatrowtʾenēn aṛach , paytsʾ ays verchin zhamanagnerĕ erewtsʾaw tsezi hamar .
60001021	Anor michotsʾov hawatatsʾikʾ Astowdzoy , or meṛelnerēn yarowtsʾanetsʾ zayn ew pʾaṛaworetsʾ zayn , orbēszi tser hawatkʾn ow yoysĕ ĕllan Astowdzoy vray .
60001022	Makʾowr sirtov , chermeṛantowtʾeamp siretsʾēkʾ zirar , kʾani or makʾrakordzetsʾikʾ tser antserĕ angeghdz eghpayrsirowtʾean hamar , jshmartowtʾean hnazantelov Hokiin michotsʾov ,
60001023	ow verstin dznadz ĕllalov , ochʾ tʾē abaganatsʾow howntēn , haba , anabaganēn - Astowdzoy khōskʾov , or g!abri ow gĕ mnay yawitean .
60001024	Artarew « amēn marmin khoti bēs ē , ow martown ampoghch pʾaṛkʾĕ , khoti dzaghigi bēs : khotĕ gĕ chʾornay ew anor dzaghigĕ gĕ tʾapʾi ,
60001025	paytsʾ Tēroch khōskʾĕ gĕ mnay yawitean » . Ew ays khōskʾn ē , or awetaranowetsʾaw tsezi .
60002001	Owremn , tʾōtʾapʾelov amēn chʾaramtowtʾiwn ew amēn nenkowtʾiwn , geghdzaworowtʾiwnnerĕ , nakhantsnern ow polor pampasankʾnerĕ ,
60002002	noradzin erakhanerow bēs tenchʾatsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy khōskʾin ankhartakh gatʾin , orbēszi ajikʾ anov ( minchʾew pʾrgowtʾiwnĕ ) ,
60002003	etʾē hamtesadz ēkʾ Tēroch kʾaghtsʾr ĕllalĕ .
60002004	Mōtetsʾēkʾ anor , abrogh kʾarin , or artarew martotsʾmē mer zhowadz ē , paytsʾ Astowdzmē ĕntrowadz ow batowagan ē .
60002005	Towkʾ al , abrogh kʾarerow bēs , gĕ shinowikʾ ipr hokewor tajar mĕ , sowrp kʾahanayowtʾiwn mĕ , orbēszi matowtsʾanēkʾ hokewor zoher , Astowdzoy ĕntowneli , Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov .
60002006	Orovhetew Kirkʾin mēch al gay : « Aha Sioni mēch gĕ tnem dzayrakoyn angiwnakʾar mĕ , ĕntir ow batowagan , ew ov or hawatay anor , pnaw amōtʾahar biti chʾĕllay » .
60002007	Owremn tsezi , or gĕ hawatakʾ , batowagan ē an , isg anhnazantnerown hamar , « ayn kʾarĕ , or gaṛowtsʾanoghnerĕ mer zhetsʾin , aniga eghaw angiwnakʾarĕ ,
60002008	ow saytʾakʾowmi kʾar ew kaytʾagghowtʾean zhayṛ » anontsʾ , or khōskʾin anhnazant ĕllalov gĕ kaytʾin , orown hamar al oroshowadz ēin .
60002009	Paytsʾ towkʾ ĕntrowadz tsʾegh mĕn ēkʾ , tʾakaworagan kʾahanayowtʾiwn mĕ , sowrp azk mĕ , sepʾagan zhoghovowrt mĕ , orbēszi hṛchʾagēkʾ aṛakʾinowtʾiwnnerĕ anor , or ganchʾetsʾ tsez khawarēn ir skʾanchʾeli loysin .
60002010	ZHamanagin zhoghovowrt chʾēikʾ , paytsʾ hima Astowdzoy zhoghovowrtn ēkʾ : aṛantsʾ oghormowtʾean ēikʾ , paytsʾ hima oghormowtʾiwn ktakʾ .
60002011	Sireliner , g!aghachʾem tsezi , bantowkhtnerow ew kaghtʾagannerow bēs , et getsʾēkʾ marmnawor tsʾangowtʾiwnnerēn , oronkʾ gĕ martnchʾin antsin tēm .
60002012	Bargesht varkʾ ownetsʾēkʾ hetʾanosnerown mēch , orbēszi , ayn panin hamar or gĕ pampasen tsez ipr chʾarakordzner , aytsʾelowtʾean ōrĕ pʾaṛaworen Astowadz , tesnelov tser pari kordzerĕ .
60002013	Owsti hbatagetsʾēkʾ amēn martgayin hastatowtʾean , Tēroch hamar : ĕllay tʾakaworin , orbēs partsrakoynin ,
60002014	ĕllay gaṛavarichʾnerown , orbēs anor goghmēn ghrgowadznerow , vrē zh aṛnelow chʾarakordznerēn ew kovelow parekordznerĕ .
60002015	Orovhetew Astowdzoy gamkʾn ē or babantsetsʾnēkʾ anmit martotsʾ ankitowtʾiwnĕ , parikʾ kordzelov ,
60002016	ĕllalov azat paytsʾ kordzadzelov tser azatowtʾiwnĕ ochʾ tʾē orbēs chʾaramtowtʾean dzadzgotsʾ , haba , ipr Astowdzoy dzaṛaner .
60002017	Batowetsʾēkʾ polorĕ : siretsʾēkʾ eghpayrnerĕ : vakhtsʾēkʾ Astowdzmē : batowetsʾēkʾ tʾakaworĕ .
60002018	DZaṛaner , hbatagetsʾēkʾ tser tērerown ampoghch ergiwghadzowtʾeamp : ochʾ miayn parinerown ew azniwnerown , ayl naew gamagornerown .
60002019	Kʾani or etʾē mēgĕ , Astowdzoy hantēb pari khghjmtankʾov , togay anirawōrēn chʾarchʾarowelow trtmowtʾean , asiga shnorhkʾ mĕn ē .
60002020	Artarew kovesti ar zhani inchʾ gay , etʾē togakʾ , minchʾ gĕ gṛpʾaharowikʾ meghanchʾadz ĕllalov . Paytsʾ etʾē togakʾ , minchʾ gĕ chʾarchʾarowikʾ parikʾ kordzadz ĕllalov , asiga shnorhkʾ mĕn ē Astowdzoy kʾov .
60002021	Kʾani or towkʾ ganchʾowetsʾakʾ ays panin hamar , orovhetew Kʾristos al chʾarchʾarowetsʾaw tsezi hamar ew ōrinag tʾoghowtsʾ tsezi , orbēszi hetewikʾ ir hetkʾerown .
60002022	An meghkʾ chʾkordzetsʾ , ochʾ al nenkowtʾiwn ktnowetsʾaw anor peranin mēch .
60002023	Erp gĕ heknowēr , pʾokharēnĕ chʾēr hekner : gĕ chʾarchʾarowēr , paytsʾ chʾēr sbaṛnar , haba gĕ yantsnēr inkʾzinkʾ artarowtʾeamp tatoghin .
60002024	Inkʾ kʾawetsʾ mer meghkʾerĕ khachʾapʾaytin vray , ir marminov , orbēszi , zerdz ĕllalov meghkʾēn , abrinkʾ artarowtʾean hamar . Towkʾ anor vērkʾerov p zhshgowetsʾakʾ :
60002025	orovhetew moloreal ochʾkharnerow bēs ēikʾ , paytsʾ hima veratartsakʾ tser antserown Hoviwin ew Tesowchʾin .
60003001	Nmanabēs towkʾ , giner , hbatagetsʾēkʾ tser amowsinnerown , orbēszi etʾē noynisg omankʾ chʾansan khōskʾin , shahowin aṛantsʾ khōskʾi , ginerown varkʾov ,
60003002	minchʾ gĕ tesnen tser makʾragentsʾagh ow ergiwghadz varkʾĕ .
60003003	TSer zartarankʾĕ tʾogh chʾĕllay towrsēn , mazerow hiwskʾerov , osginerow sharkʾerov gam shkʾegh hantertsner haknelov ,
60003004	haba tser zartĕ tʾogh ĕllay sirtin dzadzowg martĕ , hez ew hantart hokii mĕ anabaganowtʾeamp , inchʾ or tʾangakin ē Astowdzoy aṛchew .
60003005	Orovhetew zhamanagin sowrp ginern al , oronkʾ gĕ yowsayin Astowdzoy , aysbēs gĕ zartarēin irenkʾ zirenkʾ , hbatagelov irentsʾ amowsinnerown ,
60003006	inchʾbēs Saṛa gĕ hnazantēr Aprahami , tēr gochʾelov zayn . Towkʾ anor zawagnern ēkʾ , kʾani parikʾ gĕ kordzēkʾ ow chʾēkʾ vakhnar orewē sarsapʾē .
60003007	Nmanabēs towkʾ , amowsinner , kitagtsʾelov pnagetsʾēkʾ anontsʾ het , batowelov ginerĕ ipr aweli tgar anōtʾner ew geankʾi shnorhkʾin zhaṛankagitsʾner , orbēszi tser aghōtʾkʾnerĕ chʾĕnthatowin .
60003008	Verchabēs , polort eghēkʾ hamakhoh , garegitsʾ , eghpayrasēr , ktʾadz ow paresirt .
60003009	CHʾarikʾi pʾokharēn chʾarikʾ mi hatowtsʾanēkʾ , gam heknankʾi pʾokharēn , heknankʾ : ayl ĕnthagaṛagĕ , ōrhnetsʾēkʾ , kitnalov tʾē ator hamar ganchʾowetsʾakʾ , orbēszi ōrhnowtʾiwn zhaṛankēkʾ .
60003010	Orovhetew « an or g!owzē geankʾĕ sirel ow pari ōrer tesnel , tʾogh tatretsʾnē ir lezowin chʾarakhōsowtʾiwnĕ , ew ir shrtʾownkʾĕ khapēowtʾiwn tʾogh chʾkhōsi .
60003011	CHʾarowtʾenē tʾogh heṛanay ow parikʾ kordzē : khaghaghowtʾiwn tʾogh pʾntṛē ew anor hetamowt ĕllay .
60003012	Orovhetew Tēroch achʾkʾerĕ artarnerown vray en , ow ir aganchnerĕ patsʾ en anontsʾ aghersankʾin : paytsʾ Tēroch eresĕ chʾarakordznerown tēm ē » .
60003013	Ew ov biti chʾarchʾarē tsez , etʾē towkʾ nmanikʾ pariin .
60003014	Paytsʾ noynisg etʾē chʾarchʾarowikʾ artarowtʾean hamar , eraneli ēkʾ , ew mi vakhnakʾ anontsʾ ahēn , ow mi vrtovikʾ .
60003015	Haba srpatsʾowtsʾēkʾ Tēr Astowadzĕ tser sirterown mēch , ew misht batrast eghēkʾ hezowtʾeamp ow ergiwghadzowtʾeamp chatakovagan nergayatsʾnelow amēn mēgown , or gĕ khntrē tsezmē tser mēch eghadz yoysin batjaṛĕ :
60003016	pari khghjmtankʾ ownetsʾēkʾ , orbēszi , ayn panin hamar or gĕ pampasen tsez ipr chʾarakordzner , amōtʾahar ĕllan anonkʾ , or gĕ bakharagen Kʾristosov eghadz tser pari varkʾĕ .
60003017	Orovhetew aweli law ē chʾarchʾarowil - etʾē ayt ē Astowdzoy gamkʾĕ - parikʾ ĕnelov , kʾan tʾē chʾarikʾ ĕnelov .
60003018	Artarew Kʾristos al mēg ankam chʾarchʾarowetsʾaw , meghkʾerow hamar , Artarĕ , anartarnerown hamar , orbēszi mōtetsʾnē mez Astowdzoy . An marminov meṛtsʾowetsʾaw , paytsʾ Hokiov geankʾ statsʾaw ,
60003019	ew anov al knatsʾ ow kʾarozetsʾ panti mēch eghadz hokinerown .
60003020	Anonkʾ zhamanagin anhnazant eghan , erp Astowdzoy hamperatarowtʾiwnĕ gĕ sbasēr anontsʾ , Noyi ōrerĕ , minchʾ tabanĕ gĕ gertowēr . Anor mēch kʾichʾer , aysinkʾn owtʾ ants , pʾrgowetsʾan chowrēn .
60003021	Anor grgnatibĕ eghogh mgrtowtʾiwnn al hima gĕ pʾrgē mez , ( ochʾ tʾē marminin aghtĕ lkʾelĕ , haba Astowdzoy hantēb pari khghjmtankʾi mĕ yantsnaṛowtʾiwnĕ , ) Yisows Kʾristosi yarowtʾeamp .
60003022	An erginkʾ katsʾadz , Astowdzoy ach goghmn ē , ew hreshtagnerĕ , ishkhanowtʾiwnnern ow zōrowtʾiwnnerĕ hbatagadz en iren .
60004001	Owremn , kʾani or Kʾristos chʾarchʾarowetsʾaw mezi hamar , marminov , towkʾ al zinowetsʾēkʾ noyn mtatrowtʾeamp . Orovhetew an or chʾarchʾarowadz ē marminov , tatradz ē meghanchʾelē ,
60004002	orbēszi , ir marminin mēch mnatsʾadz zhamanagĕ , aylews abri ochʾ tʾē martotsʾ tsʾangowtʾiwnnerown hamatsayn , haba , Astowdzoy gamkʾin hamatsayn .
60004003	Orovhetew gĕ pawē mezi kordzatradz ĕllal hetʾanosnerown gamkʾĕ , mer geankʾin antsʾadz zhamanagĕ , erp g!ĕntʾanayinkʾ tsʾopʾowtʾiwnnerow , tsʾangowtʾiwnnerow , kinemolowtʾiwnnerow , zekhowtʾiwnnerow , arpetsʾowtʾiwnnerow ew anōrēn gṛabashtowtʾiwnnerow mēch .
60004004	Anonkʾ tarōrinag gĕ seben , or towkʾ chʾēkʾ sowrar irentsʾ het tēbi noyn anaṛagowtʾean dzayrayeghowtʾiwnĕ , ow gĕ hayhoyen tsezi .
60004005	Anonkʾ hashiw biti tan anor , or batrast ē tatel oghchern ow meṛelnerĕ :
60004006	kʾani or sa nbatagov meṛelnerown al awetaranowetsʾaw , orbēszi tatowin marminov , martotsʾ hamemat , isg abrin hokiov , Astowdzoy hamatsayn .
60004007	Sagayn amēn pani vakhjanĕ mōtetsʾadz ē : owremn khohem eghēkʾ , ew artʾown getsʾēkʾ , aghōtʾelow hamar .
60004008	Amēn panē aṛach , chermeṛant sēr ownetsʾēkʾ irarow hantēb : orovhetew sērĕ gĕ dzadzgē meghkʾerow pazmowtʾiwnĕ .
60004009	Hiwrasēr eghēkʾ irarow hantēb , aṛantsʾ trtnchelow .
60004010	Kʾani tsezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ statsʾadz ē shnorh mĕ , sbasargetsʾēkʾ zayn irarow , Astowdzoy pazmazan shnorhkʾin pari tntesnerown bēs .
60004011	Etʾē mēgĕ khōsi , tʾogh khōsi Astowdzoy batkamnerown bēs : etʾē mēgĕ sbasargē , tʾogh sbasargē Astowdzoy haytʾaytʾadz oy zhin hamemat : orbēszi amēn pani mēch Astowadz pʾaṛaworowi Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov , orown gĕ batganin pʾaṛkʾn ow zōrowtʾiwnĕ tarē tar , , . Amēn .
60004012	Sireliner , tarōrinag mi sebēkʾ ayn pʾortsowtʾean hrtehĕ , or g!ĕllay tsez pʾortselow hamar , orbēs tʾē ōtar pan mĕ gĕ batahi tsezi .
60004013	Haba owrakhatsʾēkʾ , kʾani or gĕ haghortagtsʾikʾ Kʾristosi chʾarchʾarankʾnerown , orbēszi anor pʾaṛkʾi yaytnowtʾean atenn al owrakhanakʾ tsʾndzowtʾeamp .
60004014	Etʾē nakhatowikʾ Kʾristosi anownin hamar , eraneli ēkʾ , orovhetew pʾaṛkʾi ( ow zōrowtʾean ) ew Astowdzoy Hokin hankchʾadz ē tser vray : artarew an gĕ hayhoyowi anontsʾmē , paytsʾ gĕ pʾaṛaworowi tsezmē , , .
60004015	TSezmē ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh chʾarchʾarowi ipr martasban , gam kogh , gam chʾarakordz , gam ipr owrishin michamowkh .
60004016	Sagayn etʾē chʾarchʾarowi ipr kʾristoneay , tʾogh chʾamchʾnay , haba tʾogh pʾaṛaworē Astowadz ays masin .
60004017	Orovhetew atenĕ egadz ē , or tatastanĕ sgsi Astowdzoy townēn . Ow etʾē nakh sgsi mezmē , haba inchʾ biti ĕllay vakhjanĕ anontsʾ , or chʾen ansar Astowdzoy awetaranin .
60004018	Etʾē artarĕ haziw gĕ pʾrgowi , inchʾ biti ĕllan , , amparishtn ow meghaworĕ .
60004019	Hetewapar , anonkʾ or gĕ chʾarchʾarowin Astowdzoy gamkʾin hamatsayn , parikʾ kordzelov tʾogh awanten irentsʾ antserĕ anor , ipr hawatarim Ararichʾin .
60005001	Gĕ yortorem tser mēch eghogh erētsʾnerĕ , es al ĕllalov erētsʾ irentsʾ bēs , Kʾristosi chʾarchʾarankʾnerown vgay , naew haghortagitsʾ ayn pʾaṛkʾin , or biti yaytnowi : -
60005002	hovowetsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy hōtĕ , or tser mēch ē , tesowchʾ ĕllalov , ochʾ tʾē hargatrapar , haba , gamovin : ochʾ tʾē amōtʾali shahakhntrowtʾeamp , haba , yō zharowtʾeamp :
60005003	ochʾ al tirabetelov tʾemin vray , haba , tibar ĕllalov hōtin :
60005004	ow erp Hovowabetĕ erewnay , biti stanakʾ pʾaṛkʾi antʾaṛam bsagĕ .
60005005	Nmanabēs towkʾ , teṛatiner , hbatagetsʾēkʾ taretsʾnerown . Polort irarow hbatagelov , khonarhowtʾiwn hakēkʾ : orovhetew « Astowadz g!ĕnttimanay ampartawannerown , paytsʾ shnorhkʾ gow tay khonarhnerown » .
60005006	Owremn khonarhetsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy hzōr tseṛkʾin tag , orbēszi zhamanagin partsratsʾnē tsez .
60005007	TSer amēn hokĕ tsketsʾēkʾ anor vray , orovhetew an gĕ hokay tsez .
60005008	Zkast eghēkʾ , artʾown getsʾēkʾ : orovhetew tser osokhĕ , CHʾarakhōsĕ , gĕ shrchi mṛnchʾogh aṛiwdzi bēs , pʾntṛelov tʾē ov gllē .
60005009	Timatretsʾēkʾ anor , amowr hawatkʾov , kitnalov tʾē tser eghpayrnern al ashkharhi mēch gĕ gren noyn chʾarchʾarankʾnerĕ .
60005010	Ew amēn shnorhkʾi Astowadzĕ , or ir yawitenagan pʾaṛkʾin ganchʾetsʾ mez Kʾristos Yisowsi michotsʾov , tsez gatareal biti ĕnē , amratsʾnē , ow zhovtsʾnē ew ansasan himerow vray tnē , erp chʾarchʾarowikʾ kʾichʾ mĕ aten .
60005011	Iren en pʾaṛkʾĕ ew zōrowtʾiwnĕ tarē tar , , . Amēn .
60005012	Sighowanosi michotsʾov , or , inchʾbēs gĕ sebem , hawatarim eghpayr mĕn ē , kretsʾi tsezi hamaṛōtapar , yortorelov ow vgayelov tʾē ays ē Astowdzoy jshmarit shnorhkʾĕ , orown mēch hastat getsʾadz ēkʾ .
60005013	Gĕ parewē tsez Papeloni mēch eghadz egeghetsʾin , or ĕntrowadz ē tsezi het , naew Margos , im ortis .
60005014	Parewetsʾēkʾ zirar siroy hampoyrov . KHaghaghowtʾiwn tser polorin , or Kʾristos Yisowsi mēch ēkʾ . Amēn .
61001001	Simon Betros , dzaṛay ew aṛakʾeal Yisows Kʾristosi , anontsʾ , orontsʾ vijagowadz ē noyn batowagan hawatkʾĕ mezi het , Astowdzoy ow mer Pʾrgichʾ Yisows Kʾristosi artarowtʾeamp :
61001002	shnorhkʾ ew khaghaghowtʾiwn tʾogh shatnan tser vray Astowdzoy ew mer Tēroch , Yisowsi janachʾowmov .
61001003	Artarew ir astowadzayin zōrowtʾiwnĕ barkewetsʾ mezi amēn inchʾ , or gĕ veraperi geankʾi ow parebashtowtʾean , janchʾtsʾnelov an , or ganchʾetsʾ mez pʾaṛkʾi ew aṛakʾinowtʾean .
61001004	Asontsʾmov amenamedz ow batowagan khostowmner barkewowadz en mezi , orbēszi anontsʾmov haghortagtsʾikʾ astowadzayin pnowtʾean , pʾakhchʾelov abaganowtʾenēn , or tsʾangowtʾenēn yaṛachatsʾadz ē ashkharhi mēch .
61001005	Asor hamar al , ampoghch pʾowtʾachanowtʾeamp aweltsʾowtsʾēkʾ tser hawatkʾin vray aṛakʾinowtʾiwn , aṛakʾinowtʾean vray , kitowtʾiwn ,
61001006	kitowtʾean vray , zhow zhgalowtʾiwn , zhow zhgalowtʾean vray , hamperowtʾiwn , hamperowtʾean vray , parebashtowtʾiwn ,
61001007	parebashtowtʾean vray , eghpayrsirowtʾiwn , ow eghpayrsirowtʾean vray , sēr .
61001008	Orovhetew etʾē ays panerĕ ĕllan tser mēch ew awelnan , ankordz ow anbtowgh chʾen ĕner tsez mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi janachʾowmov .
61001009	Paytsʾ an , orown mēch ays panerĕ chʾgan , goyr ē , garjates , ew moṛtsʾadz ē ir hin meghkʾerēn makʾrowadz ĕllalĕ .
61001010	Owsti , eghpayrner , aṛawelabēs chanatsʾēkʾ , or hastatēkʾ tser gochʾowmn ow ĕntrowtʾiwnĕ , orovhetew asiga ĕnelov , pnaw biti chʾsaytʾakʾikʾ :
61001011	artarew aysbēs ē or jokhowtʾeamp biti haytʾaytʾowi tsezi mer Tēroch ow Pʾrgichʾin , Yisows Kʾristosi yawitenagan tʾakaworowtʾean mowtkʾĕ .
61001012	Owsti erpekʾ anhok biti chʾĕllam misht yishetsʾnelow tsezi ays panerĕ , tʾēbēt kitēkʾ ew amratsʾadz ēkʾ nergay jshmartowtʾean mēch .
61001013	Irawatsʾi gĕ hamarem , aynkʾan aten or ays marminin mēch em , yishetsʾnelov tsez artʾown bahel ,
61001014	kitnalov tʾē showtov biti lkʾem ays marmins , inchʾbēs mer Tērĕ , Yisows Kʾristos patsʾayaytetsʾ indzi .
61001015	Owsti biti chanam or misht yishēkʾ ays panerĕ , ays ashkharhēn megnelēs etkʾn al .
61001016	Artarew menkʾ chʾhetewetsʾankʾ yeriwradzoy aṛasbelnerow , erp kittsʾowtsʾinkʾ tsezi mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi zōrowtʾiwnn ow kalowstĕ , haba aganates eghankʾ anor medzapʾaṛowtʾean .
61001017	Orovhetew inkʾ batiw ew pʾaṛkʾ statsʾaw Hayr Astowdzmē , erp ayn medzavayelowchʾ pʾaṛkʾēn aysbisi tsayn mĕ egaw iren : « Ays ē im sireli Ortis , orown es hajetsʾay » .
61001018	Ow menkʾ lsetsʾinkʾ erginkʾēn egadz ays tsaynĕ , erp anor het ēinkʾ sowrp leran vray .
61001019	Naew owninkʾ markarēagan khōskʾĕ , or aweli hastatown ē , ow nbastawor ē , , owshatir ĕllal anor , orbēs tʾē mowtʾ teghĕ lowsaworogh jraki mĕ , minchʾew or ōrĕ lowsnay ew arowseagĕ dzaki tser sirterown mēch .
61001020	Paytsʾ nakh sa kittsʾēkʾ , tʾē Kirkʾerown ochʾ mēg Markarēowtʾiwnĕ owni ir yatowg megnowtʾiwnĕ :
61001021	orovhetew Markarēowtʾiwnĕ erpekʾ chʾtrowetsʾaw martotsʾ gamkʾin hamatsayn , haba Astowdzoy sowrp martigĕ khōsetsʾan , mghowadz Sowrp Hokiēn .
61002001	Paytsʾ naew sowt markarēner gayin zhoghovowrtin mēch , inchʾbēs tser mēch al biti ĕllan sowt vartabetner , oronkʾ kaghtni biti nermowdzen gorstaper hertsowadzner , ew owranalov zirenkʾ knogh Tērĕ , arakahas gorowst biti peren irentsʾ vray .
61002002	SHater biti hetewin anontsʾ gorstaper jampanerown , , , ew anontsʾ batjaṛov jshmartowtʾean jampan biti hayhoyowi .
61002003	Anonkʾ akahowtʾeamp ow shindzow khōskʾerov biti shahakordzen tsez : sagayn anontsʾ tatastanĕ , vaghowtsʾ batrast ĕllalov , ankordz chʾē , ew anontsʾ gorowstĕ chʾi mrapʾer .
61002004	Artarew Astowadz chʾkhnayetsʾ meghanchʾadz hreshtagnerown , haba netetsʾ tartarosĕ ow matnetsʾ mtʾowtʾean gabankʾnerown , tatastani verabahelow hamar .
61002005	Naew chʾkhnayetsʾ nakhgin ashkharhin : paytsʾ bahetsʾ Noyĕ , owtʾerort antsĕ , artarowtʾean kʾarozichʾĕ , erp chrhegheghĕ peraw amparishtnerow ashkharhin vray .
61002006	Mokhiri veradzelov Sotomi ow Komori kʾaghakʾnerĕ , tatabartetsʾ zanonkʾ gordzanowmov , ew ōrinag tartsowtsʾ yetakay amparishtnerown :
61002007	sagayn azatetsʾ artar GHovtĕ , or ĕngjowadz ēr anōrēnnerown showayt varkʾēn .
61002008	( Orovhetew anontsʾ mēch pnagogh ayt artarĕ , tesnelov ow lselov anontsʾ anōrēn kordzerĕ , ōrē ōr gĕ tanchēr ir artar antsĕ . )
61002009	Tērĕ kitē parebashtnerĕ azatel pʾortsowtʾenē , ew anartarnerĕ verabahel tatastani ōrowan , batowhasi hamar :
61002010	manawant anonkʾ , or g!ĕntʾanan marmini etewēn , bghdzowtʾean tsʾangowtʾeamp , ow g!arhamarhen tērowtʾiwnĕ . Yantowkn ew inkʾnahawan ĕllalov , chʾen toghar pʾaṛawornerown hayhoyelov ,
61002011	minchʾteṛ hreshtagnerĕ , or anontsʾmē aweli medz en oy zhov ow garoghowtʾeamp , Tēroch aṛchew hayhoyalitsʾ tatavjiṛ chʾen artsager , , anontsʾ tēm .
61002012	Isg asonkʾ gĕ hayhoyen irentsʾ chʾkittsʾadz panerĕ : sagayn pnowtʾean anpan gentaninerown bēs , ( oronkʾ eghadz en orsi ew abaganowtʾean hamar , ) biti abaganin irentsʾ abaganowtʾean mēch ,
61002013	stanalov anirawowtʾean vartsatrowtʾiwnĕ . Asonkʾ tsʾeregowan mēch eghadz heshtankʾĕ hajoykʾ gĕ hamaren . Pidz ow arat en , zowarjanalov irentsʾ khapēowtʾiwnnerov , minchʾ khrakhjankʾ g!ĕnen tsezi het .
61002014	SHnowtʾeamp li achʾkʾer ownin , oronkʾ erpekʾ chʾen tatrir meghanchʾelē , khapelov anhastat antserĕ . Akahowtʾean var zhowadz sirt ownin , ew anidzeal zawagner en .
61002015	Owghigh jampan tskelov moloretsʾan , hetewelov Pēovrean Paghaami jampayin , or siretsʾ anirawowtʾean vartskʾĕ :
61002016	paytsʾ gshtampowetsʾaw ir ōrinazantsʾowtʾean hamar , erp mownch ēshĕ , khōselov martgayin tsaynov , arkiletsʾ markarēin anmtowtʾiwnĕ .
61002017	Asonkʾ anchowr aghpiwrner en , ow pʾotʾorigēn kʾshowadz amber , orontsʾ verabahowadz ē khawarin mtʾowtʾiwnĕ yawitean .
61002018	Kʾani or erp gĕ khōsin ownaynowtʾean yokhortapanowtʾiwnner , marmini tsʾangowtʾiwnnerov , tsʾopʾowtʾiwnnerov gĕ khapen anonkʾ , or haziw pʾakher ēin molorowtʾean mēch ĕntʾatsʾoghnerēn .
61002019	Azatowtʾiwn gĕ khostanan anontsʾ , minchʾteṛ irenkʾ strowgner en abaganowtʾean : orovhetew mēgĕ inchʾ panē or bartowi , strowg g!ĕllay anor .
61002020	Artarew etʾē irenkʾ , pʾakhchʾelē etkʾ ashkharhi bghdzowtʾiwnnerēn , Tēr ow Pʾrgichʾ Yisows Kʾristosi janachʾowmov , tartseal gashgantowin ow bartowin anontsʾmē , irentsʾ vakhjanĕ aweli kēsh g!ĕllay aṛachin vijagēn .
61002021	Orovhetew aweli law g!ĕllar irentsʾ , or pnaw chʾkitnayin artarowtʾean jampan , kʾan tʾē , kitnalē etkʾ , heṛanayin irentsʾ awantowadz sowrp batowiranēn .
61002022	Sagayn irentsʾ batahetsʾaw inchʾ or jshmarit aṛagĕ g!ĕsē : « SHownĕ gĕ verataṛnay ir pʾskhadzin , ow lowatsʾowadz khozĕ , tsʾekhin mēch tʾawalelow » .
61003001	Sireliner , ays ergrort namagn ē or gĕ krem tsezi . Ergowkʾin mēch al , yishetsʾnelov artʾown gĕ bahem tser angeghdz mitkʾĕ ,
61003002	orbēszi yishēkʾ sowrp markarēnerown nakhabēs ĕsadz khōskʾerĕ , naew mer , aysinkʾn Tēroch ow Pʾrgichʾin aṛakʾealnerown batowērĕ .
61003003	Nakh sa kittsʾēkʾ , tʾē verchin ōrerĕ biti kan dzaghroghner , oronkʾ biti ĕntʾanan irentsʾ sepʾagan tsʾangowtʾiwnnerown hamatsayn
61003004	ew biti ĕsen : « Owr ē anor kalowstin khostowmĕ , orovhetew hayrerown nnchelēn i ver , amēn pan gĕ mnay aynbēs , inchʾbēs or ēr ararchʾowtʾean sgizpĕ » .
61003005	Kʾani or anonkʾ g!owzen sa tʾakʾown bahel , tʾē erginkʾ vaghowtsʾ gar Astowdzoy khōskʾov , ow ergir miasin gankown ēr , chowrerēn ew chowrerown mēchtegh .
61003006	Anov gorsowetsʾaw ayn atenowan ashkharhĕ , chrhegheghov .
61003007	Isg erginkʾn ow ergirĕ or gan hima , bahesti trowadz en noyn khōskʾov , verabahowadz gragi hamar , minchʾew tatastanin ew amparisht martotsʾ gorowstin ōrĕ .
61003008	Paytsʾ , sireliner , sa mēg panĕ tʾogh tʾakʾown chʾmnay tsezmē , tʾē Tēroch kʾov , mēg ōrĕ hazar tarowan bēs ē , ow hazar tarin , mēg ōrowan bēs .
61003009	Tērĕ chʾi yabaghir ir khostowmĕ kordzatrelow mēch , inchʾbēs omankʾ yabaghadz gĕ hamaren , haba , hamperatar ē mezi hantēb : orovhetew gĕ pʾapʾakʾi or ochʾ mēgĕ gorsowi , haba , polorĕ ĕntownin abashkharowtʾiwnĕ .
61003010	Sagayn Tēroch ōrĕ biti kay koghi bēs . Ayt aten erginkʾĕ biti antsʾni shaṛachʾiwnov , tarrerĕ pṛngelov biti anchatowin , isg ergirĕ ew anor mēch eghogh kordzerĕ biti ayrowin .
61003011	Owremn , kʾani or ays polor panerĕ biti lowdzowin , inchʾbisi martig bētkʾ ē ĕllakʾ , sowrp varkʾov ow parebashtowtʾeamp ,
61003012	sbaselov ew pʾowtʾalov Astowdzoy ōrowan kalowstin , erp hravaṛ erginkʾĕ biti lowdzowi , ow tarrerĕ pṛngelov biti halin .
61003013	Sagayn menkʾ , ir khostowmin hamatsayn , gĕ sbasenkʾ nor erginkʾi mĕ ew nor ergri mĕ , orontsʾ mēch artarowtʾiwnĕ gĕ pnagi .
61003014	Owsti , sireliner , sbaselov asontsʾ , pʾowtʾatsʾēkʾ or an ktnē tsez khaghaghowtʾean mēch , anpidz ew anarat :
61003015	pʾrgowtʾiwn hamaretsʾēkʾ mer Tēroch hamperatarowtʾiwnĕ , inchʾbēs mer sireli eghpayrĕ , Bōghos al kretsʾ tsezi , iren trowadz imastowtʾeamp .
61003016	Polor namagnerown mēch al gĕ khōsi ays panerown masin : anontsʾ mēch gan kʾani mĕ t zhowarimatsʾ khōskʾer , or tkētnern ow anhastatnerĕ gĕ kheghatʾiwren , inchʾbēs miws Kirkʾern al , irentsʾ sepʾagan gorowstin hamar .
61003017	Owremn towkʾ , sireliner , gankhaw kitnalov ays panerĕ , zkowshatsʾēkʾ or chʾiynakʾ tser amrowtʾenēn , tarowadz anōrēnnerown molorowtʾenēn .
61003018	Haba ajetsʾēkʾ shnorhkʾov , ew mer Tēroch ow Pʾrgichʾin , Yisows Kʾristosi kitowtʾeamp . Anor pʾaṛkʾ tʾē hima , tʾē minchʾew yawitenagan ōrĕ . Amēn .
62001001	Geankʾi KHōskʾin masin - or sgizpēn ēr , or menkʾ lsetsʾinkʾ , or mer achʾkʾerov tesankʾ , or titetsʾinkʾ ow mer tseṛkʾerĕ shōshapʾetsʾin :
62001002	( artarew geankʾĕ yaytnowetsʾaw , menkʾ tesankʾ zayn , ew gĕ vgayenkʾ ow gĕ batmenkʾ tsezi ayt yawitenagan geankʾin masin , or Hōrĕ kʾov ēr ew yaytnowetsʾaw mezi : ) -
62001003	inchʾ or tesankʾ ow lsetsʾinkʾ , gĕ batmenkʾ tsezi , orbēszi towkʾ al haghortowtʾiwn ownenakʾ mezi het . Mer haghortowtʾiwnĕ Hōrĕ het ē , ew ir Ortiin , Yisows Kʾristosi het .
62001004	Gĕ krenkʾ tsezi ays panerĕ , orbēszi tser owrakhowtʾiwnĕ lman ĕllay .
62001005	Ew sa ē ayn batkamĕ , or lsetsʾinkʾ irmē ow gĕ haghortenkʾ tsezi , tʾē Astowadz loys ē , ew anor mēch pnaw khawar chʾgay .
62001006	Etʾē ĕsenkʾ : « Menkʾ haghortowtʾiwn owninkʾ anor het » , sagayn khawari mēch ĕntʾanankʾ , gĕ stenkʾ ow chʾenkʾ girarger jshmartowtʾiwnĕ .
