62001007	Isg etʾē loysi mēch ĕntʾanankʾ , inchʾbēs an loysi mēch ē , haghortowtʾiwn g!ownenankʾ irarow het , ew anor Ortiin , Yisows Kʾristosi ariwnĕ gĕ makʾrē mez amēn meghkʾē .
62001008	Etʾē ĕsenkʾ : « Menkʾ meghkʾ mĕ chʾowninkʾ » , gĕ khapenkʾ menkʾ mez , ow jshmartowtʾiwn chʾgay mer mēch .
62001009	Isg etʾē khostovaninkʾ mer meghkʾerĕ , an hawatarim ew artar ē , nerelow mer meghkʾerĕ , ow makʾrelow mez amēn anirawowtʾenē .
62001010	Etʾē ĕsenkʾ : « Menkʾ meghanchʾadz chʾenkʾ » , stakhōs gĕ ngatenkʾ , , zayn , ew anor khōskʾĕ mer mēch chʾē .
62002001	Orteagners , gĕ krem tsezi ays panerĕ , orbēszi chʾmeghanchʾēkʾ : isg etʾē mēgĕ meghanchʾē , Hōrĕ kʾov owninkʾ Parekhōs mĕ , Yisows Kʾristos artarĕ .
62002002	An ē mer meghkʾerown kʾawowtʾiwnĕ : ew ochʾ miayn mer , ayl naew ampoghch ashkharhi meghkʾerown .
62002003	Etʾē bahenkʾ anor batowirannerĕ , asov gĕ kitnankʾ tʾē gĕ janchʾnankʾ zayn .
62002004	Ov or g!ĕsē : « Es gĕ janchʾnam zayn » , paytsʾ chʾi baher anor batowirannerĕ , stakhōs ē , ew ir mēch jshmartowtʾiwn chʾgay .
62002005	Paytsʾ ov or gĕ bahē anor khōskʾĕ , Astowdzoy sērĕ irabēs gatareal ē ir mēch : asov gĕ kitnankʾ tʾē anor mēch enkʾ .
62002006	Ov or g!ĕsē tʾē gĕ pnagi anor mēch , bartawor ē ĕntʾanal aynbēs , inchʾbēs an ĕntʾatsʾaw .
62002007	Eghpayrner , gĕ krem tsezi ochʾ tʾē nor batowiran mĕ , haba hin batowiran mĕ , or sgizpēn ownēikʾ . Hin batowiranĕ ayn khōskʾn ē , or towkʾ sgizpēn lsetsʾikʾ .
62002008	Tartseal , gĕ krem tsezi nor batowiran mĕ , or jshmarit ē anor mēch ew tser mēch : orovhetew khawarĕ g!antsʾni ow jshmarit loysĕ artēn gĕ pʾayli .
62002009	An or g!ĕsē tʾē loysi mēch ē ew g!atē ir eghpayrĕ , tagawin khawari mēch ē .
62002010	An or gĕ sirē ir eghpayrĕ , gĕ pnagi loysi mēch , ow kaytʾagghowtʾiwn chʾgay ir mēch .
62002011	Paytsʾ an or g!atē ir eghpayrĕ , khawari mēch ē , khawari mēch gĕ kʾalē ew chʾi kiter tʾē owr g!ertʾay , orovhetew khawarĕ gowrtsʾowtsʾadz ē ir achʾkʾerĕ .
62002012	Gĕ krem tsezi , orteagner , orovhetew tser meghkʾerĕ nerowadz en tsezi , anor anownin hamar .
62002013	Gĕ krem tsezi , hayrer , orovhetew towkʾ janchʾtsʾakʾ an , or sgizpēn ē . Gĕ krem tsezi , eritasartner , orovhetew towkʾ yaghtʾetsʾikʾ CHʾarin .
62002014	Kretsʾi tsezi , zawagner , orovhetew towkʾ janchʾtsʾakʾ Hayrĕ . Kretsʾi tsezi , hayrer , orovhetew towkʾ janchʾtsʾakʾ an , or sgizpēn ē . Kretsʾi tsezi , eritasartner , orovhetew towkʾ ow zhegh ēkʾ , ew Astowdzoy khōskʾĕ gĕ pnagi tser mēch , ow yaghtʾetsʾikʾ CHʾarin .
62002015	Mi sirēkʾ ashkharhĕ , ochʾ al inchʾ or ashkharhi mēch ē .
62002016	Etʾē mēgĕ gĕ sirē ashkharhĕ , Hōrĕ sērĕ chʾgay ir mēch : orovhetew amēn inchʾ or ashkharhi mēch ē , marmini tsʾangowtʾiwnĕ , achʾkʾerow tsʾangowtʾiwnĕ ew ays geankʾin ampartawanowtʾiwnĕ , Hōrmēn chʾē , haba ays ashkharhēn ē .
62002017	Ashkharhn al g!antsʾni , anor tsʾangowtʾiwnn al : paytsʾ an or gĕ kordzatrē Astowdzoy gamkʾĕ , gĕ mnay yawitean .
62002018	Zawagner , verchin zhamn ē : ew inchʾbēs lsetsʾikʾ tʾē Neṛĕ biti kay , artēn shat neṛer gan : atgē gĕ kitnankʾ tʾē verchin zhamn ē .
62002019	Anonkʾ mer mēchēn elan , paytsʾ mezmē chʾēin : orovhetew etʾē ĕllayin mezmē , gĕ mnayin mezi het . Paytsʾ mezmē elan , orbēszi patsʾayaytowi tʾē anonkʾ polorn al mezmē chʾēin .
62002020	Sagayn towkʾ ōdzowtʾiwn ownikʾ Sowrpēn , ow kitēkʾ amēn pan .
62002021	CHʾkretsʾi tsezi , orbēs tʾē chʾēkʾ kiter jshmartowtʾiwnĕ , haba , orovhetew kitēkʾ zayn , ew kʾani or sowtĕ jshmartowtʾenēn chʾē .
62002022	Ov ē stakhōsĕ , etʾē ochʾ an , or g!owranay tʾē Yisows , Kʾristosn ē : neṛĕ an ē , or g!owranay Hayrn ow Ortin .
62002023	Ov or g!owranay Ortin , aniga Hayrn al chʾowni : ( paytsʾ an or gĕ tawani Ortin , aniga Hayrn al owni . )
62002024	Owremn inchʾ or lsetsʾikʾ sgizpēn , tʾogh pnagi tser mēch : etʾē tser mēch pnagi inchʾ or sgizpēn lsetsʾikʾ , towkʾ al biti pnagikʾ Ortiin mēch ow Hōrĕ mēch .
62002025	Ew sa ē ayn khostowmĕ , or inkʾ towaw tsezi , aysinkʾn , yawitenagan geankʾĕ .
62002026	Kretsʾi tsezi ays panerĕ , tsez moloretsʾnoghnerown hamar .
62002027	Ayn ōdzowtʾiwnĕ or statsʾakʾ irmē , gĕ pnagi tser mēch : owsti bētkʾ chʾgay or mēgĕ sorvetsʾnē tsezi . Isg kʾani or ayt noyn ōdzowtʾiwnĕ gĕ sorvetsʾnē tsezi amēn pan , ow jshmarit ē ew ochʾ tʾē sowt , ir mēch pnagetsʾēkʾ , inchʾbēs an sorvetsʾowtsʾ tsezi .
62002028	Owremn hima , orteagner , pnagetsʾēkʾ ir mēch , orbēszi erp inkʾ erewnay , hamartsagowtʾiwn ownenankʾ , ow chʾamchʾnankʾ irmē ir kalowstin atenĕ .
62002029	Etʾē kitēkʾ tʾē inkʾ artar ē , g!ĕmpṛnēkʾ tʾē ov or artarowtʾiwn gĕ kordzē , irmē dznadz ē .
62003001	Tesēkʾ tʾē Hayrĕ inchʾbisi sēr shnorhetsʾ mezi , orbēszi menkʾ Astowdzoy zawagner gochʾowinkʾ : owsti ashkharhĕ chʾi janchʾnar mez , orovhetew chʾjanchʾtsʾaw zinkʾ .
62003002	Sireliner , hima menkʾ Astowdzoy zawagnern enkʾ , ew tagawin patsʾayayt chʾē tʾē inchʾ biti ĕllankʾ : paytsʾ kitenkʾ tʾē erp inkʾ erewnay , iren bēs biti ĕllankʾ , orovhetew biti tesnenkʾ zinkʾ , inchʾbēs or ē .
62003003	Ov or ays yoysĕ owni anor vray , gĕ makʾrakordzē inkʾzinkʾ , inchʾbēs an makʾowr ē .
62003004	Ov or meghkʾ gĕ kordzē , gĕ kordzē naew anōrēnowtʾiwn , ew pown meghkʾĕ , anōrēnowtʾiwnn ē .
62003005	Ew kitēkʾ tʾē an yaytnowetsʾaw , orbēszi kʾawē mer meghkʾerĕ : paytsʾ anor mēch meghkʾ chʾgay .
62003006	Ov or gĕ pnagi anor mēch , chʾi meghanchʾer : ov or meghanchʾē , tesadz chʾē zayn ow janchʾtsʾadz chʾē zayn .
62003007	Orteagner , ochʾ mēgĕ tʾogh moloretsʾnē tsez : ov or artarowtʾiwn gĕ kordzē , artar ē , inchʾbēs an artar ē .
62003008	Ov or meghkʾ gĕ kordzē , CHʾarakhōsēn ē , orovhetew CHʾarakhōsĕ gĕ meghanchʾē sgizpēn i ver : Astowdzoy Ortin yaytnowetsʾaw , orbēszi kʾantē CHʾarakhōsin kordzerĕ .
62003009	Ov or Astowdzmē dznadz ē , meghkʾ chʾi kordzer , orovhetew anor sermĕ gĕ mnay ir mēch : ow chʾi grnar meghanchʾel , kʾani or Astowdzmē dznadz ē .
62003010	Asov patsʾayayt g!ĕllan Astowdzoy zawagnern ow CHʾarakhōsin zawagnerĕ . Ov or artarowtʾiwn chʾi kordzer , Astowdzmē chʾē , ochʾ al an , or chʾi sirer ir eghpayrĕ .
62003011	Artarew sa ē ayn batkamĕ , or towkʾ lsetsʾikʾ sgizpēn , or sirenkʾ zirar .
62003012	CHʾĕllankʾ Gayēni bēs , or CHʾarēn ēr ow mortʾetsʾ ir eghpayrĕ . Ew inchʾow mortʾetsʾ zayn : kʾani or ir kordzerĕ chʾar ēin , isg ir eghpōr kordzerĕ , artar .
62003013	Mi zarmanakʾ , eghpayrners , etʾē ashkharhĕ atē tsez .
62003014	Menkʾ kitenkʾ tʾē antsʾankʾ mahēn geankʾi , orovhetew gĕ sirenkʾ eghpayrnerĕ : an or chʾi sirer eghpayrĕ , gĕ pnagi mahowan mēch .
62003015	Ov or g!atē ir eghpayrĕ , martasban ē , ew kitēkʾ tʾē ochʾ mēg martasbani mēch gĕ pnagi yawitenagan geankʾĕ .
62003016	Menkʾ kittsʾankʾ Kʾristosi sērĕ , kʾani or an ĕndzayetsʾ ir antsĕ mezi hamar : menkʾ al bartawor enkʾ ĕndzayel mer antsĕ mer eghpayrnerown hamar .
62003017	Paytsʾ etʾē mēgĕ , or owni ays ashkharhi abrowstĕ , tesnelov ir garōteal eghpayrĕ , ir kowtʾĕ kotsʾē angē , inchʾbēs anor mēch Astowdzoy sērĕ pnagadz g!ĕllay .
62003018	Orteagners , sirenkʾ ochʾ tʾē khōskʾov ow lezowov , haba , kordzov ew jshmartowtʾeamp .
62003019	Asov gĕ kitnankʾ tʾē jshmartowtʾenēn enkʾ , ow mer sirterĕ gĕ vstahin anor aṛchew erewnalow :
62003020	orovhetew etʾē mer sirtĕ barsawē mez , Astowadz aweli medz ē kʾan mer sirtĕ ew kitē amēn pan .
62003021	Sireliner , etʾē mer sirtĕ chʾbarsawē mez , ayn aten hamartsagowtʾiwn g!ownenankʾ Astowdzoy aṛchew ,
62003022	ew inchʾ or khntrenkʾ , gĕ stanankʾ angē , orovhetew gĕ bahenkʾ anor batowirannerĕ , ow g!ĕnenkʾ anor aṛchew hajeli eghadz panerĕ .
62003023	Sa ē anor batowiranĕ , or hawatankʾ ir Ortiin , Yisows Kʾristosi anownin , ow sirenkʾ zirar , inchʾbēs batowiretsʾ mezi .
62003024	Ov or gĕ bahē anor batowirannerĕ , gĕ pnagi anor mēch , an al , ir mēch : ew asov kitenkʾ tʾē an gĕ pnagi mer mēch , aysinkʾn ayn Hokiov , or towaw mezi .
62004001	Sireliner , mi hawatakʾ amēn hokii , haba kʾnnetsʾēkʾ hokinerĕ , tʾē arteōkʾ Astowdzmē en : orovhetew shat sowt markarēner erewan eladz en ashkharhi mēch .
62004002	Sabēs gĕ janchʾnakʾ Astowdzoy Hokin : - amēn hoki or gĕ tawani tʾē Yisows Kʾristos marminov egaw , Astowdzmē ē :
62004003	isg amēn hoki or chʾi tawanir tʾē Yisows Kʾristos marminov egaw , Astowdzmē chʾē : ew ays ē Neṛi hokin , orown masin lsetsʾikʾ tʾē biti kay , ow artēn ashkharhi mēch ē .
62004004	Towkʾ Astowdzmē ēkʾ , orteagner , ew yaghtʾetsʾikʾ anontsʾ : orovhetew an or tser mēch ē , aweli medz ē , kʾan an , or ashkharhi mēch ē .
62004005	Anonkʾ ashkharhēn en : owsti gĕ khōsin ashkharhi masin , ew ashkharhĕ mtig g!ĕnē anontsʾ .
62004006	Isg menkʾ Astowdzmē enkʾ : an or gĕ janchʾnay Astowadz , mtig g!ĕnē mezi , an or Astowdzmē chʾē , mtig chʾ!ĕner mezi . Asov gĕ kitnankʾ jshmartowtʾean Hokin ow molorowtʾean hokin .
62004007	Sireliner , sirenkʾ zirar , kʾani or sērĕ Astowdzmē ē . Ov or gĕ sirē , dznadz ē Astowdzmē ow gĕ janchʾnay Astowadz .
62004008	An or chʾi sirer , chʾi janchʾnar Astowadz , orovhetew Astowadz sēr ē .
62004009	Astowdzoy sērĕ sabēs patsʾayaytowetsʾaw mezi hantēb : Astowadz ashkharh ghrgetsʾ ir miadzin Ortin , orbēszi abrinkʾ anor michotsʾov .
62004010	Sērĕ asor mēch ē : ochʾ tʾē menkʾ siretsʾinkʾ Astowadz , haba an siretsʾ mez ew ghrgetsʾ ir Ortin , ipr kʾawowtʾiwn mer meghkʾerown .
62004011	Sireliner , etʾē Astowadz aysbēs siretsʾ mez , menkʾ al bartawor enkʾ sirel zirar .
62004012	Ochʾ mēgĕ erpekʾ tesadz ē Astowadz . Etʾē sirenkʾ zirar , Astowadz gĕ pnagi mer mēch ow anor sērĕ gatareal ē .
62004013	An ir Hokiēn towaw mezi : asov kitenkʾ tʾē menkʾ gĕ pnaginkʾ anor mēch , an al , mer mēch .
62004014	Ow menkʾ tesankʾ ew gĕ vgayenkʾ tʾē Hayrĕ ghrgetsʾ ir Ortin ipr ashkharhi Pʾrgichʾ .
62004015	Ov or gĕ tawani tʾē Yisows Astowdzoy Ortin ē , Astowadz gĕ pnagi anor mēch , an al , Astowdzoy mēch .
62004016	Menkʾ kittsʾankʾ Astowdzoy mezi hantēb ownetsʾadz sērĕ , ow hawatatsʾinkʾ . Astowadz sēr ē : an or gĕ pnagi siroy mēch , gĕ pnagi Astowdzoy mēch , ew Astowadz , anor mēch .
62004017	Inchʾbēs inkʾ ē , noynbēs menkʾ enkʾ ays ashkharhi mēch : asov mer sērĕ gatareal ē , orbēszi hamartsagowtʾiwn ownenankʾ tatastanin ōrĕ .
62004018	Siroy mēch vakh chʾgay , haba gatareal sērĕ gĕ vtarē vakhĕ : orovhetew vakhĕ g!entʾatrē batowhas . Owsti ov or gĕ vakhnay , gatareal chʾē siroy mēch .
62004019	Menkʾ gĕ sirenkʾ zayn , orovhetew nakh an siretsʾ mez .
62004020	Etʾē mēgĕ ĕsē : « Es gĕ sirem Astowadz » , ew atē ir eghpayrĕ , stakhōs ē : orovhetew an or chʾi sirer ir eghpayrĕ , or gĕ tesnē , inchʾbēs grnay sirel Astowadz , or chʾi tesner .
62004021	Ew sa batowiranĕ owninkʾ angē : « Ov or gĕ sirē Astowadz , tʾogh sirē naew ir eghpayrĕ » .
62005001	Ov or gĕ hawatay tʾē Yisows , Kʾristosn ē , dznadz ē Astowdzmē : ew ov or gĕ sirē dznoghĕ , gĕ sirē naew angē dznadzĕ .
62005002	Erp sirenkʾ Astowadz ow bahenkʾ anor batowirannerĕ , atov gĕ kitnankʾ tʾē gĕ sirenkʾ Astowdzoy zawagnerĕ .
62005003	Kʾani or sa ē Astowdzoy sērĕ : - bahel anor batowirannerĕ . Isg anor batowirannerĕ dzanr chʾen ,
62005004	orovhetew ov or Astowdzmē dznadz ē , gĕ yaghtʾē ashkharhin : mer hawatkʾn ē or gĕ yaghtʾē ashkharhin , , .
62005005	Ov gĕ yaghtʾē ashkharhin , etʾē ochʾ an , or gĕ hawatay tʾē Yisows Astowdzoy Ortin ē .
62005006	Inkʾn ē , Yisows Kʾristos , or egaw chowrov ow ariwnov : ochʾ miayn chowrov , haba , chowrov ew ariwnov : ow Hokin ē or gĕ vgayē , orovhetew Hokin jshmartowtʾiwn ē .
62005007	Artarew erekʾ en , or gĕ vgayen erginkʾi mēch : - Hayrĕ , KHōskʾĕ ew Sowrp Hokin , ow ays erekʾĕ mēg en .
62005008	Naew erekʾ en , or gĕ vgayen ergri vray , , : - Hokin , chowrĕ ew ariwnĕ , ow ays erekʾĕ miatsayn en .
62005009	Etʾē g!ĕntowninkʾ martotsʾ vgayowtʾiwnĕ , Astowdzoy vgayowtʾiwnĕ aweli medz ē : orovhetew ays ē Astowdzoy vgayowtʾiwnĕ , or towaw ir Ortiin masin .
62005010	An or gĕ hawatay Astowdzoy Ortiin , ir mēch owni ays vgayowtʾiwnĕ . An or chʾi hawatar Astowdzoy , stakhōs gĕ ngatē , , zayn , orovhetew chʾi hawatar ayn vgayowtʾean , or Astowadz towaw ir Ortiin masin .
62005011	Isg sa ē vgayowtʾiwnĕ : - Astowadz towaw mezi yawitenagan geankʾĕ , ew ays geankʾĕ anor Ortiin mēch ē .
62005012	An or owni Ortin , owni geankʾĕ : an or chʾowni Astowdzoy Ortin , chʾowni geankʾĕ .
62005013	Kretsʾi ays panerĕ tsezi , or gĕ hawatakʾ Astowdzoy Ortiin anownin , orbēszi kitnakʾ tʾē ownikʾ yawitenagan geankʾĕ .
62005014	Ayn hamartsagowtʾiwnĕ or owninkʾ anor kʾov , sa ē : - etʾē orewē pan khntrenkʾ ir gamkʾin hamatsayn , gĕ lsē mez .
62005015	Ow etʾē kitenkʾ tʾē gĕ lsē mez , inchʾ or al khntrenkʾ , kitenkʾ naew tʾē g!ownenankʾ ayn panerĕ , or gĕ khntrenkʾ irmē .
62005016	Etʾē mēgĕ tesnē tʾē ir eghpayrĕ gĕ kordzē meghkʾ mĕ , or mahatsʾow chʾē , tʾogh khntrē , ew Astowadz geankʾ biti tay anor , aysinkʾn anontsʾ , or mahatsʾow meghkʾ chʾen kordzer . Meghkʾ gay , or mahatsʾow ē : chʾem ĕser or tʾakhantsē anor hamar .
62005017	Amēn anirawowtʾiwn meghkʾ ē , paytsʾ meghkʾ gay , or mahatsʾow chʾē .
62005018	Kitenkʾ tʾē ov or Astowdzmē dznadz ē , chʾi meghanchʾer . Ov or Astowdzmē dznadz ē , gĕ bahē inkʾzinkʾ , ow CHʾarĕ chʾi tbchʾir iren .
62005019	Kitenkʾ tʾē menkʾ Astowdzmē enkʾ , isg ampoghch ashkharhĕ CHʾarin mēch mkhrjowadz ē .
62005020	Naew kitenkʾ tʾē Astowdzoy Ortin egaw , ew owshimowtʾiwn towaw mezi , orbēszi janchʾnankʾ Jshmaritĕ . Ow menkʾ ayt Jshmaritin mēch enkʾ , anor Ortiin , Yisows Kʾristosi mēch : inkʾn ē jshmarit Astowadzĕ ew yawitenagan geankʾĕ .
62005021	Orteagner , zkowshatsʾēkʾ gowṛkʾerēn .
63001001	Erētsʾĕ , ĕntreal tignoch ew anor zawagnerown , or gĕ sirem jshmartowtʾeamp , ( ochʾ miayn es , ayl naew polor anonkʾ , or kittsʾadz en jshmartowtʾiwnĕ , )
63001002	ayn jshmartowtʾean hamar , or gĕ pnagi mer mēch ow yawitean biti ĕllay mezi het :
63001003	tsezi het tʾogh ĕllan shnorhkʾ , oghormowtʾiwn ew khaghaghowtʾiwn , Hayr Astowdzmē ow Tēr Yisows Kʾristosē , Hōrĕ Ortiēn , jshmartowtʾeamp ew sirov .
63001004	Medzabēs owrakhatsʾay , ktnelov tʾē zawagnerēt omankʾ g!ĕntʾanan jshmartowtʾeamp , ayn batowiranin hamatsayn , or statsʾankʾ Hōrmēn .
63001005	Hima gĕ tʾakhantsem kʾezi , tigin , or sirenkʾ zirar : gĕ krem kʾezi ochʾ tʾē nor batowiran mĕ , haba an , or ownēinkʾ sgizpēn .
63001006	Sērĕ sa ē : - ĕntʾanal anor batowirannerown hamatsayn . Ew batowiranĕ sa ē : - ĕntʾanal sgizpēn i ver tser lsadzin hamatsayn .
63001007	Artarew ashkharh mtadz en shat moloretsʾowtsʾichʾner , oronkʾ chʾen tawanir tʾē Yisows Kʾristos marminov egaw . Aysbisin moloretsʾowtsʾichʾ ow neṛ ē .
63001008	Zkowshatsʾēkʾ towkʾ tsezi hamar , or chʾgorsntsʾnenkʾ mer ashkhatankʾĕ , haba stanankʾ lman vartsatrowtʾiwn .
63001009	Ov or zantsʾaṛow g!ĕllay ew chʾi mnar Kʾristosi owsowtsʾowmin mēch , chʾowni Astowadz . Isg an or gĕ genay Kʾristosi owsowtsʾowmin mēch , owni tʾē Hayrĕ , tʾē al Ortin .
63001010	Etʾē mēgĕ kay tsezi ow chʾperē ays owsowtsʾowmĕ , mi ĕntownikʾ zayn tser townĕ , ew mi parewēkʾ :
63001011	orovhetew ov or parewē zayn , gĕ haghortagtsʾi anor chʾar kordzerown .
63001012	TSezi krelikʾ shat pan ownēi , paytsʾ chʾowzetsʾi krel tʾowghtʾov ow melanov : kʾani or gĕ yowsam kal tsezi ew khōsil tēm aṛ tēm , orbēszi mer owrakhowtʾiwnĕ lman ĕllay .
63001013	Ĕntreal kʾrocht zawagnerĕ gĕ parewen kʾez .
64001001	Erētsʾĕ , sireli Kayiosin , or gĕ sirem jshmartowtʾeamp .
64001002	Sirelis , g!ĕghtsam or amēn gerbov yachoghis ew aṛoghch ĕllas , inchʾbēs kʾow antst al yachoghowtʾean mēch ē .
64001003	Orovhetew medzabēs owrakhatsʾay , erp kʾani mĕ eghpayrner egan ow vgayetsʾin kʾow jshmartowtʾeant masin , tʾē g!ĕntʾanas jshmartowtʾeamp .
64001004	Amenamedz owrakhowtʾiwns ē lsel , tʾē im zawagners g!ĕntʾanan jshmartowtʾeamp .
64001005	Sirelis , town hawatarmapar g!ĕnes , inchʾ or g!ĕnes eghpayrnerown ew ōtaragannerown :
64001006	anonkʾ vgayetsʾin kʾow siroyt masin egeghetsʾiin aṛchew . Etʾē owgharges zanonkʾ astowadzahajoy gerbov , law g!ĕnes :
64001007	orovhetew anonkʾ megnetsʾan Astowdzoy anownin hamar , ochʾinchʾ aṛnelov hetʾanosnerēn .
64001008	Owremn menkʾ bartawor enkʾ ĕntownil aytbisinerĕ , orbēszi kordzagitsʾ ĕllankʾ jshmartowtʾean .
64001009	Kretsʾi egeghetsʾiin : paytsʾ Tiotrepʾēs , or g!owzē anontsʾ mēch aṛachin ĕllal , chʾ!ĕntownir mez .
64001010	Owsti etʾē kam , biti mtaperem anor ĕradz kordzerĕ , kʾani or gĕ shaghagratē mezi tēm chʾar khōskʾerov . CHʾi pawararowir asov , ew ochʾ miayn chʾ!ĕntownir eghpayrnerĕ , haba g!arkilē ow egeghetsʾiēn gĕ vtarē anonkʾ , or g!owzen ĕntownil .
64001011	Sirelis , mi nmanir chʾarin , haba , pariin . An or parikʾ g!ĕnē , Astowdzmē ē : paytsʾ an or chʾarikʾ g!ĕnē , tesadz chʾē Astowadz .
64001012	Isg Temetrios pari vgayowadz ē polorēn , noyninkʾn jshmartowtʾenēn al . Menkʾ al gĕ vgayenkʾ , ew towkʾ kitēkʾ tʾē mer vgayowtʾiwnĕ jshmarit ē .
64001013	Krelikʾ shat pan ownēi , paytsʾ chʾem owzer melanov ow krichʾov krel kʾezi .
64001014	Sagayn gĕ yowsam tʾē showtov biti tesnem kʾez , ew biti khōsinkʾ tēm aṛ tēm .
64001015	KHaghaghowtʾiwn kʾezi . Paregamnerĕ gĕ parewen kʾez : parewē mer paregamnerĕ , iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ ir anownov .
65001001	Yowta , Yisows Kʾristosi dzaṛan ow Yagoposi eghpayrĕ , anontsʾ , or Hayr Astowdzmov srpatsʾadz , Yisows Kʾristosov bahowadz ow ganchʾowadz en :
65001002	oghormowtʾiwn , khaghaghowtʾiwn ew sēr tʾogh shatnan tser vray .
65001003	Sireliner , erp ampoghch pʾowtʾachanowtʾeamp gĕ krēi tsezi hasaragatsʾ pʾrgowtʾean hamar , hargawor ngatetsʾi krel tsezi ew yortorel , orbēszi baykʾarikʾ ayn hawatkʾin hamar , or mēg ankam awantowetsʾaw sowrperown .
65001004	Orovhetew kʾani mĕ martig - orontsʾ tatabartowtʾiwnĕ vaghowtsʾ artsanakrowadz ē , , - kaghtni mtan tser mēch , amparishtner , oronkʾ mer Astowdzoyn shnorhkʾĕ aylapʾokhetsʾin tsʾopʾowtʾean , ew owratsʾan miag Tiragaln ow mer Tērĕ , Yisows Kʾristosĕ .
65001005	Owremn gĕ pʾapʾakʾim yishetsʾnel tsezi , tʾēbēt zhamanagin kitēikʾ asiga , tʾē Tērĕ , or pʾrgetsʾ zhoghovowrtĕ Ekibtosi ergrēn , ergrort ankam gorsntsʾowtsʾ chʾhawatatsʾoghnerĕ :
65001006	ew ayn hreshtagnerĕ , oronkʾ chʾbahetsʾin irentsʾ sgzpnagan tirkʾĕ , , , haba tsketsʾin irentsʾ pnagowtʾiwnĕ , yawer zhagan gaberov verabahetsʾ medz ōrowan tatastanin hamar , mtʾowtʾean mēch .
65001007	Nmanabēs Sotom ow Komor , inchʾbēs naew anontsʾ showrchĕ eghadz kʾaghakʾnerĕ , oronkʾ antsnatowr eghan boṛngowtʾean ew ĕntʾatsʾan owrish marmini etewēn , ipr ōrinag trowadz en mer aṛchew , grelov yawitenagan gragin vjiṛĕ .
65001008	Nmanabēs ays tsʾnoradznern al gĕ bghdzen marminĕ , g!anarken tērowtʾiwnĕ ow gĕ hayhoyen pʾaṛkʾerĕ .
65001009	Paytsʾ Mikʾayēl hreshtagabetĕ , erp gĕ vijēr CHʾarakhōsin het , khōselov Movsēsi marminin masin , chʾyantknetsʾaw hayhoyalitsʾ tatavjiṛ artsagel , , anor tēm , haba ĕsaw : « Tērĕ yantimanē kʾez » .
65001010	Minchʾteṛ asonkʾ gĕ hayhoyen ayn panerĕ , or chʾen kiter : isg inchʾ or kiten pnaganapar , anpan gentaninerow bēs , g!abaganin ayt panerown mēch .
65001011	Vay anontsʾ , kʾani or katsʾin Gayēni jampayēn , ingan Paghaami molorowtʾean mēch , vartskʾi hamar , ew gorsowetsʾan Gorkhi hagajaṛowtʾeamp .
65001012	Asonkʾ pidzer en tser siroy khnjoykʾnerown mēch , erp khrakhjankʾ g!ĕnen tsezi het , irenkʾ zirenkʾ aradzelov aṛantsʾ vakhi . Anchowr amber en , hoverēn kʾshowadz , ashnanayin khamradz btowghov dzaṛer , anbtowgh , ergow ankam meṛadz , armatakhil eghadz :
65001013	dzovow vayrak alikʾner , or gĕ pʾrpʾrtsʾnen irentsʾ amōtʾĕ : moloradz astgher , orontsʾ hamar verabahowadz ē khawarin mtʾowtʾiwnĕ yawitean .
65001014	Enovkʾ al , eōtʾnerortĕ Atamēn etkʾ , markarēatsʾaw asontsʾ hamar ew ĕsaw : « Aha Tērĕ gow kay ir piwrawor sowrperov ,
65001015	tatastan girargelow polorin hantēb , ow gshtampelow anontsʾ mēch eghogh polor amparishtnerĕ , irentsʾ amparshtowtʾeamp ĕradz polor amparisht kordzerown hamar , ew polor khist khōskʾerown hamar , or amparisht meghawornerĕ khōsetsʾan anor tēm » .
65001016	Asonkʾ trtnchoghner ow kʾrtʾmnchoghner en , oronkʾ g!ĕntʾanan irentsʾ tsʾangowtʾiwnnerown hamatsayn : irentsʾ perannerĕ gĕ khōsin yokhortapanowtʾiwnner , ow eresbashtowtʾiwn g!ĕnen ōkowti hamar .
65001017	Paytsʾ towkʾ , sireliner , yishetsʾēkʾ ayn khōskʾerĕ , or nakhabēs ĕsowetsʾan mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi aṛakʾealnerown goghmē .
65001018	Anonkʾ g!ĕsēin tsezi tʾē “ verchin zhamanagĕ dzaghroghner biti ĕllan , oronkʾ biti ĕntʾanan irentsʾ amparisht tsʾangowtʾiwnnerown hamatsayn ” .
65001019	Asonkʾ , irenkʾ zirenkʾ zatogh , shnchʾawor martig en , oronkʾ chʾownin Hokin .
65001020	Isg towkʾ , sireliner , shinelov towkʾ tsez , tser amenasowrp hawatkʾin vray , ew aghōtʾelov Sowrp Hokiov ,
65001021	bahetsʾēkʾ towkʾ tsez Astowdzoy siroyn mēch , sbaselov mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi oghormowtʾean , yawitenagan geankʾi hamar .
65001022	Garegtsʾetsʾēkʾ omantsʾ , zatoroshelov :
65001023	isg pʾrgetsʾēkʾ owrishnerĕ , vakhov yapʾshtagelov zanonkʾ gragēn , atelov marminēn abaganadz pajgonn al .
65001024	Anor , or garogh ē zerdz bahel tsez angowmē , ew anarat getsʾnel ir pʾaṛkʾin aṛchew , tsʾndzowtʾeamp ,
65001025	mer Pʾrgichʾin , miag Astowdzoy , ( mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi michotsʾov ) pʾaṛkʾ ow medzapʾaṛowtʾiwn , zōrowtʾiwn ew ishkhanowtʾiwn ( polor tarerēn aṛach , ) hima ow polor tarerown mēch . Amēn .
66001001	Yisows Kʾristosi yaytnowtʾiwnĕ , or Astowadz towaw anor , tsʾoytsʾ talow hamar ir dzaṛanerown inchʾ or bētkʾ ē showtov ĕllay , ew ir hreshtagin michotsʾov ghrgetsʾ ow matnanshetsʾ ir Yovhannēs dzaṛayin ,
66001002	or vgayetsʾ Astowdzoy khōskʾin ew Yisows Kʾristosi vgayowtʾean masin , amēn inchʾi masin , or tesaw .
66001003	Erani anor , or gĕ gartay , ow anontsʾ , or gĕ lsen ays markarēowtʾean khōskʾerĕ , ew gĕ bahen inchʾ or anor mēch krowadz ē : orovhetew atenĕ mōt ē .
66001004	Yovhannēs , eōtʾĕ egeghetsʾinerown , oronkʾ Asiayi mēch en : shnorhkʾ ow khaghaghowtʾiwn tsezi angē , or ē , or ēr ew or biti kay , ow eōtʾĕ Hokinerēn , oronkʾ anor kahin aṛchew en ,
66001005	ew Yisows Kʾristos hawatarim vgayēn , or meṛelnerown antranign ē ow ergri tʾakawornerown ishkhanĕ . Anor , or siretsʾ mez , ir ariwnov lowatsʾ mez mer meghkʾerēn ,
66001006	ew tʾakaworner ow kʾahananer ĕraw mez , Astowdzoy ew ir Hōr hamar , anor pʾaṛkʾ ow zōrowtʾiwn tarē tar , , . Amēn .
66001007	Aha amberov gow kay , ew amēn achʾkʾ biti tesnē zayn : naew anonkʾ , or khotsʾetsʾin zayn . Ergri polor tohmerĕ biti hedzedzen anor vray . Ayo : amēn .
66001008	« Es em Alfan ow ōmeghan » , g!ĕsē Tēr ( Astowadz ) , an , or ē , or ēr ew or biti kay , Amenagalĕ .
66001009	Es , Yovhannēs , tser eghpayrĕ ew haghortagitsʾĕ Yisows Kʾristosi taṛabankʾin , tʾakaworowtʾean ow hamperowtʾean , Batmos gochʾowadz gghzin ēi , Astowdzoy khōskʾin hamar ew Yisows Kʾristosi vgayowtʾean hamar .
66001010	Giragi ōrĕ letsʾowetsʾay Hokiov , ow etewēs lsetsʾi hzōr tsayn mĕ , pʾoghi tsayni bēs , or g!ĕsēr :
66001011	« Inchʾ or gĕ tesnes , krē kirkʾi mĕ mēch , ow ghrgē zayn eōtʾĕ egeghetsʾinerown , oronkʾ Epʾesosi , Zmiwṛniayi , Berkamoni , Tʾiwatiri , Sartigēi , Filatelfiayi ew Lawotigēi mēch en » .
66001012	Tartsay tesnelow ayn tsaynĕ , or gĕ khōsēr indzi . Erp tartsay , tesay eōtʾĕ osgiē ashtanagner ,
66001013	ow eōtʾĕ ashtanagnerown mēchtegh , mēgĕ , martow Ortiin nman , minchʾew otkʾerĕ ergarogh batmowjan mĕ hakadz ew gowrdzkʾin vray osgiē kōti mĕ gabadz .
66001014	Anor klowkhn ow mazerĕ , powrti bēs jermag ēin , tsiwni bēs jermag : achʾkʾerĕ , gragi potsʾi bēs ēin ,
66001015	otkʾerĕ , osgebghintsi nman , orbēs tʾē hnotsʾi mēch potsʾavaṛadz , ow tsaynĕ , yortaṛat chowrerow tsaynin bēs .
66001016	Ir ach tseṛkʾin mēch ownēr eōtʾĕ astgh , peranēn sradz ergsayri tʾowr mĕ g!ellēr , ew tēmkʾĕ arewi bēs ēr , erp gĕ pʾayli ir zōrowtʾeamp .
66001017	Erp tesay zayn , anor otkʾĕ ingay , meṛeli bēs : isg an , ir ach tseṛkʾĕ traw im vras ow ĕsaw indzi : « Mi vakhnar : es em Aṛachinĕ ew Verchinĕ .
66001018	Es an em , or g!abri : es meṛadz ēi , ow aha g!abrim tarē tar : es ownim mahowan ew t zhokhkʾin panalinerĕ .
66001019	( Owsti ) krē inchʾ or tesar , tʾē inchʾ or gay , tʾē inchʾ or biti ĕllay asgē etkʾ .
66001020	Ahawasig khorhowrtĕ eōtʾĕ astgherown , or im ach tseṛkʾis mēch tesar , ow eōtʾĕ osgiē ashtanagnerown : - ayt eōtʾĕ astgherĕ , eōtʾĕ egeghetsʾinerown hreshtagnern en , isg eōtʾĕ ashtanagnerĕ eōtʾĕ egeghetsʾinern en » .
66002001	« Krē Epʾesosi egeghetsʾiin hreshtagin : - “ Sa g!ĕsē an , or ir ach tseṛkʾin mēch gĕ pṛnē eōtʾĕ astgherĕ , ew gĕ shrchi eōtʾĕ osgiē ashtanagnerown michew :
66002002	" Kitem kʾow kordzert , ashkhatankʾt ow hamperowtʾiwnt , ew tʾē chʾes grnar hantowr zhel chʾarerown . Pʾortsetsʾir anonkʾ , or gĕ hawasten tʾē irenkʾ aṛakʾeal en , paytsʾ chʾen , ew ktar tʾē stakhōs en .
66002003	Hamperowtʾiwn ownetsʾar , taṛabankʾ gretsʾir im anownis hamar , , ow chʾtʾowltsʾar .
66002004	Sagayn sa ownim kʾezi tēm , or tʾoghowtsʾir aṛachin sērt .
66002005	Owremn yishē tʾē owrgē ingar , abashkharē , ew ĕrē aṛachin kordzert : aylabēs , showtov biti kam kʾezi , ow ashtanagt biti shar zhem ir teghēn , etʾē chʾabashkhares .
66002006	Paytsʾ sa ownis : - g!ates Nigoghayoseannerown kordzerĕ , or es al g!atem " ” .
66002007	An or aganch owni , tʾogh lsē tʾē Hokin inchʾ g!ĕsē egeghetsʾinerown . Ov or yaghtʾē , anor owtel biti tam geankʾi dzaṛēn , or Astowdzoy trakhtin mēch ē » .
66002008	« Krē naew Zmiwṛniayi egeghetsʾiin hreshtagin : - “ Sa g!ĕsē Aṛachinĕ ew Verchinĕ , or meṛaw ow g!abri :
66002009	" Kitem kʾow kordzert , taṛabankʾt ew aghkʾatowtʾiwnt , ( paytsʾ harowst es , ) ow hayhoyowtʾiwnĕ anontsʾ , or g!ĕsen tʾē irenkʾ Hreay en , paytsʾ chʾen , haba , Satanayi zhoghov .
66002010	Pnaw mi vakhnar ayn chʾarchʾarankʾnerēn , or biti gres : aha CHʾarakhōsĕ pantĕ biti netē tsezmē omankʾ , orbēszi pʾortsowikʾ , ew tasĕ ōr taṛabankʾ biti ownenakʾ . Minchʾew mah hawatarim eghir , ow biti tam kʾezi geankʾi bsagĕ " ” .
66002011	An or aganch owni , tʾogh lsē tʾē Hokin inchʾ g!ĕsē egeghetsʾinerown . Ov or yaghtʾē , biti chʾvnasowi ergrort mahēn » .
66002012	« Krē naew Berkamoni egeghetsʾiin hreshtagin : - “ Sa g!ĕsē an , or owni sradz ergsayri tʾowrĕ :
66002013	" Kitem kʾow kordzert , ew tʾē owr gĕ pnagis , hon , owr Satanayi kahn ē : paytsʾ amowr gĕ pṛnes im anowns ow chʾowratsʾar im hawatkʾs , noynisg ayn ōrerĕ , erp Antʾibas , im hawatarim vgas , sbannowetsʾaw tser mēch , owr Satanan gĕ pnagi .
66002014	Sagayn kʾezi tēm ownim kʾichʾ pan mĕ , kʾani or hot ownis Paghaami owsowtsʾowmĕ bahoghner : an Paghagi sorvetsʾowtsʾ kaytʾagghowtʾiwn tnel Israyēli ortinerown aṛchew , orbēszi anonkʾ owten gowṛkʾerow zohowadzner ow boṛngin .
66002015	Aysbēs , town al ownis Nigoghayoseannerown owsowtsʾowmĕ bahoghner , or es g!atem .
66002016	( Owsti ) abashkharē : aylabēs , showtov biti kam kʾezi , ew biti baterazmim anontsʾ tēm peranis tʾowrov " ” .
66002017	An or aganch owni , tʾogh lsē tʾē Hokin inchʾ g!ĕsē egeghetsʾinerown . Ov or yaghtʾē , anor owtel biti tam bahowadz mananayēn : naew biti tam anor jermag khij mĕ , ew ayt khijin vray krowadz nor anown mĕ , or ochʾ mēgĕ kitē , paytsʾ miayn zayn statsʾoghĕ » .
66002018	« Krē naew Tʾiwatiri egeghetsʾiin hreshtagin : - “ Sa g!ĕsē Astowdzoy Ortin , or owni gragi potsʾi bēs achʾkʾer , ew ir otkʾerĕ nman en osgebghintsi :
66002019	" Kitem kʾow kordzert , sērt , sbasargowtʾiwnt , hawatkʾt ow hamperowtʾiwnt : ew tʾē kʾow verchin kordzert aweli shat en , kʾan aṛachinnerĕ .
66002020	Sagayn kʾezi tēm ownim pan mĕ , , , orovhetew gĕ tʾoylatres Yezapēli , - inkʾzinkʾ markarēowhi gochʾogh ayt gnoch , - or moloretsʾnē im dzaṛaners ew sorvetsʾnē anontsʾ boṛngil ow gowṛkʾerow zohowadzner owtel .
66002021	Es zhamanag towi anor , abashkharelow ir boṛngowtʾenēn , paytsʾ chʾabashkharetsʾ .
66002022	Aha es mahij biti netem zayn , isg anor het shnowtʾiwn ĕnoghnerĕ , medz taṛabankʾi mēch , etʾē chʾabashkharen irentsʾ kordzerēn .
66002023	Biti meṛtsʾnem anor zawagnerĕ , ew polor egeghetsʾinerĕ biti kitnan tʾē es an em , or gĕ znnem khighjern ow sirterĕ : biti hatowtsʾanem tsezmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrin , tser kordzerown hamemat .
66002024	Paytsʾ g!ĕsem tsezi , Tʾiwatiri mēch eghogh miws polorin , or chʾownin ays owsowtsʾowmĕ ew chʾkittsʾan Satanayin khorhowrtnerĕ ( inchʾbēs g!ĕsen ) : - owrish dzanrowtʾiwn biti chʾtnem tser vray ,
66002025	haba amowr pṛnetsʾēkʾ inchʾ or ownikʾ , minchʾew or kam .
66002026	Ew ov or yaghtʾē ow bahē im kordzers minchʾew vakhjanĕ , anor ishkhanowtʾiwn biti tam anor azkerown vray ,
66002027	( ew biti hovowē zanonkʾ ergatʾē kawazanov : anonkʾ biti pʾshrowin prowti anōtʾnerow bēs : )
66002028	inchʾbēs es al statsʾay im Hōrmēs , ow biti tam anor aṛtowan astghĕ " ” .
66002029	An or aganch owni , tʾogh lsē tʾē Hokin inchʾ g!ĕsē egeghetsʾinerown » .
66003001	« Krē naew Sartigēi egeghetsʾiin hreshtagin : - “ Sa g!ĕsē an , or owni Astowdzoy eōtʾĕ Hokinern ow eōtʾĕ astgherĕ : " Kitem kʾow kordzert : town anown ownis tʾē g!abris , paytsʾ meṛadz es .
66003002	Artʾown getsʾir ew amratsʾowr mnatsʾadz panerĕ , or meṛnelow mōt en , orovhetew gatareal chʾktay kordzert Astowdzoy aṛchew .
66003003	Owremn yishē tʾē inchʾbēs ĕntownetsʾir ew lsetsʾir , ow bahē ew abashkharē : isg etʾē artʾown chʾgenas , koghi bēs biti kam kʾow vrat , ow pnaw biti chʾkitnas tʾē or zhamown biti kam vrat .
66003004	Sagayn Sartigēi mēch ownis kʾani mĕ martotsʾ anownner , oronkʾ chʾbghdzetsʾin irentsʾ hantertsnerĕ ew jermagnerov biti shrchin indzi het , kʾani or ar zhani en .
66003005	Ov or yaghtʾē , biti hakni jermag hanterts : ow es biti chʾchnchem anor anownĕ geankʾi kirkʾēn , haba biti tawanim anor anownĕ im Hōrs aṛchew ew anor hreshtagnerown aṛchew " ” .
66003006	An or aganch owni , tʾogh lsē tʾē Hokin inchʾ g!ĕsē egeghetsʾinerown » .
66003007	« Krē naew Filatelfiayi egeghetsʾiin hreshtagin : - “ Sa g!ĕsē Sowrpĕ , Jshmaritĕ , an , or owni Tawitʾi panalin , an , or gĕ panay ow ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ kotsʾē , ew gĕ kotsʾē ow ochʾ mēgĕ gĕ panay :
66003008	" Kitem kʾow kordzert . Aha aṛchewt tri patsʾowadz towṛ mĕ , or ochʾ mēgĕ grnay kotsʾel , orovhetew town kʾichʾ zōrowtʾiwn ownis , paytsʾ bahetsʾir im khōskʾs ew chʾowratsʾar im anowns .
66003009	Aha biti stibem Satanayi zhoghovēn eghoghnerĕ , - or g!ĕsen tʾē irenkʾ Hreay en , paytsʾ chʾen , haba gĕ sten , - aha biti stibem zanonkʾ , or kan ow ergrbaken otkʾerowt aṛchew , ew kitnan tʾē es siretsʾi kʾez .
66003010	Kʾani or bahetsʾir im hamperowtʾean khōskʾs , es al biti bahem kʾez pʾortsowtʾean zhamown , or biti kay ampoghch ergrakowntin vray , pʾortselow hamar ergri pnagichʾnerĕ .
66003011	Aha showtov gow kam . Amowr pṛnē ownetsʾadzt , orbēszi ochʾ mēgĕ aṛnē kʾow bsagt .
66003012	Ov or yaghtʾē , siwn mĕ biti ĕnem zayn im Astowdzoys tajarin mēch , ew al towrs biti chʾellē . Anor vray biti krem im Astowdzoys anownĕ , ow im Astowdzoys kʾaghakʾin anownĕ , aysinkʾn , Nor Erowsaghēm , - or g!ichnē erginkʾēn , im Astowdzoys kʾovēn , - ew im nor anowns " ” .
66003013	An or aganch owni , tʾogh lsē tʾē Hokin inchʾ g!ĕsē egeghetsʾinerown » .
66003014	« Krē naew Lawotigēi egeghetsʾiin hreshtagin : - “ Sa g!ĕsē Amēnĕ , hawatarim ow jshmarit Vgan , Astowdzoy ararchʾowtʾean Sgizpĕ :
66003015	" Kitem kʾow kordzert , tʾē ochʾ bagh es , ochʾ al takʾ : erani tʾē bagh ĕllayir , gam , takʾ .
66003016	Owsti town or kaghch es , ew ochʾ takʾ , ochʾ al bagh , peranēs towrs biti pʾskhem kʾez .
66003017	Kʾani or g!ĕses : « Es harowst em , harstatsʾay , ow ochʾ mēg pani garikʾ ownim » . Paytsʾ chʾes kiter tʾē town tʾshowaṛ , kheghj , aghkʾat , goyr ew merg es .
66003018	Gĕ tʾelatrem kʾezi , or knes intsmē gragi povēn antsʾadz osgi , or harstanas , ow jermag hanterts , or haknis , orbēszi mergowtʾeant amōtʾĕ chʾerewnay : ew tegh tir achʾkʾerowt , or tesnes .
66003019	Es gĕ gshtampem ow gĕ bat zhem polor siradzners : owremn nakhantsakhntir eghir ew abashkharē .
66003020	Aha gaynadz em tran aṛchew ow gĕ pakhem : etʾē mēgĕ lsē im tsayns ew panay towṛĕ , biti mtnem anor kʾov ow biti ĕntʾrem anor het , an al , indzi het .
66003021	Ov or yaghtʾē , indzi het pazmil biti tam anor , im kahis vray , inchʾbēs es al yaghtʾetsʾi ow im Hōrs het pazmetsʾay ir kahin vray " ” .
66003022	An or aganch owni , tʾogh lsē tʾē Hokin inchʾ g!ĕsē egeghetsʾinerown » .
66004001	Asgē etkʾ , nayetsʾay , ew aha towṛ mĕ patsʾowadz ēr erginkʾi mēch , ow indzi het khōsogh aṛachin tsaynĕ - pʾoghi mĕ bēs - or lsadz ēi , ĕsaw : « Hos partsratsʾir , ew tsʾoytsʾ biti tam kʾezi inchʾ or bētkʾ ē ĕllay asgē etkʾ » .
66004002	Isgoyn letsʾowetsʾay Hokiov , ew aha kah mĕ trowadz ēr erginkʾi mēch , ow mēgĕ pazmadz ēr kahin vray .
66004003	Pazmoghin teskʾĕ nman ēr yasbis ew sartion kʾarerow , ow kahin showrchĕ gar dziadzan mĕ , teskʾov zmrowkhti nman .
66004004	Kahin showrchĕ gayin kʾsanchʾors kaher , ew ayt kaherown vray pazmadz ēin , , kʾsanchʾors erētsʾner : jermag hantertsner hakadz ēin , ow osgiē bsagner ownēin irentsʾ klowkhin vray .
66004005	Kahēn g!ellēin pʾaylagner , tsayner ew orotowmner , ow kahin aṛchew gayin eōtʾĕ hravaṛ chaher , oronkʾ Astowdzoy eōtʾĕ Hokinern en .
66004006	Kahin aṛchew gar abageghēn dzov mĕ , piwreghi nman , isg kahin mēchteghĕ ew kahin showrchĕ gayin chʾors ēagner , achʾkʾerov letsʾown , aṛchewēn ow etewēn .
66004007	Aṛachin ēagĕ nman ēr aṛiwdzi , ergrort ēagĕ nman ēr zowaragi , errort ēagĕ ownēr martow erewoytʾ , isg chʾorrort ēagĕ nman ēr tʾṛchʾogh ardziwi .
66004008	CHʾors ēagnerēn amēn mēgĕ vetsʾ tʾew ownēr showrchĕ , ew nersēn letsʾown ēr achʾkʾerov . Anonkʾ aṛantsʾ hankstanalow , tsʾereg ow kisher g!ĕsēin : « Sowrp , Sowrp , Sowrp ē Tērĕ , Amenagal Astowadzĕ , or ēr , or ē ew or biti kay » .
66004009	Erp ayt ēagnerĕ pʾaṛkʾ ow batiw gow tayin ew shnorhagal g!ĕllayin kahin vray pazmoghēn , or tarē tar , , g!abri ,
66004010	kʾsanchʾors erētsʾnerĕ g!iynayin kahin vray pazmoghin aṛchew ow g!ergrbakēin anor , or tarē tar g!abri , ew irentsʾ bsagnerĕ gĕ tskēin kahin aṛchew , ĕselov :
66004011	« Ar zhani es , Tēr , pʾaṛkʾ , batiw ow zōrowtʾiwn ĕntownelow , orovhetew town steghdzetsʾir polor panerĕ : kʾow gamkʾovt anonkʾ koyowtʾiwn ownin ew steghdzowetsʾan » .
66005001	Kahin vray pazmoghin ach tseṛkʾin mēch tesay kirkʾ mĕ , krowadz nersēn ow towrsēn , ew gnkʾowadz eōtʾĕ gnikʾov .
66005002	Tesay naew hzōr hreshtag mĕ , or partsratsayn gĕ yaytararēr : « Ov ar zhani ē panalow ayt kirkʾĕ ew kʾagelow ator gnikʾnerĕ » .
66005003	Paytsʾ ochʾ mēgĕ , ochʾ erginkʾi mēch , ochʾ ergri vray , ochʾ al ergri nerkʾew , garogh ēr panal ayt kirkʾĕ , ochʾ al nayil anor .
66005004	Es al sastig gow layi , kʾani or ochʾ mēgĕ ar zhani ktnowetsʾaw panalow ayt kirkʾĕ , ochʾ al nayelow anor .
66005005	Isg erētsʾnerēn mēgĕ ĕsaw indzi : « Mi lar : aha Yowtayi tohmēn eghogh Aṛiwdzĕ , Tawitʾi Armatĕ , yaghtʾetsʾ , orbēszi panay ayt kirkʾĕ ew kʾagē ator eōtʾĕ gnikʾnerĕ .
66005006	Ow tesay tʾē kahin ew chʾors ēagnerown mēchtegh , ow erētsʾnerown mēchtegh , gaynadz ēr Kaṛnowg mĕ , orbēs tʾē mortʾowadz : an ownēr eōtʾĕ eghchiwr ow eōtʾĕ achʾkʾ , oronkʾ Astowdzoy eōtʾĕ Hokinern en , ghrgowadz ampoghch ergirĕ .
66005007	An egaw ew aṛaw kirkʾĕ kahin vray pazmoghin ach tseṛkʾēn .
66005008	Erp aṛaw kirkʾĕ , chʾors ēagnern ow kʾsanchʾors erētsʾnerĕ ingan Kaṛnowgin aṛchew ew ergrbaketsʾin : anontsʾmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ ownēr kʾnar mĕ , ow osgiē sgawaṛag mĕ , khowngerov letsʾown , or sowrperown aghōtʾkʾnern en .
66005009	Anonkʾ g!erkēin nor erk mĕ , ĕselov : « Town ar zhani es aṛnelow ayt kirkʾĕ ew kʾagelow ator gnikʾnerĕ : orovhetew mortʾowetsʾar , ow kʾow ariwnovt knetsʾir mez Astowdzoy hamar , amēn tohmē , lezowē , zhoghovowrtē ew azkē ,
66005010	tʾakaworner ow kʾahananer ĕrir mez mer Astowdzoyn , ew ergri vray biti tʾakaworenkʾ » .
66005011	Tesay , ow lsetsʾi tsaynĕ shat hreshtagnerow , oronkʾ kahin , ēagnerown ew erētsʾnerown showrchn ēin : anontsʾ tʾiwĕ piwrerov piwr ow hazarnerov hazar ēr .
66005012	Anonkʾ partsratsayn g!ĕsēin : « Ayt mortʾowadz Kaṛnowgĕ ar zhani ē ĕntownelow zōrowtʾiwn , harstowtʾiwn , imastowtʾiwn , oy zh , batiw , pʾaṛkʾ ew ōrhnapanowtʾiwn » .
66005013	Ow lsetsʾi polor araradznerĕ , erginkʾi mēch , ergri vray , ergri nerkʾew ew dzovow mēch eghogh , ow amēn inchʾ or anontsʾ mēch gay , oronkʾ g!ĕsēin : « Kahin vray pazmoghin ew Kaṛnowgin , ōrhnapanowtʾiwn , batiw , pʾaṛkʾ ow zōrowtʾiwn tarē tar , , » .
66005014	Ew chʾors ēagnerĕ g!ĕsēin : « Amēn » . Ow erētsʾnerĕ ingan ew ergrbaketsʾin .
66006001	Nayetsʾay , erp Kaṛnowgĕ patsʾaw gnikʾnerēn mēgĕ , , , ew lsetsʾi chʾors ēagnerēn mēgown tsaynĕ , orotowmi bēs , or g!ĕsēr : « Egowr ow tes » .
66006002	Ew tesay : aha jermag tsi mĕ gar , orown vray hedznoghĕ ownēr aghegh mĕ . Bsag mĕ trowetsʾaw anor , ow towrs elaw ipr yaghtʾogh , orbēszi yaghtʾē .
66006003	Erp patsʾaw ergrort gnikʾĕ , lsetsʾi ergrort ēagĕ , or g!ĕsēr : « Egowr » .
66006004	Owrish , shaṛakoyn tsi mĕ towrs elaw , ew anor vray hedznoghin ishkhanowtʾiwn trowetsʾaw , or ergrēn vertsʾnē khaghaghowtʾiwnĕ , orbēszi mortʾen zirar : ow medz sowr mĕ trowetsʾaw anor .
66006005	Erp patsʾaw errort gnikʾĕ , lsetsʾi errort ēagĕ , or g!ĕsēr : « Egowr ow tes » . Ew tesay : aha sew tsi mĕ gar , orown vray hedznoghĕ , tseṛkʾin mēch ownēr gshiṛkʾ mĕ .
66006006	CHʾors ēagnerown mēchēn lsetsʾi tsayn mĕ , or g!ĕsēr : « Gabij mĕ tsʾorenĕ , mēg tahegani , ow erekʾ gabij karin , mēg tahegani . Mi vnaser tsētʾin ew kiniin » .
66006007	Erp patsʾaw chʾorort gnikʾĕ , lsetsʾi chʾorrort ēagin tsaynĕ , or g!ĕsēr : « Egowr ow tes » .
66006008	Ew tesay : aha t zhkoyn tsi mĕ gar , orown vray hedznoghin anownĕ Mah ēr , ow t zhokhkʾĕ gĕ hetewēr anor . Ishkhanowtʾiwn trowetsʾaw anontsʾ , ergri kʾaṛortin vray , or sbannen tʾowrov , sovov , mahov ow ergri kazannerov .
66006009	Erp patsʾaw hinkerort gnikʾĕ , zohaseghanin nerkʾew tesay antserĕ anontsʾ , or mortʾowadz ēin Astowdzoy khōskʾin hamar , ew irentsʾ towadz vgayowtʾean hamar .
66006010	Anonkʾ partsratsayn aghaghagetsʾin : « Sowrp ew jshmarit Tiragal , minchʾew erp biti chʾtates ow chʾaṛnes mer ariwnin vrē zhĕ ergri pnagichʾnerēn » .
66006011	Jermag barekōt trowetsʾaw anontsʾmē iwrakʾanchʾiwrin , ew ĕsowetsʾaw anontsʾ or hankchʾin kʾichʾ mĕ zhamanag al , minchʾew or ampoghchanan irentsʾ dzaṛayagitsʾnern ow anontsʾ eghpayrnerĕ , oronkʾ biti sbannowēin irentsʾ bēs .
66006012	Tesay , erp patsʾaw vetsʾerort gnikʾĕ , ew aha medz ergrashar zh mĕ eghaw . Arewĕ sewtsʾaw , mazeghēn kʾowrtsi mĕ bēs , lowsinĕ ( polorovin ) ariwni koyni bēs eghaw ,
66006013	ow erginkʾi astgherĕ ingan ergri vray , inchʾbēs sastig hovēn shar zhowadz tʾzenin gĕ tʾapʾē ir thas btowghnerĕ .
66006014	Erginkʾĕ gdzgowetsʾaw olorowogh makaghatʾi mĕ bēs , ew polor leṛnern ow gghzinerĕ shar zhetsʾan irentsʾ tegherēn .
66006015	Ergri tʾakawornerĕ , medzamedznerĕ , harowstnerĕ , hazarabetnerĕ , zōrawornerĕ , ew polor strowgnern ow polor azatnerĕ bahowĕtetsʾan kʾarayrnerow ew leṛnerow zhayṛerown mēch ,
66006016	ow g!ĕsēin leṛnerown ew zhayṛerown : « Ingēkʾ mer vray ow bahetsʾēkʾ mez kahin vray pazmoghin eresēn , ew Kaṛnowgin pargowtʾenēn .
66006017	Orovhetew anor pargowtʾean medz ōrĕ egaw , ew ov grnay timanal » .
66007001	Asgē etkʾ tesay chʾors hreshtagner , or gaynadz ēin ergri chʾors angiwnnerĕ ow pṛnadz ēin ergri chʾors hoverĕ , orbēszi hov chʾpʾchʾē , ochʾ ergri vray , ochʾ dzovow vray , ochʾ al dzaṛi mĕ vray .
66007002	Tesay naew owrish hreshtag mĕ , or partsratsʾaw arewelkʾēn ew ownēr abrogh Astowdzoy gnikʾĕ . An partsratsayn aghaghagetsʾ ayn chʾors hreshtagnerown , orontsʾ ishkhanowtʾiwn trowadz ēr vnaselow ergrin ow dzovown :
66007003	« Mi vnasēkʾ , ochʾ ergrin , ochʾ dzovown , ochʾ al dzaṛerown , minchʾew or gnkʾenkʾ mer Astowdzoyn dzaṛanerown jagatĕ » .
66007004	Lsetsʾi gnkʾowadznerown tʾiwĕ : - hariwr kʾaṛasownchʾors hazar gnkʾowadz , Israyēli ortinerown polor tohmerēn :
66007005	Yowtayi tohmēn , tasnergow hazar gnkʾowadz , Ṛowpēni tohmēn , tasnergow hazar gnkʾowadz , Kati tohmēn , tasnergow hazar gnkʾowadz ,
66007006	Aseri tohmēn , tasnergow hazar gnkʾowadz , Nepʾtʾaghimi tohmēn , tasnergow hazar gnkʾowadz , Manasēi tohmēn , tasnergow hazar gnkʾowadz ,
66007007	SHmawoni tohmēn , tasnergow hazar gnkʾowadz , GHewii tohmēn , tasnergow hazar gnkʾowadz , Isakʾari tohmēn , tasnergow hazar gnkʾowadz ,
66007008	Zapowghoni tohmēn , tasnergow hazar gnkʾowadz , Yovsēpʾi tohmēn , tasnergow hazar gnkʾowadz , Peniamini tohmēn , tasnergow hazar gnkʾowadz .
66007009	Asgē etkʾ tesay , ew aha medz pazmowtʾiwn mĕ gar , or ochʾ mēgĕ grnar hamrel , polor azkerēn , tohmerēn , zhoghovowrtnerēn ow lezownerēn . Anonkʾ gaynadz ēin kahin aṛchew ew Kaṛnowgin aṛchew , hakadz jermag barekōtner ow armaweniner pṛnadz irentsʾ tseṛkʾerown mēch ,
66007010	ew partsratsayn g!aghaghagēin : « Pʾrgowtʾiwnĕ mer Astowdzoynn ē , or gĕ pazmi kahin vray , naew , Kaṛnowginĕ » .
66007011	Polor hreshtagnerĕ , or gaynadz ēin kahin , erētsʾnerown ow chʾors ēagnerown showrchĕ , ingan irentsʾ eresin vray , kahin aṛchew , ew ergrbaketsʾin Astowdzoy ,
66007012	ĕselov : « Amēn : ōrhnapanowtʾiwn , pʾaṛkʾ , imastowtʾiwn , shnorhagalowtʾiwn , batiw , zōrowtʾiwn ow garoghowtʾiwn mer Astowdzoyn , tarē tar , , . Amēn » .
66007013	Erētsʾnerēn mēgĕ ĕsaw indzi : « Ov en asonkʾ , or hakadz en jermag barekōtner , ew owrgē egadz en » .
66007014	Es al ĕsi anor : « Tēr , town kites » . An al ĕsaw indzi : « Asonkʾ medz taṛabankʾēn egoghnern en , or lowatsʾin irentsʾ barekōtnerĕ ow jermgtsʾowtsʾin zanonkʾ Kaṛnowgin ariwnov .
66007015	Owsti Astowdzoy kahin aṛchew en , ew gĕ bashten zinkʾ tsʾereg ow kisher , ir tajarin mēch : ew kahin vray pazmoghĕ biti pnagi anontsʾ mēch .
66007016	Aylews ochʾ biti anōtʾenan , ochʾ biti dzarawnan , ochʾ al arewĕ gam orewē tōtʾ biti iynay anontsʾ vray :
66007017	orovhetew Kaṛnowgĕ , or kahin mēchteghn ē , biti hovowē zanonkʾ , biti aṛachnortē zanonkʾ tēbi genarar chowrerow aghpiwrnerĕ , ew Astowadz polor artsʾownkʾnerĕ biti srpē anontsʾ achʾkʾerēn » .
66008001	Erp patsʾaw eōtʾnerort gnikʾĕ , lṛowtʾiwn eghaw erginkʾĕ , gēs zhamow chʾapʾ .
66008002	Ow tesay ayn eōtʾĕ hreshtagnerĕ , or gaynadz ēin Astowdzoy aṛchew : eōtʾĕ pʾogher trowetsʾan anontsʾ .
66008003	Owrish hreshtag mĕ egaw ew gaynetsʾaw zohaseghanin aṛchew : an ownēr osgiē khnganotsʾ mĕ , ow shat khowng trowetsʾaw iren , orbēszi ĕndzayē polor sowrperown aghōtʾkʾnerown het , kahin aṛchew eghogh osgiē zohaseghanin vray .
66008004	Ew khowngerown dzowkhĕ , sowrperown aghōtʾkʾnerown het , hreshtagin tseṛkʾēn partsratsʾaw Astowdzoy aṛchew .
66008005	Aba hreshtagĕ aṛaw khnganotsʾĕ , letsʾowtsʾ zayn zohaseghanin gragēn , ow netetsʾ ergri vray : ew tsayner , orotowmner , pʾaylagner ow ergrashar zh eghan .
66008006	Ew eōtʾĕ hreshtagnerĕ , or ownēin eōtʾĕ pʾogherĕ , batrastowetsʾan hnchʾetsʾnelow zanonkʾ .
66008007	Aṛachin hreshtagĕ hnchʾetsʾowtsʾ pʾoghĕ , ew ariwnov khaṛnowadz gargowt ow grag eghaw ew netowetsʾaw ergri vray : ( ergri mēg errortĕ ayretsʾaw , ) dzaṛerown mēg errortĕ ayretsʾaw , ow amēn ganachʾ khot ayretsʾaw .
66008008	Ergrort hreshtagĕ hnchʾetsʾowtsʾ pʾoghĕ , ew hravaṛ medz leran bēs pan mĕ netowetsʾaw dzovĕ : dzovown mēg errortĕ ariwn eghaw ,
66008009	dzovown mēch abrogh araradznerown mēg errortĕ meṛaw , ow nawerown mēg errortĕ pʾjatsʾaw .
66008010	Errort hreshtagĕ hnchʾetsʾowtsʾ pʾoghĕ , ow erginkʾēn medz astgh mĕ ingaw , chahi bēs vaṛelov : an ingaw keterown mēg errortin ew chowrerow aghpiwrnerown vray .
66008011	Ayt astghin anownĕ ōshintr ēr , ow chowrerown mēg errortĕ ōshintr eghaw , ew shat martig meṛan chowrerēn , kʾani or taṛnatsʾadz ēin .
66008012	CHʾorrort hreshtagĕ hnchʾetsʾowtsʾ pʾoghĕ , ow arewin mēg errortĕ zarnowetsʾaw , naew lowsinin mēg errortĕ ew astgherown mēg errortĕ : hetewapar anontsʾ mēg errortĕ khawaretsʾaw , ōrowan mēg errortĕ chʾlowsaworowetsʾaw , nmanabēs , kisherowan .
66008013	Tesay , ow lsetsʾi erginkʾi mēchteghēn tʾṛchʾogh hreshtag mĕ , or partsratsayn g!ĕsēr : « Vay , vay , vay ergri pnagichʾnerown , ayn miws pʾoghi tsaynerown hamar , or erekʾ hreshtagnerĕ biti hnchʾetsʾnen » .
66009001	Hinkerort hreshtagĕ hnchʾetsʾowtsʾ pʾoghĕ , ow tesay astgh mĕ , or erginkʾēn ingaw ergri vray . Antownti kowpin panalin trowetsʾaw anor :
66009002	an al patsʾaw antowntin kowpĕ , ew ayt kowpēn dzowkh partsratsʾaw , medz hnotsʾi mĕ dzowkhin bēs . Arewn ow ōtĕ khawaretsʾan kowpin dzowkhēn .
66009003	DZowkhēn marakhner elan ergri vray , ew anontsʾ ishkhanowtʾiwn trowetsʾaw , ergri garijnerown ownetsʾadz ishkhanowtʾean bēs .
66009004	Ĕsowetsʾaw anontsʾ or vnasen ochʾ ergri khotin , ochʾ orewē ganachʾowtʾean , ochʾ al orewē dzaṛi , haba miayn ayn martotsʾ , oronkʾ chʾownin Astowdzoy gnikʾĕ irentsʾ jagatin vray .
66009005	Hraman trowetsʾaw anontsʾ or chʾsbannen zanonkʾ , haba tanchen zanonkʾ hink amis : anontsʾ towadz tanchankʾĕ , gariji towadz tanchankʾin bēs ēr , erp gĕ khaytʾē martĕ .
66009006	Ayt ōrerĕ martig biti pʾntṛen mahĕ , sagayn biti chʾktnen : biti tsʾangan meṛnil , paytsʾ mahĕ biti pʾakhchʾi irentsʾmē .
66009007	Marakhnerĕ gĕ nmanēin baterazmi batrastowadz tsierow : anontsʾ klowkhnerown vray gayin orbēs tʾē osgiē bsagner , ew anontsʾ eresnerĕ martotsʾ eresnerown bēs ēin .
66009008	Ownēin mazer , ginerow mazerown bēs : anontsʾ agṛanerĕ , aṛiwdznerow agṛanerown bēs ēin .
66009009	Ownēin zrahner , ergatʾē zrahnerow bēs , isg anontsʾ tʾewerown tsaynĕ , baterazmi vazogh pazmatʾiw tsierē kʾashowadz gaṛkʾerow tsaynin bēs ēr .
66009010	Ownēin bochʾer , garijnerow nman , ow khaytʾotsʾner gayin bochʾerown vray . Ishkhanowtʾiwn ownēin hink amis vnaselow martotsʾ ,
66009011	ew irentsʾ vray tʾakawor ownēin antowntin hreshtagĕ , orown anownĕ eprayerēn Apaton ē , isg yownarēn , Aboghion .
66009012	Mēg vayĕ antsʾaw : asgē etkʾ aha ergow vay al gow kay .
66009013	Vetsʾerort hreshtagĕ hnchʾetsʾowtsʾ pʾoghĕ , ow lsetsʾi tsayn mĕ , Astowdzoy aṛchew eghogh osgiē zohaseghanin chʾors eghchiwrnerēn ,
66009014	or g!ĕsēr pʾogh ownetsʾogh vetsʾerort hreshtagin : « Artsagē Epʾrat medz ketin vray gabowadz chʾors hreshtagnerĕ » .
66009015	Ew artsagowetsʾan ayn chʾors hreshtagnerĕ , or batrastowadz ēin zhamowan , ōrowan , amsowan ow tarowan hamar , orbēszi sbannen martotsʾ mēg errortĕ .
66009016	TSiawor zōrkʾerown tʾiwĕ ergow piwr piwr , , ēr : es lsetsʾi anontsʾ tʾiwĕ .
66009017	Aysbēs , tesilkʾin mēch tesay tsierĕ ew anontsʾ vray hedznoghnerĕ , oronkʾ ownēin gragi , yagintʾi ow dzdzowmpi koyn zrahner . TSierown klowkhnerĕ aṛiwdznerow klowkhnerow bēs ēin : grag , dzowkh ew dzdzowmp g!ellēin anontsʾ peranēn .
66009018	Ays erekʾ ( batowhas ) nerēn martotsʾ mēg errortĕ sbannowetsʾaw , aysinkʾn , gragēn , dzowkhēn ow dzdzowmpēn , oronkʾ g!ellēin anontsʾ peranēn .
66009019	Orovhetew anontsʾ ishkhanowtʾiwnĕ irentsʾ perannerown ew bochʾerown mēch ēr , kʾani or anontsʾ bochʾerĕ nman ēin ōtserow , ew ownēin klowkhner , orontsʾmov gĕ vnasēin .
66009020	Miws martigĕ , or chʾsbannowetsʾan ays batowhasnerēn , chʾabashkharetsʾin irentsʾ tseṛkʾerown kordzerēn , or chʾergrbaken tewerown , naew osgiē , ardzatʾē , bghintsē , kʾarē ow pʾaytē shinowadz gowṛkʾerown , oronkʾ ochʾ grnan tesnel , ochʾ lsel , ochʾ al kʾalel .
66009021	Naew chʾabashkharetsʾin ochʾ irentsʾ martasbanowtʾiwnnerēn , ochʾ irentsʾ gakhartowtʾiwnnerēn , ochʾ irentsʾ boṛngowtʾenēn , ochʾ al irentsʾ koghowtʾiwnnerēn .
66010001	Tesay owrish hzōr hreshtag mĕ , or g!ichnēr erginkʾēn . Hakadz ēr amb mĕ , ew dziadzan mĕ gar ir klowkhin vray . Ir eresĕ arewi bēs ēr , ow otkʾerĕ , gragē siwnerow bēs :
66010002	tseṛkʾin mēch ownēr patsʾowadz krkʾoyg mĕ . Ir ach otkʾĕ traw dzovown vray , isg tsakhĕ , tsʾamakʾin vray ,
66010003	ew partsratsayn aghaghagetsʾ , aṛiwdzi mĕ mṛnchʾiwnin bēs . Erp aghaghagetsʾ , eōtʾĕ orotowmnerĕ khōsetsʾan irentsʾ tsaynerov .
66010004	Erp eōtʾĕ orotowmnerĕ khōsetsʾan , es biti krēi , paytsʾ lsetsʾi erginkʾēn tsayn mĕ , or g!ĕsēr : « Gnkʾē ayn panerĕ , or eōtʾĕ orotowmnerĕ khōsetsʾan , ow mi krer zanonkʾ » .
66010005	Ayn hreshtagĕ or tesadz ēi , gaynadz dzovown vray ew tsʾamakʾin vray , ir ( ach ) tseṛkʾĕ partsratsʾowtsʾ erginkʾ ,
66010006	ow ertowm ĕraw anov , or tarē tar , , g!abri , ew steghdzetsʾ erginkʾn ow inchʾ or anor mēch ē , ergirĕ ew inchʾ or anor mēch ē , ow dzovĕ ew inchʾ or anor mēch ē , tʾē al zhamanag biti chʾĕllay .
66010007	Haba , eōtʾnerort hreshtagin tsaynin ōrerĕ , erp sgsi pʾogh hnchʾetsʾnel , Astowdzoy khorhowrtĕ biti gatarowi , inchʾbēs inkʾ awetadz ēr ir dzaṛanerown , markarēnerown .
66010008	Ayn tsaynĕ , or lser ēi erginkʾēn , tartseal khōsetsʾaw indzi ew ĕsaw : « Kna , aṛ ayn patsʾ krkʾoygĕ , or dzovown ow tsʾamakʾin vray gaynogh hreshtagin tseṛkʾin mēch ē » .
66010009	Es al katsʾi hreshtagin ew ĕsi anor : « Towr indzi ayt krkʾoygĕ » . An al ĕsaw indzi : « Aṛ asiga ow lapʾē : biti taṛnatsʾnē pʾort , paytsʾ meghri bēs anoysh biti ĕllay peranit mēch » .
66010010	Aṛi krkʾoygĕ hreshtagin tseṛkʾēn ew lapʾetsʾi zayn . Meghri bēs anoysh ēr peranis mēch , paytsʾ erp geray , pʾors taṛnatsʾaw .
66010011	An al ĕsaw indzi : « Bētkʾ ē or town tartseal markarēanas shat zhoghovowrtnerow , azkerow , lezownerow ew tʾakawornerow masin » .
66011001	Indzi trowetsʾaw eghēk mĕ , kawazani nman , ew gaynadz hreshtagĕ ĕsaw : « Otkʾi elir ow chʾapʾē Astowdzoy tajarĕ , zohaseghanĕ , ew anor mēch ergrbakoghnerĕ .
66011002	Paytsʾ tskē kawitʾĕ , or tajarēn towrs ē , ow mi chʾapʾer zayn , orovhetew an trowadz ē hetʾanosnerown : anonkʾ otnagokh biti ĕnen sowrp kʾaghakʾĕ , kʾaṛasownergow amis .
66011003	Es zōrowtʾiwn biti tam im ergow vganerows , ew anonkʾ , kʾowrts hakadz , biti markarēanan hazar ergow hariwr vatʾsown ōr .
66011004	Asonkʾ ayn ergow tsitʾeninern ow ergow ashtanagnern en , or gĕ ganknin ergri Tēroch aṛchew .
66011005	Etʾē mēgĕ owzē vnasel anontsʾ , grag biti ellē anontsʾ peranēn ew biti lapʾē irentsʾ tʾshnaminerĕ : etʾē mēgĕ owzē vnasel anontsʾ , bētkʾ ē or aysbēs meṛtsʾowi .
66011006	Asonkʾ ishkhanowtʾiwn ownin erginkʾĕ kotsʾelow , orbēszi antsrew chʾteghay irentsʾ markarēowtʾean ōrerĕ : ishkhanowtʾiwn ownin naew chowrerown vray , ariwn tartsnelow zanonkʾ , ew zarnelow ergirĕ amēn tesag batowhasnerov , kʾani ankam or owzen .
66011007	Erp awarten irentsʾ vgayowtʾiwnĕ , ayn aten antowntēn partsratsʾogh kazanĕ biti baterazmi anontsʾ het , biti yaghtʾē anontsʾ ew biti meṛtsʾnē zanonkʾ .
66011008	Anontsʾ tiagnerĕ ingadz biti mnan hrabaragin vray ayn medz kʾaghakʾin , or hokeworabēs Sotom ow Ekibtos gĕ gochʾowi , owr mer Tērn al khachʾowetsʾaw .
66011009	Ew zhoghovowrtnerĕ , tohmerĕ , lezownern ow azkerĕ biti tesnen anontsʾ tiagnerĕ , erekʾ ow gēs ōr , ow tʾoyl biti chʾtan or anontsʾ tiagnerĕ trowin kerezmani mēch .
66011010	Ergri pnagichʾnerĕ biti owrakhanan anontsʾ hamar , biti zowarjanan , ew minchʾew ankam ĕndzaner biti ghrgen irarow : orovhetew ays ergow markarēnerĕ tanchadz ēin ergri pnagichʾnerĕ .
66011011	Erekʾ ow gēs ōr etkʾ , Astowdzmē egogh geankʾi hoki mtaw anontsʾ mēch , gaynetsʾan irentsʾ otkʾerown vray , ow medz vakh hamagetsʾ zirenkʾ tesnoghnerĕ , , .
66011012	Lsetsʾin erginkʾēn hzōr tsayn mĕ , or g!ĕsēr irentsʾ : « Hos partsratsʾēkʾ » . Ew ambov mĕ erginkʾ partsratsʾan , ow irentsʾ tʾshnaminern al tesan zirenkʾ .
66011013	Noyn zhamown hzōr ergrashar zh mĕ eghaw , ew kʾaghakʾin mēg tasnerortĕ gordzanetsʾaw . Eōtʾĕ hazar martig sbannowetsʾan ayt ergrashar zhēn : mnatsʾoghnerĕ vakhtsʾan ow pʾaṛkʾ towin erginkʾi Astowdzoyn .
66011014	Ergrort vayĕ antsʾaw : aha errort vayĕ showtov gow kay .
66011015	Eōtʾnerort hreshtagĕ hnchʾetsʾowtsʾ pʾoghĕ , ow erginkʾi mēch eghan hzōr tsayner , or g!ĕsēin : « Ashkharhi tʾakaworowtʾiwnnerĕ eghan mer Tēroch ew ir ōdzealin , ow an biti tʾakaworē tarē tar , , » .
66011016	Kʾsanchʾors erētsʾnerĕ , oronkʾ pazmadz ēin irentsʾ kaherown vray , Astowdzoy aṛchew , ingan irentsʾ eresin vray ow ergrbaketsʾin Astowdzoy , ĕselov :
66011017	« Kʾezmē shnorhagal enkʾ , Tēr , Amenagal Astowadz , or es ew or ēir , orovhetew girargetsʾir , , kʾow medz zōrowtʾiwnt ow tʾakaworetsʾir .
66011018	Azkerĕ pargatsʾan : kʾow pargowtʾiwnt egaw , naew meṛelnerown atenĕ , orbēszi tatowin , ew town vartsatres kʾow dzaṛanert , markarēnerĕ , sowrpern ow kʾow anownēt vakhtsʾoghnerĕ , bztig tʾē medz , ew abaganes ergirĕ abaganoghnerĕ » .
66011019	Ew Astowdzoy tajarĕ patsʾowetsʾaw erginkʾi mēch : anor owkhtin tabanagĕ erewtsʾaw ir tajarin mēch , ow eghan pʾaylagner , tsayner , orotowmner , ergrashar zh ew khoshor gargowt .
66012001	Medz nshan mĕ erewtsʾaw erginkʾi mēch : - gin mĕ , arewĕ hakadz , lowsinĕ , ir otkʾerown nerkʾew , ew tasnergow astghē bsag mĕ , ir klowkhin vray ,
66012002	yghi ĕllalov g!aghaghagēr : ergownkʾi tsʾaw gĕ kʾashēr ow gĕ tanchowēr dznanelow hamar .
66012003	Owrish nshan mĕn al erewtsʾaw erginkʾi mēch : aha medz shaṛakoyn vishab mĕ gar , or ownēr eōtʾĕ klowkh ow tasĕ eghchiwr , ew ir klowkhnerown vray , eōtʾĕ tʾak .
66012004	Anor bochʾĕ gĕ kʾashēr erginkʾi astgherown mēg errortĕ , ow netetsʾ zanonkʾ ergri vray . Vishabĕ gaynetsʾaw ayn gnoch aṛchew , or dznanelow mōt ēr , orbēszi lapʾē anor zawagĕ , erp dzni .
66012005	Ginĕ dznaw arow zawag mĕ , or ergatʾē kawazanov biti hovowēr polor azkerĕ . Anor zawagĕ yapʾshtagowetsʾaw Astowdzoy ew anor kahin kʾov .
66012006	Ginn al pʾakhaw anabatĕ , owr Astowdzmē tegh batrastowadz ēr anor , orbēszi hon geragrowi hazar ergow hariwr vatʾsown ōr .
66012007	Aba baterazm eghaw erginkʾi mēch : Mikʾayēl ew ir hreshtagnerĕ baterazmetsʾan vishabin het . Vishabn al baterazmetsʾaw ir hreshtagnerov ,
66012008	paytsʾ chʾgrtsʾaw yaghtʾel , ow erginkʾi mēch al tegh chʾktnowetsʾaw anontsʾ .
66012009	Owsti vtarowetsʾaw medz vishabĕ , ayn nakhgin ōtsĕ , CHʾarakhōs ow Satanay gochʾowadz , or moloretsʾowtsʾ ampoghch ergrakowntĕ : vtarowetsʾaw tēbi ergir , ew ir hreshtagnerĕ vtarowetsʾan iren het .
66012010	Ow lsetsʾi erginkʾi mēch hzōr tsayn mĕ , or g!ĕsēr : « Hima eghaw mer Astowdzoyn pʾrgowtʾiwnĕ , zōrowtʾiwnn ow tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ , ew anor ōdzealin ishkhanowtʾiwnĕ : orovhetew khortagowetsʾaw mer eghpayrnerown Ampastanoghĕ , or tsʾereg ow kisher g!ampastanēr zanonkʾ mer Astowdzoyn aṛchew .
66012011	Anonkʾ yaghtʾetsʾin anor , Kaṛnowgin ariwnov ew irentsʾ vgayowtʾean khōskʾov , ow chʾsiretsʾin irentsʾ antsĕ , minchʾew mah .
66012012	Owsti owrakhatsʾēkʾ , erginkʾ , ew towkʾ , or gĕ pnagikʾ anor mēch : vay ergrin ow dzovown , orovhetew CHʾarakhōsĕ ichaw tsezi , sastig zayroytʾov , kʾani or kitē tʾē owni garj zhamanag » .
66012013	Erp vishabĕ tesaw tʾē inkʾ netowetsʾaw ergri vray , haladzetsʾ arow zawag dznanogh ginĕ .
66012014	Medz ardziwi ergow tʾewer trowetsʾan ayt gnoch , orbēszi tʾṛchʾi tēbi anabat , ir teghĕ , owr biti geragrowēr zhamanag mĕ , zhamanagner ow gēs zhamanag , heṛow ōtsin eresēn .
66012015	Isg ōtsĕ ir peranēn hegheghi bēs chowr tʾapʾetsʾ gnoch etewēn , orbēszi hegheghov ĕngghmē zayn .
66012016	Paytsʾ ergirĕ ōknetsʾ gnoch : ergirĕ patsʾaw ir peranĕ ew glletsʾ ayn hegheghĕ , or vishabĕ tʾapʾetsʾ ir peranēn .
66012017	Vishabn al pargatsʾaw gnoch tēm , ow knatsʾ baterazmelow anor zarmēn mnatsʾoghnerown het , oronkʾ gĕ bahēin Astowdzoy batowirannerĕ ew ownēin Yisowsi vgayowtʾiwnĕ .
66013001	Aba gaynetsʾay dzovow awazin vray . Tesay tʾē kazan mĕ gĕ partsranar dzovēn : an ownēr eōtʾĕ klowkh ow tasĕ eghchiwr . Anor eghchiwrnerown vray tasĕ tʾak gar , ew anor klowkhnerown vray , hayhoyowtʾean anownner .
66013002	Ayt kazanĕ nman ēr ĕntsaṛiwdzi : anor otkʾerĕ , archi otkʾerow bēs ēin , ew anor erakhĕ , aṛiwdzi erakhi bēs . Vishabĕ towaw anor ir zōrowtʾiwnĕ , ir kahn ow medz ishkhanowtʾiwn .
66013003	Anor klowkhnerēn mēgĕ mortʾowadzi bēs ēr : paytsʾ anor mahatsʾow vērkʾĕ pow zhowetsʾaw , ew ampoghch ergirĕ skʾanchʾanalov kazanin hetewetsʾaw , , .
66013004	Anonkʾ ergrbaketsʾin vishabin , or ishkhanowtʾiwn towaw kazanin , ow ergrbaketsʾin kazanin , ĕselov : « Ov nman ē kazanin : ov grnay baterazmil anor het » .
66013005	Anor trowetsʾaw peran mĕ , medz paner ew hayhoyowtʾiwnner khōsogh , ow ishkhanowtʾiwn trowetsʾaw anor , ĕnelow ir gamkʾĕ kʾaṛasownergow amis .
66013006	Hayhoyowtʾeamp patsʾaw ir peranĕ Astowdzoy tēm , ew hayhoyetsʾ anor anownin , khoranin ow erginkʾĕ pnagoghnerown tēm .
66013007	Anor ishkhanowtʾiwn trowetsʾaw sowrperown het baterazmelow ew yaghtʾelow anontsʾ . Anor ishkhanowtʾiwn trowetsʾaw polor tohmerown ( ew zhoghovowrtnerown ) ow lezownerown ew azkerown vray .
66013008	Anor biti ergrbaken polor anonkʾ or gĕ pnagin ergri vray ew orontsʾ anownĕ ashkharhi himnatrowtʾenēn i ver krowadz chʾē mortʾowadz Kaṛnowgin geankʾi kirkʾin mēch , , .
66013009	Ov or aganch owni , tʾogh lsē .
66013010	An or kerevarē , inkʾ keri biti tarowi : an or sowrov sbannē , bētkʾ ē or sowrov sbannowi . Hos ē sowrperown hamperowtʾiwnn ow hawatkʾĕ .
66013011	Tesay naew owrish kazan mĕ , or gĕ partsranar ergrēn : ownēr ergow eghchiwr , kaṛnowgi nman , ew gĕ khōsēr vishabi bēs .
66013012	Gĕ varēr aṛachin kazanin ampoghch ishkhanowtʾiwnĕ , anor aṛchew , ow gĕ stibēr ergirĕ ew anor pnagichʾnerĕ , or ergrbaken aṛachin kazanin , orown mahatsʾow vērkʾĕ pow zhowadz ēr .
66013013	Medz nshanner g!ĕnēr , ew minchʾew ankam erginkʾēn grag g!ichetsʾnēr ergri vray , martotsʾ aṛchew .
66013014	Gĕ moloretsʾnēr ergri pnagichʾnerĕ ayn nshannerov , or ĕnelow garoghowtʾiwn trowadz ēr iren , kazanin aṛchew . G!ĕsēr ergri pnagichʾnerown or shinen batgerĕ ayn kazanin , or sowrov viraworowadz ēr paytsʾ abretsʾaw .
66013015	Ew garoghowtʾiwn trowetsʾaw iren , or hoki tay kazanin batgerin , orbēszi kazanin batgerĕ khōsi , naew meṛtsʾnel tay polor anonkʾ , or chʾen ergrbaker kazanin batgerin .
66013016	Gĕ stibēr polorn al , bztig tʾē medz , harowst tʾē aghkʾat , azat tʾē strowg , or troshm ĕntownin irentsʾ ach tseṛkʾin vray gam irentsʾ jagatin vray ,
66013017	orbēszi ochʾ mēgĕ garenay knel gam dzakhel , paytsʾ miayn an , or owni troshmĕ , gam kazanin anownĕ , gam anor anownin tʾiwĕ .
66013018	Hos ē imastowtʾiwnĕ : ov or mitkʾ owni , tʾogh hashowē kazanin tʾiwĕ , kʾani or martow mĕ tʾiwn ē , ew anor tʾiwĕ , vetsʾ hariwr vatʾsownvetsʾ ē .
66014001	Yetoy nayetsʾay , ew aha Kaṛnowgĕ gaynadz ēr Sion leran vray , ow anor het , hariwr kʾaṛasownchʾors hazarĕ , orontsʾ jagatin vray krowadz ēr ( anor anownĕ ew ) anor Hōr anownĕ .
66014002	Ow lsetsʾi erginkʾēn tsayn mĕ , yortaṛat chowrerow tsayni bēs , ew hzōr orotowmi mĕ tsaynin bēs : lsadz tsayns gĕ nmanēr kʾnaraharnerown nowakadz kʾnarnerow tsaynin .
66014003	Anonkʾ g!erkēin nor erk mĕ , kahin , chʾors ēagnerown ow erētsʾnerown aṛchew : ochʾ mēgĕ grnar sorvil ayt erkĕ , patsʾi ayt hariwr kʾaṛasownchʾors hazarēn , oronkʾ knowadz ēin ergrēn .
66014004	Asonkʾ anonkʾ en , or chʾbghdzowetsʾan ginerow het , kʾani or goys en . Asonkʾ anonkʾ en , or gĕ hetewin Kaṛnowgin , owr or an ertʾay : asonkʾ knowetsʾan martotsʾ mēchēn , erakhayrikʾ ĕllalow Astowdzoy ow Kaṛnowgin .
66014005	Nenkowtʾiwn chʾktnowetsʾaw irentsʾ peranĕ , orovhetew anarat en .
66014006	Tesay naew owrish hreshtag mĕ , or gĕ tʾṛchʾēr erginkʾi mēch ew ownēr yawitenagan awetaranĕ , kʾarozelow ergri vray pnagogh polor azkerown , tohmerown , lezownerown ow zhoghovowrtnerown .
66014007	An partsratsayn g!ĕsēr : « Vakhtsʾēkʾ Astowdzmē ew pʾaṛkʾ towēkʾ anor , orovhetew anor tatastanin zhamĕ hasaw : ergrbaketsʾēkʾ anor , or steghdzetsʾ erginkʾĕ , ergirĕ , dzovn ow chowrerown aghpiwrnerĕ » .
66014008	Owrish hreshtag mĕ hetewetsʾaw anor ew ĕsaw : « Gordzanetsʾaw , gordzanetsʾaw medz Papelonĕ , orovhetew polor azkerown khmtsʾowtsʾ ir boṛngowtʾean zayroytʾi kiniēn » .
66014009	Errort hreshtag mĕn al hetewetsʾaw anontsʾ ow partsratsayn ĕsaw : « Ov or ergrbakē kazanin ow anor batgerin , ew ĕntowni anor troshmĕ ir jagatin gam ir tseṛkʾin vray ,
66014010	aniga biti khmē Astowdzoy zayroytʾi kiniēn , or ankhaṛn letsʾowadz ē anor pargowtʾean pa zhagin mēch , ow gragov ew dzdzowmpov biti tanchowi sowrp hreshtagnerown aṛchew ow Kaṛnowgin aṛchew .
66014011	Anontsʾ tanchankʾin dzowkhĕ biti partsranay tarē tar , , : tsʾereg ow kisher hankstowtʾiwn biti chʾownenan anonkʾ , or g!ergrbaken kazanin ow anor batgerin , ew ov or g!ĕntowni anor anownin troshmĕ » .
66014012	Hos ē hamperowtʾiwnĕ sowrperown , oronkʾ gĕ bahen Astowdzoy batowirannern ow Yisowsi hawatkʾĕ .
66014013	Ow lsetsʾi erginkʾēn tsayn mĕ , or g!ĕsēr : « Krē : ay zhmēn isg eraneli en ayn meṛelnerĕ , or gĕ meṛnin Tērochmov » . « Ayo , - g!ĕsē Hokin , - tʾogh hankchʾin irentsʾ ashkhatankʾēn , kʾani or irentsʾ kordzerĕ gĕ hetewin irentsʾ » .
66014014	Aba nayetsʾay , ew aha jermag amb mĕ gar , ow ambin vray mēgĕ pazmadz ēr , martow Ortiin nman : ir klowkhĕ ownēr osgiē bsag mĕ , ew ir tseṛkʾin mēch , sowr mankagh mĕ .
66014015	Owrish hreshtag mĕ towrs elaw tajarēn , ow partsratsayn aghaghagetsʾ ambin vray pazmoghin : « GHrgē kʾow mankaght ew hntsē : orovhetew hntselow zhamĕ hasaw , kʾani or ergri howntskʾĕ hasowntsʾadz ē » .
66014016	Ambin vray gĕ pazmoghn al traw ir mankaghĕ ergri vray , ow ergirĕ hntsowetsʾaw .
66014017	Owrish hreshtag mĕ towrs elaw erginkʾi mēch eghogh tajarēn : inkʾ al ownēr sowr mankagh mĕ .
66014018	Naew zohaseghanēn towrs elaw owrish hreshtag mĕ , or ishkhanowtʾiwn ownēr gragin vray : hzōr ganchʾov kochʾetsʾ anor , or ownēr sowr mankaghĕ : « GHrgē kʾow sowr mankaght ow gtʾē ergri aykiin oghgoyznerĕ , orovhetew anor khaghoghnerĕ hasowntsʾadz en » .
66014019	Owsti ayt hreshtagĕ traw ir mankaghĕ ergri vray , gtʾetsʾ ergri aykiin khaghoghnerĕ ew netetsʾ Astowdzoy zayroytʾi medz hntsanin mēch .
66014020	Hntsanĕ gokhowetsʾaw kʾaghakʾēn towrs , ow ariwn elaw hntsanēn , minchʾew tsierown santserĕ , hazar vetsʾ hariwr asbarēzi taradzowtʾean vray .
66015001	Erginkʾi mēch tesay owrish nshan mĕ , medz ew zarmanali : - eōtʾĕ hreshtagner , oronkʾ ownēin eōtʾĕ verchin batowhasnerĕ , orovhetew anontsʾmov g!awartēr Astowdzoy zayroytʾĕ .
66015002	Tesay naew orbēs tʾē abageghēn dzov mĕ , gragov khaṛnowadz : anonkʾ or yaghtʾadz ēin kazanin , anor batgerin ew anor anownin tʾiwin , gaynadz ēin abageghēn dzovown vray , ownenalov Astowdzoy kʾnarnerĕ .
66015003	Anonkʾ g!erkēin Astowdzoy dzaṛayin , Movsēsi erkĕ , ow Kaṛnowgin erkĕ , ĕselov : « Medz ew skʾanchʾeli en kʾow kordzert , Tēr , Amenagal Astowadz : artar ow jshmarit en kʾow jampanert , Azkerow tʾakawor .
66015004	Tēr , ov biti chʾvakhnay kʾezmē ew chʾpʾaṛaworē kʾow anownt , orovhetew miag sowrpĕ town es : artarew polor azkerĕ biti kan ow ergrbaken kʾow aṛchewt , kʾani or kʾow artar tatavjiṛnert yaytnaperowetsʾan » .
66015005	Asgē etkʾ nayetsʾay , ew aha erginkʾi mēch patsʾowetsʾaw vgayowtʾean khoranin tajarĕ .
66015006	Eōtʾĕ batowhasner ownetsʾogh eōtʾĕ hreshtagnerĕ towrs elan tajarēn , makʾowr ow pʾaylown gtaw hakadz , ew osgiē kōti gabadz irentsʾ gowrdzkʾin vray .
66015007	CHʾors ēagnerēn mēgĕ , eōtʾĕ hreshtagnerown towaw eōtʾĕ osgiē sgawaṛagner , letsʾown tarē tar , , abrogh Astowdzoy zayroytʾov .
66015008	Ow tajarĕ dzowkhov letsʾowetsʾaw , Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾin ew anor zōrowtʾean batjaṛov : ochʾ mēgĕ grnar mtnel tajarĕ , minchʾew or irakordzowēin eōtʾĕ hreshtagnerown eōtʾĕ batowhasnerĕ .
66016001	Lsetsʾi tajarēn hzōr tsayn mĕ , or g!ĕsēr eōtʾĕ hreshtagnerown : « Katsʾēkʾ , tʾapʾetsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy zayroytʾin ( eōtʾĕ ) sgawaṛagnerĕ ergri vray » .
66016002	Aṛachin hreshtagĕ knatsʾ ew tʾapʾetsʾ ir sgawaṛagĕ ergri vray : kēsh ow chʾarorag balar mĕ eghaw ayn martotsʾ vray , or ownēin kazanin troshmĕ , ew anontsʾ vray , or g!ergrbakēin anor batgerin .
66016003	Ergrort hreshtagĕ tʾapʾetsʾ ir sgawaṛagĕ dzovown vray : chowrerĕ meṛadz martow mĕ ariwnin bēs eghan , ow dzovown mēchi polor gentaninerĕ meṛan .
66016004	Errort hreshtagĕ tʾapʾetsʾ ir sgawaṛagĕ keterown ew chowrerow aghpiwrnerown vray , ow anonkʾ ariwn eghan .
66016005	Lsetsʾi chowrerown hreshtagĕ , or g!ĕsēr : « Artar es , town , or es ew or ēir , ow sowrp es , or aysbēs tatetsʾir ,
66016006	orovhetew anonkʾ tʾapʾetsʾin sowrperown ew markarēnerown ariwnĕ : town ariwn khmel towir anontsʾ , kʾani or ar zhani en » .
66016007	Ow zohaseghanēn lsetsʾi , or g!ĕsēr : « Ayo , Tēr , Amenagal Astowadz , kʾow tatastannert jshmarit ew artar en » .
66016008	CHʾorrort hreshtagĕ tʾapʾetsʾ ir sgawaṛagĕ arewin vray ,
66016009	ow zōrowtʾiwn trowetsʾaw anor , or gragov tōtʾagēz ĕnē martigĕ . Martig tōtʾagēz eghan sastig tōtʾēn , ew hayhoyetsʾin anownĕ Astowdzoy , or ishkhanowtʾiwn owni ays batowhasnerown vray : paytsʾ chʾabashkharetsʾin , or pʾaṛkʾ tan anor .
66016010	Hinkerort hreshtagĕ tʾapʾetsʾ ir sgawaṛagĕ kazanin kahin vray , ow anor tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ khawaretsʾaw . TSʾawēn , martig gĕ dzamēin irentsʾ lezown ,
66016011	ow hayhoyetsʾin erginkʾi Astowdzoyn , irentsʾ tsʾawerown ew balarnerown batjaṛov : paytsʾ chʾabashkharetsʾin irentsʾ kordzerēn .
66016012	Vetsʾerort hreshtagĕ tʾapʾetsʾ ir sgawaṛagĕ Epʾrat medz ketin vray , ow anor chowrerĕ tsʾamkʾetsʾan , orbēszi batrastowi arewelkʾi tʾakawornerown jampan .
66016013	Tesay tʾē vishabin peranēn , kazanin peranēn ew sowt markarēin peranēn towrs elan erekʾ anmakʾowr okiner , korterow nmanogh .
66016014	Artarew anonkʾ tewerow okiner ēin , or nshanner g!ĕnēin ow g!ertʾayin ampoghch ergrakownti tʾakawornerown , orbēszi hawakʾen zanonkʾ Amenagal Astowdzoy ayt medz ōrowan baterazmin hamar .
66016015	( Aha koghi bēs gow kam : erani anor , or artʾown gĕ genay ew gĕ bahē ir hantertsnerĕ , orbēszi merg chʾshrchi ow ir anvayelchʾowtʾiwnĕ chʾtesnowi . )
66016016	Ew hawakʾetsʾin zanonkʾ tegh mĕ , or eprayerēn Armaketon gĕ gochʾowi .
66016017	Eōtʾnerort hreshtagĕ tʾapʾetsʾ ir sgawaṛagĕ ōtin mēch , ow erginkʾi tajarēn , kahēn hzōr tsayn mĕ elaw , or g!ĕsēr : « Eghaw » .
66016018	Ew pʾaylagner , tsayner ow orotowmner , , eghan . Hzōr ergrashar zh mĕn al eghaw : aytbisi medz ow hzōr ergrashar zh eghadz chʾēr ergri vray , martotsʾ ĕllalēn i ver .
66016019	Medz kʾaghakʾĕ erekʾ mas eghaw , ew azkerown kʾaghakʾnerĕ gordzanetsʾan . Medz Papelonĕ yishowetsʾaw Astowdzoy aṛchew , orbēszi tay anor ir zayrakin pargowtʾean kiniin pa zhagĕ .
66016020	Amēn gghzi pʾakhaw , ow leṛnerĕ chʾktnowetsʾan .
66016021	Kretʾē taghant mĕ gshṛogh khoshor gargowt ichaw erginkʾēn , martotsʾ vray : ew martig hayhoyetsʾin Astowdzoy , gargowti batowhasin hamar , orovhetew ayt batowhasĕ chʾapʾazantsʾ sastig ēr .
66017001	Eōtʾĕ sgawaṛagner ownetsʾogh eōtʾĕ hreshtagnerēn mēgĕ egaw ew indzi het khōsetsʾaw , ĕselov : « Egowr : tsʾoytsʾ biti tam kʾezi tatastanĕ ayn medz boṛnigin , or gĕ pazmi yortaṛat chowrerow vray :
66017002	anor het boṛngetsʾan ergri tʾakawornerĕ , ew anor boṛngowtʾean kiniov arpetsʾan ergri pnagichʾnerĕ » .
66017003	Zis aṛaw , hokiov taraw anabatĕ , ow tesay gin mĕ , or pazmadz ēr ortan garmir kazani mĕ vray . Ayt kazanĕ letsʾown ēr hayhoyowtʾean anownnerov , ew ownēr eōtʾĕ klowkh ow tasĕ eghchiwr .
66017004	Ginĕ hakadz ēr dzirani ew ortan garmir , bjnowadz ēr osgiov , batowagan kʾarerov ow markaritnerov , ew tseṛkʾin mēch ownēr osgiē pa zhag mĕ , karshowtʾiwnnerov ow ir boṛngowtʾean anmakʾrowtʾiwnnerov letsʾown .
66017005	Anor jagatin vray krowadz ēr anown mĕ : « KHorhowrt , Medz Papelon , boṛnignerown ow ergri karshowtʾiwnnerown mayrĕ » .
66017006	Tesay ayt ginĕ , or arpetsʾadz ēr sowrperown ariwnov ew Yisowsi vganerown ariwnov . Erp tesay zayn , medzabēs zarmatsʾay .
66017007	Hreshtagĕ ĕsaw indzi : « Inchʾow zarmatsʾar : kʾezi biti ĕsem khorhowrtĕ ayt gnoch ow ayt kazanin , or gĕ grē zayn ir vray , ew owni eōtʾĕ klowkh ow tasĕ eghchiwr .
66017008	Ayt kazanĕ or tesar , gar , paytsʾ chʾgay : sagayn biti partsranay antowntēn ow ertʾay tēbi gorowst . Ergri pnagichʾnerĕ , orontsʾ anownĕ krowadz chʾē geankʾi kirkʾin mēch , ashkharhi himnatrowtʾenēn i ver , biti zarmanan , erp tesnen ayt kazanĕ or gar , paytsʾ chʾgay , tʾēbēt gay , , .
66017009	Hos bētkʾ ē imastowtʾiwn ownetsʾogh mitkʾ mĕ . Ayt eōtʾĕ klowkhnerĕ , eōtʾĕ leṛner en , orontsʾ vray gĕ pazmi ginĕ : naew eōtʾĕ tʾakaworner en .
66017010	Hinkĕ ingadz en , mēgĕ gay , isg miwsĕ teṛ egadz chʾē : erp kay , bētkʾ ē or garj aten mĕ mnay .
66017011	Ayt kazanĕ , or gar , paytsʾ chʾgay , an al owtʾerortn ē : eōtʾnēn ē , ow g!ertʾay tēbi gorowst .
66017012	Tasĕ eghchiwrnerĕ , or tesar , tasĕ tʾakaworner en , oronkʾ teṛ tʾakaworowtʾiwn statsʾadz chʾen : sagayn kazanin het mēg zhamow chʾapʾ tʾakawornerow bēs ishkhanowtʾiwn biti aṛnen .
66017013	Asonkʾ miewnoyn nbatagĕ ownin : - irentsʾ zōrowtʾiwnn ow ishkhanowtʾiwnĕ tal kazanin .
66017014	Asonkʾ biti baterazmin Kaṛnowgin het , ew Kaṛnowgĕ biti yaghtʾē anontsʾ : kʾani or an tērerown Tērn ē , ow tʾakawornerown Tʾakaworĕ , ew anor het eghoghnerĕ , ganchʾowadz , ĕntrowadz ow hawatarim en » .
66017015	Naew ĕsaw indzi : « Ayn chowrerĕ , or tesar , orontsʾ vray pazmadz ēr boṛnigĕ , zhoghovowrtner en , pazmowtʾiwnner , azker ew lezowner .
66017016	Ayn tasĕ eghchiwrnerĕ , or tesar kazanin vray , anonkʾ biti aten boṛnigĕ : amayi ow merg biti ĕnen zayn , biti owten anor marminĕ ew gragov biti ayren zayn .
66017017	Orovhetew Astowadz trtetsʾ zanonkʾ , , kordzatrelow ir nbatagĕ , miewnoyn nbatagĕ : - irentsʾ tʾakaworowtʾiwnĕ tal kazanin , minchʾew or irakordzowin Astowdzoy khōskʾerĕ .
66017018	Ew ginĕ , or tesar , ayn medz kʾaghakʾn ē , or gĕ tʾakaworē ergri tʾakawornerown vray » .
66018001	Asgē etkʾ , tesay ( owrish ) hreshtag mĕ , or erginkʾēn g!ichnēr ew medz ishkhanowtʾiwn ownēr , ow ergirĕ lowsaworowetsʾaw anor pʾaṛkʾov .
66018002	An hzōr tsaynov aghaghagetsʾ : « Gordzanetsʾaw , gordzanetsʾaw medz Papelonĕ , ew eghaw tewerow pnagavayr , amēn anmakʾowr okii pant , ow amēn anmakʾowr ew ateli tʾṛchʾowni pant :
66018003	orovhetew polor azkerĕ khmetsʾin anor boṛngowtʾean zayroytʾi kiniēn , ergri tʾakawornerĕ boṛngetsʾan anor het , ow ergri aṛewtragannerĕ harstatsʾan anor berjankʾin zōrowtʾenēn » .
66018004	Lsetsʾi erginkʾēn owrish tsayn mĕn al , or g!ĕsēr : « Elēkʾ ator mēchēn , im zhoghovowrts , orbēszi haghortagitsʾ chʾĕllakʾ anor meghkʾerown ow pa zhin chʾstanakʾ ator batowhasnerēn :
66018005	orovhetew ator meghkʾerĕ gowtagowetsʾan minchʾew erginkʾ , ew Astowadz yishetsʾ anor anirawowtʾiwnnerĕ .
66018006	Hatowtsʾanetsʾēkʾ anor , inchʾbēs inkʾ hatowtsʾanetsʾ , ow grgnabatig pʾokharinetsʾēkʾ anor , ir ararkʾnerown hamemat . Ayn pa zhagĕ or inkʾ letsʾowtsʾ , grgnabatig letsʾowtsʾēkʾ iren .
66018007	Orchʾapʾ pʾaṛaworetsʾ inkʾzinkʾ ew abretsʾaw berjankʾov , aytchʾapʾ al tanchankʾ ow sowk towēkʾ anor , orovhetew ir sirtin mēch g!ĕsē : “ Es gĕ kahagalem ipr tʾakowhi : pnaw ayri chʾem ew pnaw sowk biti chʾtesnem ” .
66018008	Owsti mēg ōrowan mēch biti kan anor batowhasnerĕ , mah , sowk ow sov , ew gragov biti ayrowi : orovhetew hzōr ē zayn tatogh Tēr Astowadzĕ .
66018009	Ergri tʾakawornerĕ , or boṛngetsʾan anor het ew abretsʾan berjankʾov , biti lan ow hedzedzen anor vray , erp tesnen anor hrtehin dzowkhĕ .
66018010	Anor tanchankʾin vakhēn , heṛow biti gaynin ew ĕsen : “ Vay , vay kʾezi , medz Papelon kʾaghakʾ , hzōr kʾaghakʾ , kʾani or mēg zhamowan mēch egaw kʾow tatastant ” .
66018011	Ergri aṛewtragannern al biti lan ow skan anor vray , orovhetew al ochʾ mēgĕ biti knē irentsʾ abrankʾĕ : -
66018012	osgii , ardzatʾi , batowagan kʾarerow ew markaritnerow , pehezi , dziranii , metakʾsi ow ortan garmiri abrankʾ : amēn tesag powrowmnawēt pʾayt , amēn tesag aṛargay , pʾghosgrē , ew amēn tesag aṛarganer , batowagan pʾaytē , bghintsē , ergatʾē ow marmarē :
66018013	ginamon , ( amomon , ) khownger , ōdzanelikʾner ew gntrowg : kini , tsētʾ , nashih ow tsʾoren : anasownner , ochʾkharner , tsier , gaṛkʾer , marminner ew martotsʾ antser .
66018014	Kʾow antsit tsʾangatsʾadz btowghnerĕ katsʾin kʾezmē , polor shkʾegh ow pʾaylown panerĕ katsʾin kʾezmē , ew aylews pnaw biti chʾktnes zanonkʾ » .
66018015	Ays panerown aṛewtragannerĕ , or harstatsʾadz ēin anor michotsʾov , heṛow biti gaynin anor tanchankʾin vakhēn , lalov ow skalov ,
66018016	ew biti ĕsen : « Vay , vay , medz kʾaghakʾ , town or hakadz ēir pehez , dzirani ow ortan garmir , ew bjnowadz ēir osgiov , batowagan kʾarerov ow markaritnerov :
66018017	orovhetew ayschʾapʾ shat harstowtʾiwnĕ aweretsʾaw mēg zhamowan mēch » . Amēn nawavar , polor nawaknatsʾnerĕ , nawastinerĕ , ew anonkʾ , or g!ōktakordzen dzovĕ , heṛow gaynetsʾan
66018018	ow aghaghagetsʾin , erp tesan anor hrtehin dzowkhĕ : « Or kʾaghakʾĕ nman ēr ays medz kʾaghakʾin » .
66018019	Hogh tsʾanetsʾin irentsʾ klowkhin vray , ow lalov ew skalov aghaghagetsʾin : « Vay , vay ayt medz kʾaghakʾin , orown mēch , ir pʾartʾamowtʾenēn harstatsʾan polor anonkʾ , or nawer ownēin dzovown vray : orovhetew mēg zhamowan mēch amayatsʾaw .
66018020	Owrakhatsʾēkʾ anor hamar , erginkʾ , ew towkʾ , sowrp aṛakʾealner ow markarēner , kʾani or Astowadz tser vrē zhĕ aṛaw , , angē » .
66018021	Hzōr hreshtag mĕ vertsʾowtsʾ kʾar mĕ , medz chaghatsʾkʾi kʾari bēs , ow netetsʾ dzovĕ , ĕselov : « Aysbēs sastgowtʾeamp biti khortagowi Papelon medz kʾaghakʾĕ ew al pnaw biti chʾktnowi .
66018022	Kʾnaraharnerown , era zhishtnerown , srnkaharnerown ow pʾoghaharnerown tsaynĕ al pnaw biti chʾlsowi kʾow mēcht : al arhestawor mĕ biti chʾktnowi kʾow mēcht , inchʾ arhestē al ĕllay : chaghatsʾkʾi kʾarin tsaynĕ al pnaw biti chʾlsowi kʾow mēcht :
66018023	jrakin loysĕ al pnaw biti chʾpʾayli kʾow mēcht : pʾesayin tsaynĕ ew harsin tsaynĕ al pnaw biti chʾlsowin kʾow mēcht : kʾani or ergri medzamedznern ēin kʾow aṛewtragannert , ow polor azkerĕ moloretsʾan kʾow gakhartowtʾeampt » .
66018024	Ew markarēnerown , sowrperown ow ergri vray polor mortʾowadznerown ariwnĕ ktnowetsʾaw anor mēch .
66019001	Asgē etkʾ lsetsʾi erginkʾēn medz pazmowtʾean hzōr tsayn mĕ , or g!ĕsēr : « Alēlowia : pʾrgowtʾiwn , pʾaṛkʾ , batiw ow zōrowtʾiwn mer Astowdzoyn :
66019002	orovhetew jshmarit ew artar en anor tatastannerĕ , kʾani or tatetsʾ ayn medz boṛnigĕ , or ir boṛngowtʾeamp abaganetsʾ ergirĕ , ow vrē zhĕ aṛaw ir dzaṛanerown ariwnin , bahanchelov zayn anor tseṛkʾēn » .
66019003	Ew grgin ĕsin : « Alēlowia : anor dzowkhĕ gĕ partsranay tarē tar , , » .
66019004	Kʾsanchʾors erētsʾnerĕ ew chʾors ēagnerĕ ingan ow ergrbaketsʾin Astowdzoy , or gĕ pazmi kahin vray , ĕselov : « Amēn : alēlowia » .
66019005	Ew kahēn elaw tsayn mĕ , or g!ĕsēr : « Kovapanetsʾēkʾ mer Astowadzĕ , towkʾ , ir polor dzaṛanerĕ , ow towkʾ or gĕ vakhnakʾ irmē , tʾē bztigner , tʾē medzer » .
66019006	Lsetsʾi naew tsayn mĕ , medz pazmowtʾean tsayni bēs , yortaṛat chowrerow tsayni bēs ew sastig orotowmnerow tsayni bēs , or g!ĕsēr : « Alēlowia , orovhetew Tērĕ , ( mer ) Amenagal Astowadzĕ tʾakaworetsʾ .
66019007	Owrakhanankʾ , tsʾndzankʾ ow pʾaṛkʾ tankʾ anor , kʾani or Kaṛnowgin harsanikʾĕ hasaw ew ir ginĕ batrastetsʾ inkʾzinkʾ .
66019008	Anor shnorhowetsʾaw haknil makʾowr ow pʾaylown pehez , kʾani or ayt pehezĕ , sowrperown artarowtʾiwnn ē » .
66019009	Naew ĕsaw indzi : « Krē : erani anontsʾ , or hrawirowadz en Kaṛnowgin harsanikʾi ĕntʾrikʾin » . Ow ĕsaw indzi : « Asonkʾ en Astowdzoy jshmarit khōskʾerĕ » .
66019010	Es al ingay anor otkʾerown aṛchew , orbēszi ergrbakem anor . Paytsʾ ĕsaw indzi : « Zkowshatsʾir , mi ĕner : orovhetew es dzaṛayagitsʾ em kʾezi ew eghpayrnerowt , oronkʾ ownin Yisowsi vgayowtʾiwnĕ . Astowdzoy ergrbakē ( orovhetew Yisowsi vgayowtʾiwnĕ markarēowtʾean hokin ē ) » .
66019011	Aba tesay erginkʾĕ patsʾowadz , ew aha jermag tsi mĕ gar . Anor vray hedznoghĕ gĕ gochʾowi Hawatarim ow Jshmarit , ew artarowtʾeamp gĕ tatē ow gĕ baterazmi .
66019012	Anor achʾkʾerĕ gragi potsʾi bēs ēin , klowkhin vray shat tʾaker gayin , ew ownēr krowadz anown mĕ , or ochʾ mēgĕ kitēr , haba miayn inkʾ .
66019013	Hakadz ēr ariwni mēch tʾatʾkhowadz hanterts mĕ . Anor anownĕ gĕ gochʾowi , “ Astowdzoy KHōskʾĕ ” .
66019014	Erginkʾi mēch eghogh zōrkʾerĕ gĕ hetewēin anor , jermag tsierov , jermag ow makʾowr pehezner hakadz .
66019015	Anor peranēn g!ellēr sradz tʾowr mĕ , orbēszi anov zarnē azkerĕ . Inkʾ biti hovowē zanonkʾ , ergatʾē kawazanov , ew inkʾ biti gokhē Amenagal Astowdzoy zayrakin pargowtʾean kiniin hntsanĕ .
66019016	Ir hantertsin vray ow ir aztrin vray ownēr krowadz anown mĕ , “ Tʾakawornerow tʾakawor ew Tērerow tēr ” .
66019017	Tesay naew hreshtag mĕ , or gaynadz ēr arewin mēch . An partsratsayn aghaghagetsʾ erginkʾi mēchtegh tʾṛchʾogh polor tʾṛchʾownnerown : « Egēkʾ ow hawakʾowetsʾēkʾ Astowdzoy medz ĕntʾrikʾin , , ,
66019018	orbēszi owtēkʾ tʾakawornerown marminnerĕ , hazarabetnerown marminnerĕ , hzōrnerown marminnerĕ , tsierown ew anontsʾ vray hedznoghnerown marminnerĕ , ow polorin marminnerĕ , azatnerown tʾē strowgnerown , bztignerown tʾē medzerown » .
66019019	Ew tesay kazanĕ , ow ergri tʾakawornerĕ ew anontsʾ zōrkʾerĕ , hawakʾowadz , baterazmelow tsiown vray hedznoghin het , ow anor zōrkʾerown het .
66019020	Kazanĕ pṛnowetsʾaw , ew anor het , sowt markarēn , or anor aṛchew ĕraw nshanner , orontsʾmov moloretsʾowtsʾ kazanin troshmĕ ĕntownoghnern ow anor batgerin ergrbakoghnerĕ . Ergowkʾn al oghch-oghch netowetsʾan dzdzowmpov vaṛogh gragi lijĕ .
66019021	Isg mnatsʾoghnerĕ sbannowetsʾan tsiown vray hedznoghin tʾowrēn , or g!ellēr anor peranēn : ow polor tʾṛchʾownnerĕ gshtatsʾan anontsʾ marminnerēn .
66020001	Yetoy tesay hreshtag mĕ , or g!ichnēr erginkʾēn : ir tseṛkʾin mēch ownēr antownti panalin ew medz shghtʾay mĕ .
66020002	An pṛnetsʾ vishabĕ , ayn nakhgin ōtsĕ , or CHʾarakhōsn ow Satanan ē , ew gabetsʾ zayn hazar tari .
66020003	Antowntĕ netetsʾ zayn , kotsʾetsʾ ow gnikʾ traw anor vray , orbēszi al chʾmoloretsʾnē azkerĕ , minchʾew or awarti hazar tarin . Angē etkʾ , an bētkʾ ē artsagowi garj zhamanagowan mĕ hamar .
66020004	Tesay naew kaher , orontsʾ vray pazmetsʾan , ew anontsʾ trowetsʾaw tatavarowtʾiwnĕ . Tesay naew Yisowsi vgayowtʾean hamar ow Astowdzoy khōskʾin hamar klkhatowadznerown antserĕ . Anonkʾ chʾergrbaketsʾin kazanin , ochʾ al anor batgerin : chʾĕntownetsʾin anor troshmĕ irentsʾ jagatin gam irentsʾ tseṛkʾin vray . Owsti abretsʾan ow hazar tari tʾakaworetsʾin Kʾristosi het .
66020005	Miws meṛelnerĕ chʾverabretsʾan minchʾew or awartetsʾaw hazar tarin . Ays ē aṛachin yarowtʾiwnĕ .
66020006	Eraneli ew sowrp en anonkʾ , or pa zhin ownin , , aṛachin yarowtʾean mēch . Ergrort mahĕ ishkhanowtʾiwn chʾowni asontsʾ vray : haba anonkʾ biti ĕllan Astowdzoy ow Kʾristosi kʾahananerĕ , ew hazar tari biti tʾakaworen anor het .
66020007	Erp hazar tarin awarti , Satanan biti artsagowi ir pantēn , towrs biti ellē ow moloretsʾnē ergrin chʾors angiwnnerĕ eghogh azkerĕ , Kokĕ ew Makokĕ , orbēszi hawakʾē zanonkʾ baterazmelow : anontsʾ tʾiwĕ dzovow awazin chʾapʾ ē .
66020008	Anonkʾ partsratsʾan ergri laynowtʾean vray , ow shrchabatetsʾin sowrperown panagavayrĕ ew sireli kʾaghakʾĕ .
66020009	Sagayn erginkʾēn , Astowdzmē grag ichaw ow lapʾetsʾ zanonkʾ .
66020010	Isg CHʾarakhōsĕ , or moloretsʾowtsʾ zanonkʾ , netowetsʾaw gragi ew dzdzowmpi lijin mēch . Hon ēin kazann ow sowt markarēn , ew biti tanchowin tsʾereg ow kisher , tarē tar , , .
66020011	Yetoy tesay medz , jermag kah mĕ , ew anor vray pazmoghĕ , orown eresēn ergirn ow erginkʾĕ pʾakhan ew tegh chʾktnowetsʾaw anontsʾ .
66020012	Tesay naew meṛelnerĕ , bztig ow medz , oronkʾ gaynadz ēin Astowdzoy aṛchew . Kirkʾerĕ patsʾowetsʾan : patsʾowetsʾaw naew owrish kirkʾ mĕ , or geankʾi kirkʾn ē : ow meṛelnerĕ tatowetsʾan kirkʾerown mēch krowadznerown hamatsayn , irentsʾ ararkʾnerown hamemat .
66020013	DZovĕ towaw ir mēch eghogh meṛelnerĕ , ew mahn ow t zhokhkʾĕ towin irentsʾ mēch eghogh meṛelnerĕ : ew anonkʾ tatowetsʾan , iwrakʾanchʾiwrĕ , ir ararkʾnerown hamemat .
66020014	Mahn ow t zhokhkʾĕ netowetsʾan gragi lijin mēch : ays ē ergrort mahĕ .
66020015	Ov or geankʾi kirkʾin mēch artsanakrowadz chʾktnowetsʾaw , netowetsʾaw gragi lijin mēch .
66021001	Aba tesay nor erginkʾ mĕ ew nor ergir mĕ , orovhetew aṛachin erginkʾn ow aṛachin ergirĕ antsʾan , ew al dzov chʾgar .
66021002	Tesay sowrp kʾaghakʾĕ , nor Erowsaghēmĕ , or g!ichnēr erginkʾēn , Astowdzmē , ir amowsinin hamar zartarowadz harsi mĕ bēs batrastowadz .
66021003	Ow lsetsʾi erginkʾēn hzōr tsayn mĕ , or g!ĕsēr : « Aha Astowdzoy khoranĕ , martotsʾ mēch . Inkʾ biti pnagi hon , ew anonkʾ biti ĕllan ir zhoghovowrtĕ : Astowadz inkʾ biti ĕllay anontsʾ het , ipr anontsʾ Astowadzĕ .
66021004	Inkʾ biti srpē anontsʾ achʾkʾerēn polor artsʾownkʾnerĕ : al mah biti chʾĕllay , ochʾ sowk , ochʾ kochʾiwn . Aylews pnaw tsʾaw biti chʾĕllay , orovhetew aṛachowan panerĕ antsʾan » .
66021005	Kahin vray pazmoghĕ ĕsaw : « Aha nor g!ĕnem polor panerĕ » . Ew ĕsaw indzi : « Krē , orovhetew ays khōskʾerĕ jshmarit ow vstaheli en » .
66021006	Naew ĕsaw indzi : « Eghaw : es em Alfan ew ōmeghan , Sgizpn ow Vakhjanĕ : es dzarawin tsri biti tam geankʾi chowrin aghpiwrēn .
66021007	An or gĕ yaghtʾē , biti zhaṛankē polor panerĕ , ow es Astowadz biti ĕllam anor , an al orti biti ĕllay indzi .
66021008	Paytsʾ ergchʾotnerown , anhawatnerown , karshelinerown , martasbannerown , boṛngoghnerown , gakhartnerown , gṛabashtnerown ew polor stakhōsnerown pa zhinĕ , biti ĕllay gragov ow dzdzowmpov vaṛogh lijin mēch , or ergrort mahn ē » .
66021009	Eōtʾĕ verchin batowhasnerov letsʾown eōtʾĕ sgawaṛagnerĕ ownetsʾogh eōtʾĕ hreshtagnerēn mēgĕ egaw ew indzi het khōsetsʾaw , ĕselov : « Egowr : tsʾoytsʾ biti tam kʾezi harsĕ , Kaṛnowgin ginĕ » .
66021010	Ow hokiov taraw zis medz ew partsr leran mĕ vray , ow tsʾoytsʾ towaw indzi sowrp kʾaghakʾĕ , Erowsaghēmĕ , or g!ichnēr erginkʾēn , Astowdzmē ,
