66021011	ew ownēr Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾĕ . Anor lowsaworowtʾiwnĕ shat batowagan kʾari nman ēr , piwregheay yasbis kʾari bēs .
66021012	Anor barisbĕ medz ow partsr ēr , ew ownēr tasnergow towṛ : tasnergow hreshtagner gayin tṛnerown kʾov , orontsʾ vray krowadz ēin anownner , aysinkʾn , Israyēli ortinerown tasnergow tohmerown anownnerĕ :
66021013	arewelkʾēn , erekʾ towṛ , hiwsisēn , erekʾ towṛ , harawēn , erekʾ towṛ , arewmowtkʾēn , erekʾ towṛ .
66021014	Kʾaghakʾin barisbĕ ownēr tasnergow him , ew anontsʾ vray krowadz ēin Kaṛnowgin tasnergow aṛakʾealnerown ( tasnergow ) anownnerĕ .
66021015	Indzi het khōsoghĕ ownēr osgiē eghēk mĕ , orbēszi anov chʾapʾē kʾaghakʾĕ , anor tṛnern ow anor barisbĕ .
66021016	Kʾaghakʾĕ kʾaṛagowsi gaṛowtsʾanowadz ēr , ew anor ergaynkʾĕ laynkʾin chʾapʾ ēr : kʾaghakʾĕ eghēkov chʾapʾetsʾ , tasnergow hazar asbarēz . Anor ergaynkʾĕ , laynkʾn ow partsrowtʾiwnĕ noynchʾapʾ ēin .
66021017	CHʾapʾetsʾ naew anor barisbĕ , hariwr kʾaṛasownchʾors gankown , martow chʾapʾov , aysinkʾn , hreshtagin chʾapʾov .
66021018	Anor barisbĕ shinowadz ēr yasbis kʾarē , isg kʾaghakʾĕ zowt osgi ēr , makʾowr abagii nman .
66021019	Kʾaghakʾin barisbin himerĕ zartarowadz ēin amēn tesag batowagan kʾarerov : aṛachin himĕ yasbis ēr , ergrortĕ , shapʾiwghay , errortĕ , kʾaghgeton , chʾorrortĕ , zmrowkht ,
66021020	hinkerortĕ , eghnknakʾar , vetsʾerortĕ , sartion , eōtʾnerortĕ , osgekʾar , owtʾerortĕ , vanagn , innerortĕ , tbazion , tasnerortĕ , kʾrisobrasos , tasnmēgerortĕ , yagintʾ , tasnergrortĕ , meghesig .
66021021	Tasnergow tṛnerĕ , tasnergow markarit ēin : iwrakʾanchʾiwr towṛ , miagtowr markarit ēr . Kʾaghakʾin hrabaragĕ zowt osgi ēr , tʾapʾantsʾig abagii bēs .
66021022	Anor mēch tajar chʾtesay , orovhetew Tērĕ , Amenagal Astowadzĕ , ew Kaṛnowgn en anor tajarĕ .
66021023	Kʾaghakʾĕ bētkʾ chʾowni arewi , ochʾ al lowsini , or lowsaworen zayn : orovhetew Astowdzoy pʾaṛkʾĕ gĕ lowsaworē zayn , ew Kaṛnowgn ē anor jrakĕ .
66021024	( Pʾrgowadz ) azkerĕ biti ĕntʾanan anor loysov , ow ergri tʾakawornerĕ irentsʾ pʾaṛkʾĕ ew batiwĕ biti peren anor mēch .
66021025	Anor tṛnerĕ pnaw biti chʾkotsʾowin tsʾeregĕ : ( orovhetew hon kisher biti chʾĕllay : )
66021026	azkerown pʾaṛkʾn ow batiwĕ biti peren anor mēch .
66021027	Hon pnaw bghdzowtʾiwn mĕ biti chʾmtnē , ochʾ al karshowtʾiwn kordzogh gam sowt khōsogh mĕ : haba biti mtnen miayn anonkʾ , or artsanakrowadz en Kaṛnowgin geankʾi kirkʾin mēch .
66022001	Naew tsʾoytsʾ towaw indzi geankʾi chowri ket mĕ , piwreghi bēs pʾaylown , or gĕ pkhēr Astowdzoy ow Kaṛnowgin kahēn .
66022002	Ayt kʾaghakʾin , , hrabaragin mēchteghĕ , ew ayt ketin mēg goghmn ow miws goghmĕ gar geankʾi dzaṛĕ , or gow tar tasnergow tesag btowgh : amēn amis gow tar ir btowghĕ , isg dzaṛin terewnerĕ azkerown pow zhowmin hamar ēin .
66022003	Al pnaw nzovkʾ biti chʾĕllay , haba anor mēch biti ĕllay Astowdzoy ow Kaṛnowgin kahĕ . Anor dzaṛanerĕ biti bashten zayn ,
66022004	biti tesnen anor eresĕ , ew anor anownĕ biti ĕllay irentsʾ jagatin vray .
66022005	Hon al kisher biti chʾĕllay : anonkʾ bētkʾ chʾownin jraki , ochʾ al arewi loysi , kʾani or Tēr Astowadz biti lowsaworē zanonkʾ , ow biti tʾakaworen tarē tar , , .
66022006	Ew ĕsaw indzi : « Ays khōskʾerĕ vstaheli ow jshmarit en . Tērĕ , sowrp markarēnerown , , Astowadzĕ , ghrgetsʾ ir hreshtagĕ , ir dzaṛanerown tsʾoytsʾ talow inchʾ or bētkʾ ē showtov ĕllay » .
66022007	« Aha showtov gow kam . Erani anor , or gĕ bahē ays kirkʾin markarēowtʾean khōskʾerĕ » .
66022008	Es , Yovhannēs , tesay ays panerĕ , ow lsetsʾi . Erp lsetsʾi ew tesay , ingay or ergrbakem ayn hreshtagin otkʾerown aṛchew , or asonkʾ tsʾoytsʾ gow tar indzi .
66022009	Paytsʾ an ĕsaw indzi : « Zkowshatsʾir , mi ĕner : orovhetew es dzaṛayagitsʾ em kʾezi ow eghpayrnerowt , markarēnerown , ew ays kirkʾin khōskʾerĕ bahoghnerown . Astowdzoy ergrbakē » .
66022010	Naew ĕsaw indzi : « Mi gnkʾer ays kirkʾin markarēowtʾean khōskʾerĕ , orovhetew zhamanagĕ mōt ē .
66022011	An or aniraw ē , tartseal tʾogh aniraw ĕllay , an or aghtot ē , tartseal tʾogh aghtot ĕllay , an or artar ē , tartseal tʾogh artar ĕllay , ew an or sowrp ē , tartseal tʾogh sowrp ĕllay » .
66022012	« Aha showtov gow kam , ow vartsatrowtʾiwns indzi het ē , iwrakʾanchʾiwrin hatowtsʾanelow ir ararkʾin hamemat .
66022013	Es em Alfan ew ōmeghan , Sgizpn ow Vakhjanĕ , Aṛachinĕ ew Verchinĕ » .
66022014	« Erani anontsʾ , or gĕ kordzatren anor batowirannerĕ , orbēszi irawownkʾ ownenan owtelow geankʾi dzaṛēn , ow tṛnerēn ners , kʾaghakʾĕ mtnen .
66022015	Kʾani or towrs biti mnan shownerĕ , gakhartnerĕ , boṛngoghnerĕ , martasbannerĕ , gṛabashtnerĕ , ew ov or sowtĕ gĕ sirē ow gĕ khōsi » .
66022016	« Es , Yisows , ghrgetsʾi im hreshtags , ays panerown masin vgayelow tsezi , egeghetsʾinerown mēch . Es em Tawitʾi armatn ow tsʾeghĕ , aṛtowan baydzaṛ astghĕ » .
66022017	Hokin ow harsĕ g!ĕsen : « Egowr » , ew an or gĕ lsē , tʾogh ĕsē : « Egowr » . An or dzaraw ē , tʾogh kay , ew ov or g!owzē , tʾogh tsri aṛnē geankʾi chowrĕ .
66022018	Es gĕ vgayem polor anontsʾ , or gĕ lsen ays kirkʾin markarēowtʾean khōskʾerĕ : etʾē mēgĕ asontsʾ vray aweltsʾnē pan mĕ , Astowadz al ir vray biti aweltsʾnē ayn batowhasnerĕ , or krowadz en ays kirkʾin mēch .
66022019	Ow etʾē mēgĕ vertsʾnē pan mĕ ays markarēowtʾean kirkʾin khōskʾerēn , Astowadz al biti vertsʾnē anor pa zhinĕ geankʾi kirkʾēn ew sowrp kʾaghakʾēn , orontsʾ masin krowadz ē ays kirkʾin mēch .
66022020	Ays panerĕ vgayoghĕ g!ĕsē : « Ayo , showtov gow kam » . Amēn : egowr , Tēr Yisows .
66022021	Mer Tēroch , Yisows Kʾristosi shnorhkʾĕ tser polorin , , het . Amēn .
